headline: Varimi Vovhiringwa neKushanduka kweMamiriro eKunze kuMaruwa
text: Varimi vekumaruwa kuchamhembe nekumabvazuva kweAfrica vanoti hurumende dzenyika idzi hadzisi kuita hurukuro navo kuti Africa ingarima kudya kwakakwana sei yakatarisana nematambudziko ekuchinja kwemamiriro ekunze ichishandisa nzira dzemuAfrica. Izvi zvabuda pamusangano waitwa muHarare, uchikokerwa nesangano reLa Via Campesina in Southern and Eastern Africa. Varimi vati hurumende dzemuAfrica dzinofanirwa kuchengetedza nzira dzekurima dzemuAfrica kwete kutora zvinobva kure. Sachigaro wesangano iri, Amai Elizabeth Mpofu, avo vanotungamirirawo Zimbabwe Small-Holder Farmers Forum, vatiwo varimi vekumaruma muAfrica havasi kukosheswa sezvinoitwa varimi vemapurazi makuru. Sangano iri rinotiwo rinoda kuti hurumende dzemuAfrica dzisakurudzire kurimwa kwembeu dzakauchikwa vachiti mbeu idzi hadziunze hutano hwakanaka muvanhu. Amai Mpofu vatiwo kunyange hazvo chibvumirano chekurima cheMaputo Declaration chichiti zvikamu gumi kubva muzana zvemabhajeti enyika, zvinofanirwa kubatsira varimi, varimi vekumaruwa havasi kuwana rubatsiro urwu. VaBenedict Aminer, vanomiririra Kenya Peasants League vatiwo nzira zhinji dzekurima dzinoshandiswa nevarimi veminda mirefu dzinokuvadza nharaunda nezviwanikwa asi hurumende dzemuAfrica hadzima zvadziri kuita kugadzirisa dambudziko iri. Sangano iri rinotiwo ranyora tsamba dzenyunyuto munyaya dzemabatirwo ari kuitwa varimi vekumaruwa dzichaendeswa kuSADC neComesa.

headline: Vashandi veHurumende Vanongosva Hurumende Kuti Vatange Zvakare Nhaurirano dzeNJNC
text: Vashandi vehurumende vari pasi pesangano reZimbabwe Confederation of Public Service Trade Unions, iro raimbonzi APEX Council, vakanyorera kuhurumende vachikurudzira kuti nhaurirano dzemihoro, dzeNational Joint Negotiating Council, NJNC, dzimutsiridzwe. Mutevedzeri wemunyori wesangano iri, VaGibson Mushangu, vanoti chikonzero chikuru chaita kuti vanyorere kuhurumende vachiiyeuchidza nezvenhaurirano dzemihoro idzi inyaya yekuti mitengo yezvinhu zvinodiwa nemunhu zuva nezuva iri kungokwira, asi mihoro yevashandi vehurumende isina kwairi kuenda. "Takanyorera hurumende tsamba musi wa 02 mwedzi uno tichivarangaridza kuti tarirai tava mugore idzva rava nemasandukiro aro ekurarama. saka tinotarisirawo kuti tinge tichisangana tichiita hurukuro nekutika isu nyaya yedu yemihoro ndeyekungoti nguva nenguva tagara pasi tichikurukura." VaMushangu vanoti zvavari kuda sevashandi vehurumende hazvirambe zvichichinja, uye hazvisi zvinhu zvakawanda, kunze kwekungoti hurumende idzose mihoro yavo pamari dzavaitambira muna 2018, dzinove madhora mazana mashanu nemakumi maviri emari yekuAmerica pamwedzi. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari veGuta reHarare Vonyunyuta neDanho reKanzuru reKutevera Zvikwereti neMasamanisi
text: Rimwe sangano rinomirira vagari vemuHarare, reHarare Residents Trust, rinoti hazvisi pamutemo kuti kanzuru itange nekutumira masamanisi kuvagari vane zvikwereti isati yagara navo pasi kuti vatsvage nzira dzekubhadhara zvikwereti zvavo. Izvi zvinotevera danho rakaziviswa nekanzuru yeHarare rekuti yave kutevera zvikwereti zvayo zviri muvagari kuburikidza nemasamanisi. Kanzuru inoti vagari vemuHarare vane zvikwereti zvinosvika mabhiriyoni gumi nemanomwe emadhora emunyika, ana kuti (ZWL$17 billion) yemitero isiri kubhadharwa. Mukuru wesangano reHarare Residents Trust, VaPrecious Shumba, vanoti zvinozivikanwa kuti kanzuru haisi kukwanisa kutumira magwaro emitero kuvagari, izvo zvinoita kuti panetse kuziva kuti mugari ane chikwereti chakakura zvakadii.  No media source currently available Asi mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme vanoti vatora danho iri maringe nekuona kuti zvikwereti zviri kukurisa vanhu vasingabhadhare. Vanoti kanzuru inoda kuti mabasa ayo ainotarisirwa kuita arambe achienderera mberi, akaita sekutakurwa kwemarara, kupa vanhu mvura, kugadzira migwagwa, kuisa magetsi, kugadzira zvipatara uye kuti zvikoro zvirambe zvichishanda, VaChideme vanoti nekuda kwaizvozvo, vakaona zvakaringana kuti vanhu vapiwe masamanisi kuti vange vachibhadhara mari dzinodiwa kukanzuru. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzoyambira Kuti muNyika Muchaita Mhirizhonga VaMugabe Vakasavandudza Matongero avo
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vachitungamira sangano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute Dr Pedzisayi Ruhanya vanoti hurumende ikasagadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nevanhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi nyika ichaguma yasvika kumazivandadzoka. Mutauriri wesangano reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association VaDouglas Mahiya vati zvave kuitika munyika hazvisi kuvashamisa nekuti vakagara vataura kare kuti hurumende yemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe inenge yagumirwa. Asi ko chii chaizvo chiri kukonzera mhirizhonga iri kuitika munyika? Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu vari chipanamazano musangano reHuman rights Watch VaDewa Mavhinga vanoti mapurisa ndiwo ari kukonzera kuti munyika muite mhirizhonga nekusatevedzera bumbiro remutemo. Asi Gurukota rinoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwemukati menyika Dr Ignatious Chombo vanoti handi chokwadi kuti mapurisa ari kukonzera mhirizhonga. Zimbabwe yakatarisana nesarudzo muna 2018 asi dzime nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dziri kuyambira kuti pakasaita nhaurirano nyika ichaita mhirizhonga inotyisa. Vesangano ravanaSorojena reThe Elders rine nhengo dzakaita sevaimbova munyori mukuru weUnited Nations Vakofi Anna, avaive mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaJimmy Carter nevamwe vari kukurudzira kuti SADC Ipindire kugadzirisa nyaya yeZimbabwe. SADC iri kusangana kupera kwemwedzi uno kuSwaziland. Sangano reInternational Crisis Group rinoti kuti nyaya yeZimbabwe igadzirike zvave kuda kuti mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe avo vave nemakore makumi mapfumbamwe nemaviri vasiye chigaro. Asi veZanu-PF vanoti VaMugabe havana kwavari kuenda. No media source currently available

headline: Muzvare Linda Masarira Voendeswa kuChipatara
text: Murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu Amai Linda Masarira avo vakapedza mazuva makumi masere vari kujere reChikurubi mushure mekusungwa vachiratidzira zvisiri pamutemo vakaendeswa kuchipatara muHarare husiku hweChipiri mushure mekunge vatanga kurwara. Kumbogara mujeri uu kunonzi nevamwe ndiko kwopa kuti Muzavre Masarira varware. Shamwari yaMuzvare Masarira, VaOstallos Siziba avo vakambovharirwawo kuChikurubi vanoti vakakatyamadzwa nehurwere uhu sezvo vainge vaswera navo vachinzwa zvakanaka muswere wose. VaSiziba vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti Muzvare Masarira vachiri kuongororwa navanachiremba asi vanoti parizvino zvinoratidza kuti chipfuva chavo hachina kumira zvakanaka. VaNqobizitha Mlambo vanoti Muzvare Masarira vanogona kunge vakatapurirwa chirwere vari mujeri reChikurubi iro risina kumira zvakanaka. Vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanogaroshoropodza majeri emunyika vachiti haana hutsanana pamwe nezvekudya zvakanaka. Muna 2011 dzimwe nhengo dzeparamende dzakashanyira majeri mashanu emuno dzikabuditsa gwaro rairatidza kuti kumajeri hakuna mvura yakachena, zvekushandisa zvakakwana pamwechete nezvekudya zvinovaka muviri. Vasati vapinda muchipatara Muxvare Masarira vakaudza Studio 7 kuti dambudziko rimwe guru riri kuChikurubi nderezvekudya sezvo vanhu vachidya zvisina kukodzera. No media source currently available

headline: America Yokurudzira Kuti Vatori veNhau Vasambunyikidzwa Vachiita Basa Ravo
text: Mugwaro ravakabudisa, mutevedzeri wemukuru wemapurisa eFederal Bureau of Investigation (FBI), VaWilliam Sweeney, vakati chikwata chinotsigirwa nehurumende yeIran chakaedza kubvuta mutori wenhau anogara muAmerica kuti vamudzorere zvechisimba kuIran. Mutori wenhau uyu ndiMuzvare Masih Alinejad, akazvarirwa kuIran asi ave mugari wemuAmerica. Kwemakore mazhinji, Alinejad akashanda semutori wenhau muIran, izvo zvakakonzera kuti hurumende yeIran ishatirwe naye pamusoro pezvaakange achibudisa pachena. Kubva zvaatiza kubva kuIran muna 2009, Alinejad ave nemukurumbira pa’social media’, paanogara achishora kumanikidzwa kwevanhukadzi muIran kuti vashandise jira rekuvhara misoro yavo, kana kuti hijab. MuAmerica, Alinejad anechirongwa chaanokokera panhephenyuro yeVoice of America. Mutauriri wemuzinda weWhite House, Amai Jen Psaki, vakashora Iran mukuronga kubvuta Alinejad, vachiti Iran inoda kunyaradza manzwi eavo vanoshanda murugare muIran nekune dzimwe nyika. Muongororo inonzi ‘2021 World Press Freedom Index’, yakaitwa nekunyorwa nesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevatori venhau, reReporters Without Borders, Iran iri pachinzvimbo chezana nemakumi manomwe nechina (174) kubva munyika zana nemakumi masere (180) dzinobvumira vatori venhau kushanda vakasununguka. Sangano iri rinoti, mukudzvanyirira vatori venhau, hurumende yeIran inoshandisa nzira dzechisimba, dzinosanganisira kuvabvunzurudza, kuvaisa mumajeri kana kuvauraya. Sekutaura kwakaitwa negurukota reAmerica rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaAntony Blinken, Iran haisi iyo nyika yega inoshungurudza nekumbunyikidza vatori venhau. VaBlinken vakati hofisi iri mubazi ravo yakabudisa zvayakawana muongororo yayakaita, inonzi Human Rights Report, inotatidza kuti vatori venhau vazhinji varikumbunyikidzwa nekuurairwa basa ravo. Sangano rinorwira kuchengetedza kwevatori venhau, reCommittee to Protect Journalists, rinoti muna 2020, huwandu wevatori venhau vakaurayirwa kuita basa ravo hwakapetwa kaviri, richiti vatori venhau vazhinji vakaurawa muMexico neAfghanistan. Sangano iri rinotivo huwandu hwevatori venhau vakasungirwa kuita basa ravo mugore ra2020 hwakasvika pahusina kumbosvika kubva zvavatanga kuongorora kunetseka pabasa kwevatori venhau, richiti vazhinji vevatori venhau vakasungwa muPeople’s Republic of China, Turkey, nemuEgypt. Mushure mekuziviswa kuti Iran yakange yaedza kumubvuta muAmerica, Masih Alinejad akataura pfungwa dzevatori venhau pasi pose achiti haazoregi kuita basa rake, sezvo zvese zvirikuitika kwaari zvichimusimbaradza. VaBlinken vanoti chokwadi chinobudiswa nevatori venhau chinobatsira mukuvaka hurumende dzejekerere, vachitizve vanokurudzira hurumende dzepasi pose kuti dzichengetedze vatori venhau uye kuti dzione kuti vatori venhau vanoita basa ravo pasina njodzi. No media source currently available

headline: DeMbare yoshandisa Zoom
text: MURAIRIDZI weDynamos FC, Tonderayi “Stanza” Ndiraya anoti chikwata chavo chiri kushandisa dandemutande kuburikidza neZoom kuita gadziriro nevatambi vari kudzimba dzavo.   Nekuda kweCovid-19, nhabvu muno nemimwe mitambo yakasiyana yakambomiswa uye vanhu vari kukurudzirwa kuti vagare kudzimba dzavo senzira yekurwisa kupararira kwehutachiona hwecoronavirus hunokonzera chirwere ichi.   Ndiraya anoti DeMbare iri kushandisa Zoom apo vanenge vachiongorora vatambi vachiita gadziriro dzavo dzekuvaka muviri vari kudzimba.   “Nekuda kwecoronavirus hatisi kukwanisa kuungana nevatambi vedu tichiita gadziriro saka tave kuita gadziriro paZoom tichiudza vatambi zvekuita vachitoita. Asi tinoita vari muzvikwata zvakasiyana,” anodaro.   Anoenderera mberi achiti zvinonetsa hazvo kuongorora vatambi vari kudzimba dzavo kuti vari kuchengetedza miviri yavo here asi vakadzika mutemo wekuti anouzouya kuzotirena muviri wake usina kumira zvakanaka apo dambudziko reCovid-19 rinenge radarika vachamubatira mari.   “Pazvese hapazoshaikwe ny’any’a dzinozviti dzakangwara asi isu takadzika mutemo unovasungirira, anouya muviri wake usina kumira zvakanaka tichamubatira mari. Mwaka uno takatenga vatambi 13 nekudaro vataive navo gore radarika vanoziva kuti zvatoshanduka saka vanofanirwa kurwa kuti vagopinda muchikwata,” anodaro Ndiraya.   Chirongwa chekuti vanhu vagare kudzimba senzira yekurwisa kupararira kweCovid-19 chisati chatanga, Ndiraya akamboenda kunyika yeBelgium uko ainodzidza zvenhabvu.   Anoti akadzidza zvakawanda pamusoro pekusimudzira mutambo uyu ari kunyika iyi.   “Ndakadzidza zvakawanda kuBelgium kuti mutambo unogadzirirwa sei uye zvii zvinodiwa kuitwa kana mutambo wave kutanga.   “Ndinovimba zvandakadzidza zvichandibatsira kuti tigobudirira mumutambo uyu,” anodaro Ndiraya.

headline: ‘Vatambi vetsiva vodya nhoko dzezvironda’
text: PUROMOTA wetsiva Clyde Musonda anoti vatambi vemuno vane chitsama parizvino vave kudya nhoko dzezvironda sezvo vazhinji vavo vachirarama kuburikidza nemutambo uyu uyo wakambomiswa kutambwa senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Musonda anoti vatambi vetsiva vazhinji vari panguva yakaoma.   “Coronavirus yatiisa panguva yakaoma zvikuru uye vatambi vedu vetsiva vazhinji vari kushungurudzikana nekuti havana chekubata. Tsiva yafa, yawira pasi uye vatambi kutaura kuno vari kudya nhoko dzezvironda,” anodaro Musonda.   Anoti ari pakati pekuronga mutambo we “Kick-out Coronavirus” uyo uchazoshandiswa kuunganidza mari yekubatsira vatambi vetsiva nemamaneja avo pamwechete nevanhu vakasangana nedambudziko rechirwere ichi.   Musonda — uyo anove mutungamiri weDeltaforce Boxing Academy — anoti ane chivimbo chekuti mutambo uyu uchabudirira.   “Tine zvakawanda zvatiri kuronga izvo tinofungidzira kuti zvinogona kubatsira vatambi vetsiva kuti vasimukire kubva panguva yakaoma ino yatakatarisana nayo.   “Asi chekutanga tinoshuvira kuti mutambo udzoke. Kune dzimwe nyika sekuAmerica mutambo wewrestling wakatenderwa kuti ukwikwidzwe asi pasina vatsigiri uye tinongoshuvirawo kuti izvozvo zvigoitikawo muno,” anodaro Musonda.

headline: Zimbabwe Yotambira Dzimwe Nhomba dzeCovid-19 Kubva KuChina
text: Zimbabwe nemusi weMuvhuro yakatambira dzimwe nhomba dzedenda reCovid-19 kubva kuChina panguva iyo paine kurudziro yekuti hurumende ishande zvakasimba kuti nhomba idzi dzitengwe dzakawanda kuitira kuti dzikwanire veruzhinji. Zimbabwe yawana dzimwe nhomba zviuru mazana manomwe (700 000) dzeSinopharm dzabva kuChina. Nhomba idzi dzasvika munyika manheru ano mushure mekusvika kwenhomba zviuru mazana masere (800 000) dzakabva kuChina zvakare. Mukuru anoona nezvechirwere cheCovid 19 muhofisi yemutungamiri wenyika, Doctor Agnes Mahomva, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende iri kushanda zvakasimba kuti nhomba dzeCovid 19 dziwande munyika kuitira kuti dzishandiswe mukurwisa denda iri. Doctor Mahomva vatiwo vanhu vanofanira kuramba vachienda munzvimbo dzose dziri kubayiwa nhomba idzi kuitira kuti vakwanise kubayiwa vozvidzivirirawo kudenda reCovid 19. Asi vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano uye vari munyori anoona nezvehutano muMDC Alliance, Doctor Henry Madzorera, vatiwo hurumende inofanira kutenga nhomba dzakawanda nguva imwechete kuitira kuti veruzhinji vasanetseke kuwana nhomba idzi. Hurumende inoti vanhu vakabayiwa nhomba yekutamba kusvika mukupera kwezuva reChitatu vave miriyoni imwe nezviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi matanhatu nezviviri nemazana maviri nemakumi masere nevashanu (1 562 285) uye vakabayiwa nhomba yepiri vave zviuru mazana manomwe zvine gumi nezvitatu nezana rimwe chete nemakumi matatu nemumwe chete (713 131). Vanhu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva pachakatanga kupinda munyika ichi vave zviuru zana nezvitatu zvine mazana mashanu nemakumi matanhatu nevanomwe (103 567) uye vapora vave zviuru makumi manomwe nechimwe nemazana matatu ane makumi masere nevatatu (71 383). Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu makumi matanhatu (60) vakafa nezuro zvabva zvasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi muZimbabwe pazviuru zvitatu nemazana matatu nemakumi mana (3 340). Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba kuvanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisarambe chichipararira munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Human Rights Watch Yokurudzira Kuti Vana Vasashandiswa Mumapurazi eFodya
text: Zimbabwe iri kukurudzirwa nesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reHuman Rights Watch, kuti ichengetedze kodzero dzevana vachiri pasi pezera, avo vari kushandiswa muminda yefodya zvisiri pamwero. Sangano iri raparura gwaro reongororo yarakaita pakushandiswa kwevana vadiki mumapurazi efodya munyika. Mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vana vari kushandiswa mumapurazi efodya zvinoita kuti muchetura we ‘nicotine’ upinde muganda ravo uchikonzera zvirwere. VaMavhinga vanoti sangano ravo rayambira hurumende pamusoro pezvirwere izvi uye kuti idzike mitemo yakasimba inobatsira vana ava uye vanhu vakuru vari kushanda vasina kupfeka mbatya dzinodzivirira muchetura uyu. “Pane chirwere chikuru chinobva mukubata fodya, ingava nyoro kana yakaoma, kana paya painopiswa chinonzi muchetura we ‘nicotine’. Kana vana vachishanda mumunda vanenge vachinzwa kupera simba, kuda kurutsa, kusvotwa kana kuita sevane nyongo. Ndizvo zvimwe zviratidzo zvekuti pane chirwere ichocho,” VaMavhinga vakaudza Studio 7. “Takaonazve kuti vana nevabereki nevarimi vefodya vazhinji, vange vasingatozivi dambudziko iroro.” VaMavhinga vanoti vakaita hurukuro nehurumende pamusoro penyaya iyi uye vakavimbiswa kuti hurumende ichaedza kugadzirisa nyaya iyi kutanga nekuisa mitemo yakasimba inochengetedza hutano hwevana. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi muNyaya dzezveHupfumi Dzinoti Zimbabwe Ngaivandudze Mitemo Kuti Ikwezve veMabhizimisi veKunze
text: Sangano reZimbabwe Investment Authority kana kuti ZIA rinoti chirongwa charo chekubatsira vekunze kuti vakwanise kunyoresa makambani avo nechimbi chimbi cheOne Stop Investment Centre chiri kufamba zvakanaka. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti hurumende inofanira kugadzirisa mitemo yavo kuti vanhu vaite chivimbo neZimbabwe. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti kukakavadzana kwemakurukota ehurumende pagwara rezvehupfumi hakupe chimiro chakanaka. Sachigaro webhodhi reZIA VaNigel Chanakira vanoti chirongwa ichi chave kureva kuti zvave kutora maawa masere kuti munhu anyorese bhizimisi kwete mazuva makumi maviri nemasere. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe Dr Godfrey Kanyenze vanoti uhu hurongwa hwakanaka asi handizvo chete zvingakwezve vekunze. VaKanyenze vanoti Zimbabwe inofanira kuziva kuti iri kukwikwidzana nenyika dzakawanda nekudaro inofanira kusunga dzisimbe. No media source currently available

headline: Mhirizhonga yamisa mitambo yePSL
text: PREMIER Soccer League inoti yambomisa mitambo yose yenhabvu yeCastle Premiership nekuda kwemhirizhonga iyo iri kukonzera kuti mimwe mitambo isapere zvakanaka.   Danho iri rinotevera mhirizhonga yakaitika kunhandare yeBabourfields kuBulawayo nemusi weSvondo pamutambo weHighlanders neDynamos izvo zvakaona mutambo uyu uchitadza kupera.   Muchinyorwa, chamangwiza wePSL – Kennedy Ndebele – anoti vamisa mitambo zvichitevera kuwanda kwenyaya dzemhirizhonga.   “Nekuda kwemhirizhonga iyo iri kuitika kumitambo yakasiyana, izvo zviri kuzosvibisa nhabvu yedu, tatora danho rekuzivisa kuti mitambo yose yePSL yambomiswa. Tichazokuzivisai kuti ichadzoka rinhi.   “Iye zvino tave kuita hurukuro nevanochengetedza mutemo vanosanganisira Zimbabwe Republic Police (ZRP), vanochengetedza mitemo kuzvikwata zvakasiyana nevaridzi venhandare kuti titsvage nzira dzekupedza mhirizhonga iyi.   “Tinotora mukana uno kukumbira ruregerero kuvatsigiri, vakotsveri vedu nevose vane chekuita nenhabvu. Tinovimbisa kuti tichagadzirisa nyaya iyi,” anodaro Ndebele.    Mhirizhonga yakaitika kuBabourfields pamutambo weHighlanders neDynamos nemusi weSvondo wadarika   Anoti iye zvino vazivisa zvikwata zveHighlanders neDynamos kuti vavanyorere vachitsanangura kuti zvakafamba sei musi weSvondo wadarika.   Mhirizhonga iyi yakaona vatsigiri vezvikwata zviviri izvi vachipinda munhandare mutambo usati wapera zvikakonzeresa kuti umiswe apo Bosso yainge yakatungamira 1-0.   Masvondo adarika kuMandava Stadium kuZvishavane, mutambo weFC Platinum neHighlanders wakatadza kupera zvekare zvichitevera mhirizhonga apo FC Platinum yainge yapihwa pena.   Vatsigiri veBosso vakapinda munhandare vachinyunyuta.

headline: Vakawanda Votyira Kudeuka kweRopa Munyika
text: Vanhu vakawanda vanoti vave kutyira kuti munyika munogona kudeuka ropa kana mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakasagadzirisa nyaya yekunetsana kunotyisa kuri kuitika mubato reZanu-PF. NeChina mudzimai waVaMugabe, Amai Grace Mugabe, vakati murume wavo anofanira kubuda pachena kuti ndiyani achatora chigaro chake kuitira kuti kurwisana kunotyisa kwoitika mubato iri kumire. VaMugabe mbune vakatendawo kuti mubato mavo mune kunetsana kunotyisa uye vakati mauto ave kunyanya kupindira mukurwisana kuri mubato ravo. Mumwe ari kutevera zviri kuitika muZanu PF, VaWhisper Makuni, vanoti kunetsana kuri muZanu-PF kunogona kukonzera kusagadzikana kwenyika uye vashora VaMugabe nekusagadzirisa nyaya dziri munyika. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nechimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri kuSouth Africa, VaNhamo Goronga. VaJoseph Dhliwayo, avo vari kuSouth Africa zvekare, vanotiwo VaMugabe ndivo vakazvisikira moto muziso nekugarisa pachigaro vachirambidza vanhu kutaura nezvemunhu achatora chigaro chavo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vachidzidzisa paLummumbashi University kuZambia, VaShakespera Hamauswa, vanobumawo kuti nyika yananga kuna taisireva. Mubato reZanu-PF mune kunetsana kukuru pakati pezvikwata zviri kuzivikanwa nerekuti Team Lacoste, iyo inonzi inotungamirwa nemumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, uye Generation 40, iyo inonzi yave kuda kuti gurukota rinoona nezvemauto, VaSydney Sekeramai, vatore chigaro chaVaMugabe. Vaimbova mutauriri weZanu-PF, VaRugare Gumbo, vanoti VaMugabe vagara vachifarira havo VaSekeramai. Vamwe veTeam Lacoste vataura neStudio 7 vati mubato ravo matanga kurwisana kunotyisa pakati pemaKaranga ayo anonzi ari kuti Mazezuru neMaNdebele vabatana kuti Makaranga asatore hutungamiri. Asi nyanzvi gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaDewa Mavhinga, varamba mashoko aya. VaMavhinga vashorawo VaMugabe nekuregerera mauto achipindira munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vachiti zvapa kuti muve nekusagadzikana munyika. Vamwe muZanu-PF vanonzi vari kukurudzira VaMugabe kuti vamise basa mukuru wemauto,General Constantino Chiwenga, nevamwe vakuru vemauto vari kupomerwa mhosva yekupindira mune zvematongerwo enyika. VaGumbo vatiwo nyaya yekutadza kugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi nekutukana iri kupa kuti zvinhu zvirambe zvakaita manyama amire nerongo munyika, izvo zvave kukonzera kusagadzikana. Kunyange hazvo vakawanda vari kuti VaMugabe vadome achatora chigaro chavo, mutevedzeri wemunyori wezvemutemo mubato iri, VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana, vanoti vatungamira vanosarudzwa nevanhu pakongiresi. Bato reZanu-PF rakatozivisa gore rapera kuti VaMugabe ndivo vachakwikwidza musarudzo dzegore rinouya vakamirira Zanu-PF. Vakadzingwa muZanu PF uye vari mutauriri weZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association, VaDouglas Mahiya, vanoti VaMugabe vanofanirwa kuziva kuti nyika ndeye vanhu vemuZimbabwe, kwete yaivo VaMugabe nemudzimai wavo chete.  Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti makore avo uye hutano hwavo zvinopa kuti vakawanda vasave nekugadzikana. VaMugabe vakapinda musarudzo idzi vanenge vave nemakore makumi mapfumbamwe nemana. No media source currently available

headline: Madzimai Odzidziswa Kubatsira Madzimai Akazvitakura
text: Mukuedza kuderedza kufa kwemadzimai akazvitakura pamwe nekuchengetedza hutano hwevagari vekumaruwa, mamwe masangano akazvimirira ave kudzidzisa madzimai kuchengetedzwa kwehutano kuitira kuti vazodzidzisawo vavakagarisana navo kumaruwa. Mumwe wemadzimai akadzidziswa basa iri kuitira kuti azobatsirawo mamwe madzimai, ndiAmai Rena Round, avo vanogara mubhuku rekwaMambondiani kuDora mudunhu reManicaland. Amai Round, avo vanopinda chechi yemapostori isingabvumidzi nhengo dzayo kuenda kuzvipatara, vanoti chirongwa ichi chiri kubatsira zvikuru nharaunda yavo sezvo pari zvino vamwe vanhu vaisaziva mikova yezvipatara vave kukoshesa kuenda kuzvipatara. Amai Round vanotiwo kunyange hazvo makore mashoma apfuura vaive nedambudzo remadzimai akawanda aifa vakazvitakura, vanoti dambudzo iri rave kugadzirisika sezvo vari kudzidzisana kukosha kwekunyoresa kana mudzimai abata pamuviri, uye kuita izvi nguva ichipo. Madzimai aya ari kubatsirwa nemari inobva ku IM Swedish Development Partner. Sangano reDiocese of Mutare Community Care Programme rinoti rakakwanisa kudzidzisa madzimai makumi mapfumbamwe nemashanu, ayo anoshanda mumawadhi maviri, Ward 11 neWard 35. Madzimai aya ndiwo anodzidzisa vagari vemunzvimbo iyi inonzi ine vanhu vanosvika makumi maviri ezviuru vazhinji vacho vari mapostori. VaPeter Mashonganyika vanoshanda ne Diocese of Mutare Community Care Program, uye mumwe wevanodzidzisa madzimai aya zvehutano. VaMashonganyika vanoti vari kufadzwa zvikuru nechirongwa ichi sezvo ndufu dzaderera munzvimbo yavanoshandira iyi. KuChipinge, chirongwa chekudzidzisa madzimai aya chiri kuitwa nesangano rakazvimiririra rinonzi Community Organisation for Poverty Alleviation in Zimbabwe. Sangano iri rakadzidzisawo vagari vekuChipinge Ward 17 ne Ward 18 vanosvika makumi masere nevatatu Mumwe wevari kudzidzisa madzimai kuChipinge, Amai Sarah Mafondora, vanoti kuburikidza nedzidzo yaveko, vanhu vakawanda vava kuziva nzira dzekuchengetedza hutano. VaWitmore Masengu vanoshnada neIM Swedish Development Partner. VaMasengu vanoti tsvagiridzo yavakaita kudunhu reManicaland muna 2014 yakaratidza kuti kwange kuine vakadzi vakawanda vaifa vakazvitakura, uye zvirwere zvepabonde kumadzimai aya zvaive zvakawanda. VaMasengu vanotiwo vanhurume vazhinji kunzvimbo iyi vaive vasina hany’a nehutano hwemadzimai avo kunyanya vakazvitakura izvo zvakapa sangano ravo kuti ribatsire nemari yekuti vagari venzvimbo idzi vawaniswe dzidziso yezveutano. No media source currently available

headline: Simba, Chegutu Pirates zvakaumburudzana
text: Ndooka   SACHIGARO weZifa Northern Region Division One, Martin Kweza, oshora zvikuru mhirizhonga yakaitika kunhandare yeWadzanai kuShamva svondo radarika izvo zvakaona vatambi veSimba Bhora FC neChegutu Pirates vachirwa mumutambo weAxis Solutions Super 8 Tournament.   Zvimbokoma izvi zvakaitika mushure mekunge Simba Bhora yatungamira mumutambo uyu watambwa maminitsi masere izvo zvakazoona Constantine Tinapi weSimba Bhora naLewis Milanzi weChegutu Pirates vese vachipihwa makadhi matsvuku (red card) kuti vabude mumutambo uyu mushure mekunge varwisana.   Mutambo uyu wakazohwinwa neSimba Bhora 4-0. Achitaura pamusoro pechiitiko ichi, Kweza anoti nhabvu haizi hondo nekudaro vatambi vanofanirwa kutamba zvakanaka uye vachigamuchira zvinenge zvabuda mumutambo kwete kurwisana.   “Hatitarisire kuona vatambi vachirwa munhandare sezvatakaona zvichiitika izvi. Nhabvu haisi hondo, tinoda hunhu hwakanaka nguva dzose,” anodaro Kweza.   Anoti vachagara pasi vozeya nyaya iyi uye vatambi vose vakarwa vachavatemera zvirango zvekubhadhara faindi yemari inotangira paUS$$100 kusvika paUS$200.   “Nyaya iyi tichanyatsoizeya zvakasimba uye vanenge vabatwa nemhosva tichavabadharisa faindi yemari inobvira paUS$100 kusvika US$200,” anodaro Kweza.   Zvakadai, mune mumwe mutambo weAxis Solutions Super 8 Tournament wakatambwa svondo radarika, Herentals Under-20 yakakunda Black Mambas 4-3 kumapena zvichitevera kupera kwawakaita uri mangange 1-1.   NeMugovera svondo rino, chinenge chakachaya kuBaobab Stadium uko Golden Eagles ichabandana neNgezi U19 muquarter-final yeAxis Solutions Super Cup kuchiti musi weSvondo kuTrojan Mine kuBindura kunenge kusingadanwe anonzwa apo Commando Bullets ichasangana neTrojan Stars.

headline: Chingwa Chotarisirwa Kushomeka Zvakanyanya Mushure Mekunge Hurumende Yadzikisa Mutengo
text: Mutungamiri weBakers Association of Zimbabwe, rimwe sangano revanobika chigwa VaWellington Peyama vanoti danho rehurumende rekuti chingwa chidzikiswe kubva pamadhora maviri nemakumi matatu nemashanu kuenda padhora nemakumi masere rinoshanda chete kana bhanga reRBZ richikwanisa kuvapa mari yekuAmerica kuti varitenge pamukoto zvopa kuti vatatarike. Kudzikiswa kwechingwa nehurumende kuri kutarisirwa kutokonzera kushaikwa kwacho kunzvimbo dzakawanda sezvo vanobika chingwa vatodzikisa huwandu hwacho nekushaikwa kwedhora rekuAmerica. Gurukota rezvemaindustry VaNqobizitha Ndlovu vanoti hurumende ichabatsira vanobika chingwa nemari yekunze. No media source currently available

headline: Kuonekwa kweMauto mumaMisha Munguva dzeSarudzo Kwotyisa Vagari vekwaZvimba
text: Vagari vekwaZvimba vanoti havasi kufara nemasoja ari kungombeya mavanogara nenzvimbo dzekutandarira. Masoja aya anonzi akatanga kuonekwa mwedzi wapera, uye anenge akapfeka nhumbi dzechiuto, achingofamba mumamisha nenzvimbo dzekutandarira dzepamataundishipi. Zvinonzi hapana anoziva kwavanoenda kana nguva dzemanheru dzakwana asi zuva rinotevera vanenge vadzoka. Mumwe mugari wekwaMadzima kwaZvimba anoda kuzivikanwa nezita rekuti Priveledge anoti masoja maviri akaiswa muwadhi mavo. Priveledge anoti masoja aya haazivikanwe kwaanogara, uye anofunga kuti donzvo ravo nderekuti vadzivirire vagari kutsigira mamwe mapato anopikisa. Masoja aya anonzi anoonekwawo kuMakonde, padyo nedhamu riri pedyo neShackleton. Mugari wekuShackleton, VaKingstone Muza, vanoti masoja ari kuudza vagari kuti vatsigire hurongwa hutsva huri munyika. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi remasoja panyaya iyi, asi mutauriri wemauto, VaAlfios Makotore, vakamboudza vatori venhau kuti masoja ari kufamba-famba mumamisha, masoja akapanduka. Mune imwewo nyaya, nhengo dzebato reZANU PF dzakaungana munzvimbo dzakasiyana dzichivandudza mapazi ebato epasi, kana kuti cells, nyika yose. Misangano iyi inonzi yakapindwa nevanhu vashoma muChinhoyi nekwaZvimba. Vakapinda misangano iyi vanoti vakanzi vanyore nhengo dzebato iri mazita idzo dzakanyoresa kuvhota uye kuti vavandudze masero avo kuti apindirane nenzvimbo dzekuvhotera, polling stations. Zvinonzi bato reZanu PF riri kuda kuenzanisa huwandu hwenhengo dzaro dzakanyoresa kuvhota nezvakabuda pahuwandu hwevanhu vakanyoresa pachirongwa chekunyoresa chebazi reZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC. No media source currently available

headline: Handirohwe muno: Manyuchi
text: CHARLES Manyuchi anoti kunyangwe zviite sei haafe akakundwa mutambo waanorwira muno pamberi pevatsigiri vake.   Shasha yetsiva iyi yange iri kutarisirwa kusangana naMudamad Sebyala wekuUganda munaChivabvu achirwira kuchengetedza bhande rake reWorld Boxing Federation.   Mushure mezvo, ange achifanirwa kuzorwa zvakare naSebyala vachirwira bhande reWorld Africa Boxing Association Supreme Middleweight.   Vaviri ava vaitarisirwa kusangana nemusi wa4 Kubvumbi kuHarare International Conference Centre (HICC).   Mutambo uyu hauchaenderera mberi nekuda kwedanho rakatorwa neHurumende rekumbomisa mitambo yose uye kuungana kwevanhu senzira yekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere checoronavirus.   Manyuchi anoti akagadzirira zvikuru mutambo uyu.   “Pandinorwira muno ndinenge ndiri pamusha saka handisiye munhu achiuya kuzondidherera uye handimbofe ndakakundwa ndiri mumba mangu.   “Muno ndimo muZimbabwe mumba mangu uye zvakafanana nekuti haungaregere munhu achiuya mumba mako okudherera oita zvaanoda newe.   Ini izvozvo handimbozvitendere kana kamwechete, ndinorwira kuchengetedza zita rangu uye kusimudza mureza wenyika wangu,” anodaro.   Kubva Manyuchi zvaakakundwa naQudratillo Abdukakhorov wekuUzbekistan mugore ra2017 apo akatorerwa bhande rake reWBC Silver Welterweight, akwanisa kutamba mitambo mishanu ndokuhwina mina achikundwa mumwechete.

headline: Mumwe Munhu Ofa neCovid-19 kuBulawayo, Vanodarika Zana Vachibatwa neChirwere Ichi muHarare
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika hwasvika pamazana maviri nevasere kana kuti 208 zvichitevera kufa kwemumwe munhu kuBulawayo neSvondo. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi vasvika zviuru zvinomwe nezana rine gumi nevatanhatu kana kuti7, 116. NeSvondo vanhu zana nemakumi matatu nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 139 vakanzi vabatwa nechirwere ichi zana nemakumi maviri nevana kana kuti 124 vari vemuHarare. Asi bazi rezvehutano rinoti vamwe vanhu ava vainge vavhenekwa kare asi vasati vaziviswa zvainge zvabuda kwemazuva akati wandei. Vanhu vapora zviuru zvishanu nemazana matatu nemakumi manomwe nevatatu kana kuti 5, 373. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano uye vakambotungamira chipatara chechitungwiza central hospital dr enoch mayida. zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana ma`viri kana kuti 1, 2 million vabatwa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Vafa vasvika zviuru makumi matatu nechimwe zvine makumi mashanu nevatanhatu kana kuti 31, 056. Vapora vadarika miriyoni imwe chete. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nematanhatu nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 26, 9 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi muAmerica vadarika zviuru zana zvine mazana masere nemasere kana kuti 188,000. Vanhu vafa pasi rose vasvika zviuru mazana masere ane makumi masere kana kuti 880, 000. Vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni gumi nemanomwe ane zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 17, 9 million.

headline: Zifa, PSL vokandirana nyoka mhenyu
text: Sangano rinoona nez- venhabvu muno reZimba- bwe Football Association rokandirana nyoka mhenyu nerePremier Soccer League pamusoro penyaya yekuti mitambo yePSL ichatanga riinhi zvichitevera mashoko akabva kuConfederation of African Football (CAF) ekuti nhandare dzemuno hadzina kukodzera kutambirwa nhabvu nezvikwata zvekunze.   Svondo radarika, CAF yakabuda pachena kuti muZimbabwe hamuna nhandare kana imwechete yavanoona yakakodzera kuti itambirwe nhabvu nezvikwata zvekunze.   Izvi zvinoreva kuti mutambo wechikwata chenyika chemaWarriors wekurwira kuenda kumakwikwi eAfrica Cup of Nations 2020 neAlgeria uchatambirwa kunze kwenyika.   Hurumende parizvino iri mushishi yekuona kuti nhandare dzinosanganisira National Sports Stadium iri muHarare neBarbourfields kuBulawayo dzagadziriswa.   Kazhinji mitambo yePSL inotanga kupera kwemwedzi waKurume asi parizvino mamiriro ezvinhu haana kujeka zvichitevera mashoko akabva kuCAF aya.   Mukushi wemashoko wePSL Kudzai Bare anoti nyaya yenhandare iyi yakakomba asi zvose zvinoitwa neZifa.    Kudzai Bare   Anoti Zifa ndiyo inoongorora nhandare dzese dzemuno uye yovazivisa dzinokodzera kutambirwa nhabvu nezvikwata.   “Isu zvose zvenhandare tinozvisiira mumaoko eZifa ndiyo inoongorora nhandare dzese dziri muno dzinoda kushandiswa nezvikwata zvenhabvu zvinokwikwidza muPSL votizivisa dzavanenge vaona dzakakodzera kutambirwa nhabvu.   “Isu tinozongotevedzera zvavanenge vatiudza, saka zvimwe zvese zvizere zvekuti nhandare dzedu dzinokwanisa here kutambirwa nhabvu yePSL munotozvinzwa kuZifa,” anodaro.   Achibvuzwa neKwayedza kuti mitambo yePSL inogona kutanga rinhi, Bare anoti izvi zvichazoziviswa mushure memusangano wavo wepagore weAnnual General Meeting (AGM) kupera kwesvondo rino.   “Tichagara pasi sesangano uye tichaita musangano wedu wekutanga wegore mukuru weAGM kupera kwesvondo rino apo ticharonga kuti mitambo inotanga rinhi. Asi, tichange tichishanda neZifa tichinzwa kubva kwavari kuti nhandare dzinoita ndedzipi kuti mitambo itange,” anodaro Bare.   Mutauriri weZifa, Xolisani Gwesela anoti nyaya dzenhandare yemitambo yePSL zvinozivikanwa nevePSL.   Mushure mekunge Kwayedza yamuudza kuti PSL iri kutiwo zvenhandare zviri mumaoko avo, anoti vachagara pasi kupera kwesvondo rino kuti vagoronga kuti nhandare dzokushandisa dzedzipi.   “Zviri mumaoko ePSL inzwai kubva kwavari. Isu tichazogara hedu pasi kupera wesvondo rino toona kuti nhau iyi ichafambiswa sei,” anodaro Gwesela.

headline: MDC Alliance Yoronga Kusarudza Mutevedzeri waMeya weChitungwiza
text: Bato reMDC Alliance rinoti richaenderera mberi nekusarudza mutevedzeri wameya weChitungwiza richiti kudomwa kwemutevedzeri wameya kwakaitwa negurukota rematunhu, VaJuly Moyo, hakusi pamutemo. VaMoyo vakadoma nhengo yeZanu PF, VaKiven Mutimbanyoka, semutevedzeri wameya kutanga kwesvondo rino uye meya veChitungwiza, VaLovemore Maiko, vakatozivisa makanzura ese edhorobha iri nezvedanho iri. Asi munyori anoona nezvematunhu muMDC Alliance, VaSesil Zvidzai, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakaitwa naVaMoyo zviri kunze kwemutemo vachiti makanzura ndiwo achagara pasi achisarudza mutevedzeri wameya. Asi VaMoyo vakati kanzuru yeChitungwiza yainge yatadza kusarudza mutevedzeri wameya mukati menguva inotarisirwa kuita izvi ndosaka vakadoma VaMutimbanyoka vachishandisa mitemo yenyika inovapa simba rekuita izvi. Mukuru weChitungwiza Residents Trusts, Muzvare Alice Dian Kuvheya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakashamiswa nzvikuru nemaitiro aVaMoyo. Asi mukuru wesangano reHarare Metropolitan Residents Forum, VaMarvelous Khumalo, vaudza Studio 7kutikanzuru yeChitungwiza yakatadza kuita basa rayo vachiti ingadai yakasarudza mutevedzeri wameya gore rapfuura zvichitevera kudzingwa kwevaive mutevedzeri wameya nemamwe makanzuru. Kunyange hazvo mutevedzeri wameya akadzingwa basa musi wa4 Mbudzi gore rapfuura, munyori weChitungwiza akazivisa kuti chinzvimbo ichi chakange chisisina munhu musi wa18 Nyamavhuvhu nekudaro kanzuru ine mazuva makumi matatu kubva musi uyu kuti isarudze munhu anotora chnzvimbo izvi. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaMoyo kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Pari zvino kanzuru yeChitungiwza ine makanzura makumi maviri, gumi nematanhatu eMDC Alliance nemana eZanu PF. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi Vanoti Vari Kubatwa Kwiyo paChirongwa cheGEMS
text: Zvichitevera kuparurwa kwehomwe yevashandi vehurumende yekuchengeta mari, yeGovernment Employees Mutual Savings Fund (GEMS), iyo yakaumbwa muna Kukadzi gore rapfuura, vamwe vashandi vehurumende vanoti havasi kufara nezvakaitwa nehurumende pamusoro penyaya iyi. Hurumende inoti homwe iyi ichange ichipindwa nevashandi vanoda zvavo uye vashandi ava vachange vachibatirwa zvikamu zviviri nezviga zvishanu kubva muzana, kana kuti 2.5% yemuhoro mwedzi wega wega. Hurumende inoti chinangwa chehomwe iyi ndechekubatsira vashandi vachiri pamabasa neavo vave pamudyandigere. Asi rimwe sangano rinomirira varairidzi, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe (ARTUZ) rinoti vashandi havana kuudzwa zvakakwana kana kubvunzwa pamusoro pechirongwa ichi. Sangano iri rinotiwo harifari nemabatiro anoitwa mari dzevashandi nehurumende. Mutungamiri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure, vanoti chekutanga ndechekuti vashandi vaifanirwa kupihwa mukana wekupa pfungwa dzavo pachirongwa ichi chisati chaumbwa. VaMasarure vanotiwo panotanga chirongwa ichi, mushandi wese anobatirwa mari inoenda kuhomwe iyi. Kana achida kuramba ari nhengo anongozvisiya zvakadaro. Asi kana mushandi asingadi kuva muchirongwa ichi, anomanikidzwa kunyorera kuhomwe iyi achiti haasi kuti kupinda muchiri panguva iyo mari yake inenge ichibatwa nehurumende kudzamara homwe iyi yamubvisa muchirongwa ichi. Tatadza kubata gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi, VaPaul Mavima, uye vanga vasati vapindura mibvunzo yatavatumira pataenda pamhepo, asi taita hurukuro naVaMasaraure. No media source currently available

headline: Vanopikisa Hurumende Voronga Kuratidzira muKupera kweMwedzi Uno.
text: Mapato anopikisa, masangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, masangano evashandi pamwe nevamwe vemakereke vanonzi vari kuronga kuratidzira kwevana veZimbabwe nyika yose musi wa 31 Chikunguru, unove mwedzi uno, vachinyunyutya nekwavanoti kutadza kutonga kwehurumende yeZanu PF. Mumwe wevari kutungamira hurongwa uhwu, uye vari mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reTransform Zimbabwe, VaJacob Ngarivhume, vanoti hurumende yeZanu PF yakundikana kumisa huwori pamwe nekumutsiridza hupfumi hwenyika, izvo zvaisa vana veZimbabwe mukutambura kukuru. VaNgarivhume vanoti vari kushanda nemapato ose anopikisa nemamwe masangano anomirira vana veZimbabwe mumapoka akasiyanasiyana mukuronga kuratidzira uku, vachiti kunyange nhengo dzeZanu PF dziri kukokwawo kuti dzibatane nevamwe vanoda hutongo hwakanaka munyika. Asi mutauriri webato reMDC Alliance, Advocate Fadzai Mahere vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato ravo harina kunge rakokwa zviri pamutemo, kunyange hazvo, sezvakataurwa nemutungamiri wavo VaNelson Chamisa neSvondo, vachabatana nevose vanoda kuti munyika muve neshanduko. Mutauriri weMDC-T, VaKhalipani Phugeni vatiwo bato ravo harisi muhurongwa hwekuratidzira uhwu. VaNgarivhume vanoti vane hurongwa hwekuzivisa mapurisa nezvekuratidzira kwavo neChipiri, uye vanotarisira kuti vacharatidzira murunyararo. No media source currently available Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko mubato riri kutonga reZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vanoti kunyange hazvo bumbiro remitemo richibvumidza vanhu kuratidzira, zviri kurongwa nevanopikisa izvi kutungana kwembudzi. VaMugwadi vanoti vari kurongwa kuratidzira vari kuziva kuti kune mutemo unorambidza kufambafamba kwevanhu nekuda kwechirwere che Covid-19 ndipo powoona vamwe vachida kupinda mumigwagwa kuti zvinhu zviparadzwe nekubiwa. Vanoti vanochengetedza mutemo havasi kuzorega zvakadaro zvichiitika. VaMugwadi vanoti kunyange hazvo nyika iine matambudziko ekushaikwa kwezvakawanda, hapana asingazive kuti izvi zviri kukonzerwa nezvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe nenyika dzekumawirira. No media source currently available

headline: Vofarira kuuya kweWC muZim
text: SANGANO reZimbabwe Cricket rinoti riri kugutsikana nekusimukira kuri kuita mutambo uyu munyika zvichitevera kupihwa kwakaita Zimbabwe chiremerera chekuronga mutambo we2027 International Cricket Council World Cup ichibatsirana neSouth Africa neNamibia.   Chiremerera ichi chine chirevo chikuru kuZimbabwe pamwe nemutambo uyu sezvo zvinorakidza kuti nyika ino iri kufamba mugwara chairo panhau yecricket. Pari zvino, chikwata chemadzimai chemaLady Chevrons chiri pakati pekutatsurana nezvimwe zvipfumbamwe mumitambo yekurwira kuenda ku2023 ICC World Cup kuIndia. Kubva pamitambo iyi, panofanirwa kubuda zvikwata zvitatu chete uye malady Chevrons ari kutarisira kunge ari pakati pezvikwata izvi.   Achitaura neKwayedza svondo rino, managing director weZimbabwe Cricket (ZC) – Givemore Makoni – anoti ZC iri kuita basa guru mukusimudzira mutambo uyu.   Anoti sangano ravo riri kugutsikana nemafambiro ari kuita mutambo wecricket izvo zviri kuona zvekare malady Chevrons achikwikwidza mumitambo yekurwira kuenda ku2023 India World Cup.   “Kutaura kwatiri kuita kuno tine zvikwata zvipfumbamwe zvemadzimai zviri munyika yedu zvinosanganisira Pakistan, Sri Lanka, West Indies, Ireland, Netherlands neBangladesh izvo zviri kurwira kuenda kuWorld Cup gore rinotevera. Saka tinotarisira kuti chikwata chedu chemadzimai chibate basa gore remangwana chigoenda kuWorld Cup kuIndia.   “Zvinorakidza kuti tiri kusimukira panyaya dzecricket kana tichipihwa chiremerera chekuronga mitambo mikuru yakaita seiyi,” anodaro Makoni.   Anoenderera mberi achiti, “Nyika yose takapihwa chiremerera nekuti mukana wekuronga World Cup unounza mufaro uye zvinobatsira kana kusimudzira nyika chaiko sezvo kuchange kune zvizvarwa zvichabva kunze zvakasiyana-siyana zvichauya zvichizoona mitambo iyi.”   Aka ndekechipiri Zimbabwe ichitambirwa mitambo yeWorld Cup sezvakamboitika mugore ra2003 apo mitambo iyi yakatambirwa munyika muno nekuSouth Africa pamwe nekuKenya.   Makoni anoti Zimbabwe ikaramba ichisimukira ine mukana mukuru wekuzohwina mutambo uyu. “Aka ndekechipiri tichironga mutambo uyu, tine chivimbo chekuti nekusimukira kwatiri kuita mumutambo uyu tinogona kuhwina World Cup yacho ya2027,” anodaro Makoni.

headline: Vakoti Vanoratidzira paUnited Bulawayo Hospitals
text:
Vamwe vakoti vepachipatara cheUnited Bulawayo Hospitals, UBH, varatidzira neChina mangwanani vachiti havazi kufara nemari shoma yavanowana zvisineyi kuti hurumende yakawedzera nezuro mihoro yavo nezvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana.

Vakoti varatidzira paUBH vanga vachiimba uye vakabata zvinyorwa zvange zvakanyorwa zvakasiyana-siyana, senzira yekuratidza kusafara kwavo nemari shoma yavanoti vari kutambira.

Sachigaro wechikamu chepaUBH chesangano reZimbabwe Nurse Association, ZINA, VaAnthony Majongosi, vati vakoti havafanirwe
kubatwa sevamwe vashandi vose vehurumende vachiti vari kuisa hupenyu
hwavo panjodzi kunyanya panguva ino pavari kushanda kuine chirwere
cheCovid-19.

Sachigaro weZINA mudunhu reBulawayo, VaNicholas Chitore, vati vana
mukoti vari kuzvipira kushanda zvisinei nekuti nguva zhinji vanenge
vasina zvikwanisiro kusanganisira mbatya dzinobatsira kudzivirira kuti
vasawana hutachiwana hwecoronavirus. Asi vati hurumende haizi
kukoshesa kuzvipira kwakadai.

Pavapedza kuratidzira vana mukoti ava vadzokera pabasa asi vakawanda
vavo vange vasingashande. Taedza kunzwa kubva kumukuru weUBH, Amai Nonhlanhla Ndlovu, asi vanzi vange vari mumusangano. Hatinawo kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Vanoziva zviri kuitika vanoti vakoti vepachipatara cheMpilo havazi kukwanisa kuratidzira sevamwe vavo nekuti vakawanda vavo vakapinda pachirongwa chekuti vasasangane nevanhu vakawanda mushure mekunge pachipatara ichi paita vanhu vakabatwa neCovid-19 mwedzi wapera.

Mune imwewo nyaya, imwe kambani yeProvidence Human Capital inove
chikamu cheInnscor Africa, nemasangano anoti I am 4 Byo Against
Covid-19 neThorngrove Benevolent Community Trust, apa zvipo
zvinosanganisira mafiriji maviri, mbatya dzekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19, machira, pamwe nechikafu zvekubatsira mukurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 mukanzuru yeguta reBulawayo. Mukuru weProvidence Human Capital, Amai Buhle Ndlovu, vati vaona
zvakakodzera kuti kambani yavo iise ruoko rwayo pakubatsira kunyanya
kuchipatara cheThorngrove Hospital.

Meya weguta reBulawayo, VaSolomon Mguni, vatenda masangano aya
vakakurudzira veruzhinji kuti varambe vachichengetedza zvinokurudzirwa
nevehutano pakudzivirira kutapuriranwa kwehutachiwana hwecoronavirus, sezvo huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa naho huri kuramba huchikwira. No media source currently available

headline: Chizvarwa chekuChina Hachina Kufa neCoronavirus:Wilkins Hospital
text: Mukuru anoona nezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare Dr Prosper Chonzi varamba mashoko ekuti munyika mune chizvarwa chekuChina chakafa nechirwere checoronavirus. Dr Chonzi vati ongororo yavakaita yakaratidza kuti chainge chisina chirwere ichi. Chizvarwa chekuChina chechidzimai ichi chakatanga kurwara chiri kwaMutare chichibva chaenda kuna chiremba wacho wekuChina uyo akati chiende kuWest End Clinic. Asi vanachiremba pachipatara apa vakabva varamba kumuona vachibva vati aendeswe kuWilkins Hospital uko akafa ari munzira. Dr Chonzi vanoti kune chimwe chizvarwa chekuItaly chakaendeswa kuchipatara ichi chichiti chairwara asi chakazonzi hachinawo chirwere ichi. Vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvitatu vafa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose uye muAfrica chiri kuSouth Africa, Nigeria, Algeria neEgypt. Vabatwa nechirwere ichi pasi rose vanodarika chiuru zana. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yoronga Kumutsiridza Kambani yeHwange
text: Hurumende yadoma VaBekithemba Moyo avo vaimbova mukuru wekambani yeDBF Capital Partners kuti vambotungamira hurongwa hwekumutsiridza kambani yemarasha yeHwange Colliery. Kambani iyi yave nemakore ichitatarika uye ine chikwereti chinosvika mamiriyoni zana nemakumi mashanu kuHurumende. Gurukota rinoona nezvemutemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi vakaburitsa mashoko ekumutsiridza Hwange mubepanhau rehurumende reGovernment Gazette nemusi weMuvhuro. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachidzidzisa paNelson Mandela Metropolitan University Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano vanoti hurongwa uhwu hahwuna kuipa nekuti hunobatsira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe asi panoda kutarisiswa kuti vanosarudzwa kuita basa iri vave vakakodzera. Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano vanoti zvirongwa zvakadai vakazviona zvichibatsira kumutsa mamwe makambani akanga adonha mumwaka iri kumashure asi zvakanga zvaitwa nenzira yakanaka. Vanoti shuviro yavo ndeyekuti vanopiwa basa iri vapiwe simba rekuronga zvavanoona kuti zvinobatsira kwete kuvapa basa asi vasina masimba ekutora matanho mukambani iyi. No media source currently available

headline: VaMudzvova Vofunga Kunotariswa Kunze kweNyika Mushure Mekubayiwa Jekiseni neVanofungidzirwa Kuti Vasori
text: Nhengo yesangano reTajamuka yakaitwa kafiramberi muHarare VaSilvanos Mudzvova vanoti vave kutarisira kuti vanorapwa kunze kwenyika sezvo zvisiri kuzivikanwa kuti vakabayiwa jekiseni rainge riinei. Vanoti vesangano reZimbabwe Doctors for Human Rights vakavakurudzira kuti vanotariswa navanamazvikokota vekunze sezvo pasina ari kuziva kuti vakabayiwa jekiseni reyi. Vati nyaya iyi iri kuvadya moyo nekuti havazive kuti hutano hwavo huchange hwakamira sei. VaMudzvova vakapambwa nemusi weChipiri svondo rapera kumba kwavo nevanhu vatanhatu vanofungidzirwa kuti vasori vakatochwa pedyo neNharira Hills kuNorton. Vanhu vakapamba VaMudzvova vainge vakapakatira pfuti. Pari zvino VaMudzvova avo vari kuchipatara cheAvenues Clinic muHarare vanoti vave kutyira hupenyu hwavo asi vachitiwo vakavhiyiwa neMuvhuro kugadzirisa matumbu avo ainge asina kumira zvakanaka kubva zvavakarohwa. No media source currently available

headline: ‘TSIGIRAI LOGA’
text: VATSIGIRI venhabvu vanoti hapana chinokonesa Zimbabwe kuenda kumakwikwi e2022 Qatar World Cup zvichitevera kugadzwa kwemurairidzi mutsva wechikwata chenyika chemaWarriors, Zdravko Logarusic.   Loga, sezita remadunhurirwa raLogarusic iro raakapihwa nevatsigiri venhabvu, akagadzwa pachigaro chinopisa ichi neZifa achitsiva Sunday ‘Mhofu’ Chidzambwa uyo akasiya basa gore rapera.   Joey ‘Mafero’ Antipas ndiye ange akafanobata chigaro ichi zvichitevera kubva kwaMhofu.   Chizvarwa chekuCroatia ichi, Loga, akaparurwa zviri pamutemo svondo radarika nesangano reZifa.   Mutungamiri weZifa, Felton Kamambo, akabva azivisa Loga kuti maWarriors anofanirwa kuenda kumakwikwi ese enhabvu anoti African Nations Cup (CHAN), Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) 2021 neFifa World Cup 2022.   Muhurukuro nevatsigiri venhabvu vakasiyana vanoti remangwana remaWarriors rakajeka zvikuru zvichitevera kugadzwa kwakaitwa Loga.   Mutungamiri wesangano reFriends of Warriors, Edward Chimedza, anoti kuuya kwaLoga kwaunza chiedza chakanaka uye pane tarisiro huru yekuti achabata basa sebasa.   “Loga auya, tinofanirwa kumupa nguva anyatsobika chikwata chake uye Zifa ngaimutsigire nekumupa zvese zvaanoda kuti agoita basa rake nemazvo. Tine mukana wekuita zvikuru munhabvu naLoga uye tiri kumutemba kuti achabata basa, 2022 ndaona tichienda kuWorld Cup naye. Asi anofanirwa kutanga atidzosera kuAfcon zvekare,” anodaro Chimedza.   Mashoko ake anotsinhirwa neshasha inozivikanwa pakutsigira nhabvu, Chris ‘Romario’ Musekiwa achiti Loga anofanirwa kuwana rutsigiro ruzere kubva kuZifa, mapoka akasiyana anoona nezvenhabvu pamwechete nevatsigiri.   “Murairidzi wedu mutsva tinaye uye tiri kufamba naye, toda kumuona achibudirira. Anofanirwa kupihwa rutsigiro rwese rwaanoda kuti agobudirira mubasa rake. Kana akataura kuti ane vatambi vaanoda, ngavauye nenguva kuitira kuti ashande navo agozivana navo.   “Tine mitambo mikuru iri kuuya saka tinoziva kuti tikamutsigira zvakasimba tinobudirira chete, kunyanya mumutambo weCHAN uri kuuya munaKubvumbi. Asi mikuru yeAfcon neWorld Cup yatiri kuda ndine chivimbo chekuti ari kuzotiendesa,” anodaro.   Munyori mukuru weFriends of the Warriors, Zivanai Muwashu anoti kuve nemurairidzi wekunze kunobatsira zvikuru mune zvakasiyana.   “Uku ndiko kubudirira kwatave kuita munhabvu yedu, tave kufamba mugwara chairo naLoga. Tine varairidzi vemuno hapana kwataienda nekuti vamwe vaisarudza vatambi vekuzvikwata zvavo kuti vagouya kumaWarriors, manje naLoga achanyatsoongorora vese osarudza vatambi vaanoda avo vaanoona kuti ndivo vanokodzera kutambira maWarriors.   “ Mumaonero angu, izvi zvichatibatsira kuti vatambi vanogona vachashevedzwa uye vachatamba nhabvu votisvitsa kure,” anodaro Muwashu. Mutambo wekutanga waLoga achirairidza maWarriors uriko musi wa23 Kurume apo achasangana neAlgeria, kuAlgeria mumutambo wekurwira tikiti rekuenda kuAfcon 2021.   Svondo rinotevera racho, maWarriors achange ari pamusha apo achasangana neAlgeria mumutambo weAfcon zvakare.   MunaKubvumbi, Loga ane basa guru rekubata sezvo achatungamirira maWarriors kumakwikwi eCHAN achaitirwa kuCameroon.   MaWarriors akaiswa muboka reGroup A rine zvikwata zvinoti Cameroon, Burkina Faso neMali.

headline: Hurumende Yodira US$500 Million muMabhanga Kurerutsa Dambudziko reMari yeKunze
text: Hurumende kuburikidza nebhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, inonzi yakavimbisa kuti neMuvhuro iri kudira mari inoita mamiriyoni mazana mashanu emadhora emari yekuAmerica mumabhanga emunyika, senzira yekurerutsa nayo dambudziko remari yekunze. Gavhuna vebhanga guru reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Doctor John Mangudya, vanonzi vakazivisa neMugovera kuti mari iyi ichabatsira mukutengwa kubva kunze kwemafuta edzimotokari pamwe nemishonga, izvo zvinonzi zviri kushaikwa munyika. Hurumende inonzi yakawana mari iyi kubva kunevanobatsira vekunze, uye inonzi yakanangana nekubatsira vemabhizimusi pamwe nevanhuwo zvavo vanenge vachida mari yekunze kuitira kutenga zvinodiwa mumapka avo. Zvinonzi mari yekunze iyi haisi kuwanikwa mumabhanga, umo inofanirwa kunge ichitengeserwa vemabhizimusi pamwe nevanhu nemari iri pasi, asi ichinzi izere pamusika mutema, apo inonzi iri kutengeswa nemari iri pamusoro. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera, vanoti danho rehurumende iri rakanaka chose, kana chete hurumende ikakwanisa kuzorizadzisa, vachiti vemabhizimusi vari kurasikirwa nemari yakawanda kuburikidza nekumanikidzwa kutenga mari pamusika mutema kuti vawane zvikwanisiro mumabhizimusi avo. Asi VaKuchera vanoti chavanofunga kuti chingangotadzisa hurongwa uhwu kubudirira inyaya yehuwori, uhwo vanoti hwakadzika midzi munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Germany Inoudza Komiti yaVaParadza Kuti Zimbabwe Ibhadhare Zvikwereti Zvayo
text: Mumiriri wenyika yeGermany muZimbabwe, Doctor Thorsten Hutter, vaudza nhengo dzeparamende kuti Zimbabwe inofanira kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo kuWorld Bank, African Development Bank nenyika dzaya kakwereta pasi peParis Club, vachiti izvi ndizvo chete zvichaita kuti ikwanise kuwana rubatsiro kubva kumasangano aya nenyika idzi. Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita nenhengo dzekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekunze kwenyika, VaHutter vati manyepo ekuti Zimbabwe iri kunyimwa rubatsiro nekuda kwenyaya dzematongorewo enyika. Vati chikonzero chiri kunyimwa Zimbabwe mari inyaya yekusabhadhara zvikwereti. Vati World Bank nenyika dzekuEurope hadzikwanisi kuramba dzichipa zvikwereti zvekusimudzira maindasitiri muZimbabwe kana isati yabhadhara zvikwereti zvainayo. VaHutter vatiwo makambani ekunyika kwavo nedzimwe dzeku Europe haasi kufara nemitemo yemuZimbabwe yakaita sema roadblocks ayo ave kuitwa pese pese nemutemo wekupa masimba kuvatema munyaya dzehupfumi. Vati vemakambani vanoda mitemo yekajeka uyewo apo nyika yakatarisana nedambudziko remari, vemakambani vanoda kuziva kuti kana vakatengesa zvinhu zvavo kunze kwenyika, vanokwanisa kushandisa mari yavanenge vawana pamadiro here kana kuti kwete. Pari zvino vebhanga guru, VeReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, ndivo vanoronga nekuudza makambani kuti anga shandise sei mari dzekunze dzaanenge awana. Sachigaro wekomiti iyi, VaKindness Paradza, vati vanobvumirana naVaHutter pazvichemo zvavo, asi vati zviri kugadziriswa. VaParadza vaenderera mberi vachiti komiti yavo yakumbirawo kuti Germany ibvise zvirango zvayakatemera VaMugabe vachiti izvi zviri kukanganisa hupfumi wenyika. Vatiwo izvi hazvifaniri kunetsa sezvo Britain yavainetsana nayo muEuropean Union yave kubuda musangano iri. Kunyange hazvo VaParadza vati komiti yavo, iyo ine nhengo dzeMDC-T, yakumbira kuti VaMugabe vabvisirwe zvirango zvavakatemerwa neGermany, mutauriri weMDC-T, VaObert Gutu, vati sebato, hapana chati chachinja chingaite kuti VaMugabe varerutsirwe. VaGutu vati VaMugabe vachiri kutyora kodzero dzevanhu, mitemo yesarudzo haisati yagadziriswa, uye bato ravo rinoita rusarura pachikafu, icho chinopihwa nhengo dzeZanu PF chete. Imwewo nhengo yekomiti iyi, Amai Priscillar Misiharabwi-Mushonga, vatiwo zvakakosha kuti paramende yeZimbabwe neyekuGermany, Bundestag, zvidyidzaneuyewo kubatsira kumutsiridza hukamapakati penyika mbiri idzi pasi pesangano Zimbabwe German Association iro vati raibatsira vakawanda zvikuru Asi VaHutter vati zvirango zvaVaMugabe nemudzimai wavo nekambani neZimbabweDefence Industries hazvikanganisi hupfumi hwenyika vachiti pari zvino makambani emuZimbabwe anotengesa zvinhu kuEurope pachena pasi peEuropean Parternership Agreement. Vatiwo hupfumi hwenyika hwakakura chose panguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa apo makurukota ehurumende yaVaMugabe pamwe nemakambani akawanda aive pasi pezvirango. Vati hupfumi uhwu huri kutodzikira panguva ino kunyange hazvo EU yakabvisa makambani aya nemakurukota pazvirango. VaHutter vati hazvina kushata kuti paramende yeZimbabwe idyadzane neBundestag asi vakati pari zvinonhengo dzeBundestag hadzigoni kubuda munyika sezvo nyika yavo ichiita sarudzo muna Gunyana. Asi vati vanozvikurudzira kuti paramende dzenyika mbiri idzi dzidyidzane. Makambani ehurumende anosanganisira Telone, National Railways of Zimbabwe neZiscosteel ane zvikwereti zvinodarika mazana mashanu emamamiriyoni emaEuro kuGerman Deveopment Bank uye mari iyi yave nemakaore akawanda isati yabhadharwa. Zvichakadai, VaHutter vazivisa kuti nyika dzeEU pamwe neAfrican Union dzichasangana muna Mbudzi gore rino kuAbijan nechinangwa chekuzeya chirongwa chekudyidzana pakati pemasangano aya cheCotonou Agreement. Vati zviri pachena kuti chave kudiwa neAfrica handi rubatsiro asi kuti makambani anogadzira zvinhu achiunza mabasa kumamiriyoni akawanda evechidiki vari kubva muzvikoro muAfrica. No media source currently available

headline: ZVICHANGOITIKA . . . Cristiano adzingwa neMan United
text: CHIKWATA cheManchester United chazivisa kuti vasiyana naCristiano Ronaldo mushure mekunge vabvumirana.   Pachinyorwa chabva kuManchester United, yazivisa kuti mutambi uyu abva.   “Cristiano ave kubva kuManchester United izvezvi mushure mekunge tabvumirana naye.   “Tinoda kumutenda nebasa raakaita kaviri kaatambira chikwata chino,” yadaro Manchester United.   Kudzingwa kwaRonaldo kunotevera kushuropodza kwaakaita chikwata ichi svondo radarika pamwe chete nemurairidzi wacho Erik ten Haag uyo waakati haamuremekedze.   “Handina ruremekedzo nemurairidzi wangu nekuti iye haandiremekedzewo. Ukasandiremekedza neniwo handikuremekedze.   “Manchester United iri kusarira kumashure zvikuru, pandakabva pekutanga ndikadzoka hapana chamboshanduka, zvinhu zvingori zvimwe chete.   “Pane vanhu vari muchikwata vasiri kundida kuno, hazvina kutanga nhasi kubva gore radarika chairo,” akadaro Ronaldo.

headline: America Yovhota Musarudzo dza2020
text: Mamiriyoni nemamiriyoni evanhu ari kuvhota musarudzo dzemuAmerica dzemutungamiri wenyika, pamwe nedzenhengo dzeparamende. Asi maziso evakawanda akatarisira zvichabuta pakati pemumiriri weRepublican Party musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, VaDonald Trump pamwe nemumiriri weDemocratic Party musarudzo iyi, VaJoe Biden. Nzvimbo dzekuvhotera dzavhurwa mangwanani mumatunhu ose emuAmerica.  VaBiden vatanga zuva ravo nekupinda muchechi mudunhu ravo reDelaware uye vazopinda munzvimbo mbiri dziri mudunhu re Pennsylvania vachiona vanhu vari kuvhota, vasati vadzokera kudunhu ravo reDelaware. VaTrump, avo vanova mutungamiri weAmerica pari zvino, vatanga hurongwa hwavo nekutaura pachirongwa che Fox & Friends vachiti vachazivisa veruzhinji kana vachinge vakunda musarudzo.  Va Trump vashanyira muzinda wavo wesarudzo uri kunze kweguta reWashington, ndokubva vazodzokera kumba kwavo kumuzinda wemutungamiri weAmerica, we White House. VaBiden vanonzi vari kutarisirwa kuzivisa masangano enhau kuti vawana mavhoti anoita kuti vave mutungamiri wenyika. Sarudzo dzemuAmerica dziri kuitika panguva iyo nyika iyi yakatarisana nedambudziko rechirwere che Covid-19, icho chauraya vanhu banodarika zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi matatu nechimwe, kana kuti vanodarika 231,000. Zvisineyi nedenda iri, vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni zana nemakumi mashanu vari kutarisirwa kuvhota musarudzo yegore rino. Asi zvichabuda musarudzo idzi zvichaburitswa pachitevedza mitemo yematunhu akasiyana siyana. Matunhu achatanga kuzivisa zvabuda musarudzo anosanganisira Florida, Georgia, Maryland, Pennsylvania, Delaware, Virginia, New York, Connecticut nemamwe. Kuti munhu adomwe semutungamiri wenyika akunda musarudzo, anofanirwa kunge awana mavhoti eElectoral College anodarika mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe.

headline: MDC Alliance Yopika Kuti Ichatora Dunhu reMasvingo Urban muSarudzo
text: Nhengo dzebato reMDC Alliance dziri kuvimbisa kubvuta dunhu redhorobha reMasvingo, iro rakatorwa neZanu PF musarudzo dza2013, vachiti chigaro ichi ndechavo kubva pavakatanga musangano weMDC. Vachitaura ne Studio7, vari kumiririra MDC-Alliance musarudzo dzeparamende, VaJacob Nyokanhete, vanoti rwendo runo havasi kuzorega Zanu PF ichivatorera chigaro chavo. VaNyokanhete vanoti pasarudzo dzemwedzi uno ivo nevatsigiri vavo havasi kuvata vachifamba vachipinda mudzimba (door to door) umo vari kutsvaga rutsigiro muvanhu kuti vasatorerwerezve chigaro ichi. VaNyokanhete vanoti kubva musarudzo dzeparamende dza2000, 2005 uye dza2008 MDC yaingokunda Zanu PF mudhorobha reMasvingo asi zvinhu hazvina kufamba mushe musarudzo dza 2013 idzo dzakaona Zanu PF ichikunda. Mumwe wevatsigiri ve MDC-Alliance ange achifamba nevamwe mudzimba mumusha wekwa Majange nhasi, Muzvare Ruth Mapiye, anoti vari kutaura nevanovhota mudzimba vachivavimbisa kugadzirisa nyika nekudaro vanotora dhorobha nemakanzura awo ose gumi. VaVasivenyu Chimombe vari kumirira MDC-Alliance ku Ward 6 musarudzo dzemakanzura vanotiwo vanotarisira kukunda zvine mutsindo vachiti vari kushanda nenhengo yavo iri kukwikwidza musarudzo yeparamende kuti vakunde vose uye nemutungamiriri webato ravo VaNelson Chamisa. Asi vari kumirira Zanu PF muMasvingo Urban, VaBenard Taguma Mazarire vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti chigaro ichi hachichafi chakadzokera kuMDC-T vachiti vanochidzosa kubato ravo. VaMazarire vanoti vari kutsvagawo rutsigiro zvakasimba uye vachishandisawo nzira iri kuitwa neve MDC Alliance yekupinda mudzimba. Asi sachigaro wevechidiki muMDC-Alliance muMasvingo, VaPeacemaker Mapope vanoti Zanu PF yakatora chigaro muna 2013 nekubira nekudaro vechidiki rwendo runo vachachengetedza mavhoti evanhu kuti asabiwe kana kuvhota kwapera. Mubatanidzwa weMDC-Alliance unotiwo mutungamiriri wawo, VaChamisa vachakunda zvine mutsindo muMasvingo uye vanotarisira kuti vachagadzirisa hupenyu hwevanhu hwakange hwawondongwa neZanu PF. Kunyange kune vakwikwidzi makumi maviri nevatatu pasarudzo yemutungamirir wenyika, vazhinji vanoti makwikwi chaiwo ari pakati paVaChamisa nemutungamiri weZanu PF, uye vari mutungamiri wenyika VaEmerson Mnangagwa. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari Voita Maonero Akasiyana Pane Zviri Kuitika muBulawayo
text: Vagari vemuBulawayo vari kuita maonero akasiyana siyana panyaya yezviri kuitika mukanzuru yeguta reBulawayo, vamwe vachiti zviri kukonzerwa nehuwori, vamwe vachiti zviri kukonzerwa nerusarura rudzi. Mutauro unotyisa wakasimudza musoro zvichitevera danho rakatorwa nemutevedzeri wameya weguta iri, VaTinashe Kambarami, rekumisa basa munyori weguta, VaChristopher Dube, masvondo mashoma apfuura vachivapomera mhosva dzakati kuti. Izvi zvakapa kuti vamwe vatsigira vaVaDube, vabude pachena vachishora VaKambarami, vamwe vachiti sezvo VaKambarami vari muShona, vaifanirwa kubva mukanzuru yeguta, vachiti verudzi rweNdebele chete ndivo vanofanira kupinda mukanzuru iyi. Izvi zvakaita kuti zvinhu zvishate vanhu vakawanda vachisimudzira nyaya yerusarura rudzi, asi vamwe vachiti dambudziko reguta raikonzerwa nehuori huri mukanzuru. Meya weguta, VaSolomon Mguni, vakazopindira vachimisa kumiswa basa kwaVaDube, asi vakati nyaya iri kupomerwa VaDube inofanirwa kuferefetwa nemazvo. Mutungamiri wesangano reHabakkuk Trust, iro rinoshanda mukuvaka runyararo muvanhu, VaDumisani Nkomo, vanoti vanobvumirana nemaonero ekuti nyaya yerusarurarudzi yakasimudzwa nemakakatanwa aya, ine chekuita nekusagadziriswa zvizere kwenyaya yeGukurahundi, uyewo kusarira kumashure kunonzi kwakaita matunhu eMatabeleland. Mudzidzisi wezvekuvakwa kwerunyararo nebudiriro, VaDonwell Dube, vachitaura semuongorori akazvimirira, vanoti panoda kunyatsoitwa tsvakurudzo yakakwana yekuti makakatanwa ari kuitika aya, ari kunyatsokonzerwa nei, vachitiwo nhoroondo yekuve nezvichemo zvisingagadziriswi nehurumende, zvinhu zvinogona kuve zvimwe zvezvikonzero. Munguva pfupi yapfuura, boka remadzimai eMDC emudunhu reBulawayo, rakashora kwarakati kukurudzirwa kwekupesana kwevanhu pachishandiswa marudzi kuri kuitwa muguta iri. Mukuru weAffirmative Action Group muBulawayo, VaReginald Shoko, vanoti sangano ravo rave nenguva richitaura nezvehuwori hwavanoti hwave nenguva huchiitika. Asi VaShoko vanoti vanoshora zvikuru nyaya yekupatsanurwa kwemarudzi. Mufundisi, uye vari mukuru wechikwata chinonzi Save Bulawayo Campaign, icho chakaita musangano nezuro waikurudzira kuti makanzura eBulawayo abviswe, kugadzwe komishini, VaAnglistone Sibanda, vanoti havakurudziri nyaya yerusarurarudzi. Mukuru weBulawayo Progressive Residents Association, VaAmbrose Sibindi, vanotiwo zviri kuitika mukanzuru yeBulawayo hazvinei nerusarurarudzi, asi kuti huwori uri pachena. VaSibindi vanoti zvakakosha kuti makanzuru asati asarudzwa, vave vanhu vanoziikanwa hunhu hwavo munzvimbo dzavanogara. VaSibindi vanotiwo zvakakosha kuti vagari vasarudze zvine huchenjeri makanzura avo kuitira kudzivirira huwori, kana kutadza kuita basa nemazvo. Vanhu vane chitsama vakataura pamusangano wanezuro vakaratidzawo kusafara nekutadza kuita basa nemazvo kuri kuitwa nekanzuru iyi, izvo vakati zviri kukonzerwa nehuwori. Mumwe mugari akangozvidoma nezita rekuti Amai Moyo vakati vanoda kuti pave nekomishini vachiti pave nenguva yakareba makanzura eguta reBulawayo achinongedzwa munyaya dzehuwori. Vakambove mutevedzeri wameya weBulawayo, VaGift Banda, vakambomiswa basa vachinenedzerwa huwori, asi vakazochenurwa nedare reHigh Court. Vaimbove murwiri wehondo yerusununguko pasi peboka reZIPRA, VaLinganiso Nyathi, vanoti nyaya yehuwori haifanirwi kuve inopinza zverusarurarudzi mukati. Vachinyora paTwitter, mumwe wevatevedzeri veMDC, VaWelshman Ncube, vayambira vagari vemuBulawayo kuti vasaite pfungwa yekuda kuve nekomisheni muguta, vachiti izvi zvinogona kudzorera kumashure budiriro yeguta. Svondo rapera, hurumende yakatumira komisheni yevanhu vashanu kuti iite ongororo yezviri kuitika mukanzuru yeBulawayo. Komisheni iyi yakapedza basa rayo nezuro uye zvakabuda zvinotarisirwa kuturwa munguva pfupi inotevera. Nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo emaguta dzinoti kuuyiswa kwekomisheni kuti ifambise mabasa eguta reBulawayo, zvakafanana nekuisa kanzuru iyi mumaoko eZanu PF sezvakamboitika munguva yevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, avo vakadoma makomisheni ekuti aiite basa mumaknzuru aive pasi peMDC mushure mekunze makanzuru aya apomerwa nyaya dzehuori. No media source currently available

headline: America Inoti Kutadza Kutonga kwaVaMnangagwa Ndiko Kuri Kuvhiringa Hupfumi hweZimbabwe, Kwete Zvirango
text: America inoti zvirango zvayakatemera vakuru vakuru muZimbabwe hazvisirizvo zviri kukonzera kusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu munyika ichiti hurumende yeZimbabwe ndiyo iri kutadza kutungamira zvakanaka. Izvi zvinotevera gwaro rakaburitswa nenhumwa yeUnited Nations, Amai Alena Douhan, avo vakati zvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe nehurumende yeAmerica pamwe nedzimwe nyika dzekumavirira zviri kukanganisa raramo yeveruzhinji munyika. Mumiriri weAmerica kusangano reUnited Nations, Ambassador Linda Thomas Greenfield, vaudza vatori venhau nhasi vari kuNew York kuti kutadza kutungamira zvakanaka kwehurumende yeZimbabwe ndiko kuri kukonzera kutambura kweveruzhinji munyika kwete zvirango zvakaiswa nehurumende yavo. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemumiriri wesangano reEuropean Union, VaTimo Olkonnen, kuti tinzwewo divi ravo panyaya yezvirango iyi sezvo pataenda pamhepo vanga vasati vapindura mibunzo yavati tivatumire. Asi EU yakataura munguva pfupi yadarika kuti hurumende yeZimbabwe inofanira kugadzirisa nyaya dzekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu munyika pamwe nezvematongerwo enyika isati yabvisa zvirango. Muzinda weBritain muZimbabwe wakaburitsa mashoko padandemutande rawo reTwitter mazuva mashomanana adarika uchiti kutengesera pakati peBritain neZimbabwe kuri kufamba zvakanaka zvisinei nezvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vari muZanu PF. Gurukota rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vati togozovafonera sezvo vanga vachiti vakabatikana nemusangano weZanu PF wepagore uri kuitirwa kuBindura. Asi vakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri weZanu PF, VaMike Bimha, vati zvirango zviri kuonesa pfumvu munhu wese munyika zvisinei nekuti munhu anotsigira baro ripi rezvematongerwo enyika. VaBimha vati Zimbabwe iri kuoneswa ndondo nenyika dzekumavirira nepamusana pekutorwa kwakaitwa minda kubva kuvarimi vechichena ichigoverwa kuvanhu vatema. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzevamatongerwo enyika, VaRashweat Mukundu, vati zvirango zviripo hazvisi zvirango zvehupfumi ndokusaka Zimbabwe ichikwanisa kutengeserana nenyika dzacho dzakaisa zvirango izvi uye vati havaone nyika idzi dzichibvisa zvirango izvi kana Zimbabwe isina kugadzirisa zvikonzero zvakaita kuti zvirango izvi zviiswe kubva pakutanga. Kunyange gwaro raAmai Douhan rakakurudzira kuti America irege kushandisa mutemo weZidera kuti irambe yakaisa zvirango izvi vachiti zvirango izvi hazvisi pamutemo sezvo zvisina kubvumidzwa neUnited Nations Security Council, Amai Greenfield vati hurumende yavo haisi kuzodyira huroyi mukunyara vachiti hurumende yavo icharambawo yakatsika madziro panyaya yekuti kodzero dzevanhu dzicherechedzwe muZimbabwe. Amai Douhan, avo vakanga vari munyika kwemazuva gumi adarika vachiongorora nyaya dzekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu munyika uye kuti zvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe nenyika dzekumavirira zviri kukanganisa hupenyu hweveruzhinji zvakadii munyika, vakati ruzhinji rweZimbabwe rwuri kunhonga svosve nemuromo pamusana pezvirango izvi. Amai Douhan vakakurudzira Zimbabwe kuti iite nhaurirano dzechokwadi nenyika dzakatemera zvirango nechinangwa chekuti zvirango izvi zvigobviswa vakatiwo hurumende yeZimbabwe pachayo inofanira kuona kuti munyika maitwa nhaurirano dzemandorokwati munyika pamwe nedzimwe nyika dzakaisa zvirango izvi. Nyika dzakatemera Zimbabwe zvirango dzinosanganisira America, Australia, Britain, Canada, Switzerland pamwe nesangano renyika dziri mugungano reEuropean Union. Amai Douhan vakatarisirwa kusvitsa gwaro rezvavakawana muongororo yavo kumusangano weUnited Nations Human Rights Council uchaitwa muna Gunyana wegore rinouya. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yovandudza Mitemo yeKuvamba Mabhizimisi
text: Zimbabwe Investment Authority inoti kuvandudzwa kuri kuda kuitwa mitemo gumi nemitatu nehurumende ine chekuita nezvehupfumi kusvika muna Chikumi kwakanangana nekurudziro dzinoitwa nebhanga guru repasi rose reWorld Bank. Sangano reZimbabwe Investment Authority, ZIA, rinoti kuvandudzwa kuri kuda kuitwa mitemo gumi nemitatu nehurumende ine chekuita nezvehupfumi kusvika muna Chikumi kwakanangana nekurudziro dzinoitwa nebhanga guru repasi rose reWorld Bank iro rinoburitsa gwaro rinoratidza nyika dziri nyore kutanga bhizimisi kana kuti Ease of Doing Business Report. Munyori wedare remakurukota, Doctor Misheck Sibanda, vakaudza vemabhizimisi kuZimbabwe International Trade Fair kuti chirongwa chekuvandudza mitemo ichi chiri kufambira mberi zvakanaka uye vanofunga kuti chichabatsira kukwezva vemabhizimisi vekunze. Pagwaro reWorld Bank rekutanga mabhizimisi ra2016, Zimbabwe iri pachidanho chezana nemakumia mashanu kubva panyika zana nemakumi masere nepfumbamwe. Munyika dzepasi rose Singapore ndiyo iri pamusoro soro, uye muAfrica i Rwanda. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti Zimbabwe inofanira kuvandudza mutemo wekuendesa hupfumi kuvatema uyo unonzi nevakawanda hauna kumira zvakanaka. Makurukota ehurumende anogara achipokana nezvemashandiro awo mutemo uyu. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Investment Authority, VaRichard Mbaiwa, vanoti zvakakosha kuti mitemo ivandudzwe kuitira kuti ikwezve vekunze uye kuti vanhu vatange kuwana mabasa. No media source currently available

headline: WFP Inoti Vanhu Vanodarika Mamiriyoni Matatu muMadhorobha Madiki Vanoda Rubatsiro rweChikafu
text: Bazi reUnited Nations rinoona nezvechikafu reWorld Food Program, WFP, rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vari mumadhorobha vanoda chikafu hwasvika pamamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 3,3 million kubva pamamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana maviri kana kuti 2,2 million. NeChitatu WFP yakatanga hurongwa hwekubatsira vasina zvekudya mumaguta nekuvapa mari inosvika madhora gumi nemaviri ekuAmerica panguva iyo huwandu hwevari kuda rubatsiro rwechikafu hwawedzera nekuda kweCovid-19 uye kurasikirwa nemabasa kwevanhu vakawanda nenyaya iyi. Vanhu zviuru zana nezvitatu nemazana manomwe kana kuti 103, 700 vari kupihwa rubatsiro urwu vari kuGokwe, Redcliff, Kwekwe, Ruwa, Chinhoyi, Buhera, Chipinge ne Chegutu. Mari yekubatsira vanhu ava inosvika mamiriyoni gumi ekuAmerica, uye yakabva kubazi rehurumende yeAmerica reUSAID, iro riri kubatsira vamwe vanhu vanosvika miriyoni imwe chete kumaruwa. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau, mukuru weUSAID muZimbabwe, VaArt Brown, vanoti vacharamba vachibatsira vanhu vemuZimbabwe nechikafu uye hutano munguva ino yekurwisa Covid-19. Mukuru weWFP muZimbabwe, Amai Francesca Erdelmann, vati Covid-19 yapa kuti vanozviitira mabasa emaoko vashaye chekubata. Asi mukuru weEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, Doctor Israel Murefu, vanoti vamwe vanhu vakawanda varasikirwa nemabasa sezvo mamwe makambani akundikana kuvhurwa mushure mekumbovharwa munguva yekurwisa Covid-19. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vonyunyuta neMari Dziri kuBhadhariswa Vanoda Marezinesi eKutepfenyura
text: Vanorwira kodzero dzekufambiswa kwemashoko kwakasununguka nekodzero dzevatori venhau vochema- chema nemari yemarezinesi ekutepfenyura yakatarwa nehurumende. Muzviga zvakabudiswa nehurumende pasi pe Statutory Instrument 27 yegore rino nhepfenyuro dzenharaunda vanotarisirwa kubhadhara mari inosvika zviuru zvisere zvinezana remadhora kuti vakwanise kungonyorera kuti vanoda rezinesi iyo isingazodzoserwi kunyangwe vakashaya rezinesi iri. Pamusoro pemari iyi vanenge vabudirira vanozobhadharawo mari inosvika zviuru gumi nezvinomwe pagore rega rega kwemakore makumi erezinesi. Avowo vachange vachida rezinhesi yekutepfenyura nhepfenyuro yenyika yese vanobhadhara mari yekutsvaka rezinesi iri inoita zviuru makumi mana nezviviri zvine mazana mashanu emadhora iyo isingadzorerwi zvakare. Vanozobhadhara zvakare zviuru zana nemakumi maviri anezviuru zvinomwe nemazana mashanu kuti vakwanise kudaniwa kumusangano unouya veruzhinji kuti vatsanangure pamusoro penhepfenyuro yavo iyo isingadzorerwi zvakare vakasapiwa rezinenesi. Vanoshandisawo madandemutande pakutepfenyura vanotarisirwawo kubhadhara kubhadhara mari inoraudzira miriyoni kana yahwerengedzewa zvese zvinodiwa Mukuru weMedia Institute of Southern Africa- Zimbabwe VaTabani Moyo vati mari yakatarwa nehurumende iyi inotyisa zvakanyanya. VaMoyo vati mutengo wakatarwa kunevanotepfenyura pamadandemutande we miriyoni imwechete yemadhora emuno vakadai sanaBus Stop TV vanonakidza veruzhinji, 263 Chat nevamwe vakawanda mucherechedzo wekuti hurumende inoda kuti masangano awa avhare. VaMoyo vashoropodzawo mari dzakatarwa kuneavo vachange vachida marezinesi ekutepfenyura nhepfenyuro dzematunhu. VaMoyo vati havaoni veruzhinji vachikwanisa kubhadhara mari idzi vakati zvobva zvapa hurumende mukana wekuva iyo chete inogona kukokwikwidza kuwana marezinesi awa. Izvi zvatsigirwa neimwe nyanzvi munezvekutepfenyura VaKudzai Kwangwari vati mari irikudiwa kunyanya kune avo vanenge vachizoda rezinesi yenhepfenyuro yenharaunda (Community Radio) yakawandisa. VaKwangwari vanotiwo nekunetsa kurikuita zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi nekudawo kwehurombo munyika havaoni nharaunda dzichizokwanisa kubhadhara marezinesi awa. VaMoyo vatiwo mutemo urikugadzirwa weBroadcasting Services unoti kune avo vachazoda kuita bhizimusi rekutepfenyura munyika vanogona chete kuwana rubatsiro kana rutsigiro kubva kunze kwenyika hwezvikamu zvisingadariki makumi maviri kubva muzana izvo zvinoreva kuti mari zhinji yacho vanofanira kuzvitsvagira. VaMoyo vati izvi zvinosiya veruzhinji vangade kutepfenyura kunze sezv vanenge vasina mari. Kunyangwe zvazvo mumutemo uyu hurumende yakaisa mari yerezinhesi dzenharaunda, parizvino munyika hakuna vakambopihwa rezinesi dzemhando iyi izvo zvopawo vamwe kuti vafungidzire kuti hurumende ingangodaro yoda kuvhura masaisai. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuhurumende panyaya iyi asi munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuudiswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana vanogaroti hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa inechido chekuvhura masai sai pamwe nekuona kuti kodzero yenhau munyika yazadzikiswa. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Voziya neNzara Sezvo Hurumende Isina Mari yeChikafu Mubhajeti Rayo
text: Kunyange hazvo nyaya yekuwanisa vanhu chikafu iri kodzero yevanhu mubumbiro remitemo yenyika, izvi handizvo zviri kuitika munyika sezvo hurumende isina kuisa mari yakakwana parutivi yekuwanisa vanhu zvekudya mubhajeti ra2016 ramirira kutambirwa nedare reparamende. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kukurudzira hurumende kuti igadzirise nyaya yechikafu munyika sezvo huwandu hwevanhu vari kuziya nenzara huri kuramba huchikwira nemamiriro akaita hupfumi uye kunze sezvo mvura isiri kunaya zvakanaka. Sangano reWorld Food Program rinoti vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mashanu vakatarisana nenzara munyika. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi dzinoongorora nyaya dzechikafu dzinoti nemamiriro aita zvinhu mumadhorobha, huwandu uhu hwawedzera zvakanyanya. Vanhu vakawanda vari kutaura neStudio 7 kubva kumatunhu ose enyika vari kugunun’una kuti vave kunonga svosve nemuromo. Masangano anopa rubatsiro ari kutatarika kuwana mari yekubatsira Zimbabwe kuti itengere vanoshaya chikafu uye pave kutotarisirwa kuti hurumende ibatsire vanhu vayo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze vanoshanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe vanoti hurumende iri kungovimba kuti ichabatsirwa nevekunze asi izvi hazvina njere. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaRejoice Ngwenya, avo vanoshanda nesangano reLiberal Solutions, vanoti hurumende yakavhiringidza hurongwa hwekurima. No media source currently available

headline: Vatsigiri veZimbabwe Warriors Vogunun'una neKubuda muAFCON
text: Vatsigiri venhabvu munyika vanoti havachazive pfumo rovobaya mushure mekubuditswa mumakwikwi eAfrican Cup of Nations kuEgypt nezuro Vamwe vanoti kukundikana kutungamira kweZIFa, vamwe vavhiti vatambi pamwe nevarairidzi vavo. Zvinonzika pose pafa munhu hapashaike muroyi. MaWarriors akadamburwa 4-0 neDemocratic Republic of Congo ndokubuda mumakwikwi e 2019 Africa Cup of Nations munharaunda yekutanga. Asi vakawanda vanoti havaitarisira kuti chikwata ichi chaizorakashwa zvakadai. Zimbabwe haisati yakundwa zvakadai mumakwikwi aya. Asi chirikuvanetsa ndechekuti kutadza here kwemaWarriors kana kuti hutungamiri hweveZifa ndiwo hwakakangaisa matambiro evatambi nenyaya yekusavapa mari yavaive vavimbiswa kuti vachatambidzwa makundano aya asati atanga. Mutsigiri weHighlanders VaSimbai Mahachi vanoti varikushaya kuti chii chaizvo chakaitika. Mumwe mutsigiri wemaWarriors VaPhillip Regede vanoti kukundikana kwechikwata ichi hakuneyi nevatambi asi kuti veZifa vakatadza kusimudza chido chevatambi nekusavapa mari yavo yemuhoro. Vamwewo ndivo vave kutoti aimbove mutungamiri wesangano rinotungamirra nhabvu iri VaPhilip Chiyangwa vaive nani kudarika hutungamiri huripo parizvino, uyo urikutungamirwa naVaFelton Kamambo. Mumwe mutsigiri wemutambo wenhabvu VaNyasha Munyaradzi vanotenderanawo naVaRegede vachiti kusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi kwave kukanganisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi.
