Asi mutsigiri weDynamos VaTapiwa Chiganze vanoti nyaya dzemari ndedzimwewo vachiti iivo kana vatambi vaenda kumaAfcon inguva yavo yekuzvitengesa kwete kuchemera mari. VaChiganze vanoti panguva inotevera, Zimbabwe inofanira kushandisa vatambi vechidiki vane shungu dzekubudiira muhupenya hwavo munhabvu. Mumwe muteveri wechikwata ichi VaEugene Kuhuni vanoti nguva yemurairidzi wemaWarriors Sunday Chidzambwa yakwana vachitapawo wavanofungira kuti ndiye angatore chikwata ichi. VaSibanda vanobvumiranawo naVaKuhuni vachiti ivo Chidzambwa anofanira kusiiswa basa. Aka kave keechitatu Zimbabwe ichitadza kubudirira kussvika munharaunda yechipiri zvichitevera kutatarika kwavakaita muna 2004, 2006, na 2017. Asi vateveri venhabvu munyika vave kutarisira kuti muna 2021 Zimbabwe ichaitawo zviri nani. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yoti Vashandi Vayo Vakabaiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19 Ndivo Chete Vachabvumidzwa kuMabasa
text: Hurumende inonzi yakasunga neChipiri kuti vashandi vose vehurumende vachabvumidzwa kuenda kumabasa chete kana vachinge vakabaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 ichiti vakapiwa nguva yakareba yekuti vakwanise kubaiwa. Izvi zvakaziviswa negurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko Amai Monica Mutsvangwa mushure memusangano wedare remakurukota muHarare. Vemakereke vanonziwo vave kubvumidzwa kupinza chidimbu chepakati chenhengo dzekereke dzavo kana chete vatendi ava vakabaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19. Mamwe makungano akaita semichato nendufu anonzi vanhu vanobvumidzwa kuungana vachiri pazana sezvo zvichinzi zvinonetsa kuona kuti vanhu vari kuungana vakabaiwa nhomba here kana kuti kwete. Amai Mutsvangwa vakatiwo hurumende yabvumidzawo kutanga kwemitambo yose, uye nguva dzemitambo dzakaiswa pakati penguva dza 6 dzemangwanani nenguva dza 8 dzemanheru kuitira kupa mukana vanoenda kumabasa. Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa neChipiri kuti vanhu vanomwe (7) vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika yose, uye vamwe vanhu mazana mana negumi nevasere (418) vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi. Izvi zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi munyika yose pazviuru zvina zvine mazana mashanu ane makumi mashanu kana kuti (4 550). Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kubva zvachatanga hwakasvika pazviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezvitanhatu nemazana masere ane gumi nevanomwe kana kuti (126 817). Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisawo kuti huwandu hwevanhu vakabatwa vaine chirwere ichi hwakawanikwa mumatunhu anoti Mashonaland East, Midlands, Matabeleland South neMasvingo, uko kwakwawanikwa vana vechikoro vakawanda vaine Covid-19. Kusvika pakupera kwezuva neChipiri, vanhu vakanga vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga yekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 vakanga vave mamirioni maviri ane zviuru mazana masere nemakumi manomwe nezvitatu nemazana masere nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatatu kana kuti (2, million 873,893). Vakanga vabayiwa nhomba dzose mbiri vakanga vave miriyoni imwe chete, ine zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi maviri nezvitanhatu zvine mazana maviri nemakumi mana nevanomwe kana kuti (1,926,247). Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 vanhu mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana, senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi.

headline: Vanotengesera muMigwagwa Voita Bhindauko reKutengesa Mireza yeNyika
text: Vamwe vatengesi vemumigwagwa vanoti vatora mukana wekushanduka kwehurumende kutengesa zvinhu zvakadai semireza yeZimbabwe nezvimwe zvipfeko zvine ruvara rwemureza wenyika, sezvo zviri kuvapa pundutso. Mumwe wevatengesi vemumigwagwa ava Amai Enet Mandimika vanoti bhizimusi remireza yeZimbabwe riri kufamba zvikuru uye kubva neMugovera apo pakaitwa kuratidzira muguta reHarare vanga vari kuita mari zvikuru. Izvi zvatsinhirwawo naAmai Esinath Dube avo vanoti vakatosiya zvekuhodha zvinhu zvakadai semadomasi, muriwo nezvimwewo kuti vatengese mireza. Mumwe mutengesi, VaArnold Chapungu vanoti shanduko iri kuitika munyika ndoyakavasunda kutengesa mireza yenyika, makepesi ane mireza yeZimbabwe pamwechete nemabhareta. Vatengesi vemumigwagwa ava vanotiwo vari kutarisira kuti mangwana apo pachange pachigadzwa mutungumariri wenyika mutsva VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vachatengesawo zvakanyanya. Gore rapera hurumende yakadzika mutemo unorambidza kutengeswa kwemireza yenyika, zvichitevera kushandiswa kwakanga kwoitwa mureza nemamwe masangano anopikisa hurumende senzira yekuratidza kunyunyuta kwavo. Chimwe chizvarwa chekuChina chakasungwa gore rapera cvhakamiswa pamberi pematare mushure mekunge chawanikwa chichitengesa mireza. Asi kubva pakatanga kuratidzira kwakamanikidza VaMugabe kusiya basa svondo rapera, zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvairatidzira zvaishandisa mureza pasina munhu akasungwa. No media source currently available

headline: Politburo yeZanu-PF Yozeya Nyaya yeKuratidzira
text: Bato reZanu-PF nemusi weChitatu rakaita musangano waro wePolitburo richizeya nyaya dzezvekuratidzira kuri kuitwa munyika uye nyaya yehupfumi uho hwaenda kumawere. Vane ruzivo nezvemusangano uyu vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato iri riri kuda kusimbaradza mapurisa kuti amise kuratidzira munyika kuri kutungamirwa nevemapato anopikisa. Bato iri range richitarisirwawo kuzeyawo nyaya yekudzingwa kwedzimwe nhengo mubato, gadziriro munyaya dzekurima uye kugadzira sarudzo dzekuNorton ne Chimanimani West kune nhengo dzebato iri dzakadzingwa uye kuBikita West kuna VaMunyaradzi Kereke vari kupika jere mushure mekubata mwana mudiki chibharo. NeChishanu bato iri richaita musangano weCentral komiti kuzeya nyaya idzi zvekare. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muZanu-PF VaIgnatious Chombo vati mutungamiri webato iri VaRobert Mugabe ndivo vanenge vari sachigaro mumisangano miviri iyi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vachishanda nesangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition VaJoy Mabenge vanoti havaone Zanu-PF ichibuda nemazano anovaka nyika. No media source currently available

headline: Musona asiya kutambira maWarriors
text: MUTAMBI wenhabvu Knowledge Musona nhasi asendeka shangu dzake dzekutambira chikwata chenyika cheZimbabwe Warriors.   Pachinyorwa chaatumira, Musona uyo ange ari mutungamiri wevatambi vemaWarriors ati ave kusiya kuti ape nguva kuchikwata chake cheAl-Tai pamwe nekupa vamwe vatambi mukana wekutambirawo maWarriors.   “Mhuri yeZimbabwe, nhasi ndokuzivisai kuti ndamira kutambira chikwata chedu chenyika chemaWarriors. Danho iri handina kuritora nyore sezvo ndange ndave nemakore 12 ndichimirira nyika yangu, iyo ndakatanga kutambira musi wa3 Kurume 2010, mumutambo uyo takasangana neSouth Africa.   “Ndave kusiya kuti ndipe nguva kuchikwata changu pamwe nekupa vamwe vatambi mukana wekumirira maWarriors.   “Ndichagara ndine ndangariro yekutambira nyika yangu ndichienda kumitambo yakaita seyeAFCON neCOSAFA Cup, nekurwira kuenda kuWorld Cup.   “Chimwe chikuru kupihwa chiremerera chekuve kaputeni kwemakore mashanu adarika,” adaro Musona.   Mutambo wekupedzisira waMusona achitambira maWarriors waive wekuAFCON musi wa18 Ndira wekuCameroon apo maWarriors akakunda Guinea 2-1 mumutambo uyo akanwisa chibodzwa chekutanga.

headline: Magweta Ofarira Mutongo Unomanikidza VaMalaba Kuenda kuMudyandigere
text: Magweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu anoti ari kufara zvikuru nemutongo waitwa nevatongi vatatu veHigh Court vanoti; Justice Edith Mushore, Justice Happias Zhou naJustice Jesta Charehwa, avo vamanikidza vanga vari mukuru wevatongi vematare edzimhosva, VaLuke Malaba, kuenda pamudyandigere sezvinodiwa nebumbiro remitemo yenyika rakatambirwa nevanhu muna 2013. Mutongo uyu unotevera chikumbiro chakakwidzwa kudare iri nemukuru weZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, Dr Musa Kika, pamwe nesangano rinomirira magweta echidki reYoung Lawyers Association of Zimbabwe. Rimwe remagweta ange achimirira VaKika, VaTendai Biti, vati vafara zvikuru nemutongo wanhasi sezvo zvakanga zvaitwa panyaya yaVaMalaba zvanga zviri kunze kwebumbiro remitemo yenyika. VaKika vatiwo zvinofadza kuti dare ratambira zvichemo zveveruzhinji munyika. VaBiti vati mutevedzeri waVaMalaba, Justice Elizabeth Gwaunza, ndivo vanofanira kutora matomu kudzamara padomwa mukuru wevatongi vematare mutsva. Zvichitevera mutongo wekuti VaMalaba havasisiri mutongi zviri pamutemo, Judicial Services Commission, JSC, yabva yadoma Justice Gwaunza kuti vafanobata matomu kudzamara mutongi mukuru mutsva adomwa zviri pamutemo. Rimwe remwagweta ange achimirira hurumende panyaya iyi, VaThabo Magwaliba, vati vachanzwa kuhurumende kuti vopikisa mutongo uyu here kana kuti kwete. Gweta guru rehurumende, Advocate Prince Machaya, nemunyori anoona nezvemutemo mubato riri kutonga reZanu PF, VaPaul Mangwana, avo vange varimudare, varamba kutaura pamusoro pemutongo wanhasi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzemutemo uye vari mutungamiri weNational Constitutional Assembly, VaLovemore Madhuku, vati mutongo uyu unogona kupikiswa uye kana izvi zvikaitika, zvinoreva kuti VaMalaba vanogona kuenderera mberi nebasa sekudomwa kwavange vaitwa nemutungamiri wenyika. Vatiwo nyaya iyi inogona kugara mumatare kwenguva yakareba nekuti kana mutongo uyu ukapikiswa pachaita dambudziko rekuti ndiana achatonga nyaya iyi sezvo vatongi vose vedare reConstitutional Court nereSupreme Court vakaendeswawo kudare munyaya iyi. Hapana kana mutongi mumwe chete zvake vanogara mumatare aya vakapikisa nyaya yakakwidzwa mudare neZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum pamwe neYoung Lawyers Association of Zimbabwe. Mutauriri wesangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaMarvelous Khumalo, vanoti vatambirawo mutongo wanhasi asi vakati vanoda kuti vana veZimbabwe vave nechekuita nemadomerwo emukuru wevatongi nevatongi vacho. Kumanikidzwa kwemutongi wematare edzimhosva kuenda kumatare chinhu chekutanga haitika pana VaMalaba kubva nyika yawana kuzvitonga muna 1980. Mutongo wapihwa nhasi unorevawo kuti zvakaitwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, zvekuwedzera nguva yaVaMalaba vari pabasa, zvakange zvisiri pamutemo. VaMnangagwa vakatora danho iri mushure mekunge dare Senate ratambira kuvandudzwa kwebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Mutemo uyu unopa mutungamiri wenyika masimba ekuwedzera nguva yevatongi vematare eConstitutional Court neSupreme Court, izvo zvanzi nedare reHigh Court zvinotyora bumbiro remitemo yenyika rakatanga kushanda muna 2013.

headline: Upenyu mberi, mitambo mumashure: PSL
text: SANGANO rePremier Soccer League rinoti harizive kuti nhabvu ichatambwa here mwaka uno wa2020 sezvo iye zvino isiri nguva yekufunga zvemutambo, asi kuchengetedza utano neupenyu hwevanhu.   Kare mwaka wenhabvu unozivikanwa uchitanga kupera kwaKurume kana kutanga kwaKubvumbi.   Asi mitambo yegore rino yakambomiswa senzira yekutevedzera gwara rakatarwa nemutungamiri wenyika President Mnangagwa rekuti vanhu vose vasaungane uye vagare kudzimba senzira yekudzivirira kutapurirana nekupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 icho chinokonzerwa neutachiona hunodaidzwa kuti coronavirus.   Zvichitevera kuwedzerwa kwakaita mazuva e“lockdown” nemutungamiri wenyika svondo rino, mutauriri wePSL, Kudzai Bare anoti ino haisi nguva yekumbofunga zvekuti nhabvu inotanga riinhi sezvo vanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 uye vamwe vachifa nacho.   “Isu tiri kutevedzera danho rakatorwa nemutungamiri wenyika President Emmerson Mnangagwa rinoti vanhu vasaungane uye vagare kudzimba dzavo senzira yekuderedza kupararira kwechirwere checoronavirus.   “Vanhu vari kufa nechirwere ichi saka zvakakosha kuti veruzhinji vagare vakachengetedzeka nguva dzose kuitira kuti Covid-19 isapararire. Isu sePSL, hatikwanise kutaura nezvekutanga kwenhabvu iye zvino nemamiriro akaita nyika nekuda kwecoronavirus, chikuru kuti vanhu vachengetedzeke nguva dzose,” anodaro.   Anoenderera achiti kana chirwere ichi chapera, ndipo pavachazoronga kuti nhabvu inotanga here uye vanenge vachitarisa nepanenge pava nenguva.   “Kana lockdown yapera uye pava nehumboo hwekuti chirwere checoronavirus hakuchisina, ndipo tinotanga kuronga kuti mitambo ichitanga, asiwo tichatarisa kuti gore rinenge rafamba zvakadii.   “Iye zvino tinongokurudzira vanhu kuti ngavange vakachengetedzeka nguva dzose vari mumba, vasafunge zvenhabvu. Upenyu ndihwo hwakakosha nguva dzose,” anodaro.   Zviri kuitwa nePSL izvi ndizvo zviri kumamwe masangano enhabvu pasi rose uko mitambo yakamira kutambwa.

headline: Vanofamba neMabhazi neMakombi Votyira Kutapurirwa Coronavirus
text: Veruzhinji vanofamba nemabhazi pamwe nemakombi anotakura veruzhinji vanoti kumanikidzana kwavanenge vakaita mumabhazi kuri kuvapinza panjodzi yekubatira chirwere cheCoronavirus icho chakatekeshera munyika dzakawanda pasi rose. Kunyange hazvo chirwere ichi chichinzi hachisati chapinda muZimbabwe, hurumende inoti iri kuita gadzirio yakasimba kuitira kuti veruzhinji vasatapurirane chirwere ichi kana chikazopinda munyika. Pamusika weMbare panga paine vanhu vashoma nhasi vanga vachikwira mabhazi anoenda nzendo refu pamwe nemaZupco anoenda mumisha inogara veruzhinji muno mudhorobha reHarare. Vamwe vevanga vachikwira mabhazi eZupco, Amai Sinikiwe Nyamadzawo, vati kumanikidzana kwavanenge vakaita mumabhazi, vamwe vakamira mumabhazi umu vasina pekugara kuri kuvaisa panjodzi yekubata chirwere che Coronavirius sezvo vanhu vanenge vachingofemerana vasina zvekuvharisa miromo kana mhino dzavo, kana kuti ma mask. Amai Nyamadzawo vati chimwewo chinonetsa ndechekuti pazviteshi zvinokwirirwa maZupco nemakombi hapana kushambidzika sezvo pasina zvekugezesa uye mumabhazi nemumakombi aya hamuna mishonga yekupfapfaidza zvinoita kuti vasazobatira zvirwere. Mumwewo anga achikwira mabhazi anoenda kuSouth Africa paRoadport, Amai Acqueline Augustine, avo vati vanogara kuKuwadzana, vati mabhazi anoenda nzendo refu arinani pakuzara zvavanoti zvonoderedza mikana yekutapurirana zvizverwe zvakaita seche Coronavirus. Asi mumwe mutyairi wemabhazi anoenda kuSouth Africa, VaTonderai Kusekwa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanhu vari kuramba vachienda kuSouth Africa misi nenguva sezvo vanhu vazhinji vari kuedza kutsvaga zvingararamisa mhuri dzavo mhiri kwaLimpopo. VaKusekwa vati huwandu hwevanhu vavari kutakura kuenda kuSouth Africa nemabhazi hwadzikira kubva pakapinda chirwere che Coronavirus muSouth Africa vachiti vanokurudzira vose vavanenge vakatakura kuti vageze maoko pavanopinda mumabhazi avo pamwe nepavanosvika pamiganhu yenyika. Munyori mukuru musangano reUnited Commuter Operators of Zimbabwe, VaSimbarashe Ngarande, vaudza Studio7 kuti vari kushanda zvakasimba kuti vatsvage nzira dzekuti vanofamba nemotokari dzinotakura veruzhinji vashandise mari yebepa kana ma coins pakufamba senzira yekuderedza mukana wekuti vasatapurirane zvirwere zvakaita seche Covid-19. Munyori anowona nezvekutakurwa kwezvimhu mubato reMDC uye vari nhengo yeparamende inomirira Kwekwe Central, VaSettlement Chikwinya, vakurudzira hurumende kuti ipe dzidziso yezvehutano kuvatyairi vemabhazi nekuvapa zvinovadzivirira mukutapuriranwa kwehutachiwana hweCoronavirus. VaChikwinya vati hurumende inofanira kutora matanho akasimba kuti vose vanopinda nepamiganhu yenyika vavhenekwa vose. Munyori mukuru mubato rinopikisa reAfrican Development Party, VaBryn Negomo Murape, vakurudzirawo kuti mabhazi anotakura veruzhinji ange achipfapfaidzwa nguva dzose nemishonga uye vemabhazi vange vaine zvikwanisiro zvekuti vanokwira mabhazi vange vachishandisa munyaya dzehutsanana. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rinoona nezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu, VaJoel Biggie Matiza, kuti tinzwe kuti matanho ari kutorwa nebazi ravo ndeapi kuitira kuti veruzhinji vanofamba nemabhazi nemakombi vasabatwe nezvirwere zvakaita secheCoronavirus kana chichinge chazopinda munyika. Asi gurukota rezvehutano, VaObediah Moyo, vati hurumende iri kuedza nepose painogona napo kupa vanhu dzidziso yekuzvidzivirira kuchirwere che Coronavirus uye iri kusimbaradzawo nyaya dzekuvhenekwa kwevanhu vanopinda munyika vachishandisa nhandare dzendege pamwe nemiganhu yenyika. Zvichakadai, mashoko aburitswa nemutauriri wekambani yendege ye South African Airways, VaTlali Tlali, anoti kambani iyi yakanzura kufamba kwendege dzayo kuenda kune dzimwe pasi rose kusanganisira Zimbabwe kubva mangwana kusvika mukupera kwaChivabvu uye kambani iyi yati ndege dzayo dzichange dzichibhururuka muSouth Africa chete zvichitevera matanho akatorwa nehurumende yeSouth Africa ekuedza kurwisana nechirwere cheCoronavirus. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri weCivil Aviation Authority of Zimbabwe, Amai Anna Hungwe, kuti tizive kuti pane dzimwe ndenge dzakanzura kumhara muZimbabwe here sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo pamwe nekupindura mibvunzo yatavatumira. Asi mashoko atiri kutambira anoti ndege yeEmirates yakagumisira kupinda muZimbabwe nezuro, ukuwo Rwanda Air inonzi yatanga nhasi kusapinda muZimbabwe nepamusana pekutyira chirwere cheCoronavirus. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kudzika Mitemo Inomanikidza Vanhu Kubaiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Sachigaro vekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano, Dr Ruth Labode, vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kushandisa nzira dzose dzainokwanisa, kusanganisira kudzika mitemo inosungira kuti munhu wese abaiwe nhomba yekudzvirira denda reCovid-19 iro radzika midzi munyika. Mumashoko avo kugurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube,mushure mekunge VaNcube vazivisa mafambiro aita bhajeti regore rino kusvika pakati pegore kana kuti Mid Term Budget Review, Dr Labode vanoti nhomba dzapinda munyika pari zvino dzinoita kuti vanhu mamiriyoni matatu vabaiwa nhomba mbiri dzekudzivirira Covid-19. Dr Labode vanoti nekuda kwaIzvozvo hurumende inofanirWa kushandisa nzira dzose dzaiNOkwanisa, kusanganisira kumanikidza vanhu kuti vabaiwe nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19. Dr Labode vanotiwo Covid-19 yaunza hurombo hwakanyanya munyika uye hurumende inofanirwa kumbomisa kubhadharisa vanhu muzvipatara zvayo nemamakanzuru zvisinei kuti munhu ane Covid-19 here kana kuti kwete. Gwaro richangobva kuburitswa neWorld Bank rinoratidza kuti vanhu mamiriyoni manomwe nezviuru mazana masere vari kurarama muhurombo hunotyisa nekuda kwedenda reCovid-19. Munyori musangano remagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Association for Doctors for Human Rights, Dr Norman Matara, vanoti sesangano havabvumirani nenyaya yekuti vanhu vamanikidzwe kubaiwa nhomba vachiti izvi zvinofanira kuitwa chete sedanho rekupedzesera. Makambani akawanda munyika kusanganisira hurumende, ave kutomanikidza vanhu kubaiwa nekuomesera vaye vasina kubaiwa izvo zvave kuita kuti munhu wese aende kunobaiwa nhomba. Dr Matara vati Covid-19 iri kufamba nenzira dzinotyisa zvekuti kunyange munhu aine kodzero yekuramba kubaiwa, kodzero iyi inogona kuzopinza vamwe munjodzi. Nyika dzakawanda pasi rose dziri kuongorora mitemo yadzo dziine chinangwa chekumanikidza munhu wese kubaiwa nhomba senzira yekudzivirira zvachose chirwere ichi. Bazi rezvemitemo muAmerica, re Department of Justice, rakaita ongororo yemitemo rikabuda nechisungo charakapa muzinda weWhite House kuti hapana mutemo unorambidza hurumende kana makambani kubuda nezvisungo zvinoita kuti vanhu vasatapurirane zvirwere apo vanenge vari pabasa. Pane tsvakiridzo dziri kuitwawo nenyika dzakabudirira dzekupedza zvachose denda reCovid-19, dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzichikurudzira kuti vanhu vabayiwe nhomba katatu sezvo vanhu vakabayiwa nhomba kaviri vari kubatwa zvakasimba nehirwere ichi. Zim,babwe inoti ine chinangwa chekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana zvevanhu vese munyika senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. VaNcube vakaudza paramende nezuro kuti mwedzi unouya kuchauya dzimwe nhomba mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mashanu uye dzimwe mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mashanu dzichauya muna Gunyana. Mune imweo nyaya kambani yeOld Mutual inoti homwe yekusimbudzira vechidiki yeKurera-Ukondla Youth iyo yainge yambomiswa ichatanga zvakare munguva pfupi inotevera pasi pehurongwa hutsva. Vachipa humbowo kukomiti yeparamende inoona nezvevechidiki, mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muOld Mutual, VaIsaih Mashinya, vati homwe iyi yakamiswa muna 2014 sezvo yainge isiri kufamba sezvainge zvakatarisirwa. Homwe iyi yakaumbwa muna 2011 iine mamiriyoni gumi emadhora ekuAmerica uye payakamiswa vechidiki vainge vaine zvikwereti zvemamiriyoni mana nezviuru mazana mana zvemadhora ekuAmerica. Asi vati zvichitevera danho rekumisa kushanda kwehomwe iyi pakati pekambani yavo nebazi rezvechidiki, vakabvumirana kuparadza komiti kana kuti Trust yafambisa homwe iyi kuitira kuti vatange patsva izvo zvavave kuita pari zvino. Vati Trust ine nhengo dzeOld Mutual nebazi revechidiki yakatoumbwa uye basa rayo radzorerwa mushaure nedenda reCovid-19. VaMashinya vati bhanga ravo reCABS ndiro richaramba richipa zvikwereti kune vechidiki asi rwendo runo zvikwereti izvi zvichange zvave mumaRTGs. Payatanga homwe yeKurera-Ukondla yaipa vechidiki zvikwereti zvinotangira pamadhora mazana mashanu kusvika pazviuru mazana mashanu zvemadhora ekuAmerica. VaMashinya vati Trust yakaumbwa kumutsiridza homwe iyi ndiyo ichagara pasi yoona kuti homwe iyi ichange iine marii pamwe nekuti vanhu vangapihwa zvikwereti zvakakura sei. Mukuru wesangano revechidiki reZimbabwe Youth Forum, VaAshton Bumhira, vuadza Studio7 kuti vanotarisira kuti homwe iyi ichapa mukana kune vechidiki mumatunhu ese munyika kuitira kuti vatange mabhizimizi. Pakamiswa homwe iyi vechidiki zviuru makumi maviri nezveviri ndivo vainge vanyorera kuCABS vachida zvikwereti asi vakabudirira vaive zviuru zvitatu nemazana matanhatu nemakumi matatu. Pavanhu ava zvikamu makumi matanhatu nezvinomwe kubva muzana vaive varume zvikamu makumi matatu nezvitatu vari vakadzi. Vazhinji vevanhu ava vaive vemuHarare, ichiteverwa neBulawayo uye Matabeleland South ndiyo ine vanhu vashoma vakabatsirikana pasi pehomwe iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Vana Chiremba veHurumende Voronga Kuramwa Mabasa Kutanga neChitatu
text: Vamiriri vavanachiremba vemuzvipatara zvehurumende vaita musangano wechimbichimbi nemunyori mubazi rezvehutano mukutsvaga nzira dzekumisa nadzo kuramwa mabasa kwakaziviswa navanachiremba ava kuti kuchatanga svondo rino. Mutungamiri wesangano ravanachiremba, reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Doctor Edgar Munatsi, vanoti musangano uyu hauna zvikuru zvawaburitsa sezvo pasina kuwiriranwa kuti zvichemo zvavo zvingagadziriswa sei. Nekudaro, Doctor Munatsi vanoti nhengo dzavo dzichaenderera mberi nekuramwa mabasa nemusi weChitatu sekuzivisa kwavakaita, kunyange hazvo vachiti vachapa mukana kunhaurirano nehurumende. Vanoti hurumende iri kukundikana kugadzirisa zvinyunyuto zvavo zvikuru zvitatu zvinosanganisira nyaya yekurasikirwa nemabasa kwavanachiremba vanenge vapedza zvidzidzo. "Pane nyaya nhatu, asi yakanyanya kukosha yacho ndeyekuti vanachiremba vaenge vapedza zvidzidzo, vachinge vapedza zvidzidzo vanofanirwa kuenda kunoshanda muzvipatara zvekumamisha. Hurumende iri kuti haichakwanisa kuvapa mabasa iwayo. havana mari yekuti vange vachipa vanachiremba muhoro, vanenge vaenda kunoshanda kunzvimbo idzodzo. "Isusu tiri kunyunyuta kuti kana zvakadero hazvo hurumende yachidii kupa vanachiremba matsamba ekuti vashande vakazvimirira kana vasingakwanise kupiwa mabasa nehurumende." Doctor Munatsi vanodaro. Doctor Munatsi vanoti vasvika pakutora danho iri zvichitevera zvakabuda mukunzwa pfungwa dzenhengo dzavo mumazuva mashoma adarika. Vanachiremba vachangopedza zvidzidzo zvavo ava vanoti vari kudawo zvakare kuti mari dzekubatsirikana kana kuti 'on call allowances' dzitangire pamadhora mazana manomwe nemakumi maviri. Vanoti vanodawo zvakare kuti Health Service Board igadzirise nyaya yavakambowirirana yekuti vanachiremba vehurumende vasabatirwa mitero. Kana vanachiremba vakaramwa mabasa, vanenge vabatana nevehurumende yeKenya, avo vari kuramwawo mabasa kubva muna Zvita wegore rapera. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi veHurumende Vakawanda Voronga Kuramwa Mabasa Svondo Rinouya
text: Zvinhu munyika zvaita manyama amire nerongo sezvo vashandi vehurumende nemakambani ari pasi payo, kana kuti ma parastatals, vari kuramwa mabasa pari zvino, vamwe vacho vachitiwo vachatanga kukanda mapadza pasi svondo rinouya. Masangano azivisa kuti ari kukanda mapadza pasi anosanganisira evarairidzi, vana mukoti, vanachiremba vanodzidzisa kuzvikoro zvepamusoro soro, vashandi veZESA, ZIMRA nemamwe mapazi. Vashandi ava vanoti mari dzavari kutambira hadzichatenge chinhu, izvo zvava kupa kuti varamwe mabasa. Makurukota emakambani ehurumende ose audza Studio 7 kuti itaura negurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, avo vange vari kuMozambique kumusangano weUS Africa Summit nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Kunze kwevanoshanda muhurumende, vashandi vemumabhanga vari kutiwo vave kuda kutanga kuramwa mabasa sezvo mari dzave shoma. Kunze kwekudhura kwezvekudya, vamwe vave kubhadharisa mari yedzimba nemadhora ekuAmerica. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vachidzidzisa paNelson Mandela Metropolitan University, Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano, vanoti mari iri kutambirwa nemushandi haikwani zvachose. VaMugano vanoti mushandi wepasi anotoda mari inosvika madhora mazana mapfumbamwe emaRTGS pamwedzi kwete mazana matatu emaRTGS avari kupihwa pari zvino. No media source currently available

headline: VanaChiremba Vanoti Hurumende Iri Kutenga Mishina Yakafa Kubva kuIndia
text: Munyori mukuru wesangano ravanachiremba reZimbabwe Senior Hospital Doctors Association Dr Aaron Musara vanoti mimwe michina yakatengwa nehurumende haisi kushanda zvachose izvo zvoodza moyo yavanachiremba vachiti hurumende haisi kuratidza kuzvipira kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. Mimwe mishina isiri kushanda zvakanaka iyi yakatengwa kuIndia. Vanachiremba vanoti hurumende iri kungorova bembera ichitaura nezvekuti vanoda mari yemihoro asi ivo vachitiwo vakaudza vakuru mubazi rezvehutano kuti havana zvikwanisiro zvakaita semichina nemishonga nekudaro kunyangwe vakadzokera kubasa hakuna zvinenge zvichiitwa. Vachipindura panyaya yekuti hurumende iri kutenga michina yakafa, sachigaro weHealth Service Board Dr Paulinus Sikosana vakaudza studio 7 kuti iendese mibvunzo kumunyori mubazi rezvehutano Dr Agnes Mahomva avo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Vanachiremba vave nemwedzi mitatu vachiramwa mabasa.  No media source currently available

headline: Zvikwata zveNhabvu Zvokweshana Mukupera kweSvondo
text: Makundano eCastle Lager Premier Soccer League ari kupinda munharaunda yechipiri muine mitambo yakawandisa muHarare. MuHarare chete muchange muine mitambo mishanu, mitatu yacho mangwana sezvo zvimwe zvikwata zvekunze kweHarare zviri kutambira muguta iri mushure mekunge nhandare dzavo dzakanzi hadzikodzere kutambirwa nhabvu yepamusoro. Mutare City Rovers iri kubva kwaMutare kuzotamba neChapungu muNational Sports Stadium muHarare. Svondo rapera, zvikwata zvakaita seNitchrut ne Shabanie Mine zvakatambirawo kunze kwemusha asi zvikakunda izvo muongorori wemutambo wenhabvu, VaInnocent Mutena, vatsinhira kuti nhabvu hainei kuti muri kutambira kupi. Mutambo pakati peMutare City Rovers neChapungu uri kutambwa nguva dzekudya dzemasikati sezvo nhandare iyi iri kushandiswa zvekare zuva rimwechetero nechikwata cheBlack Rhinos icho chiri kusangana neZPC Kariba. Harare City ichange iri muRufaro Stadium neBulawayo City. Herentals iri kutamba Highlanders muNational Sports Stadium neSvondo. Ukuwo Dynamos iri pamusha neShabanie. Dembare yakarohwa 1-0 neChicken Inn svondo rapera. Murairdzi weDembare, Lloyd Mutasa, anoti ane tarisiro huru gore rino. FC Platinum iri pamusha muMandava Stadium neYadah. Mimwe mitambo iriko yakamira seizvi: Triangle United v Ngezi Platinum Stars - Gibbo Bulawayo Chiefs v Caps United - Luveve Zvichakadaro, chikwata chenyika chemaWarriors chiri kupinda munhandare yeLevy Mwanawasa Stadium muNdola, Zambia, neSvondo, chichiedza kutanda nyadzi apo chiri kusangana neAngola mumutambo wekugumisira mumakwikwi ezvikwata zvina. Zimbabwe yakadamburwa neZambia mumutambo wavo wekutanga zvekuti iri kutarisira kukunda mumutambo uyu kuti isapedze iri pachinhanho chekugumisira mumakwikwi ayo, ari kusangana Zambia neSouth Africa mufainari. Murairdzi wemaWarriors, Sunday Chidzambwa, ari kushandisa makundano aya kutarisa vatambi vaachada kushandisa mumakundano e2019 Africa Cup of Nations qualifiers umo Zimbabwe iri mugungano rimwechete neCongo DR, Congo Brazzaville, neLiberia. Chikwata chimwe chete kubva mugungano iri ndicho chichaenda kumafainari ayo achaitirwa kuCameroon muna 2019. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanoparura Hwaro Huchashandiswa Mukurwisa Covid-19
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vaparura hurongwa huchatevedzerwa nenyika pakurwisa chirwere cheCoronavirus panguva iyo masangano evadzidzisi ari kukurudzira kuti zvikoro zvose zvivharwe. Vachiparura hurongwa uhwu kuState House uhwo huri kudaidzwa kuti National Covid-19 Preparedness and Response Plan, VaMnangagwa vati ibasa remunhu wese ari munyika kuti aone kuti paagere pakashambidzika kuitira kuti chirwere che Coronavirus chisarambe chichitapuriranwa kana chichinge chazopinda munyika. Gurukota rezvehutano, VaObediah Moyo, vatiwo vari kufara kuti chirwere ichi hachisati chapinda muZimbabwe vachiti izvi hazvifanire kuita kuti Zimbabwe irare nezamu mukanwa. Mumiriri weWorld Health Organization muZimbabwe, VaAlex Gasasira, vatiwo chirwere che Coronavirus chiri kupararira nekukasika zvekuti chavakutoda mushandira pamwe pakati pehurumende dzepasi rose pamwe neveruzhinji. Kunyange hazvo VaMnangagwa vakati vanhu vanodarika zana vasaungane seimwe yenzira dzekudzikisa mukana wekuti vanhu vasatapurirane chirwere ichi, mamwe masangano evarairidzi anoti zvikoro zvinofanira kuvharwawo. Muaturiri wesangano revadzidzisi vekumaruwa reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaNation Mudzitirwa, vaudza Studio7 kuti sangano ravo riri kukurudzira kuti zvikoro zvose munyika zvivharwe mangwana chaiye vachiti muzvikoro zvizhinji hamuna mvura zvinowedzera mikana yekuti chirwere che Coronavirus chitapuriranwe. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemunyori musangano reZimbabwe Teachers Association, VaTapson Nganunu Sibanda, avo vaudza Studio 7 parunhare vari kuBulawayo kuti vana vechikoro vakabatwa nechirwere ichi vanogona kunotapurira vamwe kudzimba chirwere ichi chopararira. Mutungamiri wesangano reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaTakavafira Zhou, vati zvikoro zvikasavharwa mangwana vachakurudzira nhengo dzesangano ravo kuti dzisaende kubasa kubva neMuvhuro. Mumwe mubereki ane vana vaviri vanodzidza pane chimwe chikoro chiri muHarare, Amai Blantina Mukwesha, vati vave kutyirawo hupenyu hwevana vavo izvo zviri kupa kuti vatsigire zviri kutaurwa nemasangano evarairidzi. Gurukota rezvedzidzo, VaCain Mathema, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti havataure neStudio7 vachiti havadi kubvunzwa zvinhu zvisina musoro. Asi VaMnangagwa vakaudza vatori venhau kuState House neChipiri svondo rino kuti zvikoro zvicharamba zvakavhurwa sezvo kwangosara mavhiki matatu chete kuti zvivharwe panopera kotoro yekutanga yegore rino. Sangano reWorld Health Organization rinoti Coronavirus yauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvisere uye vanhu vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi vanodarika mazana maviri nemakumi maviri ezviuru. No media source currently available

headline: Vana Chiremba Voronga Kuramwa Mabasa Zvekare
text: Sangano ravanachiremba reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association ranyora tsamba kuhurumende richiizivisa kuti vanachiremba vari kuzombomira kuenda kubasa sezvo mari dzavo dzisisakwane. Vanachiremba vanoti mitengo yezvinhu zvose yawedzerwa asi mari yavo yemihoro isina kuwedzerwa. Vanachiremba ava vanoti hurumende haisi kuratidza kuzvipira munhaurirano dzemari dzavanotambiriswa. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvehutano, Doctor Obadiah Moyo, sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Mutungamiri wesangano ravanachiremba iri, Doctor Peter Magombeyi, vanoti basa vanoda asi zvinhu zvakaita manyama amire nerongo zvekuti havachakwanisi kuenda kubasa nekuomerwa nezvinhu. No media source currently available

headline: Cosafa Cup gore rinouya
text: SANGANO reCouncil of Southern Africa Football Association rinoti mutambo weCOSAFA Cup uchatambwa muna Chivabvu gore rinouya.   Mutambo uyu waifanirwa kutambwa muna Chivabvu kuDurban, kuSouth Africa gore rino asi wakambomiswa zvichitevera kumiswa kwakaitwa mitambo pasi rose nechinangwa chekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Achitaura ari kuSouth Africa uko anogara, munyori mukuru weCOSAFA, Sue Destombes — anoti gore rino hazvichakwanisika kuti Cosafa Cup ichiitwa.   “Gore rino hazvichakwanisika kuti Cosafa Cup yevarume ichitambwa, asi ticharonga kuti igotambwe gore rinotevera muna Chivabvu,” anodaro Destombes.   Kunyangwe zvazvo mutambo wevarume usiri kuzotambwa gore rino, Destombes anoti mitambo mina yemadzimai iriko gore rino.   “Tiri kuronga mitambo mina inoti yeCosafa Cup yemadzimai vakuru neUnder-17 kozoti maUnder-17 ne20 vachatamba mitambo yekurwira kuenda kuAFCON 2021,” anodaro.   Kumitambo yevarume, Zambia ndiyo ine mukombe weCosafa Cup uyo wayakahwina gore rapera.   Zvakadaro, chikwata chemaMighty Warriors chiri kuPort Elizabeth, kuSouth Africa uko chiri kukwikwidza mumutambo weWomen’s COSAFA Cup Tournament. Chikwata ichi chiri muboka rine zvimwe zvinoti Tanzania neBotswana muGroup C.   Chikwata chinopedza chiri pamusoro muboka iri chinobva chananga kusemi-fainari yemutambo uyu.    Mitambo yezvimwe zvikwata zvinosanganisira Under-17 ichatanga musi wa19 Mbudzi uye ichitarisirwa kuzopera musi wa29 Mbudzi. Kozoti yeUnder-20, ichatambwa  kutanga nemusi wa3 Zvita ichizopera 13 Zvita.

headline: Zvimwe Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri Kunze Zvotevedzerawo Kurudziro yeKudzivirira Covid-19 muMabasa
text: Nyika dzakawanda pasi rose, idzo dzakambenge dzambovhara senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19, dzakatanga kubvumidza kuvhurwa zvishoma zvishoma kwemakambani akasiyanasiyana paine kurudziro yekuti vashandi nevashandirwi vatevedzere mitemo yakatarwa inodzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Matanho aya akaonawo vana veZimbabwe vari munyika dzakasiyanasiyana vachidzokerawo kumabasa kwavo vachiedzawo chose kuti vatevere mitemo yehutano hwakanaka mumabasa mavanoshanda, inosanganisira kupfeka nhumbi dzinodzivirira kutapuriranwa kwechirwere, kugeza maoko nesipo uye kusiya mikaha pakati pavo. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chakaitawo rombo rakanaka rekudzokera kubasa ndaVaPhainos Chikunda, avo vari kuPort Elizabeth, kuSouth Africa. VaChikunda vanoti kubva pavakadzokera kubasa, sevashandi vari kutora matanho anokurudzirwa neWorld Health Organisation ekuona kuti vazviidzivirira kubva kuchirwere cheCovid-19, kungave kubasa kana kumba. Vanoti pavanosvika pabasa mangwanani oga oga vanovhenekwa kuona kuti havasi kupisa miviri here, vogeza maoko nesipo uye kuzora maoko avo mushonga unouraya hutachiwana. Vanotiwo mushandi wese anenge akavhara muromo nemhino, vachivhenekwa zvakare vave pabasa. Vamwe vari kunze vari kuunganidzawo mari nezvekudya zvekubatsira zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kutambura munguva ino yeCovid-19 zvisati zvakwanisa kudzokera kumabasa. Izvi zvinonzi zviri kuitikawo muSouth Africa umo vanhu vakabatana kubatsira vari kushaya. VaChikunda vanotiwo munyika iyi mune zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda chose zvisati zvadzokera kumabasa, izvo zviri kuita kuti vakawanda vanonge svosve nemuromo. Asi vanoti zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe pamwe nevemakereke nevemamwe masangano anobatsira vari kuedza kuunganidza rubatsiro pamwe nezvekudya zvekubatsira vari kutambura ava, vamwe vachitobatsirwa kubhadhara mari dzepekugara. Chinonzi chiri kunyanya kunetsa ndechekuti hurumende yeSouth Africa haisi kubatsira vasiri zvizvarwa zvenyika iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Kushandiswa Zvakanyanya kweZvinodhaka Kunonzi Kwawedzera Zvakanyanyisa Dambudziko reChirwere chePfungwa muHarare
text: Kushandiswa zvakanyanya kwezvinodhaka nevanhu kunonzi nemukuru anoona nezvehutano mudunhu reHarare kwawedzera zvakanyanyisa dambudziko rechirwere chepfungwa. Mukuru anoona nezvehutano mudunhu reHarare VaInnocent Hove vanoti nekuda kwekuwedzera kwedambudziko rechirwere chepfungwa zvakakosha kuti vanhu vapihwe dzidziso. VaHove vakataura mashoko aya paiitwa mhemberero dzekucherechedza dambudziko rechirwere chepfungwa nemusi weChitatu. Pasi rose, United Nations inoti zuva iri rinocherechedzwa musi wa10 Gumiguru asi zvakanonoka kuitwa nedunhu reHarare. Amai Betty Zephania vanova mumwe wevakaronga mhemberero idzi vachishanda kubazi rinoona nezvehutano vatsigira vachiti dambudziko rehutano hwepfungwa idambudziko ririkukura. Amai Zephania vati vazhinji vari kutamburawo nezvirwere zvepfungwa izvi varikushandisa zvinodhaka vachiti munhu wese arikufanirwa kushanda kuona kuti dambudziko iri rapedzwa. Mumwe wevechidiki, VaFarai Gutu vati vechidiki vanoda kudzidziswa kuti zvinodhaka zvine njodzi. Mumwe aishandisa zvinodhaka akakwanisa kuzobuda mazviri aona kuti zvinokuvadza, ndiVaJacob Shamuyarira, avo vakazotanga sangano rakazvimiririra rinobatsira avo vanoda kusiya zvinodhaka. Vati kushandisa zvinodhaka kunokanganisa hupenyu hwevanhu vachiti zvakakoshawo kuti vanhu vazive kwekuwana rubatsiro kana vawirwa nedambudziko iri. Kutanga kwegore rino mutungamiriri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakazivisa kuti gore rino igore rekurwisa dambudziko rekushandiswa kwezvinodhaka. Vechidiki ndivo vanonzi vari kunyanyoshandisa zvinodhaka izvi zvakaita semutoriro, krango, mbanje, mishonga yechikosoro yakaita seHistalix kana bronco nezvimwewo. Mhemberero dzegore rino dzakaitwa paine kurudziro yekuti pasi rese rikoshese hutano hwepfungwa. World Health organization inoti muAfrica, vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mazana manomwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemaviri kana kuti 792 million vane chirwere chepfungwa. No media source currently available

headline: Vasingaone Vopomera Kanzuru yeHarare Mhosva yeKutyora Kodzero Dzavo
text: Vamwe vagari vemuHarare vasingaone vapa chikumbiro kukanzuru yeguta iri chekuti vawane mashoko pamusoro pezvirongwa zvainoita. Mushamarari uye vasinaone VaLiberty Mkhululi Lupahla vanoti vasingaone havasi kuwana mashoko pamusoro pemisangano yekanzuru nezviziviso nekuti zvinyorwa zvacho zvakagadzirirwa vanoona chete, "Ngatizivei kuti vanhu vasingaone vagari vemumaguta semunhu wese muZimbabwe." Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, "Saka zvinhu zvakakodzera kuti pese panoumbwa hurongwa hwakakosha zvizivikanwe nemunhu wese." VaLupahla vanoti vasingaone vane kodzero yekuva mukati mehurongwa hweguta sezvakangoitawo vamwe, "Asi muchaona kuti ma budgets acho anenge akanyorwa ne print kwete braille kana kutaurwawo zvazvo nenzira inonzwikwa neveruzhinji." Vatizve, "Zvinonetsa nekuti vakaremara vanenge vachida kunzwawo hurongwa hweguta ravo sevanhu vanobhadhara mitero yakasiyana siyana. Saka kana ma budgets achiitwa ivo vasingazive zvinoti netsei nekuti vanoitwa sevana vadiki" VaAbraham Mateta igweta uye vasingaone vanoti dambudziko rekubatwa nekuseri kweruoko rinopera chete kana vakaremara vane hunyanzvi vakapinzwa mabasa mukanzuru. "Kana pane vanomiririra kodzero dzevakaremara mukanzuru vanezenge vachiona kuti vanhu vasingaone vanodawo runyoro rwe braille pamwe nekugadzira zvimwe zvishambadzo nemashoko zvinozobatsira vasingaone." VaMateta vanoti kanzuru iri kutyora mutemo wenyika pamwe nekodzero dzakatenderanwa nenyika dzepasi rose kana kuti Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities pakushayisa vasingaone mukana wekuti vawane mashoko. "Vemakanzuru vanofanira kuziva kuti bumbiro remitemo yenyika rinotaura kuti muhurongwa hwebudiriro zvishuwo zvevakaremara zvinofanira kunge riri rimwe dingindira rinofanira kutarisiswa." Muzvinafundo Tafara Marazi vepa University of Zimbabwe vanotungamirira sangano revasingaone reVisually-Impaired Persons Support vanotiwo vasingaone vane hunyanzvi hwekugadzira mutauro we braille vanofanira kuwaniswa mukana mukanzuru, "Vamwe vedu vane hunyanzvi vari kutopemha mudzinzira." Vaenderera mberi vachiti, "Dai zvaiita vanhu vakadaro vawaniswa mukana wekugadzira braille toraramawo hupenyu hunoraramwa nevamwe hwekuwana mashoko." Meya veguta reHarare vaJacob Mafume vatambira mashoko evasingaone vakati kanzuru ichatora matanho nekukurumidza ekuzvigadzirisa, "Ichokwadi kuti zvinyorwa zvedu hazvibude muzvinyorwa zvebraille." Vawedzera vachiti, " Zvimwe zvinhu zvinenge zvichida kuti munhu uzviwerengere. Tichaedza nepese patinogona kuti tizvigadzirise.: .

headline: Garai kumba:ZIFA
text: MANEJA wechikwata chenhabvu chenyika chemaWarriors — Wellington Mpandare — oyambira vatsigiri vangade kuenda kunoona mutambo weZimbabwe neAlgeria uyo uchatambirwa muno nemusi weMuvhuro unotevera wekurwira kuenda kumutambo we2021 Africa Cup of Nations kuti vasaende kunhandare asi kuti vaone mutambo uyu vari kudzimba dzavo.   MaWarriors nemaDesert Foxes ekuAlgeria, iyo ine vatambi vane mukurumbira vakaita saRiyad Mahrez anotambira Manchester City yekuEngland naIsmael Bennacer weAC Milan (Italy), vari kusangana mumitambo miviri yemuboka ravo reGroup H.   Mutambo wekutanga uriko husiku hwemusi weChina chino kuAlgeria uye wechipiri uchange uri muno kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium nemusi weMuvhuro unotevera.   Boka iri rine zvimwe zvikwata zvinoti Botswana neZambia.   Mitambo miviri yevakomana vaZdravko Logarusic, murairidzi wemaWarriors, neAlgeria yakakosha zvikuru uye vanofanirwa kutora zvibodzwa zvose kuti vaende pamusoro muboka ravo iri vagowana mukana wekuenda kumakwikwi e2021 Africa Cup of Nations ayo achaitirwa kuCameroon.   Mutambo wemaWarriors wemusi weMuvhuro uchange uri wekutanga kutambirwa munyika muno kubva pakamiswa mitambo pasi rose nechinangwa chekurwisa kupararira kweCovid-19.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza svondo rino, maWarriors asati asimuka akananga kuAlgeria, Mpandare anoti vatsigiri venhabvu havasi kutenderwa kunhandare kuchange kuchitambwa mutambo uyu muno.   “Vatsigiri venhabvu havasi kutenderwa kunhandare saka ngavagare kudzimba dzavo. Nemusi weMuvhuro patiri kusangana neAlgeria muno hakuna ari kutenderwa kuuya kuzoona nhabvu, mutambo uyu uchatambwa pasina vatsigiri.   “Isu tiri kutevedzera matanho akatorwa neHurumende, hatidi kuisa utano hwevatambi vedu nehweruzhinji panjodzi saka vanhu ngavagare kudzimba dzavo,” anodaro Mpandare.   Anoenderera mberi achiti, “Ngatisazoti hatina kupa yambiro, kuchange kune vemitemo vachichengetedza vachiona kuti hapana ari kupinda munhandare.”   Zvakadaro, sangano revatsigiri vemaWarriors reFriends of the Warriors rinoti riri kuronga nzvimbo dzichaonerwa bhora nevatsigiri nemusi weMuvhuro.   Mutungamiri wesangano iri — Edward Chimedza — anoti sezvo kunhandare kusiri kutenderwa kuti vanhu vapinde, sevatsigiri vari kutsvaga nzvimbo dzichaungana vanhu  vasingadarike 100 kuitira kuti vakwanise kuona mutambo uyu pamaterevhizheni.   “Isu tinoziva kukosha kwemitambo miviri iyi saka tiri kuitawo zvatinokwanisa kuti titsigire chikwata chedu. Tichaungana sevatsigiri kunzvimbo dzakasiyana uko tinenge tichitevedzera hedu mitemo yese yesocial-distancing kuti vanhu vasaite chitsoko-tsoko.   “Saka tine nzvimbo dzakawanda dzatichange tichishanda nadzo. Vakomana vedu vanofanira kuziva kuti tinavo uye tiri kuvatsigira, ivo ngavabate basa sebasa,” anodaro Chimedza.   Mumitambo mina yakapedzisira kusangana zvikwata zviviri izvi, maWarriors haasati ambokundwa neAlgeria.   Zvikwata izvi zvakaita mangange katatu uye maWarriors akahwina mumwe mutambo wacho.

headline: Zvikoro Zvovhurwa Asi Vamwe Varairidzi Vachiramwa Mabasa neNyaya yeMihoro
text: Zvikoro zvakavhurwa neMuvhuro kune vadzidzi vari kunyora bvunzo mukupera kwegore kunyangwe hazvo vamwe varairidzi vatotanga kuramwa mabasa vamwe vachitiwo hurumende haisi kupa zvikwanisiro zvakakwana kuvadzidzi kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Muzvikoro zvine chitsama zvakashanyirwa neStudio 7 muBulawayo kusanganisira Milton Primary, McKeurtan Primary, Lobengula Primary, Eveline High pamwe eGifford High, vana vechikoro vange vauya kuchikoro uye vadzidzisi vange vachiita basa ravo. Pazvikoro izvi, vana vadzidzisi pamwe nevamwe vanhu vose vanenge vasvikapo vange vachitanga vaongororwa kupisa kwemiviri yavo uyewo kugezeswa maoko nema sanitiser. Mumwe mubereki ane mwana anodzidza pane chimwe chikoro chemuBulawayo uyo angozvidoma nezita rekuti Amai Moyo, ati afara kuti zvikoro zvavhurwa asi akomekedza kuti hurumende itore matanho akasimba ekuti vana pamwe nevadzidzisi vadzivirirwe mukubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Tsvakurudzo yaitwa neStudio 7 inoratidza kuti kuzvikoro zvakawanda zvekumamisha vadzidzisi vakawanda havana kuenda kubasa. Mumwe mudzidzisi anodzidzisa kuBinga achigara muBulawayo uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita kana kubuda pamhepo achityira basa rake ati haazi kukwanisa kuenda kuchikoro kwaanodzidzisa nekuti mari yake yemuhoro haikwane kuti aite izvi. Masangano anomirira vadzidzisi akawanda ari kuti vadzidzisi havazi kukwanisa kudzokera kumabasa nekuti mari yavo haivakwanire. Mutungamiri wesangano reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe VaObert Masaraure vaudza Studio 7 kuti vadzidzisi vanosvika zvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe kubva muzana vekumaruwa havana kuenda kubasa vachiti izviz hazvishamise nekuti havana mari yekuti vakwanise kuita izvi. Vatsidza kuti vadzidzisi havazi kuzodzokera kuchikoro kana nyaya yavo yemuhoro isati yagadziriswa. Svondo rakapera gurukota rezvedzidzo VaCain Mathema vakati vadzidzisi vanotadza kuenda kubasa vanogona kudzingwa basa.\nMukuru wesangano reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, kana kuti PTUZ VaTakavafira Zhou vashora danho rehurumende vachiti kutyisidzira vashandi hakuna zvakunobatsira. Mukuru wesangano remubatanidzwa wemasangano emuzvikoro reNational Association of School Development Associations, kana kuti NASDAC, VaBanny Manokora vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kufara kuti zvikoro zvavhurwa asi vati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti dai hurumende yakadzirisa gakava riri pakati payo nevahsndi vayo kusanganisira vadzidzisi kuitira kuti zvinhu zvifambe zvakanaka muzvikoro. Tabata mutauriri webazi redzidzo VaTaungana Ndoro kuti tinzwe maonero ebazi ravo pazuva rekutanga regore rino rekuvhurwa kwezvikoro asi vati vange vari mumusangano. Asi gurukota rezvevashandi Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima vanoti nhaurirano nevarairidzi dziri kuenderera mberi nekudaro hapana chikonzero chekuramwa mabasa. Vati hurumende yakazvipira kuwedzera vashandi mari. Pave nenguva yakareba vadzidzisi vachichema chema nenyaya yemuhoro pamwe nemashandiro uye vamwe vanoti kusagadziriswa kwenyaya iyi iri kuita kuti dzidzo yemunyika idzokere kumashure. No media source currently available

headline: Hatichazviita zvakare: PSL
text: PREMIER Soccer League inoti ine chivimbo chikuru chekuti varidzi vepembe havapamhe zvekare zvavakaita svondo radarika izvo zvakaona vachiramba kuridza mitambo yePSL ikazosvika pakumiswa. Svondo radarika, vatsigiri venhabvu vakakatyamadzwa zvikuru nechiitiko ichi apo varidzi vepembe vakaramba kunoridza mumitambo yePSL vasingataure chikonzero chacho.   Izvi zvakazoona PSL ichinyorera kuZifa ichibvunza kuti sei zvainge zvaitika, Zifa ndokuvimbisa kuti zvaisazodzokorodzeka zvekare.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza svondo rino, mutauriri wePSL — Kudzai Bare — anovimbisa vatsigiri venhabvu kuti mitambo yePSL svondo rino ichatambwa pasina chinokoneso sezvakaitika svondo radarika.   “Chakachaya svondo rino, mitambo yePSL iriko uye hakuna chichakonesa kuti itambwe. “Mushure mekunge nyakanyaka yesvondo radarika yaitika, takanyorera kuZifa tichibvunza kuti sei zvainge zvaitika, ivo vakatipindura vachitivimbisa kuti hazvidzokororwe zvekare.   “Ndiko kusaka makaona kuti svondo radarika takakwanisa kuronga mitambo yeChibuku Super Cup semi-final iyo yakatambwa zvakanaka. Saka svondo rino mitambo iriko,” anodaro.   Bare anoenderera mberi achiti, “Vatsigiri venhabvu tinovakurudzira kuti vasatye, mitambo iriko svondo rino, zvose zvakagadziriswa, varidzi vepembe havambodzokorodze zvavakaita svondo radarika.” Zvakadaro, mumitambo iriko svondo rino, Dynamos ichienda kuChiredzi kunosangana neTriangle United musi weSvondo kuchiti muHarare muchange mune Harare Derby iyo ichaona CAPS United ichisangana neHarare City.   Uyu uchange uri mutambo wekutanga waLloyd Chitembwe achisangana nemaSunshine City Boys ayo aakatiza masvondo adarika achidzokera kumusha kuKepekepe.

headline: "Munodei paMuchato weDhongi neBere"-VaKasukuwere paNyaya yeKutyisidzirwa neRufu
text: Mubato reZanu-PF mapinda zinyekenyeke zvichitevera mashoko ekuti vamwe vakuru vebato iri vari muchikwata chinonzi Generation 40 kana kuti G40 vavekutumirwa mashoko ekuti vanogona kupfuudzwa pambozhanhare dzavo. Vanonzi vatumirwa mashoko aya vanosanganisa gurukota rezvematunhu VaSaviour Kasukuwere, gurukota rezvedzidzo yepamusoro muzvinafundo Jonathan Moyo, gurukota rezvekuendeswa kwehupfumi kuvatema VaPatrick Zhuwawo uye vanomirira Harare South mudare reparamende VaShadreck Mashayamombe. Bepanhau reNewsday ndiro rakatanga kuburitsa nyaya yekuti pane vakuru mubato reZanu-PF vainge vatumirwa mashoko ekuti vanogona kuitwa kafiramberi nemunhu asiri kuzivikana. Izvi zvinonzi zvakaitwa nemusi weSvondo. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Senior Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba vati vange vasati vapirwa nyaya iyi. VaMoyo havana kudaira nharembozha yavo. VaZhuwawo vati havasati vatarisa nharembozha yavo kuti pane mashoko akadai here sezvo paine vanhu vakawanda vari kuvatumira mashoko ekuvakorokotedza nekudomwa kuva gurukota. Asi VaKasukuwere havana kuda kutaura zviri kuitika vachiti Studio 7 igare kuAmerica kwede kuda kutaura zviri munyika. Tabatawo VaMashayamombe asi zvakona n’anga murapwa achida vachiti havana kusununguka kutaura parunhare. Mumusangano weZanu-PF hamuna kugadzikana sezvo pari kufungidzirwa kuti paita kunetsana kwakanyanya panyaya yekuti ndiyani achatora chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe avo vari kunzi vakwegura. Pakuvigwa kwegamba renyika VaSikhanyiso Ndlovu kumarinda eHeroes Acre neMugovera nhengo dzeZanu-PF dzakawirasanawo. Nyaya yekunetsana muZanu-PF iyi inonzi yave kukanganisa nhaurirano nemapato anopikisa idzo dzinonzi dzakatanga kuitwa kuGhana dzichitarisirwa kuitwa zvekare kuVictoria Falls neChina. Mapato anopikisa arikuramba kuti nhaurirano idzi dzakananganana nekuumba hurumende yemubatanidzwa. Zanu-PF nekune rimwe divi iri kutoramba kuti pane nhaurirano dziripo. Zanu-PF haina kubvira yagadzikana kubva zvayakadzinga vaive mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika amai Joyce Mujuru nevamwe vachipomerwa mhosva yekuda kubvisa VaMugabe pachigaro nechisimba. Asi amai Mujuru nevamwe vakadzingwa mubato vari kuramba nyaya yekuti vaida kubvisa VaMugabe pachigaro vachiti vari kuzorwa mafuta enguruve yavasina kudya. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Yoita Misangano Yekurangarira VaMorgan Tsvangirai neMugovera
text: Mukurangarira vaimbove mutungamiri webato reMDC, muchakabvu Morgan Tsvangirai, bato iri rinoti richange richiita misangano mumatunhu ose mangwana, Mugovera. Munyori mukuru webato iri, VaCharlton Hwende, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakuru vebato ravo vachaendeswa kumatunhu akasiyana siyana kunotaura nevanhu. Vatiwo musangano wemu Harare uchaitwa nemusi weChitatu paAmbassador Hotel, apo mutungamiri webato iri, VaNelson Chamisa, vachange vachitaura pamwe chete nemukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, avo vakamboshanda naVaTsvangirai kuZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions. VaHwende vati iyi misangano yekurangarira vaTsvangirai naizvozvo mapurisa haana chikonzero chekunetsana nevanhu vachaunganira. VaMorgan Tsvangirai vakashaya musi wa 14 Kukadzi, 2018. No media source currently available

headline: Vanyori Vakawanda Vanoti Zvinyorwa Zvavo Zviri Kushandiswa Pasina Muripo
text: Chirongwa cheZimbabwe International Book Fair chiri kuitika muHarare hurumende ichikurudzirwa kuti ipedze dambudziko rekubiwa kwepfungwa dzevanyori mumabhuku, kupedza huori munyaya dzekutengesa mabhuku zvisiri pamutemo kuitira kuti mabhuku abhadhare vose vane chekuita nekunyorwa, kudhindwa pamwe nekutengeswa kwemabhuku. Vanyori, vanodhinda, vanotengesa mabhuku pamwe nevadzidzisi vari kuwirirana kuti hurumende haina kupedza dambudziko rekudhindiswa nekutengeswa kwemabhuku zvisiri pamutemo. Munyori ane mukurumbira, Musayemura Zimunya, anoti huori hwakanyanyisa munyika zvekuti mapurisa nevezvematongerwo enyika vanodhindisa mabhuku zvisiri pamutemo. Zimunya anoti vanhu vanoonekwa vachitengesa mabhuku zvisiri pamutemo vanenge vatumwa nevakuru vekumapurisa nekumapazi ehurumende. Izvi zvinotsigirwa nemukuru weZimbabwe International Book Fair, ZIBF, VaBlazio Tafireyi, vanoti tsvakiridzo yavakaita inoratidza kuti mapurisa nevezvematongerwo enyika ndivo vevamwe vari kuita basa rekudhindisa mabhuku zvisiri pamutemo. Zimunya anoti zvikoro ndizvo zviri pamberi mukutyora mutemo wekudhindisa mabhuku zvisiri pamutemo. VaTafireyi vanoti kunyange vakaendesa vanhu vakawanda kumatare edzimhosva nemari inosvika zviuru makumi manomwe nezvishanu hapana chakabuda kumatare sezvo vachinzi vabhadhare mari yefaindi inosvika madhora makumi maviri. Vachivhura musika wemabhuku neChitatu, gurukota rezvedzidzo yepasi, VaLazarus Dokora, vati vemuzvikoro vanofanirwa kushanda vasingatyore mutemo wemabhuku. Vanotengesa mabhuku vanoti mabhuku avo haasi kutengwa sezvo vakawanda vave kutenga mabhuku pamikoto. Mukuru weInnov8, VaPeace Muwani, avo vanotengesa mabhuku, vanoti rimwe dambudziko ravari kusangana naro nderekuti vanodhinda mabhuku vave kutengesa vega mabhuku senzira yekuita mari yakawanda. Musika wemabhuku wavhurwa kuruzhinji rwevanhu nhasi uye uchange wakavhurwa kusvika neMugovera. Mangwana rinenge riri zuva rekuratidzira mabhuku kuvanhu uye kusangana kwevaverengi vemabhuku nevanyori . Gore rino musika wemabhuku uri kuitwa pasi pedingindira rinoti: Making the Book Pay. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Voshushikana neKuwanda kweVanhu Vari Kubatwa neCovid-19 Munyika
text:
Vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kushushikana zvikuru nekukwira kuri kuita huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Vanhu vakawanda vataura neStuduio7 kuChiredzi vanoti huwandu huri kubudiswa hwevanhu vari kubatwa neCovid-19 kwemazuva mana apfuura huri kuvatyisa sezvo guta iri raramba riri roga rine vanhu vakawanda vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi zvichienzaniswa nemamwe maguta mudunhu rose reMasvingo. Dzimwe nzvimbo mudunhu reMasvingo dziri kubuda dzisina kana munhu
mumwe chete anobatwa nechirwere ichi panoongororwa vanhu zuva nezuva. Musi wechipiri 8 Chikumi pavanhu gumi nemumwe vakawanikwa vaine
chirwere ichi mudunhu rose reMasvingo, vapfumbamwe vaiva vekuChiredzi
vaviri vari vemudhorobha reMasvingo. Musi weChitatu 9 Chikumi, pavanhu gumi nevapfumbamwe vakabatwa neCovid-19 mudunhu rose, vese vaiva vekuChiredzi uye nezuro musi wa 10 Chikumi, vanhu vapfumbamwe vakabatwa nechirwere ichi vose ndeve kuChiredzi.

Mumwe mugari wemumusha weTsvovani, VaMalcom Mugodzwa, vanoti vave kutyira hupenyu hwavo.

Mumwewo mugari wemumusha wekwa Zava, VaTiyani Chauke, vanofunga kuti guta ravo riri pedyo nemazambuko ekuenda kunyika dze South Africa neMozambique uko vagari vanobira zvisiri pamutemo nekudaro vanogona
kuuya nechirwere ichi.

Izvi zvatsigirwawo naMuzvare Nyasha Sigauke vachiti ivo hurumende
inofanira kuona kuti vanochengetedza mitemo vapinda mumisha
yemudhorobah iri kuitirakuti vanhu vatevedzere zvisungo zvekuti chirwere
ichi chaisapararire.

Hurumende yati iri kushushikanawo nekukwira kuri kuita chirwere ichi
muChiredzi kunyange hazvo kusati kwave nemunhu arasikirwa nehupenyu.

Mukuru webasa mubazi rezvehutano muMasvingo, Dr Amedus Shamu, vanoti hurumende iri kuita tsvakurudzo yekuti ione kuti chi chiri kukonzera kukwira kwechirwere ichi muChiredzi. Asi mutauriri wekomiti yeCovid-19 Task Force muMasvingo, VaRodgers Irimayi, vati kukwira uku kuri kukonzerwa nevanhu vari kubva kwakasiyana siyana vachinotsvaga mabasa ekukohwa nzimbe muminda yeTongaart Hullert nevamwe varimi. Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu vana vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika yese, uye vanhu makumi matanhatu nevana vakabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere munyika yose vave zviuru makumi matatu
nezvipfumbamwe nemazana mana ane makumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu, 39 496. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vava chiuru chimwe chete nemazana matanhatu nemakumi maviri nevatanhatu, 1 626. Vanhu mazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nevaviri vakaibawa nhomba
yekutanga nezuro izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevabaiwa nhomba yekutanga pamazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe ezviuru nemazana mana nemakumi mashanu nevavviri 690 452. Vanhu zviuru zvina nemazana mapfumbamwe nemamkumi mapfumbamwe nemumwe chete 4 991 vakabaiwa homba yepiri nezuro, izvo zvakasvitsa
vanhu vabaiwa nhomba yepiiri pa zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi mapfumambawe nezvipfumamwe nemakumi mashanu nevana, 399 054. Zimbabwe inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana, 60%,
zvevanhu vari munyika senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere
cheCovid-19. Kunyange hazvo Zimbabwe iine chirongwa ichi, nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti kubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kuchanetsa sezvo vanhu vakawanda vari kutadza kubayiwa nhomba yekutanga munzvimbo dzakawanda, sezvo nhomba idzi dziri kushaikwa mumatunhu akawanda munyika. Zvichakadaro, hurumende yeAmerica yazivisa kuti ichabatsira Zimbabwe nemari yekurwisa denda reCovid-19 inotangira pamamiriyoni makumi manomwe nemashanu emadhora kusvika pazana nemakumi
mashanu emamiriyoni emadhora ekuAmerica. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Inoiswa Munyika Dzine Huori
text: Sangano re Transparency International raburitsa gwaro raro rinoburitsa nyika dziri pamusoro munyaya dzehuori. Nyanzvi dzinoti Transparency International inoshandisa chikero chinobva pa zero kusvika pa 100, nyika inenge iine zero ichionekwa senyika ine huori hwakanyanyisa, iyo inenge iine 100 score, ichinzi inyika yakachena. Ongororo yakaitwa inoisa Zimbabwe pa 22 score, uye iri panhamba 157 kubva panyika zana nemakumi masere. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa murimwe sangano rinorwisana nehuwori re Anti-Corruption Trust of Southern Africa, VaMunyaradzi Alois Chaumba, vanoti chiri kunetsa muZimbabwe ndechekuti hurumende haina kuzvipira kurwisana nehuwori hwayakatarisa nayo. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yokumbira Kukanzurirwa Chikwereti neAfrican Development Bank
text: Hurumende yakumbira bhanga re African Development Bank, AfDB, kuti rikanzure chikwereti chine nyika kubhanga iri. No media source currently available Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita nevatori venhau mu Harare mushure mekusangana nechikwata chevakuru-vakuru chebhanga iri icho chichange chiri munyika kwesvondo, gurukota rezvemari, Va Patrick Chinamasa, vakumbira kuti Zimbabwe ikanzurirwe chikwereti chainacho kubhanga iri zvavati zvichaita kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimukire. VaChinamasa vati kana AfDB ikakanzurira Zimbabwe chikwereti chayo chemari inoita mamiroyoni mazana mashanu emadhora, mamwe masangano anokweretesa mari akaita se International Monetary Fund, IMF, neWorld Bank, WB, anogona kuzokanzurawo zvikwereti zvine Zimbabwe kumasangano aya. Asi mutungamiri wechikwata che AfDB ichi, Va Alieu Momodou Ngum, havana kutaura kuti bhanga ravo richakanzura here chikwereti chine hurumende ye Zimbabwe kubhanga iri. Vati bhanga ravo ragara richingobatsira Zimbabwe kunyanwe panga pakawoma zvinhu. Chikwereti chine Zimbabwe kumasangano ekunze anokweretesa mari chava kuvavarira kusvika pamabhiriyoni gumi emadhora uye hurumende inoti homwe yayo yakabooka kuti ibhadhadhare chikwereti ichi. Gore rapera, IMF yakaramba kukanzura chikwereti cheZimbabwe ichiti Zimbabwe haisi nyika ine hurombo hwakanyanya kana zvichienzaniswa nedzimwe nyika. Zambia ndeimwe yenyika dzinonzi dzine hurombo hwakanyanya dzakakanzurirwa zvikwereti zvadzo ne IMF. Chikwata che AfDB chakatarisirwa kushanyira nzvimbo dzakawanda munyika pachichange chiri muno chichiwona kushandiswa kuri kuitwa mari yakaiswa nebhanga iri mumabasa epundutso kana kuti ma projects. AfDB ndiyo yakapa kambani ye Lake Harvest mari inodarika mamiriyoni masere emadhora kusimudzira chirongwa chekuchengetwa kwehove ku Kariba chiri kushandiswa semucherechedzo wezvirongwa zvinosimudzira magariro evanhu mu Africa yese. Chisati chabuda munyika chakananga ku Mozambique, chikwata che AfDB ichi chakatarisirwa kusangana nemutungamiri wenyika, Va Robert Mugabe, nemusi weChishanu.

headline: Vakoti Vari paMudyandigere Votsvagirwa Mari yeKuti Vadzoke Kuzobatsira Kubaya Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangawana vachinyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter vati dare remakutukota nemusi weChipiri rakati richaongorora mari dziri kupihwa vari kubaya nhomba senzira yekukwezva vamwe kuti vaite basa iri. Vakatiwo Health Services Board yakanyora tsamba kubazi rezvemari kuti ipihwe mari yekupa vakoti vari pamudyandigere vari kuda kunzi vabatsire mukubaya vanhu nhomba sezvo bazi rezvehutano riine vashandi vashoma. Dare remakurukota iri rakapawo mvumo makirinika nezvipatara zvakazvimirira kuti zvitange kubaya nhomba pachena zvozopihwa mari yevanenge vaita basa racho chete nehurumende. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu vabayiwa nhomba kekutanga vave miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe nevana zvine mazana manomwe negumi kana kuti 1, 677, 710. Vabayiwa nhomba kechipiri sezviri kukurudzirwa vave zviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevasere nemazama masere nemakumi masere kana kuti 798, 880. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano rinoti neChipiri vanhu makumi mashanu nevaviri(52) vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Izvi zvasiya huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera hwave zviuru zvitatu nemazana matanhatu nemakumi matatu nevashanu kana kuti 3,635. Vamwe chiuru chimwe chete nemazana matatu nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 1, 309 vakabatwawo nechirwere ichi nemusi weChipiri wakare, zvichisiya huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi vave zviuru zana negumi zvine mazana masere nemakumi mashanu nemashanu kana kuti 110, 855. Vanhu zviuru zviviri nemazana manomwe nemakumi mashanu nemashanu kana 2 755 zvasiya vapora kubva gore rapera vave zviuru makumi manomwe nemapfumbamwe nemazana mana nemakumi maviri kana kuti 79, 420.

headline: Vazhinji Vorara Mumitsetse Kuti Vatore Zvitupa
text: Vanhu vakawanda muChinhoyi nenzvimbo dzakaipoteredza vari kutadza kutora zvitupa kuti vakwanise kunyoresa kuvhota muchirongwa chiri kuitwa nyika yose. Vanhu vakawanda ava vari kurara pamitsetse yemahofisi ekwamudzviti kuti vakwanise kuwana zvitupa zvekuzoshandisa kunyoresa kuvhota. Wongororo yaitwa neStudio 7 yaratidza kuti vanhu vakawanda vari kutanga vatora magwaro ekuzvarwa vozotora zvitupa izvo zviri kupa kuti vakawanda vatore mazuva akawanda vachienda kumahofisi ekwamudzviti. Vashandi vekwamudzviti vari kuyamura vanhu makumi mashanu kusvika pazana pazuva izvo zvinokonzera kuti vakawanda vadzoswe vasina kuyamurwa vachizodzoka zuva rinotevera. Mumwe mugari wemuChinhoyi, VaHosiah Kakwere, vanoti varara pamutsetse kuti vakwanise kuwana chitupa chavari kuda kuti vakwanise kunyoresa kuvhota. Izvi zvinotsigirwa nemumwe mugari akabva kwaZvimba, VaTaurai Kasanze, avo varara pamutsetse, vanoti kunonoka kuri kuita vashandi vekwamudzviti kuti vanhu vakawanda vasanyorese kuvhota. Mumwe mudzimai anobva kuHurungwe, Amai Chenai Chemhere, avo vakauya kuChinhoyi neChipiri, vanoti havana hama muChinhoyi izvo zviri kupa kuti varare pamutsetse pamudzviti. VaKakwere vanoti vari kuda kutora chitupa kuti vakwanise kunyoresa kuvhota asi chinono chevashandi vekwamudzviti chavabvisa chishuwo chekuda kunyoresa kuvhota. Amai Chemhere vanoti vari kutora mukana wekutora magwaro ekuzvarwa nechitupa pachena zvavanga vasina sezvo Baba naAmai vavo vanga vasinawo. Zvabudawo pachena kuti vamwe vanhu vari kuda kutora zvitupa pachena kwete nekuti havana asi zvitupa zvavainazvo hazvichanyatsoverengeki. Kuwanda kwevanhu vari kuda magwaro ekuzvarwa nezvitupa kwava kukonzera huori kubva kune vanochengetedza mahofisi, guards, kusvika kuvashandi vekwamudzviti. Vamwe vechidiki vave kurara pamitsetse sevari kuda kutora zvitupa vozotengesera vanenge vanonoka makadhi avanenge vapihwa nemadhora maviri kusvika pamadhora mashanu. Mukuru wepaRegistar General muChinhoyi, VaKelvin Maturi, varamba kutaura nevatori venhau panyaya iyi vachiti havabvumirwe nemutemo webasa. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yovimbisa Nhomba yeCovid Mumazuva Mashoma Anotevera
text: Vakafanobata chigaro chemunyori mubazi rezvehutano, Dr Robert Mudyirandima, vaudza paramende kuti nyika yakatora danho rekuti yoshandisa nhomba ipi kudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19 uye pane chiziviso chichaitwa kune veruzhinji pamusoro penyaya iyi mukati memazuva mashonana ari kutevera. Vachipa humbowo maererano nemamiriro akaita denda reCovid-19 munyika nemusi weMuvhuro, Dr Mudyirandima, vanoti pane nhomba dzakawanda dzave kushandiswa nedzimwe nyika uye vange vari kuita ongororo yekuti ndeipi yakanakira nyika. Vati Zimbabwe ichatangawo kushandisa imwe nhomba iyi munguva pfupi iri kutevera. Vatiwo kunyange hazvo hurumende yange isina kubhajeta mari yenhomba iyi, bazi rezvemari nevamwe vemabhizimisi vakavimbisa kuumba homwe yekutenga nhomba iyi. Mukuru anoona nezvezvirwere zvinotapuriramwa mubazi iri, Dr Portia Manangazira, vatiwo kunze kwekutenga nhomba iyi, Zimbabwe ichawana imwe pasi pechirongwa cheWorld Health Organisation cheCOVAX icho chinobatsira nyika dzichiri kubudirira pamwe nechirongwa cheAfrican Union iyo ichawana mishonga yePfizer neAstraZeneca ichiuya kuburikidza nemakambani eSeum Institute of India neJohnson and Johnson. Kunyange hazvo nhomba inopihwa vanhu vane denda iri ichibva kunze kwenyika, mimwe mishonga inopihwa vawere vane denda iri yakaita semapiritsi eParacetamol neZINC anogadzirwa muno. Zvichakadaro, Dr Mudyirandima naDr Manangazira, vazivisa kuti zvipatara zveveruzhinji zvinotora varwere veCovid 19 hazvina kuzara asi vakati pane zvipatara zvakazvimirira zvakaita seHealth Point muHarare zvine varwere vakawanda kudarika vazvinokwanisa kuchengeta. Dr Manangazira vati semuenziso chipatara cheWilkins muHarare icho chine mibhedha makumi matatu nemishanu yeCovid-19 hachina kana murwere mumwe pari zvino, Parirenyatwa ine mibhedha makumi mapfumbabwe nemitanhatu asi zvikamu makumi maviri nezvina zvemibhedha iyi ndizvo zvine vanhu chete. Mutungamiriri weZimbabwe Nurse Association VaEnock Dongo vati nyaya yekuti zvipatara zveruzhinnji hazvina kuzara inoratidza kuti vanhu havadi kuendako nekuti hakuna zvekushandisa uve vashandi veko havana mufaro nemabatirwe nemashandiro avanoita. Vakuru vakuru kubva kubazi rezvehutano vazivisawo kuti vave kuwana mishonga pamwe nezvimwee zvekushandisa pabasa kana kuti Personal Protective Equipment pasi pechirongwa cherubatsiro rwakabva kuGlobal Fund rweemamiriyoni makumi mana nemapfumbabwe emadhora ekuAmerica. VaDongo vati zvakanaka chose kuchengetedza vashandi vehutano kubva kuCovid-19. Dr Mudyirandima vazivisawo kuti munyika mune Oxygen yakawana yekushandisa kuvarwere veCovid-19. Izvi zvatsinhirwa nemutungamiriri wesangano rinomirira machiremba anoshanda akazvimirira reMedical and Dental Private Practioners Association of Zimbabwe Dr Johannes Marisa avo vaudza Studio 7 kuti kana pachavo vari kuwanawo Oxygen yevarwere vavo. Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano razivisa kuti vanhu zana nevashanu vari muzvipatara nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 uye vashanu vari mune vari kurwarisa kana kuti Intensive Care Unit. Asi huwandu uhu hunogona kunge hwakakwira kudarika apa sezvo pasina kuziviswa nezvevarwere vari kuMasvingo, Parirenyatwa, Manicaland ne Thongroove. No media source currently available

headline: Botswana Inodzika Mutemo Unoti Vanhu Vagare Mudzimba Dzavo kweMwedzi Mitanhatu
text: Hurumende yeBotswana yadzika mutemo we State of Emergency uyo uchange uchishanda kwemwedzi mitanhatu senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCoronavirus. Mutemo uyu, uyo wasainwa nemutungamiri weBotswana, VaMokgweetsi Masisi, unosungira kuti vanhu vagare mudzimba dzavo kwemwedzi mitanhatu, uye kuti makambani ape vanhu zvikwanisiro zvekuti vashande vachibva kudzimba dzavo. Mutemo we Emergency Covid-19 Amendment Number 2 Regulations of 2020, watanga kushanda zviri pamutemo mushure mekunge wapasiswa nedare raparamende, uye kusainwa naVaMasisi. Mutemo uyu unorambidza makambani kudzinga vashandi munguva iyo unenge uchishanda, uye wapawo mutongi mukuru wematare edzimhosva, masimba ekutara zvinofanirwa kuitwa nematare edzimhosva munguva yeLockdown iyi. Mutemo mutsva uyu wadzikwa panguva iyo hutungamiri hweBotswana, kusanganisira nhengo dzeparamende, makurukota ehurumende pamwe nemutungamiri wenyika, hwange hwatotanga kare kuita hurongwa hwekumbogara kudzimba, kana kuti self quarantine, kwemazuva gumi nemana zvichitevera kusangana kwahwakaita nemushandi wezvehutano ane chirwere cheCoronavirus. Asi chiitiko ichi chichaita kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinogara muBotswana zviomerwe nehupenyu sezvo pasisina achabvumirwa kuenda kubasa panguva iyi. Muzvare Sandra Sondelelo, avo vanoshanda mumba, vanoti dai zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvabvumirwa kuti zvidzokere kumusha nokuti hakuchina chavachagarira muBotswana kwemwedzi yose iyi. Chimwewo chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, Amai Pesilah Tarisai, vati vabereki nehama dzavanga vachibatsira vachadya nhoko dzezvironda sezvo vasingakwanise kutumira zvekudya. Botswana yaita nyika yekutanga mudunhu rekuchamhembe kweAfrica kutora danho rakadai, iro rine nguva yakareba vanhu vachinzi vagare mudzimba dzavo senzira yekudzivirira chirwere cheCoronavirus, icho chauraya munhu mumwe chete muBotswana, uye kubata vanhu gumi nevatatu munyika iyi. Asi zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinogara muBotswana zvinoti zviri kubatsira vamwe vavo vasina zvekudya uye pekugara panguva iyo nyika iyi inenge yakavharwa. Muzvare Faith Musesekedzi avo vanogara mudhorobha reFrancistown muBotswana vanoti vari kuchengeta zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvitatu izvo zvakapererwa nemabasa mushure mekuparurwa kwechirongwa chekugara mudzimba. Chimwewo chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri kubatsira vamwe nezvekudya uye kuvabhadharira mari epavanogara, VaMorgan Tambaoga, vanoti vakazvipira kuita izvi kusvikira zvinhu zvanaka. Mumwe wevari kubatsirwa nechikafu uye kubhadharirwa mari yepamba pavanogara, Muzvare Primrose Moyo, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanotenda zvikuru nerubatsiro rwavari kuwana. Ongorororo yaitwa neStudio7 inotaridza kuti ruzhinji rwevana veZimbabwe vari muBotswana vari kugara vari muzvikwata zvavanhu vatanhatu kana vanomwe senzira yekuti vaite muonera pamwe netwushoma twavainatwo. Asi nyanzwi munyaya dzezvehutano, VaChristopher Mbewe, vanoti kugara vanhu vakaungana mukanzvimbo kadiki kunoita kuti cherwere cheCOVID-19 chipararire nekukurumidza. Chirwere cheCoronavirus, icho chakatangira mudhorobha reWuhan kuChina gore rapera, chabata vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nemazana mashanu ezviuru, uye chauraya vanhu vanosvika zviuru makumi mapfumbamwe pasi rose. No media source currently available

headline: Zvikwata zvorwira kupinda muPSL
text: KUCHANGE kusingadanwe anonzwa svondo rino muDivision One kuSouthern Region apo Hwange FC ichasangana neAjax Hotspurs kuchiti ZPC Hwange ichitatsuranawo neIndlovu Iyanyathela.   KuSouthern Region, Hwange FC neZPC Hwange ndizvo zvikwata zviri kurwira kupinda muPremier Soccer League (PSL) gore rinotevera.   Zvikwata zviviri izvi zvasarirwa nemitambo miviri kuti paonekwe kuti ndechipi chikwata chichatevera Simba Bhora iyo yakabva kuNorthern Region, Green Fuel FC (Eastern Region) neSheasham FC (Central Region) izvo zvakatobudirira kupinda muPSL mwaka unotevera.   Mumitambo yesvondo rino, Hwange FC ikahwina mutambo wayo ukuwo nekune rimwe divi ZPC Hwange yokundwa, Hwange FC ndiyo inobva yahwina tikiti rekupinda muPSL mwaka unotevera.   Zvakadaro, svondo radarika chikwata cheSimba Bhora chakahwina tikiti rekupinda muPSL zvichitevera kukunda kwayakaita Commando Bullets 3-0 kuWadzanai Stadium kuShamva.   Simba Bhora yakakwanisa kuwana mukana uyu pamberi peGolden Eagles neHerentals U-20 izvo zvairwirawo kupinda muPSL gore rinotevera. Achitaura zvichitevera kupinda kwakaita Simba Bhora muPSL, murairidzi wechikwata ichi, Arthur Tutani, anoti mwaka wegore rino weRuyamuro Northern Region wange wakakura nekudaro waida kuti varwe semvumba.   “Mutambo wange wakaoma zvikuru, asi takaramba takangosona vanhu tichiziva kuti mujaho wakareba. Mujaho wacho wange wakareba saka takarwa kubva pekutanga kusvika kumagumo.   “Zvatave kupinda muPremier League seSimba Bhora, tinofanirwa kusimbisa chikwata chedu kuitira kuti chigokwanisa kumisidzana nezvimwe zvikwata zvemuPSL,” anodaro Tutani.

headline: Zvinhu Zvinonzi Hazvisati Zvagadzikana paChipatara cheMpilo Kunyange Vanachiremba Vakadzoka paBasa
text: Kunyange hazvo vanachiremba vadiki vakazivisa munguva pfupi yapfuura kuti vave kudzoka pabasa, zvinhu hazvisati zvave kunyatsofamba zvakanaka pachipatara cheMpilo muBulawayo chinove ndicho chipatara chikuru chechipiri munyika. Pasvika Studio 7 pachipatara ichi pakati penguva dza12 na 3 masikati, pange pane madhokotera anoverengeka navanamukoti vakawanda vange vachiwona varwere kuzvikamu zvinorapa varwere vachibva kumba kana kuti Casualty neOutpatients. Vamwe vanamukoti vange vachionawo varwere mumawadhi akasiyana-siyana. Mumwe murume asina kuda kudomwa nezita audza Studio 7 kuti ave nemazuva maviri achiuya kuzoona hama yake iri kurwara pachipatara apa uye ati haazi kugutsikana kuti vanachiremba vadzoka pabasa nemwoyo yavo yose here achiti hama yake iyi haisati yanyatsotaurirwa navanachiremba ava kuti iri kunzweyi. Mumwewo murume angozvidoma nezita rekuti Nyoni atiwo ane hama yake iri muchipatara mekare. VaNyoni vati hama yavo iyi iri kuwonekwa navanachiremba asi vati dambudziko nderekuti vari kunzi vanotenga mishonga sezvo mishonga iyi isiri kuwanikwa pachipatara ichi. Dr Mthabisi Bhebe, munyori weMpilo Doctors Association variwo nhengo yeZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti vana chiremba vadiki vave nenguva inosvika mwedzi vadzokera kubasa. Asi vatiwo sekuziva kwavo zvinhu hazvisati zvanyatsomira zvakanaka muzvipatara zvikuru munyika vachitiwo pane vanachiremba vadiki vanosvika makumi mashanu nevatatu vakasiya mabasa munyika yose uye kune vamwewo vakawanda vari kuda kusiya vachienda kumafuro manyoro. Mukuru wechipatara cheMpilo, VaLeonard Mabande, vaudza Studio 7 kuti havasati vave kukwanisa kutaura kuti zvinhu zvakamira sei uye kuti ndivanachiremba vangani vadzoka pabasa kusvika pari zvino sezvo vachiri kuita ongororo. VaMabande vati vanofara kuti munguva pfupi yapfuura chipatara chavo chakakwanisa kuwana magwenya emagetsi anoita kuti michina inobatsira kurapa vane chirwere chigomarara ishande isingakanganiswe nekuenda kwemagetsi. Vati vanotarisira kuti izvi zvichabatsira varwere zvikuru. Chipatara cheMpilo chaive chine vanachiremba vadiki mazana maviri nevana uye panguva yekuramwa kwavo mabasa, vana chiremba makumi mashanu nemumwe ndivo vakadzingwa basa. Vanoziva zviri kuitika vanoti zvinhu hazvisati zvave kunyatsofamba zvakanaka nekuti vaive vadzingwa ava vanofanirwa kutanga vanyatsodzorwa pabasa zviri pamutemo uye izvi zvinogona kutora nguva. No media source currently available

headline: EU Inobatsira Zimbabwe neMamiriyoni Makumi Manomwe eMadhora
text: Sangano reEuropean Union, EU, rapa Zimbabwe mamiriyoni makumi manomwe emadhora ekuAmerica semari ichishandiswa mukabatsira kupedza nzara yakatarisana neveruzhinji uye kubatsira munyaya dzehutano nekurima. Izvi zvaziviswa nemumiriri weEU muZimbabwe, VaTimo Okonnen, pamusangano waitwa nechikwata cheEU nechikwata chehurumende yeZimbabwe pamusangano wekuedza kugadzirisa hukama pakati peZimbabwe neEU. VaOkonnen vati kuvandudzwa kwenyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, hupfumi pamwe nekupedza huori zvinhu zvakakosha kuitira kuti hurumende yeZimbabwe ikwanise kudyidzana nedzimwe nyika zvakanaka. Mashoko aVaOkonnen anouyawo apo mutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, vakati hapana vekunze vanoda kusima mari yavo munyika isina kugadzikana, uye izere nehuori pamwe nekusachengetedzwa kwemitemo. Nyaya yekuchengetedzwa kwemitemo nekodzero dzevanhu inyaya yanga iri mudariro zvakare pakati hurumende yeZimbabwe neEU nhasi. Zvichakadai, vakafanobata chigaro chegurukota rezvinoitika kunze kwenyika, VaJuly Moyo, vati vane chivimbo chekuti zvese zvavanenge vasingawirirane neEU vachasvika pakunzwisisana. Hukama pakati peZimbabwe neEU nedzimwe nyika dzekumavirira hwakatanga kusamira zvakanaka pakatemerwa zvirango vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, pamwe nevamwe vavo vari muZanu PF zvichitevera kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu munyika uye kusafambiswa zvakanaka kwesarudzo. Zvichakadai, hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa inoti zvirango zvavakatemerwa ivo nevamwe vari muZanu PF zvinofanira kubviswa ichiti zvirango izvi zviri kunze kwemurawo uye zviri kurwadza ruzhinji rweZimbabwe. Asi veEU pamwe neAmerica dzinoti hurumende yeZimbabwe inofanira kuvandudza nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika pamwe nekuona kuti kodzero dzeveruzhinji dzachenegetedzwa zvirango izvi zvisati zvabviswa. No media source currently available

headline: Code Yosangana muHarare neMugovera
text: Hutungamiri hwemapato anopikisa mumatunhu eHarare neChitungwiza ari mumubatanidzwa weCoalition of Democrats, kana kuti CODE, huri kusangana neMugovera muHarare. Chinangwa chemusangano uyu ndechekuronga hwaro huchateverwa nemapato aya mugadziriro yawo yekuparura mubatanidzwa uyu zviri pamutemo mumasvondo mashoma anotevera. Nhengo yekomiti inoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muCODE, uye vari mutauriri webato reMDC inotungamirirwa naProfessor Welshman Ncube, VaKurauone Chihwayi, vanoti musangano uyu uchatorawo mukana wekusangana kuti uronge hwaro hwekuti mubatanidzwa uyu ungasvike sei kusarudzo dza 2018. VaChihwayi vanoti hutungamiri hwemapato mapfumbamwe ari muCODE huchange huchitaurawo pamusangano uyu, uyo uchakokerwa nasachigaro weCODE mumwedzi uno, VaDumiso Dabengwa, avo vanotungamira bato reZapu. No media source currently available

headline: VaTsvangirai neVatungamiri veMapato ari muMDC Alliance Vanoita Musangano Wavo weKutanga
text: Vatungamiri vemapato manomwe ari mumubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa weMDC Alliance vaita musangano wavo wekutanga muHarare nhasi mutungamiri weMDC VaMorgan Tsvangirai vari sachigaro. Mapato manomwe anoti MDC-T, MDC, PDP, Zanu Ndonga, Zimbabwe People First, Transform Zimbabwe neMutiracial Democratic Party, akasaina chibvumirano chekuumba mubatanidzwa uchakwikwidzana nebato riri kutronga reZanu PF. VaTsvangirai ndivo vakasarudzwa kuti vamirire mubatanidzwa uyu vachikwikwidzana nemutungamiri weZanu PF, VaRobert Mugabe. Mutauriri weMDC Alliance, uye vachitungamira Transform Zimbabwe, VaJacob Ngarivhume vanoti musangano wavo wekutanga uyu wanga uri wekuchitanga kuronga hwaro hwekutevera kugadziriro yavo yesarudzo dzegore rinouya. VaNgarivhume vanoti vawiriranawo kuti vaenderere mberi nekuparura mubatanidzwa uyu mumatunhu ose emunyika, vachitanga nekuBulawayo musi wa 26 mwedzi uno. Vatiwo zvakare nhaurirano dzekuti ndiani vachamirira mubatanidzwa musarudzo dzenhengo dzeparamende nedzemakanzuru dzichiri kuenderera mberi mumubatanidzwa wavo. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi dzeHutano Dzoshushikana neKukwira kweHuwandu hweVanhu Vari Kubatwa neCovid-19 Munyika
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa kuti vanhu makumi matanhatu nevashanu kana kuti 65, vakabatwa vaine chirwere cheCovid-19 munyika yose, uye vamwe vanhu vana vakafa nacho kuBulawayo pavanhu chiuru nezana rine makumi maviri nevatatu, kana kuti 1123 ,vakavhenekwa nemusi weChina. Dunhu reBulawayo, iro ratarisana nedambudziko rekuve nevanhu vakawandisa vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi, rine vanhu makumi matatu nemumwe kana kuti 31 vakabatwa vaine chirwere, kuchitiwo dunhu reMashonaland West rine vanhu gumi nevatatu kana kuti 13. Matabeleland North ine vanhu vashanu, vana kuManicaland, vana kuMashonaland Central nevamwe vana kuMashonaland East, Matabeleland South vaviri, kuchitiwo matunhu anoti Midlands neMasvingo aine munhu mumwe chete padunhu. Dunhu reHarare harina munhu akabatwa aine chirwere ichi.
