Izvi zvakasiya huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa neCovid-19 munyika yose vave zviuru zvipfumbamwe nemakumi mana nevatanhatu, kana kuti 9 046, kuchitiwo vanhu vapora vave zviuru zvisere nezana rine makumi mapfumbamwe nevashanu, kana kuti 8 195. Vanhu vachiri kurwara nyika yose vave mazana mashanu nemakumi masere nevatanhatu, kana kuti 586. Nyanzvi mune zvehutano vachitungamira sangano reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti vari kushushikana zvikuru nekukwira zvakare kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi, zvikuru kumatunhu ari kuchamhembe kwenyika. Pave nekutyirwawo kuti chirwere ichi chinogona kusazokwanisa kurwiswa kana kudzivirirwa kana hurumende yakaenderera mberi nekuvhura miganho yenyika musi wa 01 Zvita sezvakayavimbisa pachitariswa kuti vanhu vazhinji vanenge vopinda nekubuda muSouth Africa, iyo inove nyika ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi muAfrica yose. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata mukuru anoona nezvekurwisana neCovid-19, Doctor Agnes mahomva kuti tinzwe nezvematanho avari kutora mukudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Mukuru anoona nezvezvirwere zvinotapuriranwa mubazi rezvehutano, Doctor Portia Manangazira, vati vanga vari mumusangano vakati tivabate neMugovera. Asi VaRusike vanoti zviri kuonekwa kuBulawayo mucherechedzo wemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika ekuti vanhu havachakoshesa kuzvichengetedza kubva kuchirwere ichi kubva pakanyevenutswa mutemo wairambidza vanhu kufambafamba uye pakabviswa mapurisa nemauto vaimanikidza mutemo wekuti vanhu vapfeke mamasiki nekutevedzera zvimwe zvose zvinokurudzirwa nebazi rezvehutano. Vanoti chitsvambe chave kune vanhu pachavo kuti vaone kuti vachengetedza hutano hwavo sezvo vari kuona kuti vanhu vakawanda havachina shungu nekutyira kuti chirwere chingangovabatawo, vachiti veruzhinji vanofanirwa kuziva kuti chirwere chichiriko. VaRusike vanoti chimwe chinogona kunge chiri kukanganisa mabasa ekurwisana nechirwere ichi kushaikwa kwemvura yekugeza maoko munzvimbo nemaguta zvakawanda, uye vari kukurudzira makanzuru pamwe nehurumende kuti vaone kuti vawanisa vanhu mvura yekushandisa kuzvishambidza. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vowedzera neMavhiki Maviri Mazuva eKuti Vanhu Vagare Mudzimba Kurwisa Coronavirus
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nezuro vakazivisa kuti vainge vawedzera nemamwe mavhiki maviri mazuva ekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba kusvika musi wa 3 Chivabvu. Izvi zvinotevera kusvika kumagumo kwemavhiki matatu avainge vambotara kuti vanhu vagare mudzimba ayo ange achifanira kupera nhasi. Vachitaura kunyika kuState House, mumashoko apihwa Studio 7 mvumo yekushandisa nebazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaMnangagwa vakati zviri pachena kuti mumavhiki matatu avainge vambotara huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi hutori kuwedzera. Vakati Zimbabwe haisatiwo yazadzikisa zvose zvinoda kunzi zviitwe neWorld Health Organization kuti vanhu vanzi vabude mudzimba. Bazi rezvehutano razivisa kuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus hwawedzera kusvika pamakumi maviri nemashanu mushure mekunge mumwe mudzimai abatwa nechirwere ichi kuManicaland. Mudzimai uyu ainge adzoka munyika kubva kuFrance. Asi pane vanhu vaviri vapona kusvika parizvino. Vanhu vatatu ndivo vafa nechirwere ichi. Asi vati vemakambani emigodhi vanofanira kutanga basa mushure mekunge vashandi vose vavhenekwa. Vatiwo vemakambani akakosha vanokwanisawo kuita basa. VaMnangagwa vati bazi rezvemagariro evanhu richabatsira vamwe vave kunonga svosve nemuromo parizvino nenyaya yenzara. Vanhu vakawanda vari kuudza Studio 7 kuti nzara yapfunya chisero mudzimba dzavo. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa kuStudio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kusangano rinoongorora nyaya dzezvirwere muAfrica reAfrica Centres for Disease Control Prevention anoti vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi muAfrica vave kudarika churu chimwe chete nemakumi masere Vabatwa nechirwere ichi vave kusvika zviuru makumi maviri nechimwe. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora nyaya dzechirwere checornavirus pasi rose inoti huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere checoronavirus hwadarika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mana. Vanhu vafa vave kudarika churu zana nemakumi matanhatu. America ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vafa nechirwere ichi pasi rose vanodarika zviuru zvina

headline: Mutengo weShuga Unokwira Zvakapetwa Ruviri
text: Kambani inogadzira shuga yeTongaat Hulett inonzi yakwidza mutengo weshuga nezvikamu zvingada kusvika kuzana kubva muzana kutanga neMuvhuro uno. Gwaro raburitswa nekambani iyi rinoratidza kuti mutengo wepakiti yeshuga ye brown ine huremu hwekirogiramu imwechete wakwira kubva pamadhora mana ane masendi makumi mapfumbamwe nemapfumbamwe kuenda pamadhora masere ane masendi makumi matanhatu nerimwe emaRTGS. Makirogiramu maviri eshuga imwecheteyo akwirawo kuenda pamadhora gumi nemanomwe ane masendi makumi maviri nemaviri kubva pamadhora mapfumbamwe ane masendi makumi mapfumbamwe nemasere. Kukwira kwemutengo weshuga uku kunotevera kumboshaikwa kwayo mune zvimwe zvitoro mumazuva mashoma adarika. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vachishanda nesangano re Labour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti hausi mutengo weshuga chete wakwira, asi kuti zvakawanda zviri kukwirawo mitengo, zvichikonzerwa nekukwira kwemutengo wemafuta edzimotokari. Panyaya yekushaikwa kwechingwa, Doctor Citambara vanoti vamwe vanobika chingwa vanogona kunge vakamira kuita izvi nekuda kwekupindira kwehurumende mukutarwa kwemitengo yechingwa. No media source currently available

headline: ZOC yoyambira vatambi
text: SANGANO reZimbabwe Olympic Committee (ZOC) riri kukurudzira vatambi vakabudirira kuenda kunokwikwidza kumitambo yeTokyo 2020 Olympic Games, kuJapan kuti vatevedzere mitemo yose yeWorld Health Organization (WHO) yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Mitambo iyi iri kutanga munaChikunguru.   Sangano reInternational Olympic Committee rakaparura “Play Book” iro rine matanho anofanirwa kutevedzerwa nevatambi vose vachakwikwidza kumaOlympics senzira yekudzivirira denda iri.   Matanho ari muPlay Book iri anosanganisira kuvhenekwa Covid-19 vatambi vasati vaenda kuJapan, kukurudzira kuti vabaiwe majekiseni ekudzivirira Covid-19, kugara vakapfeka mamasiki, kugeza maoko nemvura ine sipo nguva nenguva kana kushandisa sanitizer uye kuti vasaungane. Chamangwiza weZOC – Stephen Mudawarima – anoti sangano ravo riri kukurudzira chikwata cheTeam Zimbabwe chichaenda kuTokyo kuti chigare chakachengetedzeka uye kuti vabaiwe majekiseni ekudzivirira Covid-19.   “Kwakauya Playbook remaOlympics iro takatumira kune vose vachaenda kumitambo iyi zvakabva kuInternational Olympic Committee maringe nekuzvichengetedza kubva kuCovid-19. “Tiri kukurudzira vatambi vose kuti ngavatevedzere zviri muPlaybook iri nekuti ndizvo zvichatibatsira patichaenda kuJapan kuti tinge takachengetedzeka kubva kuCovid-19. Matanho arimo anosanganisira kuvhenekwa Covid-19, kubaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19, kugara takapfeka mamasiki, kugeza maoko nguva dzose uye kusaungana.   “Tiri panyaya yekubaiwa nhomba, hazvimanikidzwe munhu, asi isu tiri kuita hurukuro nevatambi vemunyika yedu tichivazivisa zvakanakira kubaiwa nhomba iyi,” anodaro Mudawarima.   Pari zvino muZimbabwe, vatambi vatatu kubva mumitambo inoti rowing nevaviri vanotuhwina ndivo vabudirira kuenda kunokwikwidza kumitambo iyi. Mudawarima anoti pane mumwe mutambi wegorofu achiri pakati pekukwikwidza nekurwira kuenda kumitambo iyi saka vakangobatira hana mumaoko kuti agobudirira.   “Tine mutambi wedu wegorofu iye zvino akagara pa51 kubva pavatambi 60, saka tikasvika musi wa21 Chikumi ari mutop 60 anenge ahwina tikiti rekuendawo kuTokyo,” anodaro.   Zvakadaro, sangano reNational Athletics Association of Zimbabwe (NAAZ) rinoti riri kutarisira kuti shangwiti dzemujaho wekumhanya dzichabudirirawo kuenda kumaOlympics.   Director wecoaching and development kuNAAZ – Phakamile Lisimati – anoti sangano ravo rakaisa tariro pashasha dzemujaho dzinosanganisira Tinotenda Matienda, Ngoni Makusha, Kundai Maguranyanga naChengetai Mapaya avo vachiri pakati pekurwira tikiti rekuenda kumitambo iyi. “Vatambi vedu vekumhanya vamwe vari kuAmerica koita vari kuSouth Africa uko vari kurwira tikiti rekuenda kumitambo iyi. Vanomhanya vanofanira kubata nguva dzinotarisirwa kuti vakwikwidze musi wa29 Chikumi saka vari kukwikwidza vari kunyika dzakasiyana.   “Isu kuno tinenge tichikurukura navo tichivaudza zvekuita kuti vagobudirira kuenda kumitambo iyi,” anodaro Lisimati.   Mitambo yemaOlympics yaifanira kuitwa gore radarika asi yakamiswa nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 uye ichatanga musi wa23 Chikunguru ichipera musi wa8 Nyamavhuvhu.

headline: Vatsigiri veMDC-T Vorohwa paRufu neVatsigiri veZanu-PF kuShamva
text: Vamwe vatsigiri veMovement for Democratic Change vakarohwa zvakaipisisa nemusi weChina kuMadziva, Shamva North, Mashonaland Central nevanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri veZanu-PF. Vanhu ava vakarohwa vachiviga imwe nhengo yebato iri yeWomens Assembly amai Evangalista Kaundikisa. Vamwe vakarwiswa vanosanganisa Senator Lilian Timveos. Asi mumwe mutsigiri weMDC-T Memory Mbondiya anonzi akakuvara akaendeswa kuchipatara. Amai Timveos vakaudza Studio 7 kuti vakatanga vatyisidzirwa kuti vainge vakapfeka hembe dzeMDC- T vasati vatanga kurwiswa. "Ini ndakapona nepasaka reshumba sezvo ndakapotswa nedanda ndichida kurohwa. Ndakadonha ndokuzobatsirwa nevamwe vebato rangu." Mai Timveos vakadaro. Vatsigiri veZanu-PF vanonzi vainge vasingadi kuti muchakabvu avigwe kumusha kwake uko vange vachiti hakuvigwe vanhu vanobva kubato rinopikisa. Mufi akatozovigwa mushure mekunge kwauya mapurisa kubva kuShamva Police Station. Mhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika inende yave kuramba ichiwedzera munyika ichinzi nevakawana iri kukonzerwa nevebato reZanu-PF. Vatsigiri veZanu-PF mumasvondo maviri apfuura vakarwisa vatsigiri veMDC-T kuKambuzuma nemusi weSvondo uye vakarwisawo vatsigiri veZimbabwe People First kuChinhoyi nemusi weChitatu. VaGilbert Kagodora, nhengo yeMDC yange iri parufu urwu vati Zanu-PF inotya kuti MDC ipinde mudunhu iri nekutya kukundwa musarudzo. No media source currently available Mapurisa ekuShamva anonzi akangonyora mazita evanhu vanonzi vainge vaita mhirizhonga vakati vachaaendesa kuLaw and Order. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mapurisa aya kuti tinzwe divi ravo.

headline: Dunhu reGauteng Roronga Kudzika Mitemo Inosarura Vabvakure
text: Mukuru wedunhu reGauteng muJohannesburg, VaDavid Makhura, vakazivisa neChipiri kuti nekufamba kwenguva, dunhu ravo richadzika mutemo unorambidza vekune dzimwe nyika kutanga mabhizimisi mudunhu ravo, sezvo izvi zviri kutadzisa zvizvarwa zvemuSouth Africa, kuti zviwanewo chekubata. VaMakhura vakataura mashoko aya mudare ravo redunhu, apo vakange vachipindura mibvunzo yaibva kune dzimwe nhengo dzedare ravo. Vanoona nezvekodzero dzavanhu vanoti mashoko akataurwa naVaMakhura anokonzeresa kuti pave neruvengo pakati pevanobva kunze kwenyika nezvizvarwa zvemuSouth Africa. Mumwe muzvinabhizimusi muSouth Africa neZimbabwe, VaBrighton Sangore, vanoti mashoko akadai anobata zvizvarwa zvisiri zvemuSouth Africa, agara achitaurwa kwenguva yakareba muSouth Africa. Sachigaro weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti mashoko akadai haafanirwe kunge achibva pamuromo pemunhu anonyarikana saVaMakhura. VaMavhinga vanoti mashoko aVaMakhura anotyora kodzero dzevanhu uye handicho chaive chido chevaimbove mutungamiri weSouth Africa, mushakabvu Nelson Mandela. Sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Exiles Forum, VaGabriel Shumba, vanotiwo mashoko aVaMakhura anotyora mitemo yenyika, iyo isina rusarura pakuvambwa kwemabhizinesi. VaShumba vanoti kana vekunze vachivhura mabhizimusi muSouth Africa, vanenge vachibatsira kusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika iyi. VaShumba vanoti VaMakhura vanofanirwa kukumbira ruregerero kuzvizvarwa zvose zvekune dzimwe nyika zviri muSouth Africa. VaShumba vanoti sangano reZimbabwe Exiles Forum riri kuita hurukuro nemamwe masangano akasiyanasiyana, senzira yekugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa. Mashoko aVaMakhura anouya mushure mokunge zvitoro zvezvizvarwa zvekunze kweSouth Africa zvapazwa nekupiswa, ukuwo vatyairi vemagonyeti vachimbunyikidzwa kodzero dzavo, vamwe vachimanikidzwa kusiya basa nesangano rinozviti All Truck Drivers Foundation. Sangano reHuman Rights Watch rinoti vanhu mazana maviri vafa mumhirizhonga yemuSouth Africa kubva muna Kurume gore rapera, vazhinji vavo vari vatyairi vanobva kune dzimwe nyika. No media source currently available

headline: Caps United Inoti Inoda Kutevera Tsoka dzeMamelodi Sundowns
text:
Mumusha weCaps United hamusi kudaidzwa anonzwa nemhemberero. Mhemberero iri kuenderera mberi mumusha weCaps United mushure mekunge chikwata ichi chakatora mukombe weCastle Lager Premier Soccer League kwapera makore gumi nerimwechete vachikundikana. Muridzi weCaps United VaFarai Jere vanoti vatotanga kutsvaga mari yekutamba mumakundano emuAfrica egore rinouya eCaf Champions League. VaJere vanoti chinangwa chavo ndechekuita zvakaitwa neMamelodi Sundowns yekuSouth Africa iyo yakatora mukombe uyu gore rino. Vatsigiri vechikwata ichi havasi kudaidzwa vachinzwa nemufaro mushure mekutora mukombe wakakosha uyu mumwe wavo VaFadzai Muchichwa vachiti nguva yanga yarebesa vasina kumbofara. Caps United yakapedza iine mapoinzi makumi matanhatu nematatu, maviri pamusoro peFC Platinum mushure mekurova Chapungu 1-0 mumutambo wavo wekugumisira kuAscot Stadium nemugovera. Mumwe mutsigiri wechikwata ichi VaMisheck Mwayera vanoti varikufara zvikuru nezvakaitika izvi mushure memakore anodarika gumi vchitatarika Murairidzi wemaGreen Machina Lloyd Chitembwe anoti nguva yakadai inofadza zvikuru zvekuti ari kufara kuve mumwe wemhuri iri kupemberera kubudirira kwavo. Chitembwe ndiye aimbova mutambi wekutanga weCaps United kutora mukombe weLigi achirairidza chikwata ichi. Cricket Chikwata cheZimbabwe chemaChevrons nemusi weSvondo chakadamburwa neSri Lanka nemawiketsi matanhatu mufainari yeTri-Series iyo yaisanganisirawo West Indies Chikwata ichi chakanyadzisa zvikuru zvekuti mutambi wavo aive nemaranzi akawanda, Tarisai Musakanda, akakwanisa kukanda makumi matatu nematanhatu chete. ushure mekushandisa vatambi vavo vese, Zimbabwe yakakwanisa maranzi zana nemakumi matanhatu (160) ayo asina kutorera Sri Lanka nguva kudarika. Vashanyi veSri Lanka ava vakasvitsa maranzi zana nemakumi matanhatu nemana (164) vakasara vachiri nemawiketsi matanhatu mumaoko. Izvi zvirikuratidza kuti murairidzi mutsva wemaChevrons, Heath Streak ane mutoro mukuru mukuedza kuvandudza chikwata chake. Embed

Nyaya Ina Michael Kariati

headline: Zimbabwe Inocherechedza Zuva reKuwanikwa neKukosheswa kweMvura Pasi Pose
text: Nezuro, Zimbabwe yakabatana nepasi rose mukucherechedza zuva rekuwaniswa kwemvura yakachena kumunhu wese pasi rose, re World Water Day, iro rinocherehcedzwa pasi rose kubva muna 1993. Pamusoro pekuwanisa vanhu mvura yakachena, donzvo rekucherechedza zuva iri nderekupa zivo pamusoro pevanhu vanodarika mabhiriyoni maviri vari kurarama zuva nezuva pasi rose vasina mukana kumvura yakachena. Dingindira regore rino rakanangana nekuti mvura inoreveyi kuvanhu, kukosha kwayo uye kuti vanhu vangachengetedza sei chiwanikwa ichi. Vanoona nezvebudiriro yevechidiki musangano revechidiki rePlatform for Youth and Community Development, VaMuburwa Allan Murozvi, vanoti vari kukurudzira hurumende pamwe nemakanzuru ose ekumaruwa nemaguta kuti vakoshese kuwaniswa kwemvura kuvanhu kuburikidza nemari dzebudiriro yematunhu. VaMurozvi vanokurudzirawo veruzhinji kuti vadzidze kukohwa mvura kuitira kuzoishandisa munguva dzekushaikwa kwayo. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Haisi Kubuda Pachena paNyaya yeKutumira Mauto kuSADC
text: Sangano remubatanidzwa wenyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica reSouthern African Development Community, SADC, ratadza kupinza masoja muMozambique nenguva yarakanga ratara kuti masoja emubatanidzwa uyu ange apinda muMozambique zvichitevera kusagadzikana kuri munyika iyi uko kuri kukonzerwa nevanopfurikidza mwero. Izvi zvaifanirwa kunge vakatanga nezuro, Chikunguru 15, 2021. Zimbabwe haisi kuda kubuda pachena kuti hurongwa hwayo hwakamira sei panyaya yekuendesa mauto ayo kuMozambique kti anobatsirana nemamwe mauto emunyika dziri muSADC kunorwisa vanopfurikidza mwero mudunhu reCabo Delgado kuMozambique uko kwafiwa nevanhu vakawanda. Studio 7 yave nemazuva maviri ichiedza kunzwa kugurukota rinoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika, Amai Oppa Muchinguri Kashiri, avo vari kuramba kutaura nezvenyaya iyi. Zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muSADC zvichitevera mashoko aburitswa neMalawi ichiti yatadza kutumira mauto ayo sezvo yabviswa neSADC pamwe nehurumende yeMozambique, panyika dziri kufanirwa kutumira mauto adzo kuMozambique. Zvinonziwo pane kunetsana kuri muSADC zvichitevera danho rakatorwa neRwanda rekutumira mauto ayo chiuru chimwe chete kuMozambique. Asi gurukota rinoona nezvekudzivirwa kweSouth Africa, Amai Nosizive Nqakula, vati chiri kunetsa kuti SADC itumire mauto kuMozambique inyaya yekuti mutungamirin weMozambique, Va PhillipeNyusi, havasati vasaina gwaro reSADC zvir pamutemo kuitira kuti ibvumidzwe kupinzwa mauto ayo muMozambique. Munyori anoona nezvinoitika kunze kwenyika muMDC Alliance, Muzvare Gladys Hlatshwayo, vati hurumende inofanira kubuda pachena nehurongwa uhwu kunyange hazvo bato ravo riri kutsigira kuti mauto eZimbabwe aende kunobatsira kuMozambique ari pasi peSADC. Asi imwe nhengo yeMDCT inomirira Hatfield muparemende, VaTapiwa Mashakada, vati hurumende inofanira kupihwa nguva yakafanira kuitira kuti masoja eZimbabwe asazononhonga svosve nemuromo kuCalabo Delgado. Mutauriri wesangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaMarvelous Khumalo, vati sangano ravo harisi kufara kuti vanhu vari kuramba vachifa kuMozambique iyo SADC ichiramba yakapeta maoko isiri kuendesa mauto kunobatsira Mozambique kurwisa vanopfurikidza mwero. Mibvunzo yatatumirawo munyori weSADC, Doctor Stergomena Lawrence Tax, yanga isati yapindurwa pataenda pamhepo kunyange hazvo vanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko musangano iri, Amai Barbara Lope, vange vavimbisawo kuti vachatiudza pamire sangano reSADC panyaya iyi. SADC inoti iri kushushikana zvikuru nekusagadzikana kuri mudunhu reCabo Delgado kuMozambique uko kuri kukonzerwa nevanopfurikidza mwero. Sangano reUnited Nations rinoti vanhu vanodarika mazana masere ezviuru vakatiza misha yavo mudunhu reCabo Delagado, uye vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvitatu vava mumhirizhonga iri kuitika mudunhu iri kubva muna 2017 payatanga. No media source currently available

headline: Mauto Anoti Haasi Kupindira Munyaya dzeMatongerwo eNyika
text: Muzinda wemauto unoti hapana mauto ayakatuma kuti aiite zvematongerwo enyika uye vanenge vaona mauto achiita zvematongerwo enyika, vanofanirwa kumhangara kumapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police pamwe nekumuzinda weZimbabwe Defence Forces, ZDF, kuitirakuti mauto aya asungwe. Mashoko aya aturwa nemutauriri weuto reZDF, Colonel Overson Mugwisi, apo vange vari kutsanangurira vatori venhau basa remuato musarudzo dzegore rino. VaMugwisi vati vanoshushikana zvikuru nemashoko emanyepo ari kutaurwa nevamwe vanhu nekunyorwa mumapepanhau ekuti mauto akaendeswa kumaruwa uko ari kuita zvematongerwo enyika nekutsvagira rimwe bato rutsigiro. Vati veruzhinji vanofanira kuziva kuti pagara paine masoja ari kushandira munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana munyika ari kuita mabasa akaita sekuvaka zvikoro, zvipatara nemakirinika, zvirongwa zveCommand Agriculture, kuchengetedza mabhodha pamwe nekubatsira veNational Parks kuchengetedza nzvimbo dzinogara mhuka. Vati kuoneka kwemasoja pamisangano inenge ine vakuru vakuru vehurumende hakusi kuti vanenge vachiita zvematongerwo enyika asi kuti vanenge vachichengetedza vakuru vakuru ava. Vati ZDF haisiyo inoona nezvekufambiswa kwesarudzo asi kuti ichange ichibatsira mamwe mapazi ane chekuita nesarudzo akaita seZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec nezvifambiso pamwe nekubatsira mapurisa nekuchengetedza runyararo panguva yesarudzo. Asi vari kumirira MDC Alliance musarudzo yemutungamiriri wenyika, VaNelson Chamisa, vanoti panofanira kuwiriranwa kuti ndivanani vopinda mukomiti yeZec inoona nezvekufambiswa kwesarudzo yeLogistics Committee kwete kupinza mauto nerweseri. VaMugwisi vatiwo mauto ese achange asiri kunzvimbo dzaanogara kana kushandira pasarudzo ndiwo chete akanyoresa kuti avhote sarudzo dzisati dzasvika kana kuti Postal Ballot. Vati mauto aya anosanganisira ayo achenge achiita zvidzidzo kuAll Arms Battle School kuNyanga, mauto ari kudzidzira basa kuZimbabwe Military Academy kuGweru, mauto ari kumiganhu yenyika pamwe neawo achaenda kumitambo yemauto kuRussia yeRussian Military Games. VaMugwisi vatiwo zvakakosha kuti vatori venhau vanyore nhau dzechokwadi uye kuti vavabvunze vasati vaburitsa nhau pamusoro pemauto. Vatiwo hazvina kunaka kunyora nhau dzemanyepo sezvange zviri kuitwa nemamwe mapepnahu emuno. Vayeuchidzawo veruzhinji kuti mauto anobvumidzwa nemutemo kuti avhote musarudzo vachiti chisingabvumidzwe chete kuve nechigaro chezvematongerwo enyika munhu achiri pabasa. VaMugwisi vati bumbiro remitemo yenyika rinobvumidza mauto akasiya basa kutora zvigaro mumapato ematongerwo enyika avanoda. Pavabvunzwa nezvekuti vachatambira here zvinenge zvabuda musarudzo kana bato riri kutonga reZanu PF rikakundwa musarudzo, VaMugwisi vati mauto anotevedza bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Mashoko aVaMugwisi anopesana zvikuru nevaimbove mukuru wemauto ose, muchakabvu General Vitalis Zvinavashe, avo vakati mauto haaizobvuma kuti nyika itongwe nemunhu asina kurwa hondo yerusununguko. VaZvinavashe vakataura mashoko aya vakakomberedzwa nevaimbove mukuru wemapurisa, VaAugustine Chihuri, vaimbove mukuru wemauto emuchadenga, Va Perence Shiri, pamwe naVaConstantino Chiwenga, avo vava mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika mushure mekupidigura vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, muna Mbudzi gore rapera. Kunyange hazvo VaMugwisi vati mauto achatevedza bumbiro remitemo, varamba kupindura mubvunzo wekuti havana kutyora mutemo here pavakabvisa VaMugabe pachigaro zviri kunze kwemutemo. Vaimbove mutungamiriri weZimbabwe Nationa Students Unions, VaMakomborero Haruzivishe, vati chero pose paanotyora mutemo, mauto anenge achingoti ari kutevedza mutemo. Vemapato anokipisa vanoti pane zviuru zvemasoja zvakaendeswa kumaruwa kunotsvagira Zanu PF rutsigiro, uye vachitiwo Zec iri kushanda nemauto achiri pabasa. Asi sachigaro weZec, Amai Priscilla Chigumba, vanoti mauto ava pamudyandigere ndiwo ari kushanda neZec sezvinodiwa nemitemo yenyika, kwete vachiri pabasa. No media source currently available

headline: VaChivhayo Vooneswa Ndondo neNyaya yeHuori muDare reParamende
text: Muzvinabhizimisi, Wicknell Chivhayo, nemusi weMuvhuro vakabvuma mudare reparamende kuti vakashandisa vezvematongerwo enyika pamwe nevakuru vakuru vehurumende kuti kambani yavo yeIntratrek iwanane basa rekuumba gwenya remagetsi ezuva reGwanda Solar Project kunyange hazvo vange vasingakodzeri. Vachipa humbowo kukomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemighodhi nezvemhando dzemoto kuti kambani yavo yeIntratrek yakawana sei basa rekuvaka gwenya remagetsi reGwanda Solar Project, VaChivhayo vabvuma kuti pakutanga kambani yavo yakatadza kuwana basa iri uye rakapihwa kune imwe kambani yekuChina. Vati izvi zvaitika, vakaenda kune vaiva gurukota rezvemando dzemoto, VaDzikamai Mavhaire, vakandotsutsumwa kuti sei vainge vashaya basa iri ivo vari ivo vainge vauuya nepfungwa yekuvaka gwenya iyi. Vatiwo vakanyorera kumunyori wedare remakurukota, Chief Secretary to the President and Cabinet pamwe nasachigaro weState Procurement Board vachichema chema nenyaya yavo yekushaya basa iri. Vati izvi zvakazoita kuti veState Procurement board vape kambani yavo pamwe nedzimwe mbiri basa rekuvaka magwenya emagatsi kunzvimbo nhatu munyika uye ivo vakapihwa basa rekuGwanda. Vati mushure maizvozvo vakatanga kuita basa rekutanga kana kuti Feasibility Study asi kambani yemagetsi yeZimbabwe Power Company yakaramba kuvabhadhara mamiriyoni maviri emadhora avaida sezvo vaive vasina magwaro ekubhanga airatidza kuti ivo vaivewo nemari mubhanga mavo. Pavabvunzwa nemumiriri weKwekwe Central VaMasangano Matambanadzo kuti sei vaida kubhadharwa asi vasina kutevedza mutemo, VaChivhaya vati mari yaidiwa yange yakawandisa. VaChivhayo vati mushure mekuramba kubhadharwa nemukuru weZPC, Vakabva vadzokera zvakare kune vange vave gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto, VaSamuel Undenge, kundochema chema zvakare izvo zvakazoita kuti ZPC ivabhadhare mari inosvika mamiriyoni mabiri nechuru zana chemadhora kana kuti 2, 1 million dollars. Mumiriri weGlen View North, VaFani Munengami vati semaonero avo maitiro aVaChivhayo anoratidza kuti vaiita zvinhu vasingatevedzi gwara uye vanenge vaiita zvehuwori. No media source currently available

headline: Dzidziso Pamusoro peCOVID-19 Kune Vachadzidzisa Veruzhinji Yotambirwa neMufaro
text: Bazi rezvehutano neMuvhuro rakazivisa kuti huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 hwakanga hwasvika pazana nemakumi matatu nevashanu kana kuti 135, kuchitiwo vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose vasvika pazviuru zvishanu nemazana matatu ane vasere kana kuti 5 308. Bazi iri rakati vanhu vakanga vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi kusvika neMuvhuro vakanga vasvika pazviuru zvitatu nemazana masere ane makumi mana nevasere kana kuti 3 848, izvo zvakasiya vanhu chiuru nemazana matatu nemakumi maviri nevashanu kana kuti 1 325 vari ivo vachine chirwere ichi munyika yose. Mukuedza kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi munyika, bazi rezvehutano rakabatana nesangano reUnited Nations Population Fund (UNFPA) riri kupa zvidzidzo kuvanhu vachazonodzidzisawo vamwe pamusoro pemabatirwo anofanirwa kuitwa Covid-19 uye kuti chirwere ichi chingadzivirirwa sei kuti chisapararira. Zvidzidzo izvi zviri kuitirwa kuDomboshawa, uye vari kupinda muzvidzidzo izvi vanozotarisirwa kunodzidzisawo vamwe vari mune zvehutano mumapoka avo, avo vanozodzidzisawo vamwe munharaunda dzavagere. Bazi iri razivisa kuburikidza neTiwtter kuti vapinda muzvidzidzo izvi vanhu vabva kubazi rezvehutano, kumapurisa nemauto, uyewo vamwe vabva kumasangano akazvimirira. Mukuru wesangano reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti hurongwa hwekudzidzisa vadzidzisi uhwu hwakakosha zvikuru sezvo huchizobatsira kuti dzidziso pamusoro pechirwere ichi izokwanisa kupararira nenyika yose. VaRusike vakurudzirawo kuti dzidziso pamusoro pechirwere cheCovid-19 iwandire pamwe nekupararira kunzvimbo dzinogara veruzhinji pamwe nekumaruwa, uko vanoti veruzhinji vanenge vari kuratidza kuti havasi kuteerera kurudziro dzebazi rezvehutano pamwe neWorld Health Organisation dzekuti vazvivhare miromo nemhino, kugeza maoko, pamwe nekusiya mukaha pakati pavo nevamwe. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, Johns Hopkins University Hospital yemuno muAmerica, iyo iri kuongorora chirwere ichi inoti pasi rose vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri neimwe nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe negumi nezvisere, kana kuti 21 918 000 vabatwa nechirwere ichi, icho chaurayawo vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi manomwe nezvina nemazana manomwe, kana kuti 774, 700. America ndiyo ichiri pamusoro pahuwandu hwevanhu vabatwa neCovid-19, avo vadarika mamiriyoni mashanu nezviuru mazana mana nemakumi mana nezvina, kana kuti 5, 444, 000 Vanhu vafa muAmerica vadarika zviuru zana nemakumi manomwe, kana kuti 170, 000. MuAfrica vanhu vanodarika miriyoni nezviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezvisere, kana kuti 1,128 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi, kuchitiwo vashaya vadarika zviuru makumi maviri nezvishanu nemazana masere, kana kuti 25, 800. Vanhu vapona kubva kuchirwere ichi vadarika zviuru mazana masere nemakumi mana nezvitanhatu, kana kuti 846, 000. South Africa ndiyo iri pamusoro muAfrica iine vanhu vanodarika mazana mashanu nemakumi mapfumbamwe ezviuru, kana kuti 590, 000 vabatwa nacho. Vanhu vafa nechiwere ichi muSoiuth Africa vadarika zviuru gumi nechimwe nemazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 11, 900.

headline: VaBarack Obama Voita Nhoroondo neKushanyira Cuba
text: Mutungamiri weAmerica VaBarack Obama nemusi weMuvhuro vakaita musangano nemutungamiri wenyioka yeCuba VaRaul Castro vachitaura nezvekudyidzana kwenyika mbiri idzi. Rwendo rwaVaObama urwu ndirwo rwekutanga rwemutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica mukati memakore makumi mapfumbamwe. America yainge yakatemera Cuba zvirango zvehupfumi kwemakore makumi mashanu nemashanu izvo zvotanga kurerutswa nehurumende yaVaObama. Vachitaura muguta guru reCuba reHavana, mushure memusangano naVaCastro, VaObama vati vari kufara zvikuru nenhaurirano dzoitika pakati penyika mbiri idzi. Asi vatenda kuti pachine kusawirirana panyaya dzehutongo hwejekerere nekodzero dzevanhu. VaCastro vatambira nemufaro danho ratorwa nehurumende yeAmerica yekurerutsa zvinhu panyaya dzekutengeserana. Vatiwo America inofanora kudzora nzvimbo yeGuantanamo Bay iyo inochengeterwa vanopfurikidza mwero neAmerica. VaObama vakatanga vaenda kunoisa maruva pachiumbwa chinorangarira gamba rerusununguko muCuba VaJose Marti pa Plaa of the Revolution. VaObama vakarumbidza zvikuru VaJose Marti nekuzvipira kwavo kusunungura nyika yavo. Murwendo urwu, VaMugabe vari kutarisirwa kuita misangano nevanhu vakawanda muCuba kusanganisa vakuru muhurumende, vechidiki, vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu nevamwe. Asi nemusi weSvondo vamwe vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu veLadies in White vakasungwa nemapurisa mushure mekuratidzira pedyo neParqu Gandhi kana kuti Gandhi Park. Vamwe vavo vanonzi vakazosunungurwa asi mutunganiri wesangano iri Amai Berta Soler vanoti vamwe havasi kuzivikanwa kuti varipi. Gweta Doctor Alex Magaisa vanoti Zimbabwe inokwanisawo kugadzirisa hukama hwayo neAmerica asi zvinoda kuti vatungamiri venyika vazvipire kuvandudza mashandiro avo. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vofarira Hurongwa Hunokweretesa Mari Midziyo Ichiitwa Chibatiso
text: Vemabhizinesi madiki nemamwe achiri kusimukira vanoti vari kufara nechirongwa chebhanga guru renyika chekuti vakwanise kukwereta mari vachishandisa midziyo yavo sechibatiso. Izvi zvabuda pamusangano wezuva rimwe chete wapindwa nevamabhizinesi madiki uyo waitirwa kwaMutare. Vachitaura mushure memusangano uyu, mumwe muzvinabhizinesi, VaSondon Mugaradzoko, vati danho riri kutorwa nebhanga guru renyika richishanda nesangano reZimbabwe Association of Micro Finance Institutions, Zamfi, richabatsira zvikuru, sezvo mabhanga mazhinji achiomesera mabhizinesi madiki kana achida kukwereta mari kumabhanga aya. Mumwe apindawo mumusangano uyu, VaPeter Mavhiri, vatiwo kushandiswa kwezvipfuyo kunopa kuti vekumaruwa vakwanise kukwereta sezvo vasina maTitle Deeds pazvivakwa zvavo. Mukuru we Zamfi, Va Godfrey Chitambo, vanoti sangano ravo, iro rine nhengo zana neshanu, rakatanga hurongwa uhu mushure mekunge raona matambudziko ari kusangana nevemabhizinesi madiki ekuti vawane mari yekusimudzira mabasa avo apo vanenge vasina zvibatiso zvinodikanwa. Mumiriri webhanga guru renyika pamusangano uyu, Amai Grace Chiromo, vati kurerutsa kuwanikwa kwezvikwereti kuchapa budiriro munyika. Vatiwo vari mushishi kuti pave nemutemo wekutambira zvibatiso zvitsva izvi kuitira kuti zvicherechedzwe pazvibvumirano zvekukweretesana. Vanhu vangangosvika makumi manomwe vapinda mumusangano uyu, uye mumwe musangano wakadai uchaitwa kuMasvingo neBulawayo svondo rinouya. No media source currently available

headline: VaNkosana Moyo Vanoti Huori, Kwete Zvirango, Ndizvo Zvauraya Nyika
text: Mutungamiri webato ronopikisa reAlliance for the People's Agenda kana kuti APA, Doctor Nkosana Moyo, vanoti nyaya yehuori kwete zvirango zvakatemerwa nyika ndiyo yakonzera kuti nyika ipinde mumadhaka mairi munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Doctor Moyo, avo vari kufamba vachisangana nevanhu pakutsvaga rutsigiro vasingaite misangano mukuru, vanoti vari kufara nezvavari kuita uye vanofunga kuti vachakunda musarudzo. VaMoyo vanotiwo havana hurongwa hwekubatana nemamwe mapato sezvo vachiti zviri kuvanhu veZimbabwe kuti vasarudze mutungamiri wavanoda kwete kuti vatungamiri vemapato vapanane zvigaro. No media source currently available

headline: WFP Inoti Mhuri Zhinji muMaguta emuZimbabwe Dzatarisana neNzara Inotyisa
text: Sangano rinobatsira nechikafu pasi rose reWorld Food Programme kana kuti WFP rinoti gwaro rakaburitswa nesangano reZimbabwe Vulnerability Assessment kana kuti ZIMVAC richikokerwa neFood Nutrition Council rinoratidza kuti vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mana kana kuti 2,4 million vanoda rubatsiro rwechikafu mumaguta emuZimbabwe. Sangano iri rinoti kubva gore rapera kusvika gore rino nyaya yekuti vanhu vari kumanikidzwa kuti vambogara mudzimba kuyedza kurwisa chirwere cheCoronavirus kana kuti Lockdown yapa kuti vakawanda vatoziye nenzara sezvo vasingakwanise kuenda kumabasa mumadhora kana kunoita maricho kumamisha. Sezvo pasina mabasa, ongororo iyi inoti vanhu zvikamu makumi mana nezviviri kubva muzana kana kuti 42% vemumadhorobha havakwanise kuwana zvekudya zvakakwana zvichienzaniswa nezvikamu makumi matatu kubva muzana kana kuti 30% muna 2019. Mumiriri weWFP muZimbabwe Amai Francesca Erdelmann mumashoko avo kuvatori venhau vati vanhu vakawanda vave kumanikidzwa kudya kamwe chete pazuva kana kutorara nenzara. Vanotiwo kusadya zvinovaka muviri kuchakanganisa hutano hwevakawanda. WFP inoti mararamiro evakawanda mumaguta aderera zvakanyanya zvapa kuti vanhu vanodarika zvikamu makumi masere nematatu kubva muzana kana kuti 83% vatadze kuwana zvekudya zvakaringana zvinosanganisira hupfu, munyu nemafuta ekubikisa zvichienzaniswa nezvikamu zvinodarika makumi manomwe nematanhatu kubva muzana kana kuti 76, 8% muna 2019. Mitengo yezvinhu inonzi yawedzerawo zvakanyanya sezvo dhora riri kushaya simba. WFP inoti iri kupa mari kumhuri dzinosvika zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi maviri nematanhatu kana kuti 326, 000 mumadhorobha makumi maviri nematatu munyika uye iri kuda kuwedzera rubatsiro kusvika pazviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi mashanu kana kuti 550,00 mumadhorobha makumi maviri nemasere. Gurukota rezvemagariro akanaka evanhu, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende iri kubatsirawo vanhu nezvekudya ichishanda nemasangano akaita seWFP. No media source currently available Mukuru wesangano rinomirira vagari reHarare Residents Trust VaPrecious Shumba vanoti ichokwadi kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka kune vagari vemuHarare vakawanda wavari kutaura navo vachiti vave kudya kamwechete pazuva. Vanoti mitengo yezvinhu iri kukwirawo zvakanyanya. No media source currently available

headline: Vakawanda Votadza Kutevedzera Mitemo Yakaturwa naVaChiwenga yeKudzivirira Kupararira kweCovid-19
text: Nzvimbo dzakawanda munyika dzakapinda muzuva repiri neChipiri dzichitevera mitemo yakadzikwa nehurumende kuyedza kumisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Asi kune mamwe madhorobha akaita seKwekwe, Kariba neKaroi, mitemo iriko yakati omei sezvo kuri kunzi kune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi. Mitemo mitsva inobata mamwe matunhu ose munyika yakaziviswa kuvatori venhau nemusi weMugovera kuti vave kusimbaradza mitemo yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Mitemo yehurumende yekuyedza kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 cheCovid-19 iri kutambirwa zvakasiyana munyika. Kunzvimbo dzakaita seKaroi mutauriri wemapurisa Chief Superintendent Helena Mahonde vaudza bepanhau reNew Zimbabwe.com kuti vamwe vagari vemunzvimbo iyi vave kunonwira doro kudzimba vakawanda mumashabhini. Superintendent Mahonde vanoti vanhu vakawanda vakasungwa nekutyora mitemo yeCovid-19. Mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyath vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti zvinonetsa parizvino kuti vanyatsoziva kuti vanhu vari kutevedzera here kana kuti kwete mitemo mitsva yakaturwa nehurumende vachiti zvinotoda svondo rose. Asi mapurisa akazivisa neMuvhuro kuti achange achifamba famba kuona kuti vanhu havasi kuungana vakawanda. Ongororo yakaitwa neStudio 7 neMuvhuro neChipiri inoratidzawo kuti vanhu vachiri kuramba vakaungana zvikuru panzvimbo dzinokwirirwa mabhazi eZUPCO sezvo achiri mashoma. Mutungamiri wesangano rePassengers Association of Zimbabwe VaTafadzwa Goliati avo vari kuKwekwe vatendawo muhurukuro neStudio 7 kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka. Vati vemabhazi havasi kutevedzera kurudziro yekuti vatakure vanhu vashoma. KuKariba zvinhu hazvinawo kumira zvakanaka sezvo kirinika yeNyamhunga yakambovharwa kuti ifiritwe mushonga mushure mekunge mumwe anorapa vanhu abatwa nechirwere ichi. Mutauriri wesangano reKariba Urban Residents Association VaSamson Coffee vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti kutevedzera mitemo yeCovid-19 kuri kunetsa mudhorobha iri. KuMasvingo hurumende yakazivisa kuti yange isisatendere vanhu kupinda kana kubuda paMorgenster Teachers College pane vari kudzidzira hurairidzi makumi matanhatu nevatatu vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Vamwe vanorarama nekutengesa mumigwagwa vakaita saAmai Amber Zhou vemuHarare vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kutya kuti vachamanikidzwa kugara kumba kana vanhu vakawanda vakaramba vachibatwa nechirwere ichi. Vachitaurawo neStudio 7 mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaDoubt Phiri vachemachema nekudzokawo zvakanyanya kwechirwere cheCovid-19 vachiti zvichakonzera kuti vanhu vatadze zvakare kushandira mhuri dzavo. Mukuru weZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, Doctor Tinashe Manzungu vatiwo chirwere cheCovid -19 chiri kuramba chichiomesera vemabhizimisi zvakanyanya. Asiwo vatenda kuti zvakatarwa negurukota rezvehutano vhiki rapera hazvina kunyanyoomera vemabhizimusi sezvo pachine mukana wekuti mabhizimusi anoramba akavhurwa. Mutungamiri werimwe remasangano anomirira madhokotera anoshanda akazvimiririra, reMedical and Dental Private Practitioners of Zimbabwe Association Dr Johannes Marisa vanoti matanho ari kutorwa nehurumende ekurambidza zvinhu zvakadai semagungano akanaka zvikuru vachiti huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa huri kuramba huchiwedzera. VaMarisa vati zvakakosha kuti hurumende idzivirire kupararira kwechirwere ichi vakati matanho akatorwa aya anodzivirira ndufu nehurwere hwakanyanya. Pamusoro pekurambidza magungano ese kusara kwerufu panofanira kunge paine vanhu makumi matatu, VaChiwenga vakatiwo hurumende ichawedzera kuongororwa kwehutachiona hweCovid-19 kuteverera vavanenge vasangana navo. Vanotengesa zvinhu pamisika yefodya vakanzi vambomira kuita izv. Vose vanopinda nepamiganhu yenyika vachange vachiongororwa zvikuru vanenge vachibva kunyika dzorura chirwere ichi dzakaita seIndia neBrazil.

headline: Vatambi vebhora baiwai majekiseni
text: VATAMBI venhabvu uye vatsigiri vemutambo uyu vokurudzirwa kuti vaende kunobaiwa majekiseni emushonga wekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 segadziriro yekutanga kwemitambo iyi iyo iri kutarisirwa kutanga munguva pfupi inotevera.   Kuridziro iyi yakaitwa neaimbove mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weDynamos FC – Esther Tayo Mawere – uyo ari mune zvehutano zvekare achiti zvakakosha kuti vatambi venhabvu vabaiwe mushonga wekudzivirira denda iri pamwe nevatsigiri kana vachida kuzowaniswa mukana wekuona nhabvu yePremier Soccer League nekufamba kwenguva.   Nhabvu nemimwe mitambo yose zvakapihwa mvumo yekuti zvichidzoke asi vatambi uye vatungamiriri vemitambo yakasiyana vanofanirwa kunotariswa denda reCovid-19.   Mitambo yose ichange ichitambwa munhandare isina vatsigiri.   Mawere anoti kunze kwekuti vatambi vangovhenekwa vaonekwe kuti vane Covid-19 here kana kuti kwete, zvakakosha kuti vabaiwewo majekiseni ekudzivirira chirwere ichi.   “Nhabvu yakadzoswa uye vatambi vanonzi vachange vachitariswa kuti vane Covid-19 here kana kuti kwete. Asi, ini ndinokurudzira kuti vakasununguka ngavabve vaenda kunobaiwa zvekare jekiseni rekudzivirira denda iri kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisambowane mukana wekunyuka.   Vatambi venhabvu vagara vanosangana nevanhu vakawanda uye nhabvu painenge ichitambwa ipapo vanenge vachisangana vakawanda saka kutobaiwa jekiseni uku kwakatokosha nekuti kunobatsira kuvachengetedza kubva kuchirwere ichi,” anodaro Mawere.   Anoti nhabvu yemuno inonetsa kutambwa pasina vatsigiri nekudaro zvakakoshawo kuti vatsigiri vabaiwe majekiseni ekudzivirira Covid-19 kuitira nguva inotevera kana vachinge vave kuzotenderwa kuenda kunhandare kunoona mitambo.   “Kurudziro iyi tiri kuipa zvekare kuvatsigiri venhabvu kuti vakasununguka ngavaende kunobaiwa jekiseni.   Hakusi kuti kungobaiwa chete asi zvakatonakira hupenyu hwavo sezvo pavanosangana nevamwe vanhu denda iri vanogona kutapurirana asi akabaiwa jekiseni anenge akachengetedzeka zvake,” anodaro Mawere.

headline: Cholera Yopa Vanhu Kuti Vasabate Maoko paRufu
text: Zvichitevera kubuda kwakaita chirwere chekorera mumisha inogara veruzhinji yeGlen View neBudiriro, bazi rinoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwezvakatikomberedza, reEnvironmental Management Agency, EMA, rakapa vagari mabhini ekurasira marara anodarika zviuru makumi mashanu senzira yekumisa kupararira kwekorera, iyo yauraya vanhu vanodarika makumi. Bazi reEMA rinoti riri kushanda nekanzuru yeHarare mukuona kuti marara arasirwa munzvimbo dzakakodzera senzira yekuchengetedza hutano, uye kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere chekorera. Mukuru anoona nezvekushambadza mabasa eEMA, VaLeon Mutungamiri, vanoti vakaona zvakakodzera kuti vapinde mumisha inogara veruzhinji vachipa imba yega yega, bhini rekurasira marara. VaMutungamiri vanoti basa ravari kuita richaitwawo mumusha weBudiriro vachipa vagari mabhini pamwe nekuvadzidzisa zvakakoshera kuisa marara mumabhini, uye nzira dzinoiswa nadzo marara mumabhini aya. VaMutungamiri vanoti vari kupawo dzidziso kukanzuru yeHarare kuti ibvise marara ari mupombi dzinotakura mvura dzine tsvina, kuitira kuti madhireni aya asamise kufamba kwemvura inenge yanaya. Vakomana nevasikana vari kushanda neEMA vanoti dambudziko riripo nderekuti vanhu vari kurasira mashizha mumadhireni anofamba nemvura. Vanoti mashizha aya anogona kuchengetwa zvakanaka kuitira kuti ave mufudze, kwete kuarasira munzvimbo dzinofamba nemvura. Mumwe mugari wemuGlen View, Amai Annatolia Mahwindi, vanoti kanzuru inouya kamwe chete pamwedzi kuzotakura marara. Vanotiwo vari kufara nerubatsiro rwemabhini avakapihwa neEMA. Mumwe mugari wemumusha uyu, Va Enos Mahwindi, vanoti vakafara zvikuru nedanho rakatorwa neEma nokuti rinodzidzisa vagari nezvehutsanana kuitira kuti chirwere chekorera chisapararire. Mumwe mugari, Amai Tsitsi Mutekede, vakaratidzawo kufara nemabhini avakapihwa, vachiti vava kuwana pekurasira marara, izvo zvichaita kuti nzvimbo yavanogara, igare yakachena. Mutauri weHarare City Council, VaMichael Chideme, vanoti hachisi chokwadi kuti kanzuru iri kutadza kutakura marara munzvimbo dzinogara veruzhinji. Vanotiwo marori ekanzuru ari mubishi rekubvisa marara akarasirwa pese pese kuGlenview. Meya mutsva weHarare, VaHerbert Gomba, vakatsinhira mashoko aVaChideme izvo zviri kupesana nezviri kutaurwa nevagari vemuGlen View.

headline: Nyanzvi Dzopesana naVaMthuli Ncube Mashandisiro Avari Kuita Mari yeNyika
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti hurongwa hwekushandiswa kwemari hwakaturwa muparamende nemusi weChina negurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, hadzisi kugutsikana nahwo. Mukuru wesangano ravana chipangamazano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaGodfrey Kanyenze, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zviri kutaurwa naVaNcube hazvina musoro kana pakatariswa nyaya yekuti mvura haina kunaya zvakanaka mwaka uno pamwe nekutambura kuri kuita veruzhinji munyika. Vachitura hurongwa hwekushandiswa mari pakati pegore, VaNcube vakati vashandi vanotambira mari isingadarike zviuru zvishanu zvemadhara vachange vasisabatirwe mari yemutero. Asi mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaPeter Mutasa, vati kugadzirisa dambudziko rekushaya simba kwemari, hurumende inofanira kubhadhara vashandi nemari yekunze ichitorawo mitero yayo nemari dzekunze. Kunyange hazvo vashandi vachida kubhadharwa nemari yekunze, VaNcube vanogara vakataura kuti homwe yehurumende haina mari yekunze yekuti vakwanise kubhadhara vashandi nemari yekunze. VaNcube vakati mukushandisa kwavakaita mari vakasara nemari inoita mamariyoni mazana masere emadhora. Asi imwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi, VaMasimba Manyanya, avo vaimboshanda nebazi rezvemari, vati mashoko aVaNcube haatambirike pakatariswa huwandu hwemari inofanira kunge yakashandiswa mukurwisana nechirwere cheCovid-19. Munyori musangano rinomirira vanachiremba vadiki reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, VaEmmanuel Masosota, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvinovarwadza kuti VaNcube vanotambanudza muromo wavo vachitaura kuti vane mari yakawanda yavakasara nayo muhomwe yavo asi vanachiremba nanamukoti vasina zvikwanisiro zvakakwana kuti vakwanise kuita basa ravo zvakanaka. Mashoko aVaMasosota atsinhirwa nevaimbove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidza, Doctor Henry Madzorera. Vachitura gwaro remashandisirwo akaitwa mari nenyika kusvika pakati pegore nemusi weChina muparamende, VaNcube vakati mari yakashandiswa zvakanaka zvekuti hapana chikonzero chekuti pave nekuwedzerwa kwemari mubhajeti renyika kana kuti supplementary budget vachiti hupfumi hwenyika huchaderera gore rino nezvikamu zvina nechidimu kubva muzana nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Asi vakati hupfumi uhu huchazosimuka nezvikamu zvinomwe kubva muzana gore rinouya . Mushandi mukuru anoona nezvehupfumi mubato reZanu PF, VaTafadza Muguti, vati havakwanise kutaura pamusoro pezvakaturwa naVaNcube mu budget review statement vachiti vari kuda kutanga vagara pasi sebato kuti vaongorore mashoko aVaNcube. VaNcube vakati hupfumi hwenyika munyaya dzekurima nekucherwa kwezvicherwa huchaderera zvishomanana gore rinouya kuburikidza nekunonoka kunaya kwemvura pamwe nekushayikwa kwemagetsi munyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti VaNcube vanogona havo kunge vakada kufadza nyika nekuratidza kuti mari haisi kungoshandiswa zvisina musoro, dambudziko riripo nderekuti VaNcube havangazvirovi dunhu vachiti vakachengetedza mari panguva iyo Zimbabwe isina zvikwanisiro munyaya dzekurwisana neCovid-19, vana mukoti navana chiremba vachiti vari kutadza kuita basa ravo nemazvo nepamusana pekushaya mari. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti kuita kwakadai kunoratidza kusarongeka kwehurumende inozviti mudura muzere nechikafu asi vanhu vasina chekudya. Studio7 haina kuykwanisa kunzwa divi raVaNcube panyaya iyi sezvo vanga vasiri kubatika panharembozha yavo. No media source currently available

headline: Mutambi Takaidza otarisa mberi
text: SHASHA yenetball inotambira maGems uye neOlympic Dam yekuAustralia – Joice Takaidza – anoti vatambi vemutambo uyu vemuno vanofanirwa kuzvibata kana vachida kusvika kure.   Takaidza – uyo anove mumwe wevatambi vemaGems vakaita rombo rakanaka rekuwana mukana wekutambira kunze kwenyika pamwechete naAdelaide Thandeka Muskwe uyo anotambira Seven Stars yekuEngland – anoti kuzvibata kwakakosha zvikuru mumutambo uyu.   “Kuzvibata kunodiwa, hapana kwaunoenda kana usina kuzvibata uye zvese zvinotariswa kwese kwaunoenda kunogadzirira mitambo.   “Saka ndinoti kune vamwe vatambi vemaGems rambai muchizvibata muchiziva basa renyu,” anodaro Takaidza.   Shasha iyi ichatanga kutamba netball, yakambotambira zvikwata zvinosanganisira Gathsmine, Renaissance neZDF Queens uye nechikwata chenyika ichi.   Asi akazosiya mutambo uyu paakaenda kunogara kunyika yeAustralia nemurume wake uko akange awana basa. Takaidza anoti aive asingade zvekuramba achitamba netball asi murume wake ndiye akazotaurira vanhu kubasa kwake kuti mudzimai wake inyanzvi chaiyo yemutambo uyu zvakazoita kuti atange kutamba zvakare.   “Pandakaenda kuAustralia, ndakamboda kuhwanda ndisingade kuzivikanwa kuti ndinotamba netball asi murume wangu ndiye akazoudza vanhu kubasa kwake kuti ndaitambira nyika yangu, ndokutanga kudzoka kwandakaita mumutambo uyu. Mwanasikana wangu ane makore 11 okuberekwa anonzi Tatenda akatanga kurakidzawo rudo rwemutambo uyu saka ndakaona kuti ndinofanirwa kuramba ndichitamba uye ndichimudzidzisawo kuti asimukire.   “Zvinonakidza kuti auye achindiona ndichitamba uye iniwo ndoenda kunomuonawo achitamba, kuAustralia anotamba netball nebasketball. Ishasha muchikwata cheAustralia Under-13 chebasketball apa iye ane makore 11 chete ekuberekwa,” anodaro.   Anoenderera mberi achiti, “Shuviro yangu kuti nditambe imwe World Cup uye ndiri kuzozviita mugore ra2023 nekuti ndichiri kuzvinzwa kuti zvichirimo mandiri. Kunze uku kwanaka kutambira nekuti pakaita mutemo mutsva unenge wauya ndimi munotanga kuziviswa kana kudzidziswa nezvazvo saka kunotibatsira kukura sevatambi. Saka ndinoti kune vamwe vemaGems shandai nesimba mugouya kuzotambirawo kunze kwenyika nekuti kunokubatsirai kukura sevatambi.”

headline: Zimbabwe Human Rights Commission Yoshora Mabharani Mukuru weHuumende
text: Mabharani mukuru wehurumende VaClemence Masango, vanoti havasi kufara kuti komisheni inoona nezvekodzero dzevanhu, yeZimbabwe Human Rights Commission, yave kutora divi nekuvashora nevashandi vebazi ravo pamwe nekuvapomera mhosva yehuori isati yambonzwawo divi ravo. Komisheni iyi iri kufamba ichinzwa pfungwa dzevanhu pamusoro pekuwaniswa magwaro anosanganisira ekuzvarwa, zvitupa nemapasipoti VaMasangano vatiwo zvimwe zviri kutaurwa zvave kutotyisidzira vashandi vebazi ravo uye vati vanoona sekuti pachinzvimbo chekuongorora zvizere nyaya iyi, komisheni iyi yave kutovaroverera pachipiyaniso isati yave nehumbowo hwekuti chii chiri kuita. VaMasango avo vauuya nemunyori mubazi rezvemukati menyika, VaAaron Nhepera, vaudza komisheni iyi kuti vanogona kuramba kushanda nayo ikada kupindira zvakanyanya mumashandiro ebazi ravo. Asi sachigaro vekomisheni iyi, VaElasto Mugwadi vavimbisa, VaMasango kuti vachaita basa ravo nemazvo uye zviri pachenawo kuti bazi ravo rinodawo zvikwanisiro kuti rikwanise kuita basa raro zvakanaka. VaMasango vati nyaya yekushomeka kwemapasipoti munyika inyaya iri pachena uye inyaya yavagara vachitaura musi nenguva ivo pamwe negurukota rezvemukati menyika. VaMugwadi vati chirongwa chavo icho chave nemwedzi chasvika pachinhanho chekupedzesira vasati vanyorwa gwaro iro vachatura kuparamende. Zvichakadai VaNhepera pamwe naVaMasango vaudza komisheni iyi kuti vachapindura mibvunzo yavapihwa mukupera kwesvondo. Ongororo yakaitwa neZimbabwe Human Rights Commission inoratidza kuti vanhu vakawanda mune dzimwe nzvimbo munyika vari kunetseka kuwana magwaro anosanganisira ekuzvarwa, ekufa nekufambisa. Komisheni iyi inoti chinangwa cheongororo yayo ndeche kugadzirisa matambadziko akatarisana nevanhu mukuwana magwaro aya. Ukowo VaMasango vanoti bazi ravo riri kuenda pese parinogona kuvhura mahosifi munzvimbo dzese kuti vanhu vasafambe zvimbo dzakareba kunotora magwaro avonoda. Vanhu vanodarika mazana matatu ezviuru vanonzi vachiri vakamirira magwaro ekufambisa sezvo hofisi iyi ichiti haina mari yekunze yekutenga zvimwe zvinodiwa zvakaita semichina yakawanda uye bepa rinoshandiswa. Vakawanda vataura neStudio 7 vanoti vanofumobata jongwe muromo kuenda kumahofisi aRegistra General kunotsvaga magwaro ekufambisa uye vamwe vavo vanoti kune chikiribidi chakawanda chinoitwa kuti munhu awane gwaro iri. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yoshorwa neKuda kuBhadhara IMF Ichitadza kuBhadhara Vashandi
text: Zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi munyika hazvina kumira zvakanaka zvopa vamwe kuti vayambire kuti nyika inogona kuguma yaenda kumazivandadzoka zvakaitika kuZaire pasi pehutongo hwaMobuto Sese Seko zvakapa kuti nyika iite donga Watonga muzinda wenyuchi. Nyaya iri kunetsa ndeyekuti hurumende iyo isina kana kobiri yobhadhara here kana kuti kwete mari yechikwereti kuInternational Monetary Fund nemamwe mabhanga nenyika dzekunze kana kuti kubhadhara vashandi vayo. Gavhuna weRBZ Dr. John Mangudya vanoti vakawana mari kubva kubhanga reAfrican Export Import. Asi hazvina kujeka kuti Zimbabwe ichapihwa here imwe mari kana yakabhadhara mitero pazvikwereti zvayo. Mutauriri weIMF VaGerry Rice vanoti Zimbabwe ikabhadhara chikwereti hapana chivimbiso chekuti ichapihwa imwe mari sezvo pari kudiwa kuti itange yagadzirisa zvimwe zvinhu zvakaita sezvegwara rehupfumi nezvematongerwo enyika. Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa rePeople’s Democratic Party VaTendai Biti, avo vaimbova gurukota rezvehupfumi, vanotenderana nemaonero aya. VaBiti vanotiwo Zimbabwe inofanira kubvuma kuti yakundikana yoedza kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa. Asi Zimbabwe yobhadhara chikwereti chekunze ichi here kana kuti yobhadhara vashandi vayo? Nyazvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe VaProsper Chitambara vanoti hurumende inofanira kukoshesa vashandi. Kubhadhara vashandi kuchanetsawo sezvo Zimbabwe Revenue Authority kana kuti ZIMRA yave kukundikanawo kuunganidza mari dzemitero dzinoshandiswa kubhadhara vashandi. Mumwedzi mina yapfuura, ZIMRA yakakundikana kusvitsa mari yayainge yakatarisira. Zimbabwe iri kukundikanawo kukwezva vokunze vane mari yekutanga mabhizimisi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi nenyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dziri kuyambirawo kuti Zimbabwe yakasagadzirisa mamiriro akaita zvinhu, nyika inogona kuzoguma yaenda kunataisireva sezvakaitika kunyika dzakaita seZaire neAfghanistan uko kwakapedzisira kwoita kurwisana. Kuti izvi zvisaitike, sangano reInternational Crisis Group rinoti Zimbabwe inofanira kugadzirisa zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Sangano ravanachipangamazano iri rinoti panofanira kutaurwa pachena kuti VaMugabe vakasiya basa ndiyani achatora masimba uye panofanira kuitwa nhaurirano pakati pebato reZanu-PF nemapato ano pikisa pamwe nemamwe masangano akazvimirira, kuti vanyukure nyika mumoto mayavekudondera. No media source currently available

headline: Dzidzo Yodzikira Sezvo Varairidzi Vari Vashoma Munyika?
text: Bazi rezvedzidzo yepasi rinotarisirwa kuwana bhiriyoni remadhora mubhajeti regore rinouya. Asi bazi iri rinoti veruzhinji havafaniri kutarisira dzidzo yemhando yepamusoro sezvo risina varairidzi vakakwana muzvikoro zvemunyika yose. Mashoko aya akataurwa nezuro nemunyori mubazi iri, Dr Slyvia Utete Masangano, kunhengo dzekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvedzidzo yepasi, apo vaitaura pamusoro pebhajeti rebazi ravo ra2019. Vakati pari zvino hapachina zvekuronga bhajeti sezvo vave kuudzwa zvekuita nebazi rezvemari. Amai Utete-Masango vakati vakatoudzwa kuti vachapihwa mari inoita bhiriyoni nezana remamiriyoni emadhora nebazi rezvemari. Amai Utete Masango vakati zvikamu zvinodarika makumi manomwe nezvishanhu kubva muzana zvemari iyi zvinoenda kumihoro. Asi vakati kunyange zvakadaro, hapana mukana wekuti bazi iri ripinze vamwe varairidzi basa sezvarinoda kuitira kuti rikwanise kupa vana dzidzo yepamusoro. Vakatiwo izvi zvinoreva kuti murairidzi mumwe chete anodzidzisa vana vakawanda kudarika vanokodzera izvo zvinoderedza mukana wekuti vana vaite zvakanaka padzidzo yavo. Amai Utete-Masango vakati havana zvavangakwanisa kuita nenyaya iyi sezvo hurumende iine chirongwa chekuderedza mari yainoshandisa pamihoro yevashandi vayo. Asi vakati vari munhaurirano nebazi rezvemari pamwe nebazi rinopinza vashandi vehurumende basa reCivil Service Commission kuti vagadzirise nyaya iyi. Vachipawo humbowo pamberi pekomiti iyi, mukuru werimwe remasangano anomirira varairidzi, reZimbabwe Teachers Association, VaSifiso Ndhlovu, vakati hurumende inofanira kupinza varairidzi vakawanda basa kuitira kuti varairidzi varipo vasafe nebasa. Pari zvino muraidzi mumwe anodzidzisa vana makumi manhatu kana kudarika kunyange hazvo achifanira kudzidzisa vana vane huwandu huri pasi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzedzidzo dzinoti pavana vekireshi, murairidzi anofanirwa kudzidzisa vana makumi maviri nevashanu, ku primary, murairidzi anofanirwa kudzidzisa vana makumi mana pakirasi, kozoti kusekondari, murairidzi anofanirwa kudzidzisa vana vasingadarike makumi matatu nevashanu. Zimbabwe inofanirwa kupinza vamwe varairidzi zviuru gumi nezvinomwe kuitira kuti varairidzi vashande sezvavanofanirwa kuita kana zvinhu zvakanaka. Pari zvino Zimbabwe ine zvikoro zvinodarika zviuru zvisere, asi panodiwa zvimwe zvikoro zviuru zviviri nechidimbu kuitira kuti vana vakwanise kudzidza zvakanaka. No media source currently available

headline: Paramende Inoti VaChiwenga Havana Simba reKumisa Sarudzo
text: Danho rehurumende rekumbomisa kuitwa kwesarudzo dzemaby-elections riri kukonzera mutauro wakanyanya munyika komiti yeparamende inoona nezvemitemo uye vesangano reZimbabwe Human Rights Commission kana kuti ZHRC vachibatana nemamwe masangano vachikurudzira hurumende kuti ione kuti sarudzo idzi dzaitwa sezviri kuitwa kune dzimwe nyika dzakaita seMalawi neTanzania. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaConstantino Chiwenga vanovazve gurukota rezvehutano vakadzika mutemo wechimbi chimbi wekumisa kuitwa kwesarudzo kana kuti Statutory Instrument, ( SI 225A /2020 of the Public Health COVID-19 prevention, Containment and Treatment) (Amendment) Regulations 2020, No. 4.). Asi paramende inoti uku kutyora bumbiro remitemo. ZHRC inoti kudzingwa kwemakanzura nenhengo dzeparamende kuri kusiya vanhu vakawanda vasina anovamiririra zvopa kuti vasawane zvavanotarisira kuhurumende nemakanzuru. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, VaChiwenga neZimbabwe Electoral Commission vakatoendeswa kumatare nevari kuda kukwikwidza musarudzo idzi nemamwe masangano vachinzi vari kutyora mutemo nekusaita sarudzo idzi. VaChiwenga vakati sarudzo dzamiswa nenyaya yekutyira kupararira kweCovid-19. Sachigaro weZEC Amai Priscilla Chigumba vaudza Studio 7 kuti havachakwanise kutaura sezvo nyaya yave kumatare. Mutauriri webato reNCA VaMaddock Chivasa vati vanotambira danho rekumiswa kwesarudzo. Asi mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance VaClifford Hlatywayo vati uku kutyora mutemo. No media source currently available

headline: Madzimai Onetsekana Munguva Yaanenge Achitevera kuChimanimani
text: Madzimai ekuChimanimani anoti ari kushaya zvipfeko zvekushandisa kana vachitevera, uye nzvimbo yavanogara haina kuchena izvo zvinogona kukonzera kupararira kwezvirwere zvakawanda. Madzimai ekuChimanimani mazhinji anoti akatarisana nedambudziko rekushaya zvipfeko zvinopfekwa nemadzimai kana achitevera kana kuti ma sanitary pads. Mumwe mugari wemubhuku rekwaChinamira kuSkyline, Amai Sarudzai Kubvenyika, vanoti madzimai mazhinji ave kushandisa madhende ayo avari kutyira kuti anogona kuvakonzeresa zvirwere kunhengo dzavo dzakavandika. Izvi zvakatsinhirwa naAmai Locadia Mapetuka vanogara mubhuku rekwaManzou avo vanoti zvitoro zvizhinji zvakapwanywa nemvuramupengo yeCyclone Idai uye zvimwe zvakavharwa nepamusana pekuti nzira zhinji hadzisi kufambika. Mumwe mugari wemubhuku rekwaMuusha, Amai Idah Mwandiambira, vanotiwo hapana pekurasira madhende anenge ashandiswa nemadzimai anenge achitevera sezvo zvimbuzi zvavaimboshandisa zvakatorwawo nemvura. Amai Mwandiambira vanoti zvirwere zvemanyoka zvinogona kudzika midzi munharaunda yavo sezvo veruzhinji vave kuzvibatsira kuseri kwemakwenzi uye pasina mvura yekunwa yakachena munvimbo zhinji dziri muChimanimani. Kunyange hazvo bazi rehurumende rinoona nezvemvura reZimbabwe National Water Authority rakaisa matangi emvura mune dzimwe nzvimbo dziri muChimanimani, mvura iyi haisi kutora nguva isati yapera sezvo yakawandirwa. Mumwe mugari wemubhuku rekwaMuusha zvakare, VaLiberty Sigauke, vanotiwo vari kufara zvikuru kuti hurumende nevemamwe masangano ari kubatsira vagari vekuno vakavapa mishonga yekuisa mumvura kuti inge yakachena pavanoimwa. Asi VaSigauke vanoti mishonga iyi haizofi yakadzivirira zvachose zvirwere zvemanyoka zvakaita sekorera ne typhoid. Sangano re World Health Organization rinoti vanhu vanosvika zana nemakumi mana vakabatwa nechirwere chekorera muMozambique, sezvo munzvimbo dzakawanda munyika iyi musina mvura yakachena zvichitevera kurohwawo kwakaitwa nyika iyi neCyclone Idai masvondo maviri apfuura. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubazi rehurumende kuti vanhu vangani vabatwa nekorera zvichitevera kurohwa kwakaitwa matunhu eManicaland neMasvingo nedutumupengo reCyclone Idai. Zvichakadai, vanhu vakawanda vakaita sasabhuku Charles Manzou vemubhuku rekwaManzou vanoti hurumende inofanira kupira vanhu chikafu munzvimbo dzavanogara senzira yekuderedza mikana yekuti vagari vatapurirane zvirwere. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rezvehutano VaObediah Moyo, kuti tinzwe matambudziko ari kusangana nevanhu vekuChimanimani vachaagadzirisa sei uye riinhi sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakaudza vagari vekuChimanimani masvondo maviri adarika kuti hurumende yavo ichaedza napose painogona napo kuti igadzirise matambudziko ari kusangana neveruzhinji vakawirwa nedambudziko remafashamu. Kudzamara hurumende yatora matanho nekukasika, veruzhinji muChimanimani vacharamba hupenyu hwavo huri patambo sezvo nyaya yehutsanana iri kuvatemesa misoro zvichitevera mafashamu eCyclone Idai ayo akasiya vanhu zana nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe vafa uye vanhu vanodarika mazana matatu vasiri kuzivikananwa kuti varipi. No media source currently available

headline: ZimRights Yokurudzira Veruzhinji Kuramba Vachinyoresa Kuvhota
text: Chirongwa chekunyoresa vanhu kuvhota boka rinoona nezvesarudzo munyika reZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, richipinda muvanhu chapera munyika yose paine vanhu vanosvika 4 630,095 vakanga vanyoresa kuvhota pakupera kwezuva musi weMuvhuro. Huwandu uhwu hwaziviswa neboka riri kutungamira sarudzo reZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC. Huwandu uhwu, uhwo hunodarika zvishoma zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana ehuwandu hwaitarisirwa hwemamiriyoni manomwe, huri pasi kwazvo pane zvaitarisirwa neZEC kubva pakatanga chirongwa ichi musi wa14 Gunyana gore rino. ZEC yakazivisa kuti ichawedzera chirongwa ichi nemasvondo mashanu, asi yaiti inoda mari inoita mamiriyoni masere kuti chibudirire. Hurongwa hwekunyoresa kuvhota uhwu hwaive hwakaiswa muzvikamu zvina, chikamu chechina chinove chapera ichi. Asi masangano akawanda pamwe neveruzhinji vaichemachema kuti chirongwa ichi hachisi kufambiswa zvakanaka nekuda kwezvimhingamipinyi zvakasiyanasiyana zvaisangana nevaida kunyoresa kuvhota, izvo zvakazoita kuti vakumbire kuti chirongwa ichi kuti chiwedzerwe nguva. Mukuru wesangano reZimRights, VaOkay Machisa, vanove mumwe wevanhu vaikurudzira kuti chirongwa ichi chiwedzerwe nguva, vanoti vanofara nedanho reZEC rekuti iwedzere nguva, uye vanokurudzira veruzhinji kuti vashandise mukana uyu kunonyoresa kuvhota. VaMachisa vanoti vanhu vanofanirwa kuramba vachinyoresa kuvhota kusvikira panguva ye nomination court. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari vekuArda Vakabviswa kwaChiyadzwa Votora Dzimba dzeMarange Resources neChisimba
text: Mhuri dzinosvika makumi mashanu nenhatu dzakatamiswa kubva kwaChiadzwa mushure mekuwanikwa kwemangoda dzichiendeswa kunogariswa patsva kunzvimbo yeArda Transau kwaOdzi kumawirira kweguta reMutare nemusi weChina dzakarovera moyo kudombo ndokupinda mudzimba dzakavakwa nekambani yemangoda yeMarange Resources zvechisimba. Mhuri idzi dziri kunyunyuta nerekuti dzaneta kurindira guyo sembwa dzakatarisira kupihwa dzimba idzi kuti dzigare zvakanaka nemhuri dzavo. VaAntony Mwashita mumwe wevagari vakatora dzimba kuArda Transau vanoti nguva yareba pasina chirikufamba. “Zvakangoomawo ini sekuti ndiri baba vane mhuri yakura nevana vatatu, vasikana vaviri nemukomana mumwe uye vabva zera." Amai Euna Mwashita vanoti vamhanyirawo kundotora imba yavo nekuda kwekuti pavaigara vange votatsurana navanatete, hanzvadzi dzemurume wavo apo pange ponetsa kugara. Vanoti chimwe chavapa shungu iyi kunyeperwa kwavanoti vange vachiitwa kwatora makore akawandisa. ”Ini handingarambi ndichigara navanatete mu-one house, vakadzi vatatu vachibikira muimba imwe hazviiti, ndange ndiine imba ini, ndaona zvakakodzera kuti ndigare muimba iyi yakavakwa nemakambani aichera madiamonds akatitamisa kuuya kuno, imba idzi ndedzehurumende." VaPeter Munjoma vanoti havangasaririre segotsi. “Ndabata imba iyi nekuti haa nguva yacho yareba zvisati zvaitwa izvi, mhuri yangu yakura property yangu haichina pokugara nekuti dzimba dzacho dziri kungoparara pasina anogara, saka tati regai titore hedu dzimba dzacho apo takanzi sanai kuenda nevabereki tichakupai imba nepamberi apo.” VaReuben Kusena vanotsinhira mashoko aVaMunjoma maringe nekutora dzimba dziri kuArda Transau. “Chaita kuti titore danho irori rekupinda mudzimba idzi inhau yemakore atatora tisina kupihwa dzimba idzi anosvika six, saka tatoona kuti zvitori nane tipinde hedu nekuti dziri kuparara dziri kungotsva saka tati kubva takaputsirwa dzimba dzedu uku tauya kuno hatina kupihwa imba dzacho tatora dziripo.” Amai Mary Sunguro mumwe wemadzimai ari kuArda Transau vapindawo mudzimba kwaOdzi nhasi. “Tave nenguva tichingoovimbiswa pekugara pakanaka asi hapana chiri kubuda mazviri, muimba idzi mava kugara mbudzi, mombe, nehuku vamwe vave kutoitira mabasa akasarurama mudzimba idzodzo isu vanhhu tisina pekugara pacho" Mudzviti wedunhu reManicaland VaFungai Mbetsa vange vasiri kudavira nharembozha yavo apo Studio 7 yaedza kuvabata kuti tinzwewo divi ravo panyaya. Gurukota rinoona nezvedunhu reManicaland Muzvare Mandi Mandiitawepi Chimene vanzi vange vari mumusangano. Hatinawo kukwanisa kubata vakuru vekambani yeMarange Resources vakavakisa dzimba dzapambwa nhasi nevagari vekuArda Transau. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Inocherechedza Zuva reChirwere cheRurindi Pasi Rose
text: Zimbabwe yabatana nedzimwe nyika dzepasi rose mukucherechedza zuva rechirwere cherurindi, kana kuti World TB Day, pahurongwa hwaitirwa kuDzivaresekwa muHarare. Vachitaura pahurongwa hweWorld TB Day, gurukota rezvehutano, Dr David Parirenyatwa, vati vanhu vanofanirwa kubatana mukurwisa chirwere cherurindi icho chanetsa munyika. VaParirenyatwa vati nzvimbo dzakaita seMatabeleland North, Matabeland South neguta reBulawayo ndidzo dzinonyanya kuwirwa nedambudziko rechirwere ichi. Dr Parirenyatwa vatiwo chirwere ichi chakanyanya mumatunhu aya nokuti ari kumiganhu neSouth Africa, iyo ine vanhu vakawanda vane chirwere ichi. Vati Zimbabwe iri kurwisa zvakasimba chirwere ichi kuburikidza nekurapa vanhu pasina mubhadharo. Asi Dr Parirenyatwa vatiwo chirwere ichi chava kuramba kudaira mushonga, zvikuru kuvanhu vasingapedzi kunwa mishonga yavanenge vapihwa apo vanenge vachirapwa chirwere ichi. Dr Wilbert Bara, avo vanoshanda mubazi rehutano mukanzuru yeHarare, vatiwo chirwere cherurinda chinonyanya kubata varume kudarika vakadzi. Vatiwo chirwere ichi chakawanda munzvimbo dzakaita seGlenview, Budiriro, Hopley, Caledonia, Mbare nenzvimbo dziri kuHarare South. Dr Bara vati makiriniki ekanzuru yeHarare ava kushandisa mishina mitsva inokurumidza kubata chirwere cherurindi. Sangano reunited Nations rinoti vanhu zviuru zvina nemazana mashanu vanofa pazuva rega rega nechirwere cherurindi pasi rose. Dingindira rezuva iri gore rino rinoti “Wanted: Leaders for a TB-Free World." No media source currently available

headline: Amai Chigumba Vanoti Vozorwa Mafuta eNguruve Yavasina Kudya Pakusaitwa kweSarudzo
text: Sachigaro weZimbabwe Electoral Commission Amai Priscilla Chigumba varamba mashoko ekuti ndivo vari kuramba kuti sarudzo dzema by elections dziitwe vachiti mitemo yeCovid-19 yakadzikwa kuchengetedza vanhu yakapa kuti zvimwe zvinofanira kuitwa pasi pebumbiro remitemo zvimbosendekwa parutivi. Izvi zvinosanganisira sarudzo dzakamiswa kwenguva isina kutarwa nemutemo wechimbi chimbi wakadzikwa nebazi rezvehutano. umashoko avatumira kuStudio 7 vachipindura mibvunzo yedu panyaya yesarudzo dzemaby elections, Amai Chigumba vatiwo mazuva esarudzo anotarwa nemutungamiri wenyika achinzwa kubva kuZEC nekugadzirirawo kwainenge yakaita. Amai Chigumba vatiwo nyaya iyi ichiri kudare repamusoro reHigh Court nekudaro vakasungwa maoko pari zvino. Asi sachigaro wesangano rinoongorora nezvesarudzo rakazvimirira reZimbabwe Election Support Network VaAndrew Makoni vanoti sarudzo idzo dzabe kufanira kuitwa nekuti kune nzvimbo mukanzuru zana nemashanu uye makumi maviri memasere muparamende dzisisina vamiriri kwenguva yakareba nekuda kwekuti vamwe vakadzingwa nebato reMDC-T vachinzi vari kuMDC Alliance, vamwe vakadzingwa neZanu-PF vamwewo vakafa. VaMakoni vati havaone chinotadzisa kupa Zimbabwe kuita sarudzo kana nyika dzakapoteredza dzakaita seZambia neSouth Africa dzichiita sarudzo munguva yeCovid-19.

headline: VaMnangagwa Vonamatirwa neVatsigiri Vavo muHarare
text: Vamwe vatsigiri veZanu-PF vari kudivi remumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa avo vari kurwara vari muchipatara chekuSouth Africa vakasangana muHarare nemusi weChina vachivanamatira pedyo nemuzinda webato iri. Pange paine kufungidzirwa kuti VaMnangagwa vakaisirwa muchetura muchikafu kumusangano weZanu-PF kuGwanda nemusi weMugovera. Asi gurukota rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaChristopher Mushowe vanoti aya manyepo szvo vanachiremba vavo vanoti vakadya chikafu chainge chagarisa. No media source currently available

headline: America Inombomisa Vanhu Kupinda Munyika kweMazuva Makumi Matanhatu
text: Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, vasaina gwaro rinombomisa vanhu vekune dzimwe nyika kupinda muAmerica kwemazuva makumi matanhatu. Gwaro iri haribati avo vanemapepa ekugara munyika zviri pamutemo asi richarambidza avo vasati vave nemavhiza pari zvino kuti vapinde mu America. Vachinyora paTwitter pavo, VaTrump vati mutemo uyu wakaunzwa nechido chavo chekurwisana nemuvengi asingaonekwi, kureva Coronavirus, uye nechido chavo chekuchengetedza mabasa ezvizvarwa zveAmerica. Mutemo uyu haubati vanoshanda mune zvehutano kana vabereki vezvizvarwazveAmerica. Hazvisati zvave pachena kuti mutemo uyu uchabatsira papi uye kuti waitirwei sezvo vanhu varikuuya mu America vave vashoma pamusoro pechirwere cheCoronavirus. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika uye vachiita dzidzo dzepamusorosoro paHoward University, VaCalvin Manduna, vanoti mutemo uyu hauna zvaunobatsira, vachiti VaTrump vanongoda kufadza vatsigiri vavo sezvo vakatarisana nesarudzo muna Mbudzi gore rino. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yobvumidza Kutengwa kweZvinhu Kunze kweNyika
text: Hurumende yambomisa mutemo unorambidza kupinda munyika kwezvimwe zvinhu uye inoti makambani nevanhuwo zvavo vave kubvumidzwa kutenga zvinhu zvange zvichirambidzwa kupinda munyika zvakaita semafuta ekubikisa nekuzora, floor nezvimwe. Vachitaura pamusangano wavanoita nevatori venhau mushure medare remakurukota svondo rega rega, gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vati hurumende yatora danho iri nechinangwa chekuda kuona kuti vanhu vawana chikafu pamwe nekugara zvakanaka pamwe nekutenga zvinhu nemutengo uri pasi. Amai Mutsvangwa izvi hazvirevi kuti hurumende haichatsigira makambani emunhu uye vati izvi zvicharamba zviripo kudzamara zvinhu zvagadzikana munyika. Zvimwe zvezvinhu zvave kukwanisa kutengwa kubva kunze kwenyika ndezvinoti, bhinzi, fotireza, mabhara, mishonga yekurimisa, mazenge, ice cream, jam, dovi, shuga, mushonga wekuporisha shangu, pamwe nesipo. Vachitaura pachiitiko ichi, gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, vati chinangwa chavo ndechekuti zvinhu zviwande muzvitoro kuitira kuti mitengo yezvinhu idzike. Vati danho iri rakananganawo nekugadzirisa kusamira zvakanaka mumaindasitiri nemabhizimisi umo mitengo yezvinhu iri kukwira zuva nezuva. Vanongoorora zvematongerwo enyika vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, vaudza Studio7 kut danho ratorwa nehurumende richagadzirisa nyaya yemitengo munyika. Asi mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira maindasitiri, reConferderation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaSifelani Jabangwe, vaudza Studio7 kuti kunyange hazvo danho ratorwa nehurumende richikwanisa kuti zvinhiu zviwande munyika, mitengo yezvinhu haisi kuzodzikira. Vatiwo mitengo yezvinhu ichatokwira zvakanyanya sezvo vanhu nemakambani vachatsvaga mari yekunotenga kunze pamusika mutema izvo zvinozoitawo kuti vatengese zvinhu zvavo nemitengo iri pamusoro soro. VaJabangwe vati zviri nani kuti hurumende irambe ichitsigira makambani emuno nemari. Vati hurumende yakaderedza huwandu hwemari yekunze hwainopa kumakambani muna Nyamavhuvhu izvo zvakatanga kukonzera kushomeka pamwe nekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu. No media source currently available

headline: Argentina neFrance Dzinganzi Dzakatamba Zvakafadza Vanhu Zvakanyana Munhoroondo yeWorld Cup Here?
text: Makundano eWorld Cup Qatar 2022 asvika kumagumo Argentina ichipemberera kutora mukombe wemakwikwi ayo akabuditsa zvishamiso zvakawanda uye anonzi nevamwe fainari yacho yanakidza kudarika dzakamboitika kare. Makundano aya akapera nezuro zita riri kungotaurwa nezvaro riri raLionel Messi. Chirikufadza veruzhinji ndechekuti Messi atora World Cup, mumakundano ake anogona kunge ari ekugumisira sezvo ave nemakore makumi matatu nemashanu ekuberekwa. Messi ange asimudza mikombe yose yakakosha kunze kweweWorld Cup izvo zvafadza vaimbobatira Kambuzuma United VaShepard Saizi. Messi akatungamira Argentina kutora mukombe uyu nekurova France nemapenereti 4-2 mushure mekunge mutambo uyu wapera uri mangange 2-2 munguva yakatarwa uyezve 3-3 mumaminitsi makumi matatu akawedzerwa. Zita raMessi ririkupinda munhoroondo yeWorld Cup pamwechete neraPele weBrazil naDiego Maradona weArgentina sevatambi vakaita mashiripiti anotyisa mumakundano aya. Makundano e2022 World Cup akaunzawo zvishamiso zvakawanda kusanganisira kubuda munharaunda yekutanga kwezvikwata zvine mukurumbira zvakaita seBelgium neGermany izvo zvakazoteverwawo neBrazil neSpain. Kukundwa kwakaitwa Argentina 2-1 neSaudi Arabia uye Japan kurova 2 Germany 1, Morocco ichikunda Belgium 2-0, kuri kupindawo munhoroondo yemakwikwi aya semabudiro akaitawo mitambo zvaive zvisingafungirwe. Vaimbove mubati wepembe muPremier Soccer League VaSam Hamandawana vanoti izvi zvinoratidza kuti nhabvu pasi rese yashanduka. Izvi zvakasimbiswa neMorocco imwe yezvikwata zvishanu zvaive zvakamirira Africa kumakundano aya pamwechete neCameroon, Ghana, Senegal neTunisia. Morocco yakaita chikwata chekutanga kubva muAfrica kusvika musemi fainari yeWorld Cup kubvira makundano aya aparurwa muna 1930. Mukuguma, Morocco yakapedza iri pachinzvimbo chechina ndokupihwa mamirioni makumi maviri nemashanu emadhora kana kuti $25 million neFifa. Maneja wechikwata cheZimbabwe Warriors VaWellington Mpandare vanoti Morocco yasimudza manyuku-nyuku muAfrica. Izvi zvatsinihrwa nnemuongorori wemutambo wenhabvu VaAdvance Katapa. Makundano eWorld Cup anotevera ari kuitwa muna 2026 kuCanada neAmerica uyezve achange ave nezvikwata makumi mana nezvisere kubva pamakumi matatu nemana. Africa ichange iine zvikwata zvipfumbamwe kubva pazvikwata zvishanu. No media source currently available

headline: VeZanu-PF neCCC Vokakavadzana nezveKusagadzikana Kwoita Nyika paMberi peSarudzo dza2023
text:
Vebato reZanu-PF neveCitizens Coalition for Change vatatsurana muMasvingo nhasi pakuti ndiyani ari kukonzera mhirizhonga nekusagadzikana munyika pamberi pesarudzo dza2023. Vachitaura pamusangano wekutaura nezvegadziriro yesarudzo dzegore rinouya wakokerwa nesangano revatori venhau reZimbabwe Union of Journalists nhasi paChevron Hotel, vakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri weCCC muMasvingo, VaDereck Charamba nemunyori mubazi revechidiki muZanu PF muMasvingo, VaCharles Munganasa vati mapato avo akagadzirira zvakakwana kupinda musarudzo dzegore rinouya.

VaCharamba vati bato ravo riri kugadzirira sarudzo idzi nekutsvaga rutsigiromurunyararo asi vakapomera Zanu-PF mhosva yekuita nekuvakanganisa VaCharamba vati huwandu hw mhirizhonga yezvematongerwe enyika nekumbunyikidzwa kwekodzero dzavatsigiri vavo huri kukura munyika apo sarudzo dzave pedyo. Izvi zvarambwa naVaMunganasa avo vapomera mhosva yekukwira kwemhirizhonga dzematongerwe enyika kubato rinopikisa re CCC vachiti ndiro rinotanga mhirizhonga.

VaMunganasa vanoti bato reCCC rinobatsirwa nemasangano akaozvimirira oga kunemera bato ravo mhosva dzenhema vachiti vanhu varikuita izvi varikuita voga vasina kutumwa nebato ravo.
Vaenderera mberi vachiti vanotarisira kukunda musarudzo gore rinouya nekuti mabasa ari kuitwa nebato ravo ari kuonekwa nevavhoti.

VaCharamba vati hapana mabasa anoonekwa akaitwa nebato reZanu PF kubva muna 2018 sezvo hupfumi hwenyika huri kumawere uye vanhu varikutambura. Munyori mukuru musangano reZUJ muMasvingo, VaTatenda Chatagu vatiwo vaita musangano uyu pakati pevatori venhau nevatungamiriri vemapato aya kuti vazeye nyaya yemhirizhonga pasarudzo iyo inobatawo vatori venhau vanenge vachita mabasa avo

Mapurisa ange akakokwawo kumusangano wanhasi haana kuuya. Bato reCCC riri kupomera bato reZanu PF mhosva yekuponda nhengo dzaro dzinoti VaMboneni Ncube, KuKwekwe pasarudzo dzema by-election muna Kurume, Muzvare MoreBlessing Ali kuNyatsimwe mwedzi wapera pamwe na Nyasha Zhambe Mawere kwaGutu gore rapera muna Zvita. Asi Zanu PF inoramba mhosva idzi ichiti vanhu vakazviita vakapara mhosva vakazvimirira ndosaka vakasungwa nemapurisa.

Mugwaro rayo rezvekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu nemhirizhonga munyika mumwedzi waChikumi, sangano rakazvimirira roga reZimbabwe Peace Project rinoti bato reZANU PF ndiro rakanyanya kutyora kodzero dzevanhu nezvikamu zvinodarika makumi mana nematatu kubva muzana 43,8%, ukuwo bato reCCC rinewo zvikamu zvinodarika zvitatu nechidimbu kubva muzana kana kuti 3.5%. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi neVashandirwi Votambira Bond Notes Zvakasiyana
text: Gavhuna webhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, VaJohn Mangudya, nemusi weMuvhuro vakaparura mari yemabond notes iyo iri kutambirwa zvakasiyana siyana munyika. Gavhuna webhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, VaJohn Mangudya, nemusi weMuvhuro vakaparura mari yema bond notes iyo iri kutambirwa zvakasiyana siyana munyika. Zimbabwe iri kuda kuyedza zvisati zvamboitwa munhoroondo yenyika dzepasi rino zvekurega kushandisa mari yekune dzimwe kusanganisa dhora rekuAmerica ichishandisa mari yayo. Zimbabwe yakatanga kushandisa mari yekune dzimwe nyika muna 2009 mushure mekunge mari yenyika yashaya simba. Asi ma bond notes akaparurwa aya anenge asina kusvika zvakanaka. Vanoita basa rekuchinja mari vanonzi vatotanga kuitengesa pamukoto. Kuti munhu awane dhora rimwe chete rekuAmerica anoda ma bond notes gumi nematatu, uye kuti awane rand rimwe chete anoda mabond notes gumi. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wesangano reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, VaCallisto Jokonya, vanoti vemabhizimisi vari kutambira mari iyi nemufaro. Panyaya yekuti zviri kuitwa neZimbabwe zvakafanana nekufa uchimuka, sezvo zvisati zvamboitika, VaJokonya vanoti zvinokwanisika. Mutungamiri wesangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailer’s, VaDenford Chimutashu, vanotenderana naVaJokonya vachiti mabond notes ari kurerutsira vanhu vange votadza kutenga zvinhu nekushaya mari. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kuyambira kuti kuparurwa kwemari iyi kuchapawo kuti madhora ekuAmerica ashaike zvichapa kuti zvinhu zvitange kudhura muzvitoro. Vamwe vanoti izvi zvave kutooneka nekunetsa kuri kuita mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari. Asi VaChimutashu vanoti mari yekuAmerica yange ichishandiswa zvisizvo uye ikozvino inenge yave kuwanikwa. Asi mutungamiri wesangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti sevashandi havasi kutambira kuparurwa kwemari iyi uye vari kuzoratidzira. Imwe nyaya iri kunetsa inyaya yekuti mari yakaparurwa iyi iri pamutemo here. Magweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu uye vemapato anopikisa kusanganisira Zimbabwe People First vakatokwira kumatare vachipikisa kuturwa kwemari iyi. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakashandisa masimba avo vakadzika mutemo unoshanda kwemwedzi mitanhatu kuti vaparure mari itsva iyi. Asi vanokokera bato reMDC-T mudare reparamende, VaInnocent Gonese, vanoti zvakaitwa naVaMugabe hazvisi pamutemo. Ikozvino dare reparamende riri kuenda kuvanhu kunovabvunza nezvekuparurwa kwemari iyi. Asi vamwe vanoti uku kuyeuka bako mvura yanaya. VaGonese vanoti havo zvakakosha kuti vanhu vape pfungwa dzavo kuitira mangwana. Zvinhu muZimbabwe panyaya yemari zvakaita manyama amire nerongo munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti kuti zvinhu zvifambe Zimbabwe inoda kuti igadzirise hupfumi hwayo kwete kuparura mari itsva. Kuti mabond notes achashanda sezviri kuparidzwa nehurumende?
