Aiwa apa ndipo panonzi navanasorojena totenda maruva tadya chakata. No media source currently available    .

headline: Varwere Vodzoserwa Kudzimba Apo Kuramwa Mabasa kweMadhokotera, Vakoti neVamwe Kwoenderera Mberi
text: Varwere vakawanda vanonzi vari kudzoserwa kudzimba apo kuramwa mabasa kwevakoti, vanachiremba nevamwe vashandi vemuzvipatara kuri kuenderera mberi. Kunyange hazvo mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vari kuti hurumende yavo vakazvipira kugadzirisa zvichemo zvevashandi vayo, hapana hurukuro dzati dzaitwa kubva zvakatanga kuramwa mabasa vashandi vemuzvipatara ava svondo rapera. Nyaya yekukwira zvakanyanya kwemitengo yezvinhu muzvitoro uye zvave kuitwa nevemichovha nevaridzi vedzimba zvekubhadharisa vanhu nemari yekuAmerica, zvave kupa kuti zvinhu zviomere vashandi avo vari kubhadharwa nedhora remunyika iro riri kushaya simba zuva nezuva. Kuramwa mabasa uku kuri kuuya panguva yakaoma sezvo Zimbabwe, sedzimwe nyika pasi rose, iri kurwisa chirwere cheCovid19. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kubazi rezvehutano pamwe nesangano reHealth Service Board kunyangwe hazvo takavatumira mibvunzo paWhatsApp. Asi mutungamiri musangano reZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnoch Dongo, vanoti hurumende haisi kuratidza kuzvipira kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo zvavakaipa neChina svondo rapera. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yotsika Madziro PaNyaya yeKumisa Zvimwe Zvinogadzirwa Kunze Kuti Zvisapinde muNyika
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvemaindustry VaMike Bimha vanoti kutanga muna Chikunguru, ZIMRA inenge yotevedzera mutemo wakadzikwa hwekumiswa kwekupinda kwezvimwe zvinhu munyika nevanhu vasina marezinesi. Hurumende yakaparura mutemo unonzi Statutory Instrument Number 64 uyo uchapa kuti zvinhu zvakatarwa mumutemo uyu zvisabvumidzwe kupinda munyika. Zvinhu izvi zvinosanganisa masalad creams, mukaka, mafuta ekubikisa, zvekuvakiusa, mafotereza, matayi edzimotokari, cheese nezvimwe. VaBimha vanoti masangano akaita saana Confederation of Zimbabwe Industries neZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce ndiwo akakumbira kuti vambomisa kupinda kwezvinhu izvi munyika. Vanotiwo hurumende inokwanika kuwana mari yemitero yakawanda kana vemunyika vakwanisa kugadzira zvinhu zvakawanda. Vatiwo izvi zvinopa kuti vanhu vakwanise kuwana mabasa. Hurumende mavhiki apera yakamboyedza kurambidza zvinhu munyika asi pakaita mhirizhonga pabhodha reBeitbridge vangu vachiramba kutambira hurongwa uhu. Asi rwendo rwuno hurumende inonzi ichaendesa mapurisa akawanda mumabhazi nekusunga vemabhazi vanenge vabatsira kupinza zvinhu munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Mhuri yaVaMugabe Yokurudzira VaMnangagwa Kuti Vaone Kuti Mutumbi waVaMugabe Haufukunyurwe
text: Mhuri yevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika mushakabvu VaRobert Mugabe, inoti mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanofanirwa kuzivisa nyika yose kuti vachazadzisa zvavakavimbisa kuti VaMugabe varadzikwe kunodiwa nemhuri yavo uye mutumbi wavo hausi kuzofukunyurwa sezvakatarwa nematare nezuro. Mutauriri wemhuri uye vari muzukuru waVaMugabe, VaLeo Mugabe vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaMnangagwa vanofanirwa kuzivisa nyika nepasi rose kuti vacharemekedza zvido zvemhuri yaVaMugabe zvekuvaviga kumusha kwavo uye kuti havasi kuzovafukunyura sezvavakambovimbisa. Izvi zvinotevera kuraswa kwechikumbiro chevana vaVaMugabe chekuti vasafukunyurwe nekunovigwa kumarinda anovigwa magamba kuHarare nedare ramejasitiriti muChinhoyi nezuro. Vachipa mutongo wavo nezuro Muzvare Ruth Moyo vakarasa chikumbiro chevana vaVaMugabe vanoti; Bona Mugabe, Tinotenda Robert Jnr naBellaimine Mugabe chekuti dare rimise kufukunyurwa kwemutumbi wababa vavo sezvakanga zvatongwa naMambo Zvimba muna Chikumi. Mumwe mugari wekwaZvimba, VaDonmore Gombe, vati vanoshamiswa nemitongo yematare yekuda kumanikidza kuti VaMugabe vafukunyurwe vachinovigwa kuHeroes Acre asi pasingataurwe zvevamwe vakaitwa magamba asi vakavigirwa kwaidiwa nehama dzavo saVaDumiso Dabengwa nevamwe. Hatina kunzwa divi rehurumende kana raVaMnangagwa panyaya iyi sezvo mutauriri wehurumende uye vari gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, kana mutauriri waVaMnangagwa, VaGeorge Charamba, vanga vasingadavire mbozhanhare dzavo. Asi bazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko razivisa paTwitter kuti rakanzwa nezvemutongo wakaitwa kuChinhoyi uye hurumende kana mutungamiri wenyika havaneyi nezviri kuitika mumatare panyaya iyi. Zvichakadaro, gweta revana vaVaMugabe, VaFungai Chinwamurombe, vati mushure mekutaura nevana vaVaMugabe vari kupikisa mutongo wamejasitiriti muChinhoyi nekukwidza nyaya iyi kudare repamusoro nemusi weMuvhuro. VaMugabe vakashaikira kuSingapore muna Gunyana 2019 uko kwavaigara vachienda kunorapwa. VaMugabe, avo vakatonga nyika kubva muna 1980, vakabviswa pachigaro zvechisimba nemauto muna Mbudzi 2017, izvo zvakaona VaMnangagwa vachigadzwa semutungamiri wenyika vachitora chinzvimbo chaVaMugabe. No media source currently available

headline: Nera Yokurudzira Kuvandudzwa kweZec
text: Mapato anopikisa aungana zvakare muHarare neChitatu achisimbaradza nyaya yekuti sangano rinowona nezvekufambiswa kwesarudzo rivandudzwe pamberi pesarudzo achiti ave kuita gadziriro yekuratidzira mumigwagwa. Mapato anopikisa ari kushanda ari pasi peboka riri kuzvidaidza kuti National Election Reforms Agenda, kana kuti Nera, aungana panzvimbo yaari kudaidza kuti Freedom Square muHarare apo asimbisa nyaya yekupinda mumigwagwa achiratidzira kusafara nekutadza kufambisa basa kwaanoti kuri kuitwa nekomisheni inowona nezvesarudzo munyika yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission, kana kuti Zec. Mumwe ataura pamusangano uyu uye vari munyori mukuru muMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vaudza vanhu vauya pamusangano uyu kuti vabvumirana semapato ari muNera kuti vachapinda mumigwagwa munguva pfupi iri kutevera zvisinei kuti hurumende inoda here kana kuti kwete vachiti zvose zvinoita kuti sarudzo dzemunyika dzisafambe zvakanaka zvinofanira kugadziriswa sarudzo dzemuna 2018 dzisati dzaitwa. Mashoko aVaMwonzora aya anotevera kurambidzwa nemapurisa kwakaitwa Nera kuita musangano waitwa uyu muAfrica Unity Square vachinzi vaitire kuFreedom Square mapurisa achiti pakati pedhorobha panga pachizoitwa musangano wemakurukota ezvekunze kwenyika emunyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica dzinosanganisira Zimbabwe. Mumwe wevanhu vauya pamusangano uyu, VaWarship Dumba, vabvumirana nedanho ratorwa nemapato anopikisa ari muNera. Muzvare Eunice Nyakutsikwa avo vanga vari pamusangano uyu vati hurumende yeZanu PF haifanurwe kuramba ichiregererwa ichityora kodzero dzevanhu. VaMunyaradzi Banda, avo vataura vakamirira Amai Joice Mujuru vanove mutungamiri webato reNational People’s Party, vati bato ravo rakazvipira kushanda nemamwe mapato ari muNera kuti munyika muitwe sarudzo dzinoremekedza zvido zvevanhu. Vatiwo sebato riri kushanda nevakarwa muhondo uye rakatsemuka kubva muZanu PF, vanoziva chikiribidi chose chaiitwa neZanu PF mukubirira kwavanoti kunoitwa sarudzo neZanu PF. Mumwe wevatevedzeri vaVaMorgan Tsvangirai, VaElias Mudzuri, avo vataura vakamirira VaTsvangirai, avo vanzi vari kunze kwenyika, vati chinodikanwa nedechekuti ruzhinji rweZimbabwe rwutaure nezwi rimwechete kwete kusiya VaMugabe vachiita madiro aJojina nehupenyu hweveruzhinji. Zvichakadai, mapato anopikisa aya ati ave kuda kuti Zec ipwanywe -sarudzo dzofambiswa nesangano renyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica reSADC richibatsirana nesangano renyika dzose dziri muAfrica reAfrican Union nesangano renyika dzepasi rose reUnited Nations sezvo achiti hurumende yaVaMugabe ikaregwa ichitungamira sarudzo zvakafanana nekuenda kutsime nemugomo wakabooka. No media source currently available

headline: Dare rePamusoro Rinoti Kudzingwa Muparamende kwaVaBiti neVamwe neVavo Hakusi paMutemo
text: Dare repamusoro reHigh Court rapa mutongo wekuti kudzingwa mudare reparamende kwakaitwa nhengo dzePeople’s Democratic Party, PDP, dzakakwikwidza dziri pasi pemubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance hakusi pamutemo. Izvi zvave kureva kuti mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaTendai Biti, avo vanomirira Harare East, nevamwe vavo vave kudzokera mudare iri kunyange mutongo uyu uchikwanisa kukwikwidzwa mudare repamusoro soro reSupreme Court. Mutauriri wedare reparamende, VaJacob Mudenda, vakadzinga VaBiti nevamwe vavo vashanu vanoti; VaWillias Madzimure (Kambuzuma), VaSettlement Chikwinya (Mbizo), VaKucaca Ivumile Phulu (Nkulumane), VaSichelesile Mahlangu (Pumula), uye VaRegai Tsunga (Mutasa South). VaMudenda vakavadzinga vachiti vainge vanyorerwa tsamba naVaBenjamin Rukanda vaizviti ndivo munyori mukuru webato rePDP. VaRukanda vaiti VaBiti nevamwe vavo vainge vabuda mubato. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaRukanda kuti tinzwe divi ravo sezvo nharembosha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. Asi vakambomiswa basa sameya weHarare, VaJacob Mafume, vanova nhengo yeMDC Alliance vatenda kuti mutongo uyu wapihwa uye vari kutarisira kuti nhengo dzavo dzidzokere mudare reparamende. No media source currently available

headline: Kunetsa kweZvekufambisa Kunonzi Kwave kuKanganisa Nyaya dzeMagariro eVanhu Pamwe neHupfumi hweNyika
text: Dambudiko rezvekufambisa mumadhorobha makuru emunyika rinonzi nevamwe vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika pamwe nevanoongorora zvehupfumi rave kutowedzera zvakanyanya kukanganisa magariro evanhu pamwe nehupfumi hwenyika sezvo vashandi vave kumanikidzwa kunonoka kusvika kumabasa pamwe nekusvika kudzimba. Vazhinji vevanofamba nemabhazi, zvikuru muHarare neBulawayo, vanonzi vari kuzopedzisira vofamba netsoka sezvo kambani yakapiwa mvumo nehurumende yekutakura vezurizhinji, yeZUPCO, iri kunzi yakundikana kuzadzisa chirevo ichi. Izvi zvinonzi zvave kupawo mukana kune vane dzimotokari diki avo vanonzi vave kutakura vanhu vachivachaja miripo iri pamusorosoro, kunyange hazvo ivo vasina marezinesi ekutakura veruzhinji. Mapurisa nemamwe mapazi ehurumende vanonziwo vari kusunga nekurambidza vemotokari vasina marezinesi ava, avo vanozivikanwa nerekuti 'mishikashika', izvo zvinonzi zviri kusvitsa pakuti vamwe varaisikirwe nehupenyu nekuda kwetsaona dziri kuitika apo vatyairi vanenge vachiedza kutiza mapurisa. Nekuda kwedambudziko iri, vamwe vanhu vanonzi vave kutokwira pamusoro pemabhazi nemarhorhi vamwe vachipinda mumabhutu emabhazi kuti vakwanisenkusvitswa kudzimba dzavo, izvo zvave kuvaisa munjodzi. Hurumende neChitatu yakabvuma kuti ZUPCO yakundikana, asi yakavimbisa kuti iri kugadzirisa dambudziko iri kuburikidza nekuita kuti mabhazi anofamba pakati pemaguta akaita seharare nemamwe ange achizobatsira kutakura vanhu munguva dzaanenge adzoka muHarare. Asi munyori anoona nezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu mubato rinopikisa reCitizens’ Coalition for Change, CCC, vari zvakare mumiriri weMbizo mudare reparamende, VaSettlement Chikwinya, vanoti hurumende yakundikana zvakanyanya uye yapererwa. VaChikwinya vanoti hurumende yakapindira munyaya dzekutakurwa kwevanhu ichihwanda nedenda reCovid-19, asi iyo iine chinangwa chekushandisa vemabhazi kuti vaende pasi peZUPCO isingavabhadhare nenguva uye ichivabhadhara nemadhora emunyika, ayo asina chaachatenga. Kugadzirisa dambudziko iri, VaChikwinya vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kubvumidza vamwe vedzimotokari dzinotakura veruzhinji kuitawo basa iri,pamwechete neZUPCO yacho, uye kubhadhara vane mabhazi ari kushanda ari pasi peZUPCO nenguva kuitira kuti vakwanisewo kugadzirisa mabhazi avo. Asi nhengo yeZanu PF vari munyori anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mudunhu reHarare DCC 3, VaGilbert Dzikiti, vanoti hurumende iri kuita zvose zvainokwanisa kugadzirisa dambudziko rezvekufambisa iri kuburikidza nekutenga mabhazi matsva akawanda kubva kuBelarus. VaDzikiti vanoti dambudziko harisi pahurumende, asi kuti vemabhazi vari pasi peZUPCO, avo vavanoti vari kunyanya kushanda vaine chinangwa chemari yavanoda kubata pazuva zvekuti kana vangosvitsa mari iyoyo vanobva vatomisa mabhazi avo vogara zvavo pamimvuri vanhu vachitambura. VaDzikiti vanoti kuti dambudziko iri rigadziriswe, ZUPCO inofanirwa kugadzirisa mashandiro ayo, vachitiwo dambudziko remabhazi riri kuwedzerwawo nezvirango zvavanoti zviri kutadzisa kupinda munyika kwezvinodiwa kugadzirisa mabhazi anenge afa. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Tambai bhora vakomana’
text: CHIKWATA chenhabvu chenyika chemaWarriors chiri kupinda muhondo nhasi na3pm masikati apo chichasangana necheSenegal mumutambo wacho wekutanga weTotal Energy Africa Cup of Nations 2021.   Zvikwata zviviri izvi zviri muboka rimwe chete reGroup B umo mune zvimwe zvinoti Malawi neGuinea.   Mutungamiri weFriends of the Warriors – Edward Chimedza – anoti mutambo watsvuka ropa.   “Sevatsigiri venhabvu, tiri kufara zvikuru mutambo watange takamirira wasvika. Tinoti kumaWarriors basa ngaribatwe, musavhundutsirwe nemazita evatambi veSenegal. Isu titoriwo shasha uye kuti tive kumutambo uyu tinotorakidza kuti tiri nyanzviwo.   “Gore rino, kekutanga tinoda kuona chikwata chedu chichibudirira kubuda muboka racho chichifambira mberi mumutambo uyu.   “Asi tiri ipapo, tiri kukurudzira vatsigiri kuti ngaticherechedze mutemo, ngatisaungane asi tione mutambo uyu tiri kudzimba dzedu,” anodaro Chimedza.   Kuchiti mutsigiri mukuru wenhabvu ane mukurumbira – Adomsi Mukwasi – anoti maWarriors anotofanirwa kutokunya dzisimbe mumutambo uyu.   “Isu tiri kuti hatinei nemazita evatambi vari muchikwata cheSenegal, basa ngaribatwe maWarriors. Go Warriors Go, tinemi muhondo, Senegal ngairadzikwe pasi,” anodaro Mukwasi.   Chris ‘Romario’ Musekiwa, uyo akasimuka nezuro akananga kuCameroon kunotsigira maWarriors kumutambo uyu, anoti chikwata ichi chinoda rutsigiro rwakasimba.   “Vakomana vedu tinavo, ishuviro yedu kuti vabate basa sebasa. Gore rino, tinotarisira kuti ngavabude muboka ravo timbosvika kure kumutambo uyu,” anodaro Musekiwa.   Mutambo uyu uchange uri wechina maWarriors achisangana neSenegal uye pamitambo mitatu yadarika, chikwata chenyika ichi chakakundwa yose.   Kumutambo weAFCON, maWarriors akasangana neSenegal kaviri, ndokukundwa 2-0 mumitambo yose.   Zvakadaro, sangano reCAF rakazivisa kuti Senegal ichange isina vatambi vayo vane chitsama vanosanganisira Edourd Mendy weChelsea, Kalidou Koulibaly weNapoli naNampalys Mendy weLeicester City sezvo vakabatwa nedenda reCovid-19.

headline: Vorwisa mhirizhonga netsiva
text: Ndooka   SHASHA dzetsiva dzechidzimai dzichamirira Zimbabwe mumutambo uyo vachabandana nevatambi vekune dzimwe nyika wekurwira kodzero dzevanhukadzi unozivikanwa nekunzi Kick Out Girl Child Abuse.   Mutambo uyu uri kurongwa neDeltaforce Boxing Promotions uye uchaparurwa nemusi weChishanu svondo rino apo vatambi ava vachazotatsurana munaMbudzi.   Shasha yetsiva ine mukurumbira – Patience Mastara – achirwira bhande reWBF Women’s International Super Bantamweight pamutambo uyu apo acharwa naJessica Mfinanga wekuTanzania. Murairidzi waMastara anove zvakare mutungamiri weDeltaforce Boxing – Clyde Musonda – anoti pakatanga kunyuka denda reCovid-19, nhau dzekushungurudzwa kwevanhukadzi dzakawedzera zvikuru nekudaro mutambo uyu vakauronga nechinangwa chekupa chenjedzo pamusoro pekuipa kwemhirizhonga mudzimba pamwe nekusimudzira vanhukadzi vanotamba tsiva.   “Vanhukadzi vakatikoshera uye nyaya dzekushungurudzwa kwavo dzakatanga kuwanda zvikuru munguva yelockdown. Saka chinangwa chedu kuti tisimudzire vanhukadzi vadzidze kuzvimirira kana kodzero dzavo dzave kutyorwa.   “Hatidi kunzwa nezvekushungurudzwa kwevanasikana saka mutambo uyu ndewavo wekuvarakidza kuti vakatikoshera, uchange ungori wemadzimai chete,” anodaro Musonda.   Mimwe mitambo ichatambwa munaMbudzi ichaona Cecilia Pitiseni achitatsurana nechimwe chizvarwa chemunyika muno Chiedza Homakama mumutambo weLightweight kuchitiwo nerimwe divi, Anisha Basheel wekuMalawi achasangana naBridget Mbabi wekuDemocratic Republic of Congo.   Musonda anoti mutambo uyu uchange uchitsigirwa neshasha yetsiva yechidzimai yekuCanada — Olivia Gerula — uyo ari kushanda chaizvo kurwisa nyaya dzemhirizhonga kumadzimai.

headline: VanaChiremba Vari Kuramwa Mabasa Vanotadza Kuwirirana neHurumende
text: Hurumende ichimiririrwa nemapazi ezvehutano nemari neMuvhuro yakaita hurukuro navanachiremba vari kuramwa mabasa asi zvinonzi hapana kuwirirana zvapa kuti vanachiremba vati vacharamba vachiramwa mabasa. Mubati wehomwe musangano ravanachiremba reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association Dr Prince Butau vanoti kuramwa mabasa kuri kuenderera mberi sezvo pasina kuwirirana nehurumende pakugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo zvinosanganisa kushomeka kwemishonga, zvikwanisiro uye kusawedzerwa kwemari dzavanotambira. Hurumende, kuburikidza neboka reHealth Services Board, yavimbisa kuti mishonga ichawanikwa muzvipatara paine tarisiro yekuti zvicharerutsa dambudziko. Musangano uyu unonzi waudzwawo kuti hurumende iri kuwedzera mari inoita mamiriyoni gumi emadhora yekuti pakwanise kupinzwa vamwe vashandi vezvehutano mumapoka ane dambudziko rekushomeka kwevane hunyanzvi kutanga musi wa 01 Ndira 2019. Hurumende inonzi yakawanisawo mari inosvika mamiriyoni matanhatu emadhora, iyo inonzi yakanga yasara pamari yehomwe yeHealth Workers Vehicle Loan Scheme, yekuti vashandi vezvehutano vakwereteswe mari yekutenga dzimotokari vasingazobhadhariswa mitero yekupinza motokari idzi munyika kubva musi wa 01 Ndira 2019 zvakare. Zvinonziwo hurumende yakaisa hurongwa hwekuti vanachiremba nevamwe vashandi vakamisirwa mihoro yavo yemuna Zvita 2018 vakwanise kuwaniswa mihoro yemuna Ndira 2019 kana vakanyorera kumapoka avanoshandira. No media source currently available

headline: Mahofisi eMauto, Mapurisa neVamwe Ovharwa Mvura KuMasvingo neNyaya yeZvikwereti
text: Kanzuru yeMasvingo yakatanga chirongwa chekuvharira vemabhizimusi nemapazi ehurumende mvura pakati pedhorobha kuti vabhadhare zvikwereti zvavo zvakakura, Godfrey Mtimba anotipa nyaya inotevera. Izvi hazvina kutambirwa zvakanaka nevanoshandira mudhorobha vachiti zvinogona kukonzera kupararira kwezvirwere zvakaita secholera netyphoid mudhorobha sezvo zvivakwa zviri kuvharirwa mvura zvichishandira vanhu vakawandisa. Meya weguta reMasvingo VaCollen Maboke vati vari kuvhara mvura nekuti mapazi ehurumende nevemabhizimusi ndivo vane zvikwereti zvakakura.\n\nVanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano rinomirira vagari reMasvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance kana kuti MURRA, Muzvare Rumbidzai Magurupira, vati kunyange hazvo vasinga kurudziri kusabhadharwa kwemvura nani zvake, kuvhara mvura pakati peguta kunogona kukonzera zvirwere uye kutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Kanzuru yeMasvingo inoti mapazi ehurumende nevemabhizimusi vane zvikwereti zvinoda kusvika mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe emadhora emunyika kana kuti $270 000. Mapazi ehurumende anezvikwereti zvikuru anosanganisira, mauto, mapurisa pamwe nezvipatara. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko Amai Monica Mutsvangwa kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa.

headline: Reina opembedza Sarri
text: anoti aimbove murairidzi wake, Maurizio Sarri, anogona kurairidza zvikwata zvikuru zvichitevera mashoko ari kutenderera ekuti angangotsiva Zinedine Zidane kuReal Madrid. Zidane akaramwa basa rekurairidza Real Madrid svondo radarika mazuva mashanu achangosimudza mukombe weChampions League uyo waakahwina katatu kakatevedzana.   Mutungamiriri weMadrid, Florentino Perez, ave kufanirwa kutsvaga mumwe murairidzi anotsiva chizvarwa chekuFrance ichi uye Sarri zita rake riri kutaurwa nezvaro kunzi anogona kuenda kuzvikwata zvikuru zvakawanda muEurope zvinosanganisira Madrid neChelsea.   Achitaura nebepanhau reAS rekuSpain, Reina anoti, “Tiri vanhu vamwe. Tine hukama hwababa nemwana, ndinomuda zvikuru uye ndichagara nekutenda nezvose zvaakandiitira.   “Ndiye akaita kuti zvose zvaiitika kuNapoli makore matatu adarika zvibudirire, uye anoda nhabvu inonwisa mvura inoyevedza. “Ini ndingatokurudzira zvikwata zvakasiyana kuti zvimutore nekuti ane njere dzenhabvu uye ane ruzivo rwakanyanya rwemutambo uyu.” – Sportsmail Football

headline: Zanu PF Yogadzirira Sarudzo Dzichaitwa Muna Kurume
text: Bato reZanu PF nhasi ratanga kutambira magwaro evanhu vanoda kumirira bato iri musarudzo dze by-elections dzichaitwa muna Kurume. Asi Zanu PF inoti ichatanga yaita dzekutsvaga vachamirira bato iri musarudzo dzemun Kurume. Muchiziviso kunhengo dzebato ravo, murongi wemisangano muZanu PF, VaMike Bimha, vati Zanu PF ichapinda musarudzo dze by-elections nekudaro vese vanoda kumirira bato vanofanira kuendesa magwaro avo kumahofisi ebato iri mumatunhu avo. VaBimha vati izvi zvinofanira kuitwa kusvika mangwana nenguva dza4 masikati. Vati masichagaro ematunhu anofanira kuendesa mazita evanhu ava kumahofisi echikamu chebato ravo chekuronga musangano kana kuti Commissariat nemusi weMugovera masikati. VaBimha vati bato richazivisa mazita evanhu vanenge vabvumidzwa kuti vamirire bato uye kana pachinge paita vanhu vakawanda vanoda kumirira bato pachinzvimbo chimwe chete, pachaitwa sarudzo dzemaprimary musi wa20 Ndira. Zimbabwe Electoral Commission (ZEC) yakazivisa svondo rapfuura kuti vanoda kupinda musarudzo dze by-elections idzo dzichaitwa musi wa26 Kurume vanofanira kunyoresa kuZEC musi wa26 Ndira. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuna VaBimba sezvo vati vanga vasiri muhovisi. Mumwe wechidiki muZanu PF, VaMunashe Mututsa vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanotambira chiziviso chebatoi ravo uye vechidiki vachaendesa magwaro avo kuti vapinde musarudzo. Bato reZapu razivisawo kuti richapinda musarudzo idzi nekuti zvakakosha kuti veruzhinji vawane vatungamiriri vanovashandira. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaGift Ostallos Siziba, vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato ravo ritori mushishi yekutsvaga vachamirira bato iri musarudzo dzichaitwa muna Kurume. Asi vati rwendo runo havasi kuita sarudzo dzemaprimary vachiti dzinopesanisa vanhu. Vati vanhu ndivo vanosarudza vanhu vavanoda kuti vavamirire kubva munzvimbo dzavanogara. Mutauriri weMDC-T VaWitness Dube vati vatove pedyo nekupedza kutsvaga vanhu vachamirira bato ravo musarudzo idzi. Asi kunyange hazvo mapato makuru munyika nemamwe ari kuita gadziriro yesarudzo idzi, bato idzva reIdeas Party for Democracy rinoti kupinda musarudzo idzi kutambisa nguva nemari. Mutungamiri webato iri, VaHebert Chamuka, vaudza vatori venhau kuti havasi kupinda musarudzo idzi vachiti vachapinda musarudzo dza2023. Mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakatara 26 Kurume sezuva rekuita sarudzo dzekutsiva vanhu vakadzingwa kana kufa muparamende nemakanzuru. Pane zvigaro makumi maviri nezvisere muNational Assembly nezvigaro zana nezvinomwe zvemumakanzuru zvichakwikwidzwa musi wa26 Kurume. No media source currently available

headline: VaChiyangwa Vokurudzira VaTsigiri veNhabvu Kuti Vanotambira maWarriors kuNhandare yeNdege
text: Mutungamiri weZIFA VaPhilip Chiyangwa vari kukurudzira vanhu vose munyika kuti vaende kunhandare yendege yeHarare International Airport neChipiri masikati kunotambira chikwata cheZimbabwe Warriors icho chakashura mare nekudambura Zambia 3-1 kuSouth Africa nemusi weSvondo chichibva chasimudza mukombe weCOSAFA Castle Cup. Vachitaura neStudio 7, VaChiyangwa vati uyu mukombe wavo wekutanga vachitungamira sangano renhabvu reZIFA nekudaro vane mufaro mukuru. Vavimbisawo kuti vachaona kuti voitirei vakomana vemaWarriors ava. VaChiyangwa vakasarudzwa kuti vatungamire ZIFA muna 2015 mushure mekukunda musarudzo VaTrevor Carelse Juul, VaLeslie Gwindi naVaJames Takavada.

headline: Vanhu Makumi Matatu neVashanu Vofa neCovid-19 neMusi weChitatu
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu makumi matatu nevashanu vakashaya nechirwere cheCovid-19 nemusi weChitatau zvasiya huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi hwave zviuru zvitatu nemazana manomwe negumi nemumwe kana kuti 3, 7011. Vanhu chiuru chimwe chete nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemumwe kana kuti 1, 091 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vabatwa nacho kusvika parizvino vave zana rezviuru negumi nevatatu nemazana mashanu nemakumi maviri nematanhatu kana kuti 113, 526. Vanhu chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mana nemakumi maviri nevana kana kuti 1, 424 vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi zvasiya vapora vave zviuru makumi masere nemaviri zvine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemana kana kuti 82 994. Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi mananemazana mashanu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevasere vabayiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 kekutanga. Vabayiwa kechipiri sezviri kukurudzirwa vave zviuru makumi masere nemakumi matanhatu nematatu zvine mazana matanhatu nemakumi matanhatu nevanomwe kana kuti 863, 667. Hurumende inoti ine chinangwa chekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kuti ishande zvinotarisrwa

headline: IMF Yotumira Nhumwa kuZimbabwe asi Imwe Nyanzvi Inoti Hurumende Haisi Kuzokwereteswa Imwe Mari
text: Chimwe chikwata kubva kubhanga reInternational Monetary Fund chiri kutarisirwa kupinda munyika muna Kurume kuti chizeye nevakuru muhurumende kuti hupfumi hungagadziriswe sei. Uhu hurongwa hunozivikanwa nekuti Article IV Consultations. Vamwe vakuru vehurumende vasina kuda kudomwa nemazita vanoti vanoda kuti IMF ivabatsire nemari imwe yechikwereti. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Dr Godfrey Kanyenze vanoti kana hurumende isina kubhadhara mari dzemitero kana kuti ma arrears pane zvimwe zvikwereti zvinodarika bhiriyoni imwe chete nemazana matanhatu kumabhanga akaita seWorld Bank neAfrican Development Bank. No media source currently available

headline: MaGems ogadzirira remangwana
text: VAMWE vatambi venetball vemuchikwata chenyika chemaGems vari kugadzirira ramangwana ravo kuburikidza nekuenda kuchikoro uko vari kuita zvidzidzo zvakasiyana-siyana.   Vatambi ava vanosanganisira kaputeni wechikwata ichi Felistus Kwangwa uyo ari kuita zvidzidzo zveEconomic History paUniversity of Zimbabwe, kozoti Claris Kwaramba ari kuitawo zvidzidzo zvemutemo payunivhesiti imwechete iyi zvakare.   Achitaura neKwayedza svondo rino muHarare pamhemberero dzekudzoka kwemaGems kubva kuSouth Africa uko vainge vaenda kunokwikwidza kumakwishu eAfrica Netball Championships, Kwangwa anoti semaGems vari kukurudzirana kuti vaende kuchikoro vanodzidza kuitira ramangwana ravo.   Kwangwa anoti dzidzo ndiyo musimboti wehupenyu uye anokoshesa fundo yake zvekuti paanenge asingatambe netball anenge achiverenga mabhuku.   “Chokwadi dzidzo ndiyo musimboti wehupenyu, unofanirwa kudzidza. SemaGems tinokurudzirana kuti ngatidzidzei uye tigadzirire remangwana redu,” anodaro.   Kwangwa anoti dhigirii rake raari kuita reEconomic History anogona kuzoshanda mabasa anosanganisira kuve muzvinhanhorowondo (Historian), muongorori wemamiriro ezvenyaya dzehupfumi (Economic analyst) kana kuita zvetsvakurudzo (researcher).   Anoti ari kutarisira remangwana rake rakanaka nekudaro ari kushanda nesimba kuti agobudirira mufundo yake.   “Dhigirii randiri kudzidza ndinogona kuita mabasa akasiyana saka ndiri kuvavarira kuti ndipedze uye kana ndave naro ndotanga kushanda.   “Asi hazvireve kuti ndichabva ndasiya kutamba netball nekuti mwoyo wangu uri pamutambo uyu uye ndichashanda nesimba kuti ndizviite zviri zvese,” anodaro Kwangwa.   Zvakadaro, chikwata chemaGems chakapedza chiri pechina kumakwishu eAfrica Netball Championship chiri kumashure kweSouth Africa.

headline: Muchuchusi weHurumende Anoti Anoda Kuti Nhengo dzeMDC-T Dzitongerwe Rufu paMhosva yeKuponda Mupurisa
text: Nhengo dzeMDCT dzakabatwa nemhosva yekuponda mupurisa mumusha weGlen View muHarare muna 2011 nhasi dzakumbira kunzwirwa tsitsi nedare kunyangwe hazvo dzichiri kutsika madziro dzichiti hadzina mhosva yadzakapara. Muchuchisi wehurumende panyaya iyi, VaEdmore Nyazamba, vakurudzira dare kuti ritongere rufu vasungwa vanoti VaTungamirai Madzokere, Muzvare Yvonne Musarurwa pamwe naVaLast Maengehama avo vakabatwa nemhosva yekuponda Assistant Inspector Petros Mutedza pamhirizhonga yakaitika muna 2011 pakati pemapurisa nevechidiki veMDCT. VaNyazamba vati chiitiko ichi chakakanganisawo pfungwa dzevanhu vakawanda vakaona izvi zvichiitika vanosanganisira vana vadiki pamwe nevanhuwo zvavo vasinei nezvematongerwo enyika. Asi rimwe remagweta evasungwa ava, Amai Beatrice Mtetwa, vati vasungwa ava havana mhosva yavakapara uye vati mukupa mutongo, dare rinofa kutarisa kuti humbowo hwakasvitswa kudare hauburitse pachena kuti ngana ndiye akakanda dombo rakatema VaMutedza zvakazokonzera kuti vafe. Vaenderera mberi vachiti mutongo wakaturwa nemutongi wedare VaChinembiri Bhunu unoita sekuti imhosva kuti munhu anzi inhengo yeMDCT nepamusana pekuti hazvisi kubuda pachena mumutongo wavo kuti nhengo dzeMDCT dzakabatwa nemhosva yekuponda iyi dzakanyatsoita chii chaizvo chakakonzera kuti VaMutedza. Zvichakadai, Amai Mtetwa vakurudzira dare kuti mumtongo wango ribude pachena kuti hurumende inofanira kuferefeta nyaya dzevanhu vese vanonzi vakapondwa pamwe nekushayikwa zvinechekuita nezvematongerwo enyika vachiti vamwe vanhu varikupomerwa mhosva dzekuponda vari kungoswerombeya nemigwagwa vasina zvavari kuitwa zvinopedzisira zvaita sekuti mutemo une vamwe vanhu vaunoshandisirwa. Amai Mtetwa vatiwo bumbiro remitemo idzva haribvumidzwe kuti munhukadzi atongerwe rufu sezvakumbirwa naVaNyazamba; naizvozvo vati Muzvare Musarurwa havafanire kutongerwa nyangwe zvodii. Amai Mtetwa vatiwo vasungwa ava vakagara mujeri kwemakore anoda kusvika kumatatu nyaya iyi ichizeyewa mumatare saka vanofanirwa kutorwa sevanhu vakatombopika. Zvichakadai, mutongi wedare, VaBhunu, vatambira chikumbiro chasvitswa kudare nemagweta evasungwa ava chekuti VaPhineas Nhatarikwa, avo vakabatwawo nemhosva yekubatsira VaMadzokere naMuzvare Musarurwa kubva panzvimbo yakaparirwa mhosva, vabuditswe muhusungwa. Amai Mtetwa vati hazvikodzere kuti VaNhatarikwa, avo vanove mutyairi weMDCT vabatwe nemhosva iyi sezvo vaive munhu aiita basa rake panguva yaakasungwa. VaBhunu vabvuma chikumbiro chekuti VaNhatarikwa vabuditswe muhusungwa vakamirira kupihwa panyaya iyi. Zvichitevera zvasvitswa kudare nemagweta ari kumirira vasungwa, VaBhunu vati nyaya iyi ichadzoka mudare musi wa19 mwedzi uno pavachatura mutongo wekuti vanhu ava vanogara mujeri kwenguva yakareba zvakadii. Imwe nhengo yeMDCT yanga iri mudare ichinzwa nyaya iyi, VaSimon Mpande, vati varikuwona sekuti VaBhunu vane divi ravakarerekera pakutongwa kwenyaya iyi. VaSydney Chisi avo vanoshanda nesangano reYouth Initiative for Democracy in Zimbabwe kana kuti Yidez vati vanowona sekuti nyaya iyi inyaya yakatongwa kare pasiri kutariswa humbowo hwakasvitswa kudare. Mudare nhasi manga makazara kuti maku nevatungamiri veMDCT vanga vachisanganisira vatevedzeri vaVaMorgan Tsvangirai muMDCT vanoti Muzvare Thokozani Khupe, VaNelson Chamisa naVaElias Mudzuri. Vamwewo vanga vari mudare vanosanganisira mutungamiri weTransform Zimbabwe, VaJacob Ngarivhume pamwe nenhengo dzeparamende dzeMDCT dzakati wandei. No media source currently available

headline: Vemabhizimusi Madiki Vochema neKusafamba kweBhizimusi seZvavanga Vakatarisira paNguva Ino yeZororo reKisimusi
text: Apo kwasara zuva rimwechete kuti vanhu vapinde muzororo reKisimusi, vemamwe mabhizimusi madiki pamwe nevanotengesera mumigwagwa vanoti bhizimusi harina kusimuka gore rino sezvinotarisirwa panguva yezororo rakadai . Mumwe wevari kuchema-chema nekuderera kwebhizimusi ndiMuzvare Patricia Ticharwa vane chitoro chinotengesa mbatya mudhorobha. Muzvare Ticharwa vati sezvo gore rino zvinhu zvanga zvisinganyatsofamba vanga vane tarisiro yekuti kana vanhu vogadzirira Kisimusi zvinhu zvichachinja. Amai Benhilda Konje, avo vane vana vatatu, vanotengeserawo mumusha weGlenview, vatsigirawo vachiti veruzhinji vari kuratidza kuti havana mari uye havasi kutengerwa sezvavange vachitarisira. Amai Jane Sanhuwe, mumwe mutengesi vatiwo kushaikwa kwemari kuchakanganisawo zvirongwa zvavo zvekugadzirira vana pakuvhurwa kwezvikoro. Vanoongorora zvehupfumi, VaMasimba Manyanya, vati kuderera kwebhizimusi panguva ino hakukatyamadzi vachiti vanhu vari kutambira mari shoma dzisingakwani. Vaendererawo mberi vachiti mari haisi kutenderera munyika sezvo zvinhu zvinogadzirwa munyika zviri zvishoma izvo zvoitawo kuti vanokwanisa vanoshandisira mari dzavo kunze kwenyika. Vamwewo ndivo vari kuchengetedza mari dzavainadzo kuitira kuzobhadharira vana zvikoro gore rinouya, sezvo zvikoro zvakawanda zvemunyika zvakatozivisa kare kuti zvichakwidza mari dzechikoro gore rinouya. Gore rino Kisimusi ichange ichicherechedzwa musi weSvondo asi vazhinji vachichemachema nekuoma kwezvinhu munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Amai Marian Chombo Vokonzera Mutauro muZim PF Vachitsigirwa naAmai Mujuru?
text: Paita kusimudzirana mapfumo mubato reZimbabwe People First (ZimPF) mudunhu reMashonaland West apo hutungamiri hwedunhu iri hwakambomisa sachigaro waro, Amai Marian Chombo, pamusangano wavakaita neMugovera vachivapomera mhosva yekutadza kubatanidza nhengo mudunhu uye kutonga nedemo zvisina pfungwa dzevamwe. Komiti iyi, iyo yakagara musangano wayo kuHarare, yakabvumirana kuti vakafanobata chigaro chasachigaro, Amai Chombo, vambomira kutungamira sezvo vatadza kutungamira zvakanaka bato iri mudunhu reMashonaland West. Musangano uyu, uyo wakapindwa nenhengo dzakabva kumatunhu gumi nemapfumbamwe pamatunhu makumi maviri nemaviri ari mudunhu rose, wakasunga chibvumirano chekuti Amai Chombo vambomira kufambisa basa mudunhu uye vasamiririre dunhu kukomiti yenyika. Vachitaura neStudio7, murongi wemisangano mubato iri, Muzvare Abgail Sauti, vati kubvira pakagadzwa Amai Chombo, vanga vachidzinga nhengo dzisingabvumirane navo vachiti vainge vatumwa nemutungamiri webato, Amai Joyce Mujuru. Muzvare Sauti vati bato reZimPF harife rakatonga sezvo vanhu vakawanda vaodzwa moyo nevanhu vasingagone kutungamira. Kusawirirana uku kwaitawo kuti dzimwe nhengo dzibude mubato iri dzichidzokera kuMDC-T inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai. VaTendai Musonza, avo vaive mutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru, vanyorera bato reMDC-T vachikumbira kudzokera kubato iri. VaMusonza vanoti vaneta nemahumbwe ari kuitwa kuZimPF. VaMusonza vanoti nyonga nyonga iri kuitika kuZimPF inoratidza kuti ZimPF chibande cheZanu PF. Studio7 haina kunzwa kuna Amai Chombo pavamire, kanawo kubata Amai Mujuru kuti tinzwe divi ravo, Asi mutauriri webato reZimPF, VaJealous Mawarire, vanoti Amai Chombo ndivo vachiri mutungamiri wedunhu reMashonaland West sezvo vakadzingwa zvisiri pamutemo. VaMawarire vanoti chekutanga ndechekuti musangano uyu wakaitirwa kuHarare asi uri wedunhu reMash West uye vanoti nhengo dzakapinda musangano uyu dzakaburitswa mubato pamwe nevamwe vatungamiriri vakaita saVa Rugare Gumbo, VaDydmus Mutasa, Amai Magret Dongo pamwe nevamwe. No media source currently available

headline: Korera Inonzi Yauraya Vanhu Makumi Maviri neVasere muHarare Chete
text: Vanhu makumi maviri nevasere vanonzi vafa nechirwere chekorera kusvika pari zvino muguta reHarare chete, sekutaura kwevakafanobata chigaro chemukuru anoona nezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare, Doctor Clemence Duri. Ukuwo bazi rezvehutano rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi hwava kudarika zviuru zvina munyika yose. “Tiri kugutsikana nemafambiro ari kuita zvinhu nekuti vanhu vese vari kuisa misoro pamwe chete. Tiri kuedza kubata pamwe chete neshamwari dzedu nesuwo veHarare City Council tiri kuedza kuita zvatinogona,” Dr Duri vaudza Studio7. “Hongu, hatingagoni kuzviita zvese asi unonyatsona kuti vanhu vane chido chekuti chirwere ichi chipedzwe zvachose.” Dr Duri vanoti kunyange hazvo vachigutsikana nebasa riri kuitwa mukurwisana nechirwere ichi, vari kukumbira vanhu nemasangano ekunze kuti vabatsire mukurwisa chirwere ichi. Gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vakati veruzhinji vanofanirwawo kubatsira nemari yekurwisa chirwere ichi. Korera yagara ichinetsa muZimbabwe. Muna 1993 ku muna 2003, korera yakabatwa nevanhu vanodarika zviuru makumo manomwe. Muna 2008 vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvina vakafa nechirwere ichi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti Zimbabwe ndiyo chete nyika yawirwa nedambudziko rekorera rakaipisisa kudarika dzimwe nyika dzemuAfrica. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzoshora Hurumende Iri Kuda Kuomesera Vashandisi veMadandemutande
text: No media source currently available Nyanzvi dzinoti hurumende inogona kuvhara madandemutande kana kushungurudza vanoashandisa sekuvimbisa kwayakaita asi izvi zvinosvibisa chimiro chenyika pamwe nekuti irasikirwe nebhizimisi rakwanda. Nyanzvi munyaya dzekufambiswa kwemashoko nematongerwo enyika dzinoti veruzhinji vanofanira kutora mashoko ehurumende zvakadzama sezvo hurumende ichikwanisa kuita zvairi kutaura. Mudzidzisi wezvekutapwa kwenhau pachikoro cheChristian College of Southern Africa, VaDonald Mukota, vanoti pane dzimwe nyika dzemuAfrica dzakatombovhara madandemutande kana kusunga vanoashandisa, saka zvinogona kuitika muZimbabwe. Asi vanoti izvi handizvo zvingaite kuti vanhu vatadze kushandisa madandemutande. Asi vanotiwo vanhu vanofanira kushandisa madandemutande mune zvakanaka. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute, Doctor Pedzisayi Ruhanya, vanoti hazvibatsiri kuvhara madandemutande uye kana hurumende yaita izvi, inenge yaratidza pachena kuti haidi hutongo hwejekerere. Doctor Ruhanya vanoti zvekuvhara madandemutande zvinoitwa nehurumende dzine hudzvanyiriri uye dzine zvadzinoda kuvanza. Vanoti zvinoda mari yakawanda chose kuvhara madandemutande uye hurumende dzisina mari dzakaita seyeZimbabwe dzinogona kunetsekana kuita izvi. Asi vanoti Zimbabwe inogona kuwana rubatsiro rwekuita izvi kubva kunyika dzakaita seChina. Muzvare Kholiwe Majama Nyoni vanoti zvinosuwisa kuti hurumende yeZimbabwe iri kuronga kuomesera vanhu vanoshandisa madandemutande iyo iri iyo nzira yave kushandiswa neveruzhinji kufambisa mashoko pamwe nekunzwa nhau kubva mukati nekunze kwenyika. Muzvare Majama Nyoni, avo vachangobva kumusangano we Forum on Internet Freedom in Africa wakaitirwa kuSouth Africa svondo rapfuura, vati zvakabuda pamusangano uyu zvinoratidza kuti nyika inorasikirwa nemari yakawanda chose kana madandemutande akavharwa kana kuvhiringwa. Sangano reCollaboration on International ICT Policy for East and South Africa rinoti kuvharwa kwemadandemutande kwakaita kuti nyika dzeSub Saharan Africa dzirasikirwe nemari inodarika mamiriyoni mazana maviri emadhora.

headline: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri Kunze kweNyika Zvoumba Homwe Ichabatsira Musarudzo dza2023
text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri munyika dzakasiyana siyana, zvakaumba sangano, reCitizen Action For Change, iro zvinoti rinotsvaka mari yekubatsira panguva yesarudzo dza2023. Mukuru wesangano iri, VaJuma Ulete, vaudza Studio 7 kuti sangano iri rinoda kuona sarudzo dzakachena, naizvozvo mari yavari kuunganidza ichashandiswa mukubatsira kunyoresa vanhu kuti vavhote uye nekuchengetedzwa kwemavhoti panguva yesarudzo. Citizen Action For Change inoti vanhu vaneta nekubirwa kodzero dzavo nguva dzose panoitwa sarudzo naizvozvo vanoda kuona kuti izvi zvinomiswa, vachiti imwe yemari iyi ichashandiswa kubhadhara vanhu vanochengetedza mavhoti kubva panguva inovhota vanhu kusvika pakuverengwa kwawo. “Isusu hatina bato ratinoshandira. Tiri zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe. Chatinoda ndechekuti pave nejekerere. Chido chedu ndechesarudzo yakachena kuti vana veZimbabwe vagosarudza zvavanoda kuti vaenderere mberi,” vanodaro VaUlete. Vakafanobata chigaro chemurongi wemisangano muZanu-PF, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vakaudza vatori venhau mwedzi wapera kuti bato ravo rakaisa ziso raro pabato reMDC Alliance kuona kuti hariwani mari inobva kunze kwenyika inozoshandiswa musarudzo muZimbabwe. VaUlete vanoti mari yavari kuunganidza ndeyezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinoda kugadzirisa zvunhu munyika yazvo. Mutaurii weMDC Alliance, Muzvare Fadzai Mahere, vaudza Studio 7 kuti nyaya iyi iri kuitwa nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvine kodzero yekuita izvi naizvozvo hapana mutemo unovatadzisa kuenderera mberi nebasa ravari kuita iri. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yotanga Zvakare Kugadzira Mabhazi
text: Sangano rinomirira vemabhazi, reAmalgamated Bus Operators nemakambani eAVM Africa neQuest Motors nhasi vasainirirana chibvumirano chekuti makambani aya agadzire mabhazi muZimbabwe izvo zvinotarisirwa kupedza dambudziko rezvekufambisa rakatarisana neveruzhinji munyika. Vachitaura mushure mekusaina chibvumirano ichi, sachigaro weAmalgamated Bus Operators, VaSamson Nanhanga, vati kugadzira mabhazi muno kuchaita kuti nyika ichengetedze mari yekunze pamwe nekuwanisa zviuru zvevanhu mabasa. VaNanhanga vati mari yavange vachishandisa kutenga mabhazi kunze kwenyika ndiyo yavave kushandisa kugadzira mabhazi muno. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Passenger Transport Orgnaisation, VaFungai Makoni vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kushandisa mari yekunze yakawanda kutenga mabhazi kunze kwenyika asi munyika muine hunyanzvi kwekugadzira mabhazi. VaMakoni vati chirongwa ichi icho chichatanga mwedzi unouuya chinotarisirwa kupinza mabasa vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi maviri nechimwe kana kudarika. Vatiwo vanotarisira kunge vachigadzira mabhazi mazana mashanu pagore vachishandisa mamiriyoni manomwe kusvika kumamiriyoni gumi emadhora eku America pagore. Vatiwo kugadzirwa kwemabhazi muno kuchaita kuti vakwanise kushanda nekambani yehurumende yeZUPCO iyo iri kukoka makambani akazvimirira kushanda nayo pakutakura vanhu mumaguta nekumaruwa. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu, VaMike Madiro, vati hurumende iri kugadzirisa migwagwa yese munyika, vakakurudzira makambani aya kuti agadzirewo mabhazi akasimba zvekufamba kumaruwa. Vanoona nekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano rePassenger Association of Zimbabwe, VaTafadzwa Goliati, vatambira zvaitwa nhasi nemufaro vachiti zvichabatsira veruzhinji zvakanyanya. Munyori anoona nezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu muMDC Alliance, VaSettlement Chikwinya, vati sebato vanokurudzira zvikuru kuti makambani akazvimirira atanga mabasa anoita kuti munyika muve nemabasa. Vanhu vakawanda munyika vakatarisana nedambudziko rekushaya zvekufambisa sezvo ZUPCO isina mabhazi akakwana. ZUPCO inoti inoda mabhazi zviuru zviviri kuti ikwanise kuita basa rayo nemazvo asi pari zvino ine mabhazi mazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nemaviri chete. Makambani munyika akamira kugadzira mabhazi muna 1993 mushure mekunge hurumende yabvumira veruzhinji kupinza makombi matsaru munyika izvo zvakawisirawo ZUPCO pasi. Pari zvino hurumende yakarambidza makombi nemamwe mabhazi kutakura vanhu kunze kwekunge achiita izvi ari pasi peZUPCO. No media source currently available

headline: Bato reNCA Rogutsikana neGadziriro dzeChiwundura By-Election
text: Bato rinopikisa reNational Constitutional Assembly, NCA, rinoti riri kufadzwa nemafambiro ari kuita gadziriro yaro yesarudzo dze by-election dzekutsvaga achamirira dunhu reChiwundura mudare reparamende, idzo dziri kutarisirwa kuitwa nemusi weMugovera 15 Chikunguru. Mutauriri weNCA, VaMadock Chivasa vanoti chiri kunyanya kuvafadza ndechekuti humuna mhirizhonga, sezvinomboitika kune mamwe matunhu anenge achiitwa sarudzo dzerudzi urwu. VaTakudzwa Guzete ndivo vachakwikwidza vakamirira bato reNCA musarudzo idzi. Asi VaChivasa vanoti vari kutsutsumwa nekubvarurwa kwemapepa avo ekutsvagisa rutsigiro nevatsigiri veMDC-T, zvikuru mumisha yemuguta reGweru. Vanoti chinovashamisa ndechekuti mapepa avo avakasungirira kumapurazi akagariswa vanhu patsva, kunove nevatsigiri veZanu PF vakawanda haasi kubviswa. Asi mutauriri weMDC-T, VaObert Gutu varamba mashoko aya vachiti bato ravo harineyi nekubvarurwa kwemapepa uku, sezvo risineyi nesarudzo idzi. VaGutu vati vanhu vanogona kunge vari kubvarura mapepa aya vanogona kunge vari vatsigiri veZanu PF vari kuita izvi vakapfeka nhumbi dzebato ravo. Masangano akazvimirira anosanganisira reZimRights ari kuita zvirongwa zvakasiyanasiyana zvekukurudzira kuitwa kwesarudzo madunhu reChiwundura murunyararo. Mukupera kwesvondo, sangano reZimRights rakaita mitambo yebhora, uye rakakokawo vakuru veboka reZEC kuti vataure pamitambo iyi. Chigaro cheChiwundura chakasara chisina munhu zvichitevera kushaya kwaVaKizito Chivamba vaive veZanu PF. Mamwe mapato ari kupinda musarudzo idzi anoti reZanu PF iro riri kumirirwa naVaBrown Ndlovu, reFree Zimbabwe Congress, nereProgressive Democrats of Zimbabwe, PDZ. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi vepaMugodhi weShamva Gold Mine Voramwa Mabasa
text: Vashandi vepamugodhi weShamva Gold Mine, vanonzi vakatanga kuramwa mabasa nezuro vachinyunyuta nemashandiro avari kuita, uye kusatambiriswa mihoro nyavo kwemwedzi mina yadarika. Vashandi vari kuramwa mabasa ava, avo vari pasi pekambani yezvicherwa ye Metallon, vanoti zvimwe zvavari kuda kuti zvigadziriswe inyaya yekuti pasi pavanoshandira hapana mweya wekufema wakanaka, izvo zvinovaisa munjodzi huru. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata vakuru vemugodhi uyu. Asi munyori wesangano revashandi vemugodhi uyu, VaPatrick Mugwambi vanoti vashandi vakazvipira kudzokera kumabasa avo kana zvichemo zvavo zvakagadziriswa nekukasika.

headline: Warriors muna 2021 . . . • Pamitambo 15 vakakunda 1 • Vasimuka kuenda kuAFCON
text: GORE ra2021 rakaona chikwata chenhabvu chenyika chemaWarriors chichitamba mitambo 15 uye zvakarakidza kuti chadzikira zvikuru sezvo chakangokwanisa kuhwina mutambo mumwe chete.   Gore richitanga, maWarriors airairidzwa naZdravko “Loga” Logarusic uyo akarairidza mitambo 14 kubva paakagadzwa pachigaro chinopisa ichi kusvika azodzingwa basa munaGunyana.   Loga paaitungamira maWarriors, akangokwanisa kuhwina mutambo mumwe chete uye akaita mangange mishanu ndokukundwa misere.   Asi tichitarisa mitambo yakatambwa nemaWarriors gore ra2021, akatamba 15 yemakwikwi anosanganisira African Nations Championship (CHAN), Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON) Qualifiers, Cosafa Cup neyekurwira kuenda kuWorld Cup kuQatar.   Pamitambo iyi, maWarriors akangohwina kamwe chete apo akakunda Botswana 1-0 kunhandare yeFrancistown Stadium kunyika iyi mumutambo weAFCON wekurwira kuenda kuCameroon, ndokuita mangange mitambo mina uye ndokukundwa ka10. Tichitarisa mitambo yakatambwa nemaWarriors, tichitanga neyeCHAN iyo yakatambwa munaNdira, akatamba mitambo mitatu ndokukundwa yese – 1-0 neCameroon, 3-1 neBurkina Faso uye 1-0 neMali.   Mitambo yaitevevera yakatambwa munaKurume yaive miviri yekurwira kuenda kuAFCON iyo yakaona maWarriors achikunda Botswana 1-0 panove ndipo akabva ahwina tikiti rekuenda kumutambo uyu. Mutambo wekupedzisira muboka ravo chikwata chenyika ichi chakakundwa 2-0 neZambia.   MunaChikunguru, maWarriors akaenda kumutambo weCosafa Cup kuSouth Africa uko akanotamba mitambo mina akakwanisa kuita mangange miviri 0-0 neMozambique, 2-2 neMalawi asi ndokukundwa miviri 2-0 neNamibia uye 2-1 neSenegal. Achibva kuCosafa, maWarriors akatamba mitambo mitanhatu yekurwira kuenda ku2022 Qatar World cup apo angokwanisa kuita mangange miviri ndokukundwa mina.   Panguva iyi, ndipo pakadzingwa Loga basa ndokutsiviwa naNorman Mapeza uyo ari kutungamira maWarriors kuAFCON pari zvino.   Pamitamo iyi, maWarriors akaita mangange 0-0 neSouth Africa muno kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium uye 1-1 zvekare munyika muno neEthiopia, ndokuzokundwa mimwe mina inoti 3-1 neGhana kuGhana, 1-0 neGhana muno, 1-0 neEthiopia kuBahir Dar kuEthiopia ne1-0 neBafana Bafana kuFNB Stadium.   Achibvunzwa neKwayedza maonero ake pamusoro pematambiro emaWarriors aya, maneja wechikwata ichi — Wellington Mpandare — anoti haakwanise kutaura zvakawanda pamusoro penyaya iyi uye varairidzi ndivo vanofanirwa kunge vachitaura nezvazvo.   “Ndiro basa revarairidzi iroro, mofanira kuvabvunza kuti vakazvifambisa sei. Asi, tinoziva kuti mitambo mizhinji yakatambwa 2021 akairairidza wacho haasisipo,” anodaro Mpandare.   Chikwata chemaWarriors chakasimuka nemusi weChitatu chakananga kuCameroon uko chiri kunoita gadziriro dzekutanga kwemutambo we2021 Africa Cup of Nations nemusi wa9 Ndira.

headline: Munetsi azunza mambure kuFrance
text: MUTAMBI wemaWarriors, Marshall Munetsi anwisa nhasi manheru apo chikwata chake cheStade de Reims chakunda cheAngers 4-2 mumutambo weFrench Ligue 1.   Mutambo uyu ndiwo wekutanga wahwinwa neReims mwaka uno kubva mumitambo mishanu yayatamba.   Mumutambo uyu, Munetsi ndiye avhurira kunwisa mutambo watambwa maminitsi 23 uye chikwata chake ndicho chatungamira kusvika mutambo wapera.   Kusvika pari zvino chikwata chaMunetsi chatamba mitambo mishanu iyo yaona chikukundwa miviri ndokuita mangange miviri nekuhwina mumwe chete.   Wekutanga chakakundwa 4-1 neMarseille, ndokuzokundwa 4-2 neClermont uye ndokuita mangange 1-1 neStrasbourg neLyon.

headline: ZEC Yopomera Mamwe Mapato neMasangano Akazvimirira Mhosva yeKutaura Manyepo
text: Zimbabwe Electoral Commission inoti zvinoitwa nemamwe mapato nemamwe masangano anoshanda akazvimirira zvekutaura manyepo kuti ZEC inobira sarudzo ndizvo zviri kukonzera kuti vanhu vakawanda vanofanira kuvhota vasanyoresa kuvhota uye kuti vasavhote musarudzo dzinoitwa munyika. Vachitaura nevatori vanhau nhasi, vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru anoona nezvesarudzo muZEC, cha Chief Elections Officer, Amai Jane Pamhidzirayi Chigiji, vati pane manyepo akawanda ari kutaurwa kana kunyorwa pamadandemutande pamusoro peZEC akaita sekuti vanobira sarudzo, uye kuti gwaro revavhoti harina kumira zvakanaka pamwe nekuti vanoshandisa vasori veCentral Intelligence Organisation pabasa ravo. Amai Chigiji vati ZEC inoita basa rayo pachena uye pane hwaro hwekugadzirisa zvichemo. Vati mamwe mapato ezvematongerwo enyika, avasina kudoma, anogarotaura manyepo kuti ZEC inobira sarudzo vachiti izvi ndizvo zvinoita kuti vanhu vasafarire sarudzo munyika. Asi vati chinoshamisa ndechekuti mapato aya anoramba achienda kuZEC kuti nhengo dzawo dzipinde musarudzo, dzingave dzemutungamiriri wenyika, paramende kana makanzuru. Panyaya yekuti ZEC inoshandisa vasori pabasa rayo, Amai Chigiji vati ZEC inobvumidzwa kushandisa vashandi kubva kumapazi akasiyana siyana ehurumende, makambani ayo kana makunzuru pabasa rayo. Amai Chiigiji vatiwo pane mashoko akawanda ari kutaurwa pamusoro pegwaro revavhoti uye vati mapato ari kupinda musarudzo pamwe nevane chekuita nesarudzo idzi vakatopihwa gwaro iri. Vati kana paine zvichemo, pane nzira inoshandiswa kuti zvigadziriswe kwete kuenda kunonyora manyepo pamadandemutande. Asi vakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri webato reCitizens Coalition for Change, Advocate Fadzayi Mahere, vaudza Studio7 kuti haisi mhosva kana vana veZimbabwe vachigunun’una kuti ZEC haisi kuita basa rayo zvakajeka. Vatiwo havafari kuti vasori kana mauto ashande muZEC vachiti izvi ndizvo zvinoita kuti bato ravo ribatwe neseri kweruoko. Vanoongorora nyaya dzematongerwo enyika, vachishanda nesangano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute, VaBekezela Gumbo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kushandisa vasori nemauto kuri kuitwa neZEC kunoratidza kuti ZEC haina kuzvimirira. Mukuru werimwe sangano rinoongorora sarudzo muZimbabwe, reZimbabwe Elections Support Network, VaAndrew Makoni, vaudzi Studio 7 kuti havabvumirane neZEC kuti mapato ezvematongerwo enyika nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira ndiwo anokonzera kuti vanhu vasade kuvhota. ZEC yati zvese zvainoita inoshandisa mutemo weElectoral Act nebumbiro remutemo uye Amai Chigiji vati zvimwe zvavanonzi vaite zvakaita sekuvhotesa vasungwa mumajeri, vanokwanisa kuzviita chete kana mutemo wavandudzwa. No media source currently available

headline: Mitambo yeCastle Premier Soccer League Yopfungaira Hutsi Zvekare
text: Makundano eCastle Lager Premier Soccer League adzoka zvine mutsindo mushure mesvondo rimwe chete rezororo. Nemusu weMugovera masikati nhandare yeRufaro Stadium ichange isingadanwe anonzwa apo pachatambwa mitambo miviri apo Yadah neBlack Rhinos dziri kushandisa nhandare imwechete, zuva rimwe chete, mumitambo yavo yeCastle Lager Premier Soccer League yevhiki remakumi maviri nemaviri. Yadah iyo iri kuti nhasi yabaka moto, mangwana wodzima, ndiyo iri kutanga kupinda munhandare yeRufaro Stadium iyi kusangana neChapungu iyo iri kukwikwira zvishoma nezvishoma muhurongwa hwemakundano aya. Yadah, iyo yaimbotungamira makundano aya yave pazvikwata zvina zvakatarisana nekubuda mumakwikwi aya zvekuti inofanira kukunda kuitira kuti isaverengwe pazvikwata zvaingopinda muPremier Soccer League nekubuda gore rimwe chetero. Mutambo uyu ukapera, uri kuteverwa nemutambo mukuru pakati peBlack Rhinos neChicken Inn iyo iri pachidanho chechipiri mumakundano ezvikwata gumi nezvisere aya. Chipembere chadonha zvinotyisa mumakundano aya zvekuti chikwata cheZimbabwe National Army ichi chave pachidanho chechisere mushure mekumbotungamira makundano aya, kwemasvondo akati wandei. Kunyange hazvo varohwa mitambo mina yakataverana murairidzi weChipembere Stanford Stix Mtizwa anoti iyi yave nhoroondo achiti iye varikuda mapoinzi ese matatu vakatarisana nechinangwa chavo chekuramba vari muPremier Soccer League mwaka unotevera. Asi machikichori muRufaro Stadium haasi kutanga nekugumira pamitambo miviri iyi, sezvo nesvondo maGreen Machine eCaps United achange achiedza kupunzira pasi Ngezi Platinum Stars iyo iri pamusoro petafura yeligi. Mushure mekutora poindi imwechete kubva mumitambo mina vabuda mumakundano eCaf Champions League, Makepekepe irikubhebha moto mushure mekutora mapoinzi manomwe kubva mumitambo yavo mitatu ichangopera kusanganisira wemusi weChitatu uyo yakarova FC Platinum 2-1. Mapoinzi manomwe aya asiya Makepekepe ave pachinhanho chegumi neina mumakundano aya asi vaine mitambo mishanu yavasati vatamba nemhaka yekukwikwidza kwavo muCaf Champions League. Kunyange hazvo vakawanda varikuti maGreen Machine haasisimo mukurwira kutora mukombe weligi uyu, mumwe mutsigiri wechikwata ichi VaTakunda Mupereki vanoti Makepekepe anokwanisa kudzivirira mukombe uyu, uyo vakatora mwaka wapera. Asi sachigaro weNgezi Platinum Stars VaJeremiah Getiseni vanoti vanonokerwa nemutambo neCaps United uyu vachiti ivo maGreen Machine haasi kumira. Mimwe mitambo iriko yakamira seizvi…  Bulawayo City v Harare City Hwange v Bantu Highlanders v Tsholotsho Pirates Shabanie Mine v ZPC Kariba Triangle v Platinum Dynamos neHighlanders hadzina mitambo svondo rino, sezvo zvikwata zviviri izvi zvaifanira kuve zviri kuBotswana kumakundano ezvikwata zvina aifanira kusanganisirawo Taffic Stars neMochudi Centre Chiefs. Makwikwi eSupa Power Cup aya haasi kuzoenderera mberi mushure mekunge vange vakaronga makundano aya vakundikana kuzadzikisa zvange zvichidiwa nezvikwata izvi. Asi zvikwata izvi hazvichaenda kuFrancistown asi vePremier Soccer League vazivisa kuti hapana nguva yekuti mitambo yavo yeCastle Lager Premier Soccer League ienderere mberi. Dynamos yanga ichifanira kusangana neHow Mine, Highlanders ichibandana neTsholotsho Pirates. Zvakamira zvakadai, makundano eEnglish Premier League arikupinda mumitambo yechipiri apo chikwata chirikutungamira makwikwi aya cheManchester United chiri munzira kuenda kuWales kunosangana neSwansea. Vanoziva zvemutambo wenhabvu vanoti Swansea haisi kumira zvekuti varikutarisira zvekare kunaya kwezvibodzwa sezvakaitika svondo rapera apo maRed Devills akabvarura West Ham 4-0. Asi zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka mukamba yeChelsea iyo yatarisana nemutambo mukukutu apo varimuguta ravo reLondon as kuWembley uko varikunobandana neTottenham Hotspur iyo isingaroveke roveke pamusha.  Mimwe mitambo mugungano iri ndeiyi… Liverpool v Crystal Palace Southampton v West Ham Burnemouth v Watford Stoke v Arsenal Burnley v West Brom Huddersfield v Newcastle Manchester City v Everton KuSpain, makundano emwaka uno ari kutanga svondo rino apo chikwata chine mukombe weLa Liga che Real Madrid chir ikutanga chiri kunze kwemusha kuDeportivo La Coruna panguva iyo Barcelona iri Nou Camp neReal Betis. Madrid neBarcelona, zvakasangana pakati pesvondo pamutambo wemukomba apo Barceloma yakadamburwa 2-0.

headline: MDC Alliance Yoita Musangano kuCross Dete
text: Mubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance waita musangano nevatsigiri wawo kuCross Dete, kudunhu reMatabeleland North, uyo pindwawo nevatungamiri vemapato ose ari mumubatanidzwa uyu. Vachamirira MDC Alliance musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika, uye vari mutungamiri weMDC-T, VaNelson Chamisa, vanonzi vaudza musangano uyu kuti neSvondo vachaedza kuita musangano nemumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri webato ravo, Muzvare Thokozani Khupe kuti vaedze kugadzirisa makakatanwa ari pakati pavo. Muzvare Khupe vari kuti ivo ndivo vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri weMDC-T kusvika paitwa kongiresi ichazosarudza mutungamiri. Mumwe wevatungamiri vataurawo pamusangano uyu, VaJacob Ngarivhume veTransform Zimbabwe, vanoti vavimbisa vatsigiri vavo kuti mubatanidzwa wavo ndiyo chete nzira ichabatsira kusimudzira dunhu reMatabeleland North, iro vanoti rakasarira shure nekuda kwehutongi hweZanu PF. “Ndavimbisa vanhu zvinhu zviviri. Chekutanga, ndaudza vanhu kuti Alliance ndiyo nzira yatinayo muZimbabwe sebato rinopikisa kuti tikunde pasarudzo dzinotevera, saka tinofanira kuibatisisa uye tinofanira kuwirirana mumubatanidzwa wedu, uye vatsigiri vedu ngavatitsigire kuti tigone kubatana,” vanodaro VaNgarivhume. “Chechipiri, ndaudza vanhu kuti zvinokosha kuti vanhu vazive kuti VaMnangagwa vangavari umwe wevakakonzera matambudziko atange tinawo kubva muna 1980 vachishanda naVaMugabe.” No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, Muzvare Khupe vanonzi vasanganawo nevatsigiri vavo kuNkayi, kuMatabeleland North kwakare. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuti zvii zvakurukurwa kumusangano wavo uyu sezvo takundikana kuvabata.

headline: Vakoti Vanoramba Kuti Vakatambira Mari Dziri Kupiwa neHurumende
text: Sangano rinomirira vakoti, reZimbabwe Nurses Association, ZINA, raramba mashoko ari kuti nhengo dzaro dzakatambira zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana zvemari dzemihoro zvakaziviswa nehurumende svondo rino richiti harina kumbobvira raita musangano nehurumende wekuzeya nezvemari idzi. Mutungamiri weZINA, VaEnock Dongo, vanoti havana kumbobvira vagara pasi nehurumende vachipirwa nezvemari idzi kana kuzeya nezvadzo, uye havatozivi kuti zvikamu zviri kutaurwa nezvazvo zvinenge zviri zvikamu zvemihoro yavo yakasangana nemari dzekubatsirika here kana kuti kwete. VaDongo varambawo zvakare mashoko ekuti vakoti vakawanda vadzokera kumabasa, vachiti vagara vachienda kumabasa asi vachishanda mazuva maviri pasvondo avakawirirana nemushandirwi sezvo vasina mari dzekufambisa mazuva ose. Vanoti vashandi vari kunzi vadzokera kumabasa kana kuti vari kuonekwa kumabasa kwavo vazhinji vacho vanogona kunge vakadzokera sezvo vakoti vari kutyisidzirwa. Vanoti vakatoenda kumatare vachipikisa nyaya yekumanikidzwa kudzokera kumabasa iyi uye ichapinda mudare neChishanu. Bepanhau reHerald razivisa kuti vakoti vagamuchira zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana zviri kuwedzerwa kuvashandi vose vehurumende kutanga mwedzi uno, kunyange hazvo vari kuti hazvisvitsi mihoro yavo pavanotarisira chaipo. Mamwe masangano evashandi vehurumende anosanganisira evarairidzi akatobuda pachena kare achiramba zvikamu zvakaziviswa nehurumende izvi achiti zvishoma. Vashandi vehurumende vari kuda kuti mihoro yavo idzokere pamadhora mazana mashanu nemakumi maviri emari yekuAmerica, iyo vaitambira muna Gumiguru 2018. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Asi VaDongo vanoti mashoko ekuti vakatambira zvikamu izvi akanangana nekupesanisa vashandi vehurumende. Vanoti mari dzemihoro dzavanotambira chete imari dzinenge dzawiriranwa kumusangano weNational Joint Negotiating Council, NJNC, kwete dzinotaurwa mumapepanhau. Vamiriri vevashandi vehurumende nevamiriri vehurumende vari kutarisirwa kusangana zvakare kumusangano weNational Joint neChishanu uye hurumende yatokoka vashandi kumusangano uyu. No media source currently available

headline: Ndamirira: Manyuchi
text: Ndooka   SHASHA yetsiva, Charles manyuchi, anoti ari kugadzirira kusangana naMuhamad Sebyala wekuUganda munaNyamavhuvhu apo vacharwira bhande reWorld Boxing Federation uye reWorld Africa Boxing Association Supreme Middleweight.   Vaviri ava vaifanirwa kusangana munaChivabvu asi mutambo wavo wakakanzurwa senzira yekurwisa kupararira kweCovid-19.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Manyuchi anoti chikwata chake chakakumbira kuHurumende kuti mutambo uyu uitwe ndokutenderwa saka chasara ndechekuti Sebyala atenderwe nenyika yake kuti auye kuZimbabwe kuzosangana naye.   “Takapihwa mvumo yekuti mutambo wedu uenderere mberi saka tamirira kunzwa kunyika yaSebyala kuti vanomutendera here kuuya kuno, kana akanzi auye anosvika otombotanga agara mu’quarantine’ kwemasvondo maviri ari muno,” anodaro.   Mutambo wevaviri ava ukabudirira unogona kutambwa munhandare isina vatsigiri sezvo mutemo usiri kutendera kuungana kwevanhu pari zvino.   “Zvevatsigiri pari zvino hazvina basa, chinongodiwa chete kuti iye Sebyala auye topedzerana tiri vaviri. Ndiye wandiri kuda uye pakati pedu tinofanira kurakidzana mukuru.   “Ini ndinenge ndiri munyika yangu uye handifanire kushoresa nyika saka ndiri kushanda nesimba kuti ndimubike zvakasimba,” anodaro Manyuchi.

headline: Vanachiremba Voenderera Mberi Vachiramwa Mabasa
text: Kusaenda kubasa kwavanachiremba munyika kwapinda muzuva retatu kunyange hazvo hurumende iri kuti iri kupa vashandi mari yekubatsirikana yavakawirirana inosvika zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana yemari yavo yemuhoro inonzi inosvika mazana matanhatu emadhora emaRTGS. Vanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mubazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri, vanoti hurumende iri kuyedza napose painogona napo kugadzirisa nyaya yemihoro. No media source currently available Asi vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri wesangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Dr Peter Magombeyi, vati kusaenda kwavo kubasa kuri kuenderera mberi. No media source currently available Vanachiremba vanoti vari kuda mari inosvika zviuru gumi nezvisere pamwedzi kana kuti inenge ichifambirana nedhora rekuAmerica pakutengeswa kwaro kumabhanga. Vamwe vanamukoti vari pabasa vataura neStudio7 asi varamba kutaura mazita avo sezvo vasingatenderwe kutaura nevatori venhau vati zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muzvipatara zvehurumende uye varwere vakawanda vasiri kunyanya kurwara vari kudzoserwa kumba. Vati vanachiremba vakuru varipo vave kuremerwa nebasa zvekuti mumazuva mashoma vanenge votoda kubatsirwa nevechiuto.

headline: Tine hasha: dynamos
text: MURAIRIDZI weDynamos FC – Lloyd “Mablanyo” Chigowe — anoti veruzhinji ngavasatarisire chikwata chake pasi vachifunga kuti chapera zvichitevera kusatamba zvakanaka kwachakaita mwaka wapera sezvo gore rino chiri kudzoka zvine mutsindo uye chine huturu hukuru.   Mwaka wa2018, vatsigiri vazhinji vechikwata ichi vanoda kukanganwa nezvawo nekuti aive marwadzo chete kuDeMbare iyo yakapedza gore rose ichirwisa kuti isaburitswe muligi reCastle Premierhip.   Apo zvinhu zvakange zvaita manyama amire nerongo kuDynamos, zvakaona hutungamiri hwechikwata ichi vachidzinga Lloyd Mutasa semurairidzi kaviri achitsiviwa naBiggie Zuze asi haana kusvika kure sezvo naiyewo akadzingwa basa zvakare.   Chigowe ndiye akabva azogadzwa pachigaro chinopisa ichi.   Mwaka wegore rino usati watanga, vamwe vatsigiri venhabvu vange vachitoti gore rino hakuna cheDeMbare asi Chigowe anozviramba achiti vanhu ngavasataure bhora risati ratambwa.   “Chekutanga, vanhu vanofanirwa kuziva kuti gore ra2017 takapedza tiri pechipiri, takatombotungamira kwenguva refu asi zvikazongodhakwa pakupedzisira. Saka ngavasafunge kuti tiri mumatope nekuti 2018 hazvina kuti fambira zvakanaka.   “Pamwe pese apa zvaingoendeka wani, zvozongonzi nekuti mwaka mumwe chete zvatotidhakira?   “Handifunge kudaro,” anodaro Chigowe.   Anoti mwaka uno vari kuda kurwa semvumba vadzokere pachigaro chavo chaicho chemunhabvu muZimbabwe.   “Zvegore radarika zvakatodarika, zvimwe zvikwata ngazvisafunge kuti ticharamba takadaro.   “Tadzoka tashanduka uye tine huturu hukuru,” anodaro.   Kutaura kuno chikwata ichi chiri pakati pekuvaka uye vatambi vakaita saKudzanayi Dhemere, Jimmy Tigere, Tawanda Macheke, Simba Chinani naGodfrey Mukambi vamwe vanotarisirwa kuchisumudzira mwaka uno.   Vamwe vatambi vakaita saEdward Sadomba naArchford Gutu – avo vakambotambira chikwata ichi kare – vanogona kudzoswa kuzochitambira zvakare.

headline: Nyanzvi Dzinoti VaNcube Havana Chavavandudza Pane Zvavatura Pakugadzirisa Hupfumi
text:
Gurukota rinoona nezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube nagavhuna weRBZ VaJohn Mandudya nhasi vatura matanho avanoti akanangana nekudzikamisa hupfumi hwenyika uho huri kunzi nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi hwananga kumawere. Vachitaura nevatori venhau muHarare, Muzvinafundo Ncube vati nyika ichaenderera mberi nekushandisa dhora rayo pamwe nerekuAmerica uye vakatiwo vachabvisa mari yemutero pamafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari. VaNcube vati hurumende yave kuzviisa mumutemo kuti dhora remunyika nerekuAmerica acharamba achishandiswa kwemakore mashanu anotevera. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi VaVictor Bhoroma vanoti VaNcube havana zvitsva zvavaparura kunze kwekusimbardza kuti nyika icharamba ichishandisa dhora rayo nere kuAmerica. Panyaya yekubvisa mutero pamafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari, VaBhoroma vati izvi zvaifanira kunge zvakaitwa kare nekuti sezxvo achidhura kudarika munyika zhinji. Hurumende inotiwo haisi kuzodzika mitengo yezvinhu. Asi VaBhoroma vanoti iri kuhwanda nemunwe sezvo iri kutendera vemabhizimisi kubhadharisa nemutengo wedhora rekuAmerica kumabhanga. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Developmenent Research Institute of Zimbabwe Doctor Prosper Chitambara vatiwo havana kuona zvizhinji zvavandudzwa naVaNcube vachiti kana zviripo zvichatora nguva. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi VaCallisto Jokonya vaudza Studio 7 kuti kuwedzera muripo pakukwereta mari kunogona kuomesera vemabhizimisi zvakanyanya zvinopa kuti vamwe vavhare makambani avo. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi VaMasimba Kuchera vanoti kushandisa mari yekuAmerica munongedzo wekuti hurumende iri kutenda kuti vanhu Havana chivimbo nedhora remunyika. Asi vayambira kuti mitengo haisi kuzodzika. VaNcube vaturawo mamwe matanho avati akanangana nekurerutsira vashandi vehurumende. Asi vamwe vashandi vakatanga kuramwa mabasa svondo rapera vanotiwo hapana chinobatika chataurwa naVaNcube. Mutungamiri werimwe sangano rinomiririra vadzidzisi reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe - PTUZ- VaTakavafira Zhou, vanoti zvataurwa naVaNcube hazvibatsire mushandi zvakanyanya.

VaZhou vakurudzira kushandiswa kwemari yekuAmerica chete kusvika hupfumi hwenyika hwagadzikana.

Munyori mukuru wesangano rinomiririra vashandi vehurumende munyika reZimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Trade Unions, iro raimbonzi Apex Council, VaDavid Dzatsunga, vanoti kana mari dziri mbiri idzi dzikashandiswa pamutemo vashandi vehurumende vanofanirwa kutambiriswa mari mbiri dzose.

Izvi zvatsigirwa nenyanzvi yezvemari VaHope Chinyasa vanoshanda neGaleed Consultancy and Accounting Services vanoti mutemo wekushandisa mari dzakawanda unodzvanyirira vashandi vehurumende.

Hurumende iri kuita chipatapata chekuyedza kugadzirisa hupfumi mushure mekunge dhora remunyika raramba richishaya simba zvakapawo kuti mitengo yezvinhu kana kuti inflation ikwire zvakanyanya zvekuda kuzvika pamazana maviri kubva muzana kana kuti 200%. No media source currently available

headline: Sarudzo dzeAmerica Dzinounza Shanduko Mudare reParamende
text: America yakapinda musarudzo dzepakati petemu yehurumende neChipiri idzo dzakaona bato reDemocratic Party richikunda reRepublican Party zvine mutsindo musarudzo dzedare reparamende repasi kana kuti reHouse of Representatives, asi reRepublican Party richiramba rakabata hutungamiri mudare reseneti. Sarudzo idzi dzakaonawo madzimai akawanda achipinda mudare reparamende, pamwechetewo nezvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika zvave zvizvarwa zveAmerica. Verudzi rwekutanga kugara muAmerica kana kuti ma native Americans pamwe nengochani vakasarudzwawo kekutanga kuve nhengo dzeparamende pamwe nekutora zvimwe zvigaro. Mudzimai wekuSomalia ave chizvarwa cheAmerica, Ilhar Omar naRashida Tlaib vakavewo madzimai ekutanga echitendero chechi Moslem kusarudzwa kupinda muparamende. Zvigaro zvose mazana mana nemakumi matatu nezvishanu zvevamiriri veparamende pamwe nezvigaro makumi matatu nezvipfumbamwe zvenhengo dzeseneti zvakakwikwidzwa, kusanganisirawo zvimwe zvigaro zvehutungamiri hwematunhu pamwe nemagavhuna. Sarudzo idzi dzakaitwa pakati petemu yemutungamiri wenyika vari vebato reRepublican Party, VaDonald Trump, avo vakakunda Amai Hillary Clinton vaimirira bato reDemocratic Party musarudzo dzemuna 2016, idzo dzakave nemutauro mukuru Russia ichipomerwa mhosva yekupindira kuti zvakabuda zvisusukidze VaTrump pachigaro, chipomerwa chiri kurambwa naVaTrump. Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zvave zvizvarwa zveAmerica, kusanganisira Mufundisi Isaac Mwase, avo vari mudunhu reMaryland vari nhengo yebhodhi resangano reAfrican Immigrant Caucus zvakavhotawo musarudzo idzi. Mufundisi Mwase vanoti vakafadzwa zvikuru nezvakabuda musarudzo idzi sezvo zvimwe zvezvirwa zveAmerica zvine midzi yazvo kuAfrica zvakakwikwidza zvakabudirira kuwana zvigaro. "Zvandifadza zvikuru nekuti pakati pevakakwikwidza paivewo nezvizvarwa zvekuAfrica zvakabudirira, zviri kuita kuti tipembere chose." Mufundisi Mwase vanotiwo sangano ravo reAfrican Immigrant Caucus riri kuita zvakawanda mukukurudzira zvizvarwa zvemuAmerica zvakabva kuAfrica kuti zvipinde musarudzo dzinoitwa mumatunhu azvigere, vachiti izvi zvinozobatsirawo Africa sezvo vanhu ava vachizopawo ruzivo rwavanenge vawana kuno kuhama dzavo dzekuAfrica. "Sarudzo dzakaitwa murunyararo pasina kupondana, pasina kurwisana, kurwisana kuri kwemazwi. Chinhu chinofanirwa kudzidzwawo nepasi rose," Mufundisi Mwase vanodaro. No media source currently available

headline: Vakawanda muNyika Votarisira Makwikwi eWorld Cup kuRussia
text: Vatsigiri vemutambo wenhabvu muZimbabwe vanonokerwa nekutanga kwemakundano e 2018 World Cup ayo achaunganidza zvikwata zvine mukurumbira mumutambo uyu pasi rese. Kunyange hazvo chikwata chavo chisiri kuenda kuWorld Cup vateveri venhabvu munyika vanonokerwa nekutanga kwemabiko emakundano enhabvu epasi rese aya, ayo ari kupfungaidza utsi muRussia musi wa 14 Chikumi. Zimbabwe yakadzingwa mumakundano aya mushure mekunge veZifa vatadza kubhadhara, nemazuva aive atarwa neveFifa, murairidzi wekuBrazil, Valinhos, mari yake yemuhoro yemazuva ayo akamborairidza chikwata chenyika chemaWarriors. Asi izvi havina kubvisa manyuku manyuku eWorld Cup muZimbabwe vateveri vemutambo uyu vachiti ivo makundano aya atovanonokera kutanga. Vakawanda kusanganisirira muoongorori wemutambo wenhabvu, VaFarai Kambamura, vanoti kunyange dai Zimbabwe yakakwikwidza mumakwikwi aya hapana kwayaienda sezvo maWarriors aive aisina mongo wekurova zvikwata zvakabudirira kunomiririra Africa. Zvikwata zvichange zvichisimudzira zita reAfrica kumakwikwi aya iEgypt, Morocco, Nigeria, Senegal, ne Tunisia. Vamwewo vakaita saVaOliver Musegede ndivo vanonokerwa neWorld Cup nekuti vaoreswa moyo nenhabvu yemuno yeCastle Lager Premier Soccer League iyo vanoti haichanidza nemhaka yekushaikwa kwevatambi vane tarenda. Vateveri venhabvu ava vanoti nguva yeWorld Cup ichavapawo mukana wekupedza gakava rekuti ari pamberi ndiani Christian Ronaldo kana Lionel Messi avo vanga vachitora mikombe kuzvikwata zvavanotambira kuSpain cheReal Madrid neBarcelona. Muteveri weDynamos, VaByron Munyuki, vanoti World Cup ndiyo icharatidza kuti ari pamberi ndiani Christiano Ronald wePortugal kana Messi weArgentina. Chikwata che Germany ndicho chine mukombe uyu mushure mekurova Argentina mufainari yemakundano akapedzisira kuitwa kuBrazil muna 2014. Asi tichitarisa matambiro anga achiita zvikwata munzira yekuenda kuRussia, zviri kuratidza kuti hazvisi kuzove nyore kuti Germany idzivirire mukombe wayo. Brazil ndiyo iri kunzi nevazhinji ndiyo ingangotora mukombe uyu nematambiro ayaiita munzira yekuenda kuRussia. No media source currently available

headline: Vorwisa Covid neKarate
text: SHASHA yekarate — Sensei Tyson Mujuru — akavamba chikwata chemutambo uyu kwaNyamweda, kuMhondoro nechinangwa chekusimudzira vechidiki avo hupenyu hwavo hwange hwakanganiswa nedenda reCovid-19 pamwe nekuvakurudzira kuti vasiyane nekutora zvinodhaka.   Chikwata ichi chinonzi Mujuru Shukokai Karate Academy chakaumbwa kutanga kwegore rino apo nyika yaive palockdown iyo yakakonzerwa nechirwere cheCovid-19.   “Ini semugari wekuno neruzivo rwangu rwemutambo weKarate, ndakaona vechidiki – kusanganisirawo neni – vakagara kudzimba nekuda kwedenda reCovid-19. Vamwe vakanga vave kutora zvinodhaka zvakaita semutoriro nezvimwe nekuenda kudoro rekachasu nechikokiyana.   Ndakabva ndakumbira kuvakuru vemuno kuti nditange chikwata ichi, zano rangu ndokutambirwa,” anodaro Sensei Mujuru.   Anoti kubva zvaatanga kudzidzisa vechidiki ava, ari kuona shanduko huru muhupenyu hwavo uye anotarisira kuti vamwe vachave shasha dzetsiva mune remangwana.   Kunze kwazvo, Sensei Mujuru anoti ari kuvadzidzisa zvakare kukosha kwekuzvidzivirira kuti vasatapurirwe chirwere cheCovid-19.   “Tiri kutevedza nzira dzose dzekudzivirira denda reCovid-19 dzinosanganisira kupfeka mamasiki, kugeza maoko nemvura inochururuka nesipo, kuita daranganwa nezvimwe zvakawanda izvo tinotevedza,” anodaro.   Sensei Mujuru anoenderera mberi achiti, “Denda reCovid-19 machiremba anoti rinoda kuti vanhu vapote vachisimbisa miviri vachibuda dikita zvinova zvatinoita kuburikidza nemutambo wetsiva uyu.” VaRenious Gomba (63) vemumusha waSabhuku Manhanzva kwakare kuMhondoro vanotenda zvikuru chikwata chekarate ichi vachiti chiri kuwanisa vechidiki zvekuita.   “Vana vave kuwana zvekuita vachinosimbisa miviri uko vanotaurirwa kuipa kwekutora zvinodhaka zvinoita kuti vasawane nguva yekumberereka vachinyengerana zvekuba nekuita mimwe misikanzwa,” vanodaro.   Marshal Muzondo anove mumwe ari muchikwata chekarate ichi anoti vari kubatsirikana zvikuru kuburikidza nekudzidziswa kwavari kuitwa.

headline: yangova ‘go bhora’. . . zvibodzwa 178 zvazunguza mambure
text: SVONDO rino mutambo weCastle Premiership uri kupinda muvhiki re11 apo zvikwata 18 zvose zviri kukwikwidza zvatamba mitambo 10 ndokunwisa ka178.   Kana zvichienzaniswa negore radarika panguva imwe chete apo zvikwata zvese zvainge zvatamba mitambo 10, zvakakwanisa kunwisa ka158. Ngezi Platinum – iyo iri kutungamira palog – yaive yanwisa ka16 mumitambo yayo.   Zvakadai, mwaka uno vatambi vatatu vanoti Simba Nhivi weCAPS UNITED, Lameck Nhamo weTriangle United naDavid Temwanjira weShabanie Mine vakwanisa kunwisa kashanu apo vari kudzingirirana kurwira mubairo weGolden Boot.   Hapasati pazivikanwa kuti pavatatu ava ndiani achazopedza ari pamusoro pevamwe panyaya yekunwisa.   Vamwe vatambi vari kutevera pakunwisa ndiObadiah Tarumwa (Chicken Inn), Ozias Zibande (Highlanders) naTerence Dzvukamanja (Ngezi Platinum) avo vanwisa kana kusvika parizvino.   Ngezi Platinum – iyo iri kutungamira palog – ndiyo iri kutungamirazve pakunwisa sezvo yanwisa ka16 mwaka uno mumitambo yayo. Chikwata ichi chiri pamberi pakubvarura mambure uye changonwiswa kaviri chete.

headline: New England Patriots Yosimudza Mukombe weSuper Bowl muAmerica
text: Nhasi muAmerica matambwa mutambo mukuru weSuper Bowl mumakwikwi eAmerican Football League pakati peLos Angeles Rams neNew England Patriots. New England yakunda LA Rams 13 kwa 3 zvichireva kuti yahwina mukombe uyu kechitanhatu zvisati zvamboitika munhoroondo yemutambo uyu. Mutambo uyu watambirwa kunhandare yeMercedes-Benz kuAtlanta Georgia. Mutambo weSuper Bowl mutambo unenge wakatarisirwa zvikuru muAmerica gore roga roga sezvo NFL iine mukurumbira wakanyanyisa. Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe vari mugari wemuAtlanta Muzvinafundo Davison Saungweme vanoti mutambo uyu waunza mari yakawanda munhararunda mavo sezvo vanhu vabva kumativi mana ose enyika. No media source currently available

headline: Mutengo weMafuta eDzimotokarei Unokwira Zvakare keChipiri Mukati meMazuva Manomwe
text: Boka re Zimbabwe Energy Regulatory Authority, ZERA, razivisa kuti mutengo wemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari wakwira, peturu ichikwira kuenda pamadhora manomwe nemasendi makumi mana nemapfumbamwe parita rogaroga, kuchitiwo dhiziri richikidzwa kuenda pamadhora manomwe nemasendi gumi nemapfumbamwe parita. Svondo rapera mafuta aya akakwidzwa zvakare peturu ichenda pamadhora matanhatu nemasendi gumi, ukuwo dhiziri richienda pamadhora mashanu ane masendi makumi masere nemana parita. Mutauriri wesangano revemabhazi anotakura vanhu, reChitungwiza Commuter Omnibus Operators Association, VaFarai Muza vanoti iri danho raomesera nhengo dzavo zvakanyanya sezvo dzisiri kukwanisa kuwedzera mari dzinobhadharwa nevanhu vanokwira mabhazi avo nekuda kwekuti vanhu vavanotakura havana kuwedzerwawo mihoro yavo. No media source currently available

headline: Tamirira ICC: ZC
text: SANGANO reZimbabwe Cricket (ZC) rinoti riri kuongorora mafambiro ari kuita nyaya yeaimbove kaputeni wemaChevrons — Brendan Taylor — uyo ari kabuda pachena kuti akagamuchira mari yechiokomuhomwe yekutengesa mitambo uye aitora zvinodhaka zvisingatenderwi mumuviri.   Svondo rino, pasi rose rakatyamadzwa kunzwa Taylor, uyo aive nemukurumbira pakutamba cricket, achitaura kuti akatambira mari yekutengesa mitambo yakasiyana uye aitora zvinodhaka zvisingatenderwi mumuviri zvinosanganisira cocaine.   Asi anoti akatsotswa mukuita izvi uye zvimwe zvacho aiita achityisidzirwa.   Muchinyorwa chakabva kuZC, mukushi wemashoko wesangano iri, Darlington Majonga anoti vari kuzviziva kuti sangano reInternational Cricket Council riri kuongorora Taylor uye vakamirira kunzwa kubva kuICC zvavanenge vawana mutsvakurudzo yavo.   “Zimbabwe Cricket yanzwa nezvemashoko ari kunzi akaburitswa neaimbove mutambi wemaChevrons, Brendan Taylor, apo zviri kunzi ari kubvuma kuti akatambira mari yechiokomuhomwe yekutengesa mitambo uye nekushandisa zvinodhaka zvisingatenderwi mumuviri.   “Tinozivisa kuti ICC iri kuongorora Taylor maererano nekutyora mitemo inorambidza nyaya dzehuwori mumutambo wecricket.   “Nekudaro kusvika ICC yaburitsa zvainenge yawana mutsvakurudzo dzayo, ZC haisi kuzotaura zvakawanda pamusoro penyaya iyi,” anodaro Majonga.   Nyaya yaTaylor inotevera imwe yeaimbove kaputeni wemaChevrons zvekare, Heath Streak, uyo gore radarika akatemerwa zvirango zvekuti asawane chekuita nemutambo uyu kwemakore masere neICC zvichitevera tsvakurudzo yakaitwa ndokuonekwa kuti akatambira mari yechiokomuhomwe yekuti atengese mitambo uye haana kumhan’ara paakavingwa nevanhu vachimukurudzira kuti atengese mitambo iyi.

headline: Zimpapers Netball Queens yotarisa kure
text: CHIKWATA chenetball chekambani huru munyaya dzezvenhau munyika muno cheZimpapers Netball Queens chinoti chine shuviro yekusvika kure mumutambo uyu uye chinoda kuti chizopinda muligi reZimbabwe Netball Association Super League.   Kaputeni wechikwata ichi, Veronica Gwaze, anoti vari kurwa semvumba uye vachiri pakati pekuvaka chikwata chavo.   Chikwata ichi chakavambwa nguva pfupi yadarika uye parizvino chiri kukwikwidza muligi reZIMPAR Netball Social umo mune zvikwata gumi zviri kurwira kusimukira kusvika zvapinda muSuper League.   Kubva yavambwa, Zimpapers Netball Queens yakwanisa kutamba mitambo miviri muZIMPAR Netball Social ndokuhwina yose ichikunda NSSA Queens 37-14 uye ndokukwapaidza IPEC 28-0.   “Tichiri kuvaka sechikwata asi tega tichitarisa matambiro atiri kuita zvinorakidza kuti tiri kufamba mugwara chairo.   “Isu sechikwata shuviro yedu kuti tirambe tichisimukira kusvika tasvika kuZimbabwe Netball Association Super League uye tichakusvika chete,” anodaro Gwaze.   Anoti vatambi vazhinji vari muchikwata chavo  vakambotamba netball vachiri kuchikoro kupuraimari uye matambiro avari kuita anorakidza kuti zvichirimo mavari.   “Vatambi vari muchikwata chedu vazhinji vakatamba netball kupuraimari asi zviri kurakidza kuti zvichirimo. Varairidzi vedu vari kushanda nesu zvakasimba kuti titambe netball yepamusoro yave kutambwa mazuva ano,” anodaro Gwaze.   Nemusi weMugovera unotevera, Zimpapers Netball Queens ichange iri pamusha payo paRoosevelt Girls High, muHarare apo ichasangana neHit Queens.   Chikwata cheZimpapers Netball Queens chakaumbwa nevatambi kubva kumapoka akasiyana eZimpapers.    Coach Taps avo vanova ndivo vari kurairidza chikwata ichi vanoti varikufadzwa nematambiro avarikuita sezvo vasina nguva yakareba vachitamba muligi.    Vanoti zvekare remangwana rechikwata ichi rakajeka chaizvo.

headline: Mapato Anopikisa Otambira Kuvandudzwa kweGwaro reVavhoti
