text: Munyori mukuru weMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vanoti bato ravo ranga rava nemakore akawanda richirwira kuti sangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commision, ZEC, rishandise biometric voter registration musarudzo. Mamwe mapato anopikisa anoti ari kufara zvikuru nechirongwa chiri kuda kushandiswa nekomisheni inoona nezvesarudzo muZimbabwe chekuti vanhu vavhote mushure mekunyoresa mugwaro revavhoti rechizvino zvino, kana kuti biometric voter’s registration. Munyori mukuru weMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vanoti bato ravo ranga rava nemakore akawanda richirwira kuti sangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commision, ZEC, rishandise biometric voter registration musarudzo. "Isu seMDC tagara tichingoti tinoda voter registration ye biometric. Zvazvinoreva ndezvekuti vanhu vanosevenzesa zvigunwe zvavo nekuti zviripo ndezvekuti pakusikwa panoitwa munhu naMwari hapana munhu pamaline aya epachigunwe akafanana neeumwe munhu," vanodaro VaMwonzora. No media source currently available VaMwonzora vakurudzira kuti ZEC haifanirwi kungoshandisa nzira iyi pakunyoresa kuvhota asi kuti ienderere mberi nekushandisa hurongwa uhu kunyange pakuvhota vakati izvi zvinogona kubatsira kuti sarudzo muZimbabwe dzisabiririrwe. Vati sebato zvinovafadza nekuti kuchinjwa kwekunyoresa kuvhota kunoreva gwaro revavhoti idzva. "Chatinoda ndechekuti kana munhu achinge aonekwa kuti muvhoti tichisevenzesa chigunwe chake anofanira kubva angovhota achisevenzesa chigunwe ichocho pasina zvekuti yatingati manual yekuti panozotariswa tariswa zvakare pachisevenzeswa maballot papers," VaMwonzora vanowedzera. Mutauriri webato re People's Democratic Party, VaJacob Mafume, vatsigirawo vachiti kushandiswa kwenzira iyimukunyoresa kuvhota ndezvimwe zvingabatsira kuti Zimbabwe iite sarudzo dzisina bopoto. "Nyaya yebiometric voters’ roll inyaya yatabvirirra kutaura. Biometric zvinongoreva kuti picture yako, finger print yako, kana eye print yako kana DNA yako inenge yavapo pa voters’ roll saka ukaenda ipapo unokwanisa kuonekwa kuti ndiwe. Izvi zvinotibetsera kuti tizive kuti nanga nananga vavhota, vanodaro VaMafume. VaMafume vatiwo sangano reZEC harifanirwi kugumira kunyoresa vavhoti vachishandisa pabiometric asi kuita zvimwe zvinoita kuti sarudzo dzisabirirwe. Mukuru wesangano rakazvimirira rinoongorora nyaya dzesarudzo reZimbabwe Election Resource Center, VaTawanda Chimhini, varumbidzawo chirongwa ichi vakati zvinoita kuti veruzhinji rwudzorerwe vimbo munyaya dzesarudzo. Asi vati ichi chingorichikamu chezvimwe zvezvinhu zvinoita kuti sarudzo dzive dzakachena. Sarudzo dzemuZimbabwe dzinogara dzakaita mutauro vamwe vachiti gwaro revavhoti harina kumira zvakanaka, vamwe vachiti riri kushandiswa nehurumende mukubiridzira sarudzo.

headline: Nyamutsika, Mhandu hutu nemukombe
text: wemarathon – Caniscious Nyamutsika naCaroline Mhandu – ndivo vakahwina mujaho weTanganda Half Marathon wemakiromita 21 uyo wakaitirwa kwaMutare svondo radarika.   Nyamutsika akahwina mujaho wevarume mushure meawa rimwe chete nemaminitsi mashanu achisiya dzimwe shangwiti dzaitarisirwa kuhwina mumakwishu aya idzo   dzinosanganisira Misheck Sithole uyo akatora mukombe gore radarika.   Achitaura neKwayedza achangobva kuhwina mujaho uyu,  Nyamutsika anoti, “Ndakagara mudenga rechinomwe, ndave nemakore akawanda ndichiuya kuzokwikwidza mumujaho uyu zvichiramba asi gore rino ndezvanguwo.   “Makore maviri adarika, ndange ndichipedza ndiri pechitatu, asi kuramba ndichishingirira ndichishanda nesimba kwazondibatsira zvikuru gore rino uye ndazohwinawo pekupedzisira.”   Shasha iyi inoti yave kutarisira kuenda kunokwikwidza kumujaho weVic Falls Marathon uye Tanganda Half Marathon yauya panguva yakanaka nekuti inomubatsira kugadzirira kuenda kune mamwe makwikwi.   “Mujaho weTanganda Half Marathon unouya panguva yakanakisa chaizvo nekuti unondipa mukana wekugadzirira kunokwikwidza kune mimwe mijaho nekudaro ndinotenda vatungamiriri veTanganda nekutipa mukana uyu. Ndave kutarisira kunokwikwidza kuVic Falls Marathon svondo rinotevera uye ndinoshuvira kuti ndichanokunda nekuti morari yangu yasimuka zvichitevera kuhwina kwandaita,” anodaro.   Mhandu – uyo akahwina mujaho wemadzimai – anoti kushanda nesimba kwaange achiita gore rese ndiko kwakamubatsira kuti ahwine mujaho uyu.   “Tanganda tinoiziva kuti iriko gore negore uye tinogara takaimirira nekudaro zvinoda kuti munhu ugare wakagadzirira saka ini ndinogara ndakaimirira. Ndine mufaro mukuru nekuti ndini ndahwina goridhe gore rino,” anodaro.   Zvakadai, kune mamwe makwikwi, Elford Moyo ndiye akahwina mujaho wewiricheya kechinonwe kakatevedzana.   Shasha iyi yakarakidza hunyanzvi hwayo gore rino nekuramba ichihwinha kunyangwe zvazvo mugwagwa wakaitirwa mujaho uyu weMvuma usisina kunaka sezvo wakazara nemakomba.   “Zvinofadza kuramba ndichihwina, asi mugwagwa wacho hauchaite wave nemakomba akawanda nekudaro tinokumbira kuti nzira yacho igadziriswe tigomhanye zvakanaka,” anodaro.

headline: Vanachiremba Voramba Nyaya yeHurumende yeKugumura Vashandi Mabasa
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvezvehupfumi dzichiri kuzeya mashoko egurukota rinoona nezvehupfumi VaPatrick Chinamasa ekuti zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi hazvina kumira zvakanaka uye vave kuda kugumura vamwe vashandi nekuwedzera mitero yavanobatirwa nehurumende. Nemusi weChipiri, sangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association rakabatanawo nevamwe vashandi kushora danho iri. Vanachiremba mumashoko avo kuvatori venhau vakati vari kushanda vari vashoma uye vari kushanda kwenguva yakareba. Vanotiwo vari kuda kuwedzerwa mari yavanopihwa kana vadaidzwa kubasa kana kuti on call allowance kubva padhora nemakumi mashanu paawa kusvika pamadhora mazana manomwe nemakumi maviri pamwedzi. Vanachiremba vanoti zvichemo zvavo zvikasagadziriswa uye vakanyimwa bhonasi muna zvita vachazotora matanho akaomarara avasina kutaura. Mukuru weCommunity Working Group on Health VaItai Rusike vanoti zvinhu muzvipatara hazvina kumira zvakanaka uye vati hurumende inofanira kubvisa pabasa vechidiki vebato iri vari mumatunhu ose vari kungopihwa mari dzehurumende vasina zvavari kuita. No media source currently available

headline: Paramende Yozeya Bhiri reNhaurirano Pakati peVashandi neVashandirwi
text: Dare reparamende richiri kuzeya bhiri rekuyedza kudzika mutemo wenhaurirano pakati pevashandi, vashandirwi ne hurumende kana kuti Tripartite Negotiating Forum Bill. Komiti yeparamende inoona nezvemutemo yakatozeya bhiri iri ikati hapana chiri mariri chinganzi chinotyora bumbiro remutemo. Komiti yeparamende inoona nezvevashandi iri kutarisirwawo kuti mumwedzi uno inge ichitaura nevanhu mumatunhu akasiyana siyana nezvavanodawo kuti zvinge zviri mubhiri iri. Gurukota rezvevashandi Doctor Sekai Nzenza vari kutarisirwa kupira bhiri iri kudare musi wa 5 Kurume. Hatina kukwanisa kubata Doctor Nzenza kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Asi munyori mukuru wesangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Union VaJaphet Moyo vanoti hurumende iri kudya manonoko pakut bhiri iri rive mutemo uye vanovimba kuti kana rikapasiswa richabatsira kuunza kuyanana munyika. No media source currently available

headline: ZVICHANGOITIKA . . . Pitso aenda kuSaudi Arabia
text: wenhabvu wekuSouth Africa ane mukurumbira, Pitso Mosimane, aziviswa kuti ndiye ava kuzorairidza chikwata chikuru chekuSaudi Arabia, cheAl Ahli Saudi kutanga izvozvi.

headline: Mukana weAfrica kuWC . . . vamwe vanoti Nigeria, Senegal
text: MUMASVONDO mashoma anotevera, pasi rose richange rakatarira kutanga kwemakwishu makuru enhabvu eFifa World Cup 2018 kuRussia apo zvikwata 32 zvichatatsurana mumutambo uyu. Mutambo uyu uchatanga musi wa14 Chikumi uye maziso ose achange ari pazvikwata zvinoti Germany iyo ine mukombe uyu, Brazil, France, Spain, Belgium neArgentina izvo zviri kutarisirwa kubvuta mukombe uyu kubva kuGermany.   Zvakadai, Africa ichange yakaisa tariro yayo pazvikwata zvishanu zvinoti Nigeria, Egypt, Senegal, Tunisia neMorocco. Pazvikwata zviri kumirira Africa izvi, zvitatu zvacho ndezvekuNorth Africa zvinoti Egypt, Tunisia neMorocco kozoti zviviri ndezvekuWest Africa – Nigeria neSenegal. Southern Africa haina kana chikwata chimwe chiri kuimirira kumakwishu aya. Svondo rino, Kwayedza yakaita hurukuro nevaongorori pamwe navariridzi venhabvu vakasiyana avo vanopa maonero avari kuita zvikwata zvemuAfrica zvichanokwikwidza kuRussia.   Murairidzi weChicken Inn, Joey “Mafero” Antipas, anoti ari kuisa mari yake pachikwata cheSenegal iyo iri muboka rine zvikwata zvinoti Poland, Japan neColombia muGroup H.   Senegal ine gomo guru rekukwira muboka rayo nekuti mune zvikwata zvakasimba asi Antipas anoti ari kufamba nayo sezvo yakasimba zvikuru.   “Senegal yakasimba zvikuru, vatambi vayo vese vazere kuEurope uye vari kutambira zvikwata zvikuru kusanganisira Sadio Mane uyo achangobva kutamba mufainari yeChampions League umo akanwisa achitambira Liverpool. “Chikwata ichi chakasimba kudarika zvakawanda chaizvo,” anodaro Mafero.   Vatambi veSenegal vanotarisirwa kunetsa kumutambo uyu vanosanganisira Mane, Idrissa Gana Gueye weEverton, Keita Balde Diao weMonaco nakaputeni wacho Cheikhou Kouyate weWest Ham United.   Murairidzi weManica Diamond FC yemuDivision One Eastern Region, Luke Masomere, anotiwo nhabvu yashanduka zvikuru uye ari kuona zvikwata zvemuAfrica zvichikonzera nyaka-nyaka kuWorld Cup.   Muchinda uyu anoti Nigeria ichisvika kusemi-fainari yemutambo uyu. “Kare seAfrica taingotarisirwa pasi tichinzi hatina kwatinosvika asi nhabvu yashanduka zvikuru, hakusisina chinonzi chikwata chidiki nekuti zvidiki zvacho ndizvo zviri kutovava kunyanya.   “Ini ndichange ndichimhanya neNigeria uye ndiri kuitsigira zvakanyanya kuti ibate basa kumutambo uyu. Ndichange ndichigara ndakapfeka zveruvara rwegreen nekuti ndinofarira nhabvu yavo zvikuru.   “Kana kutsanya ndichaitsanyira Nigeria nekuti iri pamwoyo pangu,” anodaro Vahombe sezita remadunhurirwa raMasomere. Nigeria kana kuti maSuper Eagles ari muGroup D umo achasangana nezvikwata zvinoti Argentina, Croatia neIceland.   Chikwata ichi chizere zvakare nevatambi vanotambira kuEurope vanosanganisira Alex Iwobi weArsenal, Victor Moses weChelsea, Kelechi Iheanacho weLeicester City, naAhmed Mussa weCSKA Moscow yekuRussia.   Gore radarika, chikwata ichi chakaumburudza Argentina 4-2 iyo yaichasangana nayo kumakwishu eWorld Cup. Mugore ra2014, zvikwata zviviri izvi zvakasangana zvakare muboka rimwe chete kuWorld Cup Brazil apo Argentina yakazohwina 3-2. Partson Ndabambi, uyo aimbove maneja weZPC Kariba uye akarairidza zvikwata zvizhinji zvenhabvu, anoti   Nigeria izere nevatambi vane tarenda vechidiki saka ndiyo yaachange achitsigira kumutambo uyu. “Ini hangu ndichange ndichifamba neGermany ndiyo yangu asi muno muAfrica mari yangu iri paNigeria. Kubva kare, yagara ichienda kumutambo uyu saka gore rino ndinoiona ichiita zvinorova,” anodaro Ndabambi.   Zvakadai, zvimwe zvikwata zviri mumutambo uyu – kunyanya Egypt – ichange yakatariswa nevazhinji nekuda kwemutambi wayo Mohamed Salah weLiverpool uyo akatamba nhabvu yainwisa mvura mumwaka weEnglish Premier League wadarika. MaPharaohs, sezita remadunhurirwa reEgypt, ane vatambi vanotamba zvinodadisa vanosanganisira iye Salah asi hunge akapora bendekete rake iro akakuvara mufainari yeChampions League, Mohamed Elneny weArsenal naAhmed Hegazi weWest Bromwich Albion.   Egypt iri muGroup A umo ichasangana neRussia, Uruguay neSaudi Arabia. Zvimwe zvikwata zviri kumirira Africa, Tunisia iri muGroup G umo ichasangana neBelgium, England nePanama kozoti Morocco iri muGroup A umo ichasangana neIran, Portugal neSpain.   Morocco ine vatambi vakaita saAchraf Hakim weReal Madrid, Medhi Benatia weJuventus naYounes Belhanda weGalatasaray muchikwata chayo.

headline: Gumbo adzingwa basa kuBotswana
text: CHIKWATA cheSua Flamingoes chekuBotswana chadzinga basa murairidzi wacho Rahman Gumbo zvichitevera kusatamba zvinogutsa kwachange chichiita.   Kukundwa kwakaita chikwata ichi 3-2 svondo radarika neEleven Angels, izvo zvakaona chichigara pechi15 palogo chiine zvibodzwa zvitatu chete kubva pa18 zvachaigona kuwana, zvatuma Sua Flamingoes kudzinga basa murairidzi wemuZimbabwe uyu.   Sua Flamingoes, iyo iri kutamba muPremiership mumwaka wayo wechipiri, yakazivisa nezvekudzinga kwayakaita Gumbo nemusi weChipiri.   “Sua Flamingoes FC inozivisa vatsigiri vedu vakatikoshera, vane chekuita nechikwata chedu, vatori venhau nemhuri yese yenhabvu kuti taparadzana nemurairidzi wedu Rahman Allen Gumbo.   “Chikwata chinotora mukana uno kutenda Gumbo nebasa raakaita mukukura kwechikwata chedu izvo zvakamboona chichipedza chiri pechisere mwaka wadarika mumwaka wedu wekutanga muElite league,” chinodaro chikwata ichi muchinyorwa.   Kopane Phakedi ndiye ambofanogadzwa kuti arairidze chikwata ichi.   Zvange zvichimomotera Gumbo uyo chikwata chake chakakundwa mitambo mishanu yachatamba mwaka uno wa2022/23 uye changokwanisa kuhwina mumwe chete apo chakakunda Morupole Wanderers 1-0.

headline: Senator Hlalo Vanodzingwa muMDC-T
text: Bato reMDC-T rinoti radzinga seneta Matson Hlalo mushure mekunetsana kunotyisa kunonzi kuri kuitika mubato iri mudunhu reBulawayo. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato iri kuBulawayo VaFelix Magalela Mafa Sibanda vaudza Studio 7 kuti National Executive Council yebato iri yakadzinga VaHlalo nenyaya yehunhubu. VaSibanda vanoti VaHlalo vakapihwa tsamba yekudzingwa mubato nemusi weChina. VaSibanda vanoti VaHlao vakapihwa mukana wekuuya kuzozvichenura kudare reNational Couuncil asi vakaramba. VaHlalo vanzi vachadzingwawo kuva nhengo yedare resenate. No media source currently available Sezvo Studio 7 ichitema isina divi rainorerekera yabatawo VaHlalo avo vati mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato iri Muzvare thokozane Khupe ndivo vari kutungamira mabasa ekuvadzinga mubato. Vati havasi kuzotambira kudzingwa uku vachiti hakusi kutevera bumbiro remutemo webato. No media source currently available

headline: IMF Inoti Haisi Kuzokweretesa Zimbabwe Imwe Mari Kudzamara Yabhadhara Zvimwe Zvikwereti
text: Bhanga guru rinokweretesa mari nyika dzepasi rino reInternational Monetary Fund kana kuti IMF rinoti harisi kuzokweretesa Zimbabwe mari sezvo iine zvikwereti zvakawanda kunze zvairi kukundikana kubhadhara. Zimbabwe ine chikwereti chinosvika mabhiriyoni gumi emadhora ekuAmerica chairi kutadza kubhadhara kuWorld Bank, African Development Bank, European Investment Bank neParis Club. IMF yakatura mashoko aya kuvatori venhau nemusi weChipiri mushure mekupedza mwedzi ichiongorora mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Izvi zvakaitwa kuburikidza nemadandemutande nenyaya yechirwere cheCovid-19. IMF inoti kuti Zimbabwe, yave nemakore makumi isina kukwereteswa mari nebhanga iri ikwereteswe mari, inofanira kubhadhara zvikwereti kana kutenderana nevayakakwereta kuti yobhadhara sei chikwereti ichi. IMF. Kunyangwe hazvo Zimbabwe yakakanganiswa zvakanyanya nechirwere cheCovid-19 sedzimwe nyika. IMF inoti inotarisira kuti hupfumi huchakwira nezvikamu zvitanhatu kubva muzana gore rino. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaVictor Bhoroma, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe igadzirise zvimwe zviri kukurudzirwa neIMF kuitira kuti isimudzire hupfumi hwenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yokurudzirwa kuNgwarira Mushonga weCovid Kubva kuRussia
text: Bepanhau reHerald rinoti Zimbabwe neRussia dziri kuronga kudyidzana munyaya yekutsvaga mushonga wekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 nezvimwe . Izvi zvinotevera kupihwa nemusi weSvondo, kweZimbabwe zvikwanisiro zvekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere checoronavirus nemishonga neRussia nemumiriri wenyika iyi muZimbabwe VaNikolai Krasilnikov. Vachitambira zvipo izvi, VaMangwiro vakatenda Russia vakati Zimbabwe inoda chose kudyidzana nenyika iyi munyaya dzemishonga. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti Zimbabwe inofanira kungwarira mishonga inobva kuRussia iyo yakazviti yawana nhomba yekurapa Covid-19 inonzi Sputnik-V. Asi nyika dzakawanda dzinosanganisira Germany, France, Spain neAmerica dzinoti nhomba iyi yakangoitwa zvechimbi chimbi pasina kutevedzera zvose zvinodiwa. Bazi reUnited Nations reWorld Health Organization rinotiwo richiri kuda kuongorora mushonga uyu. Russia iri kuti hayo nyika idzi dziri kuita godo. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvehutano VaConstantino Chiwenga kuti tinzwe kuti Zimbabwe yakapihwa mushonga upi sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. Mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu munyaya dzezvehutano reCommunity Working Group on Health VaItai Rusike vanoti Zimbabwe haifanire kungobvuma mishonga kubva kuRussia pasina kunyatsotsvakurudza nezvemishonga yacho. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Aubameyang, Lacazette ka1’
text: anokurudzira murairidzi weArsenal – Unai Emery – kuti ashandise kuwirirana kuri pakati pake naAlexandre Lacazette nedonzvo rekusimudzira matambiro echikwata chavo.   Emery akatanga hupenyu hwake semurairidzi weArsenal nekuzvamburwa mumaoko eManchester City svondo radarika, apo paakasarudza kusatangisa Lacazette.   Chizvarwa chekuFrance ichi chakaunza mufaro mukuru kuArsenal zvichitevera kutengwa kwaakaitwa nemari inosvika 53 miriyoni paunzi mugore ra2017 uye akatanga achipisa kuEmirates.   Zvisinei, matambiro aLacazette akazodzikisirwa nekuuya kwaAubameyang munaNdira uye kutangisa vatambi vaviri ava kwange kuri kunetsa zvikuru kuvatambisa pamwe chete.   Asi chizvarwa chekuGabon ichi – Aubameyang – anoti anofunga kuti vanogona kutamba vese vakanetsa, hunge vasarudzwa naEmery muchikwata chake uye ndokutaura kuti anogona kusuduruka pachinzvimbo chake chaanofarira kutamba kuti Lacazette apinde muchikwata vatambe vese.   “Tinotamba tese zvakanaka uye tinowirirana,” Aubameyang akaudza ESPN. “Pane kamoto kanobaka kana tiri kutamba tese tiri munhandare.   “Tinotsvagana, takazviona nemusi weSvondo apo takatamba neCity paakapinda. Handina basa nazvo kutamba chinzvimbo asi hunge Laca akapinda otamba pachinzvimbo changu. Chatinoda chete kubatsira chikwata chedu chibudirire.” — Sportsmail Football

headline: MDC-T yaMuzvare Khupe Yoronga Kusangana neVatsigiri Vayo muMatunhu emuHarare
text: Bato reMDC-T inotungamirirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe riri kuronga kupinda mumatunhu emuHarare neMugovera richiratidza kuvatsigiri varo mutungamiri webato pamwe nevachakwikwidza musarudzo. Mutauriri webato iri, Muzvare Linda Tsungirirai Masarira vanoti bato ravo ratora nzira yekusangana nevatsigiri vavo iyi sezvo vatya kuti vakaita musangano mukuru waizogona kukanganiswa nevemamwe mapato avasina kudoma nemazita. Muzvare Masarira vanoti nzira yekupinda muvanhu vachisangana nevatsigiri vavo inovapawo mukana wekusangana nevatsigiri padunhu rega rega sezvo sarudzo dzegore rino dzakanangana nenzvimbo dzekuvhotera, kana kuti polling station-based. Vanoti hurongwa hwavo hweMugovera uhwu huchatangira muHarare Gardens, huchizoperera kuChitungwiza. Semamwe mapato anopikisa, vanotiwo sebato havasi kufara nemafambisirwo ari kuitwa gadziriro dzesarudzo neZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, zvikuru panyaya yekunonoka kuwanisa gwaro revavhoti kune mapato ari kukwikwidza musarudzo. "And hatina vimbo kuti ZEC ichakwanisa kutiburitsira and election iri free and fair and credible," Muzvare Masarira vanodaro. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vatatu Vofa, Vana veChikoro Makumi Matatu neVana (34) Vachibatwa neChirwere Ichi
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti nezuro vanhu vatatu vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nezuro zvasiya vafa nacho kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera vave zviuru zvina nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemumwe kana kuti 4, 691. Vanhu makumi matanhatu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi uye pavanhu ava pane vane vechikoro makumi matatu nevana vakabatwa nechirwere ichi. Pavana ava makumi maviri vari kuMatabelaland South, gumi nevana vari kuMasvingo. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga yeCovid 19 vave mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana mana nemasere ane mazana matanhatu negumi kana kuti 3 408 610. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba kaviri sezvinokurudzirwa vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi matanhatu nemapfumbamwe zvine mazana manomwe nemakumi mana nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 2 669 749. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kuti inyatsoshanda,

headline: Voshandisa mitambo kurwisa mhirizhonga
text: SANGANO reZimbabwe Powerlifting Federation (ZPF) rodzidzisa veruzhinji kuipa kwemhirizhonga yemudzimba pamwe nekupa chenjedzo pamusoro pedenda reHIV/AIDS kuburikidza nekuita mitambo yakasiyana.   Svondo radarika, ZPF yakaita mutambo wekusimbisa muviri kuHighfields, muHarare apo vaisendeka mamitsi 15 parutivi pachikamu chega-chega voita hukurukuro neveruzhinji pamusoro pemhirizhonga yemudzimba, kuipa kwekutora zvinodhaka nekupa chenjedzo yedenda reHIV/AIDS.   Sachigaro we ZPF mupurovhinzi yeHarare – Moses ‘Black Moses’ Nyamhotsi – anoti zvakakosha kuti pose panoitwa mitambo yakasiyana pombotorwa nguva yekukurukura neveruzhinji vachipihwa chenjedzo pamusoro penyaya dzemhizhonga, zvinodhaka zvinokanganisa muviri nezvirwere zvakasiyana.   Black Moses anoti nyaya dzemhirizhonga yemudzimba dziri kuwanda mazuva ano nekudaro vakatora danho rekuronga mitambo iyi.   “Mitambo ine simba uye inounganidza vanhu vanobva kunzvimbo dzakasiyana. Saka isu takaona kuti panoungana vanhu tichiita zvemitambo, ngatibve tatora mukana wekukurukura navo nyaya todzidzisana kuti mhirizhonga yakashata zvachose. Tiri kubva tabata dzimwe nyaya dziri kunetsa dzakaita sedzekutorwa kwezvinodhaka uye topa chenjedzo pamusoro pedenda reHIV.   “HIV iriko hama, vanhu ngavangwarire uye vagare vachizvichengetedza nguva dzose,” anodaro.   Black Moses anoenderera achiti: “Danho iri takaritora nechinangwa chekuti vanhu pavanoita mitambo yekusimbisa miviri dzimwe nguva vanenge vakaneta, saka pfungwa dzekutora zvinodhaka hadzimbovabate. Chikuru chavanenge vave kufunga nezvacho kusimbisa muviri chete.”   Zvakadaro, svondo radarika ZPF yakaita mitambo yeNational Powerlifting nePara-Powerlifting Championships.

headline: Amai Mnangagwa Vanoudzwa Kushupika Kuri Kuita Madzimai Akarwira Rusununguko rweNyika
text:
Mamwe madzimai aive varwiri vehondo yerusununguko anoti ave kuomerwa nehupenyu sezvo mari yemudyandigere yaari kupihwa, isingachakwane kuti vawane zvinhu zvinodiwa mukurarama zuva nezuva. Izvi zvabuda pamusangano wavaitwa nemudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Auxillia Mnangagwa muBulawayo. Madzimai aya audza Amai Mnangagwa kuti vanowana mazana maviri emadhora pamwedzi semudyandigere vakati mari iyi hapana zvaichakwana. Amai Elizabeth Sibanda vati murume wavo akasungwa panguva yehondo asi akafa asina chaakawana vakatiwo ivo pachavo vaive chimbwido asi pari zvino vanorarama hupenyu hwehwakumukwaku. Amai Mnangagwa vabvuma kuti zvinhu munyika pari zvino zvakaoma vakatiwo vanoziva kuti shirikadzi dzevarume vakarwa muhondo dzinosangana nematambudziko akawanda kusanganisira kuti vanogona kutorerwa midziyo yavakasiirwa zvichibva nekumatare edzimhosva. Asi Amai Mnangagwa vapa kurudziro yekuti vanhukadzi vatsvage rubatsiro kumapazi ehurumende akaita seWomen’s Affairs uyewo vaite mabasa emaoko vari muzvikwata nezvikwata kuitira kuti vakwanise kuriritira mhuri dzavo. Amai Mnangagwa vakurudzirawo vanhukadzi kuti vafarire kupinda muzvinzvimbo zvehutungamiri muzvikamu zvakasiyana-siyana kusanganisira mune zvematongerwo enyika. Vati madzimai haafanirwe kuodzwa moyo nezvimhingamupinyi zvavanosangana nazvo mukuedza kuita izvi vachiti kuve nemadzimai akawanda muzvinzvimbo zvehutungamiri kunobatsira kusimudzira nyika.

Amai Mnangagwa vapa zvipo zvakasiyana-siyana zvinosanganisira michina yekusona iyo vati ichapiwa kuzvikwata zvemadzimai kuburikidza nehofisi yegurukota redunhu reBulawayo. 

Muzvare Ambukai Mashamba vati vanoona chipo ichi chichigona kushandura hupenyu hwemamwe madzimai. Amai Mnangagwa vatorawo mukana wekukurudzira vanhukadzi kuti vatsigire hurongwa huchaitwa musi wa25 mwedzi uno hwekuratidzira senzira yekushora zvirango zvavati zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru vakuru pamwe nemamwe makambani ehurumende nenyika dzekumadokero. Vati zvirango izvi zviri kukanganisa magariro everuzhinji munyika. Asi vamwe varwiri vekodzero dzevanhu vanoti hazvizi zvirango zviri kuita kuti zvinhu zviite manyama amire nerongo munyika, asi kutadza kutungamira kwebato reZanu PF pamwe nehuori huri mumapazi ose ehurumende.

headline: Nyaya yeKutemerwa Zvirango neBritain kweVanodzivirira Nyika Yokonzera Mutauro
text: Mumavhiki maviri anotevera, sangano reEuropean Union riri kutarisirwa kuti rizeye zvekare nyaya yezvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru vakuru muhurumende. Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaJoe Biden, vari kutarisirwawo mukutanga kwaKurume kuti vazeyewo zvakare kuti vowedzera here kana kuti kwete zvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vatungamiri vari kupomerwa mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Asi semunongedzo wekuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka, hurumende yeBritain yakatemera zvirango gurukota rezvevasori, VaOwen Ncube, mukuru wevasori, VaIsaac Moyo, vaive mutungamiri wemauto ePresidential Guard uye vave mumiriri weZimbabwe kuTanzania, VaAnselem Sanyatwe, pamwe nemukuru wemapurisa, VaGodwin Matanga. Vana ava vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuva nechekuita nekupfurwa kwevanhu gumi nevanomwe vairatidzira kukwira kwemutengo wemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari muna 2019. Asi zvirango zvakatemerwa vakuru ava zvinoshanda here uye zvii zvingaitwe kuti zvibviswe? Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, uye vari mukuru wesangano reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu, vanoti vatungamiri venyika vanofanira kugadzirisa hukama nevanhu vemuZimbabwe kuburikidza nekuremekedza kodzero dzavo. Asi nhengo yeZanu-PF vakambotungamira bato rinopikisa reDARE, VaGilbert Dzikiti, vanoti Britain haina kodzero yekutemera Zimbabwe zvirango nekuti haisi iyo United Nations. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzoshushikana Zvichitevera Kufa kweVanhu Vane Covid-19 Zvisingazivikanwe Kuti Vane Chirwere Ichi
text: Nyanzvi mune zvehutano dzinoti hadzikurudzire kuti vanhu vazivikanwe kuti vanga vaine chirwere cheCOVID-19 mushure mekunge munhu afa sezviri kuitika munyika. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti izvi zvinodziviririka chete kana hurumende ikaongorora vanhu vakawanda kusanganisira vese vanenge varwara. Magwaro anobudiswa nebazi rezvehutano pamusoro pechirwere cheCOVID-19 anoratidza kuti kune vanhu vanozozivikanwa kuti vanga vaine hutachiona hwechirwere ichi ivo vanhu vacho vatoshaya. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano panguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr. Henry Madzorera, vati kufa kwevanhu vasati vazivikanwa kuti vari kunetsekana neyi zvinhu zvinoisa vashandi vezvehutano panjodzi. Mutungamiri wesangano rinomiririra vakoti, reZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnock Dongo, vaudza Studio7 kuti sesangano vanogarokurudzira hurumende kuti iise zvikwanisiro muzvipatara zvayo zvinoita kuti vezvehutano vaongorore munhu wese zvake anotsvaka rubatsiro munyaya yezvehutano zvisinei nekuti anoratidza kuti ane chirwere cheCOVID-19 here kana kwete. VaDongo vanoti sevashandi vezvehutano vanonetsekanawo nevanhu vanozobatwa chirwere ichi ivo vatoshaya. VaDongo vanoti kusavapo kwezvinoshandiswa kuti vana mukoti vazvidzivirire kuri kuisa nhengo dzavo dzakawanda panjodzi. Vatiwo sangano ravo riri kushushikana kuti vakoti vari kubatwa nehutachiona vari pabasa vari kuwanda. Nyanzvi idzi dzinotiwo kuongorora vanhu vakawanda kuti vane chirwere here kana kuti kwete ndiyo chete yekuti hurumende idzivirire kufa kwevanhu vakawanda pamwe nekupararira kwehutachiona hweCoronavirusm uhwo hunokonzera chirwere cheCovid-19. Asi mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, VaJohn Mangwiro, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanhu ava vanenge vaongororwa vachiri vapenyu asi vanofa vasati vaziva zvinenge zvabuda muongororo dzinenge dzaitwa. VaMangwiro vati izvi zvinoitika sezvo nyika isina michina inobudisa ongororo idzi chiripocho. Vachibvunzwa kuti izvi hazviisi here hutano hwevashandi vehutano panjodzi, VaMangwiro vati vashandi ava vari kutora varwere vese vanouya kuzvipatara sevanhu vane COVID-19 kusvika zvinenge zvabuda muongororo zvazivikanwa nekudaro vanenge vakapfeka zvekudzivirira. Kunyange hazvo hurumende ichiti vashandi vanenge vakapfeka zvekuzvidzivirira, vashandi vezvehutano, kusanganisira VaDongo, vanoti izvi hazvisi izvo zviri kuitika muzvipatara zvehurumende sezvo zvikwanisiro zvinodiwa izvi zviri zvishoma zvakanyanya. VaDongo vanoti kushaikwa kwezvikwanisiro imwe yenyaya dziri kupa kuti vashandi vezvehutano varambe kuenda kubasa. Sangano ravana chiremba vakuru reZimbabwe Senior Hospital Doctors Association rakazivisa hurumende svondo rino kuti inofanirwa kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa muzvipatara, kutadza kwayo vanenge voramwa mabasa. No media source currently available

headline: VaTsvangirai naVaNcube Voita Mushandirapamwe
text: Vatungamiri vaviri vakaumba MDC muna 1999, VaMorgan Tsvangairai naVaWelshman Ncube, vanyorerana chibvumirano chekuumba hwaro hwekuita mushandirapamwe. VaTsvangirai naVa Ncube vakapatsanurana muna Gumiguru 2005, mushure mekunetsana panyaya yekuti bato ravo ropinda here kana kuti kwete musarudzo dzeseneti. Chibvumirano ichi chanyoreranwa kumba kwaVaTsvangirai kuHighlands muHarare. VaTsvangirai vakanyorerana zvakare chimwe chibvumirano chakadai neChitatu nevakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri webato reNational People’s Party, Amai Joice Mujuru. Vachitaura pachiitiko chanhasi, VaTsvangirai vatenda kuti kupatsanurana kwavakaita naVaNcube muna 2005 kwakapa kuti mapato anopikisa atadze kubvisa zvine mutsindo Zanu PF pachigaro chekutonga. VaTsvangirai vatiwo vanopikisa vachapinda musarudzo dza 2018 vakabatana kuitira kuti vasunungure vana veZimbabwe pajoki rehuranda hweZanu PF. VaTsvangirai vatiwo kubatana naVaNcube chinhu chaidiwa nasahwira wavo, muchakabvu Gibson Sibanda, uye vari kuzadzikisa chido chemufi ichi. VaTsvangirai naVa Sibanda vakabva vose kuZCTU kuti vanotanga zvematongerwo enyika, izvo zvakaona bato re MDC richiumbwa muna 1999. VaTsvangirai vatiwo kushandirapamwe kwevanopikisa ndiko chete kuchapa kuti Zimbabwe ibude mumadhaka mairi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye kuti kodzero dzevanhu dziremekedzwe. Vatiwo kuti shanduko iuye munyika, vanhu vanofanira kunyoresa kuti vakwanise kuvhota. Mashoko aVaTsvangirai atsigirwa naVaNcube, avo vakava munyori mukuru wekutanga pakaumbwa MDC muna 1999, VaTsvangirai vari mutungamiri webato, VaSibanda vari mutevedzeri waVaTsvangirai. VaNcube vati kupatsanurana kwavakaita muna 2005 hakuna kubatsira nyika sezvo kwakadyara mhodzi yekusabatana muZimbabwe kwemapato anopikisa ayo ane vatsigiri vasiri kugutsikana nehutongi hwehurumende yaVaMugabe. Mushure mekupatsanuka kweMDC, VaNcube vakanokoka VaArthur Mutambara kuti vatungamire chikwata chaVaNcube chakavatevera apo vakasiya VaTsvangirai vachinoumba MDC yavowo. Ukuwo VaTsvangirai vakaenderera mberi vari muMDC iyo yakasara iine vanhu vakawanda kusvika pari zvino. Kunyange hazvo vakawanda vari kufarira kubatana uku, vamwewo vari mumapato aya vari kutumira mashoko padandemutande re Facebook, Titter nepa Whatsapp vachishora kubatana uku vachiti zviri kuitwa nevakuru vavo hakuna kwazvinosvika. No media source currently available

headline: Makanzuru Anoti Vagari Ngavabhadhare Mitero Yakakwira Sezvo Mari yemaRTGS Iri Kushaya Simba
text: Makanzuru akawanda munyika ari kuchema chema kuti mitemo yehurumende pagwara rezvehupfumi iri kungovandudzwa nguva nenguva negurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, uye gavhuna webhanga guru renyika, Doctor John Mangudya, yave kukanganisa mashandiro ayo zvekuti vave kuda kuti mari dziri kubhadharwa nevagari semutero pamwedzi dziwedzerwe. Hurumende yakambotanga yati mari yemaRTGS nedhora rekuAmerica zvakayenzana isati yati huremu hupimwe nemabhanga zuva nezuva. Izvi zvinonzi nemakanzuru akawanda zvavhiringidza mabasa avo sezvo mitengo yabva yawedzerwa zvakanyanya. Asi vagari vanoti havana mari iri kutaurwa kuti vawedzere. Meya weguta reHarar, VaHerbert Gomba, vanoti kanzuru yavo iri kuda kuti vagari vawedzere mari dzemitero nekuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nameya weguta reKweke, Amai Angeline Kasipo, vatendawo kuti kutenga mishonga yekuchenesa mvura nezvimwe zvikwanisiro zvave kuomera kanzuru yavo. Meya weguta reMasvingo, VaCollins Maboke, vanoti zvinhu kukanzuru yavo zvakaita mhidigari zvekuti havachwakwanise kuita mabasa avanotarisirwa nevagari. Mumwe kanzura wekuChitungwiza atiwo kanzuru yaremerwa nemutoro wekutadza kuwana mari. Ko vagari vari kuonawo sei nyaya yekuti mari iwedzerwe? Mukuru weChitungwiza and Manyame Rural Residents' Association, VaMarvelous Khumalo, vanoti zvinhu zvakaomera vagari vazhinji. Mutungamiri weHarare Residents Trust, VaPrecious Shumba, vati havatenderana zvachose nezviri kuda kuitwa nekanzuru yavo kuti vabhadhare mari yakawanda yemitero. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo naVaAnoziva Muguti vanove mukuru weMasvingo Residents and Ratepayers Association. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti zvinhu zvikasagadziriswa mumaguta umu munotanga kupararira zvirwere zvakaita setyphoid nekorera. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti kana hupfumi hwenyika husina kugadziriswa, makanzuru acharambawo achitatarika. Gurukota rezvematunhu, VaJuly Moyo, vaudza Studio7 kuti vange vari mumusangano uye vachapindura mibvunzo yedu panyaya iyi svondo rinouya. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Vatambi vePSL havaoni mambure’
text: SHASHA yakambonetsa mumutambo wenhabvu ichitambira Black Rhinos – Maronga “Bomber” Nyangela – anoti vatambi vekumberi vezvikwata zvakasiyana vanozunza mambure havasi kunyatsobikwa izvo zvaona muPremier Soccer League muchishaya anonwisa kanodarika ka20 mumwaka mumwe chete sezvakapedzisira kuitwa mugore ra2010 naNorman Maroto achitambira Gunners FC.   Bomber, uyo vatsigiri vazhinji venhabvu vanomuziva achizunza mambure zvakamuona achihwina mubairo weGolden Boot kanodarika katatu, anoti nhabvu iri kutambwa muPSL inonwisa mvura asi dambudziko guru nderevatambi vekumberi vanokwanisa kunwisa kakawanda mumwaka mumwe chete.   “Nhabvu iri kutambwa muPSL mwaka uno iri kunakidza uye varairidzi varipo vari kuziva zvavari kuita.   “Asi dambudziko rimwe chete nderevatambi vekumberi, havasi kunyatsozunza mambure. Vatambi vekumberi varipo vakatosiyana nevekare vataiona avo vainyatsozunza mambure zvaiita kuti nhabvu iwedzere kunakidza.   “Kuti chikwata chihwine mukombe wePSL, chinofanirwa kuve nemutambi wekumberi anonyatsozunza mambure sezvaiitwa nevatambi vakaita seni, Moses Chunga, Madinda Ndlovu nevamwe vakasiyana. Izvezvi tinoona Top Goal Scorer achipedza mwaka anwisa ka14 chete, hapana kwatinenge tichienda.   “Paye patinozotumira zvikwata zvedu kunze kwenyika, kana tisina vatambi vekumberi vanogona kunwisa, ndipo patinongosvika tichirohwa,” anodaro.   Nyangela anoti zvakakosha kuti zvikwata zvemuPSL zvishande nevatambi vakaita mukurumbira vabatsire nekupa ruzivo kuvatambi vekumberi kuti vadzidze.   “Vatambi vakaita mukurumbira vakakosha saka zvikwata ngazvivashandise vapote vachivashevedza kuzoshanda nevatambi vachivadzidzisa zvidavado zvekunwisa izvo vaive nemukurumbira nazvo.   “Hatisi kuti toda kuuya mazuva ose, kwete. Tinopota tichiuya pano neapo kuzoshanda navo,” anodaro.   Pari zvino, Nyangela – uyo anogara kuMufakose muguta reHarare – anoti ari kusumudzira vechidiki vane tarenda renhabvu vachigadzira ramangwana ravo mumutambo uyu.   Tsvakurudzo yakaitwa neKwayedza svondo rino, inotaridza kuti mwaka uno parwendo rwekurwira mubairo weGolden Boot – kubva pamitambo 19 yePSL yatambwa – Brian Muza weChicken ndiye ari kutungamira pavatambi vanwisa kakawanda sezvo anwisa ka10.    Brian Muza   Muza anoteverwa naNyasha Tito Chintuli weManica Diamond naWilliam Manondo weCAPS United avo vese vakwanisa kunwisa kapfumbamwe pamumwe nemumwe wavo.   Vamwe vari murwendo rwekurwira mubairo uyu ndiJayden Barake weWhawha naThandolwenkosi Ngwenya weFC Platinum avo vanwisa kasere mumitamo yavatamba.   Clive Augusto, uyo aitambira Chicken Inn, ndiye akapedzisira kuhwinha mubairo weGolden Boot muna2019 apo akanwisa ka14 kubva mumitambo 17 iyo ainge atambira maGamecocks.   Augusto akazoenda kunotambira Maritzburg United yekuSouth Africa mwaka wePSL muno uchiri pakati.

headline: Nhengo dzeParamende Dzinopeta Musangano weKuzeya Bhajeti ra2020
text: Nhengo dzedare reparamende dzapeta neSvondo musangano wekuzeya nezvebhajeti regore rinouya wanga uchiitwa kunzvimbo yekushanyira yeVictoria Falls, uko vanonzi vabuda nezvisungo zvakasiyanasiyana. Mukokeri wenhengo dzeZanu PF muparamende uye vari mumiriri weGutu South, VaPupurai Togarepi vanoti zvikuru zvasungwa pamusangano uyu, zvinosanganisira nyaya yekuti hurumende ipundutse raramo yevanochengetedza nyika vakaita semauto, mapurisa pamwe nemamwe mapoka, kuburikidza nekuvapa mihoro inovagutsa, pekugara, pamwe nezvikwanisiro mumabasa avo kuitira kuti vashande vakasununguka. VaTogarepi vanoti mamwe mapazi akomekedzwa kuti gurukota rezvemari ritarisise kana richinge ropa mari gore rinouya anosanganisira rezvehutano nerekurima. Vanoti vadare vakomekedza kwazvo kuti bazi rezvehutano ripiwe mari yakawanda inoita kuti rikwanise kutenga michina nemishonga zvinodiwa muzvipatara, pamwewo nekuti vashandi vehurumende vabhadharwe mari dzinoita kuti vakwanise kurarama Nhengo dzeparamende dzinosvika mazana matatu nemakumi mashanu pamwe nevemamwe mapoka avanoshanda nawo vanga vachisangana kwemazuva mashanu kuVictoria Falls, uko vamwe vanoti kwaive kutambisa mari iyo nyika ichitatarika.

headline: Vashandi Vanoti Vanoda Kuwedzerwa Mari Sezvo Zvinhu Zvose Zvave Kudhura
text: Mitengo yezvinhu zvakawanda munyika yatanga kukwira zvakanyanya uko vashandi vari kugunun’una kuti havasi kuwedzerwa mari. Mapazi nemakambani akawanda ehurumende akaita seredzidzo, Zimbabwe Energy Authority, Zimbabwe National Road Authority, Zimbabwe Electricity Authority, neZimbabwe Revenue A,uthority, akawedzera mari dzemitero izvo zviri kuitwawo nemakanzuru nevemabhizimisi. Makambani enharembhozha eEconet neNetOne akawedzerawo mari achiti ainge apihwa mvumo nePOTRAZ. Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaJaphet Moyo, vatenda kuti mushandi ari kutsenga mhandire nemavende uye vanodawo kuwedzera mari dzemihoro. Peturu yakawedzerwa kubva padhora nemasendi makumi maviri nematanhatu kusvika padhora nemasendi makumi matatu parita. Mutungamiri weConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers, VaDenford Mutashu, vati vemabhizimisi vave kumanikidzwa kukwidza mitengo nekudhura kwemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaVictor Bhoroma, avo vati kukwira kwemitengo kuchakanganisa zvikuru chido chehurumende chekuti inflation idzike kusvika pazvikamu gumi kubva muzana. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhanga, VaGilbert Muponda, vatiwo kukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu kuri kukonzerwawo nekuti mabhodha haasati anyatsovhurwa zvopa kuti zvishoma zviri kupinda munyika zvidhure. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, vati zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka kuvatengi vachiti zvikoro zvakawedzerwa mari. Asi gurukota rezvemaindasitiri, Dr Sekai Nzenza, vanoti hurumende iri kuyedza kugadzirisa hupfumi kuti hudzikame kuburikidza nezvirongwa zvakaita seNational Development 1 chemakore mashanu. Mutengo wepeturu uri kukwira pasi rose sezvo nyika dzakawanda dzovhura mabhizimisi mushure mekumbovhara nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Vanoongorora mutengo wemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari pasi rose veGlobal Petrol Prices.Com vanoti Zimbabwe iri pakati penyika nhatu dzemuAfrica dzinodhura zvakanyanya mafuta aya izvo zvopawo kuti vemabhizimisi vakwidze mitengo yezvinhu. No media source currently available

headline: Zvitoro Zvovharwa kwaMutare nekuChinhoyi
text: Vanhu vakawanda muChinhoyi vakateerera kurudziro yekuti vasaende kumabasa sezvo zvitoro zvakawanda, mabhangi nezvipatara zvanga zvakavharwa. Kuratidza kuti zvinhu zvanga zvisina kumira zvakanaka vanhu vanoita mabasa emaoko havana kuenda kubasa kana kumisika. Mabhangi akaita seStandard Bank neBancABC anga akavhara ukuwo mabhangi anga akavhura anga asina mari yekupa vanhu. Izvi zvakakonzera kuti vanhu vashoma vanga vauya mudhorobha vakurumidze kudzokera kumba. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, muguta reMutare mange muine runyararo asi muine mapurisa anodzivirira nyonga nyoga akawanda mumigwagwa nemumisika. Mabhazi anotakura vanhu kuenda kunzvimbo dziri kure ange ari mashoma pamusika weHuku. Muzvikoro zvizhinji vadzidzisi vange vachitoonekwa vari panze vachitodziya zvavo mushana, zvigaro zvevana zvakakwidibirwa, vamwe vana vachitamba pazvivanze zvezvikoro zvavo. Chikoro che 3 Brigade chete ndicho change chakavhurwa. No media source currently available

headline: Chirongwa cheTNF Chinoparurwa VaMnangagwa Vachikurudzira Vanhu Kuti Vasaramwe Mabasa
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vaparura neChitatu nhaurirano pakati pehurumende, vashandi nevashandirwi vachikurudzira kuti vashandi vasaratidzire kusafara kwavo nekuoma kuri kuita zvinhu munyika. Vachitaura pakuparurwa kwenhaurirano idzi idzo dzichaitwa pakati pehurumende, vashandi nevashandirwi pasi peTripartite Negotiating Forum kana kuti TNF, VaMnangagwa vakurudzira kuti vashandi vasapinde mumigwagwa vachiratidzira kusafara kwavo nekusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu munyika vachiti kuratidzira uku kunoputsa hukama pakati pehurumende nevashandi. Asi mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vashandi munyika reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, vaudzawo musangano uyu vashandi vachapinda mumigwagwa kana hurumende ikaramba yakaisa zvimiti munzeve panyaya yemari dzemihoro dziri kunzi nevashandi ngadziwedzerwe. Munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vati vaitawo musangano naVaMnangagwa pamberi pekuparurwa kweTNF uku apo pavati vasvitsawo nhuna dzavo sevashandi. VaMoyo vati vashamisika kuti VaMnangagwa havasi kutomboziva kuti mushandi anotambira mari iri pasi ari kuwana marii pamwedzi. Vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru wesangano rinomirira vashandirwi reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe kana kuti Emcoz, VaIsrael Murefu, vaudzawo mutungamiri wenyika kuti vemakambani vari kutadza kubhadhara vashandi kubudikidza nekusagadzikana kwakaita mari yemunyika. Zvichakadai, VaMnangagwa vati nhaurirano pakati pehurumende, vashandi nevashandirwi ndidzo chete dzinokwanisa kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa muhupfumi hwenyika kana mapandiko matatu aya akazvipira kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyika. Vatiwo sehurumende vari kuvandudza mitemo yakawanda kuitira vanoda kuzosima mari munyika vakwanise kuita mabasa avo pasina zvimhingamipinyi. Kuparurwa kwaitwa nhaurirano dzeTNF kwaitwa naVaMnangagwa kunotevera kupasiswa kwakaitwa bhiri remutemo weTNF neparamende. Mutemo uyu unosungira hurumende kuti isangane nevashandi nevemabhizimusi kaviri pagore. No media source currently available

headline: Mabhizimisi Akagarwa Matunduru neCovid19 Anoti Dambudziko reMagetsi Rauya Panguva Yakaipa
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kuyambira kuti Zimbabwe haisi kuzokwanisa kuti hupfumi hwayo hukure nezvikamu zvinodarika zvinomwe kubva muzana nekuda kwekushaikwa kwemagetsi. Zesa yakazivisa kuti inenge yodzima magetsi kwemaawa gumi nemaviri pazuva sezvo magwenya ayo asiri kushanda zvakanaka. Kambani iyi inoti iri kuwana magetsi mashoma kubva kugwenya rinoshandisa marasha reHwange uye iri kugadzirisawo magwenya anoshandisa mvura kuKariba. ZETDC inotiwo magetsi airi kutenga kubva kuMozambique neSouth Africa mashoma pane ari kudiwa. Mushure mekutatarika kwemakore maviri nekuda kwekusanaya zvakanaka kwemvura uye chirwere cheCovid-19, gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Nthuli Ncube vakati vanenge vachitarisira kuti hupfumi hwenyika huchakwira zvakanyanya gore rino. Bhanga guru rinokweretesa mari pasi rose reInternational Monetary Fund rinoti kana zvihu zvose zvakaringana, hupfumi hweZimbabwe huchakwira nezvikamu zvitanhatu kubva muzana. Asi vaimbova gurukota rezvehupfumi vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato reMDC Alliance, VaTendai Biti, vanoti nyaya yemagetsi igangaidzwa kumukwenyi mhezi yavavira mudumbu vati hurumende yakundikana kugadzirisa dambudziko remagetsi kwemakore anodarika makumi mana. Mukuru weZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, VaChris Mugaga, vatendawokuti magetsi anokwanisa kugwadamisa hupfumi hwenyika. Vati vemabhizimisi vachanyanya kuomerwa sezvo vachiri kuyedza kubuda mumadhaka mavari zvakonzerwa nechirwere cheCovid-.19. Vachipawo pfungwa dzavo, pakugadzirisa dambudziko, vaimbova gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto, VaFortune Chasi, vati hurumende inofaira kubuda negwara rakajeka kusanganisirawo kukurudzira vanhu kushandisa simba rezuva uye kugadzira mamwe magwenya. ZETDC inotiwo nzvimbo dzakakosha dzakaita sezvipatara, kunocheneswa mvura yekunwa uye kunzvimbo dzinoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwenyika ndidzo dzichawana magetsi. Hatina kukwanis akubata gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto, VaSoda Zhemu, kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. No media source currently available

headline: Mbappe haasi kuzouya: Guardiola
text: anoramba mashoko ekuti chikwata chake chiri kuda kubhadhara mari inosvika 200 miriyoni paunzi kuti chitenge mutambi weParis Saint-Germain, Kylian Mbappe, muna Ndira wegore rinotevera.   Zvakabuda mumapepanhau kuti City ichada kuendera mutambi uyu wekuFrance, uye PSG ichidawo kutengesa vatambi kuti mabhuku ayo azadzikise zvinodiwa nemitemo yefinancial fair play.   Asi, zviri kunzi Guardiola kuti atenge mutambi uyu, chikwata chake chinofanirwa kutanga chatengesa mumwe mutambi nekuda kwemitemo iyi uye Raheem Sterling ndiye ari kutaurwa kunzi anogona kutengeswa.   Achitaura svondo rino – vasati vasangana neHoffenheim mumutambo weChampions League – Guardiola akaudza vatori venhau kuti hapana apo chikwata chake pachichaendera mutambi uyu uyo akahwina mukombe weWorld Cup.   “Hazvisi kuzoitika,” anodaro.   “Dzimwe dzenguva handinzwisise kuti nyaya idzi dziri kubva kupi chaizvo.” – Sportsmail Football

headline: Sarudzo Dzinotarisirwa Kuitwa Muna Chikumi Kana Chikunguru
text: Sachigaro weZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Amai Priscilla Chigumba, vanoti sarudzo dzichaitwa pakati pa31 Chikumi na 31 Chikunguru. Asi vanoti zuva chairo pamutemo richaziviswa nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. ZEC inoti vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni mashanu nezviuru mazana matatu ndivo vakanyoresa kuvhota musarudzo. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commission Amai Rindai Chipfunde Vava vanoti zviri kutaurwa naAmai Chigumba ndizvo zviri mumbiro remutemo wenyika. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, sangano reHeal Zimbabwe Trust, iro rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu nekusimudzira runyararo, rinoti pamazuva ari pakati pa10 Gumiguri 2017 na8 Kukadzi 2018, sangano ravo rakawana kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu kunoita zviuru zvishanu nemazana manomwe nemanomwe munguva yekunyoresa kwevanhu kuti vagovhota musarudzo dzegore rino. Vanoona nezvemabasa musangano reHeal Zimbabwe Trust, Muzvare Sithabile Dewa, vanoti zvinhu zvakawanda zvine chekuita nesarudzo hazvina kunyatsomira zvakanaka uye Zimbabwe Electoral Commission inofanira kuzvigadzirisa sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. No media source currently available

headline: Musangano weCODEPA Unopera muBulawayo
text: Vamwe vanoita mabasa emaoko vanoti musangano weCoordination Committee for the Development and Promotion of African Handicraft, CODEPA, wabatsira zvikuru mukushambadza zvavanogadzira, mutauriri wedare reparamende, VaJacob Mudenda, vachitiwo zvakakosha kuti nyika dzemuAfrica dzibatane mukusimudzira mabasa azveigadzirwa zvemaoko. Vachivhura zviri pamutemo musangano weCODEPA VaMudena vati pasi rose mabasa emaoko anowanisa dzimwe nyika mari yakawanda zvikuru. VaMudenda vati nyika dzakadai seChina neIndia idzo dzinotungamira mukuwana mari kubva kumabasa emaoko, dzinokwanisa kuita zvigadirwa zvakawanda panguva imwe chete nekuda kwekushandisa hunyanzvi hwechizvino zvino mukugadzira zvinhu izvi. Vati zvakakosha kuti hurumende dzenyika dzemuAfrica dziise misoro pamwe chete kuti dziwane nzira dzekusimudzira mabasa emaoko sezvo achikwanisa kusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika idzi zvakanyanya. Vachitaurawo pamusangano uyu, gurukota rezvemabhizimisi madiki, Amai Sithembiso Nyoni, vati mari inowanikwa nenyika kubva mukutengeswa kwezvigadzirwa zvinogadzirwa nemaoko yakaderera kubva pamamiriyoni makumi mashanu mugore ra2008, kusvika pamamiriyoni gumi nemashanu muna 2015, vakati izvi zvakakonzerwa nezvirango zvavati zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe nenyika dzekumadokero. Chizvarwa chekuSouth Africa, Muzvare Yolanda Msutwana, vanogadzira zvigadzirwa zvakasiyana-siyana kusanganisira zvigaro kubva kumataya emotokari asakara. Muzvare Msutwana vatsinhirawo kukosha kwakaita kuti nyika dzemuAfrica dzibatane muzvinhu zvakadai sekusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika idzi. Kunyange hazvo South Africa isati yave nhengo yeCODEPA, inotarisirwa kuve nhengo yeboka iri munguva pfupi inotevera, uye Amai Lindiwe Zulu vanove gurukota remabhizimisi madiki muSouth Africa vange varipowo pamusangano uyu. Amai Rose Vambe avo vanogadzira mbatya dzinoziikanwa dzichinzi ‘African Attire’ ndemumwe wevanhu vanoita zvigadzirwa zvemaoko vange varipowo pamusangano uyu. Amai Vambe vati musangano uyu wabatsira zvikuru kusimudzira bhizimisi ravo. VaJustice Dzapasi avo vanogadzira zvivezwa zvakasiyana-siyana, vatiwo musangano uyu wavapa mukana wekudzidza kubva kune vamwewo vekunze nevemuno munyika vanoita basa rakafanana neravo. VaEmmanuel Noko vanoshanda nesangano reHand in Hand Zimbabwe iro rinobatsira vanhu, kunyanya madzimai, vanoita mabasa ezvigadzirwa zvemaoko. VaNoko vati musangano weCODEPA, uyo wasvika kumagumo neChishanu, wavabatsira kuti vazive kuti zvigadzirwa zvemaoko zveingatengeswa kupi. Zimbabwe yapiwa husachigaro hwemubatanidzwa uyu uye Amai Nyoni vachiitwa sachigaro kwegore rinotevera. CODEPA ine nyika makumi maviri nenhanhatu dzemuAfrica, chinangwa chiri chekusimudzira mabasa emaoko. No media source currently available

headline: Dzimwe Nyanzvi Dzinoti Mitemo yeCovid-19 Lockdown Ngaibviswe, Chikuru Kubayiwa Nhomba kweVeruzhinji
text: Hurumende yakawedzera nemasvondo maviri mitemo yeCovid-19, kana kuti Level 2 Lockdown. Izvi zvakaziviswa nemusi weChipiri negurukota rezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa. Vachitaura kuvatori venhau, Amai Mutsvangwa vakati mabhawa ane marezenisi ekuita basa rawo anogona kubvumidza vanhu vakabayiwa nhomba dzose kuti vapinde mumabhawa avo, asinvachiti mabhawa anosungirwa kutevedzera mitemo yose yokurwisana neCovid-19. Pasi pemitemo yeLockdown Level 2, vanhu vanorambidzwa kufambafamba pakati pa10 o’clock manheru na 5:30 mangwanani. Mabhizimisi anovhurwa na 8 o’clock mangwanani achisungirwa kuvharwa na 7 o’clock manheru. Amai Mutsvangwa vanoti veruzhinji vanokurudzirwa kutevedzera mitemo yose yekurwisana nedenda reCovid-19. Vachipindura mashoko abva kuhurumende aya, vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vati maLockdown apedza basa rawo asi hurumende inofanirwa kuwedzera zvikuru huwandu hwevanhuu vanobayiwa nhomba zuva rogaroga. Dr Madzorera vati hazvibetseri kuti zuva nezuva hurumende iudze vanhu kuti vanhu vangani vafa neCovid-19, vachiti vanhu vanoda kuziva kuti mishonga iri kushanda sei uye vangani vakaita dambudziko mushure mekubayiwa nhomba. Vanoti hurumende inofanira kuudza vanhu zvinovakurudzira kuti vabaiwe nhomba, vachiti inofanirwavo kutsvaka motikari dzinoenda kwakasiyana siyana, kana kuti ‘mobile clinics’, kunobaya nhomba avo vasingakwanisi kusvika kuzvipatara kana kunzvimbo dzinobaiwa vanhu nhomba Chimwe chataurwa naDr Madzorera ndechekuti hurumende inofanirwa kushanda nevamwe vakazvimirira nekuti haisi kuzopedza chirwere ichi iri yega. No media source currently available Tabatavo mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri, vakati vari kunze kwenyika, vachiti vachataura nesu kana vadzoka munyika.

headline: Amai Mugabe Vokurudzira Murume Wavo Kudzinga Amai Mujuru
text: Mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, vakurudzira murume wavo uye vari mutungamiri wenyika, Va Robert Mugabe, kuti vadzinge basa mutevedzeri wavo, Amai Joice Mujuru, avo vavari kupomera mhosva yekuronga zvekubvisa Va Mugabe pachigaro vachishandisa chisimba. Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita neMuvhuro nevadzidzi vemuzvikori zvepamusoro soro pamwe nevatsigiri ve Zanu PF, Amai Mugabe vakurudzira VaMugabe kuti vadzinge basa Amai Mujuru avo vavave nenguva vachiti vanofanira kusiya basa. Zvichitevera mashoko akabuda mubepanhau re Sunday Mail neSvondo ekuti Amai Mujuru vaironga zvekuuraya VaMugabe, Amai Mugabe vati vane humbowo hwevhidhiyo inoburitsa pachena kuti Amai Mujuru vairongawo kuvauraya ivo pachezvavo. Vati Amai Mujuru vari kupihwa mari nehurumende dzekunze yavari kushandisa muhurongwa hwekuda kubvisa hurumende zvisiri pamutemo Vaenderera mberi vachiti nekuda kweizvi, Amai Mujuru vanofanirwa kusungwa vachipomerwa mhosva yekuda kupidigura hurumende. Vatiwo kubva zvavakagadzwa semutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, hapana chavakaita chinoratidza kuti vaimirira zvido zvemadzimai munyika. Vatiwo vachashanda zvakasimba kuti makurukota ese ehurumende pamwe nevatevedzeri vaVa Mugabe vachasarudzwa pakongiresi ye Zanu PF vanogona kuvadzingisa zvakare kana vasiri kuita zvinhu nemazvo. Tabata Amai Mujuru kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi, asi vakati vari mumusangano vachatifonera kana vapedza zvavari kuita. Asi mashoko avakaburitsa nezuro anoti havana chavanoziva nezvenyaya dziri kutaurwa mazuvano naAmai Mugabe pamwe nevamwe vari muZanu PF avo vari kuvapomera mhosva yehuori, kusagona basa pamwe nekutengesa kune venyika dzekunze. Vanoti vakatosvitsa nyaya iyi kumagweta avo kuti atore matanho pamusana pekusvibiswa kuri kuitwa zita ravo. Zvichakadai, mutungamiri wesangano re Zimbabwe Congress of Students iro rinobuda pachena kuti rinotsigira Zanu PF, Va Leopold Chakanyuka, vaudza vanhu vanga vari pamusangano uyu kuti gurukota rezvedzidzo yepamusoro, Amai Olivia Muchena, pamwe negurukota rinoona nezvevechidiki, Va Francis Nhema, vanofanira kusiya mabasa avo nhasi chaiye vachipomera vaviri ava mhosva yekusakoshesa zvido pamwe nezvirongwa zvevechidiki pamwe nevadziddzi. Zvichakadai, Amai Mugabe vati vanhu vese vari kutsigira Amai Mujuru vachatorerwa matanho akaomarara mu Zanu PF. No media source currently available

headline: Matambudziko eMari Akatarisana neChitungwiza Oramba Kupera?
text: Matambudziko emari akatarisana nekanzuru yeChitungwiza anonzi ari kure nekupera kunyange hazvo kanzuru iyi yakamisa vamwe vashandi mabasa. Vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika mukanzuru iyi vanoti iri kunetsekana zvakare kuti ibhadhare vamwe vashandi vayakamisa mabasa pamwe nevakaenda pamudyandigere mari dzavo nezvimwe. Vaive mutungamiri wesangano revashandi vekanzuru yeChitungwiza, VaEphraim Katsina, avo vakambomiswa basa pari zvino vachipomerwa mhosva yekufurira vamwe vashandi kupinda mukuramwa mabasa, vanoti pane vamwe vashandi vakamiswa mabasa mugore ra2012 vasati vapiwa mari dzavo. VaKatsina vanoti mukutanga kwegore rino kanzuru yakamisa zvakare vamwe vashandi vanodarika zana mabasa asi vasere chete ndivo vati vapiwa dzimwe dzemari dzavo kusvika pari nhasi. VaKatsina vanoti ndivo vari kumirira vashandi vose vari kumiswa mabasa ava munhaurirano dzavari kuita nekanzuru. Meya weChitungwiza, VaPhilip Mutoti, svondo rapera vakazivisa kuti kanzuru yavo ine hurongwa hwekumisa zvakare vamwe vashandi vanoda kusvika kumazana matanhatu mabasa sezvo isiri kukwanisa kuunganidza mari inokwana kuvabhadhara. VaMutoti vakati dambudziko ndere kuti vagari havasi kukwanisa kubhadharawo mitero yavo paine nguva, izvo zviri kuita kuti kanzuru yavo ikundikane kuunganidza mari inoikwanira. Studio 7 yaedza kubata VaMutoti asi nharembozha yavo yanga isingadairwi. No media source currently available

headline: Britain Yorambidza Ndege Dzinobva kuZimbabwe Kuti Dzimhare Munyika Iyi
text: Hurumende yeBritain yazivisa kuti yambomisa kuti ndege dzinobva muZimbabwe nedzimwe nyika shanu dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica kuti dzimhare munyika iyi kusvika nemusi weSvondo zvichitevera kuwanikwa kweimwe mhando yehutachiwana hweCovid 19 kuSouth Africa nekuBotswana. Gurukota rinoona nezvehutano muBritain, VaSajid Javid, vati hurumende yavo yambomisa kumhara kwendege munyika yavo kubva nhasi masikati kusvika nemusi weSvondo dzinenge dzichibva kunyika dzinoti Zimbabwe, Botswana, Lesotho, South Africa, Namibia pamwe neEswathini. Izvi zvinotevera kubatwa kweimwe mhando yeCovid 19, kana kuti new variant, muSouth Africa pamwe nemuBotswana pakutanga kwesvondo rino iyo iri kudaidzwa kuti B.1.1.529. VaJavid vati hurumende yavo yatora danho iri uku ichinyatsoongorora kuti mamwe matanho aingatore ndeapi kuti new variant iyi isapinde munyika. Israel inotiwo icharambidza zvizvarwa zvayo kushanyira nyika nhanhatu idzi kusanganisirawo Mozambique nekuda kwechikonzero chimwechetecho ichiti zvakare icharambidzawo vanhu vari kubva kunyika idzi kuti vapinde muIsrael. Mumwe mukuru muEupean Union Commission, VaUrsulavon der Leyen, vabuditsawo mashoko padandemutande ravo reTwitter vachiti European Union ichatorawo matanho ekudzivirira kupararira kwe new variant iyi munyika dziri mugungano reEU. Vanamazvikokota munyaya dzezvehutano muSouth Africa vanoti new variant yeB.1.1.529 iyi ine hukasha hwakanyanya uye hurumende yeBotswana yaburitsawo mashoko kuvatori venhau ichiti vanhu vana vose vakawanikwa vaine new variant iyi muBotswana, vakanga vakabaiwa nhomba dze Covid 19 kaviri sezvinokurudzirwa. Gurukota rinoona nezvehutano uye vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, avo vanga vachitaura pavavhura zviri pamutemo kongiresi yavari munezvehutano ye Health Profesions Authority, vatiwo hurumende yakavhura ziso rayo kuti new variant iyi isapindewo munyika. Asi vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa uye vari munyori anoona nezvehutano muMDC Alliance, Doctor Henry Madzorera, vati Zimbabwe inofanira kugara yakagadzirira zvakakwana nekuti ma variant aya acharamba achingouya. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti dziri kutyira kuti chirwere cheCovid 19 chinogona kupararira zvakanyanya pachange pachifamba vanhu vakawanda munguva yezororo reKisimusi pamwe negoredzva. Doctor Madzorera vakurudzirawo kuti miganhu yenyika ivharwe sezviri kuitwa nedzimwe nyika ukuwo vanhu vachiongororwa zvakasimba. Mukuru wesangano reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vakurudzira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunyika dzakaita seSouth Africa neBotswana kuti zviregedze kuuya kuzororo reKisimusi negoredzva zvisina kubaiwa nhomba senzira yekuderedza mukana wekupararira chirwere cheCovid 19. VaRusike vanotiwo vanhu vazhinji havachatevedzera nzira dzakatarwa dzekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Asi VaChiwenga vati hurumende iri kuita zvese zvainogona kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisarambe chichipararira uye vakurudzirawo veruzhinji kuti vasamire kubaiwa nhomba dzeCovid 19. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti pane munhu mumwe chete akafa nechirwere cheCovid nezuro zvabva zvasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi muZimbabwe pazviuru zvina nemazana manomwe nevana (4704) kubva pakatanga chirwere ichi. Bazi iri rinotiwo vanhu vakabaiwa nhomba yekutanga nezuro vakasvika zviuru gumi nezvisere nemazana matanhatu nemakumi masere nevanomwe (18687) izvo zvasvitsa huwandu hwevabaiwa nhomba yekutanga munyika yose pamamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi matatu nezvinomwe nemazana mana nemakumi matanhatu nevatatu (3 737 463). Vanhu vakabaiwa nhomba yechipiri nezuro sezvinokurudzirwa vakasvika zviuru zvinomwe nemazana nana nemakumi masere nevatanhatu (7486) izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabaiwa nhomba yepiri munyika yose pamamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi manomwe nezvna zvine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi maviri nevapfumbamwe (2 774 929). Huwandu uhwu hunogona kukwira pachaziviswa zvabuda muongororo dzaitwa nebazi iri muzuva ranhasi. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid 19. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vanodarika Miriyoni Imwe Chete Vobayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19 Kaviri muNyika
text: Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 munyika kechipiri sezviri kukurudzirwa vadarika miriyoni imwe chete kunyangwe poita mutauro panyaya yekuti vanhu vomanikidzwa kubayiwa nhomba here kana kuti kwete. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana masere nemakumi mashanu nechimwe zvine mazana mana nemanomwe kana kuti 1, 851 407 vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 kekutanga. Vamwe miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru zviviri nemazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu kana kuti 1002 261 vabayiwa nhomba kechipiri sezviri kukurudzirwa. Vanhu makumi maviri nemumwe kana kuti 21 vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 neMugovera zvasiya vanhu zviuru zvitatu nemazana masere nemakumi maviri nevatanhatu kana kuti 3, 826. Vanhu mazana mana nemakumi mana nevasere kana kuti 445 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi neMugovera wakare zvasiyawo vabatwa nacho vave zana negumi nemashanu zvine mazana masere nemakumi mapfumbamwe kana kuti 115, 890. Vanhu mazana masere nemakumi mapfumbamwe kana kuti 890 vakabatwa necchirwere ichi zvasiya vapora vave zviuru makumi masere nezvinomwe zvine mazana mana nagumi nevatanhatu kana kuti 87, 416.

headline: MDC Alliance neZanu PF Dzotatsurana paNyaya yeSarudzo neKuvandudzwa kweMitemo
text: Nyika yave kuziva kuti sarudzo dzekutsiva nhengo dzeparamende pamwe nemakanzuru dzakadzingwa kana kushaya, dzema by-election, dzave kuzoitwa muna Kurume wegore rinouya zvichitevera kuziviswa kwakaitwa nezuro nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachitaura vari kumusangano wePolitiburo yebato ravo reZanu PF. Asi VaMnangagwa vakabuda pachena kuti hapanazve kuvandudzwa kuchaitwa mitemo ine chekuita nesarudzo, vachiti mudunhu reSADC rose Zimbabwe yakaisa kare mitemo yose ine chekuita nesarudzo mubumbiro remitemo yenyika. Ukuwo, mamwe mapato anopikisa anosanganisira reMDC Alliance rinotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, anga achiti hurumende yakanga isingade kuita sarudzo dzema by-elections idzi ichihwanda nedenda reCOVID-19. Mutevedzeri wemunyori anoona nezvesarudzo muMDC-Alliance, Muzvare Ellen Shiriyedenga, vanoti sebato vagarawo vachiti mitemo yakawanda inobata sarudzo inofanirwa kuvandudzwa sezvakakurudzirwa nemasangano pamwe nemapoka akaongorora sarudzo dza2018 munyika. Muzvare Shiriyedenga vanotiwo zvakare komisheni inoona nezvesarudzo munyika yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, inofanirwa kunge yakazvimirira pasina kupindira kwehurumende kana bato reZanu PF sezvavanoti zviri kuitika pari zvino. Asi mumwe wevechidiki veZanu PF mudunhu reHarare, VaAlex Gakanje, vanoti zvese zviri kutaurwa nemapato anopikisa kusanganisira MDC Alliance izvi kutungana kwembudzi sezvo zviri kubva kumapato ari kutya kupinda musarudzo nekuziva kuti anokundwa neZanu PF. VaGakanje vanoti hapana asingazive kuti sarudzo dzema by-election dzakamanikidzwa kusendekwa parutivi nekuda kwedenda reCovid-19, vachiti Zimbabwe haifanirwe kumanikidzwa kuita sarudzo ichiisa hupenyu hwevanhu panjodzi sezviri kuonekwa kune dzimwe nyika dzakaita masarudzo, uko denda reCovid-19 rakakwira. No media source currently available

headline: Shumba yeSenegal Ingarume Nhatu dzeEngland Here kuWorld Cup?
text: Chikwata cheSenegal chatarisana nekukunda kana kunyura apo chiri kusangana nemaThree Lions eEngland manheru ano. Chikwata ichi chirikupinda munhandare na9pm manheru mumutambo weRound of 16 chichiziva kuti Africa yese yakamirira kupemberera kurova England. Kukunda mumutambo uyu kunopinza Senegal mumakota fainari emakundano aya uyezve pedyo nekuita chikwata chekutanga muAfrica kusvika muma semi fainari eWorld Cup. Munyori wezvemutambo wenhabvu anogara kuEngland Admire Muhimeke anoti munyika iyi mune manyuku-nyuku anotyisa nezvemutambo uyu. Mutsigiri wenhabvu muZimbabwe VaWisdom Ncube vanotiwo varikuona Senegal ichirohwa nekuti hapana kunyatsowirirana mumatambiro munhandare pavatambi vekumasure nevepakati. Asi veruzhinji muZimbabwe kusanganisira muongorori wemutambo wenhabvu VaProsper Magoka vanoti Senegal icharatidza kuti ndiyo Shumba chaiyo. Mukuru weZimbabwe Friends Club VaTendai Barnes Zhakata vanoti cheSenegal chinokwanisa kubudirira Chimwe chikwata chemuAfrica, Morocco irikupinda munhandare neChipiri kusangana neSpain. Cameroon, Ghana, neTunisia dzakabuditswa munharaunda yekutanga mumakwikwi aya. Mitambo yeRound of 16 kuWorld Cup uku iri kupera neChipiri svondo rinouya. Parizvino France, Argentina neNetherlands ndidzo dzatove mukota fainari. KuEngland vatambi vari kutarisirwa vanosanganisira Harry Kane, Bukayo Saka, Marcus Rashford nevamwe. KuSenegal mutambi wavo mukuru Sadio Mane akakuvara aso kune vamwe vakaita sa Kalidou Koulibaly, Edouard Mendy, Boulaye Dia nevamwe.

headline: Vanhu Vokurudzirwa Kuongororwa Ropa Kuti Vazive Pavamire paNyaya yeHIV/AIDS
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti kunyangwe hazvo Zimbabwe yakatora matanho okuti munhu wese awane rubatsiro rwekuwana mushonga wekurapa chirwere cheshuramatongo cheHIV/Aids kune vanhu vakawandisa vasati vave neruzivo maerarano nezvinhu zvinokonzera kutapuriranwa kwechirwere ichi. Imwe nyanzi munyaya dzehutano Dr Josephat Chiripanyanga vanoti chimwe chezvinhu chinonyanya kukonzera chirwere che HIV, kusangana pabonde pasina kushandisa zvekuzvidzivirira zvakaita semakondomu. Vanotiwo kana munhu akabaiwa netsono yambobaiwa munhu ane hutachiwana hweHIV kana kutemwa nyora nereza yambocheka munhu ane HIV/Aids zvinogona kuti munhu atapurirwe chirwere. Dr Chiripanyanga vanoti chirwere ichi chashungurudza mhuri dzakawanda asi Zimbabwe iri kuyedza kuwanira vanhu mushonga zvapa kuti zvinhu zvive nani. Vaenderera mberi vachitiwo zvinofadza kuti huwandu hwevanhu vari kurwara nechirwere ichi hwadzikira zvikuru kana zvichienzaniswa nezvaiitika mumakore apfuura. VaEmmanuel Gasa vekusangano reAids and Arts Foundation vakatsigira mashoko akataurwa naDr Chiripanyanga vachiti vanhu vazhinji havazive pavamire maererano nezvehutachiwana hweHIV. Muzvare Maria Munzvandi veku Dzivaresekwa vanove mumwe wevakadzi vanorarama nehutachiwana hweHIV vanoti munhu wese, zvikuru vari muwanano vanofanira kuvhenekwa kuti vazive pavamire marerano nezveHIV/Aids. Muzvare Munzvandi vanoti pane zvimwe zvinhu zvisingaburitswe pachena zvinokonzera kutapuriranwa kweHIV zvinova zvinhu zvinofanira kujekesera vanhu zvakanyanyisa. Mutauriri weZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, Dr Fortune Nyasha Nyamande vanoti Zimbabwe yakatarisana nedambudziko rehurwere weHIV/Aids kunyangwe hazvo kwave nemishonga inokwanisa kuwedzera makore ekurarama kwevanhu vanorarama nehutachiwana uhwu. Dr Nyamande vanoti kuramwa mabasa kwavanachiremba kuri kupa kuti hurongwa hwekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi hunetse. Mashoko aya anotsinhirwawo nemumwe anorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanorarama nehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS Muzvare Martha Tholana. Musi wa 1 Zvita ndiro zuva rinoyeuchidzwa vanhu nezvechirwere ichi, hurongwa uhu gore rino hwakairtirwa kuMucheke Stadium, Masvingo. Dingindira regore rino rakanangana nekukurudzira vanhu munharaudza dzavo kuti vataure nezvechirwere ichi kana kuti “Communities make the Difference.” No media source currently available

headline: VaTsvangirai Vanoti VaMugabe Varemerwa neMutoro weKutonga
text: Mutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa reMovement for Democratic Change VaMorgan Tsvangirai vanoti mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakundikana kutonga nekudaro vave kufanira kuchienda pamudyandigere. Vachitaura neStudio 7, VaTsvangirai vati tsika yaVaMugabe yekuti hupfumi hwaenda kumawere nenyaya yezvirango uye vanhu vekuChina vave kunzi vari kuita kuti nyika ishomekerwe nemari kutsvaga kweashaya kutsvaga uta mugate. VaTsvangirai vanotiwo hupfumi hwenyika hunokwanisa kugadziriswa nechimbi chimbi kana hurumende yakazvipira kugadzirisa zvinhu uye kumira nyaya dzekuita zvehuwori. Vanoti muhurumende yemubatanidzwa vakakwanisa kugadzira zvinhu nechimbi chimbi kunyangwe hazvo hupfumi hwainge hwave kumaziva ndadzoka. Bato reMDC riri kuratidzirawo mumaguta ose enyika richiti harisi kufara nenyaya yehuori uye mabond notes ari kuda kuparurwa nebhanga guru renyika reRBZ. Kumwe kuratidzira kuri kwaMutare nemusi wa 25 Chikumi. No media source currently available

headline: Guta reHarare Rotarisira Mibhedha Inodarika Mazana Matanhatu Ichashndiswa neVarwere veCovid-19
text: Hurumende inoti kutanga svondo rinouya dunhu reHarare richange rave nemibhedha mitsva inodarika mazana matanhatu muzvipatara zveveruzhinji, uye mibhedha makumi mana nemiviri ichange iri mibhedha yevaye vanorwara zvakanyanya kana kuti vanenge vaiswa muchikamu cheIntensive Care Unit, (ICU). Izvi zvaziviswa nemutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, Dr John Mangwiro, mushure mekushanyira zvimwe zvipatara zvichange zvichirapa varwere veCovid-19, zvakaita seParirenyatwa, Wilkins neBeatrice Infectious Diseases Hospital. VaMangwiro, avo vange vaine gurukota redunhu reHarare, VaOliver Chidhau, vati vari kufara chose negadziriro iri kuitwa pachipatara cheParirenyatwa icho chichange chave chipatara chikuru chinorapa Covid-19 munyika yose. VaMangwiiro vati pane zvinhu zvishomanana zvakatengwa kuSouth Africa zviri kusvika mukupera kwesvondo uye svondo rinouya, chipatara ichi chinenge chave kutambira varwere veCovid 19. Parirenyatwa ichange iine mibhedha mazana mana nemakumi mashanu uye makumi maviri nemisere inenge iri yeICU. Wilkins, iyo iri kurapa varwere veCovid 19, ine mibhedha makumi matanhatu nemumwe chete, mishanu iri yeICU. Kana ichinge yapera kugadzirwa, Beatrice ichange yave nemibhedha makumi masere, gumi iri yeICU. Dr Mangwiro vati chinofadza ndechekuti kuParirenyatwa neWilkims michina inobatsira varwere kufema kana kumaVentilators, atoveko. PaParirenyatwa vashandi vange vari mushishi rekugadzira mipanda kuchikamu cheCovid-19 uye zvinhu zvizhinji zvatove muWard. Vakuru vepachipatara ichi vati pane zvavakamirira kubva kuSouth Africa zvekuisa mumaTheatres nemaLabaoratories zvekuti svondo rinouuya chipatara ichi chinenge chave kurapa pamwe nekuvheneka hutachiwana hweCoronavirus, Mukuru anoona nezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare, Dr Proper Chonzi, vaudza Studio7 kuti kunyange hazvo chipatara chavo cheWilkins chave kukwanisa kurapa varwere veCovid -19, vachiri kuda zvekushandisa zvakawanda. Pavanhu vese makumi matatu nevanomwe vakakabatwa neCovid 19, makumi mashanu vakarapwa paWilkins, uye pavana vakafa, vaviri vakafira pachipatara ichi. Pari zvino paWilkins pane murwere mumwe weCovid 19 ari pachipatara ichi. Gurukota redunhu reHarare , VaOliver Chidhau, vati vangafara chose kana pakava nemibhedha inodarika chiuru yakamirira varwere beCovid -19 chete mudunhu ravo rese. Kunyange hazvo zvipatara zviri kuhadzirwa kuti zvikwanise kurapa Covid-19, Dr Mangwiro vati kana chirwere ichi chikaparira zvakanyanya, vachashandisa nhandare dzenhabvu nemimwe mitambo, nezvivakwa zvakaita semachechi kurapira varwere veCovid-19. Zimbabwe, senyika dzakawanda pasi rose, yakavharwa senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiona hwe corona virus, uhwo hunokonzera chirwere che Covid-19. Kusvika pari zvino, chirwere ichi, icho chakatanga kuChina gore rapera, chabata vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mana nemazana mana ezviuru, uye chauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezvisere pasi rose. No media source currently available

headline: Huwandu hweVari Kufa neCovid-19 Hwoderara Asi Nyanzvi Dzinoti Haisi Nguva yeKupemberera
text: Apo huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nekufa nechirwere cheCovid-19 huri kuramba huchiderera, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dziri kukurudzira vanhu kuti vasarivare nekuti chirwere ichi chinogona kudzoka zvakare zvine hukasha. Nemusi weChina mukuru anoona nezvezvirwere zvekutapuriranwa mubazi rezvehutano Dr Portia Manangazira, vanoti vanhu vanofanira kuramba vachitevedzera kurudziro iri kupihwa yekuzvidzivirira nekupfeka mamamasiki, kugeza maoko, kusaita magungano nezvimwe. Mukuru musangano reCommunity Working Group on Heath, VaItai Rusike, vatsinhirawo mashoko aya vachiti vanhu vanofanira kuramba vakangwarira kuti vasatapurirwe chirwere. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 3,7million vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zviuru makumi mapfumbamwe nezvitanhatu zvine mazana manomwe nemakumi matatu nevaviri kana kuti 96, 732. Vapora muAfrica vadarika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana maviri kana kuti 3, 2 million. South Africa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Dunhu reSADC ndirozve rine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi vadarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 1,7 million. North Africa ine vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi vadarika miriyoni imwe chete. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 pasi rose hwadarika zana remamiriyoni nemanomwe kana kuti 107 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vanodarika zviuru mazana nemakumi manomwe nechimwe kana kuti 471 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemanomwe kana kuti 27 miillion. Pasi rose, vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 2,3 million. Vapora pasi rose vadarika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu ana kuti 60 million. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzoparura Chirongwa Chekubatsira Vanoshandisa Zvinodhaka Pachena
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzaparura chirongwa chekuongorora pachena zvinodhaka mumiviri memunhu kuyedza kupedza dambudziko ratekeshera munyika rekushandiswa kwezvinodhaka. Chirongwa ichi chinonzi Abused Substances Diagnostics & Manangement Project chichapa vanhu zvikwanisiro kana kuti (test kits) ekuona mhando yezvinodhaka zvinenge zvashandiswa. Vachitaura pachiitiko ichi, vaFanwell Dzoma vanoshanda kubazi rinoona nezvevashandi uye vataura vakamiririra mushandirapamwe wemapazi ehurumende mukuedza kupedza dambudziko rekushandiswa kwezvinodhaka kana kuti Inter-ministerial Taskforce on Drug and Substance Abuse varumbidza zvikuru chirongwa chaparurwa ichi. VaDzoma vati ongororo yakaitwa munyika irikuratidza kuti zvikamu zvinodarika makumi mashanu nechimwe kubva muzana zvevechidiki chirikushandisa zvinodhaka. Vachange vachitungamirira chirongwa ichi, nyanzvi munezvehutano uye vari mukuru weDepartment of Chemical Pathology paUniversity of Zimbabwe School of Medicine, Muzvinafundo Hilda Matarira vati chakanakira chirongwa ichi ndechekuti munhu anozviongorora ega. VaJacob Shamuyarira, avo vakamboshandisawo zvinodhaka vakazovamba sangano rakazvimiririra rinonzi Pamumvuri rinobatsirawo vanoshandisa zvinodhaka varumbidzawo chirongwa ichi. Muzvare Chengeto Nyanzira vanoshanda nekambani yeFaStep inova kambani ichange ichiwanisa zvekuongoreresa zvinodhaka izvi vati vanhu vachazviongorora vachishandisa weti yavo. Pasi pechirongwa ichi pachaitwawo dzidziso yekukurudzira vanhu kuti vasashandise zvinodhaka izvio zvinozokanganisa hupenyu hwavo vamwe vachifa kana kupenga. Masangano akasiyana siyana abatana muchirongwa ichi anosanganisira hurumende, University of Zimbabwe Health Sciences, Zimbabwe College of Pathology, FaStep, Pamumvuri nemamwe. No media source currently available

headline: SADC Inowirirana Kutumira Mauto kuCabo Delgado, kuMozambique
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pamwe nevamwe vatungamiri venyika dzemuSADC vanonzi vawirirana kuti dunhu reSADC ritumire mauto aro kudunhu reCabo Delgado, kuMozambique uko kuri kurwiswa nevanopfurikidza mwero. Musangano wanhasi unonzi watambira kurudziro yeSADC Troika yekuti mauto eSADC Standby Force ashandiswe kubatsira Mozambique kurwisa nevanopfurikidza mwero mudunhu reCabo Delgado. Mumashoko avo mushure memusangano wanhasi, munyori weSADC, Amai Stergomena Lawrence Tax, havana kutaura kuti masoja mangani achange ari muchikwata ichi uye kuti achapinda muMozambique riini. Musangano wanhasi unotevera mumwe wakaitwa neSADC Troika mwedzi wapfuura uyo wakatambira gwaro rakaturwa nechikwata chakatumwa kuCabo Delgado icho chakati mauto eSADC anofanira kupindira mudunhu iri uko vanopfurikidza mwero vari kurwisa hurumende neveruzhinji. Masangano anoshanda akazvimirira anoti vatungamiriri veSADC vanofanira kugadzirisa nyaya iyi kwete kuramba vachingoita misangano isina zvainobatsira vanhu vekuCabo Delgado. Mukuru wesangano reHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vatungamiriri veSADC havafaniri kuramba vakapeta maoko dambudziko richienderera mberi. Izvi zvatsigirwa nemutauriri weCrisin in Zimbabwe Coaltion, VaMarvelous Khumalo, avo vati dambudziko iri rinogona kupararira nedunhu rese kana rikasagadziriswa nekukasika. VaKhumalo vati musangano wanhasi unofanira kubuda nechisungo chinopedza dambudziko iri. Vanoongorora nyaya dzematongerwo enyika vakazvimirira, Dr Wellington Gadzikwa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zviri kuitwa nevatungamiriri veSADC kutora nguva kugadzirisa dambudziko iri zvinoita kuti veruzhinji vaone sekuti vatungamiriri ava havana simba. Vati kuita kwakadai ndiko kunoita kuti vekunze kwedunhu iri nenyika dzemhiri kwemakungwa vapindire. Pari zvino nyika dzakaita seUnited States, France nePortugal dzave kutobatsira Mozambique pahondo yekuCabo Delgado. Imwe nyaya iri kuzeiwa kuMaputo inyaya yekuti nyika dzeSADC dzingasimbaradze sei hukamana hwadzo pamwe nekuti dzingabatsirane sei panguva yematambudziko. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato guru rinopikisa reMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatywayo, vaudza Studio7 kuti SADC inofanira kupindira nechimbi chimbi kana pachinge paita dambudziko seriri kuCabo Delgado. Mahofisi eUnited Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs kana kuti OCHA anoti nhondo yemuCabo Delgado yaita kuti nzvimbo ive imwe yenzvimbo ine vanhu vakawandisa vari kutia misha yavo pasi rese. United Nations inoti kusvika muna Kubvumbi gore rino, vanhu zviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi matutu nezviviri (732 000) vainge vatiza misha yavo nekuda kwehondo uye vari kuyaura nenzara nenhamo. Chisungo chanhasi chinouya mushure memisangano yakawanda yakaitwa nevatungamiriri veSADC kubva pakatanga hondo yekuCabo Delgado muna 2017

headline: Hurumende yoKurudzirwa Kurapa Zvirwere zveGomarara Pachena
text: Veruzhinji vari kuchema-chema kuti dai hurumende yaita kuti chirwere chegomarara chirapwe pasina muripo, uye kuti kuzvipatara zvese kusanganisira zvekumaruwa kuiswe michina inoongorora magomarara akasiyana-siyana. Apo nyika iri pakati pekuchema vaive mutungamiriri webato reMovement for Democratic Change, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, avo vakafawo nechirwere chegomarara, veruzhinji vanoti hurumende ikasakoshesa chirwere ichi sezvakaitwa chirwere cheHIV/ AIDS, vanhu vakawanda vacharasikirwa nehupenyu. Amai Thandaza Mhlanga vaudza Studio 7 kuti shuviro yavo ndeyekuti hurumende ione kuti zvipatara nemakirinika zvarapa chirwere chegomarara pachena sezvo chopedza vanhu vakawanda. Izvi zvatsigirwawo naMuzvare Fortune Moyo avo vawedzerawo vakati pamusoro pekurapwa pachena hurumende inofanirwa kuita dzidziso dzakasimba zvakanyanya kuti veruzhinji vazive nezvechirwere chegomarara. Muzvare Moyo vati zvinosuwisa kuti nguva zhinji vanhu vanobatwa chirwere ichi chakomba. Muzvare Petronella Furusa vakurudzirawo kuti hurumende itsvage mari yakangonangana nekurwisa chirwere chegomarara. Vati kuchengetedza hutano hweveruzhinji hurumende inofanirwa kutora matanho yowona kuti kuzvipatara zvese kusanganisira kumamisha zvawaniswa michina nemishonga inoongorora gomarara kuti veruzhinji vapote vachitariswa. Munguva shoma yapfuura, sachigaro wekomiti inoona nezveutano mudare reparamende, Amai Ruth Labode vakaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakakosha kuti hurumende iite dzidziso nezvechirwere chegomarara sezvakaitwa kuneHIV/AIDS. Amai Labode vakati zvakakosha kuti veruzhinji vazive kuti chirwere chegomarara chikakurumidza kubatwa chinorapika. Cancer Registry inoti huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa negomarara huri kuramba huchikwira.
