Chirwere chegomarara ichi chinoda mari yakawanda kuti munhu arapwe, uye veruzhinji vanoti havaikwanisi kuwana mari dzinodiwa idzi. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vanoda Kusvika Mamiriyoni Zana Vange Vatovhota Musarudzo dzemuAmerica Vakawanda neKutya Covid-19
text: Vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi mapfumbamwe nematanhatu kana kuti 96 million vakatovhota kare musarudzo dzemuAmerica sezvo matunhu akawanda achibvumidza kuti vanhu vavhote vachiita zvekutumira vhoti yavo kana kuti mail in ballot kuitira kurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 uye kune vamwe vakaita semauto vanenge vari kunze kenyika. Vamwe vanokwanisawo kukurumidza kunovhota zuva rakatarwa risati rasvika. Musi wa 3 Mbudzi kana kwapera makore mana ndiwo zuva rekuvhota riri pamutemo. Mumwe wevakatovhota kare musarudzo idzi chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri muMaryland VaTaka Kapikinyu vanoti mushure mekuvhota vakaziviswa kuti vhoti yavo yainge yatambirwa yangomirirwa kuitwa. No media source currently available Vari kwikwidzana gore rino mutungamiri wenyika VaDonald Trump vebato remaRepublicans uye VaJoe Biden vebato remaDemocrats. Kunze kwekuti ndiyani achange otungamira nyika yeAmerica, pane dzimwe sarudzo dzakakosha zvikuru mumatongerwo enyika dzinova dzedare reSenate. Parizvino bato remaRepublicans ndiro rine nhengo dzakawanda dzinosvika makumi mashanu nematatu kana kuti 53. MaDemocrats ane nhengo makumi mana nenomwe kana kuti 47. Rwendo rwuno matunhu makumi matatu nemashanu ndiwo ari kuita sarudzo dzesenate sezvo dzisingaitwe panguva imwechete. Asi kana mapato maviri aya akakwanisa ose kuwana zvigaro makumi mashanu kana kuti 50-50 zvinoreva kuti mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika ndiye anenge aine vhoti yakakosha nekudaro ndokusaka paine makwikwi akasimba pakati paVaTrump naVaBiden. Rimwe dunhu rakakosha musarudzo idzi ndereNorth Carolina. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri mudunhu iri VaEsau Mavindidze vanova zvekare mutungamiri werimwe sangano rinomirira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muAmerica, reZimbabwe Diaspora Network North America vanoti kunyangwe dunhu ravo rakarerekera kumaDemocrats rwendo rwuno, zviri kuratidza kuti pane makwikwi akasimba pakati paVaBiden naVaTrump. No media source currently available

headline: Tinohwinha: Chivandire
text: SHASHA yetsiva yechidzimai, Kudakwashe ‘Take Money’ Chivandire, otsidza kuti ari kudzoka nebhande reWorld Boxing Council Super-bantam Weight iro ari kunorwira nemusi weMugovera svondo rino kuZambia.   Take Money achabandana naCatherine Phiri kuGovernment Complex kuZambia uye ane mukana wekunyora nhoroondo mumutambo uyu nekuve wekutanga kuhwina bhande guru reWBC.   Achitaura asati asimuka akananga kuZambia svondo rino, Chivandire anoti ari kunosimudza mureza wenyika uye yasvika nguva yekuti vanhukadzi vari mune zvemitambo vacherechedzwe nemabasa makuru avanenge vachiita.   “Ndinopa chitsidzo kumhuri yeZimbabwe kuti ndiri kudzoka nebhande reWBC Super-bantam Weight iro ndiri kunorwira kuZambia musi weMugovera.   “Catherine Phiri apera, svondo rino haana chake. Ini ndave kutomuziva seaimbove shasha nekuti musi weMugovera ndichabuda munhandare ndave shasha ndirini ndine bhande reWBC,” anodaro Chivandire.   Mwedzi yadarika, Chivandire ange achishanda zvakasimba achiita gadziriro nemurairidzi anovazve maneja wake, Clyde Musonda, weDeltaforce Boxing.   Musonda anorumbidza mashandiro ange achiita Chivandire achiti anovimba naye kuti achanobata basa sebasa kuZambia.   “Chivandire anoziva z vaanoita, mwedzi yadarika, tange tichishanda zvakasimba naye tichigadzirira mutambo watatarisana nawo uyu. Chishuvo chedu chekuti nemakore aafamba mutsiva, svondo rino agohwina bhande iri reWBC ugove muripo wekushanda kwaange achiita nesimba.   “Tinoziva kuti mutambo uchange usiri nyore nekuti Phiri agara ishasha inozivikanwa kubvira nekubvira.   “Asi, isu hatisi kutarira izvozvo, yave nguva yekuti Take Money achitongawo mutsiva manje,” anodaro Musonda.   Mutambo wevaviri ava usati watanga, nhandare ichambotanga yadziiswa nemitambo yakasiyana iyo ichaona vamwe vatambi vemuno vachibanda nevekuZambia.   Bongani Makovora acharwa naDavy Mwale wekuZambia mumutambo weBatanmweight apowo Issa Aliyah Phiri achibandana naMubelala Mukuni wekuZambia mumutambo weLightweight kozoti Chiedza Homakoma anokwikwidza mulightweight acharwa naFaith Kanjungu.

headline: MUSHEKWI ANE ZVIPO . . . kunze kwebhora anotamba rugby, basketball nemujaho
text: MUNIN’INA waNyasha Mushekwi uyo anove mutambi wemaWarriors nechikwata cheZhejiang Greentown chekuChina – Elvis Mushekwi – anoti mukoma wake munhu ane zvipo zvemitambo yakasiyana izvo zvakamuona achitamba mitambo yakadai serugby nebasketball uye zvenhabvu akaita zvemasanga nazvo.   Mukukura kwake, Nyasha aiitawo zvemutambo wemujaho wekumhanya zvakare. Nhabvu wakange usiri mutambo waaitamba zvakanyanya asi ndiwo wakazomuona achienda kunotambira kunyika dziri kunze dzinosanganisira South Africa, Belgium, Sweden nekuChina uko ari kutambira parizvino.   Elvis anoti Nyasha munhu ane zvipo zvemitambo yakawanda zvekuti dai asina kutamba nhabvu angadai akabudirira mune mimwe mitambo inosanganisira basketball kana rugby.   “Vanhu vanoziva Nyasha achitamba nhabvu asi mukukura kwake aitamba rugby, basketball nemujaho wekumhanya. Basketball yaive shasha manje uye akahwina mibairo yawakanda. Zvenhabvu zvakazongoitikawo asingafungire, akangonozama raki rake ndokupihwa mukana kuCAPS United uye kubva ipapo haana kuzotarira shure,” anodaro Elvis.   Nyasha akatanga kutamba nhabvu mugore ra2008 apo aive kuCAPS United uye ndokuzotengwa neMamelodi Sundowns yekuSouth Africa mushure memakore mashoma ndokugadzira zita rake. Muchinda uyu akazobva achienda kunotambira kuEurope kuzvikwata zvinosanganisira KV Oostende yekuBelgium kozoti Djurgardens yekuSweden uko kwaakanopisa akanwisa ka12 mumitambo 21 yaakatambira chikwata ichi.   Matambiro aakaita kuSweden, ndiwo akamuona achitengwa neDalian Yifang yekuChina iyo yaakatambira kwemakore mana uye ndokubatsira chikwata ichi kubva muDivision One chichizopinda muSuper League umo chiri kutambira parizvino. Ari kuchikwata ichi, Nyasha akambotamba nevatambi vane mukurumbira vakaita saYannick Carrasco wekuBelgium uyo akambotambira zvikwata zvinosanganisira Monaco yekuFrance uye Atletico Madrid yekuSpain kozoti Marek Hamsik wekuSlovakia akambonetsa achitambira Napoli yekuItaly.   Muchikwata ichi maive zvakare nechizvarwa chekuArgentina Nicolas Gaitan uyo aimbotambira Benfica yekuPortugal neAtletico Madrid. Elvis anoti iye naNyasha pamwe nemumwe mukoma wake – Ishamel – nehanzvadzi yavo vakachengetwa naambuya vavo sezvo amai vavo vachigara kunyika yeEngland.   Anoti ambuya vavo vaisada kuti Nyasha atambe nhabvu asi kuti aite zvemabhuku uye nemimwe mitambo asi iye zvino vanodada naye nekubudirira kwaakazoita mumutambo uyu.   “Takakura tichichengetwa nagogo, amai vedu vaenda kuEngland uko vanogara vachishanda. Saka gogo vaida kuti tiite zvemabhuku asi Nyasha akangoshinga akaenderera mberi nenhabvu. Asi nhasi vanodada nekubudirira kwaakaita nemutambo uyu uye kwaasvika nawo nhasi.   “Kuburikidza nenhabvu, ari kutichengeta uye ari kubatsira vanhu vakawanda,” anodaro.   Mumhuri mavo, Nyasha ndiye akakwanisa kutamba nhabvu zvekusvika kure. Ishmael anonzi akambozama raki rake kuCAPS United asi akazofunga zvekusiya ndokutanga kuita zvemabhizimisi.   Elvis anoti iye ari kuenda kuchikoro chekubika sezvo achida kuzoita basa rehuchef.   “Ini ndine rudo munyaya dzekubika, ndofarira kubika zvikuru saka ndizvo zvandiri kuendera kuchikoro. Nyasha ndiye anotondikurudzira kuti ndienderere mberi nezvandinoda kuita. Nhabvu handina hangu kumboita shungu nayo zvakanyanya, asi mumwe mukoma wangu Ishmael ndiye akamboenda kuCAPS United asi haana kuzosvika kure,” anodaro.   Nyasha aive muzvikwata zviviri zvemaWarriors zvakakwikwidza kumakwishu eAfrica Cup of Nations mugore ra2017 kuGabon uye negore rino kuEgypt.

headline: Harare Residents Trust Yoronga Kusangana naMeya weHarare Pamusoro peKudzuriswa Chibage kweVagari
text: Rimwe remasangano evagari vemuHarare, reHarare Residents Trust, rinoti rine hurongwa hwekusangana nameya weguta reHarare, VaBernard Manyenyeni, pamusoro pemashoko ekuti kanzuru yakati vagari vari kuSt. Martins nenzvimbo dzakapoteredza, vadzure chibage chavo chakarimwa munzvimbo dzisina kuvakirwa. Mukuru wesangano iri, VaPrecious Shumba, vanoti vanoona sekunge danho rekanzuru iri risiri kukoshesa mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika munyaya dzechikafu, sezvo riri kuuya panguva iyo nyika iri kutatarika nenzara. Svondo rapera kanzuru inonzi yakakurudzira vagari vakarima munzvimbo dzisina kuvakirwa kuSt. Martins, Airport Road nepedyo neCatholic University kuti vabvise chibage chavo kuitira kuti kanzuru ikwanise kutanga kuita basa rekugadzirisa masitendi ekuvakira dzimba zvakarongeka. Kanzuru inonzi ine hurongwa hwekugadzirisa masitendi anodarika mazana maviri nemakumi matatu kuitira kuti itange kupa vanhu pekuvakira dzimba. VaShumba vanoti kanzuru yaVaManyenyeni inofanirwa kunge iri kanzuru iri kushanda nevanhu vakasarudzwa nevanhu, kwete vatungamiri vezvematongerwo enyika. “Dambudziko riripo nderekuti kanzuru yedu yatsemuka nepakati, nekuti pane vamwe vashomashoma vane kwavanowana mashoko ekutaurira nyika, saka kana kanzuru ichitaura kudai iri kurwisa vagari,” VaShumba vanodaro. No media source currently available Asi mutauriri weguta reHarare, VaMichael Chideme, vanoti hachisi chokwadi kuti kanzuru yavo iri kuda kuti chibage chose chakarimwa munzvimbo idzi chibviswe. VaChideme vanoti kanzuru yavo inongove nehurongwa hwekuti vagari vashomashoma vabvise chibage chavo munzvimbo dikidiki yavari kuda kuisa migwagwa nepombi dzemvura netsvina. “Takazivisa vagari venzvimbo inonzi St. Martins kuti pavakarima chibage pane patinoda kuvhura nzira, patiri kusevhisa masitendi ekuti vanhu vawane pekugara panotenderwa,”VaChideme vanodaro. Vanoti vanhu ava vagara vachingoudzwa makore ose kuti apa pachauya dzimba, apa pachauya dzimba, asi iye zvino kanzuru yeHarare ndipo payave kuda kuchitanga kuita basa rayo. VaChideme vanoti kanzuru yavo iri kutanga svondo rino kugadzira migwagwa yekuti vatange kuita basa rekugadzira pekuvakira dzimba iri. No media source currently available

headline: Tajamuka/Sesijikile Yopa Hurumende Mazuva Mashomashoma eKuti Igadzirise Zvinhu
text: Sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reTajamuka/Sesijikile, rinoti riri kupa hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa mazuva mashoma-shoma ekuti igadzirise zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi nezvematongerwo enyika, kukundikana kwayo vanhu vanozopinda mumigwagwa nehuwandu hwavo. Izvi zvinotevera kukwira kunonzi kwakaita chingwa kubva pamadhora maviri nemasendi makumi matatu kuenda pamadhora matatu nemasendi makumi mashanu kutanga svondo rino. Mukuru wesangano iri VaPromise Mkwananzi vanoti chinorwadza ndechekuti mitengo yezvinhu zvinodiwa nevanhu nguva dzose iri kukwira, asi mihoro isina kwairi kuenda. VaMkwananzi vanoti sangano ravo harisi kuzopa vehurumende mukana wekufema kana vasina kugadzirisa zvinhu nekukasika, vachiti kukundikana vanhu vachaita zvakaonekwa kunanaAlgeria nekuSudan zvekubuda vachipinda mumigwagwa vachishandisa nzira dzine runyararo mukati. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kubata vehurumende kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende IYosimbaradza Kuti ZUPCO Ndiyo Yega Ine Mvumo Yekutakura Vanhu
text: Mutevedzeri wegurukota Amai Marian Chombo vanoti kambani yemabhazi, yeZimbabwe United Passenger Company (ZUPCO) ndiyo yega yakapihwa mvumo yekutakura vanhu mumaguta. Izvi zvinotevera kunyunyuta kwevanhu vakawanda munyika nerimwe sangano rinomirira vanotakura vanhu nezvinhu, reZimbabwe Union of Drivers and Conductors (ZUDCO) kuti kambani yeZUPCO yaremerwa nemutoro. Mutungamiri weZUDCO, VaFredrick Maguramhinga, vanoti hurumende haisi kuda kunzwa zvichemo zvevanhu vari kunetseka nekushaya zvinovatakura kuenda nekudzoka kumabasa. VaMaguramhinga vanoti sangano ravo ririkuramba richikumbira hurumende kuti iite musangano nevanotakura vanhu kuti zvinonetsa mativi ose zvikurukurwe uye kuti hurumende ikwanise kubatsira mukugadziriswa kwedambudziko iri sezvainofanirwa kuita. Vachipindura chikumbiro cheZUDCO ichi , Amai MaChombo, vanoti kana hurumende yatura gwara nemutemo hazvigoni kungozvisendeka parutivi.  No media source currently available

headline: VaItai Dzamara Vanorangarirwa Zvine Mutsindo muHarare
text: Veruzhinji vaungana muHarare vachirangarira murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu akapambwa akatsakatika makore mashanu apfuura, VaItai Dzamara, apo amai vaVaDzamara, Ambuya Benhilda Dzamara, vachema zvinopisa tsitsi. Ambuya Dzamara vachema zvinopisa tsitsi panga pachiitwa munamato wekukumbira musiki kuti vanyevenutse moyo yeavo vakapamba VaItai Dzamara, kuitira kuti vamudzose, kana kuti mhuri yavo izive zvakaitika. Vachitaura mushure memunamato waitwa pane imwe chechi muHarare, Ambuya Dzamara vaudza Studio7 kuti kusaziva kuti mwanakomana wavo mupenyu here kana kuti kwete, chinhu chiri kuvadya moyo zvakanyanya. Ambuya Dzamara vati vari kukumbira ruregerero vakamirira mwana wavo kuti kana ane waakatadzira, kuti vavewo nemoyo wekumuregerera kuitira kuti adzokewo kumhuri yake. Ambuya Dzamara, varumbidza muroora wavo, uye ari mudzimai waVaItai Dzamara. Amai Sheffra Dzamara, nekutsungirira kwavari kuita kuti vakwanise kuchengeta mhuri yakasiiwa nemurume wavo. Mukuru weZimbabwe Divine Destiny, Bishop Ancellimo Magaya, vati sevedzisvondo nemasangano anorwira kodzero szevanhu, vanoshushikana zvikuru nekukundikana kwehurumende kuzivisa kuti VaDzamara vakaendepi. VaMagaya vatiwo vanoziva kuti pakave nechido kubva kuhurumende hazvitori nguva kuwana ruzivo rwezvakaitika kuna VaDzamara. Mutungamiri weAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vatiwo zvinosuwisa zvikuru kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvatadza kumanikidza hurumende kuti itsanangure zvakaitika kuna VaDzamara. Vaive sahwira waVaItai Dzamara, VaCharles Nyoni, avo vaigarawo muAfrica Unit Square apo pavairatidzira vese, vatiwo vanodawo zororo mupfungwa dzavo, vachiti izvi zvinoitika chete kana pakave netsananguro yezvakaitika kuna VaDzamara. Vanhu vauya kuchiitiko ichi vasainawo tsamba yenyunyuto iyo masangano anorwira kodzero ati achaisvitsa kumutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, achivayeuchidza hurumende yavoine chitsvambe chekuchengetedza zvizvarwa zvenyika uye kuzivisa nyika zvakaitika kuna VaDzamara avo vakatsakatika muna 2015. NeMuvhuro, mudzimai waVaItai Dzamara akaendesawo tsamba yake yenyunyuto kumahofisi emutungamiriri wenyika achikumbirawo kuti VaMnangagwa vamubatsirewo kuwana ruzivo rwezvakaitika kumurume wake. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa pamire hurumende panyaya iyi. Asi hurumende yakaisa mubayiro wezviuru gumi zvemadhora ekuAmerica semubayiro unopihwa munhu anenge akwanisa kunongedza kuna VaDzamara. VaItai Dzamara vakapambwa musi wa Kurume 9, 2015 vachigerwa musoro mumusha weGlenview 7 nevanhu vasingazivikanwi kuti ndivanani. Vasati vapinda munyaya dzekurwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaItai Dzamara vakamboshandira masangano enhau anosanganisira The Standard neStudio7. Vakazosiya basa rekutora nhau vachiti vava kurwira kodzero dzevanhu vachikurudzira vaiva mutungamiri wenyika panguva iyi, muchakabvu Robert Mugabe, kusiya basa. No media source currently available

headline: VaPatrick Chinamasa Vanoti Hapana Kudzokera Kumashure paNyaya yeMabond Notes
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvehupfumi VaPatrick Chinamasa vanoti hapana kudzokera kumashure pachirongwa chekuparura mari yemabond notes mwedzi uno. VaChinamasa vataura mashoko aya kumucheto wemisangano yepagore ye International Monetary Fund ne World Bank muWashington DC, muAmerica. Vanoti chirongwa chekuparura mabond notes chiri kuenderera mberi kupera kwemwedzi uno. "Chirongwa chema bond notes chiri kuenderera mberi munyika uye chichabatsira kuti avo vanoita zvekutengese zvirimwa nezvimwewo kunze kwenyika kuti vawanewo mibairo yemabasa avanenge vachiita pakuunza mari yekunze munyika," VaChinamasa vaudza Studio 7. VaChinamasa nagavhuna weRBZ VaJohn Mangudya ndivo vari kutungamira chikwata cheZimbabwe. VaChinamasa naVaMangudya neChipiri vakapinda mumusangano wemakurokota ezvemari emuAfrica wakaitwa nesangano re Macroeconomic And Financial Management Institute Of Eastern And Southern Africa (MEMFMI) apo vakaudza Studio 7 kuti varikushushikana nekuratidzira kurikuitwa nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muAmerica sezvo zviri kukanganisa mimwe misangano yavo. "Zviri kundishungurudza ndezve kuti unowona zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvichiratidzira kunzvimbo dzatinoenda kunoshava rubatsiro izvo zviri kuti katyamadza kuti seyi vana vedu vari ivo varikuda kuti nyika isawane rubatsiro," VaChinamasa vaudza Studio 7. VaChinamasa vanoti hurumende iri kuyedza zvese zvainokwanisa kuti pasawane mushandi wehurumende anowanikwa achishaya muhoro wake pane nguva. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi Votambira Kurudziro Yekuti Vashandirwi Vasangomisa Vashandi Mabasa
text: Danho rakatorwa nehurumende rekusimbisa nyaya yekuti makambani asangomisa vashandi mabasa pamadiro asina kuratidza kuhurumende kuti azama zvose zvingatarisirwa kuti aite asati atora danho iri, riri kutambirwa nemufaro mukuru nevashandi. Munyori mukuru wesangano revashandi reZimbabwe Federation of Trade Unions, ZFTU, VaKennias Shamuyarira vanoti kunyange hazvo pasina zvitsva zvaiswa nehurumende, zvakakosha zvikuru kuti iratidze rutsigiro rwayo, zvikuru panguva iyo vashandi vari kurasikirwa nemabasa zvakanyanya. Gurukota rezvevashandi Amai Priscah Mupfumira vakati makambani anenge achida kumisa vashandi nekuda kwekuomerwa anofanirwa kutora matanho akaita sekudimura mari dzinotambirwa nevamwe vakuru-vakuru kuti dziende kumihoro yevashandi asati afunga zvekuderedza huwandu hwevashandi. Makambani anonzi anofanirwa kutanga aendesa chikumbiro chekumisa vashandi mabasa ku bhodhi rinoona nezvekumiswa mabasa, riri pasi pebazi rezvevashandi nemabasa, reRetrenchment Board, iro rinozotambira kana kuramba chikumbiro ichi. Asi vaimbowe mutungamiri weConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, CZI, VaCalisto Jokonya vanotiwo semaziviro avo, makambani mazhinji ari kutevedzera mutemo wekumisa vanhu mabasa uyu. Vanotiwo makambani mazhinji akatedza zvose zvekudimura mari dzemihoro yevashandi vepamusoro asati asvika pakumbomisa vepasi ava mabasa. VaShamuyarira vanoti vari kunyanya kutyora mutemo vachingomisa vanhu mabasa pamadiro ndevaya vari mune zvematongerwo enyika, avo vati vari kushandisa zvinzvimbo zvavo kuita izvi. No media source currently available

headline: Vaimbova Gurukota Amai Kagonye Votongerwa Kugara Mujeri kweGore neMwedzi Mina
text: Vaimbove gurukota rezvashandi, Amai Patronella Kagonye, nhasi vatongerwa kugara mujeri kwemakore matatu mushure mekubatwa nemhosva yekuba macomputer makumi maviri aifanira kupihwa kuzvikoro zvekumaruwa kuGoromonzi South. Mutongi wedare, Amai Vongai Muchuchuti Guwuriro, vasendeka gore pamutongo uyu vachiti Amai Kagonye havafaniri kupara mhosva yakadai mumakore mashanu. Vatiwo mwedzi misere yemutongo uyu ichaiswa parutivi kana Amai Kagonye vakabhadhara zviuru gumi zvemadhora ekuAmerica kuPostal and Telecommunications Regulatory Authority of Zimbabwe (POTRAZ) unove mutengo wemalaptop avakaba. Izvi zvinoreva kuti Amai Kagonye vachagara mujeri kwemwedzi gumi nemitanhatu. Vachipa mutongo wavo Amai Guwuriro, Amai Kagonye vakatadza kutsangura zvinogutsa dare kuti vakashandisa sei malaptop ava kapihwa nePOTRAZ. Vati tsanguro yakapihwa naAmai Kagonye kuti macomputers akafamba sei painzwikwa nyaya iyi yainge isina maturo ose. Gweta ramaAmai Kagonye, VaRungano Mahuni, vaudza Studio 7 kuti havana kufadzwa nemutongo wedare uye vari kuenda kudare repamusoro mangwana chaiwo kunopikisa. VaMahuni vaenderera mberi vachiti vanodawo kuti nyaya yaAmai Kagonye inzikwe kudare repamusoro vachibva kumba nekudaro vachakwidzawo chikumbiro nemuvhuro chekuti vaihwe mukana wekubhisva mari yechibatiso. Amai Kagonye vanonzi vakapihwa macomputer makumi maviri kuti vaape kuzvikoro zviri kuGoromonzi South asi vanonzi havana kuita izvi. Muchuchusi panyaya iyi, VaZivanai Macharaga, vakumbira dare kuti ripe Amai Kagonye mutongo wakaoma vachiti kuba mari dzeveruzhinji imhosva hombe uye ndeimwe yenyaya dzehuwori dzanetsa munyika. Muchichemo chavo kudare Amai Kagonye vakati vaive mupari wemhosva kekutanga uye ndivo muriritiri wemhuri yavo. Mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu-PF VaTafadzwa Mugwadi vati zvaitwa zvinoratidza kuti hurumende yakazvipira kurwisa huori isingatarise kuti wabuda mumnba maani Asi munyori mukuru mubato reZanu-PF VaCharlton Hwende vati mutemo wemuZimbabwe idandemutande rinobata tikuka tudiki nzou dzichidarika. Amai Kagonye ndemumwe wevashoma vaive nezvigaro murumende vakabatwa nemhosva nekutongerwa kugara mujeri. Vamwe vanosanganisira vaive gurukota rezvemmhando dzemoto, Dr Samuel Undenge avo vakazonzirwa tsitsi nemutungamiriri VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, VaDouglas Tapfuma vaive mukuru wezvedzimba dzehurumende nevaive munyori mubazi rezvemigodhi, VaFrancis Gudyanga. No media source currently available

headline: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri KuBritain Zvoronga Kuratidzira Kwakasimba
text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kuBritain zvine hurongwa hwekuungana zvichiratidzira mukupera kwesvondo pasi pehurongwa huri kutungamirwa nesangano rinorwira hutongo hwejekerere, reFree Zimbabwe Advocacy Group. Sachigaro wesangano iri, VaJoshua Chigwangwa vanoti vatora danho iri senzira yekupa mukana kuvana veZimbabwe wekuti vazivise pasi rose nezve mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika pamwe nemamiriro azvehupfumi. Hurongwa uhwu, uhwo hwuri kuitwa pasi pezita rekuti #zimbabweriseupuktour2016, hwakaonawo sangano iri richikoka varwiri vekodzero vanoti Vasten Zvorwadza, Doctor Patson Dzamara, Muzvare Linda Masarira pamwe nePastor Evan Mawarire ve#thisflag. VaqChigwangwa vanoti hurongwa hwavo hwaifanirwa kutanga neMuvhuro wesvondo rino, asi vakasangana nematambudziko akaita kuti hunonoke, akaita sekunonoka kugadziriswa kwemagwaro ekufambisa aPastor Mawarire pamwe neDoctor Dzamara, asi iye zvino zvinhu zvave kufamba zvakanaka. Vanoti pane hurongwa hwekuti Pastor Mawarire vanotaurawo pamisangano yavakakokwa nemasangano anosanganisira Chatham House pamwe neparamende yeBritain. No media source currently available

headline: Nyakupomerwa Mhosva yeKupisa Musha weNhengo yeZanu PF Anomiswa Mudare kwaMutare
text: Imwe nhengo yeMDC Alliance yekuMutasa Central yakasungwa neMugovera, yamiswa neMuvhuro mudare kwaMutare ichipomerwa mhosva yekupisa musha wenhengo yeZanu PF. Asi mutongi wedare ati nyaya iyi ichanzwikwa mangwana. VaOzwell James Chitere vaudzwa nemutongi wedare, VaTendai Mahwe, kuti nyaya yavo ichainzwa mangwana sezvo vange vakabatikana nedzimwe nyaya dzavanga vachifanirwa kutonga. Izvi zvinoreva kuti chikumbiro chaVaChitere chekuti vapihwe mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso kuitira kuti vatongwe vachibva kumba, chava kunzwikwa neChipiri. Muchuchisi wedare, VaFletcher Karombe, vati VaChitere vakanzwikwa vachiti vachapisa misha yenhengo dzeZanu PF, mushure mekutaura mashoko aya, musha waAmai Kagweda ndokubva wapiswa svondo rapera. VaChitere vari kumirirwa nemagweta anosanganisira VaRangarirai Mubata, VaBlessing Nyamaropa naAmai Peggy Tavagadza. VaMubata vati kunyange vasiri kufara nekuramba kwaVaChitere vari muhusungwa, vanotarisira kuti mangwana nyaya iyi ichapedzwa sekuvimbisa kwaitwa naVaMahwe. Vakasarudzwa zvakare kumirira Mutasa Central mudare reparamende, VaTrevor Saruwaka, vati havafari nekuona nhengo yavo ichiramba ingori muhusungwa. Papinda nyaya iyi mudare nhasi pamuzinda wedare ramejasitiriti pange pazere nhengo dzeMDC Alliance nedzeZanu PF, pamwe nevaongorori vesarudzo veEuropean Union, America nemamwe masangano akasiyana siyana. No media source currently available

headline: Gadziriro dze2024 Paris Olympics dzatanga
text: SANGANO reZimbabwe Olympic Committee (ZOC) ratanga gadziriro dzemitambo ye2024 Paris Summer Olympics izvo zvakaona richagadza Ringisai Kudzanai Hillario Mapondera kuve Chef De Mission (CdM) wechikwata cheTeam Zimbabwe.   MaSummer Olympics aya achaitwa kuFrance kubva munaChikunguru achizopera munaNyamavhuvhu muna2024 uye Zimbabwe inotarisirwa kutumira shasha dzemitambo yakasiyana kunokwikwidza kumitambo iyi.   Muchinyorwa, ZOC yakazivisa nezvekugadzwa kwaMapondera zvichitevera tsvakurudzo yaikaitwa pavanhu vakawanda vaida basa iri.   Mapondera ane basa guru rekutungamira chikwata cheTeam Zimbabwe kuenda kumitambo iyi uye achaona pamusoro pezvose zvinodiwa nevatambi nevaraidzi.   “Basa raCdM rinotanga ari kumaOlympics uye nepanopera mitambo yemaOlympics iyi.   “Izvi zviri mugwara rechirongwa cheZOC cheAthletes Development and Support Overall Goal chekuona kuti chikwata cheZimbabwe chatsigirwa chaizvo uye vatambi vagadzirira nemazvo kuti vagonokwikwidza zvakanaka kumitambo mikuru yepasi rese kusvika mugore ra2025,” inodaro ZOC.   Kumitambo ye2024 Paris Olympics, Zimbabwe inotarisirwa kutumira vatambi vakawanda zvichitevera vatambi vashoma avo vakanomirira nyika kumitambo yekupedzisira ye2020 Summer Olympics.   Mitambo iyi yakazoitwa gore radarika sezvo yakange yamiswa nekuda kwedenda reCovid-19 iro rakaona mitambo ichimiswa pasi rose muna2019.   Kumitambo ya2020, Zimbabwe yainge ine vatambi vashanu vaiti Ngoni Makusha wemujaho wekumhanya, Scott Vincent anotamba gorofu, Donata Katai anotuhwina, Peter Weltzar anotuhwina zvekare naPeter Purcell-Gilpin werowing.

headline: Mutambo wakandikoshera, anodaro Sikandar Raza
text: CHIKWATA checricket chemaChevrons chiri kupinda mu”hondo” svondo rino apo chichatatsurana nePakistan mumitambo mitanhatu inoti mitatu yeOne Day International series (ODI) nemimwe mitatu zvakare yeT20 International.   Mitambo iyi ndeyekutanga yeSuper League iro richangoparurwa uye yekurwira kuenda kumakwikwi e2023 International Cricket Council (ICC) World Cup achaitirwa kuIndia.   Mutambi wemaChevrons, Sikandar Raza, uyo akazvarirwa kunyika yePakistan anoti ari kutarisira zvikuru mutambo uyu uye sechikwata vanoda kukunda sezvo shuviro yavo iri yekuenda kuWorld Cup.   Mumakwikwi ekupedzisira eWorld Cup ayo akaitwa mugore ra2019, maChevrons akakundikana kuenda kunokwikwidza kuEngland neWales mushure mekunge akundwa mumitambo yekurwira tikiti rekuenda kumutambo uyu.   “Toda kushanda nesimba kuti tiende kuWorld Cup.   Chishuvo chedu kuti tihwine mitambo yeSuper League tibve taenda kuWorld Cup. Hatisi kuda zvekuzotamba mimwe mitambo nekuti paWorld Cup yekupedzisira takatadziswa kuenda nemaruns maviri chaiwo. Saka zvinhu zvakatirwadza kutadza kuenda kumitambo iyi apa isu taitamba cricket yepamusoro-soro,” anodaro Raza   Raza, uyo akazvarirwa kuPakistan asi akazokurira muZimbabwe, anoti mutambo wezvikwata zviviri izvi unoreva zvakawanda kwaari sezvo uchange uri wenyika mbiri dziri pamwoyo wake.   “Ndinoyemura zvikuru nzvimbo ino. Ndiri chizvarwa chekuPakistan asi ndichitambira Zimbabwe saka zvinhu zvinondifadza kudzoka kumusha kuzotamba mutambo uyu.   “Chinhu chakanyanyonakisa ndechekuti nyika mbiri idzi, Pakistan neZimbabwe, dzose dzakanditambira zvandiri,” anodaro Raza.   Mutambo wekutanga wePakistan nemaChevrons uriko nemusi weChishanu chino uye wechipiri uchizotambwa musi wa1 Mbudzi kozoti wechitatu musi wa3 Mbudzi.   Mitambo iyi ichange iri yeODI uye ichingopera chete mitambo yeT20 yobva yatanga musi wa7, 8 na10 Mbudzi.   Mitambo yeSuper League ichange iine nyika 13 dzichibandana kurwira kuenda ku2023 India World Cup. Zvikwata zvinomwe zvichapedza zviri pamusoro pamwe chete neIndia zvinobva zvatowaniswa tikiti rekuenda kuWorld Cup.   Zvimwe zvishanu zvacho zvinenge zvasara zvichazotatsurana mumutambo uchazorongwa pachitsvagwa zvikwata zviviri izvo zvinozotevera zvimwe zvisere zvagara zvinenge zvatobudirira kuenda kuWorld Cup.

headline: Mapurisa neMasoja Orambidza Vanhu Kufamba Famba Munyika
text: Mapurisa nemasoja ange achirambidza vanhu vakawanda kupinda mumadhorobha akawanda munyika uye vamwe vanhu vange vapinda mumadhorobha aya vange vachiudzwa kunzi vadzokere kudzimba dzavo. Nhasi mapurisa nemasoja ange akadzika maroadblock pamigwagwa yose inopinda mumaguta achipa chete mvumo vanhu vanobvumirwa nehurumende kushanda munguva ino yeNational Lockdown. Vanga vasina mvumo vanga vachiudzwa kuti vadzokere kudzaimba dzavo, uye varemekedze mutemo we curfew wakatarwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nemusi weChipiri. Izvi ndizvo zvaitikawo mumaguta nemadhorobha akasiyana-siyana munyika kusanganisira Chinhoyi, Gweru, Kadoma, Mutare neMasvingo. Mutori wenhau ane mukurumbira, Tapfuma Machakaire, vati shoko rekuti curfew rinounza ndangariro dzakaipa sezvo mudunhu reMatebeleland makamboitwa curfew munguva yeGukurahundi, iyo yakasiya vanhu vanosvika zviuru makumi maviri vauraiwa nemauto eFifth Brigade mumatunhu eMatabeleland nedzimwe nzvimbo mudunhu reMidlands. Asi nhengo yeCentral Committeee yeZanu PF, VaJospeh Tshuma, vati havawone chakapia pakuve necurfew. Vati vanhu vanofanirwa kudzidza kudzidza kubva kunyika dzakaita seItaly, Spain, Brazil neAmerica uko zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu zviri kufanechirwere cheCovid-19. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri weZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, VaMusa Kika, vati mapurisa nevechiuto havafanirwe kutyora kodzero dzevanhu panguva yakadai. VaKika vatiwo hurumende inofanirwa kusiya tsika yekutonga nyika nekuisa zviga izvo vati zvinotyora bumbiro remutemo yenyika. Kurambidzwa kupinda mumaguta kuri kuitwa vanhu kunonzi kuri kuvhiringa vanhu vanorarama nekutengesa mumigwagwa. Mumwe anotengesera muBulawayo angozvidoma nezita rekuti Mushapo ati vanhu vanozvishandira vange vachirambudzwa kupinda muguta. MuBulawayo Studio 7 yaona vamwe vanorarama nekuchinja mari mumigwagwa pamwe nevanotengesa pamusika wemunaFifth Street vachiita hwekatsi nagonzo nemapurisa ayo ange ari pamabhasikoro, nemamwe ange ari pamabhiza achitenderera achiudza vanhu ava kuti vadzokere kumba. Amai Medeline Mari avo vanoraramawo nekutengesa vati mutemo we curfew uchaita kuti veruzhinji vafe nenzara. Mumwe murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu, Muzvare Nozipho Moyo, vati hurumende ine tsika yekungodzika mitemo pasina kunyatsofungisisa nezvainobatsira. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi remapurisa kana vechiuto panyaya iyi.Studio7 hainawo kukwanisa kubata munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, sezvo vanga vasiri kubatika panharembozha yavo. Asi VaMnangagwa vakazivisa neChipiri kuti mauto nemapurisa achange ari mumigwagwa achiona kuti mitemo yeNational Lockdown yatevedzerwa nemunhu wese sezvo nyika iri kuedza kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19, icho chabata vanhu vanodarika zviuru zviviri nemakumi matatu nevana, uye chauraya vanhu makumi maviri nevatanhatu muZimbabwe. VaMnangagwa havana kuzivisa kuti curfew iyi ichapera riini? Hurumende yakavharisa zvikoro zvose zvepamusoro soro kudzamara zvinhu zvanaka munyika munyaya dzeCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: Musika weFodya Unovhurwa Asi Mitengo Iri Pasi
text: Misika yefodya yavhurwa muHarare mitengo yefodya iri pasi asi hurumende ichiti inotarisira kuti mitengo ichakwira nekufamba kwenguva. Gurukota rinoona nezvekurima, VaPerence Shiri, ndivo vaparura mwaka wekutengesa fodya zviri pamutemo pamusika weTobacco Sales Floor muHarare, uye vati vafara nemutengo kunyange hazvo wange uri pasi. VaShiri vati izvi ndizvo zvinogaroitika mwaka yese sezvo varimi vachitanga kuitengesa foya yemhando yepasi. Bhero rekutanga ratengwa nemadhora mana eku America pakirogiramu kozotiwo bhero repasi ratengwa nemasendi makumi mapfumbabweeku America pakirogiramu rimwe chete. VaShiri vaudza Studio7 kuti zvinofadza kuti misika yefodya yavhura kunyange hazvo paine dambudziko rechirwere cheCoronavirus. Asi mutungamiri werimwe remasangano anomirira varimi vefodya munyika reTobacco Association of Zimbabwe, VaGeorge Seremwe, vaudza Studio7 kuti kunyange hazvo misika yavhurwa, havasi kufara nemitengo iripo. VaShiri vatiwo kunyange hazvo paine dzimwe nyika dzakawanda dzinorima fodya pasi rese, Zimbabwe ine mbiri yekurima fodya yemhando yepamusoro uye inokwikwidzana neBrazil chete pasi rese. VaShiri vati kurimwa kwefodya kuri kusimukira zvakanyanya munyika uye ishuviro yavo kuti dai vanorima zvimwe zvirimwa vadzidza kubva kuvarimi vefodya. Vatiwo kunyange hazvo Coronavirus yakavhiringa hupfumi hwenyika dzinotenga fodya kubva kuZimbabwe dzakaita seChina, hazvisati zvave pachena kuti, izvi zvichakakanganisa kutengwa kwefodya yeZimbabwe here VaShiri vatiwo vati hurumende inoda kuti varimi vatevedze marimirwo anoitwa kufodya pakurimwa zvimwe zvirimwa zvakaita sechibage, nembanje dzinioshandiswa kurapa dzakaita seHemp neCannabis. Sachigaro vebhodi remakambani yehurumende inoona nezvekutengeswa kwefodya, yeTobacco Industries Marketing Board, TIMB, VaPat Devenish, vati misika yefodya ingadai yakavhurwa mwedzi wapfuura asi izvi zvakatadziswa nekuda kweCoronavirus. Vatiwo mwaka uno zvinhu hazvisi kufambiswa semamazuva ose nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 uye mwaka uno varimi havasi kubvumidzwa kupinda mumisika uye vachange vaine vanhu vanovamiririra. Mumisika mange muine vatengi chete nevanhu vashomanana uye vanhu vese vange vari pamusika vange vakapfeka maMask, vachigeza maoko nekuita zvese zvinofanirwa kuitwa pakudzivirira Coronavirus. VaDevenish vazivisawo kuti huwandu hwevarimi vefodya hwakadzikira gore rino nezvikamu guni nezvinomwe kubva muzana. Vatiwo varimi vachange vachibhadharwa mari yavo nezvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana ari madhora ekuAmerica, uye imwe yacho iri mari yemuno. No media source currently available

headline: Nhengo dzeMDC-T Dzorangarira Vamwe Vadzo Vakapondwa Muna 2008
text: Nhengo dzeMDC-T inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa pamwe nehutungamiri hwebato iri vanoti hurumende inofanira kuongorora nyaya yemhirizhonga yakaitika makore gumi adarika pamberi pesarudzo yechipiri yemutungamiri wenyika ye presidential runoff iyo yakasiya vanhu vakawanda vafa uye vamwe vasisina pokugara. Vatsigiri veMDC vakaita saVaEnoch Mkudu vanoti mhirizhonga yakaitika iyi ichizere mundangariro dzavo vachiti dai hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa ikaona kuti sarudzo dzemwedzi unouya dzaitwa pasina mhirizhonga yakadai iyo yavanoti ichiri kuvabata pamoyo. Imwe nhengo yeMDC, VaKudakwashe Matibiri, vanoti zvakakosha kuti hurumende yaVaMnangagwa iite hurongwa hwekusangana nevakapona neburi retsono pamhirizhonga iyi. Mutungamiri weboka reMDCT iri, VaNelson Chamisa, vanoti bato ravo pamwe nevatsigiri vavo vachiri kushushikana nezvakaitika izvi. Mutauriri waVaChamisa, VaNkululeko Sibanda, vati VaChamisa vachagadzirisa nyaya iyi vachiti VaMnangagwa vazvitadza sezvo vaiva mumwe wevanhu vaiva muhurumende yakakonzera mhirizhonga iyi pasi pehutungamiri hwaVaRobert Mugabe avo vakazobviswa pachigaro nemauto gore rapera. Mumwe mufundisi wechechi yeApostolic Faith Mission, Mufundisi Rogers Conrad Tekwa, vanoti vedzisvondo vane basa rakakura kwazvo rekubatsirana nehurumende mukuedza kugadzirisa nyaya iyi. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rinoona nezvinoitika mukati menyika, VaObert Mpofu, kuti tinzwe pamire hurumende panyaya iyi. Asi VaMpofu, avo vanove zvakare munyori anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa mubato riri kutonga reZanu PF, vakati sebato pamwe nehurumende vakazvipira kuita sarudzo dzisina mhirizhonga rwendo rwuno. MDC inoti pane nhengo dzayo dzinodarika mazana maviri dzakapondwa pamberi pesarudzo yechipiri yemutungamiri wenyika yakaitwa muna Chikumi 2008. Vanhu vazhinzji vakapisirwa misha vamwe vakatiza kwavaigara vachinotsvaga hupoteri kune dzimwe nzvimbo. Mhirizhonga iyi yakakonzera kuti vaimbova mutungamiri weMDC, mushakabvu VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vabude mumakwikwi esarudzo iyi vachiti zvaisaita kuti vagozotonga makuva izvo zvakazopedzira kuti paumbwe hurumende yemubatanidzwa iyo yakapera muna 2013 pakaitwa dzimwe sarudzo dzinonzi neMDC dzakabirirwa zvemhando yepamusorosoro. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yomanikidza Vashandi Vayo Kubvisa Mari yeMisangano yaVaMugabe?
text: Sangano rinomiririra vadzidzisi, reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, riri kutsoropodza hurumende iyo rinoti iri kumanikidza vashandi vayo kuti vabise mari yekuti mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakwanise kuita musangano nevechikidi vebato ravo kuBindura neMugovera, 9 Gunyana. Sangano iri rinoti zviri kuitwa nehurumende hazvisi pamutemo nekuti vanhu havafaniri kumanikidzwa kubvisa mari dzavo kana kuita zvematongerwo enyika kana vasingadi. VaMugabe vari kuenda mumatunhu ose enyika vachisangana nevechidiki vebato ravo. Mutsamba inonzi yakanyorerwa vashandi vehurumende musi wa 4 Gunyana nemumwe mukuru wekwamudzviti kuGuruve, vashandi vanonzi vakaudzwa kuti vabvise dhora rimwe chete pamunhu kuitira kuti Zanu-PF ikwanise kutenga zvokudya uye kutsvaka dzimotikari dzichatakura vanhu vachaenda kuBindura uko kuchaitirwa musangano naVaMugabe. Dr Takavafira Zhou, avo vanotungamira sangano rePTUZ, vanoti izvi zviri kuitwa nehurumende zvinokanganisa kodzero dzevanhu. Vakatizve vanhu veZanu-PF vanofanira kukumbira vanhu zvakanaka kune vanoda kubvisa, kwete kuita sekuti kana munhu akarega kubhadhara pane zvaachazoona. “Isu tirikuti izvi kutyora kodzero dzavanhu; kutyora kodzero dzevashandi; kumbunyikidza vanhu; kumanikidza vanhu kuti vaite zvavasingadi. Ndinofunga kuti misangano iyi haifaniri kunge ichiitwa nekumanikidza vanhu kuti vabhadhare mari pazvinhu zvavasingade,” VaZhou vakaudza Studio 7. Vapamhidzirawo vachiti, “Takanyora matsamba akawanda zvikuru kwazvo kuMinistry of Education, kune vanoita zvematongerwo enyika, uye kune avo vari mumapato anopikisa neanotonga nekumapurisa asi hationi zvichichinja nekuti tsamba dzinoramba dzichiuya kubva kunana DA nevamwe vemuMinistry of Education.” VaZhou vati chimwe chinonetsa ndechokuti vazhinji vari mubazi rinoona nezvedzidzo vakapiwa mabasa makuru kuri kutendwa kutsigira Zanu-PF kwavanoita saka havazorambidzi Zanu-PF kuita zvairi kuita pazvikoro. Vakapamidzirazve vachiti sangano ravo richaramba richidzidzisa vanhu pamusoro pekodzero dzavo uye kuti vashinge kubuda pachena kuti havasikuzobhadharira mari dzavo pazvinhu zvavasingade. No media source currently available

headline: ILO Yoyambira Zimbabwe nezveKushandiswa kweFacebook neWhatsApp Mukunyengedzwa kweVanhu Kuenda Muhunhapwa
text: Mumwe mukuru muhofisi yesangano reInternational Labour Organization kana kuti ILO muZimbabwe neNambia akaudza komiti yedare reSenate muHarare nhasi kuti vamwe vanhu vanoshambadzira mabasa pamadandemutande akaita seFacebook ndivo vari kukwezva vanhu kuti vagume vapinda muhunhapwa kana kuti human trafficking. VaAdolphus Chinomwe, mukuru weILO vaudza komiti yedare reSenate kuti madandemutande mazhinji ari kushandiswa anenge asina kunyorweswa zviri pamutemo. Vanhu vanenge vanyeperwa kuti kune mabasa vanozoguma vobatwa senhapwa kana kubatwa chibharo. Vatiwo madandemutande akaita seFacebook, Twitter neWhatsApp ndiwo avewo kushandiswa zvakanyanya nemakoronyera aya kukwezva vanhu kuenda kunze kwenyika vachivimbiswa mabasa anobhadhara mari yepamusoro kana kuvimbiswa nzvimbo dzechikoro. VaChinomwe vati basa rekutengesa vanhu kana kuti human trafficking, rine mari yakawanda chose zvekuti pagore rega rega pasi rese rinoburitsa mazana matanhatu emabhiriyoni emadhora. VaChinomwe vati zvakakosha kuti dzihurumende dziongorore vanhu vanoita izvi. Vanotiwo zvakakosha kuti hurumende inyorese kana kuvanechekuita nevanhu vayo vanenge vachibuda munyika vachiti izvi zvinogona kubatsira kuti vaye vanenge vachishanda kunze kana vachinge vapinda mumatambudziko vakwanise kuwana rubatsiro. Vaenderera mberi vachiti nyaya yekubuda kwevanhu munyika vachinotsvaga basa kana kuenda kunoshanda inonetsa nekuti kazhinji kazhinji vanhu vanongobuda munyika vasina kutaura kwavari kuenda uye vamwe vanongoenda vasina ruzivo rwekwavanoenda. VaChinomwe vati handi vashandi vemumba chete vanobatwa chibharo kana kushandiswa senhapwa vachiti kana vanhu vakadzidzira mabasa avo mumakoreji nemaUniversity pamwe nevatambi vebhora nemimwe mitambo vari kubatwa nemambure aya. Vatiwo zvinonetsa kurambidza vanhu kuti vasabude munyika kunotsvaga mambasa sezvo kuita izvi kuri kutyora kodzero dzavo. Sachigaro vekomiti iyi, Rtd General Mike Nyambuya, vati komiti yavo inoshushikana chose nekubuda kwevanhu munyika vachinobatwa chibharo kunze kwenyika uye vanoti vari kuita ongororo yekuona kuti kodzero dzevanhu vemuZimbabwe hadzisi kutyorwa here. VaChinomwe vati nyika inogona kuwana mari yakwanda chose kana ikaronga nekuona kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinoshanda kunze zvagara zvakanaka. Gore rapera munyika makamboita dambudziko guru mushure mekunge mamwe madzimai apinda muhunhapwa kunyika dzakaita seKuwait neSaudi Arabia. Hurumende yakatozomanikidzwa kuti ipindire mushure mekunge vakawanda vachema chema nemabatirwo ezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe izvi. Zvinofungidzirwa kuti vanhu vari pakati pemamiriyoni makumi maviri nematatu vari muhunhapwa munyika dzepasi rino. Bazi reUnited States Department rinoti vanhu vari pakati pezviuru mazana matanhatu kusvika zviuru mazana masere vanopinzwa muhunhapwa vanosvika makumi masere kubva muzana vari madzimai uye vamwe vakawanda vari vana vadiki. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi Vazhinji Vanoti Havatarisire Kupiwa Mabhonasi Gore Rino
text: Sangano rinomirira vashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, rinoti haritarisiri kuti vashandirwi vachanyima vashandi vavo mari dzekuvatenda dzemabhonasi gore rino sezvo zviri muzvibvumirano zvemabasa zvakanyoreranwa pasi pakati pemapoka maviri aya kuti vashandi vanobhadharwa mabhonasi. Mamwe makambani anotanga kubhadhara vashandi mari dzemabhonasi mwedzi uno waGumiguru, asi gore rino zvakanyarara nekuda kwemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi munyika. Munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti makambani mashoma kwazvo anobhadhara mabhonasi nekuti zvinobva pakuti gore iroro awana marii yakawanda zvakadii. Mukuru wesangano revashandirwi, reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, EMCOZ, VaJohn Mufukare, vaudza Studio 7 kuti panyaya dzemabhonasi, sangano ravo rinowanzo kuzvisiira kuboka rimwe nerimwe kuti rinokwanisa zvakadii kubhadra vashandi varo mabhonasi avo. No media source currently available

headline: Tino Kadewere anyora nhoroondo
text: MUTAMBI wemaWarriors neReal Club Deportivo Mallorca yekuSpain — Tinotenda Philana Kadewere — akapemberera kunyora kwaakaita nhoroondo yekuve wekutanga kubva muZimbabwe kutamba nhabvu muligi reSpanish LaLiga.   Kadewere akatamba mutambo wake wekutanga wemuLaLiga svondo radarika apo chikwata chake chakasangana neGetafe mumutambo uyo Mallorca yakakundwa 2-0.   Mumutambo uyu, Kadewere akatanga ari pabhenji ndokuzopinda kwapera maminitsi 84 achitsiva Lee Kang-In, chizvarwa chekuSouth Korea.   Izvi zvakaona Kadewere achinyora nhoroondo yekuve mutambi wekutanga kubva muZimbabwe kutambira muLaLiga Santander.   Svondo rino, Kadewere – uyo ari kuMallorca nechikwereti kubva kuOlympique Lyon yekuFrance – akanyora papeji rake repaFacebook kuti: “Nhoroondo yanyorwa, record yekutamba mutambo wekutanga weLaLiga, ndinokutendai RCD Mallorca.”   Paakaenda kuMallorca munaNyamavhuvhu 2020, Kadewere akasvika akakuvara izvo zvakaona achipedza nguva refu achimborapwa zvakamutadzisa kutambira chikwata chake chitsva ichi.   Paakazopora, mutambo waKadewere wekut anga achitambira Mallorca waive weCopa del Rey wakatambwa munaMbudzi uyo Mallorca yakakunda CD Autol 6-0.    Tino Kadewere   Mumutambo uyu, Kadewere akatanga ari pabhenji ndokupinda kwapera maminitsi 46 uye ndokunwisawo.   Akazotambazve mumwe mutambo weCopa del Rey munaZvita 2020 apo Mallorca yakakunda Real Union 1-0. Mumutambo uyu, akatanga ari pabhenji zvekare ndokuzopinda kwapera maminitsi 77 achitsiva Lee Kang-In.   Zvichitevera kunyora kwaakaita nhoroondo svondo radarika, vatsigiri venhabvu vakawanda vakamhanya kukorokotedza Kadewere vachimutumira mashoko papeji rake.   Muimbi Romeo Gasa akanyora achiti: “Makorokoto, ramba uchishanda nesimba uye uchitamba nesimba zvaunokwanisa.”   Panashe Garande anoti: “Tinodada newe! Tinokushuvira zvakanaka chete Tino.”   Mumwe mutsigiri wenhabvu anonzi Tinaye Gumbati anoti ari kuisa Kadewere muminamato yake kuti akwanise kutamba mitambo yakawanda.   “Makorokoto Tino ndakakuona. Tiri kukunamatira utambe mitambo yakawanda wena,” anodaro Gumbati.   Vamwe vatambi vakanyora nhoroondo vanosanganisira Peter Ndlovu uyo akaita wekutanga kubva muZimbabwe nemuAfrica kutamba nhabvu muEnglish Premier League mugore ra1992 apo aitambira Coventry kuchiti Benjani Mwaruwari akaita wekutanga kubva muZimbabwe kutamba nhabvu muFrench Ligue 1 achitambira AJ Auxerre.   Murairidzi weFC Platinum, Norman Mapeza, akaita mutambi wekutanga wemuno kutamba kuTurkey uko akatambira Galatasaray kuchiti Knowledge Musona ndiye akaita wekutanga kutambira muGermany Bundesliga apo aitambira TSG Hoffinheim.   Mushakabvu Freddy Mukwesha ndiye akaita wekutanga kubva muno kutambira kuPortugal uko akatambira Sporting de Braga.

headline: Health Services Board Inoti Yawirirana navanaChiremba vari Kuramwa Mabasa
text: Bhodhi rezvehutano, reHealth Services Board, nezuro rakabudisa gwaro rinokurudzira kuti vana chiremba vari pakuramwa mabasa vadzoke kubasa, richiti hurumende yave kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavana chiremba ava. Asi mutungamiri wesangano ravanachiremba vezvipatara zvehurumende reHospital Doctors Association, Doctor Mloxisi Ngwenya varamba mashoko aya, vachiti hapana chati chatenderanwa uye vanachiremba havasi kuzodzokera pamabasa. Mutauriri wesangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, Doctor Fortune Nyamande, vanoti sesangano, vanoshora zvikuru danho ratorwa nebhodhi rezvehutano iri rekutaura zvisina kuwiriranwa navachiremba Doctor Nyamande vanoti bhodhi iri ranga risingafanirwi kumhanyira kuenda kumapepanhau kunoshambadza kuti vawirirana, pane kuita zvinhu negwara kuti zvinonetsa zvigadziriswe. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Voungana kuMusangano weBuilding For The Future Conference Mudunhu reKansas
text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muAmerica zviri kuungana neChishanu kusvika neSvondo, Chikunguru 01, 2018, apo zvichange zvichipana mazano mumabasa ekusimudzira hupenyu nenharaunda dzavari pari zvino pamwe nekwavakabva. Vanhu ava vari kusangano pasi pesangano rinonzi Building for the Future 2018. Mumwe wevakatanga musangano uyu makore mashanu apfuura, Reverend Jacob Tozoona Maforo, avo vanogara kuKansas muno muAmerica, vanoti vari kufara nekukura nekubudiira kuri kuita sangano ravo gore negore. Kuburikidza nesangano iri vanhu vari kuwana mukana wekupana mazano panyaya dzehupenyu, kuzeya zvimhingamipinyi zvavanosangana nazvo, pamwe nekuyechidzana zvakakoshera kutarisa shure kwavakabva vachibatsirawo vamwe vanodawo kusimudzira hupenyu hwavo. Mufundisi Maforo, avo vanopinda kereke yeUnited Methodist, vanotiwo kumusangano wavo uyu vanokoka vanhu vemakereke ose echiKristu, hausaruri, naizvozvo vanhu vanofanirwa kuuya vakasununguka nekuti vamwe vanogona kutyira kuti zvimwe ndewezvematongerwo enyika. Mufundisi Maforo vanoti havaneyi nekuti munhu anotsigira bato ripi rezvematongerwo enyika, sezvo chinangwa chiri chekushumira pamwe sevana veZimbabwe. "Kune vasati vanzwa nemusangano uyu tinoti huyai kumusangano weBuilding for the future Conference. Pane vamwe vangava nepfngwa dzekuti zvimwe tinenge tichiita zvematongerwo enyika, kwete, yedu program, ndeyevanhu vane chishuvo chekuti zvavari kuita zvinobatika, zvikurukurwe pamusoro pezvazvo." No media source currently available

headline: VaMasaraure Vanoti Havasi Kuzorega Kurwira Mihoro Yakakwana yeVarairidzi
text: Mutungamiriri wesangano rinomiririra varairidzi vekumaruwa, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, avo vakapambwa nevanhu vatanhatu pakati pehusiku, vanoti vakarohwa zvakaipisisa, uye vakatorerwa mbatya dzavainge vakapfeka. VaMasaraure vanoti vakakuvadzwa mumusoro, kumusana, maoko nemakumbo, vachiti vamwe vevanhu vakavapamba ndevamwe vechikwata chakambovapamba muna Ndira gore rino, vachiti izvi hazvisi kuzovadzorerwa sure mukurwira kodzero dzevarairiridzi. VaMasaraure vanoti hurumende yave kutora vanorwira kodzero dzevashandi sevavengi vachiti hapana anoda kupidigura hurumende asi kuti vanhu vanoda kuti vakwanise kuriritira mhuri dzavo. VaMasaraure vaudza Studio7 kuti vaudzwa navana chiremba kuti vambozorora kuenda kubasa. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri wemapurisa, VaPaul Nyathi, kuti tinzwe pamire hurumende panyaya yekupambwa kwava Masaraure sezvo vanga vasingadaire nharembozha yavo. No media source currently available

headline: VaMavima Vanoti Hapana Dambudziko paNyaya yeMari Dziri Kutambiriswa Vashandi veHurumende
text: Gurukota rezvevashandi, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, varamba kuti pane dambudziko remari dzemihoro dziri kutambiriswa vashandi vachiti hurumende yaita zvose zvainokwanisa kuti vatambire mari dziri nani. VaMavima vashora zvikuru rimwe sangano revarairidzi reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, kana kuti ARTUZ, vachiti riri kushandidswa sembato nevekunze kuda kukonzera kusagadzikana vashandi vakawanda vehurumende vari kuchema chema kuti mari dzavari kutambira hadzisi kukwana uye vamwe vatotanga kuramwa mabasa. VaMavima vati varairidzi vachangotanga basa vari kutambiriswa mari inosvika pazviuru makumi matatu kana kuti 30 000 RTGS. Sangano reConsumer Council of Zimbabwe rinoti mhuri yevanhu vatanhatu yave kuda mari inosvika zviru zvina nechimwe zvine mazana maviri nemakumi matatu nemashanu kana kuti RTGS’s 41, 235 pamwedzi kuti ikwanise kurarama zvakanaka. Asi vachipindura mashoko aVaMavima, munyori mukuru musangano reARTUZ, VaRobson Chere, varamba kuti vari kushandiswa nevekunze vachiti iyi hurumende ndiyo iri kushandiswa neInternational Monetary Fund kudzvinyirira vashandi. Vati mari iri kupihwa varairidzi haikwane zvachose.

headline: Zimbabwe Yobatana neWHO neMamwe Masangano Kurwisa Chirwere cheBharaziya
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Muzvinafundo Francisca Mutapi vanoshanda nesangano reTracking Infections To Benefit Africa vari kuScotland vanoti sangano ravo riri kuita ongororo rakabatana nebazi rezvehutano nesangano guru reWorld Health Organisation yekuona kuti chirwere chebharazira chadzoka here munyika uye kuti chingarapwe seyi pachena. Vanoti chirwere ichi chinoratidza nekuita weti kana tsvina ine ropa uye vanenge vaoona izvi vanofanirwa kuenda kunavana chiremba sezvo chirwere ichi chichirapika. Vamwe vagari vemuHarare vanonzi vakabatwa nechirwere ichi chinokonzerwa nehutachiwona hunogara mumvura ine tsvina. Muzvinafundo Mutapi vanoti pakambenge pane zvirongwa zvekurapa chirwere chebharazia pachena munyika munguva yapfura chakange chakanangana nevana vadiki vemuzvikoro asi chakambomiswa uye chinotarisirwa kutanga gore rinouya. "Kurudziro yedu ndeyekuti pachadaidzirwa nebazi rezvehutano kuti vanhu vauye kuzorapwa denda rebilharzia munguva inotevera vanhu vachabuda nehuwandu hwavo sezvo chirwere ichi chichirapika uye chichange chichi rapwa pachena," Muzvinafundo Mutapi vaudza Studio7. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata mukuru wezvehutano muguta reHarare VaProsper Chonzi kana mutauriri webazi rezvehutano VaDonald Mujiri sezvo nharembozha dzavo dzange dzisiri kudairwa . No media source currently available

headline: ‘Coach wemaWarriors mutsva munaNdira’
text: SANGANO reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) rinoti richatanga kutsvaga murairidzi mutsva wemaWarriors munaNdira apo pachange papera kondirakiti yaJoey “Mafero” Antipas uyo akafanobata chigaro chekurairidza chikwata ichi.   Kondirakiti yaAntipas  — uyo anorairidza Chicken Inn zvakare — ichapera nemusi wa31 Zvita.   Antipas akagadzwa kuti afanobata chigaro chekurairidza maWarriors zvichitevera kusiya basa kwakaitwa naSunday “Mhofu” Chidzambwa apo maWarriors aive achangobva kumakwikwi eAfrica Cup of Nations.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, mukushi wemashoko weZifa, Xolisani Gwesela — uyo anove zvakare competitions manager — anoti Antipas ndiye ari kurairidza chikwata ichi kusvika gore rino rapera uye vachazozivisa kuti ndiani achatora chigaro ichi.   “Parizvino Joey Antipas ndiye ari panyanga uye kondirakiti yake yatinayo ichapera musi wa31 Zvita gore rino, kubva ipapo ndipo tichazozivisa nyika kuti tave kufamba sei,” anodaro.   Achibvunzwa neKwayedza kuti parizvino Zifa yambokurukura nevarairidzi vangani kana kuti vangani vakauya kwavari vachitsvaga basa rekurairidza maWarriors,  Gwesela anoti, “Sekutaura kwandaita, tichakuzivisai kana musi wa31 Zvita wadarika apo kondirakiti yedu naAntipas inenge yapera.”   Mwedzi unotevera maWarriors achatanga kurwira tikiti rekuenda kumakwishu e2021 Africa Cup of Nations ayo achaitirwa kuCameroon uye Antipas ndiye ari kutarisirwa kutungamira chikwata ichi.

headline: Mutungamiri weSangano reYARD, VaMliswa Vanoburitswa neDare muHusungwa
text: Mukuru wesangano revechidiki reYouth Advocacy for Reform and Democracy, YARD, VaTemba Mliswa, avo vakasungwa neSvondo kuEsigodini mudunhu reMatabeleland South, vakamiswa pamberi pedare redzimhosva kuEsigodini kwakare vachipomerwa mhosva yekutyora mutemo wePublic Order and Security Act kana kuti POSA. Gweta raVaMliswa, VaLizwe Jamela vanoshanda nesangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights vanoti mutongi wedare aona zvakakodzera kuti VaMliswa vatongwe vachibva kumba kwavo vasina kubvisiswa mari yechibatiso. “VaMliswa vakasungwa nezuro (Svondo) vaine vamwe vavo 23 vavaifamba navo, vachibva kuBulawayo vakasvika kuEsigodini vakati regai timbotura zvedu mafemo, vavane zvekudya sezvo aive masikati, vachibva vatonzi watove musangano,” VaJamela vanodaro. Vanoti vakabva vasungwa vari makumi maviri nevana vachipomerwa mhosva yekuita musangano vasina kutanga vapiwa mvumo. VaJamela vanoti VaMliswa dzimwe nhengo makumi maviri nenhatu dzeYARD idzi dzakazoregwa dzisina mhosva yadzakapomerwa, kukasara VaMliswa, avo vakarara usiku humwechete muchitokisi chemapurisa. VaJamela vanoti VaMliswa vanzi vadzoke mudare musi wa 22 Chikumi. Vasati vasungwa, VaMliswa vanonzi vakambonetsana nemumwe kanzura mudunhu iri, VaPatson Sibanda, avo vaiti VaMliswa vakanga vavazvidza zvikuru nekuita musangano mudunhu ravo vasina kutanga vavakumbira mvumo kana kuvazivisa. No media source currently available

headline: Maindasitiri Oyambira Kukwira kweMitengo neNyaya yeKushomeka kweMagetsi neMafuta eKufambisa Motokari
text: Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce VaChris Mugaga, vanoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka mumaindasitiri nenyaya yekushomekwa kwemagetsi uye mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari. VaMugaga vanoti nenyaya yekuti vemabhizimisi havana zvavari kuita nekushaya magetsi nemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari. Vati zviri kutaurwa naVaNcube zvekuti mitengo yezvinhu ichaderera zvichanetsa kuzadzikisa sezvo vemabhizimisi vachamanikidzwa kutenga zvinhu zvakawanda kunze kuti vatengese munyika. Izvi vanoti zvichapa kuti mutengo wedhora rekuAmerica utange zvekare kukwira. Magetsi ari kudzimwa kwenguva yakareba ukuwo vatyairi vedzimotokari vari kupedza nguva yakawanda vachitsvaga mafuta asiri kuwanikwa nyore. Zimbabwe iri kutatarika kubhadhra chikwereti chemagetsi kuEskom yekuSouth Africa neCahora Bassa yekuMozambique. Izvi zvakapa kuti nyika mbiri idzi dzirambe kupa Zimbabwe mari yezvikwereti. Zimbabwe hainawo mari yekuAmerica inodiwa mukutenga mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kupota Ichizivisa Vanhu Nezve Vanofa Kana Kurwara Vabayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Vaimbove gurukota rinoona nezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa Dr Henry Madzorera vanoti hurumende inofanira kupota ichiburitsa huwandu hwevanhu vanenge varwara kana kufa mushure mekubayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19. VaMadzorera vati izvi zvinopa vanhu chivimbo chekuti vabayiwe nhomba vaine ruzivo rwakakwana nezvavanofanira kutarisira. No media source currently available Izvi zvinotevera mashoko eMedicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe kubepanhau reSunday Mail ekuti vanhu makumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu vakarwa mushure mekubayiwa nhomba uye vamwe vana vakafa. Pane vakafa ava, vanhu vaviri vanonzi vainge vaine zvimwe zvirwere asi chakauraya vamwe vaviri chichiri kuongororwa. Asi mukuru anoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika Dr Agnes Mahomva vati havo vanhu vakawanda vari kufa nechirwere cheCovid-19 havana kubayiwa nhomba. No media source currently available

headline: ZIBAWU Inoti Standard Bank Haina Chido cheKusimudzira Nyika
text: Sangano rinomirira vashandi vemumabhanga, re Zimbabwe Banks and Allied Workers Union, rinoti Standard Bank iri kuvhara mabhanga ayo mumaguta madiki akaita se Hwange, Chiredzi, Chinhoyi nemamwe, nekuti bhanga iri haridi kubatsira Zimbabwe kuti ibudirire. Mashoko aya anotevera mashoko ebhanga iri ekuti riri kuvhara mabhanga aro mumaguta madiki nekuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzehupfumi. Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Banks and Allied Workers Union, VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti vashandi vavo vakawanda vari kurasikirwa nemabasa nepamusoro pemaitiro ebhanga iri. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reStandard Bank. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Human Rights Commission Inoti Zanu-PF Iri Kuita zveMatongerwo eNyika paNyaya yeChikafu
text: Komisheni inoona nezvekodzero dzevanhu yeZimbabwe Human Rights Commision nhasi yazivisa kuti ongororo yayakaita inoratidza kuti vanhu vemapato anopikisa vari kunyimwa chikafu, mbeu nezvekurimisa nevashandi vehurumende pamwe nevatsigiri vebato riri kutonga reZanu PF. Vachizivisa zvakabuda mukuferefeta kwavakaita zvichetevera zvichemo zvakaturwa kukomisheni iyi nevanhu vakawanda kubva kumatunhu eBikita East, Mazowe Central, Muzarabani North neSouth neBuhera North, sachigaro we komisheni iyi, VaElasto Mugwadi vati kunyange hazvo mutungamiriri wenyika vakati hapana munhu anofanira kunyimwa chikafu, vanhu vari kunyimwa nemhaka yekuti havasi nhengo dzebato reZanu PF. VaMugwadi vati zviri kuitwa izvi kutyora kodzero dzevanhu ava pamwe nebumbiro remutemo wenyika. Vati hurumende kuburikidza nebazi revashandi nekuchengetedzwa zvakanaka kwevanhu rinofanira kuona kuti vashandi varo vapa vanhu chikafu vasingaite zverusarura uye vanenge vaita rusarura vanofanira kurangwa. Vati mapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police anofanira kushanda asina divi raakarekera uye vati zvinofadza chose kuti mapurisa akaosunga nhengo dzeZanu PF dzakarova mumwe kanzura webato reMDC kuBuhera North panyaya dzechikafu. VaMugwadi vatiwo makanzura nenhengo dzeparamende vanofanira kumirira vanhu vese kwete nhengo dzemapato avo. Vatiwo zvavakawana muongororo yavo zvichapihwa kune vese vane chekuita nazvo nechinangwa chekuti vagadzirise dambudziko iri. Mapato anopikisa, nemasangano anoshanda akazvimiriria agara achitaura kuti chikafu nezvekurimisa zviri kugovewa nerusarura. Vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vachishanda musangano reHuman Rights Watch, VaDehwa Mavhinga, vati Zimbabwe Human Rights Commission yaburitsa pachena rusarura rurukuitika panyaya dzechikafu munyika. Vaenderera mberi vachiti chasara kuti hurumende ichigadzirisa dambudziko iri uye komisheni iyi inofanira kumanikidzira mapurisa kuti aite basa ravo nemazvo. Vamwewo vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu VaVivid Gwede vanoshanda nesangano reZIMRIGHTS vaudza Studio 7 kuti gwaro reZimbabwe Human Rights Commission richaita kuti masabhuku nemadzishe achinje maitiro awo. Gurukota rinoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwevanhu Amai Priscah Mupfumira vakamboramba kuti izvi zviri kuitika vachiti vanenge vaine humbowo vauye nahwo kumahofisi avo. Kana mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakambotaurawo kuti hapana vanofanira kunyimwa chikafu. Asi mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMDC-T VaMorgan Tsvangirai vanoti vatsigiri vavo vari kunyimwa chikafu. Zimbabwe yakatarisana nenzara inotyisa uye pane vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mana varikuda rubatsiro rwechikafu. Chikafu chekubatsira vanhu ava chiri kutengwa nehurumende uye chimwe chirikubva kunyika dzakasiyana siyana dzakaita seAmerica pamwe nemasangano anobatsira akaita se World Food Program. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanosvika kuMusangano weWorld Economic Forum kuSouth Africa
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vasvika muSouth Africa kumusangano weWorld Economic Forum on Africa uri kuitirwa kuCape Town. VaMnangagwa vari kutarisirwa kubatana nevamwe vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica nevamwe venyika dzakabudirira. Musangano uyu uri kutanga neChitatu uchipera nemusi weChishanu kuCape Town International Convention Center. Ko Zimbabwe pane chainobura here pamisangano yakadai sezvo VaMnangagwa vachangobva kumuysangano we Tokyo International Conference on African Development kuJapan vamwe vachiti vakafambira dhongi rakaora? Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaCallisto Jokonya, vanoti misangano yakadai yakakosha zvikuru kuZimbabwe. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo namuzvinabhizimisi ari nhengo yeZanu-PF, VaGilbert Muponda, avo vati musangano uyu unopa Zimbabwe mukana wekuumba hushamwari nenyika dzakaitemere zvirango. VaJokonya vati Zimbabwe inofanira kunyatsouya nemazano akajeka kuti iwane chouviri pamisangano yakadai. Asi mumwe wevatevedzeri vebato rinopikisa reMDC, uye vaimbova gurukota rezvemari muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, VaTendai Biti, vanoti misangano iyi kuteya nzou neriva. Vati VaMnangagwa vanongoenda kumisangano pasina chinobuda nekuti hapana vekunze vanoda kudyidzana neZimbabwe nenyaya yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. VaBiti vati vanhu vemuZimbabwe vanofanira kutanga vabatana, asi vakati havaone VaMnangagwa vari ivo vangatungamire hurongwa uhu. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vari mukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vemunyika vatange vataurirana vasati vaenda kunze kunotsvaga vanoda kutanga mabhizimisi munyika. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau, mutauriri wemutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, Muzvare Khusela Diko, vati mutungamiri wenyika iyi achatungamira chikwata chemakurukota avo. Musangano uyu uri kuitwa pasi pedingindira rakanangana nekukurudzira kudyidzana munyaya dzezvekutengeserana kuburikidza nehumhizha hwechizvino zvino. No media source currently available

headline: TAGADZIRIRA AFCON: DECO
text: MUTAMBI wemaWarriors neLamontville Golden Arrows yekuSouth Africa – Danny “Deco” Phiri – anoti anoda kuita zvinorova apo vari kuenda kuEgypt kumakwishu eAfrica Cup of Nations (Afcon) ayo ari kutanga masvondo maviri  anotevera.   Phiri aive muchikwata chemaWarrirors chakaenda kuAfcon kuGabon mugore ra2017 apo chairairidzwa naKalisto Pasuwa asi havana kusvika kure mumutambo uyu sezvo vakaburitswa kumagroup stages ndokudzoka kumusha vasina kumbohwina kana mutambo mumwechete zvawo.   Muchikwata ichi maive nevamwe vatambi zvakare vakasarudzwa gore rino vakadai saMarvelous Nakamba, Knowledge Musona, Khama Billiat, Kudakwashe Mahachi naTeenage Hadebe.   “Aka kachange kari kechipiri kedu vamwe vatambi kudzokera kunotamba kuAfcon saka tiri kufanirwa kurakidza kuti takura uye tine zvidzidzo zvatakawana pamakwisu ekutanga ayo takaenda mugore ra2017.   “Saka gore rino tiri kufanirwa kutamba sevanhu vakurawo uye vanoziva zvavari kuita, tiri kuda kuita zvinorova,” anodaro Phiri.   Parizvino maWarriors ari kuSouth Africa uko ari kurwira kuchengetedza mukombe weCosafa Cup.   MaWarriors kana akabudirira kuhwina mukombe weCosafa svondo rino anobva apinda munhorowondo yekuhwina mukombe uyu katatu kakatevedzana.   South Africa neZambia zvakambohwinawo mukombe uyu kana, pachikwata chimwe nechimwe.   Chikwata chenyika ichi chichange zvakare chichishandisa mutambo uyu segadziriro yemakwishu eAfcon apo chichasangana nemaPharoahs ekuEgypt musi wa21 Chikumi.   Deco anoti vanozviziva kuti vatsigiri venhabvu vachange vakatarisira mutambo uyu apo vachatatsurana nevatambi veEgypt vanosanganisira Mohamed Salah.   Mugore ra2017 kuAfcon, maWarriors aive muboka reGroup D nezvimwe zvikwata zvinoti Algeria, Senegal neTunisia izvo zvaive zvizere nevatambi vepamusoro vanosanganisira Riyad Mahrez weAlgeria uyo panguva iyi aipisa zvikuru achangobva kuhwina mubairo weSoccer Star of the Year kozoti vamwe vakaita saSadio Mane weLiverpool.   “Isu vamwe sekutaura kwandamboita Afcon iyi ndeyedu yechipiri, takadzidza zvakawanda kare.   “Tinoziva kuti vatambi vane mazita aya uye Afcon yadarika takasangana nevamwe vaitopisa futi.   “Saka isu sechikwata tave kuziva kuti vatambi ava tinovamaka sei uye zvii zvinodiwa kuti tibudirire patinosangana navo.   “Chedu chatinofanirwa kuita chete kutamba sechikwata.   “Isuwo muchikwata chedu varimo zvakare vatambi vane mukurumbira saka hatisi kuvhunduka, tinongofanirwa kushanda nesimba chete kuti tisvike kure,” anodaro Deco.

headline: Basa tapedza: Zifa
text: MUTUNGAMIRIRI weZimbabwe Football Association, Felton Kamambo, anoti sangano ravo ragadzirira zvose zvinodiwa apo maWarriors atarisana nemutambo mukuru wekurwira tikiti rekuenda kumakwishu eAfrica Cup of Nations paachasangana neCongo Brazzaville kuNational Sports Stadium nemusi weSvondo uye chasara chete ndechekuti chikwata chenyika ichi chihwinhe mumutambo uyu.   MaWarriors mumutambo uyu ari kungoda chibodzwa chimwe chete kuti abudirire kuenda kuAfcon kuEgypt gore rino. Makore adarika, paimboita kugunun’una kubva kumaWarriors vachichemera mari dzavo dzebhonasi kubva kuZifa.    Felton Kamambo   Asi, sekutaura kwaKamambo anoti hakusisina matambudziko aya uye sangano ravo riri kushanda zvakasimba kuti zvinhu zvese zvifambe zvakanaka mumutambo wavo uyu.   “Takarongeka isu, ndozvatakanakira, zvese takagadzirira kuti mutambo uyu ufambe zvakanaka.   “Hapana chipingaidzo chatinofunga kuti chichatikanganisa kana mutambo wasvika. Zvese takagadzirira kuti zvifambe zvakanaka, kana vatambi chaivo vari kufara. Chasara kuti tihwine musi wesvondo tiende kuEgypt,” anodaro Kamambo.   MaWarriors – ayo ari kurairidzwa naSunday “Mhofu” Chidzambwa – ari kurwira kuti aende kumutambo weAfcon kechina munhorowondo yenhabvu yemuno.   Kamambo anoti zvakakosha kuti vatsigri venhabvu vauye nehuwandu hwavo kuzotsigira maWarriors.   “Vatsigiri vedu tiri kuvada chaizvo musi weSvondo kumutambo uyu, mukuru zvisingaite saka ngavauye nehuwandu hwavo kuzotsigira chikwata chedu.   “Zvamunongoziva vatsigiri venhabvu vane basa guru ravanobata pakutsigira chikwata saka isu tiri kuvada chaizvo svondo rino,” anodaro.   Zvakadaro, Kamambo anoti nemusi weSvondo mutambo uyu usati watanga, vachawana nguva yekurangarira vanhu vose  vakarasikirwa nehupenyu (minute of silence) nekuda kwemafashamu emvura aive nedutu guru kumatunhu enyika anosanganisira Manicaland.   “Ticharangarira vose vakarasikirwa nehupenyu hwavo nekuda kwemafashamu ayo akaitika kunzvimbo dzakasiyana dzenyika mutambo usati watanga uye tichabatsirawo vamwe nepatinokwanisa,” anodaro.   Zvakadai, vatsigiri venhabvu vanoti svondo rino vachazadza nhandare yeNational Sports Stadium zvisati zvamboitika munhorowondo yenyika ino.   Mutsigiri mukuru wenhabvu Chris “Romario” Musekiwa anoti sevatsigiri vari kuronga kuzadza NSS svondo rino uye masvondo adarika vange vachiita gadziriro yenziyo itsva dzekuimba vachitsigira maWarriors pamutambo uyu.   “Tiri kushanda basa guru rekukurudzira vatsigiri venhabvu kuti ngavauye musi weSvondo kunhandare kuzotsigira chikwata chedu chenyika, ngativapei rutsigiro rwakakwana vabate basa sebasa.   “Kaputeni wedu Knowledge Musona tinovimba naye nechikwata chese. Tinongoti vakomana fambai nebhora uye munwise bhora richangotanga, tatotarisana neEgypt,” anodaro Musekiwa.   Mumwe mutsigiri wenhabvu – Hurbert Manyowa wekuKadoma – uyo anove sachigaro weKadoma Warriors Chapter, anoti musi weSvondo hapana munhu anofanirwa kugara kumba kwake asi nzira dzose ngadzinange kuNSS kunotsigira chikwata chenyika.   “Izvi ndezvenyika yedu, chikwata ndechenyika saka ngatibatane senyika kuenda kunotsigira vakomana vedu vachibata basa.   “Gore rino nderedu maWarriors anofanirwa kusvika kure. Iye zvino tinoona kuti hapasisina nyonga-nyonga munhabvu yedu saka vakomana ngavatambe nhabvu vasafunge zvakawanda nekuti zvese zvakagadzirirwa kuti bhora ritsve,” anodaro Manyowa.   Mumutambo uyu, Chidzambwa achange achitarisira kuti vakomana vake vanosanganisira Musona, Khama Billiati, Tinotenda Kadewere, Evans Rusike, Knox Mutizwa naTalent Chawapihwa kuti vabate basa sebasa svondo rino kuNational Sports Stadium.

headline: Ndasuwa nhabvu: Antipas
text: MURAIRIDZI weChicken Inn, Joey “Mafero” Antipas, anoti asuwa zvikuru mutambo wenhabvu uye kuramba akagara pamba nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 kwakurwadza asi ajaira sezvo zvichibatsira hupenyu hwake nehwevakawanda.   Mafero — uyo akatungamira maGamecocks kuhwina mukombe weCastle Premiership mugore ra2015 — anoti kugara asingarairidze mutambo waanodisisa uye kuuona kwakaoma asi vanhu vanofanirwa kugara mudzimba kuti vange vakachengetedzeka.   “Ndasuwa mutambo wedu asi iye zvino chakakosha kunge takachengetedzeka kuti coronavirus isarambe ichipararira.   “Ngatitevedzere zvinodiwa chete, ini ndiri mumba mangu uye handisi kumbobuda,” anodaro Mafero.   Ari mamwe makore, mitambo yePSL ingadai yakatanga asi yakambomiswa nekuda kweCovid-19 senzira yekuti vanhu vasaungane uye kuti chirwere ichi chisapararire pakati pevanhu.   Antipas anoti mwedzi miviri mutambi asingatambe nhabvu yakawandisa chaizvo saka ari kukurudzira vatambi vake kuti vange vachiita gadziriro vari kudzimba dzavo nekuti hapana anoziva kuti mitambo inotanga rinhi.   “Vatambi venhabvu vanofanirwa kukoshesa miviri yavo saka tiri kutovakurudzira kuti vari kudzimba dzavo vambomhanya uye kuita gadziriro dzakasiyana. Chirwere ichi chatidzidzisa kuti tinofanirwa kufamba nezviripo,” anodaro.

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanovhura Zviri paMutemo 2018 Agricutural Show
text: Mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vavhura Harare Agricultural Show zviri pamutemo vachiti zvirongwa zveCommand Agriculture nePresidential Input Scheme hazvisi zvematongerwo enyika uye hurumende yavo icharamba ichitsigira zvirongwa izvi sezvo zviri kubatsira nyika kuwana chikafau chakakwana. Vati zvirongwa izvi zvaita kuti nyika iite goho rakawandisa uye hurumende yavo icharamba ichizvitsigira. Vati kubudira kweCommand Agriculture kwakaita kuti ivandudzwe kusanganisira zvimwe zvirimwa zvakaita segorosi, zvipfuyo zvakaita semombe pamwe nehove. Vati zvirongwa izvi hazvisi zvematongerwo enyika sezvinotaurwa nemapato anopikisa munyika uye hurumende yavo icharamba ichitsigira chirongwa ichi. VaMnangagwa vati hurumende yavo inotsigira Harare Agricultural Show pamwe nezvirongwa zvayo zvakaita semusangano wayakaita svondo rino wevarimi nemabhizimisi. Vati mashoo emamwe matunhu munyika yose anofanira kudzidza kubva kuHarare Agricultural Show uyewo vati vachakurudzira hurumende dzematunhu dzichaumbwa pasi pehurumende kuti dzikoshese zvirongwa zvevarimi. VaMnangagwa vakurudzirawo makambani akazvimirira kuti atsigire mabasa ekurima kuitira kuti nyika ikwanise kutengesa zvirimwa zvayo kunze sezvayaiita kare. Mukuru weZimbabwe Agricultural Society, varongi veHarare Agricultural Show, VaNgoni Kudenga, vati chirongwa chavo chakabudira zvikuru gore rino uye huwandu hwevairatidzira zvirimwa hwakakwira nezvikamu gumi nezvina kubva muzana kana zvichienzaniswa negore rapfuura. Vatiwo ivo nekomiti yavo vari kuzeya pfungwa dzakapihwa nevamwe kuti Harare Agricultural Show isandurwe kuve National Agricultural Show sezvo ichipindwa nevarimi nemakambani kubva mumatunhu ese munyika. Mutungamiriri weGrain Millers Association, GMA, VaTafadzwa Musarara, vaudza Studio 7 kuti makambani ari musangano ravo ave kutotsigira varimi nechekare. Pashoo yegore rino GMA ndiyo yapa mubairo wezviuru zviviri nemazana mashanu emadhora kukambani yeGushungo Dairy iyo yatora mubairo wekutanga pachikamu chevarimi vanochengeta mombe. Zimbabwe Parks and Wildlife Management Authority yatora mubairo wekuita basa rayo zvakanaka. Mukuru wekambani iyi, VaFulton Mangwanya, vaudza Studio7 kuti vafara chose nekukunda kwavaita. Kambani yeSeedco ndiyo yawana mubairo wekutanga pamakambani ese airatidzira gore rino kozotiwo Zimbabwe Broadcasting Cooperation ndiyo yawana mubairo pamakambani ese ezvenhau akapinda pashoo yegore rino. Varimi vahwina mibairo inosanganisira dzimotokari, mari nematirakita. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vanhu Vashanu Vofa neChirwere cheCovid-19 muNyika
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vafa nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika hwakwira kusvika pagumi nevasere kana kuti 18 mushure mekunge vamwe vanhu vashanu vashaya. Vanhu vatatu vakafa vari munharaunda dzakasiyana siyana vamwe vaviri vakafa vari munzvimbo dzinochengeterwa vanenge vabatwa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vaabatwa nechirwere ichi kusvika parizvino vanosvika mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi masere nevashanu kana kuti 985. Izvi zvinotevera kubatwa kwevamwe vanhu vatatu nechirwere ichi nezuro. Pavanhu ava, vaviri vakabva kuSouth Africa uye mumwe akachitapurirwa munyika. Harare ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi vanosvika mazana maviri nemakumi masere nemasere kana kuti 288 ichiteverwa neBulawayo ine vanhu zana nemakumi masere nevatatu 183, Mashonaland Central ndiyo ine vanhu vashoma vabatwa nechirwere ichi vanova gumi nemumwe. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi vanosvika mazana matatu nemakumi maviri kana kuti 320. Vanhu vavhenekwa chirwere ichi munyika vadarika zviuru makumi masere nezvisere kana kuti 88 000. Kunyangwe hazvo huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nekufa kwechirwere checoronavirus huri kuramba huchiwedzera, vashandi vemuzvipatara kusanganisira vakoti navanachiremba vave nemazuva makumi maviri nematanhatu vachiramwa mabasa nekuda kwekushomeka kwemari dzavari kutambiriswa. Hatina kukwanisa kubata vakafanobata chigaro chegurukota rezvehutano VaAmon Murwira sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Asi gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vakaudza dare resenate kuti hurumende yakazvipira kuita hurukuro nevashandi vayo vari kuramwa kuita mabasa. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Nurses Association VaEnoch Dongo vanoti vari kusangana Muvhuro uno neveHealth Services Board vanoona nezvemari dzinotamburiswa vashandi vemuzvipatara. No media source currently available

headline: Mapazi eHurumende Onakurirana Nyoka Mhenyu neSakunda paMabhiriyoni eCommand Agriculture Akatsakatika
text: Grain Marketing Board (GMB) nhasi yaudza komiti yeparamende inoona nezvekushandiswa kwemari yehurumende yePublic Accounts Committee (PAC) kuti yainge isineyi nechekuita nechirongwa chehurumende cheCommand Agriculture ichiti Sakunda Holdings ndiyo yaitungamira chirongwa ichi. Izvi zvinopokana nezvakataurwa neveReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, bazi rezvemari nebazi rezvekurima avo vakaudza paramende kuti GMB ndiyo yakapihwa mari yechirongwa cheCommand Agriculture. Komiti yePAC iri kuongorora mashandisirwo akaitwa mabhiriyoni emadhora nehurumende pachirongwa cheCommand Agriculture zvisina mvumo yeparamende. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwebasa muGMB, VaClemence Guta, vaudza PAC, kuti basa reGMB raive rekuchengeta nekupa varimi mbeu, fotereza nezvimwe zvaishandiswa pachirongwa icho vati chaitungamirwa neSakunda Holdings. Asi sachigaro vekomiti iyi, VaTendai Biti, nevamwe vavo varatidza kusafara nemhinduro iyi vachiti semuenzaniso, vaive munyori mukuru mubazi rezvemari, VaRingison Chitsiko, vakaudza komiti yavo kuti vainge vasingazive kuti mari inosvika mamiriyoni mazana masere nemakumi mana nemanomwe yakapihwa nehurumende kutsigira mabasa ekurima muna 2017 yainge yashandiswei vachiti GMB ndiyo yaiziva kuti mari iyi zvakaitika. Asi VaGuta pamwe nevakafanoba chigaro chemukuru anoona nezvemari muGMB, Amai Constansia Dzenga, vati havana chavanoziva pamusoro penyaya iyi vachiti ivo vaingo tambira mbeu nefotereza zvaiuyakumatura avo vachizviendesa kuvarimi. Vati havana kana gwaro ravakasaina reCommand Agriculture vachiti Sakunda, nechikamu chaiona nezveCommand Agriculture mubazi rezvekurima ndivo vaiziva zvaitika. Amai Dzenga vati nekuda kwaizvozvo havatomboziva kuti zvinhu zvavaichengeta zvaiita marii sezvo zvange zvisiri zvinhu zvavo. Panyaya yekuti GMB yakapihwa mari inosvika bhiriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matatu kana kuti $1.3 billion muna 2017 na2018 kuti itsigire mabasa ekurima, VaGuta vati pane musiyano pamari dziri kutaurwa idzi pamwe nedzavakawana. Amai Dzenga vatiwo semuenzaniso muna 2018 vakapihwa mamiriyoni mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti $900 million kwete bhiriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matatu kana kuti $1.3 billion iri kutaurwa. Imwe nhengo yekomiti iyi, VaMarko Raidza vati zvinonetsa kutambira zvinoitaurwa nevakuru vakuru veGMB pasina humbowo. Asi VaBiti zviri kutika kuGMB ishura chairo uye zviri pachena kuti zvinhu zvakaita manyama amire nerongo mukambani iyi. Vati komiti yavo inogona kuti kambani iyi iongororwe zvakanyanya kana kuti Forensic Audit nekuti zvinhu hazvisi fambiswa negwara chairo. Dzimwe nhengo dzekomiti iyi dzati kuti nyaya iyi inatsobuda pachena, GMB, RBZ, bazi rezvemari pamwe nerekurima vanofanirwa kubvunzurudzwa pamwe chete kuti pasaite kukandirana nyika mhenyu. Pane mari inodarika mabhiriyoni mapfumbabwe emadhora yakashandiswa zvisvina mvumo yeparamende pachirongwa cheCommanda Agriculture uye PAC iri kuita ongororo yekuti marii iyi yakashandiswa sei. Kambani yeSakunda inotarisirwa kumira pamberi pekomiti iyi munguva pfupi inotevera. No media source currently available

headline: VaDzvokora Vokurudzira Vana veZimbabwe Vari Kunze Kuti Vabatsire Mukugadzirisa Zvinhu Kumusha
text: Mumwe wevari kushanda mukugadzirisa ramangwana rinotarisirwa ndaVaTawanda Dzvokora, avo vanozviti Chief Svosve. Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zvakawanda zvinoramba zviine shuviro yekuti zvinhu kumusha zvichanaka nerimwe zuva. Asi pahuwandu hwazvo, zvimwe ndizvo zviri kubatawo nepazvinogona napo mukuedza kuti hutongi hwejechetere huri kutarisirwa nevakawanda huitike nekukasika. Mumwe wevari kushanda mukugadzirisa ramangwana rinotarisirwa iri ndaVaTawanda Dzvokora, avo vanozviti Chief Svosve. Vanoti hapana chinombonakidza pakugara kunze kwenyika. “Ini ndiri munhu wekumusha, saka ndinoramba ndichitarisira kuti zvinhu zvichanaka chete, asi kwete nekuti vanhu vari kumusha chete ndivo vanofanirwa kushanda asi kuti kana nesuwo tiri mu diaspora,” vanodaro VaDzvokora. VaDzvokora, avo vaimbove murairidzi vakambodzidzisawo munyika yeBotswana vasati vasunga twavo nemhuri yavo vakananga kuUnited States of America kudunhu reNorth Dakota uko kwavakasvikopinda munyaya dzemhando dzemoto vachisiya zvekubata choko. “Ndagara mu diaspora kwe 15 years, 10 ndiri kuBotswana then five ndiri muno umu, asi pfungwa dzinenge dzingori kumusha nekuti muno tiri musango. Saka kare vakuru vaiti kunonzi kutetereka.” VaDzvokora, avo vane makore makumi mana nemashanu ekuberekwa, ndivo zvakare mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko mubato rinopikisa hurumende reZimbabwe First iro rinotungamirwa naVaMaxwell Zeb Shumba. Ndivo zvakare munyori anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mumubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa weNational Electoral Reform Agenda, kana kuti NERA, vachimirira bato ravo reZim First, uyo uri kurwira kuti munyika muitwe sarudzo dzakachena. Vanoti vana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika vanofanirwa kuitawo pavo mukuwedzera kuti zvinhu zvikasike. Kumusha vanoti vari kubatsirawo nekutumira mbatya, chikafu nezvimwe zvakadaro kuburikidza nechechi yavo yeZimbabwe Methodist Church. “Gore rega rega tinotumira munhu kumusha anonogovera zvinhu zvatinenge taunganidza pamwe nekutenga,” VaDzvokora vanodaro. Vanoti vari kutenga dzimba kumusha senzira yekuunganidza nayo hupfumi uye pari zvino vari kuvaka imba yekuti vari parwendo vanogona kurara kana kuti lodge kuChinhoyi. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yovimbiswa neChina Nhomba yeChirwere cheCovid-19
text: China yazivisa kuti Zimbabwe ndeimwe yenyika gumi neina dzichatanga kuwana rubatsiro rwemajekiseni enhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 pasi pechirongwa chayo chekubatsira nyika dzichiri kubudirira kuti dziwane mishonga iyi. Izvi zvaziviswa nemutauriri webazi rekuChina rinoona nekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaWang Wenbin, avo vati mishonga iyi yakagadzirwa munyika mavo uye zvavari kuita izvi kuzadzisa chitsiidzo chaikaitwa nemutungamiri wenyika yavo, VaXI Jingpin.
