China yatiwo ichabatsira zvekare dzimwe nyika dzichiri kubudirira makumi matatu nesere pachikamu chinotevera uye ichapinda muchirongwa cheWorld Health Organisations cheCOVAX. Nyika iyi inotiwo mishonga yakaita seichapihwa Zimbabwe iyo yakagadzirwa nekambani yeSinopham neSinovac, yakatoendeswa kunyika dzakaita seUnited Arab Emirates, Brazil neChile. VaWenbin vati nyika dzepasi rese dzinofanira kubatana mukurwisa Covid-19 vachiti China icharamba ichibatsira nyika dzichiri kubudirira nedzinotambura nemishonga. Vatiwo vanovimba kuti nyika dzakabudirira dzichaita zvimwezvo kuitira kuti munhu wese awane mushonga wekudzivirira Covid-19. Muchiziviso chavo, VaWenbin havana kuzivisa kuti Zimbabwe ichawana mishonga yakawanda zvakadii pasi pechirongwa ichi. Dzimwe nyika dzichawanda rubatsiro neZimbabwe in Pakistan, Brunei, Nepal, Philippines, Myanmar, Cambodia, Laos, Sri Lanka, Mongolia, Palestine, Belarus, Siera Leone neEquatorial Guinea. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kudivi rehurumende sezvo mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa edenda reCovid-19 mumahofisi emutungamiriri wenyika, Dr Agnes Mahomva, vange vakabatikana panguva yataenda pamhepo. Mutungamiri werimwe remasangano anomirira machiremba anoshanda akazvimirira, reMedical and Dental Private Practitioners Association of Zimbabwe, Dr Johannes Marisa, vati zvaitwa neChina zvakanaka nekuti hurumende yeZimbabwe inogona kunge isina mari yekutenga mishonga inokwanira munhu wese. Vati mabatirwe ari kuitwa vanhu nehutachiwana hweCovid-19 anoratidza kuti mishonga yenhomba iyi ndiyo yakakosha pakubatsira kudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. Vaenderera mberi vachiti vakazvipira kushanda nehurumende mukudzidzisa vakoti vevamwe kuti mishonga iyi inoshandiswa sei. Vatiwo zvakakosha kuti zvipatara nemakirinika zvitange kugadzirira nzvimbo dzekuchengetera mishonga iyi sezvo ichinzi inofanira kuchengetedzwa panotonhora. Zvichakadai, vaimbove nhengo yekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano, VaPrince Dubeko Sibanda, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo zviri kuitwa neChina zvakanaka, zvinosuwisa kuti hurumende haisati yazivisa veruzhinji kuti hurongwa hwayo pakutenga nekupa vanhu mishonga yeCovid-19 hwakamira sei. VaSibanda vatiwo hapana kuchejeka pakushandiswa kwezvinhu zvinenge zvapihwa pachena nedzimwe nyika. Mashoko eChina anouuya apo hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti masangano anopa rubatsiro ari kubatsira nyika nemari inoita mazana maviri nemakumi matatu nemana emamiriyoni emadhora ekuAmerica kurwisana neCovid-19 pamwe nezvirwere zvakaita seBP neDiabetes. Mari iyi inosanganisira mamiriyoni makumi mana nemapfumbamwe nemadhora ekuAmerica yakabva kuGlobal Fund iyo yave kutoshandiswa kutenga zvekudzivirira varapi kana kuti Personal Protective Equipment, mishonga pamwe nezvinoshandiswa kuongorora hutachiwana hweCovid-19. Hurumende pachayo inoti ine mamiriyoni zana emadhora ekuAmerica ekutenga mishonga yekudzivirira Covid-19 munyika ine vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi nenshanu, kana kuti US$15 million. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inoti Haichapa Makambani ekuChina Mvumo yeKuchera Marasha kuHwange National Park
text: Dare remakurukota neChipiri rakazivisa kuti harichatenderi makambani maviri ekuChina anoti Afrochine Energy neZimbabwe Zhongxin Coal Mining Group kuchera marasha kuHwange National Park mushure mekunge vanhu vakawanda vagunun’una nezvedanho iri. Gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko Amai Monica Mutsvangwa vakaudza vatori venhau muHarare kuti hurumende haichape makambani aya mvumo yekuchera zviwanikwa mumasango anochengeterwa mhuka. MuHwange mune mhuka dzesango dzakawanda dzinosanganisira nzou, zvipembere, nyati nedzimwe. Mukuru wesangano reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu vanoti hurumende yaita zvakanaka kuteerera vange vachigunun'una nedanho rayo rekuda kuti vekuChina vacehere marasha munzvimbo yakakosha inochenetrwa mhuka dzesango. No media source currently available

headline: Zifa yoronga kudzoka kwenhabvu
text: SANGANO rinotungamirira nhabvu reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) rinoti riri kushanda siku nesikati kuti nhabvu ichidzoswe kutanga kwemwedzi unotevera (Kubvumbi) zvichitevera kunyevenutswa kwakaitwa matanho ekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 neHurumende svondo rino.   Muhurukuro, mutungamiri weZifa — Felton Kamambo — anoti sangano ravo rakatotanga kare gadziriro dzekudzosa mutambo uyu izvo zvange zvichivaona vachiongorora nhandare dzose dzenhabvu dziri munyika.    Anoti chasara pari zvino kuti vachipihwa mvumo neSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) yekuti nhabvu ichitanga kutambwa.   “Isu takatotanga kare gadziriro dzekuti mutambo uyu udzoswe nekuongorora nhandare dzose dzenhabvu dziri munyika. Tichiri kuenderera mberi nekuongorora kuti nhandare dzedu dziri munyika dzakamira sei kuitira kuti tigare takagadzirira.   “Saka iye zvino takamirira kupihwa mvumo neSRC kuti tichitange kuronga mitambo ichitambwe,” anodaro Kamambo.   Anoti seZifa, vakanga vaine chivimbo chekuti nhabvu itange muna Kurume asi hazvichakwanisike saka vave kutarisira kuna Kubvumbi.   “Taida chaizvo kuti nhabvu itange mwedzi uno asi hazvichakwanisike, tave kutarisira mwedzi unotevera. Takamirira kunzwa kubva kuSRC kuti toita sei.    “Tiri kupedzisa gadziriro dzose kuitira kuti tikapihwa mvumo yekuti nhabvu ichitanga pasawanikwe chikoneso chinoita kuti isatambwe,” anodaro.   Kamambo anoti sangano ravo rakaudza hutungamiri hwemaligi ose ari muno anosanganisira Premier Soccer League, Division One neTwo kuti vavanyorere vachivazisa zvikwata zvichakwanisa kukwikwidza mumwaka wegore rino.   “Takati kumaligi ose ngavatizivise zvikwata zvichange zvichikwikwidza kuitira kuti patinotanga kuronga mafambiro anoita mitambo yegore rino tinge tichiziva kuti pachange pane zvikwata zvipi uye kuti zvitiitire nyore pakuita hurongwa hwacho,” anodaro Kamambo.   Kutanga mwaka wegore rino kana nhabvu ikatanga kutambwa, Kamambo anoti Zifa ndiyo ichange yave kubhadhara varidzi vepembe izvo zvakasiyana nezvaiitwa kare sezvo vaibhadharwa nezvikwata zvinenge zvichitamba.   “Gore rino tinoda kuti zvikwata zvisanyanyoremerwa saka isu seZifa takazvipira kubhadhara varidzi vepembe kutanga mwaka uno, zvikwata hazvichabhadhare zvega varidzi vepembe,” anodaro Kamambo.

headline: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, VaTino Mambeu, Voenda Mberi neMabasa eKuisa Magetsi eMhando dzeMoto weZuva neMhepo muSouth Africa
text: Muchikamu chedu chatinotarisa zviri kuitwa nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika, tine hurukuro nechizvarwa cheZimbabwe, VaTino Mambeu, vanove nyanzvi munyaya dzemhando dzemoto wezuva pamwe newemhepo, kana kuti solar and wind energy vachishanda vari muJohannesburg, kuSouth Africa. VaMambeu, vanove mukuru wekambani yeUlwazi Energy Technologies, vanoti vakatanga vachingoisa magetsi emazuva ose aya vasati vapinda mukuteya moto wezuva neunobva mumhepo. Vanoti vanotarisira kuti gore ravanozodzokera kumusha vanonoenderera mberi nekuita basa iri, uye vari kukurudzira hurumende kuti isabhadharisa mitero pamidizyo yemabasa avanenge vachiita vari kunze kwenyika kana vodzokera kumusha nayo. No media source currently available

headline: Zororo reEaster Rinorangarirwa Gore Rino Vanhu Vasingaungane
text: Vatendi vechiKristu vakawanda pasi rose varangarira zororo reGood Friday vari mudzimba dzavo munyika dzakasiyana siyana nekuda kwechirwere cheCoronavirus, icho chapararira pasi rose, kusanganisira muZimbabwe, umo chauraya vanhu vatatu. Vanamati vechiKirisitu vakawanda muZimbabwe vateerera yambiro yemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, yekugara mudzimba munguva ino yekuvharwa kwenyika apo vakawanda vanoti varangarira kufa kwaJesu nekunamata pamwe nekutora chirairo vari mudzimba dzavo. Amai Tsungai Madhuviko vanoti kunyange hazvo vatadza kuungana nevamwe vavo semakore ese nekuda kwechirwere cheCoronavirus, vari kunamata vari mumba vachitevedza mitemo yesangano ravo rechipositori yekwaMadzibaba Mwazha. Amai Madhuviko vanoti zvakakosha kutevedzera zviri kutaurwa nevezvehutano kuitira kuti vasarasikirwe nevatendi vafa nechirwere ichi. Mumwe mutenderi, Amai Petronela Nyikadzino, vanoti vakaronga nedzimwe nhengo dzekereke yavo yeHwisiri kuburikidza nedandemutande reWhatsup kuti vachange vachinamata nguva dzakafanana. Mumwe mutendi, VaTonderai Makaya, vanoti chikuru hakusi kunamata vanhu vakaungana, asi kunamata mumweya nemuzvokwadi. VaMakaya vanoti Pasika yaidyiwa nemhuri vari mumba mavo sezvaitika kumhuri dzakawanda nhasi. Mufundisi wekereke yePentacostal Assemblies of Zimbabwe, VaTawanda Munaki, vanoti kunamata hausi mudhuri uye kereke yaJesu inoenderera mberi nekunamata mudzimba vachiti panoungana vanhu vaviri kana vatatu, Jesu vanenge varipo sezvinotaura bhaibheri. Mufundisi Munaki vanoti kuvharwa kwezvivakwa nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 kwapa mukana vafundisi kuti vataure nenhengo dzavo kuburikidza nemadandemutamde eWhatsup, Livestreaming neFacebook. Svondo rakapera, gurukota rezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vakayambira vatendi kuti vasaungane vachinamata vachiti achawanikwa achiita izvi achazvionera pamhuno sefodya. Asi vamwe vatendi vanoti danho rekusaungana rinodzorera kutenda kwavo kumashure sezvo vatendi vachikurudzirana kunamata vakawanda. Vatenderi vechiKristu pasi rose vanoremekedza zuva reGood Friday, senzira yekurangarira kuurayiwa kwaJesu Kristu, uyo akafa nemusi weChishanu, akazomuka nemusi weSvondo, zuva rinorangarirwa seEaster Sunday. No media source currently available

headline: Chin'ono naVaNgarivhume Vanobudiswa Mujeri Mushure Mekubvisa Mari yeChibatiso
text: Mutori wenhau Hopewell Chin’ono pamwe nemutungamiri weTransform Zimbabwe, VaJacob Ngarivhume, vapihwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso nedare repamusoro mushure mekugara mujeri kwenguva inoda kusvika kusvika kumwedzi miviri. Chin’ono, uyo anga ava nemazuva makumi mana nematatu ari mujeri, abvisiswa zviuru gumi zvemadhora, ukuwo VaNgarivhume, avo vanga vava nemazuva makumi mana nemashanu, vabvisiswa zviuru makumi mashanu zvemadhora emaRTGS. Vachitura mutongo pachikumbiro chaChin’ono chekuti atongwe achibva kumba, VaTawanda Chitapi vati dare ramejasiriti rakakanganisa pakusaona kuti musi wa31 Chikunguru wakange washevedzerwa kuratidzira wakange wadarika pakaenda Chin’ono kudare iri achiti pane zvashanduka kubva paakambonyimwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso nedare iri. VaChitapi vati Chin’ono abhadhare mari inoita zviuru gumi zvemadhora ari maRTGS uye kuti asiye magwaro emba yake, azvipire kumapurisa kaviri pasvondo, asiye pasipoti yake kudare uye kuti asaende padandemutande rake reTwitter. Rimwe remagweta aChin’ono, VaGift Mtisi, vatenda kuti izvi ndizvo zvaturwa nedare. Mutungamiri wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevatapi venhau reMisa Zimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo, vati zvanzi nedare Chin’ono asaende paTwitter, zvinotyora kodzero dzake. Vachiturawo mutongo wakanyorwa naVaSiyabona Musithu, VaChitapi vati VaNgarivhume vabhadhare madhora zviuru makumi mashanu kana kuti $50,000 ari maRTGS, vasiye pasipoti yavo kudare ramejasitiriti, vazvipire kumapurisa katatu pasvondo uye vagare kumba yavo yekuWaterfalls kudzamara nyaya iyi yapera. Gweta raVaNgarivhume, VaMoses Nkomo, vati vafara zvikuru nemutongo waturwa nedare kunyange hazvo zvakatora nguva yakareba kuti VaNgarivhume vasunungurwe kubva pavakasungwa musi waChikunguru 20. Zvichakadai, mushandi mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vati mitongo yaturwa nedare nhasi inoratidza kuti matare emunyika anoshanda akazvimirira. Chin’ono naVaNgarivhume vari kupomerwa mhosva yekukurudzira veruzhinji munyika kuti varatidzire zvine mhirizhonga mukati musi waChikunguru 31. Vaviri ava vakanyimwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso kaviri nedare ramejasitiriti uye kamwe chete nedare repamusoro vasati vapihwa mukana uyu nhasi. Mune imwewo nyaya yanga iri mumatare kuMasvingo, hurumende inonzi yabvisa imwe nyaya panyaya mbiri dzanga dzichipomerwa kanzura weMDC Alliance, Va Godfrey Kurauone, avo vari muchitokisi kwenguva inodarika mwedzi. Nyaya yaraswa ndeyekuimba kwavanonzi vakaita vachizvidza mutungamiri wenyika. Gweta riri kumirira VaKurauone, VaMartin Mureri, vati VaKurauone vari kudzokera zvakare mudare mangwana apo pari kutanga kutongwa nyaya yavari kupomerwa yekuvhiringidza kufamba kwevanhu pamwe nedzimotokari. No media source currently available

headline: Voruzhinji Vokurudzirwa Kuti Vabayiwe Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Veruzhinji vari kukurudzirwa kuti vabaiwe nhomba yeCovid-19 uye kuti vasateerere zvinobuda pamadandemutande zvisingabvi kunyanzvi dzehutano pamusoro penhomba dze Covid-19 sezvo vanhu vakawanda vari kupedzisira vapinda muna taisireva. Imwe nyanzvi yezvehutano, Dr Brighton Chireka, vanoti veruzhinji vanofanirwa kusaungana kundufu panguva ino yedenda reCovid-19 uye vateerere zvinotaurwa nebazi rezvehutano pamusoro pehuwandu hwevanhu vanofanirwa kunge vari parufu. Dr Chireka vanoti panguva ino yeCovid-19, chakakosha kubaiwa nhomba yechirwere ichi nekutevedzera kurudziro yeWorld Health Organisation yekuti vanhu vapfeke mamasiki, vageze mawoko uye vagare vakataramukana kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisapararire. "Tinokurudzira zveruzhinji kuti vaende kunobayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 kuitira kuti vawane kuzvidzivirira ivo nemhuri dzavo sezvo denda iri riri kuuraya vazhinji uye dzimwe dzimba dzave kuto vharwa sezvo vanhu vazhinji vemhuri imwe vari kushaika panguva imwe,"vadaro Dr Chireka. "Tiri kuyambira vanenge vafirwa kuti vasaende nehuwandu kurufu sezvo kuri iko kuri kupararira zvakanyanya denda iri reCovid-19," vadaro Dr Chireka. Denda reCovid-19 rauraya vanhu zviuru zvina nemakumi mana nevanomwe, 4,047, uye kubata vanhu zviuru zana negumi nezvisere nemazana manomwe nemakumi mashanu nevana, 118,754 No media source currently available

headline: Ndadzoka: Pambeni
text: SHASHA yetsiva Peter “The Sniper” Pambeni anoti adzoka mumutambo uyu zvine mutsindo uye anotarisira kuramba achisimukira.   Pambeni nguva pfupi yadarika akahwina bhande reWorld Boxing Organization Africa Lightweight zvichitevera kukunda kwaakaita Albinius “Danny Boy” Felesian wekuNamibia. Muhurukuro neKwayedza svondo rino, Pambeni anoti akambenge arasika apo akasiya mutambo wetsiva mugore ra2008 ndokuenda kunyika yeSouth Africa kunotsvaga raramo.   Muchinda uyu akagara kuSouth Africa kwemakore anodarika matanhatu asi akazodzingwa kunyika iyi zvakaita kuti adzoke muno zvakare ndokunogara kuEpworth uko kwaakakurira. Anoti hupenyu hwakamuomera zvikuru apo aive kuEpworth uye akazosangana nemumwe aimbove maneja wake mumutambo wetsiva uyo akamutsvagira maneti ndokumupa achiti vatange basa rekuredza hove.   Zvisinei, anoti murume akange amupa maneti uyu akabva anyura mumvura ndokufa izvo zvakamuvhundutsa zvikuru ndokubva arega zvokuredza hove izvi. Pambeni anoti akazosangana zvakare naStalin Mau-Mau uyo akataridza chido chekumusimudzira mumutambo wetsiva ndokutanga kumutsigira.    “Ndakamborasika nekuti nekuda kwevanhu vandaimbofamba navo kare vakatadza kundiraira chaizvo izvo zvakazoita kuti ndiramwe mutambo wetsiva ndokumbobva ndikanogara kunyika yeSouth Africa.   “Ndakazodzoka kuSouth Africa ndikasangana neaimbove maneja wangu ndikamuudza kuti ndave kuda kuita zvetsiva zvakare. Asi pane kuti anditengere magirovhosi etsiva, akanditengera maneti ekuti tiende kunoredza hove dzekuti tipote tichitengesa. Asi patakaenda kuroredza hove iye akabva anyura mumvura saka nekutyira hupenyu hwangu ndakabva ndazvisiya,” anodaro Pambeni.   Anoenderera mberi achiti, “Ndakazosangana zvakare naVaMau-Mau ndikavaudza kuti ndoda kudzoka mutsiva, kubva ipapo ndiri kushanda navo uye vari kundibatsira. Iye zvino ndave shasha zvakare saka ndinotenda Mwari.”   Parizvino Pambeni ari kugadzirira kurwa nemumwe mutambi wekuSouth Africa nemusi wa12 Gumiguru muHarare. Mutambo uyu uchange uri wekugadzirira mumwe wekuzorwira kuchengetedza bhande rake munaZvita apo acharwa nemutambi achazozivikanwa.   Mau-Mau anoti anoda kuti Pambeni agorwira kuchengetedza bhande rake munyika muno pamberi pevatsigiri vake. Anoti iye zvino haakwanise kutaura kuti achasangana nani sezvo vachiri pakati pekusainirana makondirakiti ekuti vagorwa.   “Pambeni acharwira kuchengetedza bhande rake muno, izvozvo ndovimbisa. Ndiri kushanda nesimba kuti zviitike uye zvichaitika chete.   “Mwedzi unotevera ari kurwa nemutambi wekuMalawi uye munaZvita orwira bhande rake reWBO Africa Lightweight nemutambi watichazokuzivisai kana tangopedza kunyorerana pasi,” anodaro.   Mau-Mau anoti mamaneja evatambi vetsiva anofanira kurwira kodzero dzavo zvizere.   “Moziva zvatinoona vamwe vatambi vetsiva vachiitwa zvinopisa tsitsi, hazvidi kudaro wena. Mutambi shuwa anga ende kuNamibia nebhazi apa achisvika achirwa? Anokundwa nekuti anosvika akaneta. Mamaneja ngavagone kuchengetedza vatambi vavo uye ngavasatungamidze mari nguva dzese. Vatambi vekune dzimwe nyika kana voda kusimukira vanopa mamaneja vemuno mari voenda ikoko nebhazi mutambi anosvika orohwa, mutambi wekuNamibia osimukira vedu vemuno vachidzikira,” anodaro Mau-Mau.

headline: America Inobudisa Gwaro Rinoshora Kutyorwa kweKodzero dzeVanhu muZimbabwe
text: Bazi re America rionoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, re State Department, rabudisa gwaro pamusoro pekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu kwarinoti kuri kuitwa nehurumende yeZimbabwe. Gwaro iri, kana kuti Zimbabwe 2020 Human Rights Report, rine mapeji makumi mana nemapfumbamwe (49), uye rinobva muongororo yakaitwa muna 2020. Bazi re State Department rinoti hurumende mu Zimbabwe inouraya vanhu pamusoro pezvamatongerwo enyika, inotsakatikisa vanhu, kutocha vanhu nekusabata vasungwa zvakanaka. Gwaro iri rinoshoravo majeri emunyika, pamwe chete nekushora mabatirwo anoitwa ngochani mu Zimbabwe. Tatadza kubata vanoona nezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, uye vange vasati vapindura mibvunzo yatavatumira. Asi gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, uye vari mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kwe Africa, VaDewa Mavhinga, vati hurumende ye Zimbabwe haifanirwi kumirira kunzwa zvinobva kunze kwenyika, vachiti kana hurumende ikaterera pose panochema vana ve Zimbabwe, haizotyori kodzero dzavo nekuti inenge yave kuziva zvisingadiwi nevanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Masangano Akazvimirira Oshora Kushandiswa kweMauto neMakanzuru
text: Masangano akazvimirira ashora zvikuru zvaanoti kushandiswa kwemauto mumakanzuru pachirongwa chekuchenesa maguta. Masangano aya anoti izvi zvinofanirwa kumiswa izvozvo. Kuda kubviswa kwemakombi muguta kwakakonzera mhirizhonga neChina pamwe nerufu. Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita nevatori venhau muHarare nhasi, mutauriri weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaTabani Moyo, vashoropodza hurumende nekushandisa mauto kuti apindire munyaya dzekanzuru. VaMoyo vati zvakaitika neChina zvinorangarisa veruzhinji chirongwa cheOperation Murambatsvina chakaitwa muna 2005 chikasiya vamwe vanhu vasisina pekugara. VaMoyo vati maitiro ehurumende aya anoratidza kuti inoda kutanga zvakare chirongwa chakadai izvo vati hazvifanirwi kuregerwa zvichiitwa. Sachigaro weCombined Harare Residents Association, VaSimbarashe Moyo, vashorawo gurukota rezvekutongwa kwematunhu, VaJuly Moyo, vakavapomera mhosva yekuda kusvibisa kanzuru yeHarare iyo ine makanzura eMDC akawanda vachiti maitiro eZanu PF kana sarudzo dzosvika. Vakasanobata chigaro chameya weHarare, Va Enock Mupamawonde, varamba kuti kubviswa kwemakombi mudhorobha kune chekuita nekanzuru vakati izvi zvakaitwa nebazi rinoona nezvekutongwa kwematunhu pasina kanzuru. Vatiwo makanzura haawirirani nekushungurudzwa kweveruzhinji vari kutsvaka raramo, vakati matambudziko akatarisanwa nawo neguta anogadzirisika chete kana matambudziko ehupfumi munyika agadziriswa. Kumiswa kwemakombi kuti asapinde muguta kwakazomiswa nehurumende mushure memhirizhonga dzakaitika neChina. No media source currently available

headline: Dhora reMunyika Rotanga Kudonha Zvakanyanya
text: Dhora remuZimbabwe riri kuramba richishaya simba zvakanyanya zvave kupa kuti mitengo yezvinhu irambe ichiita chamurambamhuru sezvakamboitika kumakore ekuma2007 na2008. Dhora remuAmerica riri kutengwa nemadhora makumi matatu nemaviri kusvika makumi mana. Zvekudya, mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari nezvinhu zvakawanda zvave kudhura zvakanyanya zvekuti vamwe vave kuti danho rekushandisa dhora remunyika raramba kushanda. Vachitaura kuKuwadzana pahurongwa hwekuchengeta nzvimbo iyi muna Ndira, mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakati vainge vodzora dhora remunyika sezvo pasina nyika ingararame isina mari yayo. Asi mutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa, VaNelson Chamisa, vakatiwo zvekuda kushandisa dhora remunyika haishande. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano, vanoti vezvematongerwo enyika panyaya yemari handivo vanoudza musika wemari zvekuita. Mutungamiri wesangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers, VaDenford Mutashu, vatendawo kuti zvinhu zvave kutengeswa nemari yekunze. Mukuru weZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, VaChris Mugaga, vanotiwo panoda kutoisa musoro pamwe chete kuti dhora rishande zvakanaka. Asi Muzvinafundo Mugano vanoti hapana chembwa tenzi vararira mutakura nekuti kana iyo hurumende yave kuramba kutambira dhora remunyika. Munyori mukuru musangano reZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vatiwo kumushandi zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, iri kupota ichidhindha mari izvo zvinogona kuti nyika irambe iri kumawere. Asi gavhuna weRBZ, Dr John Mangudya, vanoti aya manyepo. Zimbabwe yakatanga kushandisa mari dzekunze kusanganisira dhora rekuAmerica muna 2019 asi ikazoti yave kudzokera mukushandisa dhora remunyika chete gore rapera. No media source currently available

headline: Kushandiswa kweMitemo yeRhodesia Kwopa Kuti Vanhu Vatorerwe Minda neMakambani ekuChina
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemitemo nekodzero dzevanhu dzinoti mitemo yeminda uye yezvicherwa isina kuvandudzwa kubva munguva yeRhodesia ndiyo yave kupa kuti vari mumamisha vakawanda vagare vakabatira hura mumaoko sezvo vave kumanikidzwa kutama vachisiya misha, makuva nenzvimbo dzavanoyeresa. Zvinhu zvakaita manyama amire nerongo kune vanhu variMashonaland East kwaKaseke kuUzumba, uye misha inoti Tome, Karimazonde, Kahwa neKatsukunya kwaMutoko uye kuChikomba kuChivhu. Vanhu ava vari kutamiswakuitira kuti makambani ekuChina achere matambo akakosha eGranite. Vamwe vakatarisana nekutamiswa vari kuChipinge Manicaland neChilonga kuChiredzi. Minda iyi iri kupihwa makambani evachena vanonzi vanodyidzana nehurumende. Pasi pemutemo weCommunal Areas Act, mutungamiri wenyika ndiye ane masimba ekuona kuti minda iri kumamisha iyi yashandiswa sei. Vanhu vemumaruwa havana magwaro kana kuti maTittle Deeds uye mitemo iripo inonzi haisi kunyatsovachengetedza. Gweta rinombomirira mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, VaTinomudaishe Chinyoka, vanoti mitemo inofanira kuvandudzwa. Mukuru werimwe sangano rinoona nezvekodzero dzevanhu munharaunda dzine zviwanikwa reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu, vanoti hurumende iri kukundikana kuona kuti kodzero dzevanhu vari kumaruwa dzachengetedza. Vatendawo kuti mitemo ivandudzwe. No media source currently available

headline: Vatungamiri veSADC Votarisirwa Kuparura Gwara reHupfumi
text: Vatungamiri veSADC neChitatu vari kutarisirwa kunyorerana chibvumirano chekuita mushandira pamwe pakugadzirisa maindasitiri kuitira kuti nyika dzavo dziwane pundutso. Chibvumirano ichi chiri kutarisirwa kuti chinge chiri chemakore makumi mana nemanomwe kubva muna 2015 kusvika muna 2063. Munyori weSADC, Dr Stergomena Lawrence Tax, vanoti chibvumirano ichi chikanyoreranwa, nyika dzemuSADC dzichabudirira zvakanyanya munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Hurongwa hwe SADC hwakanangana nekuumba maindasitiri, kuita mushandira pamwe mukutengeserana sezvinoitika mu European Union, pamwe nekukwenenzvera zvinotengeswa neSADC kuitira kuti zviwane mari yakawanda kana zvotengesa. Misangano yemakurukota navana mazvikokota yakatanga neMugovera senzira yekuronga hwaro hwemusangano wevatungamiri venyika idzi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Reserch Institute of Zimbabwe, VaProsper Chitambara, vanoti havaone Zimbabwe ichibuda nechouviri. Asi mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wesangano reZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, VaDavison Norupiri, vanoti Zimbabwe ichakwanisa kubudirira ikashanda zvakanaka nedzimwe nyika. No media source currently available

headline: Dynamos Yotatsurana neHighlanders muChibuku Super Cup
text:
Chikwata cheDynamos chatambidzwa Highlanders mumakundano eChibuku Super Cup. Uyu ndiwo mumwe wemitambo mikuru miviri yabuda mumubatanidzwa yezvikwa yeChibuku Super Cup yaitwa nhasi masikati mumwe wacho uchisanganisirawo Caps United ne Harare City.

Mitambo iyi iriko musi wa 29 Gunyana. Dynamos neHighlanders dzine nhoroondo yakasimba yekukwidzana asi mubati wehomwe weDembare VaWebster Marechera vanoti vachakunda.

Makepekepe Iri kusangana neHarare City iyo ichangobva kuvatorera murairidzi wavo Lloyd Chitembwe.

Asi maneja weCaps United VaShakesper Chinogwenya vanoti uyu mutambo ndewevarairidzi vaviri Chitembwe wacho neakamutsiva Darlington Dodo.

Mimwe mitambo iri kusanganisira Chicken Inn neManica Diamonds pamwe neZPC Kariba neHwange.

Chikwata chichakunda pakati peMushowani neBulawayo Chiefs chichasangana neNgezi, Black Rhinos ichitamba nevachakunda pakati peYadah ne TelOne.

Munyori mukuru weBlack Rhinos Lieutenant Mabhinginye vanoti varikuda kushandura matambiro avari kuita muligi kuisa kumukombe uyu.
Chikwata chichatora mukombe uyu chinobudirira kumirira nyika muCaf Confederation Cup. No media source currently available

headline: VaChamisa Vanotaura Zvakadzama Pamusoro peChirwere cheCovid-19
text: Mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, vaita musangano padandemudande vachitenda vanhu vose vari kushanda panguva ino nyika yakatarisana nedenda reCovid-19. VaChamisa vatiwo hurumende inofanirwa kupanga mazano nenyanzvi kuitira kuti ipedze denda reCovid-19. VaChamisa vati chirwere cheCovid-19 chinoda kuti vana veZimbabwe vaite muonerapamwe kuitira kuti vakwanise kukunda chirwere ichi. VaChamisa vati bato ravo rinotenda zvikuru zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika izvo zviri kubatsira kusimudzira zvipatara zvemunyika apo nyika yakatarisana nechirwere chedzihwa mupengo ichi. VaChamisa vatiwo havaoni zvine huchenjeri kuvhara nyika yese vakati vanoona sekuti zvingabatsire zvakanyanya kana kukaitwa tsvakurudzo kwoonekwa kuti chirwere cheCovid-19 chakawandira nzvimbo dzipi, kovharwa idzodzo. VaChamisa vati hurumende inofanirwa kutanga zvirongwa zvekuderedza huwandu hwevanhu vari mumajere pamwe nekuona kuti vanhu vanopara mhosva diki vapihwa mitongo isingavaise mumajeri senzira yekudzivirira kuapararira kwechirwere ichi mumajeri umo vanhu vari kugara vakamanikidzana. VaChamisa vakurudzirawo hurumende kuti ibatsire vanhu vari kutambura panguva ino vachiti vana veZimbabwe vakawanda vanorarama nekuzvishandira nekudaro kuvharwa kwenyika kuri kuvasiya vari parumananzombe. VaChamisa vakurudzirawo hurumende kuti iite tsvakurudzo dzakazara vanhu vasati vatanga kubaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19. Mumwe muongoroi wezvematongerwo enyika, uye vachishanda nesangano rePlatform for Youth Development, VaOwen Dhliwayo, vati mashoko ataurwa naVaChamisa ekubatana nekuitwa kwetsvakurudzo pasati patorwa matanho ekudzivirira chirwere ichi akakosha. VaDhliwayo vatsigirawo kuti zvakakosha kuti panguva ino nyika iri panguva ye National Lockdown, vanhu vawaniswe rubatsiro. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende nemashoko aVaChamisa aya sezvo nharembozha dzemunyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, yanga ichinetsa kubata. Asi vachitaura kunyika neMugovera, mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakatiwo vanhu vashande pamwe chete kurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19. VaMnangagwa vakavimbisawo rubatsiro rwavakati rwuchange rwuchipihwa veruzhinji, asi havana kutaura kuti rubatsiro urwu rwuchapiwa vanhu rinhi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano pamwe nedzematongerwo enyika dzarumbidza zvaitwa naVaChamisa zvekushandisa dandemutande reFacebook kutaura neveruzhinji dzichiti izvi zvinoita kuti vanhu vasaungane munguva ino yechirwere cheCovid-19. Mashoko aVaChamisa ndeekutanga gore rino vachitura mashoko kunyika yose. No media source currently available

headline: Nhabvu yadzoka . . . DeMbare, Bosso zvobandana
text: Ndooka   KUNOTSVA demo kugo­sara mupinyi nemusi weSvondo kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium muguta reHarare uko makara asionane – Dyna­mos neHighlanders FC – zvi­chatatsurana mumutambo wePresident’s Independence Day Trophy (Uhuru Cup).   Uyu ndiwo mutambo wekutanga wekutambwa nezvikwata zvemuno kub­vira apo mitambo yose yakamiswa munaKurume gore radarika senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Mutambo wekupedzisira pakati peDeMbare neBosso mugore ra2019, Bosso yakahwinha 2-0.   Nemusi weSvondo apo pachatambwa mutambo uyu kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium, kuchange kusina vatsigiri sezvo pachatevedzwa mitemo yose yeWorld Health Organisa­tion (WHO) neyemunyika muno yekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Vachitaura nguva pfupi yadarika, gurukota rez­vekuburitswa kwemashoko nenyaya dzenhepfenyuro, Senator Monica Mutsvan­gwa vanoti zvikwata zviviri izvi zvichatamba pachiteved­zwa mitemo yose yekurwisa denda iri.   “Zvikwata zviviri zvine mukurumbira, Dynamos neHighlanders, zvicharwira mukombe apo zvichasan­gana mumutambo wePres­ident’s Independence Day Trophy uyo uchatambwa pachitevedzwa matanho akatarwa eWHO neenyika ekudzivirira kupararira kwe­denda reCovid-19,” vanodaro Sen Mutsvangwa.   Munhoroondo yenhabvu yemutambo uyu, DeMbare neBosso zvakasangana ka16 uye zvose zvichik­wanisa kuhwina kanonwe mukombe uyu.   Mutambi weDeMbare – Kudzanai Dhemere – anoti ari kufara chaizvo nekudzoka kwenhabvu uye sechikwata vari kushanda nesimba kuti vagohwina mutambo uyu.   “Mutambo uyu tange tausuwisisa zvikuru, tange tane ngura yekugara nguva ndefu tisingatambe bhora,” anodaro Dhemere.   Murairidzi weBosso, Mandla Mpofu, nguva pfupi yadarika akati anofara chaizvo nekudzoka kwaPeter Muduhwa uyo akange aenda kunotamba kuTanzania nechikwereti kwemwedzi mitanhatu.   “Semurairidzi, ndino­fara chaizvo kuti mutambi wedu Muduhwa adzoka uyo ari kuunza hunyanzvi nehutungamiri muchikwata chedu.   Nd i n o z iva an e zvaakadzidza paange ari kuTanzania uye achapawo ruzivo urwu kune vamwe vake vaanotamba navo,” anodaro. Nhabvu yePre­mier Soccer League (PSL) yakapedzisira kutambwa mugore ra2019.   Mutambo wemusi weSvondo uyu uri kuonekwa nevazhinji segadziriro yekudzoka kwenhabvu yePSL apo mitambo iri kutarisirwa kutanga munaChivabvu.

headline: Voronga kusimudzira netball
text: SHASHA yakambonetsa mumutambo wenetball, Perpetual Siyachitema, anoti iye nevamwe vakambotamba mumutambo uyu vane hurongwa hwekuusimudzira nechinangwa chekubika vatambi vechikwata chenyika chemaGems chemangwana.   Siyachitema vazhinji vanomuziva nechiremerera chaakapihwa icho chichagara munhoroondo yemutambo wenetball munyika muno izvo zvakamuona achitungamira vatambi vemaGems kumakwikwi eVitality World Cup akaitirwa kuLiverpool, kuEngland, munaChikunguru gore rapera.   Achibva kumakwikwi aya, Siyachitema akasvika ndokusendeka kutamba netball ndokutanga kurairidza mutambo uyu.   Parizvino ari kurairidza chikwata cheGlow Queens icho chinokwikwidza muNetball Super League.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Siyachitema anoti ari kumhanya-mhanya zvikuru kuronga nevamwe vakambotamba mutambo uyu vekumapurovhinzi akasiyana kuti vasimudzire netball.   “Masvondo adarika, takasangana sevatambi vakambotamba netball kare tikambobandana mumutambo uyu. Tapedza, takagara pasi ndokukurukura kuti todii kuti tibatsirane pakusimudzira mutambo uyu. Ini ndave kurairidza mutambo uyu saka ndinoda chaizvo kuti vandakatamba navo kare vandibatsire muhurongwa hwangu uhu kuti ndifambe naho,” anodaro.   Siyachitema anoti shuviro yake kuti vese vakambotamba mutambo uyu vawanikwe vachiita mabasa akasiyana anosanganisira kurairidza kana kupinda muzvigaro zvekutungamira netball.   “Sevatambi vakambotamba mutambo uyu, zvakakosha chaizvo kuti tiwanikwe tichitora mabasa akasiyana uye tichironga kuti mutambo uyu wofamba sei. Isu takambotamba uye tinoziva zvinenge zvichiitika saka tinofanirwa kupinda mumutambo uyu toitawo mabasa ekuusimudzira.   “Saka tiri kutenderera mapurovhinzi akasiyana tichitamba nekukurukura neshasha dzakambotamba netball tichironga kuti toita sei kuti netball iende kumberi,” anodaro Siyachitema.

headline: Hurumende Yoomerwa Sezvo Hupfumi Huri Kuparara
text: Apo vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kuyaura nhenhamo, zvinhu zviri kuramba zvichioma uye hurumende iri kuramba ichiomerwa zvekuti yave kutadza kuita basa rayo pamwe nekutadza kubhadhara shandi vayo. Hurumende iyo inowana mari yekushandisa kubva kumitero yakasiyana siyana yakaita semutero unowanikwa pakutengeswa kwezvinhu, Value Added Tax, mitero yemakambani, Corporate Tax, pamwe neyavashandi kana kuti Paye As You Earn, inoti mari iri kuwanikwa nehurumende iri kuramba ichidzikira. No media source currently available Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti hapana tariro yekuti zvinhu zvichanaka munguva pfuti inotevera. Mumashoko avo emashandisirwo akaitwa mari nehurumende kusvika pakati pegore rino, gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vakati mari inowanikwa pamitero iyi yakadzikira zvakanyanya. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaNyasha Muchichwa, vanoti mari iyi kusanganisira PAYE icharamba ichidzikira sezvo makambani ari kuramba achivhara vashandi vachidzingwa mabasa. Nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyaya dzehupfumi, hurumende inotarisirwa kunge yave kutadza kubhadhara vashandi vayo pakupera kwegore rino. VaMasimba Manyanya, avo vakamboshanda mubazi rezvemari mumakore ekuma 1990s, vanoti izvi ndizvo zvinoitika kana hurumende ikatadza kuvandudza hupfumi munyika. VaManyanya vanoti zvinhu zvinogona kusamira zvakanaka mukati menguva pfupi inotevera. Vamwewo vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaJames Johwa, vanoti matanho mazhinji ari kutorwa nehurumende mukuedza kugadzirisa hupfumi haasi kushanda uye chave kudiwa kuti vari kutonga vabude pachena kuti vatadza kuitira kuti vanhu vemunyika nemapato nemasangano akasiyana siyana ashandire pamwe mukusimudzira hupfumi. Pari zvino hurumende yakaremerwa zvekuti pane mashoko asina kutsinhirwa ekuti iri kutopona nekutora mari kubva kune mamwe makambani ayo kuti ikwanise kuita basa rayo. Sachigaro wekambani ye Mbada Diamonds inove mubatanidzwa wehurumende neimwe kambani yekuSouth Africa, VaRobert Mhlanga, vakaudza paramende gore rapfuura kuti kambani yavo yakambosvika pane imwe nguva yekuti yaipa hurumende mamiriyoni makumi matatu emdhora pasvondo kuti ibhadhare vashandi vayo. Asi VaManyanya vanoti kunyange hazvo hurumende yange ichitora mari kumakambani emangoda nemamwe, zvinhu zvave kuoma kwese uye ichasara isisina kwekuenda. Pari zvino, hurumende iri kushandisa zvikamu makumi masere nezvitatu zvemari yese yebhajeti mukubhadhara vashandi izvi zvinoita kuti isare isina mari yekushandisa muzvipatara, zvikoro pamwe nemamwe mabasa. Semuenzaniso gore rapfuura, bazi rezvemari rakapa zvipatara zvese munyika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nematatu emadhora yekushandisa gore rese asi zvipatara izvi zvaive nechikwereti chemamiriyoni makumi matatu nematanhatu emdhora zvinoreva kuti mari yese yakaenda kunobhadhara zvikwereti. Makambani akawanda munyika kusanganisira ehurumende haasi kubhadhara mitero iyo inove nzira inowana hurumende nayo mari. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehufpumi dzinoti hurumende inofanira kusimbisa kubhadharwa kwemitero kuti iwane mari yekushandisa. Semuenzaniso gwaro raAuditor- General rinoti makambani ehurumende ange aine zvikwereti zvemutero zvemazana mashanu emamiriyoni emadhora gore rapfuura. VaChinamasa vanoti vakapa simba rekutevera mari dzese dzemutero dzisina kubhadharwa uyevo vanoti hurumende ichabata mitero pane mari dzimwe dzinowanikwa nevashandi vemakambani neakazvimirira kuti mari dzekubatsirikana dzibatirwe mitero. Asi VaMuchichwa vanoti hapana chinobuda nekuti vanhu havana chivimbo nemashandisirwo ari kuitwa mari nehurumende ndosaka kana makambani anokwanisa asiri kubhadhara mitero. Kunze kwemitero, nyika inokwanisa kukwereta kana kuwana rubatsiro kubva kunyika kana masangano ekunze. Asi VaManyanya vanoti izvi hazvikwanisike pari zvino nekuti hurumende iri kutadza kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo uye hukama hwayo nenyika zhinji dzinopa rubatsiro dzakaita seAmerica neBritain hauna kumira zvakanaka. Zimbabwe haisiwo kuwana rubatsiro kubva ku World Bank ne International Monetary Fund sezvo iri kukundikana kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo zvinodarika mabhiriyoni gumi emadhora Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi pamwe nezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti kana hupfumi hwenyika hukadonha, zvinhu zvinogona kushata munyika zvinogona kukonzera kuti sarudzo dziitwe nguva yadzo isati yasvika muna 2018. Zimbabwe National Statistics Agency inoti vanhu vanodarika makumi matanhatu munyika varombo uye zvikamu makumi manomwe kubva muzana zveavo vachiri pamabasa vanotambira mari iri pasi pemadhora mazana matatu nemakumi mashanu emadhora pamwedzi. Kumatunhu akaita seMatabeleland North, kune hurombo hunotyisa zvekuti vanhu vanodarika makumi masere kubva muzana kunzvimbo iyi vari kuyaura nenhamo.

headline: Nyaya yeGukurahundi Yonzwikwa neChina Svondo Rinouya
text: Dare reHigh Court muBulawayo rati nyaya yechikumbiro chechimbi-chimbi chekuti hurumende imire hurongwa hwekuda kuviga vanhu vakauraiwa panguva yeGukurahundi ichanzwikwa svondo rinouya. Mutongi wedare reHigh Court Justice, Martin Makonese, vati vave kuzonzwa chikumbiro ichi musi weChina svondo rinouya mushure mekunge gweta rehurumende, Rejoice Hove, rakumbira kupiwa nguva yekunyatsogadzirira zvizere. Mumwe murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu, VaCharles Thomas, avo vanoti vakatochwa panguva yeGukurahundi, vachishanda pamwe nesangano reIbhetsu Likazulu, vakaendesa chikumbiro chechimbi-chimbi chekuti hurumende imbomira hurongwa hwairi kuda kuita hwekuviga patsva vanhu vakauraiwa panguva iyi. Muchikumbiro ichi VaThomas, avo vari kumiririrwa negweta VaNqobani Sithole, vakadoma mutumgamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, gurukota rezvemukati menyika VaKazembe Kazembe, nasachigaro weNational Peace and Reconciliation VaSelo Nare saivo vanhu vane chekuita nenyaya iyi VaSithole vati nyaya iyi ichinzwikwa svondo rinouya sezvo gweta rehurumende rakumbira nguva, izvo zvatambirwa nedare. Amai Jenni Williams avo vanove mutungamiri wemubatanidzwa wemasangano akazvimirira ega, weMatabeleland Collective, varimowo munyaya iyi vakazvimirira pachavo vega sezvo mubatanidzwa wavo uri iwe wakavamba chirongwa chekutaura nemutungamiri wenyika kuti nyaya yeGukurahundi igadziriswe. Pane mutemo wekuti kuviga vanhu patsva vakauraiwa nenzira seyeGukurahundi chinhu chinofanirwa kuitwa hurumende ichitungamidzwa pamberi. Pane vanhu vanopfuura zviuru makumi maviri vakauraiwa panguva yeGukurahundi pakati pemakore a1983 na1987 mumatunhu eMatabeleland neMidlands nechikwata chemauto chainzi Fifth Brigade. VaMnangagwa vaive gurukota rezvekuchengetedzwa kwenyika panguva iyi mushakabvu Robert Mugabe vari mutungamiri wehurumende. Nyaya yeGukuruhandi inogara ichimutsa mutauro munyika nekuti vamwe vanoiwona seine chekuita nekurwisana kwemarudzi. Vamwe vanoti hurumende inifanirwa kubudisa pachena zvakaitika panguva iyi yokumbira ruregerero uye vakauraya vanhu ava votongwa kuitira kuti munyika muve nerunyararo rwechokwdi. Hurumende haisati yakumbira ruregerero panyaya iyi kusvika pari zvino.

headline: Nyanzvi Dzotaura Pamusoro peLockdown
text: Vanhu vakawanda vari kutambira nenzira dzakasiyana siyana kuwedzerwa kwaitwa Level 4 Covid-19 Lockdown nemamwe masvondo maviri kusvika musi wa Gunyana 7. Mumwe mutengesi wemumugwagwa audza Studio 7 kuti kuwedzerwa kwelockdown kunoreva kuti hupenyu hwavo hucharamba hwakavaomera sezvo vanhu vanenge vasina kusununguka kuti vafambe vachitenga zvavanoda. Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi, uye vachishanda ne Labor and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaProsper Chitambara, vati vange vari kutarisira kuti lockdown iyi ichisvika kumagumo senzira yokusimudzira makambani. Mutungamiriri weConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers, VaDenford Mutashu, vatiwo vatambira kuwedzerwa kwenguva yelockdown senzira yekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid 19. Asi vati chikumbiro chavo kuhurumende ndechekuti dai nguva yekuvhurwa kwezvitoro yawedzerwa vachiti vanenge vari kumabasa havana nguva yekupinda muzvitoro. Mutungamiri weProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vatiwo kunyange hazvo vatambira danho rekuwedzera lockdown level 4vanoshushukana nekusavapo kwegadziriro yekuvhurwa kwezvikoro. Asi nyanzvi munezvehutano huye vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Doctor Henry Madzorera, vati kupamhidzirwa kwelockdown hakuna zvakuri kubetsera kunyanya vakatarisa nyaya yezvekufambisa. VaMadzorera, avo vanove munyori wezvehutano muMDC Alliance, vati kurambidzwa kwezvekufambisa zvinotakura veruzhinji zvisiri pasi pekambani yeZupco kwasiya vanhu vaine dambudziko izvo zvoita kuti vanhu vamanikidzane mumotokari shoma dziriko izvo zvichawedzera njodzi yekubata chirwere ichi. Gurukota rezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vakazivisa nezuro kuti hurumende yawedzera lockdown nemasvondo mavirisenzira yekurwisa denda reCovid-19. Vakatiwo hurumende icharamba ichitenga nhomba kuti vese vanoda vabayiwe. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekumisa kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti Covid-19 yakauraya vanhu makumi mavirinevanomwe, uye vanhu mazana matatu neguminevapfumbamwe (319) vakabatwa nechirwere ichi Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose vava zviuru zana nemakumi matatu nezvitatu nemazana matatu nemakumi maviri(123 320), uye vafa nechirwere ichi vava zviuru zvinanemazana matatu nemakumi maviri , (4 320). Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga munyika yese vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana matatu zvine makumi masere nezviviri nemazana matatu nemakumi mashanu nevapfumbamwe (2 382 359). Vabayiwa nhomba yepiri vave miriyoni nezviuru mazana mashanu nezvitanhatu nemazana mana nemakumi mana nevashanu(1 506 445). Huwandu uhu hunotarisirwa kukwira nhasi manheru apo hurumende ichazivisa zvabuda muongororo dzaitwa nhasi. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yokurukurwa kuMusangano weAfrican Commission kuMauritania
text: Zimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, ZLHR, yaudza musangano wekomishini yekodzero dzevanhu muAfrica uri kuitirwa kuMauritania kuti Zimbabwe inofanirwa kugadzirisa zvinhu zvizhinji sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. Mutauriri weZLHR, VaKumbirai Mafunda, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakaitwa nemauto gore rapera zvinofanira kugadziriswa kuitira kuti hurumende idzokere zviri pamutemo. VaMafunda vanoti mitemo yose inodzvanyirira vanhu inofanirwawo kubviswa sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. “Tine shungu dzokufarawo kana paitwa zvakanaka asi tinoramba tichichema chema nenyaya dzekugadzira mitemo kuti ienderane mebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Apa ndinoreva mitemo yakaita seElectoral Act, nemitemo yevatori venhau yakaita seAIPPA nePOSA ngaiende,” vadaro VaMafunda. Musangano weAfrican Commission on Human and People’s Rights unopera musi wa 9 Chivabvu. No media source currently available

headline: Munyori Mukuru weUnited Nations Oshora Kuputika kweChinofungidzirwa Kuti Chombo muZimbabwe
text: Munyori mukuru weUnited Nations VaAntonio Guterres vanoti vari kushushikana zvikuru nekuputika kwakaita chinofungidzirwa kuti chombo kana girinendi kuWhite City Sports Stadium kuBulawayo nemusi weMugovera rakapotsa rauraya mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vatevedzeri vavo vaviri VaConstantino Chiwenga naVaKembo Mohadi avo vanonzi vakakuvara. VaGuterres vakurudzira kuti vane chekuita nekuputika uku vanofanira kusungwa voendeswa kumatare uye vakati vari kushuvira kuti vakakuvara vapore nekukurumidza. Vanhu vanosvika makumi mana nemapfumbamwe vakakuvara. Mapurisa ari kuenderera mberi achiferefeta nyaya iyi uye hapana ati asungwa. Mutauriri wemapurisa Senior Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba vati kana paine vane humbowo vanofanira kufonera matikitivha eCID Bulawayo panumber dzinoti 0292-71568, Bulawayo Central Police – 0292-72515 or CID headquarters – 0242-709134, kana National Complaints desk on 0242-703631, or WhatsApp number 0712800197 kana kumapurisa ari pedyo navo. Zvichakadaro, sangano remubatanidzwa wemakerereke yeZimbabwe Council of Churches (ZCC) vakumbira vemakereke kuti vabatane mukunamata uye kutsanya kuti munyika muitwe sarudzo murunyararo. Mizinda yekunze yakaita seEgypt, America, Britain neRussia yashorawo zvikuru zvakaitika muZimbabwe. VeSADC ne African Union vashorawo chiitiko ichi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika VaMaxwell Saungweme vanoti munyori mukuru weUnited Nations aifanira kubuda pachena kuti aya mabasa evanopfurikidza mwero. No media source currently available

headline: Veruzhinji Vanoti Hurumende Isabatsira Pachena Makambani Anenge Apfugama
text: Veruzhinji vanoti hurumende haifanirwe kuita tsika yekupa veruzhinji mutoro nekuvatakudza zvikwereti zvemakambani ehurumende. Izvi zvabuda pamusangano wekunzwa mafungiro everuzhinji pamusoro peZimababwe Iron and Steel Company (ZISCO) Debt Aasumption Bill waitwa neChina muBulawayo nekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekushandiswa kwemari. Kana bhiri rikaitwa mutemo zvinoreva kuti hurumende ndiyo ichange yave kubhadhara chikwereti chinosvika mamiriyoni mazana mashanu emadhora chine kambani yeZisco kumakambani akasiyana-siyana kusanganisira vashandi. Mumwe mugari wemuBulawayo, VaPhakamani Moyo, vati havafari kuti hurumende itore chikwereti ichi vachitiwo pane zvimwe zvakawanda zvakakosha zvinofanirwa kubhadharwa nehurumende kusanganisira kuve nemishonga muzvipatara uye kubhadharira nherera mari yechikoro. Mumwewo mugari uyo angozvidoma nezita rekuti Florence ati kunyange hazvo zvakakosha kuti maindasitiri munyika amutsurudzwe, hurumende haifanirwe kungotora chikwereti chakadaro pasina kuitwa ongororo yakakwana yekuti kambani yeZisco yakaita chikwereti chakadaro sei. Mumiriri weBinga North mudare reparamende variwo nhengo yekomiti yezvemari, VaPrince Sibanda, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanhu vakawanda kune dzimwe nzvimbo dzavaenda munyika vane maonero mamwe chete ekuti hurumende haifanirwe kuve iyo inobhadhara zvikwereti zvemakambani ehurumende. VaSibanda vati vanhu vakawanda vanoyeuka nyaya yeReserve Bank Debt Assumption Act apo vanhu vakatsutsumwa nenyaya yekuti hurumende ibhadhare chikwereti cheRBZ icho bhanga iri raive raita richitenga midziyo yakasiyana-siyana yekurimisa iyo yakapiwa vamwe vakuru vakuru mhurumende. VaTapiwa Manyangadze avo vanoshanda neNational Employment Council for the Engineering, Iron and Steel Industry vati vashandi vekambani yeZisco vanofanirwa kubhadharwa mari dzavo dzemihoro. Sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende yezvemari, VaDavid Chapfika, vati Zisco ikambani yakakoshera nyika zvikuru ndosaka hurumende iri kuda kuita danho rekutora chikwererti chakambani iyi senzira yekuedza kuimutsurudza. Zisco ndeimwe yemakambani makuru aive munyika asi yakawira pasi nepamusana pekutadza kuronga kwevakuru vakuru vekambani, uyewo kupindira kwehurumende. No media source currently available

headline: Vakuru Vakuru muBazi rezveHutano Votungamira Kubayiwa Nhomba muBulawayo
text:
Chirongwa chekubaiwa nhomba inodzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 kwevakoti, vanachiremba nevamwe vanoshanda muzvipatara chakatanga munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana munyika kusanganisira muBulawayo nemusi weMuvhuro. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaConstantino Chiwenga ndivo vakaparura chirongwa ichi nemusi weChina muHarare.

Mudunhu vanhu vakabayiwa nhomba pazvipatara zvakaita seUnited Bulawayo Hospitals, kana kuti UBH, Mpilo, Ingutsheni uye neMater Dei.

Mukuru weHealth Services Board Dr Paulinus Sikhosana ndivo vakatanga kubaiwa vachiteverwa nevakafanobata chinzvimbo chemukuru weUBH Dr Narcissus Dzvanga pamwe nevakafanobata chinzvimbo chaProvincial Medical Director wedunhu reBulawayo Dr Welcome Mlilo. Gurukota redunhu reBulawayo Amai Judith Ncube vange varipowo pachiitiko ichi semunyarikani.

Dr Dzvanga vakaudza Studio 7 kuti chipatara chavo cheUBH chakapiwa nhomba dzinosvika chiuru nemazana manomwe idzo vati dzinokwana kubaya vashandi vose vari pachipatara ichi. Vakakurudzira vashandi vezvehutano pamwe neveruzhinji kuti vabaiwe nhambo iyi.

VaElijah Maouranga avo vanoshanda vachibatsira vakoti paIngutsheni Hospital ndemumwe wevashandi vepachipatara ichi vatanga kubaiwa nhomba iyi. VaMapuranga vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanoona zvakakosha kuti ivo semunhu anoshanda mune zvehutano vabaiwe nhomba iyi, uye vakurudzirawo veruzhinji kuti vasatye kubaiwa.

Vakafanobata chinzvimbo chemutauriri weMpilo Hospital Sister Sanelisiwe Nyamandi, vati kunyange havo ivo vange vasati vabaiwa vanotambira kuvepo kwenhomba yeCovid-19 sechinhu chakakosha zvikuru pakudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi.

Pane zvikwata zvina zvine vanhu vashanu zviri kubaya vanhu nhomba mudunhu reBulawayo uye zvikwata zviviri zvichange zviri paUBH nepaMpilo kozotiwo zvimwe zviviri zvichange zvichifamba munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana kusanganisira makiriniki ekanzuru zvichibaya vanhu. Chikamu chekutanga ichi chinotarisirwa kupera mukati memazuva gumi, uye vanenge vabaiwa vanozobaiwazve mushure memazuva makumi maviri nemasere.

Dunhu reBulawayo rakawana nhomba zviuru gumi nezvitatu nemazana maviri uye Dr Mlilo vati tarisiro yavo ndeyekuti pane vashandi vanopfuura zviuru zvitanhatu vachabaiwa nhomba iyi mudunhu iri.

Kuparurwa kwechirongwa chekubaya vanhu nhomba munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana kunouya mushure mekunge nyika yapihwa pachena nhomba zviuru mazana maviri kubva kunyika yeChina.

Mutauriri webazi rezvehutano VaDonald Mujiri vabvuma parunhare kuti chirongwa ichi chatanga munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana munyika asi vati vange vasingakwanise kutaura kuti vanhu vangani vabaiwa pazuva ranhasi sezvo vange vastai vave neruzivo urwu. No media source currently available

headline: Global Fund Yobatsira Zimbabwe neMari Kuitira Kuti Irwise Coranavirus
text: Sangano reGlobal Fund ravimbisa kupa Zimbabwe mari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemashanu emadhora ekuAmerica kuitira kuti igobatisra mukurwisa hutachiwana hweCoronavirus kana kuti Covid-19. Mukuru wesangano reGlobal Fund, VaPeter Sands, vazivisa nezverubatsiro uhwu pamusangano wavaita nevatapi venhau vari pamwe chete negurukota rezvehutano, VaObadiah Moyo. Vachipindura mubvunzo wekuti mari yavavimbisa kupa nyika mukurwisa Covid-19 ichauya riinhi, VaSands vati vakarerutsa zvinodiwa pakuti nyika inoda rubatsiro kubva kwavari iwane mari nekuda kwekuona kuti covid-19 iri kutekeshera pasi rose. Vati vanotarisira kuti mari iyi inogona kuburitswa mukati memazuva mashanu. Asi vati kupa rubatsiro urwu hakurevi kuti sangano reGlobal Fund rave kuzobvisa maziso aro pachinangwa charo chikuru chekurwisa zvirwere zveHIV/Aids, malaria nerurindi. VaSands vazivisawo kuti pamwaka mutsva wechirongwa cherubatsiro rwavanopa kunyika dzakasiyana siyana kurwisa zvirwerere zveHIV/ Aids, Malaria neTuberculosis, Zimbabwe iri kuzowana mamiriyoni mazana mashanu emadhora yekuAmerica vakatiwo vari kufara nebasa riri kuitwa neZimbabwe mukurwisa zvirwere zvitatu izvi. Pamwaka wakapfuura wechirongwa ichi, Zimbabwe yaive yapiwa mazana mana nemakumi manomwe nemanomwe emamiriyoni emadhora yekurwisa zvirwere izvi. VaMoyo vati hurumende inofara zvikuru nerubatsiro rwairi kupiwa neGlobal Fund vachiti kuwedzera kwayaita mari yekurwisa zvirwere zveHIV/Aids malaria nerurindi kunoratidza kuti hurumende iri kushandisa mari inobva kuchirongwa ichi nemazvo. Panyaya yekuti hurumende haina kugadzirira zvakakwana pakurwisa hutachiwana hweCovid-19 kana hukatekeshera munyika uye kuti hurumende haizi kutaura chokwadi pamusoro pekuti pane vanhu vabatwa nehutachiwana uhu here kana kuti kwete, munyori webazi rezvehutano, Dr Agnes Mahomwa, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanhu vanofanirwa kuvimba nezviri kutaurwa nehurumende. Dr Mahomva vakurudzira veruzhinji kuti vaite tsika yekuchengetedza hutano senzira yekudzivirira kuti hutachiwana uhu huve munyika. MuZimbabwe hamusati mave nemunhu ati abatwa nehutachiwana hweCovid-19 kusvika pari zvino kubvira pahwakatanga kuzivikanwa nezvaho kuChina pakupera kwegore rapera. South Africa yave nevanhu gumi nevatatu vakabatwa nehutachiwana uhu uye. Hurumende inoti iri kuita zvose zvainogona pakutarisa vose vanopinda munyika panhandare dzendege pamwe nepamiganhu yenyika uye kuzivisawo veruzhinji nezvehutachiwana uhu nenzira dzakasiyana siyana. Pasi rose vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvina vafa nechirwere cheCoronavirus. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Inoti Kuratidzira Kwayo Kuri Kuenderera Mberi neMusi weChishanu
text: MDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa inoti iri kuenderera mberi nehurongwa hwayo hwekuratidzira nemusi weChishanu, kunyange hazvo isati yanzwa kubva kumapurisa. MDC yakazivisa mapurisa svondo rapera kuti ichapinda mukuratidzira uku sezvinodiwa nemitemo yenyika. Asi bato iri rinoti kusapindura kwemapurisa hakusi kuzotadzisa hurongwa hwekuratidzira uhu, sezvo bumbiro remitemo yenyika ichiripa kodzero yekuratidzira. MDC inoti iri kuratidzira sezvo isiri kufara nehutongi hwemutungamiri weZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, avo bato iri rinoti haricherechedzi kusarudzwa kwavakaitwa gore rapera. Sangano rinoona nezvesarudzo munyika, reZimbabwe Electoral Commission, rakazivisa gore rapera kuti VaMnangagwa ndivo vakanga vakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. Asi MDC yakapikisa izvi mudare reConstitutional Court, iro rakapa mutongo waitambira zvakanga zvaziviswa musarudzo dzegore rapera nasachigaro weZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Amai Priscilla Chigumba. Asi MDC inoti VaMnangagwa vari kutadza kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyika, izvo zviri kupa kuti nyika ishaye magetsi, mafuta edzimotokari, uye kukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu mazuva ose. Murongi wemisangano muMDC, VaAmos Chibaya, vanoti kuratidzira kwavo kuchaitwa murunyararo sezvo vagara vari bato rinoremekedza mitemo yenyika. VaChibaya vanoti zvisineyi kuti havasati vawana mhinduro kubva kumapurisa, kuratidzira kwavo kuri kuenderera mberi nemusi weChishanu. Asi mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaEnergy Mutodi, vanoti MDC inogara yakati ichaita ratidziro murunyararo asi ichizopedzisira yaita mhirizhonga. VaMutodi vanotiwo sebato reZanu PF riri kutonga, vari kuzviziva kuti MDC iri kuratidzira kuitira kuti VaMnangagwa vabviswe pachigaro. “Vakuru vari kuti vachange vari mberi mekuratidzira uku ndinovayambira kuti vasazoyeuka bako vanaiwa,” vadaro VaMutodi. Asi VaChibaya vanoti vari kuzviziva kuti Zanu PF iri kugadzira zvipfeko zveMDC zvichapihwa vanhu kuti vazovhiringa kuratidzira kwakarongwa nebato ravo. Senzira yekuti izvi zvisaitike, VaChibaya vanoti vachange vaine nhengo dzebato ravo dzichachengetedza runyararo, uye pakaita nhubu dzinoda kukonzera mhirizhonga, vachadzibata vachidziisa mumaoko emapurisa. Muna Ndira, sangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions rakadaidzira kuti vanhu vagare mudzimba dzavo kwemazuva matatu. Asi vanhu vakapinda mumigwagwa iyi vachiratidzira. Kuratidzira uku kwakapedzisira kwaita mhirizhonga iyo yakaona vanhu vanosvika makumi maviri vachifa mushure mekupfurwa nemabara epfuti. Sangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, rinoti pamhirizhonga yakaitika muna Ndira, pane vanhu makumi matanhatu nevasere vakarapwa maronda akakonzerwa nemabara epfuti, uye vanhu vanodarika zana vaive nemaronda airatidza kuti akakonzerwa nesimbi nezvimwe zvombo zvinocheka. Vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanoti mumazuva matatu akadaidzirwa neZCTU kuti vanhu vagare mudzimba dzavo, vakaona mapurisa achishandisa zvombo zvehutsi hunokachidza pavanhu vairatidzira vasina zvombo, uye vakaonawo masoja aive nepfuti dzemhando yeAK-47. No media source currently available

headline: Musangano weKimberly Process Wotanga KuAngola
text: Musangano weKimberly Process Certification Intercessional Plenary Scheme watanga kuLuanda, Angola neChipiri Zimbabwe ichichema nerekuti pane dzimwe nyika dzichiri kurwisa kuti isabvumidzwe kutengesa mangoda ayo. Musangano uyu uri kupera nemusi weMugovera. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu, gurukota rinoona nezvezvicherwa VaWalter Chidhakwa vanoti Zimbabwe iri kuita zvose zvinodiwa neKPC mukutengeswa kwemangoda. Vanoti Zimbabwe iri kuita zvose zvinodiwa neKPC mukutengeswa kwemangoda. Vamwe vakuru muhurumende vanoti sangano reWorld Policy Institute rinoda kuti Zimbabwe isatengesa mangoda nekuti iri kutengesa mangoda pamusika wekuDubai zvinonzi zvinogona kupa kuti mari dzemangoda dzigume dzave mumaoko evanopfurikidza mwero. Imwe kambani yekuBelgium inonzi Omega Diamonds yakabhadhariswa mari inosvika mamiriyoni zana nemamukumi mapfumbabwe nemashanu madhora ne KPC ichinzi yaisabhadhara mitero. Mangoda anotengeswa nekuDubai sezvinoitwa eZimbabwe anonzi anozoguma ave mumaoko emakoronyera uye vanhu vashoma ndivo vanoguma vowana mari yemangoda nenyaya yechikiribidi. Asi mukuru wekambani yePartnership Africa Canada, VaAllan Martin, avo vari kumusangano uyu vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakuru vehurumende yeZimbabwe vari kungorova bembera dzenhema panyaya iyi. VaMartin vati KPC inofanira kuona kuti mangoda atengeswa zviri pamutemo uye haafanire kuguma ave mumaoko evanopfurikidza mwero. VaMartin vatiwo Zimbabwe haifanire kungovhunduka chati kwatara. Kunyange hazvo makambani ekuMarange ave nemakore achichera mangoda, vakawanda, kusanganisira mamwe makurukota ehurumende vanoti havasi kuziva kuti mari yacho inofambiswa sei. Vashandi vakawanda kumakambani ekuMarange vari kupedzawo mwedzi vasina kubhadharwa vamwe vachigumurwa. Vakawanda vaifunga kuti mangoda achavandudza hupfumi asi zvinenge zviri kukona n’anga murapwa achida. Sachigaro wesangano reResources Exploitation Watch iro rinorerekera zvakanyanya kuhurumende, VaTafadzwa Musarara vanoti zvekunakumisa Zimbabwe kutengesa mangoda hazvishande. No media source currently available

headline: Bato reCCC Rinoti Mutumbi weNhengo Yaro, Muzvare Moreblessing Ali, Wawanikwa Wakakandwa muTsime kuNyatsime.
text: Bato reCitizens Coalition for Change rinoti mutumbi wemunhukadzi waburitswa nemapurisa kubva mune rimwe tsime kuNyatsime kuChitungwiza waonekwa kuti ndewenhengo yaro, Muzvare Moreblessing Ali, avo vakatsakatika musi wa 24 Chivabvu unove mwedzi wapera. Izvi zvatsinhirwawo nemutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioer Paul Nyathi, avo vazivisa vatori venhau kuburikidza negwaro ravaburitsa kuti pane mutumbi wakachekwachekwa wawanikwa wakakandwa mutsime papurazi reDenota Farm riri pasi peBeatrice. VaNyathi vati mutumbi uyu watanga kuonekwa naAmai Linnah Mukandi (57), vanove amai vemurume ari kufungidzirwa kuti ndiye akaponda Muzvare Ali, Pius Jamba. Vatiwo mapurisa azivisa mhuri yaMuzvare Ali, uye vari mushishi kuti vanyatsoongorora nekuzivisisa nezvemutumbi uyu. VaNyathi vayambirawo vezvematongerwo enyika kuti vasakanganisa kuferefetwa kwenyaya iyi vachitiwo vari mushishi kutsvaga Jamba. Kanzura vekuChitungwiza vari nhengo yebato reCitizen’s Coalition for Change, VaMusa Makweza, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mutumbi waburitswa mutsime uyu ndewaMuzvare Ali. VaMakweza vati sezvo zvinhu izvi zvaitika kumadeuka kwezuva, vanga vasati vagara pasi sebato kuti varonge matanho ekutora. Mutauriri webato reCCC, Muzvare Fadzayi Mahere vanyorawo padandemutande reTwitter vachiti boka ravo rezvekuchengetedzwa kwebato pamwe nehutungamiri hwavo muChitungwiza vari kushanda pamwe nemapurisa, uye vave kumirira gwaro riri pamutemo rinobva kumapurisa pamusoro pekushaya kwaMuzvare Ali. Kutsakatika kwaMuzvare Ali kunonzi nevamwe kune chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika, asi mapurisa achiti Muzvare Ali vakazvuzvurudzwa nemumwe wavo wavaimbofambidzana naye, Pius Jamba, kubva pane imwe nzvimbo inotandarirwa makare muNyatsime mushure mekunge vanetsana uye hapana akazovaona zvakare. Gweta riri kumirira mhuri yekwaAli panyaya iyi, uye vari mumiriri weSt. Mary’s muparamende, VaJob Sikhala, vatiwo timbopa nguva kune mapurisa vaite basa ravovachitiwo tizovabata pashure. No media source currently available

headline: Vanamukoti Vairamwa Mabasa Votarisirwa Kudzoka paBasa
text: Vanamukoti, avo vanga vave nesvondo vachiramwa mabasa, vari kutarisirwa kudzoka pabasa vose nhasi Muvhuro, zvichitevera kuzivisa kwavakaita neMugovera kuti vakanga vave kumisa kuramwa mabasa uku. Gwaro rakaburitswa nesangano rinomirira vanamukoti, reZimbabwe Nurses Association nemusi weMugovera, rinoti zvinosuwisa kuti matanho avanamukoti ekuratidza kunyunyuta kwavo nemabatirwo avo pamabasa akanga ave kuiswa kune zvematongerwo enyika. Sangano ravanamukoti iri rinoti kuitira kuti nhaurirano, idzo dzakanga dzambomira, dzienderere mberi, uyewo kudzivirirawo vashandi kuti vasashungurudzwa, vanamukoti vose vakawirirana kumisa kuramwa mabasa uku kuti uye vave kudzokera kubasa. Sangano iri rinoti vose vanamukoti vakanga vari pakuramwa mabasa vari kutarisirwa kudzokera kumabasa kwavo nhasi. Asi hazvisati zvazivikanwa kuti vanamukoti ava vachatambirwa here kana kuti kwete, sezvo hurumende yakanga yazivisa kare kuti vose vakanga vapinda pakuramwa mabasa vakanga vadzingwa mabasa, uye vanoda basa vaifanirwa kutonyorera patsva vachitsvaga basa. Hurumende yakazivisawo zvakare kuti yakanga yatotanga kutambira matsamba kubva kunavanamukoti vaitsvaga mabasa.

headline: Mitengo Yotarisirwa Kukwirazve neKuda kweKudhura kweMafuta
text: Nyaya yekushomeka kwemagetsi uye kudhura nekushomeka kwemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari kwave kupa kuti mitengo yezvinhu iwedzerwe panguva iyo vashandi vasiri kuwedzerwa mari. Mutungamiri wesangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers Association, VaDenford Mutashu, vayambira vanhu kuti mitengo ichawedzera kukwira kwayo muzvitoro sezvo mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari akawedzerwawo nemusi weMuvhuro. VaMutashu vanotiwo vamwe vemuzvitoro vatoregera kutengesa zvimwe zvinhu nenyaya yekushaikwa kwemagetsi. Mutungamiri weConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaHenry Ruzvidzo, vanotiwo kushaikwa kwemagetsi kwave kuita kuti bhizimisi kunetse. Mumwe muzvinabhizimisi, VaGilbert Muponda, vati makambani anofanira kupihwa masimba ekuti vagadzirise dambudziko remagetsi kuitira kuti varambe vachiita basa. VaMuponda vatiwo mutemo unofanira kuchinjwa mukutengwa kwemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari. Kunyange hazvo zvinhu zvakaoma kudai, munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti vashandi havasi kuwedzerwa mari vachipa semuenzaniso vashandi vehurumende. VaRuzvidzo vanoti vanoda chose kugadzirisa matambudziko evashandi kunyange hazvo zvinhu zvaita mhidigari. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau nemusi weMuvhuro, kambani yeEconet yakati yave kuomerwa nekuita basa sezvo mutengo wekuita basa uri kuramba uchiwedzera. Kambani iyi inotiwo mari yemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari yawedzerwa nezvikamu zvinodarika mazana mashanu kubva muzana ukuwo dhora remunyika reRTGS radonha nezvikamu mazana mapfumbamwe kubva muzana kubva muna Ndira. Kambani iyi inoti mari yakawanda yave kupera vachitenga dhiziri kuti vashandise magwenya nekuti magetsi ari kudzimwa kwenguva yakareba dzimwe nguva maawa anodarika gumi nemasere. Kukwira zvakanyanya kwemitengo yezvinhu kuri kupawo kuti inflation irambe ichiita chamurambamhuru uye Zimstats yakati yainge yasvika pazvikamu zana nemakumi manomwe nezvishanu kubva muzana mwedzi wapera kunyange hazvo hurumende yainge yati inofanira kunge yasvika pazvikamu zviri pasi pegumi mukupera kwegore. No media source currently available

headline: Vadhomeni Vanoti Hurumende Haisi Kukoshesa Mabasa Avo
text: Sangano rinomirira vanoshanda mubazi rezvekurima, re Zimbabwe Agricultural Professionals and Technical Association (ZAPTA), rinoti vashandi vebazi iri, zvikuru sei vadhomeni, vanofanirwa kupiwa mari yerubatsiro, kana kuti ‘risk allowance’, panguva ino yekurwisana necoronavirus sezvo basa ravo richivamanikidza kusangana nekushanda nevanhu vakasiyana siyana. Munyori mukuru weZAPTA, VaZivaishe Zhou, vaudza Studio 7 kuti sezvo hurumende yakapa varairidzi mari yekubatsirikana panguva iyi, haifanirwi kusarudza vashandi vainobatsira, naizvozvo hurumende inofanirwa kuziva kuti vadhomeni vanodavo rubatsiro rwakadai. VaZhou vati sangano ravo harisikufara nemabatirwo arikuitwa nyaya yezvimidhudhudhu zvinofanirwa kushandiswa nevadhomeni, vachiti vadhomeni vazhinji vari kushaya mari yokuenda kumahofisi eCMED kunotora zvimidhudhudhu izvi. VaZhou vati pane zvizhinji zvinofanirwa kugadziriswa mubazi iri, vachiti vanokurudzira hurumende kuti itarisise nekugadzirisa zvirikuitika mubazi iri kuti vashandi vaite basa ravo zvakanaka. Tatadza kubata mukuru anoona nezvevashandi mubazi iri, VaGibson Chijarira, sezvo mharembozha yavo yange isingadavirwi. Tichienda pamhepo, gurukota rezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vange vasati vapindura mibvunzo yatavatumira. No media source currently available

headline: IOM Inoti Vanhu Vanodarika Zviuru Mazana Maviri Vakadzokera Kumusha neKuda kweKukanganiswa kweHupfumi neCovid-19 Munyika Dzavagere
text: Sangano rinoona nezvekufamba kwevanhu kubva mune imwe nyika vachienda mune imwe, reInternational Organisation for Migration (IOM) rinoti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinodarika mazana maviri ezviuru zvadzokera kumusha kubva zvatanga denda reCovid-19 muna Kukadzi 2020 zvichitevera kuoma kwehupenyu munyika dzazvange zvaenda kunotsvaga mafuro manyoro. Sangano iri rinoti richishanda pamwechete nebazi rezvehutano uye nemamwe masangano, vakakwanisa kubatsira vanhu vane chitsama kuburikidza nekuvawanisa hunyanzvi mune zvekurima, mari pamwe nezvimwe zvinodiwa muhupenyu hwemunhu kuitira kuti vakwanise kusimukira. Asi IOM inoyambira kuti kana vanhu ava vakasawana rubatsiro nekukasika, vakawanda vavo vachanyura mumatambudziko akadzama kudarika avari kutarisana nawo pari zvino, izvo zvinozotuma vamwe kuti vatsvage nzira dzekurarama nadzo dzisiri pamutemo kana kuti vabude zvakare munyika vachishandisa dzimwe nzira. Studio 7 yaedza kubata gurukota rezvemabasa nekugara zvakanaka kwevanhu, Professor Paul Mavima, asi vati vanga vari mudare reparamende vachiti vaizopindura mibvunzo yedu kana vasununguka. Asi sachigaro vesangano rinomirira zvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika zviri muSouth Africa, reAfrican Diaspora Forum, Doctor Vusumuzi Sibanda, vanoti havafungi kuti huwandu hwevanhu huri kutaurwa neIOM ndehwe vanhu vakadzokera kumusha nekuti vakanga vaomerwa nehupenyu. Doctor Sibanda vanoti vanhu vakawanda vanogona kunge vakashandisa mukana wekumbodzokera Covid-19 kuti vasanetseke kupinda munyika, asi vachizobuda zvakare vachishandisa dzimwe nzira. No media source currently available

headline: VaChamisa Votaura neZviuru neZviuru zveVatsigiri paDandemutande reInternet
text: Mutungamiri webato reMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa vaita musangano nevatsigiri vavo pandandemutande reinternet kana kuti e-rally muHarare. Aka ndekekutanga mutungamiri webato munyika achiita musangano padandemutande nekuda kwekupararira kwechirwere checoronavirus munyika nepasi rose. Zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu zvakakwanisa kuteerera VaChamisa vachitaura nezvematambudziko atarisana nenyika. VaChamisa vati matambudziko atarisana nenyika ave kuda kubatana uye kuumba komiti inombofanobata matomhu zvinhu zvichigadziriswa kana kuti Transitional Authority. No media source currently available VaChamisa vatiwo vachabatana nevose vanenge vachiratidzira kunyunyuta nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika. Pane vari kuronga uratidzira munyika yose musi wa 31Chikunguru vachinyunyuta nemamiriro aita zvinhu munyika. Vashorawo nyaya yekudzingwa kuri kuitwa nhengo dzavo dzedare reparamende, senate nekanzuru nebato reMDC-T riri kufanotungamirwa naDoctor Thokozani Khupe vachiti havanzwisise kuti munhu akakundwa musarudzo ange dzinga sei vaakakwikwidzana navo. Asi mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC-T VaKhalipani Phugeni vati vari kutevera mutemo pakudzinnga vavati vabuda musangano ravo. No media source currently available Vachipindura panyaya yekuti paitwe Transional Authority, mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mubato reZanu-PF VaTafadzwa Mugwadi vati izvi hazvisi kuzoitika sezvo vachiti Zanu-PF yakakunda musarudzo zvine mutsido nekudaro inofanira kuregwa ichitonga. No media source currently available Asi vamwe vanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika nevemakereke vanoti munyika mave kuda nhaurirano nekuti Zanu-PF yaremerwa nenjunga.

headline: Lady Chevrons hutu kuIndia
text: CHIKWATA checricket chemaLady Chevrons chiri kuIndia uko chiri kuita gadziriro chakatarisana nekuzonokwikwidza kuUnited Arab Emirates (UAE) munaGunyana murwendo rwekurwira kuenda kumutambo weInternational Cricket Council (ICC) Women T20 World Cup 2023.   Mutambo weICC Women T20 World Cup uchaitwa gore rinotevera uye mimwe mitambo yacho ichatambirwa kuSouth Africa. Mutambo wekuUAE uchange uine zvikwata zvisere zvinoti Zimbabwe, UAE, Bangladesh, Thailand, Scotland, Papua New Guinea, Ireland neUnited States of America izvo zvichazorwira matikiti maviri ekuenda kuSouth Africa.   Muchinyorwa chakabva kuZimbabwe Cricket (ZC), mukushi wemashoko wesangano iri – Darlington Majonga – anoti maLady Chevrons akaenda kuIndia uko akashevedzwa nesangano reOmtex ICWC Cricket Institute kunotamba mitambo yehushamwari. Mitambi iyi iri kushandiswa nemaLady Chevrons segadziriro dzekuzoenda kuUAE kunorwira tikiti rekuenda kuWorld Cup kuSouth Africa.   Majonga anoti ZC yakatumira chikwata chevatambi 16 kuIndia icho chiri kutungamirwa naMary-Anne Musonda.   “Chikwata chedu chiri kuIndia uko chichagara kwemazuva 18 uye chakashevedzwa neOmtex ICWC Cricket Institute kuti chizotamba mitambo yehushamwari nezvikwata zvakasiyana zvekuIndia.   “Mitambo iyi maLady Chevrons ari kuishandisa segadziriro dzavo dzekuzoenda kuUnited Arab Emirates uko achanokwikwidza mumutambo wekurwira kuenda kuICC Women’s T20 World Cup.   “KuIndia, mitambo yavo yese ichatambirwa kunhandare yeNICE Cricket Arena kuBengaluru,” anodaro Majonga.   Zvakadaro, chikwata chevarume chemaChevrons chakahwina tikiti rekuenda kuICC Men’s T20 World Cup iyo ichatambirwa kuAustralia munaGumiguru.   MaChevrons akabudirira kuenda kumutambo uyu pamwe chete neNetherlands iyo yakapedza iri pechipiri mumutambo wakatambirwa kuQueens Sports Club kuBulawayo.   KuWorld Cup, iyo ichatambirwa kuAustralia, maChevrons akaiswa muboka rine zvikwata zvinoti Ireland, Scotland neWest Indies.

headline: ‘Timu dzemuHarare hadzilume’
text: wemutambo wePremier Soccer League wave pakati nepakati, mubvunzo une vatsigiri vazhinji venhabvu ndewekuti kubva kwakaita mukombe uyu uchienda kuZvishavane uchazodzoka here muHarare kana Bulawayo?   Gore radarika, FC Platinum yakanyora nhoroondo nekuve chikwata chekutanga kuhwina mukombe wePSL chisiri chemuHarare kana Bulawayo kubva muna 1980.   Kwemakore akawanda, zvimwe zvikwata zvisiri zvemuHarare zvaikundikana chaizvo kusimudza mukombe uyu apo zvimwe zvacho zvaizokundikana zvave pedyo sezvakaitwa neZPC Kariba iyo yakabvutirwa mukombe uyu zuva rekupedzisira.   Zvikwata zvePlatinum, zvinoti FC Platinum shasha dzePSL iyo iri kutungamirirwa naNorman Mapeza neNgezi Platinum yaTonderayi Ndiraya parizvino zviri kutamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura.   Shasha yakambonetsa ichitambira maWarriors, Dynamos FC nezvimwe zvekuEurope – Harlington Shereni – anoti zvichatora nguva refu kuti zvikwata zvemuHarare neBulawayo zvitevere matsimba eNgezi Platinum neFC Platinum nekuti zviviri izvi zvakagadzikana uye zvakarongeka.   “Zvichatora nguva refu kuti zvimwe zvikwata zvigotevera FC Platinum neNgezi Platinum nekuti zvakarongeka, zvakarongera vatambi vazvo kuti vatambe nhabvu vakasununguka,” anodaro Shereni.   Mushamarari wenhepfenyuro yeStar FM, Howard Musonza, anoti zvave kunetsa kuti mukombe ugouya kuHarare kana Bulawayo nekuda kwemamiriro akaita zvinhu pari zvino.

headline: Botswana Yovandudza Mapirwo eZvizvarwa Zvekune Dzimwe Nyika Magwaro
text: Mukutanga kwemwedzi waGunyana, mutungamiri weBotswana, VaMokgweetsi Masisi, vakazivisa kuti hurumende yavo ichavandudza kupihwa kwemagwaro ekugara nekushanda kuzvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika. Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvizhinji zvange zvave pedyo nekutakura mikwende yazvo zvakananga kumusha sezvo Botswana yakambenge yadzika mitemo inoomesera vekune dzimwe nyika. VaMisheck Chivhembe, avo vane makore makumi matatu nemaviri, vanoti mamiriro ezvinhu muBotswana ava nani kupinda makore apfuura. Mashoko aVaChivhembe atsinhirwa nachimwewo chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, VaMorris Nyamandwe, avo vanoshanda mabasa emaoko muGaborone. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, VaNkululeko Dube, vanoti havazive kuti vangatenda sei VaMasisi nedanho ravakatora. VaDube vanoti kusapihwa magwaro nehurumende kwakanga kwoita kuti vafunge kuenda kuSouth Africa uko zvizvarwa zvinobva kune dzimwe nyika zvinooneswa ndondo nevanhu venyika iyi. Apo Botswana yaitungamirwa naVaSeretse Khama Ian Khama, zvakanga zvisiri nyore kuti magwaro ekushanda nekugara munyika iyi abude. Machinjiro ezvinhu aya afadza mumwe muzvinabhizimisi mudhorobha reFrancistown, VaPatrick Matenge, vanoti zvakaitwa neBotswana zvinhu zvakanakira mabhizimisi emunyika iyi. Kunyange hazvo kusina humbowo hwakati tsvikiti hwezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinogara muBotswana, huwandu hwazvo hunofungidzirwa kuti hunodarika vanhu vemunyika iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Khama Billiati naPeter Ndlovu Vopinda Munhoroondo yeNhabvu neSundowns
text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeSouth Africa VaJacob Zuma nemusi weMuvhuro vakatenda zvikuru chikwata cheSundowns chemuSouth Africa nekukunda Zamaleck yekuEgypt 3-1 mufainari yemukombe weCAF Champions League nemusi weSvondo. Chikwata cheSundowns chinotambirwawo naKhama Billiat wekuZimbabwe uye china Peter Ndlovu samaneja. Vaviri ava ndivo zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvekutanga kusimudza mukombe uyu. Zvichakadaro, chikwata cheHighlanders chakabuda mumakwikwi eChibuku Super Cup mushure mekurowa 1-0 neNgezi Platinum Stars nemusi weSvondo. Ngezi Platinum yave kutamba neFC Platinum mumafinals. FC Platinum yakakunda Harare city 3-0 nemusi weMugovera. Fainari yeNgezi Platinum Stars neFC Platinum ichatambwa musi wa 5 Mbudzi. Asi vePremier Soccer League havasati vazivisa kuti fainari iyi ichatambirwa kupi. Muongorori wezvemutambo wenhabvu VaAndrew Rwodzi vanoti mutambo uyu waive wemhando yepamusoro vachiti ivo vakanakidzwa zvikuru. Mutsigiri wenhabvu VaLainos Chimenya vanoti vaive vasingatarisire kuti Ngezi Platinum Stars ingarove Highlanders sezvo ivo vaingoti Ngezi chikwata chidiki VaRwodzi vanoti vachitarisa FC Platinum neNgezi Platinum Stars vari kuona Ngezi ichitora mukombe nemhaka yekuti ine vatambi vakawanda vane ruzivo rwenhabvu yepamusoro. Pakapedzisira kusangana FC Platinum neNgezi Platinum Stars zvikwata izvi zvakaita mangange 1-1 muMandava Stadium. VaChimenya vanoti FC Platinum ingadai yakarohwa mumutambo uyu vachiti ivo izvi ndizvo zvichaitika mufainari. Chikwata chichatora mukombe uyu chichamirira nyika muCAF Confederation Cup.

headline: Bill Antonio atengwa kuBelgium
text: BILL Antonio ari kuramba achinyora nhoroondo mumutambo wenhabvu muZimbabwe. Mutambi wechidiki weDynamos uyu atengwa nechikwata cheKV Mechelen chekuBelgium.   Antonio anotarisirwa kuenda kuchikwata chake chitsva kunosangana nevatambi vaachange achitamba navo kuchikwata chekuEurope ichi.   Ange achitarisirwa kuongororwa utano hwake asati anyorerana chibvumirano nechikwata ichi apo ave kutanga rwendo rwake rwutsva munhabvu aine makore 19 okuberekwa bedzi. Mutambi akadzidza paPrince Edward uyu akaonekana nechikwata chake cheDynamos ndokuudza vatori venhau kuti ari kutarisira kunodzidza zvakawanda kuBelgium.   Antonio akafarirwa neMechelen zvichitevera kutamba kwaakaita masvondo adarika apo aiongororwa. Paimbove nefungidziro yekuti mutambi uyu aigona kuzotengwa gore rinotevera munaNdira, izvo zvaigona kuzomutadzisa kuenda kuchikwata ichi izvozvi.   Asi Antonio ava kutarisirwa kunyora chibvumirano chake mukana wekutenga vatambi kuBelgium usati wavharwa. Audza vatori venhau kuti zvose zvauya kuburikidza nekushanda nesimba uye acharamba achishanda nemwoyo wake wose kuBelgium.   “Zvinhu zvose unofanirwa kutungamidza Mwari. Kuenda kuEurope ndichibva kuDynamos kuita kwaMari kubva pakutanga. Kunamata mazuva ose kunoita kuti zvinhu zviendeke,” akadaro Antonio.   “Rutsigiro rwandange ndichiwana kubva zuva rekutanga handirwukanganwe uye handimbokoshiwa mhuri yeDynamos. Zvaifadza kutamba ndakapfeka jezi ravo, zvinhu zvekuti mutambi wose anongoshuvira. “Iniwo nemakore angu kutambira Dynamos, zvinhu zvekuti handaimbofungira kuti zvichaitika kwandiri, asi unoona kuti naMwari zvose zvinoitika.   “Muupenyu mune zvitsauko zvakawanda, kuenda kwangu kuEurope kutanga kwechimwe chitsauko chitsva uye kuzadzikiswa kwezvishuviro zvemwoyo wangu.   “Ndinovimba kuti ndichabudirira. Mwari haambokurasise, unoziva. Kungoshanda nesimba nekuterera, zvose zvinoita chete.”   Antonio akatanga kutambira Dynamos gore radarika uye angotamba mitambo 28 ndokunwisa kasere achibatsira vamwe vatambi kunwisa ka10.

headline: Vagari Vofarira Kuvandudzwa kweMabvuku Clinic Kuve Chipatara
text: Kanzuru yeHarare ichishanda nemasangano akazvimiririra yakavandudza kirinika yeMabvuku kuve chipatara izvo zvoyemurwa zvikuru nevagari vekuMabvuku. Vagari vanoti kuvepo kwechipatara ichi kuri kuvabatsira zvikuru mukuwana kodzero yehutano nemutengo wakaderera. Chipatara cheMabvuku ichi chave nemishina inoshandiswa kuonekwa zviri mumuviri inosanganisira ma ultra sound scans ne radiological services. Pachipatara apa pave kuvhiyiwawo kusanganisira madzimai anenge ane pamuviri, kubviswa mazino pamwe nekutorwa maX-Ray. Kirinika iyi isati yave chipatara, vanhu vaitumirwa kuzvipatara zvakadai seHarare Hospital neParirenyatwa Group of Hospitals. Amai Sandra Masiyiwa ndeumwe mugari wekuMabvuku. Amai Masiyiwa, avo vanga vachibva kuchipatara cheMabvuku kunorapisa mwana wavo, vanoti kusimudzirwa kwekirinika iyi kuti ive chipatara kwavarerutsira hupenyu sezvo zvobatsira mukurapwa kwavo pachipatara chiri pedyo navo. Izvi zvatsigirwa naMuzvare Caroline Kazingizi avo vaudza Studio7 kuti kuvapo kwechipatara ichi kwava kuderedza mari yavanoshandisa mukuwana hutano hwakanaka. Muzvare Kazingizi vanoti munguva shoma yapfuura vaiti vakasangana nematambudziko anoda maX-Ray kana kuvhiyiwa vaitonotsvaka rubatsiro kuzvipatara zvakadai seHarare Hospital neParirenyatwa izvo zvavanoti zvanga zviri kure navo huye pachidawo mari dzekufambisa kuenda kuzvipatara izvi. Mumwe mugari wekuMabvuku angoda kuzivikanwa nezita rekuti Obiama atiwo kuvapo kwechipatara pedyo navo kunobatsira kuchengetedza hutano hwavo sezvo vamwe vairasikirwa nehupenyu vachiendeswa kunobatsirwa kunezvimwe zvipatara. Asi VaNdlovu vatiwo chiri kunetsa pachipatara ichi inyaya yechinono, vakati varwere vari kunonoka kubatsirwa. Mukuru anoona nezvemabasa ehutano mukanzuru yeHarare, Dr Prosper Chonzi, vanoti kuvapo kwechipatara cheMabvuku kwaderedza zvikuru varwere vanoendeswa kune zvimwe zvipatara. VaChonzi vati sekanzuru vanofadzwa zvikuru kuti varwere vowana kubatsirwa panzvimbo imwe chete vakatiwo izvi zvinobetsera kuchengetedza hupenyu kunyanya kumadzimai anenge asangana nenjodzi mukusununguka. Kanzuru yeHarare inoti iri kutarisira kuvandudzawo mamwe emakirinika ayo ari mumusha inogara vazhinji kuti avewo zvipatara. No media source currently available

headline: Dai nhabvu yachidzoka: Mugadza
text: MURAIRIDZI weHarare City Queens neMighty Warriors Under-20, Rosemary Mugadza, anoti asuwa zvikuru kurairidza mutambo wenhabvu yevanhukadzi zvichitevera kumiswa kwakaitwa mitambo yose senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Mugadza anoti chishuwo chake ndechekuti kudai mariro ezvinhu adzikama maringe nechirwere ichi kuitira kuti mitambo ichitanga kuitwa zvakare.   “Zvinhu zvese zvakamira panguva ino uye isu tiri mune zvemitambo tiri kuchema kunyanya nekuti mutambo uyu ndiwo unotiraramisa hupenyu hwedu.   “Zvese takungozvisiira mumaoko aMwari nekuti ndivo vane mhinduro yezvinhu zvese uye vachatitungamira muhupenyu hwedu kusvika takunda chirwere ichi.  Tave kuda kudzokera kuhupenyu hwedu hwekare hwatange tajaira,” anodaro Mugadza.
