Mugadza, uyo anozivikanwa nekumbotambira zvikwata zvakaita seZimbabwe Saints Ladies neHighlanders Royals, anoti ari kupota achitarisa vatambi vezvikwata zvake zviviri — Mighty Warriors U20 neHarare City Queens — achida kuziva kuti vari kugara sei uye kuti vari kumboitawo here gadziriro vega kudzimba dzavo.   Anoti vatambi vechidiki vechisikana venhabvu vakasiyana nevakomana nekuti kana vari kudzimba kuita gadziriro kunonetsa sezvo vanenge vave kumboita mabasa epamba.   “Vasikana kana vave kudzimba kuita gadziriro kwacho kunonetsa nekuti vanenge vakumboita mabasa epamba vachinzi zvenhabvu izvo imbosiyana nazvo tozozviona kana yatanga.  Manje mutambi wenhabvu haadi izvozvo anofanirwa kugara achigadzirira nguva nenguva.   “Saka tinenge tichikurukura navo paWhatsApp tichivaudza zvekuti vaite vari kudzimba kwavo kana vapedza havo kuita mabasa epamba,” anodaro.   Chikwata chemaMighty Warriors U20 change chichifanirwa kurwira tikiti rekuenda kumakwikwi eWorld Cup kuCosta Rica gore rinotevera asi mitambo iyi yakambomiswa nesangano reCAF nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19.

headline: Vanhu Gumi neVashanu (15) Vofa neCovid-19 neMugovera
text: Vanhu gumi nevashanu kana kuti 15 vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika neMugovera vamwe mazana masere nenakumi matatu nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 839 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave mazana mana nemakumu masere nevatatu kana kuti 483. Vanhu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kuparira gore rapera vave zvuru makumi maviri nemazana mana ane makumi mapfumbamwe nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 20, 499. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi vave zviuru gumi bezviviri zvine mazana mana nemakumi matatu nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 12, 439 zvichitevera kupora kwevanhu mazana maviri nemamakumi mashanu nevashanu nezuro. Vanhu vachiri kurwara vanosvika zvuru zvinomwe nemazana mashanu ane makumi manomwe nevanomwe kana kuti 7, 577. Kunyangwe muHarare nemuBulawayo muri imo mune vanhu vakawandisa vari kurwara, huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi mumatunhu ose hwawedzera zvave kutyisa kana nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano. Mukuru mubazi rezvirwere zvekutapuriranwa Dr Portia Manangazira vanoti svondo rino hurumende iri kutarisira ongororo inobuditsa pachena kuti kufa nekubatwa kwevanhu nechirwere ichi kuri kukonzerwa nekamwe kamhando katsva kechirwere ichi kakabatwa kuSouth Africa neBritain uye kanzoni kanopararira zvakanyanya kana muvana. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matatu kana kuti 3 million vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zviuru makumi manomwe nemaviri zvine zana nemakumi maviri nerimwe kana kuti 72,121. Vapora vadarika mamiriyoni maviri nezvuru mazana mana kana kuti 2,4 million. South Africa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Dunhu reSADC ndirozve rine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi vadarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 1,3 million. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi masere nemapfumbamwe ane zviuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 89, 7 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vanodarika zvuru mazana matatu nemakumi manomwe nemaviri kana kuti 372, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemaviri kana kuti 22 miillion. Pasi rose, vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 1, 9 million. Asi vapora pasi rose vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi mana nemapfumbamwe ane zviuru zvisere kana kuti 49, 8 million.

headline: Veruzhinji Vokurudzirwa Kutsigira Hurumende Kuita Mabasa eKurwisa Covid-19
text: Apo huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa kana kubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 huri kuramba huchikwira, vemakereke vanoti vari kushanda zvakasimba vachirwisa kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19, kuburikidza nekuwanisa zvipatara zvemachechi zvikwanisiro, mvura pamwe nekupa dzidziso kune veruzhinji pamusoro pedenda iri. Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Council of Churches, Reverend Kenneth Mtata, vanoti basa guru riri kuitwa nemakereke kugadzirisa zvipatara zvemachechi, izvo vanoti zvakawanda kumaruwa, kuwanisa zvipatara izvi mvura yakachena, kuwanisa vashandi vemuzvipatara zvipfeko zvekuzvidzivirira kubva kuchirwere ichi, pamwe nekuwanisa vanhu zvekudya munguva ino ye lockdown. Reverend Mtata, avo vakaita zvidzidzo zvepamusoro soro zvePhD munyaya dzezvidzidzo zvebhaibheri, vanoti nyaya yakatarisana nenyika yedenda reCovid-19 haichisiri nyaya ingangonzi ingasiirwa kuhurumende chete, asi kuti yave nguva yekuti munhu wese pamwe nemasangano vawane chavangaisa mukubatsiridza kuti zvinhu zvirerukire nyika. Panyaya yekuti nyika yakagadzirira here kupa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19, Reverend Mtata vanoti pasi rose nyika zhinji hadzina kugadzirira, kusanganisirawo dzakaita seAmerica, hadzinawo kugadzirira pakugoverwa kwenhomba idzi, kusanganisirawo Zimbabwe. Munyika mune vamwe vemakereke vanonzi vari kukurudzira nhengo dzavo kuti dzisazotora nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19, asi munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Council of Churches ava vanoti vemakereke ava havafanirwe kutsvaga mbiri nekushambadza mashoko asina humbowo. Vanoti zvinozivikanwa pasi rose kuti nhomba dzinogona kukonzerawo mamwe matambudziko pamunhu, asi vachiti zvinozivikanwawo cjose kuti nhomba dzinoponesa. Reverend Mtata vanoti vemakereke ava vanofanirwa kutobatsira mukushanda pamwe kuburikidza nekusvitsawo pfungwa dzavo kuti dzishandiswe, uyewo kuti ivo kana vasingade kupiwa nhomba idzi vanofanirwa kusiya vanoda zvavo vachibaiwa. No media source currently available

headline: Joshua ndomurikita: Tyson Fury
text: anoti ane idi rekuti anokwanisa kukunda Anthony Joshua uyo ane bhande reWorld Heavyweight.   Nhaurwa dzehupenyu hwake uye nedzimwe dzakasiyana dzakaona Fury achimbomira kukwikwidza mutsiva kubva mugore ra2015 apo paakakunda Wladimir Klitschko ndokumutorera mabhande eWBA, IBF neWBO ayo ave naJoshua ose.   Fury achatanga kukwikwidza muna Chikumi uye shasha iyi haisati yambokundwa mutsiva.   Anotarisirwa kukwikwidza kuManchester Arena nemutambi asati ave kuzivikanwa uye kana apedza naye anogona kuzorwa naJoshua.   Paakabvunzwa kuti anofunga kuti anokunda Joshua here, Fury akaudza ITV Good Morning Britain kuti, “Hongu ndinozviziva, dai ndisingazvizive ndisina kumbogara pano ndichitaura zvatiri kutaura izvi. Ndingadai ndiri kuSpain uko ndichinwa hangu Sangria kana zvimwe.   “Hongu, ndozviziva kuti ndozviita nekuti ndinofunga kuti tarenda retsiva ndinaro, ndinofamba nenzira chaiyo uye ndinokwanisa kumisidzana nemutambi akaita saye zvakanaka. Ane simba zvake uye haarwisike naye zviri nyore asi haazosvike pandiri, ini ndave kumberi zvangu.   “Ndinodada hangu naye nezvaaita mumutambo uyu, uye mucherechedzo wakanaka zvikuru kune vamwe vatambi vari kusimukira. Asi ngaachangetedze mabhande ese nekuti ndiri kumuvinga kuzomubvutira manje-manje. Munhu wese mutsiva anoziva shasha chaiyo.” – SportsMail Boxing

headline: Tinosvika kure: Mudimu
text: MUTAMBI wemaWarriors neCefn Druids yekuWales Republic, Alec Mudimu, anoti shuviro yake kugadzwa kuve kaputeni wechikwata chenhabvu chenyika zvachose.   Mudimu ndiye akambofanopihwa chinzvimbo chekutungamira maWarriors mumitambo miviri yawo yadarika apo akasangana neSomalia mumutambo wekurwira kunokwikwidza ku2022 Qatar FIFA World Cup. Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Mudimu anoti ari mudenga rechinonwe nekuda kwechiremerera chaakapihwa naAntipas chekufanobata chinzvimbo chakaputeni wemaWarriors.   “Handisi kugona nemufaro, ichi chiremerera chikuru chinoshuvirwa nemunhu wese kutungamira nyika yako. Ndiri kufara chaizvo kana mhuri yangu haisi kugona nemufaro. Ndoda zvirambe zvakadaro, kana zvichiita ndoda kuramba ndirini mutungamiri ndichitungamira vamwe vatambi apo tichatanga kurwira tikiti rekuenda kunokwikwidza ku2022 Qatar Fifa World Cup,” anodaro Mudimu.   MaWarriors svondo radarika akapona nepaburi retsono kuti abudirire kuenda kumapoka ekurwira tikiti rekunokwikwidza kuWorld Cup nekudaro Mudimu anoti ino yave nguva yekubika chikwata chakasimba chichanokwikwidza nezvimwe mumutambo uyu.   “Ishuviro yemutambi wese kutamba kuWorld Cup uye ini ndichiri mwana mudiki ndichiona paTV vamwe vachitamba ndaingoshuvira ndichiti nerimwe zuva ndodawo kuzotambawo ikoko, saka ino yave nguva yekushanda nesimba. Tinoda kuenda kuQatar uye tikashanda nesimba tinoenda,” anodaro.   Mutambi uyu akazvarirwa muno asi ave nemakore mashanu akabva aenda kunogara kunyika yeEngland uko akazokurira achigara kuLondon kunove ndiko kwaakatanga kutambira nhabvu.   Akatambira zvikwata zvakasiyana zvinosanganisira Stalbridge Celtic, Radcliffe Borough, Nortwich Victoria, Stockport Town neCefn Druids iyo ari kutambira parizvino.   “Zimbabwe ndiyo nyika yangu uye ndinodada nayo, ndakazvarirwa muno uye mhuri yedu kunyanya vabereki vangu vanogara vachiuya kuno kuzoshanya nguva nenguva. Ndinotoziva nzvimbo zhinji dzemuno kusanganisira kuOld Highfields tine hama dzimwe dzinogara ikoko,” anodaro.   Achibvunzwa pamusoro pechikafu chaanofarira kudya, Mudimu anoti, “Zviri pachena kana ndauya muno ndinofarira kudya sadza uye nederere.”   Mudimu akatanga kutambira maWarriors gore radarika apo akashevedzwa neaimbove murairidzi wechikwata ichi – Sunday ‘Mhofu’ Chidzambwa – akatamba kumutambo we2018 Four Nations Tournament uyo wakaitirwa kuZambia.   Gore rino, aivemo muchikwata chemaWarriors chakakwikwidza kuAfrica Cup of Nations kuEgypt uko akakwanisa kutamba mitambo miviri yekutanga.   “Semutambi wenhabvu, ndichikura chandaingoda chete kupfeka jezi remaWarriors uye pandakapihwa mukana uyu ndakafara zvandisati ndakamboita uye zvikafadza zvakare mhuri yangu, vabereki vangu. Chinhu chandinoshuvira zvikuru kuti ndiite zvakanaka ndichitambira maWarriors,” anodaro Mudimu.

headline: Vanhu Vanoti Vari Kucherechedza Kuzvitonga kweNyika Miromo Yakaoma neNzara
text: Apo nyika iri kupemberera mangwana kusvitsa kwayo makore makumi matatu nemapfumbamwe kubva payawana kuzvitonga muna 1980, vamwe vanoti hupfumi hwenyika huri kuramba huchienda kumawere zvisinei kuti mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakavimbisa kugadzirisa zvinhu pavakapinda pachigaro. VaMoses Kumbweya, avo vanorarama nekurima nekutengesa zvirimwa zvakasiyana-siyana, vanoti vanoshushikana nenyaya yekuti hupfumi hwenyika huri kuramba huchiwondomoka; veruzhinji vachiwedzera kutambura, zvisinei nezvinotaurwa nemutungamiri naVaMnangagwa pamwe nevamwe vakuru vakuru vehurumende. VaKumbweya vanoti VaMnangagwa vakavimbisa kugadzirisa hupfumi uye kukwezva vekunze kuti vasime mari. Asi vanoti maonero avo ndeekuti mutungamiri wenyika nehurumende yavo havana zano rakati tsvikiti rekubudisa nyika mumatambudziko ayakatarisana nawo. VaKumbweya vanoti nyaya yekuti zvirango zvakatemerwa mamwe makambani pamwe nevamwe vakuru vakuru vehurumende nedzimwe nyika dzekumadokero, ndizvo zviri kukonzera kusagadzikana kwehupfumi, kuhwanda nemunwe kwavari kuita. Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinogara muBritain uye chiri chipangamazano munyaya dzezvehupfumi, Muzvare Miriam Mutizwa, vanotsigirawo kuti zvirango hazvisi izvo zviri kukonzera matmbudziko ari munyika asi kuti huwori pamwe nekusatevera bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Mutauriri webato reZapu, VaIphithule Maphosa, vanoti zuva rekucherechedza rusununguko rinogona kupfuura veruzhinji vasinganyanyi kuri koshesa nekuda kwemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika. Vanotiwo kunyange hazvo pakazoitwa sarudzo, mapindiro akaita VaMnangagwa pahutungamiri uye makakatanwa akatevera mushure mesarudzo gore rapera, ndizvo zviri kuita kuti zvinhu munyika zvisagadzikana munyaya dzezvehupfumi. VaMaphosa vanotiwo kutaura kwemutungamiri wenyika pamwe nekufamba vachienda kunyika dzakasiyana-siyana vachiedza kukwezva kusimwa kwemari yekunze munyika, hakuna zvinobatika zvakuri kuunza vachitsinhirawo kuti VaMnangagwa nehurumende yavo, vanenge vari kupererwa nemazano. Mukuru weAffirmative Action Group mudunhu reMatabeleland, variwo muongorori wezvehupfumi akazvimirira, VaReginald Shoko, vanoti dambudziko guru nderekuti VaMnangagwa vakatora hutungamiri apo hupfumi hwenyika hwaive hwatowondomoka kare, vachiti kugadzirisa izvi kunotora nguva. Asi VaShoko vanobvumawo kuti nyaya yehuwori ndiro rimwe dambudziko guru rinofanirwa kugadziriswa kuitira kuti zvinhu zvinake. Mutauriri wemadzimai muMDC mudunhu reBulawayo, Amai Barbara Tanyanyiwa, avo vanove zvakare munyori weboka reWomen’s Committee musangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, vanotiwo hapana chekupemberera pazuva rerusununguko vachiti kusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu munyika kunonyanya kubata vanhukadzi sezvo vari ivo vanoona kuti mhuri dzadyei. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kumutauriri weZanu PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, kuti tinzwe divi rebato ravo. Asi vachitaura pavakatoreswa mhiko, VaMnangagwa vakati vakanga vakazvipira kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyika, vachiti hurumende yavo ichavhura mikana yekutanga mabizinesi kuitira kuti munyika muve nemabasa. Mumazuva mashoma apfuura, sangano reZCTU rakakurudzira kuti vashandi munyika vawedzerwe mari dzemihoro. Pavakapinda pachigaro muna Mbudzi wa2017, VaMnangagwa vakati kugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika ndicho chimwe chezvinhu zvavaizokoshesa. Asi hupfumi hwenyika huri kuramba huchienda kumawere mitengo yezvinhu ichiramba ichikwira ukuwo mari ichiramba ichishaya simba rekutenga. Zimbabwe yakawana kuzvitonga musi wa 18 Kubvumbi, 1980, VaRobert Mugabe vakagadzwa semutungamiri wehurumende, vakatonga nyika kwemakore makumi matatu nemanomwe. Asi vakazobviswa pachigaro nemauto avo muna 2017, VaMnangagwa vachibva vatora chigaro chavo. No media source currently available

headline: Chirwere cheTyphoid Chovhiringa Vakawanda muMbare
text: Chirwere che typhoid chanyuka muHarare zvakare zvave kupa kuti veruzhinji vatyire hupenyu hwavo sezvo kanzuru iri kutadza kutakura marara pamwe nekugadzirisa pombi dzinotakura tsvina munzvimbo dzakawanda muguta iri. Mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme, vanoti zvipatara zvekanzuru yavo zvarapa vanhu vakawanda mumusha unogara veruzhinji weMbare mushure mekuwanikwa vaine chirwere che typhoid. Kunyange hazvo pasina vati vafa nechirwere ichi, vagari vemuMbare vakaita saMuzvare Vongai Mbedzi vanoti chirwere che typhoid hachingarege kubata vanhu sezvo pombi dzinotakura tsvina yemuzvimbuzi dzichigara dzakatushuka. Mumwe mugari wemuMbare makare, VaTitus Nhongonhema, vanoti kusatakurwa kwemarara nekusagadzirwa kwepombi dzinotakura tsvina kuri kukonzerawo kuti zvirwere zvakaita se typhoid zvipfunye chisero muMbare vachiti vave kutyira kuti chirwere ichi chichapararira neguta rose kana dambudziko iri rikasagadziriswa. Zvichakadai, VaChideme vanoti kanzuru yavo yakaisa dumba riri kushandiswa sechipatara kuMatapi muMbare richange risingavharwe kunyange nehusiku kuti vanhu vakwanise kurapwa. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naMeya weHarare kuti tinzwe kuti sei kanzuru yavo iri kutadza kutakura marara pamwe nekugadzirisa pombi dzinotakura tsvina yemuzvimbuzi. Asi mumwe kanzura mukanzuru yeHarare, VaCharles Nyatsuro, vakurudzira veruzhinji kuti vasarasire marara pese pese vachiti izvi zvinoita kuti chirwere che typhoid nezvimwe zvirwere zvinokonzerwa nekusashambidzika kwenzvimbo zvisapararire. VaNyatsuro vati kanzuru yavo iri kutadzawo kutakura marara sezvo isina motokari dzakakwana kunyange hazvo vakatenga dzimwe motokari svondo rapera. Gurukota rezvehutano, VaDavid Parirenyatwa, vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti bazi ravo richashanda zvakasimba nekanzuru yeHarare kuedza kupedza chirwere chetyphoid kuMbare. Gore rapera pane vanhu vaviri vanonzi vakaurayiwa nechirwere che typhoid muHarare. No media source currently available

headline: VaTsvangirai Voita Musangano kuChikomba neMugovera
text: Mapurisa anonzi azivisa bato re MDC-T kuti harikwanise kuita musangano nevatsigiri varo ku Chikomba mudunhu reMashonaland East neMugovera sezvo Zanu PF iine hurongwa hwayo mudunhu iri musi uyu. No media source currently available Mutauriri weMDC-T, Va Obert Gutu, vanoti vakazivisa mapurisa kuti mutungamiri webato ravo,Va Morgan Tsvangirai, vanoda kuita musangano nevatsigiri vavo, asi mapurisa akati havakwanisi kuita izvi. Va Gutu vashora mapurisa vachiti ari kushandiswa ne Zanu PF vachirega kuita basa ravo vasina divi ravakarerekera. Vaenderera mberi vachiti vatora danho sebato rekuti Va Tsvangirai vaenderere mberi nemusangano zvisinei nemhinduro yemapurisa vachiti mapurisa haana kodzero yekuvarambidza kuita musangano uyu pasi pemutemo we Public Order and Security Act. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Amai Charity Charamba, vati havakwanise kutaura nezvenyaya iyi vachiti havasati vakwanisa kutaura nemukuru wemapurisa mudunhu re Mashonaland East kuti vanzwe kuti nyaya iyi yakamira sei. Mutauriri wemapurisa mudunhu reMashonaland East, Inspector Clemence Mabweazara, vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachigarowanzotaura vachitsigira Zanu PF, Va Goodson Nguni, vanoti MDC-T yakashanda kwazvo kuti pave nebumbiro idzva remitemo yenyika saka nokudaro vati Va Tsvangirai nebato ravo vanofanirwa kuwanikwa vachitevedzera mutemo. Izvi zvatsinhirwawo neimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo uye vari mudzidzisi pa University of Zimbabwe, Muzvinafundo Charity Manyeruke, avo vashora danho ratorwa ne MDC-T iri vachiti uku kuzvidza vanochengetedza mutemo nerunyararo munyika. Asi pasi pemitemo yenyika, mapurisa haana mvumo yekurambidza mapato kuita misangano yayo, kunze kwekuti mapurisa anogona kuti anenge akawandirwa nebasa musi uyu, kana kuti nzvimbo inenge ichida kushandiswa, inenge ichishandiswawo nemamwe masangano.

headline: Vanhu Vabatwa neCovid-19 Vadarika Zviuru Zvishanu
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muZimbabwe hwadarika zviuru zvishanu zvine zana nemakumi manomwe nematanhatu kana kuti 5176. Izvi zvinotevera kubatwa kwevanhu vanodarika zana nevana kana kuti 104 nechirewere ichi munyika neMugovera. Vanhu vaviri vakafa kuBulawayo neCovid-19 zvichireva kuti munyika yose, vanhu zana nemakumi matatu vafa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vapora vanosvika zviuru zviviri nemakumi mana nemasere kana kuti 2047. Kupararira zvakanyanya kuri kuita chirwere ichi kuri kuuya apo vakoti navanachiremba vave kupinda mumwedzi miviri vachiramwa mabasa vachinyunyuta nemari dzavari kutambiriswa uye kushaya zvikwanisiro zvekuzvidzivirira kubva kuchirwere checoronavirus. Mukuru weHealth Services Board inoona nezvemashandiro avashanmdi vemuzvipatara Dr Paulinus Sikosana vaudza Studio 7 kuti ikozvino havasi pabasa nekudaro havakwanise kutaura nezvenyaya iyi. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika vari gurukota rezvehutano VaConstantino Chiwenga sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Enoch Mayida avo vakambotungamira chipatara cheChitungwiza vanoti huwandu hwwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi hunogona kunge hwakakura nekuda kwekuti vamwe vari kufa vasati vavhenekwa. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru zana vabatwa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Vafa vadarika zviuru makumi maviri nemashanu ane mazana matatu nemasere kana kuti 25, 337. Vanhu vapora vadarika zviuru mazana masere nemakumi maviri nematatu kana kuti 823, 000. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nerimwe ane zviuru mazana mana kana kuti 21,4 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi muAmerica vadarika zviuru zana ne makumi matanhatu nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 169, 000. Brazil ine vanhu vafa vanodarika chiuru zana kana kuti 100,000 ndiyo inotevera America pandufu pasi rose. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi pasi rose vadarika zviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi manomwe nerimwe kana kuti 771,000.  Vapora pasi rose vachidarika mamiriyoni gumi nematatu ane zviuru mazana mana kana kuti 13,4 million

headline: Dare Rinopa Mutongo Unoti Vechidiki Vakatora Muzinda weMorgan Tsvangirai House neSvondo Vabviswe
text: Dare ramejasitiriti muHarare rakatura neChipiri mutongo wekuti bato reMDC-T iri kufanotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe ribvise vechidiki vanonzi ndivo vakabvuta muzinda weMorgan Richard Tsvangirai House uri muHarare neSvondo vachiti vanobuda chete mumuzinda uyu kana vakuru vemapato eMDC-T neMDC Alliance iri kutungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa vatauarirana kuti vashande pamwechete zvakare. Vechidiki ava vanoti vari kutevera mutongo wedare reSupreme Court wekuti vaive nezvigaro muna 2014 vafambise mabasa muMDC-T, vachiti ndivo vaive pazvigaro gore iri. Bato reMDC-T pamwe nemunyori mukuru waro, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vakakwira dare neMuvhuro vachikwirira bato reMDC Alliance, VaChamisa, VaPaul Gorekore, VaHappymore Chidziva, VaDenford Ngadziore pamwe nemukuru wemapurisa mudunhu reHarare. MDC-T yakatora muzinda uyu kubva kuMDC Alliance muna Chikunguru ichibatsirwa nemapurisa. Mutongi wedare akati vashanu vekutanga vakakwirirwa dare vanofanirwa kudzosera muzinda uyu kuMDC-T, uye vaburitse muhutapwa vanhu vanonzi vakavharirwa mumuzinda uyu. Tabata VaMwonzora kuti tinzwe divi rebato ravo panyaya iyi. No media source currently available Asi mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatywayo, vanoti vakatoshamiswa nekuona mutongo uyu uchiisawo bato ravo pamwe nemutungamiri wavo VaChamisa mukati sezvo vasineyi nechekuita nezviri kuita pamuzinda weMorgan Richard Tsvangirai House. VaHlatywayo vanoti vakangonzwawo kuti muzinda uyu wakatorwa nevechidi vaiti ndivo vaive pazvigaro muna 2014 pakaitwa kongiresi yebato iri. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Squad yakanaka asi. . .’
text: SHASHA dzakambonetsa dzichitambira maWarriors pamwe nevaongorori vemutambo uyu vanoti chikwata chaSunday ‘Mhofu’ Chidzambwa icho chakasarudzwa kuti chinomirira nyika kumutambo weAfrica Cup of Nations chakanaka kunyangwe zvazvo vamwe vatambi vakaita saWillard Katsande naCosta Nhamoinesu vaifanira kuvewo muchikwata ichi.   Svondo rino, Mhofu akadoma vatambi 34 avo vachapinda mukembi umo vachatanga gadziriro dzekuenda kumakwishu aya. Mutambo uyu uri kutanga nemusi wa11 Chikumi apo Zimbabwe ichatamba neEgypt, kuCairo.   Lazarus Muhoni – uyo akanwisa chibodzwa chakaendesa maWarriors kumakwishu ekutanga eAFCON mugore ra2004 kuTunisia – anoti chikwata ichi chakanakisa zvikuru asi Mhofu angadai akashevedzawo Katsande sezvo ruzivo rwake rwenhabvu rwaizobatsira zvikuru mumutambo uyu.   Katsande ndiye aive kaputeni wemaWarriors kuAFCON yakaitirwa kuGabon uye kugumurwa kwakaita chikwata ichi akabva asendeka shangu dzake achiti anoda kupa vechidiki mukana wekuti vatambewo. Asi pakurwira kuenda kumakwishu egore rino, akamboshevedzwa kamwechete naChidzambwa apo maWarriors akaita mangange 1-1 neDemocratic Republic of Congo.   Muhoni anoti Katsande aigona kushanda basa guru pakumaka Mohamed Salah weEgypt zvekuti aimushaisa mukana wekuita zvidobi-dobi zvake apo zvikwata zviviri izvi zvichasangana.   “Willard Katsande ange achidiwa muchikwata ichi nekuti ndiye ega kubva muZimbabwe akasimba bhonzo uye ane ruzivo rwemutambo uyu sezvo akamboenda kuAFCON kare. Mwedzi yadarika, ange achitamba zvinonwisa mvura kuKaizer Chiefs kwake kuSouth Africa saka anokodzera kuve ari muchikwata ichi. Apa tichitarisa mitambo hedu, haina kuchipa nekuti tiri kusangana neshasha chaidzo dzakaita saMohamed Salah. Katsande ndipo paaigona kushanda basa guru kumunyararidza nekuti Katsande haakusiye uchienda,” anodaro.   Anoti vamwe vatambi vari muchikwata ichi vakaita saThabani Kamusoko naDanny Phiri – avo vakasarudzwa kuti vatambe pachinzvimbo chaKatsande – vanogona kubata basa sebasa.   “Asi tichitarisa hedu vamwe vatambi varimo vanofadza zvavo vakaita saThabani Kamusoko uyo ari kutambira kuDRC kana Danny Phiri. Kamusoko ini ndinomufarira, kuDRC ange achitamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura uye muviri wake mukuru ndewenhabvu chaiwo. Zvikwata zvatinenge tichisangana nazvo zvine vatambi vakuru saka tinofanirwawo kuita vedu vakakura kuti zvitibatsire pakuhwina mabhora,” anodaro Muhoni.   Shasha yekuongorora nhabvu Charles “CNN” Mabika anorumbidza chikwata ichi achiti chakagona kubatanidzwa sezvo chiine vechidiki pamwe nevamwe vave nenguva ndefu vachitamba.   Asi, anoti Mhofu angadai akashevedza Nhamoinesu anove mumwe wevatambi vemaWarriors vakuru vane ruzivo rwakanyanya rwenhabvu sezvo ave nemakore akawanda achitambira kuEurope.   Masvondo adarika, Nhamoinesu akabuda pachena kuti asendeka kutambira maWarriors, asi Mabika anoti Mhofu aifanirwa kugara pasi naye omuudza kuti anoda kumutambisa nekuda kweruzivo rwake rwaanarwo rwenhabvu.   “Chikwata chakabatana nekuti chine vechidiki nevakuru, zvinove zvatinoda asi Costa Nhamoinesu ange achidiwa. Nhamoinesu anodirwa ruzivo rwake uye rwaishanda apa nekuti mitambo yedu haina kuchipa. Ndiye wandinoona aigona kudzikamisa vechidiki munhandare kana chabvondoka,” anodaro Mabika.   Aimbove mubati wepagedhi wemaWarriors neDynamos, Japhet ‘ShortCat’ Mparutsa anoti nguva ino ndiyo yekuvaka chikwata chemaWarriors chichazonetsa makore mashanu kana gumi anotevera.   “Tinofanirwa kutarira kumberi kune remangwana redu, tovaka chikwata icho chichatibatira basa kwemakore mashanu kusvika gumi anotevera.   “Dai ndirini ndiri panyanga, ndaitumira vechidiki vane makore ari pasi pe20 ne23 okuberekwa, tovasanganisa nevashanu kana vatanhatu vagara vachitamba muchikwata ichi kuti vabatsire vechidiki avo vanenge vasarudzwa,” anodaro ShortCat.

headline: Kucherwa kweGoridhe Zviri Kunze kweMutemo kuPenhalonga Kwokanganisa Magariro eDunhu iri
text: Vamwe vagari vekuPenhalonga mumusha weTsvingwe, kuOld West muMutasa South mudunhu reManicaland vari kuchema-chema nenyaya yekusvibisirwa mweya wavanofema zvichitevera mabasa ekucherwa kwegoridhe ari kuitwa kunharaunda iyi zviri kunze kwemutemo nemakorokoza. Vagari ava vanoti zvakare mvura yavo yemurwizi Mutare haichashandisiki nekuda kwemadhaka ayinawo uye mishonga irimo inoshandiswa pakuchenesa goridhe. Vanotiwo chipfambi chatekeshera zvakare munharaunda yavo pamwe nekuparwa kwedzimhosva. VaWeston Makoni mugari wekuPenhalonga uye vari sachigaro wekomiti yevagari vekunharaunda iyi. VaMakoni vanochema nenyaya yekuti kubva pakamira kambani yeRedwing kuchera goridhe zviri pamutemo, makorokoza ave kuita basa iri ari kukanganisa nharaunda nekusiya makomba, kusvibisa mvura, uye nemweya wekufema. VaMakoni vanotiwo nyaya dzehumbavha nedzechipfambi dzawedzera munzvimbo yavo zvichitevera kuwanda kwaita makorokoza aya uye nevatengi vegoridhe. “Vanhu vose vari kuchera gold vanenge vaine maU.S. dollar, saka vave kuona kuti tave kutowana usiku mari yemaU.S. dollar, saka vose vakumhanyira kuno vachiti kuPenhalonga kune foreign currency saka zvadaro zvakare mbavha dziri kuuya zvakare vachibira avo vane mari muhomwe semaGweja aya vachiba kunyangwe nemudzimba vari kupinda, munguva yapfuura pane vakabatwa vaba mumba vapinda vakaba ma-TV, mibhedha nezvimwe zvakadaro.” VaMakoni vanoti kunyangwe vakaedza kutaura nevesangano rinoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwezviwanikwa nezvakatikomberedza, veEnvironmental Management Agency, EMA, hapana chakabuda. VaKingstone Chitombe mukuru weEMA mudunhu reManicaland vange vasiri kudavira runhare rwavo kuti tinzwe divi ravo pamusoro penyaya iyi. Amai Tsverukai Duwa mumwe mugari wenharaunda iyi uye vanoti pavaikura havana kumbosangana nenhamo yavepo pari zvino zvichitevera huruva iri kupwititidzwa zuva nezuva nevacheri vegoridhe ava izvo zvopinza vagari munjodzi yezvirwere zvinokonzerwa nekufema mweya wakasviba. Amai Josephine Musiyazviriyo vanobvumirana navaDuwa panyaya. Vanoti ivo kutangwa kwakaitwa kucherwa kwegoridhe nemakorokoza kwaunza zvakare vanhu vakawandisa munzvimbo yavo nevamwe vekure kure. “Redwing Mine yange iri nzvimbo yakanaka asi iye zvino zvasiyana. Mukatarisa izvezvi paive nemiti uye nema lawn kutenderedza kuitirira kuti dust risasumuka, sakaizvezvi chanyanya kunetsa pamwe inyaya yema resources onetsa kuti vatadze kudzivirira dust riri kusimuka zvopa kuti tifeme mweya une dust totyira zvakare zvirwere, nekuti rinosimuka zvakanyanya kusvika kunana Africa University, even miriwo yedu inenge iri ye brown ne dust irori.” VaGeorge Miti ndivo mukuru anoona nekugara zvakanaka kwevana vepachikoro chepamusorosooro cheAfrica University, icho chiri kukanganiswawo zvakare nekucherwa kuri kuitwa goridhe uku. VaMiti vanoti kucherwa kuri kuitwa chicherwa ichi kwave kukanganisa mafambisirirwo emabasa ekurima pachikoro pavo zvakare nekugara kwakanaka kwevana vavo sezvo vacheri ava vave kutopinda nemuyadhi yechikoro chavo. “Izvezvi nzvimbo inenge ichimainiwa inenge iri nzvimbo yechikoro, inozosara makomba zvokonzera kuti munenge musisiri safe pakuzofamba uye zvokonzera zvakare mavanga munharaunda kana kuti environmental degradation pamwechete nekuti mvura zvakare kana paine ma chemicals anoshandiswa mvura inenge isisiri safe kushandisa isu kuminda yedu yemadiridzo.” Mumiriri weMutasa South mudare reparamende VaRegai Tsunga vanoti vakaudzwa nezvedambudziko iri nevagari uye nemukuru wechikoro cheAfrica University VaMunashe Furusa. Vanoti vachagara pasi nevakuru vehurumende kubazi redzidzo yepamusoro, rekucherwa kwezviwanikwa, naMudzviti vedunhu reMutasa vaGeorge Bandure uye negurukota rinomirira dunhu reManicaland Amai Ellen Gwaradzimba kuti vaone kuti pamwechete vangagadzirisa seyi nyaya iyi. “Vice Chancellor vepaAfrica University vakandinyorera vachinyunyuta nemashandiro ari kuita zve-illegal mining iri kuitika around Africa University vachiti makomba avo ari kukanganisa zvivakwa zvavo sezvo mamwe ma-tunnels ave kuuya kumadziro uyezve makomba aya ane njodzi pakuti ari kusiyiwa akadaro kana vapedza kuchera, so zvichaita kuti vana vechikoro vanogona kukuvara uye kuti mvura payonaya mosquito dzotanga ku-breeder nekuti zvakare ivhu ririkucherwa richakukurwa rwizi rwozara jecha.” Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano VaIsaac Tomu vaudza Studio 7 kuti kazhinji pakucherwa kwegoridhe panoshandiswa mishonga yakaita se Mercury, iyo inoti ikaiswa mumvura inokanganisa hutano hwevanhu uye nezvipfuyo. Vanoti vanhu vanokwanisa kurwara negomarara, uye huruva ichikonzeresa rurindi, kana kuti TB. Kudzimara munyika magadzikana munyaya dzezvehupfumi vanhu vachiwana mabasa mumakambani akanga avharwa, mabasa echikorokoza acharamba achienderera mberi munyika mose sezvo vanhu vanenge vachitsvaga chouviri kuti vararamise mhuri dzavo. No media source currently available

headline: Madzimai emuZimbabwe Anorangarira Mabasa aAmai Winnie Mandela
text: Madzimai akawanda emuZimbabwe akaungana muHarare nezuro achipemberera pamwe nekurangarira hupenyu hwamushakabvu Amai Winnie Mandela, pamwe nemabasa avakaita nekushinga kwavaiva vakaita panguva yehondo yakaunza rusununguko kuvanhu vatema vekuSouth Africa. Madzimai ose akataura pagungano iri vakarumbidza mushakabvu Amai Mandela, vachiti vaiva mucherechedzo werusununguko wenyika zhinji dzemuAfrica nekuti vaiva vakashinga nenzira yakayemurwa nemadzimai epasi rose. Mumwe wemadzimai aya, Amai Christine Chima, vakataura kuti Amai Mandela ndivo vakaita kuti nyika yeSouth Africa izivikanwe nenyika dzose apo vairwisa vachena kuti vasunungure murume wavo, VaNelson Mandela, kuti vabude mutirongo mavakange vakatongerwa kugara kwemakore akawanda. Amai Chima vakaendera mberi vachiti nyaya inonyanya kuvarwadza ndeyekuti murume waAmai Mandela akaramba kuti vagare pamusha pavakange vakaroorwa. Mumwe mudzimai anorwira kodzero dzemadzimai, Amai Edna Masiiwa, vakatsinhira mashoko aAmai Chima vachiti Amai Mandela vakapomerwa nyaya yekuti havana kuvimbika apo murume wavo aiva ari mujeri. Vakaendera mberi vachiti dai aiva murume akaita saizvozvo, pangadai pasina zvaakamboitwa. Imwe nhengo yeParamende yeZimbabwe, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vakarumbidza Amai Mandela vachiti raiva gamba rakashingisa vanasikana kuti vaende kuhondo yakasungura Zimbabwe. Amai Lucia Matibenga vakataurawo kuti havakanganwe zvavakaitwa naAmai Mandela pavakatanga kusangana pamusangano wakaitirwa kuJohannesburg mushure mekunge varohwa zvakaipisisa nenyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Mhembero yekurangarira Amai Mandela yakarongwa nenhengo yeParamende yeZimbabwe Amai Priscilla Misihairabwi pamwechete nesangano reWomen’s Coalition of Zimbabwe. Amai Winnie Mandela, avo vakange vave nemakore makumi masere nerimwechete, vakashaya nomusi wa2 Kubvumbi vakazovigwa mushure mevhiki mbiri. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Makumi Mashanu Vanobatwa Vaine Mhando yeOmicron Variant
text: Vanhu makumi mashanu vanonzi vakabatwa vaine mhando itsva yeCovid-19 yeOmicron variant muZimbabwe. Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita nevatori venhau muHarare nhasi, mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, Doctor John Chamunorwa Mangwiro, vati ropa rakaongororwa iri raive rabva kuvanhu makumi maviri vakabatwa nedenda iri paMasvingo Teachers College, vatambi venhabvu makumi maviri nevaviri vechikwata che Under 17 National team, uye vamwe vanhu vasere. VaMangwiro vati ropa rese makumi mashanu rakavhenekwa rakawanikwa ruine hutachiona hwemhando itsva yeCovid -19 yeOmicron variant. VaMangwiro vatiwo vashandi vese vanoshanda nekurwisana nechirwere cheCovid 19 pamwe nevese vanorarama nezvirwere zvehupenyu hwese vave kufanirwa kubaiwa nhomba yetatu. VaMangwiro vatiwo kukwira kwehuwandu hwevari kubatiwa nehutachiona hweCovid -19 mucherechedzo wekuti nyika yapinda pachikamu chechina kubva zvatanga denda riri kana kuti 4th wave. Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, uye vari munyori wezvehutano muMDC Alliance, Dr Henry Madzorera, vati ongororo iyi inoratidza kuti mhando yeCovid-19yeOmicron ratova dambudziko guru munyika. Zimbabwe yava pakati penyika dxzinodarika makumi mashanu, idzo dzinosanganisira America, Britain, Brazil nedzimwe dzine vanhu vane chirwere chemhando yeOmicron variant pasi rose zvichitevera kubuda kweSouth Africa pachena mwedzi wapera ichiti yainge yawana hutachiona uhu munyika iyi. Nyika dzakawanda dzakabva dzamisa kutambira vanhu vanobva kunyika nomwe dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica dzinosanganisira South Africa, Zimbabwe, Namibia, Mozambique, Lesotho, Eswatini neBotswana. Zimbabwe inoti iri kutora matanho ekuona kuti chirwere ichi chisarambe chichipararira munyika kuburikidza nekuti vanenge vapinda munyika vachibva kudzimwe nyika, kusanganisira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe, vazvipatsanure kwemazuva akatarwa nehurumende mushure mekuvhenekwa chirwere ichi pavanopinda munyika. Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nezuro kuti hakuna munhu akafa nedenda iri munyikayose izvo zvakasiya huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vangori pazviuru zvina nemazana manomwe nevanomwe, 4 707. Vanhu chiuru chimwe chete nemakumi mana nevaviri vakabatwa nedenda iri nezuro wakare izvo zvakasiya vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika vava zviuru zana nemakumi matatu nezvitanhatu nemazana matatu nemakumi manomwenevapfumbamwe(136,379). Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga munyika vave mamiriyoni matatu ane zviuru mazana masere nemakumi maviri nezvipfumbamwenemazana matanhatu ane makumi matatu nevatanhatu(3 829 636). Vabayiwa nhomba yechipiri vave mamiriyoni maviri ane zviuru mazana\nmasere nemakumi mashanu nechimwe nemazana matanhatu ane makumi maviri nevashanu (2 851 625). Huwandu uhu hunogona kukwira nhasi manheru apo hurumende ichazivisa zvayawana nhasi. Hurumende inoti inoda kubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi munyika. No media source currently available

headline: VaSikhala Vanoti Mota dzePOLAD Kutenda Vatsigiri vaVaMnangagwa Vasina Zvido zveRuzhinji
text: Mutevedzeri wasachigaro webato reMDC Alliance VaJob Sikhala vanoti motokari dzakapihwa vatungamiri vemapato madiki anopikisa vari mugungano rePolitical Actors Dialogue kana kuti POLAD kutenda vavanoti vari kushandiswa nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa kudzorera hutongi hwejekerere kumashure. Asi mutauriri werimwe bato riri mugungano iri reNational Constitutional Assembly VaMaddock Chivasa vanoti hapana chakaipa kuti nhengo dzePOLAD dzipihwe dzimotokari dzekushandisa mukuunza kubatana munyika. Nyaya yekuti hurumende yakatengera vatungamiri vemapato anopikisa ari mugungano rePOLAD zvikakarara zvemotokari dzemhando yeIsuzu D-Max izvo zvipatara zvakawanda zvisina mishonga, madhorobha akawanda asina maamburenzi yakonzerawo mutauro munyika. MuHarare semuenzaniso munonzi amburenzi nhanhatu pachidiwa makumi matatu nembiri uye vanhu vanoda kusvika zvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana vachinzi vakatarisana nenzara inotyisa. Vari muPOLAD vanoti gungano iri rinobatsira asi vamwe vanopikisa vachiti riri kungopfukutawo mari yenyika uye harina meno. Bato guru rinopikisa reMDC Alliance harisi mumubatanidzwa uyu kunyangwe vamwe vakuru mubato reMDC-T rinotungamirirwa naVaDouglas Mwonzora vari kuti vanenge vave mugungano iri mavhiki anotevera. No media source currently available

headline: Muzvare Masarira Vanomiswa Zvakare muDare reDzimhosva
text: Murwi wekodzero dzevanhu Linda Masarira, uyo akasungwa mwedzi wapera nenyaya mbiri dzaari kupomerwa, amiswa pamberi pedare redzimhosva reMbare Magistrate Court achitongwa nenyaya yaari kupomerwa yekukanganisa mapurisa kuita basa ravo. Asi zvinonzi nyaya iyi yanendeswa mberi kumusi wa 17 mwedzi uno mushure mekunge vachichisi vakumbira kudare kuti vanoda nguva yekuti vapedze kuongorora nyaya iyi. Gweta riri kumirira Muzvare Masarira nevamwe vapfumbamwe vavari kutongwa navo, VaObey Shava vanoti vapikisa danho revachuchisi iri vachiti rinoratidza kuti havana kurongeka sezvo nyaya yaMuzvare Masarira nevamwe vavo yave nenguva ichinzwikwa mudare. VaShava vanoti vakumbira dare kuti kana hurumende isina kugadzirira zvakare pachadzoka nyaya iyi mudare, dare rinofanirwa kurasa nyaya yevasungwa ava. Vasungwa gumi ava vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuvhiringidza mapurisa kuita basa ravo apo vaiedza kusunga Doctor Patson Dzamara nevamwe vavo muAfrica Unity Square mavairatidzira. Asi vamwe vaMuzvare Masarira vakakwanisa kunge vachipiwa mukana wekubvisa mari dzechibatiso, ivo vakanyimwa mukana uyu vachinzi vane samanisi rekukundikana kumira mudare pane imwe nyaya yavanonzi vakapara kwaMutare. Muzvare Masarira vari kutarisirwa zvakare kudzoka kudare rimwechetero nemusi weChina vachitongwazve mune imwe nyaya yavari kupomerwa yekuita mhirizhonga pakuratidzira kwakaitika mumusha weMufakose nemusi wa 6 Chikunguru gore rino. No media source currently available

headline: VaMugabe Votanga Kutsvaga Rutsigiro Asi Vamwe Vachitya Kudzoka kweMhirizhonga
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, nemusi weChishanu vari kutarisirwa kuparura hurongwa hwekutsvaga rutsigiro musarudzo dzegore rinouya vachikurudzira vechidiki kuti vaende kunonyoresa kuvhota. Musangano wekutanga pamisangano gumi ichaitwa naVaMugabe mumatunhu ose uri kutanga kuRudhaka Stadium, Marondera. Rwendo rwaVaMugabe urwu rwuri kuuyawo mushure mekunge mutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa reMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vatendererawo mumatunhu ose enyika vachiita misangano nevatsigiri vavo. Vamwe vari kuitawo misangano yakadai ndiAmai Joice Mujuru webato reNational People’s Party. Asi kutanga kwekutsvaga rutsigiro uku kunonzi nesangano rinoita zveongororo reAfrobarometer kuri kukonzera kuti vanhu vakawanda munyika vabatwe nekutya kukuru nenyaya yemhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika. Afrobarometer inotiwo huwandu hwevanhu vari kuti havachina chivimbo nesarudzo hurikuramba huchikwira. Nhengo yeMDC-T vachimirira Mkoba mudare reparamende, VaAmos Chibaya, vanoti ichokwadi kuti Zanu-PF iri kukonzera mhirizhonga nekuti haina chekuitira vanhu. Asi sachigaro weZanu-PF Youth League kuManicaland, VaMubuso Chinguno, vanoti muromo hauzarirwe nerwizi uye vanopikisa vanoreva nhema kuti bato ravo rinokurudzira mhirizhonga. No media source currently available

headline: Pivac ave panyanga
text: ndiye akasarudzwa kuti azotsive Warren Gatland semurairidzi weWales gore rinotevera pachapera mutambo weWorld Cup.   Pivac ange achiita basa rimwe chete kuScarlets kubva mugore ra2014 izvo zvakamuona achiitungamirira kuhwina mukombe weGuinness PRO12 zvikabatsira chikwata chake kupinda musemi-fainari yeChampions Cup mumwaka mumwe chete uyu.   Shasha iyi – iyo yaimbove mupurisa kunyika yake yeNew Zealand – akakunda vamwe vanoti Dave Rennie naScott Robinson kupinda pachigaro ichi icho chichazosiiwa naGatland gore rinotevera pachapera mutambo weWorld 2019 Japan. Pivac acharamba achitungamirira maScarlets kusvika kupera kwemwaka we2018-19   Achazove pasi peWRU muna Chikunguru 2019, Gatland apedza kutungamira Wales kuWorld Cup. — SportMails rugby

headline: Hurumende Yomisa Basa Vamwe Vechidiki
text: Hurumende nemusi weChishanu yakatanga kumisa basa vamwe vechidiki vange vachishanda mumawadhi ekumamisha kana kuti maYouth Officers nechinangwa chekuda kuyedza kuderedza mari iri kushandiswa kubhadhara vashandi vehurumende. Nyaya yekumisa vechidiki ava basa yakataurwa negurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthulu Ncube, gore rapera vachiti mari zhinji yehurumende inosvika zvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe kubva muzana iri kushandiswa kubhadhara vashandi vehurumende. Asi pakamboyedza vaive gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, kumbomisa vechidiki ava basa vaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, nemamwe makurukota avo vakatsika madziro. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti vechidiki ava vanoshandiswa nebato riri kutonga kutyora kodzero dzevanopikisa. Asi vechidiki ava vanoti vanoita basa rakakosha kukurudzira vechidiki kuzviitira mabasa emaoko. Zvinonzi pawadhi yoga yoga pange paine vechidiki ava vatanhatu asi parizvino pave kusiiwa mumwe chete. Mumashoko aro kuvatori venhau, Bazi rePublic Service Commission rati ramisa vechidiki zviuru zvitatu nemazana matatu nemakumi matanhatu nevashanu. Mumwe wevechidiki ava, VaTakawira Maluku vekuGuruve, vati havasi kufara nekumiswa basa kwevamwe vechidiki. No media source currently available

headline: Mhuri Dziri Kurima kuSikato kuMasvingo Dzoramba Kubviswa neHurumende Munzvimbo Iyi
text: Mhuri dziri munzvimbo yeSikato pedyo neMasvingo eGreat Zimbabwe, dzapihwa mazuva manomwe ekuti dzibve mupurazi madziri kugara, iro raiva remurungu radzakatora munguva yehondo yeminda. Hurumende inoti vanhu ava vakatora minda iyi zvisiri pamutemo. Sadunhu wenzvimbo yeSikato kuMasvingo, VaTitison Haruzivishe pamwe nasabhuku Henry Makusha, vasungwa mushure mekuramba kusaina magwaro abva kuhurumende ekuti vaudze vanhu vavo kuti vabude muminda iyi. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo dzinoti mapurisa akanganisa zvikuru kusunga vanhu ava. Mumwe mugari, VaRemison Dengu, vanoti kunyange hazvo vasunga vakuru vavo, ivo vacharamba vakashinga vari pamisha yavo. Mutauriri wemapurisa mudunhu reMasvingo, Inspector Charity Mazula, vati havasi kuziva nezvekusungwa kwaVaHaruzivishe naVaMakusha, vachiti vanga vasiri muhofisi. Nzvimbo yeSikato ine mabhuku manomwe anoti, Muza, Chikutuva, Manunure, Makasva, Banga, Sithole nerekwa Marukutira. Mhuri dziri mubhuku manomwe aya dzikabatanidzwa, dzinoita vanhu vanosvika zviuru zvishanu. Mugari wemubhuku rekwaChikutuva, VaEdmore Matarirano, vanyunyuta zvikuru nekudzingwa kwavari kuitwa munzvimbo yavo nehurumende yebato ravo ravati vakatsigira kuti ridzoke panyanga musarudzo dzegore rapera. Hurumende kubudikidza negurukota rebazi rezveminda nezvekurima, VaPerence Shiri, vakati vachabvisa vanhu vakazvigarisa voga nekuti vakatyora chikamu chemutemo we Gazetted Land Act. Mutsamba dzapuwa vagari ava dzakabva kubazi iri, hurumende inoti vagari ava vakazvigarisa zvisiri pamutemo uye vakasvika musi wa 15 Ndira vasati vabva, vachasungwa vvachiendeswa kumatare edzimhosva. Mumwe mugari, Amai Kundai Haruziveshe, vanoti ivo hurumende iri kuvadzinga munzvimbo yemadziteteguru avo. Vamwe vataura neStudio7 vanoti vave nemakore gumi nemasere vachigara munzvimbo iyi uye vakavaka misha yavo yakakura vachishandisa mari dzakawanda nekudaro havangasiyi kana kuputsa misha iyi sezvo hurumende isina kuvaudza kuti ichavaripa here kana kuvapa imwe nzvimbo yekugara. Amai Virginia Machida, avo vanoti vakabva kwaChivi muna 2000, vanoti vave nemusha nezvipfuwo zvakawanda zvisingadi kutamiswa-tamiswa Mumwe mugari, VaTawanda Munhundiripo, vati hurumende iri kutyora bumbiro remitemo kana ichivadzinga isina kuvapa imwe nzvimbo yekunovaka misha yavo, pamwe nekuvabhadhara kuvabvisa pavanogara. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu muMasvingo, VaOmen Mafa, vati hurumende yaita zvisiri pamutemo nekuti bumbiro remitemo yenyika hariibvumidzi kudzinga vanhu vasina kupihwa mvumo nedare repamusoro redzimhosva, uye haina kutevedzera gwara remutemo zvakakwana. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuna VaShiri divi ravo panyaya iyi. Asi vagari ava vanoti havasi kuzotevedzera zviri mutsamba dzavapihwa, uye vakatogadzirira kusungwa. Pari zvino vagari ava vari kutsvaga magweta angavabatsire panyaya yavo. Vagari ava vakatora purazi rainzi Mzero, iro raiva raVaNorman Richards mugore ra 2000. No media source currently available

headline: Zim yotamba nePakistan
text: Chikwata chenyika checricket chemaChevrons chakatanga gadziriro dzekusangana nePakistan izvo zvichaona zvikwata zviviri izvi zvichitamba mitambo miviri yeTest match series nemitatu yeTwenty20 International Series (T20I).   Mukushi wemashoko kuZimbabwe Cricket (ZC) — Darlington Majonga — anoti maChevrons achatamba nePakistan musi wa17 Kubvumbi na21 Kubvumbi mutambo weT20I.   Zvikwata izvi zvichazotatsurana zvekare musi wa23 na25 Kubvumbi.   Kana mitambo yeT20I yapera, zvikwata zviviri izvi zvichabandana mumitambo yetest match series apo mutambo wekutanga uriko musi wa29 Kubvumbi uchizopera musi wa3 Chivabvu kozoti wechipiri uchatanga musi wa7 Chivabvu uchipera musi wa11 Chivabvu.   “Pakistan iri kutarisirwa munyika musi wa17 Kubvumbi apo ichauya kuzosangana neZimbabwe mumitambo miviri yetest match nemitatu yeTwenty20 International games,” anodaro Majonga. Mitambo yezvikwata zviviri izvi yose ichatambirwa paHarare Sports Club munhandare isina vatsigiri senzira yekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Majonga anoti mitemo yemunyika muno neWorld Health Organization (WHO) yekudzivirira Covid-19 ichitevedzwa pamitambo iyi.   “Mitambo iyi ichitambirwa pasi pechirongwa chebio-secure bubble zvinoreva kuti vatambi, varairidzi nevose vari kuona nezvemitambo iyi vachagara kure neveruzhinji uye hapana vatsigiri vachatenderwa kusvika pedyo navo.   “Apo mitambo inenge ichitambwa, vatambi vose vachange vachivhenekwa kuti havana here kubatira denda reCovid-19, koti mazuva ose nhandare dzichafafaidzwa kuitira kuuraya hutachiona,” anodaro Majonga.   Mutambo wemaChevrons nePakistan uyu unotevera mumwe wechikwata chenyika ichi neAfghanistan uyo wakatambirwa kuUnited Arab Emirates nguva yadarika.

headline: Vasope neVamwe Vasingaone Zvakanaka Vobatsirwa neMagirazi Pachena
text: Mukuru weAlbino Trust of Zimbabwe, VaBrian Nyoni, vanoti vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana matatu, 300 000, vachawana rubatsiro rwekupiwa magirazi okuverengesa pachena pachirongwa cheSight To the World. Sangano iri riri kushanda nebazi rezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare. VaNyoni vanoti chirongwa ichi chichabatsira vanhu vanemazera ari pakati pemakore makumi mana nemashanu, 45, nemakumi matanhatu nemashanu, 65. Vaendera mberi vachiti chirongwa ichi chichaendawo kumatunhu mashanu enyika kwemakore mashanu anotevera. VaNyoni vatiwo chirongwa ichi hachisi kunangana nevanhu vanorarama nehusope chete. Vaendera mberi vachiti zvakakosha kuti munhu wese apinde muchirongwa ichi pasina rusarura izvo zvinozoita kuti vanhu vaone kukosha kwemasangano anomirira vanorarama nehusope uye nekunzwisisawo matambudziko avanosangana nawo. Imwe nyanzvi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano isina kudomwa nezita yaudza Studio 7 kuti kune zvakawanda zvinokonzera kuti vanhu varware maziso uye vaendera mberi vachiti vanosanganawo nevana vari pasi pemakore gumi nemashanu, 15, vanenge vavhiringidzwa maziso nenzira dzakasiyana siyana. Vati rimwe donzvo rechirongwa ichi nderekudzikisa huhwandu hwevanhu vanoita tsaona pamigwagwa nenyaya yekusaona zvakanaka. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Chiripanyanga vatsanangura zvimwe zvezvirwere zvinokonzera kupofomara kwemaziso. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti kune vanhu vakawandisa vanoda magirazi okuonesa zvekuti vari kukurudzira varapwi kuti vaende kumakiriniki anosanganisira Sekuru Kaguvi iri paParirenyatwa Hospital, Norton Eye Hospital, Sakubva Clinic kwaMutare ne Richard Morris Hospital kuBulawayo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano hwemaziso ine mukurumbira pasi rose Dr Solomon Guramatunhu vanoti zvinorwadza kuona varwere vachishaya rubatsiro munyika, asi dzimwe nyika dzichisimbaradza zvipatara zvehurumende kuitira kuti veruzhinji vakwanise kubatsirwa.

headline: Vagari vekwaChiyadzwa Vakanetsana neVakuru veKambani yeMangoda yeAnjin Vopihwa Mukana weKubvisa Mari yeChibatiso
text: Mutongi wedare ramejasitiriti maMutare VaLangton Mukwengi neChina vakabhadharisa mari yechibatiso inosvika madhora zviuru zvitatu zveRTGS kuvasungwa makumi maviri nevasere avo vakasungwa nemusi weChipiri apo vairatidzira pakambani yemangoda yeAnjin vachinyunyuta nekusabata vagari ava zvakanaka, uye kukanganisirwa nharaunda yavo nemabasa ekucherwa kwemangoda kuri kuitwa nekambani iyi. VaMukwengi vakaudza vasungwa ava kuti vasakanganisa mabasa ari kuitwa pakambani yeAnji vachiti vasasvika chinhambwe chemamita zana pedyo nayo. Vati vasungwa vagare padzimba dzavo dziri mumagwaro edare uye vasavhiringidza vafakazi panyaya iyi. Vasungwa ava vanzi vadzoke zvakare kudare nemusi wa22 Mbudzi gore rino apo mhosva yavari kupomerwa ichatanga kutongwa. Rimwe remagweta riri kumiririra vasungwa ava VaCosmas Chibaya vaudza Studio 7 vanofara nezvabuda mudare. Izvi zvatsigirwa nerimwe remagweta evasungwa ava VaRichard Ncube vanoshanda nesangano reZimbabwe Environmental Law Association. Vachuchusi venyaya iyi vanoti vasungwa makumi maviri nevasere ava vachitungamirirwa naSabhuku Robert Chiadzwa avo vanemakore makumi mapfumbamwe ekuberekwa vakaputsa hari dzedoro range rabikwa pakugadzirira mhemberero dzekuvhurwa patsva kwekambani yemangoda yeAnjin nemusi wa28 Gumiguru. Vasungwa ava vanonzi zvakare vakaparadza matende epagungano iri vachinyunyuta nekusabatwa zvakanaka kwevashandi vepakambani iyi nevaridzi vayo vekuChina. Vagari ava vanotiwo vanoda kuti vave chikamu chinosvika gumi kubva muzana chevashandi vepaAnjin sezvo kambani iyi iri kuchera munharaunda mavo. Vakuru vekambani yeAnjin vanonzi havana havo kumhan’ara chiitiko ichi kumapurisa vachida kugadzirisana pachavo nevagari, vakavimbisa kudzoka nemusi wa2 Mbudzi kuita musangano vose nechinangwa chekunzwisisana. Mushure mekutadza kuuya kwevakuru veAnjin ava kumusangano uyu sezvange zvarongwa vagari vanosvika mazana mana vakaungana pamba paVaNewman Chiadzwa vatsamwa vakaronga kuratidzira pamuzinda weAnjin vachitungamirirwa naVaNewman Chiadzwa, Sabhuku Robert Chiadzwa uye nava Shadreck Chipise. Vairatidzira ava vainge vaine zvinyorwa zvakanzi, Anjin wauraya zvipfuyo zvedu, wauraya mafuro, madhamu, nzizi neminda yedu yekurima nezvimwewo. Kuratidzira uku kunonzi kwakazoita mhirizhonga pakarohwa vawe vashandi nevaridzi vekambani iyi. Tichiri panyaya dzange dziri kumatare maMutare, mutevedzeri wemunyori anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa mubato reMDC Alliance kuManicaland VaItai Masaka neChitatu vakabvisiswa mari yechibatiso inoita madhora zviuru gumi pamhosva yavari kupomerwa yekurova mutsigiri weZanu PF mumusha weChikanga, VaMalcom Masarira vanova sachigaro wevechidiki mu14th District kwaMutare. VaMasaka avo vange vakamirirwa mudare negweta VaDavid Tandiri vakanzi vadzoke kudare zvakare musi wa19 Mbudzi.

headline: Mapurisa Anorambidza Vanotengesera Mumigwagwa Kufora Vachinyunyuta neKushungurudzwa neMapurisa
text: Mapurisa muHarare nhasi anonzi anyima mvumo yekufora kunhengo dzesangano revanorarama nekutengesera mumigwagwa reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation, VISET, idzo dzanga dzichida kuratidzira kwadzinoti hutsinye hwemapurisa zvichitevera kushaya kwemumwe wavo ari muhusungwa. VaTafadzwa Hilton Tamangani vakashaya vari muhusungwa kuHarare Remand Prison mushure mekusungwa pamwechete nevamwe gumi vanotengesera mumigwagwa vachipomerwa mhosva yekurova mupurisa. Mukuru wesangano reVISET, VaSamuel Wadzayi, vanoti vakanga vakanyorera mapurisa neMuvhuro svondo rapera vachiazivisa nezvehurongwa hwavo hwekuda kuratidzira uhwu. Asi vanoti vazoshamisika vachiwana mhinduro inovaudza kuti tsamba yavo yakanga isiri kuwirirana nezvinodiwa nechikamu 25 chemutemo wePublic Order and Security Act (POSA) (Chapter 11:17), nekudaro vakanga vasingafanirwe kuenderera mberi nekuratidzira uku. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata Mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi. Asi vaWadzayi vanoti vari kupikisa danho remapurisa iri kuburikidza nekumhanyira kudare repamusoro reHigh Court. No media source currently available

headline: Nhabvu yevechidiki yakanganisika‘ . . . tanzwa nekumirira’
text: AIMBOVE mutambi weMotor Action, Lengthens neShooting Stars, Godfrey Moyo, anoti kusimukira kwenhabvu yevechidiki kuri munjodzi huru zvichitevera kumiswa kwakamboitwa mitambo yose nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Moyo vazhinji vanomuziva achitambira maYoung Warriors Under-20 ne23.   Kubva zvaasendeka shangu dzake, Moyo ave kurairidza chikwata chePrime Academy chiri kuRuwa achibika vatambi vemangwana.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Moyo anoti kubvira pakamiswa mitambo mizhinji senzira yekuti vanhu vasaungane nedonzvo rekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19 vechidiki vari kurasikirwa zvikuru munyaya dzekusimudzirwa mumutambo wenhabvu.   “Ini ndinotyira zvikuru vechidiki vedu nekuti vakasiiwa vari vega vamwe vanofuririka vakapedzisira vave kutora zvinodhaka muviri zvopedzisira zvavakanganisa remangwana ravo.   “Nhabvu yevechidiki yakakosha nekuti ndivo vatambi vemangwana saka vanofanirwa kukosheswa vogara vachibikwa. Asi manje nekuda kwelockdown hatizive kuti vamwe varipi uye vari kuitei, totovatyira nekuti sevana vakasaongororwa remangwana ravo rinoenda mudondo.   “Ndipo paye mutambi anenge achirakidza kuti tarenda riripo uye remangwana rake rakajeka mozongonzwa kuti nhabvu haachatambe, azvisiya zvose afuririka. Isu patinosangana navo tinovadzidzisa nhabvu uye zvehupenyu asi tikaita nguva tisinawo ndipo vanopedzisira vafuririka,” anodaro Moyo.   Sangano rinotungamira nhabvu reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) nguva yadarika rakazivisa kuti rinoda  kutangisa zvirongwa zvekusimudzira vechidiki mumutambo wenhabvu (junior league) kumapurovhinzi akasiyana enyika asi zvose zvakazoenda mudondo nekuuya kweCovid-19.   Panguva yaakatamba nhabvu, Moyo akakwanisa kuhwina mikombe inosanganisira Banc ABC neLengthens uye neMotor Action izvo zvakazomuona achitamba mumitambo yeConfederations Cup pamwe chete neChampions League neLengthens neMotor Action zvakare.

headline: EU Yobatsiea Vechidiki neMamiriyoni Mashanu eMadhora
text: Sangano reEuropean Union neChishanu razivisa kuti richashandisa mari inodarika mamiriyoni mashanu emadhora mumabasa ekusimudzira vechidiki pamwe nekuvapa mukana wekupinda muzvirongwa zvebudiriro munyika. Mugwaro raburitswa nemuzinda wesangano iri muHarare neChishanu, European Union yati mari iyi ichapihwa kumasangano anoshanda akazvimirira, makanzuru pamwe nemakambani akazvimirira kuti ashande nevechidiki kuvapa mukana wekuti vaite mabasa ebudiriro kuti vazvisimudzire mukurarama kwavo. EU inoti panofanira kuve nemikana yakaenzana uye vechidiki vanofanira kupihwa mukana wekushandisa zviwanikwa, kuwaniswa mabasa nemikana yekutangawo mabhizimisi avo. Mukuru weChitungwiza Residents Trust, VaMarvelous Khumalo, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvinofadza kuti apo zvinhu zviri kuramba zvichioma munyika, pane dzimwe nyika dziri kurangarira vechidiki munyika. Mukuru wesanganio reYouth Forum, VaWellington Zindove, vanoti zvinotendwa kuti sangano reEU rinoramba richibatsira vechidiki munyika umo mune kutambura kukuru. Mukuru wesangano rePlatform for Youth Development, VaClaris Madhuku, vanoti rubatsiro rweEU rwakanaka chose sezvo rune chinangwa chekubatsira vechidiki avo vakasarira zvikuru muzvirongwa zvebudiriro. Sangano reEU rinoti donzvo guru raro kubatsira kupedza hurombo muZimbabwe uye kuti vanhu vagare zvakanaka, pasina mhirizhonga kana hudzvanyiriri. Kunze kwerubatsiro kune vechidiki, EU inotsigirawo Zimbabwe nekutenga chikafu, mabasa ekuwanisa vanhu mvura yakachena nezvimwe zvakawanda. No media source currently available

headline: ZVIBHAKERA ZVANDIRERA: MONALISA
text: SHASHA yetsiva yechidzimai, Monalisa “Queen of the Jungle” Sibanda, anoti hakuna chisingapere, naizvozvo vanhu ngavasanyanye kutya sezvo chirwere cheCovid-19 chichapera neimwe nguva.   Sibanda anotiwo mutambo wetsiva wakanaka uye kana ari iye, zvinhu zvabhadhara nekuti ari kurarama kubva mukukanda zvimbokoma zvematsenganzungu.   Vanhu vari mune zvemitambo vakawanda vakakanganiswa nedenda reCovid-19 sezvo mitambo mizhinji yakambomiswa nekuda kwechirwere ichi pasi rose izvo zvakonzera matambudziko makuru uye kushushikana kune vari mune zvemitambo.   Asi muhurukuro naQueen of the Jungle, anoti zvinhu zvose zvinoitika pasi pano zvine chirevo uye Mwari vachagadzirisa zvose zvigonaka.   “Zvinhu zvose zvinoitika pasi pano zvine chirevo, hazvingoitike. Matambudziko aya achapera uye Mwari vachatitungamirira kusvika zvanaka.   “Zvinonzi chisingapere chinoshura, saka iyo coronavirus (Covid-19) yatishungurudza iyi ichasvikawo pakupera,” anodaro.   Sibanda anozivikanwa ari iye mumwe wemadzimai kubva muZimbabwe vakaita mukurumbira achitamba tsiva izvo zvakamuona achitamba mitambo 25 muboka reamatuer akaihwina yose. Akazokwirira ndokutanga kukwikwidza muboka reprofessional achirwa muJunior weight akatamba mitambo 17 umo akahwina misere uye nemabhande anosanganisira reWorld International Boxing Association (WIBA), World Intercontinental Champion iro akahwina gore radarika kuNairobi, Kenya.   Shasha iyi haina kuenda kure nechikoro asi inoti ine mufaro mukuru muupenyu hwayo nekuti mutambo wetsiva wakaichengeta zvikuru uye nanhasi uchiri kungoira- ramisa.   “Tsiva ndiwo upenyu hwangu, kubva kare uye kusvika nanhasi mutambo uyu wandichengeta zvikuru. Ndinongotenda Mwari vakandipa chipo ichi nekuti handitombokwanise kuverenga ndikazvipedza zvose zvandakawana kuburikidza netsiva,” anodaro Sibanda.   Queen of the Jungle akakomborerwa nevanakomana vatatu uye vose vari kutevera mumatsimba ake ekutamba tsiva uye mukuru wacho ane makore 16 ekuberekwa ave kutokwikwidza muboka reamatuer.

headline: MDC T Inoti Hurongwa Hwayo hweKuratidzira kwaMutare Hwoitwa neMusi weChina, 23 Chikumi
text: Bato reMDC T rinoti hurongwa hwaro hwekuti nhengo dzaro dzifore dzichiratidzira muguta reMutare mudunhu reManicaland, hwave kuzoitwa nemusi weChina svondo rino, kwete neMugovera sezvakanga zvamboziviswa. Mutauriri weMDC T, VaObert Gutu vanoti izvi zvaitwa nekuda kwemhinduro yavawana kubva kumapurisa, ayo vanoti avazivisa kuti zuva reMugovera rakanga rakumbirwa kare nebato reZanu PF kuti riite hurongwa hwaro. “Mapurisa akazivisa hutungamiri hwebato redi hwedunhu reManicaland svondo rapera kuti Saturday 25 haichaita nekuti Zanu PF yakanga yavazivisa kare nemusi wa 8 June kuti ine hurongwa hwayo, ndofunga hwekupa vechidiki ma stand here,” vaGutu vanodaro. VaGutu vanoti sebato rinoziva maitiro emapurisa pamwe nebato reZanu PF, harioni paine dambudziko pakushandurwa kwemazuva uku, sezvo richigara rakagadzirira. Bato reMDC- T rinoti riri kuratidzira kusafara nemamiriro ezvehupfumi, zvichionekwa nekuvharwa kwemakambani akawanda zvichisiya vanhu vakawanda vasina mabasa. Bato iri rinoti nyaya yehuwori hwebato riri kutonga reZanu-PF ndiyo yakonzerawo kuti zvinhu zviomere vakawanda munyika. MDC inoti vanhu vekuManicaland vanofanira kuratidzirawo nenyaya yekutsakatika kwemari yemangoda akacherwa mudunhu ravo. Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe ndivo vakataura vega kuti mari yakabva kumangoda inosvika mabhiriyoni gumi nemashanu yainge yatsakatika. No media source currently available

headline: Komisheni Inoona zveKodzero Yoshushikana neKushomeka kweVanhu Vaongororwa Chirwere cheCOVID-19 Kusvika Nhasi
text: Komisheni inoona nezvekodzero dzevanhu yeZimbabwe Human Rights Commission, inoti iri kushushikana nehuwandu hwevanhu vaongororwa kana vaine chirwere che COVID-19 munyika kusvika pari zvino. Komisheni iyi inoti vanhu zana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevana vanozi vainge vaongororwa kusvika musi wa30 Kurume, vaive vashoma zvikuru pachitariswa zviuru zvevanhu zvakapinda munyika kubva pakatanga chirwere ichi kuChina gore rapera. Mugwaro rayakaburitsa neChitatu, Zimbabwe Human Rights Commission inotiwo iri kukurudzira hurumende kuti ipe dzidziso pamusoro peCoronavirus mundimi dzakasiyanasiyana, kusanganisirawo mutauro wemaoko kana kuti Sign Language, senzira yekuti veruzhinji vabatsirikane. Komisheni iyi inotiwo hurumende iri kunonoka kuita kuti kuongororwa kwevanhu kuti vane hutachiwana here kana kuti kwete kuitwe mumatunhu ose emunyika, kwete kuti kungoitwa muHarare chete. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi sezvo gurukota rebazi rinoona nezvekomisheni iyi, reMitemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, vanga vasiri kubatika panharembozha yavo. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu, uye vaive mukuru weZimRights, VaOkay Machisa, vanoti vanobvumirana nemaonero eZimbabwe Human Rights Commission ekuti vanhu vaongororwa vashoma kwazvo pachitariswa huwandu hwevanhu vanopinda munyika nepamiganho yenyika yose, kusanganisirawo nhandare dzendege. Panyaya yekuti shambadzo iitwe nemitauro yose inocherechedzwa munyika, VaMachisa vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kutevera zviri mubumbiro renyika panyaya yemitauro, yoshambadza mashoko kuvanhu vose. Vanotiwo nyaya yekuti matunhu ose akwanise kuongorora vanhu kana vaine hutachiwana hweCoronavirus, vanoti zvakakosha chose kuti matunhu ose awaniswe mukana wekuita ongororo idzi. Pari zvino chipatara cheSally Mugabe Hospital muHarare ndicho chete chiri kuita ongororo dzechirwere cheCOVID-19 munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Huwandu hweVanhu Vabatwa neCOVID-19 Munyika Hwave Makumi Matatu neVasere
text: Bazi rezvehutano nekuchengetwa kwakanaka kwevana rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 hwakwira kusvika pamakumi matatu nevasere zvichitevera kuwanikwa kwakaitwa munhu mumwe chete aine chirwere ichi muHarare nemusi weChina. Bazi iri razivisawo kuti vafa nechirwere ichi vachiri vana munyika yose, uye vapona kubva kuchirwere ichi vari gumi nevatatu. Izvi zvinobuda panguva iyo mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vari kutarisirwa kuzivisa nezvekuti vari kuwedzera mazuva here kana kubvisa mutemo unorambidza kufambafamba kwevanhu, kana kuti lockdown, uyo vakaderedza kuenda pachinhanho chepiri, kana kuti Level 2 masvondo maviri adarika. Mutemo uyu uri kutarisirwa kupera nemusi weSvondo. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica inoti vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi pasi rose vadarika mamiriyoni mana nemazana mana ezviuru (4.4 million) uye vafa nechirwere ichi vasvika pazviuru mazana matatu nezvitatu nemazana matatu nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe (303 389). Gweta uye vari chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri ku Britain, Doctor Simba Mavaza, vanoti kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nemunhu mumwe chete kunoratidza kuti chirwere ichi hachisati chadzika midzi munyika. Dctor Mavaza vanoti izvi zvinogona kunge zviri kukonzerwa nenyaya yekuti vanhu vari kutevedzera kurudziro yekuti vazvichengetedze, kana matanho ari kutorwa nehurumende ekuchengetedza kwavo voga vose vanenge vaponda munyika vachibva kunze. Panyaya yekuti mutungamiri wenyika owedzera here kana kubvisa mazuva ekusafambafamba kwevanhu, Doctor Mavaza vanoti vanofunga kuti VaMnangagwa vachavhura makambani ose uye kubvumidza vanhu kufambafamba sezvo pakatoiswa kare matanho anofanirwa kuteverwa nevemakambani mukuona kuti vashandi vavo vakadzivirirwa kubva kuchirwere ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Nyika Yoita Sarudzo dzemaBy-Election Dziri Kunzi neVanopikisa Kutungana KweMbudzi
text: Sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commission amai Rita Makarau vanoti sangano ravo ragadzirira kuita sarudzo dzemaby-elections dziri kuitwa kuMbire, Epworth neMarondera Central. Izvi zvinotevera kudzingwa mubato reZanu-PF kwaVaDavid Butau uye VaRay Kaukonde kuMarondera Central. Vaviri ava vaipomerwa mhosva yekutsigira vaimbova mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika amai Joyce Mujuru vakadzingwawo mubato. KuEpworth kuri kuitwa sarudzo mushure mekushaya kwaVaAmos Midzi veZanu-PF. Vanhu varikukurudzirwa nezec kuti vauye nemapepa chaiwo ekuvhota kwete madrivers license. Amai Rita Makarau sachigaro weZEC vanoti vavhoti vanofanira kuuya nezvitupa zvinoonekwa kwete madrivers license. No media source currently available  Tichiri panyaya iyi mutauriri wesangano rinoongorora sarudzo rakazvimirira reZimbabwe Election Support Network Amai Ellen Dingane vanoti zvinhu zvirikufamba zvakanaka parezvino. No media source currently available Mapato achakwikwidza kuEpworth anosanganisira Zanu-PF, Transform Zimbabwe neZAPU. KuMarondera kuchakwikwidza Zanu-PF, Transform Zimbabwe, Freedom Front ne National Constitutional Assembly uye kuMbire kuchakwikwidza Zanu-PF, Transform Zimbabwe neNCA. Asi mapatao akaita seMDC ne People’s Democratic Party ari kuramwa kupinda musarudzo idzi achiti mitemo yesarudzo iripo yakarerekera kubatsira bato riri kutonga reZanu-PF kuti rikunde. Asi bato reZanu-PF rinoti zviri kutaurwa izvi ndezvemugotsi matsuro. Bato iri rinoti veMDC vanotya kukundwa musarudzo.

headline: Zimbabwe Inobatana neDzimwe Nyika Kucherechedza Zuva reWorld Cancer Day
text: Zimbabwe inoti sedzimwe nyika pasi rese dambudziko rechirwere chegomarara riri kuramba richikura huye zvakakosha kutsvaka nzira dzekuti vese vanobatwa nechirwere ichi vakwanise kurapiwa. Vachitaura pamhemberero dzekucherechedza zuva rechirwere chegomarara pasi rose reWorld Cancer Day muHarare nhasi, vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiriri wenyika vari zvakare gurukota rezvehutano, VaConstantino Chiwenga vati chirwere chegomarara idambudziko munyika huye hurumende iri kutsvaka nzira dzekubatsira vese vanobatwa nedenda iri. VaChiwenga vati mugore ra2018 chete vanhu zviuru zvinomwe nemazana mashanu nemakumi matanhatu nevana vakabatwa nechirwere chegomarara munyika. Vatiwo kurwisa chirwere ichi zvakakosha kuti vanhu vavhenekwe vachiti vanhu vazhinji munyika vari kubatwa chirwere ichi chatodzika midzi. VaChiwenga vati mugore ra2017 vanhu vana muvanhu gumi vaibatwa nechirwere ichi vairasikirwa nehupenyu. Vatiwo munyika dzisina kubudirira seZimbabwe vana vasere muvana gumi vanobatwa nechirwere chegomarara vanoshaya asi kunyika dzakabudirira vaviri muvana gumi ndivo vanofa nechirwere ichi. Vatiwo sezvo mishonga yekurapa chirwere ichi ichidhura huye nzvimbo dzekurapira chirwere ichi dzirishoma huye dziri mumaguta chete, hurumende yakazvipira kuwanisa mishonga yegomarara pachena. Vati izvi ndozvakaita kuti mubhajeti yegore rino kuiswe homwe padivi yekubatsiridza mukurwisa chirwere chegomarara sezvinongoitwawo mukurwisa chirwere cheHIV/Aids. VaChiwenga vatiwo hurumende ichange ichiitisa zvidzidzo zvemachiremba egomarara pamwe nevakoti kuitira kuti vakwanise kubatsira veruzhinji, kuramboenderera mberi nekubaya nhomba yeHuman Papilloma Virus (HPV) kuvanasikana vari pakati pemakore gumi negumi nemana senzira yekudzivirira gomarara remuromo wechibereko. Vatiwo kuvhenekwa kwechirwere chegomarara kucharamba kuchiitwa uye kuwaniswa kwemishonga nezvekurapisa gomarara kucharamba kuchisimbaradzwa. Vachipawo humbowo hwavo mushure mekurwara negomarara rechibereko pamhemberero dzanhasi, Amai Busisiwe Moyo vati kurapwa gomarara munyika mutoro. Izvi zvatsigirwaro nemukuru weKidzcan VvaDaniel Mckenzie, avo vati kusaenzana kwemikana pakati pevanowana nevanoshaya kuri kukonzera ndufu dzakawanda kuvana. Vatiwo pane mukana wakakura wekuti vana vanobatwa negomarara varapwe vachipora asi nyaya yehurombo inoita kuti vazhinji vasakwanise kuwana mishonga pamwe nekuongororwa nekurapwa. Mumiriri wesangano reWorld Health Organization muZimbabwe, Dr Alex Gasasira vatsigirawo kuti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vese vakwanise kuwana mukana wekuongororwa, kurapwa pamwe nekuwana mishonga zvisinei nekwavanenge vari munyika. Mutauriri weCancer Association of Zimbabwe, VaLovemore Makurirofa vaudzwo Studio 7 kuti vari kukurudzirawo kuti munhu wese agone kurapwa zvisineyi nekunobva kana mamiriro akaita munhu. Vatiwo zvakakosha kuti mishonga yegomarara ibve kuhurumende vachiti pamusoro pekudzikisa mitengo zvinoitawo kuti iwanike kuzvipatara zvehurumende. Zuva rechirwere chegomarara rinocherechedzwa musi wa4 Kukadzi gore negore. Dingindira regore rino kusvika 2024 riri kukurudzira kuti vanhu vese vakwanise kurapwa kana kuti Closing the Cancer Care Gap. No media source currently available

headline: Dambudziko reMvura Rotyirwa Kuunza Zvirwere zveManyoka muShamva
text: Mukuru wechikoro cheShamva Primary School, VaEdson Chuwe, vanoti vari kukumbira kuboka reZimbabwe National Water Authority, ZINWA, kuti rivhure mvura yarakavhara pachikoro chavo, iyo vanoti yakavharwa nekuda kwechikwereti chemari isina kubhadharwa. Chikoro cheShamva Primary School chinonzi chiri pasi pemugodhi weShamva Gold Mine, uyo uye chikwereti kuZINWA. Chikumbiro chaVaChuwe ichi chinotevera kurwara nemanyoka kwakaita vana vechikoro vatanhatu nemusi weChitatu svondo rino, kunyange hazvo chipatara cheShamva chakati manyoka aya haasi echirwere chekorera kana typhoid. Dambudziko remvura iri rinonzi rakabatawo zvakare musha weveruzhinji weShamva Gold Mine, izvo zvaita kuti vagari vedzimba dzemugodhi uyu vanyore gwaro kudare reparamende vachida kuti ripindire mukuona kuti ZINWA yavhura mvura yakavharwa kubva kutanga kwemwedzi wapera, sezvo iri kodzero yemunhu wese yekuti awane mvura yakachena. Vagari ava vanoti kuvharwa kwemvura kwave kuita kuti vanhu vashandise mvura inobva munzvimbo dzisina hutano, izvo zviri kuwedzera hurwere kwemanyoka. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reZINWA kanawo kubva kumugodhi weShamva Gold Mine. No media source currently available

headline: Madzimai eWomen of Dominion International Osendeka Musangano wePagore Nekuda kweCoronavirus
text: Sangano reWomen of Dominion International rinoti harisi kuita musangano waro wepagore gore rino nekuda kwechirwere che coronavirus. Mutungamiri wesangano iri, Pastor Marvelous Ndhlovu, vanoti madzimai anobva munyika dzakasiyanasiyana anga achitarisirwa kusangana ku Los Angeles mudunhu reCalifornia muna Chikumi asi nekuda kwekurudziro yekuti vanhu vasaungana senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwe coronavirus, vaona zvakakosha ] kuti musangano wavo usaitwa. Pastor Ndhlovu vanoti sezvo mamwe madzimai achibva kunze kweAmerica, miganhu yenyika dzakawanda yakavharwa pari zvino zvekuti kana dai zvinhu zvakazogadzikana panenge pasisina nguva yekuti madzimai aya agadzirire. "Ndinoda kutenda Mwari nekuwana mukana wekutsanangura kuti gore rino takaona zvakakodzera kuti tisaita musangano wedu weWomen of Dominion watanga tichifanirwa kuita muna June, June 25 kusvika 28 tiri kuLos Angeles, California. "Saka takazogara sedare takakanzura musangano iwoyo. Gore rino tanga tichi celebrator nine years dzekunge tiri Women of Dominion, kubva patakatanga tichitanga kusangana gore ra2012." Pastor Ndhlovu vanoti chakanyanyoita kuti vakanzure musangano wegore rino zvikonzero zvakati wandeyi, chekutanga chiri chechirwere che coronavirus. "Patakatarisa nekunyatsoongorora, uyezve nekunyanyonzwisisa nezvatiri kunzwa nema forecast takaona kuti izvo musangano iwoyo uchanetsa kuti ubudirire, uye zvinogona kuti strainer isusu vanotungamirira Women of Dominion nevano attender as well. "Dambudzo rekutanga tichiziva kuti tose coronavirus yaka affecter even kubva vanhu kumabasa. Even kuLos Angeles kwatiri kuenda it's one of the cities iri kunzi ichaita ma cases akawanda, saka kuti June tifokasite kuti zvinhu zvinenge zvave nani panguva iyoyo in that city nemaonero edu uye nekunzwa pamweya, hatina kuona kunge zviri zvinhu zvakanga zvakanakira musangano wedu," vanodaro Pastor Ndhlovu. Women of Dominion International yave nemakore mapfumbamwe yaumbwa uye inobatanidza madzimai anobva kuZimbabwe ari munyika dzakasiyanasiyana mukurarama mushoko raMwari. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inoti Zvikoro Zvichavhurwa Mwedzi Uno, Varairidzi Vachiti Zvikoro Hazvina Gadziriro Yakakwana
text: Hurumende yakazivisa neChipiri kuti zvikoro zvave kuzovhurwa muzvikamu zviviri, chikamu chekutanga musiwa 15 Kurume kuchiti chikamu chepiri chiri musi wa 22 Kurume, unove mwedzi uno. Vachitaura mushure memusangano wedare remakurukota, gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vakati vana vari kuita zvidzidzo zvinonyorwa bvunzo gore rino zveGrade 7, Form 4 neForm 6, ndivo vachatanga kuvhura musi wa 15. Vakatiwo varairidzi vari kudzidzisa zvidzidzo zviri muchikamu chekutanga vanofanirwa kunge vave kumabasa avo musi wa 10 mwedzi uno. Amai Mutsvangwa vakati vamwe vana vese vachange vachizovhura musi wa 22 Kurume, uye varairidzi vavo vanofanirwa kunge vave kumabasa avo musi wa 17. Vakati muzvikoro munenge musina mukana wekuti vana vasiye mikaha pakati pavo, vana vachapana mukana wekudzidza nguva dzakasiyanasiyana. Asi vakafannobata chigaro chemunyori mukuru werimwe sangano revarairidzi, reZimbabwe Teachers Association, ZIMTA, VaGoodwell Taderera, vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kutanga yazadzisa matanho anokurudzirwa neWorld Health Organization pamwe nebazi rezvehutano isati yafunga zvekuvhura zvikoro. VaTaderera vanoti sesangano revashandi vanoti varairidzi vanofanirwawo zvakare kupiwa mihoro inovaita kuti vagare pamabasa, kwete zvekuti mudzidzisi anofunga zvekusiya basa ombonokorokoza. No media source currently available Asi mutauriri webazi redzidzo yepasi, VaTaungana Ndoro vakaudza Studio 7 neMuvhuro kuti bazi ravo rakagadzirira kuvhurwa kwezvikoro, uye svondo rapera vakuru vakuru vebazi ravo kusanganisira negurukota redzidzo yepasi VaCain Mathema vaishanyira zvikoro vachiona kuti zvakagadzirira zvakadii kudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. Vanoti zvikoro zvavakashanyira zvinosanganisira zvehurumende, zvine vana vanodzidza vachigarapo kana kuti boarding, izvo zvakamboita dambudziko reCovid-19 zvakanyanya, pamwewo nezvakazvimirira. VaNdoro vakati bazi ravo rakagudzikana nezvavakaona muzvikoro. No media source currently available

headline: VanaChiremba Vanoshora Kushandiswa KwePfuti Pakumisa Kuratidzira
text: Sangano ravana chiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, ZADHR, rashora zvikuru hurumende mukushandiswa kwemabara nemapurisa nemauto mukuedza kumisa vanhu vari kuratidzira. Vanhu muHarare, Epworth, Chitungwiza nedzimwe nzvimbo dzakapoteredza Harare neBulawayo vavhara migwagwa vachipisa matayi emota vachiratidza kutsutsumwa kwavo nekukwidzwa kwakaitwa mafuta emotikari mazuva maviri apfuura. Mutauriri ZADHR, Dr Fortune Nyamande, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanachiremba vesangano ravo riri kurapa vanhu vazhinji vakuvadzwa mukuratidzira uku. Vaenderera mberi vachiti pane vakuvara, pane vamwe gumi nevatatu vanyanya kukuvadzwa kupfuura vamwe uye vari kutovhiyiwa muzvipatara. Hatina kukwanisa kubata vatauriri vemapurisa nemauto kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vodzokera kuMusha neMugovera
text: Mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmerson Mnangagwa, vapedza rwendo rwavo rwemazuva mashanu ku China vachiita misangano mumatunhu madiki ari ku Hangzhou uko kwaitirwa musangano we Zimbabwe- China Business Forum. Mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmerson Mnangagwa, vapedza rwendo rwavo rwemazuva mashanu ku China vachiita misangano mumatunhu madiki ari ku Hangzhou uko kwaitirwa musangano we Zimbabwe- China Business Forum. Uyu musangano waitwa nevemabhizinesi nemakurukota ehurumende yeku China navana muzvinabhizinesi nemakurukota ehurumende vekuZimbabwe. VaMnangagwa, avo vari kutarisirwa kudzoka kusvika kumusha neMugovera, vanonzi vakanyorerana zvibvumirano zvinomwe nehurumende pamwe nemakambani ekuChina. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi dzinoti zvibvumirano izvi hazvina zvazvinoreva kana pasina chinobuda mazviri. Muongorori wezvebudiriro, uye vachidzidzisa pa Africa University, Doctor Iris Shiripinda vanoti kunyorana zvibvumirano chinhu chisinganetsi nekuti kuwirirana zvamunoda kuitirirana asi kuzochizadzisa rimwe basa rinoda kuti vanhu vacherechedze zvese zvavanenge vawirirana kuitirana sezviri muchisungo chavo Doctor Shiripinda vanoti ruzhinji rwenyika harwufaniri kungopemberera kutaurwa kwe zvibvumirano, asi kuti vaone kuti nekufamba kwenguva zvazogonekwa kuzadziswa ndezvipi. Vanoti rwendo rwaVaMnangagwa nderwekunovhima saka mhemberero inoda kuzouya kana vazoona zvabuda murwendo urwu. Vatiwo zvinoda kuti vatungamiriri venyika vatarise zvinogona kuitika kwete kutaura zvisingagoneki kune ve kuChina ava kuti zvibvumirano izvi zvisazoperere ku hope chete. No media source currently available

headline: Zifa inokara mari: Shereni
text: SHASHA yakambonetsa ichitambira nhabvu maWarriors, Dynamos nezvimwe zvikwata zvekuEurope — Harlington Shereni — anoti vakambotamba mutambo uyu vanovharirwa kunze pose pavanoda kuita zvirongwa zvekusimudzira nhabvu nesangano reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) iro raanoti rizere nevanhu vane makaro emari.   Shereni mumwe wevakatamba nhabvu yepamusoro izvo zvakamuona achitambira kuEurope kwemakore akawanda kuzvikwata zvinosanganisira SR Delemont yekuSwitzerland kozoti Istres, Guingamp, Nantes neStrausborg zvekuFrance.   Muchinda uyu aive muchikwata chemaWarriors chekutanga kuenda kunokwikwidza kuAfrica Cup of Nations kuTunisia.   “Isu sevakambotamba nhabvu kare tine rudo rwekusimudzira mutambo uyu asi tinopedzisira tasvika pakuneta nekuti hutungamiri hwenhabvu yemuno vanokupedza simba. Havana rudo nenhabvu asi chavanongoda imari chete, kunyangwe pakauuya vatsva vanoshanda semashandiro aiita vanenge vabva.   “Kuti zvinake, panodiwa munhu akatamba nhabvu yepamusoro kwete munhu wese wese,” anodaro Shereni.   Parizvino Zifa iri kutungamirirwa naFelton Kamambo uyo akambotamba nhabvu kuchikwata cheMhangura Football Club.   Asi, mumaonero aShereni anoti chigaro ichi chinoda munhu akatamba nhabvu yepamusoro-soro.   “Ndofunga yasvika nguva yekuti isu takambotamba nhabvu tikwikwidze musarudzo idzi dzekusarudza mutungamiri weZifa   “Uye munhu anofanirwa kunge akaona nekutamba nhabvu yepamusoro kuti aunze shanduko munhabvu yemuno,” anodaro.   Shereni — uyo akaberekerwa ndokukurira kuChiredzi —  anoti anoda kusimudzira mutambo wenhabvu kuChiredzi.   “Ndiri kushanda kuti ndisimudzire nhabvu kuChiredzi kwandakabva uye kutanga gore rinotevera tichange tichiita mitambo yakasiyana tichibika tarenda revatambi vari kusimukira. Tiri kutsvaga vanokwanisa kukotsvera kuti basa iri ritange,” anodaro Shereni.   Mutauriri weZifa Xolisani Gwesela anoti havasati vakamboona chinyorwa chinobva kunaShereni chekuti anoda kusimudzira mutambo wenhabvu muno.   “Hatisati tamboona kana zvaakambonyora achiti anogona kushandura nhabvu muno saka zvaari kutaura zviri kubvepi? Mari ipi iri kudyiwa?   “Nhabvu yakavhurika kumunhu wese uye tinotambira pfungwa dzevamwe idzo dzinoshandura nhabvu  zvichiita kuti ikure,” anodaro Gwesela.   Anoenderera achiti, “Hapana akambomurambidza kuti akwikwidze musarudzo dzekusarudza hutungamiri hweZifa uye kana achiona kuti anogona kutungamira akasununguka kukwikwidza musarudzo dzinotevera, asi hunge kana achizadzikisa zvinodiwa zvinotarisirwa kuti ukwikwidze musarudzo dzeZifa.”

headline: Nhengo dzeZIBAWU Dzinoratidzira paBhanga reStanbic
text: Nhengo dzeZimbabwe Banks and Allied Workers Union (ZIBAWU) dzaratidzira muHarare pabhanga reStanbic riri muna Samora Machel dzichinyunyuta nekudzvanyirirwa kwadzinoti kuri kuitwa vanhukadzi nebhanga iri.
