Vashandi vemumabhanga ava vanga vachinyunyuta nekudzingwa kwemumwe mushandi wechidzimai nebhanga reStanbic, Amai Verity Mutsamwira. Amai Mutsamwira vaitungamirira sangano revashandi vekuStanbic. ZIBAWU inoti ndivo vaive mukadzi wekutanga kumiririra vashandi vebhanga. Vachitaura neStudio7 apo vanga vachiratidzira, Amai Bernice Maluleke, avo vanoona nezvekuenzaniswa kwemikana pakati pevanhurume nevanhukadzi muZIBAWU,vati nhengo dzavo dziri kunyunyuta zvikuru nekumbunyikidzwa kunoitwa kodzero dzemadzimai kubanga reStanbic. Amai Maluluke vanoti Amai Mutsamwira vakadzingwa nekuda kwekuti vaimirira kodzero dzevashandi. Imwe nhengo yeZIBAWU, MuzvareRumbidzai Choto, vati kutsikirirwa kwevanhukadzi pamabasa ndozviri kukonzera kuti vanhukadzi vasawana zvigaro zvepamusoro mumapazi akasiyana-siyana munyika. Muzvare Choto vayambiro bhanga reStanbic vachiti rikasagadzirisa mabatiro ariri kuita vanhukadzi, sangano ravo richaramba richiratidzira. Mutungamiriri weZIBAWU, VaFarai Katsande, vati vanoda kuti bhanga reStanbic ridzosere Amai Mutsamwira pabasa. VaKatsande vapomerawo bhanga iri mhosva yekuramba richidzvanyarira vashandi vakati izvi zvinofanirwa kuchinja sezvo nyika yakasununguka. Vamwe vashandi vebhanga iri varamba kudomwa nemazita vati hutungamiriri hwebanga iri hauremekedzi vanhukadzi uye vanotsikirira vanhukadzi kuti vasawana hutungamiriri kana kusimukira pabasa ravo. Nhengo dzeZIBAWU idzi dzakatozoenda kumatare edzimhosva kuti vapiwe mvumo yekuratidzira mushure mekunge mapurisa avarambidza. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rebhanga iri sezvo vakuruvebanga iri vanga vasiri mumahofisi avo.

headline: Vagari Vodyira Marasha Kanzuru yeMasvingo
text: Vagari vemudhorobha reMasvingo vanoti havasi kufara nedanho rakatorwa nekanzuru yavo nezuro rekuti itengere vakuru vemapazi nharembozha dzichadya mari inodarika zviuru makumi matanhatu zvemadhora ekuAmerica. Vagari vakawanda vanoti zviri kuitwa nekanzuru yavo zvinoratidza kuti haina shungu nekuita zvinhu zvinobatsira veruzhinji. Maminetsi emusangano wekanzuru wakaitwa nezuro anoratidza kuti kanzuru yakabuda nechisungo chekutenga nharembozha dzemhando yepamusoro soro dzekupa vakuru vemapazi ekanzuru gumi, pamwe nevetevedzeri vavo gumi. Vakuri vemapazi vachatengerwa Iphone7 iyo inoita zviuru zvitatu zvemadhora, vatevedzeri vavo vachitengerwa Samsung Galaxy S9, iyo inoita zviuru zviviri nemazana manomwe emadhora ekuAmerica. Izvi zvichadyira kanzuru mari inoita makumi matanhatu ezviuru zvemadhora. Vagari vataura ne Studio7 vanoti izvi zvinoratidza kuti vatungamiri vekanzuru havana hany'a nehupenyu hwevagari sezvo vachishandisa mari yakawanda kuzvinhu zvenhando, asi ivo vasina mvura yakakwana, migwagwa yakanaka uye marara asiri kutakurwa kanzuru ichiti mari yairi kuwana ishoma. Amai Sandra Muzenda, avo vanogara mumusha weSisk, vanoti izvi zvinoratidza kuti vakuru vekanzuru vane humbimbindoga. Mumwe mugari, Muzvare Blessing Chimombo, vanotiwo havaoni chinobatsira nharembozha pakufambiswa kwebasa rekanzuru rakafana nekuti kushomeka kwemvura kupere mudhorobha. Kunyange zvekutengwa kwenharembozha izvi zvisimo mubhajeti rekanzuru ra2019, kanzuru inotarisirwa zvakare kuzobudisa mari yakawanda yekutengera vakuru ava muto wekudzishandisa mwedzi wega wega. Mubhajeti regore rino remari inosvika mamirioni maviri emadhora, kanzuru ichashandisa mari inosvika zviuru mazana mashanu zvemadhora gore rose mukugadzirisa migwagwa, zvinoreva kuti mari yenharembozha yose inokwanisa kugadzirisa migwagwa yedhorobha kwemwedzi mumwe chete. Kanzuru inoshandisazve mari inoita zviuru mazana matatu zvemadhora kutenga mishonga inochenesa mvura pagore, zvekuti mari yenharembozha inokwanisa kutenga mishonga yekuchenesa mvura kwemwedzi miviri, vanhu vachiwana mvura yakachena muguta rine vanhu vosvika zviuru zana. Mari yenharembozha iyi inokwanisawo kutenga mafuta edzimotokari dzose dzekanzuru nedzekutakurisa marara mudzimba kwemwedzi mitatu, izvo zvinoita kuti zvirwere zvive zvishoma muguta. Naynzvi munyaya dzemari dzinotiwo, kanzuru, iyo iri kunetseka kuwanira musha wega wega bhini rawo, yaikwanisa kutenga mabhini zviuru zvisere zvopihwa vagari kuitira kuti vasarase marara pose pose. Mukuru webasa muMasvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance, VaAnoziva Muguti, vanoti kanzuru iri kuita zvekutamba nemari yevagari. Kunyange izvi zvakabuda mumaminitsi emusangano wekupera kwemwedzi unopa mvumo kubasa rose rekanzuru richaitwa mwedzi unotevera, meya weguta, VaCollen Maboke, vanoti izvi hazvisati zvapasiswa. Vagari vanoti kanzuru inofanirwa kusatenga nharembozha idzi yonangana nezvinhu zvinobatsira vagari. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vatanhatu Vanosungwa Vachiratidzira muHarare
text: Kuratidzira uku kwatangira pamuzinda weMDC paHarvest House apo varatidziri ava vaimba vakatakura zvinyorwa zvakasiyana-siyana vachinanga kuparamende. Mapurisa anorwisana nemvongamupopoto asunga vanhu vatanhatu ndokubva avhiringidza kuratidzira kwaitwa nenhengo dzeMDC-T pamwe neTajamuka muHarare idzo dzanga dzichiti dzinoda kuti hurumende ibvise ma bond notes mumabhanga. Kuratidzira uku kwatangira pamuzinda weMDC paHarvest House apo varatidziri ava vaimba vakatakura zvinyorwa zvakasiyana-siyana vachinanga kuparamende. Vasati vatanga kuratidzira, mutungamiri weboka revechidiki muMDC-T, VaHappymore Chidziva, vaudza varatidziri ava kuti havasi kufara nema bond notes akaparurwa nebhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe neMuvhuro. VaChidziva vati sezvo hupfumi hwenyika hwaita madamburikiti mashatekuzhe mutariro wemadhende, VaMugabe vave kufanirakusiya matomhu voenda pamudyandigere. Izvi zvatsinhirwa nemumwe wevaratidziri ava, VaHardlife Mudzingwa, avo vaudza Studio 7 kuti kuunzwa kwakaitwa mari iyi hakusi kubatsira kupedza dambudziko rekushayikwa kwemari mumabhanga. Varatidziri ava pavanga voda kusvika kuparamende vabva vagamuchirwa nemapurisa anorwisa mvongamupopoto ayo avadira mvura inovava nekuvakandira zvombo zvehutsi hunokachidza. Varatidziri ava vabva vaita hushamwari nemhepo vachiita aziva kwake aziva kwake vamwe vachitizira mumitsetse yevanhu vanga vachitsvaga mari mumabhanga pamwe nemuzvitoro. Mapurisa abva atanga kudeedzera kuti vanhu vabve mumitsetse iyi uye vezvitoro vabva vavharawo vakazovhura havo mushure memaawa akati kuti. Mapurisa azoswera oita hwekiti negonzo nevaratidziri avo vanga vave kuratidzira vari muzvikwata zvikwata munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana mudhorobha. Zvimwe zvitoro zvinonzi zvapwanywa nevaratidziri ava asi hatina kukwanisa kuziva kuti pane zvatorwa here muzvitoro izvi. Hurumende yakaparura ma bond notes neMuvhuro ichiti achashandiswa kupa mubayiro kune vanenge vatengesa zvinhu kunze kweyika. Asi ma bond notes aya ave kungowanikwa nemunhuwo zvake kubhanga. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti ma bond notes aya yatove mari chaiyo izvo zvaiwanzotaurwa nevari kushora ma bond notes aya avo vanoti hurumende iri kudzosa dhora remuZimbabwe nerweseri.

headline: Vatsigiri va VaTrump Vanoita Mhirizhonga paCapitol Hill
text: Nhengo dzeparamende ye America dzakabudiswa muparamende zvechimbichimbi mushure mekunge mhomho yevatsigiri vemutungamiri we America, VaDonald Trump, yakapinda zvechisimba muparamende panguva iyo nhengo dzedare iri dzakange dzichiverenga mavhoti esarudzo yakapa VaJoe Biden hutongi hwe America pavakakunda VaTrump musarudzo. Mhomho iyi yakapunza mahwindo nemisuwo izvo zvakakonzera kuti nhengo dzose dzeparamende dzitize kana kuvanda kusvika mapurisa asvika. Mumwe munhukadzi akapfurwa akazofira kuchipatara. VaTrump vari kushorwa nekuramba kwavo kubvuma kuti vakakundwa musarudzo uye yekukurudzira vatsigiri vavo kuti varatidzire vachiramba zvakabuda musarudzo. Meya veguta reWashington D.C. Amai Muriel Bowser, vadzika mutemo unorambidza vanhu kufambafamba pakati pemaawa a 6 o’clock manheru na 6 o’clock mangwanani. Mushure memhirizhonga iyi, makambani eTwitter, Facebook neInstagram akazivisa kuti ave kuvhara mukana waVaTrump wekushandisa madandemutande aya pari zvino, achiti anogona kunyima VaTrump mukana wekushandisa madandemutande aya zvachose. Mugari wemu Washington D.C, Doctor Frenk Guni, vanoti zvavaona zvichiitika zvinonyadzisa uye zvasvibisa zita reAmerica zvakanyanya. No media source currently available

headline: Vemitambo Vofarira Kirsty Coventry seGurukota Idzva reMitambo neVechidiki
text: Vemumhuri yemutambo vari kubvumirana kuti Muzvare Kirsty Coventry vanokodzera kubasa iri sezvo vachiziva nzira dzese dzemitambo zvekuti vachagadzirisa panga pasinga fambe zvakana. Muzvare Coventry, avo vakatora menduru nhanhatu kumaOlympic Games, vapihwa basa iri nhasi masikati nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, apo vadoma makurukota enyika. Mutambi wetsiva, Farai Mugoni, anoti basa iri ranga richida munhu akambopinda munhandare, munhu anoziva matambudziko evatambi zvekuti anofunga kuti Muzvare Coventry vanokodzera. Aimbove shasha yeZimbabwe mutsiva zvekare muhuremu hweligh heavyweight neheavyweight, Arigoma Chiponda. anoti ari kufaranezvaitika izvi achiti ari kutarisira kuti Muzvare Coventry vachakandawo mumitambo vatungamiri vakambopindawo munhandare. Muongorori wemutambo, VaFarai Kambamura, vanoti kusarudzwa kwaMuzvare Coventry kuve nhengo yeInternational Olympic Committee kunoratidza kuti munhu ari kuziva zvaari kuita vachiwedzera ivo kuti Zimbabwe yakomborerwa nekupihwa kwake basa iri. Mutambi we volleyball, Oliver Musongoro, anoti Muzvare Coventry vane ruzivo rwakadzama rezvemitambo zvichitevera kufamba kwavaita munyika dzakasiyana siyana zvekuti vari kuona pachiita shanduko sezvo vave panyanga. Musongoro anoti afara nekuti paiswa munhu ari mumitambo kare. Muteveri wemitambo, VaKudzai Bere, vanoti zvinofadza kuti vatambi vakaita saMuzvare Coventry vatambidzwe mabasa akadai sekutendwa zvavakaitira nyika pasina mubhadharo. Makore apfuura panga pachiita kugunununa kuti makurukuta ari kupihwa basa iri ari kuritadza sezvo anga asingazive zvemitambo. Asi Muzvare Coventry vane basa guru rekuedza kusandura mafungiro evamwe vemuhurumende avo vasingakosheshe zvemitambo izvo zvanga zvichikonzera kuti mitambo isawane mari yakasimba kubva kuhurumende. Pamusoro pekuve nhengo yeInternational Olympic Committee, Muzvare Coventry ndivo zvekare mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weZimbabwe Olympic Commiittee, basa raarikutarisirwa kusiya nezvaave ikozvino. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inomisa Chirongwa Chekupa Vadzidzi Zvitupa neNyaya yeCovid-19
text: Kunyange hazvo hurumende yakamisa neMugovera chirongwa chekuti vana vanoda kunyora bvunzo dzeOrdinary neAdvanced Level vatore zvitupa nekuda kwekutyira kupararira kweCovid-19, nyanzvi munyaya dzedzidzo dzinoti zvakakosha kuti chirongwa ichi chienderere mberi kuitira kuti pasaita nhubu dzinonyorera vamwe mazamanishoni. Hurumende yainge yaisa parutivi zuro nanhasi semazuva maviri ekuti vaya vanoda kunyora bvunzo gore rino vatore zvitupa, asi yakazomisa chirongwa ichi chave pakati nezuro masikati yave kutyira kuti denda reCovid-19 ringapararire zvakanyanya mushure mekunge vanhu vabuda zvine mutsindo. Bazi rezvemukati menyika pamwe nevakafanobata chigaro chaRegistrar-General, VaHenry Machiri, vakazivisa nezuro kuti vakamisa chirongwa ichi mushure mekunge vanhu vakawandisa vaenda kumahofisi avo kunotorerwa zvitupa. Mapurisa akatozoshevedzwa kuzochengetedza runyararo uye vamwe vakanga vatorara pamahofisi aRegistrar General aya vachida zvitupa. Mumwe mudzidzi wepane chimwe chikoro muHarare, Chipo Zhou, uyo akamukira pamahofisi aRegistrar-General ari paMachipisa mumusha weHigfiled muHarare, audza Studio 7 kuti akawana paine vanhu vaidarirka chiuru vakanga vave mumutseste nechakare uye akazobva asina kutora chitupa mushure mekuudzwa kuti chirongwa ichi chaitirwa vaye vanodzidza muzvikoro zvakazvimirira kana kuti private colleges. Mumwe murairiridzi wepane chimwe chikoro mumusha weGlen View uyo aramba kudzomwa nezita, audza Studio 7 kuti ichokwadi kuti chirongwa ichi chinobata vana vanodzidza kuma private collegel. Ati vanhu vari muzvikoro zvehurumende, makunzuru kana zvemakereke havadi zvitupa kuti vanyore bvunzo. Murairidzi uyu atiwo vana vakawanda vaida zvitupa nekuti vanodzidza muzvikoro zvakazvimirira kana kuti zvisina kunyoreswa nehurumende uye zvisingabvumidzwe kunyoresa bvunzo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzedzidzo uye vari mutungamiriri wesangano rinomirira varairidzi reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakakosha kuti vanoda kunyora bvunzo vasingadzidzi muzvikoro vatore zvitupa vachiti izvi zvinodzivirira hutsotsi nechikiribidi pabvunzo. Doctor Zhou, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvinosuwisa kuti vanhu vanotambura kutora zvitupa munyika vachiti hapafaniri kuitwa zvematongerwo enyika pakutora zvitupa. Mutauriri webazi redzidzo yepasi, VaTaungana Ndoro, vanoti ichokwadi kuti vaya vasiri muzvikoro zvakanyoreswa kana kuti vari kudzidza kuma Non-Formal school, kana kuti vanganzi External Candidates, ndivo chete vanosungirwa kunge vaine zvitupa pabvunzo, kwete vanodzidza musvikoro zviri pasi pehurumende, makanzuru kana mamishoni. Zimbabwe Schools Examinations Council yakazivisa mwedzi wapera kuti vanoda kunyora bvunzo vanofanira kunge vabhadhara mari dzebvunzo musi wa9 Chikunguru uye vano nonoka vanofanira kubhadhara mari iyi musi wa30 Chikungururu. Doctor Zhou vaudza Studio 7 kuti vasina kukwanisa kutora zvitupa nezuro vachinenguva yekutora zvitupa izvi sezvo pachine nguva pazonosvika 30 Chikunguru. Vatiwo Covid-19 inogona kukanganisa kunyorwa kwebvunzo idzi uye semaonero avo, gore rino vana vachafoira zvakanyanya sezvo vasina nguva yekudzidza yakakwana uye varairidzi vasiri kudzidzisa nekuti havasi kufara nemihoro yavanotambira. Hurumende yakambomisa kuvhurwa kwezvikoro nekuti Covid-19 iri kupararira zvakanyanya. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Varairidzi Vombosungwa Apo Hurumende Yotadza Kuwirirana neVashandi paNyaya yeMari Dzavanotambira.
text: Nhengo pfumbamwe dzesangano revadzidizi vekumaruwa reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe kana kuti ARTUZ, dzakambochengetedzwa nemapurisa zvichitevera kuratidzira kwakaitwa nesangano iri muHarare panguva iyo vamwe vashandi vehurumende vanga vachiita musangano nemamwe makurukota hurumende. Mutungamiri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure, nedzimwe nhengo sere dzesangano ravo vakambochengetedzwa kwechinguvana nemapurisa mushure mekusungwa kwavaitwa vachida kutanga kuratidzira paAfrica Unity Square. VaMasaraure vaudza Studio vari pakamba yeHarare Central kuti kunyange hurumende ikavasunga havasi kuzodzokera shure panyaya yekurwira kuti vadzidzisi vabhadharwe nemari yekunze pamwe nekupihwa zvimwe zvikwanisiro zvinoita kuti vaite basa ravo nemazvo. Pavaregedzwa nemapurisa vasina mhosva yavapomerwa zvichitevera kupindiria kwaita magweta avo, VaMasaraure nevamwe vavo vabva vaenda kunoratidzira pahofisi yegurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Muthuli Ncube vachiti vanoda kuwedzerwa mari dzemihoro vachiti havasi kuzoenda kumabasa panovhurwa zvikoro nemusi weChipiri. Tichiri panyaya iyi, mutauriri wesangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaTabani Moyo vati sangano ravo harisi kufara nechisimba chiri kushandiswa nehurumende pavashandi vayo vari kuda kuwedzerwa mari dzemihoro. Zvichakadai, masangano ese anomirira vashandi vehurumende aita musangano negurukota rezvevashandi VaJuly Moyo achida kuti vashandi vehurumende vawedzerwe mari asi hapana chinobatika chabuda mumusangano uyu. Mutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru muApex Council, VaGibson Mushangu, vaudza Studio 7 mushure memusangano wavo kuti hurumende yati haikwanise kubhadhara vashandi vayo nemari yekunze. VaMushangu vati sevashandi vehurumende havasi kuzoramwa mabasa parizvino kunyange hazvo vati vashandi vazhinji vanogona kutadza kuenda kumabasa sezvo vaine mari isingavakwanire kuti vakwire mabhazi kuenda kumabasa pamwe nekuraramisa mhuri dzavo. VaMushangu vati vave kutarisira kuti nhuna dzavo dzichagadziriswa mumusangano weNational Joint Negotiating Council wakatairisirwa kuitwa munguva pfupi iri kutevera. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nevakafanobata chigaro chegurukota rezvemaindustry VaJuly Moyo mushure memusangano wavaita nevemasanagano anomirira vashandi kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Vashandi vehurumende vanoti vanoda kuwedzerwa mari dzavanotambiriswa pamwe nekugadzirisirwa zvikwanisiro zvose zvinoita kuti vakwanise kuita basa ravo zvakanaka. No media source currently available

headline: Homwe yeAmerica yePEPFAR Inopa Mari Kune Vanorarama neH-I-V Yekudzivirira COVID-19
text: Hurumende yeAmerica yapa rubatsiro rwemari inoita madhora zana nemakumi mashanu ezviuru zvemari yekuAmerica kuburikidza nehomwe yePresident’s Emergency Plan for Aids Relief, (PEPFAR), iyo ichabatsira vanorarama nehutachiwana hweH-I-V mukudzivirira chirwere che COVID-19. Mashoko aburitswa nemuzinda weAmerica uri muZimbabwe anoti mari iyi ichashandiswa kutenga zvinhu zvakaita sesipo, migoro, nzvimbo dzekugezera maoko, pamwe nemishonga inouraya hutachiwana yekuzora mumaoko kana kuti sanitizers, zvichapiwa kumasangano agara achibatsirwa nehomwe iyi. Mari iyi inonzi ichashandiswawo zvakare mukudhinda magwaro anopa ruzivo pamusoro pechirwere cheCOVID-19 ichi. Mwedzi wapera America yakapa World Health Organisation mari inoita mazana mana nemakumi manomwe ezviuru zvemadhora yekuti ibatsire Zimbabwe mukurwisana ne COVID-19. Mukuru anoona nezvezvirongwa musangano reNational Aids Council, VaRaymond Yekeye, vanoti sesangano vanotenda zvikuru nezvaitwa nehomwe yePEPFAR izvi sezvo Zimbabwe iri kudawo rubatsiro rwekurwisanawo nechirwere cheCOVID-19 senyika dzose pasi rino. Mari iyi inonzi ichasvitswa kumasangano matatu agara anoshanda nePEPFAR anoti OPHID, I-TECH neZACH, ayo achazoita basa rekugovera zvinhu izvi. No media source currently available

headline: Zanu PF Inoti Haina Hurongwa hweKuumba Hurumende yeMubatanidzwa neMDC Alliance
text: Munyori wezvemutemo mubato reZanu-PF VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana vanoti parizvino bato ravo harina hurongwa hwekuita hurumende nemubatanidzwa nebato reMDC Alliance rinotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakazivisa kuti mukova wavo hwakavurika kuita nhaurirano naVaChamisa. Asi VaChamisa avo vakarambawo zvehurumende yemubatanidzwa vanoti hakuna munhu kubva kuhurumende kana bato reZanu-PF akauya kuzotaura navo zviri pamutemo nenyaya yenhaurirano. No media source currently available

headline: Karate handi kurwa: Chirumhanzu
text: SHASHA yekarate yechidzimai, Grace Chirumhanzu, anoti mutambo uyu unodzidzisa vanhu kuzvibata uye kuzvidzivirira kwete kufamba uchirwisana nevanhu.   Chiramhanzu mumwe wemadzimai vane mukurumbira vari kusimudzira mureza weZimbabwe kunze kwenyika izvo zvakambomuona achihwina menduru yebhuronzi mugore ra2018 kuScotland.   Anoti kune vamwe vanhu vanotaura kuti ukaroora mudzimai anotamba karate unogona kugara uchirakashwa zvikuru, asi handizvo sezvo mutambo uyu unodzidzisa vanhu kuzvibata, kushinga pamwe nekuzvidzivirira kana vorwiswa nevamwe.   “Karate hazvirevi kuti unofamba uchirwa nevanhu, kwete inotokudzidzisa kuzvibata muhupenyu hwako uye kuzvisimbisa. Kana uchiita mutambo uyu, zvirwere zvakasiyana-siyana hazvimbokubate. Paye patinenge tichikwikwidza munhandare tinenge tichitodzidza zvakawanda.   “Kwatinogara kune nhubu dzakasiyana, mutambo wedu uyu unotidzidzisawo sevanhukadzi kuti tikwanise kuzvidzivirira kana nhubu idzi dzichida kuti vhiringidza,” anodaro.   Zvakadai, Chirumhanzu naRumbidzai Takawira anova imwe shasha yekarate vari kutarisirwa kuenda kunomirira nyika pamwechete nevamwe kuJapan kumakwikwi e2nd So-Kyokushin World Karate Championship 2020 ayo achaitwa munaKubvumbi.   Anoti kuchange kwakaoma zvikuru sezvo kuJapan kuriko kumuzinda wekarate asi vari kugadzirira kunohwina vagotevera mumatsimba aSamson Muripo uyo akahwina mumakwikwi aya kunyika iyi kekutanga mugore ra2018.   “KuJapan ndiko kumuzinda wekarate uye ndiko kwainobikwa, vana vanotokudzwa mumutambo uyu. Saka patiri kuenda kuJapan tinoziva kuti tichasangana neshasha dzakawanda. Asi hatisi kuzozvitarisa izvozvo. Shasha yedu Shihan Samson Muripo avo vanove murairidzi wedu vakanozviita kuJapan kumakwikwi aya saka isu tikagadzirira zvakasimba tinoziva kuti tichanozviitawo,” anodaro.

headline: ‘Division One yakaoma’
text: MUTAMBI weSimba Stars FC, Hardlife ‘Nairobi’ Zvirekwi, anoti nhabvu inotambwa muDivisione One haina kumbopfava sezvo zvikwata zvose zvichitamba kunge zvichadambuka makumbo nechinangwa chekurwira kupinda muCastle Premiership.   Mushure mekunge atamba kwemakore muPSL, Zvirekwi, mwaka uno akatengwa neSimba Stars iyo iri kurwa semvumba muNorthern Region Division One sezvo iri kuda kupinda muPSL mwaka unotevera.   Mutambi uyu, uyo akambotambira zvikwata zvinosanganisira CAPS United nemaWarriors, anoti mitambo yemuDivision One yakaoma uye inonakidza.   “Division One yakaoma zvikuru ndiko kune bhora rese nekuti zvikwata zvose zvirimo zvine chinangwa chimwe chete – chekurwira kupinda muPSL. Saka hakuna chakanaka, kunenge kuchitomhanyiwa zvakasimba,” anodaro.   Anoti kuSimba Stars FC haasi kungotamba nhabvu chete, asi ari kupota achipakurira ruzivo rwaawana munhabvu kwemakore akawanda kune vatambi vechidiki.   “Kuchikwata chedu, ndini mumwe wevatambi vakuru saka ndiri kutora chikamu chikuru mukupa dzidziso kune vechidiki ndichivarakidzawo gwara rakanaka rekufamba naro. Kuti ndisvike pandave iye zvino, ndakabva kure uye ndakaona zvakawanda. Naizvozvo ndinofanirwa kupa vechidiki mazano kuti vafambire mberi mumutambo uyu vadarike patakasvikawo isu munhabvu,” anodaro.   Gore rino, Zvirekwi ari kusvitsa makore 35 okuberekwa ayo vamwe vanenge vave kutosendeka shangu dzavo dzekutambisa nhabvu.   Asi anoti achiri kuda kutamba nhabvu kwemamwe makore maviri kana matatu.   “Ndega ndichiri kuzvinzwa kuti ndinokwanisa kuramba ndichitamba nhabvu kwemamwe makore maviri kana matatu chaiwo. Handisati ndapera, asi makore andataura akasvika ndinenge ndave kutosiya zvekutamba nhabvu,” anodaro.   Zvakadaro, svondo rino Simba Stars iri pamusha kuShamva apo ichasangana neHarare City Cubs musi weMugovera

headline: Hurumende Inoti Iri Kuongorora Zvakaitika muKanzuru yeBulawayo
text: Meya veguta reBulawayo, VaSolomon Mguni, vanoti bazi rezvekutongwa kwematunhu ravazivisa kuti richatuma chikwata chevanhu kuBulawayo kunoongorora zvakaitika mukanzuru yeBulawayo, zvinosanganisira kumiswa basa kwakange kwaitwa munyori weguta, VaChristopher Dube, nemutevedzeri wameya, VaTinashe Kambarami, pavakambofanobata chinzvimbo chameya. VaMguni vati zvichawanikwa nevaongorori ava zvichabudiswa nehurumende mumavhiki mashoma arikutevera. MuBulawayo makamboita kusagadzikana pakati pemarudzi kusvika meya, pamwe chete nebato reMDC rinotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, rapindira. Asi nyanzvi mukurongwa kwemaguta, VaPrince Sibanda, vanoti bazi rezvekutongwa kwematunhu harifanirwi kupindira munyaya iyi zvachose, vachiti nyaya iyi inofanirwa kugadziriswa nekanzuru yeBulawayo. VaSibanda vanoti havanzwisisi kuti sei hurumende ichida kupindira munyaya dzekanzuru iyo kanzuru isati yashandisa mapazi ayo ese mukugadzirisa nyaya iyi.

headline: Amai Mliswa Chikoka Vokurudzira Kusungwa kweVanhu Vanoita Huori Munyaya dzeKutengeswa kweMasitendi
text:
Imwe nhengo huru muhurumende yabvuma nhasi kuti vashandi vehurumende pamwe nevamwe vanhu muZanu PF vari kutengesa nzvimbo dzekuvakira zvisiri pamutemo, nokudaro vanofanirwa kusungwa nemitemo yenyika. Vachitaura paCooksey Hall muChinhoyi pamusangano wavaita
nevakuru vemapazi ehurumende, gurukota redunhu reMashonaland West, Amai Mliswa-Chikoka, vati mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, havasi kufara negwaro reongororo yezvekushandiswa kwenzvimbo dzehurumende iro rakaburitsa pachena kuti nhengo dzebato reZanu PF nevashandi vehurumende vari kuita zvehuori munyaya dzekuwanisana pekugara. Amai Mliswa-Chikoka vaudza mapurisa kuti vave nebasa rekusunga wose
ari kuita kana akaita zvehuori pasina kutarisa kumeso. Amai Mliswa Chikoka vakurudzira vematare kuti vaite basa ravo nemazvo kuitira kuti mutemo ubate wose akaita zvehuori. Amai Mliswa-Chikoka vati vose vakawana nzvimbo kubva kuhurumende kana kumakanzuru dzekuvakira dzimba zvechitsotsi, vanofanirwa
kusungwa. VaMnangagwa vakaumba komisheni yakaongorora kupihwa kwaiyitwa nzvimbo dzehurumende mumakanzuru pamwe nekutambira zvichemo zvevanhu vainge vatenga nzvimbo dzekugara asi votadza kudziwana. Konisheni iyi yaive nemutongi wedare repamusoro, Justice Tendai Uchena, sasachigaro wayo. Ongororo yaVaUchena inoti muChinhoyi pane nzvimbo yeDestiny iyo
yakapihwa VaObediah Musindo vanotsigira bato reZanu PF avo
vakatengesera vanhu nzvimbo dzekugara asi kusvika nanhasi vanhu ava
havasati vapihwa pekugara kunyange vakabhadhara mari yavainge vanzi
vabhadhare. Imwe nhengo yevechidiki yeZanu PF, VaMike Chimombe, vakapihwa nzvimbo yekuvakira dzimba asi kusvika pari zvino hapana chakavakwa asi vanhu vachiti vakabhadhara mari dzavo. Asi VaChimombe vati vakapedza kubhadhara nzvimbo iyi vangomirira
kuvaka dzimba dzavo. KuChitungwiza, imwe nhengo yeZanu PF, Dr Fredrick Mabamba, vemushandira pamwe wedzimba weUnited Westand Housing Cooperative, vakasungwa nebazi rezvekudzivirirwa kwehuori masvondo matatu apfuura vachipomerwa mhosva yekupa vanhu nzvimbo dzekuvaka dzimba zvisiri pamutemo. Muguta reNorton, kambani yeBeyond Reality yenhengo yeZanu PF
yeConsultative Assembly, VaJimayi Muduvuri, iri kunetsanawo nevechidiki
pamusoro penzvimbo inosvika mahekita mazana maviri inofanirwa kuvakirwa dzimba iyo iri mumatare edzimhosva. Vechidiki ava, avo vakabhadhara mari asi havana kuzopihwa nzvimbo
dzekuvakira dzimba, vave kunzi mari inofanirwa kuwedzerwa. Mashoko aAmai Mliswa-Chikoka anouya apo vaimbove gurukota rezvematunhu, VaIgnatius Chombo, vari kumiswa pamberi pematare edzimhosva vachipomherwa mhosvo yekusashandisa hofisi yavo zvakanaka vachiita zvehuori munyaya dzekupa vanhu nzvimbo dzekugara. Hatina kukwanisa kubata munyori wezvematunhu mubato reMDC Alliance, VaSesil Zvidzai, kuti tinzwe pamire bato ravo panyaya iyi. Asi mutevedzeri mumutauriri webato iri, VaClifford Hlatywayo, vanoti Zanu PF haikwanise kugadzirisa nyaya yevanhu vakawana nzvimbo dzekuvakira zvisiri pamutemo kana kuti ma Land Barons sezvo nhengo dzayo dziri idzo ma land barons. Gwaro rekomisheni yaVaUchena rinoti pane huori hwemhando yepamusoro hwakaitika pakupihwa kwenzvimbo dzekuvakira dzimba mumaguta akawanda munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Tichiri kuda kuenda kuCHAN: Zifa
text: MANEJA wechikwata chenhabvu chenyika chemaWarriors — Wellington Mpandare — anoti vakanyorera kuHurumende vachikumbira mvumo yekuti vaende kuCameroon kunokwikwidza kumutambo weAfrica Nations Championship (CHAN) uyo unofanirwa kutanga nemusi wa16 Ndira.   MaWariors anofanirwa kusimuka musi wa11 akananga kuCameroon kunokwikwidza kumutambo uyu sezvo ariwo achavhurira makwikwi egore rino apo achasangana neCameroon iyo inenge iri pamusha. Zvichitevera matanho akatorwa neHurumende ekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 izvo zvakaona mitambo yose ichimbomiswa munyika, Mpandare anoti sangano rinotungamirira nhabvu reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) rakabva ranyorera kuHurumende richikumbira mvumo yekuti vatenderwe kuenda kunokwikwidza kumutambo weCHAN.   “Takanyorera kuHurumende tichikumbira mvumo yekuti tigoenda kuCameroon kunokwikwidza kuCHAN.   Asi kutaura kuno tichiri takamirira kunzwa kuti vachati kudii nenhau yacho. Asi isu tiri kuda chaizvo kuenda kunokwikwidza,” anodaro Mpandare.   Svondo radarika, vatambi vapfumbamwe vemaWarriors vakawanikwa vaine chirwere cheCovid-19 izvo zvakazotuma murairidzi wechikwata ichi kuti adome vamwe vatambi gumi kuitira kuti kana vakabatwa nedenda iri vakasapora vozovatakura kuenda navo kuCameroon.   Mpandare anoti vatambi vakabatwa neCovid-19 vose vachaongororwa nemusi weChina svondo rino. “Sekuziva kunoitwa, munhu anenge abatwa kuti ane Covid-19 anogara mazuva 10 ari pake oga saka vatambi vedu vose vakabatwa nechirwere ichi vari kwavo voga uye kana zvikasasanduka tine vamwe vatakaudza kuti vagare vakagadziririra.   “Saka nemusi weChina vose vakabatwa kuti vane Covid-19 vachaongororwa zvekare kuti chirwere ichi chichiri mumuviri yavo here kana kuti chakabuda,” anodaro Mpandare.   Kumitambo yeCHAN, maWarriors akaiswa muboka reGroup A rine zvimwe zvikwata zvinoti Cameroon, Mali neBurkina Faso.

headline: Kuramwa Mabasa kwaVana Chiremba Kwava neMazuva Makumi Matatu neMaviri
text: Vanhu vakawanda vanonzi vari kufa muzvipatara zuva-nezuva sezvo vana chiremba vari kuramwa mabasa vachiti vanoda kuwedzerwa mari dzemihoro pamwe nezvikwanisiro zvinoita kuti vakwanise kuita basa ravo. Varwere vanonzi vari kufa muzvipatara nekushaya anovapa mishonga uku hurumende nanachiremba vachikakaVadzana panyaya yemari dzemihoro. Mugari wemuHarare, VaTendai Chapeyama, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira mushe muzvipatara zvikuru zvehurumende zvakaita secheParirenyatwa umo varwere vari kuswera varere muzvipatara vasina kana rubatsiro rwavari kuwana. Amai Nomalanga Chemhere avo vane murwere ari muchipatara vanoti vave kutorapisa murwere kunana chiremba vakazvimirira asi izvi zvave kuvadhurira. Muzvare Primrose Chimimba vakurudzirawo hurumende kuti igadzirise nhuna dzanachiremba kuitira kuti vanhu vasarambe vachirasikirwa nehupenyu. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuhurumende kuti vanhu vangani varasikirwa nehupenyu hwavo kuburikidza nekuramwa mabasa kwavana chiremba. Kuramwa mabasa uku nemazuva rechimakumi matatu nemaviri. Asi Amai Chemhere vati kana vanachiremba vari kuramwa mabasa vasingdadi kudzoka kumabasa, zviri nani hurumende ibvise vana chiremba ava pabasa yoisa vamwe vanhu vakaita savana chiremba vechisoja vazobatsira vanhu muzvipatara. Vamwe vana mukoti vatataura navo vanoti vanga vachidzoserwa kudzimba nevakuru vavo sezvo muzvipatara manga musina vanachiremba. Zvichakdai, mumwe chiremba wepaParirenyatwa watataura naye, VaWallace Hlambelo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti havasi kuzodzokera kubasa kudzamara hurumende yagadzirisa nhuna dzavo. Kusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu muzvipatara kwabva kwawedzera kuipa sezvo vana chiremba vakuru vave kuramwawo mabasa vachiti havakwanise kuitawo basa ravo nemazvo kana vana chiremba vadiki vasiri parutivi pavo. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, vakaudza vatori venhau neChipiri kuti hurumende yakabvuma kutambira dzimwe nhuna dzanachiremba asi kwete dzose. Vakatiwo hurumende haina mari yekunze yekubhadhara vana chiremba ava sezvavari kuda izvo zviri kuramba kutambirwa nana chiremba ava. No media source currently available

headline: Vamiriri veVashandi veMumigodhi Vari Kugumurwa Mabasa Vodaidzira Nhaurirano neVashandirwi
text: Vakuru vevashandi vemimighodhi vari musangano reNational Mine Workers’ Union of Zimbabwe vanoti nhasi vari kuda kuita hurukuro nevaridzi vekambani inochera goridhe yeMetallon Corporation Group kuti vazeye nyaya yekumiswa basa kwevashandi vanosvika mazana masere. Kambani iyi ine makambani anoti Shamva Mine, Redwing Mine, How Mine neMazoe Mine. Mutungamiri werimwe sangano revashandi vemumighodhi, reNational Mine Workers’ Union of Zimbabwe VaNdodana Sithole, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvaitwa izvi hazvisi pamutemo sezvo vashandi vazhinji vane mwedzi mitanhatu kana kupfuura vasina kutambiriswa mari dzavo dzemihoro. VaSithole vati vakatadza kutaurirana nyaya iyi inogona kuzoguma yave kumatare. Hatina kukwanisa kubata vakuru vepakambani iyi kuti tinzwe divi ravo. No media source currently available

headline: Nyika Dzakapoteredza Zimbabwe Dzotora Matanho paCoronavirus
text: Nyika dzakakomberedza Zimbabwe mudunhu dziri kutora matanho ekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCOVID-19 kana kuti Coronavirus izvo zvoita kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvisare zvomerwe pakupinda munyika idzi. Nyika dzakapoteredza Zimbabwe dzinoti Botswana, Zambia, Mozambique neSouth Africa dziri kutora matanho ekudzivirira kupinda kwe Coronavirus munyika idzi kubudikidza nekutora matanho akasimba panzvimbo dzinopinda nevanhu vachibva kune imwe nyika. Botswana yakazivisa kuti yavhara miganhu yayo nemusi weChipiri ukuwo South Africa iri mubushi rekukurudzira kuti vagari vemunyika iyi vasabude mudzimba kutanga neChina, Kurume 26, kwemasvondo matatu. Zambia, Namibia neMozambique dziri kuitawo mushandirapamwe nedzimwe nyika dziri mudungu reSADC mukuvhara zvikoro uye kurambidza kuungana kwevanhu vazhinji senzira dzekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere icho chakatanga mudhorobha reWuhan KuChina muna Zvita gore rapera. Asi matanho ari kutorwa nenyika dzakakomberedza Zimbabwe ari kuita kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviomerwe kupinda munyika idzi. Sachigaro wesangano reVendors Initiative and Economic Transformation, VaSamuel Wadzai, vaudza Studio7 kuti kuvharwa kwemabhodha kuchaita kuti vanhu vadye nhoko dzezvironda sezvo ruzhinji rwuchirarama nekutenga midziyo kuvavakidzani veZimbabwe kuti vatengese munyika. VaWadzai vanoti hurumende yakafanira kuona kuti ingabatsire sei hungwandangwanda hwevanhu vanorarama nekutenga nekutengesa sezvo kutengesa ndiko kuri kuwanisa ruzhinji cheuviri. Chimwewo chizvarwa cheZimbabwe icho chinotyaira bhazi rinofamba pakati pedhorobha reFrancistown muBotswana neHarare, VaMicheal Muzondiwa, vanoti mamiriro ezvinhu aita kuti vapererwe nebasa. Asi Muzvare Peace Gwatidzo vanoti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinofanirwa kutevedzera yambiro dziri kupihwa nemapazi ezvehutano enyika dzakapoteredza Zimbabwe nokuti ndiyo nzira chete ingapedze kupararora kweCoronavirus. Hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa yakavharawo mabhodha nemusi weMuvhuro mushure mekunge Zororo Makamba ashaika nokuda kwechirwere cheCoronavirus. Nyika iri mudambudziko guru rechirwere cheCoronavirus mudunhu reSADC iSouth Africa iyo ine vanhu mazana manomwe nevapfumbamwe vakabatwa nechirwere ichi.

headline: Vatsigiri vopemhera vatambi mari
text: VATSIGIRI venhabvu vezvikwata zvakasiyana vobatana mukubatsira vatambi vemutambo uyu kuburikidza nekuunganidza mari nechikafu zvekuti vawane raramo.   Mitambo mizhinji, kusanganisira nhabvu, pari zvino yakambomiswa nechinangwa chekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Izvi zvaita kuti vatambi vakawanda vaomerwe nehupenyu sezvo vachiwana raramo yavo kubva kumutambo wenhabvu.   Mutungamiriri wesangano reFriends of the Warriors, Edward Chimedza, anoti sevatsigiri venhabvu vari kuita musangano svondo rino pamasai-sai (virtual meeting) apo vachakurukura nemasangano akasiyana evatsigiri vachironga kuti vobatsira sei vatambi venhabvu panguva ino.   “Isu tine rudo nemutambo wenhabvu uye kutaura chokwadi chirwere cheCovid-19 chakanganisa zvakawanda. Saka isu sevatsigiri venhabvu tiri kubatsirawo nepatinogona vatambi vakasiyana panguva ino zvinhu zvakaoma kudai,” anodaro Chimedza.   Mashoko ake anotsinhirwa naChris “Romario” Musekiwa anove organising secretary wesangano reZimbabwe National Soccer Supporters Association achiti kuuya kweCovid-19 kwakanganisa zvakawanda munyika muno nepasi rose.   “Hatina kumbozvifungira kuti tingasvike patave iye zvino munyika zvinhu zvakaoma kudai zvakonzereswa neCovid-19. Asi isu tinoziva nhabvu ichitiunzira mufaro mukuru kwazvo kwatiri uye ichitibatanidza nevanhu vakawanda.  Saka nehuwandu hwedu tiri kurangana kuti tigobatsirawo vatambi vakasiyana kuburikidza nekuvatsigira chikafu.    “Nguva yatiri yakaoma saka tinofanira kuvarangarirawo vazive kuti isu vatsigiri vavo tine rudo navo,” anodaro.   Anoti ngachive chidzidzo chikuru kuzvikwata zvinokwikwidza muPremier Soccer League kuti zvinofanira kugara zvakarongeka zviine homwe yemari kuitira kuti kana zvinhu zvaoma senguva ino yoshandiswa mukubatsira vatambi.   “Zvikwata zvedu ngazvidzidze kubva pane zviri kuitika nekuda kwehutachiona hwecoronavirus kuti mune ramangwana ngavagare vakagadzirira vane homwe yekubatsira vatambi kana zvinhu zvaoma sezvatiri kusangana nazvo iye zvino,” anodaro Romario.

headline: Chatsva kuBulawayo . . . Bosso yotatsurana neDeMbare
text: Ndooka   KUNOTSVA demo kugosara mupinyi kunhandare yeBabourfields Stadium kuBulawayo nemusi weSvondo uko makara asingaonane — Highlanders neDynamos — zvichatatsurana mumutambo weCastle Premiership uyo vazhinji vanoziva seBattle of Zimbabwe kana kuti Zim Derby.   Zvikwata zviviri izvi kubva kare pazvinonosangana panotambwa nhabvu inonwisa mvura.   Makwishu aya ari kuuya kwapera masvondo mashoma zvichitevera kusangana kwakaita zvikwata izvi mumutambo weIndependence Trophy uyo wakahwinwa neBosso 1-0.   Murairidzi weDeMbare, Tonderai “Stanza” Ndiraya, anoti mutambo uyu mukuru kuchikwata chake.   “Tiri kudzokera kuBulawayo zvekare mwedzi usati wambodarika kunosangana neBosso mumutambo mukuru uyu uyo watinogara tichitarisira makore ese.   “Tinoremekedza mutambo uyu nekudaro tichaukoshesa zvikuru. Patakapedzisira kuenda kunhandare iyi, hazvina kutifambira zvakanaka. Saka tinovimba kuti svondo rino zvichatinakirawo,” anodaro Ndiraya.   DeMbare pari zvino ndiyo iri kutungamira palog muPSL kubva pamitambo 14 yatambwa.   Asi, mumutambo wayo wekupedzisira yakaita mangange 1-1 neBulawayo City kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium muguta reHarare.   Ndiraya anoti mune mimwe mitambo yavo yadarika, vange vachitora zvibodzwa zvese uye vane tarisiro yekuti izvi zvirambe zvichiitika.   “Hongu, takarasa zvibodzwa tiri pamusha svondo radarika, zvinowanikwa. Mune mimwe mitambo yedu yakatamba tiri kunze, tange tichitora zvibodzwa zvese. Saka zviri kutisunda kuti tishande nesimba takatarisana nemutambo wedu uyu wemusi weSvondo,” anodaro Ndiraya.   Murairidzi weBosso, Mandla Mpofu, anoti vari mushishi kuita gadziriro dzechikwata chavo vakatarisana nemutambo uyu.    Mandla Mpofu   “Tiri mushishi kuita gadziriro dzemutambo wedu mukuru watakatarisana nawo neDeMbare. Tinozosununguka kutaura zvakawanda nemusi weChina chete apo tinotenderwa kutaura nevatori venhau,” anodaro Mpofu.   Bosso pari zvino yakagara pechi11 palog rePSL uye yakwanisa kuwana zvibodzwa 16 kubva pamitambo 13.   Zvikwata zviviri izvi pazvakapedzisira kusangana mumutambo wePSL uyo wakatambirwa muHarare mugore ra2019, wakapera ari mangange 1-1.   Kune mimwe mitambo iriko svondo rino, FC Platinum ichatatsurana nechikwata cheMiracle Boys kana kuti Yadah Stars nemusi weChishanu kuNational Sports Stadium.   Kuchiti nemusi weSvondo zvekare, CAPS ‘Kepe-kepe’ United ichange iri pamusha apo ichasangana neChicken Inn kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium.   Chicken Inn ndiyo iri pechipiri palogo rePSL apo yakasiiwa neDembare nezvibodzwa zviviri chete kubva pamitambo 14 yayatamba.

headline: Vatyairi veMagonyeti vekuZimbabwe Votambura Vari kuRwanda Mushure meKutadza Kubhadharwa Mari Dzavo kweMwedzi Inodarika Miviri
text: Vamwe vatyairi vemagonyeti makumi mana vanobva kuZimbabwe vanoti vari kunonga svosve nemuromo vari kuRwanda nepamuganhu weTanzania neZambia mushure mekupererwa namari vari pamabasa uye kambani yakavapa basa isiri kuda kuvapa mihoro yavo. Vatyairi ava vanoti vakaenda kuRwanda mushure mekunge vawana basa rekutakura zvinhu kubva ku Mt. Hampden muHarare vachienda nazvo kuKigali, guta guru reRwanda. Vanoti vakapinzwa basa nekambani yeSimba Logistics yekuTanzania ichishanda pamwechete neimwe kambani yemuZimbabwe inonzi Ceva Logistics.uko rekuti vatakure michina kubva pakavakirwa paramende itsva yeZimbabwe. Pamotokari dzakapiwa basa idzi panonzi paive nesere dzekuTanzania asi vatyairi ava vanofunga kuti vamwe vavo vekuTanzania ava vanogona kunge vakatopiwa mari dzavo kare. Vamwe vatyairi vataura neStudio 7 vanoti zvibvumirano zvavakanga vanyorerana nekambani yeSimba Logistics chaguma kushanda musi wa 17 Gumiguru uye vazhinji vavo vakangopiwa zvikamu makumi manomwe kubva muzana zvemari yezvibvumirano zvavo, vachinzi zvikamu makumi matatu kubva muzana zvakasara vaizopiwa wasvitsa zvinhu zvavakatakura. Asi mari yavakapihwa yakatopera sezvo vave nemwedzi yakawanda vabva kumba uye vachizvitengera chikafu pamwe nemvura yekushandisa zuva nezuva. .Vamwe vachiri pamuganhu weTanzani neZambia vanoti vari kusangana nedambudziko rekutadza kuwana mvumo yekuti vapfuurire mberi nerwendo rwavo kunyange hazvo vachiti kambani yakavapa basa yakanga yakavavimbisa kuti havaizosangana nedambudziko. Vatyairi ava vanoti havasi kukwanisa kushandisa mazita avo sezvo vari kutyira kuzodzingwa mabasa pamwe nekunyimwa mari dzavo dzasara pabasa ravari kuita. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuma kambani maviri aya sezvo ange asinga kudaira nhare dzawo. Hatinawo kukwanisa kubata muzinda weZimbabwe muRwanda kuti tinzwewo kana uine matanho auro kutora ekuedza kubatsira vatyairi ava. No media source currently available No media source currently available

headline: Zvikwata 4 zvorwira mukombe
text: HAKUDANWE anonzwa nemusi weMugovera uye neSvondo apo zvikwata zvina zvasara mumutambo weDivision One Axis Solutions Super 8 zvinoti Simba Bhora FC, Herentals Under-20, Golden Eagles neTrojan Stars zvichatatsurana musemi-final.   Musi weMugovera , kuchatambwa semi-final yekutanga iyo ichaona Herentals U-20 ichibandana neSimba Bhora FC kunhandare yeMorris Depot muHarare kuchiti musi weSvondo Golden Eagles (Gondo Harishaye) ichatamba neTrojan Stars kuEllis Robins muHarare zvekare.   Murairidzi weSimba Bhora FC, Arthur Tutani, anoti chikwata chake chiri kutokunya zvakasimba sezvo vari kuda kuhwina mumutambo uyu.   Achitaura pamusoro pekukundwa kwavakaitwa neChegutu Pirates, Tutani anoti mikombe yakaita seAxis Solutions Super 8 mikuru uye vari kuukoshesa sezvo vachida kupedza mwaka uno vaine mikombe yakawanda.   “Sechikwata, tiri kufara nematambiro atiri kuita mwaka uno. Mitambo yakaita seweAxis Solutions Super 8 Cup uyu unotibatsira kuti tipe vamwe vatambi mikana sezvo rwendo ruchiri rurefu kusvika tapedza mwaka wegore rino.   “Takanangana nemutambo weAxis Solutions Super 8 Cup, tiri kuda kuuhwina. Asi, tichange tichitora mutambo sekuuya kwaunenge uchiita dzamara tasvika kufainari. Hakuna asingade kuhwina mukombe uye isu tiri kuudawo mukombe uyu,” anodaro Tutani.   Kuchiti murairidzi weGondo Harishaye, Gilbert Mushangazhike – uyo chikwata chake chakaumburudza Ngezi U19 svondo radarika kunhandare yeBaobab uko chakahwina 2-1 – anoti vari kudawo mukombe uyu zvakanyanya.    Gilbert Mushangazhike   Gondo Harishaye ichasangana neTrojan Stars iyo yakakunda Commando Bullets 2-1 svondo radarika mumutambo wakatambirwa kuTrojan, kuBindura.   Mushangazhike anoti ari kutarisira zvikuru kufambira mberi kwe[1]chikwata chake mumutambo uyu.   “Mwaka wakareba uye kune vamwe vatambi vasiri kuwana mukana wekutamba saka ndivo vatiri kupawo mukana mumutambo uyu apo tiri kuzama kubata zvinangwa zvedu zvose zvemwaka uno.   “Tave kutarira mitambo yedu iri mberi uye ticharwa semvumba kuti tihwine mutambo wedu wesemi-final kusvika kufainari.   “Kutamba mitambo yemikombe zvinopa mukana wekunyora nhoroondo. Nenyasha dzaMwari, ticharwa kuti tihwine mukombe uyu,” anodaro Mushangazhike.   Murairidzi weTrojan Stars, Clifford Sakala, anoti mutambo wechikwata chake neGolden Eagles uchange wakaoma sezvo Gondo Harishaye ichitamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura.   “Tiri kutarisira zvikuru kusangana neGolden Eagles mumutambo wedu wesemi-final uyo tinoziva kuti unenge usiri nyore. Asi chatinoziva ndechekuti ticharwa kuti tifambire mberi. Tiri kugadzirira zvakasimba mutambo wedu watakatarisana nawo,” anodaro Sakala.

headline: VaReport Phelekezela Mphoko Vanoitwa Mutevedzeri weChipiri waVaMugabe
text: Kunyange hazvo veruzhinji muHarare vachiti havana ruzivo rwakanyaya pamusoro pemumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiriri wenyika vadomwa, VaReport Phelekezela Mphoko, ongororo yataita inoratidza kuti VaMphoko igamba rehondo yerusunungujo uye vakashanda muhurumende kwenguva yakareba vachimirira Zimbabwe kunyika dzakasiyana siyana. Vaimbova kanzura muHarare, VaWarship Dumba, vanoti havana chavanoziva pamusoro paVaMphoko uye vakatanga kunzwa nezvavo painge pave kuda kuitwa kongiresi yebato reZanu PF. VaWashington Ngirazi vekuMbare vanotiwo hapana zvavanoziva kunze kwenguti vaimbomirira Zimbabwe kunze kwenyika. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vakazvimirira, VaTakura Zhangazha, vanotiwo ndezvechokwadi kuti veruzhinji havana ruzivo ruzhinji pamusoro paVaMphoko uye zvakakosha kuti vazivikanwe neveruzhinji. Asi vanoti vane chivimbo chekuti vachaita basa ravo nemazvo sezvo vadoma nemutungamiriri wenyika. VaZhangazha vanotiwo chimwe chinofanira kuziva VaMphoko ndechekuti VaMugabe havapikiswe uye vanogona kusiya basa zvakaita vaimbove mutevedzeri waVaMugabe, Amai Joice Mujuru, kana vakada kukura musoro. Vanodzidzisa zvidzidzo zvematongerwo enyika paUniversity of Zimbabwe, Amai Charity Manyeruke, vanotiwo vanhu havangazive vanhu vese vakaenda kuhondo uye chakakosha ndechekuti VaMphoko igamba rehondo. Vanotiwo VaMphoko inhengo yeZanu pF yakavimbika ndosaka vasarudzwa nemutungamiriri wenyika. VaMphoko ndemumwe weavo vaitungamira mauto eZimbamwe People’s Revolutionary Army kana kuti ZIPRA uye vakambomirira ZAPU kuMozambigue Zimbabwe isati yawana kuzvitonga. Vari ikoko vakashanda nedzimwe nhengo dzebato reAfrican National Congress yeSouth Africa dzakaita semutungamiriri wenyika iyi, VaJacob Zuma. VaTjenesani Ntungakwa avo vanoongorora mashaindiro aiita bato reZAPU vanotiwo VaMphoko munhu aive nechinzvimbo chikuru munguva yehondo. VaMphoko vakambomirira Zimbabwe kunyika dzakaita seRussia uye vange vachimirira nyika kuSouth Africa kubva muna 2011 kusvika pavakasiya basa mwedzi mishonana yapfuura. No media source currently available

headline: Makambani Akawanda Okundikana Kuvhura Gore Rino Mamwe Achivharwa?
text: Gore rino rinonzi harina kutanga zvakanaka mumakambani akawanda munyika sezvo mamwe akakundikana kuvhura kana kuti akaderedza huwandu hwevashandi kubva pakatanga gore rino ra2015. Munyori mukuru wesangano revashandi vemumabhanga reZimbabwe Banks and Allied Workers Union, VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti mabhanga gore rapera chete akarasikirwa nevashandi chiuru chimwe chete kubva muvashandi zviuru zvitanhatu zvaive zviri pamabasa. VaMutasa vanoti gore rino chete vashandi vanosvika mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu vatorasikirwa nemabasa zvichitevera kuvhara kwebhanga reAllied Bank. Sangano iri rinotiwo kana nhaurirano dzekuedza kuponesa rimwe bhanga dziri kuitwa dzikakundikana mukati memazuva gumi ari kutevera, zvinenge zvoreva kuti vamwe vashandi zana nemakumi matatu vanenge vorasikirwa nemabasa avo zvakare. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaProsper Chitambara, vanotiwo dambudziko rekurasikirwa kwevanhu nemabasa harina kubata mabhanga chete asi kuti rakabata makambani ose ari kutatarika. VaChitambara vanoti dambudziko guru ndere kushaikwa kwemari iri kutenderera munyika, uye kusajeka kwemitemo yezvemabhizimusi. Sangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions rinotiwo hurongwa hwekuvandudza mitemo yemabasa huri kuda kuitwa nehurumende huchatoita kuti vashandi vakawanda varasikirwe nebasa sezvo huchipa vashandirwi masimba ekupinza kana kuburitsa munhu basa paanodira. No media source currently available

headline: Coronavirus Yovhiringidza Kucherechedzwa Zvakanaka kweZuva RaanaAmai
text: Vanhu vakawanda pasi rose vavhiringidzwa zvikuru kucherechedza Zuva reMother’s Day sezvo vachiri vakazvivharira mudzimba nekutya kutapurirwa chirwere checoronavirus. Vakawanda vanoti vangotumira zvipo asi vamwe vachiti vangotaura nevanaamai vavo pambozhanhare uye vachazoita mabiko kana zvecoronavirus zvapera. Zuva rekutenda mabasa anoitwa naanaamai iri rinochercehdzwa musvondo rechipiri rwemwedzi waChivabvu gore roga roga. Muzvare Wendy Muperi avo vari kuIreland vati vanoda kutenda amai wavo vakavarera vari vashanu kunyangwe zvinhu zvainge zvakaoma. No media source currently available VaWhisper Ganya avo vari kuCape Town, South Africa vatendawo amai wavo vari kuMt Darwin vachiti vanoda kuvarangarira nezvose zvavakavaitira mukukura kwavo. No media source currently available Muzvare Netsai Marova vanogara kuMabvuku vati vanoda kuti Mwari aropafadze amai vavo nebasa guru rekuvachengeta. No media source currently available Izvi zvatsigirwawo naVaKumbirai Mafunda vari muHarare vati amai wavo vari kwaVumbunu, Manicaland nemamwe madzimai ose vakakosha zvikuru muhupenyu uye vakati vazvichengetedze munguva ino yecoronavirus. No media source currently available

headline: Gavhuna weRBZ VaMangudya Vanoti Kushandisa Rand Hakupedze Dambudziko reKushomeka kweMari
text: Gavhuna webhanga guru renyika, Doctor John Mangudya vanoti dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari riri munyika haripedzwe nekushandisa mari yerand yekuSouth Africa seviri kutaurwa nedzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi. VaMangudya vakataura mashoko aya paUniversity of Zimbabwe muHarare musi weChitaru apo pange pari kuitwa musangano kana kuti symposium wenyanzvi dzezvehupfumi. VaMangudya vati Zimbabwe ichaenderera mberi ichishandisa mari dzakasiyana siyana nekuti kushandisa rand chete handiko kungagadzirisa dambudziko rakomba munyika rekushomeka kwemari. Doctor Mangudya vati mamwe ematanho anofanirwa kutorwa ekugadzirisa mamiriro ehupfumi haasi kuitwa. Vatiwo kuwondomoka kwemakambani ehurumende kan kuti maparastatals ndokumwe kuri kupa kuti hupfumi hwenyika hubve hwaenda kumawere. Gavhuna weRZ atiwo nyika inofanirwawo kugadzirisa zvematongerwo enyika kukwezva vane mari dzekunze. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezveupfumi yataurawo pamusangano uyu VaNyasha Kaseke vati kuti nyika iwane mari yekunze vemakambani neveruzhinji vanofanirwa kunotengesera zvinhu kunze kwenyika. VaKaseke vati vemakambani vanofanirwa kutarisa kuti vogadzira sei zvinhu zvine mutengo wakaderera kuti vakwanise kuwana vatengi kunze kwenyika. Pamusangano uyu, nyanzvi dzezveupfumi dzakurudzirawo kuti kushandiswa kwemacards ekumabhanga pamwe nEcocash zviitwe kunzvimbo dzese munyika kusanganisira kumaruwa. VaMangudya vati kunyangwe zvazvo vanhu vanenge vachiti vane mari kumabhanga nyika haina mari iyi uri musvo izvo zviri kukonzera kuti kushaikwa kwemari kurambe kuchienderera mberi. Vakurudzira veruzhinji kuti vafarire kutenga nemacards ekubank nedzimwe nzira dzakadayi seecocash zvisingadi mari chaiyo vakati izvi zvinogona kurerutsa myaya yekushomeka kwemari. Vatiwo kupedza dambudziko rehuori pamwe nekugadzirisa dambudziko rekubudiswa kwemari yekunze zvisiri pamutemo zvinogona kubatsira zvakanyanya dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari. Vamwe vari pamusangano uyu vanosanganisa CZI, ZNCC, veZimbabwe Stock Exchange. No media source currently available

headline: VaMangudya Vokurudzirwa Kuzadzikisa Zvavanotaura paKufambisa Mari
text: Gavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, VaJohn Mangudy,a neChishanu vakaparura hurongwa hwavo hwepagore hwekushandiswa kwemari. Kunyange nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzakawanda dziri kutambira hurongwa uyu, vakawanda vanoti panoda garwa rakajeka kuitira kuti hupfumi hugadzirike. Chinangwa chaVaMangudya ndechekusimbaradza dhora remunyika range roramba richishaya simba. Kunyange hazvo vakawanda vachiti Zimbabwe ikazvipira inokwanisa kubuda mumadhaka mairi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, vamwe vanoti nyika inenge huku yemurombo inokandirira mazai mumuti. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi inodzidzisa paDurban University of Technology, Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano, vanoti pane zvakanaka nezvekaipa pane zvakaparurwa nmaVaMangudya. VaMugano vati hurongwa hwavo hwekusimbaradza musika wekutengeswa kwemari wakanaka sezvo uchiunza kugadzikana munyika. Asi vati havatenderane nehurongwa hwekuomesera makambani enharembozha anoitawo mamwe mabasa anoitwa nemabhanga akaita seEconent neNet One kuti asashande semabhanga achiwanisa vanhu mari. Vati kushomeka kwemari munyika uye kushaya simba kwedhora remunyika kunopa kuti zviomere veruzhinji. Vatiwo vari kumamisha vapinda panguva yakaoma Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhanga, VaGilbert Muponda, vanoti vanotambira hurongwa hwekuomesera makambani enharembozha vachiti ange okurudzira kutengeswa kwemari pamukoto zvange zvokanganisa hupfumi hwenyika. Asi VaMuponda vatiwo zvakakosha kusimbaradza nyaya yekurima senzira yekusimbaradza hupfumi vachiti nyika iri kupedza mari yekunze yakawanda ichitenga zvinhu zvinogona kurimwa kana kugadzirwa munyika. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvepfumi, VaVictor Bhoroma, vanoti hurongwa hwakaparurwa naVaMangudya hwakanaka vachiti zvikashanda zvichapa kuti mitengo yezvinhu iderere asi ndokunge hurumende yasimbaradza nyaya yekugadzira zvinhu zvekutengesa kunze kwenyika. VaBhoroma vatiwo pane zvimwe zvinoda kuitwa kuti vanhu vave nechivimbo nehurongwa hweRBZ uhu vachiti chitsvambe chiri kbhanga iri kuti riratidze kuti rinoshandisa mari yekunze zvisina huori. Zimbabwe yakatarisana nematambudziko makukutu munyaya dzezvehupfumi kusanganisira kushaikwa kwemari, magetsi, mvura nezvimwe. Matambudziko aya awedzerwawo nenyaya yechirwere cheCovid-19 icho charura pasi rose. No media source currently available

headline: Murume Akambotiza kuWilkins Anowanikwa Asina Coronavirus
text: Chizvarwa chekuThailand chekumbokatiza muchipatara cheWilkins muHarare neSvondo kwachaifanirwa kuongororwa kana chiine coronavirus chinonzi chazoongororwa neChipiri chawanikwa chisina hutachiwana uhwu. Mukuru anoona nezvehutano mukanzuru yeguta reHarare, Doctor Prosper Chonzi, zvabuda muongororo yaitwa iyi zvinoratidza kuti murume uyu haana chirwere ichi, izvo zvaita kuti abva aregwa achienda kumba kwake. Murume uyu anonzi adzoka ega kuchipatara ichi mushure mekutsvagwa nemapurisa achishaikwa. Murume uyu anonzi akabva kuThailand mazuva makumi maviri adarika akaitwa ongororo ye coronavirus pakupinda kwaakaita munyika, izvo zvakaratidza kuti muviri wake waidziya zvakanyanya. Izvi zvinonzi zvakazoita kuti aendeswe kuWilkins Hospital, uko akazongotsakatika. Hapana ati awanikwa aine chirwere ichi muZimbabwe kunyange hazvo paine vanhu vanoVanhu vana muSouth Africa vanonzi vakawanikwa vaine hutachiwana hwecoronavirus neMuvhuro, izvo zvasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vave nechirwere ichi pavanomwe munyika iyi. Vakambove gurukota rezvehutano uye vari ivo munyori anoona nezvehutano muMDC inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, Doctor Henry Madzorera, vanoti panofanirwa kutorwa matanho akasimba ekuchengetedza vanenge vafungidzirwa kuti vangave nehutachiwana hwechirwere ichi, vachiti zvakaitika paWilkins Hospital hazvifanirwe kodzokororwa nekuti zvinoisa ruzhinji rwevanhu munjodzi. Doctor Madzorera vanoti bazi rezvehutano rinofanirwawo kushambadza zvakasimba nezvechirwere ichi, uyewo kuisa nhare mumatunhu ose emunyika ekuti vanhu vanokwanisa kufona chero nguva vachitaura pamusoro pechirwere ichi. Vari kukurudzirawo kuti pave navanautsanana vanofamba vachiongorora vanhu kuti vane hutachiwana here kana kuti kwete, pane kumirira kuti munhu anofungidzira kuti ane chirwere ichi aende iye kuchipatara. No media source currently available

headline: Danho reHurumende reKumira Kubaya Nhomba yeCovid-19 Yetatau Parizvino Rotambirwa neImwe Nyanzvi
text: Vaimbova mukuru wechipatara cheChitungwiza Dr Enoch Mayida vanoti vanowirira nedanho rehurumende rekuti pari zvino imbosimbaradza hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu nhomba dzeCovid-19 mbiri pasati pabayiwa nhomba nhatu sezvave kuitwa kune dzimwe nyika dzakaita seAmerica. Nyika dzakabudirira dziri kubaya nhomba yetatu kune vakwegura nevanoshanda muzvipata sezvo zviri kunzi zvinobatsira masoja emuviri. Dr Mayida vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanotenderabna nezvakataurwa panhepfenyuro ino nemukuru anoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19 Dr Agnes Mahomva kuti vakoshese kubaya vanhu nhomba kaviri parizvino. No media source currently available Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana maviri negumi nevana zvine mazana mana nemakumi manomwe nemanomwe kana kuti 3 214, 477 vabayiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 kekutanga. Vabayiwa nhomba kaviri sezviri kukurudzirwea vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mana nemakumi manomwe nemaviri zvine mazana masere nemakumi mashanu nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 2, 472, 859. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kuti inyatsoshande sezvinotarisirwa. Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu vaviri vakafa neMugovera nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvasiya vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera vave zviuru zvina nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu nevanomwe kana kuti 4, 657. Vanhu makumi mana nevasere vakabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vabatwa nacho vave zviuru zana nemakumi matatu nemaviri zvine mazana matatu nemakumi matatu nematatu kana kuti 132,333.

headline: ZEC Inoti Zvinhu Zvayo Zvose Zvakachengetedzwa Zvine Hudzamu
text: Mamwe makomishina eZimbabwe Electoral Comission, ZEC, anoti zvose zvine chekuita nekunyoreswa kwevanhu kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota zvakachengetedzwa zvakasimba. Izvi zvabuda pamusangano wekuzeya mashandiro evatapi venhau panguva yesarudzo waitwa muBulawayo. Mumwe wemakomishina maviri eZEC ange aripowo pamusangano uyu, Amai Faith Sebata, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanhu havafanirwe kutyira kuti pane zvingaitwe zvingakonzera kusafamba zvakanaka kana kubiridzirwa kwesarudzo. Amai Sebata vatiwo gwaro rine mazita evanhu vakanyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota richacheneswa zvekuti hazvingaite kuti pave nemunhu mumwe chete anogona kunyorwa kakawanda kana kuti anogona kuvhota kanopfuura kamwe chete panguva imwe chete. Pane kushushikana kune vamwe veruzhinji pamusoro pekunonzi kusabuda pachena kweZEC pamusoro pekuti mazita evanhu vakanyoresa kuvhota ari kuchengetwa sei. Vamwe vanoshushikanawo nenyaya yekuti kune vanhu vakawanda vane zvitupa zvine mazuva ekuzvarwa nenumber dzechitupa dzakafanana asi ivo vari vanhu vakasiyana, izvo zvinonzi nevamwe zvinogona kushandiswa seimwe nzira yekubiridzira nayo sarudzo. Parunyerekupe rwekuit mapepa anoshandiswa pakuvhota kana kuti ballot papers akatodhindwa kare, VaDaniel Chigaru, vanovezve mumwe komishina weZEC vati hazvigone kuti mapepa aya adhindwe kana vanhu vanokwikwidza musarudzo vasati vataurwa nenomination court sezvinodiwa nemutemo. Vati ZEC ichataura zvizere panguva yakafanira pamusoro pezvekudhindwa kwemapepa ekuvhotera vakatiwo vatapi venhau pamwe nevemapato ezvematongerwo enyika anobvumidzwa kuwona panenge podhindwa mapepa aya. Asi mutauriri webato reNational People’s Party, VaJeffryson Chitando, vati ZEC haifanirwe kungotaura chete asi vanofanirwa kuonekwa vachiita zvinhu zvinoita kuti vave nechivimbo chekuti vanoita basa rakanaka. Pamusangano uyu vatapi venhau vachema-chemawo nenyaya yekuti vanonzi vanyorese kuZEC kuti vakwanise kunyora kana kutepfenyura nhau dzine chekuita nesarudzo. Lee Mangena anoshanda neSkyz Metro FM ndemumwe wevatapi venhau ati haawone pane chikonzero chekuti ZEC iite izvi. Zvichakadaro VaDavid Coltart avo vanove gweta uye vari nhengo yebato reMDC inotungamirwa naVaWelshman Ncube vaudza musangano mumwe chete kuti havawone sarudzo dzichikwanisa kuve dzakachena kana nhepfenyuro yehurumende yeZimbabwe Broadcastibg Corporation ichiramba yakarerekera kudivi rebato reZanu PF. VaColtart vati kuita izvi kunotyora bumbiro remitemo yenyika vakatiwo kunyange hazvo izvi zvichigona kunetsa zvakakosha kuti vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vakwire kumatare kuti nyaya iyi igadziriswe. Musangano wemazuva maviri unopera neChina wakarongwa nesangano reZimbabwe Union of Journalists. No media source currently available

headline: Mitumbi yeVakafa muTsaona yeCyclone Idai Yofukurwa Kubva muMadhaka
text: Mumiriri weManicaland muparamende pasi pehurongwa hwe Proportional Represenation, Amai Lynette Karenyi, veMDC, vanoti basa rekutsvaga mitumbi yevanhu vangadai vakafuchirwa nemadhaka mutsaona yeCyclone Idai pamwe nevamwe vangadai vachiri vapenyu riri kuenderera mberi muChimanimani neChipinge. Amai Karenyi vanoti dzimwe mhuri dziri kuita zvekufukura mitumbi yehama dzadzo dzakafushirwa mumadhaka nematombo pakawondomoka gomo, pamwe nepasi pedzimba dzakaparadzwa vanhu vareremo, mimwe mitumbi ichiwanikwa munzizi. Asi vanoti dambudziko guru richiripo nderekuti vanhu vawane rubatsiro, zvikuru rwechikafu, sezvo vanhu vakawanda vari kunzvimbo dziri kure dzakaita sekwaMutsvangwa, vachinzi havasati vakwanisa kuwana rubatsiro rwezvekudya. Vanotiwo mishonga, zvikuru yemaARV, yakwanisa kusvitswa pakirinika yeMutsvangwa, uyewo madzimai matatu pamadzimai gumi nevatatu vakazvitakura vari pakirinika iyi vanonzi vakwanisa kusunuguka zvisina dambudziko. No media source currently available

headline: Mamiriro enhabvu yeZim
text: Kubva nyika ino yawana kuzvitonga zvizere mugore ra1980, vatambi vazhinji venhabvu vakawana mukana wekunotambira kunyika dziri kuEurope nekumwe kwakasiyana kana zvichienzaniswa neapo Zimbabwe yaive isati yawana rusununguko.   Pari zvino vatambi vanodarika 23 vari kutambira nhabvu yavo kuzvikwata zvakasiyana zvekuEurope kunyika dzinoti England, France, Spain, Slovakia, Germany, Czech Republic, Croatia, Norway neTurkey. Asi Zimbabwe isati yawana kuzvitonga kuzere, Freddy Mukwesha — uyo aitambira Dynamos — ndiye akaita wekutanga kuenda kuEurope apo akanotambira chikwata cheSporting Braga chekuPortugal. Nerimwe divi, Zimbabwe ichiwana kuzvitonga zvizere, Bruce “Jungleman” Grobbelaar ndiye akaita wekutanga kutambira kuEurope apo aitambira chikwata cheCrewe Alexandra mumwaka wa1979-1980 nechikwereti kubva kuVancouver Whitecaps yekuCanada.   Grobbelaar akazoita mukurumbira gore raitevera apo akatengwa neLiverpool akatambira chikwata ichi kusvika muna1994.     Akahwina mikombe yakawanda inosanganisira UEFA Champions League, FA Cup (3), League Cup (3), FA Charity Shield (4) neFootball League Super league (1).    Moses “Razorman” Chunga akazoita wechipiri kubva muZimbabwe kuenda kuEurope mugore ra1987 apo akatengwa nechikwata chekuBelgium cheEendracht Aalast achibva kuDynamos FC.    Chunga pavatambi vese kubva muZimbabwe ndiye ane nhorowondo yekuita mutambi wekutanga akatambira nhabvu muPremier Soccer League achibva ananga kuEurope asina kumbobvira aenda kune zvimwe zvikwata.    Bambo, sezita rake remadunhurirwa, akambopotsa atengwa neNottingham Forest yekuEngland asi mukana uyu wakazoramba kubuda zvichinzi akatadza kuterera apo aienda kunozama raki rake. Akabva ndokuenda  Eendracht Aalast uko akanogadzira zita rake zvekuti nanhasi achiri kupihwa ruremekedzo rukuru ikoko.   Vatambi vemuZimbabwe vari kutambira kuEurope parizvino vanosanganisira Marvelous Nakamba uyo ari kuAston Villa kuEngland. Nakamba akwanisa kutambira zvikwata zvinoti Vitesse yekuNetherlands, Club Brugge nekuBelgium uye neNancy yekuFrance.     KuEngland ndiko kune vamwe vatambi vanosanganisira Tendayi Darikwa uyo anotambira Nottingham Forest. Darikwa akazvarirwa kunyika iyi akakurira ikoko.   Koti kaputeni wemaWarriors, Knowledge Musona iye zvino ari kutambira chikwata cheEupene chekuBelgium nechikwereti kubva kuAnderlecht. Musona akwanisa kutambira zvikwata zvizhinji zvemuEurope izvo zvakambomuona achitambira kuGermany kuzvikwata zve1899 Hoffenheim neAugsburg achizoenda kuBelgium uko akatambira KV Oostende, Anderlecht, Lokeren neEupene yaari kutambira.   KuFrance kune vatambi vaviri Marshall Munetsi uyo ari kuReims muFrench Ligue naTino Kadewere anotambira Le Havre uko ari kuzunza mambure zvisina mukare akamboona.   Mwaka unotevera Kadewere achange achitambira Olympique Lyon iyo yakabhadhara mari zhinji kutenga mutambi uyu ndokumudzosera kuLe Havre nechikwereti kusvika mwaka wegore rino wapera.   KuTurkey kuna Teenage Hadebe uyo ari mumwaka wake wekutanga achitambira Yeni Malatyaspor uko akaenda achibva Kaizer Chiefs yekuSouth Africa.     Kozoti kuCzech Republic, Costa Nhamoinesu ari mumwaka wake wechinomwe kuchikwata cheSpart Praha uko akaenda achibva Zaglebie Lubin yekuPoland.    Zvakadai, vamwe vatambi vemuno vakatambira kuEurope kare ndiWillard Mashinkila Khumalo, Madinda Ndlovu naTito Paketh.    Vatatu ava vaitambira Highlanders vese vakaenda kuGermany mugore ra1989 kuchikwata cheEmsdetten 05 ndokuita vekutanga kubva muno kunotambira nhabvu yavo kunyika iyi.   Mugore ra1991, Peter Ndlovu akabva aita wechitatu apo akatengwa neCoventry City yekuEngland achibva kuHighlanders achiri nemakore 18 ekuberekwa.    Nsukuzonke, sezita raNdlovu remadunhurirwa, akazotambira zvikwata zvakawanda zvekuEngland zvinosanganisira Birmingham City, Huddersfield Town neSheffield United uye aizivikanwa achizunza mambure.    Gore rimwechetewo iri, Agent ‘Ajira’ Sawu akabva kuZimbabwe Saints akaenda kuCypus kunotambira APOP Kinyras Peyias kunyangwe hake asina kunyanyogara.     Ajira akazonyanyoita mukurumbira paakaenda kuSwitzerland uko akanotambira zvikwata zvinoti SC Kriens, FC Lucerne, Young Boys, FC Basel neFC Wil achizobva achienda kuChina.   Gore raitevera 1992, aimbove mutambi weZimbabwe Saints, Henry Bull Mckop akateverawo kuGermany achienda kuchikwata cheBonner SC.   Achibva kuGermany, akananga kuEngland achinotambira Bristol City akazoenda kuShelbourne kuIreland uye akatambira kuAustria zvekare.    Aimbove murairidzi wemaWarriors neFC Platinum, Norman Mapeza mugore ra1993 ndipo paakatanga kuenda kuEurope nekuenda kuPoland uko akanotambira chikwata cheSokol Pniew.     Muchina wemajuzi akazonyanya kuita mukurumbira kutanga gore raitevera apo akatengwa nechikwata cheGalatasaray chekuTurkey ndokuita mutambi wemuno wekutanga kutambira kunyika iyi.     Mapeza akazotambira zvikwata zvakawanda zvekunyika iyi kusvika gore ra2003 apo paakazodzoka kumusha achisvika achitambira CAPS United.

headline: VanaChiremba Vanoti Vave Kungorapa Vari Kurwarisa neKushaya Zvikwanisiro
text: Vanachiremba vakuru avo vakaratidzira nemusi weChitatu kuchipatara cheParirenyatwa mabasa vanoti vari kurapa vanhu varikurwarisisa chete sezvo vachiti hurumende iri kutadza kuvapa zvikwanisiro zvekuti vaite basa ravo nemazvo. Zvichakadai, kuramwa mabasa uku kunonzi kwapararirawo kune zvimwe zvipatara zvehurumende muHarare. Vanachiremba vakuru vari kuramwa mabasa vanoti hapana chine musoro chakabuda mumusangano wavakaita negurukota rezvehutano VaObediah Moyo. Mumwe wavanachiremba vakuru vepachipatara cheParirenyatwa, Doctor David Chimuka, vakaudza Studio 7 kuti parizvino vari kungorapa varwere vari kurwarisisa muzvipatara zvehurumende sezvo hurumende iri kutadza kuvapa michina yekushandisa pamwe nemishonga yekurapisa varwere. Mumwe chiremba wepaParirenyatwa, Doctor Shingai Chiurunge, vati vave kungopa varwere mapepa ekuti vakwanise kunotenga mishonga yekuti varapwe kana kuti ma prescription sezvo muzvipatara zvehurumende musina mishonga iyi. Vamwe vanachiremba vekune zvimwe zvipatara zvehurumende zvakaita seHarare General Hospital neChitungwiza General Hospital vakaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti havachakwanisiwo kuita basa ravo sezvo vakatarisana nematambudziko akafanana neanachiremba vekuParirenytwa. Vamwe vanachiremba vepa Harare General Hospital vakati vave kungorapawo varwere vari kurwarisisa sezviri kungoitwa paParirenyatwa vachiti bandiko reIntensive Care Unit, kana kuti ICU, iro ranga rave nemasvondo akati kuti risingashande, ratovhurwa neChina kuitira kuti anachiremba vakuru vakwanise kurapa varwere varikurwarisisa chete. Anachiremba ava vanoti kunyange hazvo vavhura bandiko reICU iri, vari kusangana zvakare nematambudziko ekushayikwa kwemimwe michina pamwe nemishonga yekurapisa varwere. Asi gurukota rezvehutano, VaObediah Moyo, vakaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti bazi ravo riri kuyedza pose parinogona napo kuti ritsvage mari yekutenga mishonga yekupa varwere pamwe nekugadzirisa mimwe michina inonzi yakafa kuti anachiremba vakwanise kuishandisa. VaMoyo vakatiwo dambudziko ravainaro sehurumende nderekushaya mari yekunze yekutenga zvimwe zviri kudiwa nanachiremba ava kunyange hazvo vati vari mubishi rekuedza kuti vataure nagavhuna webhanga guru renyika VaJohn Mangudya kuti bazi rezvehutano rikwanise kupihwa mari yekunze kuti vatenge zviri kudiwa izvi. No media source currently available

headline: VaChombo Vomirira Kunzwa Mutongo paChikumbiro Chekuti Vabvisiswe Chibatiso
text: Mutongi wedare repamusoro remuHarare nhasi aisa gweta rehurumende parumananzombe nenyaya yekuti vaimbova gurukota rezvemari VaIgnatius Chombo vakanga vamiswa pamberi pedare zviri pamutemo here kana kuti kwete. Izvi zvinotevera kupambwa kwavanonzi vakaitwa nemasoja paakatora masimba ehurumende yevaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe mwedzi wapera. Muchuchisi wenyaya iri kupomerwa VaChombo, VaEdmore Nyazamba, nhasi vatambiswa nhova nemutongi wedare repamusoro Amai Edith Mushore avo vanga vachida kunzwisisa maunzirwo akaitwa VaChombo kudare redzimhosva. Izvi zvinotevera nyaya yakwidzwa mudare negweta raVaChombo VaLovemore Madhuku, ekuti musungwa akawunzwa kudare maawa makumi mana nemasere akatarwa mubumbiro remitemo adarika zvichitevera kupambwa kwaakaitwa nemasoja musi wa15 Mbudzi. VaNyazamba vadzambadzamba vachipindura mubvunzo uyu. Vambotanga nekuti VaChombo vakange vapambwa nevanhu vasingazivikanwe kuti ndivanani, vakazoti vakanga vakahwanda vakazopedzisira voti vakanga vasingazivikanwe kwavaive pavaitsvagwa nemapurisa kubva musi wavanoti vakapambwa nemasoja. VaMadhuku vatsinhira kuti vasvitsa chikumbiro chekuti VaChombo vaburitswe muhusungwa pasina kana kumbotaurwa nyaya yemari yechibatiso sezvo vachiti vakamiswa pamberi pedare ramejasitirti zvisiri pamutemo svondo rapera apo pavakanyimwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso. VaMadhuku vatiwo mutongi wedare ramejasitiriti akanyima VaChombo mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso akatura mutongo usingakodzere paakavanyima mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso. Mutongi wedare ati achatura mutongo wake nhasi masikati munguva yaasina kutara sezvo ari kutarisirwa kunzwa chimwe chikumbiro kubva kuna VaKudzanayi Chipanga avo vaimbove mukuru weboka revechidiki muZanu PF vasati vadzingwa mubato iri. VaChombo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuita huori mukutenga kwavanonzi vakaita imba yavo yeku Glen Lorne muno muHarare uye vanonzi vakashandisa masimba avo zvisirizvo kutora mari kubhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe. Nekune rumwe rutivi, VaChipanga vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuzvidza mauto zvichitevera mashoko avakaburitsa vachishora mukuru wemauto VaConstantino Chiwenga, avo vakange vazivisa kuti masoja aizopindira kana makakatanwa aiva mubato reZanu PF akasvika pakawomarara. Masoja akazopindirawo sekutaura kwaakaita zvakazoita kuti vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vasiye chigaro. No media source currently available

headline: National Aids Council Yobatsira Vagari vemuBulawayo Pachena
text: Vamwe vanhu vanogara kunze kweguta reBulawayo nemusi weChina vakaongororwa ropa, chirwere cheshuga, maziso nezvimwe pachena pasi pechirongwa cheNational Aids Council. Chirongwa ichi chakaitwa kunzvimbo yeRobert Sinyoka Primary School kunze kweguta reBulawayo pasi pechirongwa cheNational AIDS Council chekukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vaongororwe ropa ravo. Mukuru weLuveve District Aids Awareness Committee Amai Priscilla Mac-Isaac vakaudza Studio 7 kuti chirongwa ichi chaitwa neNAC ichishanda nemamwe masangano akasiyana-siyana, uye chakanangana nevanhu vanoonekwa vari panjodzi yekutapurirwa hutachiwana hweHIV. Vamwe vevanhu vakauya kuchirongwa ichi vakakwanisa kuongororwa ropa ravo pamwe nezvimwe vakati vakafara nechirongwa ichi sezvo chakaunzwa kwavari. Mumwe wevanhu vakabatsirwa ndemumwe wevechidiki anonzi Thomas Nyoni uyo ati anoziva kuti zvakakosha kuti munhu azive kuti ropa rake rine hutachiwana hweHIV here kana kuti kwete. Asi ati vanhu vakawanda vemunharaunda yenzvimbo yeRobert Sinyoka vanotadza kuita izvi nekuti vanoshaya mari yekuenda kuzvipatara zviri pedyo. Izvi zvakatsigirwawo nemumwe musikana uyo angoda kudeedzwa nezita rekuti Patience. Muzvare Margaret Mucheki avo vati vakabatwa nechirwere chemaziso chinonzi glaucoma vati vafarawo kuti vakwanisa kutariswa maziso avo pachena. Amai Mac-Isaac vati veNAC vave kugara vachiita zvirongwa zvekuenda muvanhu senzira yekukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vazive pavamire mairirano nehutachiwana hweHIV/ Aids. Pachirongwa ichi painge paine mamwe masanganowo akasiyana-siyana anosanganisira veZimbabwe National Family Planning Council avo vange vachidzidziswawo nezvekuronga mhuri kuchishandiswa nzira dzekudzivirira kubata pamuviri dzakasiyana-siyana. Mamwe masangano akadai seJustice for Children Trust neChildline vange varipowo vachidzisa vanhu pamusoro pekodzero dzevana uye nezvekudzivirira kushungurudzwa kwevana. No media source currently available

headline: VaChamisa Votambirwa Zvine Mutsindo kuGweru
text: Zviuru nezviru zvevanhu zvaungana munhandare yeMkoba muGweru nhasi pamusangano webato idzva richangoumbwa reCitiozens Coalition for Change kana kuti Tripple C rinotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa. VaChamisa vatambirwa nenziyo uye detembo. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu VaChamisa vashora zvikuru nyaya yemhirizhonga munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika yakapa kuti vanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri veZanu-PF vauraye mumwe wevatsigiri wavo VaMboneni Ncube kuKwekwe svondo rapera. VaChamisa vavimbisawo kuti vachadzora dhora remuAmerica vakamirira kugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi. Izvi zvatsinhirwa nemumwe akafanobata chigaro chemutevedzeri webato iri VaTendai Biti avo vakambovawo gurukota rezvehupfumi. Panyaya yekutungamira VaChamisa vati vashakabvu vakawanda vaive vatungamiri vanosanganisira VaMorgan Tsvangirai veMDC, VaDumiso Dabengwa veZapu uye VaRobert Mugabe vakafa vavatambira kuti vave mutungamiri wenyika. Pamusangano vamwe vanhu vekuGweru varatidza kusafara nezviri kuitwa nezvimwe zvizvarwa zvekuChina munyika zvavanoti kuvhiringidza hupfumi hwenyika nekutyora kodzero dzevashandi. Asi muzinda weChina muZimbabwe unoti vemabhizimisi vakawanda vari kungozorwa mafuta enguve yavasina kudya vachiti vari kusimudzira nyika. Vamwe vataura pamusangano uyu mutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru musangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions VaKudakwashe Munengiwa avo vati vahsnadi vanoda kuti dhora remunyika ridzoswe. Mutungamiri wesangano revadzidzi reZimbabwe National Students Unions atiwo pamusangano uyu zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muzvikoro nenyaya yekuramwa basa kwevarairidzi. Asi vachitaura neStudio 7 panyaya yemhirizhonga, mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashaoko mubato reZanu-PF VaTafadzwa Mugwadi vakati bato ravo harisi zvemangoromera. Sarudzo dzemaby-elections kutsiva nhengo dzepamende dzakadzingwa neMDC-T dzichinzi dzaitsigira VaChamisa uye vamwe vakadzingwa kuZanu-PF nevakafa. No media source currently available

headline: VaTsvangirai Voita Misangano kuMashonaland East
text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMovement for Democratic Change VaMorgan Tsvangirai kutanga nemusi weChishanu vachange vari mudunhu reMashonaland East kwemazuva matatu vachiita misangano nevatsigiri vavo. Bato reMDC-T rinoti VaTsvangirai vari kuitawo misangano iyi kugadzirira sarudzo dzemuna 2018. VaTsvangirai vachange vari paKotwa Growth Point neChishanu vozoita mumwe musangano wechipiri paMutoko Growth Point. Nemusi weMugovera, VaTsvangirai vachange vari kuMarondera kuRudhaka Stadium vasati vasimuka vakananga kuZaire Business Centre kuHwedza. VaTsvangirai mumwedzi yapera vange vachishanyirawo mamwe matunhu akaita seMatabeleland, Mashonaland Central neMasvingo. Mutauriri waVaTsvangirai VaLuke Tamborinyoka vanoti vanhu vakawanda vari kufarira VaTsvangirai vachiti vachavavhotera muna 2018. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reVaimbove Varwiri veHondo yeRusununguko Ropatsanuka?
text: Chimwe chikamu cheZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association mudunhu reHarare, chashora vamwe vaive varwiri verusununguko vari kuti hutungamiriri wesangano iri hubviswe. Chikwata ichi chatiwo chinotsigira hurongwa hwehurumende hwekuripa varimi vachena vakatorerwa minda yavo sezvo hurongwa uhwu huri kuitwa pachitevedzwa bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Sachigaro wesangano iri muHarare, VaSamuel Bhila, vati vanotsigira hutungamiriri hwaVaChris Mutsvangwa musangano reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association, uye havabvumirane nechikwata chaVaEthan Matibela icho chakati VaMutsvangwa nevamwe vavo vabviswe. VaBhila vati VaMatibela nechikwata chavo havasi nhengo dzeZNLWA uye havafaniri kunge vachitaura pamusoro pesangano iri. VaMatibela nechikwata chavo avo vanoti ndevamwe vaivepo pakaumbwa sangano rinomirira vaive varwiri vehondo yerusununguko, vakaudza vatori venhau nemusi weChitau kuti sangano iri rakaumbwa kuti rigadzirise matambaudziko avo kuti vagare zvakanaka asi vakati izvi hazvisi kuitika nekuti hutungamiriri huripo hauna hany’a navo. Pamashoko aVaBhila, VaMatibela vaudza Studio 7 kuti vaive varwiri vehondo yerusunguko vave kurwisaniswa nevamwe vanhu pachinhambo chekuti vashande pamwe kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. VaBhila vatiwo havasi kufara neimwe nhengo yesangano ravo yechikadzi iyo yakabuda pamadandemutande svondo rino ichinyomba mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, ichiti vatadza kutonga nyika. VaBhila vati vanoziva mudzimai uyu asi varamba kumudoma nezita vachiti havabvumirani nezvaanotaura. Vatiwo vanotsigira chirongwa chehurumende chekuripa varimi vachena vakorerwa minda yavo sezvo chiri kuitwa pachitevedzwa bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Asi chikwata chaVaMatibela hachisi kufara nechirongwa chekuripa varungu ichi cheGlobal Compensation Deed. Pane chimwewo chikwata chinomirira vamwe vakarwa muhondo yerusununguko che War Veterans Pressure Group, icho chakatokwidza nyaya iyi kudare repamusoro chichida kuti chirongwa ichi chimiswe sezvo chichiti chinosarura kubhadhara vachena chichisiya vatema vemuno. Patavabvunza pfungwa dzavo pamusoro pemutauro wasimudzwa nenyaya iyi munyika, mutungamiriri wesangano rinomirira varimivachena munyika reCommercial Farmers Union, VaAndrew Pascoe, vati vanofara kuti hurumende yakabvuma kuvabhadhara uye vari kuedza napose pavanogona kuona kuti mari yacho yawanikwa. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuna VaMutsvangwa, kanaeo munyori mukuru wesangano ravo, VaVictor Matemadanda, kuti vanoti kudii nekudhonzerana masimba kwava kuitika musangano ravo. No media source currently available

headline: Vanamazvikokota Votarisa Pachena Vane Dambudziko reMwoyo kuChinhoyi
text: Vamwe vanhu vari kurwara nezvirwere zvemoyo vari kufarira chirongwa chekuvhenekwa pasina muripo navana mazvikokota vezvirwere zvemoyo avo vari kubatsira varwere ava pachipatara chikuru chemuChinhoyi. Vanhu vakawanda vari kufara nechirongwa ichi, icho china chiremba vatatu vanobva ku Italy. Vana chiremba ava vari kutarisa zvikonzero zviri kuita kuti vanhu varware nemoyo vachivaendesa kunana chiremba vepamusoro soro kuti vanorapwa mushure mekuvhenekwa dzambudziko rinenge riripo. Mumwe wevatariswa nana chiremba ava, ndiVaPeter Phiri avo vabva kuMasvingo. VaPhiri\nvanoti vanzi moyo wavo unotoda kuvhiyiwa kunze kwenyika sezvo pasina vanachiremba vanogona kuvhiya nekugadzirisa mavharuvhu ari pamoyo pavo ayo anonzi akakanganisika. VaPhiri vanoti vanzi nyika iri pedyo inokwanisa kuvhiya moyo pasina dambudziko iSouth Africa kana kuenda kuIndia kana kuItaly. VaPhiri vanoti iye zvino zvave nani nekuti vave kuziva zviri kudikanwa. Mumwe avhenekwa akawanikwa moyo wake uzere mvura ndiVaCainos Beremauro avo vanzi vaende kuchipatara chikuru chemuHarare cheParirenyatwa kuti vanobviswa mvura yakawandisa mumoyo. VaBeremauro vanoti chirongwa chekutarisa moyo chiri kuyamura sezvo kuvhenekwa kwavayamura kuti vazive dambudziko ravanaro. Vanhu vari kurapwa vari kuita mutsetse wakakura paimba yekuvhekwa havasi kufara nevashandi vepachipatara ichi avo vari kupinza hama dzavo mberi idzo dzinenge dzanonoka kubva kumba. Mumwe murwere anonetsekana nemoyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita anoti huori haupere munyika sezvo hwatekeshera nemuzvipatara. Chirongwa chekuvheneka varwere vemoyo chatanga neMuvhuro uye chichapera neChishanu svondo rino. Mukuru wepachipara chikuru chemuChinhoyi, Supt Collet Mawire, vanoti vari kutarisira kuvhenekwa vanhu vanosvika makumi maviri pazuva vachibatsirwa nana chiremba vatatu. No media source currently available

headline: Vasina kubaiwa hamupindi: PSL
text: PREMIER SOCCER LEAGUE (PSL) inoti vatsigiri venhabvu vachatanga kutenderwa kupinda munhandare svondo rino mumitambo yeChibuku Super Cup quarter-final uye matiki ekupindisa achatengeserwa kumunhu anenge aburitsa gwaro kana kuti kadhi rinoratidza kuti akabaiwa majekiseni ose ekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19.   Izvi zvinotevera kupihwa mvumo kwakaitwa vatsigiri 2 000 kuti vaone mutambo uyu.   Mutauriri wePSL – Kudzai Bare – anoti kutanga svondo rino, vatsigiri vachatenderwa kupinda munhandare kuti vaone mitambo yenhabvu, asi vanofanirwa kunge vakadzivirirwa zvizere kuCovid-19.
