Anoti matikiti ekupindisa munhandare achatengeswa kune vakabaiwa nhomba dzekudzivirira denda iri mitambo isati yatanga.   Bare anoti PSL ichazivisa nezvenzvimbo dzinenge dzichitengeswa matikiti ekupindisa munhandare.   “Kutanga svondo rino, vatsigiri vachange votenderwa kupinda kuona zvikwata zvavo zvichitamba. Asi tinoda kuzivisa kuti kuti mutsigiri akwanise kutenga tikiti rekupindisa munhandare kunoona chikwata chake chichitamba, anofanirwa kutanga aburitsa kadhi rake rinoratidza kuti akabaiwa majekiseni eCovid-19 pamwe nemagwaro ake ose akakwana anosanganisira chitupa. Kana usina izvi, haukwanise kutengeserwa tikiti redu.   “Chimwezve, matikiti aya haasi kuzotengeswa musi wemitambo, asi achatengeswa mitambo isati yatambwa nekuti hatidi kuti musi wemitambo kunhandare kuite nyonganyonga pakupinda uye vanhu vozoungana. Munhu anouya netikiti rake osvika achingopinda kana magwaro ake ose aongororwa,” anodaro.   Bare anoti PSL ichange ichishanda nemapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police (ZRP) nemamwe mapoka anochengetedza runyararo mukuona kuti mitemo iri kuchengetedzwa.   “Tichange tichishanda neZRP nemamwe makambani mukuona kuti mitemo iri kutevedzerwa. Nekuti kune vamwe vangagona kuuya vachida kupinda vasina magwaro akakwana anodiwa.   “Tichangezve tiine vezveutano vachitibatsira kuongorora utano hwevanhu vachipinda munhandare. Isu hatidi kuti nhabvu igokonzeresa kupararira kweCovid-19,” anodaro Bare.   Zvichakadai, mumitambo iriko svondo rino yeChibuku Super Cup iyo ichatambwa musi weMugovera, Chicken Inn ichisangana neNgezi Platinum Stars kuBaobab Stadium mumutambo uchatanga na11:00 dzemangwanani uye masikati nenguva dza15:00 FC Platinum ichatatsurana neHighlanders FC.   Musi weSvondo, munhandare imwe chete iyi, Cranborne Bullets ichisangana neHarare City mangwanani kuchiti Dynamos FC icharovana neBlack Rhinos.

headline: MDC Inoti VaMwonzora Havana Kumiswa Basa
text: MDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa inoti tsamba iri kutenderera pa social media ichiti munyori mukuru webato iri, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vambomiswa basa, haisi yechokwadi. Mutauririri waVaChamisa, Doctor Nkululeko Sibanda, vanoti tsamba iyi ndeyemanyepo uye aya mabasa eZanu-PF ekuda kuparadza bato ravo. Doctor Sibanda vati VaChamisa naVaMwonzora vari kushanda vese zvakanaka mukusimbaradza bato ravo. “Zanu-PF ndiyo yakanyora tsamba yenhema iyi nekuti tinoziva kuti ine hurongwa hwayakaisa mari yakawandisa kuti ikuvadze MDC nekuparadzanisa hutungamiri hwayo mumwedzi mitanhatu,” Doctor Sibanda vaudza Studio7. “Uye zvekuti VaChamisa naVaMwonzora vanofarirana here hazvina basa. Chinokosha ndechekuti musangano uri kuenderera mberi,” vadaro VaSibanda Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kumutauriri weZanu PF kuti tinzwe divi rayo. Mugwaro ranyorerwa kuvatori venhau, vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko mubato re MDC Alliance vati bato ravo ibato rakasimba rine mirairo yekuita hurukuro uye yekusvitsa zvichemo kunzeve dzevanotarisa zvichemo zvevatsigiri naizvozvo mabasa ekuparadza akaita setsamba iyi haazombokwanisi kukanganisa bato iri kana kuribudisa mugwara. No media source currently available

headline: ZEC Inoti Vanhu Vatanga Kuongorora Mazita Avo Mugwaro reVavhoti
text: Apo kwasara mazuva matanhatu kuti chirongwa chekuongorora gwaro rine mazita evakanyoresa kuvhota chipere, Zimbabwe Electoral Commission inoti vanhu vasingasvike miriyoni imwe chete ndivo vakwanisa kuongorora gwaro iri kusvika pari zvino.\n\nPadandemutande rayo, ZEC inoti kusvika nezuro munyika mose vanhu vanopfuura zviuru mazana manomwe ndivo vange vakwanisa kuongorora gwaro rine mazita evakanyoresa kuti vagovhota. ZEC inotiwo yakakwanisa kutumira maSMS kunharembozha dzevanhu vanopfuura mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana maviri. Pakapera chirongwa cheBVR mop up muna Kurume kune vanhu vanopfuura mamiriyoni mashanu nezviuru mazana mana vaive vanyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota. Dunhu reBulawayo nderimwe rematunhu ane vanhu vashoma kana kwakatariswa vanhu vakanyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota mumatunhu ose emunyika. Mukuru weZEC muBulawayo District Amai Sithembiso Khupe vanoti kusvika nezuro vanhu vanopfuura zviuru gumi nezvinomwe ndivo vaive vakwanisa kuongorora mazita avo mugwaro revakanyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota. Amai Khupe vanoti kunyange hazvo vanhu vakatumirwa maSMS panharembozha dzavo, zvakakosha kuti vaende vanoongorora gwaro rine mazita evakanyoresa kuvhota nekuti zvinotumirwa panharembozha zvinogona kuve zvisiri izvo kana kuti zvisina kukwana. Vanotiwo kuenda kunoongorora gwaro iri pachezvavo kunobatsirawo vakanyoresa kuti vagare vaziva nzvimbo yavachanovhotera. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Election Support Network Amai Rindai Chipfunde-Vava vanoti sangano ravo riri kugutsikana nekufamba kuri kuita chirongwa chekuongorora gwaro revakanyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota uye vanotendawo ZEC nekukwanisa kutumira maSMS kune vamwe vanhu vakanyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota. Chirongwa chekuongorora gwaro revakanyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota chiri kuitwawo pamwe nechirongwa cheBVR mop up munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana munyika mose senzira yekupa mukana kuvanhu vakawanda vanokodzera asi vange vasati vakwanisa kunyoresa kuvhota. Chirongwa ichi chakatanga musi wa19 mwedzi uno uye chiri kupera musi wa29 chinove Chipiri chesvondo rinouya. No media source currently available

headline: ZCTU Yozeya Mhinduro dzeVashandirwi Vari Kutsigira Kumakidzwa kweVashandi Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Munyori mukuru wesangano reZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo ,vanoti ivo nemagweta avo vatanga kuzeya mhinduro dzemapazi nemakambani ehurumende apindura panyaya yavakakwidza kumatare yekuti vashandi vasamanikidzwa kubayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 sezvo kuita izvi kuchityora bumbiro remitemo yenyika. No media source currently available Vakaendeswa kumatare ava vanonzi vakati vashandi vasina kubayiwea nhomba vamire kuuuya kubasa. Vakaendeswa kumatare vanosanganisira gurukota rezvevashandi, VaPaul Mavima; gweta guru rehurumende, VaPrince Machaya; makambani anoti ZIMNAT Insurance, Zimbabwe National Road Administration (ZINARA), TelOne, Windmill, SEEDCO Zimbabwe nechikoro cheManicaland State University. Mukupindura zvakaturwa neZCTU kumatare, VaMachaya vati havazivi kuti sei ivo negurukota rezvevashandi vakapinzwa munyaya iyi nekuti handivo vanoudza vashandi kana makambani zvekuita panyaya dzakadai. VaMavima vaudza Studio7 kuti vakamboyedza kuti vataurirane neZCTU asi zvakaramba asi vachiti zvakakosha kuti vashandi vabayiwe nhomba. No media source currently available Kambani yeTelOne inoti nyaya iyi haifanire kunzwikwa nechimbi chimbi ichiti ZCTU yakatora mavhiki matatu kuiendesa kumatare zvinoratidza kuti hayaifunga kuti yakakosha zvekunzwikwa nechimbi chimbi.

headline: VaTomana Voridzirwa Pito Vachinzi Vatadza Basa
text: Judiciary Service Commission, JSC, inoti gweta guru renyika, VaJohannes Tomana, vanofanira kusiya basa nenyaya yekusatevedzera mitongo yematare epamusoro sezvinodiwa nebumbiro remitemo. Judiciary Service Commission, JSC, inoti gweta guru renyika, VaJohannes Tomana, vanofanira kusiya basa nenyaya yekusatevedzera mitongo yematare epamusoro sezvinodiwa nebumbiro remitemo. JSC ina sachigaro uye ari mutongi mukuru wematare, VaGodfrey Chidyausiku, pamwe nedzimwe nhengo dzinosanganisira mutongo mutungamiri wedare repamusoro pamwe nevamwe vatongi vedare iri. JSC inoti VaTomana havachakodzere zvachose kuti vave gweta guru rehurumende uye nyaya yekuti vakatopotsa vaendeswa kujeri panyaya yavairamba kuchuchisa nhengo yeZanu-PF, VaMunyaradzi Kereke, vari kupomwera mhosva yekubata chibharo, munongedzo wekuti munhu asisafanire kuva muhofisi. Studio7 yange yatoudzwa neMuvhuro nevamwe vakuru muhurumende kuti VaMugabe vave mubishi kuumba komiti yekutanga kuferefeta VaTomana uye vakabatwa nemhosva, vanodzingwa basa. Asi VaTomana vatokwira kudare repamusoro vachiti zviri kuitwa neJSC hazvisi pamutemo. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaTomana kanawo gweta ravo, VaThabani Mpofu. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo, uye vachidzidzisa mitemo paKent University kuBritain, Doctor Alex Magaisa, vanoti havaoni VaTomana vachipona munyaya yasimudzwa neJSC. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzira Kushandiswa Magwenya eZuva
text: Zvinhu zvinonzi zviri kuramba zvichioma munyika, zvikuru sei nekushaikwa kwemagetsi pamusoro pemamwe matambudziko agara akatarisanawo nenyika. Kambani yemagetsi yeZimbabwe Electricity Suppy Authority, ZESA, yakatozivisa vagari kuti vachange vachishaiwa magetsi munguva dzayakatara, dzingangosvika maawa manomwe pazuva, asi vazhinji vari kutaura neStudio 7 vanoti magetsi munzvimbo dzavanogara ari kudzimwa kwenguva dzinotodarika maawa makumi maviri pazuva. Vamwe vanototi vave nemazuva matatu vasina magetsi. Mukuedza kurerutsa dambudziko iri, gurukota rehurumende VaSamuel Undenge neChitatu vakakurudzira vanhu kuti vachinyanya kushandisa moto wezuva, kana kuti solar energy seimwe nzira yekuwana nayo magetsi sezvo emvura ave kunetsa. Asi vamwe vanoti kurudziro yehurumende iyi haina zvainoreva sezvo pasina hurongwa hwekuti vanhu vangawana sei magetsi ezuva aya kana hurumende isina kuvapa zvekushandisa zvacho. Mvura mudhamu reKariba, uko kunogaiwa magetsi, inonzi yadzikira zvakanyanya izvo zvoita kuti itadze kutenderedza magwenya anozogaya magetsi. Asi vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vachitungamira sangano reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu vanoti dambudziko rose iri riri kubva pakuti hurumende iri kukundina kuona matambudziko achiri kure. VaMaguwu vanoti dai hurumende yakachenjera ingadai yakaita kuti matunhu ose azvibikire oga magetsi awo, sezvo aine madhamu asina zvaari kuita. “Muchitaura Masvingo kunana Lake Mutirikwi, Manicaland kunana Osborne Dam, saka hurumende yedu ihurumende isingatarisi mangwana,” vanodaro VaMaguwu. Vanotiwo nyika inokwanisa kubata moto wezuva ichishandisa kuita magetsi, sezviri kuitwa nenyika dzakawanda dzisina magetsi anogayiwa nemvura. Nyanzvi munyaya dzemoto wezuva, vachishanda nekambani ye Exempla Solar Systems iri kuBulawayo, VaTendai Mukucha vanoti izano rakanaka riri kukurudzirwa nehurumende rekuti vanhu vatange kushandisa zvakanyanya moto wezuva. Asi VaMukucha vanoti dambudziko riri pakuti vanhu vese vanokwanisa here kuzowana zvikwanisiro zvinodiwa kuti munhu awane magetsi e solar. Vanoti vanofara nedanho ratorwa nehurumende sezvo zvichireva kuti kana yakurudzira kushandiswa kwemoto wezuva, naivovo zvinovasimudzira. “Asi takatarisa kuhurumende, tinenge takatarisawo matanho anotibatsira sevano provider equipment,” vanodaro VaMukucha. No media source currently available

headline: Varwere Votambura Hurumende naVanachiremba Vachinetsana
text: Zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muzvipatara zvehurumende zvinoshandiswa neveruzhinji vasina mari kuti varapwe. Kusamira zvakanaka uku kwatonyanya kuwedzerwa nekuramwa mabasa kwavana chiremba avo vapinda musvondo retatu vachikanda mapadza pasi. Kunyange hazvo zvipatara zveParirenyatwa Group of Hospitals neHarare Central zvakavhurwa, hapana zvakawanda zviri kuitwa mukubatsira varwere sezvo vanachiremba vari kuramwa mabasa. Vari kubatsirwa chete ndevaya vanenge vachirwarisa kana vanenge vapinda mutsaona. Mota dzinotakura vanhu vanorwara, pamwe nedzavanhuwo zvavo, dzanga dzichitaukura varwere kubva pachipatara cheParirenyatwa vachienda kune zvimwe zvipatara. Vatataura navo vanoti vange vari kubvisa hama dzavo sezvo dzisiri kuwana rubatsiro pachipatara ichi. Mumwe wevanhu ava, VaWakefield Mlilo, vanoti ivo nehama dzavo vaburitsa muni’nina wavo muchipatara sezvo asina kumbobvira awona chiremba kubvira paakapinda muchipatara ichi nemusi weChina chapfuura. VaMlilo vanoti vave kuenda nehama yavo kuchipatara che All Souls Mission kwaMtoko. Amai Ruramai Phiri vanogara mumusha weRugare vanoti kubvira pakatanga vanachiremba kurwamwa basa, munzvimbo mavo mafa vanhu vaviri mushure mekushaiwa rubatsiro kubva kuchipata cheHarare Central. VaNesbet Nyoni avo vange vauya kuzoona hama yavo paHarare Hospital vaudza Studio7 kuti zvinosuwisa kuti zvipatara izvi zviri kudzorera varwere kudzimba dzavo vasina kubatsirwa kunyange vaye vanenge vapinda mutsaona. VaNyoni vanoti hurumende ngaigadzirise zvichemo zvana chiremba kuitira kuti zvinhu zvifambe muzvipatara. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaJoseph Murawu, vanoti hurumende inofanira kugadzirisa nyaya dzehuwori kuitira kuti ikwanise kubhadhara vanachiremba mari dzavari kuda. Vanachiremba vemuzvipatara zvehurumende pasi pesangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association vakatanga kuramwa mabasa musi wa27 Gumiguru vachida kuti mari dzavanotambiriswa dziwedzerwe kubva pamadhora mazana maviri nemakumi masere kusvika pachuru nemazana maviri emadhora pamwedzi. Izvi zvavhiringa basa muzvipatara zvese zvehurumende uye kana vanotengesa mumigwagwa pazvipatara izvi vanoti basa ravo radzikira sezvo varwere nevanhu vanoenda kuzvipatara izvi vave vashoma. Vamwe amai vanoshandira paParirenyatwa vasina kuda kudomwa nezita vanoti bhizimisi ravo radzikira chose kubvira pakatanga kuramwa vanachiremba kuramwa basa. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi revakuru vakuru vezvipatara izvi sezvo vati havana kupihwa mvumo yekutaura nevatori venhau kubva kubazi rezvehutano nekuchengetedzwa kwevana. Vana chiremba vari kuramwa basa vari kutarisirwa kuita musangano nevatori venhau mangwana apo vachazivisa zvabuda munhaurirano dzavari kuita nehurumende. Vamwewo vashandi vanoita zvehutano vatataura navo vakaita sana mukoti nevamwe, vasina kuda kudomwa nemazita vati vanotarisira kuti hurumende ichavawedzerawo mari vachiti vacharamwawo mabasa kana vasina kuwedzerwa mari mari dzavanotambira. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende yeZimbabwe Inoti Inovimba Kuti Ichashanda Zvakanaka naVaTrump
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaChris Mushowe vaudza bepanhau reHerald kuti vanovimba kuti vasarudzwa kutungamira nyika yeAmerica VaDonald Trump vachakwanisa kushanda neZimbabwe zvakanaka. VaMushowe vati Zimbabwe inoremekedza zvido zvevanhu vemuAmerica vakavhota. Vatiwo Zimbabwe haina daka neAmerica uye vanoti vanofunga kuti VaTrump vachagadzirisa hukama hweZimbabwe neAmerica. Vatiwo vakafara zvikuru nemashoko aVaTrump pavakakunda ekuti vanoda kushanda nenyika dzose. VaMushowe vati vafadzwa nenyaya yekuti kunyangwe hazvo VaTrump vaitaura panguva yekutsvaga rutsigiro kuti vachasunga Amai Clinton, vave kurumbidzana. Vati Zimbabwe haingafanotaura nezvehurumende itsva iri kuuya asi vati vane chivimbo chekuti inenge iri nani pane iripo iri kutungamirwa naVaBarack Obama.

headline: Mapurisa Anonzi Atadzisa Vagari vekuChilonga Kuratidzira
text:
Mapurisa ange negurukota reMasvingo, VaEzra Chadzamira, nhasi arambidza vagari vekuChilonga kuratidzira kusafara kwavo nehurongwa hwehurumende hwekuda kuvabvisa munzvimbo iyi kuitira kuti minda yavo ishandiwe semafuro emombe dzemukaka dzekambani yeDendiary.

Vagari ava vange vachipfuura mazana maviri vanga vatanga kuimba
vachiramba neivhu ravo pasvika VaChadzamira pazvitoro zvepaMutomani. Mumwe mugari wekuChilonga,VaBornface Chidowera, vati kuratidzira kwavo kwamiswa nemapurisa vachangotanga.

Izvi zvatsinhirwa naSabhuku Vheremu vekuChilonga, VaLuckson Mavasa,
avo vati kuratidzira kwavo kwamiswa. Vatiwo vaita musangano uyo usina kubuda zvakanaka sezvo vanhu vanga vachipikisana nevamiriri vehurumende.

VaChadzamira vati hapana ratidziro yaitika kana kurambidzwa vanhu,
asi vaita musangano wavo zvakanaka nevagari wekunzwa pfungwa dzevanhu pachirongwa ichi chirikuda kuitwa nehurumende.

Asi mumwe mugari, Amai Esther Munghomi, vati ratidiziro yaitika
kwenguva diki uye musangano hauna kubuda zvakanaka sezvo ivo
varambidzwa kutaura mushure mekuramba chirongwa ichi. Mutauriri wemapurisa muMasvingo, Inspector Kudakwashe Dhewa, vaudza
Studio 7 parunhare kuti vanga vasati vanzwa mashoko ekuti mapurisa
arambidza vanhu kuratidzira kuChilonga. Hurumende iri kuti haichadi kudzinga vanhu kuChilonga asi vanovafanira
kugarisana nekambani yeDendairy ichapinda munzvimbo mavo yovaitira
budiriro yemadiridziro vowanawo chouviri. Asi vagari vekuChilonga vari kuramba vachiti kambani iyi ikange yauya
inozopedzisira yavadzinga nekudaro vari kuda kubatwa kumeso
nehurumende. Kambani yeDendairy yakavambwa nemhuri yekwaCoetzee muna 2004, pamwe neimwe kambani yekuEurope, Spear Capital, iine zvikamu makumi maviri nezvinomwe kubva muzana, kana kuti 27% zvehupfumi muDendairy, iyo yakatanga kushandira kuRedcliff mudunhu reMidlands.

Vakuru vakuru muDendairy vanosanganisira VaAndrew Bradnick, VaNeville Coetzee, Amai Cherly Coeztee naDarly Archibald. VaCoetzee vanonzi murimi wechichena anowirirana zvikuru
nemutungamiriri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Unobvuma Kuripa Muzvare Jestina Mukoko
text: Dare repamusoro reHigh Court rakapa mutongo wekuti Muzvare Jestina Mukoko vapihwe mari inosvika zviuru zana nemakumi mashanu zvemadhora semuripo wekupambwa nekushungurudzwa kwavakaitwa vari muhusungwa. Pamari iyi, Muzvare Mukoko vachapihwa mari inosvika chiuru zana imwe inosvika zviuru makumi mashanu ichienda kumagweta avo anove nhengo dzesangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights. Hurumende nemagweta aMuzvare Mukoko akawirirana pamari iyi pamberi pedare. Dare iri rati mari iyi ibhadharwe musi wa31 Gumiguru usati wadarika. Muzvare Mukoko vakapambwa kumba kwavo kuNorton musi wa3 Zvita 2008 vakazoendeswa kumatare musi wa24 Zvita. Vaipomerwa mhosva yekuda kupidigura hurumende yevaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Dare reSupreme Court rakambotara kuti vose vainge vapamba Muzvare Mukoko vaigona kuendeswa kumatare ivo pauzima. Muzvare Mukoko vati kuripwa uku hakubvise bundu riri mumoyo mavo asi zvichabatsira vamwe vanotyorerwa kodzero kuti vazive kuti kwekupotera kuripo. No media source currently available

headline: Huwori, Kusarongeka Zvonzi Ndidzo Honzeri Dzekushaikwa hweHupfu muNyika
text: Dambudziko rekushaikwa kwehupfu munyika rinonzi nevamwe ratodzika midzi, panguva iyo paine kunakurirana nyoka mhenyu pakati pehurumende nevanogaya upfu, avo vari kunzi vari kunzvengesa upfu, zvikuru hweRoller Meal. Hurumende yakabhadhara kare chidimbu chemari inofanirwa kutengeswa nayo rudzi rwehupfu urwu, ivzo zvinozoita kuti vatengi vahuwane nemutengo uri pasi, asi izvi zvinonzi hazvisi kubatsira sezvo hupfu hwacho huri kuramba huchishaikwaq muzvitoro asi huchiwanikwa kumusika mutema, uko kwahuri kuwanikwa nemari iri pamusoro. Vanogaya upfu vari kupomerwawo mhosva yekuwanza upfu hweNgwerewere, uhwo hunodhura, pachinzvimbo chekuti vagaye hweRoller Meal hunokwaniswa kutengwa nevanhu vose nemutengo uri pasi. Ruzhinji rwevanhu munyika rwunonzi rwave kuswera rwuchifudza zvitoro kuri kumirira kuti rwungangosangana nemotokari dzinodhirivhara upfu, pachinzvimbo chekunge rwuchiita zvinopa pundutso kumhuri pamwe nenyika. Mumwe anoti aswera akagarira upfu ndaAmai Rufaro Chakanyuka vekuGreendale muHarare, avo vanoti vazohuwana asi huchitengeswa nemadhora zana nemakumi mashanu patsapo yemakirogiramu gumi, pane mutengo wakatarwa nehurumende wemadhora makumi manomwe pamakirogiramu gumi. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, vanoti dambudziko rekushaikwa kwehupfu riri kukonzerwa nekusarongeka kwechirongwa chehurumende chekutsigira vanogaya upfu nemari kuitira kuti vagohutengesa nemari iri pasi. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu, vanotiwo chanyanya kukonzera dambudziko rekushaikwa kwehupfu huwori, uhwo vanoti hwatekeshera munyika. VaChirumhanzu vanoti veruzhinji munyika vari kutarisira kuti hurumende ichakasika kutora matanho ekuparadza midzi yehuwori iyi isati yasunga nekusvina nyika yose. Svondo rapera vanogaya upfu vakapomerwa mhosva yekutengesa hwehupfu hwavanofanirwa kutengesera vanhu munyika kuDemocratic Republic of Congo, uko vanonzi vari kutengesa nemari iri pamusoro. Mukupera kwesvondo mapurisa anonzi akapinda mumabhizimusi evanogaya hupfu, uko anonzi akawana upfu hunosvika matani zviuru zvishanu hwakanga hakachengetedzwa, hunofungidzirwa kuti hwaida kuendeswa pamisika mitema. Asi mutauriri wesangano revanogaya hupfu, reGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe, VaGarikai Chaunza vakaudza bepanhau reHerald kuti hapana chinoshamisa kuti vanogaya upfu vawanikwe vaine hupfu, sezvo riri iro basa ravo. VaChaunza vakatiwo vamwe vanogaya hupfu vari kuita dambudziko rekushaya chekutakurisa upfu uhwu kuendesa kune vezvitoro. Sachigaro weGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe, VaTafadzwa Musarara, vanoti sangano ravo riri kupinza chibage munyika kubva munyika dzakaita seSouth Africa, Mexico, Brazil neThailand. Uganda yakazivisawo kuti ichatengesera Zimbabwe chibage. Asi VaKuchera vanoti panotoda kuti pagadziriswe mitemo yemunyika kuitira kuti zvinhu zvakaita sehupfu zvisashaikwa munyika. Kusvika matambudziko ose, kusanganisira huwori, zvagadziriswa No media source currently available vakawanda vanoti dambudziko rekushaikwa kwehupfu munyika richaramba riripo kunyangwe nyika yakapinza chibage chakawanda zvakadii kubva kunze, nekuti pane vanenge vachiwana cheuviri kubva kumutengeswa kwehupfu pamisika mitema.

headline: Zimbabwe neSouth Africa Dzinonyorerana Zvibvumirano Munyaya dzezveUpfumi
text: Zimbabwe neSouth Africa nemusi weChina dzanyorerana zvibvumirano zvakawanda zvakanangana nekuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika mbiri idzi. Nyika mbiri idzi dzanyoreranawo chibvumirano chezvemuchadenga chichaita kuti ndege dzekuSouth Africa dzakawanda dzikwanise kumhara muZimbabwe. Izvi zvinotevera musangano waitwa pakati pemakurukota emapazi akasiyana-siyana ehurumende idzi wanga uchidaidzwa kuti bi-national commission unove wekutanga wakadai kuitwa nenyika mbiri idzi. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu, mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakurudzira vemabhizimusi vekuSouth Africa kuti vauye kuzosima mari dzavo muZimbabwe vachiti mabhizimusi avo haana chinoawana. "Ndinoda kusimbaradza vemabhizimusi vekuSouth Africa kuti mabhizimusi avo akachengetedzeka muno uye tinodawo kuona vemabhizimusi vemuZimbabwe vachivhurawo mabhizimusi avo kuSouth Africa," VaMugabe vadaro. Mashoko aVaMugabe aya anouyawo apa vekunze vazhinji vari kubatwa nenhetemwa panyaya yekusima mari yavo muno pamusana pemutemo wakaiswa nehurumende wekuendesa hupfumi kuvatema. Kunyange hazvo VaMugabe vasina chavataura pamusoro pekutya kuri kuita vekunze vakawanda kusima mari yavo muZimbabwe, vati chirongwa chekuendesa hupfumi kuvatema chazvara anamuzvinabhizimusi vatsva vanogona kuita kuti hupfumi hweZimbabwe neSouth Africa husimukire. Zvichakadai, mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaJacob Zuma, vakurudzira kuti pawumbwe hwaro hunoita kuti vemabhizimusi vakwanise kushanda zvakanaka. "Patinoita izvi tinofanira kutarisa nyaya yekudyidzana munyaya dzehupfumi. Nokudaro tinofanira kuona kuti vemabhizimusi havana zvibingamupinyi zvavanosangana nazvo mukuita mabhizimusi avo. Tinofanirawo kuona kuti pavakwa muganhu mumwe chete pakati penyika dzedu kuitira kuti vanhu vafambe vakasununguka," VaZuma vadarowo. Zvichakadaro, gurukota rinowona nezve kunze kwenyika, VaSimbarashe Mumbengegwi vati zvimwe zvibvumirano pakati penyika mbiri idzi zvichiri pakati pekuzeyewa uye zvichasainwa munguva pfupi iri kutevera. VaMbengegwi vati nhaurirano dziri kuitwa dzakanangana nekuchengetedzeka hukama kwenyika mbiri idzi, zvekushanyirwa kwenyika nezvimwe zvakawanda. No media source currently available

headline: VaMangudya Vanoti Vanotengesa Mafuta Vari Kuita Chitsotsi
text: Gavhuna webhanga guru renyika, reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Doctor John Mangudya, pamwe negurukota rinoona nezvemhando dzemoto, VaFortune Chasi, vanoti dambudziko rekushaikwa kwepeturu nedhiziri munyika riri kunyanyokonzerwa nehuwori huri kuitwa nemakambani nemagaraji anotengesa mafuta. Vachipa humbowo kukomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemhando dzemoto, VaMangudya vati vanoshamisika zvikuru kuti pane mitsetse yepeturu nedziziri ivo vakapa makambani emafuta munyika magwaro ekubhadhara mafuta aya kana kuti maLetters of Credit anokwana nyika yese. Vati pari zvino vakabhadhara mari inoita mamiriyoni zana negumi nemashanu emadhora ekuAmerica, iyo vati inokwanisa kutenga marita mamiriyoni zana nemakumi manomwe emafuta pamwedzi, kunyange hazvo nyika ichida zana nemakumi matatu emamiriyoni emarita emafuta pamwedzi. VaMangudya vati pane humbowo hunoratidza kuti mamiriyoni mashanu emarita ari kubva kumatangi ekuMsasa zuva rega rega, asi mafuta aya haasvike kumagaraji sezvo ari kuendeswa kunze kwenyika. VaMangudya vati izvi zvinoratidza kuti pane chitsotsi chiri kuitwa nemakambani aya. Asi VaMangudya vaudza komiti iyi kuti nyika ine chikwereti chisati chabhadharwa chemari inosvika mazana maviri emamiriyoni emadhora kumakambani ekunze anotengesa mafuta anosanganisira Independent Petroleum Group, Glencore, Trafigura, Engen ne Total. Vachipawo humbowo kukomiti iyi, VaChasi vati zviri pachena kuti pane huwori huri kuitwa nemakambani aya uye vari kutora matanho ekupedza zvese izvi. Vatiwo mafuta emotokari emuno ari kutengeswawo kunyika dzakati komberedza sezvo akachipa kudarika kunyika idzi. VaChasi vati Zimbabwe Energy Regulatory Authority inofanira kupihwa simba rekuita basa rayo nemazvo pamwe nekuongorora kuti mafuta anofamba sei kubva kwaonochengeterwa kuMsasa kuenda kumagaraji mazana matanhatu nemakumi maviri anotengesa mafuta munyika. VaChasi naVaMangudya vatiwo nyaya yemanyepo pamadandemutande akaita seWhatsApp, Twitter nemamwe ndiwo anokonzerawo kuti vanhu vaite chipatapata chekutenga mafuta vachichengeta mudzimba izvo zvinoita kuti ashaikwe mumagaraji. Vati izvi ndizvo zvakaitika svondo rino apo pakatanga kufambiswa mashoko ekuti mafuta emotokari ainge akwira mutengo asi iwo asina. Pavabvunzwa kuti sei vari kuramba kuti mafuta atengeswe nemadhora ekuAmerica, VaMangudya vati hazvigoni kuti hurumende iiite izvi nekuti vanhu vakawanda munyika havawani mari iyi. Vati zvikamu makumi maviri kubva muzana chete zvevanhu munyika ndizvo zvinowana mari yekunze chete. Pavabvunzwa neimwe nhengo yekomiti iyi, VaAnele Ndebele, kuti havawoni sekuti nyaya dzekusamira zvakanaka kwematongerwo enyika ndidzo dziri kukanganisa zvinhu munyika, VaChasi vati zviri pachena kuti izvi zviri kuitika munyika zvinokanganisa chimiro chenyika. Vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Manyanya, vati zviri kuitika zvinoratidza kuti nyaya dzematongerwo enyika dzinoda kugadziriswa. Zvichakadai, VaChasi vazivisa kuti kushanduka kwemamiririro ekunze kuri kuita kuti mvura irambe ichidzikira kuKariba izvo zvinogona kuti gwenya remagetsi rimire kushanda mukati memwedzi gumi nemina kana izvi zvikaramba zvichiitika. Vatiwo nyaya yekusabhadhara magetsi, kubiwa kwemaTransformer nedzimwe tambo dzemagetsi zviri kutadzisa ZESA kuita basa rayo nemazvo. VaChasi vatiwo bhodhi reZESA pamwe nevakuru vakuru mukambani iyi vange vasiri kufambisa basa nemazvo izvo zvaita kuti kambani iyi isvike pakutadza kugaya magetsi anokwanira nyika. VaChasi vati vachadoma nyanzvi nevanhu vane chimiro chakanaka kupinda mubhodhi reZESA kuti vaburitse kambani iyi mumadhaka mairi.

headline: Bato reMDC-T Rokurudzira Hurumende Kuti Iburitse muMajeri Vakasungirwa Zvematongerwo Enyika
text: Vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri weMDC-T, VaElias Mudzuri, vakurudzira hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuti iburitse mujeri vasungwa vose vakasungirwa zvematongerwo enyika pasi pehurumende yevaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Vachitaura nevatori venhau mushure mekushanyira jeri reChikurubi, uko kwakachengetwa dzimwe nhengo dze MDC-T dzinoti Yvonne Musarurwa, Last Maengehama naTungamirai Madzokere, VaMudzuri vati vasungwa vazhinji vakasungirwa zvematongerwo enyika pasi pehurumende yaVaMugabe vakaita saMuzvare Musarurwa nevamwe vavo vari kupikira mhosva dzavasina kupara. Nekudaro, VaMudzuri vakurudzira hurumende itsva yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuti iburitse vasungwa vezvematongerwo enyika mumajeri ose ari munyika. VaMudzuri vanoti sebato vakatosvitsa chikumbiro ichi kubazi rinoona nezvemitemo. Muzvare Musarurwa nevamwe vavo vaviri, avo vakatongerwa kugara mujeri kwemakore makumi maviri mushure mekubatwa nemhosva yekuponda mupurisa VaPetros Mutedza mumusha weGlen View muna 2011, vakasvitsa chikumbiro kumatare chekuti nyaya yavo iongororwe zvakare vachiti havana mhosva yavakapara, asi nyaya iyi haisati yanzwikwa. Gurukota rezvemitemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti bazi ravo rakatambira chikumbiro cheMDC chekuti vasungwa vezvematongerwo enyika vaburitswe mumajeri asi vachiri kuongorora nyaya iyi sehurumende. Zvichakadai, VaMudzuri vakurudzira komisheni inowona nezvesarudzo kuti inyorese vasungwa vari mumajeri sevavhoti vachiti ikodzero dzavo sezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe kuti vave nechokutaura mukutongwa kwenyika yavo. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nevakafanobata chigaro chasachigaro weZEC, VaEmmanuel Magade, kuti tinzwe divi rekomisheni yavo panyaya iyi sezvo vanga vachiti vari mumusangano. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari kuChivi Voparura Zvirongwa Zvinosimudzira Dunhu Ravo
text: Nechinangwa chekuendesa mberi chirongwa che Zimbabwe Agenda for Sustainable Socio-Economic Transformation, Zim-Asset mumaruwa mavagere, vagari vedunhu reChivi kuMasvingo vari kuparurawo neMugovera hurongwa hwavo hwakanangana nekusimudzira dunhu ravo. No media source currently available Sachigaro weChivi Rural District Council, uye vari kanzura we Ward 31, VaKiller Zivhu, vanoti vanenge vakaungana pamusha pavo apo vanenge vachiparura zvirongwa zvakawanda. Vati zvirongwa izvi zvinosanganisira chibage chakarimwa chichabatsira vane nzara, mombe dzichapiwa kumadzishe kuti vagozorimira nherera nechirikadzi, pamwewo nehove dzavari kupfuya. VaZivhu vanoti vachatorawo mukana uyu kukurudzira vagari vemunharaunda yavo vari mumaguta kuti vavake kumamisha kwavanobva.

headline: Hurumende Inoshevedzera Musangano weKuedza Kumisa Kuramwa Mabasa kweVashandi
text: Hurumende inonzi yashevedzera musangano wechimbichimbi nevashandi vayo senzira yekuedza kudzivirira kuramwa mabasa kwevashandi mushure mekupera kwemazuva gumi nemana avakanga vaipa kuti igadzirise zvinhu, kukundikana kwavo vaizotanga kuramwa mabasa neMuvhuro svondo rino. Sachigaro wesangano rinomirira vashandi, reApex Council, Amai Cecilia Alexander, vanoti vakokwa nehurumende kuti vasangane neMuvhuro kuti vaedze kutsvaga nzira dzekudzivirira kuramwa mabasa kwevashandi mushure mekunge dzimwe nhaurirano dzavakamboita dzatadza kuburitsa chimuko. Asi Amai Alexander vanoti sangano ravo harisati rashevedzera kuramwa mabasa kunyange hazvo mazuva gumi nemana akadarika. Vanoti zvichabuda mumusangano uyu ndizvo zvichavapa gwara rekutora kuenda mberi. “Hurongwa huripo Vakandemiiri tichienda mberi ndehwekuti, chekutanga, apex Council haisati ya declare strike. Takangosana takawirirana kuti kwasara 48 hours, saka mangwana tiri kuenda kunosangana nehurumende kuseni. “Tarongazve kuti kuseni tine Apex Council yatinozoturira zvatinenge tataura ku meeting yeNational Joint Negotiations Council,” vanodaro Amai Alexander. Vashandi vehurumende vari kuramba kutambira mari inoita mamiriyoni mazana matatu emadhora yakanga yanzi nehurumende imbofanobatsira vashandi kubva mukukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu. Mazuva gumi akanga aziviswa nevashandi akapera nemusi weChishanu svondo rapera, zvichireva kuti vashandi vaifanirwa kutanga kuramwa mabasa kutanga kwesvondo rino. No media source currently available

headline: Ngezi Platinum Yoyambira Makepekepe Kuti Ichaiomesera neSvondo
text: Ngezi Platinum Stars yayambira Caps United kuti isapemberere kutora mukombe weligi zvechimbichimbi nekuti munhabvu munhu anofanira kutenda maruva adya chakata. Zvikwata zviviri izvi zviri kusangana muNational Sports Stadium neSvondo mumutambo unogona kupa Caps United mukombe weligi kana kukanganisa zvese zvaitwa nemaGreen Machine gore rese. Caps United iri kuda kukunda mumutambo uyu ichitarisirawo kuti FC Platinum inorohwa kana kuita mangenge neHighlanders kuti itore mukombe. Sachigaro weNgezi Platinum Stars VaJeremiah Getiseni vanoti hazvisi kuzove nyore kuti Caps United itorere mukombe pavari vachiti ivo marovero avakaita Highlanders neFC Platinum ndiwo avari kuzoita maGreen Machine. VaGetiseni vanoti vakagadzirira zvakasimba mutambo nemaGreen Machine vachiwedzera ivo kuti vari kuenderera mberi kugadzirira kusvikira mutambo uyu wapera. Pari zvino, Caps United ndiyo iri pamusoro soro nemapoinzi makumi mashanu nemanomwe, maviri pamusoro peFC Platinum, uyezve matatu kudarika Highlanders. Caps United ikakundwa kana kuita mangange, FC Platinum ikakunda Highlanders, Kugona Kunenge Kudada ndiyo inoenda pamusoro uyezve pedyo nemukombe unokosha $1,2 million. Asi mutsigiri weCaps United VaShingirai Miti vanoti vari kuona Makepekepe ichikunda Ngezi Platinum Stars vachiti ivo nguva yarebesa vasati vabata mukombe weligi. Makundano eCastle Lager Premier Soccer League asarwa nemitambo miviri kuti asvike kwamvura yacheka makumbo. Mimwe mitambo iriko svondo rino ndeiyi Mugovera Mutare City Rovers v Harare City Sakubva Tsholotsho v Bulawayo City Luveve ZPC Kariba v How Mine Nyamhunga  Svondo Triangle v Dynamos Gibbo Hwange v Chapungu Colliery Chicken Inn v Border Strikers Luveve Zvakamira zvakadai, maMighty Warriors neMugovera ari kupinda munhandare yemuYaounde muCameroon kusangana neBanyana Banyaya yekuSouth Africa mumutambo wavo wekutanga mumakwikwi e2016 Africa Women’s Africa Cup of Nations. Mutambo wekutanga wakakosha zvikuru zvekuti maMighty Warriors anofanira kukunda kunyange hazvo gadziriro yavo yanga isina kumira zvakanaka. Zvikwata izvi zvakasangana mumutambo wekuedzana masimba masvondo maviri apfuura maMighty Warriors akarohwa 3-0. Asi murairidzi wechikwata ichi Shadreck Mhlauzi anoti iyi inhoroondo achiti uyu mutambo mutsva uyezve une zvinangwa zvakasiyana. Kunze kweSouth Africa, maMighty Warriors achatamba zvekare neCameroon pamwe ne Egypt. Zvikwata zviviri kubva mugungano iri ndizvo zvinoenderera mberi nemakundano. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa eZRP Anoparura Chirongwa cheKudzivirira Kuraraira kweHIV/Aids
text: Zimbabwe Republic Police neChitatu yakaparura hurongwa hwehwaro hwekuyedza kudzivirira kutapuriranwa kwechirwere cheHIV/AIDS kwamutare. Hwaro uhu hwakananganga nekubatsira mapurisa ari pabasa uye vari pamudyandigere. Hurongwa uhu hwave nenguva yakareba huchikwenenzverwa paine chinangwa chekuti panosvika gore ra2020 pange pasisina vanoshaya nekuda kwechirongwa ichi. Vanenge vaine chirwere ichi vanenge vachitarisirwa kuwana mapiritsi zviri nyore. Mukuru wemapurisa mudunhu reManicaland, Assistant Commissioner Dorothy Kupara, avo vakaparura chirongwa ichi, vanoti zvakakosha kuti mapurisa ose aremekedze hwaro hwavapo kuitira kuderedza kuparira kwechirwere ichi. Amai Kupara vanoti hapana chinonyadzisa pakunoongororwa chirwere cheHIV uye pamwechete nekutora mishonga yacho sezvinodiwa. “Chirwere ichi chakangofananawo neshuga, kana zvakubata gadziriswa, so my officer will ensure kuti zvashandiswa sezvinotarisirwa, uye my officer handifungi kuti pane vachange vachiramba kuzotestwa, uye basa richatowanda kune ma medical officers vachitesitwa.” Mukuru wemapurisa uyu anotiwo hwaro huripo uhu hunobudisa pachena kuti vanenge vaine chirwere havaizotadziswa kusimudzirwa pabasa. Hwaro uhu hunotiwo vanenge varwara vanokwanisa kumbonozorora zvavo vachipora vachizongodzokera pabasa kana vave kunzwa zviri nani. Mumashoko avo ekuvhara chiitiko ichi, mumwe mukuru wemapurisa Superintendant Kamanda vanoti hwaro hwavapo uhu huchabatsira mukufambisa basa ravo zvakanaka kunyanya kuvatungamiriri vemakamba kumatunhu ose emunyika. “Ndinoti kumaDispols (District Police Officers) ose kana masangana nechinhu chiri medical chingakunetsai munongoti ko policy inoti chii? Endai munotitoreraiwo ende rinonzi rakatsetseka rinosuppotwa nePolice Act uye ne the current Labour Laws, tinoiti chii zviya, iSimbi yebasa!” Mumwe wechipurisa anorarama nehurwere Sergeant Tawanda Mugeri vachipa huchapupu vanoti zvakakosha kuti munhu wega wega, kunyanya kuchipurisa, ararame achiziva paamire mushure mekuvhenekwa ropa. “Panhau yekuudza vamwe vekubasa, inonzi chii zviya, inonzi disclosure, zviri nani inini ndavakuziva zvandiri zvitori right, ndikaenda kuhospital vave kutondishevedza nefirst name nekuti ndikanzwa parwadza ndotomhanya kuti ndizive kuti chii.” Hwaro hwekubudisa HIV/AIDS Policy hwakaitwa pachidyidzanwa nemasangano akasiyana-siyana anosanganisira reNational Aids Council, NAC, Population Services International, PSI nemamwewo. Mukuru weNational Aids Council muManicaland, VaEvans Makoni, vanoti vari kushanda nemapurisa kuti vazadzikise zviri muhwaro mavo. “Chatiunganidza pano inyaya yeZRP AIDS Policy launch iyi, chirongwa chiripo pakuti National Aids Council yakapuhwa mutoro wekuti irwisane nedenda reHIV. Saka mukuita izvozvo tinoti vanhu vari pamabasa kuti vawanirwe nguva yekuitirwa ma programmes inoita shoma saka kambani ikaita policy yaino implemenda zvinobata vazhinji vanenge vari kumabasa toderedza huwandu hwemari yatinoshandisa pakurapa nekuti vanhu vanenge vadzivirira.” Vakuru vechipurisa havana kuda kuburitsa pachena kuti chirwere ichi chakapararira zvakanyanya seyi muZRP, kunyangwe hazvo ongororo ichitaridza kuti kuchipurisa kumwe kwemamwe mapoka emabasa kwakatekeshera chirwere ichi kusanganisira kuchiuto, nekuvatyairi vedzimotokari dzinofamba mitunhu mirefu. Hwaro hwakaparurwa uhwu hucharamba huchiongororwa nekugadzirisa kuti hukwanise kufambidzana neshanduko inenge iriko uye nenguva. No media source currently available

headline: Matare eDzimhosva Ovhiringwa neChirwere cheCovid-19
text: Judicial Service Commission (JSC) yavhara matare mumadhorobha matanhatu mushure mekunge vashandi vemumatare aya vabatwa nechirwere che Covid-19. JSC yavhara matare amajisitireti, kuBindura, Chinhoyi, Kariba, Karoi, Mt Darwin neMutare uko kwavharwawo dare repamusoro. Munyori weJSC, VaWalter Chikwanha, vati vatora danho iri kuti matare aya ambofiritwa nemishonga inodzvirira kupararira kweCovid-19, kuvheneka vashandi pamwe nekuita ongororo yekutsvaga chakapa kuti denda iri ripinde mumatare aya. Vati vanoda kukwidza nyaya dzavo kumatere, magweta nevamwe vanoda rubatsiro kumatare aya vanofanira kubata vatongi vakuru munzvimbo dzavo, Registrar Additional Sheriff kana Assistant Master uye mafoni evanhu ava achaiswa pamatare avharwa aya. VaChikwanha havana kutaura kuti vanhu vangani vakabatwa neCovid 19 kumatare avharwa aya asi vati vari kushanda nebazi rezvehutano kugadzirisa kuti avhurwe uye veruzhinji vachaziviswa kuti matare aya achavhurwa rini. VaChikwanha vati JSC iri kutora matanho ese anokurudzirwa neWorld Health Organisation nebazi rezvehutano kudzvirira kupararira kweCovid-19 kumatare ose ari kushanda. Vatiwo vave kusimbaradza kupfekwa kwemamasiki, kugeza maoko nekushandisa maSanitizer kuti munhu apinde mumatare. Kunyange hazvo hurumende yakati mapazi ayo anofanira kuderedza huwandu hwevashandi vanoenda kubasa kusvika pazvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana, VaChikwanha vati havagoni kuita izvi nekuti matare anoita basa rakakosha. Gweta rinoshanda neZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights kwaMutare, Amai Peggy Tavagadza, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hongu danho ratorwa neJSC rakanaka chose asi rinofanirawo kuitirwa kuvasungwa, mapurisa navose vanoshandisa matare. Vatiwo JSC ngaifambirane nenguva kuti vanhu vatongwe pachishandisa muchina yechizvino zvino vasingasangane nevamwe mumatare. Mutungamiri wesangano reMedical and Dental Priivate Practitioners of Zimbabwe Association, Dr Johannes Marrisa, vati hurumende inofanira kuvheneka vanhu vakawanda kuti izive huwandu hwevanhu vane denda iri. Vaive gurukota rehutano panguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kuwanda kuri kuita Covid-19 kunokonzerwa nekuti matanho ekudzivirira denda iri haasi kutevedzwa vakatiwo hurumende inofanira kuwanisa vanhu zvekufambisa vachiti vanhu vari kutapuriranawo denda iri vari mimitsetse yemabhazi. Nezuro vanhu mazana manomwe nemakumi matanhatu nevatanhatu vakabatwa neCovid -19 izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa neCovid-19 munyika yose pazviuru makumi mana nezvitauru nemazana mana nemakumi masere (43, 480 cases). Munhu mumwe chete akafa neCovid-19 nezuro,izvo zvaskavitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa neCovid-19 munyika yosepachiuru nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbabwe nevaviri, 1 692. Kusvika nezuro vanhu vainge vabaiwa nhomba yekutanga vave zviuru mazana manomwe nemagumi zvishanu nemakumi mashanu nevatanhatu, 715 056 uye vabaiwa nhomba yepiri vave zviuru mazana mana nemakumi mashanu nechimwe nemazana manomwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatatu, 451 793. Huwandu uhu hunotarisirwa kukwira nhasi manheru apo hurumende ichaburitsa zvayawana nhasi. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba vanhu mamiriyoni gumi senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Covid-19 yaondonga mutambo wenetball’
text: MUTAMBI wenetball wechikwata chenyika chemaGems  Felistas Kwangwa — uyo anove kaputeni — anoti coronavirus yakamisa zvinhu zvakawanda muhupenyu hwake sezvo mutambo uyu uriwo unomuraramisa.   Kwangwa vazhinji vanomuziva ari mumwe wevatambi akatamba netball yainwisa mvura apo maGems akaenda kunokwikwidza kumakwikwi eVitality World Cup Liverpool 2019.   Achidzoka kubva kumutambo uyu, akasvika achitsiva Perpetual Siyachitema ndokugadzwa kuve kaputeni wechikwata ichi.   Kwangwa anoti kusawana mukana wekutamba mutambo uyu unomuraramisa iye pamwe nevatambi vakasiyana, kuri kurwadza uye kudzosera hupenyu hwavo kumashure.   “Zvinhu hazvina hazvo kumira zvakanaka, hatina kumbozvifungidzira kuti coronavirus ndizvo zvaichaita izvi.   Hatina kukanganiswa isu tega, asi pasi rese riri kuchema nechirwere ichi,” anodaro.   Mwedzi uno chikwata chemaGems chaifanirwa kunge chaenda kunokwikwidza kune mumwe mutambo kunyika yeRepublic of Wales asi wakamiswa nekuda kweCovid-19.   “Mwedzi uno tange tichifanirwa kunge taenda kuWales kunokwikwidza kune mumwe mutambo asi zvese zvakaenda mudondo.   Tave kungomirira pachapera coronavirus tozoona kuti tozvifambisa sei.   “Asi iye zvino tiri kuita gadziriro dzedu tiri kudzimba sezvo takangonzi tigare takagadzirira nehutungamiri hwedu nekuti tinogona kunotamba bhora kana ‘lockdown’ ikapera. Ndofunga pane zviri kurongwa,” anodaro Kwangwa.   Parizvino Kwangwa ari kugara kuZvishavane uko anoshanda.   “Ndiri kuZvishavane izvezvi, ndine vamwe vatambi vemaGems vatatu saka tinoita tichimbobatana tichiita gadziriro dzedu pamwechete.   “Vamwe vari kunzvimbo dzakasiyana munyika tinokurukura paWhatsApp tichitumirana mavhidhiyo uye tichirakidzana kugadzirira kwatinenge tichiita,” anodaro Kwangwa.

headline: Breaking...Senegal Yopinda muChikamu Chechipiri Mumakwikwi eFIFA World Cup kuQatar
text: Senegal yave nyika yekutanga muAfrica kupinda muchikamu chechipiri chemakwikwi eWorld Cup kuQatar. Senegal yakunda Ecuador 2-1 muGroup A. Yabudirira kuenda kuchikamu chenyika gumi nenhatu kana kuti Group of 16 pamwe neNetherlands yakunda Qatar 2-0 muGroup A zvekare. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi muNyaya dzezveHutano Dzotyira Kupararira kweChimbwamupengo
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti dziri kutyira zvikuru kuti chirwere chechimbwamupengo chichapararira zvakanyanya zvikuru sezvo vanhu vakawanda vari kurumwa nembwa dzisina kubaiwa jekiseni rinodzivirira chirwere ichi. Vanhu vanodarika mazana mana vanonzi vari kurumwa svondo rega rega nembwa dzisina kubaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira chirwere chechimbwamupengo, izvo zvava kutyirwa kuti dambudziko rechirwere ichi, rinogona kuvhiringa hutano hwemunhu vakawanda vanenge varumwa. Imbwa dziri kuruma vanhu idzi dzinonzi dzinenge dzisina kuchengetedzwa mudzimba, zvinopa kuti dziswere dzichizvifambira muguta reHarare. Nyazvi munyaya dzezvehutano, Dr. Josephat Chiripanyanga, vanoti kana munhu arumwa nembwa, anofanira kuona muridzi wembwa yamuruma kuitira kuti azive kana yakabaiwa nhomba yechimbwamupengo. Dr. Chiripanyanga vanoti chirwere chechimbwamupengo chinonetsa kurapa zvokuti murwere akanonokerwa kurapwa, anoguma ave kuhukura sembwa kusvikira azofa nokuti anenge anonokerwa kurapwa. Dr. Chiripanyanga vanoti munhu anofanira kuenda kuchipatara mukati memazuva matatu kubva paanenge arumwa nembwa kuitira kuti majekiseni aanozobaiwa akwanise kushanda kuuraya huturu hwechimbwamupengo. Nyanzvi yezvirwere zvinotapuriranwa mubazi rehutano, Dr. Portia Manangazira, vanoti vanhu vanodarika mazana mana vanorumwa nembwa uye zhinji dzacho dzinenge dzisina kubaiwa nhomba yechimbwamupengo. Dr. Manangazira vanoti pasi rose hakuna munhu akararama mushure mokunge arumwa nembwa ine chimbwamupengo. Sekuru Kamwelo Banda veku Cranborne vanoti zvinoshamisa kuona vanhu vanogara nembwa dzinodarika gumi padzimba dzavo zvinova zvinhu zvisingabvumirwe pamutemo weHarare City Council. Dr. Manangazira vanoti mutemo wePublic Health Act unoraira maguta ose kuti vatevedzere zvakatarwa maererano nehuhwandu hwembwa hunofanirwa kuchengetwa paimba yoga yoga vakati asi mutemo uyu hausi kutevedzerwa. Dr. Manangazira vanoti vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvisere vakarumwa nembwa gore rakapfuura munyika zvikaonekwa kuti chikamu chikuru chembwa idzi dzaiva dzisina kubaiwa nhomba yechimbwamupengo. Studio 7 yakaedza kunzwa kubva kumutauriri weHarare, VaMichael Chideme, kuti sei kanzuru yavo isiri kutevedzera mitemo inovasungira kuona kuti imbwa dzemuguta dzabaiwa nhomba here kana kuti kwete, asi havana kuda kutaura nezvazvo. Asi VaChideme vanoti munhu wese anosungirwa kuchengetera imbwa dzake pamba pakakomberedzwa nemudhuri uye paine ghedhe rinovharwa kuitira kuti dzisaruma vanhu vanenge vachizvifambira. VaChideme vanoti kanzuru yavo iri kushushikana zvikuru nenyaya yembwa dziri kungomhanya mhanya munzvimbo dzakawanda dzisina muridzi wadzo. Mumwe mushandi wekuZimbabwe Society for The Prevention of Cruelty to Animals, uyo akaramba kudomwa nezita rake, sezvo asingabvumidzwe kutaura nevatori venhau, anoti vanhu vazhinji vari kutadza kuchengeta imbwa dzavo nepamusana pekuoma kwaita zvinhu munyaya dzehupfumi. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yoita Nhaurirano dzeMari neMusi weChina neVashandi Vayo Vange Voronga Kuramwa Mabasa
text: Hurumende nemusi weChina iri kutarisirwa kuita musangano nevashandi vayo vari pasi pesangano reZimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Trade Unions raimbozivikanwa nekuti Apex Council nezvenyaya yemuhoro. Izvi zvinotevera yambiro yevashandi ava yekuti vainge voronga kuratidzira sezvo hurumende isiri kuratidza kuzvipira pakuvawedzera mari. Asi gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, negurukota rezvevashandi, VaPaul Mavima, vanoti vakazvipira kuti vataurirane nevashandi nenekuvawedzera mari. Musangano uyu uri kuitwa pasi pegungano reNational Joint Negotiating Council. Nhaurirano dzakamboitwa mavhiki maviri adarika asi hapana chakabuda nekutadza kuwirirana panyaya yekuti vashandi vobatirwa here mari pahomwe yakaumbwa nehurumende yeGovernment Employees Mutual Savings (Gems) yavanozokwanisa kukwereta uye nyaya yemari yemuhoro yekubatsirikana kana kuti Cost of Living Adjustment. Hurumende inonzi yaida kuwedzera vashandi nemari inosvika zvikamu makumi maviri nemashanu kubva muzana kana kuti 25% zvakarambwa nevashandi vari kuti hurumende yakawedzera vari muchiuto nevamwe nemari inodarika zana nemakumi mashanu kubva muzana kana kuti 150%. VaMavima vati nhaurirano dzakakosha uye dzinofanira kuitwa sezvo kuramwa mabasa kuchidzosera nyika kumashure. No media source currently available Mutauriri weZimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Trade Unions, VaGibson Mushangu, vanoti vanoda kutambiriswa mari inosvika pamazana mashanu nemakumi maviri yekuAmerica kana kuti US$520. No media source currently available

headline: Varairidzi Vanoita Musangano Pamusoro Pekuramwa Mabasa
text: Rimwe remasangano anomiririra varairidzi, reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, rinoti matunhu matanhatu esangano ravo akabvumirana kuti kana pasina mari inemusoro inopamidzirwa varairidzi pakupera kwemwedzi uno, nhengo dzesangano ravo dzirikuzoramwa mabasa. Mutungamiriri wePTUZ, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mamwe matunhu esangano ravo arikuita misangano mangwana, Chipiri, kuti vakurukure nezve kuramwa mabasa. VaZhou vati, zvinenge zvabuda mumisangano iyi pamwe chete neyakatoitwa ndizvo zvichatevedzerwa. No media source currently available

headline: Tarakinyu omirira Zim kuChina
text: SHASHA yemarathon — Moses Tarakinyu — ndiye achanomirira Zimbabwe kumujaho weWorld Half Marathon kuChina munaMbudzi zvichitevera kuhwina kwaakaita mumakwikwi eTanganda Half Marathon svondo radarika kwaMutare.   Mujaho uyu ndiwo unoshandiswa kusarudza shasha yemarathon inomirira nyika kuWorld Half Marathon izvo Tarakinyu akakwanisa kuita svondo radarika apo abvuta mukombe kubva kuna Misheck Sithole uyo akapedza ari pechitatu.   Achitaura mushure mekukunda mumakwikwi aya, Tarakinyu anoti chiremerera chikuru kuhwina mujaho uyu pamwe nekuwaniswa mukana wekunomirira nyika kuChina.   “Handisi kugona nekufara nekuti sevamhanyi ndizvo zvatinotarisira pose patinenge tichikwikwidza mumijaho yakasiyana.   “Ndiri kufara zvikuru sezvo ndave nemukana wekunomirira nyika yangu kuChina kumujaho weWorld Half Marathon uko ndoziva kunenge kune shasha dzakawanda dzinobva pasi rose,” anodaro Tarakinyu.   Mutungamiri weNational Athletics Association of Zimbabwe (NAAZ), Tendai Tagara, anoti vachatsigira Tarakinyu zvakazara apo achaenda kumomirira nyika kuChina.   “Tarakinyu gore rino ange achimhanya zvinonwisa mvura nekuti ahwina mijaho yakawanda chaizvo. Saka tinoziva kuti paachaenda kuChina achanorwa semvumba uye isu tichamutsigira mugadziriro yake,” anodaro Tagara.   Zvakadaro, kune mimwe mijaho, Olivia Chitate akakwanisa kuchengetedza mukombe waakatora mugore ra2019 apo akahwina mujaho wemadzimai we21km Kuchiti mumujaho we10km wevarume, wakahwinwa naWellington Varevi apo wemadzimai ukahwinwa naAnne Chirisa.   Shasha yemujaho wewiricheya, Elford Moyo, akarakidza kuti haasi kuzosiya humambo hwake mumujaho uyu zvichitevera kuhwina kwaakaita zvakare.   Nerimwewo divi, kumadzimai ari kusimukira, Stella Jongwe, akahwina mujaho weTanganda Half Marathon kekutanga.

headline: Argentina yaMessi yatiza neWorld Cup
text: ARGENTINA ndiyo shasha dzepasi rese zvichitevera kukunda kwayaita France 4-2 kumapena mumutambo we2022 FIFA World Cup uyo watambwa manheru ano kunyika yeQatar.   Mutambo uyu, uyo wange uchinakidza kukunda ngoma kurira, wange wapera uri mangange 3-3.   Uyu ndiwo wangu uri mutambo wekupedzisira waLionel Messi achitambira nyika yake sezvo akati panopera mutambo wefainari ari kubva asendeka shangu dzake dzekutambira Argentina.   Mumutambo wanhasi, Messi anwisa kaviri kuchiti Kylian Mbappe weFrance akanda katatu achidzosa chikwata chake mumutambo uyu.   Mbappe ndiye abva ahwina golden boot kuWorld Cup sezvo anwisa kasere kumitambo iyi.   France, iyo yange iine vatambi vayo vazhinji vane madzinza ekuAfrica, ndiyo yange iine mukombe uyu mushure mekuutora muna2018.

headline: Vashandi, Vashandirwi neHurumende Votarisirwa Kusangana neChipiri paNyaya yeVashandi Vari kuDzimba Nekuda kweCoronavirus
text: Sangano rinomirira vashandi, reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, rinoti rashevedzwa nehurumende kuti vazeye nyaya yekuti vashandi nevashandirwi vangabatwa sei munguva ino yekuvharwa kwemamwe makambani senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere che coronavirus. Munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti hurumende yavashevedza kumusangano neChipiri wekuti ivo sesangano rinomirira vashandi vapewo pfungwa dzavo pakuti vashandi vangabatsirwa sei pamazuva makumi mavbiri nerimwe avanenge vasiri kuenda kumabasa. VaMoyo vanoti kunyange hazvo sangano ravo riri iro rakatanga kuuya nepfungwa yekuti makambani ambovharwa kuitira kudzivirira vashandi kubva kuchirwere ichi, vakazoshamisika votonzwa mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vozivisa kuti vanhu vagare kudzimba, asi pasina kuziviswa kuti vashandi nevanozvishandira pamwewo nemakambani anenge achitatarika vachabatsirwa sei. Vanoti musangano weTripartite Negotiating Forum wavakapedzisira kuita hauna kubuda nechisungo panyaya iyi nekuda kwekuti chirwere ichi chakanga chisati chapinda munyika panguva iyi. Asi vakanga vawirirana kuti paumbwe chikwata chaizotarisa nezvenyaya iyi, icho chisati chaumbwa kusvika pari nhasi. VaMoyo vanoti vanoona sekunge musangano wemusi weChipiri uyu uchatadza kubudirira sezvo naivo vari kutyawo kufambafamba, kunyange hazvo vachiti mushandi haafanirwe kukanganiswa panguva iyi. No media source currently available Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi revashandirwi panyaya iyi. Asi mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Doctor Energy Mutodi vanoti vashandirwi vose vanofanirwa kubhadhara vashandi vavo kwemazuva makumi maviri nerimwe iwayo, kunyange hazvo vari kuti vambonzwa vamwe vari kuti mushandi kana asina kushanda haawane mubhadharo wake. “Tambonzwa vamwe vari kuti no work no payment, saka izvozvo tiri kuti kwete. Hatisi kuda kunzwa mushandirwi anotadza kubhadhara mushandi wake nechikonzero cheCOVID-19,” VaMutodi vanodaro. Vanoti kana ivowo sehurumende, vashandi vavo vari kudzimba zvichireva kuti havafanirwe kutadza kuvabhadhara. Panyaya yekuti kune vamwe vari kuti vanogona kufa nenzara panguva yekusaenda kumabasa iyi, Doctor Mutodi vanoti vanhu ava vanofanirwa kuzivisa bazi rezvekugara zvakanaka kwevanhu uyewo mapurisa kuitira kuti vakwanise kuwaniswa rubatsiro rwakakodzera.

headline: Vanhu VemuBulawayo Voratidzira Zvine Mutsindo
text: Mapurisa muBulawayo ashandisa hutsi hunokachidza kuti adzinge vanhu vange vachiratidzira muguta iri. Pazosvika nguva dzekuma1 masikati muguta mange musisina vanhu zvitoro nemabhanga zvavharwa. Kunyange hazvo muguta matanga muine runyararo, zvitoro zvikuru zvakawanda zvange zvakavharwa uye panguva dzekuma9 mangwanani mhomho yevanhu yaungana paCity Hall vakazotenderera mumigwagwa yeguta ichiimba nekuisa matombo nezvimwe zvose zvavange vachikwanisa kuwana kudzivirira kufamba kwemotokari muguta. Kuratidzira uku kwaitikawo munzvimbo dzinogara veruzhinji dzakadai Sizinda, Tshabalala neEntumbane uko vamwe vevange vachiratidzira ava vapaza chimwe chitoro cheChoppies vachitora zvinhu. Kuvhurwa kwekotoro yekutanga kwedare reHigh Court uko kwaitwa nemutevedzeri waChief Justice, Justice Elizabeth Gwaunza, kwambomiswa kukazoenderera mberi mushure mekanguva apo vanhu ava vasvika vakaratidzira panze pedare iri. Mukuru weboka revechidiki mubato reMDC mudunhu reBulawayo VaMalandu Ncube avo vange variwo pakati pevange vachiratidzira vati iyi inzira yeveruzhinji yekuratidza hurumende kuti vaneta nematambudziko avari kusangana nawo zuva nezuva, vachitiwo kukwidzwa kwemutengo wemafuta edzimotokari kwawedzera kutambura uku. Gweta VaKholwani Ngwenya avo vange vari pachiitiko chekuvhurwa kweHigh Court ndemumwe wevaona zvaitika uye vaudza Studio 7 kuti kuratidzira kwaitwa nevanhu uku kunoenderana nekodzero dzavo pasi pebumbiro remutemo wenyika. Mumwe mugari wemuBulawayo VaMoses Kumbweya vati kuratidzira kwevanhu kwaitika uku hakushamisi nekuti veruzhinji munyika vave kunhonga svosve nemuromo. Mumwe mufundisii VaSikhalo Cele vaudza Studio 7 kuti mamiriro aita zvinhu munyika ave kuda kuti vanhu vose, kusanganisira mapato ezvematongerwo enyika, vaite maonera pamwe. Nhasi range riri zuva rekutanga rakadeedzerwa nevemamwe masangano akazvimirira ega kusanganisira veZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions kana kuti ZCTU kuti vagare kumba. No media source currently available

headline: ZEC Yotanga Chirongwa Kunyoresa Vanhu Vachavhota Pachishandiswa BVR
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vatara kuti kutanga svondo rinouya nemusi wa14 Gunyana kusvika musi wa15 Ndira 2018, Zimbabwe Elections Commission, ZEC, inofanira kutanga kuumba gwaro idzva revavhoti kana kuti biometric voters roll. VaMugabe vaita izvi kuburikidza negwaro rezvisiviso zvehurumende kana kuti “government gazette”. Izvi ndizvo zvinofanira kuitwa pasi pemutemo wesarudzo kana kuti Electoral Act, gwaro idzva risati raparurwa. Asi vachitaura neStudio7, sachigaro weZEC, Amai Rita Makarau, vati hazvireve kuti vanobva vatanga kunyoresa vanhu musi wa14 Gunyana sezvo vachiri vakamirira mimwe michina yekunyoresa vanhu. No media source currently available Mukuru wesangano reElection Resource Centre, VaTawanda Chimhini, vati vari kufara nezvaitwa nemutungamiri wenyika sezvo vakagara vayambira ZEC kuti kuda kutanga kunyoresa vanhu pasina kuteverwa mutemo kwaizokonzera mutauro. No media source currently available

headline: Kusaenda kuMabasa kwaVanachiremba Kwoomesera Varwere Zvakanyanya
text: Hupenyu hwevarwere hworamba huri munjodzi sezvo vana chiremba vari kuramba vakashinga nerekuti havazi kuzodzokera kumabasa kusvika hurumende yagadzirisa zvichemo zvavo.\n\nPasvika Studio 7 pachipatara chikuru chemuBulawayo cheMpilo Central nhasi mangwanani vanhu vashoma vange vari kuzvikamu zvinorapwa varwere vanenge vachibva kumba, kwange kuchibatsirwa navana mukoti vachiri kudzidzira basa. Mumawadhi mange muine varwere vashoma vange vachionekwawo navana mukoti. Mumwe murwere anorarama nehurema, VaMalcolm Ndlovu, vati vave nevhiki vachirwara nemudumbu uye vange vauya kuti vazoonekwa navana chiremba asi vanzi vadzokere kumba sezvo vanachiremba vange vasiri pabasa. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kumukuru wavana chiremba paMpilo Central, Doctor Solwayo Ngwenya, sezvo vange vachinzi vari mumusangano. Asi Doctor Mthabisi Bhebhe, vanove munyori weMpilo Doctors Association, vati vanachiremba vepachipatara ichi pamwe nevekuUnited Bulawayo Hospitals uye munyika mose, havazi kuzodzokera kubasa kusvikira hurumende yagadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. Doctor Bhebhe, avo vakambovewo mutauriri wesangano ravanachiremba vemuzvipatara zvehurumende reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, vatiwo pari zvino hurumende haisati yaita zvinobatika pakugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. Pakuti zvinhu zvakamira sei muzvipatara kana kwakatariswa varwere, Doctor Bhebhe vati havakwanise kuziva sezvo vasiri kuenda kubasa, asi vati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti hurumende igadzirise zvichemo zvavo nekukasika kuti vakwanise kudzokera kubasa vabatsire varwere. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Kuramwa mabasa kwavana chiremba kwasvika muzuva rechimakumi maviri nemanomwe. Mune imwewo nyaya, kanzuru yeguta reBulawayo inoti iri kushushikana nekuti vagari vari kuramba vachishandisa mvura yakawanda izvo zvinogona kuzosiya madhamu anopa mvura muguta iri asisina mvura. Vachitaura neStudio 7 mushure memusangano nevagari pamusoro pemamiriro akaita zvinhu muguta panyaya dzemvura, munyori wekanzuru, VaChristopher Dube, vakurudzira kuti vagari vashandise mvura zvine mwero. Guta reBulawayo rinowana mvura kubva kumadhamu matanhatu anosanganisira Inyankuni, Lower Ncema, Upper Ncema, pamwe neUmzingwane, uye kwasara zvikamu makumi maviri kubva muzana zvemvura mumadhamu ari kushanda pari zvino. Dhamhu reUpper Ncema rakatomiswa kushandiswa pari zvino nekuda kwekushomeka kwemvura uye kanzuru inoti Umzingwane rinogona kumiswawo munguva pfupi inotevera. Panyaya yekuwedzerwa kwemari inoshandiswa nekanzuru kana kuti supplementary budget yakaparurwa nekanzuru svondo rapera, VaDube vatsanangura kuti bhajeti iyi ichashanda chete kana yapasiswa nehurumende. Pabhajeti iyi kanzuru inoti inoda kukwidza mitero nezvikamu zvinosvika mazana matatu kubva muzana uye vamwe vagari vari kutsutsumwa kuti mari iyi yakawandisa. No media source currently available

headline: Ndiyani Achakunda Musarudzo dzemuKenya?
text: Kuverengwa kwemavhoti kuri kuenderera mberi muKenya musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika dziri kukwikwidzanwa zvakasimba pakati paVaWilliam Ruto mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika iyi naVaRaila Odinga. Vari kuona nezvesarudzo veIndependent Electoral and Boundaries Commission vanoti vachaburitsa zita reanenge akunda kana mavhoti ose apera kuverengwa. Mukuru wekomisheni iyi VaWafula Chebukati vakurudzira vanhu kuti vamirire murunyararo kuverengwa kwemavhoti. Idzi dzinogona kunga dziri sarudzo dzekupedzisira dzaVaOdinga kukwikwidza uye kave kechishanu vachipinda musarudzo dzekuva mutungamiir wenyika. VaOdinga vave nemakore makumi manomwe nemanomwe ekuberekwa. Munhu anokunda musarudzo anotarisirwa kuti awane mavhoti anodarika zvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana kana kuti 50%. Anokunda anofanirawo kuwana mavhoti zvikamu makumi maviri nemashanu kubva muzana mumatunhu makumi mana nemana pamatunhu makumi mana nemanomwe. Zvimwe zvizvarwa zverudzi rwevashona kubva kuZimbawe zvakatamira kukenya makore makumi mashanu adarika zvakavhotawo kekutanga musarudzo dzemunyika iyi mushure mekupihwa magwaro ehugaro nemutungamiri wenyika ari kusiya basa VaUhuru Kenyatta. MuKenya parizvino mune zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zviri kuongorora sarudzo idzi. Mumwe ari kuongorora sarudzo mutungamiri wesangano reWomen’s Academy for Leadership and Excellence Muzvare Stabile Dewa avo vaudza Studio 7 kuti vafara nekubatwa kwaitwa sarudzo muKenya kunyngwe paine zvimhingamupinyi zvishoma. Vati havana havo kufara nekuti hapana mudzimia akwikwidza musaudzo dzemutungairi wenyika kunyangwe aoine vatatu vari kukwikwidza musarudzo sevatevedzeri vevatungamiri.

headline: Nyanzvi dzeHutano Dzotyira Kuti Kuungana kweVanhu paMabhazi eZUPCO Kuchakonzera Kuparadzirwa kweCovid-19
text: Nyanzvi mune zvehutano vari mukuru weCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vari kukurudzira hurumende kuti igadzirisa nechimbichimbi dambudziko rechekufambisa vachiti kukundikana kwekambani yeZUPCO kutakura vanhu kuri kukonzera kuungana nekutsikirirana kwevanhu pamisika yemabhazi. VaRusike vanoti izvi zviri kuzoisa vanhu vakawanda munjodzi huru yekutapurirana hutachiwana hunokonzera chirwere cheCovid-19. Vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kuwedzera mabhazi eZUPCO, kana kudzosera mumigwagwa makombi aimbotakura vanhu, poonekwa kuti atevera mutemo wekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. Svondo rapera mapurisa akazivisa kuti achange achisunga vedzimotokari dzisiri pasi peZUPCO, uye vafambi vanowanikwa vakakwira motokari idzi vachabhadhariswa madhora zviuru zviviri pamunhu sefaindi. VaRusike vanotiwo nekuda kwekuwanikwa kwehutachiwana hutsva hunokonzera Covid-19 hwe C.1.2 munyika dzakaita seSouth Africa, hurumende inofanirwa kusimbisa nyaya dzedzidziso pamusoro pedenda iri. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa neSvondo kuti vanhu gumi nevatanhatu (16) vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika yose, uye vamwe zana nemakumi maviri nevashanu (125) vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi nezuro wakare. Izvi zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi munyika yose pazviuru zvina nemazana mana ane makumi masere nevaviri, (4,482). Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kubva zvachatanga vakasvikawo pazviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezvishanu zvine mazana mashanu nemakumi mashanu (125,550). Vanhu vapora vave zviuru zana negumi nezvitanhatu zvine mazana mana nemumwe, (116,401). Kusvika pakupera kwezuva neSvondo, vanhu vakanga vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga yekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 vakanga vave mamirioni maviri ane zviuru mazana manomwe negumi nezvitatu zvine mazana mashanu ane makumi mana nevasere (2 million 713 548). Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba dzose mbiri sezvinokurudzirwa vakanga vave miriyoni imwechete ine zviuru mazana manomwe negumi nezvinomwe zvine mazana mana nemakumi matatu kana kuti (1 million 717 430). Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 vanhu mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana, senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi.

headline: Kurudziro yaVaChombo Yekudzinga Vanotengesa Mumigwagwa Yotsviriridza
text: Vanhu vakawanda vanoti kutengeswa kwezvinhu mumigwagwa zvisina kurongeka dziko kuri kukonzera dambudziko remarara muguta reHarare nemamwe maguta. Vanhu ava vanotiwo izvi zviri kukonzerawo zvirwere sezvo marara ari kungorasirwa pose pose. Mashoko everuzhinji aya anotevera mashoko anonzi akataurwa negurukota rezvekutongwa kwematunhu, VaIgatius Chombo, ekuti vanhu vari kutengesera mumigwagwa vanofanirwa kubviswa nekukasika. Asi veruzhinji vanoti hurumende yaVaChombo ndiyo honzeri sezvo iri kukundikana kuwanisa vanhu mabasa uye yakaregerera vanhu ava vachiita pamadiro kubva kare. Vachitaura mukupera kwesvondo pamusangano wepagore wemameya pamwe nemasachigaro emakanzuru wechimakumi manomwe nenhatu (73rd Urban Councils Association of Zimbabwe), wakaitirwa kuBulawayo, VaChombo vanonzi vakati panofanirwa kutorwa matanho nechimbichimbi ekuti vanotengesera mumigwagwa vange vachibviswa sezvo vari kukanganisa nyaya dzehutano uye nzvimbo dzinogara vanhu. Studio7 yakundikana kubata VaChombo panyaya iyi. Asi meya weguta reHarare, VaBernard Manyenyeni, avo vakapindawo musangano uyu, vabvuma kuti ichokwadi kuti VaChombo vakataura mashoko aya. VaManyenyeni vanoti dzimwe nguva mabatirwo anoitwa zvitengeswa zvinosanganisira zvekudya, anotyora mitemo yekutengeswa kwezvekudya. Vanoti dzimwe nguva vanotengesa zvinhu ava vanotiza mapurisa vachipedzisira voviga zvinhu zvavo zvinosanganisira zvekudya munzvimbo dzisina kukodzera dzakaita semumigero inorasa mvura. No media source currently available No media source currently available

headline: Hatizi DeMbare: FC Platinum
text: SHASHA yeCastle Premiership FC Platinum inoti vatsigiri venhabvu kana vaongorori vemutambo uyu  ngavasafananidze chikwata chavo neDynamos iyo yakasvika kufainari yemutambo weCAF Champions League mugore ra1998.   Zvikuru zvange zvichitarisirwa kubva kuFC Platinum gore rino apo yakabudirira kupinda mumagroup-stages eCAF Champions League ayo anozivikanwa semini-league, kekutanga munhorowondo yechikwata ichi.   Asi isati yambosvika kure, FC Platinum yakatoburitswa mumumakwishu aya zvichitevera kutadza kwayakaita kuhwina kana mutambo mumwe chete zvawo muboka rayo muGroup B kubva mumitambo mina yayatamba.   Iye zvino FC Platinum yasarirwa nemitambo miviri chete neOrlando Pirates pamwe neEsperance of Tunisia uye kunyangwe ikaihwina hazvichabatsire chinhu.   Munhorowondo yenhabvu yemuno, chikwata cheDynamos ndicho chega chakakwanisa kuita zvinorova mumutambo uyu izvo zvakachiona chichisvika kufainari mugore ra1996 uye ikazombosvika kumasemi-fainari muna 2007.   Zvimwe zvikwata zvinosanganisira FC Platinum zviri kukundikana kutevera mumatsimba eDeMbare.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, mukushi wemashoko weFC Platinum – Chido Chizondo – anoti zvikwata hazvifanane uye ivo pavakasvika mumakwishu aya vanofara napo nekuti ndipo pavaishuvira kusvika.   “Musatifananidze neDynamos isu, pedu patakasvika ndipo chaipo pataida kusvika. Chikuru chamunofanirwa kuziva ndechekuti isu tave nemakore 11 tapinda muPremier League saka hamungatienzanise nanaDynamos vagara kwemakore akawanda.   “Tichiri kudzidza uye tinovimba kuti patichadzoka tinogona kusvika pane chimwe chinhanho,” anodaro Chizondo.   Achibvunzwa neKwayedza kuti anonzwa sei sezvo chikwata chavo chakatadza kuhwinha kana mutambo mumwe chete, Chizondo anoti,  “Patakatosvika zvakatoringana zvakadaro nekuti isu chataingoda chete kusvika kumagroup-stages emutambo uyu, zvimwe zvese zvaizouya ibhonasi.   “Patakahwina tikiti rekukwikwidza mumakwishu aya takazviudza sechikwata kuti chatinoda kupinda mumagroup-stages ayo anozivikanwa semini-league chete. Saka sechikwata takasvika pataida kusvika, zvimwe zvese hazvisisina basa. Kana tikazodzoka mwaka unotevera tinenge tave kutarisa zvimwe zvatinoda kuti zviitike,” anodaro Chizondo.   Zvisinei, shasha yekuongorora nhabvu ari mutsigiri mukuru wemutambo uyu, Chris ‘Romario’ Musekiwa, anoti FC Platinum ichiri kudzidza nezvemutambo uyu.   “Champions League ave makata, saka sechikwata munofanirwa kugadzirira zvakasimba.   “Mumaonero angu, FC Platinum iri pakudzidza nezvemutambo uyu saka vanoda kupihwa nguva uye ivo ngavagadzirire sechikwata nekuti zvinosuwisa kuti mumitambo yavatamba votadza kunwisa kamwe chete zvako.   “Ivo sechikwata vanofanirwa kuita vachibvunzawo kune zvimwe zvikwata zvakaita seDynamos kuti vakasvika sei kufainari, vonzwa mazano ayo andinoona kuti anogona kuvabatsira,” anodaro Musekiwa.   Mutambo unotevera weFC Platinum mumakwishu aya, ichatamba svondo rinotevera apo iri kunanga kuSouth Africa kunotamba neOrlando Pirates yozopedzisa svondo rinozotevera paichasangana neEsperance muno.

headline: Gurukota reMari neHupfumi Rinoparura Hurongwa Hunovandudza Hupfumi?
text: Bazi rezvemari raparura hwaro huchatevedzwa nenyika kwemakore maviri ari kutevera senzira yekuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika. Vachiparura hurongwa uhwu muHarare, gurukota rezvemari, Va Mthuli Ncube, vati hurongwa uhwu, uhwo hwavari kudaidza kuti transitional stabilzation program, hwakanangana nekusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika kubva pari zvino kusvika muna zvita 2020. Izvi zvichaitwa kubudikidza nekusimbaradza nyaya dzekurima, kucherwa kwezvicherwa, kusimbisa nyaya yekutengesera dzimwe nyika, kudzikisa mari inoshandiswa nevari muhurumende, kugadzirisa migwagwa, madhamu nezvimwe zvivakwa zvehurumende pamwe nekuona kuti makanzuru aita zvose zvaanosungirwa kuita kuitira kuti veruzhinji vawane hugaro hwakanaka. VaNcube vati hurumende ichasimbaradzawo nyaya yekucherechedzwa kwekodzero dzeveruzhinji pamwe nekuona kuti munyika magara muine runyararo kuitira kuti Zimbabwe ikwanise kukwezva vemabhizimusi ekunze vanoda kuzosima mari muno. Vatiwo zvakakosha kuti vemabhizimusi emuno vasimewo mari yavo munyika senzira yekukwezvawo vekunze uye kuti nyika yashanda zvakasimba kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo kumasangano anokweretesa mari akaita se world bank ne internationational monetary fund nemamwe. VaNcube vaenderera mberi vachiti hupfumi hwenyika hwakatarisirwa kukura nezvikamu zvina kubva muzana mumakore mana kubva gore rinouya, huchizokura nezvikamu zvinomwe kubva muzana mamakore anenge achitevera maererano nehurongwa hwehurumende hwekuti munhu wese munyika ange ave kugara zvakanaka panosvika gore ra 2030. VaNcube vatiwo hurumende ichawedzera nhengo dzeparamende mari dzadzinotambiriswa kuitira kuti dzinyatsoitawo basa dzakachena mwoyo sezvo vachiti nyaya dzinozeyewa nenhengo dzeparamende mudare radzo dzichibata hupenyu hweveruzhinji. VaNcube, avo vanga vakatsigirwa nemunyori mubazi ravo, Va George Guvamatanga, vati mari dzemitero dziri kubhadhariswa vanhu dzichashandiswa kugadzira zvinhu zvinobatika zvakafanana nemigwagwa nekuona kuti zvipatara zvine mishonga vachiti zvakakosha kuti nyika irwisane nehuori kuti mari dzemitero dzioneke kushanda kwadzo. Mushure mekuparura hurongwa hwavo, Va Ncube vaudza Studio7 kuti vane hurongwa hwekubvisa mari yemhando yema bond notes nekufamba kwenguva mushure mekunge vagadzirisa zvinhu zvakati kuti. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vachishanda nesangano re Labour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Propser Chitambara, vaudza Studio7 kuti hapana chinofamba kana hurumende isina kuzvipira kuita zvose zviri kutaurwa naVaNcube. VaChitambara vati Zimbabwe inogona kusimukira kana ikashandisawo zviwanikwa zvayo zvakanaka pasina kutsvaga mari kunze yekuisa muhupfumi kana kuti stimulus package. Vazivisawo kuti hurumende ine hurongwa hwekuti pave nenzvimbo imwe chete ichange ichipa marezeresi kune vekunze vanoda kuita mabhizimusi munyika vachiti pane vamwe vana muzvinabhizimusi vavasina kudoma nemazita vavati vakatonosima mari dzavo kune dzimwe nyika dzakapoteredza Zimbabwe nechikonzero chekuti vainzi vatsvage marezenesi anodarika makumi maviri kuitira kuti vaite bhizimusi ravo muZimbabwe. Bazi rezvemari ratiwo riri mubishi kuongorora nyaya yekuti vari muhurumende vashandise motokari dzisingadhure senzira yekuderedza huwandu hwemari inoshandiswa nehurumende muzvinhu zvisina nemusoro. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yokundikana Kuzadzikisa Zvayakazvitarira neZvaitarisirwa neWHO paNyaya yeNhomba yeCovid-19
text: Zimbabwe iyo yave nenhomba dzinodarika mamiriyoni gumi nematanhatu kana kuti 16 million ichiri kutatarika kubaya vanhu nhomba sezviri kuitikawo munyika dzakawanda dzemuAfrica. Vanhu zvikamu makumi maviri kubva muzana ndivo vabayiwa nhomba mbiri munyika kusvika parizvino kunyangwe chinangwa chehurumende chaive chekuti vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana vange vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 mukupera kwegore rapera. Asi kunyangwe Zimbabwe isati yasvitsa huwandu uhu, yatangawo kubaya vamwe nhomba kechitatu. Nhomba yeCovid-19 yakatanga kubayiwa muZimbabwe musi wa 17 Mbudzi gore rapera. Nhomba dziri kubayiwa munyika dzinoti Sputnik V yekuRusssia pamwe nedzekuChina dzinoti Sinopharm neSinovac, Covaxin yekuIndia uye Janssen yeJohnson and Johnson dziri kushandiswa muZimbabwe. Kunyangwe hazvo vanhu vakawanda vachiri kuzengurira kubayiwa nhomba, mukuru anoona nezvekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 munyika Dr Agnes Mahomva vanoti, nhomba inobatsira nekuti. Zimbabwe haina kungokundikana pane zvayainge yazvitarira chete pakubaya nhomba yeCovud-19 asi pane zvimwe zvainge zvatarwa nesangano reWorld Health Organization kana kuti WHO. WHO yainge yatiwo yainge iine chivimbo chekuti panopera gore ra2021, nyika dzemuAfrica dzinenge dzabaya vanhu vadzo zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana nhomba. A si nyika shoma shoma dzisingadarike gumi kusanganisira, Seychelles, Mauritius, Morrocco, Rwanda neBotswana chete kuchamhembe kweAfrica ndidzo dzakwanisa kuita izvi. MuAfrica yose, vanhu zvikamu zviviri nechidimbu kubva muzana kana kuti 2, 5% ndivo vabayiwa nhomba zvichienzaniswa nezvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kana kuti 60% kubva kunyika dzakabudirira. Kunyangwe hazvo nyanzvi munyika nekunze dziri kuti zvave pachena kuti vanenge vabayiwa nhomba kaviri kana katatu vane mukana wakakura wekuti vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 vasafe, vanhu vashoma zvikuru vemuAfrica havana kubayiwa nezvikonzero zvakasiyana siyana. Vamwe vachiri kutya kutivanogona kutadza kuita mbereko vamwe vachiti chitendero hachivabvumidze zvose izvi zviri kutenderedzwa pamadandemutande akasiyana siyana pasi rose. Vamwe vanhu vari kushaya chivimbo nenhomba vachiti vamwe vakabayiwa nhomba dzose mbiri kana nhatu vari kungorwara. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvezvirwere zvekutapuriranwa, Muzvinafundo Davison Sangweme vatiwo kushanduka kwechirwere kana kuti virus ndiko kunopa kuti chiiuye nedzimwe mhando chobata vakabayiwa nhomba ava. Ko huurumende yeZimbabwe ingaite sei kuti vanhu vakawanda vabayiwe nhomba? Tabvunza mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu munyaya dzezvehutano reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike vanoti hurumende inofanira kunyengetedza vanhu kuti vabayiwe nhomba. Nhomba muAfrica dziri kuuyawo kuburikidza nesangano reAfrican Union pasi pechirongwa chinonzi Vaccine Acquisition Trust kana kuti AVAT nechimwe cheWorld Health Organization chinonzi COVAX. Asi munyika dzakaita seNigeria, Malawi neSouth Sudan, dzimwe nhomba dzakapiswa sezvo mazuva akatarwa kuti dzinge dzashandiswa ainge adarika dzichiri mumatura. African Union iri kuchema chema kuti dzimwe nhomba dziri kuita zvekuraswa kuAfrica. Sangano iri rinotiwo chimwe chiri kupa kuti zvinetse kubaya vanhu nhomba inyaya yekuti dzimwe nyika dzemuAfrica hadzina zvimwe zvinodiwa mukushandiswa mukubaya nhomba zvakaita semafacemask, donje nemotokari dzekutakurisa nhomba kuendesa kune mamwe matunhu kanawo mafiriji ekuchengetera dzimwe nhomba. Sangano reTony Blair Institute for Global Change rinoti nhomba dzinosvika zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana dziri muAfrica hadzina kushandiswa nezvikonzero zvakasiyana siyana. Mukuru weAfrica Centres for Disease Control VaJohn Nkengasonga vanoti dzimwe nyika hadzisiwo kana kutouya kuzotora mishonga kumatura avo. Asiwo vakawanda vanoti nyika dzakabudirira ndidzo dzakonzera dambudziko kunyanya nekusada kubatsira dzevarombo nenhomba. No media source currently available

headline: Zvitunha Zvoworera muMamochari neKushaya Magetsi kuMasvingo
text: Zvinhu zvaita manyama amire nerongo pachipata chikuru mudunhu reMasvingo cheMasvingo General Hospital sezvo kudzimwa dzimwa kwemagetsi kwave kupa kuti mitumbi yevanhu iri mumochari iwore. Chipatara ichi chatarisanawo nerimwe rekushomeka zvakanyanya kwemvura zvoomesera vanachiremba kuita basa ravo. Mukuru webasa pachipatara ichi, VaShadreck Zangairai, vaudza Studio 7, kuti dambudziko remagetsi nemvura riri kudzosera kumashure zvakanyanya basa pachipatara ichi. Vanoti pachipatara pari kuswera paine munhuwi wakaipa unobva kumochari nenyaya yekudzimwa kwemagetsi. Vakumbira ZESA kuti isavadzimire magetsi. Vatiwo genareta ravainaro harisi kushanda zvakanaka sezvo rave kuremerwa nekudaro vanoda rubatsiro rwekutenga rimwe rinoti dhonzei. Magetsi ari kudzimwa kunyangwe hazvo gurukota rinoona nezvemhando dzemoto VaFortune Chasi vakati ZESA hayaizodzima magetsi kunzvimbo dzose dzakakosha kusanganisira zvipatara nekunogayiwa mvura. Panyaya yekushomekwa kwemvura, VaZangairai vatiwo chipatara chiri kutopemha kuti chikwanise kucheresa zvibhorani. Mumwe chiremba asina kuda kudomwa nezita ati kushaikwa kwemagetsi nemvura kuri kuvaomesera. Dzimwe hama dzevarwere dzakaita saVaDreck Mujinga, dzinoti dzanzwa nekukumbira mvura kuvanhu vanogara mumusha weRhodene avo vari kutonetsekawo nekuiwana. Studio 7 yashanyira chipatara ichi ikaona hama dzevarwere dzichipinda pachipatara nezvigubhu uye migomo yemvura. Dhorobha reMasvingo rave nemwedzi yakawanda rakatarisana nedambudziko rekushomeka kwemvura zvichikonzerwa nekudzimwa kuri kuitwa magetsi kunocheneswa mvura kuBushemead Water Works. Mvura iyi inenge yadhonzwa kubva kudhamu reMutirikwi. Mumwe murwere, VaKudzai Manatsa vari mu ward yevarume pachipatara apa nechirwere cheshuga vanoti kushaikwa kwemvura kuri kupa kuti zvimbuzi zvisashande zvakanaka. Imwewo hama yemurwere , VaThomas Marume vanoti kushaikwa kwemvura kwavashaisa mufaro. Mayor weguta reMasvingo VaCollen Maboke vanoti dambudziko remvura riri kukonzerwa nekudzimwa kwe magetsi neZESA vachiti vakambozama kutaura neve bazi iri asi zviri kuramba. Vanachiremba pachipatara cheMasvingo ichi havana havo kuramwa mabasa sezvakaita vamwe muHarare neBulawayo asi vanoti havasi kushanda zvakanaka nematambudziko avasangana nawo aya. No media source currently available

headline: Zvizvarwa ZveZimbabwe Zviri Kunze Kwenyika Zvotumira Chikafu Kumusha
text: Apo pasi rose rakacherechedza zuva reWorld Food Day nezuro, zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinogara nekushanda kunze kwenyika zvinoti zviri kushanda nesimba kuitira kuti zvibatsire vari kumusha nechikafu chiri kunetsa kuwana kuZimbabwe. Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinogara nekushanda muBotswana nedzimwe nyika zviri kutenga chikafu pamwe nekutumira mari kumusha kuitira kuti hama neshamwari dziwane chikafu, sezvo zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka munyika. VaCosta Zimhunga, avo vanotyaira mubhazi anofamba pakati peGaborone neKasane muBotswana, vanoti kukwira kwemitengo pamwe nekuoma kwezvinhu munyaya dzehupfumi, kuri kukonzera kuti vanhu vakawanda vashaye chikafu. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, VaTafadzwa Makamudze, vanoti kusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu kwava kuita kuti vagare vakatumira chikafu kumusha. Mumwe mudzidzi paUniversity of Botswana, Muzvare Memory Musavengane, vanoti vari kubatanidza zvechikoro nekushanda kuitira kuti vakwanise kubatsira vabereki vavo kumusha. Chimwewo chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, VaRobson Muroiwa, vanoti nzara yapfunya chisero munyika inoda kuti munhu asunge dzichisimba pakuriritira mhuri yake. Mwedzi wakapera, sangano reWorld Food Program rakati vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete vakatarisana nedambudziko renzara muZimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Vari Kunze Vochema neKwavanoti Kusatirimuka kweHurumende paNyaya yeMapasipoti
text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvikuru zviri kunze kwenyika zviri kunyunyuta zvakasimba nekwazvinoti kukundikana kwehurumende kuzviwanisa magwaro ekufambisa matsva kana kumutsiridza anenge apera kushanda, izvo zvave kuita kuti vamwe vavo varasikirwe nemabasa. Hurumende yakanga yambozivisa svondo rapera kuti zvinhu zvakanga zvave kuzoreruka sezvo yakatenga mapepa nezvimwe zvinodiwa mukugadzirwa kwemapasipoti. Asi tsvakiridzo yaitwa neStudio7 inoratidza kuti hurumende iri kutotarisira chikamu chekutanga chemapepa akatengwa aya pamwe nezvimwe zvinodiwa mukudhindwa kwemapasipoti zvakaita se ink zviri kutotarisirwa munyika pakati pemwedzi unouya. Mushandi uyu atiwo pari zvino hapana chiri kudhindwa kumahofisi kwavo, izvo zvinopesana nemashoko anga achiburitswa nevamwe ekuti zvinhu zvave kutanga kufamba.
