Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri kuSouth Africa, VaMaxwell Mwale, vanoti vari kuchema zvikuru kuti pasipoti yavo yave kupera kushanda pasina hurongwa kwekuti vawane imwe nekukasika. VaMwale vanoti vanhu vakawanda muSouth Africa vave kuvharirwa mabhuku avo ekumabhanga sezvo vasisina magwaro anovabvumidza kugara nekushanda munyika iyi zviri pamutemo. VaMwale vanoti vanhu vakawanda vave kungogara vasina mapasipoti, kunyange hazvo vachityira kuti vachabatwa vachidzoserwa kumusha. VaMwale vanokurudzira hurumende yeZimbabwe kuti igare pasi nevatungamiri venyika dzine zvizvarwa zvayo votsvaga nzira dzingabatsira vanhu ava, pane kuti vadzoserwe kumusha. No media source currently available

headline: Vaigara Mupurazi reManzou Voramba Vachishungurudzwa naAmai Mugabe
text: Vagari vepa purazi reManzou, kuMazowe vanoti kunyange hazvo vakaita musangano nekomisheni yezvesarudzo vachitaura nezvekutyorerwa kodzero dzavo nemapurisa anonzi akatumwa naAmai Grace Mugabe kuti avabvise nechisimba papurazi iri, kushungurudzwa kwavo kuri kuenderera mberi. Sachigaro wekomisheni yeZimbabwe Human Rights Commission, VaElasto Mugwadi, vanoti chikwata chavakatumira kuManzou chiri kuita ongororo yekuona kuti kodzero dzevanhu ava dziri kutyorwa here kana kuti kwete. Rimwe sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimRights rashorawo zvikuru nyaya yekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu nemapurisa papurazi iri. ZimRights inoti Amai Mugabe nemapurisa vanofanira kutevedzera bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Dare repamusoro rakambotongawo kuti vanhu ava vasabviswe asi hapana akazviteerera uye mapurisa ari kupomerwa mhosva yekutowedzera kushungurudza nekurova vanhu ava. Vagari ava vakatanga kugara papurazi iri muna 2000 asi gurukota redunhu reMashonaland Central, VaMartin Dinha, vanoti purazi iri rakazopihwa Amai Mugabe kuti vachengetere mhuka. Asi vamwe vanoti purazi iri rine goridhe rakawanda rinogona kuva riri iro rakapa kuti paite mutauro wakanyanya. Mumwe mugari wepapurazi iri, Amai Susan Kufakunesu, vanoti zvitangwena zvavange vavaka zvakaputswa pamwe nematanga emombe. Vanoti vave kutorara pamhene nguva dzose nevana vavo. No media source currently available

headline: Amai Mugabe Vanoti Vane Rutsigiro rwaVaMugabe
text: Mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, nemusi weChina vakaita musangano nevatsigiri vebato ravo mumusha wevazhinji weMbare paChishawasha Grounds vachiti misangano yavo ine makomborero emutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe. Amai Mugabe vakatambirwa zvine mutsindo nekambo kanonzi Unconqurable kakaimbwa naDr Tawanda Benson uye pange paine vamwewo vaimbi vakawanda. Asi semagariro eZanu-PF, misika yose yekuMbare nemabhizimisi akanzi avharwe kuitira kuti vanhu vaende kumusangano uyu. Mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika arova nhendeshure panyaya yavo yekuti hapana chinoshamisira pakurwa hondo yerusununguko. Asi vange voti vanoremekedza zvakanyanya vanhu vakarwa muhondo yerusununguko. Vatiwo sangano revakarwa hondo yerusununguko rainge roda kupindwa napongwe mushure mekunge pabuda mashoko ekuti painge paine vamwe vesangano iri vainge voda kuratidzira kuti havavafarire amai mugabe vachiti vainge vavazvidza. Panyaya yematarakita yanetsa pakati pehurumende nevanopikisa, Amai Mugabe vati vanhu havasi kupihwa pachena asi kuti vachabhadhara. Vanopikisa vanoti matarakita aya ndeehurumende kubva kuchibvumirano chehurumende yeBrazil neye Zimbabwe. Asi Amai Mugabe vave kupa pamisangano yeZanu-PF. Vanhu vakapihwa mupunga nechibage. Sezvinongoitwawo nemurume wavo, amai Mugabe vashorawo nyika dzekumawirira uye vatori venhau vemapepa akazvimirira. Zvabudawo pachena kumusangano uyu kuti mubato reZanu-PF mune kunetsana kunotyisa sezvo vamwe vange voti havadi nhengo yedare reparamende yenzvimbo iyi, VaTendai Savanhu. VaSavanhu vakambomiswa kuva nhengo yeZanu-PF kwemakore mashanu vachipomerwa mhosva yekudyidzana naAmai Joice Mujuru vaimbova mutevedzeri waVaMugabe vasati vadzingwa mubato. Kunyangwe vanhu vemumbare vakawanda vati havachadi kushanda navasavanhu, amai Mugabe vati vanofanira kuregererwa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongero enyika vachitungamira sangano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute, VaPedzisayi Ruhanya, vanoti Amai Mugabe vari kuratidza kuti munhu ane makomborero emurume wavo. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vakawanda Vanoti Vanoda Ruzivo Pamusoro peNhomba yeCovid-19
text: Vagari vemuHarare vakawanda vanoti kunyange hazvo vari kufara kuti kwave nenhomba yokudzivirira chirwere cheCovid 19, vazhinji vavo vanoti havasi kunyatsonzwisisa nezvemushonga uyu. Mumwe mugari wemuguta, VaAlbert Mwaengepi, vanoti kunynage hazvo gurukota rezvehutano, VaConstantino Chiwenga, vakapaiwa chibaiwa nhomba yeSinopharm veruzhinji vachizviona, kutambirika kwenhomba iyi kuchanetsa muvanhu vakawanda munyika. Mutori wenhau, Henry Munjanja,anotiwo haasi kuzobaiwa nhomba iyi nechikonzero chokuti mushonga uyu wakangoerekana wamhara nendege pasina kana chenjedzo yokudzidzisa kana kuzivisa veruzhinji kuti mushonga uyu unoshanda sei. Asi nhengo yesangano reThe Aids and Arts Fondation, VaEmmaunel Gasa, vanoti vari kufara chaizvo nenyaya yenhomba yeCovid 19 yave munyika. Asi VaGasa vanoti zvainge zvakanaka zvikuru dai nhomba iyi yakatanga yaongororwa nenyanzvi dzehutano dzemunyika isati yabaiwa veruzhinji. Mumwe mugari wekuArdbernie, Amai Nakisai Murenje, vanoti vakakurudzirwa nehama neshamwari dziri mhiri kwemakungwa avo vakatobaiwa nhomba dzokudzivirira kutapuriranwa kweCovid 19, asi vanoti kutambirika kwenhomba yeSinopharm munyika kuchanetsa kana hurumende isina kupa veruzhinji mashoko akakwana ezvemashandiro emushonga uyu. Asi mumwe mukuru mubazi rezvehutano, Dr Robert Mudyiradima, vanoti pane hurongwa hwekushambadzira zvakadzama chirongwa chenhomba yeSinopharm kumativi mana enyika. Zimbabwe yakagamuchira neMuvhuro wapfuura nhomba dzinosvika mazana maviri ezviuru dzayakapihwa neChina pachena kuitira kuti ibaye vanhu kuitira kuti vazvidzivirire kuchirwere cheCovid-19. Zimbabwe iri kutarisira kuwana mwedzi unouya imwe nhomba inosvika mazana matanhatu ezviuru iyo yakatenga kukambani yekuChina ye Sinopharm. Hurumende inoti inotarisira kubaya vanhu zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekurwisa kupararira kweCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: Zifa rongekai: zikeeper
text: MUTAMBI wemaWarriors — Edmore ‘Zikeeper’ Sibanda — anoti sangano rinotungamirira nhabvu remuno reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) harina kurongeka zvachose zvichitevera kusazadzikisa kwarakaita zvarakange ravimbisa vatambi vechikwata chenyika ichi apo vakaenda kumakwishu eAfrica Cup of Nations kuEgypt nguva yadarika.   Zikeeper aive muchikwata chemaWarriors chakanokwikwidza kuAfcon icho chakashoropodzwa zvikuru nevatsigiri venhabvu uye nevanoongorora mutambo uyu zvichitevera kuramba kwavaimboita kutamba vachiti vanoda kutanga vapihwa mugove wavo wemari neZifa izvo vainge vakavimbiswa.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Zikeeper anoti Zifa haina kurongeka sezvo yakange yakavavimbisa kuzovabhadhara mari dzavo vasati vatamba mitambo yavo izvo yakakundikana kuzadzikisa.   “Munoziva zvinozongonzi isu tinokara mari asi isu tinenge tine makondirakiti atinosainiswa nayo Zifa yacho.   “Ivo ndivo vanogadzira makondirakiti acho isu tongonzi iyo chisaina saka unobva washaya kuti isu tinenge takanganisa papi chaipo sezvo isu taingotevedzera izvo zvavainge vati tiite.   “Zvinorakidza kuti havana kurongeka uye havazive zvavari kuita sesangano,” anodaro Zikeeper.   Shasha iyi ndiyo yakabata bhora mutambo wekutanga wemaWarriors uyo vakakundwa 1-0 neEgypt apo akatamba zvainwisa mvura asi haana kuzoupedza sezvo akazobuda mushure mekunge akuvara ndokutsiviwa naElvis Chipezeze.   Mumutambo wechipiri, uyo maWarriors akaita mangange 1-1 neUganda, George Chigova ndiye aive mubati wepagedhi.   Kozoti mumutambo wekupedzisira — uyo maWarriors akazozvamburwa 4-0 neDemocratic Republic of Congo – Chipezeze ndiye aive pamambure uye akashoropodzwa zvikuru zvichitevera kukundwa kwavakaitwa sezvo vamwe vaiti akatengesa mutambo uyu.   Asi, Zikeeper anoramba kuti Chipezeze akatengesa mutambo uyu.   “Munoziva, vanhu iye zvino vanoda kuzongoti heee Chipezeze akatidyisa mutambo uya wekupedzisira weDRC asi havazive zvaiitika kumashure.   “Havazvizive kuti akarara kuma2 am ari mumusangano nevatungamiri veZifa tichida kuti mari ibude. Panguva iyo aifanirwa kunge akazorora achigadzirira zvemutambo, manje haana kuwana zororo rakakwana,” anodaro Zikeeper.   Zvakadai, mutambi uyu gore radarika aitambira Witbank Spurs yekuSouth Africa muNational First Division asi yakapedza iri pasi ndokuburitswa muligi iri.   Pakapera mwaka wegore radarika, ndipo pakabva papererawo kondirakiti yake uye iye zvino ari mushishi kutsvaga chimwe chikwata chekutambira.   “Kondirakiti yangu yakapera gore radarika kuWitbank Spurs saka iye zvino vamiriri vangu vari mushishi kunditsvagira chimwe chikwata chekutambira nekudaro ndakangomirira kunzwa kuti ndezvipi zvavandiwanira.   “Ndichiri mupfana chaiye uye ndine makore akawanda ekuramba ndichitamba nhabvu yepamusoro,” anodaro Zikeeper.

headline: Varwiri veKodzero Vogara Vakabatira Ura Mumaoko Vachitya Kusungwa
text: Varwira kodzero dzevanhu vanoti havasi kukwanisa kuita basa ravo nemazvo sezvo vari kushungurudzwa nevasori avo vari kuuya kumisangano yavo pamwe nekumahofisi avo. Nhengo dzemasangano akasiyana siyana muMasvingo dzinoti dzave kugara dzichityira hupenyu hwadzo mazuva ose sezvo dziri kutyisidzirwa nevasori. Amai Lucia Masekesa veSangano reMasvingo Residents Association, vati kushanda kwavo kwava kunetsa nekuti vari kuvingwa kumabasa nekudzimba vachishungurudzwa nevasori vehurumende. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano re Community Tolerance and Development Trust, VaBrighton Ramusi, vati kubva zvakasungwa mukuru wavo, VaGamuchirai Mukura, nevamwe vatanhatu vachibva kumusangano wakaitirwa kuMaldives, vari kuvingwa pabasa nevasori zuva nezuva vachibvunzwa mibvunzo yakasiyana siyna. Vati vari kubvunzwa pamwe nevagari vemumaruwa mavanoshandira kuti vari kudzidzisa vanhu zvehondo here sezvo mukuru wavo ari kupomerwa mhosva yekuenda kunze kwenyika kundodzidziswa zvekushandisa zvombo mukupidigura hurumende. Vanhuwo zvavo vanoenda kumisangano yezvekodzero dzevanhu kana mimwe misangano inotaura nezvekumira kwakaita hupfumi hwenyika, havachakwanisi kutaura pfungwa dzavo vakasununguka sezvo misangano iyi iri kupindwa nevasori. VaHardLife Mapingure ve Masvingo Human Rights Trust, vati kuvepo kwevasori pamisangano yavo kunoita kuti vagari vatye kutaura pfungwa dzavo pamisangano iyi. Gurukota rezvekubudiswa kwe mashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, havana kuda kutiudza pamire bazi ravo panyaya yevasori ava vachiti vange vari mumusangano. Ukuwo munyori mubazi ravo, VaNick Mangwana, vange vasingadairi nhare yavo. Mugari wekuMasvingo, VaTapiwa Gondo, vati zviri kuitwa nevasori izvi zvinoratidza kuti hapana musiyano pakati pe hutungamiriri hwaVaEmmerson Munangwagwa nehutunganiri hwaivepo apo VaRobert Mugabe vaive panyanga vasati vabviswa nemauto muna Mbudzi 2017. VaMukura nevamwe vavo havana kukwanisa kupihwa mukana wekubhdhara mari yechibatiso kuitira kuti vatongwe vachibva kudzimba dzavo sezvanga zvakatarisirwa. Vasungwa ava vacharamba vari mujeri kusvika musi wa Chikumi 7. Mutauriri wesangano remagweta ari kumirira vasungwa ava reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, Va Kumbirai Mafunda, vati mutongi wedare ati achapa mutongo wake nemusi weChishanu svondo rinouya apo achange apedza kunyora mutongo wake waachatura. No media source currently available

headline: Boka rePlatform of Concerned Citizens, PCC, Roronga Musangano weKuzeya Mamiriro eZVinhu Munyika
text: Vatungamiri vemapato ose ezvematongerwo enyika vari kutarisirwa kusangana nemusi weChina muHarare kumusangano wekuzeya matambudziko ari munyika pamwe nekutsvaga nzira dzingashandiswa kuti paumbwe hurumende ichafanobata matomu, kana kuti National Transitional Authority. Vamwe vari kutarisirwa kupinda musangano uri kukokerwa nePlatform of Concerned Citizens (PCC) uyu vamiriri vemasangano akazvimirira, vadzidzi, vechidiki pamwe nemadzimai. Mumwe wevari kuronga musangano uyu, Doctor Ibbo Mandaza vanoti chinangwa chemusangano wavo ndechekunzwa pfungwa dzevanhu pamusoro mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika. "Musangano wacho tadaidzira kuti tione kuti maZimbabweans senyika vanoti chiinenyaya ye crisis yatatarisana nayo senyika yeZimbabwe. Ndo main purpose yedu yemusangano wemusi weChina," Doctor Mandaza vanodaro. Vanoti nyaya yekuti ndiani achatora masimba kana VaMugabe vachinge vasiya chigaro iri kunetsa, saka boka ravo riri kuda kudzivirira mhere nekuurayana kuburikidza nekuumbwa kwe National Transitional Authority. "Inenge iri nguva yekuti makore maviri or 18 months,vanhu vagara pasi vaine National Transitional Authority yevanhu vasiri ma politicians asi vanhu vakanangana nekuti nyika ipore." Vanoti kusvika pari zvino vatungamiri vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika vazivisa kuti vachange vari pamusangano uyu vanosanganisira VaTendai Biti vePeople’s Democtratic Party, VaDumiso Dumiso Dabengwa vebato reZapu pamwe naVaSimba Makoni veMavambo/Kusile/Dawn. Asi Doctor Mandaza vanoti havasati vanzwa kubva kumapato anoti MDC T yaVaMorgan Tsvangirai, Zimbabwe People First yaAmai Joice Mujuru, pamwe neZanu PF inotungamirirwa naVaRobert Mugabe. Asi mutauriri weMDC-T VaObert Gutu vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato ravo harisi kukwanisa kuve pamusangano uyu sezvo pari zvino riri kumbonangana nekurwisa kuti mitemo ine chekuita nesarudzo ivandudzwe riri pasi pemubatanidzwa weNERA. Ukuwo mutauriri weZimbabwe People First, VaJealousy Mawarire vatiwo mutungamiri webato ravo Amai Mujuru havakwanisi kunge vari pamusangano uyu nemusi weChina sezvo vachisimuka kuenda kuSouth Africa zuva iroro kumusangano wavari kuronga kuita neMugovera. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kudivi reZanu PF kana VaMugabe vachabudirira kunge varipo pamusangano uyu. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Zana neMakumi Matatu neVapfumbamwe Vofa neKuda kweDutumupengo Idai
text: Bazi rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko raburitswa padandemutande raro reTwitter kuti vanhu zana nemakumi matatu nemapfumbamwe vafa kusvika pari zvino nedambudziko reTropical Cyclone Idai. Vanhu zana nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe havasi kuzivikanwa kuti vari kupi uye vamwe vanosvika zana nemakumi matanhatu vari muzvitsuwa vakamirira kununurwa. Mutauriri werimwe bazi reUnited Nations reWorld Food Programme kana kuti WFP VaHerve Verhoosel vati ongororo yavakaita nezuro inoratidza kuti vanhu zviuru mazana maviri muZimbabwe vakaputsirwa dzimba uye vanoda rubatsiro nechimbi chimbi. WFP inoti kuChimanimani, zvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe kubva muzana zvezvivakwa zvakaputswa dutumupengo iri. Amai Solinda Ngwenya vekuBulawayo vanoti vakarasikirwa nemhuri yehanzvadzi yavo yese yainge iri kuChimanimani ichiita mabasa ekuparidza shoko raMwari. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, vamwe vanhu vakawirwa nedambudziko iri vanoti havasati vawana rubatsiro. Vamwe vanoti hurumende yeZimbabwe iyo ine zvikopokopo zviviri chete zveAir Force zviri kuManicaland inenge iri kuremerwa nezvinhu zvawedzerwawo nekuti migwagwa nemazambuko zvakaparadzwa. VaBrighton Nyanisi vari muWard 14 kuChipinge East vanoti havasati vawana chikafu kubva nemusi weMugovera. No media source currently available Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemumiriri wenzvimbo iyi mudare reparamende, VaMathew Mlambo veMDC. No media source currently available Asi vachitaurawo nezvechikafu, gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi nemagariro evanhu Doctor Sekai Nzenza vanoti nyaya yekuparara kwemigwagwa nemazambuko ndiyo iri kupa kuti chikafu chitadze kusvika kune dzimwe nzvimbo. Asi vati vari kushanda zvakasimba kuzvigadzirisa. No media source currently available

headline: Pasi Rose Rinocherechedza Zuva reHutongo hweJekerere, reInternational Democracy Day
text: Zimbabwe neSvondo yakabatana nepasi rose mukucherechedza zuva rehutongo hwejekerere, kana kuti International Day of Democracy. Dingindira regore rino rakanga rakanangana nekuyeuchidza dzihurumende kuti hutongo hwejekere hwakanangana nevanhu. Zimbabwe, sedzimwe nyika dzakawanda mupasi rose, inotarisiswawo mabatiro ainoita kodzero dzevanhu, uye kuti iri kutevera zvakadii hutongo hwejekerere. Dzimwe nyika, zvikuru dzekumawirira, pamwe nezvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe, vanopomera hurumende yeZimbabwe mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Izvi zvinonzi ndizvo zvakazosvitsa kuti vamwe vakuru muhurumende yevaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe, kusanganisira naivo VaMugabe, vatemerwe zvirango. Vamwe vanotiwo hapana shanduko yati yavepo pasi pehurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa, iyo iri kupomerwawo mhosva yekutowedzera kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu ichishandisa mapurisa nemauto. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Human Rights Association, VaOkay Machisa, vanoti kunyange hazvo vaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakabatsira mukusunungura Zimbabwe, matongero avakanga vozoita mumashure akanga afanana nekuti vakanosungirira zvakare nyika pavakanga vasunungura. Vanoti hutongo hwejekerere hunoonekwa nemafambisirwo anenge achiitwa sarudzo munyika, pachitariswa kuti vanhu vari kuvhota murunyararo here, uye kuti zvabuda musarudzo zviri kutambirwa zvakadii. VaMachisa vanoti kunyange hazvo Zimbabwe ichiita sarudzo, zvinozobuda musarudzo idzi zvinowanzopikiswa nemamwe mapato anenge apinda musarudzo idzi, izvo zvinozoita kuti paonekwe sekunge hutongo hwejekerere husiri kuteverwa. Vanotiwo nyaya dzekupambwa kwevanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti vanopikisa nehurumende dzeimwe nyaya inosvibisa hurumende panyaya yehutongo hwejekerere. No media source currently available

headline: Varairidzi Vanoti Havana Kuwana Mihoro Yavo neChitatu Sezvakanga Zvavimbiswa neHurumende
text: Rimwe sangano rinomirira varairidzi, reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe rinoti varairidzi havana kuwana mihoro yavo neChitatu sezvakanga zvavimbiswa nehurumende. Mutungamiri wePTUZ, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vanoti varairidzi vaifanirwa kuwana mihoro yavo kumabhanga avo, asi nhengo dzavo dzakawanda dzaivazivisa kuti kwakanga kusina mari sezvo mihoro yakanga isina kuiswa. Asi vamwe vanoti vanofunga kuti kumbovharwa kwemasaisai eindaneti kunogona kunge kuri iko kwakanonotsawo kufambiswa kwemari, sezvo hurumende ichitumira mari idzi kumabhanga dziri maRTGS kuburikidza nemasaisai. Svondo rino hurumende yakazivisa kuti yapa vashandi vayo vose mari yekuti vabatsirikane kubva mukukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu mwedzi uno chete iri pakati pezvikamu makumi maviri nezviviri kubva muzana kusvika pazvikamu zvishanu kubva muzana, zvichienderana nemuhoro wemunhu. Asi Doctor Zhou vanoti sesangano vari kuramba kutambira mari idzi sezvo dziri shoma kwazvo zvichienzaniswa nekukwira kwezvinhu munyika. Vashandi vehurumende vakaramba kutambira zvikamu gumi kubva muzana zvavakanga vaipwa nehurumende svondo rapera, izvo zvakazoita kuti vape hurumende mazuva gumi nemana ekuti igadzirise zvinhu, kukundikana kwayo vanozoramwa mabasa. Doctor Zhou vanoti nhengo dzavo dziri kumboenda kumabasa zuva rimwe chete pasvondo, asi kubva svondo rinouya vanenge votarisisa kuti votora matanho api, sezvo mazuva gumi nemana avakapa hurumende achikwanawo svondo rinouya. No media source currently available

headline: Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kubatwa Pamwe neKufa neCovid-19 Hworamba Hwuchikura
text: Kunyange hazvo huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere cheCOVID-19 huri kuramba huchikwira, vanhu vakawanda havasi kutora matanho ekuzvidzivirira sezviri kukurudzirwa nesangano reWorld Health Organization, akaita sekupfeka mamasiki kumeso kwavo. Kunyange hazvo zviri pachena kuti veruzhinji vari kutapurirana chirwere ichi munyika, kumisika yemabhazi pamwe nekumabhanga vanhu vanenge vakaungana, kana kumanikidzana, izvo zvinoita kuti kutapurirana kweCovid-19 kuve nyore. Studio7 yaona vanhu vazhinji vange vasina kupfeka mamasiki apo vanga vachisangana neveruzhinji muguta reHarare. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaPaul Majaira, avo vanga vasina kuzvidzivirira vati dzimwe nguva vanombokanganwa kuzvidzivirira. Mumwe murume uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita anga akamirira kutora mari pane rimwe bhanga muguta apo vanhu vanga vakatsokodzerana abvuma kuStudio7 kuti ane ruzivo rwekuti huwandu hwevari kubatwa nechirwere cheCOVID-19 munyika huri kukwira. Asi ati kunyange hazvo achiziva kuti kumira vakapatsanurana kunobatsira, nyaya yekutya kupindirwa ndiyo inoita kuti vanhu vabatane vari mumitsetse. VaSimon Zhou, avo vanga vakamirira bhazi kuti vaende kuMt Pleasant Heights, vati vanga vava nemaawa mana vari panzvimbo imwe chete, izvo zvinogona kuti vabate chirwere ichi. Vatiwo vanhu havasi kutariswa temperature kana kupihwa zvekuzora maoko ava pavanenge vachipinda mumabhazi eZupco sezvaiitika pakatanga kuvhurwa nyika. Munyori wezvehutano muMDC Alliance, uye vakambove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr. Henry Madzorera, vati vanhu vanofanirwa kuchengetedza hutano hwavo kuburikidza nekutevedzera zvinokurudzirwa nevehutano. Dr. Madzorera vakurudzirawo kuti munguva ino yechando dai veruzhinji vagara kudzimba. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, Va John Mangwiro, vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti vari kuwedzera kudzidzisa veruzhinji nezvechirwere ichi pamwe nekuwedzera vanhu vanoongororwa kuitira kudzivirira kutapuriranwa kwechirwere ichi. Vachitaura kumusangano wePolitburo yebato ravo, mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vatiwo kukwira kuri kuita huwandu hwevari kubatwa neCOVID-19 kuchaitawo kuti vatarise zvakare nyaya yekuvharwa kwenyika. Huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa pamwe nekufa nechirwere cheCovid-19 hausi kukwira muZimbabwe chete, sezvo izvi zviri kuitikawo munyika dzakawanda pasi rose, iro rave nevanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi nemaviri vabatwa nechirwere ichi, vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi masere nezvisere nemazana maviri ane gumi nevaviri, vari vemuZimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Huwandu hweVari Kubatwa neCovid-19 Vagara Vari Munyika Hwoshusha Nyanzvi dzeZvehutano
text: Kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vasina nhoroondo yekubuda munyika vave kuwanikwa vaine chirwere cheCovid-19 kunonzi nedzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehutano chinhu chinofanirwa kuvhundutsa hurumende pamwe neveruzhinji kuti patorwe matanho nekukasika. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko ebazi rezvehutano akabuda nemusi weChina ekuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa neCovid-19 munyika hwakanga hwakwira kusvika pachiuru nemazana matatu nemakumi matanhatu nevaviri, kana kuti 1 362 pakupera kwezuva. Bazi iri rinoti huwandu uhwu hwakakwira zvichitevera kuwanikwa kwevamwe mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe nevatatu kana kuti 273, vaine chirwere ichi, mazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu kana kuti 260, vari vanhu vagara vanga vari munyika, gumi nevatatu kana kuti 13, vari vanhu vakadzoka munyika kubva kunze. Huwandu hwevanhu vafa munyika hwakakwira kusvika pamakumi maviri nevatatu kana kuti 23, uye vapora vave mazana mana nemakumi maviri nevashanu, kana kuti 425. Vanhu vakaongororwa kana vaine chirwere ichi nemusi weChina vaisvika chiuru nemazana mashanu nemakumi mashanu nemumwe kana kuti 1 551. Dunhu rinonzi rine vanhu vakawandisa vari kuwanikwa vaine chirwere ichi idunhu reBulawayo, iro rine vanhu vanosvika mazana mana negumi nevapfumbamwe, 419, richiteverwa neHarare ine vanhu mazana matatu nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe, kana kuti 389. Pave nekutyirwa kuti sezvo guta reBulawayo riine vanhu vakawanda vari kubatwa vaine chirwere ichi, rinogona kunge risina kugadzirira zvakakwana kuchengeta vanhu vari kuwanikwa vaine Covid-19 ava. Asi zvipatara zviviri zvakagadzurudzwa mazuva apera aya kuti zvitambire varwere veCovid-19 zvinoti Thorngrove ne Ekusileni, zvinonzi zvatanga kushanda. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica, iyo iri kutevera kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi pasi rose, inoti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi nematatu nezviuru mazana masere kana kuti 13.8 million vabatwa pasi rose, vafa vachidarika mazana mashanu nemakumi manomwe ezviuru kana kuti 590 000. MuAmerica chete, vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 3.5 million vabatwa nacho uye vafa vadarika zviuru zana nemakumi matatu nezvisere kana kuti 138 000. South Africa, iyo inove ine vanhu vakawandisa muAfrica vane Covid-19, uye iri muvakidzani weZimbabwe, yave nevanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi maviri nezvina kana kuti 324 000 vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi. Vanhu vafa muSouth Africa vasvika pazviuru zvina nemazana matanhatu nemakumi matanhatu nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 4 669. Vazhinji vevanhu vari kuwanikwa vaine covid-19 vachibva kunze kwenyika vari kubva kuSouth Africa. Doctor Gilson Mandigo, avo vari muHarare, vanoti havasi vose vari kubva kunyika iyi vari kupinda nepamiganho iri pamutemo, sezvo kuine vamwe vari kusvetuka muganhu vachipinda munyika vasina kuvhenekwa. Vanoti izvi ndezvimwe zvezvinhu zviri kuwedzera dambudziko iri munyika sezvo hurumende isingazokwanisa kuziva kuti apinda munyika zviri kunze kwemutemo ndeupi. Doctor Mandigo vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kusimbisa mutemo wekusafambafamba, zvikuru kurambida vanhu vanobva mumatunhu ane dambudziko guru rechirwere ichi kuti vasashanyira dzimwe nzvimbo. Hurumende iri kukurudzirwawo kuti iwedzere kuvhenekwa kwevanhu vagara vari munyika, zvikuru vari kumaruwa, uko kunoshanyirwa nevakawanda vanobva mumadhorobha nemaguta ane vanhu vari kubatwa vaine chirwere che covid-19. Vanotiwo veruzhinji vanofanirwa kuita bandiko ravo kuburikidza nekupfeka zvekuvhara miromo nemhino kana kuti ma mask, kugeza maoko avo nesipo pamwe nekukoshesa nyaya yesiya mikaha pakati pavo uye kusangoungana. Doctor Mandigo vari kukurudzirawo hurumende kuti kana yodzamisa mutemo wekurambidza kufambafamba kwevanhu iisewo mukana wekuti veruzhinji vakwanise kuwana chekudya, vachiti panogona kuzoguma pave nedambudziko rekufa kwevanhu nenzara, kwete necovid-19. Asi vanoti mitengo yezvekuvhara miromo nemhino iri pamusoro zvakanyanya muzvitoro zviri kutengesa, vakati dai pawanikwa zvinokwanisa kuwachwa kana zvashandiswa kuitira kuti veruzhinji vasarasikirwa nemari yakawanda.  No media source currently available

headline: ‘Mabhinya’ ava kuda Graham Potter
text: CHIKWATA chenhabvu chekuEngland, cheChelsea chinonzi chiri kuita hurukuro nemurairidzi weBrighton & Hove – Graham Potter – uyo wavanoda kuti agotsiva Thomas Tuchel zvichitevera kudzingwa basa kwaakaitwa nezuro.   Varairidzi vakawanda vanosanganisira Zinedine Zidane naMauricio Pochettino vange vachifungidzirwa kuti vanogona kutsiva Tuchel sevarairidzi ve”Chele” kana kuti “Mabhinya”, asi pane mashoko anoti Potter ndiye ari kudiwa neChelsea.   Chikwata cheBrighton & Hove chakatopa Potter mvumo yekuti akurukure neMabhinya uye zvikafamba zvakanaka, anotarisirwa kunge akagara pabhenji reChelsea svondo rino apo ichasangana neFulham.   Kana Chelsea ikaita chibvumirano naPotter, inotarisirwa kubhadhara mari inosvika 12 miriyoni paunzi yekumutenga kubva kuBrighton.

headline: Nhomba yeCovid-19 Iri Kubva kuChina Ichapihwa Vanhu Isina Kuongororwa muZimbabwe
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti mushonga wekudzivirira Covid-19 uyo uri kutanga kusvika nemusi weMuvhuru ichibva China, unofanira kutevedza gwara rinoshandiswa pamishonga yese inopinda munyika rekuti unotanga waongoororwa kuti unoshanda sei muZimbabwe zvichienderana nemhando yehutachiwana huri muno usati wapihwa veruzhinji. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vanoti mushonga usati watengwa, Zimbabwe, kuburikidza nebazi rehutano, inotanga yaongorora kuti mushonga uyu wakagadzirwa sei kunyika kwaunobva, uye kuti zvawakashatira ndezvipi veruzhinji vasati vapihwa mushonga uyu. Vati panopinda mushonga uyu munyika, unofanira kutanga waongororwa sezvo wakagadzirwa kudunhu repasi rino rakasiyana neZimbabwe. VaMadzorera vati ongororo iyi inogona kuitwa mukati meguva pfupi sezvo denda reCovid-19 riri kupararira nekusaika. VaMadzorera vati pari zvino havana ruzivo kuti izvi zvakaitwa here kana kuti kwete sezvo hurumende isiri kubuda pachena nehurongwa hwayo. Imwe nyanzvi yezvehutano, Dr Peter Mataruse, vatiwo tarisiro yavo ndeyekuti Medicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe, ichaongorora mishonga yeCovid-19 sezvainoita pamishonga yese inopinda munyika sezvinodiwa nemitemo yakaita kuti bazi iri riumbwe munyika. Vati ongororo idzi dzinogona kuitwa kunyange hazvo mushonga watove munyika. Sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano, Dr Ruth Labode, vatsinhira mashoko emamwe machiremba, vachiti paramende inotarisira kuti bazi rehutano richavapakurira zvizere nemusi weChipiri pavanotanga kugara dare reNational Assembly. Mukuru weMedicine Control Authority of Zimbabwe, VaRichard Rukwata, vatiwo vakapa hurumende mvumo yekuunza mishonga yeCovid-19 munyika mushure mekunge yatevedza zvese zvinodiwa pasi pemitemo yenyika. Pasi pechibvumirano cheZimbabwe Covid-19 National Development and Vacccination Strategy, Medicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe inopa mvumo yekuunza nekushandisa mishonga iyi mukati memazuva mashanu ichinge yapihwa humbowo hunoratidza kuti mishonga iyi yakanyoreswa munyika dzayakagadzirwa, uye kuti yakanyoreswawo nesangano reWorld Health Organisation here kana kuti kwete. Vati panofanirawo kuitwa ongororo yekuona kuti mishonga iyi haikanganise here vanhu munyika yose. Vati kunyange hazvo ongororo dzakadai dzichikwanisa kutora nguva yakareba, dzinokwanisa kuitwa mukati memazuva manomwe sezvo mishonga iyi iri kushandiswa zvechimbichimbi. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rinoona nezvehutano, Dr John Mangwiro, vati hurumende yakatevedza zvese zvinodiwa uye vari kutevedza hunyanzvi hwesainzi pamatanho ese avari kutora. Gurukota rezvehutano, uye vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, vati zvinhu zose zviri mugwara uye mushonga uri kusvika munyika, uchabva wapihwa vanhu vari muchikamu chekutanga kuwana nhomba iyi. Vanhu ava vanosanganisira vana chiremba, vakoti, vashandi vemuzvipatara nevose vanoita mabasa anonzi akakosha zvikuru. Izvi zvinoburitsa pachena kuti hurumende haina hurongwa hwekutanga yaongorora nhomba iyi isati yapihwa veruzhinji. Mutangamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanotarisira kugamuchira mishonga yeSinopharm inosvika mazana maviri ezviuru nemusi weMuvhuro painosvika munyika ichibva kuChina. No media source currently available

headline: Zvizvarwa zveZimbawe Zvofarira Kuvhurwa kweBhodha neBotswana Svondo Rinouya
text: Varidzi vemabhazi anofamba pakati peHarare neGaborone nemamwe maguta ari munyika dzakatenderedza Zimbabwe vanoti vafadzwa zvikuru nedanho ratorwa neBotswana rekuti vatange kushanda musi wa1 Zvita. Gurukota rinoona nezvekutakurwa kwevanhu nezvinhu uye kufambiswa kwemashoko muBotswana, VaThulaganyo Segokgo vaivisa nezvedanho iri vachitaura nevatori venhau nemusi weMuvhuro. VaSegokgo vazivisa kuti rimwe remabhodha mashanu ari kuvhurwa zvizere kubva musi wa1 Zvita ndere Plumtre-Ramokgwebana iro rinoshandiswa zvikuru nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe. Botswana yakavhara mabhodha ayo nenyika dzakaitenderedza muna Kubvumbi gore rino senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiwana hweCovid-19. Kuvharwa kwemabhodha uku kwakakanda ruzhinji rwezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe mukanwa mamupere sezvo zvichirarama nekutenga zvinhu kunyika dzakatenderedza Zimbabwe zvichinotengesa kumusha. Mukuru kukambani yeMangongongo Logistics ine mabhazi anobva mudhorobha reFrancistown muBotswana achienda kuHarare VaMartin Vumbani vati bhizimisi range radzokera kumashure zvakanyanya nekuvharwa kwemabhodha. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinotyaira kukambani imwe cheteyo VaThompson Moyo vatsinhira mashoko aya. Kunyange hazvo vachigamuchira kuvhurwa kwemabhodha nemaoko maviri, VaMoyo vaenderera mberi vachiti vachatenda maruva vadya chakata nokuti zvinoda kutevedza kuti kusaparadzirwa hutachiwana hhweCovid-19 hazvisi nyore kuzadzikisa. Vachitsigira mashoko aVaMoyo, VaThomas Muzavazi vaudza Studio 7 kuti dai nyika dziri mudunhu reSADC dzataurirana kuti vanhu vasabhadhariswe mari zhinji pakuvhenekwa hutachiwana hweCoronavirus. Vafambi vanotarisirwa kuva nechitambi chinoratidza kuti havana chirwere cheCOVID-19 uye kutewedzera zvinodikanwa kuti hutachiwana husapararire kusanganisira kupfeka maface mask, kugeza maoko nguva dzose uye kusaungana kwenguva refu. Vakuru mubazi rezvekupinda nekubuda kwevanhu muZimbabwe vakatozivisa dare reparamende kuti havana zvimwe zvikwanisiro zvekuona kuti vanhu havapinde here pamabhodha nemapepa ekunyeba vachiti vanoda mari yekutenga michina yechizvinozvino. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanoti Vanenge Vakundwa Ngavabvume Kukundwa
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanoti vanhu vanenge vakundwa musarudzo vanofanirwa kubvuma kukundwa voshanda nekupembera nevanenge vakakunda kuitira kuti munyika muve nerunyararo. Vachitaura nhasi muBanket apo vanga vachitsvaira marara mumusha unogara veruzhinji weKuwadzana, VaMnangagwa vati vanhu vanofanirwa kuwirirana munyika, uye kuti kana munhu akundwa musarudzo, haafanirwe kuita zvemhirizhonga asi kuti anofanirwa kupembera nevakakunda kuti munyika muve nerunyararo. VaMnangagwa vati kana munhu akundwa anofanirwa kusiya zvinenge zvamukundisa zvemhirizhonga, uyo anenge akunda sezvavakaita, oramba achiita zvinoita kuti arambe achikunda. VaMnangagwa vati bato ravo reZanu PF rinokunda nokudaro richaramba richiita zvinokundisa zvekuenda kunonzwa zvichemo zvevanhu nekuzvigadzirisa sezvavakaita zvekuunza mabhazi anobhadharwa mari shoma yekufambisa. Kunyange VaMnangagwa vasina kudoma bato nezita, vazhinji vanoti ibato rinopikisa reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa ranga richitaurwa. Asi mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato reMDC, VaLuke Tamborinyoka, vati bato ravo harisi kuzobva pachokwadi chekuti VaMnangagwa vakabirira sarudzo izvo vanoti Zimbabwe Electoral Commission yakabvuma nekuchinja zvakabuda musarudzo katatu. Panyaya yehutsanana VaMnangagwa vati hurumende ichaisa mutemo wekuti motokari dzose dzinotakura veruzhinji zvikuru mabhazi dzive nemabhini ekurasira marara sezvo zvakaonekwa kuti vanhu vanenge vari mudzimotokari vanorasa marara nepamahwindo. Asi mumwe mugari wemuBanket asina kuda kudomwa nezita anoti kuchenesa nzvimbo hakufanirwe kumirira zuva rinotsvaira mutungamiri wenyika sezviri kuitika muBanket umo makatsvairwa nezuro nekuti VaMnangagwa vari kuuya. VaMnangangwa, avo vasvika muBanket nguva dza 8 manganani dzavanga vachitarisirwa, vaudza vanhu kuti vakurumidza nekuti vari kuenda kuAdis Ababa, KuEthiopia nhasi kumusangano weAfrican Union. No media source currently available

headline: Paramende Inopasisa Bhiri reRBZ Kuti Hurumende Itore Zvikwereti Zvayo Zvose
text: Dare reNational Assembly rapasisa bhiri reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe Debt Assumption iro rinopa hurumende mvumo yekutora zvikwereti zvese zvebhanga guru renyika. No media source currently available Banga iri rine zvikwereti zvinosvilka bhiriyoni nemazana matatu ezviuru zvemadhora. Bhiri iri rapasa mushure mekupopotedzana pakati penhengo dzebato reMovement for Democratic Change pamwe nhengo dzeZanu PF, MDC ichiti vose vane zvikwereti kuRBZ havafanirwe kuvhota. Zvichitevera kupopotedzana uku, dare razovhota uye nhengo dzeZanu PF zana negumi neshanu dzatsigira bhiri iri, nhengo makumi matatu nenomwe dze MDC dzapikisa bhiri iri. Vachitaura mushure mekuvhota uku, mumiriri weKuwadzana East, VaNelson Chamisa, vebato reMDC vati zvaitwa nedare zvakashata chose sezvo rabvumidza dzimwe nhengo dzeZanu PF dzakapihwa zvinhu neRBZ kuti dzivhote. Asi gurukota rezvamari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, avo vakaunza bhiri iri kudare vati kugunununa kwaVaChamisa nebato ravo hakuna maturo ose. Mumiriri weBulawaro Central, Amai Dorcus Sibanda, vati vasuwa nezvaitika sezvo veruzhinji vave kuzobhadhara zvikwereti zvakatorwa nenhengo dzeZanu PF. RBZ yakaita chikwereti ichi mushure mekutengera nhengo dzedare dzeZanu PF nevamwe vatsigiri vebato iri matirakita, motokari nezvimwe. Amai Sibanda vanoti vanhu vemudunhu ravo vanoda kuti wese akapihwa zvinhu neRBZ abhadhare kana kudzora zvinhu zvacho kana asingakwanise kubhadhara. Vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zviri kuitwa nehurumende zvekutora zvikwereti zveRBZ zvakashata chose uye zvichaita kuti chikwereti chayo chirambe chichikura. Vatiwo izvi zvinokanganisawo mukana wekuti hurumende iwane rubatsiro rwemari kubva kune dzimwe nyika nemasangano anobatsira. Dzimwe nhengo dzeMDC dziri kukurudzira kuti nhengo dzebato dziri mudare reparamende dzibude zvadzo sezvo pasina zvido zve MDC zvadziri kumirira. Asi vamwe vashoma vanoti vacharamba vari muparamende vachimirira zvido zvevanhu vakavavhotera. Bhiri iri rave kuenda kudare reSenate uko rinotarisirwa kupasa nyore nyore sezvo Zanu PF ine nhengo dzakawanda kudarika MDC mudare iri. Kana rabva ikoko rinobva ranosainwa nemutungamiriri wenyika kuti rive mutemo.

headline: Vamwe Vanoti Zvakarwirwa Hondo Hazvina Kuzadzikiswa Sezvo Nhamo Yatekeshera
text: Apo Zimbabwe iri kucherechedza zuva remagamba vamwe vanoti zvakarwirwa muhondo yerusununguko zviri kuzadzikiswa, asi vamwe vachitiwo kutambura kuri kuita vana veZimbabwe, chiratidzo chekuti nyika haisisiri mugwara raitarisirwa nevakarwira nyika. Munyori mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association, VaDouglas Mahiya, vanoti zvimwe zvakarwirwa muhondo yeChimurenga, kutora masimba ezvematongerwo enyika kwakaitwa nevanhu vatema. VaMahiya, avo vanove nhengo yeZanu PF, vanotiwo chimwe chakagonekwa munyika kupihwa kwakaitwa vanhu vatema mapurazi, kunyange hazvo zvakarwirwa muhondo yeChimurenga zvisina kubudirira zvese. VaMahiya vanoti hurumende yaiva yaVaRobert Mugabe yakavhiringa zvinhu nekuisa vanhu muzvinzvimbo asi vasina ruzivo rwezvakaenderwa kuhondo. Mumwe aive murwiri werusununguko, VaShadreck Makombe, vanotiwo chakanyanyobudirira kuwaniswa kuwaniswa minda kwevanhu vatema. Asiwo VaMakombe vanoti vamwe havachakoshesi vaimbove varwiri verusununguko, kunyanya vechidiki, vavanoti havachaoni kubatsira kwekusununguka kwenyika nekuti vanoona zvinhu zvavo zvisingachafambi. VaMakombe vanoti tarisiro yavo huru ndeyekuti mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, varange vese vane huori munyika. Mumwe muongorori wezvematongerwo enyika, Dr Tinashe Mawere, vanoti kwavari hapana chakachinja patsika dzehutongi sezvo kuchine hudzvinyiriri. Vanotiwo vanoona sekuti ropa rakadeukira mahara munguva yehondo. Mutauriri webato reMDC, VaDaniel Molekele, vanotiwo zvakarwirwa muhondo yekusunungura nyika zvakasiyana zvikuru nezviri kuitika munyika pari zvino. VaMolekele vanoti Zimbabwe yava kutoda kuvakwa patsva. Asi VaMahiya vanoti kutambura kuri kuitika munyika kwakakonzerwa nehutongi hwaVaMugabe, uhwo husina kugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika, izvo vanoti zvava kugadziriswa nehurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Vakawanda vanoti havaoni kukosha kwekuzvitonga kana munyika musina mabasa, kodzero dzevanhu dzichityorwa nehurumende, muzvipatara muchishaikwa mishonga, zvinhu zvichidhura muzvitoro, vanhu vachiita zvidzidzo zvepamusoro soro asi vachipedzisira votengesa zvinhu mumigwagwa nepamusana pekushaikwa kwemabasa. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weNyika, VaMnangagwa, Vanosimuka Kuenda kuDavos kuMusangano weWorld Economic Forum
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakasimuka neSvondo manheru vakananga kuSwizterland kumusangano wekuzeya matambudziko akatarisana nepasi rose weWorld Economic Forum, uyo unoitirwa muguta reDavos. Musangano uyu wakatanga neSvondo uye unopera musi weChina svondo rino. VaMnangagwa vari kutarisirwa kuita misangano yepamusorosoro nevatungamiri vedzimwe nyika pamwe nevakuru vezvemabhizimusi emuEurope muhurongwa hwavo hwekuedza kukwezva vemabhizimusi kuti vapinde munyika. Musangano weWorld Economic Forum uyu uri kutarisirwa kupindwa nevatungamiri venyika, vemabhizimusi pamwe nevemasangano akazvimirira vanoda kusvika kuzviuru zviviri nemazana mashanu, avo vari kutarisirwa kuzeya nyaya dziri kutambudza pasi rino dzinosanganisira denda reCovid-19, hondo iri pakati peRussia neUkraine, kusagadzikana kwehupfumi pamwe nekushanduka kwemamiriro ekunze. Muzvinafundo Elliot Masocha, vanove nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi nekudyidzana kwenyika dzapasi rose, vari zvakare mudzidzisi mukuru wezvemabhizimusi paDevry University muAmerica, vanoti musangano uyu wakakosha zvikuru kuZimbabwe nepasi rose Panyaya yekuti VaMnangagwa vane chavanodzoka nacho here kubva kumusangano uyu, Muzvinafundo Masocha vanoti havaoni paine chinokohwe nekuda kwekuti nhoroondo yeZimbabwe munyaya dzezvikwereti pamwe nekumabatiro ayo enyaya dzezvemabhizimusi nehupfumi zvinogona kuvakanganisa. No media source currently available

headline: Varimi Votambira Kurudziro Yekuti Varimi Vatengese Dzimwe Mombe
text: Rimwe sangano revarimiri, reZimbabwe Commercial Farmers’ Union, ZCFU, rinoti varimi vanofanirwa kutambira kurudziro yehurumende yekuti vatapudze zvipfuwo zvavo munguva ino yekushaikwa kwemafuro, kuitira kuti vasazorasikirwa nepfuma yavo. Rimwe sangano revarimi, reZimbabwe Commercial Farmers’ Union, ZCFU, rinoti varimi vanofanirwa kutambira kurudziro yehurumende yekuti vatapudze zvipfuwo zvavo munguva ino yekushaikwa kwemafuro, kuitira kuti vasazorasikirwa nepfuma yavo. Mukuru wesangano iri, VaJeremiah Tevera, vanoti sangano ravo ragara richikurudzira varimi vari mumatunhu ane nzara kuti vatengese zvimwe zvipfuwo zvavo kuitira kuti vawane mari yekutenga chikafu chekupa kune zvimwe zvipfuwo zvavanenge vasara nazvo. “Ishoko rakanaka ravari kutaura asi isu sesangano tinoona sekunge ranga ranonoka kuuya nekuti zvipfuwo zviri kufa,” VaTevera vanodaro. Mutevedzeri wegurukurota rezvekurima vakanangana nezvipfuwo, VaPaddy Zhanda, vanonzi nedandemutande renhau reThe Source vari kukurudzirawo varimi kuti vaite nhimuramiswe, vasachiva kuverenga mombe dzakawanda asi idzo dzichizofa dzoga nenzara. Vazhanda vanonzi vari kutarisirwa kushanya kumatunhu eMatabeland South neMatabeleland North neChitatu kuti vasangane nevarimi kuti vakurukure nezvemamiriro akaita zvinhu pamwe nezvekurudziro yavo iyi. Takundikana kubata VaZhanda kuti tinzwe nezvehurongwa hwavo uhwu. Mombe dzinodarika zviuru zvinomwe dzinonzi dzafa mukati memwedzi mina yapfuura nekuda kwekushaiwa mafuro. Hurumende mwedzi wapera yakaparura chirongwa chekubatsira varimi nechikafu chezvipfuyo zvavo mudunhu reChiredzi, asi vamwe varimi vanonzi vari kukundikana kuwana madhora masere ekuti vatenge tsaga rimwe chete rechikafu ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Madzimai Obatwa Chibharo neKubirwa Zvowedzerwa Nekushomeka kweMabhazi eZUPCO
text: Sangano rePassengers Association of Zimbabwe rinoti danho rehurumende rekubvisa makombi mumigwagwa nechinangwa chekuda kuvamanikidza kuti vaite mushandirapamwe nekambani yehurumende yeZUPCO rave kuisa hupenyu hwevanhu vakawanda munjodzi. Izvi zvinotevera kukwira kwehuwandu hwemadzimai ari kubatwa chibharo uye kubirwa zvakanyanya kwevanhu nevanhu vane motokari dzinozivikanwa nekuti mishikashika. Vachinyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter, mapurisa anoti vanhu havafanire kukwira motokari dzemushikashika idzi uye havafanire kutakura mari yakawanda. Mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi mumashoko kuvatori vanhu vanotiwo muHarare ndimo manyanya nyaya dzekubatwa chibharo kwemadzimai uye kubirwa kwevanhu. Motokari dziri kushandiswa nematsotsi aya dzinosanganisira maHonda Fit nemaToyota Wish, vanhu vari kubirwa mari nenharembozha. Vanhu vakawanda vaudza Studio 7 kuti mabhazi eZUPCO mashoma nekudaro vanozogumisira vakwira chero motokari. Mutungamiri wePassengers Association of Zimbabwe VaTafadzwa Goliati vaudza Studio 7 kuti mabhazi mashoma zvosiya vanhu vokwira motokari dzematsotsi. No media source currently available

headline: Raza apinda muTeam of the Tournament
text: MUTAMBI wemaChevrons, Sikandar Raza, akasarudzwa kupinda muchikwata cheUpstox Most Valubale Team of the ICC Men’s T20 World Cup 2022.   Zvichitevera kupera kwakaita mutambo weICC T20 World Cup uyo waitambirwa kuAustralia uye wakazohwinwa neEngland mushure mekukunda Pakistan musi weSvondo wadarika, Raza akadomwa kuve mumwe wevakatamba zvinonwisa mvura kumutambo uyu.   Akapinda muchikwata chakasarudzwa cheTeam of the Tournament chine vamwe vakaita saAlex Hales weEngland, Jos Buttler (England), Virat Kohli (India), Glen Phillips (New Zealand) naShadab Khan (Pakistan).   Muchikwata chemaChevrons chakanokwikwidza kumutambo uyu, Raza mumwe wevatambi vakadadisa izvo zvakaona achiita 216 runs uye ndokutora 10 wickets.   Ichi chiremerera chikuru sezvo zvinorakidza kusimukira kuri kuita mutambo uyu munyika muno zvichitevera kugadzwa kwakaitwa Dave Houghton pachigaro chinopisa chekurairidza maChevrons nguva pfupi yadarika.   Mumutambo uchangopera uyu weT20 World Cup, maCheverons akapedza ari pekupedzisira muboka reGroup B reSuper 12.   Chikwata chenyika ichi chakangokwanisa kuhwina mutambo mumwe chete wePakistan ndokuita mangange neSouth Africa uyo wakazotadziswa kupera nekuda kwemvura yakanaya musi wacho.   Zvakadaro, Zimbabwe yakapihwa chiremerera chekuronga mutambo weICC U19 Men’s World Cup 2026 pamwe chete neNamibia.   Sachigaro weZimbabwe Cricket (ZC), Tavengwa Mukuhlani, anoti sangano ravo riri kunzwa manyukunyuku nechiremerera chikuru chakapihwa nyika ichi.   “Tiri kunzwa kufara kuti mutambo weICC U19 Men’s World Cup 2026 uri kuzotambirwa muZimbabwe.   “Izvi hazvibatsire kungosimukira kwemutambo uyu munyika chete, asi mukana wekurakidza kuti tiri imwe yenyika dzine mukurumbira mukutamba mutambo uyu pasi rese.   “Panosvika 2026, tinenge takagadzirira zvikuru,” anodaro.   Zimbabwe zvekare yakapihwa mukana wekuronga mutambo weICC Men’s World Cup 2027 wevakuru pamwe chete neSouth Africa neNamibia.

headline: Vashandi veChitungwiza Voenderera Mberi Vachiramwa Mabasa, Asi Kanzuru Ichiti Vari Kushanda
text: Vamwe vashandi vekanzuru yeChitungwiza vanosanganisira vanamukoti nevari muboka rezvehutano, vari kuramwa mabasa vachinyunyuta kuti vanoda zvikwanisiro zvinovadzivirira kubva kuCoronavirus, kana kuti ma Personal Protective Equipment, uyewo mari dzekubatsirikana munguva ino yeCOVID-19. Vanamukoti mumakiriniki ekanzuru ose vanonzi vari kungogara zvavo pabasa vasingashande vachizongobatsira chete vanenge vaine pamuviri panoda rubatsiro rwechimbi-chimbi. Vamwe vari kuramwa mabasa vanonzi vashandi vekudivi remvura pamwe nevekudivi rinoona nezvekuraswa kwetsvina. Vachipindura mubvunzo wedu, vakafanobata chigaro chamabharani wekanzuru yeChitungwiza, Doctor Tonderai Kasu, vati mashoko avawana nhasi anoratidza kuti vanamukoti vari pamabasa avo uye vari kushanda semazuva ose. Doctor Kasu vatiwo vari kutowana chikumbiro kubva kuvashandi vari kushanda usiku chekuti vawaniswe chekufambisa. Asi vati mamiriro ezvinhu haasati anyatsogadzikana uye vachiri mushishi kugadzirisa zvichemo zvose zvakasimudzwa navamukoti. Asi sachigaro vesangano rinomirira vashandi reChitungwiza Municipality Workers’ Union, Reverend Ephraim Katsina, vanoti kanzuru inofanirwa kukoshesa hutano hwevashandi vayo kuitira kuti ivo vapewo vagari hutano hwakakodzera, zvikuru munguva ino yeCOVID-19. Nekudaro, Reverend Katsina vanoti kanzuru inofanirwa kuita musangano wechimbi-chimbi nevamiriri vevashandi kuitira kuti dambudziko iri rigadziriswe vashandi vadzokere mumabasa. No media source currently available

headline: ‘dembare hainyure’
text: MUTAMBI weDynamos FC, Kudzanayi Dhemere, anotsidza kuti iye pamwe nevamwe vatambi vechikwata ichi vachasunga dzisimbe kuti DeMbare “isanyure” mwaka uno.   Masvondo adarika chikwata ichi change chichinyombwa nevatsigiri vezvimwe zvikwata nekudzikira kwachaita zvasvika pakuchiona chichirwira kuti chisaburitswe muligi reCastle Premiership.   Mwaka uno, tariro huru yaive kuDeMbare iyo yakapedza iri pechiri gore radarika asi zvakaenda nepamwe sezvo chikwata ichi chiri kutatarika zvikuru nekuda kwezvikonzero zvakasiyana.   DeMbare parizvino yasarirwa nemitambo minomwe uye iri kufanirwa kuhwina yese kana ichida kuramba iri muCastle Premiership asi mitambo yacho haina kumbochipa sezvo vhiki rino ichasangana neFC Platinum kuMandava Stadium, kuZvishavane.   Asi sekutaura kwaDhemere anoti hakuna gomo risingakwirike.   “Zvinhu zvinoenda nepamwe asi tiri kuramba takashinga, tichirwa semvumba kuti tirambe tiri muCastle Premiership.   “Tiri Dynamos isu chikwata chikuru munhabvu yemuno uye chine nhoroondo huru panyaya dzenhabvu. Saka hatimbosiye chikwata chedu chichinyura, kwete tinoramba. Kunyangwe zviome sei tinoramba tichishanda nesimba kuti tifadze vatsigiri vedu,” anodaro Dhemere.    Pakutanga kwemwaka uno, zvikuru zvaitarisirwa kubva kuna Dhemere uyo akambotamba nhabvu yainwisa mvura izvo zvakamuona achibatsira DeMbare kuhwina mukombe weZNA Charity Shield apo yakakunda CAPS UNITED kusemi-fainari uye neHighlanders mufainari yemutambo uyu.    Mumitambo miviri iyi, Dhemere aitamba nhabvu kunge akasvikirwa sezvo akanwisa mune yese.   Asi, mumwaka wegore rino mutambi uyu akwanisa kunwisa kaviri chete.    “Ini hangu handisi kufara nematambiro andaita, ndinoziva kuti ndogona kutamba zvepamusoro kudarika zvandaita mwaka uno asi ndichiri kukura uye ndichiri kudzidza.   “Asi ndikaramba ndichishanda nesimba pamwe nechikwata changu tinoziva kuti tinosimuka zvakare,” anodaro Dhemere.   Maneja weDeMbare, Richard Chihoro, svondo rapera akabuda pachena kuti chikwata chake chiri kutatarika mwaka uno zvichitevera kubva kwakaita Christian ‘Ntouba’ Epoupa uyo aichitungamira mukurwira mukombe uye ndiye aive top goal scorer kuDynamos apo akanwisa ka12.   Kubva kwaEpoupa kuri kuonekwa mwaka uno sezvo mutambi ari kutungamira pakunwisa kuDeMbare ndiQuality Kadzange uyo angokwanisa kunwisa katanhatu chete mumitambo yePSL.

headline: Highlanders neFC Platinum dzotarisirwa Kupinda muMafinals eChibuku Super Cup
text: Makundano eChibuku Super Cup ar ikupinda musemi fainari apo Highlanders yadongorera mufainari. Chikwata chinotora mukombe weChibuku Super Cup chinobudirira kumiririra nyika mumakwikwi emuAfrica eCaf Confederation Cup Highlanders haisi kuvanza kuti chinangwa chavo ndechekutora mikombe yese mikuru weleaague newe Chibuku Super Cup. Chikwata ichi svondo rino chiri kuswedera pedyo nekuzadzikisa chinangwa chavo apo vari kusangana neNgezi Platinum Stars musemi fainari yeChibuku Super Cup muBabourfields Stadium. Pakambosangana zvikwata zviviri izvi munhandare imwe cheteyo, Ngezi Platinum Stars yakabuda ichizhamba ichiti yaive yabirirwa mushure mekunge Highlanders yapihwa penareti mutambo wave kupera ndokukunda 2-1. Asi ikozvino kuzhamba uku kungangotadza kuitika sezvo Highladers yacho iri kubvira moto. Bosso yakunda mumitambo gumi yavo yakateverana zvekuti pane vakawanda varikuti Ngezi Platinum Stars haisi kumira. Mutori wedu wenhau dzemitambo Michael Kariati anotipa nyaya iyi. VaRichard Musengezi mutsigiri wenhabvu vanoti mutambo uyu uchange wakaoma asi vari kuona Highlanders ichienderera mberi nekukunda kwayo. Asi Highlnders isafunge kuti yakatokunda kare nekuti Ngezi Platinum Stars inozivikanwa nenyaya yekuita zvishamiso. Imwe semi fainari iri kuMandava Stadium mangwana uko FC Platinum irikubandana neHarare City iyo inorairidzwa naMoses Chunga. Pakapedzisira kusangana zvikwata zviviri izvi Kugona Kunenge Kudada yakarohwa 2-1 ndokubviswa pamusoro pegungano reCastle Lager Premier Soccer League zvekuti vane shungu dzekudzorera. Murairidzi wavo Norman Mapeza anoti haasi kutarisa kuti uyu mutambo weligi kana wemukombe. Anoti iye vari kugadzirira mutambo uyu sezvavaingoita imwe yese yavakatamba. Murairidzi wemaSunshine City Boys Moses Chunga anoti mutambo wese wavanotamba vanotarisira kukunda achiti iye zvemutambo we Platinum arikuzvigadzirisa. Vakawanda vasineyi nezvikwata zvirikutamba izvi varikuona kunge fainari ichave pakati peFC Platinum neHighlanders. Fainari yemukombe uyu iriko musi wa 5 Mbudzi.

headline: pe yakahwapura mukombe
text: CHIKORO chePrince Edward ndicho chakahwapura mukombe wemakwikwi eDairyboard Rugby Schools Festival ayo akaitirwa muHarare svondo rapera.   Prince Edward yakakunda Churchill Boys 16-10 mufainari yainakidza kukunda ngoma kurira.   Tawanda Jimu – uyo anove Dairyboard Rugby Schools Festival Tournament director – anoti makwikwi aya akakosha sezvo vachiashandisa kutsvaga nyanzvi dzemangwana dzichazomirira nyika pamwe nezvikwata zvikuru zvemutambo uyu.   Anoti makwishu egore rino akarakidza kuti mutambo werugby wakura zvikuru uye uri kutambwa muzvikoro, vachitarisa zvikwata zvakawanda zvakauya kuzokwikwidza zvevakomana nevasikana.   “Tichiongorora zvikwata zvese zvakauya, takazviona kuti mutambo uyu uri kuramba uchikura uye uchisimudzira vatambi pamwe nezvikwata zvakawanda.   “Zvimwe zvikwata zvaizviona sezvikuru iye zvino zvave kuzviona zvega kuti hazvingohwine dambe nekuti zvimwe zvekumamisha chaizvo zvaitozvikunda zvichitamba rugby yepamusoro, inonwisa mvura,” anodaro Jimu.   Anoenderera mberi achiti mutambo uyu uripo pakupa mukana kuvatambi verugby kubva kuzvikoro zvakasiyana kuti vagosimukire kusvika padanho rave naTendai “The Beast” Mtawarira uyo anotambira maSpringboks eSouth Africa.   “Chishuvo chedu kuti titsvage mumwe Beast kuburikidza nemutambo uyu ndiko saka uchiitwa gore negore kuti vatambi ava vawane mukana wekusvika kure.   “Tinoziva kuti kuburikidza nemutambo uyu ndipo vamwe vatambi vanoonekwa nezvikwata zvakasiyana izvo zvinozovapa mukana wekuzvitambira,” anodaro.

headline: VaBiden Vozivisa Nyika Yavo Nezve Kuurayiwa kweMutungamiri weAl Quaida
text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaJoe Biden nezuro vakati America yainge yauraya mutungamiri wechikwata chinopfurikidza mwero cheAl Qaida, Ayman al Zawahri. Al Zawhri akaberekerwa kuEgypyt. Chikwata cheAl Qaida ndicho chakapamba ndege ndokuparadza zvivakwa muNew York, Pentagon nePennsylvania musi wa 11 Gunyana 2001 kukafa vanhu zviuru zviviri nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi manomwe nevanomwe. VaBiden vakati mushure mekutsvaga Al Zawhri kwemakore akawanda, vasori vemuAmerica vakazoziva kuti ainge ave kugara muKabul, Afghanistan nevamwe vepedyo vemhuri yake. VaBiden vanoti Al Zawahri akaurayiwa ari oga kunyangwe mumba maainge ari mainge muine vamwe vanhu. Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinogara muNew York muzvare Savanna Madamombe, vanoti chiitiko ichi chichabatsira kupodza maronda evanhu vazhinji vakarasikirwa nehama neshamwari muguta iri mugore ra 2011. No media source currently available

headline: VaMatemadanda Vopomera VaMugabe Mhosva Yose yeGukurahundi
text: Munyori wesangano revakamborwa hondo yerusununguko, VaVictor Matemadanda, vanoti hapana zvazvinobatsira kuti nyika irambe ichitsvaka munhu wekupomera mhosva yeGukurahundi izvo zviri pachena kuti vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, ndivo vanofanirwa kubvunzwa uye kutsanangura mhosva yavakapara iyi. VaMatemadanda vanoti VaMugabe ndivo vanofanira kutaurira vanhu kuti zvipangamazano zvavo vaive vanaani panguva yeGukurahundi. Vanoti VaMugabe ndivo vaive mukuru wemauto, kana kuti "Commander-in-Chief", panguva iyi, uye semukuru wemauto, mutungamiri wenyika ndiye anotanga kana kumisa hondo. “Hapana minister kana commander wemauto ane simba rekutanga hondo. Hondo inotangwa napresident, yomiswa napresident,” VaMatemadanda vanodaro. Vanoti hurongwa hwemauto eFifth Brigade hwakatoshevedzerwa varairidzi vakabva kuNorth Korea, nekudaro hazvishandi kuramba vanhu vachinyenyeredza dambudziko rakatarisana nenyika. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika dzinoti mashoko aVaMatemadanda ekuda kuedza kuchenura mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa haana zvaanobatsira, sezvo VaMnangagwa vaive ivo gurukota rezvekugadzikana kwenyika vachiona nezvevasori panguva iyi. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti maoko aVaMnangagwa akangosvibawo sezvakaita aVaMugabe panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Mukombe ndewedu: Jere
text: SACHIGARO weCAPS UNITED, Farai Jere, anoti mwaka wa2019 ndewechikwata chake uye chinoda kurakasha zvimwe zvese kuti vagove shasha zvakare dzeCastle Premiership.   Makepekepe, sezita remadunhurirwa reCAPS UNITED, yakapedzisira kusimudza mukombe wePremier Soccer League (PSL) mugore ra2016 uye makore maviri adarika mukombe uyu wange uchitorwa FC Platinum.   Mwaka yadarika, CAPS UNITED yange ichitatarika zvikuru kuti ipedze iri pakati pezvikwata zvina zvepamusoro pelog.   Achitaura neKwayedza svondo rino, Jere anoti chikwata chavo chicharwa semvumba mwaka uno.   “Gore rino, Makepekepe ichadzirakasha dzese mirai muone uye tiri kuvaka zvakasimba kuti tidzore mukombe wedu weCastle Premiership.   “Mukatarisa vatambi vamwe vataunza kuchikwaa chedu zvinorakidza kuti tiri kuziva zvatiri kuita uye tiri kuda chaizvo kuve shasha,” anodaro Jere.   Anoti CAPS UNITED inoda kutora mukombe wePSL kuitira kuti igowana mukana wekukwikwidza zvakare mumitambo yeCAF Champions League.   Anoti vane vatambi vavatenga mwaka uno vepamusoro vachabatsira zvikuru chikwata chavo mukusimukira panyaya dzenhabvu.   Kusvika parizvino, Makepe-kepe yatenga vatambi vanosanganisira Gabriel Nyoni uyo akabva kuHighlanders, Phineas Bhamusi kubva kuTriangle, Blessing Sarupinda kubva kuBlack Rhinos nevamwe vakasiyana.   “Isu tiri kuda kudzokera muChampions League nekuti mutambo uyu wakakosha zvikuru, zvikwata zvese zvinoda kukwikwidzamo saka isu toda kudzokera.   “Mukatarisa vatambi vatatenga ndeve pamusoro, izvozvo  zvega zvinorakidza kuti basa ratiri kuda kubata iguru,” anodaro Jere.

headline: VaMugabe Votemesa VaMnangagwa Musoro
text: Bepanhau reStandard nemusi weSvondo rakaburitsa mashoko ekuti vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakaudza vanhu vakauya pamhembererero yebhavhudhe ravo kumba kwavo kuBorrowdale kuti mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vainge vavakumbira kuti vaite navo musangano. VaMugabe vanonziwo vakati mhuri yavo iri kushungurudzwa nehurumende yaVaMnangagwa. Vakatiwo vainge vakatorerwa vashandi nedzimotokari uye mudzimai wavo Amai Grace Mugabe vari kugara vachichema. VaMugabe vanotiwo havana kubva nekuda asi vakashandisirwa mauto. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri waVaMugabe VaGeorge Charamba kana mutauriri webato reZanu-PF. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika VaEarnest Mudzengi vanoti VaMnangagwa havadi kuti VaMugabe vafukure hapwa nekuti zvinozopa kuti hutongi hwavo huiite sehwechiuto. No media source currently available

headline: VaMugabe Vanoshamisa Veruzhinji Vachiti Vasiya Basa
text: Vange vari mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vasiya basa rekutungamira hurumende mushure mekunge vazivisa paramende kuti vasiya basa semutungamiri wenyika. VaMugabe vatora danho iri panguva iyo paramende yanga ichitora matanho ekuvapomera mhosva sezviri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika, pachishandiswa nzira ye impeachment. Mutauriri wedare reparamende, VaJacob Mudenda, vaudza nhengo dzeparamende dzanga dzaungana kuHarare International Conference Centre, kuti hurongwa hwe impeachment hwava kumiswa sezvo VaMugabe vabvuma kubva pachigaro. Gurukota rezvemutemo, VaHappyton Bonyongwe, ndivo vanonzi vatura shoko rekusiya basa kwaVaMugabe kuna VaMudenda, izvo zvinonzi VaBonyongwe vatombopengerwa nedzimwe nhengo dzeparamende dzanga dzafunga kuti vari kuda kukanganisa hurongwa hwe impeachment hwanga hwatanga. VaMugabe vasiya basa zvichitevera kupindira kwakaita mauto nemusi weChipiri svondo rapera achiti zvinhu zvanga zvaipa munyika, kusanganisira kuparara kwehupfumi munyika. Bato reZanu PF rakatobuda nechisungo chekuti vakadzingwa semutevedzeri waVaMugabe muhurumende nemuZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, ndivo vari kutora basa raiitwa naVaMugabe. VaMugabe vakaberekwa musi wa 21 Kukadzi 1924 kwaKutama mudunhu reMashonaland West. Vakadzidza paKutama neku Fort Hare University kuSouth Africa, mushure vakazoshanda semurairidzi. Zanu PF yatosvitsa zita raVaMnangagwa kuti vatambirwe zviri pamutemo semutungamiri wenyika. Pasi pemitemo yenyika, VaMnangagwa vanofanirwa kutora mhiko yekuva mutungamiri wenyika achabata matomu kusvika panoitwa sarudzo gore rinouya. Muna 1963, VaMugabe vakasarudzwa semunyori mukuru webato idzva rakanga raumbwa reZimbabwe African National Union, Zanu. Vakazosarudzwa semutungamiri webato iri muna 1975, muna 1980 vakazosarudzwa kuve mutungamiri wehurumende yeZimbabwe zvichitevera kukunda kwebato ravo musarudzo. Muna 1987, vakazove mutungamiri wenyika kusvika kusiya kwavo basa neChipiri, Mbudzi 21, 2017. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yotarisana neKudzingwa Munhabvu yePasi Rose?
text: Zimbabwe inogona kudzingwa munhabvu yepasi rose chero nguva zvichitevera kukundikana kweSports and Recreation Commission, SRC, kudzosera bhodhi reZifa rayakadzingwa muna Mbudzi gore rapera. SRC yakadzinga bhodhi iri ichiti rainge rashandisa mari zvisiri pamwero. Asi sangano renhabvu yepasi rose, reFederation of International Football, Fifa, rakazivisa mwedzi wapera kuti rakanga risiri kufara nekupindira kwehurumende mukufambiswa kwenhabvu munyika. Sangano iri rakazivisa kuti bhodhi reZifa rikasadzorerwa musi wa Ndira 3, 2022 asati apfuura, Fifa yaizotorera nhabvu yemuZimbabwe matanho akaomarara. Asi SRC inoti haisi kuzodzosera bhodhi reZifa, uye haina kuwana tsamba yakabva kuFifa iri kutaura nezvekudzoserwa kwebhodhi iri. Sachigaro veSRC, VaGerald Mlotshwa, vaudza Studio7 kuti Fifa yakatarira nguva iyi kuZifa, vakati hapana nguva yakatarirwa SRC. VaMlotshwa mukuwasha wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, sezvo vakaroora mwanasikana wavo, Farai Celine Mnangagwa. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuna sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemitambo, VaMathias Tongofa, kuti tinzwe pamire komiti yavo panyaya iyi. Asi imwe nhengo yekomiti iyi, VaTrevor Saruwaka, vanoti hunhinhi huri kuitwa neSRC huchaita kuti Zimbabwe idzingwe munhabvu yepasi rose sezvo mitemo yeFifa isingadi kuti dzihurumende dzipindire mukufambiswa kwenhabvu munyika dzepasi rose. VaSaruwaka vanoti Fifa inotora matanho akaomarara pose panenge patyorwa mitemo yayo. Vanotiwo sezvo zuva rakatarwa rakapfuura madeko, Zimbabwe inofanirwa kunyorera Fifa ichikumbira ruregerero uye kuona kuti bhodhi reZifa radzoserwa kuitira kuti Zimbabwe isadzingwe munhabvu yepasi rose. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvemitambo, Kirsty Coventry, sezvo vanga vasingabatike panharembozha yavo. VaSaruwaka vanoti pari zvino komiti yavo haisi kuita basa zvichitevera kumiswa kweparamende kuungana ichiita basa rayo kusvika mwedzi unouya nepamusana pedambudziko rechirwere. cheCovid-19. Asi VaSaruwaka vanoti pachavhura paramende, vachada kunzwa kuSRC kuti seyi yakatora danho rinoisa nhabvu yemunyika parumananzombe. Zimbabwe iri kuCameroon kumakwikwi eAfcon, uko inogona kudzingwa kana chero nguva kana Fifa ikatora danho rekudzinga Zimbabwe munhabvu yepasi rose sezvayinoita kunyika dzinenge dzatyora mitemo yayo. No media source currently available

headline: Dynamos Inotenga Vatambi Vatsva
text: Dynamos yatenga vatambi vatsva senzira yekuti chikwata ichi chisimbe kudarika zvachiri. Dembare iri kudzoka munhandare neSvondo iine vatambi vatsva apo ichatamba neZPC Kariba sekutaura kwaita gwaro rabva kune vanoronga mitambo muPremier Soccer League, VaElisha Mandireva. Mutungamiri weDembare, VaSolomon Sanyamandwe, vanoti vateveri veDynamos vanofanira kugadziririra kuona Dynamos yakasimba uyezve yakasiyana zvikuru neyaivepo munharaunda yekutanga iyo yaitatarika zvinotyisa. VaSanyamandwe vanoti Dembare yakatenga vatambi vatsva vakati wandei kusanganisira Kingstone Nkhata kubva kuSupersport yekuSouth Africa uyo vanotarisira kuti achapedza dambudziko ravanaro rezvibodzwa. VaSanyamandwe vanoti Nkhata akanyorerana chibvumirano chemwedzi mitanhatu neDembare vachizoona kuti vanokwanisa here kuwedzera nguva yacho. Nkhata ane nhoroondo yakasimba mumutambo wenhabvu mushure mekutambira Kaiser Chiefs, Free State Stars, Black Leopards neSupersport United muSouth Africa pamwe neBuymore neCaps United mu Zimbabwe. Nkhata akatambira Zimbabwe kanokwana kagumi akanwisa zvibodzwa zvitatu. Pamusoro paNkhata, VaSanyamandwe vanoti Dynamos yakatenga zvekare Brett Amidu kubva kuFC Platinum vachiwedzera ivo kuti zviri mumaoko emurairidzi wavo, Lloyd Mutasa, kushandisa kana kuregedza Denver Mukamba uyo akadzoka kubva kuCaps United. Mukamba ane nhoroondo yemisikanzwa. Asi Mutasa anoti hapana mutambi ane nzvimbo muchikwata ichi. Dynamos yaifanira kuve yakadzoka munhandare svondo rapera ichisangana neHighlanders asi mutambo uyu wakamiswa nePSL.. Pari zvino, Dembare iri pachinhanho chegumi nenhatu, mapoinzi mashanu kubva pachikwata chakatarisana nekubuda muPSL cheNichrut icho chine mapoinzi gumi nemanomwe. Mutasa anoseka avo vari kuti chikwata chake chingangobuda mumakwikwi aya. Pari zvino, chikwata cheFC Platinum ndicho chiri kutungamira makundano ePSL nemapoinzi makumi mana nemapfumbamwe, mapoinzi maviri pamusoro peNgezi Platinum Stars. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Gumi Vanoshaya Vamwe Vachiparadzirwa Misha neMafashamu eMvura
text: Mhuri dzakawanda kuMashonaland Central, Mashonaland West, Manicaland, Midlands neMatabeleland North dzasara dzisina misha mushure mekunge yakukurwa nemafashamu emvura anotyisa asati amboonekwa mumatunhu aya kwenguva yakareba. Vanhu gumi vanonzi varasikirwa nehupenyu kusvika parizvino. Zvipfuyo, minda, mabhiriji nemigwagwa zviri kuparadzwawo nemafashamu emzvura aya. Civil Protection Unit iyo yakazivisa kuti inoda mari inosvika mamiriyoni matatu ekubatsira vanhu vanenge vawirwa nematambudziko akadai iri mubishi kuyedza kubatira vanhu ava ichibatsirana nemamwe mapazi ehurumende akaita sevemauto emuchadenga nevamwe. Mukuru weCivil Protection Unit VaMadzudzo Pawadyira vati vari kukwanisa kununura vanhu vange vavhiringidzwa nemvura iyi asi vakati titaure negurukota rezvematunhu VaIgnatious Chombo. Nyaya dzekubatsira vanhu vanenge vapinda mumatambudziko akadai dziri kubazi raVaChombo. Asi Vachombo vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari pazororo asi vakatiwo titaure nevakafanobata matomu mubazi ravo VaJoseph Made avo vange vasingadaire nharembozha yavo. Mumiriri weMakonde mudare reparamende VaKindness Paradza vanove nhengo yeZanu-PF vatenda kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka mudunhu ravo uye misha yakawanda yaparadzwa nemafashamu emvura aya. No media source currently available

headline: Vakarwa Hondo yeRusununguko Voronga Nhaurirano neBritain
text: Vanotungamirira sangano revakarwa hondo yerusununguko reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association vanoti vari kuronga musangano neBritain nedzimwer nyika dzakabudirira kuti vagadzirise nyaya yemagariro avo sezvo vari kuti hurumende yavarasa. Vesangano re ZLHR ava vakataura mashoko aya apo vakaita musangano nevatori venhau muHarare nemusi weChina. Munyori mukuru musangano re ZNLWA VaVictor Matemadanda vati kunyangwe hazvo vakazoshorwa kuti vave kuita misangano nevekumawirira havana hany'a nazvo sezvo chinangwa chavo chiri chekuti varwi vehondo yerusununguko vabatsirikane. Vati vane chivimbo chekuti hurukuro dzavachaita idzi dzichabatsira kusimudzira hupenyu hwevarwi verusununguko. VaMatemadanda vashoropodzawo Brigadier General Retired Asher Walter Tapfumaneyi munyori mubazi revakarwa hondo vachiti vanofanira kuregedza kuda kutonga sangano revarwi vehondo yerusununguko. VaTapfumaneyi vanoti hurumende yave kuda vatungamiri vatsva sezvo isingakwanise kushanda nevatungamiri varipo nekuti vakati mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe ngavaende pamudyandigere vachitiwo havachavatsvagire rutsigiro. VaMatemadanda vati bato reZanu PF harina kumboita hany'a nevarwi vehondo yerusununguko uye sangano ravo isangano rakazvimirira risinei nebato reZanu PF. Vatiwo vari kushushikana kuti kunyangwe vakarwa hondo, vana veZimbbwe havana rusununguko. Vanoona nezvemabasa musangano iri, VaFrancis Nhando vatsigira mashoko aya vachiti vakazvionera pamhuno sefodya apo vange vobvunzurudzwa nemapurisa kuti sei vange vakamira muHarare Gardens vari vana apo vaigadzirira kuita musangano wavo. Vanoona nezvekubuditswa kwemashoko musangano iri, VaDouglas Mahiya vati vanokatyamadzwa kuti hurumende inoda kupindira munyaya dzesangano revarwi verusunungukonekuyedza kuri putsa. Musangano uyu wange uine vanasachigaro vekumatunhu akasiyana-siyana avo vati kunyangwe hazvo hurumende ichida kuvanganisa, vari kuzoramba vachibatira pamwe nemukuru wavo VaChristopher Mutsvangwa. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvevakarwa hondo VaTshinga Dube kana VaTapfumaneyi sezo vange vasiri kudarira nharembozha dzavo. No media source currently available

headline: Juventus yodzora Morata
text: kuedza kudzora mutambi weChelsea – Alvaro Morata – zvichitevera kutatarika kwaaita mumwaka wake wekutanga kuStamford Bridge.   Chikwata ichi chiri kuda mutambi uyu nechikwereti mwaka unotevera nekudaro chiri kugadzirira kubhadhara mari inosvika 13 miriyoni paunzi uye chine chivimbo chekuzomutenga zvachose.   Mari inozodirwa mutambi uyu inozosvika ku43 miriyoni paunzi kana chikwata chekuTurin ichi chikada kuzomutenga zvachose mugore ra2019.   Alvaro anoda chaizvo kudzokera kuJuventus uko kwaakatambira kwemakore maviri asati aenda kuReal Madrid iyo yakambomudzora mugore ra2016.   Sekutara kweTuttosoprt, maBlues ari kunzi anoda kutenga Edinson Cavani kubva kuParis Saint-Germain sezvo chikwata chekuFrance ichi chichida kugadzirisa mapepa acho maringe nemashandisirwo emari apo chiri kurwisa nyaya dzeFinancial Fair Play.   Izvi ndizvo zvichavhurira Morata mukana wekudzokera kuJuventus, kozoti PSG neBayern zviri kudawo chizvarwa chekuSpain ichi.   Morata akatamba zvinonwisa mvura kuStamford Bridge izvo zvakamuona achinwisa katanhatu mumitambo minomwe.   Kubva ipapo, mutambi uyu akabva atanga kutatarika zvikuru sezvo akazonwisa kashanu chete kubva mumitambo 22 kuchikwata chaAntonio Conte. – SportsMail Football

headline: Dambudziko Rekushaya Mari muMabhanga Roenderera Mberi muNyika
text: Nyazvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vanhuwo zvavo munyika vari kushora zvikuru vemabhanga uye vemuzvitoro nekuvabhadharisa mari dzemitero kwavari kuita kuti vatore mari dzavo mumabhanga kana kuwana mari muzvitoro. Vanhu vanoti kunze kwekupedza nguva yakareba vari mumitsetse, vave kubhadhara mari inosvika madhora makumi maviri pakutora mari inosvika chiuru chemadhora yavanofanirwa kunge vachitora nemadhora matatu chete. Vanhu ava vanoti vave kumanikidzwa kutora mari inosvika chiuru chemadhora mukati memazuva gumi sezvo vari kukwanisa kutora zana remadhora chete pazuva kubva mumabhanga uye pose pavanotora mari iyi vanobhadhariswa mari. Vezvitoro vanonziwo vari kumanikidza vanhu kuti vatenge zvavanenge vasiri kuda kuti vakwanisewo kuwana mari. Mukuru weBankers Association of Zimbabwe Dr. Charity Jinya vanoti vemabhanga havana zvavangaite pamitero iyi nekuti vashandi vawo vanenge vawandirwawo nebasa. Asi vanhu vataura neStudio 7 vanoti vave kupedza nguva yakareba yavanofanirwa kunge vachishanda vakaforera mari. Kunyangwe zvazvo mukuru webhanga renyika VaJohn Mangudya vakati mabhanga ape vanhu mari inosvika chiuru chemadhora pazuva, Amai Esther Samson vati chino nyanyovashungurudza kutadza kupiwa mari yakatemerwa iyi. “Kubvira last week tichingotora mari tichipiwa ma$200. Ndasvika na 7am kuzopiwa $200 iyoyo kuma past 3 pm kuno apa unenge wanzwa nenzara. Izvozvi ndatozotenga nartjie apo ndiro randadya pano. Tiri kuswera pano nenzara. Mari iri kunetsa” Amai Samson vanodaro. Mumwe zvakare ange akaforera mari pabhanga reCABS ndaVaMagodo Bangwayo, avo vati vari kurasikirwa nenguva yekunge vachibata mabasa panguva iyo vanhu vazhinji vari kurarama nekubata mabasa emaoko nekuda kwekusawanikwa kwemabasa. “Cash iri kunetsa, unogona kumira panapa 3 hours uchinzi mari hapana. Ndasvika kuma 11am asi ndiri kutobva kuwana mari ikozvino. Queue yanga yakasvika ukoko, vachimbopinza six six, kusvika vaapa 15 kusvika tazonzi tese kuma past 3 pm,” VaBangwayo vadaro. VaJack Kavero vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti kumichina kana kuti maATM vanhu havasi kukwanisa kutora mari sezvo musina mari. Vatiwo mumabhanga vari kungoudzwa kuti hakuna mari. Vati zvinovashungurudza zvikuru kuti vanobuda ziya kushanda vobudazve ziya kutora mari yavo kubhanga. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, sangano rinomirira varairidzi reZimbabwe Teachers Association, Zimta, rati dambudziko remari kumabhanga riri kukanganisawo zvikuru mashandiro evarairidzi, sezvo vari kuzomanikidzwa kupedza nguva vari mumitsetse vachiedza kutora mari. Mukuru weZimta, VaSifiso Ndlovu vati nemhaka yekuti mabhanga haasi kukwanisa kupa vanhu mari dzavanoda pazuva, varairidzi vazhinji vari kukundikana kubhadhara zvikwereti pamwe nemitero yepavanogara. “Varairidzi vari kutarisira kutambira mari dzavo dzemihoro mangwana, ndinoona vazhinji vavo vachi kundikana kudzokera kumabasa kwavo vatadza kuwana mari dzavo.” VaNdlovu vati vane hurongwa hwekumbogara pasi nevatungamiri vezvemari kuti vanzwe kuti dambudziko iri richapera riini. Vanoti nyika inofanirwawo kusimbisa kurudziro yekuti vanhu vashandise makadhi ekumabhanga sezviri kuitwa mune dzimwe nyika dzakapoteredza. “Tinofanirwa kusiyana netsika yekungoshandisa mari chete, toshandisawo zvimwe zvakaita sema credit card kana digital money,” VaNdlovu vadaro. No media source currently available

headline: Tsiva mberi, mari mumashure-Musonda
text: MURAIRIDZI wetsiva ane mukurumbira arizve nyanzvi yekuronga mitambo uyu, Clyde Musonda, anoti vatambi pakutanga havafanire kutungamidza mari asi kuti vagadzire mazita avo.   Achitaura neKwayedza, Musonda anoti chinodiwa mumutambo wetsiva kuti munhu atange agadzira zita rake, zvemari zvozotevera.   “Tsiva pari zvino haina mari, vatsigirri chaivo hakuna. Asi vatambi tinovakurudzira kuti ngavasatungamidza mari sezvo chikuru kuti vagadzire mazita avo.   “Zita ndiro rakakosha nekuti ukahwina mitambo yakawanda uchirwira nzungu, mitambo ine mari inotanga kuuya uye kana mapuromota ekunze anotanga kukutsvaga voda kushanda newe nekuti vanenge vaona chiedza chakanaka pauri,” anodaro Musonda.   Musonda pari zvino ari kurairidza vatambi vatanhatu muchikwata chake cheDeltaforce Boxing Academy achitsigirwa neGypsite Sports Promotions.   Pavatambi vatanhatu ava, vana ndevemuZimbabwe nevaviri vekuMalawi.   VemuZimbabwe ndiTinashe “Chairman” Madziwana uyo anova shasha ine bhande reZimbabwe National Super Bantamweight, Collin Nyamambisha anorwa muboka reheavyweight, Simon Madanhire naTinashe Mutodza kuchizoti vatambi vekuMalawi ndiAnisha Bashil naIsreal Kamwamba.

headline: Southern African Community USA Yobatana neManna Food Center muKuwanisa Chikafu Kune Vakakanganiswa neCovid-19
text: Sangano rinomirira zvizvarwa zvekuchamhembe kweAfirca zviri muAmerica, reSouthern African Community USA, kana kuti SACU, rakabatana nesangano reManna Food Center riri muMontgomery County mudunhu reMaryland mukupa rubatsiro rwechikafu kune zvizvarwa zvemuSADC zvinogara muMontgomery County zvakakanganiswa nedenda reCovid-19. Nhengo yeSACU, Muzvare Omega Tawonezvi, vanoti sesangano vakaona zvakakosha kuti vabatane neManna Food Center kuitira kubatsira nezvekudya zvizvarwa zvekuchamhembe kweAfrica kusanganisira vana vangadai vari kuAmerica kuchikoro asi vakazokanganiswa neCovid-19. Muzvare Tawonezvi vanoti vari kukurudzira zvizvarwa zvekuchamhembe kweAfrica zvingadai zvichida rubatsiro rwechikafu pane ino nguva kuti zvisanyare asi kuti zvibude pachena zvononyoresa kuti zviwane rubatsiro urwu, kwete kutambura chinyararire. Vanoti vanhu vari kubuda vachizivisa kuti vanoda rubatsiro kana zvichienzaniswa nekare. "Chirwere ichi cheCorona chavharisa zvinhu saka vanhu havasi kunyanya kutya kana kunyara sezvavaimboita pane dzimwe nguva nekuti vanoziva kuti zviri kuitika mazuvano zviri beyond their control," vanodaro Muzvare Tawonezvi. Vanoti pakunyoresa kuManna Food Center hakubvunzwi munhu paamire panyaya dzemapepa ehugaro hwake kunze kwekungoti aburitse chitupa chinoratidza kuti anogara muMontgomery County, uye pane nzira nhatu dzinosanganisira kunyoresa kuManna kana kushambadza kuri kuitwa neSACU dzekuti vanhu vakwanise kunyoresa. "Ende uye tine ma outreach workers vari kuita basa rekufamba muma community akasiyanasiyana kutsvaga kuti vanonidha rubatsiro ndivanaani." Sangano reSouthern African Community USA rakaumbwa pamwe nekanyoreswa zviri pamutemo mudunhu reMaryland muna 2013 nechinangwa chekusimudzira tsika nemagariro ezvizvarwa zvekuchamhembe kweAfrica zviri muAmerica pamwe nekuzvibatanidza kuburikidza nemitambo yakasiyanasiyana. No media source currently available

headline: Commonwealth Yotumira Nhumwa kuZimbabwe Kuti Dziongorore Kuti Ingadzorwe Here Mugungano Iri
text: Hurongwa hwekuti Zimbabwe idzokere mumubatanidzwa wenyika dzainge dziri pasi pehutongo hweBritain weCommonwealth hwave padanho repamusoro mushure mekunge sangano iri razivisa kuti rave kuzotumira chikwata chevaongorori vanoona kuti zvakakodzera here kuti itenderwe kudzokera kuva nhengo zvekare. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakanyora tsamba kumunyori mukuru weCommonwealth Amai Patricia Scotland musi wa 9 Chivabvu vachiti vave kuda kuti Zimbabwe idzokere mugungano iri. Mutauriri weCommonwealth VaBarnie Choudhury vanoti vatanga kuongorora kuti Zimbabwe yakakodzera here kudzoswa. Vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakaburitsa Zimbabwe muCommonwealth muna 2003 mushure mekunge Commonwealth yazivisa muna 2002 kuti yainge ichironga kumbomisa Zimbabwe kuva nhengo. Zimbabwe inofanira kuchengetedza kodzero dzevanhu kuti itenderwe kudzoka mugungano. No media source currently available

headline: Vatambi vaita ngura: Siyachitema
text: MURAIRIDZI wechikwata chenetball cheGlow Petroleum Queens – Perpetau Siyachitema – anoti kugara nguva refu vatambi vemutambo uyu vakangogara kwava kuona vazhinji vachiusiya, kuita ngura kana kutsvaga mamwe mabasa anovararamisa.   Kubva pakatanga kumiswa mitambo gore radarika nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19, mutambo wenetball hauna kuzombopihwa mvumo yekutambwa zvekare izvo sekutaura kwaSiyachitema, zvava kuita kuti vamwe vatambi vaore moyo vachifunga kuti mutambo uyu hauchdzoke uye vamwe vave kuita mamwe mabasa kana zvedzimba.   “Denda iri chokwadi rakanganisa zvakawanda chaizvo nekuti vatambi vazhinji havachina shungu nemutambo uyu nekuti havachazive kuti uchadzoka here kana kuti kwete.   “Kubva gore radarika taingoita gadziriro vamwe vari kudzimba dzavo, zvino munhu anosvika pakuneta nekungoita gadziriro dzake mutambo usingadzoke.   Kuburikidza nekugara ikoko, vamwe vave kusimba miviri yavo, vamwe vave kuita pamuviri zvekuti kuzotamba netball kunozonetsa pamberi apo. “Kudai denda iri rachipera kuitira kuti upenyu hwedu nevatambi huchiendekawo nekuti ndipo panoraramira vatambi vazhinji,” anodaro Siyachitema.   Shasha iyi inoti iri kuzvishingisa ndokuudza vatambi vake kuti vasaore moyo uye vagare vachiita gadziriro dzavo kuitira kuti miviri yavo igare yakasimba.   “Pakatanga Covid-19 gore radarika, vatambi vaiita gadziriro vari kudzimba dzavo uye mazuva ose ndaigadzira mavhidhiyo ndovatumira ezvandinenge ndichida kuti vadzidze ivo vozonditumira vachizviita, asi vamwe vakasvika pakuneta nekuti vanenge vave kubvunza kuti toramba tichifondokerei iwo mutambo wacho usiri kudzoka. Vanenge vachitoti zviri nani kuita zvimwe.   “Ini semurairidzi wavo, handikwanise kuvaudza izvozvo kuti zororai, ndinongovati garai muchingoita gadziriro kusvika pazvinenge zvakanaka, hapana anoziva kuti zvinonaka rinhi,” anodaro.   Siyachitema ndiye akatungamira chikwata chemaGems chekutanga kuenda kunokwikwidza kumitambo yeWorld Cup 2019 apo chakanokwikwidza kuEngland uye kubva kumutambo uyu, akasvika achisendeka shangu dzake dzekutamba ndokutanga kurairidza mutambo uyu.   Chikwata chemaGems gore rinotevera chinofanirwa kutanga kurwira kuenda kumutambo we2023 World Cup uyo unofanirwa kuzotambirwa kuSouth Africa.   Achitaura, Siyachitema anoti kana netball ikasapihwa mvumo yekuti ichitanga kutambwa, zvinogona kuremera chikwata chemaGems gore rinotevera kusarudza vatambi vanochimirira pakurwira tikiti rekuenda kuSouth Africa sezvo vatambi vazhinji vanenge vava nengura yekugara vasingatambe kwenguva refu.   “Zvino zvino takatarisana nekurwira kuenda kuWorld Cup, zvino kana tisiri kutamba zvinogona kuzoremera chikwata chenyika.   “Mitambo iri kutofanirwa kutanga kutambwa nekuchimbidza kuti vatambi vagare vakagwinya uye vanosarudza chikwata chenyika vatange kuongorora vatambi. Patakabva kuWorld Cup yekupedzisira, vatambi vakaita seni, Pauline Jani naJoice Takaidza takabva tasendeka kutambira maGems, saka pane gwanza guru rinofanira kuvharwa.   Kana mitambo isiri kutambwa hameno kuti vanotitsiva sei,” anodaro Siyachitema.
