headline: America neIran Dzopesana paNyaya yeZimbabwe paZuva Rekupemberera Kuzvitonga Kuzere
text: Hurumende yeAmerica yakatumira mashoko ekukorokotedza mhuri yeZimbabwe kwete kuvatungamiri wenyika Vaemmerson Mnangangwa pazuva rekupemberera kuwana kuzvitonga kuzere. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau, gurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muAmerica VaAntony Blinken vakakurudzira hurumende yeZimbabwe kuti iremekedze kodzero dzevanhu dziri mubumbiro remitemo renyika. Vanotiwo zvakakosha kuti muZimbabwe muitwe nhaurirano kuti muve nekubatana sezvakarwirwa nyika. Hurumende yeZimbabwe inoti hayo America inofanira kubvisa zvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vatungamiri venyika vachipomerwa mhosva yekutonga nedemo. Asi mumashoko avo pazuva rekuwana kuzvitonga kuzere kwezimbabwe, mutungamiri wenyika yeIran VaHassan Rouhani vakakorokotedza VaMnangagwa vachishorawo nyaya yezvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe. vakati zvirango izvo zvinofanira kubviswa. Iran yakatemerwawo zvirango neAmerica ichipomerwa mhosva yekuda kugadzira chombo chenuclear.

headline: VaChinamasa Vanotura Bhajeti re$4,1 Billion Kuti Ritambirwe neParamende
text: Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vaparura neChina bhajeti regore rinouya remabhiriyoni mazana mashanu ezviuru zvemadhora. VaChinamasa vanoti zvikamu makumi masere nezviviri kubva muzana zvemari iyi zvichashandiswa pamihoro yevashandi vehurumende. Vati izvi zvinoreva kuti hurumende inosara isina mari yekawanda yekushandisa kuita mamwe mabasa ayo akakosha. Vachitura muparamende hurongwa hwavari kuda kuti hushandiswe pamari yehurumende gore rinouya, Chinamasa vati hupfumi hwenyika hauna kumira zvakanaka uye bhajeti iri harina kunyanyosiyana nere gore rino. Semaonero avo, VaChinamasa vati izvi zvinoreva kuti hupfumi hwenyika hausi kufamba zvakanaka. Vati mari zhinji ichaunganidzwa nehurumende ichaenda kumihoro yevashandi vayo uye izvi zvinoreva kuti hurumende ichange ichibhadhara vashandi vanenge vasingaite basa sezvo pasina mari yekuitisa mabasa anodiwa nehurumende. VaChinamasa vati kunze kwemari yavari kutarisira kuwana kubva kumitero, vanotarisira kuwana mari ingangosvika bhiriyoni remadhora sezvikwereti pamwe nerubatsiro runobva kune dzimwe nyika. Vati sezvo hupfumi hwenyika husiri kufamba zvakanaka, zvakakosha kuti bhajeti ravo rironge hwaro hwekuti makambani avhure uye kuti nyika ikwanise kukwezva makambani ekunze. Vanoti pari zvino nyika iri kutenga zvinhu zvakawanda kubva kunze kudarika zvairi kutengesa. Vatiwo zvizhinji zviri kutengwa kunze zvinogona kugadzirwa munyika. Nekuda kwaizvovo, VaChinamasa vati makambani achange achitengesa zvinhu kunze zvakanyanya achabvisa mitero inenge iri pasi pasi. Vatiwo kunyange hazvo vari kushanda nemabhanga ekunze akaita seInternational Monetary Fund mukugadzirisa nyaya yezvikwereti, hurumende yavewo nehwaro hwekugadzirisa nyaya iyi. Zimbabwe ine zvikwereti zvekunze zvinosvika mabhiriyoni masere emadhora ekunze. Vatiwo mutemo wekupa masimba ehupfumi kuvatema vemuno unofanira kujekeswa kuitira kuti vekunze vakwanise kuzotanga mabhizimisi muZimbabwe. VaChinamasa vanoti vanoda kutanga mabhizimisi munyika vanofanira kutaurirana nebazi rinoona nezvevechidiki nezvekupa masimba ehupfumi kuvatema kuti vajekeserwe kuti mutemo uyu unofamba sei. Vati izvi zvakakosha sezvo makambani emunyika ari kuvhara. Vatiwo kubva muna 2011 kusvika gore rino, makambani anodarika zviuru zvina nemazana matanhatu akavhara, ukuwo vashandi vanodarika zviuru makumi mashanu nezvishanu, vakarasikirwa nemabasa. VaChinamasa vatiwo vashandi vanotambira mari isingadariki mazana matanhatu emadhora pamwedzi havafanirwe kubatirwa mutero kutanga gore rinouya. VaChinamasa vatiwo hurumende iri kuda kukwidza mitero wefodya yemudzanga senzira yekuunganidza mari. Vatiwo vari kukumbira paramende kuti idzikewo mutero kuvarimi vefodya vachiti mari ichaunganidzwa kubva pamutero uyu ichashandiswa pamabasa ekudyara miti sezvo varimi vefodya vari kutema miti apo vanenge vave kupisa fodya yavo. VaChinamasa vati vari kudawo kuderedza mitero yehwahwa hwemumabhodhoro kana izvi zvikatambirwa neparamende. VaChinamasa vatiwo hurumende ine hurongwa hwekupa hurumende dzematunhu mari asi yakamirira kuti patange pave nemitemo yekushanda kwehurumende dzematunhu idzi. Vatiwo vari kuda kuisawo parutivi mamiriyoni gumi emadhora semari yekusimudzira matunhu kana kuti Constituency Development Fund. Asi vati mari iyi ichapihwa nhengo dzeparamende kana pachinge pave nemutemo wekushandiswa kwemari iyi. VaChinamasa vatiwo hurumende ine hurongwa hwekubatsira varimi nembeu nefotireza nezvimwe senzira yekuti nyika iwane goho rakanaka. Vatiwo hupfumi hwenyika hunotarisirwa kukura nezvikamu zvitatu nechidimbu kubva muzana gore rinouya. Matare eHouse of Assembly ne Senate ari kutarisirwa kuzeya bhajeti raturwa naVaChinamasa oona kuti oritambira here kana kuti kwete sezvinodiwa nemitemo. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Varimi Votadziswa Kurima Minda Yavo kuMashonaland West neVari Kuchera Goridhe
text: Vamwe varimi mudunhu reMashonaland West vanoti vave kutadza kurima minda yavakapihwa nehurumende nekuda kwevanhu vari kuchera goridhe muminda yavo. Varimi ava, avo vakapihwa minda pasi pechirongwa chehurumende chekuwanisa ivhu kuruzhinji rwevanhu vanoti nguva dzakawanda vave kuwana minda yavo yavakucherwa nevanhu vanochera zvicherwa vasina mvumo kana kuti makorokoza, avo vanenge vachitsvaga goridhe. Varimi ava vanoti haasi makorokoza chete ari kuchera minda yavo, kunyange vanochera goridhe zviri pamutemo vanongokaruka vauya nemagwaro anovapa mvumo yekuchera muminda yavo zviri pamutemo. Mumwe mugari wekuMakonde akachererwa mumunda make ndiAmai Mary Nyabadza. Amai Nyabadza vanoti hurumende ingadai isina kupa vanhu minda munzvimbo dzizere zvicherwa nekuti vave kutotadza kurima. Vanoti vanochera zvicherwa ava vanoita zvemhirizhonga kana munhu akada kuvarambidza. Mumwe murimi akachererwa mumunda make, VaReason Dandawa, vanotiwo vanochera goridhe vanoita madiro ajojina uye vanoita zvemhirizhonga. VaDandawa vanoti chikamu chinoti anochera zvicherwa anoonekwa seakakosha kudarika murimi mumaziso emutemo chinofanirwa kuvandudzwa. Mumwe murimi akapindirwawo mumunda make emahekiteya makumi masere kwaZvimba nevanochera goridhe, VaGerald Mashiri, vanoti vakapindirwa nevanhu vatanhatu vari kuchera goridhe vasina kuvapa mvumo. VaMashiri vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kupa murimi mukana wekutanga wekuti achere goridhe riri mumunda make. VaMashiri vanoti vanochera goridhe ava vanosiya vasina kuvhara makomba vachiti bazi rinoona nezvemigodhi pamwe nezvicherwa ndiro riri kuita zvehuwori zvekupa vanochera ava marezinesi pasina gwaro rekuti murimi abvuma here kana kuti kwete. Sachigaro weboka remadzimai anoita zvekuchera zvicherwa, Muzvare Chiedza Chipangura, vanoti gakava remurimi nemucheri rinofanirwa kupedzwa nekukurumidza nemukuru webazi rezvemigodhi nezvhicherwa wedunhu zviri pamutemo. Muzvare Chipangura vanoti zvikatora nguva rinenge rave dambudziko rehuwori. Panyaya yevacheri vari kurambira paminda, Muzvare Chiedza vanoti dambudziko rine vamwe varimi nderekuti vanoda kurambira nzvimbo asi ivo vasingacheri zvicherwa vachida kungorima chete. Mukuru webazi rezvemigodhi nezvicherwa mudunhu reMashonaland West, Amai Sibongubuhle Mpindiwa, vanobvuma kuti pane nyaya dzine chitsama dzekusawirirana kwevarimi nevanochera zvicherwa zvakaita segoridhe, asi vachiti nyaya dzacho dzinongosiyana nenzvimbo. Amai Mpindiwa vanoti rimwe dambudziko rinoita varimi kufunga kuti zvicherwa zvinenge zviri muminda mavo ndezvavo vachiti izvi hazvisi izvo nekuti zvicherwa ndezvehurumende iyo inopa bvumo kune wose anenge akumbira bvumo yekuchera. Amai Mpindiwa vanoti nzvimbo yose munyika inogona kupihwa mvumo yekuti icherwe zvicherwa kusanganisira nzvimbo dzehurumende. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvicherwa vachishanda vakazvimiririra, VaGeorge Mugani, vanoti mutemo unopa mucheri wezvicherwa mvumo yekuchera zvicherwa kunyange pamunda wemumwe munhu sezvo mvumo yekurima iri pamasendimita makumi matatu kubva pamsoro kudzika pasi chete, zvichireva kuti kubva panogumira masendimita makumi matatu aya zvichidzika, pasi pose hapachisiri pake, asi panenge pave pehurumende. Panyaya yemutemo wemigodhi nezvirimwa VaMugani vanoti mutemo uri kuvandudzwa kuchengetedza murimi sezvo pave nemutemo wekuti mucheri wezvicherwa anofanirwa kupihwa mvumo nemurimi kana aine mahekiteya ari pasi pezana. Ongororo yakaitwa neStudio 7 inoratidza kuti dambudziko iri rakatekeshera mumatunhu madiki ose muMashonaland West anoti Hurungwe, Makonde, Zvimba, Norton, Chegutu, Kadoma pamwe neMhondoro, uye rinowanikwawo mune mamwe matunhu ose emunyika ane zvicherwa zvakaita segoridhe. No media source currently available

headline: Varwere Voomerwa neKushaikwa neKudhura kweMishonga
text: Vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kuchema chema nekushaikwa uye kudhura kuri kuita mishonga zvopa kuti hupenyu hwevarwere vakawanda huve munjodzi. Zvipatara zvikuru zvehurumende zvinonzi zvasara nemishonga yakakosha isingadarike mazuva gumi. Vanotengesa nekugadzira mishonga vanoti hurumende haisi kuvapa mari yakakwana yekunze yekutenga mishonga kubva kuIndia neSouth Africa kunyanya. Sachigaro wePharmaceutical Manufacturers Association of Zimbabwe ,VaEmmanuel Mujuru, vatenda kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka nenyaya yekushaya mari vachiti vanoda mamiriyoni maviri emadhora asi vari kuwana zvikamu gumi kubva muzana zvemari iyi. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo naMuzvare Emily Nyathi vanotengesa mishonga muHarare. Amai Nyathi vati nyaya iyi yave nenguva ingatosvika makore maviri isina kugadziriswa. Hurumende inoti iri kuyedza kutsvaga mari yekubatsira mukutenga mushonga uye nemusi weChina yakapa vanotenga mishonga mari inosvika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru zviviri mushure mekunge yambovapa mari inosvika mamiriyoni matanhatu nezviuru zvisere svondo rapera. Asi chiremba Dr Rutendo Bonde vanoti mari iyi idonwe remvura mugwenga. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo naAmai Nyathi. Mukuru wechipatara cheMpilo Hospital, Dr Solwayo Ngwenya, vaudza nhepfenyuro yeZBC kuti vasara nemishonga inokwana mazuva gumi chete. Matambudziko aya ndemamwe kuParirenyatwa, Harare Hospital, UBH nezvimwe zvipatara zvehurumende. Mukuru weCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vatendawo kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzemishonga. Vanotiwo vamwe vanhu vave kutopotera kumaporofita nekun’anga Vakawanda vataura neStudio 7 vati vave kutoita mapiritsi ekudimbura nepakati kuti vakwanise kutombowana chekunwa pazuva. Vamwewo vanoti vave kutopona nekuenda kunyika dzakaita seZambia neSouth Africa kunotsvaga mishonga. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano vanoti hurumende inofanira kumutsiridza makambani anogadzira mushonga kuti varerutse dambudziko iri. Mari zhinji yeZimbabwe inosvika zvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe kubva muzana inobva kumasangano akazvimirira akaita seUnited Nations Children’s Fund, Global Fund neUS Presidents Emmergency Plan for Aids Relief neDepartment for International Development yekuBritain. Pharmaceutical Society of Zimbabwe inogadzira mishonga inoti inoda mari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi mana nemashanu kuti itange kushanda zvakanaka. VePharmaceutical Wholesalers Association vanoti nekuda kwechikwereti chemari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemashanu, havachapihwe mishonga kwavaitenga. Vanoti pamwedzi vanoda mari inosvika mamiriyoni masere. No media source currently available

headline: Kukwidzwa kweMafuta eKufambisa Kworwadza Vagari muChinhoyi
text: Vagari vemuChinhoyi vanoti havasi kufara nemakwidzirwo ari kuita mari dzekufambisa kuenda kunzvimbo dzakasiyana apo zvitoro zvakawanda zvainge zvakavharwa neSvondo. Mari dzekufambisa dzakamuka dzakakwidzwa nezuro mangawanani zvichitevera kukwidzwa kwakaitwa mari yemafuta edzimotokari nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa neMugovera. Dzendo dzose dzemuChinhoyi dzaisiita dhora rimwechete dzave kuita madhora matatu, mari inonzi nevakawanda yakawandisa. Kubva muChinhoyi kuenda kuHarare munhu aimbobhadhara madhora matanhatu, asi iye zvino kwave kubhadharwa madhora gumi nemashanu. Kubva muChinhoyi kuenda kuChegutu kana kuKaroi kwave kuita madhora gumi nemaviri kubva pamadhora matanhatu. Amai Sarudzai Patana vanoti madhora matanhatu pamunhu kuenda kubasa ivo nemurume wavo nemwana wavo anoenda kuchikoro nekombi yakawandisa. Mumwe mudzidzisi, VaItai Mutapa, avo vanoti vainge vave kuenda kubasa kaviri pasvondo, vanoti nhasi havaende kubasa sezvo vasina mari yekufambisa. VaMutapa vanoti pavaenda kunotenga zvekudya zvitoro zvanga zvakavhara zvavapa fungidziro yekuti vezvitoro vari kuda kukwidza mitengo yezvinhu kubva nhasi mangwanani. Asi VaClifford Matambo, avo vanotengesa zvekudya, vanoti mitengo inofanirwa kukwira sezvo mari yekuunza zvinhu zvavanotengesa zvave kuvadhurira nekuda kwemitengo yemafuta yakakwidzwa. Mumwewo mugari wemuChinhoyi anoda kudanwa nezita rekuti Nimrod anoti zvinonyadzisa kuti mutungamiri wenyika VaMnangagwa anozivisa kukwira kwemafuta gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto riripo. Mutungamiri wenyika VaMnangagwa vakazivisa kuti dhiziri rave kutengwa nemadhora matatu nemasendi gumi nerimwe ukuwo peturu yave kuita madhora matatu nemasenzi makumi matatu. Kunyange mafuta edzimotokari akakwidzwa achiri kushaikwa munyika.

headline: ‘UPENYU PAMBERI, BHORA MUSHURE’
text: MUTAMBI weZimbabwe Warriors nechikwata cheStade de Reims chekuFrance, Marshall Munetsi, anoti panguva ino yechirwere cheCovid-19 icho chatekeshera pasi rose, upenyu hwevanhu hunofanirwa kukosheswa kudarika mutambo wenhabvu.   Achitaura svondo rino ari kuFrance uko anotambira achitambira nhabvu yake, Munetsi anoti kumiswa kwakaita mitambo yenhabvu kunyika iyi pamwe nepasi rose kwakakosha sezvo matanho akatorwa aya ari kubatsira kurwisa kupararira kwecoronavirus.   “Ini semutambi wenhabvu, mutambo uyu hauna kunyanya kukosha kukunda upenyu hwevanhu. Ndinotsigira kumiswa kwakaitwa mitambo yenhabvu sezvo uku kuri kubatsira kurwisa kupararira kwecoronavirus.   Kana chirwere ichi chapera hacho, tochidzokera kunotamba hedu nhabvu.   “Zvose ngatingozviisai mumaoko aMwari, zvichadarika hazvo todzokera kuupenyu hwedu hwemazuva ose,” anodaro.   Munetsi akatanga kutambira chikwata cheStade de Reims mwaka uno achibva kuchikwata cheOrlando Pirates chekuSouth Africa.   Kusvika pazomiswa mitambo yose, Munetsi ange achitamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura kuStade de Reims izvo zvakambomuona achimaka shasha Neymar Jnr mune umwe mutambo wechikwata chake necheParis St Germain (PSG) uyo chikwata chaje chakahwina 2-0. Mumutambo uyu, Munetsi akarumbidzwa zvikuru sezvo PSG ichizivikanwa pasi rose nevatambi vanoita “kuruka” bhora vachisanganisira iye Neymar Jnr, Kylian Mbappe, Edinson Cavani asi musi uyu shasha idzi dzakashaiswa mukana.   Munetsi anoti agere zvakanaka kuchikwata chaari kutambira cheReims achiti kana mumwe mukana wekuenda kune chimwe chikwata ukaiuya, achatarisa zvinomunakira.   “Ndiri kugutsikana nepandiri iye zvino, asi ndinoda kusvika kumusoro-soro nenhabvu. Ndichatungamirirwa naMwari murwendo rwangu uye kwose kwandinoenda ndiye anoziva kwandichasvika.   “Ingori nyaya yekuona zuva nezuva kuti zvinenge zvichifamba sei. Kana mukana wauya ndinoushandisa ndofambira mberi nemutambo,” anodaro Munetsi.   Nemusi weChipiri svondo rino, vanhu 18 vange vabatwa vaine chirwere cheCovid-19 muZimbabwe apo vatatu vacho vakatoshaya.

headline: Madhokotera neVakoti Votanga Kuramwa Mabasa neKushaya Zvekuzvidzivirira kuCoronavirus
text: Vanachiremba navana mukoti munyika vatanga kuramwa mabasa kunyangwe nyika yatarisana nechirwere chouraya vanhu vakawanda pasi rose cheCoronavirus. Vanachiremba navanamukoti ava vanoti hurumende iri kukundikana kuvapa zvekushandisa kuti vazvidzivire kutapurirwa zvirwere zvakaita seCoronavirus. Mutsamba kubazi rezvehutano, iri mumaoko eStudio 7, vanamukoti kuburikidza nesangano reZimbabwe Nurses Association vati vakasuma bazi rezvehutano mazuva maviri apfuura kut vanoda zvekuzvidzivirira kubva kuchirwere cheCoronavirus, mvura muzvipatara uye mari yekushanda kwavachaita nguva yakareba vachirapa vane chirwere cheCoronavirus. Mutsamba kubazi rezvehutano nevakuru vezvipatara zvehurumende munyika, mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vanachiremba reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Dr Tawanda Zvakada, vatiwo nhengo dzavo hadzichakwanise kuramba dzichishanda kutanga nhasi sezvo dzisina zvekuzvidzivirira. Vati vakaita musangano nehurumende neMuvhuro nezvenyaya iyi asi kusvika pari zvino hapana chabuda. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvehutano, Dr Obadiah Moyo, kana munyori mubazi ravo, Dr Agnes Mahomva, sezvo vose vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha dzavo. Kusvika pari zvino hurumende inoti vanhu vatatu vabatwa nechirwere cheCoronavirus munyika uye mumwe chete, mutori wenhau, Zororo Makamba, akashaya vakavigwa neChipiri. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnock Dongo, vatenda kuti vanoda zvikwanisiro muzvipatara nechimbi chimbi uye vakanda mapadza pasi.. No media source currently available

headline: Ane nharo ngaauye: Khan
text: anoti hapana chinhu chinomutadzisa kurwa naManny Pacquiao pamwe naKell Brook futi mumwedzi 12 inotevera.   Khan akakwanisa kuzvidzora mumutambo wake naSamuel Vargas wekuColombia svondo radarika ndokuhwina pazvibodzwa, uye mutambo uchangopera Eddie Hearn anove puromota waBrook pamwe naKhan akataura kuti mutambo wevaviri ava unofanirwa kuitika izvezvi kana kuti hauchaitike zvachose.   Khan akaudza PA Sport kuti: “Ndine makore 31, ndichiri mudiki saka nguva ichiripo yekuti mitambo yese miviri iitike. Sei usiri kuitika? Ndinofunga kuti yese miviri mugore rimwe chete inotambika ikabudirira.   “Pacquiao ndiye wandiri kunyanyoda nekuti mukuru pasi rese munyaya dzetsiva uye zita rake rine mukurumbira. Saka kurwa nemunhu akaita saye chiremerera chikuru.   “Mutambo usingazivikanwe kuti unofamba sei uye vanhu vachafunga kuti ndinogona kukundwa naye, asi ndinoziva kuti ndinogona kumushamisa.   “Mutambo waKell Brook, mutambo wandinoziva kuti ndinogona kuhwina zvangu ndakasununguka, ndicho chokwadi. Asi inyaya yekuti pakugadzira zita rangu ndina mazita andinoda kunzi ndinzi ndakakunda. Asi ndingade chaizvo Manny Pacquiao pana Kell Brook. Zita rake iguru chaizvo uye aya ndiwo maonero angu.”   Apo mutambo wake naBrook unenge ndiwo uri kudiwa nevatsigiri vetsiva kuBritain, Khan anofunga kuti anogona kukurudzira Pacquiao kuti auye kuzorwa kunyika iyi asi hunge kana vakamupa zvaanenge achida kuti asimuke.   Akapedza makore matanhatu achishanda nemuFilipino uyu vachirairidzwa vese tsiva naFreddie Roach uye anoti kumuziva kwaanoita —  sezvo vaimborwa mitambo yehushamwari —  zvinomubatsira zvikuru. — SportsMail boxing

headline: Iran Inorwisa Mizinda Inogara Mauto eAmerica muIraq
text: Iran yakakanda zvombo zvema ’missiles’ zvinopfuura gumi nezviviri kumizinda inogara mauto eAmerica mu Iraq neChipiri manheru. Asi hazvisati zvazivikanwa kana paine mauto aurayiwa kana akuvadzwa. Iran inoti yaita izvi senzira yekutsiva kuurayiwa neAmerica kwakaitwa General Qassem Soleimani svondo rapera. Muzinda mukuru wemauto eAmerica, we Pentagon, pamwe chete nemuzinda wemutungamiri wenyika, weWhite House, yazivisa kuti haisi kuzotaura pamusoro penyaya iyi nevatori venhau sezvo mutungamiri wenyika, VaDonald Trump, vachataura kune veruzhinji.. VaTrump Asi vanyora paTwitter pavo kuti zvinhu zvese zvakanaka, vachiti vachataura kuvanhu pamusoro pezvenyaya iyi nemusi weChitatu. Nhengo yeZanu PF muWashington DC, VaFrenk Guni, avo vari kutevera kufamba kuri kuita nyaya iyi nguva dzese, vanoti America inofanira kuziva kuti kana ikatanga hondo neIran, inofanira kuziva kuti hondo yacho haiperi sezvatiri kuona muIraq neAfghanistan. No media source currently available

headline: Vatsigiri veMDC Alliance Vorwiswa neVanofungidzirwa Kuti VaTsigiri veZanu-PF paMusangano Wavo
text: Mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa neMuvhuro vakaita misangano nevatsigiri vavo kuCaledonia neMabvuku kwavakati makanzura ebato ravo achaita huori kana vapinda panyanga vachadzingwa pamwe nekutorerwa matanho akaomarara. Pakamboita mhirizhonga pakati pevechidiki vebato ravo nevechidiki veZanu PF vaChamisa vasati vasvika kuCaledonia. Mhirizhonga inonzi yakaitika panzvimbo yemabhizimusi paGazebo kuCaledonia apo vechidiki veZanu PF vanonzi vakanda matombo panga pakaungana vatsigiri veMDC Alliance vakamirira VaChamisa. Imwe nhengo yeboka revechidiki muMDCT inotungamirwa naVaChamisa, VaDennis Muroyiwa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vechidiki veZanu PF vanga vaine chitsama vapotedzera matombo zvaita kuti vatsigiri veMDC vaviri vakuvare. VaMuroyiwa vati vakuvara ava vakaendeswa kuchipatara. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nasachigaro weboka revechidiki muZanu PF, VaGodfrey Gomwe, kuti tinzwe pamire bato ravo panyaya iyi. Mhirizhonga yaitika iyi inouya panguva iyo mutungamiri weZanu PF uye vari mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vachigara vakataura kuti vanoda sarudzo dziri pachena uye dzisina mhirizhonga. Pavakasvika kuCaledonia, VaChamisa vatsoropodza nyaya yemhirizhonga vachiti mawoko avo akachena panyaya yemhirizhonga. Vachitaurawo pane mumwe musangano wakaitirwa kuMabvuku, VaChamisa vati makanzura ese ebato ravo achaita huori kana vachinge vapinda panyanga varangwa zvakaomarara vachiti mameya anofanira kunge aine masimba. VaChamisa vakakurudzirawo kuti vatsigiri vebato ravo vavhotere VaJames Chidhakwa pasarudzo dzeparamende vachiti nhengo yeparamende inomirira Mabvuku parizvino, VaJames Maridadi, havana rutsigiro rwebato ravo sezvo vachiti vakaendesa mapepa ekukwikwidza kuZEC zvemusoro wavo mushure mekunge vakundwa naVaChidhakwa musarudzo dzema primary dzebato ravo. No media source currently available

headline: Musangano weNyika Dzine Nzou Unopetwa kuHwange Nyika Dzine Nzou Dzichikurudzira CITES Kuti Isapindira Muzvirongwa Zvadzo
text: Musangano wemazuva matatu wekutsvaga nzira dzekuti nyika dzemuAfrica dzine nzou dzitaure nezwi rimwechete kumusangano weCOP uchaitwa mukupera kwegore rino, uyo wakanga uchiitirwa kuHwange wkapetwa nemusi weChina, makurukota ezvekuchengetedzwa kwezviwanikwa akapinda mumusangano uyu achiti sangano reConvention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora kana kuti CITES haifanirwe kupindira mukutengeswa kwenyanga dzenzou nenyika dzakazvimirira. Makurkota emunyika dzemuAfrica aya akati nyika dzakazvimirira dzine kodzero dzadzo dzekushandisa zviwanikwa zvadzo sezviri mumitemo yadzo. Musangano uyu wakabuda nechibvumirano cheHwange Declaration, icho chine zvisungo gumi nezvina, zvinosanganisira chekuti sangano re CITES rinofanirwa kuongorora zvakare zvisungo zvaro panyaya yekutengeswa kwenyanga dzenzou. Nyika dzine nzou idzi dzakakurudzirwa kuti dzitambirewo chibvumirano cheHwange Declaration ichi. Zimbabwe iri kuda kuti ibvumidzwe kutengesa nyanga dzayo dzenzou dzainoti dzakawandisa. Hurumende yakambotiwo inogona kubuda mugungano reCITES kana zvido zvayo zvakasatevedzerwa. Mukuru wesangano reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu musangano uyu wavive musangano wakakosha zvikuru asi donzvo riri kurwirwa nemakurukota akapinda mumusangano kusanganisira weZimbabwe rakanangana nekuuraya nzou, izvo zviri kurambwa nesangano reCITES. No media source currently available

headline: South Africa neAmerica Dzoronga Kudzika Mitemo Inochengetedza Mabasa eZvizvarwa Zvadzo
text: Bato reANC muSouth Africa rinonzi riri kuronga kuti padzikwe mutemo unoderedza huwandu hwevanhu vekunze vanenge vachishanda munyika iyi. Vachitaura nevatori venhau nemusi weMuvhuro, munyori mukuru webato reANC, VaGwede Mantashe, vanonzi vakati bato ravo rakabuda nechisungo chekuti zvizvarwa zvemuSouth Africa hazvingarambi zvichitorerwa mabasa nevekunze. Bato iri rinonzi richazeya zvakare nyaya yekutorwa kwemabasa nevekunze iyi kumusangano waro mukuru uchaitwa muna Zvita gore rino, uko kunotarisirwa kuti hurongwa hwekuti pave nemutemo wakadai hunogona pasiswa zvisina dambudziko. Kana mutemo uyu ukabudirira, zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zvinonzi zvinogona kurasikirwa nemabasa, zvikuru mumakambani anoita zvekuvaka, zvekubika zvekudya pamwe nemumapurazi. Asi vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reZimbabwe Exiles Forum, Muzvare Diana Zimbudzana, vanoti havazivi kuti chiri kukurudzirwa neANC chitsva chii, sezvo pagara paine mutemo nechekare wekuti makambani anosungirwa kupinza vekunze vangani mabasa. Zvichakadaro, mutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, vazivisa nezvebhiri remutemo uri kuronga kudzikwa, uyo uchaderedza huwandu hwevanhu vanopinda vachizogara munyika iyi zviri pamutemo. Mukutanga kwegore rino maseneta maviri anoti VaTom Cotton naVaDavid Pardue vakaparura mutemo unogona kudimura huwandu hwevanhu vanopinda vachigara kubva pamiriyoni imwe chete kuenda pamazana mashanu ezviuru pagore roga-roga. Bhiri iri, iro risati rapinda mudare reseneti, riri kukurudzirawo kuderedzwa kwemhuri dzemunhu anopinda muAmerica semushandi, kumisa chirongwa chekuhwinhisa vanhu mavhiza ekunogara muAmerica che diversity visa lottery, uyewo kuomesa nzira dzekuwana nadzo mvumo yekushanda kuburikidza ne “green card”. No media source currently available

headline: ZIMRA Yoomesera Vasiri Kubhadhara Mitero
text: Chipiri range riri zuva rekupedzisira remakambani emunyika ane zvikwereti zvemutero kuti ange atenderana nebazi reZimbabwe Revenue Authority, ZIMRA, kuti angazvibhadhara sei mari iyi gore rino risati rapera. Asi vakuru vemabhizimisi vanoti kuda kuvamanikidza kubhadhara mari iri kunzi neZIMRA inopfuura bhiriyoni imwe chete yemadhora zvichapa kuti vavhare mabhizinesi avo, vanhu vorasikirwa nemabasa. ZIMRA inoti mari iyi ndeyezvikwereti zvekubva muna Kukadzi 2009 kusvika muna Gunyana 2014. ZIMRA iri kuyambira kuti vanhu vanenge vanyepa pamapepa avo vanobvisirwa kanganwiro kana kuti Amnesty yavanenge vapihwa. ZIMRA iri kuita chipatapata chekutsvaga mari yekupa hurumende kuti ibhadhare vashandi pamwe nekufambisa mabasa ehurumende. Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chnamasa, vanoti ZIMRA inofanira kuona kuti mitero yabhadharwa. Mutungamiri wesangano revemabhizimisi reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, VaJohn Mufukari, vanoti havaone makambani achikwanisa kubhdhara mari iyi sezvo makambani aya ari kuomerwawo. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nemukuru anoona nezvehupfumi musangano Resource Exploitation Watch, VaWashington Mehlomakhulu, avo vanoti nguva yekuti vanhu vabhadhare zvikwereti inofanirwa kuwedzerwa. No media source currently available

headline: Mitambo yeDivision One yosimudzira
text: HUTUNGAMIRI hweNorthern Region Division One hwazivisa kuti mitambo yenhabvu yange yambomiswa kuitira kuti patambwe Axis Solutions Super 8 Tournament ichasimudzira nemusi wa4 Chikumi.   Pakamiswa mitambo iyi mwedzi wadarika, Golden Eagles ndiyo yange ichitungamira palog iine zvibodzwa 32 kubva pamitambo 16 yakatambwa.   Herentals U20 yaive panhamba yechipiri nezvibodzwa 34 kuchiti pechitatu pakagarwa neSimba Bhora iyo ine zvibodzwa 33 asi yatamba mitambo 15.   Nerimwewo divi, mutambi weSimba Bhora, Tinashe Balakasi, pari zvino ndiye ari kutungamira murwendo rwekurwira mubairo weGolden Boot sezvo akwanisa kunwisa ka18 kubva mumitambo 15 yatambwa nechikwata chake.   Anoteverwa naClaude Mapoka weGolden Eagles uyo anwisa kanomwe kubva mumitambo 16.   Muchinyorwa, icho chakatumirwa kuzvikwata zvose, sachigaro weNorthern Region Division One – Martin Kweza – anoti zvikwata zvinofanirwa kugara zvakagadzirira sezvo mitambo iri kuzosimudzira nemusi wa4 Chikumi.    Tinashe Balakasi   “Mitambo yedu tinotarisira kuti ichasimudzira musi wa4 Chikumi. Tazorangana kuti mitambo isimudzirwe pazuva iri kuti zvitipewo nguva yekupedza kuita hurukuro nevaridzi vepembe pamusoro penyaya yemari yavanozobhadharwa.   “Hatichatange zuva iro taitarisira kuti tichatanga nekukurumidza,” anodaro Kweza.   Zvakadaro, pachasimudzirwa mitambo yeligi iri, ichatambwa kusvika ipere, kochizotambwa fainari yeAxis Solutions Super 8 iyo ichaona Simba Bhora ichibandana neGolden Eagles FC.

headline: Chipatara cheChegutu Chovharwa Mushure Mekunge Mumwe Anopa Mushonga Ashaya neCovid-19
text:
Chipatara chikuru chemuChegutu chakavharwa nemusi weChina mushure mekubatwa kwevashandi vaviri nechirwere cheCovid-19, mumwe wacho ndokufa nezuro. zvi zvasvita huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi munyika yose pamazana maviri nemakumi matatu nemumwe chete. Vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru mubazi rezvehutano mudunhu
reMashonaland West, VaGift Masoja, vazivisa veruzhinji kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka pachipatara chikuru chemuChegutu neimwe kiriniki iri pedyo zvichitevera kufa kwemumwe mushandi nechirwere cheCovid-19 nezuro. VaMasoja vati mushandi akashaya uyu munhu aishanda kudivi rinochengetwa mishonga inopihwa varwere vepachipatara ichi. Vati vavhara chipatara ichi kuitira kuti vapfapfaidze mushonga chipatara chose sezvinokurudzirwa nebazi ravo pamwe nesangano reWorld Health Organization. VaMasoja vati bazi ravo riri kushushikana zvikuru nehuwandu hwevanhu vave kufamba vasina kupfeka zvinodzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Vayambira vagari kuti chirwere cheCovid-19 chichiripo uye kuti vatevedzere zvose zvinodikanwa zvakaita sekupfeka mamasiki anovhara muromo nemhino pamwe nekugara vanhu vakapatsanurana kana kuti social distancing.

Munguva pfupi yadarika bazi rezvehutano rakambovhara makiriniki anoti Chikonohono muChinhoyi, Madzorera kwaZvimba neChikangwe kuKaroi nekuda kwekuti vamwe vashandi vepamakiriniki aya vainge vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Studio7 yaona vanhu vakawanda muChinhoyi vasina kupfeka mamasiki mumisha inogara veruzhinji, vanhu vanozopfeka mamasiki aya kana vave kupinda muguta. Mumwe wechidiki anga asina kupfeka masiki, VaArthur Changara, vati vanofunga kuti chirwere cheCovid-19 chaderera uye mapurisa haachafamba famba mumisha inogara veruzhinji. No media source currently available

headline: Zim gymnastics yahwina bhuronzi
text: CHIKWATA chenyika chegymnastics chakahwina menduru yebhuronzi kumakwikwi eAfrican Union Sports Council (AUSC) Region 5 Youth Games ayo akaitirwa kuLilongwe, kuMalawi.   Zimbabwe yakapedza iri pechitatu kumashure kweSouth Africa iyo yakahwina menduru yegoridhe neAngola yakatora nhamba yechipiri ikahwinha yesirivha.   Chikwata cheZim gymnastics chaive nevatambi vanosanganisira Alexandra Chenelle Hencil, Maitaishe Naomi Chikuni, Nontokozo Makanaka Sibanda, Shameela Naida Fazilahmed, Pride Nyagura, Tatenda Kajonde, Tanatswa Clement Mutowo naLennon Kutenda Kagona.   Murairidzi wechikwata ichi – Rodwell Ngadziore – anoti vatambi vake vakadadisa nekupedza vari pechitatu uye anoona chiedza chakanaka mune remangwana zvekuti vanogona kuzokwikwidza mumitambo mikuru yemuAfrica.   Anoti vatambi vazhinji vaive muchikwata chake aka ndiko kekutanga kavo kuenda kunokwikwidza kumutambo uyu.   “Tine mufaro mukuru nekuhwina kwatakaita bhuronzi mumutambo uyu wemagymnastics. Zvinorakidza kuti remangwana rechikwata chedu rakajeka zvikuru nekuti tichitarisa vatambi vari muchikwata chedu, vadiki vanotangira kubva pamakore 13 kusvika pa18 okuberekwa chaiwo.   “Isu sevarairidzi takasarudza kutakura vatambi vane makore mashoma ivavo kuti tiende navo kuMalawi nechinangwa chekuti vakure mumutambo uyu.   “Tinoziva kuti pavachazokera, vanogona kutorwa zvekuzvekutosvika pakuhwina menduru yegoridhe chaiyo,” anodaro Ngadziore.   Zvakadaro, mumitambo yese, chikwata cheTeam Zimbabwe chakakwanisa kuhwina menduru dzinodarika 13 kuAUSC Region 5 mumitambo yakasiyana. Mutambi weTaekwondo, Clarity Ndhlovu, akahwina menduru yesirivha kumakwikwi aya.

headline: Mbappe, Messi vorwira Golden Boot
text: MUTAMBI weFrance – Kylian Mbappe – naLionel Messi weArgentina ndivo vari kutungamira pakurwira mubairo weGolden Boot kumutambo weFIFA 2022 World Cup Qatar sezvo vese vanwisa kashanu.   Mumitambo mishanu yaatambira ‘Les Blues’ kuWorld Cup, Mbappe akwanisa kunwisa kashanu kuchiti Messi anwisa kashanu zvakare mumitambo mitanhatu yaatambira Argentina.   Vaviri ava vari kuteverwa nevatambi vaviri vanoti Olivier Giroud weFrance uyo akwanisa kunwiswa kana pamwe chete naJulian Alvarez weArgentina  anwisawo kana zvakare.   Rwendo rwekurwira mubairo uyu rwasarira pavatambi vana ava sezvo zvikwata zvavo zvichirimo mumakwikwi eWorld Cup kuQatar.    Olivier Giroud   Vamwe vatambi vanomwe vakatobva kumutambo uyu nenyika dzavo vainge vakwanisa kunwisa katatu-katatu.   Vatambi ava ndiBukayo Saka naMarcus Rashford veEngland, Cody Gapko (Netherlands), Richarlison (Brazil), Enner Valencia (Ecuador), Alvaro Morata (Spain) naGoncalo Ramos (Portugal).

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanoita Hurukuro neVakuru veMakereke
text: Munyori mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Council of Churches, Reverend Kenneth Mutata, vanoti zvakakosha kuti vemachechi vaite misangano yekubudirana pachena nevatungamiri vezvematongerwo enyika. Vanoti shuviro yavo ndeyekuti zvinotaurwa nevatungamiri vehurumende dai zvichizozadziswa zvinoita kuti veruznji vaone gwara rehurumende zvakanaka. Mashoko aReverend Mutata anotevera musangano wakaitwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nevakuru vemachechi. Zvinonzi pamusangano uyu Va Mnangagwa vakataura nyaya dzakasiyana siyana nevakuru vemakereke. VaMnangagwa vanonzi vakavimbisa kutsigira zvinoitwa nevemakereke. Vakaudzawo vemachechi kuti vasununguke mukupawo pfungwa dzavo pamusoro pematongerwo enyika. Muhurukuro dzavaiita nevemachechi aya, pane dzimwe nguva VaMnangagwa vaishandisa mavhesi emubhaibheri zvikuru pamusoro pedambudziko rehuori hwauraya nyika. Zvinonziwo VaMnangagwa vakaudza vemakereke kuti vanzwisisewo kuti havangagoni kuvandudza zvinhu zvese nechimbi chimbi munyika asi vakati vakazvipira kugadzirisa zvese zvavanofanirwa kugadzirisa. No media source currently available

headline: Vana Chiremba Vanopinda Muzuva Repiri Vachiramwa Mabasa
text: Vana chiremba vapinda neChina muzuva repiri rekuramwa mabasa. Vana chiremba avo vanoti pamusangano wavaita nebazi rezveutano, hurumende yavimbisa kutambira chinyunyuto chimwe chete chete. Vachitaura neStudio7, mutungamiri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctor’s Association, Dr Edgar Munatsi, vati nhengo dzavo zhinji hadzisi pabasa sezvo vakamirira kuti zvichemo zvavo zvigadziriswe nehurumende. VaMunatsivati vanotorwadziwa zvikuru sanachiremba kuti hupenyu hwevanhu huri parumananzombe nekuda kwekuramwa mabasa kwavo uku. Vakurudzira hurumende kuti ikurumidze kugadzirisa zvinyunyuto zvavo. VaMunatsi vatinhengo dzavo dziri kutyityidzirwa nevamwe vakuru vemuzvipatara asi vati mumusangano wavaita nehurumende nhasi, vavimbiswa kuti kuita kwakadai kuchamiswa. Vana chiremba vanoti pahurukuro dzavaita nhasi nehurumende, hurumende yavimbisa kugadzirisa chinyunyuto chimwechete chekuvawanisa mabasa kana vapedza zvidzodzo zvavo zvepamusoro. Pari zvino hurumende yange ichibatirira kuzvitupa zvana chiremba ava kwegore kunyange hazvo hurumende yange isingavapi mabasa. Mubati wehomwe musangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctor’s Association, VaInnocent Zano, vati chinangwa chavo ndechekuti hurumende igadzirise zvinyunyuto zvavo zvese, vonyorerana pasi kuti vadzokere kubasa. Pashanyirwa chipatara cheParirenyatwa, vana chiremba vange vakatogara zvavo vachitaura nyaya nguva dzebasa. Studio 7 yatadza kutaura nevarwere sezvo kwange kuchidiwa tsamba kubva kubazi rezveutano . Asi VaBrian Paradza, avo vashanyira hama yavo kuParirenyatwa vakurudzira hurumende kuti igadzirise dambudzo iri vakati murwere wavo kubva nezuro haasati awonekwa nachiremba. Bazi rezvautano rabudisa gwaro rekukurudzira vana chiremba kuti vadzokere kumabasa apo zvichemo zvavo zvinenge zvichigadziriswa. Asi MDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai yaburitsa mashoko ichiti haisi kufara nezviri kuitwa nehurumende yeZanu PF iyo iri kuvhiringa hutano hwenyika yese nekutadza kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavana chiremba. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weNyika, VaMnangagwa, Vanoti Hurumende ichabatsira paRufu RwaVaGiles Mutsekwa veMDC-T
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vazivisa kuti mutewedzeri wasachigaro we MDC-T, uye vakambove mumwe wemakurukota ezvemukati menyika munguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa, VaGiles Mutsekwa, avo vakashaya svondo rino, vachavigwa nehurumende. Mumashoko avo, VaMnangagwa vati VaMutsekwa munhu akabatsira nyika nenzira dzakasiyanasiyana mune zvematongerwo enyika kunyange hazvo vakanga vari nhengo yaipikisa. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, VaRejoice Ngwenya, vanoti kunyange hazvo zvakakosha pachivanhu kuti vanhu vachemane, vanoona sekunge VaMnangagwa vatora danho iri kungoda zvavo kusvotesa bato rinopikisa reCitizen's Coalition for Change. VaNgwenya vanoti kana hurumende iine chokwadi nezvairi kuita, ngaiise nhengo dzemapato anopikisa dzinenge dzashaya panoradzikwa magamba paHeroes Acre. Asi mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vanoti sebato vanorumbidza chose zvaitwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaMnangagwa, vachiti zvinoratidza kuti vanotungamirira murudo, uye mumwe nemumwe anopiwa ruremekedzo zvichienderana nebasa raakabatira nyika.

headline: Vagari Vaswera Vachizvifambira Zvavo muKwekwe Yakavharwa neMugovera
text:
Vagari vemuKwekwe vari kutambira nenzira dzakasiyana siyana kuvharwa kwakaitwa guta ravo zvichitevera kuwanikwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19 chemhando yekuIndia muguta iri. Vagari vemuKwekwe vari kutambira nenzira dzakasiyana siyana kuvharwa kwakaitwa guta ravo zvichitevera kuwanikwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19 chemhando yekuIndia muguta iri.

Kunyange hazvo hurumende yakatara kuti lockdown iyi itange nezuro manheru, zvitoro nemamwe mabhizimisi zvange zvakavhurwa uye veruzhinji vange vachiita mabasa avo semazuva ose kusanganisira kutengesa pamisika nekuchinja mari mumigwagwa, vamwewo vari mumitsetse pamabhangi.

Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti muguta iri muchave nelockdown
kwemasvondo maviri kutanga nezuro manheru zvichitevera kuwanikwa kweimwe mhando yechirwere cheCovid iyo yakauraya mumwe muzvinabhizmisi mudhorobha reRedcliff svondo rapera mushure mekunge ashanya kuIndia.

Vamwe vagari vemuKwekwe vataura neStuio 7 vati vanotyira kuti kungove
nelockdown munzvimbo iyi chete hakuna zvakunonyanyobatsira vamwewo
vachiti vanoona danho iri richibatsira.

Mumwe mugari, Parti Ngozo, anove mutapi wenhau anoshanda akazvimirira ati maonero ake ndeekuti dai nyika yose yaiswa mulockdown sezvo mhando yechirwere cheCovid yekuIndia iyi ichiratidza kuti ine hukasha hwakasimba.

Mumwe mugari wemuguta iri, Muzvare Nyarai Ndawana, avo vanove mukuru wesangano reZichea mudunhu reMidlands, vati veruzhinji vanonzwisisa chose kukosha kwekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 asi vati nekuda kwekutambura vakawanda vanozotadza kutevedzera zvimwe zvezvinodiwa vachitsvaga zvinoraramisa mhuri dzavo.

Meya weguta reKwekwe, Amai Angeline Kasipo, avo vanovewo
muzvinabhizimisi vane nzvimbo inoitirwa michato nezvimwe, vati
kunyange hazvo lockdown ichigona kuvhiringidza mararamiro evanhu, vane chokwadi chekuti veruzhinji vanonzwisisa kukosha kwedanho rekuve
nelockdown.

Mumwe muzvinabhizimisi wemuKwekwe, VaFreddy Kapuya, avo vanove mumiriri weMhondoro Ngezi mudare paramende vari mubato reZanu PF, vati vanotambirawo danho rekuve nelockdown vachiti kukoshesa hutano hweveruzhinji ndicho chinhu chikuru.

Vakambove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, uye vahigarawo muKwekwe, Dr Henry Madzorera, vati danho rekuti muKwekwe muve nelockdown rakanaka.  Asi Dr Madzorera vati danho iri rinofanirwa kutsigirwa nemamwe matanho akasimba anosanganisira kusimudzira ongororo yeveruzhinji kuti vane chirwere cheCovid-19 here kana kuti kwete. Muchizivisa chavo nezuro, gurukota rezvehutano, VaConstantino Chiwenga, vakatiwo mabhawa ose haasi kubvumidzwa kuvhura munguva yelockdown, uye michato nekunamata vanhu vakaungana, zvava kurambidzwawo kwemasvondo maviri.  VaChiwenga vakatiwo vanenge vafirwa vanofanirwa kunge vaine munhu abva kubazi rezvehutano, uye vanhu vanoungana parufu havafanirwe kudarika makumi matatu. Vanhu vanopfuura nemuguta reKwekwe vari kukurudzirwa zvikuru kusamira muguta iri kwenguva yakareba. VaChiwenga vakatiwo hurumende ichaenderera mberi nedzidziso yechirwere cheCovid-19, kucheneswa kwezvitoro nenzvimbo dzose dzinopindwa neveruzhinji.

Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehutano dziri kukurudzirawo kuti hurumende isimudzire kubaiwa kweveruzhinji nhomba senzira yekubatsira kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Nezuro vanhu zviuru zvipfumbamwe nemazana matatu nemakumi matanhatu nevapfumbamwe, 9 369, vakabayiwa nhomba yekutanga, izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga pazviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi maviri nezvina nemazana matanhatu nemakumi matanhatu nevashanu, 624 665.

Hurumende ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi, avo vanove zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana zvevanhu vari munyika senzira yekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere ichi, icho chauraya vanhu munyika yose vanosvika chiuru nemazana mashanu nemakumi masere nevatanhatu, 1 586, uye kubata vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi matatu nezvisere nemazana matanhatu nemakumi matanhatu nevana, 38 664. Pasi rose, vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni zana nemakumi matanhatu nematanhatu, 166 million, vabatwa nechirwere ichi, uye vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matatu nemazana mana nemakumi matanhatu ezviuru, 3, 460 000 vafa nechirwere ichi pasi rose. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yotambira neMufaro Kupihwa Mvumo yeKushandiswa kweNhomba yeSinopharm neWHO
text: World Health Organization kana kuti WHO nemusi weChishanu yakapa mvumo nhomba yeSinopharm yekuChina, iyo iri kushandiswa muZimbabwe, kuti ishandiswe nechimbi chimbi kana kuti "Emergency use authorization" Mukuru anoona nezvekurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 munyika Doctor Agnes Mahomva vanoti vari kufara kuti Sinopharm yapihwa mvumo yekushanda zvakagara zvaonekwa nenyanzvi dzemuZimbabwe dzakakurudzira kuti ibayiwe vanhu. Zimbabwe yakatanga kushandisa nhomba iyi muna Kukadzi payakapihwa nhomba dzinosvika zviuru mazana maviri neChina. No media source currently available Iyi ndiyo nhomba yekutanga isiri kubva kunyika dzekumawirira kupihwa mvumo yakadai. Izvi zvave kureva kuti Sinopharm yave kupinda pachirongwa cheCOVID-19 Vaccines Global Access kana kuti COVAX chekubatsira nyika dzichiri kubudirira nenhomba. Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano vari nhengo yeMDC Alliance Dr Henry Madzorera vanoti vanhu vange vachizengurira kubayiwa nhomba iyi vave kuchifanira kurega kutya sezvo yatambirwa neWHO. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano rinoti nemusi weSvondo hakuna munhu akafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvasiya huwandu hwevafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira huchiri pachiuru chimwe chete nemazana mashanu nemakumi manomwe nevatanhatu, 1 576. Vanhu gumi nemumwe vakabatwawo nechirwere ichi neSvondo zvekare izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi pazviuru makumi matatu nezvisere nemazana mana negumi nevana kana kuti 38 414. Vamwe vanhu gumi nemumwe vakaporawo zvasiya vapora vave zviuru makumi matatu nematanhatu nemakumi mashanu nevaviri kana kuti 36, 052. Vanhu vachiri kurwara munyika vave mazana manomwe nemakumi masere nevatanhatu kana kuti 786. Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa kuti kusvika musi weSvondo vanhu vabayiwa nhomba munyika yose vainge vava zviuru mazana mashanu nepfumbamwe nemazana maviri nemakumi manomwe nevana kana kuti 509, 274. Pavanhu ava, vabayiwa nhomba kaviri sezvinokurudzirwa vave zviuru zana nemakumi mana nevasere nemazana mashanu nemakumi matanhatu nevana kana kuti 148, 564. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi senzira yekumisa kupararira kwechirwere ichi.

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanorumbidza Major General Mugoba Vachivaviga kuHeroes Acre
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vaviga gamba renyika, Major General Trust Mugoba, vachiti kushaya kwavo, pamwe nekushaya kwevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, kwasiya nyika yarasikirwa zvikuru. Vachitaura pakuradzikwa kwaVaMugoba, VaMnangagwa vati nyika yakarasikirwa zvikuru svondo rapfuura apo pakashaya VaMugabe naVaMugoba musi mumwe chete. Vati ndufu dzemagamba maviri aya dzinoita kuti veruzhinji varangarire hondo yerusununguko. Vati VaMugoba munhu akakura muchiuto kubvira panguva yehondo uyewo zvichitevera rusununguko muna 1980, vakati izvi ndizvo zvaita kuti varadzikwe paHeroes Acre. VaMnangagwa vati VaMugoba, avo vashaya vaine chigaro chepamusoro muchiuto kuAfrican Union kuEthopia, munhu aiziva kukosha kwerunyararo muAfrica uye zvakakosha kuti runyararo urwu ruchengetedzwe. Vatendawo mauto nekuchentegedza runyararo munyika vachiti hurumende yavo haisi kuzorega vanhu vachiita zvavanoda kukanganisa runyararo nerusununguko hwakaunzwa nevanhu vakaita semushakabvu. VaMnangagwa vati mutemo uchashandisa pane avo vanoda kukanganisa ruranyararo munyika. Vati vanoziva kutambura kuri munyika nekuda kwezvirango zvakatemerwa nyika pamwe nezvirongwa zvekuvandudza uye vari kutora matanho ekugadzirisa izvi. Mutevedzeri wemukuru wedare reSeneti, Retired Major General Mike Nyambuya, avo vakashanda nemushakabvu vati VaMugoba munhu aiziva nekuita basa rake nemazvo. VaMugoba vakashaya vave nechinzvimbo chepamusoro mumauto eAfrica National Union kuEthopia. Vange vave nemakore makumi matanhatu ekuberekwa. No media source currently available

headline: Kanzuru yeBulawayo Yoendesa Zesa kuMatare eDzimhosva
text: Guta reBulawayo rinoti harizi kuzosiya zvivakwa zvaro zvichitorwa nekambani yeZesa, kubutikidza nekambani Zimbabwe Power Company, iyo iri pasi peZesa. Kanjani iyi inogadzira magetsi munyika. Kanzuru yeBulawayo inoti icharamba yakatsika madziro pahurongwa hwehurumende hwekuda kuputsa zvivakwa zvayo zviviri zviri pagwenya remagetsi anobva mumarasha paBulawayo Thermal Power Station. NeChishanu pakaita kupesana kukuru pakati pekanzuru yeBulawayo negurukota rezvemhando dzemoto, VaFortune Chasi, pamusoro pedanho rehurumende rekuda kuparadzwa zvivakwa zviviri zviri izvi. Meya weguta reBulawayo, VaSolomon Mguni, vanoti vakatokwidza nyaya iyi kumatare edzimhosva sezvo zvivakwa izvi zviri zvekanzuru yeguta ravo.  Zesa, kubudikidza neZimbabwe Power Company, inonzi iri kuda kubvisa zvivakwa izvi ichiti zvinogona kudhirika zvega zvikakonzera njodzi. Asi VaMguni vanoti izvi hazvisi kuzoitika nekuti zvivakwa izvi hazvisi zve Zesa. VaMguni vati Zesa yakaita zvisiri pamutemo zvekuedza kuchinja muridzi wezvivakwa izvi ichizviisa muzita rayo. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuvakuru vakuru veZesa divi ravo panyaya iyi sezvo nharembozva dzavo dzanga dzichinetsa kubata. Asi VaMguni vanoti vane magwaro anoratidza kuti zvivakwa izvi ndezvekanzuru yeguta ravo nokudaro hapana anokwanisa kutaura akamirira zvivakwa izvi kunze kwekanzuru yavo. VaChasi vakaudza Studio7 neChishanu kuti kanzuru yeBulawayo inofanirwa kutaurirana neZesa vowirirana kuti voenderera mberi seyi. VaChasi, avo vakaita musangano nekanzuru yeBulawayo, vakati rwendo rwavo kuBulawayo rwaive rwekuti vazivisane nekuonesana pamire zvinhu. Asi VaMguni vanoti hapana hurongwa hunoitwa pazvivakwa zvavo kanzuru yavo isina ruzivo nazvo. No media source currently available

headline: Dare Rinorambidza Hurumende Kubhadharisa Vanhu Madhora ekuAmerica
text: Nezuro, Chitatu, dare repamusoro rakaisa parutivi mutemo wechimbi chimbi, kana kuti Statutory Instrument 161 of 2020, wakange wadzikwa gore rapera negurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu waisungira vanhu munyika kuti vatenge ma’number plates’ emotikari dzavo vachishandisa madhora eku America. Justice Chinhamora vakatonga kuti bazi rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu harina masimba ekubhadharisa vanhu nemari yemadhora eku America, vachiti izvi zvinogona kuitwa negurukota rinoona nezvemari bedzi. Justice Chinamora vakati bazi rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu rinofanirwa kudzorera vanhu mari dzavo. Tabata munyori mubazi rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu, VaThedius Chinyanga, kuti tinzwe divi rebazi ravo vakati vachataura neStudio 7 mushure mekuona zvese zviri mugwaro raJustice Chinamora. Izvi zvaitika panguva iyo hurumende ichishorwa zvikuru pamusoro pekuti mapasipoti ave kubhadharwa nemari yekunze. Svondo rapera, gurukota rezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vakazivisa kuti mitengo mitsva yemapasipoti vachiti mapasipoti ese anofanirwa kubhadharwa ne madhora eku America. Izvi zvakashatirisa vazhinji uye zvakashorwa nebato rinopikisa, reMDC Alliance. Sachigaro veMdc Alliance mudunhu reNorth America, VaTawanda Dzvokora, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mutongo wapiwa naJaji Chinamora wakanaka zvikuru, vachiti hurumende inoda kuti vanhu vashandise madhora eku America asi iyo yakarambidza kushandiswa kwawo munyika makore maviri apfuura. VaDzvokora vati hurumende inofanirwa kutanga yapa vanhu mihoro inoita kuti vararame zvakanaka isati yakwidza mitengo kana kumanikidza vanhu kuti vabhadhare zvinhu nemadhora ekuAmerica. No media source currently available Asi sachigaro veZanu-PF mudunhu reNorth America, VaRegis Charumbira, vanoti hurumende iri kuita zvakanaka chose nekuti zvinoshandiswa pakugadzira mapasipoti zvinobva kunze kwenyika uye zvinotengwa nemari yekunze. No media source currently available

headline: Inflation Yokwira Zvisati Zvamboonekwa Mumakore Gumi Apfuura
text: Zimbabwe National Statistics Agency kana kuti Zimstats inoti inflation yemunyika yakwira kusvika pazvikamu makumi matatu nechiga chimwe kubva muzana kana kuti 31.01% kubva pazvikamu makumi maviri nezviga makumi masere nemashanu kubva muzana kana kuti 20, 85%. Aka ndekekutanga mitengo yezvinhu kukwira zvakadai mukati memakore gumi. Zimstats inoti mitengo yezvinhu zvakaita sechingwa, zvinwiwa nehembe ndizvo zvapa kuti mitengo yezvinhu ikwire. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze vanotungamira sangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzinoti Hupfumi hweZimbabwe Hwonanga Kumakore eKare Aikwira Mitengo Katatu paZuva
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kukurudzira hurumende kuti isimbaraze mabasa ekusimudzira makambani emunyika kuyedza kudzikisa mutengo wekukwira kwezvinhu kana kuti inflation uyo wananga kumawere zvekare. NeMugovera bazi reZimbabwe National Statistics Agency kana kuti Zimstats rakazivisa kuti mitengo yezvinhu kana kuti inflation yakwira kusvika pazvikamu mazana masere nemakumi matatu nemanomwe kubva muzana kana kuti 837, 53%. Muna Chikumi, mitengo yezvinhu yaive pazvikamu mazana manomwe nemakumi matatu nemanomwe kubva muzana kana kuti 35, 53%.  Izvi zvinorevei? Tabvunza nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhanga VaGilbert Muponda vanoti kushaya simba kwedhora remunyika kuri kupa kuti mitengo ikwire zvakanyanya. Asi pane zviri kuitwa here nehurumende kuona kuti hupfumi hwagadzirika? VaMuponda vanoti hurumende iri kuyedza kusimudzira mabasa ezvicherwa asi vachiti zvinoda kusimbaradzwa. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi VaVictor Bhoroma vanoti kutengwa kwemafuta nedhora rekuAmerica kuri kupawo kuti mitengo iite chamurambamhuru. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezveupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Research Institute of Zimbabwe Dr Chitambara vanoti mitengo zvikuru pamwedzi ikakwira kusvika pazvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana kwemwezdi yakati wandei Zimbabwe inenge yadzokera kumakore ekuma 2007 na2008 apo mitengo yezvinhu yaikwira katatu pazuva kana kuti hyperinflation. Munyori mukuru mune rimwe sangano revashandi reZCTU VaJaphet Moyo vanoti havana chivimbo neZimstats vachiti kuda kuteerera zvairi kuburitsa kuchengetesa bere chitunha. Vanoti mitengo yezvinhu inogona kunge yakawedzer kudarika zviri kutaurwa nebazi iri. VaMoyo vati Zimbabwe yave kutoteverana neVenezuela panyaya yekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu. Inflation yekuVenezuela parizvino iri pazvikamu zviuru zvina kubva muzana kana kuti 4,000 percent. Nyika iyi neZimbabwe ndidzo dzazezesa pasi rose munyaya dzekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu kana kuti inflation. No media source currently available

headline: Nyika Inovharwa kweMazuva Makumi Matatu Ichirwisa Covid-19
text:
Vanhu vakawanda vatevedzera kurudziro yehurumende yekuti vanhu varemekedze mutemo weNational Lockdown Level Four uyo achange uripo kwemazuva makumi matatu. Asi vakawanda vari kuchemachema nerekuti hurongwa uhu huchavasiya vari munzara.

Veruzhinji muBulawayo vagara kudzimba dzavo pakutanga kwelockdown
nhasi uye nzvimbo dzakawanda dzinosive dzakazara vanhu mudhorobha
dzange dziine vanhu vashoma-shoma kusanganisira kunoziikanwa kunzi
kuMarket muna Fifth Avenue.

Pange paine ma roadblock mumigwagwa yakawanda inopinda mudhorobha uye vamwe vanhu vange vachida kupinda mudhorobha vasina magwaro anodiwa vange vachidzorerwa kumba. Asi vamwe vataura neStudio7 vati izvi zvange zvichiitwa nenzira yakanaka pasina kutyisidzira kana kuvhundutsira vanhu kunosiitwa nemapurisa nemasoja panguva dzakadai.

Vakawanda vange vachichema-chema vachiti pane kuti hurumende iise
lockdown zviri nani kuti iite zvose zvainogona kuti vanhu vatevedzere
zvinotaurwa nenyanzvi dzezvehutano pakudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19.

Mumwe ane chitoro chinotengesa zvakasiyana-siyana mudhorobha uyo
angoda kuzvidoma nezita rekuti Moyo ati kuvharwa kuchasiya
vakawanda vari munzara.

Mumwe anorarama nekutengesa zvirimwa zvakasiyana-siyana paMarket,
VaTyson Shumba, vati vanonzwisisa kuti sei hurumende yakaisa mutemo
wekuvharwa kwenyika asi vati ivo semumwe wevanhu vanozvishandira, shuviro yavo ndeyekuti dai hurumende yakavapa mukana wekuti varambewo vachishanda.

Mumwe anorarama nekutengesa, Amai Memory Gaviro, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanhukadzi kunyanya ndivo vanonyanya kuomerwa nekushaiswa mukana wekuita mabasa avo nekuda kwekuvharwa kwenyika. Vati vanhu vakawanda vanogona kufa nenzara sezvo pasina matanho akatorwa nehuruemende ekuti ape veruzhinji vanotambura mari yerubatsiro panguva yelockdown.

Mumwewo mugari, VaFarai Zowa, vati kunyange hazvo vachibvuma kuti
mitemo iyi inoomesera veruzhinji, zvakakosha kuti ivepo senzira yekuedza
kurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 icho choramba chichikura munyika nepasi
rose.

Mudzidzisi wezvidzidzo zvepamusoro zvehupfumi uye vari muongorori
akazvimirira, VaFelix Chari, vati nekuda kwekuti hupfumi hwenyika
hwagara husina kumira zvakanaka, Lockdown Level Four ichawedzera kutambura kweveruzhinji. Vati zvange zviri nani kuti hurumende isimudzire dzimwe nzira dzekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi.

Mutauriri wemutungamiri weMDC T, VaWitmess Dube, vati bato ravo riri
kushushikana nekutekeshera kwechirwere cheCovid 19 munyika uyewo kuti chave kubata vechidiki. Vati dai hurumende yawana dzimwe nzira dzekurwisa chirwere vachitiwo
vanhu vanozvishandira pachavo vega vanofanirwa kubvumidzwa kuramba
vachishanda.

Mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato reMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatywayo, vashora hurumende vachiti maitiro ayakaita lockdown anoomesera
veruzhinji.

Gurukota revashandi pamwe nekugara zvakanaka kwevanhu, VaPaul Mavima, vabvuma kuti hurumende yange isati yatora danho rekupa
vamwe veruzhinji vanotambura mari yerubatsiro nekuti lockdown yerwendo
rwuno yakaitwa nechimbi-chimbi. Asi vati nekuda kwekuti lockdown inogona kuvepo kwenguva yakareba bazi ravo riri mushishi kutaura nebazi rezvemari kuti rubatsiro urwu rupiwe kuvanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yokundikana Kubhadhara Vashandi Mari yeKubatsirikana
text: Kunyange hazvo hurumende yakapa mapurisa nemauto mari yekubatsirikana inosvika madhora mazana emaRTGS svondo rapera, vamwe vashandi vehurumende vakaita sevarairidzi, madhokotera navanamukoti vatambira neChishanu, havasati vapihwa mari iyi. Hurumende inoti hayo pane zvimhingamupinyi zviripo zviri kukonzerwa nekunetsana kwemabhanga nePaynet iyo iri kuti haisi kuzoshanda nemabhanga emunyika kusvika abhadhara chikwereti. Asi hurumende inoti vashandi vose vachapihwa mari yekubatsirikana iyi nhaurirano dzemihoro dzichienderera mberi. Hurumende inoti iri kuda kupa vashandi ava mari inosvika zana remadhora asi ivo vachiti vanoda mari inotosvika zviuru zvina zvichienderana nekushaya simba kwedhora reRTGS rave kushandiswa munyika. Sangano reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe rakakurudzira nemusi weChina varairidzi kuti vatange kuratidzira neChishanu richiti harisi kufara nezviri kuitwa nehurumende pakutaurirana kuri kuitwa. Vanachiremba navanamukoti vanonzi vave nenguva vachienda kumabasa mazuva maviri chete sezvo vari kuti havana mari. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Mutungamiri werimwe sangano revarairidzi reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vanoti varairidzi vachatanga kuratidzira neMuvhuro. No media source currently available Kunyange hazvo vamwe vashandi vehurumende vari kuti vave kudawo kutanga kuratidzira, sangano revashandi vemuzvipatara vanosanganisira madhokotera navanamukoti reHealth Apex Council rinoti nhengo dzaro dziri kuenda kubasa mazuva maviri chete. Vanotungamira mubatanidzwa wemasangano evashandi vemuzvipatara weHealth Apex Council,Va Panganai Chivese, vaudza Studio7 kuti naivowo vange vasati vapihwa mari yekubatsirikana. No media source currently available

headline: Vakaremara Vobatsirwa neMishina Inochera Goridhe kuManicaland
text: Sangano revacheri vezviwanikwa zvakakosha, reZimbabwe Miners’ Federation, ZMF, rakabatsira vakaremara mudunhu reManicaland nemuchina unoshandiswa pakuchera goridhe. Vachitaura pakutambidzwa kwemuchina uyu nezuro, sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Miners Federeation kudunhu reManicaland, VaLameck Mushayamhara, vakati vanovimba kuti muchina wakapihwa nhengo dzeManicalanda People with Disabilities in Mining uchapa kuti vasiye tsika yekupemha. Mumiriri weZMF kudunhu reManicaland, Amai Judith Shadaya, vakatiwo vanorarama nehurema vanofanirwa kusimudzirwa sezvaitwa neZMF. Sachigaro vesangano revanorarama nehurema mudunhu reManicaland, Va James Mutisi, vakatiwo vakafara zvikuru nezvavaitirwa neZMF Munyori mukuru musangano revanorarama nehurema mudunhu reManicaland, Muzvare Esther Nemaramba, vakati zvavo zvavaitira zvakanaka sezvo vasichapemhi kuburikidza nemuchina wavakapihwa. Nhengo makumi matanhatu dzakapihwa rubatsiro rwemuchina wecompressor dzichange dzichichera goridhe munzvimbo dzinoti Premier, Old Umtali, uye kuPenhalonga mudunhu reManicaland. Rubatsiro urwu rwakapihwa kuvanhu ava pamabiko akaitirwa muDarlington Extension muguta reMutare.

headline: VaGono Vanoudza Paramende Kuti Kambani Inokwezva Mabhizinesi Haina Mari
text: Kambani iri kutarisirwa nehurumende kuti ichasimudzira hupfumi nekupa makambani mukana wekugadzira zvinhu achitengesa kunze nemutemo yakareruka, yeSpecial Economic Zones Authority, haina kana mari, mahofisi kana vashandi zvekuti nhengo dzeparamende dzashamisika kuti mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vari kufamba vachipembedza zvinhu pasina chiri kuitika. Vachipa humbowo kukomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika nemabhizimisi, sachigaro vebhodhi rekambani iyi, VaGidion Gono, vati kambani iyi haina kana hofisi zvayo uye ivo nebhodhi ravo ndivo vari kutoita basa rinofanira kunge richiitwa nevashandi avo vasipo. VaGono vati kumbani iyi iri kushandira kumahofisi avo pachavo uye nhengo dzebhodhi iri dziri kushandisa mari yadzo kuita basa rekambani iyi. Vati pave nemwedzi misere kambani iyi yaumbwa uye vakatodoma vanhu vavanoda kuti vatungamire kambani iyi asi hurumende haisati yasarudza kuti ndiyani anofanira kuva mukuru wekambani iyi. VaGono vati maSpecial Economic Zones ane mukana wekusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika nekukasika pamwe nekupedza dambudziko remari munyika nekuti pakaita makambani akawanda anogadzira achitengesa kunze, hupfumi hunofamba zvakanaka. VaGono vaudza komiti kuti kambani iyi yakaumbwa iri pasi pebazi reMacroeconomic Planning and Development muhurumende yaive yaVaRobert Mugabe. Asi zvichitevera kupinda kwaVaMnangagwa, vati havasi kuziva kuti vava pasi pebazi ripi. Vati vakatonyorera kumahofisi emutungamiriri wenyika vachibvunza nezvenyaya iyi uye havasati vawana mhinduro. Imwe nhengo yekomiti iyi, Amai Tabeth Malinga, vati hazvifadzi kuti mutungamiriri wenyika anopinda mumisangano kunze kwenyika achipembedza maSpecial Economic Zones asi ipo pasina chiri kuitika munyika. Vayambirawo VaGono nebhodhi ravo kuti vasiyane nekushandisa mari yavo kuita basa rehurumende vachiti kana hurumende ichikoshesa Special Economic Zones Authority inofanira kudira mari mukambani iyi. Izvi zvatsigirwawo nedzimwe nhendo dzekomiti iyi. Vanongoorora nyaya dzehupfumi vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, vaudza Studio7 kuti humbowo hwaturwa kuparamende naVaGono haufadzi zvachose uye zvaratidza kuti hurumende iri kuwanza mutauro pasina zvairi kuita. Vati maSpecial Economic Zones akakosha uye dzimwe nyika dzakabudirira nawo nokudaro hurumende inofanira kukoshesha kambani iyi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi, VaJohn Masimba Manyanya, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvataurwa naVaGono zvinotyisa. Vaenderera mberi vachiti havawoni chinotadzisa hururmende yaVaMnagwagwa kugadzirisa nyaya yemaSpecial Economic Zones nekukasika. Vati zvinonyadzisa kuti vanhu vekunze vanoda kushandira mumaSpecial Economic Zones vauye munyika vosvikoona kuti kambani iyi haitomborina kana hofisi zvayo. Asi VaGono vati zvisinei nekuoma kwakaita zvinhu vari kutoita basa uye bhodhi ravo rakatopa imwe kambani yekuChina mvumo yekumutsiridza kambani yeZISCOSTEEL nemari indarika bhiriyoni remadhora. Vatiwo pari zvino pane makambani anodarika makumi matatu akatonyorera kubhodhi ravo achida kupihwa nzvimbo yekushanda mumaSpecial Economic Zones aya. Pari zvino hurumende yakadoma nzvimbo yeSunway City kuRuwa, guta reBulawayo nedhorobha reVictoria Falls sema Special Economic Zones. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yokurudzirwa Kutevedzera Bumbiro reMitemo Zvizere Kana Yoita Sarudzo Dzayo
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo nesarudzo dzinoti Zimbabwe inokwanisa kuita sarudzo dzakachena chete kana ikatevedza bumbiro remitemo yaro uye kana mauto akasapindira munyaya dzesarudzo nedzematongerwo enyika. Vachitaura pamusangano wakarongwa neZimbabwe Democracy Institute kana kuti (ZDI wekuzeya kuti chii chingaitwa kuitira kuti nyika iite sarudzo dzakachena muna 2023, mukuru weSAPES Trust, VaIbbo Mandaza, vati kunze kwekuteedza bumbiro pamwe nekudzorera mauto kumabharaki hapana chimwe chingaitwe kuti nyika iite sarudzo dzisingakipikiswe. Vati kunyange hazvo vamwe vachiti mutemo wesarudzo unofanira kushandurwa chikuru chiri kuita kuti nyika iite sarudzo dzinopikiswa nguva nenguva inyaya yekupindira kwemauto panyaya dzematongerwo enyika pamwe nekufambiswa zvakanaka kwesarudzo. Vati mapato anopikisa pamwe nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira anofanira kushanda zvakasimba kuona kuti bumbiro remitemo ratevedzwa uye kuti mauto adzokera kumabharaki. VaMandaza vati hapana chikonzero chekuti mapato anopikisa apinde musarudzo kana bumbiro risingatevedzwi uye kana masoja akaramba achipindira munyaya dzematongerwo enyika sezvo bato reZanu PF richingokunda musarudzo idzi. VaMandaza vati bato reZanu PF rinoshandisa mauto uye range riri kuruza sarudzo dzese kubva muna2 000 asi richabatsirwa kuramba iri panyanga nemauto. Izvi zvatsigirwa nemutauriri webato rinopikisa reNational Patriotic Front, VaJelousy Mawarire, avo vati mauto pachawo akabuda pachena apo akabvisa vaive mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, muna Mbudzi 2017. Vachitaurawo pamusangano wanhasi, mutevedzeri wasachigaro webato guru rinopikisa munyika, reMDC Alliance, VaJob Sikhala, vabvumirana naMuzvinafundo Mandaza vachiti Zanu PF haigoni kukunda musarudzo kana ikasashandisa mauto. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi remauto kana kubva kugurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika, Amai Oppah Muchinguri Kashiri, sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kuita. Asi mushandi mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, varamba mashoko VaMandaza ekuti bato ravo range richikundikana musarudzo kubva muna 2000 vachiti kunongova kutaura kwevavengi. VaMugwadi vatiwo manyepo kuti mauto anobatsira Zanu PF musarudzo vachiti mauto anopindira chete kana pachinge paita mhirizhonga. VaMandaza vatiwo mapato anopikisa pamwe nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira anofanira kusunga dzisimbe kuunganidza mari yemaAgents, kuona kuti vanhu vanyoresa kuvhota pamwe nekudzivirira vhoti panguva yesarudzo. Asi VaMawarire vati mapato anopikisa anokwanisa kukunda chero pasina shanduko yaitika. Mumwe mushandi mukuru muZDI, VaBekezela Gumbo, vati musangano wanhasi waburitsa pachena kuti kunyange mutemo wesarudzo ukasandurwa, zvakakoshawo kuti bumbiro ritevedzwe uye kuti mauto asapindire musarudzo. Mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakaudza musangano webato ravo wePolitiburo svondo rapfuura kuti Zimbabwe yakatoisa zvese zvinodiwa neSADC kuti paitwe sarudzo dzakachena uye vakati vaye vanochema kuti mutemo wesarudzo unofanira kushandurwa havasi kubuda pachena kuti ndezvipi chaizvo zvavari kuda. Asi izvi zviri kurambwa nevemapato anopikisa pamwe nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira avo vanoti VaMnangagwa vanoziva zvese zvinodiwa kuti nyika iite sarudzo dzakachena. No media source currently available

headline: VaBhasikiti Voruma Nzeve VaMugabe Zviri Kuitwa naAmai Mahofa kuNuanetsi Ranch
text: Vaimbova gurukota rinoona nezvedunhu reMasvingo, VaKudakwashe Bhasikiti, vanoti vanyora tsamba kumutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vachinyuyuta kuti vakatora chigaro chavo, Amai Shuvai Mahofa, vari kushanda nemumwe muzvinabhizimisi, VaBilly Rautenbach, kuti vabvise vanhu kuNuanetsi Ranch kuitira kuti VaRautenbach vatange bhizimisi rekugadzira mafuta enzimbe panzvimbo iyi. No media source currently available Amai Mahofa vakaudza Studio7 svondo rapera kuti mhuri zviuru makumi maviri dzichabviswa kuNuanetsi Ranch dzichiendeswa kumapurazi manomwe akatsvagwa nehurumende. Asi nzvimbo yakagariswa vanhu patsva iyi yagara iine mutauro nekuti kambani yeDevelopment Trust of Zimbabwe yakavambwa nevaive mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, mushakabvu Joshua Nkomo, avo vakatenga purazi iri. VaRautenbach vanonzi vakanyorerana pasi chibvumnirano chekushanda nekambani iyi mukuumba kambani ye Zimbabwe Bio Energy. Asi pange pachikandiranwa makobvu nematete pakati pekambani iyi nehurumende. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaRautenbach sezvo munhu adaira nharembozha yavo ati vachazofona. Asi havana kuita izvi pataenda kumhepo. Amai Mahofa vati vange vari mumusangano. Asi mukuru we Development Trust of Zimbabwe, VaCharles Madonko, vanoti hurumende haineyi neminda iri pasi pekambani yavo, sezvo minda iyi yakatengwa kare. No media source currently available

headline: Zvikoro Zvogadzira Zvikwanisiro Zvekushandisa Kurwisa Kupararira kweCovid-19
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCoronavirus hwakaburitswa nehurumende neMuvhuro, hwasvika pavanhu vasere, uye munhu ashaya nechirwere ichi achiri munhu mumwe chete. Huwandu uhu hunogona kukwira chero nguva apo hurumende ichazivisa zvinenge zvaitika. Pavanhu vasere vakabatwa nechirwere cheCoronavirus, vana vanobva kudunhu reMashonaland East, vatatu kuHarare uye mumwe chete kuVictoria Falls. Mukuru mubazi rezvehutano mudunhu reMashonaland West, Dr Wensilus Nyamayaro, vanoti zvave kuziviswa manheru ega ega kana pane zvinenge zvashanduka pahuwandu hwevanhu vanenge vabatwa nechirwere cheCoronavirus. Zimbabwe yakatara mazuva makumi maviri nerimwe ekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba dzavo senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi, icho chabata vanhu vanodarika mazana maviri nemakumi mana muZimbabwe, uye vanhu vanosvika mazana masere ezviuru pasi rose. Senzira yekubatsira varwere munyika iyo yakatarisana nekushaikwa kwema ventilators anobatsira kufema vanenge varwarisa zvakanyanya nechirwere ichi, zvimwe zvikoro zvepamusoro zvinoti zviri kushandisa hunyanzvi hwazvo kugadzira ma ventilators, ma sanitisers nemasiki. Chikono chepamusoro cheHarare Institute of Technology chinoti chiri pakati pekugadzira muchina wekufambisa mhepo mudzimba dzinochengeterwa vanhu vanenge vachirwara nechirwere cheCOVID-19. Ukuwo Chinhoyi University of Technology, CUT, inotiwo iri pakati pekugadzira mamasiki apo kune rumwe rutivi iri kutsvaka zvikwanisiro zvekugadzira ma sanitisers sezvo chikoro ichi chine hunyanzvi hwacho. Vachitaura nevatori venhau muChinhoyi, mutauriri weCUT, VaMusekiwa Tapera, vati vari kugadzira mamasiki senzira yakaonekwa nechikoro ichi yekurwisa chirwere cheCoronavirus. VaTapera vati vamwe vana muzvinafundo vari mubishi kuita hurongwa hwekugadzira ma sanitisers. Asi mukuru weCUT, Muzvinafundo Jambwa Simbi, vati basa rekugadzira mamasiki riri kudzoserwa kumashure nekushaikwa kwemagetsi nguva dzakawanda. Zvikoro izvi zviri kutora matanho aya sezvo zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka munyika munyaya dzehutano panguva iyo hurumende iri kutatarika kuwanira vashandi vemuzvipatara zvipfeko zvekuzvidzivirira zvakakwana pavanenge vachirapa varwere vanofungidzirwa kuti vane Coronavirus. Zimbabwe yapinda muzuva repiri vanhu vachigara kudzimba dzavo senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweCoronavirus, iyo yakatanga kuChina gore rapera, uye kusvika pari zvino, yauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi matatu nezvisere pasi rose, kusanganisira Zororo Makamba wemuZimbabwe, uyo akashaya svondo rapera. No media source currently available

headline: Varairidzi veKumaruwa Voyambira Kuramwa Kwavo Mabasa
text: Sangano revarairidzi vekumaruwa, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, razivisa hurumende neMuvhuro nezvenhengo dzaro dziri kuda kuramwa mabasa pamusoro pekukundikana kwePublic Service Commission kuzivisa mazuva achabhadharwa vashandi vehurumende mabhonasi egore rapera. Munyori mukuru wesangano iri, VaRobson Chere, vanoti vasvitsa gwaro rinopa mazuva gumi nemana kumahofisi emukuru wePublic Service Commission, kugurukota rezvemabasa nevashandi pamwe nekugurukota rezvedzidzo yepasi. VaChere vanoti kukundikana kwavo kunzwa kubva kuhurumende mukati memazuva gumi nemana aya nhengo dzavo dzinozoramwa mabasa. Zvinonziwo masangano anomirira vashandi haasi kuwiriranawo pamatanho ekutora pamusoro pekuti vawedzerwe mihoro, vamwe vachinzi vari kuti hazvibatsire kutora matanho iyo hurumende yacho iri kutotadza kuvabhadhara mabhonasi avo uye mihoro yavo paine nguva. Musangano wakaitwa svondo rapera pakati pevamiriri vevashandi nevamiriri vehurumende pamusoro pemari dzemabhonasi unonzi hauna chawakaburitsa sezvo vashandi vakaramba kutambira zvose zvaive zvaiswa patafura nehurumende. Hurumende inonzi yakati ichadzoka nemhinduro musi wa20 mwedzi unouya, asi mamwe masangano evashandi anoti uku kudakutenga nguva chete kuri kuitwa nehurumende. No media source currently available

headline: Vane Makadhi emaATM Vorasikirwa neMari
text: Dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari rave kupa vamwe vanhu vafambe namakadhi emaATM vachipihwa mari nevanenge vachida kutenga muzvitoro zvikuru vobhadhara kamutero kadiki. Kuita uku kwatekeshera muzvitoro zvose zvinokurudzira kushandiswa kwemakadhi ekubangi kudarika mari sezvo mari iri kushayikwa kumabhanga munyika kunyangwe bhanga guru renyika rainge rati kuuya kwemabond notes kwaizobatsira kupedza dambudziko iri. Vanhu vanenge vaine makadhi vanofamba vachibvunza vatengi kuti vari kutenga nemari here kana kuti vari kuzoshandisa kadhi. Vanokwezva vatengi vanenge vachida kushandisa mari kuti vashandise kadhi ravo vozovapa imwe mari pamusoro peyavanenge vavapa. Munhu anenge aine mari anopihwa masendi makumu mashanu pamadhora gumi. VaOnisimo Zemura mumwe weavo vatenga nekadhi vakapihwa mari. VaZemura vanoti kutengerana uku kune kachitsotsi sezvo paine mari inobviswa pamusoro asi vanoti hapana zvekuita sezvo vanga vachida mari yekufambisa kuenda kubasa mangwana. Asi VaEdmore Mazarure vekuAlaska vanoti kushaikwa kwemari ndiko kuri kukonzera kuti mari itengeswe. VaMazarure vanoti izvi hazvishamise sezvo zvichitika pane chinhu chose chinenge chichishayikwa munyika. VaMazarure vanoti dambudziko remari ratekeshera munyika richaramba rakadaro nekuda kwezvizvarwa zvekuChina izvo vanoti hazvidi kutambira makadhi muzvitoro zvavo. VaMazarure vanofungidzirawo kuti zvizvarwa zvekuChina izvi hazviise mari kumabhangi. Zvitoro zvinokurudzira kushandisa makadhi zvakaita seOK neTM zvinopa munhu mari inosvika madhora makumi mashanu ($50) kana munhu atenga zvinhu zvemari inosvika madhora makumi maviri ($20). Chitoro cheOK mugwaro racho rinoratidza mamiriro akaita kambani iyi chinoti chakaita mari yakawanda kana kuti profit inosvika mamiriyoni maviri gore rino kubva muna Ndira kusvika muna Chikumi (June) nekuda kwevanhu vaitenga zvinhu nemakadhi kuti vazopihwa mari.

headline: Zimbabwe Yoiswa Mugungano Rakaoma kuNetball World Cup
text: Chikwata cheZimbabwe chemaGems chaiswa mugungano rakaoma kumakundano e 2019 Netball World Cup. MaGems eZimbabwe aiswa mugungano rimwechete nechikwata chine mukombe uyu Australia, Northern Ireland pamwe ne Sri Lanka mumakwikwi achaitwa kubva musi wa 12 kusvika 21 Chikunguru muLiverpool kuEngland gore rinouya. Asi Zimbabwe haifanire kunyanya kutemwa nemusoro nekuti zvikwata zvitatu kubva mugungano iri ndizvo zvinoenderera mberi nemakwikwi aya ayo ari kuunganidza zvikwata gumi nezvitanhatu. Zimbabwe iri kutanga kurwira mukombe uyu musi wa 13 Chikunguru apo irikusangana neSri Lanka, zuva rimwechete Australia ichangobva kubandana neNorthern Ireland. Sri Lanka ndiyo iri pasi pasi mugungano iri muhurongwa hwenetball pasi rese zvekuti mukuru weZimbabwe Netball Association Muzvare Leticia Chipandu vanofunga kuti vakarova Sri Lanka chete, zvavo zvinenge zvaita. Mumwe mutsigiri wemutambo uyu Muzvare Charity Muzanenhano vanotiwo Zimbabwe inofanira kukunda mumutambo wavo neSri Lanka kuti nzira yavo ichene. Asi mumwe muteveri wemutambo uyu VaTichafa Kathumba vanoti Australia chete ndiyo inotyisa mugungano iri. Aka ndiko kekutanga Zimbabwe ichikwanisa kubudirira kuenda kumakundano aya kubvira muna 1963 apo makwikwi aya akavambwa. Zimbabwe yakasvika padanho iri mushure mekupedza iri pachinhanho chechipiri pasi peUganda kuma Africa Netball Championships. Zvimwe zvikwata zviri kumiririra Africa kumakwikwi aya iSouth Africa, Malawi ne Uganda. No media source currently available

headline: Varairidzi Vokurudzira Hurumende Kuti Ivadzivirire Kubva kuCovid-19 Panovhurwa Zvikoro
text: Masangano evarairidzi, anoti reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, neZimbabwe Teachers Association, ZIMTA, ari kukurudzira hurumende kuti ione kuti panovhurwa zvikoro varairidzi nevadzidzi vanenge vakadzivirirwa kuti vasabatwe nechirwere che coronavirus. Masangano aya ari kukurudzira kuti pave nemichina yekuti vakwanise kuongororwa kuti vane hutachiwana here kana kuti kwete muzvikoro zvose uye kuti muve nezvikwanisiro zvose zvinodiwa mukudzivirira chirwere ichi. Masangano aya anoti atora danho iri zvichitevera mashoko ekuti bazi rezvedzidzo rinotarisira kuwana mvumo kubva kumutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa yekuti zvikoro zvivhurwe, asi hapasati pave nenguva chaiyo yekuti zvingavhurwa riini. NeMuvhuro PTUZ yakanyorera kumunyori webazi redzidzo ichipa zvainofunga kuti zvingabatsira mukuenda mberi panyaya yedambudziko rechirwere cheCovid-19 nebandiko redzidzo. Mutungamiri wePTUZ, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vanoti kunyora kwavakaita tsamba iyi kunotevera kukokwa kwavakaitwa nemunyori mukuru mubazi ravo kuti vapewo pfungwa dzavo pamusoro pedambudziko iri. Doctor Zhou vanoti kana hurumende yakavhura zvakare zvikoro panguva iyo panenge pasati pave nekujeka kuti nyika iri kuenda mberi here kana kuti kwete mukurwisana nechirwere ichi, inenge yarasika zvikuru. Vanotiwo sezvo vabereki vasiri kukwanisa kuenda kumabasa nekuda kwekumbovharwa kwenyika kana kuti lockdown, hurumende inofanirwawo kuita kuti vabhadhare chidimbu chepakati chemari dzechikoro kotoro inouya, sezvo vachiona vabereki vasiri kukwanisa kubhadhara mari dzose. Ukuwo, sangano reZIMTA svondo yapera rakanyorerawo mutungamiri wenyika, VaMnangagwa, richisvitsawo pfungwa dzaro pamusoro pekuti zvikoro zvingadzivirirwa sei kubva ku coronavirus. Zvikoro zvaifanirwa kunge zvichivhurwa musi wa 5 Chivabvu, asi hurumende haisati yatara zuva razvichavhurwa. Doctor Zhou vanotiwo vari kukurudzira hurumende kuti ione kuti zvikoro zvose zvinenge zviine mvura senzira yekuchengetedza hutsanana munguva ino yedambudziko reCoronavirus. No media source currently available

headline: PSL yorodza mazino
text: PREMIER Soccer League inoti zvikwata zvine vatsigiri vachabatwa nemhosva yekuita mhirizhonga kumitambo zvichabvisirwa zvibodzwa kana kubhadhariswa faindi inorwadza, pakati pezvimwe zvirango.   Achitaura neKwayedza svondo rino apo mitambo yePSL iri kutarisirwa kudzoka zvichitevera kumbomiswa kwayakaitwa svondo radarika nekuda kwemhirizhonga, mutauriri wePSL, Kudzai Bare anoti kune matanho akawanda avakakurukura nezvawo svondo radarika ayo vari kuendesa kubhodhi ravo iro richagara svondo rino kuti agozeyewa.   Izvi zvinotevera musangano wakaitwa nePSL wekutsvaga nzira dzekupedza mhirizhonga nemapoka anosanganisira mapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police, Sports and Recreation Commission, zvikwata zvenhabvu nevaridzi vepembe.   “Tine zvakawanda zvatakakurukura izvo tichapira kubhodhi redu iro richagara pasi pamusangano weAGM. Kana bhodhi rapasisa, tichazozivisa nyika yose kuti ndeapi matanho atichatora.   “Mamwe ematanho aya anosanganisira kubvisira zvibodzwa chikwata chine vatsigiri vanenge vakonzeresa mhirizhonga kana kuchibhadharisa faindi yakasimba. Nyaya yemhirizhonga iyi ihombe saka tiri kushanda zvakasimba kuti tigoipedza nhabvu itambwe munharaunda yakasununguka,” anodaro.   Bare anoti PSL ine basa guru rekubata mukushanda nemapoka akasiyana anosanganisira vatsigiri venhabvu avo vavachaita hurukuro navo yekutsvaga nzira dzekupedza mhirizhonga inoitika kunhandare kuitira kuti mitambo ifambe zvakanaka.   Anoti vanozviziva kuti mamwe ematanho avachatora achabatsira zvakasimba kupedza mhirizhonga sezvo hakuna vatsigiri vanoda kuona chikwata chavo chichibvisirwa zvibodzwa.   “Tichashanda nehutungamiri hwevatsigiri vezvikwata tichionesana panyaya yemhirizhonga iyi.   “Tinoziva kuti vatsigiri venhabvu vanoda kuona zvikwata zvavo zvichibudirira naizvozvo danho rakadai sekubvisira zvibodzwa chikwata chine vatsigiri vanoita mhirizhonga zvichabatsira sezvo pasina anoda kuona chikwata chake chichibvisirwa zvibodzwa zvichinzi ndiye akonzera mhirizhonga,” anodaro.   PSL, anodaro Bare, ichange ichishandawo zvakanyanya nemapurisa eZRP izvo zvichaona vatsigiri vanenge vabatwa vachiita mhirizhonga vachisungwa uye kutemerwa zvirango zvekusatsika kunhandare dzenhabvu kweupenyu hwose.   “Iyambiro iyi kuvatsigiri venhabvu vanoita mhirizhonga kuti anenge abatwa achasungwa. Isuwo tichamutemera zvirango zvekuti hatidi kumuona achitsika kunhandare dzenhabvu dzemuno.   “Saka kana mutsigiri wenhabvu achida kuramba achiona nhabvu akasununguka, ngaasaite mhirizhonga, ngaangouye atsigire chikwata chake,” anodaro Bare.   Zvakadaro, mumitambo iriko svondo rino, ichaona Dynamos FC ichisangana neHerentals nemusi weSvondo mumutambo uchabuda paterevhizheni itsva ichangoparurwa yeZTN Prime, kuchiti CAPS United iri kunanga kuLuveve uko ichasangana neBulawayo Chiefs.   Musi weMugovera, Highlanders ichange iri kuKariba uko ichatatsurana neZPC Kariba kunhandare yeNyamhunga Stadium.   Harare City ichasangana neBulawayo City nemusi weMugovera mumutambo zvakare uchabuda paZTN Prime.

headline: Varairidzi Vanombomisa Kuramwa Mabasa Mushure meMusangano neHurumende
text: Varairidzi vanga vachiramwa mabasa vachida kuti hurumende igadzirise zvichemo zvavo zvemihoro nemari nekubatsirikana, vanoti vambomisa kuramwa mabasa uku mushure mekuvimbiswa nehurumende kuti iri kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo nekukasika. Izvi zvinotevera musangano wechimbichimbi waitwa nevamiriri vevaraidzi vemasangano ose evarairidzi negurukota rezvedzidzo yepasi Muzvinafundo Paul Mavhima masikati. Nhengo yerimwe remasangano apinda mumusangano uyu, reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaAbiot Moyo, avo vanomirira varairidzi vakaremara, vanoti masangano ose awirirana kuti vambopa hurumende mukana wekugadzirisa zvinhu, ivo vachimbomisawo kuramwa mabasa uku. VaMoyo vanoti vari kutarisira kusangana zvakare nevamiriri vehurumende pakati pesvondo rino. Vanotiwo hurumende yavavimbisa kuti vose vakanga vari pakuramwa mabasa havasi kuzotorerwa matanho sezvakanga zvamboziviswa neboka reCivil Service Commission, iyo yakanga yazivisa kuti vose vakaramwa mabasa vaizobatirwa mari dzemazuva avasina kushanda. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kubata Muzvinafundo Mavhima kuti tinzwe divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. No media source currently available
