headline: WHO Inoti Iri Kufara neZviri Kuitika Mukurwisa Covid-19 muZimbabwe
text:
Mumiriri wesangano reWorld Health Organization muZimbabwe, Dr
Alex Gasasira, varumbidza zviri kuitwa nehurumende mukurwisa denda
reCovid-19 asi vayambira kuti vanhu havafanirwe kurivara mukuramba
vachitevedzera zvose zvinokurudzirwa nenyanzvi dzezvehutano
pakudzivirira denda iri. Vachitaura pagungano rekudzidzisa vamwe vagari vemuBulawayo
nezvekodzero dzavo dzakasiyana-siyana munzvimbo inogara veruzhinji yeSidojiwe, Dr Gasasira vati vanofara zvikuru kuti hapana vanhu vemunzvimbo iyi vati vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19, zvisinei nematambudziko akawanda avakatarisana nawo, kusanganisira kugara vakawanda panzvimbo imwe chete.

Dr Gasasira varumbidzawo hurumende nematanho airi kutora pakurwisa
denda reCovid-19 kusanganisira kuunza nhomba munyika. Asi vayambira kuti veruzhinji havafanirwe kuvarairwa pakuramba vachitevedzera zvose zvinotaurwa nenyanzvi dzezvehutano pakurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 sezvo chichiri kutekeshera pasi rose, vakakurudzirawo kuti vanhu vabaiwe nhomba.

Dr Gasasira vaudza Studio7 kuti sangano ravo riri kubatsirawo
nyika nenzira dzakasiyana siyana kusanganisira kuona kuti vashandi
vezvehutano varamba vachipiwa dzidziso pamusoro pechirwere
cheCovid-19 pamwe nekubatsira kuwana zvipfeko nezvimwe zvinodiwa
pakurwisa chirwere ichi. Vachipawo maonero avo pamabatiro aita hurumende denda reCovid-19
kusvika pari zvino, vakambove gurukota rezvehutano uye vari munyori wezvehutano muMDC Alliance, Dr Henry Madzorera, vati hurumende ine zvayakagona zvakawanda kusanganisira kuedza kutevedzera matanho anokurudzirwa neveWorld Health Organization pakudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19.

Asi VaMadzorera vati hurumende ichine basa guru rekupa vashandi vezvehutano pamwe neveruzhinji dzidziso izere pamusoro pechirwere checovid-19 vachiyambirawo kuti nyika haifanirwe kuvarairwa
pakurwisa chirwere ichi.

Studio7 haina nkukwanisa kunzwa kumutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri, sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isingabatike.

Gungano raitwa paSidojiwe range riri chikamu chechirongwa chekushanya
kwevakuru vakuru vemapoka esangano reUnited Nations, International Organisation for Migration, International Labour Organisation vachiona
zvirongwa zvakasiyana siyana zviri kuitwa nemasangano anoshanda
akazvimirira avanotsigira mukubastira veruzhinji, kunyanya
vanotambura, nenzira dzakasiyana-siyana.

Mumashoko akabudiswa nebazi rezvehutano nezuro, vanhu vashanu
vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nezuro wakare, izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ihi pachiuru chimwe chete nemazana mashanu nemakumi matanhatu nevashanu, 1565. Vanhu makumi matanhatu nevaviri vakabatwa neCovid-19 nezuro izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi pazviuru makumi matatu nezvesere nezana nemakumi matanhatu nevana, 38 164. Vanhu vapora kuchirwere ichi munyika yose vava zviuru makumi matatu nezvishanu nemazana mana nemakumi masere, 35 480.

Kusvika nezuro munyika mange mave nevanhu mazana matatu
nemakumi manomwe ezviuru nemazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe netanhatu nevanomwe, 370 676, vabaiwa nhomba yekutanga, uye pave nevanhu zviuru makumi matanhatu nezvitatu nemazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nevatatu, kana kuti, 63 263 vabaiwa nhomba yepiri kusvika nezuro. Huwandu uhu huri kutarisira kukwira nhasi manheru apo hurumende ichazivisa zvayawana muongororo dzaitwa nhasi. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu nhomba yeCovid-19 vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inopa Mari Inopiwa Mapato Pasi peMutemo wePolitical Parties Finance Act kuMDC-T, Kwete kuMDC Alliance
text: Hurumende svondo rapera yakapa mari inopiwa mapato ezvematongerwo enyika pasi pemutemo wePolitical Parties Finance Act inoita mamiriyoni manomwe nemazana mashanu ezviuru zvemadhora emunyika kubato reMDC-T iro riri kufanotungamirwa naMuzvare Khupe, kunyange hazvo bato iri risina kuwana mavhoti anoita kuti rikodzere kupiwa mari iyi. Mari iyi yaifanirwa kupiwa kubato reMDC Alliance riri kutungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, iro rakawana mavhoti akawanda anodarika zvikamu zvishanu kubva muzana zvinofanirwa kuwanikwa nebato pasarudzo kuti rikodzere kuwana mari iyi. Hurumende inonzi yakapa bato iri mari iyi zviichitevera mutongo wedare reSupreme Court, iro rakati MDC Alliance harisi bato rezvematongerwo enyika sezvo yakabva mumubatanidzwa wemapato masere akapinda musarudzo pasi peMDC Alliance. Muna Chivabvu mutongi wedare reHigh Court, Justice Nyaradzo Munangati-Manongwa vakapa mutongo unorambidza hurumende kupa mari iyi kubato reMDC-T mushure mekunge MDC Alliance yaendesa gurukota rezvemitemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi pamwe negurukota rezvemari muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube kumatare richida kuti VaZiyambi varipe mari iyi. Asi hurumende yakazopikisa mutongo uyu kudare repamusorosoro reSupreme Court, iro risati ranzwa nyaya iyi. Bato reMDC-T rinoti ndiro rinokodzera kwana mari iyi sezvo riri iro bato riri pamutemo, richiti MDC Alliance mubatanidzwa waive nemapato manomwe kusanganisira nairo bato reMDC-T. Asi mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaFelix Magalela Mafa-Sibanda, vanoti zvakaitwa nehurumende zvekupa mari kuMDC-T mucherechedzo wekuti bato iri riri kushandiswa neZanu PF. VaMagalela Mafa vanoti sebato vave kusiya zvose mumaoko evanhu vanove ndivo vane zvido zviri kumbunyikidzwa. No media source currently available Gweta rezvemitemo, vachidzidzisa zvemutemo pa Univesirty of Kent, Doctor Alex magaisa, vanoti izvi zvaitwa nehurumende hazvinyanye kushamisa asi yakapotsa zvikuru sezvo nyaya iyi yanga ichiri kumatare edzimhosva. No media source currently available

headline: Dare reHigh Court Rinobvuma Chikumbiro chevana vaMushakabvu Mugabe Chekuti Vapikise Kufukunyurwa kweMutumbi Wavo
text: Dare repamusoro reHigh Court nemusi weChina rakabvuma chikumbiro chevana vevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika mushakabvu VaRobert Mugabe chekuti vapikise mutongo wekuti mutumbi wababa vavo ufukunyurwe unovigwa kunovigwa magamba enyika kuHeroes Acre. Vachipa mutongo wavo kuburikidza negwaro, vatongi vedare repamusoro vanoti Justice Fatima Maxwell naJustice Amy Tsanga vakawirirana kuti vana vaVaMugabe vanoti Bona Mutsahuni Mugabe, Tinotenda Robert Mugabe Jnr. naBellarmine Chatunga vane kodzero pamutemo kupikisa mutongo waMambo Zvimba wekuti mutumbi wababa vavo ufukunyurwe kwavakavigwa kumusha kwavo kwaZvimba kuti vanovigwa kumarinda anovigwa magamba kuHeroes Acre kuHarare. Vana vaVaMugabe vainge vapikisa mutongo waMambo Zvimba kudare ramejasitiriti muChinhoyi asi mutongi Amai Ruth Moyo vainge varasa chikumbiro ichi vachiti vana ava havakwanise kupikisa mutongo waMambo Zvimba sezvo vainge vasiri ivo vainge vaendeswa kudare raMambo asi Amai vavo Grace Mugabe. Asi dare repamusoro iri rakati vana ava vane kodzero yakazara. Rimwe remagweta evana vaVaMugabe, VaFungai Chimwamurombe vaudza Studio 7 kuti mutongo uyu unopa vana ava kodzero yekupikisa mutongo waMambo. VaChimwamurombe vati vave kutonyorera Mejasitiri Moyo nezvemutongo wedare repamusoro uyu kuti vavape zuva richanzwikwa nyaya iyi. Mutauriri wemhuri yekwaMugabe ari muzukuru waVaMugabe, VaLeo Mugabe, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanga vasati vapirwa nezvemutongo uyu. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata Mambo Zvimba kuti tinzwewo divi ravo pamutongo uyu sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga isingadairwi. Nyaya yenzvimbo yekuvigwa kwaVaMugabe yakanetsa kubva pavakafa makore maviri apera kusvika nhasi. Vamwe vanoti dai varega mutumbi wevaive mutungamiri wenyika ava wazorora murugare.

headline: Morocco Yosimudza Mureza weAfrica kuWorld Cup
text: Morocco yakashamisa vakawanda nezuro kumakwikwi eWorld Cup ari kuitirwa kuQatar mushure mekurova Belgium 2-0 zvange zvisingatarisirwe nevakawanda. Aka ndekekutanga Morocco ichikunda mumutambo weWorld Cup kekutanga kubva muna 1998. Morocco yave nyika yechipiri yemuAfrica kukundawo kumakwikwi aya zvichitevera kukunda kwakaita Senegal Qatar 3-1. Morocco iri muGroup F pamwe chete neCroatia iyo yakatungamira gungano iri nezvibodzwa zvakawanda mushure mekurova Canada- 4-1. Croatia ine mapoinzi mana, Morocco ine manawo ichiteverwa neBelgium ine poindi imwe chete sezvakangoitawo Canada iyo yabva yabuda mumakwikwi aya. Zvikwata zvise zvasarirwa nemutambo mumwe chete wekupedzisira. Morocco ichatamba neCanada musi wa 1 Zvita ukuwo Belgium ichitamba neCroatia musi wakarewo.

headline: Vanamukoti Vanoramba Mari Yanga Yauya neHurumende Vachiti Ishoma, Vanovimbisa Kuramba Vari paMabasa
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weChina kuti huwandu hwevanhu vakanga vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 hwakanga kwasvika pazviuru zvinomwe nemazana mana nemakumi mashanu ane vatatu, kana kuti 7 453. Asi huwandu hwevanhu vanga vafa kusvika pazuva iri hwakaramba huri pamazana maviri nemakumi maviri nevaviri kana kuti 222, sezvo pakanga pasina akafa. Vanhu vakanga vapona kubva kuchirwere ichi munyika yose vakanga vasvika pazviuru zvishanu nemazana matanhatu ane makumi matatu nevashanu, kana kuti 5 635. Vanhu makumi mapfumbamwe nevatatu vakapora kuchirwere ichi izvo zvakasiya huwandu hwevanhu vakanga vachine chirwere ichi hwaderera kuenda pachiuru nemazana mashanu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu, kana kuti 1 596. Vanhu mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matanhatu nevapfumbamwe, kana kuti 969 ndivo vakavhenekwa kana vaine chirwere ichi, vanhu makumi maviri nevana vakawanikwa vainacho. Johns Hopkins University Hospital yemuAmerica, iyo iri kutevera kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose, inoti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemasere, kana kuti 28 million vabatwa nechirwere ichi pasi rose, icho chasiya vamwe vanodarika zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe nezvishanu, kana kuti 905 000 vafa pasi rose. MuAmerica vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matanhatu nemazana matatu ezviuru, kana kuti 6.300 million vabatwa neCovid-19, vamwe vanodarika zviuru zana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nechimwe kana, kuti 191 000 vafa. Zvichakadaro, vanamukoti, avo vakadzokera kubasa kutanga kwesvondo rino mushure mekuramwa mabasa kwenguva ingada kusvika kumwedzi mitatu, vanonzi varamba kutambira zvanga zvaiswa patafura nehurumende mukuedza kwayo kugadzirisa nyaya yemihoro yavo. Hurumende inonzi yanga ichida kuvapa zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana zvemihoro yavo, asi vashandi vanonzi varamba kutambira mari iyi vachiti haigadzirise matambudziko avo Vashandi vanonzi vazivisawo hurumende kuti vari kudawo kuti vapiwe imwe yemari yemihoro yavo iri mumadhora ekuAmerica. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Asi mutungamiri wesangano ravanamukoti reZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnock Dongo, vanoti kuramba kutambira kwaita vanamukoti mari iyi hakurevi kuti vave kudzokera zvakare mukuramwa mabasa. VaDongo vanoti vanamukoti vakadzokera kumabasa mushure mechikumbiro chakaitwa negurukota rezvehutano idzva uye vari mutewedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, avo vakati vari kugadzirisa zvichemo zvevashandi vemuzvipatara. VaDongo vanoti vamiriri vehurumende munhaurirano vakavavimbisa kuti zvipatara zvichawaniswa zvekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19, uye vanoti vari kukurudzira nhengo dzavo kuti dziende kumabasa, asi dzisazvipinza munjodzi kuburikidza nekushanda zvisina mhatya dzinodzivirira kutapurira chirwere, kana kuti PPEs. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inokurudzirwa Kuti Iwedzere Nzvimbo Dzinobaiwa Vanhu Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Hurumende Inokurudzirwa Kuti Iwedzere Nzvimbo Dzinobaiwa Vanhu Nhomba yeCovid-19 Imwe yenyanzvi mune zvehutano, Dr. Edgar Munatsi, vanoti vari kukurudzira hurumende kuti iwedzere zvipatara nemakiriniki ari kubairwa vanhu nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 kuitira kuti vanhu vasaungane nehuwandu huri kuonekwa iye zvino munzvimbo shoma dzakadomwa kuti dziite basa iri. Doctor Munatsi vanoti kuungana kuri kuita vanhu uye kutsikirirana vachirwira kuti vakwanise kuwana mukana wekubaiwa nhomba, pavanhu vashoma vanonzi vari kukwanisa kuwana nhomba iyi pazuva, kunogona kuzove dambudziko guru mune ramangwana, sezvo vanhu vachigona kutapurirana Covid-19 ipapo. Kunyange hazvo hurumende ichinzi yakawedzera nzvimbo dzekubaira vanhu, kusanganisira makirinikiemakanzuru, vanhu vanonzi vari kuramba vachizara munzvimbo idzi sezvo vave kubuda nehuwandu kudarika zviitika kare. Doctor Munatsi vanotiwo nekuona kukwira kuri kuita huwandu hwevanhu vari kumaruwa vave kubatwa nedenda iri, zvakakosha zvikuru kuti hurumende ikasike kuvhura nzvimbo dzekubaira vanhu nhomba mumaruwa ose emunyika. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri, kuti tinzwe hurongwa hwehurumende panyaya iyi sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga ichinetsa. Asi Dr Munatsi vanoti hurumende inofanira kuwedzera nzimbo dzekubaya vanhu nhomba, pamwe chete nekuendesa mushonga uyu kunzvimbo idzi. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: Manyama amire nerongo kuCAPS
text: CAPS United ichapinda mune mumwe mutambo isina kugadzirira zvakakwana, zvakare pave nemwedzi mitatu vatambi vechikwata ichi vasiri kutambira.   Vatambi vange vachiramba kuita gadziriro uye ndokumbotyisidzira kusazadzikisa mitambo yavo, asi hakuna chabuda kubva mukuita uku.   Makepekepe ichatamba neHerentals mumutambo weCastle Lager Premiership kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium neMugovera uno, asi inogona kupinda mumutambo uyu isina kunyatsougadzirira zvakakwana.   Vatambi havana kunoita gadziriro dzavo nezuro. Vari kuti vanoda kubhadharwa mari yavo panguva iyo chamangwiza wechikwata ichi, Charlie Jones, anonzi akange avavimbisa kuti vaizobhadharwa musi weChipiri.   Jones aisadaira nhare yake, asi vatambi vakataura neKwayedza nezuro vakati vanogona kumanikidzwa kusatamba mutambo wesvondo rino neHerentals.   “Haisi nyaya diki. Hutungamiri huri kutamba nesu kwenguva refu. Chandinokwanisa kukuudzai ndechekuti vatambi vari kuronga kusatamba mutambo weHerentals.   “Tange tichizvibata tichizvidzora, ndoona sekunge tazvibata zvakanyanyisa kuhutungamiri. Chavanogona inhema uye hapana chavanozoita.   “Nyaya yacho payave hapasisina kunaka. Zviri kwaviri ngavatibhadhare kana kuti hatitambe,” anodaro umwe mutambi.   “Tange tichizvibata senyanzvi. Takavaremekedza, tange tichivaterera kakawanda, saka hatifanirwe kubatwa mabatirwo akadai.   “Takaramba kuita gadziriro. Fungai takasvika muguta na1am musi weMuvhuro tafamba kubva kuBulawayo uko tainge tatamba neHighlanders. Vakati vanoda kutiudza kuti tiite gadziriro dzedu musi weChipiri ivo vasina kutibhadhara . . .”   Vatambi veKepekepe vakaramba kuita gadziriro dzavo svondo radarika apo vainge vakatarisana nemtambo weHighlanders.   Vaisaenda kwavanoitira gadziriro dzavo svondo rose ndokuzooneka musi weChishanu apo vakaita gadziriro. Kutadza kugadzirira zvakakwana kwakaonekwa zvichitevera kukundwa kwavakaitwa neBosso 2-1 svondo radarika.   Svondo rino vari kupinda mune mumwezve mutambo mukuru apo vachasangana nemaStudents ayo ari kutamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura mazuva ano.   Mitambo yePSL: Nhasi: Yadah v Highlanders (NSS)   Mugovera: Cranborne Bullets v Whahwa (Vengere) Chicken Inn v Ngezi (Luveve) CAPS Utd v Herentals (NSS) FC Platinum v Manica Diamonds (Mandava)   Svondo: Tenax v ZPC Kariba (Vengere) Bulawayo Chiefs vs Black Rhinos (Luveve) Triangle v Bulawayo City (Gibbo) Dynamos v Harare City (NSS)

headline: VaMugabe Voparura Hurongwa hweGwaro Idzva reVavhoti kuState House
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe nemusi weChina vari kutarisirwa kuparura chirongwa chekutanga kwekunyorwa kwegwaro revavhoti kuState House. Sachigaro weZimbabwe Electoral Commission Amai Rita Makarau vaudza Studio 7 kuti pavachabva kuState House vachaenda kuHarare International Conference Centre. Izvi zvinotevera kuziviswa naVaMugabe mashoko akaburitswa naVaMugabe ekuti hurongwa uhu hutange zviri pamutemo kubva musi wa14 Gunyana kusvika musi wa 1 Ndira gore rinouya. VaMugabe vakaburitsa hurongwa uhu mugwaro rehurumende regovernment gazette. Amai Makarau vati vamwe vanhu vachazotanga kunyoreswa zviri pamutemo kana michina yose yekunyoresa vanhu kuvhota yebiometric voter registration. Parizvino michina yakauya inosvika mazana mana uye iri kushandiswa mukudzidzisa vanhu avo vachanodzidzisa vamwe mumatunhu nezvenyaya yekuvhota. No media source currently available

headline: Mutengo weRopa Woderedzwa Mushure Mekupindira kweHurumende
text: Sangano reNational Blood Services kana kuti rinoti mari yavakawana kutanga kwegore rino kubva kuhurumende yakavabatsira kuti vadzikise mutengo weropa pamwe nekuti madzimai akazvitakura vano batsirirwa muzvipatara zvehurumende vawane ropa iri pachena. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko musangano iri, Muzvare Esther Masunda, vati NBS yakawana mari inoita mamiriyoni mana nemazana manomwe emadhora. Muzvare Masunda vati mari iyi ndiyo yakaita kuti vadzikise mutengo weropa kusvika pamadhora makumi mashanu papaindi imwe yeropa kubva pamadhora makumi masere muna Zvita. Amai Masunda vati nekuda kwekudzika kwemitengo iyi vanhu vazhinji vave kukwanisawo kutenga ropa iri huye sesangango vari kutsvaga nzira dzekusimudzira huwandu hweropa ravanotengesa. NBS ine mizinda mishanu inotengeserwa ropa inoti Harare, Bulawayo, Masvingo, Gweru neMutare. Muzvare Masunda vanoti nekuda kwemari yavakawana iyi vave kutsvakawo nzira dzekuti vawedzere mizinda inotengeserwa ropa iyi kuti veruzhinji vawanire ropa iri pedyo navo. Munyori webazi rezvehutano, Dr Gerald Gwinji, vanotiwo vanhu vazhinji vanga vasiri kukwanisa kutenga ropa izvo zvinova zvakasunda hurumende kuti ibatsire nemari. VaGwinji vanoti muono webazi rezvehutano ndewekuti mune remangwana ropa riwaniswe vanhu pachena. Vatiwo vari kutarisira kuti panozopera gore rino mutengo uye wadzika kusvika pamadhora gumi chete papaindi imwechete. Sangano reNBS rinowana ropa pachena kubva kune vanobatsira asi vanoti kucheneswa nekuchengetedzwa kweropa iri kunoda mari zhinji uye havagoni kuderedza mitengo kusvika vawana anenge achivabatsira nemari. No media source currently available

headline: Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kufa neCovid-19 Hunokwira muNyika
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nezuro kuti huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika hwakanga hwasvika pazana nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe, kana kuti 189, mushure mekushaya kwevamwe vanhu gumi. Vanhu makumi mana nemumwe kana kuti 41 ndivo vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi pavanhu mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mashanu nemumwe kana kuti 951, vakavhenekwa kuona kana vaine chirwere ichi. Pavanhu ava, makumi matatu nevasere kana kuti 38 vanhu vagara vari munyika, kuchiti vamwe vatatu kana kuti 3, vari vanhu vakadzoka munyika vachibva kuSouth Africa. Vanhu zviuru zvitanhatu nemazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevaviri kana kuti 6 292, vakabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose, kunyange hazvo paine vamwe vanosvika zviuru zvishanu negumi kana kuti 5 010. vapora kubva kuCovid-19. Izvi zvinosiya vanhu chiuru nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatatu, kana kuti 1 093 vachine chirwere ichi. Izvi zvinouya panguva iyo sangano reCommunity Working Group on Health riri kudzidzisa vanotungamira nyaya dzehutano munharaunda pamusoro peCovid-19 uye kuti chirwere ichi chingadzivirirwa sei. Mukuru wesangano reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti sangano ravo rakabatana nebazi rezvehutano riri kushanda pamwe nemakanzuru kupa ruzivo kune vanoita zvehutano mumadhorobha nemumaruwa. Vanoti vawaniswawo mabhasikoro akawanda kwazvo nesangano re World Bicycle Relief, ayo achashandiswa zvikuru mumaruwa mukurwisana nedenda iri. Zvichakadaro, Johns Hopkins University Hospital, iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kweCovid-19 pasi rose, inoti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemana nemazana mana ezviuru, kana kuti 24,400 000 vabatwa nechirwere ichi pasi rose, icho chaurayawo vamwe vanodarika zviuru mazana masere nemakumi matatu nezviviri kana kuti 832 000. America ndiyo iri pamusoro pasi rose iine vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mashanu nezviuru mazana masere nemakumi matanhatu nezvipfumbamwe, kana kuti 5, 869 000 Vanhu vafa muAmerica vadarika zviuru zana nemakumi masere kana kuti 180 000. South Africa, iyo iri pamusoro muAfrica yose, ine vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana matanhatu negumi nezvisere kana kuti 618 000 vabatwa nechirwere ichi, kuchitiwo vafa nacho vadarika zviuru gumi nezvitatu zvine mazana matanhatu, kana kuti 13 600. No media source currently available

headline: Munhu Mumwe Anofa muHarare neChirwere cheTyphoid
text: Munhu mumwe chete anonzi akafa nechirwere che typhoid, vamwe makumi maviri nevatatu vachinzi vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva pakatanga kuonekwa chirwere ichi muHarare mwedzi wapera. Munhu mumwe chete anonzi akafa nechirwere che typhoid, vamwe makumi maviri nevatatu vachinzi vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva pakatanga kuonekwa chirwere ichi muHarare mwedzi wapera. Mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme, vanoti kunyange hazvo kanzuru yavo iri kuita zvose zvainokwanisa mukudzivirira kupararira pamwe nekupedza chirwere ichi, iri kushushikanawo nekukwira kwehuvandu hwevanhu vabatwa nacho. “Sekanzuru tinoti tine hurombo nekurasikirwa kwehupenyu kwakaitwa nemugari akashaya uyu, uye kuramba huwandu hwevanhu huchikwira,” VaChideme vanodaro. Chirwere ichi chakatanga kuonekwa mwedzi wapera mumisha inogara veruzhinji inoti Glen Norah, Glen View, Budiriro, Hatfield neHopley, uye chinokonzerwa nekunwa mvura isina kuchena kanawo kudya chikafu chine tsvina. VaChideme vanoti kanzuru yavo iri kuita zvose zvainogona kuti idzidzise veruzhinji nezvenzira dzavanofanirwa kutevera kuti chirwere ichi chisaramba chichipararira, uye mapoka ose ekanzuru akatotanga kutora matanho ekudzivirira kupararira kwacho. Vanoti matanho atorwa nekanzuru yavo anosanganisira kugadzirira zvakakwana kwemapazi ekanzuru akaita serekutakurwa kwemarara pamwe nekuona kuti vanhu vawaniswa mvura yekunwa yakachena. No media source currently available

headline: VaChiwenga Vokurudzira Kuti Vanhu Vangwarire Covid-19
text: Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, vanoti veruzhinji vanofanirwa kuramba vakangwarira kurwisana nechirwere cheCovid-19 sezvo chiri kuramba chichitekeshera pasi rose. Vachitaura semunyarikani pakuparura chirongwa Covid-19 Charity Cycling Campaign muBulawayo, VaChiwenga vati veruzhinji munyika havachakoshesi kutevedzera zvinokurudzirwa kuitwa nevehutano pakudzivirira kutapuriranwa kwehutachiwana hwecoronavirus uho hunokonzera chirwere cheCovid-19. VaChiwenga, avo vanovewo gurukota rezvehutano, vati Covid-19 iri kudzoka nehukasha kunyanya kunyika dzekumadokero vakayambira veruzhinji kuti vasaite sekuti chirwere ichi hachisisiko. VaChiwenga vati zviri kubuda pakuongorora chirwere cheCovid-19 munyika zvinoratidza kuti huwandu hwevanhu vanobatwa nechirwere ichi munyika huri kukwira kupfuura huwandu hwevanhu vanobatwa nechirwere ichi vabva kunze kwenyika. Vati muAfrica, South Africa ndeimwe yenyika dziri kubatwawo nechirwere ichi vakatiwo sezvo zvizvarwa zvemuZimbabwe zvakawanda zviri muSouth Africa, zvakakosha kuti veruzhinji vangwarirewo chirwere ichi. VaChiwenga vati muBulawayo kunyanya dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemvura rinoisa vanhu panjodzi yekubatwa nechirwere cheCovid. Vati hurumende iri kuita zvose zvainogona kuti igadzirise dambudziko iri asi havana kutsanangura zvizere. Vanhu gumi nevanomwe vachachovha mabhasikoro kubva muBulawayo vachienda kuHarare senzira yekukurudzira veruzhinji kuzvidzivirira kubva kuchirwere ichi. Mukuru wesangano reRotary Club International muBulawayo, VaAlbert Mkandla, avo vakabatsira kuronga chirongwa ichi vaudza Studio7 kuti vaona iyi iri nzira inogona kubatsira kuti vanhu varambe vachikoshesa kudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19. Gurukota rezvemitambo, Muzvare Kirsty Coventry, pamwe nemutevedzeri wegurukota rezvemaindasitiri, VaRaj Modi, vabatana naVaChiwenga mukusangana nevachachovha mabhasikoro ava mushure mekunge mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika vaparura chirongwa ichi. Mumwe wevachovhi vemabhasikoro ari muchirongwa ichi, Nqobani Gatsheni, ati ari kufara zvikuru kuve muchirongwa ichi chekukurudzira veruzhinji kuti varambe vachirwisa chirwere cheCovid-19. Vachovhi ava vachabva muguta reBulawayo mangwana mangwanani uye vanotarisirwa kusvika muHarare mushure memazuva matanhatu. Zimbabwe yave nevanhu mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu nevashanu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19, uye vanhu zviuru zvisere nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu, vakabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi Voda Kupihwa Bhonasi Vose Mwedzi Uno Sezvo Dhora reNyika Roshaya Simba
text: Mutauriri wesangano revashandi rehurumende reZimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Trade Unions VaGibson Mushangu vanoti pamari dzebhonasi dzavakatenderana nehurumende mumisangano yavange vachiita, vari kuda kuti vashandi vose vapihwe mari mwedzi uno sezvo dhora remunyika riri kuramba richishaya simba. Makore adarika, hurumende inopa vashandi mari dzebhonasi mwedzi yakasiyana siyana ichitanga nemauto nemapuris ichiti haikwanise kuvapa kamwe chete. Gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube negurukota rezvevashandi Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima vakatenda kuti hurumende semakore ose ichapa vashandi mari dzebhonasi kutanga mwedzi uno. VaMavima vakamboudzawo Studio 7 kuti sezvo hurumende yamboyedza napose painogona kuwedzera vashandi mari yemihoro, chasara kungovapa bhonasi gore rino. Asi vashandi vachiri kuchema chema kuti mari yavari kutambiriswa ishoma sangano rinomirira varairidzi reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe richiti riri kuronga kuratidzira panotanga kunyorwa bvunzo dzeO neA Level. Kunyangwe pamusika uri pamutemo wehurumende dhora rekuAmerica riri kutengwa nemadhora anodarika makumi mapfumbamwe nemapfumbamwe emunyika kana kuti 1:98.98 pamusika wemukoto parinowanikwa zviri nyore riri kutengwa nemadhora anosvika zana nemakumi masere nemashanu kana kuti 1; 185 dzimwe nguva mazana maviri kana kuti 1:200. Gavhuna weRBZ Doctor John Mangudya mwedzi wapera vakamanikidza vemarketwatch.co.zw nevamwe vanoburitsa mutengo wedhora pamukoto vachiti ndivo vave kupa kuti dhora remunyika ritonyanya kushaya simba. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti dhora rinowana simba chete kana nyika ichigadzira zvakawanda zvekutengesda kunze uye iine gwara rehupfumi rakajeka. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Votyira Hutano Hwavo Sezvo Kanzuru yeHarare Yoronga Kuvhara Mvura
text: Kanzuru yeHarare inoti ichatanga chirongwa chekumbomira kupa vagari mvura mamwe mazuva sezvo yave shoma mumadhamu. Dzimwe nzvimbo dzinonzi dzichatora mazuva mashanu dzisingawane mvura izvo zvoita kuti vagari uye vana chiremba vatyire kuti zvirwere zvinogona kupararira. Dambudziko iri riri kuwanikwa nemakanzuru eBulawayo neChitungwiza. Vanhu vakawanda vataura neStudio 7 vati nyaya yekushaya mvura kwemamwe mazuva imviro mviro yekutanga kwekupararira kwezvirwere zvakaita setyphoid. Vagari vemumusha wevazhinji weWarren Park vanoti vagara vachinetseka kuwana mvura uye vave kutokatyamadzwa kuti danho idzva rokuvhara mvura rinorevei. Muzvare Shandurai Zireva anoti madzimai nevanasikana ndivo vanoiswa parumananzombe zvakanyanya nekushomeka kwemvura. VaDonald Mavhudzi mumwe mugari wemuHarare vatiwo kanzura inofanirwa kutsvaka nzira dzekuzadzikisa kodzero yekuwanisa vanhu mvura yakachena iri mubumbiro remutemo. Amai Cecelia Mhondiwa vachema chemawo vakati sevanhukadzi kushaikwa kwemvura kuri kuvakonzeresa hurombo sezvo nguva zhinji vanenge votsvaka mvura pachinzvimbo chekubata mabasa emaoko. Vati kanzura inofanirwa kutsvaka nzira dzekuwanisa vanhu mvura. Hapana kuwiriran kuti chii chichaitwa mazuva anenge achishaikwa mvura. Vagari vanoti kanzuru inofanira kuunza motokari dzinotakura mvura kumisha yevanhu. Asi mutauriri weHarare City Council VaMichael Chideme vanoti vanhu vanofanira kuchereredza mvura. Vanotungamira sangano reCombined Harare Residents Association VaMfundo Mlilo vanoti hurumende nekanzuru vanofanira kutenda kuti mutoro wekuwanira vanhu mvura wavaremera kuti vape masangano ekunze mukana wekubatsira. Kumisha mizhinji inogara vanhu muHarare, zvibhorani zvishoma zviriko zvakaiswa nemasangano akazvimiririra asi nekuda kwekuwandirwa nekushandiswa zvakanyanya, zvibhorani izvi zvinofa nguva zhinji uye hakuna anogadzira. Muna 2009 vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvishanu vakashaya nekuda kwechirwere cheCholera. Vana vakawanda vanombofa nezvirwere zvemanyoka. Vana chiremba vakawanda vari kuchema chema kuti kuzvipatara zvakawanda hakuna mishonga nekudaro pakaita zvirwere zvinogona kupararira nekukurumidza. No media source currently available

headline: Zifa Inotsamwisa Komiti yeParamende Inoona Nyaya dzeMitambo
text: Nhengo dzeparamende dzashatirwa mushure mekunge sangano reZimbabwe Football Association (ZIFA) nekanzuru yeBulawayo vatadza kunopa humbowo kudare mushure mekunge sangano rezvenhabvu muAfrica reConfederation of African Football (CAF) rati nhandare dzese dzemuZimbabwe hadzikodzeri kutambirwa nhabvu. Nhengo dzekomiti inoona nezvevechidiki nemutambo dzaratidza kusafara nekuita kweZIFA dzichiti hazvishamisi kuti mutambo wenhabvu wasvika pauri munyika nekuti ZIFA haikoshesi basa rayo pamwe nedare reparamende. Imwe nhengo yekomiti iyi, Muzvare Tatenda Mavetera veZanu PF, vati danho reCAF rakabata vakawanda nevatsigiri venhabvu munyika uye kana ZIFA isingakoshesi izvi, zvinoreva kuti haina hany’a nenhabvu. VaOmega Sibanda veZanu PF varatidzawo kusafara nekuita kweZIFA nekanzuru yeBulawayo vachiti ndivo vanhu vange vakanyanya kukosha kukomiti yeparamende VaGift Banda veMDC vatiwo zvange zvakakosha kuti ZIFA ive pamusangano wanhasi sezvo iri iyo inotaura neCAF ichizozivisa vamwe vese zvinenge zvabva kuCAF. Vachipa humbowo pamusoro penyaya iyi, vakafanobata chinzvimbo chemunyori mubazi rezvematunhu, VaJoseph Mhakayaora, vati zvose zvinodiwa neCAF zvingadai zvagadzirwa munhandare yeNational Sports Stadium dai vaipihwa mari nehurumende. Vati nhandare iyi yakapedzisira kugadziridzwa makore gumi apfuura nemari yakabva kuChina. Vati gore rapfuura chairo vakaisa bhajeti remamiriyoni mazana maviri nemakumi mana emadhora rekusimudzira National Sports Stadium, asi hapana chakabuda. Asi vakafanobata chinzvimbo chemunyori mubazi revechidiki nemitambo, VaBenson Martins Dube, vaudza paramende kuti hurumende yakataoudza ZIFA kuti inyorere kuCAF ichiikoka kuti izoongorora zvakare National Sports Stadium neBarbourfields sezvo nhandare idzi dziri kugadziriswa. Vati hurumende iri kushandisa mamiriyoni makumi matatu nematatu ekugadzirisa nhandare idzi uye vati vanovimba kuti dzichange dzapera kugadziriswa mukati memazuva gumi nemana ari kuetevera. Zvichakadai, CAF yanyorera ZIFA ichiramba chikumbiro chekuti iongorore zvakare nhandare idzi ikati inoda kuti Zimbabwe idome nhandare iri kunze kweZimbabwe yainoda kutambira mutambo weZimbabwe neAlgeria. Mutauriri ZIFA, VaXolisani Gwesela, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hongu vatambira gwaro iri kubva kuCAF mushure mekunyorera sangano iri neMuvhuro. VaGwesela vatiwo vatadza kuenda paramende nhasi sezvo vange vakabatikana uye vakanyorera kuparamende neChitatu vachiti musangano wanhasi uendeswe mberi. No media source currently available

headline: VaMthuli Ncube Voendeswa kuMatare neNyaya yeKukwidza Mutero
text: Mumwe muzvinabhizimisi wemuHarare, VaArnold Mutsondi, vaendesa gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Muthuli Ncube, kumatare vachiti mutemo wavo wavakadzika wekuwedzera mutero hausi pamutemo uye hautarisirwe munyika ine hutongo hwejekerere. VaNcube vakati vanhu vatange kubhadhara masendi maviri padhora roga roga pavanoshandisa makadhi avo ekubhengi kubva pamasendi mashanu pachero mari yavanenge vachitumira kana kushandisa. VaMutsondi vanoti zviri pachena kuti hurumende iri kuda kuomesera vanhu vasina mhaka nekuti yakundikana kugadzirisa dambudziko remari. Gweta raVaMutsondi, VaAlex Majachani, vanoti zviri kuitwa naVaNcube kutyora bumbiro remutemo wenyika. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaNcube kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Musikana Anoti Akarohwa naAmai Grace Mugabe Oramba Kupihwa Mari Kuti Asaende kuDare redziMhosva
text: Gweta riri kumirira musikana anonzi akarohwa naAmai Grace Mugabe, VaGerry Nel vakaudza Studio 7 nemusi weChina kuti vanhu vaimirira Amai Mugabe avo vasina kudomwa nemazita vakayedza kuti musikana uyu, Gabriella Engel areve mari yaanoda kuti nyaya iyi isaende kudare. No media source currently available Asi VaNel vati akaramba achiti anoda kuti mhosva itongwe nekuti chaari kuda haisi mari asi kuti nyaya itongwe nyakupara mhosva arangwe. Amai Mugabe vari kupomerwa mhosva yekurova zvakaipisisa Muzvare Gabriella uyo ainge ari muhotera muSouth Africa nevanakomana vavo vaviri, Chatunga Bellamine naRobert Junior. VaNel vatiwo kana hurumende yeSouth Africa ikati amai mugabe varegerererwe semuyarikani kana kuti kupihwa “diplomatic immunity” vachanda kudare repamusoro kuti vasabvumidzwe kubuda munyika iyi. Muzinda weZimbabwe wakatoendesa chikumbiro kuhurumende yeSouth Africa chekuti Amai Mugabe vabatwe semunyarikani. VaNel vati vachine chivimbo chekuti Amai Mugabe vachamiswa pamberi pematare edzimhosva. Vatiwo vatiwo Amai Mugabe havakwanise kubatwa semunyarikani. Mutauriri wemapurisa muSouth Africa Brigadier Vish Naidoo vaudza Studio 7 kuti semapurisa vambomira kuferefeta nyaya iyi kusvika vanzwa chikumbo chaAmai Mugabe chekuti vabatwe semunyarikana. Pavabvunzwa neStudio 7 kuti ko Amai Grace Mugabe vari kuti kudi pakupikisa mhosva iyi, VaNaidoo vaudza Studio 7 kuti Amai Mugabe havana kana humbowo kana mashoko avakapa kumapurisa sezvo vasina kuuya kukamba kwavainge vakamirirwa. Mamwe magweta anoti Amai Mugabe vanokwanisa kubatwa semunyarikani asi vamwe vachiramba. Muzvinafundo munyaya dezvemutemo paUniversity of Zimbabwe vachitungamira bato reNCA VaLovemore Madhuku vanoti Amai Mugabe vanokodzera kubatwa semunyarikani asi vozotongwa vave kuZimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Voshandisa Social Media Vachikurudzirana Kunyoresa Kuvhota
text: Mamwe masangano anoshanda akazvimirira ega pamwe nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika ari kushandisa ‘social media’ kukurudzira vanhu kuti vanyorese kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota. Asi izvi zviri kusiya vamwe vaine mubvunzo wekuti kuita izvi kunobatsira here kuti vanhu vanyorese vagovhota nehuwandu hwavo. Mapato ezvamatongerwo enyika pamwe nemamwe masangano anoshanda akazvimirira ega uye vanhuwo zvavo vari kushandisa ‘social media’ kunyanya paWhatsApp senzira yekukuridzira vanhu kuti vanyorese kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota. Izvi zvave kuita kuti vamwe vabvunze kuti kuita izvi kungabatsira here panguva iyo pane maonero ekuti vamwe veruzhinji vari kushaya hany’a nekunyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota. Nyanzvi muhumhizha hwekufambiswa kwemashoko, VaNigel Gambanga, vanoti vanoona ‘social media’ ichibatsira zvikuru mukukurudzira vanhu kuti vanyorese kuti vagovhota sezvo humboo hunobva kuboka rePost and Telecommunications Regulatory Authority huchiratidza kuti vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kushandisa social media kunyanya WhatsApp. VaGambanga vanotiwo nekuda kwekuti dzimwe nhepfenyuro nemamwe mapepanhau zviri pasi pehurumende, kushandisa ‘social media’ kunopa masangano anoshanda akazvimirira ega, pamwe nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika, mukana wekuti vaitewo kurudziro yavowo pasina kumbunyikidzwa. VaVictor Chimhutu ndivo sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Yadzoka iro rine chirongwa chinonzi Zvimakire zama vhota/ Decide Your Destiny Vote Campaign. Pasi pechirongwa ichi veZimbabwe Yadzoka vari kushanda nevamwe vaimbi vakasiyana siyana munyika vachikurudzira vanhu, kunyanya vechidiki, kuti vanyorese kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota. Mudzidzisi wezvekutapanhau paFalmouth University kuUnited Kingdom, VaHayes Mabweazara, vanoti kushandisa social media kunogona chose kubatsira kukurudzira vanhu kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota, asi vanotiwo vakawanda vanowana mashoko ekurudziro yakadaro, vanhu vari kunze kwenyika vasingakwanise kunyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuzovhota musarudzo dzegore rinouya. Dzimwewo nyanzvi mune zvekufambiswa kwemashoko dzinoti kunyange hazvo vanhu munyika vave kushandisa social media zvakanyanya, kushandisa nzira iyi kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vanyorese kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota kunogona kushaya basa sezvo vanhu vane tsika yekusatevedzera zvavanenge vawona kana kunzwa pa’social media’ apa. No media source currently available

headline: Vadzidzi Vakawanda Vovhiringirwa Dzidzo neCoronavirus muZimbabwe
text:
Vamwe vabereki vane vana vanofanirwa kunyora bvunzo dzakakosha
gore rino vanoti vari kutyira kuti vana vavo vacharasikirwa nenguva
yakakosha yekudzidza nekuda kwechirwere cheCoronavirus. Vanwe vadzidzi vari kuzvikoro zvepamusoro vari kuchemawo nerekuti havana mari yekuti vaite zvidzidzo zvavo zvepaiundaneti sezviri kukurudzirwa nehurumende.

Vamwe vabereki vataura neStudio7 vati hurumende inofanirwa kubuda
pachena panyaya yekuti dzidzo yevana vekuprimary nesecondary
ichaenderera mberi sei uye kuti vanofanirwa kunyora bvunzo vachaita
sei.

Mumwe mubereki ane mwana ari kufanirwa kunyora bvunzo dzeGrade7 gore rino, Amai Rudo Makamure, vati vanofunga kuti dai bvumzo dzaendeswa mberi.

Muzvare Tafadzwa Musika avo vanochengeta vana vemukoma wavo vari
muGrade 7 neForm 4, vatiwo kunyange hazvo vana vachigona kuverenga vari kumba, maverengero aya anosiyana nepavanenge vari kuchikoro. Vati dai bvunzo, kunyanya dzemuna Chikumi dzaendeswa mberi kuitira kuti vadzidzi vawane nguva yekugadzirira yakakwana.

Zvimwe zvikoro zviri kukurudzira kuti vabereki vatengere vana vavo nharembozha kana makombiyuta kuitira kuti vakwanise kudzidza vari kumba vachishandisa indaneti.

Mumwe mubereki, Amai Oster Magqoka, vati havazi vose vabereki
vanokwanisa kuwana mari yekutenga zvinhu zvakadai, uye kubhadhara mari
inodiwa pakushandisa indaneti. Amai Magqoka vatiti hurumende inofanirwa kupindira ichitaura pachena kuti nderipi gwara rinofanirwa kutorwa panyaya iyi.

Murongi wemabasa mumubatanidzwa weNational Association of School
Development Associations and Committees, NASDAC, VaBanny Manokora, vati hurumende inofanirwa kuenzanisa kukosha kwehupenyu hwevana uye kukoshakwedzidzo.

Mutungamiri wesangano reProgressive Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, VaTakavafira Zhou, vatiwo hurumende haifanirwe kuda kumhanyira kuti zvikoro zvivhurwe kana chirwere chichiri kutekeshera. VaZhou vati pane vadzidzisi vari kudzidzisa vana nenzira dzakadai seWhatsApp vakati zvakakosha kuti hurumende itsigire nekuvandudza hurongwa uhu.

Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi regurukota rezvedzidzo, VaCain Mathema,
panyaya iyi sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isingabatike. Asi VaMathema vanogara havo vakaudza Studio7 kuti havafi vakataura nayo nepamusana pezvirango zvavanoti zvakatemerwa hurumende yavo neAmerica. Asi vachipindura mubvunzo wekuti ndeapi matanho ari kutorwa mune zvedzidzo kwakatariswa chirwere cheCoronavirus, munyori mubazi rezvekufambiswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, vati hurumende iri kugadzira hurongwa hwakazara hwekuona kuti dzidzo ingaenderere mberi sei. VaMangwana vabvuma kuti vadzidzi vakawanda, kusanganisira vekumaruwa, havakwanise kudzidza vachishandisa indaneti vakati hurumende ichabudisa hurongwa hwainahwo panyaya iyi uyewo pakuti zvikoro zvichavhurwa riinhi.

Zvichakadaro, vamwe vaddzidzi vemuzvikoro zvepamusoro vari kuchemawo
nerekuti havazi kukwanisa kudzidza vachishandisa indaneti nekuda
kwekudhura kunoita nzira iyi.

Mumwe mudzidzi uyo angozvidoma nezita rekuti Tafadzwa ati vabereki
vakawanda havakwanise kubhadharira vana vavo mari yeindaneti nekuda
kwekuoma kwakaita zvinhu munyaya ndzemari munyika.

Mumwezve mudzidzi, Tabeth Magigwana, ati dai vemakambani enharembozha neindaneti achipa vadzidzi mutengo wepasi.

Mudzidzisi wezvidzidzo zvepamusoro munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vari
muongorori akazvimirira ega, VaFelix Chari, vaudza Studio 7 kuti
kushandiswa kweindaneti mukuita zvidzidzo zvepamusoro hakusati
kwasvika padanho rakakura muZimbabwe nekuda kwezvikonzero zvakasiyana-siyana.

Pari zvino zvikoro zvepamusoro zvemunyika zvakavharwawo senzira
yekuedza kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCoronavirus icho
chauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru zana nemakumi manomwe nezvisere pasi rose, kusanganisira vanhu vana vemuZimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vanoti Vave Kufa neNzara Vari Mudzimba
text:
Vanhu mudunhu reMashonaland West vane maonero akasiyana zvikuru padanho rehurumende rekuti vagare mudzimba kwemamwe mavhiki maviri senzira yekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere checoronavirus. Amai Judith Chikwari avo vanorarama nekutenga nekutengesa mbatya vanoti vave kufanenzara mudzimba sezvo vasiri kutengesa kuti vawane zvekudya.

Amai Chikwari vanoti VaMnangagwa vangadai varerutsa nguva dzekuvhura kuti vatenge zvinogona kupa kuti vatenge zvekudya.

Izvi zvatsigirwa naVaTavengwa Kamuchokoto vekuKadoma avo vasingaone vanorarama nekupemha vanoti rwendo rwuno Mwari avaseke sezvo vari kutadza kuwana ruyamuro kunyange kubva kubazi reSocial Welfare. Asi gurukota rinona nezvemagariro evanhu Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima vanoti hurumende iri kupa vanhu mazana maviri emadhora pamwedzi kuti vabatsirikane mari inonzi nevamwe ishoma zvikuru. No media source currently available Sachigaro weboka revadzidzisi reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe-PTUZ- mudunhu reMashonaland West VaWeston Mutapa vanoti vatambira kuwedzerwa kwemazuva nemufaro sezvo hupenyu hwevadzidzisi nevadzidzi hwanga huri parumananzombe dai vadzokera kuzvikoro
parizvino. VaMutapa vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kutora nguva yavawedzera kuvharwa kwenyika kugadzirira vadzidzisi kuti vawane zvipfeko nemishonga yekuderedza hutachiona hwecoronavirus kana vave kudzokera kumabasa.

Munyori mukuru muboka guru rinomirira vashandi munyika reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Union-ZCTU- VaJaphet Moyo vanoti vafarawo dedanho ratorwa naVaMnangagwa sezvo hupenyu hwevanhu hwakakosha kudarika hupfumi vachiti kana munhu afa hapasisina zvekuita.

Asi VaMoyo vanoti havasi kufara nemari inoita madhora mazana maviri ari kupihwa pamunhu kuti vanhu abastirikane nebazi rezvemagariro evanhu panguva iyo nyika inenge yakavharwa vachiti ishoma zvikuru.

Mumiriri weNorton muparamende VaTemba Mliswa vanoti pamusoro pekuwedzera mazuva ekuvhara nyika mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanofanirwa kuona kuti motokari dzose dzinotakura zvinhu kunze kwenyika dzichipfuura nemuno munyika dzimbomira. Vatiwo vashandi vakaita sanamukoti nemapurisa vanoshanda vachisangana nevanhu vangangodaro vaine chirwere cheCoronavirus havafanirwe kushanda vachibva kumba asi kuti vatsvagirwe nzvimbo dzekugara.

VaMnangagwa vakawedzera mazuva nyika yakavharwa kusvika musi wa3 Chivabvu nekuda kwekuti nyika haisati yazadzisa zvinokurudzirwa nebazi rezvehutano muUnited Nations reWorld Health Organisations kana kuti WHO-kuti nyika ivhurwe vachiti huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 huri kuramba huchikwira munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Veruzhinji Pasi Rose Vochema Kushaya kwaAmai Winnie Madikizela-Mandela
text: No media source currently available Amai Winnie Madikizela-Mandela, avo vaimbove mudzimai wemutungamiri wekutanga weSouth Africa, mushakabvu VaNelson Mandela, vashaya mu Johannesburg muSouth Africa makare. Amai Madikizela-Mandela vakaroorana naVaNelson Mandela mugore ra1958, vakazosiyana muna 1996. Amai Madikizela-Mandela vakambotungamira boka remadzimai ebato reAfrican National Congress, ANC, muna 1993, uye vakave nhengo yeparamende negurukota rehurumende kwekanguva kapfupi. Amai Madikizela-Mandela vasiya vana vaviri avo vakaita naVaMandela. African Union Goodwill Ambassador anorwisana nekuroodzwa kwevanasikana vasati vabva zera, uye vari mukuru wesangano reRozaria Memorial Trust, vanoti kushaya kwaAmai Mandikizela-Mandela kuri kurwadza vazhinji sezvo vaive murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu mukuru, kunyanya panguva yerusarura muSouth Africa. "Tinoziva kuti ndiMai vakabatsira kurwira rusununguko rweSouth Africa, uye rusununguko rwedu sevanhukadzi. Ndimai vakamirira zviro zvizhinji zvatayi shuwira kuti dai tawana madzimai ane hushingi, anoramba amire pamutsetse pane zvinhu zvatinokoshesa, nekuti rusununguko rweSouth Africa rwaive rwusununguko rweZimbabwe," Amai Gumbodzvanda vanodaro.

headline: Tarumbwa ‘anwisa’ zvekare . . . apa Quin Tasha pamuviri
text: VATAMBI venhabvu pasi rose, vanoratidza sekuti vanopinda murudo kana kuroora nevanhu vane mukurumbira sewavo. Aimbotungamira chikwata chenyika yeEngland, David Beckham, akaroora tsvarakadenga yaiita zverunako, mutambi wemadhirama uye muimbi Victoria Caroline Beckham, Wayne Rooney akaroorawo Coleen Mary wekuIreland uyo anova munyori uye achishanda pachiteshi cheterevhizheni. Imwe yenyaya dzinogona kunakidza ndeye aimbova mutambi weFC Barcelona, Gerard Pique, uyo akachata neshasha yekuimba yekuColumbia, Shakira.   Zvino aimbove mutambi weHighlanders neChicken Inn – Obidiah Tarumbwa – akapindawo muboka revatambi venhabvu ava zvichitevera kudanana kwaari kuita naQuin Tasha uyo anozivikanwa zvikuru munyaya dzekutamba mimhanzi. Tasha aimbova mutambi wechikwata chevanhukadzi chete cheWhin Quins.   Tarumbwa, uyo akambotambira chikwata chekuBelgium chinonzi Cercle Brugge, anoratidza kuti achiri “kunwisa” zvichitevera kupa pamuviri kwaakaita Quin Tasha.   Vaviri ava vakatanga kudanana makore maviri adarika uye Tasha ane pamuviri pave nemwedzi misere. Kunyangwe zvazvo vaviri ava vasina kuda kutaura zvakawanda pamusoro perudo rwavo, Tasha akatumira mashoko padandemutande kumudiwa wake musi wekupemberera zuva rekuzvarwa kwake 29 Mbudzi, izvo zvakatsinhira kudanana kwavo.   Zvisinei nekuti Tarumbwa ane vana nevamwe vakadzi uye dzimwe nguva vaasingabhadharire mari dzemendenenzi, Tasha ari kuratuidza kusave nehanya nazvo.   “Izuva rako mudiwa wangu uye ndiri kupemberera zuva rino newe. Mwari wemasimba ose vakuropafadze nemakore akawanda azere nebudiriro. “Ndinonzwa kufara nekuve nemunhu ane rudo uye mweya wakanaka sewe muupenyu hwangu.   “Vakazvitaura zvose, vakataura mashoko akaipa pamusoro pako asi handiwirirane nazvo. Mukomana uyu anoshamisa kwandiri. Anotya Mwari, ane ruremekedzo, anotsigira uye nekusimudzira.   “Nguva dzose anenge ari padivi pangu panguva yakanaka neyakaoma, anondiudza nzira dzekugadzirisa matambudziko ose. Ndiye zvose zvandinoda pamunhurume.   “Achava MURUME wangu, achazova DADDY, ndinokuremekedza uye ndinokuda murume iwe #Obidiah Tarumbwa,” anodaro Quin Tasha padandemutande.

headline: Engineer Mudzuri veBato reMDC-T Vanozivisa Kuti Vakabatwa neChirwere cheCovid-19
text: Mutewedzeri wemutungamiri weMDC-T iri kufanotungamirwa naMuzvare Thozane Khupe, Engineer Elias Mudzuri, vakazivisa neChipiri kuti vakabatwa vaine chirwere cheCovid-19. Vachinyora padandemutande reTwitter, Engineer Mudzuri vakazivisa vana veZimbabwe kuti vakanga vavhenekwa vachiwanikwa vaine chirwere ichi, uye vakanga vatove kune chimwe chipatara uko vakanga vachibatsirwa nevashandi vaive vakazvipira, chinove chinhu chaivapa kugadzikana. Vakatiwo nekuzvipira kwavo pamwe neminamato yevamwe vose vaizokwanisa kukunda chirwere ichi.

headline: Hurumende Inoti Iri Kugutsikana neChirongwa Chayo Chakangana neKubaya Nhomba yeCovid-19 Vanhu Mamiriyoni Gumi
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu nhomba yeCovid-19 huri kufamba zvakanaka chose munyika asi dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehutano dzichiti pane zvimwe zvakawanda zvinoda kugadziriswa. Mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri, vaudza Studio7 kuti chirongwa chekubaya vanhu nhomba chiri kufamba mugwara rakanaka, uye vanotarissira kuti hurumende ichagona kuzadzikisa shuviro yekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana zvevanhu munyika yose. VaMujiri vatiwo mangwana hurumende iri kutambira nhomba dzeCovid-19 mamiriyoni maviri dzakatengwa kuChina. Mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira machiremba anoshanda akazvimirira, Dr Johannes Marisa, vatsigirawo kuti chirongwa chekubaya nhomba chiri kufamba zvakanaka kana zvichienzaniswa nedzimwe nyika dzemuAfrica. VaMarisa varumbidzawo danho rakatorwa nehurumende rekuti zvipatara, nemakirinika akazvimirira zvitange kubayawo nhomba yeCovid-19. Asi VaMarisa vatiwo vana chiremba vakazvimiririra ava vanoda kubatsirwawo nemabhokisi anochengeta chando sezvo nhomba idzi dzine matemperature adzinofanirwa kugara dziri. Asi vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vati chirongwa ichi hachisati chanyatsopinda mugwara. VaMadzorera vati hurumende inofanirwa kusimba mukupinza nhomba munyika kuitirakuti ikwanise kubaya nhomba vanhu zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana. VaMadzorera vatiwo kune dzimwe nzvimbo dzichiri kuita mitsetse mirefu yevanhu vanenge vachida kubayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kutivanhu mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matanhatu nevatatu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi, izvo zvakasvitsahuwandu hwevanhu vabatwa neCovid-19 pazviuru zana negumi nezvina nemazana mana nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe,kana kuti 114,489. Vanhu makumi mana nevatatu vakafa nechirwere ichi nezuro izvo zvakasiya vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vave zviuru zvitatu nemazana manomwe nemakumi mashanu nevana 3,754 Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi mmasere nemazana mashanu nemakumi mana nemumwe chete 1, 780, 541vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga yekudzivirira Covid-19. Vabayiwa nhomba yepiri vave maza mapfumbamwe nemakumi maviri ezviuru nemazana mashanu nemakumi mashanu nevana,kana kuti 920,554. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 vanhu mamiriyoni gumi. kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisarambe hichpararira. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inopa Nhepfenyuro Nhatu dzeMatunhu Marezenisi
text: Mubatanidzwa hwenhepfenyuro dzemumanharaunda munyika weZimbabwe Association of Community Radio Stations, kana kuti Zacras, unoti uri kufara zvikuru kuti hurumende yakapa marezeresi kunhepfenyuro nhatu dzemunharaunda kana kuti community radio stations kunyange hazvo Zacras ichiti zvaitwa nehurumende izvi zvakafanana nekuisa donhwe remvura mugungwa. Hurumende, kubudikidza neBroadcasting Authority of Zimbabwe, yakazivisa kuti yapa marezenisi kunhepfenyuro nhatu dzemumanharaunda dzinoti Nyangani Community Radio Trust, Ntepe-Manama Community Radio Trust pamwe neThe Mbembesi Development Trust. Gwaro rakaburitswa neBAZ rinoti dzimwe nhepfenyuro nomwe dzemhando iyi dzichapihwa marezenisi mukutanga kwegore rinouya kuitira kuti dzisvike pagumi. BAZ inoti panhepfenyuro nhatu dzakapihwa marezenisi hapana vamwe vaikwikwidza kuti vapihwewo marezenisi ichitiwo panzvimbo nomwe dzasara pane makwikwi saka nokudaro bazi rehurumende iri rinoti richiri kumboongorora kuti vanokodzera kupihwa marezenisi ndevapi. Sachigaro weZacras, Muzvare Pelagia Kapuya, vaudza vatori venhau kuti vafara nekupihwa kwaitwa nhepfenyuro nhatu idzi marezenisi. Vati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti nharaunda imwe neimwe ive nenhepfenyuro yayo zvavanoti zvinoita kuti munyika muve nebudiriro. Mumwe mutori wenhau anoshanda akazvimirira, Marshall Bwanya, audzawo Studio 7 kuti kupihwa kwaitwa nhepfenyuro nhatu idzi marezenisi kuchaitawo kuti vamwe vatori venhau vanga vasina basa vawane pekubatabata vari sezvo pane vatori venhau vakawanda vari kupedza zvidzidzo zvavo zvekutora nhau munyika gore rega-rega asi vasina kwekunoshanda sezvo makambani enhau ari mashoma munyika. Zvichakadai, mukuru wenhepfenyuro yeCommunity Radio Harare kana kuti CORAH, VaGift Mambipiri, vati mutemo unoona nezvekunyoreswa kwenhepfenyuro unofanira kuvandudzwa kuitira kuti vanenge vachida kuvamba nhepfenyuro dzavo vakwanise kunyoresa pavanodira kwete kumirira kukokwa nehurumende kuti vasvitse magwaro avo ekuti vanyorese. VaMambipiri vati nhepfenyuro yavo yakagadzirira kutanga kutepfenyura kana nhasi chaiye asi havana kukokwa nehurumende kuti vasvitse magwaro avo ekunyoresa nhepfenyuro yavo. Vaenderera mberi vachiti zvinonyadzisa kuti dzimwe nyika dzakavakidzana neZimbabwe dzakaita seSouth Africa, Zambia neMalawi dzine ma community radio akawanda asi Zimbabwe ine nhatu chete idzo dzakapihwa marezenisi nezuro. ZACRAS yati kubudirira kwenhepfenyuro idzi kuchauya chete kana hurumende ikasaisa ruoko mukufambiswa kwebasa kunhepfenyuro idzi. Danho ratorwa nehurumende iri rinoteverawo kupihwa rezenisi kweimwe nhepfenyuro yepaGreat Zimbabwe University yeGreat Zimbabwe Campus Radio munguva pfupi yadarika. Vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika vanoti nhepfenyuro idzi dzinogona kunonoka kuenda pamhepo sezvo Transmedia isina mireza inofambisa mashoko kana kuti ma transmitter. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura neveTransmedia kuti gadziriro yavo yasvika papi pari zvino uye munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, vati vari pazororo. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yoronga Kubatira Mitero yeHutano
text: Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekuparura chirongwa chekuti vanhu vose vange vachiwana mukana wekurapwa kuburikidza nekubhadharisa mitero vari kushanda nevari kuwana mari kukambani yeNational Social Secutiy Authority, NSSA. Izvi zvakabuda pamusangano wakaitwa muHarare neMuvhuro weTripartite Negotiating Forum, TNF. Musangano uyu unounza pamwe chete hurumende, vashandi nevashandirwi. Uyu ndiwo musangano wekutanga weTNF kubva mugore ra2010. Misangano yeTNF yakambomiswa nenyaya yekusawirirana pakati pemapoka matatu aya. TNF yakaumbwa paine chinangwa chekuti nhaurirano dzipe kuti pave nechinangwa chimwe chete munyika pakuyedza kugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, ndivo vakaparura gwaro reKadoma Declaration muna 2010 iro rinotara zvinangwa zveTNF. Gwaro iri ndiro rine zvibvumirano zvemisangano yeTNF izvi zviri kunetsa kuzadzikisa. Gurukota rezvevashandi, Amai Priscah Mupfumira, vanoti hurongwa hwekuona kuti vanhu vawana hutano kuzadzikisa bumbiro remitemo rinoti vanhu vose vanofanira kuwana mukana wekurapwa.. No media source currently available Sangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, nerevashandirwi re Employers’ Confederation of Zimbabwe, EMCOZ, anoti anotambira nemufaro kutanga kwemisango yeTripartite Negotiating Forum achiti zvichabatsira mukuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika hwaenda kumawaere. Asi masangano EMCOZ neZCTU anoti pari zvino haasi kutambira chirongwa chehurumende chekuti NSSA itungamire hurongwa hwekutora mitero kuvanhu semari ichashandiswa munyaya dzehutano hwevanhu. Mutungamiri wesangano reEMCOZ, VaJohn Mufukari, vanoti misangano yeTNF inobatsira asi havatenderane nenyaya yekubhadhara mari yemitero yezvehutano. Munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vanotiwo vashandi havana chivimbo neNSSA. No media source currently available

headline: Mauto Anoti Agadzirira Kudzokera kuMakamba Avo Sezvo Apedza Basa
text: Mumwe mukuru wemauto Major-General Douglas Nyikayaramba vanoti mauto akwanisa kuunza runyararo mushure mekuratidzira kune mhirizhonga mukati nekudaro vagadzirira kudzokera kumakamba avo kana mapurisa ati haachadi rubatsiro. Vachitaura nevatori venhau muHarare nezuro, VaNyikayaramba vakati mauto achaita ongororo yezvavari kupomerwa zvekutyora kodzero dzevanhu asi vakati pane vanhu vakaba pfuti nehembe dzemauto vakanobata madzimai chibharo nekupfura vanhu. Nyaya yekuti mauto ari kushungurudza vanhu iyi imwe nyaya yakapa kuti bato guru rinopikisa reMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa rirambe kuita hurukuro nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nezuro. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nemutauriri weNPF VaJealousy Mawarire vanoti hakuna nhaurirano dzingaitwa mauto achirura mudzimba dzevanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yotora Matanho Kuitira Kuti Mari Iri Kunze Zvisiri paMutemo Idzoke
text: Bhanga guru renyika razivisa neChitata kuti pane matanho ari kutorwa kudzora mari dzakabudiswa kunze kwenyika zvisiri pamutemo, uye imwe yemari yacho yakatodzoka munyika. No media source currently available Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti dzinotyira kuti hurumende ichatadza kudzora mari yese yakabuda munyika zviri kunze kwemutemo sezvo mari iyi yakaburitswa nevanhu vane chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika. Vachitaura muHarare mushure mekubuda kwenyaya yekuti pane zvizvarwa zvemuZimbabwe zvaichengeta mamiriyoni mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe emadhora mubanga reHSBC kuSwitzerland, iro riri kunzi raishanda richityora mitemo yekufambiswa kwemari zvakanaka pasi rose, mukuru weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Doctor John Mangudya, vati hurumende iri kutora matanho ekuona kuti mari dzakaburitswa zviri kunze kwemitemo yadzorwa munyika. VaMangudya vati patori nehurongwa hwekudzora mari idzi, uye dzimwe dzemari dzakaburitswa zviri kunze kwemutemo, dzatova munyika. VaMangudya vazivisa kuti mamiriyoni zana emadhora ange iri kunze kwenyika zviri kunze kwemutemo yakatodza zvichitevera zvisungo zvebhanga ravo zvekuregerera nekupa mukana kune avo vari kuchengeta mari kunze zvisiri pamutemo kuti vaidzore. Vati mamiririyoni makumi matanhatu nemasere emari iyi akatodzoka uye bhanga ravo riri kuramba richitaura nevanhu nemakambani anochengeta mari zviri kunze kwemutemo kuti adzore mari iyi. Asi varamba kutaura zvakawanda pamusoro penyaya yeHSBC vachiti pari zvino vachiri kuongorora kwakabva mari yevanhu vanonzi vaichengeta mari kubhanga iri. Pasi pemutemo zvizvarwa zvemuno zvinoshanda kunze kwenyika zvinobvumidzwa kuchengeta mari kunze kwenyika. Asi mutemo haubvumidze kuti vanoshandira munyika kana vemabhizimisi emuZimbabwe vachengetedze mari kunze kwenyika vasina kupihwa mvumo neRBZ. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi uye vakamboshanda kubazi rezvemari, VaMasimba Manyanya, vati mari iyi ichanentsa kudzoka kwayo. Vati izvi zvaiitwa nevakuru vakuru muhurumende nemunyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye hapana anokwanisa kuti vadzore mari idzi. Vatiwo panofanira kudzikwa mitemo inopa masimba kubhanga guru renyika kuitira kuti rinongorore mapindiro nemabudiro emari munyika. Vamwe vanoongorora nyaya dzehufpumi uye vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaJames Johwa, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvinotoda kuti veRBZ kuti vasunge dzisimbe kuti mari iyi idzoke kumusha. Asi VaMangudya vati vane mari dzichiri kunze vanosanganisira vaye vasina kuunza mari mushure mekutengesa zvinhu kunze kwenyika, vakatanga kuchengeta mari kunze kwenyika vasina mvumo yeRBZ pamwe nevaya vaiita bhizimisi munyika asi vachinochengeta mari yavo kunze kwenyika. VaMangudya vati pave nezvizvarwa zvakawanda zvemuZimbabwe zvinogara kunze kwenyika uye zvizhinji zvavo zvave kutumira mari kumusha. Vati mari inotomirwa nezvizvarwa zviri kunze kwenyika yakakwira kusvika pa$840 million gore rapfuura, kubva pa$790 million muna 2013.

headline: Zimbabwe Yokurudzirwa Kuremekedza Kodzero dzeVanhu, Kuitwa kweSarudzo
text: Sangano reUnited Nations nemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu uye anoona nezvesarudzo ari kukurudzira hurumende kuti iremekedze kodzero dzevanhu kusanganisirawo nyaya yekuti sarudzo dziitwe vanhu vabvumidzwewo kuratidzira murunyararo. Nzvimbo dzakawanda munyika hadzina vamiriri mudare reparamende uye mumakanzuru zvichitevera kufa kwevamwe nezvirwere zvakasiyana siyana kusanganisira chirwere cheCovid-19 uye kudzingwa kwenhengo dzeMDC Alliance neMDCT-T mudare reparamende uye kudzingwa kwevamwe mubato reZanu-PF. Kunyangwe hazvo nyika dzakawanda kusanganisira Tanzania, Uganda, Ghana, Malawi neAmerica dzakaita sarudzo, hurumende yeZimbabwe iri kuranba yakatsika madziro ichiti hakuna sarudzo dzinoitwa sezvo ichiti iri kurwisa denda reCovid-19. Masangano ari kukurudzira kuti kuitwe sarudzo anosanganisira Zimbabwe Election Support Network, Election Resource Centre, Human Rights Watch, Zimrights nemamwe. Svondo rapera vamwe vechidiki vakaratidzirawo vachiti vari kuda kuti sarudzo dziitwe. Gwet vari nhengo yeZanu-PF, VaTinomudaishe Chinyoka, vanoti Zimbabwe handi iyo yoga nyika yakundikana kuita sarudzo nekuda kweCovid-19 vachiti zviri kuitwa zvakanangana nekuchengetedza hutano hwevanhu. Asi mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatywayo, vanoti zviri kutaurwa neZanu-PF ndezvemugotsi matsuro sezvo nyika dzakawanda dziri kuita sarudzo pasina matambudziko sezvo dziri kungotevedzera zviri kukurudzirwa neWorld Health Organization. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa, Vasori neVeChidiki veZanu-PF Vobatana Kumisa VaNgarivhume Kubvisa Marara kuMbare
text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reTransform Zimbabwe VaJacob Ngarivhume vanoti nemusi weChina vakarambidzwa zvekare nevasori, mapurisa nevechidiki vebato reZanu-PF kubvisa marara kuMatapi, Mbare. VaNgarivhume vakambochengetedzwa zvekare nemapurisa ekuMbare . Vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti mapurisa akati vanofanira kutanga vavakumbira mvumo. Nzvimbo yeMbare sedzimwe nzvimbo dzakawanda mumaguta amazhinji haisi kutakurwa marara sezvo makanzuru ari kuchema chema kuti haana mari achitiwo vanhu havasi kubhadhara mari dzemitero pamwedzi. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvemukati menyika VaKazembe Kazembe kana revasori VaOwen Ncube vanzi vange vari mudare reparamende nemimwe misangano. Tatumirawo mubvunzo kumukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu- PF VaTafadzwa Mugwadi asi vange vasati vapindura pataenda pamhepo. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vatungamiri veMapato Anopikisa Vokurudzira Vanhu Kuti Vabayiwe Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa, reLabour, Economists and Democrats (LEAD), Muzvare Linda Masarira, vanoti vari kukurudzira vana veZimbabwe kuti vasatarisa denda reCovid-19 sedambudziko renyika yeZimbabwe chete izvo zvinozoita kuti varitarise neziso rezvematongerwo enyika. Muzvare Masararira, avo vakave mumwe wevatungamiri vemapato anopikisa vakabatana nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pakuparurwa kwechikamu chechipiri chekubaiwa kwenhomba yeSinopharm, yekudzivirira Covid-19 kuVictoria Falls nezuro, vanotiwo kunyange hazvo vana veZimbabwe vaine kodzero yekusarudza chakavanakira, zvakakoshawo kuti vasarudze kuzvidzvirira kubva kuchirwere ichi kuburikidza nekubaiwa nhomba iyi. Mutungamiri weMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, ndemumwe wevatungamiri vanopikisa vakavewo pachiitiko ichi. VaMnangagwa vakatora mukana uyu kubaiwawo nhomba yavo yekutanga, pamwechete negurukota rezvekudzviririrwa kwenyika, Amai Oppah Muchinguri-Kashiri, naMuzvare Masarira. VaMwonzora vakabaiwawo nhomba yavo yepiri kuWilkins muHarare nezuro wakare. No media source currently available

headline: Varimi vePurazi reWadzanayi kuLalapanzi Vonetsana neKambani yekuChina YeAsia Ferry Yakapinda muPurazi Ravo
text: Varimi vepapurazi remushandirapamwe reWadzanayi Cooperative kuLalapanzi mudunhu reMidlands vanoti vari kushungurudzwa neimwe kambani yekuChina yeAsia Ferry, iyo vari kuti yakatora chidimbu chepurazi ravo uye vashandi vayo vari kugezera chicherwa che chrome mupurazi ravo. Varimi ava vanotiwo zvizvarwa zvekuChina izvi zvatove kuchengeta makwai mupurazi ravo. Munyori wemushandirapamwe uyu, VaDominic Mngwabi, vanoti kambani iyi inonzi yakapinda muchibvumirano nemuridzi wepurazi iri pedyo neyavo chekuti ishandise, asi yakatobvisa muganhu waivepo kare ichipinda mupurazi ravo. Vanotiwo chiitiko ichi chakanganisa mhuri dzinosvika zana nemakumi manomwe nesere dziri papurazi reWadzanayi iri, kuburikidza nekuisa hutano hwavo pamwe nehwezvipfuwozvavo munjodzi yekukanganiswa nemishonga iri kushandiswa kugeza matombo ari kucherwa nekambani iyi. VaMngwabi vanoti vakamboedza kuti vagare pasi nemukuru wekambani iyi anonzi Tony asi vanoti akaramba kutaura navo, akatovirima achiti vaende kunomhang'ara kwavanoda uye kuganza achiti haana zvavanomuita. Vanoti vakazoperekedzwa negweta ravo neChitatu svondo rino vachinosiya gwaro rine nyunyuto dzavo kuhofisi yekambani iyi iri papurazi ravo, asi havasati vawana mhinduro. Vanotiwo vakaedza kugara pasi nemuridzi wepurazi kuti varatidzane miganho yemapurazi avo iye achiedzawo kutaura vekambani iyi kuti vagarisane zvakanaka nevavakidzani vavo. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata vakuru vekambani yeAsia Ferry kuti tinzwe divi ravo. VaMngwabi vanoti rimwe dambudziko riri kukonzerwa nekambani yezvizvarwa zvekuChina iyi ndeye kuparadzwa kwemigwagwa yavopamwe neguruva ravanoti rave kutadzisa vagari kana kuwacha mbatya vachiyanika pamisha yavo. No media source currently available

headline: Musangano weForum on China-Africa Cooperation Summit Unotanga muBeijing
text: Musangano weForum on China-Africa Cooperation Summit (focac), uyo uri kuitwa kuBeijing, kuChina wavhurwa zviri pamutemo neMuvhuro nemutungamiri wenyika iyi VaXi Jinping. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, avo vari kuChina, vanotarisirwawo kuzotaurawo pamusangano uyu, uyo uri kupindwa nevatungamiri venyika dzemu africa vakawanda. Vachitaura nenhepfenyuro yeChina Global Television Network (CGTN) pamberi pemusangano uyu, VaMnangagwa vati Zimbabwe yashanduka kuve nyika itsva, vakati kana paine nyika dziri kutadza kuona izvi dzakapofomara. VaMnangagwa varumbidzawo hushamwari hweChina nenyika dzemuAfrica. Zimbabwe yagara iri kubatsirwa neChina nezvikwereti zvemari, uye Africa inonzi yavimbiswa mari inoita mabhiriyoni makumi matanhatu emadhora neChina. Nyanzvi mune zvemabhizimisi uye vachidzidzisa paDevry University, Professor Elliot Masocha, vanoti kukwereta mari kubva kuChina hakuna kuipa asi Zimbabwe inofanirwa kutarisisa zvibvumirano zvainonyorerana nenyika iyi kuitira kuti isazorasikirwa pakakura yatadza kubhadhara mari iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende naVanaChiremba Voyambira Vanhu nezveMushonga waVaMagaya weHIV
text: Bazi rezvehutano raburitsa mashoko kuvatori venhau richikurudzira vanhu vari kurwara nechirwere cheHIV/AIDS kuti varambe vachinwa mishonga yavo vachiongorora mashoko evamwe ekuti vakawana mushonga wekurapa chirwere ichi pamwe nechegomarara. Bazi iri harina haro kudoma nezita Muporofita Walter Magaya vekereke yePHD Ministries avo vakazivisa nezuro kuti vainge vawana mushonga yemiti inowanikwa muMozambique neIndia yekurapa zvirwere izvi. Bazi iri rati iro ndiro rinoongorora kukodzera kwekushandiswa kwemishonga kunyangwe yechivanhu pasi peMedicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe. Zvichakadaro, sangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights-ZADHR- rinoti rapa VaMagaya mazuva matatu kuti vadzore mashoko avo ekuti vainge vawana mushonga unorapa chirwere chegomarara pamwe neAIDS. Sangano ravana chiremba vanorwira kodzero iri rinoti VaMagaya vakatadza kuita izvi richavasungisa. VaMagaya vakaudza nhengo dzechechi yavo nezuro kuti vakawana mushonga uyu vachishanda nevamwe vavo vanobva kunyika yeIndia.\nVaMagaya vanoti zvakatora makore maviri etsvakiridzo kuti vawane mushonga uyu, uyo unogadzirwa kubva pamiti inowanikwa muno munyika nekunyika yeMozambique. Asi sangano reZADHR rinoti zviri kuita VaMagaya hazvina kunaka sezvo zvichigona kukonzera kuti vateveri vavo nevamwewo vanhu vazorega kunwa mishonga yavakapihwa navanachiremba votevera zviri kutaurwa naVaMagaya izvi. Mashoko aVaMagaya ashoropodzwawo nevanhu vakawanda munyika.\nVaBigboy Manatsa vanoti kuita kwaVaMagaya kuchauraisa vanhu vakawanda vanovatevera. Izvi zvinotsigirwa naVaElvis Karonga avo vanoti VaMagaya vanofanirwa kuzozvirova dundundu kana mushonga wavo wagamuchirwa nebazi rezvehutano munyika. Mumwe mugari wekuKaroi, VaTinashe Mhazi, vanoti VaMagaya varatidza kuti havasi vemweya sezvo vave kushandisa midzi yen’anga nekudaro havafanirwe kuteererwa. VaKaronga vanoti VaMagaya vanofanirwa kushanda nebazi rezvehutano votora vanhu vari kurwara nechirwere cheAIDS vovarapa zvonyatsowonekwa kuti vapora vasati vazvipembedza. Asi mumwe mutendi VaRenius Rambanepasi vanoti vanhu vasakurumidze kusvora VaMagaya sezvo Mwari vachigona kushandisa munhu kuuya nemushonga wezvirwere zvisingarapike. Bazi reNational Aids Council, NAC, rabudisa chiziviso chekuti vose vari pachirongwa chekunwa mapiritsi ekudzikisa hutachiwana hweHIV varambe vachinwa mapiritsi avo sezvavakataurirwa kumakiriniki nekuzvipatara. Bazi iri razivisawo kuti hapasati pawanikwa mushonga wechirwere cheAIDS vachiti kana paine munhu anoti ave nemushonga wakadaro unofanirwa kuongororwa nanamazvikokota nekubvumidzwa nebazi rehurumende rezvehutano. Pari zvino vanhu vanosvika miriyoni imwe chete nechidimbu munyika vari pasi pechirongwa chekunwa mapiritsi ekudzikisa utachiwana. No media source currently available

headline: KuZifa handibve ini: Phidza . . . ndiko kukereke kwangu
text: MUTUNGAMIRIRI wesangano rinoona nezvenhabvu munyika muno reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa), Phillip Chiyangwa, anoti kukunda kwaakaita musarudzo dzichangobva kuitwa kuti amirire Zvimba South mudare reNational Assembly hakumukanganise kutungamirira sangano iri sezvo asiri mushandi waro.   Mubvunzo mukuru une vatsigiri vakawanda venhabvu parizvino ndewekuti zvichitevera kusarudzwa kwakaitwa Phidza — sezita remadunhurirwa raChiyangwa — kuve mumiriri weZvimba South uye nemutevedzeri wake Omega Sibanda kuve mumiriri weVungu mudare reNational Assembly hazvichavakanganise here kutungamira Zifa?   Pamusoro pezvo, mitemo yeFederation International de Football Association (FIFA) haitendere kuti nhau dzenhabvu dzinenge dzichinetsa dzinge dzichipindirwa neHurumende.   Kana Hurumende ikapindira munyaya dzenhabvu dzinenge dzichinetsa kumasangano akasiyana, nyika iyoyo inotemerwa zvirango zvakasimba neFIFA.

headline: Dzidziso yeNhomba yeCovid-19 Yokurudzirwa Kupihwa Veruzhinji
text: Mukuru wesangano riri kudzidzisa veruzhinji nezvechirwere cheCovid-19 rePerch Media, VaCollen Magobeya, vanoti vapedza kubayiwa nhomba dzavo mbiri vachiti semunhu anoshanda neveruzhinji zvinovabatsira kuti vasatapurirwa kana kutapurira vamwe chirwere. VaMagobeya vanoti havo dzidziso ichiri kudiwa kuitira kuti veruzhinji vanzwisise nezvenhomba iyi kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisadzoke zvakare zvine hukasha. Zimbabwe ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi. Asi vanhu vabayiwa nhomba iyi kusvika pari zvino vachiri vashoma zvichienzaniswa nevanotarisirwa kunge vabayiwa. Mukuzeya nyaya iyi, tabata VaMagobeya. No media source currently available

headline: Khama Billiati Otarisirwa Kutambira Zimbabwe paMutambo neCongo Brazzaville
text: Pane chivimbo chakasimba chekuti mutambi ane mukurumbira. Khama Billiart. achange ari munhandare neSvondo apo Zimbabwe iri kusangana neCongo Brazzaville kunyange hazvo asati apora kubva mukukuvara kwaakaita. Maneja wemaWarriors, VaWellington Mpandare, pamwe nachiremba wechikwata ichi, VaSomani Mudariki, vanoti mutambi uyu, uyo asina kugadzirira nevamwe nemhaka yekukuvara, achange ari munhandare neSvondo apo maWarriors ari kusangana neCondo Brazzaville Billiart, uyo anokanda zvibodzwa pamadiro ari kudikanwa zvikuru mumutambo uyu uyo Zimbabwe inofanira kukunda kuti varambe vane mukana wekuenda kumaAfrica Cup of Nations. VaMpandare vanotitaurira mamiriro akaita zvinhu. VaMpandare vanoti chikwata chemaWarriors chiri kusimuka mangwana chichisvika muBrazzaville musi wemutambo kuitira kutiza kusabatwa zvakanaka kunoitwa zvikwata zvinoshanya kune dzimwe nyika muAfrica. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Football Association, VaPhilip Chiyangwa, vakatora nguva yavo kusangana nemaWarriors vachangobva kugadzwa senhengo yeparamende. VaChiyangwa vanoti hapana chimwe chavari kutarisira kunze kwekukunda. VaChiyangwa vanoti mukamba makabatana vachiwedzera ivo kuti nyaya dzemari dzemaWarriors kana vakakunda dzakagadziriswa. Zimbabwe inofanira kukunda kana kuita mangange kuCongo Brazzaville kuitira kuti irambe iine mukana wekubudirira kuenda kuma fainari eAfrica Cup of Nations ayo achaitirwa kuCameroon muna Chikumi gore rinouya. Pari zvino, maWarriors ndiwo ari pamusoro pemakundano aya nezvibodzwa asi vakaenzana pamaponzi neDRC iyo ine mapoinzi matatu zvekare. Asi maWarriors ari kutarisira kuti vacharamba vari pavari apa kunyange hazvo vasina vamwe vatambi vavo vane mbiri vakaita saCosta Nhamoinesu, Nyasha Mushekwi, maMarvelous Nakamba avo vakakuvara. Asi kaputeni wavo, Knowledge Musona, ari mukamba mushure mekusauya kuzotamba muCosafa Cup nemhaka yekuvara zvekare. MaWarriors ari kuda kuenda kuma fainari eAfrica Cup of Nations kechitatu mushure mekuita izvi muna 2004, 2006, na 2017. No media source currently available

headline: VaSikhala Vopomerwa Dzimwe Mhosva
text: Mumiriri weZengeza West mudare reParamende VaJob Sikhala vakamiswa zvekare pamberi pedare redzimhosv vachipomerwa imwe mhosva itsva. mhosvaVari kupomerwa yekuti vaida kuvhiringidza mapurisa kuferefeta nyaya yekupondwa kwamuzvare MoreBlessing Ali kuNyatsime kuchitungwiza. VaSikhala vanonzi vakati pavhidhiyo muzvare Ali vainge vapondwa nevatsigiri veZanu-PF zviri kunzi nemapurisa aive manyepo. VaSikhala vanova gweta remuhuri yamuzvare Moreblessing Ali vari mutirongo kuChikurubi sezvo vakapomerwa mhosva yekupesvedzera mhirizhonga parufu rwaMuzvare Ali. Magweta anoti mhosva idzi dzakada kungofanana uye kwave kungotsvaga uta nemugate kwemapurisa. Asi gurukota rezvemitemo vaZiyambi Ziyambi vakaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende haisi kuzopeta maoko kana vanopikisa vakaita saVaSikhala vakada kukonzera kusagadzikana munyika. Mutungamiri wenyika vaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakataurawo mashoko aya nezuro vachiti mapato anopikisa ari kuda kukonzera nyonga nyonga munyika. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato reCCC VaGift Ostallos Siziba vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende haidi kuona vanhu vanopokisa bato riri kutonga re ZANU PF, saka vanhu ve bato ravo vari kushungurudzwa. No media source currently available Asi vachipawo pfungwa dzavo, ,mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mubato reZanu-PF VaTafadzwa Mugwadi vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato ravo harishungrudze vanopikisa asi haringapete maoko kana paine vanenge vachida kukonzera mhirizhonga munyika. Vanopikisa nevanorwira kodzero dzevnhu vanoti hurumende iri kushandisa mapurisa nematare kuvambunyikidza.

headline: Sangano reVashandi kuChamhembe kweAfrica Roshora VaMnangagwa neKusungwa Nhengo dzeZCTU
text: Rimwe sangano revashandi kuchamhembe kweAfrica reSouthern African Trade Union Coordination Council (SATUCC) rashora zvikuru mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nekusungwa kwakaitwa vakuru nenhengo dzesangamo reZimbabwe Conress of Trade Unions kana kuti ZCTU nemusi weChina. VeZCTU ava vaida kuratidzira kusafararira mutero we kubatira vanhu masendi maviri padhora rega rega kana vachitenga zvinhu nekadhi pamari iri pasi pemadhora gumi. Munyori mukuru wesangano iri VaAustin Muneku mumashoko avo kuvatori venhau vashora zvikuru VaMnangagwa avo vati pavakasarudzwa vakavimbisa kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu nevashandi asi havasi kuita saizvozvo. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri waVaMnangagwa VaGeoerge Charamba. Asi munyori mukuru weZCTU VaJaphet Moyo vanoti zviri pachena kuti hapana zvakawanda zvakasiyana pakati pevaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe naVaMnangagwa. No media source currently available

headline: Croatia Yotamba neFrance Kurwira Mukombe weWorld Cup
text: Croatia yapinda mufainari yayo yekutanga yeWorld Cup kubvira makundano epasi rese aya avambwa muna 1930. Vateveri vechikwata cheCroatia vari mumafaro mushure mekunge chikwata chavo chakapinda mufainari ye 2018 World Cup nezuro manheru mushure mekurova England 2-1 nechibodzwa chakakandwa na Mario Mandzukic munguva yemuwedzerwa. Croatia yakatanga yakatungamirwa ndokudzora kuita mangange 1-1 ndokuzopedzisa England apo varuzhinhi vanga vave kufunga kuti mutambo uyu uchaenda kumapenereti. Aka ndiko kekutanga Croatia ichipinda mufainari yemakundano eWorld Cup mushure mekusvika muma semi fainari muna 1998 apo yakarohwa 2-1 neFrance. VaTapiwa Mahwengwa avo vanotevera chikwata cheBarcelona vanoti zvinodakadza kuti zvikwata zvisina mukurumbira wakanyanya seCroatia zviitewo mukurumbira. Mumwe muteveri wemutambo wenhabvu, VaWalter Mombo, vanoti veruzhinji vanga vachidherera Croatia asi vasina kutarisa nhoroondo yayo mumakwikwi aya. Croatia yave kusangana mufainari ichaitirwa muLuzhiniki Stadium neSvondo neFrance, iyo yakarova Belgium mu semi final. Belgium iri kusangana neEngland neMugovera dzichirwira chinzvimbo chechitatu mumakwikwi e2018 World Cup ari kutarisirwa kupera zvine mutsindo pamutambo we Croatia neFrance neSvondo. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Inoti Yakagadzirira Kutaurirana neEthiopia paNyaya Yekudzoserwa kwaMengistu Akatongerwa Rufu neHumhondi
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika VaFrederick Shava vanoti Zimbabwe yakagadzirira kutaura neEthiopia panyaya yevaive mutungamiri wenyika wenyika iyi Mengistu Haile Mariam uyo akatongerwa rufu nenyaya dzekuponda vanhu. aShava vaudza Studio 7 kuti Zimbabwe yakagadzirira kutaura neEthiopia ikaite zvinotarisirwa munyaya dzekudyidzana kwenyika. Mengistu akapotera muZimbabwe muna 1991 mushure mekutungamira Ethiopia kwemakore gumi nemana. Mauto ake aizivikanwa nekuti Derg akwanikwa aine mhosva dzekuponda vanopikisa pamwe nehama dzavo. Muna 2008, dare remuEthiopia rakatongera Mengistu rufu richimupomera mhosva dzekuponda zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu. Asi Zimbabwe haina kuratidza chido chekuti adzokere kuEthiopia kunyangwe ainge abatwa nemhosva idzi. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu VaKennedy Masiye vaudza Studio 7 kuti Zimbabwe iyo isingadi kuisa ruoko rwayo pazvibvumirano zvinorambidza kuitwa kwevanhu kafiramberi uye zvimwe zvekuendesa vanpara mhosva dzehondo kumatare kana kuti kuti International Criminal Court inoratidza kuti haina kuzvipira kuomesera vanoponda vakaita saMengistu.

headline: National Economic Consultative Forum Yokurudzira Kurwiswa kweHuwori muNyika
text: Sangano rinotarisa nyaya dzehupfumi munyika reNational Economic Consultative Forum nhasi raparura gwaro idzva rinotarisa mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika munyaya dzezvehupfumi richi kuridzira kuti huwori hupere kuitira kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimukire. Gwaro raparurwa iri rinoti hupfumi hwenyika huri kutadza kukura pamusana pehuori hwatekeshera munyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vachishanda nesangano reNECF, VaGodwin Murehwa, vanoti huwori hukaramba hwakapfunya chisero munyika zvinhu zvinoramba zvakamira nemusoro munyika. VaMrehwa vati imwe nyaya inofanira kusimbaradzwa kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimukire inyaya yekurima. Vanga vari muenzi ano remekedzwa pakuparurwa kwegwaro reNECF iri uye vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mngangagwa vati huwori hukapera munyika zvinoitawo kuti hurumende ikwanise kudyidzana nedzimwe nyika pamwe nemasangano anobatsira nemari. “Tinofanira kushanda zvakasimba kuti huwori hupere munyika. Kupera kwehuwori munyika kunoitawo zvakare kuti vanoda kuzosima mari dzavo munyika vauye vakasununguka,” VaMnangagwa vanodaro. Mashoko aVaMnangagwa aya anouyawo apo mumwe wevatedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika VaPhelekezela Mphoko vari kutsoropodzwa nevamapato anopikisa pamwe nevemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira. VaMphoko vanonzi vari kuvhiringidza kurwisana nenyaya dzehuwori nenyaya yekuvhariridza kwavanonzi vakaita kuferefetwa kwenyaya yegurukota rezvedidzo yepamusoro, Muzvinafundo Jonathan Moyo. VaMphoko vanonzi vakapindira kuti VaMoyo vasasungwe nevekomisheni inorwisana nehuori yeZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission. VaMoyo, avo vanove zvakare nhengo yeparamende inomirira Tsholotsho, vanonzi vakatora mari inoda kusvika kuzviuru mazana mashanu zvemadhora kubva kuhomwe yeZimbabwe Manpower Development Fund, iyo vakashandisa mukutenga mabhasikoro akapiwa madzishe nevamwe kuTsholotsho. Asi vari kuzvidzivirira vachiti vakatora mari iyi kuti vabatsire vanhu vanotambura vachizvifananidza naRobin Hood, mbavha yekuEngland yaibira vapfumi ichipa varombo kunyika iyi. VaMphoko vakati kusunga VaMoyo kwaizokonzera kusagadzikana muhurumende. Zvichakadai, munyori mukuru musangano revashandi reZimbabwe Industrial Revolution Workers Federation, VaPascoe Chakanetsa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti nyaya yehuwori inonetsa kupedza munyika kana pane makororo anobatwa sezai. Zvichakadai, VaMnangangwa vakurudzira kuti pave nekutaurirana pakati pehurumende, vemabhizimusi, vashandi nevashandirwi nechinangwa chekutsvaga nzira dzekupedza huwori munyika. NECF inotiwo chimwe chiri kuita kuti zvinhu zvisafambe zvakanaka mukuitwa kwemabhizimusi munyika inyaya dzekuti vemabhizimusi havasi kukwanisa kuwana mari kumabhanga pamwe nekunonoka kunoita mapazi ehurumende mazhinji kufambisa mapepa anenge asvitswa kwaari nevemabhizimusi.
