Zvichakadai, VaMnangagwa vati hurumende ichaedza pose painogona kugadzirisa matambudziko ese ataurwa aya kuitira kuti zvemabhizimusi munyika zviite mutserendende. No media source currently available

headline: Zvizvarwa Zviri Kunze Zvowana Mukana weKupinda Muchirongwa Chinorerutsa Zvinhu Munguva yeKushaikirwa
text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika mukupera kwesvondo zvakave nemukana wekunzwisisa pamusoro pechirongwa chekuvigana kana munhu achinge ashaya, cheSahwira International Plan chiri pasi peNyaradzo Life Assuarance Company. Mukana uyu wakavepo kuburikidza nemusangano wakaitwa padandemutande reZoom nevari kumirira kambani iyi kunze kwenyika, vekambani yeMKI, iri pasi pezvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muAmerica. Mumwe mukuru wekambani yeMKI, VaEsau Mavindidze, vanoti vanhu vanodarika zana vakakwanisa kupinda mumusangano wavo uyu vachibvunzawo mibvunzo yakakosha zvikuru pamusoro pechirongwa ichi, icho chakanangana nekurerutsira vari kunze munguva yekushaikirwa. VaMavindize vanoti chirongwa cheSahwira International Plan ichi chinorerutsa ndima zvikuru kana mufi achida kuendeswa kunoradzikwa kumusha. Vanoti munguva zhinji hama neshamwari dzemufi vanozopinda mudambudziko rekuunganidza mari kuti vakwanise kuzadzisa zvido zvemufi zvekunoradzikwa kwaakasarudza achiri mupenyu. VaMavindize vanoti musangano wavo wavakaita uyu wakaratidza kuti vanhu vave kutarisira kuchirongwa ichi, uye vave kusununguka kutaura nezveremangwana ravo kana vachinge vazosiya pasi rino, izvo zvagara zvichionekwa nevamwe sechinhu chisingataurike nezvacho nguva zhinji. No media source currently available

headline: Sudan Yotora Rwendo rweZimbabwe Pakupidigura Hurumende
text: Mutungamiri weSudan, Va Omar al-Bashir, vabviswa neChina zvine chisimba nemauto avo pachigaro chemutungamiri wenyika. Gurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kweSudan, uye vari mutevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika, VaAwad Mohamed Ahmed Ibn Auf, ndivo vazivisa veruzhinji panhepfenyuro yehurumende, vakatiwo mauto achange achitonga nyika iyi kwemakore maviri. Vazivisawo kumiswa kwekushandiswa kwebumbiro remitemo yenyika, uye kuumbwa kwekanzuro yemauto ichange ichifambisa zvinhu kwemakore maviri. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzine maonero akasiyana panyaya yekuti kupidigurwa kwehurumende yeSudan mushure mekunge vanhu varatidzira kwemwedzi mina. Maonero akasiyana ari kuuya panyaya yekuti zvaitika muSudan zvakafanana here kana kuti kwete nezvakaitika muZimbabwe muna 2017 apo vaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakamanikidzwawo kusiya chigaro nemauto. VaMugabe naVa Al Bashir vange vatungamira nyika dzavo kwemakore akawanda vachishorwa kuti vaisaita sarudzo dzakajeka. Mumwe mutungamiri wenyika yemuAfrica ainge atongawo kwenguva yakareba, VaAbdelaziz Bouteflika vekuAlgeria, vakamanikidzwawo kusiya basa mavhiki apfuura mushure mekupinda panyanga muna 1999. VaAl Bashir vakatanga kutungamira muna 1989. Vakawanda vari kubvunzawo kuti African Union ine meno here ekugadzirisa matambudziko enyika dziri mugungano iri. African Union inoti iri kuisa maziso ayo pane zviri kuitika muSudan zvichitevera kupindira kwaita mauto munyaya dzematongerwo enyika. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vachishanda neTrust Africa muZimbabwe, VaBriggs Bomba, vanoti hapana chakanyanya kusiyana pakupidigurwa kwehurumende yaVaMugabe neyaVaAl Bashir. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, uye vari mukuru weCenter for Natural Resources Govervance, VaFarai Maguwu, vanoti pane musiyano uripo pakuti muSudan vanhu ndivo vakatungamira kuratidzira asi muZimbabwe mauto. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yoramba Kuti Yakatumira Mauto kuMozambique Kunorwisa Vanotsigira ISIS
text: Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko vanick mangwana vari kuramba runyerekupe rwekuti Zimbabwe yakatumira mauto kuMozambique kunorwisa vanopfurikidza mwero vachitsigira chikwata cheIslamic State kana kuti ISIS. Vanopfurikidza mwero ava vari mudunhu reCao Delgado pedyo nemuganhu wenyika yeTanzania. Vanhu vanodarika churu chimwe chete vafa muMozambique nekuda kwehondo iyi. Nemusi weChishanu, mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanova sachigaro webazi rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika dzemuSADC kana kuti SADC Organ on Politics and Defense vakaenda kunoita hurukuro nemutungamiri weMozambique VaFilipe Nyusi nezvekusagadzikana kwenyika iyi. Asi VaMangwana vari kuramba mashoko ekuti Zimbabwe yakatotumira mauto. ​Vanoti kana Zimbabwe ichida kuita izvi mune remangwana inotoita pasi peSADC. No media source currently available Munyori anoona nezvemutemo mubato rinopikisa reMDC VaInnocent Gonese vanova gweta vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti VaMnangagwa havakwanise kuita zano ndega vachitumira mauto kune imwe nyika vasina kusuma dare reparamende uye kana vakaita fungira mumoyo rwendo rwembwa vanofanira kusuma dare iri nechimbichimbi. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weTogo Anovhura ZITF Vanorwira Kodzero Vachinyunyuta
text: Mutungamiri we Togo, VaFaure Gnassingbe, vavhura Zimbabwe International Trade Fair, ZITF, zviri pamutemo muBulawayo vachikurudzira vanhu vemuZimbabwe kuti varambe vakashinga kunyange hazvo vakatemerwa zvirango nenyika dzekunze. Mutungamiri we Togo, VaFaure Gnassingbe, vavhura Zimbabwe International Trade Fair, ZITF, zviri pamutemo muBulawayo vachikurudzira vanhu vemuZimbabwe kuti varambe vakashinga kunyange hazvo vakatemerwa zvirango nenyika dzekunze. Vati nyika yavo yeTogo yakambotemerwawo zvirango pane imwe nguva. VaGnassingbe vange vachifamba nemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe. Nyika dzinosvika gumi nepfumbamwe dzange dzichiratidzira kumusika mukuru uyu, uye dzinosanganisira, Russia, Botswana, Cyprus, China, Ethiopia ne Germany. Mutungamiri weTogo akurudzirawo Zimbabwe nenyika dzemuAfrica kuti dzikoshese kukwenenzvera zvigadzirwa zvadzinotengesa kuti dzikwanisewo kubudirira. VaGnassingbe vapawo mibayiro kumakambani anonzi akagona kushongeza zvinhu anosanganisira yaVaMugabe yeAlpha Omega Dairy, Delta Corporation, bazi rezvekurima, redzidzo, nemamwe. Asi havasi vanhu vose vari kufara munyika nekuuya kwaVaGnassinbe avo vanonzi nevanopikisa munyika mavo vanotonga nedemo. Mutungamiri weTogo uyu akasiirwa chigaro nababa vake Va Gnassingbé Eyadéma avo vakatora simba vachishandisa mauto muna 1967. Vakatonga nyika iyi kusvika vafa muna 2005. Mauto akabva agadza VaFaure Gnassingbe pachigaro nechisimba kunyange hazvo mutauriri wedare reparamende uyo aive kunze kwenyika, aifanirwa kumbobata matomu pamutemo. Nyika dzekumavirira dzakazomanikidza VaGnassingbe kuita sarudzo asi vanhu vanodarika mazana mana vakafa mukurwisana musarudzo dzinonzi nevanopikisa dzakabirirwa. Mutungamiri weTogo uyu akarambawo nyaya yekuti atonge matemu maviri sezvaidiwa nevamwe munyika iyi. Asi munyori mubazi rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaJoey Bimha, vanoti Zimbabwe senyika yaona zvakakodzera kuti mutungamiri weTogo avhure zviri pamutemo chirongwa cheZITF. No media source currently available  Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika uye vaimboshanda kumuzinda weZimbabwe kuEthiopia, VaClifford Mashiri, vanoti muitiro waVaMugabe hauna kusiyana naVa Gnassingbe, izvo zvakapa kuti vavakoke. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vapfumbamwe Vofa neChirwere cheCovid-19 neMugovera
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti nemusi weMugovera vanhu vapfumbamwe vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvasiya vafa nacho kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore raopera vave zviuru zvina zvine mazana mana nemakumi matanhatu nematanhatu kana kuti 4, 466. Vanhu makumi mapfumbamwe nevana vakabatwa nechirwere ichi, zvasiya vabatwa nacho kusvika parizvino vave zana rezviuru nemakumi maviri nemashanu zvine mazana mana nemakumi maviri nemashanu kana kuti 125, 425. Vanhu mazana mana nemakumi mashanu vakapora kubva kuzchirwere ichi zvasiya vapora vave zana rezviuru negumi nemashanu zvine makumi masere nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 115, 089. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 kekutanga vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemasere zvine mazana matanhatu nemakumi matatu nemaviri kana kuti 2 698, 632 .Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba kechipiri sezvinokurudzirwa vave miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana manomwe nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe kqna kuti 1 700, 993. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba yeCovid-19 kuti inyatsoshanda zvakanaka munyika.

headline: ‘NHABVU HAIDI MAKAKATANWA’
text: AIMBOVE mubati wepagedhi weDynamos FC nechikwata chenyika chemaWarriors — Gift ‘Umbro’ Muzadzi — anoti kuti nhabvu yemuno isimukire ibve mumadhaka mairi pari zvino, vanhu vanofanirwa kushanda pamwe chete kwete kuita “zvekudhonzerana”.   Kubvira makore adarika, nhabvu yemuno haina kumbosimuka sezvaitarisirwa nevazhinji nekuda kwezvikonzero zvinosanganisira kusabatana kuripo mumasangano anotungamira pamwe chete nevatsigiri vemutambo uyu.   Izvi ndizvo Umbro anoti zviri kukonzera kuti nhabvu yemuno isaririre kumashure. Anoti munhu wese ane chekuita nenhabvu anofanirwa kupihwa mukana wekushanda mumutambo uyu uye pfungwa dzake dzokosheswa.   “Chakuvadza nhabvu yedu inhau yekudhonzerana kuri kuitika chete, hakuna chimwe chinhu.   “Ngatibatanei tishande pamwe chete nekuti chinhu chinofanira kuhwina pakupera kwezuva inhabvu yedu. Hazvina basa kuti uyu mutsigiri wenhabvu here, uyu ane mari here kana kuti kwete, asi tikakoshesana tese sezvatiri tinokunda chete uye nhabvu yedu inosimukira.   “Kana tiri kurwisana hapana zvatinenge tichiita nekuti mhedzisiro tese tichangochema sezvatiri kuita iye zvino. Nhabvu yedu yakamira izvo zviri kukanganisa vechidiki,” anodaro.   Umbro anoenderera mberi achiti: “Tikatarisa iye zvino patave nhabvu yedu tiri kusarira kumashure zvakanyanya izvo zvakazokonzerwa nezvirango zvatakatemerwa neFIFA neCAF, zvave kuita kuti nyika dzatainge tasiya panyaya yebudiriro panhabvu dzave kutotibata uye dzimwe dzatotidarika.   “Saka ngatibatane tishande kuti zvirango izvi zvibve nekuti ndezvimwe zvauraya nhabvu yedu. Vana vedu vaomerwa havachazive kuti remangwana ravo richazovei munhabvu.”    Gift ‘Umbro’ Muzadzi   Mwedzi watiri uno ndeweWorld Cup iyo iri kutambirwa kunyika yeQatar uye Africa iri kumirirwa nenyika shanu kumutambo uyu dzinoti Ghana, Cameroon, Senegal, Tunisia neMorroco.   Umbro anoti nyika shanu idzi dziri kutamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura kumutambo uyu uye ari kudzitsigira.   Asi anoti shuviro yake rimwe remazuva kuzoona maWarriors achinokwikwidza kumutambo uyu.   “Ini sechizvarwa chese chemuno chinofarira nhabvu, ndinoda kuonawo nyika yangu ichienda kuWorld Cup, nyika dzese dzinotoda kuenda kumutambo uyu.   “Ukaona wakwanisa kuenda kunotamba kuWorld Cup unenge watamba nhabvu yepamusoro. Saka ngatirongekei muno tigokwanisawo kuenda kumakwishu aya,” anodaro.   Mwaka wenhabvu wemuno uchangodarika, Umbro ange achishanda kuchikwata cheDynamos FC ari mumwe wevatevedzeri vaTonderayi Ndiraya.   Anoti vatsigiri venhabvu havachanyatsouya kuzotsigira zvikwata zvavo sezvavaiita kare uye zviri kukonzerwawo nekudhura kuri kuita kupinda munhandare.   “Nhabvu kuti inakidze, inofanirwa kunge ine vatsigiri, asi manje mazuva ano nhandare hadzichanyatsozare sezvaiitika kare. Nhau yandiri kuona hombe ndeyekuti kupinda munhandare kuri kudhuriswa zvakanyanya saka vatsigiri vari kutadza kuwana mari yacho.   “Saka zviri nani kunzi mari yekupindisa munhandare iendeswe paUS$1 chairo zvekuti kana nhandare ikazara nevanhu 50 000, imari yakawanda inoenda kuzvikwata zvemuno pane kunzi bhora ronzi US$3 kana US$5 mopinda vanhu vashoma munhandare.   “Nhabvu mazuva ano yave bhizimisi, ende zvakakosha kugona kuziva bhizimisi racho muite mari,” anodaro.   Umbro anobva kuMalawi asi akazvarirwa muZimbabwe ndokukurira muno. Kana vari muno, ndivanaHungwe asi kuMalawi ndivanaMbewe.   Kumusha kwavo muno kwakabva baba vake ndekwaLandas, kwaChihota.   Zita rekuti Umbro akaripihwa neshamwari dzake dzaakakura nadzo dzinoti Norman Mapeza, Lloyd Chitembwe naAlois Bunjira panguva iyo vese vaitambira Darryn T.   Anoti panguva iyo vaitambira chikwata cheUnder 14 cheDarryn T, akasonerwa juzi naambuya vake avo aigara navo.   Juzi iri ndiro raaiuya achitambisa nhabvu saka rimwe zuva akazosonerera zita rekuti Umbro pajuzi iri izvo zvakanakidza shamwari dzake ndokubva vamupa zita remadunhurirwa iri.   “Tichikura kuDarryn T, ndaiita gadziriro dzangu ndakapfeka juzi randakasonerwa naambuya vangu. Saka chikwata chevakuru chaive nemayunifomu eUmbro aibva kuUK, rimwe zuva ndakauya ndakasonera zita rekuti Umbro pajuzi rangu iri shamwari dzangu dzikanakidzwa nazvo ndokutanga kundishevedza kuti Umbro. Kubva ipapo, zita rakabva ratongogara kusvika nhasi.   “Umbro iyoyo yaive yakanaka uye iniwo ndaiida chaizvo,” anodaro Umbro.

headline: Vorwisa HIV nenhabvu
text: SANGANO reNational AIDS Council (NAC) rorwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheHIV neAIDS pamwe nekutorwa kwezvinodhaka zvisingatenderwe mumuviri nevechidiki kuburikidza nemutambo wenhabvu pasi pechirongwa cheBrother to Brother.   Chirongwa ichi, icho chakavambwa mugore ra2019, chiri kuitwa kumatunhu akasiyana-siyana enyika kusanganisira kuChipinge uko kwakaumbwa zvikwata 40 kubva kumawards 10.   London Makwanya anove District AIDS Coordinator (DAC) weNAC kuChipinge anoti chirongwa cheBrother to Brother chiri kubatsira zvikuru mukudzidzisa vanakomana kuti vasatore zvinodhaka pamwe nekuzvidzivirira kubva kuHIV neAIDS kuburikidza nemutambo wenhabvu.   Anoti kuChipinge kune mawards 10 uye muward yega-yega mune zvikwata zvina zvevanakomana vanosvika 25 muchikwata chimwe nechimwe.   Kana vechidiki ava vapedza kutamba nhabvu, vanowana zvakare mukana wekudzidziswa pamusoro pekukoshesa kuchengetedza utano hwavo uye mamwe emabhindauko anokwanisa kuvararamisa muhupenyu.   “Tiri kushandisa mutambo wenhabvu kupa vanakomana zvidzidzo zvehupenyu zvinosanganisira dzidziso maringe nedenda reHIV/AIDS uye kuita mabindauko akasiyana emaoko anobatsira kuti vawane mari yekuvaramamiswa muhupenyu hwavo.   “Mabhindauko avari kuita anosanganisira kurima miriwo yekutengesa, kupfuya huku uye koita vamwe vanorima mamacademia vanozotengesa vachiwana mari. Izvi zviri kubatsira vakomana ava kurarama hupenyu hwakachena uye vabereki vavo vari kutofara nemararamiro avanoita.   “Pari zvino, tine zvikwata 40 zviri muChipinge uye tiri pakati pekuronga mutambo mukuru uchaunganidza zvikwata zvese kuti zvigouya zvobandana,” anodaro Makwanya.   Mumwe mutungamiriri wezvikwata izvi anove mentor pasi pechirongwa cheBrother to Brother, Samson Mukonya, anoti chiri kubatsira zvikuru vechidiki kuti vasapinde munyaya dzekutora zvinodhaka zvisingatenderwe mumuviri.    SAMSON Mukonya achipa zvidzidzo zvakasiyana-siyana kuchikwata chake apo vainge vapedza kuita gadziriro dzavo dzenhabvu   Anoti muchikwata chake mune vatambi venhabvu vanotaridza kuti vane tarenda uye vanogona kuzotambira zvikwata zvikuru mune remangwana.   “Tiri kuona shanduko huru muhupenyu hwevakomana kuburikidza nechirongwa cheBrother to Brother icho chiri kuvadzidzisa kurarama hupenyu hwakachena. Tiri kuvafundisa nhabvu uye kana tapedza kutamba nhabvu, totanga kupangana mazano ekutsvaga mari zviri pamutemo kwete zvechikiribidi.   “Chirongwa ichi chiri kubatsira zvakare kuti vakomana vagone kuzvichengetedza muhupenyu hwavo, vazive nezveHIV/AIDS uye vasiye kutora zvinodhaka zvisingatenderwe mumuviri,” anodaro Mukonya.   “Ini muchikwata changu nditori nevakomana avo ndinotoona kuti vachasvika kure nenhabvu saka tiri kuvabatsira kuti vagoonekwa nezvikwata zvakasiyana mune remangwana.”

headline: VaTsvangirai Vorambidzwa Kushanyira Vasungwa kuJeri reChikurubi
text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMDC-T VaMorgan Tsvangirai nemusi weChishanu vakarambidzwa kunoona vasungwa vezvematongerwo enyika vari mujeri reChikurubi Maximum Prison. Magadhijeri anonzi akaudza VaTsvangirai nehumwe hutungamiri hwebato ravo kusanganisa mumwe wevatevedzeri vavo VaNelson Chamisa, nhengo dzedare reparamende nevamwe kuti vanopinda mujeri iri chete kana vapihwa tsamba nevakuru vakuru vehurumende. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri weZimbabwe Prison Services kuti tinzwe divi ravo. VaChamisa vati zvaitwa nevanochengetedza majeri kutyora bumbiro remutemo.  Mutauriri webato reMDC-T VaObert Gutu mumashoko avo kuvatori venhau vashora zvikuru zvaitwa neveZPCS. Vati VaTsvangirai vaburitsa chitupa chavo kuti vakwanise kupinda kunoona vasungwa asi vemajeri vatsika madziro. Vati zvaitwa nevemajeri zvange zvakanangana nekuda kungoshungurudza nekunyadzisa VaTsvangirai asi vakati izvi hazvishande. VaGutu vakurudzira mukuru wemajeri Retired Major General Paradzai Zimhondi kuti vaongorore nyaya iyi.

headline: Chirwere cheCovid-19 Chopararira Zvikuru kuMaruwa
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano uye vakambove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vanoti vana vechikoro vari kudzoka kumusha mushure mekuvharwa kwezvikoro ndivo vamwe vari kubatsira kuparardzira chirwere ichi kumaruwa sezvo chirwere ichi chave kunetsa muzvikoro. Mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri, vakaudza Studio 7 pakupera kwesvondo kuti bazi ravo riri kurwadziwa zvakanyanya nekufa kuri kuramba kuchiita vanhu munyika zvichikonzerwa neCovid-19. Dr Madzorera vanoti hurumende iri kuedza kudzikisa huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi asi vachiti vanhu kumaruwa vanofanirwa kupihwa ruzivo rwakawanda pamusoro pechirwere ichi sezvo vaimbofunga kuti ichi chirwere chevanhu vemumadhorobha chete. No media source currently available

headline: MDC-T neMDC Alliance Dzoramba Dzichitatsurana
text: Munyori mukuru weMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vanoti bato rakadzinga munhu muparamende ndiro rine masimba ekudoma munhu anotsiva akadzingwa wacho pakatariswa mitemo yeProportional Representation pamwe nemadomerwo enhengo dzedare reSenate.  Mashoko aVaMwonzora anotevera mashoko emunyori mukuru weMDC Alliance, VaChalton Hwende, avo vazivisa Studio7 kuti bato ravo raunganidza magwaro enyunyuto, ayo akasainwa nevanhu vanodarika mazana matatu ezviuru, vachiratidza kusafara kwavo nekudomwa kwemazita evanhu vachatora zvigaro zvemu National Assembly pamwe nemudare reSenate, kwakaitwa neMDC-T. Izvi zvinotevera kudzingwa kwakaitwa nhengo dzeMDC Alliance mumatare aya, neMDC-T. VaMwonzora vanoti pamutemo MDC Alliance harisi bato asi kuti mubatanidzwa wemapato manomwe akasainirana chibvumirano chekukwikwidza pamwe chete, asi mapato aya achiramba akazvimirira. Asi VaHwende, avo vanove mumwe wenhengo dzeMDC Alliance dzakatanga kudzingwa mudare neMDC-T iri kufanotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe, vanoti zviri pachena kuti vanhu vakaburitsa zvido zvavo nekusaina magwaro enyunyuto dzavo ayo vakaendesa kumahofisi eZimbabwe Electoral Commission munyika yose.  VaHwende vanoti hazviite kuti vanhu vamirirwe nemunhu akakundwa musarudzo sezviri kuda kuitwa neMDC-T. Asi VaMwonzora vanoti mutemo uri pachena pakuti nderipi bato rine vanhu vari muparamende, nokudaro zviri kuitwa nevamwe vavo ava hakuna kwazvinosvika. VaMwonzora vatiwo bvato ravo rakaita musangano neChishanu wekuzeya zvakabuda musarudzo yameya weHarare. Vati magweta avo ari kuzeya nyaya iyi sezvo paine chibvumirano cheMDC Alliance chekuti bato rePeople's Democratic Party rine chinzvimbo chemutevedzeri wameya, kwete kuti munhu akabva kubato iri aitwe meya sekusarudzwa kwakaitwa VaMafume. VaMafume vakabva kuPeople's Democratic Party vachipinda muchibvumirano cheMDC Alliance. Asi VaMwonzora vabvuma kuti havakwanisi kudzinga VaMafume sameya sezvo vasiri nhengo yakabva kuMDC-T ichipinda muchibvumirano cheMDC Alliance icho chakaumbwa mutungamiri wekutanga weMDC, VaMorgan Richard Tsvangirai, vasati vashaya. Asi vati magweta avo ari kuzeya nyaya iyi vakatarisa zvinoreva chibvumirano cheMDC Alliance vozotora matanho anokodzera. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi raVaMafume panyaya iyi. Asi muhurukuro yavakaita neStudio7 nemusi weChishanu, VaMafume vakati kusarudzwa kwavakaitwa kuva meya mecherechedzo mukuru wekuti nderipi bato rine vanhu pakati peMDC Alliance inotungamirwa naVaNeslon Chamisa, neMDC-T iri kufanotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kugadzirisa Dambudziko reKushaikwa kweMagetsi Pave neKutyira Kuti Mitengo yeZvigadzirwa zveMunyika iChakwira
text: Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi, vashandi, vashandirwi pamwe nevezvitoro vari kuyambira kuti kana dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemagetsi rakatarisana nenyika rakasagadziriswa nekukurumidza richakonzera matambudziko akawanda anosanganisira kukwira kwemitengo yezvigadzirwa zvemunyika, izvo zvichazoomesera veruzhinji. Mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vashandirwi, reConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, CZI, VaKurai Matsheza, vanoti dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemagetsi munyika riri kuvabata zvakanyanya zvekuti vanga vakatarisira kuti hurumende neZESA vachakasika kurigadzirisa. VaMatsheza vanoti nekuda kwedambudziko iri, vemakambani vave kumanikidzwa kutsvaga nzira dzekuti varambe vachigadzira zvigadzirwa zvavo dzinosanganisira kushanda usiku nemukupera kwesvondo panenge pauya magetsi. VaMatsheza vanoti vemakambani vanenge vachikwanisa ndivo vari kuisawo magwetsi anoshanda nezuva kana kushandisa majenareta, zvinhu zvavanoti zvinenge zvave kuvadhurira, zvinozoita kuti vasiire mutoro uyu kuvatengi. Izvi zvinotsigirwa nenyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, avo vanoti kushandiswa kwemajenareta nevemakambani kunowedzera mutengo wezvinhu, izvo zvinozodhurisirwa vatengi. Munyori mukuru werimwe sangano rinomirira vashandi, reZimbabwe Federation of Trade Unions, ZFTU, VaKennias Shamuyarira, vanoti dambudziko riripo nderekuti hurumende pamwe nekambani yeZESA havasi kukoshesa zvine basa zvekuwanisa nyika magetsi. Vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kugadzirisa magwenya emarasha mumaguta ose kuitira kuti zvinhu zviitire nyore vashandi nevashandirwi. Saka dambudziko iri ringagadziriswa sei? VaKuchera vanotiwo zvinotoda kuti nyika itange kugadzira magetsi akawanda vachiti kuKariba nekuHwange hakusi kubva magetsi akawanda uye ekutengawo acho mashoma. Vanoti panenge pachitoda hurongwa hwekuti pabikwe magetsi akawanda pachishandiswa zuva, mvura, uye marasha, vachiti munyika zuva rakawanda kwazvo zvekuti magetsi anokwanisa kugadzirika nyore. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto, VaSoda Zhemu, kuti tinzwe kana paine matanho avari kutora sehurumende asi nharembozha yavo yanga isiri kudairwa. Dambudziko rekudzimwadzimwa kwemagetsi rinonzi riri kukonzerwa nekuderera zvakanyanya kwaita mvura mudhamu reKariba uko kunogaiwa magetsi. Zvinonziwo hurongwa hwekuti nyika itenge magetsi kuSouth Africa huri kuvhiringidzwa nekuti kambani yemagetsi munyika iyi yeEskom ine matambudziko ayowo, uyewo Zimbabwe inonzi haina nhoroondo yakanaka pakubhadhara magetsi kumakambani ekunze anomboibatsira. Kunyange hazvo vakawanda vari kukurudzira kuti hurumende ivake magwenya emoto wezuva akawanda, vamwe vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vanoti izvi zvinokanganiswa nehuwori sezvakaonekwa mune mamwe makambani akambopiwa basa iri nehurumende mumashure ayo akakundikana kupedza basa iri. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi vekuMizinda yeNyika Voyawura neKusatambiriswa Mihoro kweMwedzi Yakawanda
text: Vashandi vekumizinda yeZimbabwe pamwe nevamiriri venyika munyika dzakawanda pasi rose vanonzi vari kunonga svosve nemuromo sezvo vachinzi vamwe vatove nemwedzi inodarika mitanhatu vasati vawaniswa mihoro yavo. Izvi zvinonzi zvave kukonzera kuti vamwe vashandi vaburitswe mudzimba dzavari kugara, vamwe vachikundikana kubhadharira vana vavo mari dzezvikoro munyika dzakasiyanasiyana dzavari kudzidza. Vamwe vashandi vekumizinda iyi vataura neStudio 7 vatisingakwanisi kudoma nemazita sezvo vasingabvumidzwi kutaura nevatori venhau, vati havachamboziva kuti remangwana ravo rakamira sei, sezvo pasina kana tarisiro yekuti vanobhadharwa riini. Vashandi ava vati chiri kunyanya kuvarwadza ndechekuti vanoudzwa kunzi nyika haina mari yekunze inodiwa kuti vakwanise kubhadharwa asi vanoona vamwe vakuru-vakuru muhurumende vachiita nzendo dzimwe dzisina kana nekukosha kwese. Mumwe mushandi ati haaonewo njere pakuti hurumende inodoma vamwe vamiriri venyika vatsva iyo ichikundikana kubhadhara vari pamabasa kare. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vachangobva kudoma vamiriri venyika gumi nevashanu kutsiva vakaenda pamudyandigere nevamwe vakashaya. Zvinonzi mimwe mizinda yenyika yakatarisana nekuvharwa nekuda kwekukundikana kubhadhara mari dzekushandisa zvivakwa izvi. Kutanga kwegore rino bepanhau reNew Zimbabwe rakazivisawo nezvekuramwa mabasa kwevamwe vashandi vekumuzinda weZimbabwe kuMozambique, vachinyunyuta nekusatambiriswa mihoro yavo kwemakore matatu. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, Ambassador James Manzou, avo vanga vachinzi vabuda muhofisi mavo, kuti tinzwewo divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Asi sachigaro vekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, vari mumiriri weMakonde, VaKindness Paradza vanoti komiti yavo inoziva nezvematambudziko akatarisana nevari kumizinda yenyika iyi, asi dambudziko guru rakatarisana nenyika ndere kushaya mari yekunze inodiwa pakubhadhara vashandi ava. VaParadza vanoti vave nehurongwa hwekuti vashandi vekumizinda yenyika vese vadzokere pasi pebazi rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika kuitira kuti zvigove nyore pakuvabhadhara mihoro yavo. Vanoti pari zvino vashandi ava vari kutambira mihoro yavo pamwechete nevamwe vashandi vehurumende vose, danho ravatenda kuti harisi kufamba zvakanaka. No media source currently available

headline: VaBiti Vorwira Kodzero dzeVakatongerwa Rufu
text: Gweta rine mukurumbira uye vachiita zvematongerwo enyika, VaTendai Biti, vanoti vave kubatana nevamwe vari kurwisa nyaya yekutongera vanhu rufu vachiti kuita izvi kunotyora kodzero dzevanhu. Bumbiro remitemo idzva harichabvumidze kuurayiwa kwevanhukadzi, uye varume vari pasi pemakore makumi maviri nerimwe, pamwe nevarume vari pamakore apfuura makore makumi manomwe. Zimbabwe yakagumisira kuuraya munhu mujeri muna 2005. Asi pachine vanhu vanoda kusvika kana kupfuura zana vakatongerwa rufu. Mukuru wesangano reAmnesty International kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDeprose Muchena, vanoti hurumende inofanira kubvisa mutemo wekutongera vanhu rufu zvachose nekuti kutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, varizve gurukota rinoona nezvemitemo, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanoti naivowo vanoda kuti mutemo wekutongerwa vanhu rufu ubviswe. VaBiti vanoti bumbiro remitemo idzva rinochengetedza kodzero dzevakatongerwa rufu uye vazvipira kubatsira vasungwa ava. No media source currently available

headline: Kambani yeHurumende yeFidelity Printers Ndiyo Ichadhinda "Ballot Papers"
text: Komisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yazivisa makambani achadhinda mapepa ekuvhotesa pamusangano wayaita nevemapato ari kukwikwidza musarudzo dzegore rino. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu, imwe nhengo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec, VaQubani Moyo, vati mapepa ekuvhotesa achadhindwa nemakambani maviri emuno anoti Fidelity Printers nePrintflow. Fidelity ndiyo ichadhinda magwaro ekuvhotera mutungamiri wenyika, uye ekuvhotera nhengo dzedare reparamende. Printflow ichadhinda mapepa ekuvhotera makanzura. Makambani maviri aya ndeehurumende. VaMoyo vatiwo mapato achabvumidzwa kuona kudhindwa kunenge kuchiitwa mapepa aya. Mashoko eZec aya atambirwa nevari kumirira MDC Alliance musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, VaNelson Chamisa, VaJameson Timba. Asi munyori mukuru muMDC-T inoutngamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe, VaNixon Nyikadzino, vati kunyange hazvo Zec yazivisa kuchadhindwa mapepa ekuvhotesa aya, nyaya iyi haiperere ipapa sezvo vachiti pane zvimwe zvinoda kugadziriswa. Mapato aya paapihwa mukana wekubvunza mibvunzo maererano nekomiti yanga ichida kuumbwa neZec pakati pevanhu vari mumapato ari kukwikwidza musarudzo ichange ichitarisa nhuna dzinenge dzichibva mumapato pamberi pesarudzo, ye Multi-party Liason Committee, imwe nhengo yebato reFreedom Movement #1980 Chinhu Chedu, VaFrancis Danha, vakonzera zhowe zhowe vachiti sachigaro weZec, Amai Priscilla Chigumba, nevose vari mukomsheni yavo vanofanira kusiya basa. VaDanha vati Amai Chigumba nevamwe vavo vakatadza kufambisa basa zvakanaka pavakatadza kupa mapato ezvematongerwo gwaro revavhoti pamberi pekugara kwakaita dare raitambira mazita evachakwikwidza musarudzo svondo rapera. VaDanha vati kutadza kuwana gwaro revavhoti kwakakonzera kuti nhengo dzebato ravo zhinji dzitadze kukwikwidza musarudzo vachiti havachavimbi kuti Zec ichakwanisa kufambisa sarudzo munyika. Zvaitwa naVaDanha, avo varambidza VaMoyo nechikwata chavanga vachifamba nacho kuenderera mberi nekutaura kudzamara Amai Chigumba vasiya basa, zvabva zvakaonzera kuti musangano uyu utadze kuenderera mberi uye komiti yanga ichida kuumbwa iyi itadze kuumbwa. Vanga vakamirira Zanu PF pamusangano uyu, VaFortune Chasi, vashora zvaitwa naVaDanha. Asi VaTimba vatiwo zvaitwa naVaDanha zvinoburitsa pachena kurwadziwa kwemapato anopkisa nemafambisirwo ari kuitwa basa neZec Zvichakadai, VaMoyo vati komisheni yavo ichazoshevedzera mumwe musangano kana vagadzirisa nyaya dzekuchengetedzeka kwevanhu nemapurisa kuitira kuti misangano isakanganiswe sezvaitwa naVaDanha. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Human Rights Commission Yofara neMamiriro Akaita Zvinhu Musarudzo
text: Sachigaro veZimbabwe Human Rights Commission, Doctor Elasto Mugwadi, vanoti komisheni yavo inofara nemamiriro akaita zvinhu mayererano nesarudzo dzichaitwa nemusi weMuvhuro. VaMugwadi vanoti kunyange hazvo pange pane zvichemo zvakasvitswa kukomisheni yavo, zvange zviri zvishoma uye vakagadzirisa zvichemo zvizhinji. Mamwe mapato anopikisa anotaura kuti haasikufara ne Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, kana kuti Zec, pamusoro pemabatiro airikuita gadziriro yesarudzo idzi. Izvi zvakakonzera kuti mamwe mapato nemasangano akazvimiririra aende kumatare edzimhosva kuti Zec imanikidzwe kuteerera zvichemo zvavo. “Ndingati zvinhu zvinenge zvakamira zvirinani kana tichienzanisa nemamwe makore apfuura aya,” VaMugwadi vaudza Studio7. “Kana tichitarira runyararo huripo uye tichitarira kodzero dzevanhu kuti vari kukwanisa here kuungana sezvavanoda uye vanokwanisa here kuita misangano yavo pavanodira uye vanokwanisa here kutaura zvavanoda vasina anovashungurudza. Izvi tiri kuona kuti zviri kuitika.” Svondo rapera, sangano revadzidzisi rakabudirira kumatare edzimhosva kwarakange raenda richimanikidza Zec kuti ibvumidze vadzidzisi kuvhota kunzvimbo dzavanenge vaendeswa neZec kunovhotesa vanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Tuchel otsiura Mbappe
text: Saint-Germain, Thomas Tuchel, akaramba kutaura pamusoro penhau yekuti chikwata chake chinogona kutenga mutambi weChelsea, N’Golo Kante.   Kante – uyo akapembera kuhwina mukombe weWorld Cup neFrance gore rino – ari kunzi ari kudiwa kuzotengwa nechikwata ichi chekuFrance chinove shasha dzeLigue 1 mwaka uno.   Mutambi wePSG, Kylian Mbappe, akabuda pachena kuti akasiya katsamba muhomwe dzaKante achiedza kumukurudzira kuti auye kuzotambira nhabvu yake kuchikwata ichi chekuFrance apo vaive kuWorld Cup kuRussia.   Asi, Tuchel anoti hazvina kunaka kutaura pamusoro pezvevatambi vekune zvimwe zvikwata panyaya yekuda kuvatenga. “Hazvina kunaka uye handizvifarire zvachose, uye handizvifarire kana vamwe varairidzi vachitaura pamusoro pevatambi vari kutambira zvimwe zvikwata,” anodaro Tuchel. Saka hapana nyaya panhau yaKante uye hatisi kufunga nezvazvo mwaka uno.”   Apo Tuchel ari kuramba kutaura nezvevamwe vatambi vari kuuya kuchikwata chake, murairidzi wePSG uyu anoti ane chivimbo chikuru chekuti Edinson Cavani haasi kuzobva achienda kuReal Madrid.   Mutambi uyu – uyo anove chizvarwa chekuUruguay – ari kunzi anodiwa kuti azotsive Cristiano Ronaldo uyo akabva achienda kuJuventus nemari inosvika 100 miriyoni paunzi.   Asi achitaura chikwata chake chichangobva kukunda Atletico Madrid 3-2 mumutambo weInternational Champions Cup, Tuchel anoti, “Ndinofunga kuti acharamba ari kuno, hapana ambotaura chinhu kwandiri nezvenyaya yake saka ndinoziva kuti acharamba aripo.   “Hazvina kumbouya mupfungwa dzedu kuti angangoenda, ndakataura naye uye haana kurakidza kuti anoda kubva.” — SportsMail Football

headline: Coronavirus Youraya Vanhu Vanodarika Mazana Mana muAfrica
text: Zimbabwe nhasi yapinda muzuva rechipfumbamwe vanhu vachikurudzirwa kugara mudzimba senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere checoronavirus icho chauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi manomwe nezvitatu pasi rose. MuZimbabwe mune vanhu gumi vakabatwa nechirwere ichi uye mumwe chete akafa.Vachitaura neStudio 7, mukuru anoona nezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare Dr Prosper Chonzi vati vari kutyira zvikuru kuti vanhu zviuru gumi nezvitatu vakabva kuSouth Africa painge ponzi vanhu munyika iyi vagare mudzimba vanogona kuwedzera huwandu hwevanhu vachabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika. Vatiwo huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere hunogona kunge wakaderera nekuti varikuvhenekwa vachiri vashoma. Mashoko atumirwa kuStudio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kusangano rinoongorora nyaya dzezvirwere reAfrica Centres for Disease Control Prevention anoratidza kuti muAfrica mafa vanhu vanodarika mazana mana nemakumi mana nevaviri. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi muAfrica vadarika zviuru zvipfumbamwe nemazana mana uye vakawanda vacho vari muSouth Africa umo mafawo vanhu gumi nemumwe chete kusvika parizvino. Dunhu reSADC rine vanhu vanodarika chiuru chimwe chete nemazana manomwe nemakumi matanhatu vabatwa nechirwere ichi. Asi kunyika dzekumawirira ndiko kune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwaJohns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iri kuongorora chirwere ichi inoti vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana maviri vabatwa nechirwere ichi. America iyo ine vanhu vanodarika zviuru gumi vafa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi kunyangwe vakawanda vafa pasi rose vachiri vekuItaly kwashaya vanhu vanodarika zviuru gumi nezvitanhatu nemazana mashanu. Mutungamiri wehurumende yeBritain VaBoris Johnson avo vakabatwa nechirwere ichi vaendeswa kunorapwa vari kurwarisa kana kuti Intensive Care Unit mushure mekusimbirwa zvakanyanya nechirwere ichi. Kunyangwe zviri pachena kuti kukurudzira vanhu kuti vagare mudzimba kunobatsira kuderedza huwandu hwevanhu vanofa nechirwere ichi, vamwe muZimbabwe vave kugunun’una kuti vave kufa nenzara sezvo vemabhizimisi vakawedzera mitengo yezvekudya zvakanyanya.

headline: ARTUZ Inopedza Kongiresi Yayo Ichiti Kushandira Mahara Kwete
text: Kongiresi yeAmalgamated Rural Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, yapetwa muGweru sangano iri richibuda nezvisungo zvakasiyana siyana kusanganisira kusadzokere kubasa kwevarairidzi panovhurwa zvikoro svondo rinouya. Musangano uyu wasarudza vatungamiri vatsva vana kuti vave vamwe vevatungamiri vatanhatu vanoumba National Executive Council yesangano iri. VaObert Masaraure vanoramba vari mutungamiri wesangano iri, ukuwo VaRobson Chere, vari munyori mukuru mushure mekunge vaviri ava vasarudzwa pasina avakwikwidza. Aitwa mutevedzeri waVaMasaraure, ndiMuzvare Gaudencia Mandiopera; ukuwo vasarudzwa kuva mutevedzeri waVaChere, ndiVaMunyaradzi Masiyiwa. Asarudzwa kuvamutauriri weArtuz ndiVaNation Mudzitirwa, ukuwo Muzvare Brenda Musavengana vaitwa mubati wehomwe. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, avo vange vari munyarikani pamusangano uyu, vakorokotedza ARTUZ nekukwanisa kuita kongiresi yayo zvisinei nekuoma kwakaita zvimhu. Vatiwo zvakakosha kuti vashandi vose munyika vabatane kuti vakwanise kubuda mumatambudziko avari. VaMasaraure vabvuma kuti kubatana kwakakosha vakati sangano ravo richaramba richiedza kushanda nemamwe masangamo kuti kubatana uku kuvepo. VaChere vaudza Studio7 kuti chimwe chezvisungo zvabuda ndechekuti varairidzi havazi kuzodzokera kuzvikoro pazvinivhurwa asi vati izvi hazvirevi kuti vari kuramwa mabasa. Vamwe varairidzi vange vari pamusangano uyu vaudza Studio7 kuti vanotsigira zvizere zvisungo zvabuda izvi. Muzvare Mary Mupatsi, avo vanodzidzisa kuSilobela, vati varairidzi vekumaruwa vari kurarama hupenyu hwakaoma. Sangano reARTUZ rakavambwa mugore ra2014, uye kongiresi inotevera ichaitwa mushure memakore mashanu. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yokurudzirwa Kubvuma Kuti Zvinhu Zvakaita Manyama Amire neRongo Munyika
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzerunyararo pamwe nedzematongerwo enyika dzinoti zvinhu zvicharamba zvakaita manyama amire nerongo muZimbabwe kana hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa, ikaramba yakaomesa musoro ichiti munyika hamuna matambudziko. Mukuru weZimbabwe Peace Project, Muzvare Jestina Mukoko, vanoti Zimbabwe haisi kuzofambira mberi kana hurumende ikaramba achiratidza kuti haisi kunzwisisa matambudziko akatarisana neveruzhinji. Muzvare Mukoko, avo vakambopambwa vakatochwa vari mumaoko ehurumende muna 2008,vanoti kunyange hazvo vari kutonga nyika vasiri kubvuma kuti zvinhu zvakaminama muZimbabwe, veruzhinji munyika vari kugara vari panyanga dzamushore. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzerunyararo, Reverend Ray Motsi, vanoti kana pasina muonera pamwe unoitwa nrvanhu vemuZimbabwe, hapana chinogadzirisika munyika. VaMotsi vanoti kunyange hurumende iri kuti munyika hamuna dambudziko, chokwadi chiripo ndechekuti veruzhinji vari kutambura zvakanyanya munyika yavo. Munyori mukuru musangano reZimbabwe Council of Churches, Reverend Kenneth Mtata, vanoti semachechi, maonero avo ndeyekuti nhaurirano ndiyo chete nzira ingagadzirise zviri kunetsa munyika. VaMtata vanotiwo zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe pachazvo, kana zvikabatana zvichiita muonera pamwe, ndizvo chete zvinogadzirisa matambudziko akasunga nyika mbiradzakondo. Mumwe muongorori wezvematongerwo enyika, Dr Tinashe Mawere, vanotiwo kana pasina kuwirirana kuti munyika mune zviri kunetsa, hapana kufambira mberi kungaite Zimbabwe senyika. Zviri kutaurwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzerunyararo zvakatsigirwawo nemizinda iri muZimbabwe yenyika huru dzinobatsira Zimbabwe munyaya dzakasiyana. Vamiriri vemizinda iyi vakaburitsa gwaro riri kushora zvikuru kutyorwa kuri kuitwa kodzero dzevanhu muZimbabwe pamwe nehuori huri kuitwa munyaya dzezvicherwa. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi, sezvo gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusiso Moyo, vange vasingabatike panhare mbozha yavo. Asi vachipindura padanho rakatorwa nemizinda iyi, iyo inosanganisira Canada, America, Netherlands nemimwe, mushandi mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vakati nyika iyi dzinofanirwawo kuteerera zviri kutaurwa nehurumende yeZimbabwe. Sachigaro veZimbabwe Human Rights Commission, VaElasto Mugwadi, vanoti vanhu vanofanirwa kuisa misoro pamwe chete vogadzirisa zvinenge zvichinetsa munyika mavo. Komisheni yaVaMugwadi, iyo inovawo boka rakaumbwa nehurumende, rakaburitsawo mashoko enyunyuto pamusoro pekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu munyika. Komisheni iyi yakakuridzirawo hurumende kuti iferefete nyaya dzose dzekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu munyika. Asi hurumende inoti kunze kwedambudziko reCovid-19, hapana matambidziko ari munyika, uye vari kuti munyika mune matambudziko, vanhu vari kushandiswa nevavengi vane chinangwa chibvisa hurumende iripo. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano Rakazvimirira reCOTRAD Rombomiswa Kushanda neHurumende
text: Hurumende yambomisa sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reCommunity Tolerance and Reconciliation Development Trust kuita basa mudunhu reMasvingo ichiti inoda kuongorora kuti inemagwaro ari pamutemo here kuti inge ichishanda munyika. Ve Cotrad vanoti izvi zvine zvematongerwe enyika mukati sezvo sangano ravo ruchita basa rekurwira kodzero dzevanhu uye range richiteverwa kubva muna ndira pakamboita ratidziro yakavharisa nyika. Vachitaura ne Studio 7 VaBrighton Ramusi mushandi weCotrad vati vagamuchira tsamba kubva kuna mudzviti wedunhu reMasvingo VaRay Hove ichivaudza kuti vambomire basa. VaRamusi, avo vakambosungwa nevamwe vashandi vesangano iri muna Ndira vanoti hurumende yagara isingafaire basa ravanoita. Vatiwo zviri kuratidza kuti hurumende iripo haina hutongi hwejekere sezvo ichida kuvhara mikana yekushanda kumasangano anodzidzisa vanhu zvekodzero dzavo. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano iri VaZivanai Muzorodzi vati kumiswa kushanda kwavaitwa kuchakanganisa zvikuru vashandi vavo. VaRamusi vaenderera mberi vachiti nyaya yemagwaro haisiriyo yavari kurambidzirwa sezvo vane gwaro re Notarial Deed of Trust ravakanyoresa kuhurumende muna 2012 rine nhamba dzinoti MA1050/2012. Vanoti uku kumbunyikidzwa kwekodzero dzavo sezvo vachipomerwa mhosva yekupindira mune zvematongerwe enyika uye vachinzi vanotsigira bato guru rinopikisa reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa. VaRamusi vati havasi kuzopeta maoko kodzero dzavo dzichi mbunyikidzwa nekudaro vachaendesa hurumende kumatare. VaHove varamba kutipa chikonzero chavamisira Cotrad basa parunhare vachiti vange vakabatikana apowo gurukota reMasvingo, VaEzra Chadzamira vati vange vasati vasumwa nezvenyaya iyi. Vati tizovafonere asi havana kuzobatika panharembozha yavo. Vanoona nezve matongerwe enyika vakazvimirira VaMasimba Gonese, vati hurumende yatotanga kushungurudza masangano ainofunga kuti anovapikisa. Vati uku ndiko kutanga kwekuvharwa kwemasangano akazvimirira sekuzadzikisa mashoko akataurwa nemutungamiriri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuMwenezi. Hurumende inopomera masangano akazvimirira mhosva yekushanda nemapato anopikisa kuda kuipidigure nechisimba. Mugore ra 2013 hurumende yakambovharisa masangano akazvimirira makumi maviri nemapfumbamwe mudunhu reMasvingo. No media source currently available

headline: Vadzidzi paGreat Zimbabwe University Voronga Kuratidzira Kune Mutsindo
text: Vadzidzi vepachikoro cheGreat Zimbabwe University vanoti vari kuenderera mberi nekuratidzira mwedzi uno vachinyunyutira mari dzechikoro dzavanobhadhariswa dzakawandisa. Vadzidzi ava vanotiwo vacharatidzira kusafara kwavo zvichitevera kumbomiswa zvidzidzo kwegore rose kwemunyori mukuru wavo musangano re Students Representative Council, VaKudakwashe Mugapu, vachipomherwa mhosva yekukurudzira kuti vadzidzi vaite mhirizhonga. Mumwe wevatungamiri wevadzidzi, VaKeith Chingwe, vanoti ratidziro yavari kuronga kuita ndeyekuratidza kusafara kwavo nemari dzakakwidzwa dzekuita zvidzidzo zvinoratidza hunyanzvi, kana kuti Practicals, kubhadhara mari yechikoro vari pakudzidzira basa, pamwe nemari dzekugara pachikoro dzakawandisa idzo vari kubhadhariswa. VaMugapu vanoti havasi kufara nekuti vaida kuita zviri pamutemo wenyika zvekurwira kodzero dzevadzidzi, izvo zvakaita kuti varangwe. Asi vadzidzi vanoti havasi kuzotarisa mumwe wavo achimiswa zvidzidzo zvake, nokudaro vari kuendesa chikoro ichi kumatare edzimhosva. Mumwe mudzidzi, VaGivemore Nyamuranga, vanoti vave mushishi rekugadzira mapepa avo ekudare guru redzimhosva vachibatsirwa nesangano remagweta re Zimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights kuti mumwe wavo adzoswe kuchikoro. VaMugapu vakapuwa tsamba yekumiswa chikoro kwegore rose nemukuru weGreat Zimbabwe University, Vice Chancellor Professor Rungano Zvobgo, musi wa 1 Gunyana. Professor Zvogbo vati havakwanisi kutaura neStudio 7parunhare vachiti vari kuGhana. Asi vadzidzi vati vari kuenderera mberi nechirongwa chekufamba munzvimbo dzinodzidzirwa dziri pakasiyana siyana mudhorobha reMasvingo vachikurudzira vamwe vavo kuti vapinde mumigwagwa musi wa 14 Gunyana. Vadzidzi vanoti chikoro chakawedzera mari idzi pasina kuwirirana navo uye, vari kubvisa mari yekugara pachikoro asi vachishaya pekugara. Vanotiwo mari yechikoro yavanobhadhariswa inoita mazana mashanu nemakumi mapfumbamwe emadhora, yakawandisa zvikuru. No media source currently available

headline: Vakabaiwa Nhomba yeCobvid-19 yeCovaxin Kamwe Chete Vokurudzirwa Kubayiwa Imwe Mhando
text: Hurumende inoti zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu zvakabaiwa kamwe chete nhomba yeCovid-19, yeCovaxin yakabva kuIndia zvinofanira kubaiwa chero imwe mhando yenhomba irti munyika. Izvi zvinonzi zviri kukonzerwa nekushomeka kwenhomba iyi munyika. Mukutanga kwegore, India yakabatsira Zimbabwe nenhomba yeCovaxin inosvika zviuru makumi matatu nemashanu kana kuti 35,000. Asi mamiriro akaita zvinhu muIndia iyo ine dambudziko rechirwere ichi rakomba anoni ave kutadzisa nyika iyi kuti iwane nhomba yekuendesa kune dzimwe nyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano, Doctor Frenk Guni, vanoti hapasati pave nehumbowo hunoratidza kuti kuvhenganisa mishonga yenhomba yeCovid-19 kune njodzi, vachiti parizvino zvinoonekwa sekuti kubaiwa nhomba iyi katatu zvinotobatsira vanhu. No media source currently available Asi ongororo dziri kuitwa muAmerica dziri kuratidza kuti kusanganisa nhomba yeJohnson and Johnson nedzimwe dzakaita sePfizer neModerna.

headline: Hurumende Yoramba Ichizvicherera Gomba neKuramba Ichikwereta Mari
text: Hurumende yeZimbabwe iri kuramba ichienderera mberi nekukwereta mari yekushandisa munyika kana kuti domestic debt. Izvi zviri kuuya panguva iyo bhanga reIMF nereWorld Bank akayambira kuti kuita izvi kuchapa kuti nyika itadze kubuda mumadhaka mairi. Kunyange hazvo gurukota rinoona nezvehupfumi, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vari kuti hurumende hakuna zvimwe zvaingaite kunze kwekukwereta mari kuita mabasa ayo, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti zviri kuitwa izvi kukokera mhepo wakasenga mamera mutswanda. Vaimbova gurukota rinoona nezvehupfumi vachitungamira bato rinopikisa rePeople's Democratic Party, VaTendai Biti, vanoti nyaya yehurumende yekuramba ichikwereta mari iri kudzosera zvikuru chirongwa chekugadzirisa hupfumi uho huri kutatarika. VaBiti vati mari yakweretwa munyika yave kusvika mabhiriyoni matanhatu emadhora. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachidzidzisa paUniversity of Free State muSouth Africa, VaCalvin Mdzingiri, vanoti vanowirirana naVaBiti vachiti mari inokweretwa inofanira kushandiswa pazvinhu zvinobatsira nyika zvakaita semigwagwa, zvipatara, magwenya emagetsi nezvimwe. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reZimbabwe Coalition on Debt and Development, VaTinashe Gumbo, vanoti nyaya yezvikwereti inofanira kunyatsodorongodzwa kuti paonekwe kuti imarii chaiyo yakakweretwa nekuti parizvino hazvina kujeka kuti chikwereti chakamira sei. Vaimbotungamira ZIMCODD kwemakore gumi uye vari nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaJoy Mabenge, vanotiwo mari isati yatanga kudzoserwa inofanira kuzivakanwa kuti chii chayakatenga. International Monetary Fund inoti Zimbabwe ikaramba ichikwereta mari munyika zvichapa kuti mitengo yezvinhu irambe ichikwira zvichapa kuti inflation yemunyika ikwirewo zvakanyanya. Asi nesarudzo dziri kuitwa gore rinouya VaBiti vanoti havaone nyaya yekukweretwa kwemari ichimira. Zimbabwe iri kutatarikawo kubhadhara chimwe chikwereti kuWorld Bank neAfrican Development Bank chinosvika bhiriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matanhatu emadhora. Kunyangwe hazvo VaChinamasa vainge vati vawana mari yekubhadhara chikwereti ichi uye vainge vatotenderana neWorld Bank neIMF, mabhanga aya anoti hapana chatenderanwa . Nyaya yekusabhadhara zvikwereti iri kupa kuti Zimbabwe itadze kukwereteswa mari nevamwe. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vobvumidzwa Kupinza Munyika Pachena Zvinhu Zvine Mutengo we$200 Chete
text: Asi zvinenge zvapfurikidza pamazana maviri emadhora aya zvichizochajwa mutero wezvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana, kana kuti 40%. Kusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu munyika munyaya dzezveupfumi kunonzi kuri kupa kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zvirambe zvichipinza munyika zvekudya nezvimwe zvekushandisa zuva nezuva kubva kunyika dzakaita seSouth Africa neBotswana. Izvi zvinoitika kunyange hazvo paine mutemo weStatutory Instrument 64, uyo unorambidza kupinzwa kwezvinhu zvine huwandu munyika. Mutungamiri wesangano revanotenga nekutengesa zvinhu kunze kwenyika, reIntrenational Cross Border Traders Association, VaDenis Juru, vanoti kunyange hazvo paine mutemo uyu, vashandi veZimbabwe Revenue Authority, Zimra, vari pamuganhu weBeitbridge vane zvimwe zvavari kubvumidza kupinzwa munyika. VaJuru vanoti zvinhu zvinokosha madhora mazana maviri chete pamunhu, ndizvo zvinobvumidzwa kupinda munyika pasina mutero. Asi zvinenge zvapfurikidza pamazana maviri emadhora aya zvichizochajwa mutero wezvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana, kana kuti 40 %. Asi VaJuru vanoti zvinhu zvakaita sezvekuvakisa, mabhara nezvimwe zvihombe hazvisi kubvumidzwa munyika pasi pemutemo weSI 64 uyu. Vanotiwo mitsetse yevanhu vanoda kupinda muZimbabwe pabhodha reBeitbridge, zvikuru kudivi reSouth Africa, hapachina sezvo South Africa yakawedzera vashandi. Asi vanoti vari kufamba vari kusangana nematambudziko ekukwidzwa kwemari dzekubhadhara kumabhazi, vachiti semuenzaniso, kubva ku Johannesburg kunosvika kuHarare vanhu vari kubhadhariswa mari inosvika marhandi mazana masere. No media source currently available

headline: Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kubatwa neCovid-19 Hworamba Huchikwira
text: Hurumende yakazivisa neChitatu kuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa ne Covid-19 munyika hwakakwira kusvika pachiuru nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 1 089, zvichitevera kuwanikwa kwevamwe vanhu makumi maviri nevashanu vaine chirwere ichi. Vanhu vakavhenekwa chirwere ichi nezuro vanosvika zviuru zviviri nemazana matanhatu negumi nevaviri, kana kuti 2 612. Vanhu vakanga vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi kusvika nezuro vaive mazana matatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevashanu kana kuti 395, uye vashaya vachiri makumi maviri. Mumwe chiremba, Dr Edgar Munatsi, avo vari ku Britain, vanoti dambudziko rekukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vave kuwanikwa vaine chirwere ichi, zvikuru muvanhu vagara vari munyika, richanetsa kudzivirira nekuti vanhu vanga vasiri kutevera zvakadzama mitemo yekuvhara kumeso pamwe nekugeza maoko. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanosangana neVechidiki veBato Ravo reZanu-PF
text: Mutungamiri weZanu PF VaEmmerson Mnangagwa neChitatu vakasangana nevatungamiri vevechidiki vebato ravo muHarare vakati boka revechidiki iri harisi kunyatsoonekwa mashandiro aro panyaya dzekukwezva vechidiki kuti vave nechekuita mune mamiriro ezveupfumi hwenyika. VaMnangagwa, avo vapinda musangano veNational Assembly yevechidiki ava, vatiwo vechidiki ava ndivo vanofanirwa kudzivirira pamwe nekusimudzira gwara remusangano weZanu PF. Vatiwo vakatambira chikumbiro chevechidiki chekuti bazi roga roga rive neboka rinoona nezvezvido zvevechidiki, vachiti vachagara pasi kuti vazeye nezvechikumbiro ichi. Munyori anoona nezvevechidiki kuZanu PF, VaPupurai Togarepi vanoti musangano uyu wanga wakakoshera vechidiki zvakanyanya sezvo uchivapa mukana wekusangana nemutungamiri wenyika. VaTogarepi vanotiwo zvabuda mumusangano uyu zvichatakurwa nevechidiki vodzokera nazvo kumatunhu kwavo uko vachanozvishandisa mukusimudzira musangano wavo pamwe nenyika. No media source currently available

headline: VaMwonzora Voronga Nhaurirano naVaMnangagwa Asi CCC Inoti Inoda Sarudzo Dzakachena Chete Muna 2023
text: Mutungamiri wechimwe chikwata cheMDC-T uye vachitungamira mubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance musarudzo VaDouglas Mwonzora vanoti vari kuda kuita nhaurirano nemutungamiri wenyika uye vari mutungamiri webato reZanu-PF VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vachiti zviri kuitwa nePolad parizvino hazvina zvazvinonyatsobatsira. Tayedza kubata mutauriri webato rezanu-pf VaChris Mutsvangwa asi vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Asi mutauriri werimwe bato rinopikisa reCitizens Coalition for Change Muzvare Fadzai Mahere vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato ravo parizvino rakangotarisa zvakanyanya nyaya yesarudzo dza2023 uye kana paine nhaurirano dzinoda kuti dziitwe, dzinofanira kunangana nekuona kuti sarudzo dzaitwa zvakachena. Vati izvi zvikaitika vanokunda sarudzo zvine mutsindo zvekuti panenge pasina chinangwa chekuti paitwe hurumende yemubatanidzwa. No media source currently available

headline: ZLHR Yoendesa Hurumende kuMatare eDzimhosva
text: Rimwe sangano remagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu rinoti raenda kumatare zvechimbi chimbi richikumbira matare aya kuti amise mapurisa nemauto kuvhiringidza kwaari kuita magweta esangano iri ayo ari kubatsira vanhu vari kusunga zvichitevera mhirizhonga iri kuitika munyika. Zimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights inoti inoda kuti dare redzimhosva repamusoro soro riudze mapurisa kuti asatadzise magweta esangano iri kuita basa rawo rekumirira vanhu vari kusungwa nemapurisa mumhirizhonga iri kuitika muZimbabwe. Sangano iri rinoti nhengo dzaro dziri kubatsira vasungwa munzvimbo dzinoti Bulawayo, Kadoma, Harare. Masvingo nedzimwe zvichitevera kusungwa kwavo kwakatanga neMuvhuro apo sangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions rakaronga kuratidzira kune mutsindo richitsigirwa nemamwe masangano akazvimirira. Mutauriri wesangano iri, VaKumbirai Mafunda, vanoti sangano ravo riri kushushikana zvikuru nekutyorwa kuri kuitwa kodzero dzevanhu nemapurisa pamwe nemauto. VaMafunda vanoti vari kunzwa zvakare kushushikana nekuvharwa kwaitwa masai sai eindaneti izvo zvava kutyorera vanhu kodzero dzekuwana mashoko pamwe nekuziva zviri kuitika munyika. Vanhu vemuZimbabwe vakatanga kuratidzira neMuvhuro vachiti zvinhu zvizhinji zvava nemitengo iri pamusoro soro zvichitevera kuwedzerwa kwemafuta neMugovera wapfuura. Vanhu vanodarika gumi vanonzi vakapfurwa vakafa mumhirizhonga iri kuitika. Asi Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kumutauriri wemapurisa, Amai Charity Charamba, kuti tinzwe huwandu hwevanhu vafa kusvika pari zvino. No media source currently available

headline: Go Warriors Go: Vatsigiri
text: VATSIGIRI venhabvu vanoti chikwata chenyika chemaWarriors chinoda minamato yakasimba apo chiri kunanga kuCameroon kunokwikwidza kumutambo weAfrican Nations Championship (CHAN) uyo unotanga nemusi weMugovera.   Rwendo rwemaWarriors rwekuenda kumutambo uyu rwange rusiri nyore sezvo gadziriro dzacho dzakambosvika pakumiswa zvichitevera kubatwa kwainge kwaita vatambi 15, kusanganisira dzimwe nhengo dzechikwata ichi, nechirwere cheCovid-19.   Chikwata chaZdravko ‘Loga’ Logarusic chakasimuka nemusi weChitatu chakananga kuCameroon uko chichanovhurira mutambo weCHAN chichisangana necheIndomitable Lions cheCameroon.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, mutungamiri wesangano reFriends of the Warriors – Edward Chimedza – anoti makwikwi eCHAN egore rino akasiyana neemakore adarika nekuti maWarriors achange asina vatsigiri.   “Tange tiri kuona zvange zvichiitika mune mitambo yakasiyana yakadai seweFC Platinum, kubirirwa kwayange ichiitwa pachishandiswa Covid-19. Saka tiri kuzvityirawo kuti ndizvo zvinogona kuitika kumaWarriors edu paari kuenda kuCameroon. Tinoda kuti anohwina pasina kubirira uye tiri kuda kuona nhabvu inonakidza ichitambwa.   “Saka isu chatichangoita sevatsigiri kungoisa minamato yakasimba kuti vakomana vedu vanotimirira uye rwendo rwavo rwunge rwakajeka rwuchiendeka,” anodaro Chimedza. Chikwata cheFC Platinum masvondo adarika chakaenda kuTanzania uko chakatamba necheSimba Football Club mumutambo wechipiri wekurwira kuenda kumakwikwi eCAF Champions League group stages. Vatambi veFC Platinum vachisvika kuTanzania, vakaongororwa denda reCovid-19 asi havana kuziviswa zvakabuda muongororo iyi pachiri nenguva. Chikwata ichi chakazoziviswa kwasara maawa maviri kuti mutambo uyu uchitanga kuti vatambi vacho vashanu vane denda iri izvo zvakakatyamadza FC Platinum ndokukanganisa hurongwa hwavaive vanaho. FC Platinum yakazokundwa mutambo uyu 4-0 zvakaita kuti ibve yaburitswa mumutambo uyu. Mutsigiri mukuru wenhabvu Adomsi ‘Admoski’ Mukwasi anoti chikwata chaLoga chakasimba zvikuru uye chichanokonzeresa kumutambo uyu zvekuti chichasvika kuquarter-final chaiko.   Munhorowondo yemaWarriors kuCHAN, mugore ra2014 chikwata ichi chakasvika kusemi-fainari yemutambo uyu uko chakazoburitswa neLibya 5-4 kumapena mushure mekunge mutambo uyu wapera uri mangange 0-0.   Adomski anoti maWarriors achanyora nhorowondo zvakare gore rino kuCameroon uye vanoda minamato yenyika yese kuti vanokunda.   “Isu mumutambo weCHAN tagara hedu tinositamba zvinonwisa mvura saka naizvozvo tiri kutarisira kuti Loga nevakomana vake vachanotibatira basa. Tichavaisa mumitamato yedu kuti vatambe zvinonwisa mvura uye vagonobudirira kuCameroon.   “Chikwata chedu chakasimba uye vatambi vacho vane tarenda rinodadisa,” anodaro Adomski. Zvakadaro, maWarriors ari kuenda kumutambo uyu ariwo chikwata choga chiri kubva kunyika isiri kutambwa nhabvu pari zvino nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Gore rapera, nhabvu haina kumbobvira yatambwa munyika muno nekuda kwedenda iri uye pari zvino hazvisati zvave zivikanwa kuti mitambo yePremier Soccer Leage ichatambwa here.

headline: Mutori weNhau, Hopewell Chin'ono, Anorambirwa Chibatiso neDare
text: Mutori wenhau ane mukurumbira, Hopewell Chin’ono, anyimwa nedare repamusoro mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso kuitira kuti atongwe achiba kumba kwake pamhosva yaari kupomerwa yekukurudzira veruzhinji kuti varatidzire zvine mhirizhonga. Mumutongo waverengwa namutongi VaWebster Chinamhora, uyo wakanyorwa naVaTawanda Chitapi, dare repamusoro ratura kuti Chin’ono haakodzere kubuditswa mujeri. Zvaturwa nedare zvatsinhirwa nerimwe remagweta raChin’ono, VaGift Mtisi. VaMtisi vati vachatora matanho kana vachinge vanzwisisa zviri mumutongo uyu. Mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevatori venhau reMisa Zimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo, vati matare anofanira kushanda asina divi raakarerekera vakakurudzira kuti hurumende yeZimbabwe idzokere pahutongo hwejekerere. Chin’ono ari kupomerwa mhosva yekunzi akanyora padandemutande rake reTwitter achikuridzira kuti veruzhinji varatidzire zvine mhirizhonga mukati vachipandukira hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Mutongo pachikumbiro chemutungamiri weTransform Zimbabwe, VaJacob Ngarivhume, avo vakadaidzira kuti munyika muratidzirwe musi wa31 Chikunguru, chekuti vatongwe vachibva kumba kwavo wakatarisirwa kuturwa nedare reHigh Court mangwana zvichitevera kunyimwa kwavakaitwa mukana uyu nedare ramejesitiriti. Zvichakadai, sangano reParadigm Initiative iro rinova mubatanidzwa wemasangano akawanda pasi rose anorwira kodzero dzevatori venhau, raburitsa gwaro richitsoropodza kusungwa kwaChin’ono. Sangano iri rati kusungwa kwaChin’ono kunoratidza kuti hurumende yeZimbabwe iri kutyora bumbiro remitemo zvikurusei kodzero dzekutaura kwakasununguka. No media source currently available

headline: Muchatiguta: Masomere
text: MURAIRIDZI weManica Diamond, Luke ‘Vahombe’ Masomere, anoti chikwata chake icho chiri kukwikwidza muCastle Premiership kekutanga gore rino chauya zvachose uye hachina wachinovhunduka.   Mwaka uno, maziso ese achange ari paManica Diamond yekwaMutare iyo yakapinda muCastle Premiership mushure mekunge yatamba nhabvu yainwisa mvura kuDivision One izvo zvakatuma hutungamiri hwechikwata ichi kutaura kuti vanoda kuita mukurumbira muAfrica yese.   Asi achitaura neKwayedza svondo rino, Vahombe – uyo ave kudanwa nezita remadunhurirwa nevatsigiri kuti Dr of Football kana kuti His Excellency – anoti chikwata chake chauya zvachose muPSL.   “Isu sechikwata, chekutanga ndechekuti tauya zvachose uye hapana kwatiri kuenda. Handisi kuda hangu kuvimbisa kuti tichapinda torakasha zvimwe zvikwata kana kuhwina mikombe yakawanda mumwaka wedu wekutanga. Asi zivai kuti isu hatisi kuzongorakashwa sezvinoitwa zvimwe zvikwata zvinenge zvapinda muPSL zvobva zvadzokera kwazvinenge zvabva, kwete.   “Isu tauya kuzogara muno zvachose nekuti muno muPSL ndimo medu matinokodzera kuve tiri,” anodaro.   Chero zvazvo Masomere achiti mwaka uno haadi kuvimbisa kuti vachasimudza mukombe, chikwata chake chatenga vatambi vepamusoro vakawanda vanosanganisira Partson Jaure, Marshall Mudehwe, Peace Makaha naPritchard Mpelele.   Anoti vari kuda kuti vazove chimwe chezvikwata zvikuru zvemuno zvenhabvu uye vozonomirira nyika kunze kumitambo yeCAF Champions League nemimwe.   “Vatungamiriri vechikwata chedu vanoda kuti isu tigove chimwe chezvikwata zvikuru zvenhabvu muAfrica,  zvinogoneka kuitika uye ndizvo tiri kushanda kuita saka tiri kuvaka uye munguva pfupi inotevera tichange tave padanho iroro,” anodaro.   Shasha iyi yashandura nhabvu kuManicaland zvekuti vatsigiri venhabvu vemudunhu iri vave kutomushevedza vachimuti ‘His Excellency’ vachimurumbidza nebasa raari kubata kusimudzira nhabvu.   “Handichangonzi Dr of Football chete asi kuno ndave kutoshevedzwa saHis Excellency nekuti vanhu vari kufarira basa randiri kubata rekusimudzira nhabvu.   “Chikwata chedu chaunza mufaro kune vazhinji uye ndiko saka mazita aya erumbidzo ari kungowanda,” anodaro Masomere.   Zvichitevera kuburitswa kwakaitwa Mutare City Rovers muCastle Premiership mwaka wadarika, Manica Diamond ndiyo ichange yakamirira guta reMutare muPSL mwaka uno.

headline: Sangano reBill and Melinda Gates Rowanisa Vanhu Dzimba muHarare
text: Rimwe sangano rekuAmerica, reBill and Melinda Gates Foundation, irapedza chirongwa charo chekuvakira vanotambura dzimba muHarare apo ratambidza dzimba zviri pamutemo kumhuri mazana mana nemakumi masere mumusha weDzivaresekwa Extenstion muHarare. Vachitaura pachiitiko ichi, mumwe mukuru anoona bezvekufambiswa kwezvirongwa musangano iri, Amai Melanie Walker, vati chirongwa ichi, icho chine mamiriyoni makumi mashanu emadhora, chabudirira chose. Vati ishuviro yavo kuti kanzuro yeHarar,e ichashanda nemamwe masangano anopa rubatsiro,ichaenderera mberi ichivakira vanoshaya dzimba kuti vagare zvakanaka sezvo sangano ravo rapedza chirongwa charo. Meya veguta reHarare, VaBenard Manyenyeni, vatenda sangano iri uye vati chirongwa ichi chakabudirira chose zvekuti kanzuru yavo yave kutoronga kushandisa chirongwa ichimukugadzirisa dambudziko revanhu vari kugara munzvimbo dzisingakodzeri muguta. Pasi pechirongwa cheBill and Melinda Gates Foundation, kanzuru yakapihwa mari yekugadzira migwagwa, kugadzira pombi dzemvura nesiweji uyewo vanhu vakazopihwa mari dzekuvaka dzimba dzine mipanda miviri miviri. Vazhinji vakawana rubatsiro nedzimba pasi pechirongwa ichi ndevaya vakabviswa munzvimbo dzavaigara apo hurumende yaigadzirira kushanya muZimbabwe kwaMambokadzi wekuEnglanda, Queen Elizabeth, muna 1992 pamwe nevamwe vakaputsirwa dzimba dzavo paOperation Murambatsvina muna 2005. Mumwe wevanhu ava, Amai Grace Tagarisa, vanoti vanofara chose kuti vavewo nepekugara zvichitevera rubatsiro rwakabva kuBill and Melinda Gates Foundations. Vanoti kunze kwemba vakadzidziswa kuita mabasa ekuzvibatsira akaita sekusona. Mumwe wevanhu vakawana rubatsiro kubva kusangano iri, Ambuya Netty Mahachi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanofara chose kuti vave nepekugara mushure mekutambura kwenguva yakareba. VaManyenyeni vati zvichitevera kufamba zvakanaka kwechirongwa ichi, kanzura ichabvisa mumhuri zana nemakumi maviri neimwe dziri kugara zviri kunze kwemutemo mumusha weGunhill vodzivakira dzimba kuMabvuku. Vaenderera mberi vachiti kanzuru yavo iri kuedza napose painogona napo kuti munhu wese awane pekugara muHarare zvisinei nekuti murombo here kana kuti kwete Vati kanzuro yavo ine chinangwa chekuvaka dzimba dzinodarika zana rezviuru kusvika mugore ra2018.

headline: DeMbare yagadza Mashingaidze saCEO
text: DYNAMOS yagadza aimbove CEO weZIFA, Jonathan Mashingaidze, kuve chamangwiza wechikwata ichi.   Mashingaidze akamboshanda basa iri kuchikwata ichi asati abviswa achipihwa rimwe mugore ra2021 panguva yechirwere cheCovid-19.   Mutauriri weDeMbare, Tinashe Farawo, anozivisa nezvekugadzwa kwaMashingaidze.   “Dynamos Football Club inoda kuzivisa nezvekugadzwa kwaJonathan Mashingaidze saChief Executive Officer wechikwata. Kugadzwa kwake kwatoitika uye kuri mugwara rinotenderwa neFIFA, CAF neZIFA Club licencing framework nezvirongwa zvechikwata.   “Mashingaidze, nyanzvi mune zvekutungamira nhabvu, ari kutarisirwa kutungamira basa rechikwata,” anodaro Farawo.   Mashingaidze achange achishanda ari general manager zvekare.

headline: Zimbabwe Inobatana neDzimwe Nyika Mukucherechedza ‘World Aids Day’
text: Zimbabwe yabatana nedzimwe dzepasi rose mukucherechedza zuva rekukurudzira vanhu kuti vadzivirire kupararira kwechirwere cheHIV/AIDS kana kuti World AIDS Day. United Nations yakatara musi 1 Zvita gore rega rega semusi wekucherechedza zuva iri. Dingindira reWorld Aids Day gore rinoti “Ending the HIV/AIDS Epidemic: Resilience and Impact”. Vachitaura panhepfenyuro yeZBC neMuvhuro manheru, mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakati gore rino, kucherechedzwa kwe zuva iri kunokosha nekuti nyika dzepasi pose dzakatarisana nechirwere che Covid-19. VaMnangagwa vakati hazvigoni kuti Zimbabwe inangane nekurwisa AIDS/HIV chete isingatarisi mamiriro akaita zvipatara nezvose zvinoshandiswa mukuunza hutano kuvanhu. Vakati hurumende yavo iri kugadzirisa mamiriro ezvehutano munyika kuti ikwanise kubatsira vanhu nekukurumidza. VaMnangagwa vakavimbisa kuti hurumende ichabudirira muchirongwa che 90/90/90 sezvo Zimbabwe ichitove mberi muzvizhinji zvezvinangwa izvi. Zvinangwa izvi ndezvekuti vanhu makumi mapfumbamwe kubva muzana vazive vavhenekwe uye kana vavhenekwa vapinde muchirongwa chekupihwa mapiritsi. Zuva reWorld AIDS Day rakatanga kucherechedzwa muna 1988. Rinopa mukana kumasangano nevanhu pasi pose kuti vabatane mukurwisa mukondombera uyu, uye kukurudzira ruzivo pamusoro pechirwere ichi, pamwe chete nekubvisa pfungwa yekusarudza vanenge vabatwa nacho. Dr Simbiso Ranga, vanoshanda mudunhu reNorth Carolina, muAmerica, vaudza Studio 7 kuti senyika, Zimbabwe inofanirwa kuona kuti chirwere che Covid-19 hachikanganisi basa riri kuitwa mukurwisa HIV/AIDS.  No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yokundikana Kuwirirana neVashandi paMari Dzavanotambira
text: Munyori mukuru musangano reApex Concil, mubatanidzwa wemasangano evashandi vehurumende VaDavid Dzatsunga vanoti mushure memusangano wemaawa mana vatadza kuwirirana nyaya yemari dzavanotambiriswa nehurumende. Pari kutarisirwa kuitwa mumwe musangano nemusi weChitatu. Vashandi vanoti vanoda kuwedzerwa mari kubva pamazana mana negumi nemana kusvika pachiuru chimwe chete nemazana manomwe. Vashandi ava vange vati vachatanga kuratidzira nemusi weMuvhuro asi vakazoti vave kuda kumbopa nhaurirano mukana.

headline: Gweta raVaMnangagwa VaLewis Uriri Vopa Huchapupu muDare reConstitutional Court
text: Gweta riri kumirira mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa VaLewis Uriri vave kupa humbowo mudare vachiti humbowo hwakapihwa nemagweta emutungamiri weMDC Alliance VaThabani Mpofu akanonoka kuunzwa kumatare sezvinodiwa nemutemo. VaUriri vari kuti nekudaro dare haritombofanire kunzwa zvose zviri kupihwa sehumbowo neMDC Alliance. Vari kutiwo dai bato rinopikisa rakakumbira kuti mavhoti averengwe patsva kana vaida kupa humbowo hwekuti dare rivhure magwaro avhurwe zvekare. Asi mumwe mutongi wedare Amai Rita Makarau vati zvimwe zviri kutaurwa naVaUriri hazvienderane nezvinodiwa pamutemo wesarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika zvekuti kana maawa makumi mana nemasere apfuura veMDC Alliance vaikwanisa kuenda kudare reElectoral Court kuti vapihwe mvumo yekuti mavhoti averengwe zvekare patsva. VaUriri vanoti VaMpofu havana humbowo hwakati tsvikiti hwavapa kuti pane mamwe mavhoti akaita zvekubirirwa anosvika zviuru makumi matanhatu nemappfumbamwe.

headline: Vanopikisa Vanoti VaMliswa Ndivo Vanofanirwa Kumirira Hurungwe West Kwete VaGuzah
text: Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, iri kushorwa zvakanyanya nemabatiro ayakaita sarudzo yemuHurungwe West, uko inoti VaKeith Guzah veZanu-PF vakasarudzwa zviri pamutemo kunyange hazvo vange vasiri mugwaro revavhoti. ZEC inoti VaGuzah vakakumbira kuti vabviswe kuMagunje vachienda kuHurungwe West asi pakaita matambudziko pakuita izvi zvakapa kuti izvi zvisaitwe. Asi ZEC inoti kubvumidza kwayakaita VaGuzah kuti vavhoterwe musarudzo yeHurumengwe West zviri pamutemo. ZEC yatendawo kuti VaGuzah havana kukwanisa kuvhota nekuda kwekuti zita ravo rainge risiri mugwaro revavhoti mudunhu iri. VaGuzah vaudza Studio 7 kuti hapana chavangataure panyaya iyi pari zvino. Asi vakakwikwidza musarudzo iyi vakazvimirira, VaTemba Mliswa, vanoti VaGuzah havafanire kunge vachimirira Hurungwe West nekuti mapepa avo avakashandisa pasrudzo iyi akange asina kumira zvakanaka. No media source currently available Mutungamiri webato reNational Constitutional Assembly, NCA, uye vari muzvinafundo panyaya yemitemo, VaLovemore Madhuku, vanoti mashoko eZEC anoshoresa zvikuru. VaMadhuku vanoti kana VaGuzah zita ravorakanga risiri mugwaro revavhoti zvinoreva kuti havana kodzero dzekuvhoterwa mudunhu iri izvo zvinopa kuti VaMliswa vagadzwe semumiriri wedunhu iri muparamende. No media source currently available

headline: Zvikoro Zvovhurwa Vakawanda Vachinetsekana Kuwana Mari
text: Vabereki vakawanda vanonzi vachakundikana kugadzirira zvakakwana kudzokera kuchikoro kwevana vavo neChipiri pachatanga kotoro yepiri, nekuda kwekunetsa kwemari kumabhanga pamwe nemunyika yose. Mutungamiri werimwe sangano revarairidzi, reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vanoti sesangano vatambira mashoko ekuti mitsetse yekutora mari kumabhanga yanga yakareba kudarika mamwe mazuva, uye mamwe mabhanga apererwa nemari. Mumwe mubereki ane mwana anodzidza kuMazowe asina kuda kudomwa nezita anoti azokwanisa kuwana mari yekuti mwana afambise mushure mekumira mumutsetse wepabhanga kwenguva ndefu kwazvo. Mabhanga mashoma asara achipa mari anonzi anga achipa madhora makumi maviri chete pamunhu, mari inonzi nevakawanda haina zvikuru zvainobatsira nazvo. Doctor Zhou vanotiwo zvikoro zviri kuvhurwa pasina zvati zvagadziriswa pane zvinetswa zvekotoro yapera zvinosanganisira hwaro hwedzidzo hutsva, kana kuti curriculum. Doctor Zhou vanoti vadzidzi nevadzidzisi vane dambudziko rekuona vanofunga kuti vari kusiiwa kunze panyaya yehwaro hwedzidzo hutsva sezvo pasina zvati zvaitwa zvekuvabatsira kuti vave nemabhuku ekushandisa. Vanotiwo nyaya dzemari dzemihoro dzevarairidzi hadzina kutaurwa nezvadzo, izvo zviri kuita kuti varairidzi vanyunyute zvikuru. No media source currently available

headline: Young Igwe osimudzira maboozer
text: ZVIKWATA zvitanhatu zvenhabvu yemaboozer zvichasangana svondo rino nemusi weMugovera paPrince Edward School, muHarare apo zvichatatsurana pamutambo wePeter Moyo at 29 Tournament.   Mutambo uyu uri kurongwa nemuimbi wemusambo weSungura – Peter ‘Dhewa’ Moyo – uyo anove nerudo nenhabvu zvikuru sezvo akambotambira zvikwata zvakadai seLancashire Steel Juniors nevatambi vanosanganisira Dennis Dauda.   Mutambo uyu uchange uri wekupemberera kusvitsa makore 29 okuberekwa kwaYoung Igwe sezita remadunhurirwa raMoyo pamwe nekusimudzira nhabvu yemaboozer.   “Nhabvu yechiboozer vazhinji vanoiona seyezvidhakwa chete, asi yakakosha zvikuru sezvo ichitibatsira kuvaka nekuchengetedza miviri yedu.   “Kana vanhu vakura, kazhinji nguva yekuvaka muviri tinenge tisina saka ndiri kuda kusimudzira mitambo yemaboozer iyi iite mukurumbira itambwe nezvikwata zvakawanda.   “Hongu, ndinoziva kuti zvikwata zvakawanda zviriko zvinotamba nhabvu yemaboozer zvichikwikwidza asi ini ndiri kuda kuisimudzira iite mukurumbira,” anodaro.   Moyo achatambawo mumutambo uyu sezvo chikwata chake chaanotambira cheLimpopo FC chichange chiri chimwe chezvichakwikwidza.   “Ini ndiri kutambawo musi wacho sezvo chikwata changu Limpopo FC chiri kuzokwikwidzawo. Ndichange ndichirakidzawo tarenda rangu,” anodaro Moyo.   Zvikwata zvichahwina pamutambo uyu zvichawaniswa mibairo yakasiyana-siyana inosanganisira mikombe nemenduru.

headline: Vatambi baiwai nhomba: SRC
text: SANGANO reSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) riri kukurudzira vatambi vemitambo yakasiyana kuti vabaiwe majekiseni ekudzivirira Covid-19 kuitira kuti zvigobatsira mukuderedza kupararira kwechirwere ichi pamwe nekudzoswa kwemitambo nekuchimbidza.   Mitambo yose pari zvino yakambomiswa nekuda kweCovid-19 kunze kweyezvikwata zvenyika chete inosanganisira yeZimbabwe Cricket apo maChevrons ari kubandana neBangladesh mumitambo yeOne Day International, Twenty20 Series neTest match series.   Muchinyorwa, akafanobata chigaro chadirector-general weSRC – Sebastain Garikai – anoti zvakakosha kuti vatambi vose vaibaiwe majekiseni ekudzivirira Covid-19.   “Kunyanzvi dzemitambo zvakakosha kuti tikoshese chirongwa chekubaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 sezviri kuitwa neveruzhinji nekuti zvinobatsira mukuderedza kupararira kwechirwere ichi.   “Kana chirwere ichi chikarwiswa, zvinobatsira zvakare pane zvatiri kuedza kuita mukudzosa mitambo yose, ichidzoka iine vatsigiri asi vari vashoma,” anodaro Garikai.   Anoenderera mberi achiti, “Tichitarisana nekumiswa kwemitambo yeChibuku Super Cup, zvakaratidza kukosha kwekubaiwa majekiseni eCovid-19 nekuti zvikwata zvaive nevanhu vakawanda vakabatwa neCovid-19 ndizvo zvaive nevashomawo vakabaiwa.”   Garikai anoti pari zvino SRC pamwe nemasangano akasiyana vari kuongorora mafambiro ari kuita zvinhu munyika maringe nedenda iri.   “Tiri kuongorora zvose zvinenge zvichiitika kuti todzosa sei mitambo, naizvozvo tichange tichiongorora svondo rega-rega tichiita hurukuro negurukota revechidiki nerezveutano nekurerwa kwevana,” anodaro.   Garikai anoti pari zvino mitambo yenhabvu haikwanisike kuti idzoke asi hunge kana zvikwata zvemuPSL zvikatevedzera chirongwa chebio-secure bubble izvo zvinoreva kuti vatambi venhabvu, hutungamiri hwemutambo uyu nevaridzi vepembe vanenge vachigara pavo voga kusina veruzhinji.   “Nhabvu pari zvino inogona kudzoka chete kana chirongwa chebio-secure bubble chiri kutevedzerwa izvo zvinoona vatambi venhabvu, vatungamiri vezvikwata nevaridzi vepembe vose vachigara pamwe chete vasingasange neruzhinji. Izvi ndizvo zviri kuitwa nevecricket nerugby, ndiko kusaka mitambo yavo iri kutenderwa kutambwa.   “Tose tinoda kuona kukasika kudzoka kwemitambo. Asi kudzoka kwayo kunofanirwa kunge kuchienderana nesainzi, mitemo yeWorld Health Organization (WHO) nemitemo yeHurumende,” anodaro.

headline: Mabhizimisi Orasikirwa neMamiriyoni Mashanu eMadhora paZuva neNyaya yeKuratidzira
text: Sangano reZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, ZNCC, rinoti mumazuva maviri ekuratidzira nyika yarasikirwa nemari inodarika mamiriyoni gumi emadhora. Mari iyi haisanganisiri mari yezvitoro zvakavharwa kana kupwanya mukuratidzira uku. Mukuru weZNCC, VaChris Mugaga, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka kune vemabhizimisi. VaMugaga vakurudzira hurumende kuti itaurirane nevashandi senzira yekuyedza kupedza kunetsana uku. Gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi, Doctor Sekai Nzenza, vanoti hurumende iri kuzopa vashandi vayo mari iri pakati pezvikamu nemakumi maviri nezvitatu kubva muzana kubva mwedzi uno kusvika muna Kurume nhaurirano dzemuhoro dzichienderera mberi. Vatiwo vari kuda kutanga kuita nhaurirano nevashandi kuburikidza nemisangano yeTripartite Negotiating Forum. Munyori mukuru muZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti hurumende yange yave nemakore akawanda ichiramba kuita nhaurirano nevashandi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, uye vari mukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vati zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka kumushandi muZimbabwe zvokonzera kuratidzira. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pari zvino vari kuRussia uye vachashanyira dzimwe nyika shanu vachiyedza kukwezva vekuze vanouchika mari munyika. Asi Doctor Kanyenze vati kuti zvishande, zvinonetsa kana munyika musina kugadzikana. Vashandi vakatanga kuratidzira musi weMuvhuro vachigunun’una nekukwira kwemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari nezvikamu zana nemakumi mashanu kubva muzana. Mitengo yezvinhu zvekudya yakabva yatangawo kuita chamurambamhuru ichikwira izvo vakawanda vanoti vava kuomerwa nehupenyu. No media source currently available

headline: Nyakupfura VaPatrick Kombayi Muna 1990, VaChivamba, Vanoshaya
text: Mutevedzeri wasachigaro weZanu-PF mudunhu reMidlands Province, VaKizito Chivamba, avo vange vari nhengo yeparamende inomirira Chiwundura, vakashaya kuchipatara cheGweru nemusi weChitatu. VaChivamba vakatanga kuva nhengo yeZanu muna 1972 uye vanoti vainge vari mujibha kubva muna 1977 kusvika muna 1979. Vange vari nhengo yeparamende kubva muna 2008. Mufi anonzi ange arwara kwenguva yakareba. Kunyange hazvo veZanu-PF mudunhu iri vari kuchema vachiti vaive gamba, vamwe vanopikisa vanoti nyaya yavo yekupfura muchakabvu Patrick Kombayi vachibatsirana naVaElias Kanengoni musori, avo vakaitwa gamba renyika munongedzo wekuti muZimbabwe hamuna hutongo hwejekerere. Muna 1990 munguva yesarudzo, VaChivamba naVaKanengoni vakapfura VaKombayi vainge vari kubato reZimbabwe Unity Movement. VaKombayi vaikwikwidzana nevaimbova mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika mushakabvu Simon Muzenda kuGweru. Dare repamusoro soro rakavatongera kugara mujeri kwemakore manomwe asi mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakabva vavaregerera vachishandisa masimba avo semutungamiri wenyika. Munguva yehondo yeChimurenga, VaKombayi vaibatsira zvikuru varwiri verusununguko vainge vari kuZambia. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaDewa Mavhinga, avo vanoshanda nesangano reHuman Rights Watch, vanoti tsika yehurumende yeZanu-PF yekuregerera vanotyora kodzero dzevanhu iri kudzosera hutongo hwejekerere kumashure. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Bhora radhakwa’: mitambo yeDynamos, caps haisisina mukurumbira
text: SHASHA yakambonetsa ichitamba nhabvu kuzvikwata zvinoti Arcadia United, CAPS UNITED nemaWarriors – Carlos Max – anoti mutambo weHarare Derby pakati peDynamos neCAPS UNITED hausisina mukurumbira sezvawaiita kare.   Svondo rino, nzira dzese dziri kunanga kunhandare yeRufaro Stadimu nemusi weSvondo uko Dynamos ichatamba neCAPS UNITED mumutambo uyu uyo waizivikanwa kare uchinakidza zvekukunda ngoma kurira.   Mutambo wekutanga wakatambwa muna Kubvumbi kuNational Sports Stadium pakati pezvikwata izvi, wakaona Kepe-kepe ichihwina 1-0 uye Denver Mukamba – uyo panguva iyi aitambira CAPS UNITED – ndiye akanwisa chibodzwa ichi.   “Munoona chii? Mutambo uyu mukuru uye kare ndiwo waitoburitsa shasha dzePSL dzegore iroro asi zvasiyana nemakore ano nekuti zvakawanda zvashanduka.   “Kuvatsigiri venhabvu unogona uchiri mutambo mukuru asi kuvatambi havachaukoshese nekuti tinozvionera nematambiro acho, haasiriwo ataiita kare,” anodaro.

headline: Dhora remuNyika Roramba Richishaya Simba paMusika weRBZ
text: Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe yazivisa kuti dhora remunyika riri kuramba richishaya simba pamusika wekutenga nekutengeserana mari wekunze kana kuti RBZ auction rate. RBZ yazivisa izvi padandemutande rayo reTwitter. Nhasi dhora rekuAmerica range richitengwa nemashora mazana makumi matanhatu nemakumi mashanu nemana nezviga zvisere nezvinoraudzira kana kuti 1 US dollar to ZWL654, 8651. Svondo rapera dhora rekuAmerica raitengwa nemadhora zana nemakumi matanhatu nemaumi mana nematanhatu nezvigag zviviri nezvinoraudzira kana kuti 1 US$1To ZWL 646, 2415. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano vati RBZ iri kuyedza kuda kuti huremu hwedhora kumusika wayo huenzane nehwepamusika wemukoto uri kutengesa dhora rekuyAmerica nemadhora mazana masere kusvika pamazana mana kana kuti ZWL800 to ZWL 900 asi vati izvi zvichanetsa.

headline: Mapurisa Oparadza Zvinotengeswa Mumigwagwa
text: Vanotengesera mumigwagwa vari kurasikirwa nezvinhu zvavo zvinokosha zviuru nezviuru zvemadhora izvo vari kutorerwa nemakanzuru mumaguta zvichetevera mashoko emutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, ekuti makanzuru anofanira kubvisa mumigwagwa vese vari kutengesa zviri kunze kwemutemo. Kunyange hazvo mamwe madhorobha asati atanga kubvisa vanotengesa mumigwagwa, mumaguta akaita seHarare neMasvingo, mapurisa ekanzuru pamwe neeZimbabwe Republic Police, ZRP, ari kufamba mumigwagwa achitora zvinhu zvevanhu vanonzi vari kutengesera panzvimbo dzisangabvumidzwe. KuMasvingo vaye vanenge vatorerwa zvinhu zvavo vanokwanisa kunozvitora kumahofisi ekanzuru kana ZRP kana vachinge vabhadhara faindi. MuHarare kanzuru inoti iri kuparadza mirivo, michero nezvimwe zvinhu zvinosvika matani maviri zuva rega rega. Mutauririri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme, vanoti zvinhu izvi, zvinogona kuora, hazvibvumidzwe kudzorerwa mumigwagwa. Asi vanoti vaye vanenge vatorewa zvinhu zvakaita sembatya kana mbozhanhare vanokwanisa kuenda kunotora zvinhu zvavo kumahofisi ekanzuru vabvisa mubhadharo. VaChideme vanoti nyaya yekuparadza chikafu, michero nemiriwo inoitirwa kudzivirira zvirwere zvakaita sekorera sezvo zvinhu izvi zvinenge zvatorwa munzvimbo dzisingabvumidzwe. VaChideme vati kana zvinhu zvikagarisa zvisina kutorwa, kanzuru inozvitengesa.
