Zvichakadai, VaChideme varamba mashoko ekuti mapurisa nevamwe vashandi vekanzuru vari kutora zvinhu zvinenge zvatorerwa vanoitengesera mumigwagwa vachiti izvi hazvibvumidzwe nemutemo. Imwe nhengo yeZimbabwe Home Industries Association, Amai Martha Shumba, vati manyepo kuti vese vari kutorerwa zvinhu vari kutengesera panzvimbo dzisingabvumidzwe. Vati semuenzaniso, kanzuru nemapurisa vari kutora zvinhu zvevanhu vari pane mimwe misika yakavhura kare kare. Zvichetevera mashoko aVaMugabe, gurukota rinoona nezvedunhu reHarare, Amai Mirriam Chikukwa, vakaita musangano nekanzuru yeHarare, mapurisa, masoja nemagadhijere vakatanga chirongwa chekubvisa vanotengesera mumigwagwa icho chinonzi chicharamba chiripo kusvika guta rachena. Izvi zviri kuitwawo mune mamwe maguta nemadhorobha asi mamwe madhorobha achiri kuronga kuti ofambisa chirongwa ichi sei. Vanhu vakawanda munyika havana mabasa izvo zvave kuita kuti vararame nekutengesa mumigwagwa. No media source currently available

headline: Chinhoyi University of Technology Inonzi Yave Kumanikidza Vadzidzisi, Vadzidzi neVashandi Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Chikoro chikuru cheChinhoyi University of Technology -CUT- chiri kurambidza vadzidzi nevashandi vanenge vasina kubayiwa nhomba yekudzivirira chirwere che COVID-19 kupinda pachikoro. Vadzidzi avo vanga vauya kuzopedza zvidzidzo zvavo pamwe nekunyora bvunzo nemusi weMuvhuro vakashamisika vachinzi vaburitse kadhi rinoratidza kuti vakabaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira chirwere che COVID-19 kuti vabvumirwe kupinda pachikoro. Mumwe mudzidzi asina kuda kudomwa nezita anoti arambidzwa kupinda pachikoro achinzi haana kubayiwa nhomba audza Studio 7 kuti anoti chanyanya kumurwadza ndechekuti havana kunge vayambirwa nezvedanho iri. Munyori anoona nezvemagariro evadzidzi musangano rinomirira vadzidzi pachikoro ichi VaFrancis Nhete vanoti danho ratorwa nechikoro rakanaka sezvo vachiwirirana naro sevatungamiri vevadzidzi. Mutauriri weCUT Dr Tapera Musekiwa vanoti vatora danho iri senzira yekudzivirira vamwe vadzidzi nevashandi. VaTapera vanoti vabva vaisa nhomba pakiriniki yechikoro kuti zvive nyore kune vanenge vasarudza kubayiwa.Zvikoro zvakawanda zvepamusoro zvakatozivisa kuti vadzidzi vanenge vasina kubayiwa nhomba yekudzivirira chirwere che COVID-19 havabvumirwe kudzidza kana kunyora bvunzo nevamwe. Asi danho iri riri kupikisawa nesangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions rinoti kuita izvi kutyora kodzero dzevanhu dziri mubumbiro remitemo. Gore rapera muna Mbudzi, chikoro cheCUT chakambovharwa mushure mekunge vadzidzi makumi mashanu nevanomwe vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yotadza Kupa Zvikwanisiro Zvayakavimbisa Vashandi
text: Sangano rinomirira vashandi mubazi rezvekurima, reZimbabwe Agricultural Professionals And Technical Association (ZAPTA), rinoti hurumende haisi kuzadzikisa zvizhinji zvayakavimbisa vashandi mumisangano yavakaita navo. Munyori weZAPTA, VaZivaishe Zhou, vaudza Studio 7 kuti sangano ravo rave nenguva richiudza hurumende kuti vashandi havana zvikwanisiro zvekuita mamwe mabasa anodiwa nehurumende musi wa 21 Zvita 2020 usati wapfuura, asi vachiti hurumende haisati yavapa zvikwanisiro izvi, zvinosanganisa michina inoratidza nzimbo dzepakashandwa muchirongwa che Pfumvudza, kana kuti GPS Coordinates. VaZhou vanoti nyaya iyi yakataurwa nezvayo mumusangano wavakaita masvondo maviri apfuura, hurumende ikavimbisa kuti ichagadzirisa nyaya iyi. Vanoti kusvika parizvino, hapana chati chaitwa. VaZhou vanoti vanotya kuti vashandi vanozopomerwa mhosva yekuti vatadza kuita basa munguva yakatarwa ivo vasina zvikwanisiro zvacho. Takabata mukuru anoona nezvevashandi mubazi iri, VaGibson Chijarira, vakati titaure nemukuru we Agritex, VaStancilae Tapererwa, avo vatatadza kubata. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Voudzwa Kuti Vazadzise Mashoko Avo Anoshora Huori
text: Masangano anoshanda akazvimirira anoti hurumende haina chido chekurwisa nekupedza huwori munyika zvisineyi hazvo kuti mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanobuda vachishoropodza huori uhwu. Vachitaura mushure memashoko aVaMnangagwa pazuva rekucherechedza zuva reAfrica Anti Corruption Day pamwe nemashoko avakataura ekushora huori pamusangano wePolitical Actors Dialogue nezuro, mutauriri weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaMarvelous Khumalo, vanoti aka hakasi kekutanga VaMnangagwa vachitaura mashoko akadai, asi pasina zviri kuitwa. VaKhumalo vanoti semaonero avo, hurumende iripo ine huwori hwakanyanya kudarika hurumende yaiva yaVaRobert Mugabe. Mutungamiriri wesangano rinomirira vashandi munyika reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti pavakatora matomu, VaMnangagwa vakataura kuti vachaparadza huwori, izvo zvavari kutadza kuita sezvo huwori hwacho huri kutoenderera mberi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi, uye vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Manyanya, vanoti vanoona sekuti zvinonetsa kuti hurumende irwise huwori nekuti vazhinji vanoita huwori vari pedyo nemutungamiri wenyika nevamwe vakuru vakuru muhurumende. Imwewo nyanzvi munya dzehupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera, vanoti VaMnangagwa vakavimbisa kurwisa huwori pavakapinda panyanga muna 2017 vakatodzinga nhengo dzebhodhi reZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission dzaivepo asi kusvika pari zvino hapana chiri kunatsoitwa kupedza hurowi munyika. Vanoongorora nyaya dzematongerwo enyika vakarerekera kubato riri kutonga reZanu PF, VaPeter Matange, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mashoko aVaMnangagwa anoratidza kuti havasi kufara nemabatirwo ari kuitwa nyaya dzehuwori munyika. Vaenderera mberi vachiti mutungamiriri wenyika haakwanisi kupindira munyaya dzinenge dzave kumatare edzimhosva vachiti nyaya dzehuwori dzinoda nyanzvi mukudziongorora uye zvinotora nguva kuita izvi. Asi VaMnangagwa vanoti hurumende yavo iri kuedza napose painogona napo kurwisa huwori. Mushandi mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vanoti hurumende yaVaMnangagwa iri kurwisa huori ndosaka vamwe vakuru vakuru muhurumende vaine nyaya dzehuori dziri kumatare. Kubvira pavakapinda muhofisi, pane makurukota ehurumende anoti Amai Priscah Mupfumira, VaObadiah Moyo nevamwe vaive makurukota ehurumende, vakaita saVaIgnatius Chombo, naVaSamuel Undenge vakasungirwa nyaya dzehuwori. Sachigaro weZimbabwe Anti-Corrutpion Commission, Justice Loice Matanda-Moyo, vanoti matare anofanira kusimbiswa kuti ape mitongo inodzivirira kuparwa kwemhosva dzehuwori munyika. Sangano reTransparence International rinoti Zimbabwe inorasikirwa nemari inodarika bhiriyoni remadhora ekuAmerica nekuda kwehuori gore rega rega. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yokandwa Pakati peNyika Dziri Kutyora Kodzero dzeVanhu Munguva yeCovid-19
text: Rimwe sangano rekuEurope raisa Zimbabwe pakati penyika dzisiri kukoshesa hutongi hwejekerere munguva yeCovid 19 izvo zviri kutsinhirwawo nevanorwira kodzero dzevanhu munyika. Sangano rekuSweden reInternational Institute for Democracy and Electoral Assistance, kana kuti International IDEA, rinoti Zimbabwe ndeimwe yenyika dzisiri kukoshesa hutongi hwejekerere munguva ino yedenda redzihwamupengo reCovid 19. Dzimwe nyika dzaiswa muchikwata ichi nesangano iri dzinosanganisira Algeria, Bangladesh, Cambodia, China, Cuba, Egypt pamwe neSaudi Arabia, Sachigaro wesangano reMedia Institute of Southern Africa muZimbabwe pamwe nekuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaGolden Maunganidze, vati kusungwa kwakaitwa vatori venhau vakawanda munyika vachinzi vatyora mitemo inobata nyaya dzekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere chedzihwamupengo kana kuti Covid 19 Containment Regulations kunoratidza chokwadi chekuti hutongi hwejekerere hausi kukosheswa munyika. Vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vakaita saVaPride Mkono vanoti kusaitwa kwesarudzo dzechipiri dzekutsiva makanzura nenhengo dzeparamende dzakabviswa pazvigaro zvavo kana avo vakafa kwakaitawo kuti zvido zveveruzhinji zvisazadzikiswe ukuwo hurumende ichiti kuita sarudzo idzi kwaizowedzera mukana wekuti vanhu vatapurirane chirwere cheCovid 19 icho chiri kuuraya vanhu vakawanda pasi rose kusanganisira muZimbabwe. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaOstallos Siziba, vaudza Studio 7 vari kuMatabeleland South uku kwavari kufamba naVaNelson Chamisa vachionana sevatsigiri vavo kuti vanowirirana negwaro iri sezvo VaChamisa vanga vasiri kubvumidzwa kuita misangano nevatsigiri vavo munguva yeCovid 19 asi mutungamiri wenyika uye vari mutungamiri weZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachingoita madiro aJojina kuita misangano nenhengo dzebato ravo. VaSizba vatiwo mhirizhonga ine chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika iri kuitika munyika pari kuitwa misangano naVaChamisa pamwe nekusungwa kwakaitwa nhengo dzebato ravo nguva yapfuura kunoratidza kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyika. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, kuti tinzwe pamire hurumende pamusoro pegwaro re International IDEA iri sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Munyori mubazi ravo, VaNick Mangwana, vanga vasati vapindurawo mibvunzo yatavatumira pataenda pamhepo. Asi VaMangwana vakamboudza Studio 7 munguva pfupi yadarika panyaya yekusungwa kwenhengo dzebato rinopikisa kuti mutemo hautarise kuti munhu abuda mumba maani vachiti anenge afungidzirwa kuti apara mhosva anonomira nenyaya dzake mumatare ochenurwanematare aya kana kubatwa nemhosva. Pavakapinda panyanga vachitora mhiko muna Mbudzi 2017, VaMnangagwa vakati hurumende yavo ichaita zvose zvainokwanisa zvinosanganisira kukoshesa kodzero dzevanhu kuitira kuti munyika muve nehutongi hwejekere. No media source currently available

headline: Paramende Youdzwa Kuti Hurumende Haisi Kukoshesa Mishonga yeChivanhu
text: Hurumende yeZimbabwe inonzi haisi kukoshesa varapi vechivanhu pamwe nemishonga yavo sezvo isiri kupa rutsigiro rwakasimba kubazi kuvarapi kunyange hazvo paine humbowo hunoratidza kuti zvikamu masere kubva muzana zvevanhu vemuZimbabwe zvinoenda kun’anga kana kushandisa mushonga yechivanhu pane dzimwe nguva. Ongororo yakaitwa nesangano reWorld Health Organisation yakaratidzawo kuti zvikamu makumi masere kubva muzana zvevanhu vane hutachiwana hweHIV/AIDS pamwe nezvikamu makumi mashanu nezviviri zvemadzimai akazvitakura vanoshandisawo mishonga yechivanhu. Vachipa humbowo nemaererano nemabasa ari kuitwa nehurumende kusimudzira mabasa evarapi vemuno pamwe nemishonga yavo, munyori mukuru mubazi rezvehutano, Doctor Gerald Gwinji, vaudza komiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano kuti kunyange hazvo vanhu vakawanda vachishandisa mishonga iyi, hurumende hasi kuvapa mari yavanoda kusimudzira kushandiswa kwemishona iyi. Doctor Gwinji vati bazi ravo rine chikamu chinoona nezvemishonga iyi asi chikamu ichi hachiwani mari yachinoda. Semuenzaniso, Doctor Gwinji vati gore rega rega, chikamu ichi chinoda zviuru mazana matanhatu zvemadhora nechidumbu asi chinowanzo pihwa churu chemadhora chete izvo zvinoita kuti chitadze kuita basa racho. Vanoti kunze kwekushaya mari vane zvakawanda zvavari kuita zvekuona kuti mabasa evarapi vemuno pamwe nemishonga yavo yasimudzirwa. Vati mutemo we Traditional Medical Practitioners Act 11, Regulations on Complementary and the Traditional Medicine policy ndezvimwe zvavakaitwa kusimudzira mabasa evarapi vemuno. Doctor Gwinji vati kunyange hazvo paine varapi vanodarika churu vakanyoreswa neTraditional Medical Practitioners Council, vanoziva kuti munyika mune n’anga nevarapi vakawanda kudarika apa uye mishonga yechivanhu iri kutengeswa pese pese kunyange munzvimbo dzisina kunyoreswa. Vati zvingave zvakanaka chose kana varapi vese vakadzidziswa kubata mishonga yavo zvakanaka zvinoita kuti vanhu vasakanganiswa nemishonga iyi sezvinoitika pane dzimwe nguva. Vati Zimbabwe inogona kudzidza zvakawanda kubva kune dzimwe nyika zvikuru sei kunyika dzakaita seIndia neChina idzo dzave kushandisa mishonga yechivanhu zvakanyanya. Munyori anoona nezvedzidzo musangano reZimbabwe National Traditional Healers Association, VaPrince Mutandi Sibanda, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo vaine ruzivo rwekusimudzira mushonga yechivanhu, havasi kuwana rutsigirwo rwemari kuti vaite izvi. VaSibanda vati ZINATHA ine nhengo dzakawanda chose zvekuti hazvivanetsi kugadzira mishonga yechivanhu nekubatsira vanhu vese munyika. Muzvare Juliet Chirenje avo vari kudzidzira zvekurapa nemishonga yechivanhu pachikoro cheZINATHA vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende inofanira kuisa mari parutivi yekutsigira vanoshandisa mishonga yechivanhu. Doctor Gwinji vati pari zvino pave nemasangano gumi nematatu anomiriria varapi vemuno akanyoreswa zviri pamutemo uyewo kune makirinika emishonga yemuno gumi nemana. Asi vati mishonga iyi yave kutengeswa pese pese, mumigwagwa nedzimwe nzvimbo zvekuti bazi ravo rinoda kuti itengeswe zviri pamutemo pachitevedzwa hurongwa hweMedicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe pamwe ne Medical Research Council of Zimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: ZESN Inoti Mauto Haafaniri Kushandiswa Munyaya dzeSarudzo
text: Mashoko anonzi akataurwa negurukota rinomirira dunhu reMasvingo, VaJosiah Hungwe, pamwe chete nechipangamazano chemutungamiri wenyika, VaChris Mutsvangwa, ekuti bato riri kutonga reZanu-PF richashandisa mauto mukutsvaga rutsigiro musarudzo dzegore rinouya, ari kushorwa zvikuru neveruzhinji. Mumwe wevari kushoropodza mashoko aya ndisachigaro weZimbabwe Election Support Network, ZESN, VaAndrew Makoni. VaMakoni vanoti zvekushandisa mauto mukutsvaga rutsigiro hazvisi pamutemo, uye pane mimwe mitemo ine chekuita nesarudzo inofanirwa kuvandudzwa kana nyika ichida kuita sarudzo dzakachena uye dzisina mutauro gore rinouya. “Kuti sarudzo yegore rinouya iitwe zvakanaka, tinofanira kuve ne voters’ roll itsva, munoziva kuti pane chirongwa cheBVR chirikuitwa nguva ino, chinonzi chingangopamidzirwa mazuva, saka tinofanira kuva tine voters’ roll itsva uyezve tinofanira kuvatagadzirisa mitemo inechokuita nesarudzo uye nemitemo inongombundikidza kodzero dzevanhu,” VaMakoni vanodaro. Vanoti kana vanoita zvematongerwo enyika vaine chido chekugadzirisa zvinhu, nguva yacho ichiripo yekuzvigadzirisa. Panyaya yasachigaro weZimbabwe Election Commission, ZEC, VaMakoni vanoti havasati vanzwa kuti sachigaro uyu achadomwa riini asi vanokuridzira hurumende kuti ikurumidze kuwana sachigaro weZEC vachiti pane basa rakawanda rinofanira kuitwa sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. No media source currently available

headline: Caps United Inosimudza Mukombe weCastle Premier Soccer League
text: Chikwata cheCaps United ndicho chasimudza mukombe weCastle Premier Soccer League mushure mekurova chikwata cheChapungu 1-0 kuAscot Stadium kuGweru. Chikwata cheFC Platinum icho change chichifema chiri mugotsi meCaps United hachina kuwana mukombe kunyangwe hacho charova Tsolotsho 3-0. Aka ndekechishanu munhoroondo yemakwikwi aya Caps United ichisimudza mukombe wePSL. Caps yakambozviita muuna 1979, 1996, 2004, 2005. Makororokoto kuCaps United kubva kuStudio 7

headline: Vamwe Voenzanisa Kubvutwa kweMasimba neMauto kuMali neZvakaitika muZimbabwe 2017
text: Vanhu vakawanda muAfrica nepasi rose vari kutevera nemaziso matsvuku zviri kuitika munyika yeMali, uko mauto akabvisa mutungamiri wenyika iyi, VaIbrahim Boubacar Keita, pachigaro nemusi weChipiri uye kumusunga pamwechete nemutungamiri wehurumende yake VaBoubou Cisse nemamwe makurukota ehurumende. Izvi zvinonzi zvakatanga mushure mekunge chikwata chemauto chakatora nechisimba akamba yemauto ye Kati iri makiromita gumi nemashanu kubva muguta guru renyika iyi re Bamako. Mauto aya akazofora achipinda muguta guru umo akasvikosunga mutungamiri wenyika nevamwe vake pamwe nekuumanikidza kuti asiye basa. VaKeita vakabuda panhepfenyuro yenyika iyi vachizivisa kuti vakanga vosiya basa senzira yekudzivirira kudeuka kweropa. Masangano akawanda kusanganisira sangano rinoona nezvekugadzikana munyika dzepasi rose reUnited Nations Security Council, European Union, sangano reAfrican Union, pamwe nere Economic Community of West African States (Ecowas) iro Mali iri nhengo akatozivisa nezvekusatambira kwawo kubvutwa kwemasimba uku nemauto. Sangano reAfrican Union neChitatu rakamisa Mali kuve nhengo yesangano iri nekuda kwechiitiko ichi. Gurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muAmerica, VaMike Pompeo vakazivisawo kuti nyika yavo iri kubatana nemasangano eAfrican Union neECOWAS mukushoropodza zvakaitika neChipiri muMali. Sachigaro veAfrican Union vari mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, vakakurudzirawo kudzoserwa kwehutongo hweveruzhinji nekukasika. Mutungamiri weFrance, VaEmmanuel Macron vakakurudzirawo kudzoswa kwehutongo hwejekerere munyika iyi. Pave nemaonero akasiyanasiyana pakubvutwa kwemasimba mu Mali nemauto nekubvutwawo kwemasimba nemauto muZimbabwe, vamwe vachiti masangano ari kubuda paachena achishoropodza zviri kuitika kuMali aifanirwa kuita zvimwechete muZimbabwe muna 2017, apo mauto akabvisa vaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe pachigaro pamwe nekuvamanikidza kusiya chiogaro. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika vachitungamira bato reDemocratic Party, Doctor Urayayi Zembe, vanoti pane kufanana kezvakaitika kuMali nezvakaitika muZimbabwe muna 2017, zvikuru panyaya yehuwori nekubirwa kwesarudzo. Vanoti zviviri izvi zvakafanana uye ndizvo zvakasimudza kuti munyika mbiri idzi mauto atungamire mukubviswa kwehutungamiri. Asi Doctor Zembe vanoti musiyano uripo chete ndewekuti muZimbabwe veruzhinji vakapinda mumigwagwa mushure mekuridzirwa huwi nemauto pamwe nevesangano revakarwa hondo yerusununguko kuti vanhu vauye vatsigireVaMugabe vabve pachigaro. Izvi zvinotsinhirwa nevanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, Doctor Simba Mavaza, avo vanoti vanhu vari kuenzanisa Zimbabwe neMali havasi kunzwisisa zvakaitika. Vanoti nyaya yekuMali inyaya yemauto akabvisa mutungamiri pachigaro isina vanhu mukati uye paramende yeMali haina kugara kuti itorere matanho mutungamiri wenyika, VaKeita kuti vadzingwe kana kuti varegedze basa sezvakaitika muZimbabwe. Doctor Mavaza vanoti VaMugabe vakabviswa pachigaro nebato ravo, iro rakazoshevedza vaive mutewedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, kuti vadzoke munyika mushure mekunge vatizira kuSouth Africa. Vanotiwo VaMugabe havana kumbobvira vasungwa nemauto sezvakaitika kuMali uko VaKeita vakaiswa muhusungwa nemauto. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi veNRZ Vochemachema neKusabhadharwa Mari dzavo
text: Vashandi vekambani yeNational Railways of Zimbabwe, NRZ, vanoti vanga vachitarisira kuti hurumende ichabatsirawo kambani yavo mukuona kuti vashandi vayo vawaniswa mihoro yavo, iyo yave nemwedzi inodarika gumi nemishanu vasati vatambiriswa. Mutungamiri werimwe sangano rinomirira vashandi veNRZ, reZimbabwe Amalgamated Railways Workers Union, VaKamurai Moyo vanoti vashandi veNRZ vari kushupika zvakanyanya zvekuti hurumende iri kuzviona asi hapana matanho airi kutora ekugadzirisa dambudziko ravo. "Tanga tichitarisirawo sevashandi kuti hurumende inofanirwa kubatsira railways kuti vabhadharewo chimwe chikwereti chedu, nekuti iye zvino vanhu vari kufa, vanhu vari kurwara, vamwe vari kusiya mabasa nezira dzakasiyanasiyana, vachingosiya zvikwereti kurailways," VaMoyo vanodaro. Sachigaro vebhodhi reNRZ, VaLarry Mavhima, mwedzi wapera vakatenda kuti kambani yavo iri kukundikana kubhadhara vashandi vayo mari dzemihoro idzo dzave kudarika mamiriyoni makumi mapfumbamwe emadhora, nekuda kwekuti haisi kushanda zvakakwana. VaMavhima vakazivisawo kuti dare remakurukota rakavapa mvumo yekuti vatsvage vanoda kubatana navo mumatanho avo ekumutsiridza kambani iyi. Asi VaMoyo vanoti hurongwa hwekuti kambani yeNRZ ibatane nevamwe vane mari hahuna kuipa, kana chete vashandi vasingazorasikirwa nemabasa. No media source currently available Gurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu, Doctor Joram Gumbo vanoti ichokwadi kuti NRZ ine chikwereti chevashandi chemari yakawanda, asi kambani iyi haisi kuita mari. "Mari inotambirwa navashandi inobva pabasa ravanoita. Kana pasina basa ravanoita hapana mari inouya, nokuti inobva kuna ani? havana basa," Doctor Gumbo vanodaro. Vanoti hurumende iri mushishi kutsvaga vanoda kubata neNRZ, asi vanowedzera vachiti pari zvino kambani iyi inotove nevashandi vakawandisa iyo isisina basa. Doctor Gumbo vanoti makambani aisimbopa NRZ basa akaita seemarasha, eshuga neesimende haacha basa raanoipa. No media source currently available

headline: Vekumaruaa Vazhinji Vorarama neZvikwereti Sezzvo Hupfumi hweNyika Hwaenda kuMawere
text: Sangano re Zimbabwe Vulnerability Assessment Committee (ZIMVAC) muongororo yaro yakanzi 2016 Rural Livelihoods Assessment Surveys rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vari mumaruwa huri kutambura nezvikwereti nekuda kwekusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu hwakwira zvakanyanya kusvika pazvikamu makumi masere kubva muzana. Izvi zvinonzi zviri kukonzerwa nekushaya chikafu. Ongororo iyi inoti vazhinji vari mumaruva vari kutengesa midziyo nezvipfuyo zvavo senzira yekutsvaga raramo. Nzvimbo dziri kunyanya kutarisana nedambudziko iri dzinosanganisira Matabeleland South ne North, Masvingo, ne Manicaland. Zvikwereti zvakawanda zvinonzi zvange zviri zvekubhadhara mari dzezvikoro nechikafu. Gurukota rinooona nezvemagariro evanhu Amai Prisca Mupfumira vakaudza bepanhau re Herald kuti vari kushanda nematunhu akasiyana siyana kuti vawedzere huwandu hwevari kuwana chikafu kubva kuhurumende. Vamwe Amai vekwaChivi Gogo Matizorofa vanoti ichokwadi kuti vakawanda mumaruwa vari kurarama nezvikwereti. "Ichokwadi zvinhu zvaooma kuno kwaChivi tinotokwereta zvekudya kuzvitoro mwedzi woga woga zvinosvika pa$40 tozopota tichidzosera asi zviri kuramba zvichiwedzera kuoma," Gogo Matizorofa vaudza Studio 7. Gogo Matizorofa vanoti vane vazukuru gumi nepiri nevana vavo vari pamusha sezvo varikushaya mabasa sezvo hupfumi hwenyika hwuri kuramba uchienda kumawere zvinoreva kuti ivo ndivo vanofanirwa kupa mhuri yese zvekudya. Vaenderera mberi vachiti kusanaya kwemvura mudunhu iri nekutsva kwakaita zvirimwa ndiko kuri kuwedzera dambudziko rekukwereta mumaruwa. No media source currently available

headline: Kanzuru yeMasvingo Pamwe neHurumende Zvoendeswa kuMatare
text:
Vagari vemudhorobha reMasvingo vaendesa kanzuru yavo, bazi rinoona nezvezvicherwa pamwe nemakambani anochera goridhe mashanu mugomo reTarget Kopje, vachikumbira dare kuti rimisemabasa ekucherwa kwegoridhe sezvo ari kukanganisa dzimba dzavo pamwe nematangi emvura. Sangano reMasvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance (MURRA), rasvitsa chikumbiro chechimbi chimbi mudare repamusoro richimirirwa naVaPhilip Shumba. VaShumba vaudza Studio7 kuti kunze kwekukanganisa dzimba nekugara zvakanaka kwevagari, vacheri ava vari kuchera pasi pematangi emvura nekudaro anogona kuwondomoka kukaita mashamu emvura vanhu vakarasikirwa nehupenyu mumusha uri pedyo. VaShumba vati pamusoro pezvo makambani mashanu anoti Lions Mining
Syndicate, Lions 2, Brossro, Edwards pamwe neGreat Zimbabwe Mining
Syndicates ari kushandisa mishonga yakaipa inogona kuuraya vanhu ikapinda mumatangi emvura. VaShumba vati vaendesa kanzuru kumatare nekuti ndiyo yakapa mvumo makambani aya. Vatiwo hurumende yaendeswa kumatare nekuti ndiyo yakapa marezenisi ekuti makambani aya aite basa rawo mumusha wevagari ve Target Kopje
pamwe neHillside. Meya weguta reMasvingo, VaCollen Maboke, vati havasati vagamuchira
mapepa abva kudare, asi vati chero paachasvika mumaoko avo havasi
kuzopikisa kudare nekuti vakazoona kuti zviri kuitwa nekambani aya
zvinokanganisa vagari nematangi avo emvura. Vakafana kubata chigaro chemukuru webazi rezvicherwa muMasvingo,
VaMarshal Muzira, avo vatambira mapepa ekudare, varamba kutaura
neStduio 7 vachiti tibate munyori mubazi ravo kuHarare sezvo
vasingabvumidzwi kutaura nevatori venhau. Munyori mubazi rezvezvicherwa, VaOnesimo Moyo, vange vasingadairi nharembozha yavo kana kupindura mibvunza yatavatumira. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muMURRA, Muzvare Rumbidzai Magurupira, vati vanotarisira kuti dare richapa mutongo unomisa mabasa ekuchera goridhe munzvimbo dzinogara vanhu.

Nyaya iyi inotasisirwa kunzwikwa mudare kana vamhangarirwa vakapikisa
zviri kudiwa nevagari mukati memazuva gumi. No media source currently available

headline: Vanotengesa Mumigwagwa Vopika Kusabva Munzvimbo Dzavanotengesera
text: Rimwe remasangano anomiririra vanotengesa zvinhu mumigwagwa, reNational Vendors Union, rinoti rinogona kumisa kutengesa zvinhu mumigwagwa kana hurumende ikatambira zvirongwa zvarakaendesa kwairi. Sangano iri rinoda kuti riwaniswewo mabasa ekuita pose panoitwa zvibvumirano nehurumende nemakambani anenge apihwa ma “tender”, sezvo richiti rine vanhu vane hunyanzvi hwakasiyana siyana, asi vasina mabasa avanoita. Mutungamiri wesangano iri, VaSten Zvorwadza, vanoti vakamirira kunzwa kubva kuhurumende vachiti hazvina musoro kuti hurumende inopa kambani imwe chete basa remamirioni makumi mapfumbamwe emadhora asi isingape rimwe remabasa kune avo vanotengesera mumigwagwa. “Chandinopokana nacho ndechokuti vanotengesera mumigwagwa vongonzi ibvai mumigwagwa pasina kutsvakwa imwe nzira yekuti vararame nayo,” VaZvorwadza vakaudza Studio7. Vatiwo sangano ravo rinoda kuti hurumende ipe vanotengesera mumigwagwa chikamu chema ’tender’ anenge apiwa makambani munyika. No media source currently available Asi mukuru werimwe sangano reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation, kana kuti Viset, VaSamuel Wadzayi, vanoti nhengo dzesangano ravo hadzisi kuzobva munzvimbo dzavanotengesera kusvika hurumende yavapa nzvimbo yakanaka yekutengesera. VaWadzayi varatidza kunyunyuta zvikuru nekurohwa kwaitwa vamwe vavo nemapurisa eZRP achishanda nemapurisa ekanzuru. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzonetsa neNyaya yeMishonga yeChivanhu
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti vanhu vanofanirwa kungwarira kusashandisa mishonga inenge isina kubva kuna vana chiremba vakadzidzira kuita basa rekupa vanhu mishonga inorapa zvirwere zvakasiyana siyana. Kurudziro iyi inouya mushure mekunge vanhu vakawanda vava kushandisa mishonga yechivanhu sezvo vari kutadza kuwana mishonga zvichitevera mari yekunze yavasina, iyo iri kudiwa nezvitoro zvinotengesa mishonga. Mumwe chiremba anoshanda nekiriniki yePublic Medical Services International, Dr Sydney Mukonoweshuro, vari kukurudzira zvikuru vanorwara neHigh Blood Pressure pamwe nechirwere cheshuga kuti vasashandisa mishonga yechivanhu isina kuongororwa, sezvo mishonga iyi ichikwanisa kuwedzera kuvhiringa hupenyu hwemurwere. Kunyange hazvo munyika musina mari yekunze, Dr Mukonoweshuro vanoti hazvina kunaka zviri kuitwa nezvitoro zvemishonga zvinoomesera vakwegura nekuvabhadharisa madhora ekuAmerica. Dr Mukonoweshuro vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kuumba homwe yemari inotenga mishonga yeshuga nokuti murwere haafanirwe kupedza mazuva maviri asina kupihwa mushonga we insulin. Asi maonero aDoctor Mukunoweshuro anopesana zvikuru nemaonero aSister Yulittah Chirawu, avo vanoshanda neNature Is The Pharmarcy, iyo iri pasi pechita cheLittle Children of Our Blessed Lady. Sister Chirawu vanoti mishonga yema herbs iri kubatsira zvikuru varwere veshuga nezvimwe zvirere zvakasiyana siyana. Sister Chirawu, avo vakadzidzira kushandiswa kwema herbs kuBritain, vanoti donzvo rekereke yavo yeRoman Catholic, nderekubatsira vanhu vanoshaya, zvikuru madzimai kuitira kuti varapwe zvirwere zvakasiyana siyana vachibhadhara mari shoma. Mumwe chiremba asina kuda kudomwa nezita rake anoti zvakakosha kuti munhu ane chirwere cheshuga apote achinwa mishonga nguva dzose, kuitira kuti asawedzere kuvhiringa hutano hwake. Dr Mukonoweshuro vanoti sezvo munyika muine dambudziko remari yekunze, zvakakosha panguva ino kuti hama dziri kunze kwenyika dzibatsire hama dziri kumusha nekudzitengera mishonga inogona kushandiswa kwemwedzi mitatu, kana kudzitumira mari yekunze. Masangano anoshanda munyaya dzehutano muZimbabwe ari kukurudzirawo kuti zvirwere zveshuga ne BP, zvirapwewo pachena sezvinoitwa zvimwe zvirwere. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rebazi rezvehutano pakurudziro iri kuitwa iyi. Asi vachitaura nguva pfupi yapfuura pamberi pekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano, munyori mubazi rezvehutano, Doctor Gerald Gwinji, vakati bazi ravo rakanzi richapihwa chidimbu chemari yarakanga rakumbira yebhiriyoni imwechete nemazana matatu emamiriyoni emadhora mubhajeti regore rinouya. VaGwinji vakati izvi zvichatadzisa bazi ravo kuita basa raro nemazvo, uye kutadza kuwanisa mishonga kuvanhu vanoshaya. Ongororo yakaitwa nebazi rezvehutano inoratidza kuti munhu mumwe chete kubva pavanhu gumi, ane chirwere cheshuga muZimbabwe. Izvi zvinoreva kuti zvikamu gumi kubva muzana zvevanhu vemuZimbabwe, vane chirwere cheshuga. No media source currently available

headline: Chikwata Chinotsigira VaMnangagwa Chodududza paHondo yeMusangano wePolitburo
text: Munyori mukuru wesangano revakarwa hondo reZimbabwe Liberation War Veterans Association VaVictor Matemadanda vanoti sangano ravo radududza pachisungo charo chekuti riri kuda kumisa gurukota rezvedzidzo yepamusoro muzvinafundo Jonathan Moyo uye gurukota rezvematunhu VaSaviour Kasukuwere kuti vasapinde mumusangano wePoltiburo. Vaviri ava vari kupomerwa mhosva yekukonzera nyonga nyonga mubato iri iro roita kunge bhasikiri raTizira rekuti uku riri kurukwa uku riri kurudunurwa. Paita hondo pakati pechikwata chinonzi chiri kutsigira mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nechimwe chinonzi chiri kutsigira amai Grace Mugabe chinozisikanwa nekuti Generation 40. Zviri kubuda mukuwrisana uku zviri kubuditsa pachena kuti vakarwa hondo vakawanda vari kutsigira VaMnangagwa madzimai achitsigira chikwata cheGeneration 40. Zvichakadaro, pari kutyirwa kuti kunogona kuita bata murefu bata mupfupi pamuzinda weZanu-PF muHarare pari kuitirwa musangano wePolitburo uyu sezvo nhengo dzeZanu-PF dziri keunderera mberi dzichikandirana makobvu nematete. Vamwe Vakuru vemapurisa vanoti vatogara vakagadzirira kuti panogona kuita mvonga mupopoto. Mukuru wemadzimai mudunhu reMashonaland West Amai Angeline Muchemeyi avo vanonzi nevamwe vanotsigira chikwata cheGeneration 40 vaudza madzimai ose emusangano wavo kuti vaende nehuwandu hwavo kumuzinda webato iri muHarare. Bazi remadzimai raronga mabhazi gumi nemana kuti atakure vanhu . Mutsamba yavanyora Amai Muchemeyi vakurudzira madzimai kuti vaende kunotambira mukuru wavo vari zvakare mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika amai Mugabe apo vanenge vachiuya kuzopinda mumusangano wePolitburo. Sachigaro weZanu PF mudunhu reMashonaland West VaEphraim Chengeta vanyorawo gwaro kunhengo dzose dzeProvincial Coordinating Committee (PCC) kuti dziendewo kuHarare kumusangano uyu. VaChengeta havana kutaura kuti donzvo rekusangana nemutungamiri wenyika ndereyi. Asi vati kungosangana nemutungamiri webato sezvavanogaroita. VaMatemadanda vati VaMoo naVaKasukuwere vanoda kushandisa madzimai kuti arwisane nevakarwa hondo asi vati havasi kuzoita izvi. No media source currently available Asi izvi hazvina kufadza vamwe mumusangano weZanu-PF avo vanofungidzirwa kuti vanotsigira chikwata chinotungamirirwa nemutevedzeri wenyika VaMnangagwa. Vaimbove sachigaro wevechidiki mudunhu reMashonaland Central, VaGodfrey Tsenengamu vanoti vanotsigira VaMnangagwa, vanyorawo gwaro vachikoka vechidiki vose mubato pamwe nevana vevaimbove varwi verusununguko kuti vaende kumuzinda webato kuHarare kunotambira mukuru wenyika vasati vapinda mumusangano wePolitburo. Mutsamba mavo VaTsenengamu vati “Ibasa redu kuchengetedza musangano uyu wemisodzi, dikita neropa, hatingapete maoko musangano uchiparadzwa nembavha, ngochani nevatengesi vanodya nemuvengi’. VaTsenengamu vazoti kunyange vari kuenda kumuzinda webato reZanu-PF vakazvimirira, vanoshora misangano yakadai inoratidza kunetsana mubato asi vanhu munyika vachinonga svosve nemuromo. Vanoziva zviri kuitika mubato iri vanoti nhengo dzePolitburo dzichabudirana pachena sezvo paine nyaya dzekurangana nekudzingana mumusangano dziri kubuda. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa Anoparura Chirongwa Chinorwisa Mhirizhonga Yakanangana neVanhukadzi Musarudzo
text: Mapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police akaparura chirongwa chakanangana nekudzivirira mhirizhonga kumadzimai nevanasikana, zvikuru munguva dzesarudzo. Mapurisa akaparura chirongwa ichi neChitatu achitsigirwa nemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, zvikuru dzemadzimai, muzinda weCanada muZimbabwe, pamwe neNational Prosecuting Authority of Zimbabwe. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu, mukuru wemapurisa, Commissioner-General Godwin Matanga, vakati mapurisa haasi kuzopeta maoko panyaya dzekushungurudzwa kwemadzimai munguva dzesarudzo. Vakakurudzirawo madzimai kuti vamhang’are nyaya dzemhirizhonga kana kumbunyikidzwa vasingatyi. Mukuru anoona nezvezvirongwa musangano reWomen’s Coalition of Zimbabwe, Amai Sally Ncube, vakatiwo vafadzwa zvikuru nechido chiri kuratidzwa nemapurisa rwendo rwuno mukudzivirira mhirizhonga kumadzimai munguva dzesarudzo. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Mazana Mana neMakumi Matanhatu neVaviri (462) Vakafa neCovid-19 Mumazuva Manomwe Chete
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu makumi mashanu nevapfumbamwe vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nemusi weMugovera zvasiya huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera hwave zviuru zviviri nezana nemakumi masere nemashanu kana kuti 2,185. Mumazuva manomwe adarika chete, vanhu mazana mana nemakumi matanhatu nevaviri kana kuti 462 vakafa zvichienzaniswa nemazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nevanomwekana kuti 267 vakafa munguva imwe chete svondo rapera. Vanhu chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mana nemakumi mana nevashanu kana kuti 1, 445 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi neMugovera. Izvi zvasiya vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru makumi masere nemaviri zvine mazana matanhatu negumi nevatatu kana kuti 82, 613. Vanhu mazana manomwe nemakumi masere nevana vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi zvasiya vapora kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru makumi mashanu nechimwe zvine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi maviri nevatatu kana kuti 51, 923. Vanhu vachiri kurwara zviuru makumi maviri nemasere zvine zana nevaviri kana kuti 28, 102. Pavanhu ava mazana manomwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevasere kana kuti 798 ndivo vari muzvipatara kunyangwe chipatara cheInyathi chisina kuzivisa huwandu hwevari kurawara. Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo Nzvimbo dziri kupararira chirwere ichi zvinotyisa dzinoti Chegutu, Hurungwe, Sanyati, kuMashonaland West, kochiti Guruve, Mazowe kuMashonaland Central, Marondera, Murewa kuMashonaland East, Bikita neMasvingo, nemuHarare, kuchizotiwo Northern Suburbs, Nkulumane, Emakhandeni kuBulawayo uye Kwekwe mudunhu reMidlands. Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru zana nemakumi matatu nevaviri ne mashavashanu kana kuti 1, 132 05 vabayiwa nhomba kekutanga kudzivirira Covid-19. Vanhu vabayiwa kaviri sezviri kukurudzirwa vave zviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi matatu nepfumbamwe zvine mazana matatu nemakumi masere nepfumbamwe kana kuti 639, 389. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba kuti inyatsoshanda zvakanaka. Gurukota rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko Amai Monica Mutsvangwa vanoti chinangwa chehurumende ikozvino ndechekuona kuti vanhu vakawanda vabayiwa nhomba yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Vati vachatora vanachiremba nevakoti kubva kumauto nemapurisa. No media source currently available Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano varizve munyori munyaya dzezvehutano mubato rinopikisa reMDC Alliance Dr Henry Madzorera vati vanhu vanofanira kuziva kuti kudzivirira Covid-19 kunotanga naivo nekutevedzera kurudziro iri kupihwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano zvikuru kupfeka zvivhara muromo nemhuno. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vakawanda Vanonyoresa Kuitira Kuti Vakwikwidze Musarudzo Dzichaitwa Muna Kurume
text:
Zimbabwe Electoral Commission (ZEC ) nhasi yatambira magwaro evanhu vachapinda musarudzo dzichaitwa musi wa26 Kurume, mapato makuru munyika anoti MDC Alliance, Citizens Coalition for Change pamwe neZanu PF achinyoresa mazita evanhu vachakwikwidza zvigaro zvesezveNational Assembly gumi muHarare, Chitungwiza neEpworth. ZEC yatambirawo mazita evanhu vachapinda musarudzo idzi mumatunhu ese munyika. Zvigaro zvese gumi zveNational zviri kukwikwidza muHarare, Chitungwiza neEpworth. Kunze kwemapato makuru matatu aya mamwe mapato ari kupinda mussarudzo anosanganisira Lead Party iyo ichamiririrwa nemutungamiri wayo, Muzvare Linda Masarira kuHarare Central. Ichi ndicho chigaro chete chiri kukwidzwa nebato iri. Mamwe mapato ari kupinda masarudzo ndeanoti United Democractic Alliance, NPF, Patriotic Zimbabwean Party pamwe nevamwe vari kupinda musarudzo idz vakazvimirira.

Amai Betty Kaseke avo vachamirira bato reZanu PF kuKuwadzana Consituency vati zvinhu zvafamba zvakanaka uye vanotarisira kukunda.

Amai Zalerah Makari veZanu PF avo vakambomirira Epworth vanotiwo havanachimwe chavari kutarisira kunze kwekukunda.

Amai Susan Matsunga avo vakadzingwa muparamandeneMDC Tuye vachamirira, Citizens Coalition for Change, kuMufakose Constituency vaudza Studio 7 kutivanokumbira vanhu vekuMufakose kuti vavhotere.

Sachigaro weCitizens Coalition for Change muHarare, VaWellington Chikombo, avo vari kumirira Glen Norah vati veruzhinji vari kufarira shanduko yakaitwa nebato ravo uye vachakunda zvine mutsindo.

VaNorest Marara Chiureki, veMDC Alliance avo vari kukukwidza kuve nhengo yeNational Assembly kutHarare Central, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanotarisira kukunda nekuti vanhu vakawanda vari kugunun’una nemumiriri ange aripo.

Sarudzo idzi dizichaitwa musi wa26 Kurume, uye dziri kusarudza vanhu vachatsiva vakadzingwa basa kana kufa. No media source currently available

headline: Mutambi wenetball oita zve‘fuel’
text: Mutambi wenetball wechikwata chenyika chemaGems — Ursula Ndlovu — anoti mutambo uyu wamuvhurira mikana yakawanda muhupenyu hwake izvo zvakaona achipinzwa basa neimwe kambani inotengesa mafuta ezvifambiso.   Ndlovu, uyo anove mumwe wevatambi vemaGems vakanetsa zvikuru kumakwikwi eVitality World Cup gore radarika kuLiverpool, ave kutambira Glow Petroleum Queens iyo yakabva yamupa basa rekushanda pane imwe service station kuArdbennie muHarare.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Ndlovu anoti hupenyu hwake huri kugara huchishanduka kuburikidza nenetball.   “Zvinhu zvinofadza kuona kuti kune vanokoshesa isu vanhukadzi vari mune zvemitambo. Kusimudza kwatakaita mureza wenyika ini kwandibatsira zvikuru nekuti zvandivhurira mikana yakasiyana.   “Ndave kuenda kubasa uye hupenyu hwangu hwave kushanduka. Hazvirevi kuti handichatamba netball kwete nekuti ndiri kuita zvese sezvo netball ndiyo yakandiwanisa basa iri,” anodaro.   Ndlovu anoenderera mberi achiti, “Ini ndakakura ndiri munhu akashinga, ndinofarira kuita mabasa akawanda saka kwandiri zviri nyore kuita zvose kuenda kubasa uye nekutamba netball. Kubva Muvhuro ndinenge ndiri kubasa kusvika musi weChitatu ndozoti Chitatu ndapedza basa ndotopinda munzira kuenda kuKwekwe kunopinda mukembi nevamwe ndipo patinoita gadziriro dzedu dzemutambo wesvondo iroro.   “Ndiri kufara hangu chaizvo nekuti zvinofadza kuti madzimai kunyaya vari mune zvemitambo tiri kuwaniswa mikana yakasiyana uye tiri kuremekedzwa mabasa edu atinenge takaita,” anodaro Ndlovu.

headline: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe Chiri kuChina Chotaura nezveCoronavirus
text: Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri kushanda kuChina chinoti zvinhu hazvisati zvanaka munyika iyi sezvo vanhu vasati vobvumidzwa kufamba pamadiro nepamusoro pechirwere che coronavirus chanetsa munyika iyi. VaTinashe Bare, avo vanodzidzisa chirungu muguta reZhengzhou mudunhu reHenan kuChina kwakare, vanoti vari kubvumidzwa chete kubuda mudzimba kuitira kuti vanotenga chikafu, uye vanoenda kunotenga chikafu ichi vakachengetedzwa nevashandi vehurumende muguta reZhengzhou. VaBare vanoti hapana munhu wekuZimbabwe wavanoziva ati abatwa ne coronavirus, iyo yauraya vanhu vanodarika chiuru nemazana masere. No media source currently available

headline: McGregor, Nurmagomedoc votatsurana
text: mutambo weMMA, Robin Black, anoti anofunga kuti Conor McGregor achasendeka kukwikwidza mumutambo uyu, asi hunge akakundwa naKhabib Nurmagomedoc kumutambo weUFC 229.   McGregor ari kutarisirwa kuti ndiye achakundwa mutambo uyu sekutaura kwevanobhejesa mitambo.   Mari iri kuiswa panaMcGregor yakawandisa pane iri kubhejwa panaNurmagomedov wekuRussia uyo waachasangana naye kuLas vegas muna Gumiguru.   Black anoti anofunga kuti mutambo uyu uchave mukuru kuvatambi vese nekuti hapana anoda kukundwa.   “Kunyangwe pane zvakawanda zvekuhwina mumutambo uyu, zvakawanda zvavacharuzawo zvakare. Nekuti kana McGregor akakundwa, mumaonero angu, achasendeka kukwikwidza mumutambo uyu. Kana McGregor akakundwa chete, hatichamuone mumutambo uyu zvakare.   “Kana Khabib akakundwa mutambo uyu, haangorase nhorowondo yake yekusakundwa kwete, asi kukundwa nemunhu akaita saMcGregor hakumbomufadze, apo morari yange yakasimudzwa yemutambo uyu. Kukundwa uku hakumbomuitire zvakanaka kunoshandura zvakawanda,” akadaro. – Sportsmail MMA

headline: Zimbabwe Yokurudzirwa Kuremekedza Kodzero dzeVanhu Isati Yatambirwa Kuva Nhengo yeCommonwealth
text: Chikwata chesangano reCommonwealth icho chiri munyika kuongorora kuti Zimbabwe yodzorwa musangano iri here kana kuti kwete, chiri kusangana nehurumende, mapato anopikisa nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika nekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika dzinoti zvakakosha kuti hurumende iremekedze kodzero dzevanhu pamwe nehutongi hwejekerere kuti kuti itambirwe zvakare muCommonwealth. Chikwata chenyika dziri mugungano reCommonwealth chiri munyika chiri kuenderera mberi nehurukuro nemapato nemasangano akasiyana siyana. Vataura neStudio 7 vakawanda vanoti hapana chakaipa kuti Zimbabwe idzorwere mugungano iri asi inofanira kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu. VaTabani Mlambo avo vanogara kuChipinge East, ndemumwe ane muonero uyu. Mukururu wesangano reZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum iro raita hurukuro nechikwata ichi, Doctor Musa Kika vati vanotsigira kudzokera kweZimbabwe muCommonwelath asi.. Dr Kika vaudza Studio 7 kuti havashamisiki kuti nhengo gumi dzeCitizens Coalition for Change idzo dzange dzave nemwedzi mishanu dzichinyimwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso panyanya yadziri kupomerwa yekukonzera mhirizhonga kuNyatsime dzapihwa mukana uyu nhasi nekuda kwekuti chikwata cheCommonwealth chiri munyika. Asi gurukota rezvemitemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi vakaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende haipindire panyaya dzinenge dziri kumatare. Mukuru weMedia Centre, VaErnest Mudzengi vati zvakakosha kuti vatori venhau vashande vakasungunuka Commonwealth isati ambundira Zimbabwe. Pari zvino chikwatai ichi chiri kuita musangano neZanu PF uye chiri kutarisirwa kuita hurukuro nemapato eMDC Alliance inotungamirirwa naVaDouglas Mwonzora neCCC inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa. Mutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaWitness Dube, vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato ravo rinoda chose kuti Zimbabwe ipinde muCommonwealth nekuti iri kurasikirwa zvikuru. Mutauriri weCCC, Muzvare Fadzayi Mahere vati bato ravo richazivisa veruzhinhi parimire munguva inotevera. Mukuru mubazi reZanu-PF rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaTafadzwa Mugwadi vat Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvekudyidzana kwenyika zvakare vachishanda nesangano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute, VaBekezela Gumbo vaudza Studio 7 kuti Zimbabwe ingona kudzorwa muCommonwealth kana pakatariswa nzira dzakashandiswa pakapinda dzimwe nyika dzakaita sana Rwanda. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutungamiriri wechikwata cheCommonwealth Muzvinafundo Luis Franschesci. Asi vachitaura mumusangano wavaakaita negurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe, VaFrederick Shava nezuro vakati vachaedza nepavanogona kubatsira Zimbabwe kudzoka muCommonwealth. VaShava vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo asi Studio 7 ine hurukuro yayakaita nemutauriri wemutungamiri wenyika VaGeorge Charamba nezvenyaya iyi yatichakupai muzvikamu zvinotevera. VaCharamba vanoti donzvo reZimbabwe ndseekudyidzana nenyika dzose. Vaimbove mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakaburitsa Zimbabwe muCommonwealth mushure mekunge Zimbabwe yambomiswa kuve nhengo yesangano iri ichipomerw mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu muna 2003. Asi zvichitevera kupidigurwa kwehurumende yaVaMugabe, VaMangagwa vakaisa chikumbiro kusangano iri kuti Zimbabwe idzoke izvo zvazoita kuti Commonwealth itumire chikwata ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Makanzura Akadzingwa Basa kuGweru Oronga Kuendesa VaKasukuwere kuMatare
text: Sangano re Zimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, rakamirira makanzura maviri emuGweru, ranyorera tsamba gurukota rezvematunhu richipikisa kudzingwa kwakaitwa makanzura aya. Gweta re Zimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum riri kumirira makanzura maviri aya, VaTafadzwa Christmas, vanoti VaMoses Marecha naVaAlbert Chirau vakadzingwa basa zvisiri pamutemo, izvo vanoti zvinotyora kodzero dzavo dziri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika. VaChristmas vanoti kunyange hazvo mutemo we Urban Councils Act uchipa simba gurukota rezvematunhu kudzinga makanzura, masimba aya akabviswa mubumbiro idzva remitemo yenyika. VaChristmas vanoti mutemo uripo unosungira kuti paumbwe komiti inoferefeta kukanganisa kunenge kwaitwa nakanzura, kana meya. VaChristmas vanoti kana komiti iyi yawana kanzura kana meya aine mhosva, ndipo panopinda gurukota rezvematunhu richidzinga anenge achipomerwa mhosva, kwete zvakaitwa naVaKasukuwere. VaChristmas vanoti VaKasukuwere vakasatevedzera zviri mutsamba yavanyora, vachaendesa nyaya iyi kudare repamusoro soro vachipikisa kutyorwa kwekodzero dzemakanzura maviri aya. Asi VaKasukuwere vanoti havasi kuzodzosa makanzura aya pabasa uyezve havasi kuzopindura tsamba yakabva kumagweta emakanzura aya. VaKasukuwere vanotiwo vanoda kuvaendesa kumatare vakasununguka kuita izvi. Sachigaro veZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Amai Rita Makarau, vati havasati vawana tsamba yakanyorwa naVaChristmas. Amai Makarau vanoti kudzamara vawana tsamba inovazivisa zviri pamutemo nezve kudzingwa kwemakanzura aya, komisheni yavo icharamba ichiita basa rayo semazuva ose. Makanzura maviri aya ndiwo akatanga kudzingwa basa vachipomerwa mhosva yeuori naVaKasukuwere, avo, svondo rapera, vakambomisa basa makanzura ese kusanganisira meya weguta reGweru, vachivapomera mhosva yehuori pamwe nekushandisa mari yekanzuru zvisiri mugwara. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reAmnesty International muZimbabwe Ropomerwa Mhosva yeKusashandisa Mari Zvakanaka
text: Sangano rinorwirwa kodzero dzevanhu pasi rose, reAmnesty International, rinoti wongororo yemabhuku aro emari akaitwa kuchikamu chesangano iri muZimbabwe inoratidza kuti sangano iri rakarasikirwa nemamirioni mazhinji emadhora kuburikidza nehuwori pamwe nekusashandiswa kwemari zvakanaka. Amnesty International inoti vashandi vayo havana kubata mari zvakanaka uye vamwe vakashandisa mari zvisina kufanira, vamwe vakatora mari zvisiri pamutemo. Vanoona nezvekubudiswa kwamashoko musangano iri kuchamhembe kwe Africa, VaRobert Shivambu, vaudza Studio 7 vari kuSouth Africa kuti havakwanisi kutaura nezvenyaya iyi nekuti zvingakanganisa nyaya yavo kumatare edzimhosva kwavakaiendesa. Gore rakapera, bazi reAmerica rezvekudyina nedzimwe nyika rakamisa kubatsira nemari masangano mazhinji akazvimiririra emuZimbabwe richiti masangano aya ange asingatevedzeri nzira dzinodiwa mukushandiswa kwemari yadzaivapa. Amnesty International inoti nyaya iyi inobata mukuru wesangano iri muZimbabwe, VaCousin Zilala, avo vakatosiya basa, pamwe nasachigaro wesangano iri, VaTakesure Musiyiwa. Vanoona nezvemari musangano iri, Amai Sibongile Zimbeva, vakambomiswawo basa vachipomerwa mhosva yekusaita basa ravo nemazvo. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reAnti-Corruption Trust of Southern Africa, VaAlois Munyaradzi Chaumba, vanoti nyaya dzekusabata mari zvakanaka dziri kuramba dzichiitika mumasangano emunyika dzinouraya tarisiro yeveruzhinji, avo vanotarisira kwaari kuti avabatsire mukuchengetedzwa kwekodzero dzavo. VaChaumba vanoti huwori mumashandisirwo emari mumasangano aya hunopedzawo simba reavo vanoapa mari kuti arwire kodzero dzevanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Musangano weUNGA Unozeya Nzara Pamwe neHutano
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmeron Mnangagwa vanyora neChishanu padandemutande ravo reTwitter vachiti musangano wavo wekutanga kuUnited Nations General Assembly muNew York wakafamba zvakanaka chose. Asi zviri kubuda kuUnited Nations zviri kuratidza kuti zvinhu zvakaomera sangano iri, uye pane nyaya dzehutano nezvekudya Zimbabwe inofanira kusunga dzisimbe. VaMnangagwa vanoti chinangwa chavo chaive chekuti Zimbabwe itange kudyidzana nedzimwe nyika uye kuti vatungamiri venyika idzi vashanyirewo Zimbabwe. Kunze kwevatungamiri ava, VaMnangagwa vanoti vakasanganawo nevemabhizimisi kuti vauye kuzotanga mabhizimisi muZimbabwe zvikuru vekuAmerica. VaMnangagwa vanoti misangano yavo yakafamba zvakanaka uye Zimbabwe yadzokera mugungano renyika dzepasi rino. Zimbabwe yakaonawo mupupuriri akanaka kubva kumutungamiri weRwanda, VaPaul Kagame, vanove sachigaro weAfrican Union. Mumashoko avo kuUnited Nations, VaKagame vakati Zimbabwe inoda rubatsiro kubva kunyika dzepasi rino. Asi vachitaura kumucheto wemusangano uyu, munyori anoona nezvekudyidzana nenyika dzemuAfrica muhurumende yeAmerica, VaTibor Nagy, vakati Zimbabwe inofanira kuvandudza mitemo yakaita saana AIPPA nanaPOSA uye vakati Zimbabwe inoziva zvairi kuda kunzi iite kuti itange kudyidzana neAmerica. KuUnited Nations kuri kubudawo nyaya yekuti zvinhu munyaya dzekurwisa chirwere cherurindi kana kuti TB haina kumira zvakanaka. Mutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru weUnited Nations, Amai Anna Mohammed, vakanoti pagore, mari yekurwisa chirwere ichi iri kushomeka nemari inosvika mabhiriyoni gumi nematatu. Zimbabwe pari zvino iri kutatarika kuwana mari yekutenga mapiritsi ekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Rimwe dambudziko riri kubudawo kumusangano weUnited Nations inyaya yekuti vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni mazana masere nemakumi maviri nemumwe kana kuti munhu mumwe chete pavapfumbamwe anoziya nenzara. Vakawanda vakatarisana nenzara kunyanya muAfrica neSouth America. Nzara inonzi yatove nemakore matatu ichiwedzera. MuZimbabwe vanhu mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mana vakatarisana nenzara gore rinouya nekuda kwemhepo yeEl Nino iri kutarisirwa kukanganisa kunaya kwemvura. Musangano weUnited Nations uyu uri kupera musi wa 5 Gumiguru vatungamiri venyika vachitaura mudare reUnited Nations General Assembly uye vamwe vachiitawo misangano kumucheto wemusangano mukuru uyu. Imwewo nyaya yakasimudzwa kumusangano uyu ndeyezvinotarisirwa neUnited Nations kuti zviitwe nevechidiki. Munyori mukuru weUnited Nations VaAntonio Guterres vanoti vanoda kuti sangano ravo risimbaradze kushanda nevechidiki avo vanosvika bhiriyoni imwe chete mazana masere emamiriyoni pasi rose. Kuita izvi, VaGuterres vanoti kodzero dzevechidiki dzinofanira kuremekedzwa uye vachiwaniswa mikana. No media source currently available

headline: Munyori Mukuru weUnited Nations Okurudzira Kupera kweHondo muUkraine
text: Munyori mukuru weUnited Nations VaAntonio Guterres vaita musangano nemutungamiri wenyika yeUkraine VaVolodymyr Zelenskyy muguta guru renyika iyi reKyiv vakati kurwiswa kwenyika iyi neRussia kuri kupa kuti vanhuwo zvavo varasikirwe nehupenyu. VaGuterres vashanyira nzvimbo dzakaita seBorodianka, Irpin neBucha uko kwakawanikwa mitumba yevanhu vakaurayiwa pakabuda mauto eRussia munzvimbo idzi. Izvi zvakapa kuti vakawanda vati idzi dzitorwe semhosva dzehondo dzinofanira kuongororwa. VaGuterres vakurudzira Russia kuti ishande neInternational Criminal Court mukuongorororwa kwenyaya iyi. Vatiwo vari kuda kuti vanhu vemuUkraine vapihwe chikafu zvinova zvavati vakataurawo nemutungamiri wenyika yeRussia VaVladimir Putin. Mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaJoe Biden vanotiwo vaendesa kuCongress chikumbiro chekuti vakwanise kutumira zvimwe zvombo nerubatsiro kuUkraine. Vanoongogora nyaya dzezvehupfumi VaMasimba Kuchera vanoti hondo iyi iri kukukonzera matambudziko makukutu kunyika dzakaita seZimbabwe dzi sezvo kunyika iyi kuchitengwa gorosi, chibage nemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Votadza Kutora Mari Dzavo kuMasvingo
text: Vagari vekuMasvingo vatadza kutora mari dzavo mumabhanga nhasi, izvo vakawanda vanoti zvichavhiringa hurongwa hwavo hwezororo rekisimusi. Muguta reMasvingo manga musina mufaro nhasi zvichitevera kutadza kutora mari kumabhanga kwaitwa nevagari vakawanda. Mumwe wevanhu vasiri kufara, uye ari mutori wenhau, Energy Bara, anoti atadza kutora mari kubhanga rake reCBZ. "Zvinhu zvacho zviri kuita zvichitoshata pakapinda mutungamiri mutsva takafunga kuti zvichaita nani but zvavakutoshata ike zvino nhasi ndatouya kubank handina kana kuwana kana cent, pa bank hapana vanhu nhasi not nekuti pane mari asi hapana kana mari saka hapana kana shanduko yatati taoona sevana veZimbabwe," Bara anotsanangura. Mitsetse inogara iri mumabhanga mazuva ose, yange isiko, sezvo mabhanga asiri kupa vanhu mari. VaPilani Ngoniye vanoti kushaikwa kwemari panguva ino kunorwadza zvikuru uye zvinhu zviri kutowedzera kushata chero hazvo pava nehurumende tsva. “Tashaiwa mari kana cent tatodzoserwa kumusha totoshaya kuti tofamba neyi kudzokera kumusha uyezve handifungi kuti kisimusi yedu ichanakidza sezvo muMasvingo muno hamuna kana bank riri kupa vanhu mari, haa hurumende tsva iyi yakangofana neyaivapo sharu, yaivapo ikange nani, vakangoita recycle vanhu asi system ndoimwe, it’s from bad to worse,” vadaro VaNgoniye. Muzvare Esther Chimanikire vati kushaikwa kwemari kunovhiringa mufaro wevanhu pazororo rekisimusi rinofanira kufarwa. “Isu hatitozivi kuti krisimasi yedu inenge yakamirasei, izvezvi ndatodzosewa kubanka hanzi hatina mari apa ndinoda kuenda kumusha hakuna eco cash, kana swipe hakushandiswi card saka mbudzi dzacho tinouraya sei, zvakatotiomera kana vanobva joni vanochinjisa sei ma rands avo,” vadaro VaChimanikire. Mumwe mushandi wemubhanga aramba kudomwa zita rake anoti kushaikwa kwemari muMasvingo kwakatanga nemusi weMugovera. Vanhu vakambopembera apo vemabhanga vakawedzera mari yavaipa vanhu svondo ragadzwa mutungamiri wenyika asi iye zvino zvadzokera pazvaiva. Mabanga emuMasvingo akaita seZB ne NMB ari kupa vanhu makumi maviri emadhora pazuva, ukuwo mabhanga eCBZ, Standrad Charted neBarclays achipa makumi mashanu emadhora pasvondo rose. No media source currently available

headline: Vakawanda Votambira Chibvumirano Pakufamba kweZvitima Pakati peZimbabwe neBotswana
text: Zvizvarwa zvemuZimbabwe neBotswana zviri kutambira nemufaro chubvumirano chakanyoreranwa pakati penyika mbiri idzi chekudyidzana panyaya dzezvitima chinonzi “Through Working Agreement. Chibvumirano ichi chakanyoreranwa neMuvhuro pakati peNational Railways of Zimbabwe kana kuti NRZ neBotswana Railways chichaona zvitima chekuBotswana neZimbabwe zvichidarika miganhu yenyika mbiri idzi. Vanorarama nekutenga muBotswana vachinotengesa kuZimbabwe, Muzvare Primrose Mandeya vanoti havazivi kuti NRZ yavabvirepi sezvo vange vachirasikirwa nemari yakawanda mukuita basa ravo nenyaya yemabhazi nemichovha. Nekuda kwechibvumirano ichi, zvitima kubva kumakambani aya zvinenge zvokwanisa kusvika kuFrancistown nekuBulawayo. Chibvumirano ichi chisati chaitwa, zvitima zvenyika mbiri dzi zvaigumira kuBotswana paPlumtree. Pakusainwa kwechibvumirano ichi, mukuru weNRZ Amai Respina Zinyanduko vakati zvainge zvotora mazuva mana kana mashanu kuti zvinhu zvizotakurwa kubva paPlumtreekupinda muZimbabwe sezvo chitima cheNRZ chisingafambe mazuva ose. Izvi zvinotsinhirwa nemukuru weBotwana Railways Amai Chelesile Malele. Asi kunyangwe vamwe vari kufara, VaAbraham Mangena, avo vanoita zvekutakurira vanhu zvinhu kubva muguta reFrancistown kuenda kunzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana muZimbabwe vanoti hurongwa uhu huchaita kuti vasare vasisina basa. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzataura neStudio 7 dzinoti chibvumirano ichi chichabatsira Botswana zvakanyanya sezvo NRZ isina zvitima zvakakwana uye iine zvikwereti zvakawanda zvairi kutadza kubhadhara. NRZ yamboyedz kuita zvibvumirano nemakambani akaita seTransnet yekuSouth Africa nezvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika pasi peDiaspora Infrastructure Development Group asi zvakakona n’anga murapwa achida. Zimbabwe yakambotiwo iri kutaura neRussia kuti ipihwe zvitima asi hapana chakabuda.

headline: Makusha otarisira kuenda kumaOlympics
text: SHASHA yemujaho wekumhanya — Ngoni Makusha — anoti chishuvo chake chegore rino kuhwina menduru mumijaho yakasiyana uye nekubudirira kuenda kumakwishu eParis 2023 Olympics ayo achaitirwa kuFrance gore rinotevera.   Makusha mwaka wake wekumhanya uri kutanga svondo rino apo ari kunokwikwidza kuBotswana mumujaho uyo anoti uchamurakidza kuti ari papi pagadziriro dzake.   Mujaho uyu mumwe uyo Makusha ari kushandisa mukurwira tikiti rekuenda kunokwikwidza kuOlympics uye World Athletics Championship iyo ichaitwa gore rino kuBudapest, kuHungary.   Asati aenda kuHungary, Makusha achaenda kunomirira nyika kumakwishu eAfrican Games ayo achaitirwa kuGhana munaNyamavhuvhu.   “Mwaka wangu wegore rino uri kutanga svondo rino apo ndiri kuenda kuBotswana kunokwikwidza mumujaho wangu wekutanga uyo ndichaushandisa kuona kuti ndiri papi pakugadzirira uye kuti chii chandinoda mugadziriro dzangu nekuti mwaka wangu wegore rino mukuru.   “Ndine mujaho weAfrican Games uri kuuya mwaka uno uye ndinoda kunohwina menduru ikoko. Ndinoda zvakare kurwira kuenda kumujaho weWorld Championships nekudzokera kumaOlympics ayo ariko gore rinotevera kuParis, kuFrance,” anodaro.   Makusha aive kumujaho wemaOlympics uyo wakapedzisira kuitirwa kuTokyo, kuJapan 2021 uko akakundikana kusvika kumasemi-final kunyangwe zvazvo ainge ambohwina mujaho wake wekutanga.   Mujaho wechipiri akazopedza ari pechinomwe izvo zvakamutadzisa kuenda kumasemi-final ndokubva adzoka kumusha.   Gore rino, mujaho wemaAfrican Games uchatanga nemusi wa4 Nyamavhuvhu uye uchizopera nemusi wa19 Nyamavhuvhu.   Nerimwewo divi, mujaho weWorld Championship wekuHungary uchatanga nemusi wa19 Nyamavhuvhu uchizopera nemusi wa27 Nyamavhuvhu.

headline: VaChasi Vanoti Hurukuro neEskom Dzichiri Kuenderera Mberi paNyaya yeMagetsi
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvemhando dzemoto VaFortune Chasi vanoti hurukuro nekambani yeESKOM yekuSouth Africa panyaya dzekuti Zimbabwe itengeserwe magetsi dzichiri kuenderera mberi. VaChasi vaudza Studio 7 kuti parizvino South Africa haina magetsi ari kutengesera Zimbabwe. No media source currently available Zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka kukambani yeESKOM iyo yakaita chikwereti chemari inosvika mabhiriyoni makumi maviri emarands mukushanda kwayo kubva gore rapera kusvika muna Kurume gore rino. Kambani iyi yave kurarama nerubatsiro rwairi kupihwa nehurumende yeSouth Africa. Vakuru muESKOM vari kuti Zimbabwe inofanira kubhadhara chikwereti chinosvika mamiriyoni makumi matatu emadhora ekuAmerica kana ichida kutenga magetsi. Zvichakadaro, makambani mazhinji munyika ari kuti ari kutatarika nenyaya yekushaya magetsi zvopa kuti mamwe avhare kana kuti ati vanhu vashande maawa mashoma husiku panenge paine magetsi. Asi dambudziko iri riri kupa mukanha kune mamwe makambani akaita seZimplow iyo iri kutengesa magwenya emagetsi kana kuti magenerator. Kambani iyi inotiwo yakaita zviri nani gore rino kunyangwe zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka munyika. Mukuru mukambani iyi kana kuti Group Chief Executive VaVimbayi Nyakudya vanoti kambani yavo iri kuitawo mari nekutengesa magejo anodonzwa nemombe munyika dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica. No media source currently available

headline: Kupisa Kwekunze Kotarisirwa Kuenderera Mberi Kunzvimbo Dzakawanda Zvokanganisa Varimi
text: Bazi rezvemamiriro ekunze remeteorological Services Department rinoti kupisa kwekunze kuchaenderera mberi kunzvimbo dzakawanda kunyangwe dzimwe nzvimbo dzichawana mvura pano neapo. Bazi iri rinoti kutanga musi wa 10 mwedzi uno ndipo pari kutarisirwa kuti pachanaya mvura. Vanokokera mabasa muzimbabwe Farmers Union Amai Margaret Hoshiki vanoti kusanaya kwemvura kwave kupa kuti varimi vakawanda vaomerwe sezvo pasina tarisiro yekuti goho remwaka uno rinenge rakanaka. Vakurudzira varimi kuti vasarambe vachidyarurura Mbeu dzinonoka kuibva. "Tino kurudzira kuti varimi varime zvirimwa zvakadayi semamapfunde mapfupi anokurumbidza kuibva, ne mbesa dzinokurumidza kuibva kana kuti ma "small grain" sezvo mwaka usina kumira zvakanaka," Amai Hoshiki vaudza Studio 7. Vaenderera mberi vachiti, "Tinokurudzira kuti kana mvura yango tanga kunaya varimi ngava kande mbesa dzinokurumbidza kuibva kana chiri chibage ngava kande mbese chechibage chinonzi tsoko icho chinokurumbidza kuibva." No media source currently available

headline: Kushaiswa Bhonasi Kokonzeresa Mutauro
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, neMuvhuro vakazivisa kuti hurumende haisi kuzobhadhara vashandi vayo mari dzebhonasi kwemakore maviri anotevera. VaChinamasa vanoti hurumende yaremerwa nezvinhu uye haichakwanisi kuti irambe ichimanikidza makambani kuti abhadhare mari dzemitero sezvo iwo ari kutatarikawo. VaChinamasa vanoti mugore ra 2014, hurumende yakabhadhara mabhonasi nemari inosvika zana nemakumi manomwe nemaviri emamiriyoni emadhora. Asi mapato anopikisa hurumende akaita seMDC-T, Nationalm Constitutional Assembly, pamwe nemasangano akaita seRural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe ari kushora zvikuru danho rehurumende iri achiti kuita izvi kuomesera mushandi. Hurumende iri kumbotiwo iri kuda kugumura vamwe vashandi kubva pavashandi vayo vanonzi vanosvika mazana mashanu ezviuru. Mutungamiri weProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaTskavafira Zhou, vanoti danho rehurumende iri rinoodza moyo. Asi mutungamiri wesangano reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, VaJohn Mufukari, vanoti zvakaoma kuti hurumende irambwe ichibhadhara vashandi vayo mari nemitero yemakambani ari kunetsekawo. No media source currently available

headline: Ndiri kurwadziwa: Mangwiro
text: MURAIRIDZI wechikwata chenhabvu cheHarare City – Taurai Mangwiro – anoti ari kurwadziwa zvikuru zvichitevera kuburitswa kwakaitwa chikwata chake muPremier Soccer League svondo radarika umo change chave nemwaka 10 chichikwikwidza.   Mwaka unotevera, maSunshine City Boys achange achitambira nhabvu yavo muDivision One.   Mumakore aMangwiro achirairidza nhabvu, aka ndekekutanga kutungamirira chikwata chinoburitswa muPSL.   Achitaura panhepfenyuro yeStar FM, Mangwiro anoti ari kurwadziwa kuti ave nenhoroondo iyi iyo asina kumbobvira atarisira kuti achaiita semurairidzi wenhabvi.   “Zvinhu zvinorwadza, zvandisina kumbobvira ndatarisira kuti ndichasangana nazvo mumakore 16 ndichirairidza nhabvu.   “Asi ndiyo nhabvu yacho,” anodaro Mangwiro.   Kuburitswa kweHarare City muPSL kunotevera kuita mangange kwakaita ZPC Kariba neHighlanders 1-1 nemusi weSvondo wadarika.   MaSunshine City Boys akabva atevera Tenax neWhawha izvo zvakaburitswa zvekare muPSL zvichidzokera kuDivision One.   Svondo rino, ndipo pachaonekwa chikwata chechina chichatevera zvikwata izvi kuenda kuDivision One.   Zvakadaro, mwaka wenhabvu wa2022 uri kupera svondo rino apo Dynamos FC ichisangana neCAPS United mumutambo weHarare Derby kuNational Sports Stadium.   Shasha dzePSL dza2022, FC Platinum dzichange dziri pamusha kuMandava Stadium uko dzichasangana neCranborne Bullets nemusi weMugovera.   Kuchiti Harare City ichatamba neHighlanders mumutambo wayo wekupedzisira muPSL.

headline: Hurumende Yomisa Basa Vashandi Vayo Vose Vasina Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Hurumende inoti kutanga neMuvhuro uno vashandi vose vehurumende vasina kubayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 havasi kuzobvumidzwa kushanda uye havatembire mari. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaKindness Paradza vaudza Studio 7 kuti vashandi vakapihwa nguva yakakwana yekubayiwa nhomba uye vasina vari kuzomiswa basa nekuti vanenge votyora mutemo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti uku kuyedza kuda kumanikidza vari kuzengurira kuti vabayiwe nhomba yeCovid-19 sezvo huwandu hwevari kubayiwa huri kuramba huchidzikira. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba kusvika muna Zvita asi nehuwandu hwevanhu vari kubayiwa pazuva zvinenge zviri kukona n’anga murapwa achida. Hurumende yakaburitsa mugwaro rayo kana kuti Government Gazette kuti mushandi wose wehurumende anenge asina kubayiwa nhomba kusvika musi wa15 Gumiguru acharangwa. Asi zvinonzi vamwe vanogona kuregererwa ndokunge vapa zvikonzero zvakati tsvikiti zvekuti sei vasina kubayiwa nhomba. Vashandi vehurumende vanodarika zviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 300 000. Masangano evaraitidzi akaita seARTUZ nePTUZ anoti hurumende haifanire kumanikidza vashandi kubayiwa nhomba asi kungovakurudzira nekuvapa dzidziso yakakwana. No media source currently available

headline: Mashoko eRBZ Oratidza Pachena Kuti Hupfumi hweNyika Hwananga kuMawere
text: Bhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe rakaburitsa mashoko nemusi weChipiri anoratidza kuti zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi zviri kuramba zvichienda kumaziva ndadzoka. Izvi zviri kuonekwa kuburikidza nemari yakawanda iri kukweretwa nehurumende kubva kumabhanga emunyika, kushomeka kwemari iri kukweretwa nevemabhizimisi, uye kushaikwa kwemari mumabhanga zvopa kuti vamwe vashaye chivimbo nemabhanga acho. Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe inoti mari yakweretwa nehurumende kusvika pari zvino inosvika pamabhiriyoni manomwe ichikwira nezvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana kusvika muna Chivabvu zvichienzaniswa negore rapera. Nekushomeka kwemari munyika kunyange hazvo pakaparurwa mabond notes, RBZ inoti vanhu vakawanda vave kushandisa Real Time Gross Settlement Transaction kana kuti RTGS. Asi vaimbova gurukota rezvemari uye vachitungamira bato rinopikisa rePeople's Democratic Party, VaTendai Biti, vayambira kuti zviri kuitwa nehurumende izvi kuzvisikira moto muziso. VaBiti vati mumabhanga hamuna mari zvopa kuti pashandiswe RTGS asi izvi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti kukwereta mari kuri kuitwa nehurumende uku hakuna kunaka. Ko mari iri kukweretwa nehurumende iyi inobva kupi chaizvo kana vemabhanga vachiti havana mari. Doctor Kanyenze vanoti hurumende iri kungotora mari yevanhu iri mumabhanga. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vaimbotungamira Zimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, VaLuxon Zembe, vanoti nyaya yekuti hurumende iri kukwereta mari yakawanda yave kuomesera vemabhizimisi. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo naDoctor Kanyenze avo vati hurumende iri kukwereta mari yekubhdhara vashandi vayo kwete kuita mabasa ebudiriro ari kudiwa munyika. VaZembe vatiwo kukweretwa kuri kuitwa mari nehurumende kuri kupawo kuti mutengo wekuti vemabhizimisi vakwerete mari udhure. VaBiti vatiwo kuti zvinhu zvifambe munyaya dzezvehupfumi, gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vanofanira kuona kuti mabhizimisi awaniswa mari yekuita mabasa. Kuyange hazvo nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kuti hurumende haifanire kukwereta mari, VaChinamasa vanoti hurumende hakuna kumwe kwainowana mari sezvo isingakwanise kukwereteswa mari neInternational Monetary Fund, IMF, neWorld Bank. Hurumende inoti izvi zviri kukonzerwa nenyaya yezvirango zvakatemerwa nyika. Asi veIMF neWorld Bank vanoti hurumende yeZimbabwe iri kutadza kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yozadzazve Mauto Mumigwagwa neNhandare dzeNdege
text: Hurumende inonzi yazadza mauto, vasori, mapurisa uye matikitivha akapakatira zvombo pamaroad blocks, nhandare dzendege uye kumabhodha ose izvo zvopa kuti nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dziti zviri kuratidza kuti zvinhu hazvina kugadzikana. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vari kufambawo vakachengetedzwa nemauto nevasori chete pasina mapurisa pedyo kunze kwevezvimidhudhu. Nyazvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinotiwo kuwanda kwevanochengetedza munyika nekunze kunokanganisa vanoda kuuya kuzotanga mabhizimisi munyika. Mashoko aya anotsnhirwa naDr Godfrey Kanyenze, avo vanoshanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe. VaKanyenze vanoti kuvapo kwemauto mumigwagwa munongedzo wenyika isina kugadzikana zvinoita kuti vemabhizimisi vatye kuzotanga mabhizimisi. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, uye vari gurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika, Retired General Constantino Chiwenga. Adaira nharembozha yavo ati vange vakabatikana. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri vemauto, VaEverson Mugwisi, kuti tinzwe kuti sei mauto kubva kudivi reMilitary Intelligence vari mumigwagwa. Hurumende dzeAmerica neBritain dzakambozivisa hurumende kuti mauto haafanire kunge achiita mabasa anofanira kuitwa nemapurisa izvo zvinonzi zvakakonzera kuurayiwa kwevanhu vanomwe muHarare masvondo apera mushure mekupfuurwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti mauto. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, Doctor Victor Chimhutu, vanoti zviri kuitwa nemauto zvinoratidza kuti VaMnangagwa vanoshandisa mauto kutodarika zvaiitwa nevaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa eKanzuru yeHarare Anotadza Kubvisa Vanotengesera Mumigwagwa
text: Mapurisa ekanzuru amboedza neChipiri kubvisa nechisimba vanotengesera mumigwagwa asi zvakundikana sezvo vanotengesera mumigwagwa ava varamba vakatsika madziro vachiti havana kwavanoenda. No media source currently available Mutungamiri werimwe remasangano anomirira vanotengesera mumigwagwa ava re Zimbabwe Informal Sector Organization, ZISO, Va Promise Mkwananzi, vati mapurisa ekanzuru asvika panga pachitengesera vanhu ava paCopa Cabana mu Harare vakaedza kuda kubvisa nechisimba vanotengesera mumigwagwa ava kuti vaende kunzvimbo dzakatarwa nekanzuru kuitira kuti vanotengesera vari kunzvimbo idzi. Va Mkwananzi vati havasi kuzobvuma kuti vanotengesera mumigwagwa ava vabviswe pasina hurongwa hwakati tsvikiti. Vati kanzuru pamwe chete nehurumende vanofanira kuwona kuti vagadzira nzvimbo dzekutengesera dzakanaka uye kuwona zvakare kuti nyaya yekushayikwa kwemabasa yagadziriswa. Mushure mekutadza kubvisa vanotengesera mumigwagwa, vashandi vekanzuru vazoswera vave kufamba nemotokari vachishevedzera vachikurudzira kuti vanotengesera mumigwagwa vakanyoresa muchirongwa chiri kuitwa nekanzuru chekunyoresa vanhu vese vanotengesera mumigwagwa vachitanga kuenda kunzvimbo dzakatarwa nekanzuru kuitira kuti vashande vari kwadziri. Asi vazhinji vevanotengesera mumigwagwa ava vanoti havasi kuda kuenda kunzvimbo idzi vachiti hakuna vanhu vanouyako vachitenga uye vanoti nzvimbo idzi hadzina kugadzirwa zvakakwana. Zvichakadai, meya wekanzuru ye Harare, Va Benard Manyenyeni, vati kana vanhu vachibviswa munzvimbo dzavanotengesera vanofanira kubviswa zvine mwero. Pane imwewo nyaya ine chekuita nemafambisirwo ebasa mukanzuru ye Harare, Va Manyenyeni vaudza vatori venhau kuti munyori mukanzuru yavo, Va Tendai Mahachi, avo vakambomiswa basa kuti kanzuru imbovaferefeta, vanofanira kuwunza magwaro anoratidza kuti vakadzoka seyi kubasa mazuva maviri asati adarika. Va Manyennyeni vaudza vatori venhau pa Town House kuti vachasvitsa nyaya yaVa Mahachi kugurukota idzva rrinowona nezvematunhu, Va Saviour Kasukuwere, zvichitevera kudzoka kwakaita Va Mahachi nezuro kubasa kunyange hazvo vakambomiswa basa nekanzuru yavo. Va Kasukuwere vati havasati vaziva mamiriro akaita zvinhu mukanzuru ye Harare sezvo vakatanga basa mubazi iri nezuro.

headline: Herentals yorongera FC Platinum
text: MURAIRIDZI weHerentals FC, Kumbirai Mutiwekuziva, anoti chikwata chake chakagadzirira kusangana neFC Platinum svondo rinouya apo vachaumburudzana mumutambo weCastle Premiership neChibuku Super Cup semi-final.   FC Platinum neHerentals zvichabandana svondo rino nemusi weMugovera kunhandare yeMandava Stadium kuZvishavane mumutambo wePSL.   Mutiwekuziva anoti svondo rino vachashandisa mutambo wavo wekutanga neFC Platinum kuongorora matambiro echikwata ichi apo vakatarisana nemutambo mukuru weChibuku Super Cup svondo rinotevera uyo anoti ndiwo wavari kukoshesa.   “Isu mutambo wakanyanya kutikoshera pane miviri yatakatarisana nayo neFC Platinum ndeweChibuku Super Cup nekuti tinoda kupinda mufainari tigohwina mukombe uyu.   Hatisati tambopinda mufainari yemutambo uyu saka ticharwa semvumba kuti tihwine.   “Saka svondo rino, tichashandisa mutambo wedu kuongorora FC Platinum matambiro ainenge ichiita uye patinenge takanganisa tinozopagadzirisa svondo rinotevera,” anodaro Mutiwekuziva.   Mumutambo wekutanga wePSL wakatambwa nezvikwata zviviri izvi mwaka uno, Herentals yakakunda FC Platinum 1-0 kuNational Sports Stadium.   Mutiwekuziva anoti vanoziva kuti Platinum vanogona kuikunda sei saka havasi kutya kusangana nayo.   “Platinum mumutambo wePSL takairadzika muNational Sports Stadium panguva apo yaipisa ichitamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura saka hatinyanye kuitya nekuti tinoziva kuti toikunda sei,” anodaro.   Kuchiti murairidzi weFC Platinum, Norman Mapeza anoti mitambo yakatarisana nechikwata chake yakakosha zvikuru asi panguva ino ari kunyanya kufunga nezvemutambo weMugovera.    Norman Mapeza   “Isu mutambo watinowanzokufunga ndeuyo watinenge takatarisana nawo svondo iroro, asi tiri kushanda zvedu nesimba kuti tigokunda mumitambo miviri yatakatarisana nayo neHerentals.   “Herentals mwaka uno iri kutamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura uye kusvika kwayaita kusemi-final yeChibuku Super Cup kunorakidza kuti vari kuziva zvavanoita, saka tinotofanirwa kushanda nesimba kuti tikunde mumitambo yedu miviri yatichasangana navo,” anodaro Mapeza.   Zvakadaro, mune mimwe mitambo yePSL iriko svondo rino, kuBulawayo kuchange kuine mitambo yeBulawayo derby miviri apo wekutanga uchaona Bulawayo Chiefs ichisangana neBulawayo City musi weMugovera kuLuveve kuchiti musi weSvondo Chicken Inn ichitatsurana neHighlanders kuBarboufields.   Dynamos ichange iri pamusha paNational Sports Stadium apo ichasangana neWhaWha nemusi weSvondo kuchiti CAPS United iri kunanga kuVengere kwaRusape kunosangana neCranborne Bullets.

headline: Zambuko reKazungula Rozeyiwa neZvaro
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kupesana pfungwa panyaya yekuti Zimbabwe inowana chouviri here pazambuko reKazungula kana kuti kwete. Zambuko iri riri pakati peZimbabwe, Zambia neBotswana. Zimbabwe iyo yakange yambobuda mumushandirapamwe neBotswana neZambia muna 2010 inoti yakazoona zvakakosha kuti ipindezve muhurongwa uhu. Nemusi weSvondo mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakabatana nemutungamiri wenyika yeBotswana, VaIan Khama, uye mutungamiri weZambia, VaEdgar Lungu, kuti vaone zvaitwa pari zvino pakuvakwa kwezambuko reKazungula riri pakati penyika nhatu idzi. Asi nekuda kwekusawirana nevaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, zambuko iri riri kuvakwa richinyenyeredza Zimbabwe richienda kuNamibia zvishoma. Izvi zvapa kuti mari yekurivaka iwande sezvo rakazowedzera nemamwe makiromita mazana matatu. VaMnangagwa mushure memusangano naVaKhama vakati vaida kuti Zimbabwe idzoke muhurongwa uhu. Chibvumirano chiripo ndechekuti Zimbabwe ipinde muchikamu chepiri apo ichavakirwa One Stop Border Post kudivi reBotswana. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wesangano re Confederation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaCallisto Jokonya, vanoti zvakaitwa naVaMnangagwa zvinokudzwa zvikuru. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvezvehupfumi vari mukuru wezvedzidzo paZimbabwe Ezekiel Gutu University Doctor Gift Mugano vanoti zambuko iri rakakosha kuZimbabwe. Asi Doctor Mugano vatiwo zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe isangoti yapinda muchibvumirano asi isingakwanise kushandisa zambuko iri nemazvo. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nemutungamiri wePeople's Democratic Party, uye vari vaimbova gurukota rezvemari, VaTendai Biti, avo vati zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe igadzirise mugwagwa weHarare Chirundu sezvo uri iwo ungabatsira mukupundutsa nyika. Doctor Mugano vanoti kuti Zimbabwe ibudirire zvinotoda kuti nyika ive nezvivakwa zvakaita semazambuko aya uye migwagwa. Asi VaJokonya vanoti kunyangwe mugwagwa weHarare kusvika kuBeitbridge wakakosha, zambuko reKazungula harifanire kutarisirwa pasi. Zambuko reKazungula riri kutarisirwa kushandisa mari inosvika mamiriyoni mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu emadhora uye chikwereti kubva kukambani yekuJapan yeInternational Cooperation, African Development Bank neEU-Africa Infrastructure Trust Fund. Kuvakwa kwezambuko iri kuri muzvikamu zvitatu, chekutanga izambuko rine njanji yakareba makiromita mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi maviri nematatu, chikamu chechipiri ndeche One Stop Border Post kuBotswana chekupedzisira kuZambia. Zvose zvinoda kuitwa zvinotarisira kupera muna Zvita gore rinouya. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inoti Vane Makore Gumi neMatanhatu Vave Kukwanisa Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Bazi rinoona nezvehutano razkaivisa kuti vechidiki vari pakati pemakore gumi nematanhatu negumi nemanomwe vave kukwanisa kuti vatange kubaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 yemhando yeSinovac. Mugwaro ravo kuvatori venhau bazi rezvehutano rinoti danho iri rakatorwa mushure meongororo dzakaitwa uye nekurudziro kubva kusangano reZimbabwe Medicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe. Hurumende inoti yazivisa matunhu ose, zvikoro zvepamusoro, pamwe nenzvimbo dzinobayirwa nhomba kuti dzichitange kubaya nhomba vana vemazera aya. Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano Dr Henry Madzorera, vanoti vazhinji havasati vanzwa nezveongororo yakaitwa iyi asi vachiti havo idanho rakanaka chose. Vakurudzirawo hurumende kuti ibudise zvakabuda muongoro iyi kuti vashandi mune zvehutano vaite basa vakasununguka uyevo kuti vezvehutano vakwanise kukurudzira vana ava kuti vabaiwe nhomba. No media source currently available Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo.

headline: Lionel Messi Anotungamira Argentina Kupinda muSemifainari yeWorld Cup Mushure meKurova Netherlands muMapenareti
text: Argentina yaita chikwata chepiri kupinda musemifainari yemukombe wepasi rose weFIFA World Cup 2022 uri kutambirwa kuQatar, mushure mekukunda Netherlands 4-3 mumapenareti. Zvikwata izvi zvanga zvapedza zviri mangange munguva dzemaminitsi makumi mapfumbamwe, ndokupinda munguva yawedzerwa, kana kuti extra time, mutambo wakaramba uri mangange 2-2. Lionel Messi, uyo anga akatarisirwa nevakawanda kuti ndiye achafambisa injini yeArgentina, haana zvake kurasisa vangadai vanga vabheja vachimutemba sezvo atamba zvinonwisa mvura, uye kunwisa penareti yeArgentina yekutanga. Mubati wepagedhi weArgentina, Emiliano Martinez, ashurawo mare mushure mekubata mapenareti maviri ekutanga eNetherlands, ukuwo chikwata chake chichinwisa matatu ekutanga. Argentina yave kusangana neCroatia nemusi weChipiri musemifainari yekutanga. Mugovera kune mitambo miviri yemakotafainari yanga yasara, wekutanga uri pakati peMorocco nePortugal, kuchizotevera mumwe pakati peEngland neFrance.

headline: Nhamo Yoramba Yakabata Vamwe Vagari kuChimanimani
text: Vamwe vagari vekuChimanimani vanodarika gumi nevaviri vanonzi vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Izvi zvakaitika mushure mekunge hurumende yati vanhu vanodarika mazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu vange vambotama musha nekutyira kuyeredzwa nemafashamu emvura vadzokere kumisha yavo yekumatende avari kugara kubva muna 2019 apo vakaparadzirwa misha nedutumupengo reCyclone Idai. Vanhu ava vakambotamiswa mushure mekunge dunhu iri rapindazve munzira yemafashamu emvura nemadutumupengo emhepo maviri kana kuti Tropical Storm Chalane yakarova muna Zvita, uye Tropical Storm Eloise mwedzi uno. Manicaland ndiro dunhu riri kutevera Harare pavanhu vakawandisa vari kurwara neCovid-19 pari zvino vanove mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matatu nevasere kana kuti 938. Hatina kukwanisa kubata sachigaro mubazi rekudzivirira njodzi kuManicaland kana kuti Civil Protection Committee chairperson, VaEdgars Seenza, vange vachitungamira hurongwa hwekubatsira vanhu ava. Asi tabata mumwe mugari wekuChimanimani kuNgangu VaPardon Maguta. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Mamiriyoni Matatu Vofa neCovid-19 Pasi Rose
text: Pasi rose, huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 hwadarika mamiriyoni matatu.
