Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi inoti vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi pasi rose vadarika zana nemakumi mana nezviuru mazana masere zvemamiriyoni kana kuti, 140, 800 million. MuAfrica mune vadarika mamiriyoni mana vabatwa nechirwere ichi. Vapora pasi rose vadarika mamiriyoni makumi masere kana kuti 80, million. Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weMugovera kuti munhu mumwe chete akafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kuManicaland zvasiya vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kuparaira gore rapera vave chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mashanu nevaviri kana kuti 1, 552. Vanhu zana nemakumi matanhatu nevashanu kana kuti 165 vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 neMugovera zvasiya huwandu hwevabatwa nacho hwave pazviuru makumi matatu nemanomwe zvine mazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 37, 699. Vanhu makumi maviri nevana kana kuti 24 vakapora kubva kuchirwere ich zvasiya vanhu vapora vave zviuru makumi matatu nemashanu nevashanu kana kuti 35, 005. Vanhu vakabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 yekutanga vave zviuru mazana maviri zvine makumi manomwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevashanu kana kuti 276, 095. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 kaviri sezvinokurudzirwa nenyanzvi vave zviuru makumi matatu nemashanu zvine mazana masere nevatanhatu kana kuti 35, 806. Zvichakadaro bazi rezvedzidzo raburitsa mashoko kuvatori venhau richiti rave kusimbaradza zvirongwa zvekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 muzvikoro. Mutauriri webazi rezvedzidzo VaTaungana Ndoro vati zvakakosha kuti paitwe mushandirapamwe pakati pevabereki, varairidzi uye vadzidzi uye bazi rezvedzidzo richange roshanda nebazi rezvehutano kuona kuti patevedzerwa zviri kukurudzirwa kuti chirwere chisapararire. No media source currently available Bazi rezvehutano riri kuyambira kuti zvikoro zvisingatevedzere mitemo iyi zvinogona kuvharwa. Munyori mukuru musangano werimwe sangano rinomiririra vararaidzi reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe kana kuti ARTUZ VaRobson Chere vanoti hurumende haisi kuita zvakakwana kuwanisira zvikoro zvikwanisiro zvekurwisa denda reCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanoyambira Nhengo dzeZanu PF Kuti Dzingwarire veMasangano Akazvimirira
text: Mutungamiriri wenyika, vari zvakare mutungamiriri webato reZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanoyambira nhengo dzebato ravo kuti dzichenjerere masangano akazvimirira munyika. Vachivhura musangano wePolitburo kumuzinda webato ravo muHarare neMugovera, VaMnangagwa vati nhengo dzebato ravo dzinofanirwa kungwarira masangano akazvimirira nevamwe vasori avo vasingadi kuona Zimbabwe yakasununguka, vachiti masangano aya ari kuhwanda nenyaya yekudzidzisa veruzhinji nyaya dzekuvhota. Asi murongi wemabasa musangano reZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, unova mubatanidzwa wemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaWilbert Mandinde vati havana chinangwa chekuve hurumende uyewo vanokatyamadzwa nekutya kunoita bato reZanu PF masangano akazvimirira. VaMandinde vakurudzirawo bato iri kuti rishande pamwechete nemasangano akazvimirira. VaMnangagwa vatiwo vanoda kuti bato ravo rikwanise kuhwina sarudzo dzema by-elections pamwe nekutora zvigaro zvaive nenhengo dzemapato anopikisa. Vakurudzira nhengo dzavo kuti dzienderere mberi nezvirongwa zvekukwezva vavhoti vachiti vanoda kukunda zvine mutsindo pasarudzo dzema by-election pamwe nesarudzo dziri kutarisirwa 2023. Vayambirawo nhengo dzebato ravo idzo vati dziri kukonzera nyonga nyonga pamwe nekusawirirana mubato vachiti avo vanoda kuparadza bato iri ndivo vachazoguma vaparara. VaMnangagwa vakatomisa basa vaimbove gurukota rezvekuchengetedzwa kwenyika, VaOwen Mudha Ncube, avo vainzi vaikonzerawo nyonga nyonga, kunyanya mudunhu reMidlands. VaMnangagwa vatiwo vari kushushikana nemafashamu emvura kune dzimwe nzvimbo, vakakurudzira vanobatsira veruzhinji munguva yenjodzi dzakadai, veCivil Protection Unit kuti vagare vakagadzirira kubatsira vanenge vawirwa nedambudziko iri. Vakurudzirawo avo vasina kubaiwa nhomba kuti vabaiwe vachiti nyika ine nhomba dzakawandisa. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Vatambi vetsiva changamukai’
text: SHASHA yakambonetsa mutsiva — Alfonso “Mosquito” Zvenyika — anoti kusadzidza kuri kukonzeresa kuti vatambi vazhinji vemutambo uyu vabirwe mari dzavo nemapuromota nemamaneja vosara vasina chinhu.   Mosquito anoti vatambi vemitambo yakasiyana vanofanirwa kukoshesa nyaya yefundo.   “Vatambi vezhinji vetsiva havana kudzidza saka izvi zviri kukonzera kuti vabirwe mari uye hapana chavari kuita muhupenyu hwavo. Vari kuitisa vamwe vanhu mari, kunyanya mamaneja nemapuromota avo.   “Mutambi anoudzwa kuti pamari ngatiite 50-50, iye mutambi pa50 perecent yake ndipo pachabva yekuti abhandare kuBoxing Board of Control uye azobhadhare zvakare murairidzi wake nekugym kwaanenge achishandira saka anosara asisina chainacho asi maneja akanuna                         zvake. Ndipo paye munhu paanozosendeka magirovhosi ake etsiva anenge asisina chinhu nekuti mari aingobirwa,” anodaro.   Mosquito anoti mamaneja nemapuromota etsiva vanofanirwa kushanda pamwe chete mukusimudzira vatambi.   “Tikatarisa kunze kwenyika kuEurope, mutambi wetsiva anenge ane chikwata chikuru chaanoshanda nacho chichimubatsira mubasa                rake. Chikwata ichi chinoshanda mabasa akasiyana ekusimudzira mutambi uyu.   “Manje muno tiri kuona zvakasiyana nekuti unonzwa maneja achiti mutambi uyu ndewangu, ndini ndoshanda naye chete.    Ihwohwo humbimbindoga nekuti unenge uchitadzisa mutambi wako kusimukira mumutambo uyu. Isu chatiri kungoda kuona vatambi vose vachisimukira chete, nyika yedu yorumbidzwa kana vatambi vahwina,” anodaro Mosquito.   Zvichitevera kupihwa mvumo kwakaita mitambo yose kuti ichidzoka, Mosquito anoti zvave kubatsira kuti vatambi vazhinji, avo hupenyu hwavo hwange hwakanganiswa nedenda reCovid-19, vachisimuka vagowana cheuviri muhupenyu hwavo.   “Covid-19 yakavhiringa zvizhinji mumutambo wedu, vatambi vandinawo ipfuti chaidzo asi kumbopedza nguva vakagara kwakadzorera basa rose ratange tichiita                     kumashure.   “Asi iye zvino tave nemufaro kuti tavhurirwa, tapihwa mvumo yekuti mitambo ichitanga, zvave kubatsira kuti tichienderera mberi nebasa,” anodaro Mosquito.

headline: Vadzidzi Vanomwe Vanobatwa neCovid-19 paChikoro chePrince Edward muHarare
text: Vamwe vabereki vanonzi vatanga kubvisa vana vavo pane chimwe chikoro muHarare mushure mekunge vamwe vadzidzi vepachikoro ichi vawanikwa vaine chirwere cheCovid-19. Gwaro raburitswa nemukuru wechikoro chePrince Edward High School chiri muHarare, Va A.G. Gora, rinoti mushure mekuongororesa vadzidzi vepachikoro chavo nezuro, vana vanomwe vawanikwa vaine chirwere cheCovid 19 uye havasati vawana zvakabuda mukuongororwa kwevamwe kunyange hazvo vadzidzi vese vakaongororwa. VaGora vati vadzidzi vawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi vapatsanurwa kune vamwe vana uye vamirira kunzwa kubazi rezvedzidzo pamusoro pedambudziko ravasangana naro iri. Mumwe mubereki ane vana vanodzidza pachikoro ichi, Amai Revai Gambe, vati vaona zvakakodzera kuti vambobvisa vana vavo pachikoro kudzamara hurumende yatora matanho akasimba ekuti vana vavo vasabatwe nechirwere cheCovid 19. Mumwe mubereki ane mwana anodzidza pachikoro apa abvisawo mwana wake pachikoro apa nhasi, uyo aramba kudomwa nezita, akurudzira hurumende kuti ikurumidze kugadzirisa dambudziko iri kuitira kuti vana vasarasikirwe nenguva yedzidzo sezvo vana vakatora nguva yakareba vasingaende kuzvikoro zvichitevera kuvharwa kwakanga kwakaitwa nyika yose nekuda kwedenda reCovid 19. Mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mubazi redzidzo, VaTaungana Ndoro, vaudza Studio 7 kuti bazi ravo harisati rave nedanho raratora panyaya iyi vachiti vachatevedzera zvinenge zvabva kubva kubazi rehutano. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, VaJohn Mangwiro, vati bazi ravo ratumira vanhu kunoongorora mamiriro akaita zvinhu pachikoro apa kuitira kuti vagoona kuti votora matanho api. Pasvika Studio 7 pachikoro chePrince Edward vezvehutano vanga vachifirita chikoro chose. Zvichakadai, vamwe vedzisvondo vari pasi peZimbabwe Catholic Bishops Conference vabaiwa nhomba yeSinopharm pahurongwa hwanga huchitungamirwa nebazi rezvehutano vamwe vafundisi vachikurudzira kuti vose vanoita zvechitendero vabaiwe nhomba iyi kuitira kuti vazvidzivirire kuchirwere cheCovid19. Vabaiwa nhomba ava vafundisi mazana maviri nemakumi masere nevasere. Vanhu vakabayiwa nhomba kekutanga nezuro vakasvika zviuru zvishanu nemazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nevapfumbamwe, 5 269, kusanganisira mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu vabaiwa nhomba yekutamba vave zviuru makumi mana nezvipfumbamwe nemazana nemazana mana nevana (49 404) uye vabaiwa nhomba yechipiri vave zviuru zviviri nemazana mana nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe (2489). Bazi rezvehutano rinoti kubva pakatanga chirwere ichi, muZimbabwe mave nevanhu zviuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu nemazana manomwe nemakumi mana nevapfumbamwe (36 749) vakabatwa vaine chirwere ichi, uye vakapora vava zviuru makumi matatu nezvina nemazana mana nemakumi manomwe nevatanhatu (34476). Munyika mave nevanhu chiuru nemazana mashanu negumi nevatanhatu, 1 516, vafa nechirwere cheCovid 19 uye huwandu uhwu hunogona kukwira pachaburitswa mamwe mashoko nebazi iri nhasi manheru. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reSACU Rowanisa Nhengo Dzaro muAmerica Ruzivo Pamusoro peCovid-19
text: Sangano rinomirirra zvizvarwa zvekuchamhembe kweAfrica zvinogara munharaunda yeD.C, Maryland neVirginia, reSouthern African Community USA, nemusi weSvondo rakakokera hurukuro padandemutande pamusoro pedenda reCovid-19 senzira yekuti veruzhinji vanzwisise pamusoro pedenda iri uye kuti ringabatwa sei. Nhengo yebhodhi reSACU vachiona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano iri, Muzvare Omega Tawonezvi, vanoti sangano ravo rakatora danho iri kuitira kuti veruzhinji vawane ruzivo rwuzere pamusoro pedenda reCovid-19, iro rashungurudza pasi rose. Muzvare Tawonezvi vanoti kuti vanhu vanzwisise kukosha kwenzira dzekudzvirira nadzo pamwe nekurapa denda iri, vakakoka nyanzvi mbiri dzinoti chiremba vari nyanzvi yemishonga yechirungu Dr. Bukhosi Dube vanove chizvarwa chekuZimbabwe, pamwe nemumwe godobori wemishonga yechivanhu anobva kuSouth Africa kuti vatsanangurire veruzhinji pamwe nekupindura mibvunzo yaive nevanhu. Vamwe vakataurawo pamusangano uyu vanhu vaakapona kubva kudenda iri avo vakagoverawo kune vamwe nzira dzavakashandisa mukurwisana nedenda reCovid-19. Sangano reSouthern African Community USA rinoshandawo nemakanzuru pamwe nehurumende dzematunhu mukubatsira zvizvarwa zvekuAfrica muzvirongwa zvakasiyanasiyana zvinosanganisira zvehutano nezvehupfumi. Muzvare Tawonezi vanoti sangano ravo rine hurongwa hwekuita mimwe misangano nenhaurwa pamusoro pedenda reCovid-19 senzira yekupa ruzivo nedzidziso kunhengo dzavo. No media source currently available

headline: Vanomirira Masangano eMitambo Vokumbira Hurumende Kuti Vadzoke Munhandare
text: Masangano anomirira vatambi mumitambo yakasiyana siyana aisa zvikumbiro kuhurumende kuti vatenderwe kuendera mberi nemitambo mushure mekunge mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika vari gurukota rezvehutano VaConstantino Chiwenga vati mitambo yose imbomiswa kutanga neMuvhuro senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Muraridzi webasketball Edmore Zivanai Muthetwa anoti ari kushushikana zvikuru nekuti hurumende yakatora danho iri isina kutaurawo navo. Kugunun’una uku kwauya panguva iyo veZimbabwe Cricket neZimbabwe Rugby Union vaisa chikumbiro kuhurumende kuti vatenderwe kuenderera mberi nemitambo. Gwaro rabva kuZimbabwe Cricket riri kukumbira kuti vapedzise mutambo wavo wemazuva mana uripo pakati peZimbabwe A neSouth Africa A uyo wakatanga nesvondo ndokumiswa neMuvhuro. Pamusoro pezvo, Zimbabwe Cricket yakumbira kupihwa mukana wekuti zvikwata zvenyika zvitenderwe kuita gadziriro yemitambo neve kune dzimwe nyika iyo yaive yarongwa kare.  Murairidzi wechikwata chevanhukadzi chemaLady Chevrons Adam Chifo anoti ane chivimbo chekuti chichemo chavo chichanzwikwa vakatarisana nemitambo ye2022 World Cup. Mukuru weZimbabwe Rugby Union VaAaron Jani vazivisawo kuti vakumbirawo mukana wekuti zvikwata zvenyika zvigadzirire makundano eAfrica Cup ayo ariko mwedzi unotevera. Makundano eAfrica Cup ayo arikutirwa kuTunisia ari kushandiswa senzira yekuenda kuWorld Cup. VePremier Soccer League neve Zifa vanonzi vari mubishiwo rekuedza kuti mitambo yeChibuku Super Cup ienderere mberi. Mutauriri weZFA VaXolisani Gwesela veZifa vanoti vanyorawo tsamba kuSport and Recreation Commission kuti mitambo yenhabvu irambe ichitambwa sezvanga zvichingoitwa masvondo mana apfuura. Anotaura akamirira PSL Muzvare Kudzai Bare vati pasvika nyaya iyi hapasisiri pezera ravo asi reZifa neSRC. Murairidzi weTriangle Taurayi Mangwiro anoti ane chivimbo chekuti mitambo ichaenderera mberi achiwedzera iye kuti panguva ino vatambi vavo vachange vachiita gadziriro vari kudzimba. Muongorori wemutambo wenhabvu VaJustice Muzanenhamo vanoti nemamiriro akaita zvinhu hurumende yagona kumisa mitambo. Aka kave kechipiri mitambo ichimiswa nehurumende nemhaka yechirwere cheCovid 19 chakatanga kupararira munyik gore rapera.

headline: Hurumende Inokurudzirwa Kutsigira, Kusimbaradza Mari Itsva
text: Bhanga guru renyika, reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, razivisa kuti richadhinda mari itsva ichange ichishandiswa mumabhanga serimwe rematanho ariri kutora mukugadzirisa nyaya yekushomeka kwemari munyika, pamwe nekugadzirisa zvinhu mumabhanga nemisika yemari munyika. Muzvinafundo Elliot Masocha, vanodzidzisa zvemabhizimusi paDevry University ku Ohio, vanoti vanhu vanoda mari yavanoshandisa, naizvozvo danho ratorwa neReserve Bank of Zimbabwe idanho rakanaka kana hurumende ikatevedzera mitemo nemirairo yezvehupfumi hwenyika inotevedzwa nenyika dzepasi pose, kwete zvokuzoramba ichidhinda mari pavanenge vazvifunga. Muzvinafundo Masocha vati hurumende inofanirwa kuratidza vanhu kuti inovimbika kwete kudhinda mari nguva dzese zvinozokonzera kuti mari yacho ishaye huremerera. "Vanhu vanoda kuona mari yavo mumavoko kwete kuudzwa kuti iri mukati mefoni yavanoshandisa, saka kana hurumende ikaunza mari iyi vanhu vangafara nekuti zvema RTGS hazvisi zvinovafadza. Asi hurumende inosungirwavo kuchengetedza chiremera chemari iyi nekurega zvekuzodhindadhinda mari sezvayaimboita makore apfuura," Professor Masocha vaudza Studio 7. No media source currently available

headline: Danho reSouth Africa reKunyevenutsa Mutemo weKudzivirira Kupararira kweCovid-19 Rotambirwa neMufaro
text: Mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa vakazivisa neChitatu manheru kuti hurumende yavo yave kuzonyevenutsa mitemo yakasiyanasiyana ine chekuita nekudzivirirwa kwekupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 . VaRamaphosa vakazivisa kuti kubva pakati peusiku hwemusi weSvondo 20 Gunyana nyika inenge yave kuenda pa Level 1 ye lockdown, zvichitevera kudzikira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kuvhenekwa vaine chirwere ichi munyika iyi. VaRamaphosa vakazivisawo kuti kutanga musi wa 01 Gumiguru, South Africa inenge yovhura miganho yayo uye kubvumidza vashanyi vanopinda nendege pamwe nepamiganho yayo vanenge vaine magwaro anoratidza kuti vakavhenekwa Covid-19 mukati memaawa makumi manomwe nemaviri kana kuti 72 hours. Vakati vanenge vasina magwaro aya vanozoendeswa kunzvimbo dzinochengeterwa vanenge vakamirira kuvhenekwa kuona kana vaine Covid-19, kana kuti quarantine centres. Vashanyi vanobva kunyika dzinozivikanwa kuti dzine dambudziko reCovid-19 vakanzi vanogona kurambidzwa kupinda munyika iyi. Mutungamiri wesangano reInternational Cross Border Traders Association, VaDenis Juru vanoti vana veZimbabwe vari muSouth Africa vakatambira nemufaro mukuru danho rekunyevenutsa lockdown iri, sezvo vanga vasingawanewo mari yekubatsirika yanga ichipiwa zvizvarwa zveSouth Africa. VaJuru vanotiwo kuvhurwa kwemiganho, zvikuru weBeitbridge kuchatambirwa nemufaro mukuru nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe, izvo zvagara zvichishandisa muganhu uyu kunotenga pamwe nekutengesa zvinhu muSouth Africa Vanoti vanotarisira kuti hurumende yeZimbabwe ichazivisawo nezvekuvhurwa kwemuganhu weBeitbrdge kuitira kuti vanhu vakwanise kiupinda munyika dzose zvisina dambudziko. No media source currently available

headline: Ma’gym’ ngaavhurwe: Musonda
text: PUROMOTA wetsiva — Clyde Musonda, uyo anove maneja zvekare nemurairidzi wemutambo uyu — anoti kuvharwa kwemagym kuri kukanganisa zvikuru vatambi vemuno avo vari kuenda kunorwa kunze kwenyika vasina kunyatsogadzirira.    Svondo radarika, shasha yetsiva — Tinashe ‘Chairman’ Mwadziwana — akakundwa kunyika yeNamibia naNathaniel Kakololo apo vairwira bhande reAfrican Boxing Union Featherweight.    Musonda anoti kuuya kweCovid-19 kwakakanganisa zvizhinji kuvatambi vetsiva sezvo vave kuenda kunokwikwidza kunze kwenyika vasina kugadzirira zvakakwana.   Izvi zvinotevera kumiswa kwakaitwa mitambo yose munyika muno muna Kurume gore rapera senzira yekuedza kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   “Kukundwa kwakaita Chairman kuNamibia, haisi nyaya yekuti mutambi waakarwa naye anogona manhingi, kwete. Asi kuti Chairman haana kuwana nguva ndefu yekunyatsogadzirira. Sekuziva kwemunhu wese, iye zvino magym akavharwa uye mitambo haisi kutenderwa. Saka topedzisira tave kutsvaga dzimwe nzira dzekuti aite gadziriro dzake zvekungoti aende kunozadzikisa mitambo yake,” anodaro.    Musonda anoenderera mberi achiti, “Asi kana mutambi ane ngura akaenda kunorwa zvinogona kurema sezvo anenge ave nenguva ndefu akangogara asiri kukwikwidza, izvo zviri kuitwa nevatambi vedu vari kuenda kunorwa kunze kwenyika.”   Vatambi vazhinji vetsiva vari kuenda kunorwa kunze kunyika dzakaita seNamibia, Tanzania, South Africa neMalawi uko tsiva iri kutenderwa kutambwa.      Musonda anoti dai mutambo uyu wachidzorwa muno sezvawakaitwa kune dzimwe nyika uko uri kutenderwa kutambwa asi pasina vatsigiri.    “Tave kungochema kuti dai mutambo uyu wachidzoswa muno nekuti tinotyira remangwana revatambi vedu kuti ringakanganisike.    “Kune dzimwe nyika uri kutambwa pasina vatsigiri. Saka  tinoona kuti muno ukadzoswa uchinzi utambwe pasina vatsigiri zvinobatsira vatambi vedu vagare vachitamba kuitira apo vakazoenda kunorwira mabhande makuru kunze kwenyika vanenge vasina ngura,” anodaro Musonda.

headline: Kubva Zvavhurwa Mabhodha, Vanhu Makumi Mapfumbamwe Vobatwa neCovid-19 Vabva kuSouth Africa
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu zana nemumwe kana kuti 101 vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nemusi weSvondo. Pavanhu ava, makumi mana nevatanhatu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika vamwe makumi mashanu nevashanu vakabva nacho kuSouth Africa. Kubva zvavhurwa miganhu yenyika musi wa 1 Zvita, vanhu makumu mapfumbamwe vakabva kuSouth Africa vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi munyika. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira munyika vave zvuru gumi nemazana manomwe ane gumi nevasere. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi vave zvuru zvisere nemazana masere nemakumi masere kana kuti 8, 880 zvichitevera kupora kwevamwe vanhu makumi matatu nevatanhatu nezuro. Vanhu vachiri kurwara vave churu chimwe chete nemazana mashanu nemakumi mana nevanomwe kana kuti 1, 547. Vanhu vafa vachiri mazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemumwe kana kuti 291 uye nezuro hakuna akarasikirwa nehupenyu. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nezvuru mazana maviri kana kuti 2, 2 million vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zvuru makumi mashanu nezvitatu zvine mazana mashanu nemakumi mana nevatatu kana kuti 53, 543. Vapora vadarika miriyoni imwe chete nezvuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 1,9 million. South Africa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu nemanomwe kana kuti 67 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vadarika zvuru mazana maviri nemakumi masere nemaviri kana kuti kuti 282, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni gumi nemana nezvuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 14, 5 million. Pasi rose, vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 1, 5 million. Asi vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi mana nematatu kana kuti 43 million.

headline: Vanotengesa Mumigwagwa Vodzokera kuMabasa Avo
text: Rimwe remasangano anomirira vanoita mabasa ekutengesa mumigwagwa reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation (VISET) rinoti riri kufara nemafambiro aita zvinhu muHarare nhasi apo nhengo dzaro dzadzokera kumabasa. Mutungamiri wesangano iri, VaSamuel Wadzai, vanoti pane zvinoda kugadziriswa nemakanzuru nehurumende zvakaita sekuwanikwa kwemvura munzvimbo dzinotengesera veruzhinji nezvikwanisiro zveCovid-19. Vanoti vakatarisira kuti hurumende ichaita zvirongwa zvekudzidzisa vatengesi pamusoro penhomba yeCovid-19 iri kubaiwa vamwe pari zvino kuitira kuti vatengesi vemumigwagwa vave nechivimbo nayo. "Tiri kutarisira kuti hurumende itange zvirongwa zvekudzidzisa vanotengesa mumigwagwa nezve nhomba irikubaiwa vanhu kutira kuti vazhinji vawane ruvimbo ne nhomba iyi," vadaro VaWadzai. Kudzokera kwevanhu ava mumigwagwa kunotevera kunyevenutswa kwemitemo yeCovid-19 kwakaitwa neMuvhuro nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. No media source currently available

headline: Hatina kutenga Mahachi: Chicken Inn
text: MURAIRIDZI weChicken Inn — Joey “Mafero” Antipas — okurudzira Kudakwashe Mahachi kuti agadzirise nyaya dzake idzo dzakamumomotera uye ndokuti chikwata chake hachisi kutarisira kumutenga sezviri kutenderera pamadandemudande eSocial Media.   Mahachi akamiswa kutamba nhabvu nechikwata chake cheSupersport United chekuSouth Africa nekuda kwenyaya yaari kupomerwa yekunzi akapisa mwanakomana wake nemvura izvo zvakaona achikuvara kusvika pakudamburwa gumbo.   Nyaya iyi iri kumatare edzimhosva pamwe nedzimwe dzichiri kuferefetwa nemapurisa.   Mafero anoti Mahachi mutambi wepamusoro wekuti zvikwata zvakawanda zvinogona kumutenga, asi panguva ino anofanirwa kumbogadzirisa nyaya dziri kukanganisa hupenyu hwake.   “Isu hatisi kutarisira kutenga Kuda Mahachi sezviri kutaurwa nevanhu. Tinoyemura kuti mutambi ane tarenda guru zvekuti zvikwata zvakawanda zvinogona kumutenga. Asi, panguva ino ini ndinomukurudzira kuti ngaambogadzirise nyaya dzehupenyu hwake.   “Nyaya dzaakatarisana nadzo ihuru chaizvo saka ngaaise pfungwa dzake ikoko. Isu seChicken Inn hatisi kuda kumutenga,” anodaro Mafero.   Zvakadai, kubva patanga mitambo yePremier Soccer League mwaka uno, chikwata chaMafero ndicho chiri kutungamira apo mwaka wa2022 wave muchikamu chechipiri.    Joey Antipas   Mafero anoti chikwata chake chiri kutamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura nekuda kwekuti chakasimba zvikuru izvo zvachiona chichitungamira palogo kwenguva refu.   Asi anoti zvakakosha kuti vatambi vake var[1]ambe vachitamba nhabvu yepamusoro uye vakazvininipisa sezvo rwendo rwePSL ruchiri rurefu.   “Tine chikwata chakasimba chiri kutamba zvinonwisa mvura saka zvakakosha kuti tirambe tichitamba nhabvu yepamusoro tiwane mukana wekuhwina mukombe wePSL. Ndinoziva kuti pachiri negomo guru rekukwira ratakatarisana naro asi tinofanirwa kuramba tichishanda nesimba uye takaz vininipis a pamitambo inenge ichiuya,” anodaro Mafero.   Nemusi weMugovera svondo rino, Chicken Inn ichange iri pamusha panhandare yeLuveve apo ichasangana neFC Platinum mumutambo unotarisirwa kunge uchi[1]nakidza kukunda ngoma kurira.   Mumutambo wekutanga wezvikwata zviviri izvi, uyo wakatambirwa kuMandava, FC Platinum yakahwina 2-1. Svondo radarika, zvikwata zviviri izvi zvaive kwaMutare uko kwakaona Chicken Inn ichizvambura Cranborne Bullets 4-1 kuchiti FC Platinum yakakunda Tenax 2-0.   Mutambowazvo wesvondo rino uchange uchibuda paZTN Prime.   Mune mimwe mitambo iriko svondo rino, Harare City ichange iri pamusha apo ichasangana neCAPS United nemusi weMugovera, kuchiti DeMbare ichange iri pamusha zvakare ichatatsurana neTriangle United musi weSvondo rino.   KuBaobab Stadium kuchaona Ngezi Platinum ichisangana neHighlanders nemusi weSvondo unove mumwe yemitambo ichabuda pa ZTN Prime.

headline: Sangano reCouncil on Foreign Relations rekuAmerica Rotyira Mhirizhonga Munyika
text: Rimwe sangano rekuAmerica, reCouncil on Foreign Relations, rinoti Zimbabwe inogona kupinda mumhirizhonga pamberi pesarudzo dza 2018 kana nyaya yekuti ndiani achatungamira nyika kana mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vachinge vazobva pachigaro. Sangano iri rinoti pane zvinhu zvishanu zvikuru zvisina kugadzikana apo nyika yatarisana nesarudzo, zvinoti nyaya yaVaMugabe yekuramba kudoma kuti ndiani achatora matomu, nekusagadzikana mubato reZanu PF. Zvimwe zvinonzi zviri kunetsa kusabatana kwemapato anopikisa kuti aumbe mushandira pamwe wakasimba, kuramba zvinhu zvoenda kumawere munyaya dzezveupfumi, uyewo kuderera kwetarisiro yekuti nyika dzakatenderedza Zimbabwe dzinozogona kutora matanho ekudzivirira mhirizhonga munyika. Panyaya yekunetsana muZanu PF, sangano iri rinoti kunyange hazvo vakuru vemauto nevasori vari kuita sevari kutsigira chikwata cheLacoste, icho chinonzi chinotsigira mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa muhondo yacho neG40, iyo inonzi inotsigira Amai Grace Mugabe, zvinonetsa kufembera kuti magumo acho akamira sei mukunetsana uku. Sangano reCouncil on Foreign Relations iri riri kukurudzira kuti America itsvage nzira dzekudzivirira nadzo kusagadzikana pamwe nemhirizhonga muZimbabwe, uyewo kuderedza hudzamu hwedambudziko iri, kana richinge razoitika. Asi nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika vari mukumuru wesangano re Zimbabwe Democracy Institute, Doctor Pedzisai Ruhanya vanoti havawirirane nezvose zviri kutaurwa nesangano iri. Dorctor Ruhanya vanoti kunyange munyika kana mubato reZanu PF makanzi hamuna kugadzikana, havaone Zimbabwe ichipinda mudambudziko rakaita kutyirwa nesangano iri, vachiti hapasati pave nehumbowo hwekuti mauto kana vasori vangangokonzeresa kusagadzikana. Vanoti havawirirane nesangano iri zvakare panyaya yekuti nyika dzakavakidzana neZimbabwe dzinogona kusave nematanho adzinotora kana makaita mhirizhonga, vachiti sangano reSADC rakatorakidza kare kuti rakagadzirira kugadzirisa matambudziko enhengo dzaro sezvarakaita muLesotho. Doctor Ruhanya vanotiwo vanokurudzira masangano nenyika dzekunze, zvikuru dzekumawirira, kuti vasanyanye kuda kutaura nezveZimbabwe, asi kuti vazvisiire kunyika dzemuAfrica dzakaita saana South Africa.

headline: Imwe Nhengo yeKomisheni yeSarudzo muKenya Yopondwa Ukuwo VaOdinga Vachiramba Kutambira Zvakabuda Musarudzo
text: Vakakundwa musarudzo dzekuKenya VaRaila Odinga varamba kutambira zvakabuda musarudzo dzakakundwa naVaWilliam Ruto. VaOdinga vaudza vatori venhau kuti havana kufara nekufambiswa kwakaitwa sarudzo nekomisheni yeIndependent Electoral and Boundaries Commission. Nhengo ina panomwe dzekomisheni iyi dzakti sarudzo hadzina kufambiswa zvakanaka. Mapurisa emuKenya ati mumwe komishina VaDaniel Musyoka vakawanikwa vakapondwa mushure mekupambwa nemusi weChina. Sachigaro IEBC iyi VaWafuli Chebukati vati nhengo dzekomisheni yavo dziri kushiungurudzwa zvakanayanya. VaOdinga vane mazuva manomwe ekuti vaende kumatare kunopikisa zvakabuda musarudzo. Asi kunyangwe pachine mutauro pakufambiswa kwesarudzo, mutungamiri wenyikaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakatotumira mashoko ekukorokotedza VaRuto nekukunda musarudzo. Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reNational Constitutional Assembly vari nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemitemo Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku vati bumbiro remutemo weKenya rinobvumidza VaOdinga kupikisa zvakabuda musarudzo.

headline: Handiende: Chiyangwa. . . ‘Ini ndini ndine yese’
text: MUTUNGAMIRI wesangano rinoona nezvenhabvu munyika muno reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) – Phillip Chiyangwa – anoti kunyangwe zviite sei ndiye ari kutonga uye haasi kuzobva pachigaro chinopisa ichi.   Captain Fiasco kana kuti Phidza, semazita emadunhurirwa aChiyangwa, ndiye ega achamira pasarudzo dzichaitwa dzekusarudza mutungamiri mutsva weZifa musi waZvita 1 sezvo vamwe vaida kukwikwidza kupinda pachigaro ichi vakakundikana nekuda kwekuti vaive vasina magwaro akakwana anotarisirwa kuti vange vachikwikwidza.   “Kunyangwe ndikarwara zvekundisunda mubhara chaimo, ndini ndiri kutonga uye ndicharamba ndichitonga.   “Vanoda kundirwisa, asi hapana zvavanoita kana kwavanosvika. Isu ndisu tine yese, musi wa1 kungonzi panyanga ka, tatopinda panyanga,” anodaro Chiyangwa.   Anoenderera mberi achiti kunyangwe vanhu vakataura zvakawanda-wanda, hapana zvazvinoshandura nekuti mutungamiri wesangano rinoona nezvenhabvau pasi rose reFederation International de Football Association (Fifa) – Gianni Infantino – anoteerera zvinenge zvataurwa naiye (Chiyangwa) chete kana dziri nyaya dzine chekuita nezvenhabvu yemuno.   “Vanhu kunyangwe vakataura zvavanotaura, hapana zvazvinoshandura, Gianni Infantino anongoteerera zvandinenge ndataura ini chete kwete vamwe vese.   “Munenge muchipedza nguva yenyu kana muchinyora matsamba enyu muchitaura kudii kudii, zvavamunenge muchiita. Ini ndini waanoterera chete nekuti ndini ndiri panyanga,” anodaro.   Chiyangwa anoti kuti nhabvu yemuno inyatsosimba, Hurumende inofanirwa kupindira yotsigira mutambo uyu nemari sezvinoitwa kune dzimwe nyika kuti basa ravo rinyatsofamba zvakanaka uye nekuita zvirongwa zvakasiyana.   Anoti kusapindira kweHurumende kunovadzosera kumashure zvikuru izvo zvinozovaona dzimwe dzenguva vachisvika pakuburitsa mari dzavo dzemuhomwe kuti vakwanise kufambisa basa reZifa rinosanganisira kubhadhara vatambi kana kuvatumira kunze kwenyika kumitambo yakasiyana.   “Zvatinoona kune dzimwe nyika, Hurumende inofanirwa kupindira yodira mari mumutambo uyu kuti zvitibatsire kufambisa basa redu. Dzimwe dzenguva tinosvika pakuburitsa mari dzedu dzemuhomwe kuti tiwane kubatanidza zviendeke titumire vakomana kumitambo yavo izvo zvinove zvisingafanirwe kuitika.   “Tikawana rutsigiro rwemari kubva kuHurumende, zvinhu zvedu zvoshanduka zvotifambira zvakanaka,” anodaro Chiyangwa.

headline: Vanochera Mangoda Voita Hurukuro neVagari kwaMutare
text: Mutauriri weZimbabwe Consolidated Diamond Company, VaSugar Chagonda, vanoti hurumende ichaita musangano mukuru muguta reMutare apo ichagara pasi nemasangano akazvimiririra, vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, makambani anochera mangoda vakaita seZimbabwe Consolidated Diamond Company. Mukuru weCenter for Natural Resources Governance, VaFarai Maguwu, avo vachange vachitaurawo pamusangano uyu, vanoti musangano uyu uri kutarisa kuzeya nyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu, kugovana kwemari nematunhu ane zvicherwa uye kuti vanhu vaite zvokupiwa mvumo yekupinda munzvimbo iyi. No media source currently available

headline: SADC Troika Inoti Mozambique Ngaibatsirwe Izvozvi
text:
Nyika dzinoumba bazi rerinoona nezverunyararo nekudzivirirwa kwenyika
dziri mudunhu reSouthern African Development Community, SADC Troika- nhasi dzabuda nechisunga chekuti paitwe musangano wechimbichimbi mwedzi uno usati wapera wekuzeya matanho angatorwe kumisa hondo iri kukonzerwa nevanopfurikidza mwero mudunhu reCabo Delgado muMozambique. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vasangana ndokukurukura nevamwe vatungamiri venyika dzinoumba SADC Double Troika iyo ine mutungamiri weMozambique, VaFilipe Jacinto Nyusi, sasachigaro wayo, Dr Lazarus Chakwena vekuMalawi, VaHusseini Ali Mwinyi vekuTanzania pamwe nevatungamiri venyika dzinoumba bazi reOrgan on Politics, Defence and Security Cooperation vanoti sachigaro VaMokgweetsi Masisi vekuBotswana naVaCyril Ramaphosa vekuSouth Africa. VaMwinyi vanga vakamirira mutungamiri wavo, Amai Samia Saluhu Hassan, avo vange vasiri pamusangano uyu. Mugwaro razivisa zvabuda mumusangano uyu munyori weSADC, VaStergomena Lawrence Tax, vazivisa kuti vatungamiri venyika vari kushushikana zvikuru nekuurayiwa kuri kuitwa vanhuwo zvavo, madzimai nevana nevanopfurikidza mwero veAl Shabab. VaTax vati nekudaro musangano weDouble Troika wati paitwe musangano
wechimbichimbi weOrgan Troika Summit musi wa29 Kubvumbi uyo uchazeya matanho achatorwa kumisa hondo iri kukonzerwa nevanopfurikidza mwero ava. Gweta uye vari mukuru wesangano reHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe
kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vati vanga vachitarisira kuti musangano uyu ubude nechisungo chakajeka chekuyamura Mozambique kwete kunonokera wavari kuita vanhu vachifa.

VaMavhinga vati ongororo yavakaita yakaburitsa pachena kuti vanhu
vakawanda vari kutyorerwa kodzero dzavo nevapanduki veAl Shabab pamwe nemauto eMozambique.

VaMavhinga vati chimwe chinoshamisa ndechekuti Mozambique
haisi kubuda pachena kuti inoda ruyamuro rwedzimwe nyika here kana kuti kwete asi zvichioneka pachena kuti mauto ayo haana simba rekukunda vapanduki ava.

Mutauriri weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaMarvellous Khumalo, vati
havasi kunyatsofara nezvabuda mumusangano wanhasi nekuti SADC iri kunonoka kupindiria panguva iyo vanhu vari kufa.

Izvi zvatsigirwa negweta rinoona nezvekodzero dzevanhu munyika
yeZambia VaMuleta Kapatiso avo vanoti pamutemo nyika dzinosungirwa
kuyamura imwe nekukurumidza kana yave kurwiswa nevapanduki.

Mumwe mugari wemuMozambique, Amai Nzira De Deus, vati madzimai
nevanasikana vari kubatwa chibharo mazuva ose. Stuio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa zvimwe zvabuda mumusangano wanhasi kumutauriri waVaMnangagwa, VaGeorge Charamba, sezvo vanga vasiri kubatika panharembozha yavo. Asi pane mashoko ekuti SADC yawiriranawo kuti ipe Mozambique rubatsiro rwezvikwanisiro izvozvi panguva iyo mumwe musangano uri kurongwa kuitwa. Sangano reUnited Nations vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi , 670 000, vanonzi vakatiza misha yavo mudunhu reCabo Delgado, vachityira hupenyu hwavo. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe muZimbabwe Vanoti Morocco Inokwanisa Kusimudza Mukombe weWorld Cup
text: Chikwata cheMorocco chasimudza chivimbo kuti mukombe weWorld Cup ungangouya kuAfrica kekutanga munhoroondo yemakundano aya. Morocco yasimudza chivimbo chakasimba muvatsigiri venhabvu muZimbabwe nemuAfrica yese mushure mekupinda musemi fainari ye2022 World Cup nekurova Portugal 1-0 mumutambo wekota fainari. Mukuita izvi maAtlas Lions aita chikwata chekutanga muAfrica kusvika musemi fainari yeWorld Cup kubvira makundano aya aparurwa muna 1930. Dzimwe nyika dzakaita zviri nani mumakundano aya dzakagumira mumakotafainari uye dzinoti Senegal, Ghana neCameroon. Mutsigiri wemutambo wenhabvu VaSaymore Mandara vanoti Morocco ichashamisa vakawanda nekuunza mukombe weWorld Cup kuAfrica. Muna 1986, Morocco ndiyo zvekare yakaita chikwata chekutanga muAfrica kusvika muRound of 16 yemakundano aya. Morocco nemusi weChitatu iri kusangana neFrance iyo yakarova England 2-1 mukota fainari nezuro manheru. Chivimbo muchikwata ichi chasimuka mushure mekunge Morocco yakapunzira pasi zvikwata zvine mukurumbira zvinoti Belgium, Spain nePortugal. Mumwe mutsigiri wenhabvu VaVincent Bushu vanoti kuti Morocco ichasvika mufainari yeWorld Cup iyi. Pamusoro pezvo, Morocco haisati yakundwa pamitambo misere yakateverana uyezve yanwiswa chibodzwa chimwechete chete pamitambo iyi. Morocco ir ikurairidzwa nemurairidzi we munyika iyi Walid Regragui. Muongorori wemutambo wenhabvu VaGibson Nyikadzaramba vanoti Africa yese iri kuda kuti Morocco iite zvakanaka, Ruzhinji rwuri kuda kuti Morocco idarike pairi apa nekuti yatoita kare zvanga zvisingatarisirwe. Asi mutambo neFrance wakaoma sezvo nyika iyi iri kuda kuva nyika yekutanga kusimudza mukombe weWorld Cup mumakwikwi akatevedzana zvakapedzisira kuitwa neBrazil muna 1962. Uye nevatambi vakaita saOlivier Giroud naKylian Mbappe, mutambo uyu wakaoma zvikuru kuMorocco iyo yawisa hayo mikono yakawanda kuQatar.  Imwe semi fainari pakati peArgentina neCroatia iriko musi weChipiri. Croatia iyo yaimbenge iri pasi peYugoslavia yakatanga kuzvitonga muna 1992 ikatanga kukwikwidza muWorld Cup yakazvimirira muna 1998. Kubva mumakore aya yasvika mumasemi fainari katatu. Mutambi wayo ane mukurumbira ndiLuca Modric weReal Madrid. Argentina yakasimudza mukombe uyukaviri, muna 1978 uye 1986 ichitungamirirwa namushakabvu Diego Maradona. Iko zvino chitsvambe chiri kuna Lionel Messi uyu ari kufunguiudzirwa kuti ave kutamba makwikwi ake ekupedzisira muWorld Cup sezvo ave nemakore makumi matatu nemashanu. Fainari ye2022 World Cup iriko musi wesvondo, svondo rinouya. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Makumi Matanhatu neVapfumbamwe Vofa neCovid-19 muNyika
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika huri kuramba huchikwira mushure mekunge vamwe vanhu vaviri vashaya vari muzvipatara kuBulawayo. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kusvika parizvino vasvika zviuru makumi matanhatu nevapfumbabwe kana kuti 69. Nemusi weMugovera kwakaita huwandu hunotyisa hwevanhu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi apo vanhu mazana mana nemakumi mapfumbamwe kana kuti 490 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi mushure mekunge vavhenekwa. Pavanhu vose ava kunze kwevashanu chete, vamwe vose vakabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Brighton Chireka vanoti zviri pachena kuti chirwere chadzika midzi munyika. No media source currently available Vanhu vavhenekwa chirwere ichi munyika vadarika zviuru zana nemakumi matatu nevaviri kana kuti 132, 000. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi vasvika zviuru zvitatu nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 3,659. Pavanhu vashaya, Harare ndiyo ine vakawandisa vanosvka makumi matatu nemumwe ichiteverwa neBulawayo ine makumi maviri. Pamatunhu ose emunyika, Masvingo chete ndiro dunhu risina kana munhu mumwe chete ashaya. Tichiri panyaya iyi, kunyangwe hazvo zvinhu zvasvika pakaipisisa panyaya yerkupararira kwechirwere checoronavirus, kuramwa mabasa kwevashandi vemuzvipatara kusanganisira vakoti navanachiremba kwave mumwedzi weChipiri kuri kuenderera mberi. Nemusi weChishanu mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vachitaura kumarinda eHeroes Acre pakuvigwa kwegamba renyika VaPerrance Shiri vakakumbira vanachiremba kuti vadzokere kumabasa sevanhu vane chido chenyika yavo pamoyo. Vakati hurumende iri kuteerera zvichemo zvavo asi hazvifanire kugadziriswa vanhu vachifa. Asi mutauriri wesangano ravanachiremba vakuru reSenior Hospital Doctors Association Dr Aaron Musara vanoti hurumende haina kana kubvira yataura navo kubva zvavatangawo kuramwa mabasa nemusi weChina. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Nurses Association VaEnoch Dongo vanotiwo kuramwa mabasa kuri kuendera mberi nekuti zvichemo zvavo hazvisi kugadziriswa. No media source currently available Hatina kukwanisa kubata vakafanobata chigaro chegurukota rezvehutano VaAmon Murwira sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo asi ivo negurukota rezvemari VaMthuli Ncube vakambovimbisa kugadzirisa nyaya yekuramwa mabasa kwevashandi vemuzvipatara. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mana nevana kana kuti 944, 000 vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vafa vadarika zviuru gumi nezvipfumbamwe zvine mazana mapfumbamawe nemakumi maviri kana kuti 19, 920. Vapora vadarika zviuru mazana matanhatu nezviviri kana kuti 602, 000. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni gumi memanomwe ane zviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 17, 5 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi muAmerica vadarika zviuru zana ne makumi shanu nenomwe kana kuti 154, 000. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vadarika zviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi masere nemashanu kana kuti 685,000.  Vapora pasi rose vachidarika mamiriyoni gumi nezviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 10,5 million.

headline: Vamwe Varimi Votsigira Kurambidzwa kweZvirimwa Zvekunze Munyika
text: Rimwe sangano revarimi reZimbabwe Commercial Farmers Union, ZCFU, rinoti rinotsigira zvakanyanya danho rakaziviswa nehurumende rekuti yave kumisa kupinzwa munyika kwezvirimwa zvakaita sehanyanisi, matomati, nechibage pamwe neupfu. Asi sangano iri rinoti panyaya yechibage hurumende yaifanirwa kutanga yaona kuti goho remwaka uno rakamira sei, yozoti yoona kuti chibage chingadiwa kubva kunze kwenyika chakawanda zvakadii. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekurima vachiona nezvezvirimwa nemadiridziro, VaDavis Mharapira, vakaudza bepanhau reSunday Mail kuti hurumende pari zvino yambomira kupa marezinesi ekupinzwa kwehanyanisi nemadomasi, uye kubva musi wa 30 Kubvumbi gore rino inenge isisabvumidzi kupinzwa kwechibage neupfu munyika. VaMharapira vakati hurumende yatora danho iri senzira yekudzivirira varimi vemunyika kubva kuzvirimwa zvekunze izvo zvine mitengo yakaderera. Asi mutungamiri wesangano reZCFU, VaWonder Chabikwa, vanoti ongororo yezvirimwa iri kuitwa nebazi reAgritex inoratidza kuti matunhu ari kuchamhembe kwenyika atotarisana nedambudziko rekushaikwa kwemvura, izvo zvichaita kuti nyika ide chibage chakawanda kubva kunze. VaChabikwa vanoti kunyange hazvo goho remwaka wapera rakanga riri nani pane mamwe makore adarika, harikwanisi zvakare kuyambutsa nyika kusvika pakukohwa kwemwaka uno. Vanotiwo ongororo yeAgritex ndiyo ichabatsira kuti paonekwe kuti goho rawanikwa rakadii, chikafu chingada kuwedzerwa chakadii, izvo zvichaita kuti hurumende itange zvakare kubvumidza kupinzwa kwechibage munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Zim shasha yeIKF Africa Champions
text: CHIKWATA cheZimbabwe Korfball chakasimudza mureza wenyika kuZambia uko chakahwina mukombe weInternational Korfball Federation (IKF) Africa Champions ndokuwana tikiti rekunokwikwidza kuWorld Cup iyo ichatambirwa kuChinese Taipei gore rinotevera.   Achitaura vachangodzoka kubva kuZambia, mutungamiri weZimbabwe Korfball Association arizve mutungamiri weIKF Africa – Tarirai Chadebah – anoti chikwata chavo chine mufaro mukuru nekukunda kwachakaita.   Kuhwina kwavakaita kuZambia kunoreva kuti Zimbabwe pari zvino ndiyo iri pamusoro muAfrica yese mumutambo wekorfball. Africa ichange ichamirirwa neZimbabwe neMorocco iyo yakahwina mutambo werimwe boka reNorthern Region.   “Senyika, tiri kufara kuti takakunda kuZambia ndokuhwina tikiti rekuenda kuWorld Cup ichatambwa gore rinotevera kuChinese Taipei.   “Kuhwina tikiti iri pamwe chete neMorocco kunoreva kuti senyika tiri kufamba mugwara chairo uye tiri kuziva zvatiri kuita. Saka tinofanirwa kuramba tichishanda nesimba kuti tirambe tichisimukira mumutambo uyu,” anodaro Chadebah.   Anoti chikwata chavo hachisi kumbozvipa nguva yekuzorora nekuti vanoda kubva vatotanga gadziriro dzeWorld Cup izvozvi.   “Tinoziva kuti patinoenda kuWorld Cup tinotarisirwa pasi asi isu tinoda kunorwa semvumba kumutambo uyu tigovarakidza kuti tiri shashawo.   “Saka hatina nguva yekuzorora, takangobva kuZambia ndokusvika takutotanga kuronga rwendo rwedu rwekuenda kuChinese Taipei kumutambo uyu,” anodaro Chadebah.

headline: Mapato eMDC Alliance neMDC-T Otarisirwa Kunetsana Pamusoro peZita
text: Pave nemaonero akasiyanasiyana pagakava ramuka pamberi pesarudzo dza2023 pakati pemapato eMDC Alliance neMDC-T pamusoro pezita rekuti MDC Alliance, zvichitevera mashoko emutungamiri weMDC-T, VaDouglas mwonzora ekuti vanogona kupinda musarudzo dz2023 vari pasi pezita rekuti MDC alliance. Mmwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaTendai Biti, vakazobudawo zvakare panhepfenyuro yeHeart and Soul Television vachiti bato ravo ringangopinda musarudzo riri pasi perimwe zita kuitira kuti nyaya yezita isazovakanganisa. Asi VaBiti vanonzi vakati vanofanirwa kuramba vachishandisa zita rekuti MDC, vozoisa rimwe mberi risiri Alliance kuitira kuramba vakabata rutsigiro rwavanga vaunganidza pasi peMDC Alliance. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaRejoice Ngwenya, vanoti VaMwonzora nebato ravo reMDC-T havafanirwe kuswera vachida kukambira zita rekuti MDC Alliance nekuti kubva zvakabuda mutongo wedare reSupreme Court uchiti MDC-T ndiro bato riri pamutemo, pamwe chete nekutora pfuma yose yeMDC Alliance, zvakatoratidza kuti mapato aya akasiyana. VaNgwenya vanoti MDC-T inofanirwa kuramba iri mudanga rayo, kwete kuti ide kukanganisa zvakare vari kumhanya vari mugwanza reMDC Alliance. Vanotiwo hazvizoshamisi kuona MDC-T ichipinda musarudzo ichinzi MDC Alliance, vachiti pasi peZanu PF chese chinhu chinogona kuitika. Vamwe vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGilbert Dzikiti, vanotiwo sezvo MDC-T riri iro bato rakaonekwa nedare reSupreme Court kuti ndiro riri pamutemo, zviri pamutemo kuti bato iri rive iro rinopinda mumubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance. VaDzikiti varambawo zvakare mashoko kana muono wekuti Zanu PF ndiyo ine chekuita nekunetsana kuri mumapato maviri aya, vachiti matambudziko ari muMDC haana kutanga nhasi asi kuti akakonzerwa nevaive mutungamiri webato iri, mushakabvu VaMorgan Tsvangirai mushure mekudoma kwavo vatevedzeri vavo vaviri, uye nekuda masimba kwevamwe vari mubato iri. No media source currently available

headline: Zanu-PF Yorambidza VaVan Hoogstraten Kupa Huchapupu Ichityira Kuti Vangafukura Hapwa paNyaya yeHwange Colliery
text: Nhengo dzeZanu PF nemusi weMuvhuro dzakaramba kuti muzvinabhizinisi, VaNick van Hoogstraten, avo vanove mumwe wevaridzi vekambani yemarasha, yeHwange Colliery, vape humbowo mudare iri. VaVanHoogstraten vaida kupa humbowo maererano nemafambisirwe ebasa mukambani iyi izvo zvisina kufadza sachigaro wekomiti yezvezvicherwa, VaTemba Mliswa, avo vazivisa kuti vanogona kusiya basa ravo. Godwin Mangudya anotipa nyaya inotevera. Kunze kwehurumende, VaVan Hoogstraten, ndivo vane zvikamu zvakawanda muHwange Colliery uye vange vakokwa neparamende kuti vazopa humbowo maerarano nemashandiro ekambani iyi sezvakaita vamwe asi izvi zvarambwa nenhengo dzeZanu PF. Nhengo dzeZanu PF dzakaita ruzha dzichiramba kuti VaVanHoogstraten vasape humbowo dzinosanganisira, mumiriri weBuhera West VaSoul Nzuma, mumiriri weChiredzi North, VaRoy Bhila, mumiriri weGutu West VaJohn Paradza. Nhengo idzi dzakapopotedzana nasachigaro wekomiti iyi VaTemba Mliswa avo vakati nhengo dzange dziri kusvibisa zita nechimiro chebato radzo sezvo izvi zvose zvange zviri kuitika mumaziso aVaVan Hoogstraten. VaVan Hoogstraten vakaratidza kusafara nezvange zviri kuitika uye vakati dai zvaibvira nhengo dzainge dziri kuita ruzha dzadzingwa mudare nenyaya yekurizvidza. Asi VaVan Hoogstraten vakaudzwa nenhengo idzi kuti harisi basa ravo kudziudza zvekuita. Mushure meawa rimwe rekukandirana makobvu nematete mabharani wedare reparemende, VaKenneth Chokuda, vakazokwanisa kudzima gakava iri pakatorwa danho rekuti VaVan Hoogstraten vachirega kupa humbowo sezvo nyaya kugadziriswa kana kuti Reconstruction yeHwange Colliery yave kumatare edzimhosva. VaMliswa vakatiwo zvakaitika hazvina kuvafadza zvachose uye vanoona sekuti hazviratidzi chimiro chakanaka chenhengo dzeparamende. VaMliswa avo vanozvimirira vati vakapihwa chigaro ichi neZanu PF uye zvinosuwisa kuti dzimwe nhengi muZanu PF hadzisi kuda kuti vari kuita huwori vasasikwe pachena. VaMliswa vakati vachataura nevakuru uye vachizivisa veruzhinji kuti vacharamba vari sachigaro wekomiti iyi here kana kuti kwete. Zvichakadai, VaVan Hoogstraten vakaudza vatori venhau kuti vachapikisa danho rakatorwa nehurumende rekuisa kambani yeHwange paReconstruction. Nyaya iyi yakaiswa kuHigh Court svondo rapfuura sezvinodiwa nemutemo weReconstruction Act, uye ndipo pachapihwa muakana vese vanezvikamu mukambani iyi wekupikisa kana kubvuma danho rakatorwa nehurumende. VaVan Hoogstraten vakati muHwange Colliery mune huwori hunotyisa zvekuti mukambani iyi muri kubuda mamiriyoni nemamiriyoni emadhora ekuAmerica asi pasina chiri kuuenda kuhurumende kana vamwe varidzi vekambani iyi. Vakati huwori hwakanyanya kukwira mukati memakore matatu apfuura apo gurukota rezvezvicherwa pari zvino VaWinston Chitando vaive sachigaro wekambani iyi. Vakati zvinhu zvakatombonyanya kuipa muHwange zvekuti pane imwe nguva vakatombokurudzira kuti mauto apinde mukambani iyi kuti apedze huwori hunotyisa hwainge hwoitika. VaVan Hoogstraten vakati kambani iyi iri kuita mibatanidzwa nemishandirapamwe nemakambani akawanda kubva kunyika dzakaita seChina uye kunyange ivo vaine zvikamu zvakawanda mukambani iyi havana chavari kuudzwa. Vakati hapana chingamutsiridze kambani iyi kunze kwekubvisa huwori uhwo vanoti hunozivikanwa nevatungamiriri venyika. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Vatambi rongerai remangwana’
text: ZVIKWATA zvemitambo yakasiyana zvokurudzirwa kuti zvibatsire vatambi kuti vakwanise kuita zvidzidzo zvakadai sezvemabhizimisi nemabhindauko emaoko kuitira kuti vagokwanisa kuwana zvinovararamisa mune remangwana apo vanenge vasisatambe mitambo iyi.   Kurudziro iyi yakapihwa nachamangwiza weGlow Petroleum, Aaron Chinhara, apo aive muenzi anoremekedzwa pamusangano mukuru wekuronga mwaka mutsva weRainbow Amateur Netball League (RANL) svondo radarika.   Chinhara – uyo anokotsvera RANL kuburikidza nekambani yake – anoti zvakakosha kuti vatambi panguva iyo vanenge vachiri kukwikwidza vadzidziswe kuchengetedza mari pamwe nekupihwa chenjedzo yekugadzirira ramangwana ravo.   Anoti zvinosuwisa zvikuru kuona dzaimbove nyanzvi dzemitambo yakasiyana vachikangwaya uye vachisekwa nevanhu asi ivo vaimbounza mufaro mukuru kunyika yose.   “Munoona vatambi vedu panguva yavanotamba, vanenge vachidiwa zvikuru vachiremekedzwa.   Asi pavanozosiya mitambo hapana anenge ave nehanya navo. Zvikangozivikanwa kuti ave kutambura, vanhu vachimuona achizvifambira vanotanga kumuseka.   “Saka tiri kuda kuti izvozvo zvisaitike kuvasikana vedu, ngativadzidzise vazvishandire nemaoko avo kuitira kuti pavanozosiya zvemitambo vawane zvekuita zvinovararamisa nemhuri dzavo, vasatambure. Ipapo ngatipakoshesei,” anodaro Chinhara.   Panguva ino apo nyaya dzekutorwa kwezvinodhakwa dziri kukurumbira, Chinhara anoti zvakakosha kuti vanasikana vemitambo yakasiyana, kusanganisira netball, vagare vachifundiswa kuipa kwetsika yekutora zvinodhaka sezvo zvichikanganisa remangwana ravo.   “Tiri kurarama panguva iyo kutorwa kwezvinodhaka kuri kuwanda mune vechidiki. Ngatisasiye vanasikana vedu vachipinda mazviri sezvo zvichizokanganisa hupenyu hwavo. Ngatiedze nepatinogona kuvapa chenjedzo yekuipa kwekutora zvinodhaka.   “Mune zvemitambo, kutorwa kwezvinodhaka kuri kuwanda izvo zviri kukanganisa hupenyu hwevakawanda. Saka nguva nenguva ngatiite hurukuro nevanasikana tichivadzidzisa kuti vasapinde mukutora zvinodhaka, vasakanganise hupenyu hwavo,” anodaro Chinhara.   Achitaurawo pamusangano uyu, munyori mukuru weRANL – Moses Gukumure – anoti zvikwata zvavo zvagadzirira kutanga kwemwaka mutsva zvisinei nezvimhingamipinyu zvavange vachisangana nazvo.   Anoti mwaka uno muligi reRANL muchange muine zvikwata 15 zvichakwikwidza, kuwedzera kubva pa11 izvo zvaivepo gore radarika.   “Tagadzirira kutanga kwemwaka wegore rino uyo tinovimba uchafamba zvakanaka. Tiri kuenderera mberi nemitambo yedu kunyangwe hazvo pane zvange zvichinetsa. Chikuru kuti mitambo yedu itambwe pasina chinokanganisa.   “Nguva yadarika, mitambo yedu yaimbokanganiswa nezvakawanda kusanganisira iyo Covid-19 chaiyo. Saka izvezvi tiri kutarira zviri mberi,” anodaro Gukumure.   Anoti RANL iri pakati pekuumba chikwata chimwe chete icho vanoda kuzotumira kunokwikwidza kunyika dzakaita seSouth Africa neScotland uye chichazosarudzwa pamutambo weIndependence Tournament.   “Tiri pakati pekuita hurukuro neshamwari dzatinodyidzana nadzo dziri kunze kunyika dzakaita seSouth Africa neScotland kuti tizotumira chikwata chedu kunokwikwidza ikoko. Tichaumba chikwata chedu pamutambo weIndependence Tournament apo pachazosarudzwa vatambi vanenge vadadisa,” anodaro Gukumure

headline: Godobori rosimudzira karate
text: CHIREMBA wechivanhu wemuguta reHarare, Sekuru Tasvu, avo kumusha vanobva kuMukumbura, kuMt Darwin, vosimudzira vechidiki mumutambo wekarate.   “Ini ndichikura kumusha kwangu kuMukumbura ndaifarira zvetsiva kana kuti mhanda nekudaro ndauya kuno kuHarare, ndinopinda mumitambo iyi yekarate netsiva ndichinzwa matambudziko akatarisana nevechidiki ava.   “Ndava kusvitsa makore maviri ndichibatsira vatambi vekarate. Izvozvi ndine vakomana vatatu vaiva vashaya mari yekukwira ndege kuenda kuJapan, ndakavatengera matikiti ekuenda nekudzoka uye kuvabatsira nemari yekudya nepekunogara,” vanodaro Sekuru Tasvu.   Vanoti vanofara nekuda kwechikwata chevakomana ava sezvo mumwe wavo akanouya nemenduru.   “Munguva pfupi yadarika, ndakaendesa chimwe chikwata cheKarate kunyika yeSouth Africa, ndikavabatsira nemari yekukwira mabhazi nepekunorara nekudya kusvikira vadzoka,” vanodaro Sekuru Tasvu.   Sensei Malvern Chomusora (37), uyo ane Black Belt Second Dun mumutambo wekarate weKyokshin, mumwe wevatambi vakabatsirwa kuenda kuJapan naSekuru Tasvu uko anoti kwaikwikwidzwa nenyanzvi dzakabva kunyika makumi maviri neimwe dzepasi rino.   “Takasarudzwa kuno kuti tinomirira mutambo wekarate kuJapan pamutambo unoitwa gore rogaroga. Musi wa9 Mbudzi wasvika pataifanirwa kunge tichienda, mari yakashaika kusvikira Sekuru Tasvu vakazopindira ndokutenga matikiti endege uye ndokubatsira nezvimwe zvaidiwa ikoko.   Tine mumwe chete akazotadza kukwira ndege nekuda kwemitemo ine chekuita nekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19, asi zvose zvainge zvabhadharwa,” anodaro Sensei Chomusora.    Sekuru Tasvu   Anoti vakakwikwidza mumutambo weHeavy Weight Category ndokutora nhamba yechitatu apo vakapihwa menduru yebhuronzi.   “Ndinonyanya kutenda Sekuru Tasvu nekutambanudza kwavo ruoko uyewo tine vamwe vakadai seBoss CAG Buses naVaMangena vakabatsirawo murwendo urwu.   “Tinotarisira kuti mweya wakadai ucharamba uchipinda mune vakawanda kuti vasimudzire mutambo wedu wekarate nemimwe yakasiyana muno,” anodaro Sensei Chomusora.

headline: Yoita Donga Watonga kuMuzinda weMDC muHarare Pachikandiranwa Makobvu neMatate
text: Vamwe vechidiki vebato reMDC vanoti vaive nezvigaro muna2014 vanoti muzinda weMorgan Tsvangirai House wava pasi pavo parizvino vachiti vanoda kuti vakuru vavo vaite nhaurirano. Ari kutungamirira chikwata chiri mukati meHarvest House VaPaul Gorekore avo vanova sachigaro wevechidiki mudunhu reHarare uye vange vave kudivi reMDC T inotungamirirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe vati vaita chisungo sevechidiki kuti vabatanidze MDC Alliance neMDC T. Asi munyori mukuru weMDC T, VaDouglas Mwonzora vati vanhu vatora muzinda wavo vanhu vakapihwa mari. VaMwonzora vapika kuti varikuzotora zvakare muzinda uyu. VaGorekore vati vanoda kuti MDC igadzirisane pakusawirirana vari pamwechete uye vowirirana kuti voita musangano wecongress rinhi. Vatiwo VaMwonzora vakaudzwa kare kuti vaite musangano weNational Council asi vari kutsika madziro. Vechidiki ava vanoti VaMwonzora vari kuita zano ndega vasina wavaruma nzeve mukuita mabasa ebato. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatshwayo vaudza Studio 7 kuti havanei nezviri kuitika kumuzinda weMorgan Tsvangirai House. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika, VaEarnest Mudzengi vanova zvekare mukuru weMedia Center vati zvirikuitika izvi mucherechedzo wekurwisana kuri mubandiko reMDC T. Vakafanobata chigaro chasachigaro weMDC T VaMorgen Komichi vari mumuzinda uyu asi varamba kutaura nevatori venhau. Dare guru rakapa mutongo wekuti varidzi vemuzinda weMorgan Tsvangirai House yaive MDC T inotungamirirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe mushure mekunge bato rinotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa ratorerwa muzinda uyi muna Kubvumbi wegore rino richiti mapurisa nemauto ainge ashandiswa kuvabvisa. Asi kunyangwe mauto nemapurisa aivepo musi uyu akaramba kuti aive achibatsira VaMwonzora. Mapurisa auya zvekare nhasi uye pataenda pamhepo vange vachiri panze. No media source currently available

headline: VeMDC neMthwakazi Vozeya Nyaya Yekunetasana Mukanzuru yeBulawayo
text: Chikwata chehurumende chiri kuongorora bata murefu bata mupfupi iri kuitika mukanzuru yeBulawao change chiri kutarisirwa mudhorobha iri neChina kuti chitanga basa nemusi weChishanu. Mukanzuru yeBulawayo maita kunetsana kunotyisa mushure mekunge mutevedzeri wameya, VaTinashe Kambarami, avo vakaedza kumisa basa munyori mukuru weguta, VaChristopher Dube, vachivapomera mhosva yehuori. Bato reMDC radaidzawo makanzura aya kuti riyedze kugadzirisa kunetsana kuri mukanzuru kwapa kuti mamwe mapato akaita seMthwakazi Republican Party apindire achishora bato reMDC vachiti riri kuunza vabva kure kuti vatungamire mudunhu reBulawayo. Asi MDC inoti pamutemo hapana chakaipa kuti munhu akwikwidze kwaakavaka musasa chero muri muZimbabwe. Mutauriri weMthwakazi Republican Party, VaMbonisi Gumbo, vanoti MDC iri kusarudza vanhu vasingakwanise kutaura mutauro wechiNdevere. Asi mutevedzeri wemunyori wezvekutongwa kwematunhu mubato reMDC, VaClifford Hlatshwayo, varamba kuti kune makanzura avo asingagone kutaura chiNdevere.

headline: Vatsigiri veMDC-T Vanorohwa Zvakaipisisa muHarare
text: Imwe nhengo ye MDC-T yechidiki, Va David Mazibiye, vanoti vakarohwa zvakaipisisa neSvondo nevanofungirwa kuti inhengo dze Zanu PF kuMbare uko vaifanirwa kuita musangano wevechidiki webato ravo. Imwe nhengo ye MDC-T yechidiki, Va David Mazibiye, vanoti vakarohwa zvakaipisisa nezuro nevanofungirwa kuti inhengo dze Zanu PF kuMbare uko vaifanirwa kuita musangano wevechidiki webato ravo. VaMazibiye vanoti ivo nevamwe vavo vanodarika gumi vakarohwa mapurisa akatarisa kunyange hazvo bato ravo rakanga rawana mvumo yekuita musangano wavo. "Takarohwa takawanda isu vechidiki ve MDC-T uye vamwe vachiri muchipatara mushure mekukuvara pachiitiko chanezuro. Isu tinofungidzira kuti inhengo dze Zanu PF dzakatirova sezvo vakaita izvi pamberi pemapurisa asina kana kusunga munhu," VaMazibiye vaudza Studio7. "Chakanyanya kutirwadza ndechekuti takange tawana mbumo kubva kumapurisa kuti tiite musangano uyu asi takawana panzvimbo pataida kuitira musangano uyu pakazara nhengo dze Zanu PF dzainge dzichitamba bhora nekunwa doro nekuputa mbanje zvakaita kuti tizive kuti havasi vamwe vekubato kwedu nekuti vekwedu havaite izvi zvisina hunhu," VaMazibiye vaenderera mberi. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata bato re Zanu PF kana mapurisa kuti tinzwe divi ravo. No media source currently available

headline: Vana Chiremba Vanoti Havadzokeri kuBasa Kusvika Hurumende Yagadzirisa Zvichemo Zvavo
text: Apo kuramwa mabasa kwaana chiremba kwasvitsa masvondo maviri nemusi weChitatu, vamwe vana chiremba vamboratidzira kwekanguva kadiki pachipatara cheUnited Bulawayo Hospitals. Studio7 yasvika pachipatara cheUnited Bulawayo Hospitals, UBH, kuratidzira uku kuchangopera. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctors’ Association, Dr Mxolisi Ngwenya, vanoti kuratidzira uku yange iri nzira yekuyeuchidza hurumende kuti igadzirise zvichemo zvaana chiremba. Dr Mxolisi Ngwenya vati zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muzvipatara zvikuru zvehurumende munyika yose. Vati kunyange zvakadaro, vana chiremba vadiki havazi kuzodzokera shure panyaya yekuramwa mabasa kusvika hurumende yagadzirisa zvichemo zvavo, sezvo vati pave nenguva vachiudzwa kuti zvichemo zvavo zvichagadziriswa asi pasina chinobuda. Mumwe mukoti mukuru paUBH uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita kana kutaura pamhepo sezvo asingabvumirwe kutaura nevatapi venhau, ati vanhu vari kungorapwa pachipatara apa ndevaye vanenge vachirwara zvakaipisisa, sezvo vana chiremba vakawanda kunyanya vachangopedza zvidzidzo zvavo, vari kuramwa mabasa. PaRichard Morris Hospital, chinove chikamu cheUBH panorapwa vanhu maziso, vamwe vanhu vange vauya kuzorapwa vange vachiudzwa kuti vadzokere kumba sezvo panga pasina vana chiremba vanga vachikwanisa kuvaona. Ongororo yaitwa neStudio 7 paMpilo Central Hospital, chimwezve chipatara chikuru muBulawayo, yaratidzawo kuti kuchikamu chechipatara ichi chinorapa vanhu vachibva kumba - kana kuti Outpatients Department - kwange kusina vanhu. Chiremba mukuru paMpilo, Dr Solwayo Ngwenya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo vari kungokwanisawo kurapa vanhu vari kurwara zvakaipisisa, zvinhu hazvina kunyanya kuipa sezvo vana chiremba vakuru nevamwe vanoshanda vachibva kunze, kana kuti consultants, vari kushanda semazuva ose. Dr Solwayo Ngwenya vabvuma mashoko ekuti vana mukoti vanonzi vari kuda kutanga kuramwawo mabasa mangwana, asi vakurudzira vana chiremba pamwe naana mukoti kuti vakoshese varwere sezvinotarisirwa mubasa ravo. Studio7 haina nkukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi, kanawo kunzwa kugurukota rezvehutano, Va David Parirenyatwa. Vana chiremba naana mukoti vanogara vachiramwa mabasa nguva nenguva vachitsutsumwa pamusoro pemashandiro avo uye mari shoma yavanowana. Nekune rimwe divi hurumende inogarawo ichichema nerekuti haina mari. Asi Fortune Moyo, mumwe mutori wenhau anoshanda akazvimirira, ndemumwe wevanhu vanoti matambudziko ana chiremba pamwe nemamwe ane chekuita nezvehutano munyika anogona kugadziriswa, kana hurumende ikakoshesa nyaya yehutano munyika sezvainofanirwa kuita. Kunze kwemari yavanohora, zvimwe zvezvichemo zvaana chiremba ava zvinosanganisira nyaya yekushaya zvikwanisiro zvekushandisa muzvipatara. No media source currently available

headline: Dzimwe Nyanzvi Dzinoti Hapana Chichabuda Mukushanya kuZimbabwe kweNhumwa yeUnited Nations
text: Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vanoti vari kukatyamadzwa zvikuru kuona kuti gwaro rabudiswa nehurumende pamusoro pevanhu vachasangana nenhumwa yeUnited Nations, Amai Alena Douhan, hapana mapato anopikisa kana masangano akazvimirira. Amai Alena Douhan vari muZimbabwe mavari kutarisirwa kuongorora nyaya dzezvirango zvakatemerwa mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nevamwe vakuru mubato reZanu-PF, pamwe chete nemabhizimisi avanodyidzana navo. Amai Douhan vachitarisirwawo kuongorora nyaya yekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu munyika. Gwaro rakabudiswa nehurumende rinoratidza kuti Amai Douhan vachangosangana nemakurukota ehurumende, vakuru veReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Zimbabwe Human Rights Commission naJustice Luke Malaba. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, vachidzidzisa zvematongerwo enyika paWellesley College, kuMassachusetts, Muzvinafundo Chipo Dendere, vanoti havaoni kuti rwendo rwaAmai Douhan pane zvaruchabudisa sezvo United Nations pachayo isina simba rekubvisa zvirango izvi, vachiti zvirango izvi zvakatemerwa neAmerica, pamwe nemadzisahwira ayo, anosanganisa Britain nedzimwe nyika muEuropean Union. Vanoti chingabatsira vakatemerwa zvirango ndechekuti vataure nenyika dzakatemera zvirango izvi, vachiti panoenda VaMnangagwa kuBritain apa, vanogona kutaura nehurumende yeko, vachiratidza chido chekugadzirisa zvinhu pakati penyika mbiri idzi. Muzvinafundo Dendere vanoti Amai Douhan vanozikanwa zvikuru pamusoro peongororo dzavanoita munyika dzinotyora kodzero dzevanhu, dzakaita seVenezuela, vachiti izvi zvinogona kukonzera kuti vakatemerwa zvirango muZimbabwe vasawana mukana wekumbotererwa nenyika dzakatemera zvirango izvi. No media source currently available

headline: MDC-T Yoendesa Banga Guru reNyika kuMatare
text: Bato rinopikisa reMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai rinoti rave kuendesa bhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, kumatare edzimhosva pamusoro pehurongwa hwebhanga iri hwekuda kuwunza mari yepepa iri kudaidzwa kuti ma bond notes. Bato rinopikisa reMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai rinoti rave kuendesa bhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, kumatare edzimhosva pamusoro pehurongwa hwebhanga iri hwekuda kuwunza mari yepepa iri kudaidzwa kuti ma bond notes. MDC-T inoti zviri kuda kuitwa nebhanga iri zviri kunze kwemutemo. Nhengo dzekomiti yepamusoro ye MDC-T ye National Executive dzasangana pamuzinda webato iri paHarvest House neChina dzikabuda nechisungo chekuti bato ravo rikwidze nyaya yema bond notes kudare repamusoro-soro sezvo bato iri richiti zviri kuda kuitwa neRBZ zvinotyora bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Mutauriri weMDC-T, Va Obert Gutu, vaudza Studio 7 papera musangano uyu kuti bato harisi kuzopeta mawoko aro hurumende yeZanu PF ichiita muzerere nenhupenyu hwevanhu. VaGutu vati RBZ haina masimba ekudhinda mari isiri mari inocherechedzwa nenyika kana kuti official currency. VaGutu vatiwo bato ravo richaratidzira mumigwagwa nenyaya iyi. Gavhuna webhanga guru renyika, VaJohn Mangudya, vakati vachapa zvikamu zvishanu kubva muzana zvema bond notes kune vemabhizimusi vanenge vachitengesa zvinhu kunze kwenyika senzira yekukurukudzira kuti vemabhizimusi vatengesere dzimwe nyika kuti nyika iwane mari yekunze sezvo vachiti mari zhinji iri kubuditswa munyika zvisiri pamutemo hurumende isina chairi kuwana. Nekune rumwe rutivi, mutauriri weZanu PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, vaudzawo Studio 7 parunhare kuti havangamhanyire kumedza kutsenga vachada vachiti vari kumirira kutanga vawona kuti veRBZ pamwe naivo veMDC-T vachaitasei nezvenyaya iyi. MDC-T inoti zviri kuda kuitwa nehurumende izvi kudzosa mari yemuZimbabwe nerweseri. Asi VaMangudya vakati mari yekunze icharamba ichishandiswa munyika kudzamara hupfumi hwenyika hwagadzikana kuti Zimbabwe ikwanise kudhinda mari yayo.

headline: Doctor Magaisa Vorangarirwa seMunhu Aiva neNjere Dzakapinza
text:
Vanhu vakawanda vaungana muHarare nhasi vachirangarira hupenyu hwaDoctor Alex Magaisa vakavatsanangura sedenhe reruzivo. Vakashayikira kuBritain musi wa5 Chikumi.

Hama neshamwari dzaVaMagaisa dzaungana muHarare nhasi dzichirangarira hupenyu hwavi zvichitevera kusvika kwakaita mutumbi wavo munyika nezuro.

Ataura akamira sababa vemhuri yekwaMagaisa, VaRobert Magaisa, vati mhuri yavo yakarasikirwa nemunhu aiva nerudo uye aida budiriro yenyika yake.

Shamwari yaVaMagaisa, VaOnias Topodzi Kwenda, vati mufi aida zvedzidzo zvakanyanya zvekuti akavabatsira kuti vadzokere kuchikoro mushure mekunge vasiira chikoro panzira nekuda kwekushaya mari.

Vachitaurawo pachiitiko ichi, mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reCitizens Coalition for Change, VaNelson Chamisa vatiwo kunyange zvinhu zvakawanda zvisina kumira zvakanaka munyika, dzidzo yemunyika yakaitawo kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zvakaita saVaMagaisa zvisimudze mureza wenyika kune dzimwe nyika.

VaChamisa vatiwo vari kutarisira kukunda musarudzo dzegore rinouya vachishandisa ruzivo rwavanga vachipihwa naVaMagaisa. Vatiwo kubva zvino zvichienda mberi vave kuzenge vachienda kuzviitiko zvenyika kana kuti manational events vachiti havacharamwire munda kumakudo.

Vaimbova mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wehurumende yemubatanidzwa, Muzvinafundo Arthur Mutambara, avo vakashanda Doctor Magaisa vari chipangamazano chaVaMorgan Tsvangirai vati mufi aive munhu akanga achinyora zvinhu zvinoita kuti nyika isimukire uye akanga aishanda zvikuru kusimudzira vamwe kuti vave vatungamiri vakatswasuka uye vanomirira zvido zveveruzhinji.

Vamwe vange vari parufu apa vanosanganisira Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku vanotungamira bato reNCA vati mufi akabata basa guru mukudzidzisa vanhu nezvemutemo. Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMavambo Kusile Dawn, Doctor Simba Makoni vaimbova gurukota rezvemari vati Magaisa vaitumutora semudzidzisi wavo. Vamwe vange vari parunfu apa vanosanganisira nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika Doctor Ibbo Mandaza uye magweta nevamwe.

VaLuke Tamborinyoka avo vaiva mutauriri waVaTsvangirai vati VaMagaisa vaiva munhu aiziva basa ravo uye vaipa miwono yavo vasingatungamidze zvido zvavo mberi.

Doctor Magaisa vakaberekwa musi wa 9 Nyamavhuvhu 1975 uye vasiya mudzimai Shamiso nevana vaviri. VaMagaisa vanotarisirwa kuradzikwa neChipiri kumusha kwavo munharaunda yeChikomba. No media source currently available

headline: Zim yakunda Singapore
text: CHIKWATA chenyika checricket chemaChevrons nhasi chakunda Singapore ne111 runs mumutambo wacho wekutanga wekurwira tikiti rekuenda kuICC Twenty20 International Series World Cup uyo watambirwa paQueens Sports Club kuBulawayo.   MaChevrons ndiwo ange atanga kutamba (bat) izvo zvamaona achiita 236 pachibuda vatambi vashanu kubva pa20 overs yazotadza kuteverwa neSingapore iyo yaita 125 pabuda vatambi vayo vanomwe.   Mutambi wemaChevrons, Sikandar Raza, ndiye ahwina mubairo weMan of Match zvichitevera maruns 87 aaita kubva pamabhora 40 aasangana nawo.   Mumutambo uyu, maChevrons ari kubandana nedzimwe nyika dzisere apo zvose zviri kurwira matikiti maviri ekuenda kuICC Twenty20 International Series World Cup kuAustralia munaGumiguru.   Mutambo uyu wakaparurwa nemutungamiri wenyika, President Mnangagwa, nezuro kuQueens Sports Club, kuBulawayo.   MaChevrons ari muboka reGroup A uye nemusi weChipiri achasangana neJersey ozopedzisira neUnited States of America musi weChina.   Mune rimwe boka, kune zvikwata zvinoti Netherlands, Hong Kong, Uganda nePapua New Guinea.   Mumapoka maviri aya, muchabuda zvikwata zviviri izvo zvichatamba musemi-final uye zvinenge zvahwina ndizvo zvichabva zvawana matikiti ekuenda kuAustralia.   Fainari yemutambo uyu ichazotambwa musi weSvondo.

headline: Kusapa Bazi rezveHutano Mari KweMakore Akawanda Kunonzi Kwopa Kuti Kurwisa Coronavirus Kunetse.
text: Vanhu vakawanda munyika vanoti kunyangwe hazvo Zimbabwe yasvitsa makore makumi mana yawana kuzvitonga kuzere, zvinhu munyaya dzezvehutano hazvina kumira zvakanaka zvaburitswa pachena nenyaya yechirwere checoronavirus. Vanhu vakawanda vataura neStudio 7 kusanganisira nyanzvi munezvehutano vanoti Zimbabwe inofanirwa kusunga dzisimbe kugadzirisa matambudziko munyaya dzezvehutano. Amai Pepukai Shava vanoti kunyangwe haazvo nyika yakakwanisa kuvaka zvipatara mushure mekuwana kuzvitonga kuzere, zvipatara izvi zvangove midhuri isisina zvinhu zvakakosha zvekushandisa. Mutungamiri webato reLabour Economists African Democrats, Muzvare Linda Masarira, vanoti hurumende haisi kuita zvakakwana kusimudzira nyaya dzezvehutano munyika zvopa kuti kana kurwisa chirwere checoronavirus kunetsa nekuti zvipatara hazvina zvikwanisiro zvakaita semichina yekubatsira vanhu kufema kana varwarisa. Vatiwo zvingabatsire kana nyika ikaisa mutemo unosungira kuti vatungamiriri vehurumende varapwe munyika vakati izvi zvinogona kubatsira kusimudzirwa kwezvipatara munyika. Izvi zvatsigirwawo naVaKudzai Kwangwari avo vatiwo kunyangwe hazvo zviripowo zvakagonekwa nenyika mushure mekuwana kuzvitonga kuzere vati kune zvizhinjiwo zvichiri kuda kuzadzikiswa vakati izvi zvinosanganisirawo nyaya yehutano. Munyori musangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, Doctor Norman Matara, vanoti kunyangwe hazvo mumakore ekutanga Zimbabwe ichangosungunuka, hurumende yakamboedza kusimudzira zvinhu munyaya dzezvehutano kusanganisira kuvaka makirinika. Asi vanoti makore makumi maviri apfuura, Zimbabwe yatadza kuvandudza zvinhu munyaya yezvehutano kuburikidza nekusapiwa mari yakawanda kubazi rezvehutano. VaMatara vati kunyangwe hazvo nyika dzemuAfrica dzakanyorerana pasi chibvumirano cheAbuja Declaration icho chinosungira hurumende kuti iise zvikamu gumi nezvishanu kubva muzana zvemari yebhajeti yenyika kune zvehutano, Zimbabwe haina gore rayakambozadzikisa zvinotarisirwa izvi. VaMatara vanotiwo kusaisa mari yakakwana kubazi rezvehutano zvinobudawo kunyangwe panguva ino nyika iri kurwisa chirwere cheCOVID-19 vachiti bazi rezvehutano rakatora nguva kuwana mari chirwere chapinda munyika izvo zvakaita kuti zvizhinji zvaidiwa kushandiswa zvibve kune masangano ekunze kwete kuhurumende. Vanomirira Chinhoyi mudare reparamende vari nhengo yeMDC Doctor Peter Matarutse vanoti kunyangwe hazvo nyika yakakwanisa kudzivirira zvirwere zvakaita se Kwashiorkor, T.B nezvimwewo kuondomoka kwehupfumi munyika kwasiya zvinhu zvakaita manyama amire nerongo munyaya dzezvehutano. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvehutano Dr Obadiah Moyo kuti tinzwe divi ravo sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Asi mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaEnergy Mutodi vati hurumende iri kuyedza napose painogona kugadzirisa zvinhu munyaya dzezvehutano. Nyaya yechirwere checoronavirus iri kuburitsa pachena kuti zvinhu munyanya dzezvehutano zvaderera uye zvipatara zvizhinji hazvina zvikwanisiro uye midhuri yacho yave kuondomoka. No media source currently available

headline: Varume neVakadzi Vokurudzirwa Kupota Vachivheneka Mazamu Kudzivirira Gomarara
text: Hurumende nhasi yakurudzira vatori venhau kuti vaongororwe gomarara pazammu ichiti izvi zvino batsirawo kuti vanyore nezvenyaya dzemagomarara zvine hudzamu. Bazi rinoona nezvekubuditswa kwemashoko rabatana nemakambani anoita zvehutano akaita sePremier Service Medical Aid Society PSMAS pamwe ne MedPoint mukudzidzisa pamwe nekuongorora chirwere chegomarara kuvatori venhau · Gurukota rinoona nezvekubudiswa kwemashoko Amai Monica Mutsvangwa vati hurumende inokoshesa zvikuru hutano hwakanaka munyika. Vachitaurawo mushure mekuongororwa gomarara remazamu, mutevedzeri wavo, VaKindness Paradza vakurudzirawo vanhurume kuti vaongororwe gomarara iri sezvo risingangobate madzimai. Mumwe wevaongororwa ndiBridget Madzimure anoshanda kuZimbabwe Broadcasting Cooperation (ZBC) uyo ati afara zvakanyanya nekuwana mukana wekuongororwa pachena. Nyanzvi munezvikuongorora zvirwere zvemagomarara VaLyman Khumbula zvakakosha kuti vanhu vaongororwe vachiti vazhinji vari kuzobatwa gomarara radzika midzi. Gomarara rezamu ndiro rinonzi rinoteverera gomarara remuromo wechibereko mukuraya madzimai. Mwedzi waGumiguru ndiwo unocherechedzwa chirwere chegomarara remazamu gore negore. No media source currently available

headline: Kuipa kweMigwagwa Kwokanganisa Hupfumi muZimbabwe
text: Kunyangwe hazvo vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kufara kuti mvura gore rino yaturuka uye vachazadza matura, zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka kuzvivakwa zvenyika zvakaita semigwagwa iyo yazara makomba. Kunze kwekukanganisa zvakanyanya nyaya yezvehupfumi, vanhu vakawanda vari kupararawo mumigwagwa iyi. Mugwagwa mukuru ungadai uchiunza hupfumi munyika kuburikidza nemitero yemotokari nemabhazi anenge akatakura zvinhu mugagwa weBeitbridge-Harare-kusvika kuChirundu. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachidzidzisa paUniversity of Zimbabwe, Doctor Gift Mugano, vanoti migwagwa ndiho hupfumi. Mugwagwa uyu unoshandiswa nenyika dzakawanda dzemuSADC idzo dzave kuronga kutsvaga mumwe mugwagwa nenyaya yekusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu muZimbabwe. Gurukota rinoona nezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu, Doctor Joram Gumbo, vanotenda kuti mugwagwa uyu wakakosha zvikuru. Gwaro rakaburitswa nenyika dzemuSadc muna 2001 rakati mugwagwa mumwe chete pamitatu muZimbabwe haina kumira zvakanaka zvakapa kuti South Africa nedzimwe nyika dzitange kutsvaga mazano ekusadarika nemuZimbabwe zvichapa kuti Zimbabwe irasikirwe nemari yakawanda. Muna 2013 bhanga reDevelopment Bank of Southern Africa iro rakabatsira Zimbabwe kugadzira mugwagwa wePlumtree-Bulawayo-Harare-Mutare rakati Zimbabwe inoda kubatsirwa zvakanyanya kugadzira migwagwa yayo nekuti yakakosha zvikuru munyaya dzezvehupfumi muAfrica yose. Asi Dr Gumbo vanoti kutanga gore rino mugwagwa uyu uchagadziriswa. Mugwagwa uyu waurayawo vanhu vakawanda zvikuru sezvo uchishandisa nevanoenda kunotenga zvinhu kuSouth Africa. Mukuru weInternational Cross Borders Association, VaDennis Juru, vanotenda kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka vachiti zvinotora mazuva akawanda kubva kuSouth Africa nenyaya yemakomba ari munzira. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti nyaya yekuti migwagwa haina kumira zvakanaka iri kupa kuti zvinhu zvakawanda munyika zvidhure. Zimbabwe haina zvitima zvakawanda zvekutakura zvinhu zvopa kuti vakawanda vashandise migwagwa chete izvo zvinodhura. Kambani yeNational Railways of Zimbabwe yave nemakore ichitatarika. Ko chi chinopa kuti hurumende itadze kugadzirisa zvivakwa? Vaimbova gurukota rezvemari vave kutungamira bato rePeople Democratic Party, VaTendai Biti, vanoti mari yehurumende iri kuperera mukubhadhara vashandi vayo izvo zvinozoita kuti isare isina mari yekugadzirisa zvivakwa zvayo. Doctor Gumbo vanoti kugadzira mugwagwa weBeitbridge-Harare-kusvika kuChirundu kunokwanisa kuwanisa vanhu zviuru mazana matatu mabasa. Asi Doctor Mugano vanoti nenyaya yehuori zvinogona kuva zviroto zvekare. Dzimwe nyika dzisina mari dzinoita zvirongwa zvinonzi Build Operate and Transfer zvichireva kuita mushandirapmwe nenyika dzekunze kana makambani vovaka migwagwa makambani ekunze otora mitero kwemakore akati wandei. Asi izvi hazvisi kuitwa muZimbabwe pari zvino. Doctor Mugano vanoti South Africa inokwezva vekunze nekuti ine zvivakwa zvakanaka. Mumaguta migwagwa mizhinji yazarawo makomba nenyaya yekuvharika kwemagoronga anofanira kutakura mvura asiri kugadzirwa nemakanzuru. Makanzuru ari kunakurira Zimbabwe National Road Authority kana kuti ZINARA nyoka mhenyu achiti iri kutora mari yemitero asi haina zviri kuita kugadzirisa migwagwa. Mahombekombe enyanza iri pedyo neZimbabwe ari kuBeira kuMozambique uye Zimbabwe iri mutsinga dzenjanji yeTazara zvichireva kuti inokwanisa kuenda kunyanza yekuTanzania ichipfuura nemuZambia. Asi hupfumi hwenyika hausi kunyatsofamba nekuti migwagwa nenjanji hazvina kumira zvakanka. Kunze kwemigwagwa isina kumira zvakanaka, nyika hainawo magetsi mvura nezvimwe zvakakosha mukukwezva vekunze vanoda kutanga mabhizimisi. No media source currently available

headline: Chikwereti cheRBZ Chotemesa Hurumende Musoro
text: Komiti yeparamende inoona nezvemari yagara neMuvhuro ichikurukura bhiri remutemo rinopa masimba ekuti hurumende itore chikwereti chebhanga guru renyika, kana kuti Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe Debt Assumption Bill. Izvi zvaitwa panguva iyo makomiti akasiyana siyana atanga kusangana kekutanga gore rino. Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, uye gavhuna vebhanga guru renyika, VaJohn Mangudya, ndivo vange vari mudare vachibvunzwa nenhengo dzeparamende. RBZ ine chikwereti chinopfuura bhiriyoni rimwe chete remadhora icho yakaita pasi pevaive gavhuna vebhanga iri, VaGideon Gono, avo vaonzi vaiita mamwe mabasa ainge asineyi nezvaifanira kuitwa nebhanga iri. Mabasa aya aisanganisira kutenga matirakita, fotereza nezvimwe zvaipihwa vanhu vari kunzi nehurumende havafanire kuburitswa mazita avo. Asi vachitaura kukomiti yezvemari, VaChinamasa naVaMagudya vati chikwereti ichi wave mutoro kuRBZ zvopa kuti bhanga iri ritadze kushanda zvakanaka. Gore rapera vanhu vazhinji munyika vakati havaida kuti hurumende itore chikwereti ichi uye vakati vanoda kuti vose vakapihwa mari vaburitswe mazita avo. Asi RBZ nehurumende zviri kutsika madziro kuburitsa mazita aya. Dzimwe nyanzvi munya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti hazvibatsire kuti hurumende, iyo iri kutatarika nechimwe chikwereti chinosvika mabhiriyoni masere emadhora, izviwedzere mumwe mutoro. Nhengo yekomiti yezvemari, uye vari nhengo yeMDC Renewal Team, VaWillas Madzimure, vanoti vakumbira VaChinamasa naVaMangudya kuti vanogadzirisa zvimwe zvavange vasingatenderane nazvo zvikuru pamitero iri kubhadhariswa nevamwe pazvikwereti. No media source currently available

headline: Osimudzira mureza weZim. . . Chiwenga akapihwa mubairo weFootball BlackList 2019 Award
text: NYANZVI yechidzimai inomiririra vatambi venhabvu vazhinji vanotambira kuEurope, Ellen Chiwenga, akasimudzira mureza wenyika nguva pfupi yadarika apo akahwina mubairo weFootball Blacklist 2019 Award kuEngland.   Chiwenga — uyo ane rezinesi rekushanda achimiririra vatambi venhabvu raakapihwa nesangano reFederation International de Football Association (Fifa) — akawanikwa ariye ega mudzimai wekutanga kubva muAfrica kupiwa mubairo weFootball BlackList 2019 Award pamhemberero dzakaitirwa kuLondon nguva pfupi yadarika.   Mudzimai uyu zvakare ane marezinesi akasiyana ekushanda munhabvu anosanganisira Football Association of England License (FA), Association of Football Agents (AFA) neWoman in Football (WIF).   Mubairo weFootball Blacklist Award — uyo unokotsverwa nesangano reFootball Blacklist Organisation — unopihwa kuzvizvarwa zvemuAfrica nezvekuCaribbean Islands avo vanenge vachiita basa guru mukushandura nhabvu munyika yeEngland.   Chiwenga akapihwa mubairo weCommercial Section uyo unove muboka rekushambadza nhabvu pamwe nekuisimudzira.
