Achitaura neKwayedza ari kuLondon uko anogara, Chiwenga anoti vanhukadzi vanogona kushanda mubasa rekumirira vatambi venhabvu sezvinoitwa nevanhurume vane mukurumbira vakadai saJorge Mendes naMino Raiola avo vanomirira vatambi venhabvu vakuru pasi rese vanosanganisira Cristiano Ronaldo, David de Gea, Zlatan Ibrahimovic naPaul Pogba.   Mibairo yeFootball Blacklist yakatangwa mugore ra2009 uye Chiwenga ndiye mudzimai wekutanga kubva kuSouthern Africa kuhwina mubairo uyu.   Vamwe vakambohwina mubairo uyu vanosanganisira Yaya Toure wekuCote d’Ivoire, Rio Ferdinand wekuEngland kozoti Rachey Yankey uyo aimbotambira chikwata cheEngland chemadzimai.   “Ndinonzwa kufara nekuremekedzwa kwandaita, zvichibva kune mudzimai wekutanga kuva nerezinesi zviri pamutemo reFifa mune zvemuitambo kuUnited Kindom, Rachel Anderson.   Zvinhu zvinotisimudzirawo nekutipa shungu kuti sevanhukadzi tiite mabasa ayo anonzi ndeevanhurume bedzi,” anodaro Chiwenga.   “Mubairo uyu hauna kusimudzira ini bedzi asi mureza wenyika yeZimbabwe, dunhu reAfrica, vanhukadzi pamwe nevanhukadzi vari mune zvenhabvu munyika dzakasiyana-siyana,” anodaro.   Kushanda kukuru kwaari kuita munhabvu zvakamuona achiremekedzwa kunyika dzakasiyana uye achigadzwa zvigaro zvinosanganisira kuve Global Goodwill Ambassador of Bring Hope Humanitarian Foundation (BHHF) naAmbassador weKarachi FC kunyika yePakistan.   “Shuwiro yangu ndeyekusimudzira nhabvu muAfrica, zvakare ndine chido chekuti dai ndawana mukana wekusimudzira matarenda kunyangwe kwandinobva zvakaita sekuvakwa kwenhandare dzenhabvu, kusimudzira matarenda evana muzvikoro,” anodaro Chiwenga.   Anoenderera mberi achiti, “Vechidiki vanoda kusimudzirwa, vamwe nekushaya mikana yekuratidza matarenda avo vave kuita zvekunwa nekuputa zvinodhaka.   Isu tiripo pakuvapa mikana yekusimudzira matarenda aya vararame hupenyu hunoyevedza nekuda kwekuti ndivo vatungamiri vemangwana.”

headline: Veruzhinji Vochemachema neKukwidzwa kweMari dzeMasaisai neveDzinharembozha
text: Mamwe makambani embozhanhare anonzi akwidza mitengo yemabhanduru anoita kuti veruzhinji vakwanise kuenda paindaneti nezvikamu zvinodarika gumi kubva muzana izvo zviri kutsoropodzwa nevakawanda kusanganisira vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika. Kambani yehurumende yeNetone yazivisa kuti yakwidza mutengo wemabhanduru anoita kuti vanoshandisa masaisai ekambani iyi kuenda pamadandemutande kana kufona vachemecheme. Netone yazivisa nhasi magwanani kuti yakwidza mutengo wemabhanduru kubva nhasi zvichienda mberi uye mabhanduru aya akwidzwa nezvikamu zana kubva muzana. Zvaitwa neNetone zvinotevera kukwidzwawo kwakaitwa mutengo wemabhanduru aya neEconet masvondo maviri adarika nezvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana. Mumwe anoshandisa nharembozha nemasaisai eNetone, Muzvare Gracious Mangava, vati kuita zvidzidzo zvavo kuchavadhurira sezvo vachishandisa nharembozha kuita zvidzizo izvi. Sachigaro wesangano revanoburitsa mashoko paindaneti reOnline Content Creators of Zimbabwe, VaToneo Rutsito, vati kukidzwa kwemitengo yemabhanduru kuchaita kuti vatadze kushanda zvakanaka mukuwanisa veruzhinji mashoko anobata zvakawanda muhupenyu hwavo. Mutauriri weboka revechidiki muCitizens Coalition for Change, VaStephen Chuma, vati kusvitsa mashoko avo ekutsvaga rutsigiro kune veruzhinji pamberi pesarudzo kuchavanetsa sezvo vanga vachishandisa madandemutande kutaura neveruzhinji sezvo vachiti havasi kuwaniswa mukana wekushambadzira bato ravo panhepfenyuro yeZBC pamwe nemapepanhau ehurumende. Asi mushandi mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vanoti hachisi chokwadi kuti vemapato anopikisa havasi kupihwa mukana wakaenzana newebato ravo pamhepo kuburikidza nenhepfenyuro nemapepanhau ehurumende. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nevatauriri vemakambani enharembozha kuti tinzwe kuti chii chiri kukonzera kukwidza kwavaita mitengo yemabhanduru eindaneti. Asi zvichitevera kuchemachema kwaswera kuchiita veruzhinji nezvenyaya iyi pamadandemutande eFacebook, Twitter neWhatsapp, kambani yeNetone yazoburitsa mashoko ichiti iri kuongorora nyaya iyi. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vaimboshanda mubazi rezvemari, VaMasimba Manyanya, vati kusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi hwenyika ndiko kuri kukonzera kuti makambani aya akwidze mitengo yemabhanduru. Munyori muboka revechidiki muZanu PF, VaTendai Chirau, vanyora pandamutande ravo reTwitter kuti vachasvitsawo nyaya iyi kugurukota rinoona nezvehumhizha hwema computer VaJenfan Muswere. Ukuwo, VaRutsitu vatiwo vachagara pasi naVaMuswere pamwe nePostal and Telecommunications Regulatory Authority of Zimbabwe kuti vaone kuti nyaya iyi ingadziriswe sei. VaMuswere vanga vasati vapindura mibvunzo yatavatumira pataenda pamhepo. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vopokana neRBZ paHuwandu hweMari Ichatumirwa Gore Rino Kumusha
text: Bhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe rakazivisa svondo rapera kuti gore rino nyika iri kutarisira kuwana mari inogona kudarika bhiriyoni rimwe chete remadhora kubva kuzvizvarwa zvayo zviri kunze kwenyika. Mari iyi yakwira kubva pa $837m yakawanikwa gore rapera. Mari yakawanda inonzi inobva kuzvizvarwa zvenyika zviri kuSouth Africa, ichiteverwa neUnited Kingdom, United States nedzimwe nyika dzakawanda dzakapararira vana veZimbabwe. Bhanga iri rakazivisawo kuti ravhura nzira dzakawanda dzekuti vanhu vari kunze kwenyika vakwanise kutumira mari kumusha, kuburikidza nekuwanisa mikana yakawanda vamwe vanoda kupindawo mubhizimusi rekupinzwa nekubuda kwemari munyika. Asi zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvizhinji zviri kunze kwenyika zvinosanganisira vanoongorora zvamatongerwo enyika uye vachidzidzisa paTswane University of Technology, kuSouth Africa, VaRicky Mukonza, zvinoti hurumende inofanirwa kutanga yagadzirisa hukama hwayo nevana vayo vari kunze kuitira kuti pave nechivimbo pakati pavo. VaMukonza vanotiwo hurumende inofanirwa kujekesa nyaya ye Dual Citizenship, iyo iri kuramba yakahwandiswa, kunyange hazvo bumbiro remitemo rakaitambira. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi uye vari mukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaGofrey Kanyenze, vanoti havaoni mari iri kutarisirwa neRBZ iyi ichipinda munyika yose nenzira dzakatsarukana, sezvo vazhinji vevana vari kunze kwenyika vachishandisa nzira dzepasi kutumura mari dzavo. VaKanyenze vanoti vanotsinhira nyaya yekuti hurumend iwumbe hukama hwakanaka nevana vayo sezvinoitwa nedzimwe nyika dziri kusimukira nekuda kwemari dzinotumirwa nezvizvarwa zvadzo. No media source currently available

headline: VaGari vemuManicaland Vanoti Vanoda Chouviri paZvicherwa Zviri muDunhu Ravo
text: Sangano reSouthern Eastern Trade Information and Negotiations Institute, SEATINI rinoti vagari vemunharaunda dzinoshandira makambani ekunze anenge asainirana zvibvumirano nehurumende zvekuita mabasa muno vanofanirwa kunge vaine chekuita pazvibvumirano izvi. Mashoko aya abuda pamusangano waitwa nhasi maMutare apo zvabuda pachena kuti vagari vazhinji vanozosangana nematambudziko nekuda kwekuti zvibvumirano zvinenge zvaitwa hazvineyi nemagariro avo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvekuongorora mafambiro emabasa musangano reSEATINI VaAdmire Mutizwa vati ichokwadi kuti vagary havana chouviri chavari kuwana kubva kuzviwanikwa munharaudza mune zvicherwa vachipa muenzaniso mangoda ari maMarange ayo vagary vanoti haapna pundutso yaaunza munharaunda mavo. “Saka zvatiri kuita kunouku ndezvekuti tiri kukurudzira kuti vagari vaparticipate maringe nekutsvagwa kuri kuita makambani ekunze, takaona pahurumende yedu itsva kuti iri kuti Zimbabwe is Open for Business zvinoreveyi kumunhu, an ordinary person, sekwaChiadzwa pane makambani akamina madiamond mari ichibuda asi hapana chavakawana saka tiri kuti zvinorevei kwavari kana zvichinzi Zimbabwe is open for business.” VaMutizwa vanoti kurudziro yavari kuita kumatunhu ose munyika ndeyekuti inzwi revagari rinzwikwewo panyaya dzebudiriro. “Chechipiri tiri kuda kukurudzira voice revagari vemunzvimbo maeerano nedevelopment, transparence and accountability, macitizens vakaita participate pakutsvagwa kwemari tinovimba kuti macitizens edu anowana zvinovabatsira munzvimbo dzavanenge vari pamusoro pemabasa anenge oitwa nemakani ekunze aya.” Muzvare Mildred Muzanechita mugari wemaMutare uye ange ari pamusangano wanhasi anoti dzidziso iripo inobatsira kuvhura pfungwa kuvagari venharaunda dzakasiyana-siyana pamusoro pezvinosungirwa kuitwa kana makambani achinge apihwa basa rekuchera zvicherwa munharaunda mavo. “Musangano uyu wabatsira pakuti tinenge tave kuziva zvatinoda basa risati raitwa sekuti venharaunda tiwanirwe pekushanda, kumacommunities sevekuPenhalonga uye Bocha, infrastructure development vanofanirwa zvakare kubatsirika nazvo. Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, “Mainvestor aya kana achiuya muno muZimbabwe tinge tiine benefit ichasara nesu kana vachinge vazopedza mabasa avo mumacommunities matinogara.” Mumwe mugari wemaMutare VaAnndy Ziyera avo vapindawo mumusangano vanoti sekutaura kwakaita mutungamiriri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa mazuva mashoma apfuura kuti inzwi revanhu inzwi ramwari zvido zvavo zvinofanirwa kuremekedzwa zvimwechetewo nekuti pakuuya kwemabhizinesi muno vange vachipawo pfungwa dzavo. “Vanhu ndivo nyika saka inzwi revanhu ndiro inzwi raMwari vakadaro VaMnangagwa, naizvozvo panoitwa mainvestments ese vanhu vanofanirwa kunge nechekuitawo, FDI haifanirwi kuuraya local investment uye tinotarisira kuti itobatsira local investment yacho.” Vanotizve, “Tinoziva kuti tairima cotton muno but yakatourayiwa neizvozvo tave kuimporta cotton kana maSkipper muno anobva kuChina saka tinodawo equal treatment.” Musangano uyu wakapindwa nevagari vanobva kunzvimbo dzinocherwa zviwanikwa dzakaita sePenhalonga, Marange uye Chimanimani. No media source currently available

headline: Dare rePamusoro Soro Rozeya Gakava Pakati paVaChamisa naAmai Khupe
text: Dare repamusoro-soro reSupreme Court nhasi ranzwa chikumbiro chemutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, chekuti mutongo wakaturwa nedare repamusoro reHigh Court wekuti kusarudzwa kwavo semutungamiri webato ravo hakuna kufambiswa zvakanaka usendekwe parutivi. Vachisvitsa chikumbiro chavo kudare, gweta raVaChamisa, Advocate Thabani Mpofu, vati mutongo wedare reHigh Court unofanira kusendekwa parutivi vachiti harisi basa rematare kusarudzira bato rezvematongerwo enyika hutungamiri. VaMpofu vaudza dare kuti komiti yepamusoro-soro muMDC pakati pemakongiresi yeNational Council yakatora danho rekugadza VaChamisa semutungamiri weMDC zvichitevera kufa kwavaimbova mutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai. VaMpofu vati komiti iyi ndiyo ine masimba ekuita izvi ndokusaka zvakaitwa uye vati VaChamisa naVaElias Mudzuri vakagadzwa naVaTsvangirai sevatevedzeri kunyangwe zvazvo paiva naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe zvichiitwa VaTsvangirai vachishandisa masimba avaive nawo ari mubumbiro reMDC. Zvataurwa naVaMpofu zvatsinhirwa nemunyori anoona nezvesarudzo muMDC yaVaChamisa, VaJacob Mafume, avo vanga vari mudare. Gweta riri kumiririra Muzvare Khupe panyaya iyi, VaLovemore Madhuku, vaudzawo dare kuti pasi pebumbiro remitemo reMDC hazvikwanisike kuti pave nevatevedzeri vemutungamiri webato vaviri kana vatatu sezvo vachiti bumbiro iri riri pachena kuti panofanira kunge paine mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato mumwechete. VaMadhuku vati Muzvare Khupe ndivo vaifanira kufanobata chigaro chemutungamiri weMDC pakamirirwa kuitwa kongiresi yechimbichimbi yekutsvaga mutungamiri webato zvichitevera kufa kwakaita VaTsvangirai. VaMadhuku vaenderera mberi vachiti kudomwa kwaVaChamisa naVaMudzuri kuti vave vatevedzeri vaVaTsvangirai kwaive kunze kwemutemo. Vaenderera mberi kudaidzirwa kwaitwa musangano weNational Council wakagadza VaChamisa semutungamiri webato kwaiva kunze kwemutemo sezvo vachiti bumbiro reMDC riri pachena kuti misangano yechimbichimbi yekomiti iyi inokwanisa kushevedzerwa nemutungamiri webato chete kana mutevedzeri wake. Zvichakadai, dare reSupreme Court iro range riine vatongi vatatu vanoti VaPaddington Garwe, Amai Antonia Guvava naVaBharat Patel, rati richazotura mutongo waro muzuva rarisina kutara. Nyaya iyi isati yapinda mudare, mapurisa anorwisa mhirizhonga ayo anga akapakatira zvombo arambidza vatsigiri veMDC vanga vauya kuzonzwa nyaya iyi kupinda mudare ndokuvadzinga pamatare apa izvo zvashorwa nemumwe wevatevedzeri vaVaChamisa, Amai Lynette Karenyi Kore. Nyaya iyi yakaunzwa kumatare neimwe nhengo yeMDC yekuGokwe, VaElias Mashavira, avo vaiti VaChamisa havana kusarudzwa kuti vatungamire bato zviri pachena izvo zvakatambirwa nedare High Court. Asi VaChamisa vakazokwidza nyaya iyi kudare reSuupreme Court vachiti mutongo wedare reHigh Court unofanira kusendekwa parutivi. No media source currently available

headline: Nhengo dzeParamende Dzinotora Mhiko Dzichivimbisa Kushandira Zvido zveVanhu
text: Nhengo dzeparamende dzakakunda musarudzo dzegore rino nhasi dzatora mhiko yekutanga basa dzichivimbisa kuti dzichadzika mitemo inosimudzira magariro everuzhinji munyika pamwe nekuvandudza mitemo yese kuitira kuti ienderane nebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Nhengo zhinji dzeparamende dzaudza Studio7 kuti dzinofara chose nekusarudzwa kupinda mudare reparamende uye dzavimbisa kuti dzichaita zvese zvadzaivimbisa vanhu. Mumiri weMazowe South muNational Assembly, VaFortune Chasi veZanu PF, vati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti mitemo yese ivandudzwe kuitira kuti ienderane nebumbiro remitemo. Mumiri weMt Pleasant, VaSamuel Banda veMDC Alliance, vatiwo nyika inofanira kuva nemitemo inobata vanhu vese zvakaenzana zvisine kuti munhu ndewebato ripi. Mumiri weHarare West vari nhengo yeMDC Alliance, Muzvare Joana Mamombe, vaudza Studio7 kuti shuviro yavo ndeyekuti nhengo dzeparamende kubva kumapato ese, dzishande pamwe mukudzika mitemo nekuita basa rinobatsira mwana wese weZimbabwe. Mumiriri weGokwe-Nembudziya muNational Assembly, VaJustice Mayor Wadyajena veZanu PF, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanoda kushanda vasingatyityidzirwe nemakurukota ehurumende sezvaiitika muparamende yapfuura. Nhengo yeZanu PF, VaJoseph Chinotimba vekuBuhera South, vanoti vachashanda zvakasimbamukusimudzira vanhu vemudunhu ravo uye vatiwo vanoda kuti Studio7 ichitanga kutepfunyura iri muZimbabwe. Mumiri weGutu North, Amai Yeukai SimbanegaviveZanu PF, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vachaedza pese pavanongona napo kuti vanhu vemunzvimbo yavo vawane mabasa. Paramende yagara ichionekwa seisina simba uye ichimanikidzwa kuitwa zvese zvese nemutungamiriri wenyika kana makurukota ake. Asi VaSettlement Chikwinyawa veMDC Alliance vachimirira Mbizo vati izvi hazvisi kuzoitika rwendo rwuno. Munyori weparamende, VaKennedy Chokuda, vagadza nhengo dzese mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe dzedare reNational Assembly nenhengo makumi masere dzeseneti. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson MNangagwa, vanotarisirwa kudomwa nhengo shanu kudare reseneti uye svondo rapfuura vakatodoma vatevedzeri vavo vaviri zvinoreva kuti vasarirwa kudoma nhengo nhatu chete. Matare maviri eparamende aya achagara svondo rinouya kuti asarudze mutauriri weNational Assembly pamwe nemutungamiri wedare reSenate. Pane nzvimbo dzinodarika makumi matatu dzeNational Assembly dziri kupikiswa neMDC Alliance mudare reElectoral Court, zvekuti vari kupikisa ava vakabudirira, vamwe vatoreswa mhiko nhasi vanorasikirwa nenzvimbo dzavo mudare iri, vanenge vanzi vakunda vachitoreswa mhiko yekuti vave nhengo dzedare iri. No media source currently available

headline: Vanorwira Kodzero Voshushikana neHuwandu hweVanhukadzi Vakakunda muZanu PF
text: Varwiri vekodzero dzevanhukadzi voshushikana nezviri kubuda musarudzo dzeZanu PF vachiti zvinodzorera kumashure kuenzaniswa kwemikana pakati pevanhukadzi nevanhurume. Murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu variwo mutungamiri wesangano re#This Constitution, Our Constitution, Muzvare Abigail Mupambi, vanoti vari kushushikana nehuwandu hwevanhukadzi vakunda mubato reZanu PF. Pama constituency zana nemakumi mapfumbamwe aitwa sarudzo kusvika pari zvino, vanhukadzi gumi nevapfumbamwe ndivo chete vabudirira kuti vazomirira bato iri musarudzo dzenhengo dzeparamende. Muzvare Mupambi vanoti izvi zvinodzorera shure kurudziro yekuenzaniswa kwemikana pakati pevanhurume nevanhukadzi mune zvematongerwo enyika. Munguva pfupi yapfuura, sachigaro weboka remadzimai muMDC T inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, Amai Lynette Karenyi-Kore, vakati mubato ravo madzimai anopfuura zvishoma zvikamu makumi maviri kubva muzana ndivo chete vaive varatidza kuda kukwikwidza pazvinzvimbo zvekuve vamiriri veparamende. Vari kuda kuve mumiriri weBulawayo Metropolitan mubato reMDC T yaVaChamisa pasi pechikamu che proportional representation, Amai Barbara Tanyanyiwa, vanoti chimwe chikonzero chikuru chinoita kuti madzimai atadze kupinda muzvinzvimbo zvehutungamiri munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika inyaya yekushaya. Mumwewo murwiri wekodzero dzemadzimai, Muzvare Florence Guzha, vanotsinhira maonero aya. Bumbiro remitemo yenyika rine chiga chehuwandu hwevanhukadzi vanofanirwa kuve mumatare eNational Assembly pamwe neSenate. Murongi wemabasa muMDC T inotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe, Muzvare Yvonne Musarurwa, vanoti chimwe chikonzero chikuru chinoita kuti vanhukadzi vasawaniswe mukana wekupinda muzvinzvimbo zvehutungamiri mune zvematongerwo enyika inyaya yekuti vagara vachitarisirwa pasi munyaya dzehutungamiri. Mune imwe ongororo yarakaita mumakore mana apfuura nesangano reResearch Advocacy Unit yakaburitsa kuti vamiriri veparamende vechidzimai vaiita basa ravo zviri nani kupfuura vanhurume. Munyori mukuru weNational Association of Non-Governmental Organisations, Muzvare Tinaye Nhutsve, vanoti vanoshushikanawo nezvabuda kusvika pari zvino musarudzo dzema primary dzebato reZanu PF. Muzvare Nhutsve vanoti zvakakosha kuti masangano anoshanda akazvimirira ega pamwe nehurumende zvishande pamwe chete kuti vanhukadzi vapinde muzvinzvimbo zvehutungamiri. Vachitaura nerimwe bepanhau munguva pfupi yapfuura sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemadzimai nevechidiki, Amai Priscilla Misihairabwi Mushonga, vakati maitiro emapato ezvematongerwo enyika anoita kuti vanhukadzi vatadze kupinda muzvinzvimbo zvehutungamiri. Vakati kune mhirizhonga, kunyombwa, kushungurudzwa uye kudzvinyirirwa kwevanhukadzi kwakawanda kunoita kuti vasade kupinda muzvinzvimbo zvehutungamiri. No media source currently available

headline: ZCTU Yokurudzira Vashandi Kuti Vasaenda Kumabasa Kutanga Muvhuro
text: Sangano rinomirira vashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, rinoti riri kukurudzira vashandi pamwe nevanozvibatira mabasa emaoko kuti vasaenda kumabasa kutanga neMuvhuro senzira yekuratidza kunyunyuta kwavo nekuoma kwaita hupenyu. Mutungamiri weZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti zvichitevera tsvakurudzo yavakaita kubva kune mapoka akasiyanasiyana, vakaona zvakakodzera kuti vakurudzirire vanhu kuti vasaenda kumabasa kwemazuva matatu. VaMutasa vanoti vashandi vamanikidzwa kutora danho iri zvichitevera kukwidzwa kwemutengo wemafuta ekufambisa nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa neMugovera usiku. VaMutasa vanoti vashandi vari kutarisana nematambudziko makukutu ekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu zuva nezuva asi mihoro yavo isiri kukwirawo. Vanoti kuwedzerwa kwemutengo wemafuta ekufambisa kwatonyanyowedzera matambudziko evashandi vemuZimbabwe, vangave vakabairwa zvitupa kana vanozvishandira voga. VaMutasa vanoti vanga vakanga vakokwa nehurumende kuti vasangane nehurumende pamwe nevashandirwi neMuvhuro pasi pegungano reTripartite Negotiating Forum, asi mushure mekukwidzwa kwemafuta ekufambisa sangano ravo harichakwanisa kupinda mumusangano uyu. Vanoti vachazotarisa dzimwe nzira dzekutora panopera mazuva matatu ekusaenda kumabasa.

headline: Masimba eParamende eKutonga Nhengo Dzayo Ovandudzwa
text: Hurongwa hwekuwandudza mitemo yenyika kuti ifambirane nebumbiro idzva remitemo hunonzi hwuri kuratidza kufamba negwara zvichitevera kugazetwa kwebhiri reGeneral Laws Amendment Bill svondo rapera. Bhiri iri rinonzi riri kuda kuti mitemo ingangosvika zana nemakumi mashanu, kusanganisira mutemo uchatapudza masimba edare reparamende mukuranga kwaro nhengo dzinenge dzatsautsira, ivandudzwe. Bhiri iri rinonzi riri kuda kuti paramende itorerwe masimba ekuendesa kujeri munhu anenge atsautsira, asi kuti abhadhariswe faindi, kana kuti pane dzimwe mhosva, paramende itsvage rubatsiro rwehofisi yemuchuchisi mukuru wenyika, kwete kuti iyo paramende itonge nhengo iyi. Mukokeri wenhengo dzeMDC T mudare reparamende, VaInnocent Gonese, vanoti kunyange hazvo vasati vaona bhiri iri, vanotsigira pfungwa yekuti matare edzimhosva atore iwo masimba ekuranga nhengo dzinenge dzatsautsira, kwete kuti vadare varangane pachavo. VaGonese vanoti dzimwe nguva vadare muparamende vanotonga mhosva vachitarisa kuti munhu abuda mumba maani kana kuti ane ruvara rwakadii. Nyaya inouya mupfungwa dzevakawanda ndeye vaive mumiriri weChimanimani mudare iri, VaRoy Bennett veMDC-T, avo vakakandwa mujeri mugore ra 2005 vachipomerwa mhosva yekurova vaive gurukota rezvemitemo panguvayo, VaPatrick Chinamasa. Paramende yakakanda VaBennett mujeri kwegore rose, danho rakaonekwa nevakawanda senzira yekupfidzisa vanopikisana nebato reZanu PF. Asi VaGonese vanoti zvanga zvatora nguva yakanyanya kureba pasati pabatanidzwa mitemo iyi, vachiti izvi zvaifanirwa kunge zvakaitika kare pakangotambirwa bumbiro remitemo idzva. Bhiri iri rave kutarisirwa kuverengwa muparamende kekutanga risati razeyiwa nekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemitemo. No media source currently available

headline: Matare eDzimhosva Ovhiringwa neCovid-19
text: Komisheni inoona nezvekufambiswa kwenyaya dzemumatare, yeJudicial Services Commission, yazivisa nhasi kuti kunyange hazvo matare achange akavhurwa pamazuva eLockdown Level Four, matare achange asingaiti mabasa ese anotarisirwa kuti ave achiitwa semazuva ose. Mutauriri weJudicial Services Commission, Muzvare Rumbidzai Takawira, vati kunyange hazvo matare anenge akavhurwa panguva iyi, haakwanisi kuita mabasa awo sezvinotarisirwa nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 nezvimwe zvipingaidzo. Muzvare Takawira vati nekudaro matare achange achingonzwa nyaya dziri kupinda mumatare kekutanga, nyaya dzechimbichimbi pamwe nenyaya dzeavo vanenge vachida kukumbira mukana wekutongwa vachibva kumba chete Muzvare Takawira vati izvi zvinoreva kuti vese vane nyaya dziri mumatare avo vaive vapiwa mazuva ekudzoka ari mumazuva makumi nematatu anotevera, vachazodzokera kumatare mumashure memazuva aya zvichitariswa mitemo inenge yaiswa nehurumende mukuedza kudzivirira kupararira kwedenda reCovid 19. Judicial Services Commission yazivisawo kutiwo vese vachange vachiuya kumatare vanosungirwa kutorwa temperature, kupfeka mamasiki pamwe nekugeza maoko, uye kuona kuti havabatani nevamwe zvakanyanya. Sangano iri ratiwo vanhuwo zvavo vanenge vasingabvumirwi kupinda pamatare mukati memazuva akatarwa eLockdown. Asi rimwe gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaObey Shava, vaudza Studio 7 kuti matanho atorwa neJudicial Services Commission aya anotyora bumbiro remitemo yenyika. VaShava vati izvi zvinoreva kuti vanhu vane nyaya mumatare, nyaya dzavo dzichanzwikwa mushure menguva yakareba zvisinei nebumbiro remitemo yenyika iro rinoti nyaya dzinofanirwa kunzwika nechimbichimbi mumatare. VaShava vatiwo zvinoomeserawo avo vasina kupiwa mikana yekutongwa vachibva kumba vachiti nguva yavo yekugara mutirongo inenge yorebeswa kunyange hazvo vasati vabatwa nemhosva. Izvi zvatsigirwawo nerimwezve gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaMartin Kadzere, vachitiwo kunyange matare ati pane nyaya dzaanenge achinzwa, magweta ari kurambidzwa kuenda kumabasa pamaroadblocks. VaKadzere vati nhasi ivo pachavo vadzorerwa kumba. Kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 zvakanyanya kwakaita kuti hurumende ikurudzire veruzhinji kuti vagare kudzimba kutanga nhasi, kwemazuva makumi matatu. No media source currently available

headline: Amai Grace Mugabe Votuka Zvakare Amai Mujuru neMDC
text: Mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mygabe, vati vaimbova mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joice Mujuru, havazofa vakavigwa pamarinda anovigwa magamba enyika nepamusana pekuti vakapandukira mutungamiri wenyika,Va Robert Mugabe. Vachitaura neChitatu nevatsigiri vebato ravo paChimhanda Secondary School ku Rushinga mudunhu reMashonaland Central, munyori muboka remadzimai reZanu PF reWomen’s League, Amai Grace Mugabe, vashora Amai Mujuru nekuda chigaro chaVa Mugabe vachiti Amai Mujuru havazofi vakavigwa pa Heroes Acre nokuti vakazvidza mutungamiri wenyika. No media source currently available Amai Mugabe vati kunze kunotonhora kana munhu achinge asiri mu Zanu PF. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kutaura naAmai Mujuru kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Amai Mugabe vaenderera mberi vachiti mapato anopikisa haafanirwe kubvumidzwa kupinda mudunhu reMashonaland Central vachiti dunhu iri ndere Zanu PF. Amai Mugabe varambawo mashoko ari kubuda mumapepanhau ekuti ndivo vari kutungamira chipoka chemuZanu PF chiri kudaidzwa kuti G40 kana kuti Generation 40 icho chinonzi chakateya kutora masimba kubva kuna Va Mugabe kana vachinge vabva pachigaro. Zvinonzi muZanu PF mune kusawirirana zvakanyanya panyaya yekuti achatora matomhu kubva kuna Va Mugabe ndiyani. Mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika atorawo zvakare mukana uyu kutsoropodza vaimbova mutungamiri weBritain, Va Tony Blair, pamwe naVa George Bush vaimbova mutungamiri weAmerica vachiti vaviri ava vanofanirwa kutongwa kudare re International Criminal Court. Va Mugabe vanowanzotukawo America ne Britain pese pavanowana mukana wekutaura paruzhinji sezvaitwa nemudzimai wavo nhasi. Kunyange hazvo mhuri yaVa Mugabe ine mapurazi akawanda, mazhinji acho ari pasi pekambani inonzi Gushungo Holdings, Amai Mugabe vashora vakuru vakuru muhurumende vakatora mapurazi akawanda avasiri kushandisa nemhazvo. Zvichakadai, Amai Mugabe vatorawo mukana uyu kutuka vatori venhau vachiti vanonyora manyepo. Mumwe mutori wenhau ane mukurumbira munyika uye vari mupepeti webepanhau re The Observer, Va Barnabas Thondlana, varatidza kusafara nemashoko aAmai Mugabe aya vachiti vatori venhau vanofanirwa kusiiwa vachiita basa ravo vakasununguk Amai Mugabe vasiya vagovera matarakita, mbatya, shangu, ma computer pamwe nechikafu kuvagari veku Mashonaland Central vachiti havana basa nekuti vemapato anopikisa anoti chii panyaya dzekutenga mavhoti vachiti yatokwana nguva yekuti bato ravo ritsvage rutsigiro pamberi pesarudzo dzemuna 2018. Amai Mugabe vakatarisirwa kuita misangano nevatsigiri vavo mumatunhu ose enyika kwavanoti vachafamba vachigovera zvinhu vachiti zvavari kuita kuzadzikisa zviri muchirongwa chekuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika che Zimbabwe Agenda for Sustainable Socio Economic Transformation kana kuti Zimasset.

headline: Sangano reCoomunity Working Group on Health Ropa Dzidziso Pamusoro peCovid-19
text: Mukuru wesangano reCoomunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti sangano ravo riri kushanda mumatunhu akawanda emunyika richidzidzisa vanoita zvehutano munharaunda pamwe vechidiki pamusoro pekudzivirirwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19, avo vanozodzidzisawo vamwe. Izvi zvinouya panguva iyo matunhu anoti Bulawayo, Matabeleland North neMatabeleland South ari kusangana nedambudziko rekukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kufa pamwe nekubatwa nechirwere kubva mwedzi wapera. VaRusike vanotiwo sangano ravo riri kushandawo mumatunhu anoti Manicaland, Masvingo neMidlands, uko vari kubatana nanambuya hutano mukupa dzidziso kuti veruzhinji vazive nzira dzekudzvirira kupararira kwedenda iri. Sangano reCommunity Working Group on Health riri kukwanisa kupinda mumaruwa kuburikidza nemabhasikoro arakapiwa nesangano reWorld Bicycle Relief. Asi vanoti kuti nyika ibudirire kudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiwana hunokonzera chirwere ichi, hurumende pamwe nemakanzuru zvinofanirwa kuona kuti vanhu vawaniswa mvura kayachena yekushandisa kugeza maoko pamwe nekuzvishambidza, uyewo vari kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vachengetedze mitemo yakatarwa nebazi rezvehutano pamwe neWorld Health Organisation. Asi VaRusike vanoti kana hurumende yakazofunga kutora matanhu ekurambidza veruzhinji kufambafamba, haifanirwe kubva yavhara nyika yose sezvakamboitika pakutanga, sezvo vazhinji vevanhu munyika vachirarama nekuzviitira mabasa emaoko. No media source currently available

headline: Russia Yoburitsa Spain Mumakwikwi eWorld Cup
text: Russia yakashura mare mumakwikwi eWorld Cup apo yakarova Spain 4-3 mumapenalties mushure mekuita mangange-1-1. Russia yapinda mumaquarter finals emakwikwi aya. Spain yakabatana nedzimwe nyika dzakapinda mumaquarter finals nezuro dzinoti France neUruguay. Nemusi weMuvhuro nenguva dza 4 masikati, Brazil iri kutamba neMexico kochizoti manheru nenguva dza 8, Belgium iri kutamba neJapan.

headline: WHO Inoti Haisati Yatambira Nhomba dzeCovid-19 Dziri Kushandiswa muZimbabwe
text: Sangano reWorld Health Organisation, WHO,rinoti nhomba dziri kushandiswa muZimbabwe dzakagadzirwa kuChina hadzisati dzatambirwa nesangano iri zviri [amuteno kuitira kuti dzishandiswe neveruzhinji mukudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19. WHO inoti ichiri kuongorora nhomba mbiri idzi dzeSinovac neSinopharm. Mumiriri weWHO muZimbabwe, Dr Alex Gasasira, vati nhomba dzekuChina dzeSinovac neSinopharm dzave padanho repamusoro soro mukuongororwa, uye vanotarisira kuti panopera mwedzi uno waKubvumbi, WHO inenge yapedza kuongorora nhomba idzi. Mashoko aVaGasasira anoburitsa pachena kuti nhomba dzeSinovac neSinopharm dziri kushandiswa munyika, hadzisati dzapihwa chitambi neWHO kuti dzishandiswe neveruzhinji. Vachipindura mubvunzo weStudio7 wekuti zvinhu zvinotarisirwa here kuti nyika dzishandise nhomba dzisati dzakomekedzwa neWHO, VaGasasira vati sesangano vanokurudzira masangano anotarisa mishonga munyika dzakasiyana siyana kuti aongorore nhomba idzi dzisati dzashandiswa kune veruzhinji. VaGasasira vati sangano rinoongorora nekubvumidza mishonga munyika reMedicine Control Authority of Zimbabwe, MCAZ, rakati rakatarisa nhomba idzi rikagutsikana kuti dzakanakira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe. VaGasasira vatiwo Zimbabwe hasi iyo yega nyika iri kushandisa nhomba dzekuChina idzi. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuMCAZ kuti yakaita ongororo yayo riini, uye kuti zviyi zvakabuda muongororo iyi. Zimbabwe pari zvino iri kushandisa nhomba mbiri dzekuChina, yeSinovac neSinopharm Nhomba dzekuChina idzi dzinonzi dzaita mitauro kune dzimwe nyika kunyanya nhomba yeSinovac inonzi dziviriro yayo yakaderera pane zvaive zvataurwa neChina. Asi mutungamiri werimwe remasangano anomirira madhokotera anoshanda akazvimiririra, Dr Johannes Marisa, vaudza Studio7 kuti kana nhomba ichidzivirira nezvikamu zvinopfuura makumi mashanu, chinhu chakakosha mukudzivirira ndufu nezvikamu izvozvo. VaMarisa vatiwo kana vanhu vakabaiwa pamwe nekutevedzera zvinokurudzirwa, zvekupfeka mamasiki, kusaungana nekugeza maoko zvinobatsira mukurwisa chirwere ichi. VaMarisa vatiwo mimwe mishonga inodzi ine dziviriro iri pamusoro inonetsa kushandisa nekuda kwezvinodiwa pakuichengetedza. Nyanzvi mune zvehutano uye vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano, VaHenry Madzorera, vati chakanyanyokosha pari zvino kuti Zimbabwe iite tsvagiridzo yayo yekuona kuti nhomba idzi dziri kushanda zvakadii munyika. VaMadzorera vati hapana change chakaipa mukusanobaya vanhu nhomba idzi, vakati vanhu vapiwa nhomba iyi munyika vawanda zvekuti hurumende ine mukana wekuchiongorora kuti iri kushanda zvakanaka here. VaMadzorera vati mashandiro enhomba anosiyana siyana, uye hapana chakaipa mukumira kushandisa nhomba idzi kana zvaonekwa kuti hadzisi kushanda zvakanaka. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kudivi rebazi rezvehutano nezvenyaya yenhomba dzekuChina. Asi vachitaura pakasvika nhomba yekutanga munyika, mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, VaJohn Mangwiro, vakati zvimwe zvinotariswa neZimbabwe panhomba, machengeterwo enhomba idzi vakapa muenzaniso wenhomba yeSinopharm iyo vakati iri nyore kuchengeta munyika sezvo zvikwanisiro zvaidiwa zvakagara zviripo munyika. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanoti Zimbabwe imwe yenyika dzemuSADC dziri pamusoro mukushandisa nhomba dzakagadzirwa kuChina. No media source currently available

headline: Vatori veNhau Vocherechedza Zuva reKuremekedzwa kweKodzero Dzavo Vachiti muZimbabwe Vari Kushungurudzwa
text: Vatori venhau neMuvhuro vakacherechedza zuva rekuremekedzwa kwekodzero dzavo kana kuti World Press Freedom Day vachichema chema kuti makore makumi matatu mushure mechibvumirano chekuWindoek Declaration vachiri kushanda vakamanikidzika munyika. Mumwe mutori wenhau, VaEliah Ntali vaudza Studio 7 kuti chibvumirano chakaitwa kunyika yeNamibia muWindhoek, chinozivikanwa nekuti Windhoek Declaration chinokurudzira kufambiswa kwemashoko zvakasununguka hachisati chazadzikiswa munyika vachipa muenzaniso wekusungwa nekumbunyikidzwa kwevatori venhau. Mumwe mutori wenhau John Cassim atsinhirawo mashoko aya vachiti pakapidigurwa hurumende yamushakabvu Robert Mugabe nemauto muna 2017, zvinhu zvakamboita nani pakapinda VaEmmerson Mnangagwa panyanga asi iko zvino hazvichisina kumira zvakanaka. Mukuru we Media Institute of Southern Africa- Zimbabwe kana kuti Misa-Zimbabwe VaTabani Moyo vatiwo basa rekutapwa kwenhau harisi kufamba zvakanaka vachitiwo vatapi venhau vari kushungurudzwa, kusungwa uye kune dzimwe nyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica vari kuurayiwa. VaMoyo vatiwo panguva ino yedenda reCovid-19 vatapi venhau vanofanirwa kupiwa zvinovadzivirira pavanenge varikubasa vakarumbidza hurumende yeZimbabwe nekutenda kuisa vatori venhau pavanhu vakatanga kubaiwa nhomba. VaMoyo vatiwo hurumende inofanirwa kuisa mitemo inokurudzira kufambiswa kwemashoko kwakasununguka vakatiwo mitemo irikuda kuiswa yakadai seCybersecurity and data protection Bill inodzorera shure kufambiswa kwemashoko zvakasununguka Mukuru weZimbabwe Association of Community Radio Stations (ZACRAS), Muzvare Vivenne Marara vakurudzirawo hurumende nevatori venhau kuti vawanise veruzhinji ruzivo rwakakwana kuti vatore matanho akakosha muhupenyu vaine ruzivo rwakakwana. Vatori venhau vemuZimbabwe vanotiwo chirwere cheCovid-19 chasiya vazhinji vavo vave parumananzombe sezvo mamwe makambani enhau onetsekana kubhadhara vashandi. Mugwaro ravo rekucherechedza WPFD, Amnesty International yatiwo kumabudazuva nekuchamhembe kweAfrica vatori venhau vari kumbunyikidzwa izvo zvosanganawo nedenda reCovid-19 . Amnesty International yati Zimbabwe irikushungurudzawo vatori venhau kuburikidza nekusungwa pamwe nekukanganiswa pakushanda. Mumwe mutori wenhau wekuManicaland, Sydney Saize akasungwa mugovera achiita basa rake. Asi hurumende iri kuramba mashoko ekuti iri kushungurudza vatori venhau ichiti iri kutoisa mitemo yekurerutsira vatori venhau. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaKindness Paradza vaudza Studio 7 kuti pane mitemo yakawanda yadzikwa kurerutsira vatori venhau. Asi mumashoko kuvatori venhau, rimwe sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights rinoti hurumende inofanira kumisa tsika yekumbunyikidza kodzero dzevatori venhau sezvo zvichikanganisa nyaya yehutongo hwejekerere. Zuva reWorld Press Freedom Day rinocherechedzwa musi wa 3 Chivabvu gore rega rega uye gore rino ririkucherechedzwa pasi pedingindira rakanangana nekukosha kwekuburitswa kwemashoko kuruzhinji kana kuti “information as a public good." No media source currently available

headline: Vanotengesa Zvinhu Mumigwagwa Voisa Zvipikiri Munzeve Dzavo
text: Vatengesi vemumigwagwa vari kushoropodza zvikuru kanzuru yeHarare iyo vanoti yakavaudza kuti ichashandisa mapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police kuvadzinga mumigwagwa mavanotengesera. Senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheTyphoid, kanzuru yeHarare neChipiri yakapa vanotengesera zvinhu zvavo mumigwagwa mazuva maviri kuti vamire kuita izvi. Kunyange hazvo mazuva aya apfuura, vatengesi ava havasati vabuda mumigwagwa uye vanoti havasi kuzobuda. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiriri we Sangano re Zimbabwe Chamber of Informal Economy Association, ZCIEA, iro rinomirira vanobata mabasa emaoko, Amai Olivia Songere, vashora zvikuru kanzuru nekuda kushandisa huturu pamusangano wavaita nevatori venhau. Mumwe mutengesi, VaGivus Maririmba, vashoropodzawo kanzuru yeHarare nekupomera vatengesi vemumigwagwa kuti ndivo vari kukonzoresa kuti hutachiona hwetyphoid hwupararire. VaMaririmba vatiwo kutengesa mumigwagwa kuri kukonzerwa nekushaikwa kwemabasa VaMaririmba vashorawo mitemo inoshandiswa nemakanzuru iyo yavati ndeyehudzvanyiriri yaishandiswa nehurumende yavachena. Mukuru wesangano reHarare Residents Trust, VaPrecious Shumba, vanotiwo kupomerana mhosva hakusiko kunopedza dambudziko rezvirwere zvemudumbu. VaShumba vari kukurudzira kanzuru kuti iterese mitero vanotengesa mumigwagwa, mari yainenge yawana, yoshandiswa mukuchenesa nzvimbo dzinotengeserwa. Mutauriri wekanzuru ye Harare, VaMichael Chideme, vanoti kanzuru ichazenge ichibatsirwa nemapurisa kubvisa nechisimba vatengesi vari kurambira mumigwagwa. No media source currently available

headline: Munhu Mumwe Chete Akafa neChirwere CheCovid-19 neSvondo kuMatabeleland South
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti nemusi weSvondo munhu mumwe chete akafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kuMatabeleland South zvichireva kuti vanhu vafa vachiri chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mashanu nemakumi manomwe kana kuti 1,557. Vanhu makumi maviri nevaviri kana kuti 22 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vabatwa nacho vave zviuru makumi matatu nemasere ane makumi masere nevatanhatu kana kuti 38, 086. Vanhu makumi maviri nevaviri vakapora zvasiya vapora vave zviuru makumi matatu nemashanu zvine nezana nemakumi maviri nevatatu kana ktui 35, 123. Vanhu vachiri kurwara vave chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mana nevatanhatu kana kuti 1,406. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga vave zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi matatu nemazana matanhatu kana kuti 336, 600. Vabayiwa nhomba kaviri sezvinokurudzirwa vave zviuru makumi mashanu nematatu zvine mazana mana negumi nevasere kana kuti 53, 418.

headline: WFP Yowedzera Kubatsira Zimbabwe Mushure Mekunge VaMugabe Vati Nzara Yapfunya Chisero muNyika
text: Mutauriri wesangano reWorld Food Programme kuchamhembe kweAfrica VaDavid Orr vanoti mashoko emutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe ekuti Zimbabwe inyika iri parumananzombe kana kuti state of disaster panyaya yechikafu ave kureva kuti vave kusimbisa mabasa ekutsvaga mari yekubatsira vanhu vemuZimbabwe. WFP yainge yati ichabatsira vanhu vanopfuura zviuru mazana masere munyika asi inogona kuwedzerwa huwandu uhu. Payakati inoda kubatsira vanhu ava zvainzi vanhu vanosvika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mashanu ndivo vaida chikafu munyika asi ikozvino vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mana. Mukuru weChristian Care, rimwe sangano rinobatsira nechikafu richishanda neWFP, Reverend Stanlus Chatikobo vanoti nzara yapfunya chisero munyika uye kuwana zvekudya kuri kunetsa. VaChatikobo vati kana vawana mari vanobatsira vanhu nemadhora gumi pamunhu mumhuri. Vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni makumi matatu kusanganisa kuSouth Africa kusingawanzopihwe chikafu vanonzi vakatarisana nenzara inotyisa kudunhu rekuchamhembe kweAfrica. No media source currently available

headline: Covid-19 Inobata Vanhu Vanodarika Zviuru Zvina neMazana Masere
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu vakanga vabatwa nechirwere che Covid-19 munyika vaive vasvika pazviuru zvina nemazana masere negumi nevasere, kana kuti 4 818. Vanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika yose vachiri zana nevana kana kuti 104, uye vapona vasvika kuchiuru nemazana mashanu nemakumi mana nevana, kana kuti 1 544. Vanhu vanoita makumi manomwe, kana kuti 70, ndivo vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi pavanhu chiuru nemazana manomwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevashanu, kana kuti 1 795 vakavhenekwa pachishandiswa nzira ye Polymerase Chain Reaction kana kuti PCR. Vanhu vose vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi ndevaya vagara vari munyika vasina nhoroondo yekubuda kunze. Nhepfenyuro yeZBC yakazivisawo nezuro kuburikidza nedandemutande reTwitter kuti vashandi vayo makumi matatau vakabatwa ne Covid-19. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reZBC pamusoro pevanhu vakabatwa neCovid-19 ava. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano vari chiremba, Doctor Gilson Mandigo, vanoti vari kuona kuti pave nemusiyano mukuru pahuwandu hwevanhu vave kubatwa nekushaya nechirwere ichi, zvichienzaniswa nepakatanga chirwere ichi kuwanikwa munyika sezvo vanhu vave kuwanikwa vaine chirwere ichi vari vanhu vagara vari munyika, kwete vari kubva kunze kwenyika. Doctor Mandigo vanoti zvinoratidza kuti vanhu vanofanirwa kusimbisa nyaya dzekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. No media source currently available

headline: NAAZ yotumira shangwiti kuNigeria
text: SANGANO reNational Athletics Association of Zimbabwe (NAAZ) rinoti rakanyorera kuHurumende richikumbira mvumo kuti rigotumira shangwiti dzerelay kunokwikwidza kumujaho weMoC relays (4×100) uyo uchaitirwa kuLagos kuNigeria svondo rino.   NAAZ yakashevedzwa kumutambo uyu neThe Athletics Federation of Nigeria (AFN) uye chikwata cheZimbabwe chinofanirwa kunge chave kuNigeria musi weChishanu chino chichigadzirira mujaho uyu uchamhanywa musi weMugovera neSvondo.   Mutungamiri weNAAZ — Tendai Tagara — anoti sangano ravo richiri rakamira mhinduro kubva kuHurumende uye kunzwa kubva kuAFN nevakotsveri vemutambo uyu kuti vagotumira matikiti endege nemaVisa evamhanyi vavo vavachatumira.   “Takangomirira kunzwa kubva kuHurumende yedu kuti tozvifambisa sei parwendo urwu uye kubva kuAFN nevakotsveri vemutambo uyu vekuNigeria avo vakatidana kuti tiende kunokwikwidza. Mujaho uyu uchashanda mukurwira zvekare tikiti rekuenda kumaOlympics saka tiri kuukoshesa zvakanyanya. Kana tapihwa mvumo, chikwata chedu chinofanira kunge chave kuNigeria musi weChishanu, choswera chakazorora chiriko nekuti musi weMugovera chinenge chakatobvondoka kumujaho uhu,” anodaro Tagara.   Anoti iye zvino havasati vaziva kuti ndevapi vatambi vavachasarudza kuti vapinde muchikwata ichi sezvo vari kumbomirira mvumo yekuenda ndipo vozotanga kudoma vatambi vekutakura.   “Pari zvino hatisati tave nechikwata asi vatinogona kutumira ndevari kurwira kuenda kumaOlympics vanosanganisira Ngoni Makusha, Chengetai Mapaya, Kundai Maguranyanga, Tinotenda Matienda nevamwe vari kurwira kuenda kuIAAF World championships,” anodaro Tagara.

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kuzivisa Nyika Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kuwanikwa Vaine Omicron Variant
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti dziri kushushikana nekusabuda pachena kwehurumende pahuwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa vaine mhando itsva yeCovid-19, yeOmicron Variant. Kushushikana uku kunotevera kuzivisa kwayakaita hurumende svondo rapera kuti vanhu makumi mashanu vaive vabatwa nemando yeOmicron munyika asi haina kuzoramba ichizivisa nezvehuwandu uhu izvo zviri kuita kuti vamwe vati pane zviri kuvanzwa pamusoro penyaya iyi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano uye vari chiremba anoshandira mudunhu reNorth Carolina muAmerica, Dr Simbiso Ranga, vanoti zvakakosha kuti hurumende iite tsvakurudzo nekuzivisa huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nemhando yeOmicron vachiti izvi zvinobatsira zvikuru pakurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19. Dr Ranga vati kunyange hazvo zvichidhura kuti paitwe ongororo yekuziva kuti mhando yechirwere cheCovid iri kutekeshera munyika ndeipi, vati zvakakosha kuti hurumende iwane mari yekuve nezvikwanisiro zvekuita izvi. Dr Norman Matara, avo vanove munyori mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, vatiwo matanho akatorwa nehurumende mushure mekuveko kwemhando yeOmicron ndeechimbi-chimbi uye haana humboo hwescience hunoratidza kuti anobatsira. Vatiwo hurumende inodzoka yozvivhiringidza pachayo nekuramba ichiita zvimwe zvirongwa zvinoonekwa sezvinowedzera kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Mukuru wezvekudzivirirwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19 munyik, Dr Agnes Mahomva, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende haisi kukwanisa kugara ichipa huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nemhando yeOmicron munyika. Asi vati vari mushishi kuongorora hutachiwana uhu kubva kumatunhu ose enyika vakati vachazivisa zvinenge zvawanikwa munguva pfupi inotevera. Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu vaviri vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nezuro, uye vamwe vanhu zviuru zvina nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare. Izvi zvakasiya huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi hwasvika pazviuru zvina nemazana manomwe nemakumi maviri, 4 720, uye vabatwa munyika yose nechirwere ichi vavazviuru zana nemakumi mashanu nemazana matanhatu nemakumi maviri nevasere, 150 628. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yepiri vakanga vava mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi maviri nezvitanhatu nezana nemakumi mana nemumwe chete, 2 926 141, uye vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga vari mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe nezvinomwe nemazana masere nemakumi matanhatu, 3 907 860. Huwandu uhu hunogona kukwira nhasi manheru apo hurumende ichazivisa zvayawana nhasi. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Barcelona yotenga Martial
text: kugadzirira mari inosvika 60 miriyoni paunzi yekutenga mutambi weManchester United, Anthony Martial.   Martial zvinonzi haasi kufara kuOld Trafford uye hurukuro dzekuwedzera imwe kondirakiti yake hadzisi kufamba nekuda kwekushaya mikana yekutamba yakawanda muchikwata chaJose Mourinho. Kondirakiti yake yaanayo parizvino ichapera mugore ra2019, asi ine chimwe chibvumirano chekuti inogona kuwedzerwa rimwe gore pamusoro.   Kubva Alexis Sanchez auya kuchikwata ichi muna Ndira, Martial haasati ambonwisa, angotamba mitambo mina chete inosanganisira uyo vakakundwa neTootenham pamwe neNewcastle uye akazoburitswa angotamba maminitsi 64 chete apo vakasangana neChelsea. Martial anonzi haana kufara paakaudzwa kuti ave kuchinja nzvimbo yekutambira zvichitevera kuuya kwakaita Senchez kuchikwata ichi.   Barcelona yaida kutenga Martial mwaka uno  ndokuzosarudza kutenga Ousmane Dembele kubva kuBorrusia Dortmund, asi inogona kuzodzokera mutambi uyu panopera mwaka uno.   Barcelona ine chivimbo chekuti inogona kutenga mutambi weFrance – Antoine Griezmann – kubva kuAtletci Madrid uye inonzi iri kuongorora Ryan Sessgnon weFulham. – SportsMail Football

headline: Mutasa akapotsa atiny’udza: DeMbare
text: MWAKA wenhabvu wa2018 uchagara mundangariro dzevatsigiri veDynamos sezvo gore rino chikwata ichi chakapona nepaburi retsono kuburitswa muCastle Premiership League.   Dynamos mwaka uno haina kutamba nhabvu yainozivikanwa ichitamba makore ese izvo zvakaona chikwata ichi chichisvika pakushandura varairidzi kanokwana kana.   Pekutanga, DeMbare yakadzinga Lloyd Mutasa ndokumutsiva naBiggie Zuze asi ndokuzomudzinga zvakare ichidzosa Samaita – sezita raMutasa remadunhurirwa – uye ndokuzomudzinga kechipiri achitsiviwa naLloyd Chigowe.   Zvese izvi mumaziso amaneja wechikwata ichi Richard Chihoro anoti zvakakonzereswa naMutasa uyo waanoti aive nehumbimbindoga asingade kushanda nevamwe kana kuteerera mazano aaipihwa pamusoro pechikwata ichi.   “Munoziva nhabvu haidi humbimbindoga, kuti ndiwe unoziva kudarika vamwe vese! Kwete, hazvidi kudaro.   “Nhabvu inoda mushandirapamwe, kana muchida kuhwina munofanirwa kushanda semhuri. Manje Lloyd aisada izvozvo aingoda kushanda ari ega,  asingateerere vamwe.   “Takapotsa tanyura nekuda kwake kusateerera achifunga kuti ari kugona iye pasina zvaaiita,” anodaro Chihoro.

headline: Mhuri yeVaShona Iri muKenya Yotarisira Kuvhota Kekutanga neChipiri Kubva Zvayawaniswa Magwaro eKuve Zvizvarwa zveNyika iyi Muna 2020
text: Mhuri yeVaShona iri muKenya ichange ichivhota kekutanga musarudzo dzenyika dziri kuitwa nemusi weChipiri 09 Nyamavhuvhu 2022, mushure mekupiwa magwaro ekuve zvizvarwa zvenyika iyi. Mutauriri wemhuri yeVaShona iyi, VaOliver Muregerera, vanoti vari kufara zvakanyanya nekukwanisa kushandisa kodzero dzavo dzevhota sezvimwe zvizvarwa zvemuKenya, vachiti chinhu chakatarisirwa nevanhu vose. Vabereki vemhuri idzi vakapinda munyika yeKenya vachibva kuZimbabwe makore anodarika makumi matanhatu adarika vakagara pasi pehutungamiri hwakasiyanasiyana, asi hapana akakwanisa kuvapa magwaro aya, kusvikira mugore ra 2020 pavakazocherechedzwa nekupiwa magwaro aya nemutungamiri wenyika, VaUhuru Kenyatta. Mhuri dzingangoda kusvika kuzviuru zvina dzinonzi dzakakwanisa kunge dzichipiwa magwaro aya. VaMuregerera vanoti kuwaniswa magwaro uku hakuna kungovapa mukana wekuvhota chete, asi kuti vave kukwanisawo zvakare kuvhura mabhuku ekumabhanga, kukwereta mari kumabhanga, kuenda kuzvikoro zvepamusoro, nezvimwe zvakawanda. Vanotiwo nekuda kwekuti vave nemagwaro ekuve zvizvarwa zveKenya, vanotarisirawo kuti musarudzo dzichatevera vana vavo vari kuchikoro pari zvino vachazokwanisawo kukwikwidza muzvigaro zvakasiyanasiyana. No media source currently available

headline: Vari Kunze kweNyika Votambira Zvakaitwa neMauto
text: Zvizvarwa zveku Zimbabwe zvinogara kunze kwenyika zvinoti zviri kufara nezvakaitwa nemauto ayo akabvisa mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, pamatomu zvichiti zvanga zvayaura nekushupwa nehurumende yeZanu PF. Asi vanhu ava vanoti vanoda kuona mauto achidzosera masimba kune vezvematongerwo enyika. Murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu, uye vari vamwe vevanhu vakavamba MDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai muAmerica, VaNick Mada, vanoti shuviro yavo ndeyekuti mauto adzosere masimba kune vanoita zvematongerwo enyika kana zvaari kuda zvabudirira. VaMada vanotiwo havaone mauto emuZimbabwe achiramba akabata masimba sezvinoitika kune dzimwe nyika. Mashoko aVaMada anotevera kutorerwa masimba kwakaitwa VaMugabe nemauto nemusi weChipiri manheru. No media source currently available No media source currently available

headline: VaTsvangirai Vanoshora Mhirizhonga Yakaitika muBato Ravo reMDC-T
text: Mutungamiriri weMovement for Democratic Change, VaMorgan Tsvangirai vashoropodza mhirizhonga yakaitika kumahofisi ebato ravo kuBulawayo neSvondo uko kwakarohwa vamwe vatungamiri vebato iri. Vachitaura nevatori venhau muHarare, VaTsvangirai vati zvinosuwisa kuti mafaro avo ekubatana nemamwe mapato anopikisa vachiumba MDC Alliance agurisirwa panzira nekuda kwemhirizhonga yakaitika iyi. VaTsvangirai vati havadi zvemhirizhonga mubato ravo, vakati kunyangwe zvazvo mapurisa ari kuferefeta nyaya iyi, ivo sebato vari kuitawo tsvagiridzo dzavo. Vati kana pane nhengo dzavo dzakakonzera mhirizhonga iyi dzicharangwa nebato ravo zvakaomarara. Vakarohwa kuBulawayo vanosanganisira mumwe wevatevedzeri vaVaTsvangirai, Muzvare Thokozani Khupe nasachigaro webato iri VaLovemore Moyo. Vatungamiri ava vaive vasipo pakaparurwa mubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa neMugovera. Vachibvunzwa kuti vatungamiriri vebato reMDC vari kuwirirana here nezvemubatanidzwa, VaTsvangirai vati vakaita chibvumirano sebato chinosunga vatsigiri nehutungamiriri hwese. Mhirizhonga yakaitwa kubato reMDC T iyi yasvorwawo zvikuru nemasangano ano kurudzira runyararo munyika. Mutungamiriri weZimbabwe Peace Project, Muzvare Jestina Mukoko vati havatarisire kuti kusawirirana mumapato ezvematongerwo enyika kugadziriswe nemhirizhonga kunyanya nyika yadongorera sarudzo dziri kutarisirwa kuitwa gore rinouya. Kunyangwe zvazvo VaTsvangirai vati bato ravo hari kurudziri mhirizhonga, Muzvare Mukoko vati matanho achatorwa nebato reMDC-T kune vakaita mhirizhonga ndiwo acharatidza kuti bato iri rakamira papi panyaya yemhirizhonga. MDC T yakabatana nemamwe mapato matanhatu nemugovera kuumba mubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance, uyo uchakwikwidzana neZanu PF musarudzo dza 2018 uchi tungamirirwa naVatsvangirai. Mutungamiri weMDC-T uyu atiwo vanhu vakaita mhirizhonga iyi vanoda kusvibisa zita rebato pamwe nemubatanidzwa uyu asi vati izvi hazvisi kuzobudirira. No media source currently available

headline: IMF Inoti Zimbabwe Yatsvaira Chikwereti Chayo neSangano Iri
text: Sangano reInternational Monetory Fund, IMF, rinoti Zimbabwe yakwanisa kupedza kubhadhara chikwereti chayo chemari inoda kusvika $108 million, icho change chave nemakore gumi nemashanu. Mashoko aburitswa nemukuru wezvekufambiswa kwemashoko muIMF, VaGerry Rice anoti Zimbabwe yakwanisa kuzadzisa basa rayo kuboka reIMF rePoverty Reduction and Growth Trust, kuburikidza nekutamisa mari ingangosvika $107.9 million yanga ichi chengetwa muhomwe yesangano iri, ichiendeswa kuPoverty Reduction and Growth Trust. VaRice vanoti izvi zvave kureva kuti Zimbabwe haichina chikwereti sezvo yave kufambidzana nezviga zveIMF. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara vanoti danho ratorwa neZimbabwe idanho rakakosha zvikuru muhurongwa hwayo hwekubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo. VaChitambara vanoti izvi zvinoita kuti mamwe masangano anokweretesa mari akwanisewo kuchitarisa Zimbabwe nemamwe maonero kubva pamamiriro ayanga yakaita. Vanotiwo izvi zvichaita kuti vemabhizimusi vemuZimbabwe vakwanisewo kukwereta pamisika sezvo zita renyika rinenge ranaka. Asi VaChitambara vanoti izvi hazvisi kuzobatsira Zimbabwe kuti ikwanise kupiwa zvimwe zvikwereti, sezvo ichine zvikwereti kuWorld Bank neAfrican Development Bank. Zimbabwe ine chikwereti chinodarika bhiriyoni remadhora kuWorld Bank, kuchitiwo chimwe chemari inodarika mamiriyoni mazana matanhatu emadhora kuAfrican Development Bank. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezvehupfumi, VaPatrick Chinamasa, kanawo gavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe Doctor John Mangudya. No media source currently available

headline: VanaChiremba, Vakoti, Voronga Kuramwa Mabasa Kutanga kweGore
text: Vana chiremba nana mukoti vanoshanda muzvipatara zvehurumende vazivisa hurumende kuti vacharega kuenda kubasa panotanga mwedzi unouya kana vasina kupihwa mari dzavo mwedzi uno waZvita usati wapera. Izvi zvataurwa nemutungamiri wesangano ravanachiremba vemuzvipatara zvehurumende, reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, VaFortune Nyamande, avo vanoti sangano ravo rakabatana nesangano ravana mukoti reZimbabwe Nurses association vanyorera hurumende tsamba vachiizivsa nezvedanho iri. Doctor Nyamande vanoti vanyorera hurumende vachiizivisa nezvedanho ravachatora rekusaenda kumabasa kubva musi wa 1 Ndira gore rinouya. Vanoti ivo nevakoti vemuzvipatara zvehurumende vatora danho iri nezvikonzero zvekushaiwa mari dzekufambisa sezvo vasati vatambira mihoro yavo yemwedzi uno pamwechete nemari dzebhonasi dzavakavimbiswa nehurumende. Doctor Nyamande vashorawo mafambisirwo avanoti ari kuitwa mashoko nehurumende, ekushandisa mapepanhau ichisiya nzira dzagara dziripo kare dzekutaurirana. Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vakatozivisa kuti hurumende ichatadza kubhadhara vamwe vashandi vayo gore rino nekuda kwekushomeka kwemari iri kupinda muhomwe dzayo. “VaChinamasa vakashandisa mapepanhau kuti zivisa nezvekushandurwa kwemazuva edu ekutambira mihoro yedu, saka nesu tichashandisawo nzira idzodzo,” Doctor Nyamande vanodaro. Varairidzi, avo vaifanirwa kutambira mari dzavo neMuvhuro, vanzi vave kutambira neChipiri, asi ruzhinji rwose kusanganisira vanachiremba nevakoti, vachinzi vachazowana mari dzavo musi wa 5 Ndira gore rinouya. Asi vashandi vazhinji vehurumende vataura neStudio 7 vanoti havana chivimbo chekuti vanowaniswa mari dzavo pamazuva matsva akatarwa. Takundikana kubata gurukota rezvehutano, VaDavid Parirenyatwa, pamwe negurukota rezvevashandi, Amai Priscah Mupfumira, kuti tinzwe kana pane matanho avachatora ekudzivirira dambudziko ringaitika kana vanachiremba nanamukoti vakaramwa mabasa. No media source currently available

headline: ARTUZ neZHDA Dzoronga Kusvitsa Nyunyuto Pamusoro peMihoro kuHurumende
text: Sangano revarairidzi vekumaruwa reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe rinoti neChipiri riri kusvitsa gwaro renyunyuto kuboka rePublic Service Commission richizivisa kuti rinoda kuti nhengo dzaro dzipiwe mazuva mana ekunotora mari dzavo kumabhanga kubva nemusi weMuvhuro pachatambira varairidzi mihoro yavo. Vanoona nezvekurongwa kwemabasa musangano iri, VaPride Mukono, vanoti vari kukurudzirawo nhengo dzavo kuti dziratidzirewo nemusi weChishanu svondo rino kuburikidza nekuburitsa panze homwe nemidhebhe nemarokwe. VaMukono vanoti iyi ndiyo chete nzira yekuratidza nayo hurumende kuti homwe dzavo hadzina mari sezvo mari dzavari kutambiriswa dziri shoma zvikuru. Vanoti mari dziri kutambirwa nevarairidzi dzave shoma nezvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana nekuda kwekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu, asi mihoro isina kwairi kuenda. Vana chiremba vari musangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association vari kurongawo kuendesawo gwaro renyunyuto kumakurukota ezvepfumi, hutano, pamwe nekubhodhi rinoona nezvehutano reHealth Services Board. Munyori mukuru wesangano iri, Doctor Alloys Muzvaba, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kunyunyutawo nekuderera kwemari dzavanotambiriswa zvichienzaniswa nekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu. Sangano ravanachiremba iri rakaburitsawo gwaro rinoti mihoro yavana chiremba vanoshanda muzvipatara zvehurumende yaderera nezvikamu zana kubva muzana kudzika kuenda pamadhora mazana matatu nemakumi mashanu pamwedzi. Sangano iri rinoti riri kukurudzira hurumende kuti igadzirise nyaya iyi nekukasika kuitira kudzivirira kuramwa mabasa kwavanachiremba nyika yose, izvo zvinozokanganisa nyika yose. Doctor Muzvaba vati sangano ravo riri kukwenenzvera gwaro iri, vachiti panosvika kupera kwesvondo vanenge vari svitsa kwarinofanirwa kuenda. No media source currently available

headline: Ishe Makore Vanoti Havana Kufara neZvakaitwa naVaTsvangirai Mudunhu Ravo
text: Ishe Makore vekumMasvingo mudunhu reGutu South vanoti havana kufara kuti bato reMDC rakaita musangano waro mudunhu ravo risina kuvapira. Ishe Makore vekumMasvingo mudunhu reGutu South vanoti havana kufara kuti bato reMDC rakaita musangano waro mudunhu ravo risina kuvapira. Pamusangano wakaitwa kwaGutu nemusi weChipiri, Ishe Makore vakabuda pachena kuti ndeve Zanu PF, vakapika kuti havasi kusiya dunhu ravo richiitirwa misangano neMDC. Pamusangano uyu vanhu vanonzi vakaenda kumusangano wakaitwa naVa Morgan Tsvangirai nemusi we Mugovera vakaudzwa kuti vachaurayiwa. Asi Ishe Makore varamba mashoko aya vachiti ivo chavanopokana nacho, kuitwa kwemisangano ivo vasingazive. Vachitaura pamusangano wakaitwa neChipiri, uyo wakapindwa nemabhuku anosvika makumi matatu, Mambo Makore vakati vari kurwadzikana nevanhu vavo vakaenda kumusangano waVa Tsvangirai vakati havachabvumidzi misangano ye MDC mudunhu ravo. Ishe Makore vakatiwo vachadzinga masabhuku pamwe chete nemakanzura eMDCT akasangana naVaTsvangirai vasina kuziviswa saMambo wedunhu iri. Ishe Makore vakapomera kanzura wemubhuku eumnzvimbo iyi anomirira MDC kuita zviri kunze kwemutemo, vakati vachadzinga kanzura uyu mudunhu ravo. Musangano uyu wakasiya vagari vazhinji vaine kutya sezvo wakavimbisa kudzoka kwemhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika mudunhu iri. No media source currently available

headline: Vakarwira Rusununguko Vokurudzirwa Kurapwa Pfungwa
text: Apo nyika iri kugadzirira kupemberera kusvitsa makore makumi matatau neshanu nyika yawana kuzvitonga neMugovera, imwe nyanzvi yezvirwere zvepfungwa inoti pane vamwe vanhu vakawanda vakarwira rusununguko vasina kuwana rubatsiro rwekuvhenekwa pfungwa dzavo kuti vaonekwe kana vaine zvirwere zvinosaririra mupfungwa mushure mehondo kana tsaona. Nyanzvi yezvirwere zvepfungwa mubazi rezvehutano, Dr Sekayi Nyiwatiwa, vanoti dambudziko rezvirwere zvepfungwa zvinokonzerwa nezvakasangana nemunhu muhondo kana kuti mutsaona, Post Traumatic Stress Disaorder, PTSD, zviri kuwanda munyika. Dr Nyiwatiwa, avo vanoshanda kuchipatara che Parirenyatwa kubazi rezvepfungwa, vanoti zvirwere izvi zvinowanikwa muvanhu vakasiyana siyana kusanganisira vamwe vaive varwiri vehondo yerusununguko. Dr Nyiwatiwa vanoti asi vazhinji vevanhu ava havazivi kuti vanofanirwa kurapwa kuitira kuti dambudziko rekusagadzikana kwepfungwa ripere. Dr Nyiwatiwa vanoti ruzhinji rwevanhu vakarwa muhondo yeChimurenga pavakadzoka, havana kuwana rubatsiro rwunofanirwa kupihwa kuvanhu vanenge vasangana nezvinotyisa, kana zvinosiya pfungwa dzavo dzisina kugadzikana. Kunyange hazvo makore makumi matatu nemashanu apfuura, Dr Nyiwatiwa vanoti vose vanonetsekana nepfungwa vanofanirwa kuenda kunoona vana mazvikokota, kana kuenda kuzvipatara zviri pedyo navo vobatsirwa. Dr Nyiwatiwa vanoti munhu ane PTSD anoonekwa nekuvhunduka apo anorangarira zvakaitika kare, kushaya hope, kubuda dikita kana akarara, pamwe nekutaura ega nezvimwewo. Sangano reUnited Nations Commission for Refugees rinoti chirwere ichi chinobata mamiriyoni nemariyoni evanhu vanobva muhondo pasi rose. Vaimbove murwiri werusununguko, uye vari nhengo yeparamende, Amai Irene Zindi, vanoti ivo neruzhinji rwevamwe vaimbove varwiri vehondo yerusununguko pavakadzoka kubva kuhondo havana kuenda kunotariswa kuti vakange vane chirwere ichi here. Amai Zindi, avo vaizivikanwa muhondo nezita rekuti "Jilly Flamingo," vanoti vane zvizhinji zvavakaona muhondo zvinovashaisa hope pari zvino. Vanoti vanga vasingazive kuti ichi chinogana kunge chiri chirwere. Amai Zindi vanoti zvanga zvisiri nyore kuva muhondo uye vamwe vavo vazhinji vari kutambura pari zvino zvekuti havasi kufunga zvekuenda kunotsvaga rubatsiro rwekurapwa zvirerwe zvepfungwa. Hurumende yakaita chirongwa chekupodza maronda kuburikidza nekubhadhara munhu kukuvara kwaakaita muhondo, pasi pechirongwa che War Victims Compensation Fund. Asi chirongwa ichi chakapedzwa mari nevanhu vasingakodzero sezvo vazhinji vakanyepa kukuvara kwavo mushure mekuongororwa namuchakabvu Dr Chenjerai Hunzvi, avo vakabvuma pamberi pekomisheni yakaferefeta huori hwakaitwa muchirongwa ichi, kuti pazuva vaigona kuongoorora vanhu vanodarika mazana maviri. Chirongwa ichi chakabastira vamwe varwiri verusununguko asi mari zvinji inonzi yakadyiwa nevakuru vakuru munyaya dzematongerwo enyika, avo vanosanganisira mukuru wemapurisa, Va Augustine Chihuri, pamwe nehanzvadzi yemudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, muchakabvu Reward Marufu. Nyanzvi munyaya dzepfungwa dzinoti hukasha hunoburitswa nema War Vets dzimwe nguva, muratidzo mukuru wekuti vamwe vavo vanoda kurapwa nana chiremba kuitira kuti vagare zvakanaka nevamwe muhupenyu. Vaimbove varwiri verusununguko vazhinji vanoti havasi kuona chavakarwira muhondo sezvo vamwe vavo vari kunonga svosve nemuromo, uye vamwe vaine zvirwere zvepfungwa zvinovashungurudza zuva nezuva hurumende pasina chairi kuita. No media source currently available

headline: Vatyairi veMarori vemuZimbabwe Vochema Chema Nekumanikidzwa Kushandisa Zambuko reKazungula
text: Zvimwe zvarwa zveZimbabwe zvino gara muSouth Africa zvichityaira marori zvatotanga kuchema chema nenyaya yekumanikidzwa kushandisa zambuko reKazungula nekuregedza kushandisa muganhu weBeitbridge. VaRight Moyo, mumwe wevatyairi ava, uyewo vakamirira sangano reZimbabwe All Truckers Association, vanoti kusadarika nemuZimbabwe vari pabasa kwave kupa kuti vatadze kuonana nehama dzavo uye kutakura zvinhu zvekutengesa zvinodiwa kuZiVambabwe kuti vawanewo chouviri. Asi mumwewo mutyairi asina kuda kudomwa nezita ati hapana chakaipa kushandisa , izvi zvichayamura makambani emarori akawanda sezvo mafuta anoshandiswa nemarori, akachipa muBotswana. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi VaMasimba Kuchera, vanoti danho iri richakanginisa zvikuru mhuri yeZimbabwe inoita zvekutenga nekutengesa pakati peZimbawe ne South Africa. VaKuchera vati nyika yeZimbabwe icharasikirwa zvikuru nehupfumi kuburikidza nemitero naizvozvo inofanira kugadzirisa mamiriro emuganhu weBeitbridge kana ichida kukwikwidzana nezambuko reKazungula. VaStan Makwara, sachigaro weProudly 263, sangano rinosimudzira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvine mabhisimisi achiri kusimukira muSouth Africa, vanoti nhengo dzavo ndidzo dzicharasikirwa zvikuru nedanho iri. Zambuko reKazungula rakavakwa neBotswana neZambia dzichibatsirwa nezvikwereti kubva kuAfrican Development Bank neJapan International Cooperation Agency. No media source currently available

headline: Tsiva yakandidzidzisa kuzvibata: Makumbe
text: SHASHA yakambonetsa mutsiva yechidzimai, Diana Makumbe, anoti mutambo uyu wakamubatsira chaizvo kuti akwanise kuchengeta amai vake nevekumhuri yavo mushure mekunge akundikana kuchikoro.   Makumbe, uyo parizvino ave muridzi wepembe najudge wetsiva, mumwe weshasha dzechidzimai dzakaita mukurumbira munyika muno izvo zvakamuona achihwina mitambo 23 achikundwa mumwechete muboka reAmateur.   Asi, paakazoenda padanho repamusoro reProfessional akakwanisa kuhwina mitambo mitatu chete pa15 yaakatamba ndokukundwa mipfumbamwe, achiita mangange katatu.   Pakukura kwake, Makumbe aive nembiri yekumhanya mumakwikwi emujaho zvekuti anoti vamwe vanhu vaimukurudzira kuti aende kuchiuto.   Anoti paakakundikana bvunzo dzake dzeO-Level, ndipo paakatanga kutamba tsiva ndokuzoenda kuArmy School Sports uko akanotamba tsiva zvakare achiedza kuti zvimwe angagone kupinda basa rehusoja.   “Ndichikura, ndaida chaizvo kuita musoja nekuti ndakakura ndiri shasha pamujaho wekumhanya uye vanhu vaindiona vaitoti kwandiri kana wakura enda kuchisoja unogona kupinda basa saka ndaida chaizvo kuita musoja.   “Zvose zvakazoshanduka pandisina kubuda zvakanaka pabvunzo dzangu izvo zvakazondituma kuti nditange kukwikwidza mutsiva.   “Mutambo uyu wakandibatsira chaizvo nekuti ndakange ndave kukwanisa kuchengeta amai vangu uye nevekumhuri kwavanobva,” anodaro.   Makumbe anoti paakange ave kukwikwidza pachidanho cheProfessional, akasangana nezvakawanda zvinosanganisira kubirirwa achinzi akundwa mumutambo asi iye ahwinha izvo zvakaita kuti asvike pakuramwa kutamba tsiva.   Mutambo wake wekupedzisira waive mugore ra2016 paakasangana naEllen Simwaka wekuMalawi apo akakundwa.   Anoti tsiva yakamudzidzisa kuzvibata muhupenyu hwake izvo nanhasi zvinomubatsira pane zvose zvaanoita.   “Tsiva izere nekubirira uye unobirirwa kuti ukundwe zvigobatsira kugadzira zita remumwe mutambi uyo mapuromota vanenge vachida kuti asimukire.   “Saka ini ndizvo zvimwe zvakandituma kuti ndichisiya tsiva nekuti ndakange ndaneta kubirirwa apa unenge uchipihwa mari isingatenge futi,” anodaro Makumbe.   Anoti basa rake semuridzi wepembe najudge wetsiva riri kumuona achienda kune dzimwe nyika dzakaita seZambia achinoridza kumitambo yeko.   MuZimbabwe, Makumbe aridza pembe pamwe nekuve judge pamitambo yevatambi vetsiva vakasiyana vanosanganisira Charles Manyuchi.   Anoti anoda kushandura tsiva pamwe nekusimudzira vatambi vanenge vachibirirwa kuti vasabirirwe.   “Ndave muridzi wepembe uye judge wetsiva saka ndinoda chaizvo kuti ndiridze mutambo uyu zvisina kubirira mukati. Vamwe varidzi vepembe vanobirira vachida kufadza puromota, manje ini handiite izvozvo.   “Saka ndinoona kunge ndizvo zvakatuma vekuZambia kuti vandishevedze kuzoridza pamutambo waEmily Kubwalo wemuno uyo akarwa naCatherine Mulyata wekuZambia munaZvita,” anodaro.   Kubva achisendeka zvekurwa tsiva, Makumbe anoti akapinda zvekare mune zvemhanzi uye ari kuridza musambo wembira nechikwata cheBlack Survivors.   Anoti vanotarisira kuparura dambarefu ravo rekutanga nguva pfupi inotevera.   Makumbe akakomborerwa nemwanasikana ane makore 14 okuberwekwa uyo waanoti ane zvipo zvemitambo yakasiyana uye parizvino anokwikwidza mumujaho nekutamba nhabvu yevasikana.   “Vana havadi kuudzirwa zvekuita. Isu tinofanirwa kuvarakidza gwara chete tichivakurudzira kuita zvese mitambo nekudzidza. Dzidzo ndiyo inofanirwa kuenda pekutanga zvimwe zvese zvozotevera,” anodaro Makumbe.

headline: Mapazi eHurumende neVamwe veParamende Voramba Kutambira Bhajeti ra2022
text: Apo hurukuro dziri kuenderera mberi kuti bhajeti rakaparurwa negurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube rotambirwa here nedare reparamende kana kuti kwete, pave kubuda mutauro wakanyanya. Mapazi ehurumende akawanda ari kuti mari dzavakapihwa hadzina zvadzinobatsira uye VaNcube vane nhoroondo yekusavapa mari dzavanenge vataura mubhajeti. Bhajeti rakaparurwa naVaNcube rinofanira kutambirwa nematare ose eparamende anoti reHouse of Assembly neSenate kuti ritange kushanda zviri pamutemo. Asi rwendo rwuno dzimwe nhengo dzedare reparamende dziri kuti haiziyiwe. Vamwe vasiri kufara nebhajeti rakaparurwa iri mumiriri weNorton VaTemba Mliswa. Vanoti VaNcube havafanire kuvimbisa mari dzavasingazope mapazi ehurumende. Vakafanobata chigaro chemubati wehomwe mubazi rezvehutano Amai Lynette Tennis vakaudza dare reparamende kuti mari yakapihwa bazi ravo haikwane uye inotoisa hupenyu hwevanhu munjodzi. Bazi iri rakapihwa mari inosvika mabhiriyoni zana negumi nemanomwe kana kuti 117 billion yemunyika mubhajeti regore rinouya. Amai Tennis vakati zvikamu makumi masere nemashanu kubva muzana zvemari yekurapa TB, Malaria, hutano hwemadzimai nezvimwe yakabva kumasangano akazvimirira anoti Global Fund nehomwe yemutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica yePresident’s Emergency Plan For Aids Relief. Asi muzinda weAmerica wakatozivisa hurumende kuti itsvage nzira dzekubatsira vanorarame nehutachiona hweHIV/Aids. Hurumende yaibatsirikana zvikuru nemari yehomwe yeAIDS Levy inobatirwa vashandi asi inonzi yave shoma sezvo vakawanda vari kuzviitira mabasa emaoko vasingabhadhare. Rimwe bazi riri kuti rakapihwa mari ishoma nderedzidzo riri kuti zvirongwa zvakaita sezve Continuous Assessment Learning Activity kana kuti CALA zvichazviringidzwa zvakanyanya nemari shoma yarakapihwa. VaMliswa vanoti kugadzirisa dambudziko iri dai hurumende yaita bhajeti nemari yekuAmerica. VaMliswa vanoti zviri nani hazvo kuti dai VaNcube vakaparura bhajeti iri nemari yekuAmerica. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemunyori mukuru musangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions VaJaphet Moyo. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi VaVictor Bhoroma vanoti mari inoshandiswa haina hayo kunyanya kukosha nekuti. VaNcube vakazivisa havo kuti mapazi ehurumende akanga akumbira mari inoda kusvika matrilion maviri nemabhiriyoni manomwe kana kuti 2, 7 trillion yemunyika asi ivo vainge vaine mari inodarika zvishoma mabhiriyoni mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi maviri nemanomwe kana kuti 927 billion yemunyika. VaNcube vakati chavari kuyedza kuita mubhajeti yavo kubatsira varombo kunyanya.

headline: VaMudenda naAmai Chinomona Votarisirwa Kuva Vakuru veHouse of Assembly neSenate
text: Politiburo yebato reZanu-PF yakagara muHarare nemusi weMuvhuro kuti idome vachakwikwidza musarudzo dzekuva vatauriri vanenge vakamirira bato iri musarudzo dzeSenate neHouse of Assembly kana kuti maspeaker. Parizvino, mutauriri wedare reHouse of Assembly ndiVaJacob Mudenda uye mutungamiri weSenate ndiAmai Edna Madzongwe. Vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika vanoti vari kutarisira kuti VaMudenda vachadzoswa pachigaro chekuva mutauriri weHouse of Assembly. Asi Amai Edna Madzongwe vanenge vari kutorerwa chigaro ichi naAmai Mabel Chinomona. Vamwe vange vachitarisirwa kuti vangangopinde musarudzo idzi ndiVaPatrick Chinamasa. Vamwe vari kusarudzwa nhasi vakokeri vedare reparamende kumapato ose kana kuti machief whip. Bato reMDC Alliance nezuro raita musangano weStanding Committee kuti rizeye nyaya iyi. Hatina kukwanisa kubata munyori mukuru webato iri VaDouglas Mwonzora sezvo vange vari mumusangano. Vari kukokera bato iri muHouse of Assembly pari zvino VaInnocent Gonese vati vachatoudzwa neChipiri nezve vachapinda musarudzo dzacho. Asi bato reZanu-PFrine mukana wekakurisa wekudoma warinoda kuti vave vatauriri vematare maviri ose sezvo rakakunda zvine mutsindo musarudzo dzapfuura. Munyori wezvemutemo muZanu-PF VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana vanoti vakazeya nyaya iyi asi vakaramba kutaura kuti ndiyanani vachakwikwidza vakamirira bato ravo. No media source currently available

headline: Mudzimai Osungunukira Muchimbuzi muHarare
text: Vagari vemumusha weGlen View nhasi vasvitsa gwaro renyuto kuna meya weguta weHarare, VaJacob Mafume, vachigunun’una mushure mekunge mumwe mudzimai anogara mumusha uyu, Amai Estina Swaba, vazvarira muchimbudzi chekirinika yekanzuru Glen View Polyclinic, mushure mekunge vakoti vepakirinika iyi varamba kuvabatsira vachiti vaifanira kuenda kuchipata cheSally Mugabe. Izvi zvakatika nemusi weChipiri svondo rapfuura izvo zvakatsamwisa vagari vemumusha uyu. Murume waAmai Swaba, VaBlessing Chaodzemoyo vaudza Studio 7 kuti havasi kufara nezvakaitika. Mumwe mugari wemusha uyu zvakare vari nhengo weCombined Harare Residents Association, Amai Joylin Nyachuru, vati zvinosuwisa kuti vanhu vari kubatwa neseri kweruwoko muzvipatara zvekanzuru. Mugwaro rakasainwa nevagari vanodarika zchiuru nemazana matanhatu, vagari ava yave nguva yakareba madzimai akazvitakura achishungurudzwa paGlen View Polyclinic Zvinonzi vakoti vakati vainge vasingakwanise kuvabatsira nekuti vaida kuzvara mwana mwana weChishanu vachiti kirinika iyi inobatsira vanhu vanozvara mwana wekutanga kusvika pane wechina chete. Izvi zvatsinhirwa nemukuru wevakoti mumakirinika nezvipatara zvekanzuru, Matron Amai Perpetua Kaseke. Meya weHarare VaJacob Mafume vatambira gwaro iri vakati vachaongorora kuti zvakafamba sei uyewo vati vachaona kuti makoti vese vapihwa zvikwangwani zvine mazita avo kuti zvikwanise kuzivikanwa kuti ndiana anenge atadza kuita basa. Vatiwo vachabhadhara mari dzese dziri kudiwa muSally Mugabe kudzamara Amai Swaba nemwana wavo vadzokera kumba. VaMafume vati vano zviziva kuti pamabasa pane vamwe vasingaiite basa ravo nemazvo asi vakati chakakosha ndechekuti kanzuru yatambira zvakaitika uye yave kubatsira mhuri. Vatiwo kanzuru yavo ine dambudziko rekushomeka kwevakoti mumakirinika nezvipatara zvayo zvese uyewo vati vakurudzira hurumende kuti ibatsire kanzuru nemari kuti ikwanise kupa vagary hutano hwakanaka. Vagari vakawanda muHarare havasi kufara nebazi rekanzuru rehutano uye madzimai akawanda aka zvitakuura anozvarira panze pemakirinika kana zvipatara mushure mekurambidzwa kupinda muzvipatara izvi zvikuru sei kana huri husiku. Paramende iri kuongorora nyaya iyi uye inotarisira kuburitsa zvakayakwana mutsvakurudzo yayo kunguva ipi zvayo. No media source currently available

headline: Kubviswa kweRutsigiro rweMari neHurumende muZvimwe Zvitengeswa Kwoomesera Veruzhinji
text: Zvinhu zvinonzi zviri kuramba zvichiomera veruzhinji munyika kuburikidza nekukwira kwemitengo yezvinonyanyodiwa muhupenyu, zvikuru zvekudya pamwe nemafuta edzimotokari, asi mihoro yevashandi vazhinji isina kwairi kuenda. Izvi zvinotevera kukwira kutanga svondo rino kweupfu zvichitevera danho rinonzi rakatorwa nehurumende rekubvisa rutsigiro rwemari mukutengwa kwechibage negorosi nevanogaya upfu. Rutsigiro urwu rwunonzi rwaibatsira kuti mitengo yezvinhu zvakaita seupfu nechingwa irambe iri pasi, sezvo vanogaya upfu vaiwana dzimwe dzemari dzavanoda kubva kuhurumende. Vachitura hurongwa hwemashandisirwo emari nehurumende mugore rinouya, gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, vakazivisa kuti hurumende yaizotora danho iri senzira yekuderedza nayo mari yainoshandisa. Asi imwe nyanzvi mune zveupfumi, vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti danho rehurumende rekubvisa rutsigiro rwemari iri rakatoita kuti zvinhu zvinyanye kuomera veruzhinji. Semuenzaniso, katsaga keupfu hwerudzi rwe roller meal kane huremu hwemakirogiramu gumi kanonzi kakakwira mutengo kubva pamadhora makumi mashanu nemashanu kuenda pamadhora zana nerimwe nemasendi makumi matanhatu nematanhu. Peturu yakakwirawo mutengo kubva pamadhora gumi nemanomwe ane masendi manomwe kuenda pamadhora gumi nemanomwe ane masendi makumi mana nemana parita, kuchitiwo dhiziri richenda pamadhora gumi nemanomwe ane masendi makumi mapfumbamwe parita, richibva pamadhora gumi nemanomwe ane masendi makumi manomwe nemana. Mutewedzeri wemunyori mukuru wesangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, VaThomas Masvingwe, vanoti kukwira kwemitengo uku kuri kuomesera vashandi zvakanyanya nekuti mihoro yavo haisi kufambirana nezviri kuitika mune zveupfumi. VaMasvingwe vanoti mari iri kutambirwa nevashandi haichagoni kuti vararame, vachiti zvose izvi zviri kukonzerwa nehurongwa hwehurumende hwekuvandudza upfumi, kana kuti austerity measures. Izvi zvinotsinhirwawo naDoctor Chitambara, avo vanoti mihoro yevashandi yedonha zvakanyanya zvichienzaniswa nehuremu hwedhora rekuAmerica. Asi vaimbove gurukota rezvemaindasitiri nekutengesera, VaMike Bimha, vanoti hongu, vanhu vangaona sekunge zvinhu zviri kukwira mitengo asi pane zvakawanda zvaikanganisa hupfumi zviri kuedza kugadziriswa nehurumende. Vanoti zvose izvi zvichapfuura zvinhu zvichitogadzikana zvakanaka kwazvo munyika. Panyaya yekuti zvose izvi zviri kuremera vashandi, VaBimha vanoti mhinduro inofanirwa kunge ichibva kuvashandirwi kuti vari kuzviona sei, asi vanoti ibasa revashandirwi kuona kuti vashandi vavo vadzivirirwa kubva mumatambudziko akasiyanasiyana. VaMasvingwe vanoti hupenyu hucharamba huchiomera veruzhinji, zvikuru vashandi, kana mitengo yakaramba ichiita chamurambamhuru pasina ari kuiisa matomu. Vanoti pasvika zvinhu pari zvino pave kutongoda kuti vashandi vagare zvavo kudzimba dzavo, sezvo vasina mari dzekufambisa, pamwe nekuti vatenge chikafu kudzimba. Vakuru vanoti chakatanga ndicho chakachenjedza, nekudaro vakawanda vanoti vari kutarisa mberi vachiyeuka matambudziko akasangana nenyika mumakore a 2007 na 2008, apo veruzhinji vakanonga svosve nemuromo. Kusvika zvinhu zvagadzikana mune zveupfumi, vazhinji vacharamba vachitya mimvuri yavo. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa neVasori Vanosungwawo Munyaya yeGoridhe Yakasungirwa Muzvare Rushwaya
text: Hurumende inoti yasunga vamwe vanhu vatanhatu vane chekuita nenyaya iri kupomerwa vanga vari mutungamiri wesangano reZimbabwe Miners Federation, uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, Muzvare Henrietta Rushwaya, avo vakasungwa vachida kubuda negoridhe munyika zvisiri pamutemo. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti vasunga vamwe vanhu vatanhatu vanoti VaAli Mohamed, VaStephen Chengerai Tserayi, VaGift Karanda, VaRaphios Mufandauya, pamwe nemapurisa maviri anoti Superintendent Shoko pamwe naDetective Chief Inspector Chimhungu. VaTserayi vanga vachishanda vari musori anochengetedza mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, uye VaNyathi vati VaKaranda vainyepera kuzviita musori panguva yavanoti vakapara mhosva. VaNyathi vati VaMohamad, avo vane kambani yeAli Japan 786,iyo inoita zvekutengesa motokari ndivo vakanzi naMuzvare Rushwaya ndivo vaive muridzi wegoridhe. Vati pari zvino havasi kutaura zvakawanda sezvo vachiri kuferefeta nyaya iyi vachiti vasungwa ava vakatarisirwa kumiswa mudare. Muzvare Rushwaya vakatarisirwa kudzoka kudare ramejasitiriti mangwana apo pakatarisirwa kuturwa mutongo naVaNgoni Nduna wekuti zvinokodzera here kuti hurumende ishandure pfungwa dzayo dzekubvuma kwayakange yaita kuti Muzvare Rushwaya vapihwe mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso. Vachuchisi venyaya iri kupomerwa Muzvare Rushwaya vakaudza dare kuti vakange voda kuchinja mabatiro enyaya iyi sezvo vachiti vakange vazoona kuti nyaya iyi yakakura kwazvo uye ine vanhu vakawanda vari mairi. Goridhe raida kuburitswa munyika zvisiri pamutemo naMuzvare Rushwaya rinokosha mari inodarika mazana matatu nemakumi matanhatu ezviuru zvemadhora ekuAmerica. Vari kutevera nyaya iyi vanoti kusungwa kwaitwa mapurisa nevasori panyaya iyi kunoratidza kuti hurumende yadzikisa gejo mukurwisa huori. Asi mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatshwayo, vati kusungwa kwemapurisa nevasori haisi nyaya yekuti hurumende yakazvipira kurwisana nehuori asi kuti zvikwata zveZanu PF zviri kurwira bhonzo renyama. Asi VaNyathi mapurisa haasi kuzorega kusunga munhu wese ane chekuita nenyaya iyi vachiti vari kuferefeta zvakare kuti goridhe iri rakanga rabvepi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi, VaMasimba Manyanya, avo vaimboshanda mubazi rezvemari, vanoti kubuda kwemari munyika zvisiri pamutemo kwakafanana nababa vanoba mari mumba vachinonwa doro mhuri ichisara ichiziya nenzara. Zvichakadai, bhodhi reZimbabwe Miners Federation rinoti rambomisa basa Muzvare Rushwaya richiti nyaya yavo inosvibisa zita resangano iri. Vanga vari mutevedzeri waMuzvare Rushwaya, VaMarufu Sithole, ndivo vave kumbofanobata chigaro chemutungamiiri weZimbabwe Miners Federation. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yotenda Kuti Kushaya Simba kweMari Kwopa Kuti Vari Pamudyandigere Vaomerwe neHupenyu
