text: Gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, vatenda kuti mari dziri kuwedzerwa vari pamudyandigere neNational Security Authority kana kut NSSA kutanga mwedzi uno hadzikwani nekuda kwekushaya simba kwedhora asi vachiti havo atsunya arwa. VaMavima vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende ichaita zvose zvainogona kuona kuti mari iyi hairambe ichishaya simba. Vatiwo vari kutambira mari yepasi vanenge vachiwana mari inosvika madhora makumi matanhatu ekuAmerica asi pachishandiswa chikero chemari chiri pamutemo kwete zviri kuitika pamukoto vakati mari iyi inosvika pamadhora mazana matatu kune vakabatirwa mari dzakati wandei vachiri kushanya. Mari idzi dziri kutangira pamadhora makumi matanhatu ekuAmerica asi pachishandiswa chikero chiri pamutemo kwete mari dzepamukoto. Vari pamudyandigere vane makore akawanda vachichema chema kuti mari kutambiriswa haisi kuvakwanira zvopa kuti vanonge svosve nemuromo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vatendawo kuti mari iyi ishoma zvichinyanya kukonzerwa nekuti dhora remunyika riri kutengeswa nemari inodarika mazana maviri emadhora padhora rekuAmerica kana kuti 1”200. Vatiwo vemabhizimisi vakawanda vanotengesa zvinhu vachishandisa chikero chemaei yepamukoto. Munyori mukuru wesangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaJaphet Moyo, vatiwo vari pamudyandigere vachiri vakaomerwa nehupenyu sezvo mari iyi isingakwane kuti vatenge kana mishonga chaiyo kana vave kurwara. Munyori mukuru werimwe sangano revari pamudyandigere reAssociation of National Social Security Retirees Trust, VaGideon Shoko, vatiwo panotanga kubatwa zvimwe zvirehwa rehwa nevemabhanga mari iyi ishoma. Vatiwo haisvike pane inotarisirwa kuti mhuri irarame pamwedzi kana kuti Poverty Datum Line Vashandi vemumakambani nemuhurumende vanobatirwa mari pamwedzi neNSSA kuti vazopihwe kava vave pamudyandigere kana kuremara vari pabasa. Asi kwemakore vashandi vagara vachichema kuti huori hunotyisa hunoitika muNSSA hunopa kuti itadze kuvapa mari dzekuti vakwanise kurarama. No media source currently available

headline: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri Kunze kweNyika Zvoita Bishi Kuenda Kumusha Kuzororo
text: Kwasara svondo rimwe chete kuti Kisimusi isvike, izvo zvave kuita kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zviite chipatapata zvichipinda munyika kubva munyika yazvigere dzakasiyana siyana. Miganhu yenyika inonzi yatotanga kuona huwandu hwevanhu vari kupinda munyika, zvikuru vari kubva kuSouth Africa vachishandisa muganhu weBeitbridge. Bepanhau reChronicle rinoti bazi reZimbabwe Revenue Authority, ZIMRA, ratowedzera huwandu hwevashandi vepamuganho uyu nekuisa vamwe makumi masere vabva kune mimwe miganhu isiri kunyanya kuwandirwa nevanhu. Mitsetse yevanhu nedzimotokari zviri kuda kupinda munyika inonzi iri kuramba ichikura zuva nezuva. Mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vanorarama nekutenga nekutengesera kunze kwenyika, reInternational Cross Border Traders Association, VaDenis Juru, vanoti vemabhazi vatokwidzawo mari dzinobhadharwa nevafambi nezvikamu zviri pakati pemakumi mashanu kubva muzana nezana kubva muzana, zvichienderana nekuti rwendo rwacho rwunogumira kupi. VaJuru vanotiwo vanotambira nemufaro danho reZIMRA rekuwedzera vashandi paBeitbridge, asi vanoti handizvo zvinopedza dambudziko rekunonoka kufamba kwevanhu. VaJuru vanoti chinofanirwa kuitwa neZIMRA kutenga michina mitsva yekushandisa kurerutsa basa revashandi vepamiganhu yenyika. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Hakuna DeMbare yakadaro’
text: MUTAMBI wenhabvu weDynamos FC, Kudzanayi Dhemere, anoti matambiro akaita chikwata chavo mwaka wadarika haana kufadza izvo zvakachiona chichipedza chiri pechipfumbamwe palog reCastle Premiership.   Zvikuru zvaitarisirwa kubva kuDeMbare nevatambi vayo vanosanganisira Dhemere, Ngandu “Moto-moto” Mangala naEdward Sadomba asi yakakundikana kurwira mukombe wePSL.   Izvi zvakaona chikwata ichi chichishandura murairidzi wacho mwaka uri pakati apo pakadzingwa Lloyd “Mablanyo” Chigowe akatsiviwa naTonderayi Ndiraya.   Ndiraya akakwanisa kudzikamisa chikwata ichi  akachitungamira chikapedza chiri pechipfumbamwe palog.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Dhemere – uyo vazhinji vaitarisira zvikuru kwaari kuti ndiye mumwe wevatambi vachatungamira chikwata ichi kurwira mukombe wePSL – anoti gore radarika harina kufamba sezvavaifungira.   Anoti vanofanirwa kutokunya dzisimbe mwaka uri kutevera kuitira kuti DeMbare idzokere pachidanho chayo chakare apo yaizezesa munyaya dzenhabvu munyika muno.   “Patakapedza tiri hapasipo pataida kupedza tiri. Gore rino range riri rekudzidza uye takadzidza zvakawanda,” anodaro.   Kupera kwemwaka wadarika kwakaonawo kondirakiti yake kuDeMbare ichipera uye anoti ari kutarisira kuti apihwe imwe gore rino apo anoda kushanda nesimba.   “Izvezvi handizive kuti ndiri kuita sei asi chishuvo changu kuti ndirambe ndiri kuDeMbare, ndipihwe imwe kondirakiti uye kana ndapihwa ndichashanda nesimba ndigobatsira chikwata chedu tirwire mukombe wePSL. Ichi chishuvo chezvikwata zvese zvinokwikwidza muPSL uye isu tinofanirwa kuonekwa tiripo tichirwirawo mukombe mukuru muno munyika,” anodaro Dhemere.   DeMbare yakapedzisira kusimudza mukombe weCastle Premiership mugore ra2014 apo yairairidzwa naKalisto Pasuwa.   Kubva kwakaita Pasuwa kuchikwata ichi, hachina kuzombohwina mukombe uyu zvakare kunyangwe hazvo makore matatu anoti 2015 na2017 chaipedza chiri pechipiri palog.

headline: South Africa Yozeya Nzira dzeKuti Zimbabwe Yobuda Sei Mukanwa Mamupere
text: Nhasi bazi rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muSouth Africa raita musangano muPretoria wange wakanangana nekuzeya matambudziko ari muZimbabwe uye kuti angagadziriswe sei. Gurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muSouth Africa Amai Naledi Pandor vanoti South Africa inofunga kuti vana veZimbabwe vakabatana vanokwanisa kugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nenyika yavo vavakidzani vozongobatsirawo zvishoma. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemumiriri weZimbabwe kuSouth Africa VaDavid Hamadziripi avo vange vari mumwe munyarikani pagungano vatambirawo mashoko aAmai Pandor ekuti zvirango zvavati zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe zvibviswe. No media source currently available Vaive mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wehurumende yeZimbabwe Muzvinafundo Arthur Mutambara vange vari pamusangano uyu vatiwo zvakakosha kuti zvirango zvibviswe asi Zimbabwe inofanira kutanga yazvichenura nekuita zvido zvevana vayo vose. No media source currently available Vamwe vataura pamusangano uyu vanosanganisiri mukuru wechikoro cheUNISA VaMandla Makhanya uye VaSomadoda Fikeni vepaUNISA zvekare, VaPhilani Mthembu veInstitute for Global Dialogue, VaShingirirai Mutanga veAfrica Institute of South Africa, VaPhilani Mthembu veInstitute for Global Dialogue, VaShingirirai Mutanga veAfrica Institute of South Africa

headline: HATITYE EGYPT: ZIM
text: VATAMBI vechikwata chenhabvu chenyika chemaWarriors vanoti vagadzirira zvikuru mutambo wavo weAfrica Cup of Nations (Afcon) apo vachatatsurana neEgypt nemusi weChishanu chino.   MaWarriors ndiwo achavhurira makwikwi aya apo ari kusangana neEgypt mumutambo wekutanga uyo uchatanga na10pm.   Kwayedza svondo rino yakaita hurukuro nevatambi vemaWarriors vakasiyana avo vanoti vagadzirira mutambo uyu. Knox Mutizwa – uyo anove mutambi wemaWarriors neLamontville Golden Arrows yekuSouth Africa – anoti zvikwata zvese zviri kukwikwidza kuAfcon zvinofanirwa kuvhunduka chikwata chavo.   “Gore rino takatodya nduru, zvikwata zvese zviri kuAfcon ngazvitodedera nekuti isu takatosimbisisa.   “Chikwata chedu chakasimba zvikuru uye tine vatambi vakawanda vane tarenda vari kutambira zvikwata zvekunze kwenyika saka tinotokwanawo pamamonya ipapo,” anodaro Mutizwa.   Kubva maWarriors paakatanga kukwikwidza kuAfcon mugore ra2004, chikwata ichi hachisati chambobuda muboka rachinenge rapinzwa. Asi, Mutizwa anoti zvinhu zviri kushanduka gore rino sezvo shuviro yavo iri yekutamba nhabvu yepamusoro kuti vagosvika kure mumutambo uyu.   “Takwikwidza makore akawanda kuAfcon asi tichingoburitswa mutambo uyu uchangotanga saka gore rino zvinofanirwa kushanduka.   “MaWarriors rwendo runo ndiwo chikwata vazhinji vachange vachitaura nezvacho chete nguva dzose nekuti takagadzirira. Chimwe chinhu zita handiro rinotamba nhabvu saka zvekuti Mohamed Salah hatizvitarise izvo isu Khama Billiat naKnowledge Musona, Tino Kadewere naNyasha Mushekwi vese avo tinavo vatambi vepamusoro,” anodaro.   Gore radarika, Mutizwa akanwisa chibodzwa chakanetsa zvikuru mumutambo weAbsa Premiership wechikwata chake neMaritzburg United uye chibodzwa ichi chakasvika pakuvhoterwa kuve Goal of the Month mumwaka waNyamavhuvhu 2018 iye ndokupihwa mubairo. Anoti kana akawana mukana wekutamba kuAfcon anoda kudzokorodza zvaakaita kuSouth Africa nekunwisa chibodzwa chinohwina mubairo weGoal of the Tournament.   “Mukana ukauya kuAfcon ndinoda kuita zvinorova sezvandakaita kuSouth Africa pamutambo wechikwata changu neMaritzburg United. Ndoda kuuhwina mubairo weGoal of the Tournament, zvandakaita kuSouth Africa.   “Kana zvikaitika ndingafare zvikuru, asi chikuru kwandiri kuhwina sechikwata mikombe mikuru yakaita seAfcon iyo tiri kuenda kunorwira. Hapana chinoramba uye kana kutitadzisa, zvese zvinogona kuitika,” anodaro Mutizwa.   Mashoko ake anotsinhirwa naTendayi Darikwa uyo anotambirawo zvakare Nottingham Forest yekuEngland achiti vagadzirira kubata basa sebasa.   “Afcon inoonekwa pasi rese wena, yakakosha zvikuru uye inoteverwa nekuti vatambi vazhinji vane mukurumbira vanouya kuzokwikwidza kumakwishu aya saka tinofanirwa kunge takagadzirira kuti tibate basa.   “Isu chedu chete tinofanirwa kutamba sechikwata uye hatifanirwe kutarisa zvinoitwa nevamwe vatambi.   “Isu ngatingoita basa redu chete ratakafambira,” anodaro Darikwa.   Thabani Kamusoko – uyo anotambira nhabvu yake kuTanzania – anoti anozviziva kuti maWarriors ari muboka rakaoma zvikuru asi vanofanirwa kushanda nesimba kuti vafambire mberi mumutambo uyu.   “Ndinoziva hangu kuti tiri muboka rakaoma zvikuru asi tikashanda nesimba tinosvika kure uye isu chatiri kuda kusvika kure mumutambo uyu,” anodaro.   MaWarriors ari muboka reGroup A nezvimwe zvikwata zvinoti Egypt, Uganda neDemocratic Republic of Congo.   Zvakadai, Hurumende yakatoumba komiti yekutsigira chikwata chenyika ichi nemari yeWarriors Fund Raising  Committee.   Mutungamiriri wenyika President Mnangagwa vakadoma komiti iyi nechinangwa chekuti iunganidze mari ichashandiswa nemaWarriors mumakwikwi aya.

headline: Human Rights Watch Inoburitsa Gwaro Rinoshora Zvikuru Mhirizhonga Inobata Vabvakure Vari muSouth Africa
text: Gwaro iri rinoti zvizvarwa zveSouth Africa zviri kupomera vabvakure mhosva yekuvatorera mabasa avo, humbavha, hupfambi nekukonzera kuti hurumende yeSouth Africa ipedzere mari yayo pakuchengeta vabvakure ichisiya zvizvarwa zveSouth Africa zvichitambura. Mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kwe Africa, VaDewa Mavhinga, vaudza Studio7 kuti hurumende yeSouth Africa inofanirwa kuona kuti kupiswa kwedzimba, kupondwa nekushungurudzwa kwevabvakure, zvikuru sei vanotyaira magonyeti, kwamiswa zvachose. VaMavhinga vanoti sangano ravo rinokurudzira kuti nyika dzakaita seZimbabwe dzigadzirise mamiriro ezvehupfumi, pamwe nekuchengetedza kodzero dzevanhu kuitira kuti zvizvarwa zvenyika zvisapinde muhupoteri mudzimwe nyika. Gwaro raparurwa neHuman Rights Watch rinenhorowondo yekushungurudzwa, kupondwa, kupisirwa dzimba nekutorerwa magonyeti ekubasa kunoitwa kuvashandi vassiri zvizvarwa zveSouth Africa. VaMavhunga vati sangano ravo rakatoendesa gwaro iri kuhurumende yeSouth Africa nekuvatungamiri vematunhu eSouth Africa, pamwe chete nekumakanzuru emunyika. Tatadza kubata munyori mubazi rezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, pamwe chete negurukota rezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, sezvo vange vasingadairi nharembozha dzavo. VaMavhinga vati sangano ravo reHuman Rights Watch richaendesa gwaro iri kuhurumende yeSouth Africa, kuUnited Nations, kuSADC ne kuAfrican Union. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yobatana neDzimwe Nyika Kucherechedza Zuva reChirwere cheShuga
text: Zuva reWorld Diabetes Day rakacherechedzwa nemusi weChitatu, vamwe vanhu vanorarama nechirwere ichi –pamwe nezvimwe zvirwere zvisingatapuriranwe- vakatarisana nedambudziko guru rekutadza kuwana mishonga nekuda kwekushaya mari yekunze inodiwa pakutenga mishonga iyi. Susan Mpofu anochengeta mai vake vakura uye vave nenguva vaine chirwere chediabetes anoti mumasvondo mashoma apfuura, amai vake vakambofenda vakazomuka mushure menguva inosvika awa rimwe chete nekuda kwekuti vaive vave nemazuva maviri vasina kumwa mapiritsi avanofanirwa kumwa nekuda kwekuti vaive vashaya mari yemadhora ekuAmerica anodiwa nezvitoro zvinotengesa mishonga. Amai Charity Ndisengei ndemumwewo wevanhu vakawanda munyika vari kurarama nechirwere chediabetes icho vakabatwa mugore ra1995. Amai Ndisengei vanoti mumakore ose apfuura vange vasina dambudziko rekuwana mapirirtsi avanofanirwa kumwa, asi pari zvino ivo nevamwe vakaita saivo vave panjodzi yekurasikirwa nehupenyu nekuda kwekudhurirwa nemishonga. Chirwere chediabetes icho chinoziikanwa nevakawanda chichinzi chirwere cheshuga, chinokonzera kushomeka kana kuwanda kweshuga mumuviri izvo zvinogona kuuraya. Mutauriri wesangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association Dr Mxolisi Ngwenya vanobvuma kuti nekuda kwemariro ezvinhu munyika, vanhu vane zvirwere zvakaita sediabetes vakatarisana nedambudziko guru sezvo vane zvirwere izvi vachifanirwa kuwana mishonga kwehupenyu hwavo hwose. Dr Ngwenya vanotiwo zuva reWorld Diabetes Day rakakosha nekuti rinobatsira kuti vanhu vawane ruzivo pamusoro pechirwere ichi. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kusangano reZimbabwe Diabetics Association pamusoro pehuwandu hwevanhu vane chirwere chediabetes munyika. Asi gwaro rinonzi World Health Organisation kana kuti WHO Non-communicable Diseases Progress Monitor regore ra2017 rinoratidza kuti vanhu zviuru makumi mana, zvinove zvikamu makumi matatu kubva muzana, vakafa nekuda kwezvirwere zvisingatapurirranwe kusanganisira diabetes. Gwaro iri rinoratidzawo kuti pamatanho anotarisirwa neWHO kuti atorwe pakudzivirira zvirwere zvisingatapurirane huruemende iri kusarira kumashure pane zvakawanda. Chiremba Dr Rutendo Bonde vanoti hurumende ine mitemo ine matanho akanaka anoratidza zvose zvinofanirwa kuitwa pakudzivirira diabetes nezvimwe zvirwere zvisingatapuriranwe. Asi vati chinonetsa ndechekuti zvinhu izvi hazvizotevedzerwi. Dr Bonde vanotiwo chirwere chediabetes chikasarapwa chinokonzera zvimwe zvirwere zvakawanda vachiti zviri nani kuti vanhu vawane mishonga yakafanira pane kuzoedza kurapa zvimwe zvirwere zvakawanda. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano Dr John Mangwiro avo vaimbova sachigaro weZimbabwe Diabetics Association vari kutora hutungamiri hwechikamu cheAfrica cheInternational Diabetes Association kutanga kwegore rinouya. Dr Mangwiro vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti Zimbabwe iri kusarira kumashure panyaya yekurapwa kwediabetese vachiti hurumende yakapedzisira kuita ongororo yemamiriro echirwere ichi munyika mugore ra2005. Asi vati bazi ravo riri kuita zvose zvakafanira kusanganisira kuita kuti zvive nyore kuti vanhu vawane mishonga yavanofanirwa kuwana. Zuva reWorld Diabetes Day rinocherechedzwa musi waMbudzi 14 gore rega rega pasi pehurongwa hwesangano reInternational Diabetes Association rakabatana neWHO.

headline: Pove neMaonero Akasiyana Zvikuru paKupasiswa kweBhiri reKuvandudza Bumbiro reMitemo
text: Danho rakatorwa nenhengo dzedare reparamende svondo rino rekupasisa bhiri repiri rinobvumidza kuvandudzwa kwebumbiro remitemo yenyika, kana kuti Constitutional Amendment Bill (No.2), rakasimudza mutauro mukuru muvanhu, vakawanda vachipa maonero akasiyanasiyana. Imwe nhengo yeZanu PF iri kuBritain, Doctor Simba Mavaza, vanoti zvakaitwa nenhengo dzavo muparamende pamwe nedzimwe nhengo dzebato rinopikisa reMDC-T zvekutambira kuvandudzwa kwebumbiro remitemo yenyika rakaumbwa muna 2013, chinhu chakanaka sezvo izvi zvichichengetedza zvido zveveruzhinji. Doctor Mavaza vanotiwo danho iri rinopa mutungamiri wenyika mukana wekushandisa masimba avo zvisina anokanda zvipanera mumavhiri pakusarudza vatongi vematare, vachiti zvaiitwa zvekubvunzurudzwa kwevanenge vachida basa sevatongi vematare zvinozvidza vatongi ava. Asi munyori anoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika mubato idzva rePatriotic Zimbabweans, VaPishai Muchauraya, vanoti zvakaitika izvi mucherechedzo wekufa kwehutongo hwejekerere, uye zvinoratidza kuti Zanu PF iri kushandisa masimba ayo muparamende zvisizvo nekuti bumbiro idzva iri ranga risati rambotanga kushandiswa rose. VaMuchauraya vanoti izvi zvinoita kuti vana veZimbabwe vakawanda vashaye chivimbo nehutungamiri hwavo kuti vanokwansa here kuchengetedza bumbiro renyika. vanoti zvadii kuti bumbiro remitemo rimboramba riripo kusvika vanhu vese varijaira. Nhengo dzinosvika zana nemakumi mapfumbamwe neimwe dzakatambira kuvandudzwa kwebumbiro uku, kuchitiwo makumi maviri nembiri dzichipikisa. Zvinonzi zvinofanirwa kuvandudzwa mubumbiro iri zvinosanganisira mutemo wekusarudza anokwikwidza ari mutevedzeri weanozove mutungamiri wenyika, kana kuti running mate, mutemo wekusarudzwa kwevatongi vematare epamusoro, kuwedzerwa kwenguva yemutemo unopa zvigaro kumadzimai pasarudzo kana kuti women’s quota uyo wanga uchiguma kushanda muna 2023, uyewo kuiswa kwemutemo mutsva unopa zvigaro gumi kune vechidiki musarudzo. Bhiri iri rave kuzoenda kudare reseneti uko rinotarisirwa kupasiswa zvakare sezvo Zanu PF iine nhengo dzakawanda ikoko. Kana rakapasiswa neseneti rinenge rave kuzoenda kumutungamiri wenyika kuti aise runyoro rwake kuti uzove mutemo. No media source currently available

headline: VaMugabe Vodomwa seMunyarikani weWHO Anomirira Zvirwere Zvisingatapuriranwe muAfrica
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakadomwa nesangano reWorld Health Organisation, WHO, semunyarikani achange akamirira Africa munyaya dzezvirwere zvisingatapuriranwe, kana kuti non communicable diseases. VaMugabe, avo vane makore makumi mapfumbamwe nematu, vakadomwa mazuva maviri apfuura pamusangano uri kuitirwa ku Uruguay. VaMugabe vakaenda kumusangano uyu vachiperekedzwa negurukota nezvekunze, VaWalter Mzembi, gurukota rezvehutano, VaDavid Parirenyatwa, pamwe nemamwe makurokota ehurumende. Vachitaura vari kuUruguay, VaMzembi vaudza Studio7 kuti ichokwadi kuti VaMugabe vadomwa semunyarikani izvo zviri kufadza nyika. "Ichokwadi VaMugabe vawana ruremekedzo rwekuve, WHO Ambassador for NCD's, Africa," VaMzembi vaudza Studio7. VaMugabe vachange vari pachinzvimbo ichi kwemakore maviri, uye basa iri haribhadharwe mari. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti dziri kushamiswa nezvaitwa neWHO zvekudoma mutungamiri ari kukundikana kugadzirisa nyaya dzehutano munyika make izvo zviri kupa kuti vakuru vakuru muZimbabwe varapwe kunze kwenyika. VaMugabe pachavo vanogara vachibuda munyika vachinorapwa kuSingapore.

headline: Cholera Yobata Munhu kuChiredzi Zvotyisa Vakawanda
text: Vagari vemudhorobha reChiredzi nenzvimbo dzakapoteredza vari kutyira kubata chirwere cheCholera icho chinonzi chakabata vamwe vanhu munzvimbo iyi nezuro zvinonzi zvakonzerwa nekushaikwa kwemvura yakachena. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti munhu mumwe chete akabatwa nechirwere checholera uye pane vamwe gumi vachiri kuongororwa. Mumwe mugari wemumusha weTshovani Vamwe vagari vakaita saAmai Enia Mukarati vemumusha weTshovani muChiredzi vanoti vave kutyira hupenyu hwavo sezvo vari kutarisana ne ndambudziko remvura iyo yave nemwedzi inodarika miviri ichinetsa\n\nizv zvatsinhirwa nevanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano rinomirira vagari reUnited Chiredzi Residents and RatePayers Association kana kuti UCHIRA Amai Constance Chikumbo Kanzura weward 18 mumusha weTraingle kuChiredzi, VaGilbert Mutubukiti vanoti vagary vave kumanikidzwa mvura ine tsvina yekudiridza nzimbe inodarika nemumigero yakavhurika. Vanotiwo nyaya yekuti vanhu vanozvibatsira pedyo nemigero iyi inobva yapa kuti itonyanye kusviba zvichiisa vanhu munjodzi yekubatwa necholera. VaMutubuki vati kanzuru yavo iri kuvaka zvimbuzi nekuchera zvibhorani kuyedza kuti vanhu vasarware nezvirwere zvakaita secholera. Munyori wekanzuru yeChiredzi, Engineer Wesley Kauma vati havasati vanzwa nezve denda iri kubva kubazi rezvehutano. Mukuru mubazi rezvehutano mudunhu reMasvingo, Dr Emedus Shamu vatenda kuti chirwere ichi chakabata munhu kuChiredzi vachiti bazi ravo richiri kuongorora vamwe vanofungirwa kuti vanacho. Muna 2008, vanhu vanoda kusvika zana rezviuru kana kuti 100 000 vakabatwa nechirwere checholera munyika vamwe zviuru zvina vakafa. Kuti vanhu vasabatwe nechirwere checholera, nyanzvi dzinoti vanofanira kunwa mvura yakachena, kugeza maoko nesipo vasati vabika nekudya, kubhoirisa chikafu uye kushandisa zvimbuzi. Kana munhu abatwa nechirwere ichi anoita manyoka, kunzwa nyota zvakanyanya, kurutsa kana kunzwa kuneta. Anenge achinzwa izvi anokurudzirwa kumhanya kuchipatara. No media source currently available

headline: Kasikana (8) shasha yemotor-cross
text: KASIKANA kemakore masere okuberekwa koita zvinorova mumutambo wemotor-cross izvo zviri kukaona kachitatsurana nevakomana vakuru kwakari mumujaho yakasiyana.   Kare mujaho wemotor-cross waizivikanwa uri wevarume asi kuzouya kwakaita Tanya Muzinda, uyo akwanisa kunokwikwidza kunyika dzakasiyana dzekunze achihwina mikombe yakawanda, kwabva kwavhurira mikana vamwe vasikana vakaita saMufaro Kabasa (8) uyo ave kutevera mumatsimba ake.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza svondo rino, Mufaro anoti chishuwo chake kusimudzira mureza weZimbabwe sezvinoitwa naTanya kuburikidza nekuhwina mibairo yakawanda kunze kwenyika.   “Ndakazviona kuti hapana mutambo unonzi ndewevakomana chete, isu vasikana tinogona kuzviitawo uye pasina chinotikanganisa.   “Ndakazvarwa ndichingofarira kuchovha bhasikoro uye ndichikwikwidza nevakomana kumaraini. Pandakanzwa nezvaTanya ndipo ndakati ndinokwanisa kuzviitawo uye ndokutanga kukwikwidza kuDonnybrook.   “Hapana chinombonditadzisa kusvika kure nekuti zvese zviripo zvinondibatsira kuti ndibudirire,” anodaro Mufaro. Shasha iyi parizvino iri kuita Grade 4 pachikoro cheGroombridge Primary, muHarare uye anoti dzidzo ndiwo musimboti wezvose muhupenyu hwake nekudaro anoikoshesa sezvaanoita mutambo wemotor-cross.   Anoti paanoenda kuchikoro, haasiye mukurumbira waave nawo uchimupinda mumusoro asi anongoita zvefundo yake. “Fundo yakakosha uye ndiwo musimboti wezvese muhupenyu saka ndinotanga ndaita zvechikoro changu, ndapedza ndochienda kumotor-cross kunoita gadziriro dzangu kana ndakatarisana nemujaho.   “Mazuva ano fundo inodiwa pazvose nekuti mune ramangwana kana ndave kuzoenda kunokwikwidza kunze kwenyika handizive kuti zvinofamba sei saka zvakakosha kushanda nesimba kune zvose,” anodaro Mufaro.   Baba vake, Kudakwashe Kabasa uyo anove zvakare maneja wake, anoti chipo chiri pamwana wake chakakosha zvikuru. “Tinokoshesa fundo yaMufaro nemutambo uyu saka ini ndinenge ndiripo nguva dzese ndichimuendesa kuchikoro kana apedza toenda naye kunoita gadziriro dzake. Chishuwo chedu kuona achibudirira mumutambo uyu uye fundo yake achipasa zvakare,” anodaro Kabasa.

headline: IMF Inoti maBond Notes Haangagadzirise Dambudziko reMari muZimbabwe
text: Bhanga guru rinokweretesa mari nyika dzepasi rino reInternational Monetary Fund, kana kuti IMF, rinoti kuparurwa kwakaitwa mari yemabond notes neZimbabwe hakupedze dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari munyika. Mashoko aya ari kuuya apo Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe iri kutumira matikitivha kuzvitoro kuti isunge vanonzi havasi kuendesa mari kumabhanga nechimbi chimbi zvave kunzi zviri kukonzera dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari munyika. Asi mukuru weIMF muAfrica, VaAbebe Aemro Selassie, vakaudza vatori venhau muWashington DC kuti kuparura mabaond notes hakungapedze dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari munyika. Vanoti Zimbabwe inotofanira kusunga dzisimbe kuti igadzirise mitemo inopa kuti hupfumi hugadzikane ikwanise kutanga kutengesa zvinhu kunze kwenyika yowana mari. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vari mukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti vanotenderana neIMF asi vachiti Zimbabwe inofanira kumira nyaya dzehuori. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachidzidzisa paUniversity of Zimbabwe Doctor Gift Mugano vanotenderanawo nemaonero eIMF. Asi mukuparura mari yemabond notes gavhuna weRBZ, Doctor John Mangudya, vakati anobatsira. VaMangudya vanoti chimwe chiri kunyanya kuita kuti dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari rinyanye kunetsa inyaya yevemakambani vasiri kuendesa mari kumabhanga. Nekuda kwefungidziro iyi RBZ yave kutumira matikitivha eFinancial Intelligent Unit kunomanikidza vemabhizimisi kuendesa mari kumabhanga. Vachitsinhira, gurukota rezvehupfumi VaPatrick Chinamsa vanoti pasi pemutemo we Bank Use Promotion Act [Chapter 24:24] vemabhizimisi vanofanira kuendesa mari kumabhanga mukari mezuva rimwe chete. VaDenford Mutashu mutungamiri wesangano re Confederation of Zimbabwe Retailers vanoti vanotenderana nedanho raVaMangudya. Mutungamiri weConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaBusisa Moyo, vanotiwo vanotenderana neRBZ. VaMoyo vati mari ikasaenda kumabhanga zvinopa kuti vanogadzira zvinhu vatadze kuhodha zvinhu kunze. Asi Doctor Mugano vanoti zviri kuitwa naVaMangudya kupedzera hoko padehwe retsindi. Zimbabwe yakatanga kushandisa dhora rekuAmerica nedzimwe mari dzekunze muna 2009 mushure mekunge dhora remunyika ratanga kushaya simba zvisina mukare akamboona. Kusvika parizvino, RBZ inoti yakwanisa kudhinda mari inosvika mamiriyoni zana nemakumi maviri nerimwe yemabond notes. No media source currently available

headline: Varwere Voshaya muZvipatara Sezvo Musina Varapi
text: Sangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association rinoti richiri mubishi kuongora kuti huwandu hwevacheche nemadzimai vakashaya apo vaisununguka apo vana chiremba vairatidzira kutanga neChishanu hwakamira sei. Mutungamiri wavana chiremba ava, Dr Fortune Nyamande, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mari dzemihoro dzave kuoneka mumabhanga kunyangwe vachikwanisa kudzitora neChipiri chete. Mumashoko aburitswa nesangano ravana chiremba neravana mukoti reZimbabwe Nurses Association mushure memusangano wavakaita neMuvhuro, masangano aya ati achadzokera kubasa chete kana vabata mari yavo nemusi weChipiri. Vatiwo vanoda kuti vapihwe mabhonasi avo musi wa 31 Ndira. Asi vakuru vemamwe maasangano evashandi vehurumende vakasangana nagavhuna webhanga guru renyika, VaJohn Mangudya, vakaudzwa kuti hurumende haina mari uye mabhonasi angangopihwa vanhu mukati memwedzi mitanhatu. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvehutano, Dr David Parirenyatwa, kanawo gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha dzavo. Dr Nyamande vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muzvipatara. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaProsper Chitambara, vanoti dambudziko rekutadza kubhadhara vashandi hari kuvashamisa uye zvichatora nguva kuti hurumende irigadzirise. No media source currently available

headline: Mitengo yeZvinhu Yotarisirwa Kukwira Zvichitevera Kukwira kweMitengo yeMafuta
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kuyambira kuti kukwidzwa kwemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari neZimbabwe Energy and Regulatory Authority kana kuti ZERA kuchapa kuti mitengo yezvinhu ikwire zvakanyanya. Mukuru weZERA, VaEddington Mazambani ,vaudza Studio 7 kuti kukwira kwemitengo yekuunza mafuta aya munyika ndiko kuri kupawo kuti vawedzera mutengo. ZERA inoti kunyangwe yatara mitengo, vanotengesa mumagaraji havafanire kudhurisa mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari aya zvakanyanya. GlobalPetrolProces.com iyo inoongorora mitengo yemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari pasi rose inoti muAfrica, Zimbabwe iri pachidanho chechipiri kubva kuSenegal pakudhura kwemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaVictor Bhoroma, vanoti nyaya yekukwira kwemafuta aya chave chigariro musoro wetsuro kushaya nyanga. VaBhoroma vanoti izvi zvinoshamisa zvikuru nekuti Zimbabwe inosanganisa mafuta ainotenga kunze neanogadzirwa nenzimbe dzinorimwa kuChisumbanje. Munyori mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti kukwira kwemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari kunopawo kuti mitengo yezvinhu zvakawanda iwedzerwe asi vashandi vasiri kuwedzerwa mari. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhanga VaGilbert Muponda vanoti panofanira kudzamiswa pfungwa pasati pakwidzwa mutengo wemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari nekuti zvinokonzera kusagadzikana kwehupfumi. VaMuponda vatiwo havo haisi Zimbabwe chete iri kukwidza mitengo nekuti South Africa iri kutarisirwa kuita zvimwe chetezvo munguva pfupi inotevera. Mutungamiri weEmployers Confederaition of Zimbabwe, Doctor Israel Murefu, vati kukwira kwemitengo kuchakonzera kukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu kana kuti inflation vachiti sevemabhizimisi vari kunetsekana nekusagadzikana kwemutengo wemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari. No media source currently available

headline: RBZ Yotarisirwa Kuparura Svondo Rinouya Mamwe Mapeni Ane Huremu hweGoridhe huDikidiki Zvinonzi Nevamwe Zvichabatsira Vane Mari Shoma
text: Nekuona kubudirira kwarinoti kwakaita zvirongwa zvaro zvekutanga zvekudzikamisa hupfumi hwenyika pamwe nekusunga inflation, zvinosanganisira chekutengeswa kwemapeni egoridge, bepanhau reSunday Mail rinoti bhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, svondo rinouya riri kuwedzera zvakare pamusika mamwe mapeni . Mapeni egoridhe aya, ayo anonzi anenge ane huremu hwegoridhe hwepasipasi, anonzi anenge ari zviuru zvina nemazana mashanu, kana kuti 4 500 . Asi hurongwa uhwu hwagara huchisimudza maonero akasiyanasiyana kunyanzvi mune zvehupfumi, dzimwe dzichihupembedza asi dzimwe dzichihushora. Mumwe wevari kupembedza danho rekutengeswa kwemapeni egoridhe iri ndi Doctor Prosper Chitambara, avo vanoshanda nesangano re Labour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe. Doctor Chitambara, vanoti kuparurwa kwemapeni madikidiki aya kuchapawo mukana kune veruzhinji wekuti vange vachikwanisawo kuchengetedza mari dzavo kuburikidza nekutenga mapeni aya. Imwe nyanzi mune zvehupfumi, Doctor Charles Mutasa, vanotiwo kuuya kwemapeni egoridhe kwave kuoneka kubatsira kwawo sezviri kuonekwa pakuderera kwe inflation kwakatika mwedzi wapera. Asi Doctor Mutasa vanoti pachine zvakawanda zvinofanirwa kuitwa kuitira kuti kudzikamiswa kwehupfumi hwenyika kubudirire. Asi imwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi, Muzvare Chenai Mutambasere, vanoti hapana zvikuru zvati zvaonekwa zvati zvaburitswa nekuuya kwemapeni aya. Muzvare Mutambasere vanoti vanhu vanongonzwa kuti kwatengeswa mapeni akawanda zvakati, asi hapana humbowo kunoiswa pajekerere. Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi dzinoti kunyange hazvo hurumende neReserve Bank of Zimbabwe vose vari kuti mapeni egoridhe aya pamwe nemamwe matanho avari kutora akwanisa kudzikamisa hupfumi hwenyika nekusunga inflation, zvirongwa zvehurumende zvinoda mari, zvinosanganisira mabhonasi evashandi vayo, zvekurima zvePfumvudza nePresidential Input Scheme, uye sarudzo dzegore rinouya, zvinogona kuisa mudondo hurongwa hwese uhwu. Mapeni ari kutarisirwa kuparurwa svondo rinouya aya anonzi achange achitengeswa nemutengo wemadhora ekuAmerica pamwe nemadhora emunyika zvichienderana nemutengo wegoridhe pamisika yekunze yezuvaro, sezviri kungoitwa pane akaburitswa kare. Gavhuna veRBZ, Doctor John Mangudya, vakaudza bepanhau reSunday Mail kuti kubva muna Chikunguru wegore rino mapeni anodarika zviuru gumi nechimwe, kana kuti 11 000 atengeswa munyika. Zvasarira kuona kuana kuiswa kwemapeni madikidiki aya pamusika kuchaitawo kuti veruzhinji vakwanise kuatenga sezvo agara achitengeswa anga achinzi mitengo yawo iri pamusoro zvekuti vakawanda vepasi havakwanise kuwana mari yekutenga. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Zana neMakumi Mashanu neMumwe (151) Vafa neChirwere cheMalaria Chopararira muNyika
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dziri kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vaongororwe pamwe nekurapwa chirwere chemalaria icho chiri kuramba chichiuraya vanhu munyika. Mutauriri webazi rezvehutano VaDonald Mujiri vati kusvika parizvino vanhu zana nemakumi mashanu nemumwe vafa nechirwere cheMalaria gore rino chete. VaMujiri vati ongororo yavo yezvirwere yakaratidza kuti pavhiki ra17 kusvika 23 Gumiguru vanhu churu chimwechete nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi vazhinji vari vekuMashonaland East kwozotevera Mashonaland Central province. Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu vana vakafa panguva imwechete iyi nechirwere vaviri vari vemuHarare. Vachitaura neStudio 7 mukuru anoona nezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare, Doctor Prosper Chonzi vatiwo kunyangwe muHarare manga musina dambudziko rechirwere ichi ravemo. Dr Chonzi vanoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vaongororwe chirwere ichi vakaita zviratidzo zvekuti vabatwa nacho. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti zvikamu zvinodarika gumi nezviviri kubva muzana zvevari kubatwa nechirwere chemalaria munyika vana vari pasi pemakore mashanu.VaChonzi vati vana ava vanowanzobatwa nemalaria sezvo vachinyanyotambira panze uye vasingagoni kukurumidza kutaura kana vachidzimbikana nemuviri. Dr Chonzi vatiwo kuzvipatara zvekanzuru kuongororwa malaria kunoitwa pachena uyewo mishonga yechirwere ichi inopiwa pachena. Nyanzvi munezvehutano uye vaimbova gurukora rezvehutano Doctor Henry Madzorera vati chirwere chemalaria chirwere chinorapika. VaMadzorera vati hurumende inofanirwa kupfapfaidza mishonga munogona kuberekera humhutu kudzivirira ndufu dzechirwere ichi Dr Madzorera vatiwo veruzhinji vanofanirwa kuzvidzivirira kuchirwere ichi kuburikidza nekuzvivhara muviri kana vachinge vari panze husiku uyewo kushandisa zvinodzinga humhutu kana vari mudzimba dzavanorara. VaMujiri vatiwo hurumende yakatotanga chirongwa chekupfapfaidza dzimba kumatunhu makumi maviri nemashanu uye vari kutarisira kubatsira vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana masere kana kuti 2.8 million. Bazi rezvehutano ririkukurudzira kuti avo vanopihwa mambure ekudzivirira humhutu vanofanirwa kuashandisa sezvinotarisirwa vachiti vamwe vanoguma voshandisa mamwe mabasa vachizviisa panjodzi yekubata malaria. Ko munhu anoziva sei kuti abatwa nechirwere ichi? Nyanzvi dzinoti anotanga kupisa muviri, kurutsa, kutemwa nemusoro, kuneta. Manyoka nekungorwadziwa nemuviri. No media source currently available

headline: POTRAZ Yoshorwa Ichinzi Yave Kuda Kumbunyikidza Vanoshandisa WhatApp
text: Makambani enharembhozha anoti achaziva svondo rino kuti chikonzero chei kambani yePost and Telecommunications Regulatory Authority kana kuti POTRAZ yakavamisa kupota vachimboderedza mitengo yenharembozha nekumboita zvirongwa zvekuti vanhu vafonewo nemari yakaderera pane dzimwe nguva kana kuti mapromotions. Danho rePOTRAZ iri rave kuunza mutauro vamwe vachiti danho iri rinombunyikidza kodzero dzeveruzhinji. Vanhu vakawanda vakataura neStudio 7 vanoti havazi kufara nekusabuda pachena kweveboka rePOTRAZ padanho ravakatora rekuti makambani enharembozha matatu ari munyika eEconet, Net One neTelecel ambomira kuderedza mitengo, kana kuti promotion muChirungu, kwaange achiita. Vamwe vevanhu ava vakaudza Studio 7 kuti vanotyira kuti POTRAZ yakatora danho iri senzira yekudzivira veruzhinji kuti vasawane mukana wekutaura zvavanoda nenzira dzakachipa dzepa internet. Mumwe mugari wemuBulawayo muzvare Tinaye Shumba vanoti mafungiro avo ndeekuti, hurumende kuburikidza nePOTRAZ, yakatora danho iri nekuti mapoka anorwira kodzero dzevanhu akawanda ange ari kushandisa nzira dzakachipa idzi kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti varatidze kutsutsumwa kwavo kuhumende pamusoro pemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika. VaIpithule Maphosa vanove sachigaro weboka revechidiki vebato reZAPU muBulawayo vanoti danho rePOTRAZ iri ndemumwe muenzaniso uri pachena unoratidza kushaya hanya kwehurumende pazvinhu zvinobatsira veruzhinji. VaMaphosa vanotiwo danho iri inzira yehurumende yekuedza kutsvaga nzira dzose dzingakwanisika dzekutsvaga nadzo mari sezvo hurumende iri kutambudzika kuwana mari yekubhadhara vashandi vayo. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuPOTRAZ panyaya iyi. Mumwewo mugari uyo akangoda kuzvidoma nezita rekuti Michelle akaudza Studio 7 kuti danho rakatorwa nevePOTRAZ harifadze vakawanda, asi anoona zvakakosha kuti boka iri riise mitemo inobatsira kuti nyika ichengetedzeke. Kunyange hazvo achibvuma kuti danho iri rinogona kuita kuti veruzhinji vadhurirwe nekushandisa nharembozha dzavo, muzvare Michelle anoti zvinonetsa kuti hurumende idzivirire vanhu kuti vataurirane pfungwa dzavo pamusoro pezviri kuitika munyika. Amai Koliwe Majama vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muchikamu cheBroadcsating neInformation Technonology musangano reMedia Institute of Southern Africa kana kuti MISA. Amai Majama vanoti kunyange hazvo sangano ravo richiziva nekunzwisisa kuti ibasa revePOTRAZ kuti vaongorore mashandiro emakambani enharembozha, chiri kuvanetsa ndechekuti vePOTRAZ vakatora danho iri vasingape chikonzero. Amai Majama, avo vanoti sangano reMISA rakamboita musangano nePOTRAZ, vanoti zvakakosha kuti boka iri ribudire vanhu pachena pamatanho arinenge ratora, vachitiwo chiri kuita kuti vanhu vashushikana parizvino inyaya yekuti vechiuto vakabuda vachityisidzira veruzhinji pamusoro pekushandisa iinternet. VaButler Tambo ndivo mutevedzeri wemukuru wesangano reCentre for Public Engagement uye vanoongororawo mitemo yehurumende kunyanya ine chekuita nezvehupfumi. VaTambo vakashorawo danho rePOTRAZ vachiti rinodzorera kumashure zvehupfumi munyika. Hurumende pasi pegurukota reInformation Communication Technology, iri mushishi kugadzira mutemo unonzi Computer Crime and Cyber Crime Bill uyo unonzi uchashandiswa kusunga vose vachawanikwa vachishandisa internet zviri kunze kwemutemo. Vamwe vanoti mutemo uyu unogona kutyora kodzero dziri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika dzekuti vanhu vane kodzero yekutaurirana pachena kana kuti Freedom of expression muChirungu. Asi vamwewo vanoti zvakakosha kuti nyika ive nemitemo yakadai sezvo ichibatsira kudzivirira nyika kubva kuvavengi kana vanopfurikidza mwero.

headline: China Yotumira Gurukota Rayo Kunoshanya muZimbabwe
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvekudzivirirwa muChina, General Chang Wanquan, vakapinda munyika neChitatu murwendo rwunonzi nevanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika nezvechiuto hwakanangana nekusimbaradza mauto eZimbababwe panguva iyo munyika zvinhu zvakaita manyama amire nerongo. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakati rwendo urwu rwakakosha zvikuru uye Zimbabwe inotenda China zvakanyanya nekuibatsira kwainoita. Hurumende inoti General Chang vari kuda kuona kuti zvibvumirano zvakanyoreranwa pasi gore rapera pakati peZimbabwe neChina zvazadzikiswa. Asi vakawanda munyika vanoti havana chavari kuona pazvibvumirano izvi sezvo zvinhu zviri kuramba zvichienda kumawere munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Kunze kwekutengesera Zimbabwe zvombo zvehondo, China yakavakirawo Zimbabwe muzinda wemauto uye kambani yekunyika iyi yemauto yeAnjin iri pamakambani ange achichera mangoda kuChiyadzwa. Mauto emuZimbabwe ave kunyanya kuzemberana neChina kubva zvakatamerwa nyika zvirango nehurumende dzekumawirira ichipomerwa mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaTakura Zhangazha, avo vanoshanda nesangano reVoluntary Media Council of Zimbabwe vanoti Zimbabwe haifanire kungoringa kumabuda zuva chete panyaya yekudyidzana asi kuti itarisi kumativi mana ose enyika. No media source currently available

headline: VeMDC Vanoti Pane Nhaurirano dzeMapato Ose Asi Zanu-PF Yotsika Madziro
text: Mapato anopikisa reMDC rinotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai nerimwe rinotungamirwa naVaWelsman Ncube anoti ichokwadi kuti pane nhaurirano dziri kuitwa nemapato ose emunyika. Bepanhau reNewsday rinoti mapato aya akasangana kuGhana nekuKenya kuti paitwe hurumende yemubatanidzwa. Asi mapato matatu aya anoti izvi ndezvemugotsi matsuro. Mutauriri weZanu-PF VaSimon Khaya Moyo vatsika madziro vachiti hakuna musangano wakadai wakaitwa. Vaudza Studio 7 kuti Zanu-PF haina chekutaura nevanopikisa. Asi mutungamiri weMDC VaWelshman Ncube vaudza Studio 7 kuti nhaurirano idzi dzirikuitwa asi hadzinei nechekuita nekuumba hurumende yemubatanidzwa. Muzvinafundo Ncube vati pane zvinhu zvinoda kugadziriswa nechimbichimbi zvakaita sebumbiro remitemo nemitemo yesarudzo. Mashoko aVaNcube atsinhirwawo naVaObert Gutu mutauriri weMDC inotungamirwa naVaTsvangirai. No media source currently available Kubva zvakabuda nyaya iyi, kukandirana makobvu nematete kunenge kwanyanya zvotyirwa kuti musangano wange wakarongwa kuitwa musi weChina, 24 Gunyana kuVictoria Falls unogona kutadza kuitwa. Muna 2009, Zimbabwe yakaita hurumende yemubatanidzwa zvichitevera mhirizhonga inotyisa yakaitika muna 2008 musarudzo dzechipiri dze mutungamiri wenyika. African Union neUnited Nations ndiwo masangano aiona kuti chibvumierano chemubatanidzwa chatevedzerwa here. Muyananisi mukuru panyaya iyi akatanga ari vaimbove mutungamiri weSouth Africa VaThabo Mbeki vachizotorerwa naVaJacob Zuma avo vakavatsiva.

headline: Vari Kunze Voshaya Vimbiso Yakadzama Kuitira Kuti Vadzoke Kumusha
text: Vanhu vemuZimbabwe vane mabhizimisi muSouth Africa vanoti havasi vose vachatambira mashoko emutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, ekuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zvidzokere kumusha kundosimudzira hupfumi hwenyika sezvo pasina zvakajeka zvinoratidza kuti Zimbabwe yava nyika inoremekedza kodzero dzemunhu wese. Vazhinji vane mabhizimisi muSouth Africa vanoti dambudziko guru nderekuti hurumende yaVaMnangagwa haizi kuvimbisa zvakadzama kuti vari kunze vakadzoka kumusha, vachazokwanisa here kuzovhura mabhizimisi matsva kana kushanda nehurumende murunyararo. Sachigaaro wemabhizimisi emhuri yeZimbabwe achiri kusimukira muSouth Africa yeZimbusinessLink Forum SA, VaMarshal General Sankara, avo vane nguva refu vachigara muSouth Africa, vanoti hapana shanduko yati yaitika mu Zimbabwe inokodzera kuti nhengo dzebato ravo dzikwanise kudzokera kumusha. Muzvinabhizinesi ane makambani akawanda muSouth Africa, VaAustin Moyo, avo vanova zvakare munyarikani musangano re Diaspora Care Forum, vanoti mashoko aVaMnangagwa ekuti vanhu vadzoke kumusha, hapana zvaanoreva nekuti kumusha hakuna mabasa kana mari uyewo hurumende yavo haizombokwanisa kugutsa mhuri yeZimbabwe iri munyika kana vose vari kunze kenyika. VaGarai Madziva, avo vanobva kwaRusape, vanoti ivo nemhuri yavo vangangode kudzokera kumusha asi matambudziko akaita sekushaikwa kwemari mumabhanga, kuipa kwemigwagwa, ndiko kuri kunyanyokonzera kuti mhuri yeZimbabwe iri kunze kwenyika isafarira kudzokera kumusha. Vanoti panguva yose yavanoshanyira kumusha, kushaikwa kwemari hakunyanye kuvatambudza nekuti vanenge vakagadzirira nguva dzose. VaMadziva vanoti pari zvino ivo nemhuri yavo havangakwanise kudzokera kumusha. Vazhinji vatakurukura navo varatidza kuti havasi kuzokurumidza kudzokera kumusha vamwe nekuda kwekudhura kwezvinhu muzvitoro, kushaikwa kwemabasa nezvimwe. No media source currently available

headline: Mutambi weFC Platinum, Walter Musona, Anosimudza Mukomwe weSoccer Star of The Year 2022
text: Mutambi wechikwata cheFC Platinum, Walter Musona, ari kunyemwerera akananga kubhanga mushure mekutora mukombe we2022 Castle Lager Soccer Star of the Year pamabiko akaitwa muHarare neChishanu manheru. Musona akatambidzwa mari inoita iyo zviuru zvishanu zvemadhora ekuAmerica, kana kuti US$5000.00, mushure mekutora mukombe une chiremera chikuru munhabvu yemunyika weCastle Soccer Star of the Year wemwaka uno. Mari iyi imari yakawandisa zvikuru munyika muno pachitariswa mamiriro ehupfumi hwenyika. Muongorori wemutambo wenhabvu VaTinashe Museti vanoti Musona anokodzera nekutora mukombe weligi kwaakaita nechikwata chake. William Manhondo we Caps United akatendwa nemari inoita iyo zviuru zvitatu zvemadhora ekuAmerica kana kuti US$3000.00 mushure mekupedza ari pachinhanho chechipiri. VaMuseti vanoti ndipo paanofanira kuve ari nekuti hapana chaakabuda nacho chinobatika neCaps United kunze kwekurwira nzvimbo yavo mugungano iri. Frank Makarati weDynamos ndiye akatora chinhanho chechitatu ndokutambidzwa mari inoita iyo zviuru zviviri nemazana mashanu zvemadhora ekuAmerica kana kuti US$2500.00. Chiri kushamisa ndechekuti mutambi weHerentals, Tino Benza, ndiye akavhoterwa nechaunga kunzi ndiye mutambi akatamba zvinonwisa mvura mwaka uno. Asi pakasarudzwa ma Soccer Star, veruzhinji vaitonyunyuta kuti Benza aive asingakodzere pamberi paBlessing Majarira uyo vanotamba vese kuchikwata chimwechetecho. No media source currently available

headline: VaTsvangirai, Amai Mujuru neVamwe vanopikisa Voronga Kuratidzira muHarare neChishanu
text: Mapato anopikisa ari mumubatanidzwa unozivikanwa nekuti National Electoral Reform Agenda kana kuti NERA anoti ari kuzoenderera mberi nekuratidzira nemusi weChishanu kuti Zimbabwe Electoral Commission ivandudze mitemo yesarudzo kunyangwe mapurisa ari kuti mushure mekuungana vasapinde mukati meguta. Vanokokera mabasa eNERA VaDidymus Mutasa vebato reZimbabwe People First vakaudza vatori venhau muHarare nemusi weChina kuti vari kutarisira vanhu vanodarika zviuru zana nemakumi mashanu pakuratidzira kwavo. Vapikawo kuti hapana kudududza pakuratidzira uku. Asi kunyange hazvo vasina kurambidza mapato aya kuti aratidzire, mukuru wemapurisa paHarare Central, Chief Supritendent Newbert Saunyama, vayambira kuti mapato aya kuti asapinde muguta sezvo vanhu vanenge vakawandisa. VaSaunyama vatiwo mapato aya akasununguka zvawo kuenda negwaro rawo renyunyuto kuZEC ine mahofisi ari nechekunze kweguta. Vanopikisa ava vachatanga vaungana pedyo neRainbow Towers panozivikanwa kuti Freedom Square nevamwe vasati vafamba nepakati peguta. VaMutasa vati tsamba yemapurisa haina kujeka uye vaenda kumatare edzimhosva kuti mapurisa asazopindira mukuratidzira uku. Nekuda kwaizvozvo, VaMutasa vati veruzhinji vanofanira kupinda mumigwagwa vakawanda kuti nyika ikwanise kuita sarudzo dzakachena. Sachigaro we komiti inoona nezvemutemo muNERA, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vati zvinoshamisa kuti mapurisa anorambidza mapato anopikisa kuratidzira mukati medhorobha asi akabvumidza bato reZanu PF kuita One Million Men mukati mekugata rimwero nguva pfupi yapfuura. VaMutasa vatiwo sangano reSouthern African Development Community rinofanira kutsigira vanhu vemuZimbabwe kuti nyika ive nesarudzo dzakachena vakati matambudziko ari munyika ese anokonzerwa nekuti nyika haiite sarudzo dzakachena. Mapato anopikisa munyika haasi kufara nemashandire ekomisheni yeZEC uye anoti haisi kuita basa rayo nemazvo uye inenge inoshanda ichirerekera kubato riri kutonga reZanu PF. Sachigaro weZEC Amai Rita Makarau vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kuBotswana uye vanokwanisa kutaura nesu vadzoka neChishanu. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri weZanu-PF VaSimon Khaya Moyo kuti tinzwe divi ravo. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Stock Exchange Ichatangidza Kushanda neMuvhuro
text: Musika weZimbabwe Stock Exchange uri kutarisirwa kutanga kushanda nemusi weMuvhuro. Asi nyanzvi munayay dzehupfumi, VaVictor Bhoroma, vanoti makambani anoti Old Mutual, Seed Co International ne PPC anzi ambomira kushandisa musika uyu sezvo ari kuferefetwa nebazi reFinancial Intelligence Unit panyaya dzaari kupomerwa dzekuti aisafambisa mari zvakanaka. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vanodarika Mazana Mapfumbamwe Vokumbira Kuvhenekwa Coronavirus
text: Zimbabwe neChitatu yakapinda muzuva retatu nyika yakavharwa senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCoronavirus, icho chabata vanhu vasere, uye kuuraya munhu mumwe chete. Bazi rezvehutano muZimbabwe rinoti pane vanhu vanosvika mazana mapfumbamwe ne gumi nevashanu vakachaya nhare kwariri vachifungidzira kuti vane chirwere cheCoronavirus kubva musi wa 28 mwedzi wapera. Vanhu vari kukurudzirwa kufona panhamba dzinoti 2-0-1-9 kana vachifungidzira kuti vabata chirwere ichi. Asi pane vakakwanisa kuongororwa vakaonekwa vaine chirwere ichi vanomwe vanonzi vari kunzwa zviri nani. Chirwere ichi, icho chakatanga kuChina gore rapera, chabata vanhu vanodarika mazana masere nemakumi masere ezviuru pasi rose, uye kuuraya vanhu zviuru makumi mana nezvina. Italy ndiyo iri kutungamira pakufirwa nevanhu vanodarika zviuru gumi nezviviri; Spain ichifirwawo nevanhu vanopfuura zviuru zvipfumbamwe, ichiteverwa ne America, iyo yarasikirwa nevanhu vanodarika zviuru zvina, ukuwo China iine vanhu zviuru zvitatu nemazana matatu ane gumi nevaviri vafa nechirwere ichi. Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, vari kuyambira kuti nyika yavo inogona kurasikirwa nehupenyu hwevanhu vanogona kusvika pamazana maviri nemakumi mana ezviuru. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi mu America vadarika zviuru zana nemakumi masere nezvishanu. Mukuru wezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare, Dr Prosper Chonzi, vanoti vanenge vasingakwanise kupora vari kumba vanoendeswa kuWilkins Hospital neBeatrice Infectious Unit muHarare, kanawo kuti Thorngrove kuBulawayo.

headline: Xhaka angangodzokera Borussia
text: Granit Xhaka, anoti anogona kudzokera kuBorussia Monchengladbach kana kondirakiti yake yapera.   Chizvarwa chekuSwitzerland ichi chakambotamba mwaka mina kuBundesliga asati ayenda kuArsenal mugore ra2019 uko akatengwa nemari inosvika £35m.   Xhaka iye zvino ane kondirakiti nemaGunners ichapera mugore ra2024 uye anoti angade kudzokera kuMonchengladbach kana chikwata chekuGerman ichi chichimuda.   Achitaura neMit Geredet Podcast anoti, “Handina kubva kuBorussia ndichiuya kuArsenal nekuda kwemari kwete. Chaive chishuvo changu kutamba muEngland.   “Ndichangobva kuwedzera kondirakiti yangu, iyo yasara nemakore maviri kuti ipere. “Ndichabva ndasvitsa makore 32 saka kana Max Eberl (Monchengladbach’s director of sport) achida kundidzosa ndine makore 32, saka ini musuwo wangu wakazarurwa ndinoenda.”   Xhaka achangobva kusaina kondirakiti imwe kuArsenal yegore mwaka uno, zvichitevera kudiwa kwaaiitwa naJose Mourinho murairidzi weRoma. Mutambi uyu (29) pari zvino haasati ave kutamba nhabvu zvichitevera kukuvara kwaakaita gumbo rake mumutambo weNorth Londona Derby apo Arsenal yakakunda Tottenham 3-1. Akakuvara paibvi rake izvo zvichamuona asingatambe nhabvu kwemwedzi mitatu. — SportsMail.

headline: Isu tadzivirirwa 100pc –  PSL
text: SANGANO rePremier Soccer League (PSL) rinoti riri kufara zvikuru kuti chirongwa chekubaiwa nhomba dzekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 chiri kugamuchirwa nevatambi nezvikwata zviri pasi payo izvo zvaona vose vabaiwa vachisvika chikamu che99.9 percent.   Mukushi wemashoko wePSL – Kudzai Bare – anoti vatambi, varairidzi nehutungamiri hwezvikwata zvose zvinokwikwidza muligi iri vakabaiwa majekiseni eCovid-19 izvo zvinove zvimwe zvezvikonzero zvichaita kuti mutambo uyu utambwe vanhu vakasununguka.   Anoti mutambo uyu usati wadzoka, vakanyorerwa nesangano reSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) kuti vatambi vose nezvikwata zvavo, kusanganisira hutungamiri vabaiwe nhomba kuitira kuti mutambo uyu ugodzoka uye ugotambwa vanhu vakachengetedzeka.   “Tiri kugutsikana kuti vatambi nevarairidzi vabaiwa nhomba kusvika pari zvino vanosvika chikamu che99.9 percent. Zvinofadza nekuti vanhu vakaterera, vakatevedzera matanho anodiwa kuti mutambo udzoke ugofamba zvakanaka.   “Kubaiwa majekiseni nekugara vanhu vachivhenekwa Covid-19 mamwe ematanho anotarisirwa kutevedzerwa izvo zvatakapihwa neSRC, saka zvikwata zvakatevedzera zvikabaisa vatambi vazvo nehutungamiri hwacho,” anodaro.   Bare anoti sePSL, vari kushambadza kuvatsigiri venhabvu kuti vaendewo kunobaiwa kuitira kuti zvigobatsira nguva inotevera kana votenderwa kuzonoona zvikwata zvavo zvichitamba.   “Tiri kuvakurudzira tichishandisa nzira dzakasiyana dzinosanganisira dandemutande kuparidza shoko rekuti vanobaiwewo nhomba nekuti tinoda kuti vazouya kuzotsigira zvikwata zvavo vakasununguka. Kana vakabaiwa, zvinobatsira kuti vange vakachengetedzeka nekuti hatidi kuti nhabvu izowedzera pakutapurirana denda iri,” anodaro Bare.   Zvichakadaro, Bare anoti PSL ichazivisa svondo rinotevera kuti mitambo yemuno inogona kuenderera mberi here kana kuti ichambomiswa sezvo pachange pane mutambo wenyika wekurwira kuenda kuQatar World Cup.   MaWarriors, ayo ave kurairidzwa naNorman Mapeza, achasangana neGhana mumitambo miviri yakatevedzana yekuenda kuWorld Cup.   Mitambo yemuGroup G iyi iriko nemusi wa9 na12 Gumiguru asi hapasati pajeka kuti mitambo yeChibuku Super Cup ichambomiswa here kana kuti kwete kuitira kuti Mapeza agowaniswa nguva yekushanda nemaWarriors.   Mitambo yeChibuku Super Cup neChitatu svondo rino mushure mekumbomiswa kwenguva yakareba nechinangwa chekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   “Tiri panyaya iyoyo, tinoziva kuti kune mutambo mukuru uchauya saka tichazozivisa svondo rinotevera kuti tichazvifambisa sei. Iye zvino tiri kungofunga nezvemitambo iriko svondo rino chete,” anodaro Bare.

headline: Vagari vemuHarare Vochemachema neKushomeka kweMotokari dzeKanzuru Yavo Dzinotakura Varwere
text: Vamwe vagari vemuHarare vari kuchema-chema nekushomeka kwemotokari dzekanzuru dzinotakura varwere, kana kuti maamburenzi, dzinova idzo dzine muripo uri nani zvichienzaniswa nedzemakambani akazvimirira. VaTaurai Zviripamwoyo, avo vakarwarirwa mazuva mashoma achangodarika, vanoti kunyangwe hazvo motokari dzinotakura varwere dzekanzuru yeHarare dziine muripo uri nani, hadziwanikwi zviri nyore. VaZviripamwoyo vanoti mamwe makambani ane motokari dzinotakura varwere akazvimirira anodhura zvakanyanya. Vachitaura neStudio 7, mumwe zvakare mugari wemuHarare, VaTanatsiwa Dambuza, vati kodzero yehutano iri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika haigoni kuzadzikiswa kana vagari vasiri kuwana motokari dzinotakura varwere dzine muripo uri pasi sedzekanzuru yeHarare. VaDambuza vakurudzira kanzuru kuti igadzirise dambudziko iri. Meya veguta reHarare, VaJacob Mafume, vatendawo kuti motokari dzinotakura varwere muguta ishoma zvakanyanya vachiti pari zvino dzinogona kunga dziri nomwe kana sere. Vawedzerawo vachiti kanzuru yavo ichange ichizeya nezvenyaya yekushomeka kwemotokari dzinotakura varwere kuti vagadzirise dambudziko iri. Vachipindura mubvunzo wekuti imotokari ngani dzingakwanira kanzuru, VaMafume vati kanzuru inoda mota dzinotakura varwere makumi maviri neshanu. Tsvakiridzo yaitwa neStudio 7 inoratidza kuti motokari dzekanzuru dzinotakura varwere ndidzo dzine mutengo yepasi inogonekwa nevagari vasina mari yakawanda. Pari zvino motokari dzinotakura varwere dzekanzuru yeHarare dzinobhadharisa makumi maviri emadhora ekuAmerica kana kuti US$20.00, vagari vachitenderwa kubhadhara nemari yemunyika. Ukuwo, makambani akazvimiririra achibhadarisa varwere mari inogona kusvika kuzana remadhora kana kuti US$100.00, kutakura murwere panguva yega yega. No media source currently available

headline: Kushandiswa kweMari yeChina neIMF Koshandura Zvinhu Pasi Rose?
text: Kutambirwa kwemari yekuChina semari inogona kushandiswa nesangano rinokweretesa mari pasi rose, reInternational Monetary Fund, kana kuti IMF, kunonzi mucherechedzo mukuru wekuti dhora rekuAmerica rava kukwikwidzwa zvine mutsindo pasi rose. Nyanzvi munyaya dzemari pasi rose dzinoti IMF yakatora danho iri mushure mekuona kuti China iri kufambira mberi zvikuru munyaya dzebudiriro, uye nyika dzakawanda dzinoshandisa zvinhu zviri kugadzirwa kuChina. Kunyange hazvo mari yekuChina, Yuan, iine huremu huri pasi pedhora rekuAmerica, nyanzvi munyaya dzemari dzinoti kusimukira kuri kuita hupfumi hweChina kuchaita kuti mari yayo ive nesimba mumakore mashoma anotevera. Dzimwe nyanzvi dziri kuyambira kuti mune remangwana vane mari dzavo vachaonekwa vachidyara mari dzavo mumakambani ekuChina, sezvo nyika iyi iri kuratidza kusimukira kune mutsindo. IMF isangano rinoziva zvinoitika muna zana nemakumi masere neshanu, uye ndiro sangano rinobatsira nyika dzinenge dzichida mari yerubatsiro. Vanoziva zviri kuitika muIMF vanoti kupinda kweChina mudura remari dzinoshandiswa nesangano iri, zvava kureva kuti maitiro esangano iri ava kuchinja, kuburikidza nekupihwa nzeve kunenge kwava kuitwa China. Kutengeserana kweChina nenyika dzemuAfrica kuri kuramba kuchikwira. Mugore ra2009, China yakapfuura America mukutengeserana nenyika dzemuAfrica uye muna Ndira gore rino, China inoti kutenga nekutengeserana pakati penyika iyi nenyika dzemuAfrica kwakapfuura mabhirioni gumi nemanomwe emadhora. Kutengeserana pakati peChina nenyika zhinji kuri kuramba kuchikwirira izvo zvave kukonzera kuti vanhu kana makambani anoisa mari mune dzimwe nyika, aise mari yavo mumakambani ekuChina. Zvichitevera kupinda kwe Yuan mudura reIMF, nyika dzinoita gumi nenomwe dzemuAfrica dziri kuzeya kushandiswa kwe Yuan mukutengeserana pakati padzo. Asi nyanzvi munezvemari nehupfumi uye vachidzidzisa zvemabhizimisi paDevry University kuOhio, Professor Elliot Masocha, vanoti havavimbi nemaitiro eChina. Asi imwezve nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi uye vachishanda neLabour, Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti China iri kubata nyika dzepasi rose nekuti hupfumi hwenyika iyi huri kukwirira zvekuti vemabhizimisi vemunyika dzakaita seAmerica vave kuda kuisa mari mumakambani ekuChina. VaChitambara vanobvumirana naVaMasocha kuti Zimbabwe ngaigadzirise hupfumi hwayo. Vanotiwo Zimbabwe inofanira kurega kutengesa zvinhu kana zvicherwa zvinozonogadzirwa kunze kwenyika sezviri kuitika kufodya nemangoda. VaChitambara vanoti hapana zvekuchadzvenga China nekuti masimba ezvehupfumi ari kuchinja asi Zimbabwe inofanira kushanda nesimba kuti isasaririra. Zvamira zvakadai, VaChitambara vanoti America inofanirwa kusunga dzisimbe kuitira kuti isapinzwe parumananzombe neChina. Nyanzvi dzinoti China iri kushandisa hunyanzvi hwavo mukutenga zvicherwa semubhadharo wainopihwa nenyika, zvikuru dzemu Africa dzinenge dzatenga zvinhu zvayo, kanawo nyika dzinenge dzapihwa mari yekusimudzira nyika idzi. Izvi zvinoita kuti China ive nehupfumi hwakasimba, kuburikidza nezvicherwa zvainenge yaunganidza, kana kuti sound money. Dzimwe nyika dzakabudirira dzine hupfumi hwe fiat currency, uhwo hunovapo kuburikidza nekuvimbika kwehurumende uko kunopa veruzhinji kuti varemekedze mari inodhinda nedzihurumende dzakadai. No media source currently available

headline: NDINI CHIBABA: KAMAMBO
text: MUTuNGAMIRIRI wesangano rinoona nezvenhabvu reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) — Felton Kamambo — anoti ndiye “Chibaba” chenhabvu yemuno uye Philip Chiyangwa anotonga kuCosafa kwake uko anotungamirawo.   Achitaura svondo radarika muHarare apo Zifa yaizivisa nyika kuti chizvarwa chekuCroatia, Zdravko Logarusic, ndiye ave murairidzi mutsva wemaWarriors, Kamambo anoti bhodhi rake ndiro rinotonga zvenhabvu yemuno.   “Tisu tiri panyanga, tisu zvibaba zvenhabvu zvemuno uye Philip Chiyangwa ndiye chibaba chekuCosafa, ipapo panzwisisei. Saka muno zvese zvine chekuita nenhabvu zvinotodarika nepatiri isu uye tisu tinopasisa kuti zviite,” anodaro Kamambo.   Kubva Kamambo akapinda panyanga mugore ra2018 apo akunda Chiyangwa pasarudzo dzemutungamiri weZifa, pagara pachingotenderera mashoko ekuti vaviri ava vakarimirana muganhu. Vamwewo ndivo vaiti Chiyangwa aikonzera nyonga-nyonga yaiitika mubhodhi raKamambo nguva yadarika izvo zvakazoona Zifa ichimutemera zvirango pamwechete naOmega Sibanda uyo aive mutevedzeri wake kuti vasava nechekuita nezvenhabvu yemuno.   Zifa yakasvika padanho rekutombonyorera kuCosafa kuti Chiyangwa abviswe pachigaro chekutungamirira sangano iri.   Kamambo anoti bhodhi rake harichadi kupedza nguva richinetsana nevanhu pamusoro penyaya dzekutungana kwembudzi.   Anoti iye zvino yasvika nguva yekubatanidza vanhu vese kuburikidza nenhabvu nekudaro Zifa yakabviswa zvirango zvavainge vatemera Chiyangwa naSibanda.   “Takagara pasi sebhodhi uye takazviona zvakakodzera kuti tiregerere Chiyangwa naSibanda.   “Tabvisa zvirango zvese zvatainge takavatemera, saka tichienda mberi chikuru kuti nhabvu yedu ibudirire pane kuswera tichinetsana zvisina                            basa.   “Toda kuti bhora redu rinakidze ndizvo chete zvatinoda kwete zvimwe zvese,” anodaro Kamambo.   Zvakadaro, Logarusic — uyo akamborairidza Sudan — akapihwa basa guru rekutungamira maWarriors mumitambo inosanganisira Africa Cup of Nations 2021 ne2022 World Cup.

headline: Nyanzvi Dzokurudzira Vanhu Kuti Vagare Mudzimba Asi Vakawanda Vachiti Havana Chekudya
text: Apo vanhu vari kukurudzirwa kuti vatange kugara mumba kutanga mangwana senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dziri kuyambira kuti vangwarire kutapurirwa chirwere sezvo parizvino vanhu vari kuvhenekwa vachiri vashoma. Mumiriri wesangano reWorld Health Organization muZimbabwe Dr Alex Gasasira vati vatambira kurudziro yekuti vanhu vambogara mumba nekuti zvinopa kuti vannhu vasatapurirane chirwere. Munyori mukuru wesangano ravanachiremba reSenior Hospital Doctors Association, Doctor Aaron Musara vati huwandu hwevanhu varikubatwa nechirwere ichi hunoratidza pachena kuti zvinhu hazvisisina kumira zvakanaka. VaMusara vakurudzira veruzhinji kuti vatevedzere kurudziro dzavanachiremba kuti chirwere ichi chisapararire. Vanhu vanhu vasaende pane magungano, vapfeke mamask zvakanaka vakavhara mhuno nemuromo uyewo kugeza maoko nguva dzose. Sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano, Dr Ruth Labode, vatiwo danho rakatorwa nehurumende reLockdown rakakosha zvikuru vachiti kusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi munyika kunopa kuti ruzhinji rufambe zvakanyanya izvo zvinowedzera kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Amai Labode vati kunyangwe hazvo Lockdown ichikanganisa mararamiro evanhu, kudzivirira kurambopararira kwechirwere kwakakosha vachitiwo kuvhurwa kwemuganhu pakati peSouth Africa neZimbabwe kunogona kuriko kwakonzera kukwira kwehuwandu hwevari kubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano, Doctor Henry Madzorera, vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti zviri pachena kuti hurumende yamomoterwa. VaMadzorera vati hurumende haina mari yekuongorora zvakanyanya vakati chakakosha panguva ino kuti munhu wega wega azvigarire kumba kuchengetedza hutano. Asi Muzvare Joylene Nyachuru mumwe mugari weku Glenview vati kuisa nyika mulockdown vanhu vasina chouviri hakuna zvakunobatsira. VaChristopher Gohori mumwezve mugari wemuHarare vatiwo pasina kugadzirisa dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemvura muHarare, vanhu kunyanya kumisha inogara vazhinji vacharamba vachiungana pazvibhorani sezvo vasingakwanisi kugara vasina mvura. Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa kuti nekuda kwekukwira kuri kuita chirwere cheCovid-19 No media source currently available , vanhu vanenge vokurudzirwa kugara mumba kana kuti Lockdown kutanga mangwana. Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisawo kuti kubva neChipiri, mamwe makambani anenge asingachashandi uyewo rakatorambidza magungano kusara kwevanenge vachienda kurufu asi vasingadarike makumi matatu. Vanhu vanenge vasisabvumidzwe kuenda kune mamwe maguta.

headline: Gweta reMDC-T yaVaChamisa Rinoti MDC-T Chaiyo Iri Pasi paVaChamisa
text: Gweta rinomirira MDC-T inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaThabani Mpofu, vanoti zviri pachena kuti bato raVaChamisa ndiro bato reMDC-T chairo. VaMpofu vanoti nyaya yezita pakati pavo neMDC-T inotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe haina kubviswa kumatare asi zuva rekuti inzwikwe richaziviswa mazuva anotevera. VaMpofu vanotiwo mari inobva kuhurumende ichipihwa mapato ezvematongerwo enyika iyo yakapiwa bato raVaChamisa, yakaendeswa kubato iri zviri pamutemo nekuti hurumende inoendesa cheki kukero yebato iri mumagwaro ehurumende. Mashoko aVa Mpofu anotevera mashoko emutevedzeri waMuzvare Khupe, VaObert Gutu, muhurukuro yavakaita neStudio7 neMuvhuro. Panguva iyi Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata gweta raVaChamisa. “Nyaya iyi yemari inosetsa zvisingaiti. Mari iyi yakabva kuhurumende ichienda kubato reMDC. Vanhu vese muZimbabwe vanoziva kuti MDC inotungamirwa naVaChamisa; MDC ine mahofisi kuHarvest House; ekuBulawayo chaiwo, ari pasi paVaChamisa. Zvese zve MDC zviri pasi paVaChamisa,” VaMpofu vakaudza Studio7. VaMpofu vatiwo mutauriri weNational Assembly, VaJacob Mudenda, vakadzinga Muzvare Khupe muparamende mushure mekuudzwa kuita izvi neMDC-T yaVaChamisa. Vati danho rakatorwa iri rakacherechedza hutungamiri hwaVaChamisa. No media source currently available

headline: Vanotengesa Mumigwagwa Vochema Zvichitevera Kuputsirwa paVanotengesera
text: Sangano rinomirira vanotengesera mumigwagwa reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation, (VISET) rinoti riri kushoropodza zvikuru danho rekanzuru yeguta reHarare rekuparadza kwayakaita misika yevanhu pamwe nekuparadza zvinhu zvavo panzvimbo yemabhizimusi yeBudiriro 5 svondo rino. Mugwaro raraburitsa, sangano iri rinoti rakawana humbowo hwekuti kuparadzwa kwenzvimbo dzekutengesera uku kwakapiwa mvumo nekanzuru pamwe neboka reEnvironmental Management Agency, EMA, uye VISET inotiwo ine humbowo hwekuti zvakaitwa izvi zviri kunze kwemutemo. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reEMA panyaya iyi. Izvi zvinoitika mushure mekunge kanzuru yatora danho rimwechetero svondo rapera payakaputsa zvivakwa zvevanhu vaitengesera paKamunhu Business Centre kuTafara/Mabvuku, uye kuedzawo kuputsa nzvimbo inoitirwa mitambo yeMoto Republik iri mukati meHarare. Asi mutauriri wekanzuru VaMichael Chideme vanoramba mashoko ekuti kanzuru yavo iri kuputsa zvinhu zvavanhu, vachiti chiri kuitwa nekanzuru yavo kuchenesa guta. VaChideme vanotiwo kanzuru yavo ine hurongwa hwekusangana nevaridzi veMoto Republik kuti vaone kuti vangaenda mberi sei. Izvi zvinotevera kupera kwemazuva manomwe akanga apiwa nekanzuru ekuti varidzi veMoto Republik vaparadze voga zvivakwa zvavo. VaChideme vanoti kambani iyi yakanga yaisa zvivakwa zvayo zvema container izvo zvisingabvumidzwi nemutemo wekanzuru yavo. No media source currently available

headline: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe Chiri muAmerica, VaNdenda, Vobata Pamwe neMasangano Akawanda muKusimudzira Vechidiki neNharaunda kuZimbabwe
text: Muchirongwa chedu chatinotarisa zviri kuitwa nevana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika, svondo rino tine hurukuro naVaInnocent Ndenda vari mudunhu reTexas muAmerica asi vachibva kuHwedza mudunhu reMashonaland East. VaNdenda, avo vakaenda kuAmerica muna 2016, vanoti kunyange hazvo vachishanda samaneja pane imwe kambani kwakare kuTexas, vakaramba vachienderera mberi nemabasa avo avaiita vachiri kumusha, ekubatsira vanoshaya pamwe nekusimudzira nharaunda yavanobva. Pari zvino vanoti vari kushanda nemasangano matatu anoti reMubatirapamwe Trust, iro rinobatsira vanenge vachishandisa zvinodhaka, reMakoni North District Association, rakanangana nenyaya dzebudiriro, pamwe nereGlobal Exchange Program, iro rinobatanidza vanhu vanobva kunyika dzakasiyanasiyana. VaNdenda vanoti shuviro yavo ndeyekuona vana veZimbabwe vachiisa misoro pamwe vosiyana nehumbimbindoga, vachiti chose chinezwi rekuti kubatana chinobudirira. Vanoti ivowo vane shuviro yekuti vange vachizorangarirwawo mune remangwana semunhu akabatsira mukushanda nevamwe kubatanidza vanhu kuti vavandudze magariro avo. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vari Kunze Vokurudzira Kubata Kugadzirisa Zviri Kunetsa Munyika
text: Zvime zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zviri kukurudzira hurumende kuti igadzirise nekukasika matambudziko akatarisana nenyika mune zveupfumi, zvichiti matambudziko aya ave kuzviita kuti zviwedzere kuremerwa nemutoro wekuchengeta hama neshamwari kumusha. Mumwe wevana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika vari kuti kusagadzikana kwezvinyu kumusha kwave kuvaomera, ndaAmai Chenaimwoyo Mutambasere, avo vari kuBritain. Amai Mutambasere vanoti chave kuremedza vakawanda vari kunze inyaya yekuti havachatarisirwa kungobatsira hama neshamwari dzavo chete, asiwo kubatsira veruzhinji kuburikidza nekubatsira mukutsvagwa kwezvinhu zvakawanda zvinosanganisira mishonga yekushandisa muzvipatara zvinorapa veruzhinji. Vanotiwo vana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika vagara vaine bandiko guru kwazvo mune zveupfumi hwenyika kuburikidza nemari dzavanotumira. Matambudziko ari kutarisana nenyika pari zvino anosanganisira kukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu, kushaikwa kwemafuta edzimotokari, pamwe nekushaikwa kwemari yekunze. Amai Mutambasere vanoti chave kudiwa munyika iye zvino kuvandudzwa kwenyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika kuitira kuti vari kunze vave nechivimbo chekudyara mari dzavo munyika. Vanoti chikuru chave kudiwa ndechekuti vana veZimbabwe vese vabatane vatsvage nzira dzekugadzirisa nadzo matambudziko aya kuitira kuti nyika ifambire mberi. No media source currently available

headline: Amai Prisca Mupfumi neVamwe Voita Misangano muLondon
text: Gurukota rezvekushanyirwa kwenyika, Amai Prisca Mupfumira, nevamwe vakuru muhurumende, vari muLondon kuBritain kwavapinda musangano wezuva rimwechete we Investment Forum waitrirwa pa London Hilton Canary Wharf iri muCentral London. Musangano uyu wakarongwa neZimbabwe Investment and Development Agency iyo yakaburitsa gwaro neChitatu ichiti chinangwa chemusangano uyu change chiri chekushambadza Zimbabwe nemikana iri munyika munyaya dzezvemabhizinesi nekushanyirwa kwenyika. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi vashoropodza danho rehurumende rikuita rwendo rwune vanhu vakawanda vanobva kuZimbabwe vachienda kuLondon kunokwezva vekunze vachiti misnagano yakadai inogona kurongwa nemuzinda weZimbabwe muBritain. Vanhu ava vanoti Zimbabwe iri parumananzomba sezvo zvisina zvisina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzemari. Hatina kukwanisa kubata Amai Mupfumira kuti tinzwe tivi ravo. Sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekushanyirwa kwenyika, Amai Concilia Chinanzvavana vanoti basa ravo sekomiti nderekuona kuti zvirongwa zvebazi rekushanya kwevanhu munyika zvaitwa negwara rakanaka here. No media source currently available

headline: Bato reSACP rekuSouth Africa Rinoti muZimbabwe Mune Dambudziko, Kunyange Hazvo Zanu PF iri Kuramba
text: Bato reSouth African Communist Party, SACP, rekuSouth Africa mukupera kwesvondo rakazivisa kuti muZimbabwe mune matambudziko anoda kutariswa nekukasika, ayo rinoti ari kubatawo South Africa. Vachitaura mushure memusangano weCentral Committee yebato ravo muJohannesburg, munyori mukuru webato iri, VaBlade Nsimande, vanove zvakare gurukota rezvedzidzo, vakati kuramba kuti muZimbabwe hamuna matambudziko kuzvinyepera pachitariswa huwandu hwevana veZimbabwe vari kuvaka misasa munyika iyi. Asi vakati vana veZimbabwe ndivo chete vanofanirwa kugadzirisa matambudziko ari munyika yavo. Mashoko ebato reSACP aya anouya panguva iyo bato reAfrican National Congress, ANC, rakabva kutumira chikwata kuZimbabwe chaitungamirwa nemunyori mukuru webato iri VaAce Magashule kuti chinonzwisisa nezvematambudziko anonzi akatarisa nezimbabwe. Hurumende pamwe nebato reZanu PF vagara vari kuramba kuti munyika hamuna matambudziko, kunyange hazvo vanopikisa pamwe nemamwe masangano akazvimirira vari kuti munyika mune matambudziko. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri weZanu PF, VaPatrick Chinamasa vakaudza vatori venhau kuti Zimbabwe harisi dunhu reSouth Africa, nekudaro nyika iyi inofanirwa kusiyana netsika yekuisa mhino dzayo munyaya dzeZimbabwe. VaChinamasa vakapomerawo hurumende yeSouth Africa kuve pasi pevachena. Studio 7 yaedza kunzwa divi reZanu PF pamusoro pemashoko ebato reSouth African Communist party aya, asi sachigaro veZanu PF mudunhu reSouth Africa, VaKenneth Mandaza vavimbisa kuzopindura mibvunzo yedu nemusi weMuvhuro. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vachitungamira sangano reFastforward Community Development Centre, VaAkson Potera vanoti hazvishamise kuti munyori mukuru weSACP, VaBlade Nsimande vakataura kuti muZimbabwe mune dambudziko nekuti vakaona kuti mune dambudziko. Vanoti VaNsimande munhu akanzvera mabhuku zvakanyanya zvekuti vanogona kuve nemaonero akasiyana kubva kune vamwe. No media source currently available

headline: Mapato Ari Kupinda Musarudzo dzeBy-Election Oita Gadziriro Dzekupedzisira Mamwe Achinyunyuta neKushungurudzwa kweNhengo Dzawo
text: Panguva iyo vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika nemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu vari kunyunyuta kuti mhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika iri kuramba ichikwira munyika, mapato ari kukwikwidza musarudzo dzema by-election dziri kuitwa musi wa 26 mwedzi uno ave mushishi kumhanya nendima yekutsvaga rutsigiro kekupedzisira. Mapato akawanda akaronga misangano kubva neChishanu, mimwe misangano neMugovera, vamwe vachiita misangano yavo neneSvondo, vamwe neMuvhuro unouya kana neChipiri vachiedza kubata vanovhota nguva yekuvharwa kwekutsvagwa kwerutsigiro isati yasvika. Zvinonzi pamutemo mapato anobvumidzwa kutsvaga rutsigiro kusvika pamazuva mana sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. Mamwe mapato ari kunyunyuta kuti ari kunyimwa mvumo nemapurisa yekuita misangano yawo mune mamwe matunhu achiudzwa kuti kunenge kuine mutungamiri weZanu PF uye vari mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vachiitawo misangano nenhengo dzebato ravo ikoko. Mutauriri weMDC-T inotungamirirwa naVaDouglas Mwonzora, iyo iri kupinda musarudzo idzi seMDC Alliace, VaWitness Dube, vanoti vakarambidzwa kuita musangano wavo kuBinga musi wa 21 unove Muvhuro unouya vachinzi nekuti kunenge kuina VaMnangagwa, mapurisa achiti haazokwanisi kutarisa misangano miviri iyi. Asi VaDube vanoti vakatoshamiswa nazvo sezvo vakanga vari ivo vakanga vatanga kuzivisa mapurisa kuti vari kuda kuita musangano wavo ikoko ye vakanga vatombopiwa mvumo yekuita musangano uyu. Munyori anoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika mubato idzva rePatriotic Zimbabweans, VaPishai Muchauraya, vanotiwo bato ravo harisi kusangana nematambudziko ekurambidzwa kuita misangano yavo sezvo vasingatsvage mvumo kubva kumapurisa kana kuazivisa kuti vari kuita misangano yavo. Ukuwo, Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, kana kuti ZEC, yakatozivisawo kuti yakatodhinda kare mapepa ekuvhotesa, uye vose vari kukwikwidza musarudzo idzi vave kukwanisa kuwana gwaro revavhoti, kana kuti voters’ roll. ZEC yakazivisa kuti vanhu vanosvika zviuru mazana masere negumi nezvitatu nemazana matanhatu ane makumi mashanu nevapfumbamwe, kana kuti 813 659 vakanyoresa kuvhota musarudzo yevamiriri vedare reparamende. Vamwe zviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe nezvisere zvine mazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu, kana kuti 678 260 vanonziwo vakanyoresawo kuvhota musarudzo yemakanzuru. Asi VaDube vanoti bato ravo harisi kugutsikana negadziriro iri kuitwa neZEC pasarudzo idzi, vachipa muenzaniso wekudhindwa kwakaitwa mapepa ekuvhotesa mapato ezvematongerwo enyika asingazive. VaMuchauraya vanoti sebato idzva, havakwanise kunyanya kutaura pamusoro pezviri kuitwa neZEC kunze kwekungoti chete vari kuona sekunge ZEC iri kunyanya kuwanza misangano nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika ari kupinda musarudzo, zvavanoti zvakanangana nekuda kukanganisa mutsvaga rutsigirio. Mapato gumi nematanhatu kana kuti 16 akanyoresa kuti achakwikwidza musarudzo idzi. Mapato aya anoti reCitizen Coalition for Change, Zanu PF, All People's Party, Democratic Opposition Party, Federation of African State, Free Zimbabwe Congress, Labour, Economists and African Democrats, MA'AT Zimbabwe, Movement for Democratic Change Alliance. Mamwe ari kukwikwidza anoti New Patriotic Front, Patriotic Zimbabweans, Republican Party of Zimbabwe, United Democratic Alliance, United Zimbabwe Alliance, Zimbabwe African People's Union neZimbabwe Labour Party. Kune zvigaro makumi maviri vezvisere zvedare reparamende pamwe nezvigaro zana nezvishanu zvemakanzuru zvichakwikwidzwa musarudzo idzi. No media source currently available

headline: Chisora orovana naTakam
text: (34) acharwa naCarlos Takam (37) apo vanenge vachitsigira mutambo waDillian Whyte naJoseph Parker.   Chisora (ari pamufananidzo kurudyi) – uyo anokwikwidza muboka reheavyweight – ari kumhanyidzana nenguva kuti azvirakidze kuti anogona kurwira mabhande makuru zvichitevera kukundwa kwaakaitwa katatu mumitambo yake mitanhatu yadarika.   Takam, anove wekuFrance asi ari chizvarwa chekuCameroon, akarakidza kuti anogona kuzvimirira apo akamisidzana naAnthony Joshua kusvika muround rechi10 muna Gumiguru gore radarika, asi kubva ipapo haana kuzombokwikwidza zvakare.   Akazopinzwa kuti akwikwidze mumutambo uyu pakupedzisira asi akarwa semvumba zvakashamisa vazhinji zvisinei kuti akazorikitwa hake naAJ muround rechi10.   “Kudivi raDel Boy uyu mukana wake wekupedzisira kuti arwe aende pamusoro pevamwe vatambi vetsiva uye kunaTakam mumwe mukana wake wekurwira kuti azorwire mamwe mabhande makuru etsiva zvichitevera kurwa kwaakaita naAJ zvinonwisa mvura,” anodaro puromota wetsiva, Eddie Hearn.   “Ndinonzwa manyukunyuku kuti tave kuronga mutambo uyu weheavyweight uyo ndinoona uchinakidza zvikuru kukunda ngoma kurira mwedzi unotevera, mutambo mukuru uyu.” – SportsMail boxing

headline: Vakawanda Vofarira Kudzikiswa Kwaitwa Mitengo yeDhata
text: Kukwidzwa kwemitengo uku kwaive kwaitika mushure medanho rakatorwa neboka rePost and Telecommunications Regulatory Authority, kana kuti POTRAZ rekutambira chikumbiro chemakambani enharembozha chekuti mitengo iyi ikwidzwe. Vanhu vakawanda vari kutambira nemufaro danho rakatorwa negurukota rehumhizha hwekufambiswa kwamashoko, VaSupa Mandiwanzira, rekumisa kukwidzwa kwemitengo wekushandisa internet panharembozha kwaive kwaitwa namakambni enharembozha. Kukwidzwa kwemitengo uku kwaive kwaitika mushure medanho rakatorwa neboka rePost and Telecommunications Regulatory Authority, kana kuti POTRAZ rekutambira chikumbiro chemakambani enharembozha chekuti mitengo iyi ikwidzwe. Vanhu vakawanda avo vaive varatidza kusafara kwavo vachishandisa Facebook, Twitter neWhatsapp, vadzokera zvakare painternet vachiratidza kufara kwavo nedanho ratorwa naVaMandiwanzira iri. Vamwe vataura neStudio 7 vatiwo vari kufara vachiti izvi zvinoratidza kuti vanhu vakataura nezwi rimwe chete pane zvinhu zvinenge zvichivanetsa, hurumende inogona kuvateerera. Mumwe mugari wemuBulawayo, Muzvare Nozipho Moyo, vanoti vari kufara nedanho rekumisa kukwidzwa kwemitengo yedhata. Asi Muzvare Moyo vanoti mitengo iyi yange isingafanirwe kuve yakakwidzwa kubvira pekutanga kuchitariswa kuti mitengo yeinternet muZimbabwe yagara iri pamusoro. VaMandiwanzira vakazivisa nezvekumisa kukwidza kwemitengo yedhata uku nemusi weChina mushure mekunge veruzhinji varatidza kusafara kwavo. Mumashoko avo, VaMandiwanzira, avo vaive vamboti havaikwanisa kupindira munyaya iyi sezvo vari pazororo, vakazivisa kuti mushure mekutaura nevakafanobata chigaro chegurukota rezvehumhizha hwekufambiswa kwemashoko, Amai Prisca Mupfumira, pamwe nePotraz, vakaona zvakakodzera kuti kukwidzwa kwemitengo iyi kumbomiswa. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuna Amai Mupfumira kana kubva kuPotraz. Asi Potraz yaburitsawo mashoko ekuti yamisa danho rekukwidza mitengo yeinternet. Vamwe vanhuwo vakawanda vange vachishora kambani yeEconet iyo inonzi ndiyo yaive yauya nezano rekukwidzwa kwemitengo uku uye inova iyo yaive yakwidza mitengo iyi zvakanyanyisa uye nechimbi-chimbi. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuEconet panyaya iyi asi kambani iyi yazivisawo kuti yave kudzokera kumitemgo yakare. Mumwe anotengesa airtime uyo angoda kuzvidoma nezita rekuti Moyo ati kukwidzwa kwemitengo kwaive kwaitwa uku kwange kwave kukanganisa basa rake nevamwewo vanotengesa airtime saiye. Mutungamiri wekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reAbammeli Human Rights Lawyers Network, VaTineyi Mukwewa, vati danho ratorwa nehurumende rinoratidza masimba evanhu kana vakataura nenzwi rimwe chete. VaNigel Gambanga avo vanoshanda nebepanhau repainternet rinonyora pamusoro pezvehumhizha hwekufambiswa kwemashoko, vanoti ichokwadi kuti makambni enharembozha ari kudurirwa nekuwanisa vanhu internet vachitiwo vanowona mitengo ichizokwidzwa zvekare asi zvisina kunyanya sezvange zvaitwa pari zvino. Gore rakapera Potraz yakakonzerazve mutauro apo yakatora danho rekuti makambani enharembozha asaite zvirongwa zvakasiyana-siyana zvekuderedza mitengo

headline: Zimbabwe Yokurudzirwa Kushanda neIMF Apo Makambani Otadza Kubhadara Mitero kuZIMRA
text: Nyaya yekugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika inenge yoramba ichinetsa zvichitevera mashoko eZimbabwe Revenue Authority, ZIMRA, ekuti iri kutadza kuunganidza mari yemitero yavange vachitarisira kubva kuvanhu nemakambani.
