Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, uye vari muridzi wekambani yeManagement Solutions, VaLuxon Zembe, avo vaimbova mutungamiri weZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, vanoti vanhu vose vanofanira kutsigira zviri kuitwa negurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, zvekuyedza kugadzirisa hupfumi vachishanda neIMF. Zimbabwe pari zvino haisi kupihwa zvikwereti nenyika uye mabhanga ekunze nepamusana pekutadza kubhadhara mitero. Mamwe makurukota ehurumende kusanganisira rezvekuendeswa kwehupfumi kuvatema, VaPatrick Zhuwawo, pamwe rezvevakarwa hondo, VaChris Mutsvangwa, vange vachishora VaChinamasa zvikuru vachiti vari kurasika nekuda kuumba hukama neIMF neWorld Bank. Mari dzemitero inobatwa nehurumende dzinoshandiswa kubhadhara vashandi vehurumende, kugadzira migwagwa, zvikoro, magwenya emagetsi, madhamu nezvimwe zvivakwa. Mukati memwedzi mitanhatu yekutanga kwegore rino, ZIMRA yakawana mari inosvika US$1,66 billion asi iyo yaitarisira mari inosvika US$1,76 billion. Sachigaro webhodhi reZIMRA, Amai Willia Bonyongwe, mumashoko avo mugwaro rezvemamiriro emari yemitero, vanobvuma kuti kusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi kwapa kuti makambani akawanda atadze kubhadhara mitero. Vanotiwo vakayedza kupa makambani nguva yakareba yekubhadhara zvikwereti vachiyambira kuomesera vari kuramba kubhadhara mari dzemitero vachiviga mari kuti ZIMRA isaone zviri kuitika, asi zvakakona n’anga murapwa achida . Makambani ane zvikwereti kuZIMRA zvemari inosvika bhiriyoni imwe chete yemadhora. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mukuru weZIMRA, VaGershom Pasi, sezvo nhare yavo yange isiri kudairwa. No media source currently available

headline: Hurukuro dzeRunyararo Pakati peRussia neUkraine Dzotarisirwa Kutangazve muTurkey
text: Nhaurirano dzeRusssia neUkraine dziri kutarisirwa kutanga svondo rino muTurkey apo hondo pakati penyika mbiri idzi yapinda musvondo rechishanu. Mutungamiri wenyika yeUkraine VaVolodomyr Zelenskyy vanoti rusungunuko rwenyika yavo yose rwakakosha munhaurirano idzi vachiramba zviri kutaurwa neRussia kuti itore mamwe matunhu enyika yavo. Mutungamiri wenyika yeTurkey VaRecep Tayyip Erdogan vakatotaura parunhare memutungamiri weRussia VaVladimir Putin vachikurudzira kuti vambokanda zvombo pasi. United Nations inoti vanhu mamiriyoni gumi vamanikidzwa kuenda muhupoterei muUkraine nekuda kwehondo iyi. Gurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muAmerica VaAntony Blinken vakadzokorora zvakare kuti nyika yavo haisikuda kupidigura hurumende yeRussia mushre mekunge mutungamiti wenyika VaJoe Biden vati VaPutin havafanire kuramba vari pachigaro zvichitevera kurwisa kwavari kuita Ukraine. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Muzvinafundo Mashocha vari muAmerica vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanoona Russia ichibvuma kuita nhaurirano dzekupedza hondo sezvo zvirango zvakaomarara zvayakatemerwa zvichigona kukanganisa hupfumi hwavo zvakanyanya. No media source currently available

headline: Kuvhurwa kweZvikoro Kuchanetsa Rwendo Rwuno
text: Kuvhurwa kwezvikoro kunogona kusafamba sezviri kutarisirwa mushure mekunge masangano akawanda anomirira varairidzi azivisa kuti nhengo dzawo dzakawanda dzichatadza kudzokera kumabasa nekuda kwekushaiwa mari dzekufambisa. Varairidzi vari kuda kuti hurumende idzosere mihoro yavo pamari dzavaitambira muna 2018, uye kuti nyaya dzehutano hwavo dzigadziriswe maringe nekudzivirirwa kubva kuCovid-19. Varairidzi vanodzidzisa zvidzidzo zveGrdae 7, Form 4 neForm 6 vanofanirwa kunge vadzokera kumabasa avo nhasi vachigadzirira kuvhurwa kwezvikoro muchikamu chekutanga nemusi weMuvhuro svondo rinouya. Studio 7 yakundikana kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Asi mukupera kwesvondo hurumende yakazivisa kuti varairidzi vose vanoda kubaiwa nhomba vachabaiwa kana zvikoro zvavhurwa. Mutungamiri wesangano reProgressive Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, VaTakavafira Zhou, vanoti hapana chikoro chingavhurika kana zvichemo zvevashandi zvisati zvagadziriswa. No media source currently available Asi vakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri wesangano reZimbabwe Teachers Association, ZIMTA, VaGoodwill Taderera, vanotiwo sesangano, vanotarisira kuti hutano hwevarairidzi huiswe pamberi kunyanya, uye vari kugumburwa nehurongwa hwekuti varairidzi vadzokere kumabasa vasina mari. VaTaderera vanoti sesangano vari kuda kuti musi wa 15 Kurume uchavhurwa zvikoro, usati wasvika, hurumende inofanirwa kutanga yavapa mari dzichaita kuti varairidzi vakwanise kudzokera kumabasa. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, mubatanidzwa wemamwe masangano anomirira vashandi vehurumende, weZimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Trade Unions, uyo waimbozivikana seApex Council, nezuro wakanyorerawo gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi vehurumende tsamba richipa hurumende mazuva manomwe kubva nezuro ekuti inge yagadzirisa zvichemo zvevashandi zvemihoro yavo, kukundikana kwayo vashandi vanozozivisa nezvehurongwa hwekuramwa mabasa. Gwaro rinoti hurumende iri kukundikana kushevedzera musangano weNational Joint Negotiating Council, uyo waifanirwa kunge wakaitwa muna Ndira wegore rino sezvakanga zvabvumirwa pamusangano wakapedzisira kuitwa muna Zvita, wekuti hurumende idzosere mihoro yevashandioo pamari dzavaitambira muna Gumiguru 2018.

headline: Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, Voronga Kushanyira Muganhu weNyika Yavo neMexico
text: Mutungamiri we nyika yeamerica, Va Donald Trump, vari kutarisirwa kushanyira muganhu we America neMexico svondo rino panguva iyo pasati pave nechiyedza chekuti bato rinopikisa reDemocratic Party richawirirana here nebato ravo reRepublican Party kuti vavhure mamwe mapazi ehurumende, ayo asvika muzuva rechi gumi nesere akavharwa. Va Trump vaudza vatori venhau kuti vanogona kushandisa masimba avo ekuisa ekumbosendeka bumbiro remitemo parutivi – kana kuti national Emergency nekuda kwekusawirirana kwavepo nenyaya yemari yekuvaka mudhuri kumuganhu wenyika mbiri idzi yavari kuda. Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinoshanda nemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu nezvematongerweo enyika, VaCharles Mutama, avo vanogara mu Maryland, vanoti mashandiro ehurumende yekuAmerica haangashandi kuZimbabwe kana pasati paitwa shanduko mumatongerwo enyika muZimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Vaive Mukuru weBulawayo Polytechnic Engineer Mabasa Vakashaya neCovid-19 Voradzikwa
text: Mukuru wechikoro cheBulawayo Polytechnic Engineer Gilbert Mzenzi Mabasa avo vakashaya nemusi weChishanu nechirwere cheCovid-19 kuArundel Hospital chiri pe kuUnited Bulawayo Hospital’s vakaradzikwa nemusi weSvondo kuBulawayo kumarinda eAthlone. Vachitaura nebepanhau reSunday News, gurukota rezvedzidzo yepamusoro Muzvinafundo Amon Murwira vati VaMabasa munhu ainge ari mbariro munyaya dzedzidzo sezvo ainge akazvipira kuvandudza dzidzo munyika uye nyika yarasikirwa zvikuru. Engineer Mabasa vaizivikanwa zvikuru nerekuti “The Teacher” semunhu aida kudzidzisa vanhu zveshoko raMwari nehupenyu. Vange vave nemakore makumi matanhatu nemashanu ekuberekwa. Vakazivisa musi wa 6 Nyamavhuvhu kuti vainge vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. VaMabasa vasiya mudzimai nevana vatanhatu. Mumwe akashanda naEngineer Mabasa inhengo yeparamende yeMDC Alliance yaive sachigaro wedzidzo VaDaniel Molokele. Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano rinoti nemusi weMugovera vanhu gumi nevatanhatu vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvasiya vafa nacho kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru zvina nemazana matatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe kana kuti 4, 390. Vanhu zana nemakumi matatu nemumwe vakabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vabatwa nacho kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zana rezviuru nemakumi maviri nemana zvine mazana matatu nemakumi matanmhatu nemanomwe kana kuti 124, 367. Vanhu mazana maviri nemakumi maviri nevatanhatu kana kuti 226 vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi zvasiya vapora vave zana rezviuru negumi nemazana manomwe nemakumi manomwe nemashanu kana kuti 110, 775. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mashanu zvine makumi mapfumbamwe nemakumi matanhatu nemazana matatu nemakumi masere nemumwe kana kuti 1, 596 381 vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 kapiri sezvinotarisirwa. Vabayiwa nhomba kekutanga vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mashanu negumi nematanhatu zvine mazana matatu nemakumi mashanu nematatu kana kuti 2, 513, 353. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba kutin inyatsoshanda zvinotarisirwa kudzivirira kuparira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: Ndiyani Achatamba neFrance Mufainari yeWorld Cup-England Kana Croatia?
text: Chikwata cheFrance chapinda mufainari ye 2018 World Cup mushure mekurova Belgium 1-0. . Chibodzwa chakabva kuna Samuel Umtiti zvikwata zviviri izvi zvichangobva kuzororo yemaranjisi chakapinza France mufainari ye 2018 World Cup iyo iriko neSvondo. France yave kusangana nechikwata chichakunda pane imwe semi fainari iriko nhasi manheru pakati peCroatia neEngland. Muteveri weHighlanders, VaSifelani Maphosa vanoti kukunda kwakaita France mumutambo mukuru uyu kunoratidza kuti chikwata ichi chakasimba zvekukwanisa kutora mukombe mukuru uyu.  Muongorori wemutambo wenhabvu, VaFarai Kambamura, vanoti hapana aitarisira kuti France ingasvike mufainari vachiwedzera ivo kuti payave apa yave kunotora mukombe. Asi kunyange hazvo France yakakunda mumutambo uyu, ivo pachavo vanobvuma kuti izvi hazvina kuuya nyore sezvo Belgium yakarwisa semvumba. Belgium yacho ingadai yakakundawo mumutambo uyu dai yakashandisa mikana yakawandisa yayakawana asi panzvimbo yekurovera mabara mugedhe, yaida kuita bhora rekufamba naro mumambure. Aka kanga kave kechipiri munhoroondo yeBelgium kusvika muma semi fainari eWorld Cup. Asi iyi yave nhorooondo sezvo France yave kutarisira fainari uyezve nekutora World Cup yayo yechipiri mushure mekumboita izvi muna 1998. Mumutambo uriko na 8pm nhasi, weCroatia ne England, Croatia iri kutarisira kuna Luka Modric kuti ikunde England. Croatia ine vatambi vanotambira zvikwata zvine mukurumbira zvinoti Barcelona, Real Madrid, Atletico Madrid, Liverpool, Juventus, Inter Milan ne AC Milan.  Ukuwo England iri kutarisira kuna Harry Kane kuti ipinde mufainari neSvondo. No media source currently available

headline: Nadal akabuda muCincinnati Masters
text: wetenesi pasi rese, Rafael Nadal (32), akabuda mumutambo weCincinnati Masters sezvo ari kuedza kutanga gadziriro dzake dzekuchengetedza mukombe weUS Open. Nadal – uyo anove chizvarwa chekuSpain – akaumburudza Stefano Tsitsipas wekuGreece achibva ahwina mukombe wake wechi80 ndokubva atora zvakare Rodgers Cup kuToronto musi weSvondo. “Ndine hurombo kukuzivisai kuti handisi kuzotamba kuCincinnati gore rino,” Nadal akanyora padandemutande rake reTwitter musi weSvondo. “Hapana chimwe chikonzero kunze kwekuchengetedza hupenyu hwangu uye nekuedza kuramba ndiri mutano sezvandiri kunzwa iye zvino. “Ndine kutenda kukuru kune shamwari yangu Andre Silva, tournament director weCinciannati Tournament, uyo wandakataura naye panharembozha akanzwisisa zvikuru nyaya iripo yandakamutsanangurira.” Kubuda kwaNadal mumutambo uyu kwave kusiya Roger Federer, uyo aive asiko kuToronto, ariye mutambi ari kutarisirwa kuhwina makwishu aya eCincinnati. Makwikwi eUS Open achatanga musi wa27 Nyamavhuvhu, kuFlushing Meadows. — Sportsmail Tennis

headline: Vakawanda Votadza Kuona World Cup neKudzimwa kweMagetsi
text: Vanhu vakawanda muZimbabwe vari kutadza kuona makundano avanofanira efifa World Cup nenya yekudzimwa kwemagetsi neZESA Saudi Arabia nhasi yashamisa pasi rose nekurova Argentina 2-1 pamutambo weWorld Cup kuQatar muGroup C. Vakawanda vange vachitarisira kuti Argentina ichasimudza mukombe uyu. Asi muZimbabwe vamwe havana kuona mutambo uyu sezvo kwange kusina magetsi. Nzvimbo zakawanda munyika dzatarisana nedambudziko guru remagetsi ari kuenda mangwanani odzoka pakati pehusiku panguva iyo mitambo ye2022 World Cup inenge yapera. Vanoitawo zvekubheja vatarisana nedambudziko guru sezvo nzvimbo dzavanotambira dziri kuswera dzakavharwa nekushaya magetsi. Muzvinabhizimisi VaInnocent Mutenha avo vane mabhawa muWarren Park nekuKuwadzana vanoti magetsi avakanganisira basa panguva ino yeWorld Cup. Nemhaka yekushaikwa kwemagetsi uku, vakawanda nezuro vakatadza kuona mutambo weWorld Cup wavaishuwira pakati peSenegal neNetherlands uyo Senegal yakarohwa 2-0. Mutambo weSenegal unotevera uriko neChishanu apo iri kusangana neQatar.MMuongorori wemutambo wenhabvu VaTinashe Museti vanoti Qatar inofanira kukunda kana kuti huhwandu hwevanhu vemuQatar mudzinhandare kumakundano aya hunodzikira. Zvimwe zvikwata zviri mugungano rine Qatar neSenegal iEcuador pamwe neNetherlands. Brazil iyo veruzhinji varikutarisira kuti ichatora mukombe uyu iri kupinda munhandare neChina apo iri kusangana neSerbia. Vakawanda kusanganisira mukuru weZimbabwe National Soccer Supporters Association VaJoseph Mutawu vanoti mukombe uri kuenda nemaSamba Boys aya. Asi vaongorori vemutambo uyu vanoti hapana chikwata chiri pamberi vachiti chimwe cheArgentina, Belgium, France, Germany neNetherlands chinokwanisa kutorawo mukombe uyu. Munyori wezvemutambo wenhabvu anogara kuEngland Admire Muhimeke anoti Argentina kana Germany ndidzo dzinogona kutora mukombe uyu. Panyaya yemagetsi, mutauriri weZesa VaGeorge Manyaya vanoti Zesa haikwanise kubuditsa hurongwa hwenguva dzinodzimwa magetsi nekuti dzimwe nguva kudzima uku kunosangana nekufa kwezvinotakurisa moto wacho. Vanoti veruzhinji vanofanira kujairira kudzimwa kwemagetsi kwenguva refu kuri kuitika uku. Izvi zvinoreva kuti vakawanda munyika vachatadza kuona mitambo yakawanda. Makundano eWorld Cup aya ayo akatanga nezuro achapera musi wa 18 Zvita. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yocherechedza Zuva reVane Chirwere chePfungwa
text: Zimbabwe nhasi yabatana nedzimwe nyika kucherechedza zuva revane chirwere chepfungwa. Vachitaura pagungano rekucherechedza zuva iri kana kuti World Mental Health Day muHarare, mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, Doctor John Chamunorwa Mangwiro vati hurumende yakazvipira kubatsira vane chirwere ichi asiwo vachichema chema nekushandiswa kwezvinodhaka munyika izvo zvinonzi zvinowedzerawo dambudziko rechirwere chepfungwa. Mukuru wesangano rakazvimiririra reZimbabwe Obsessive Compulsive Disorder Zimbabwe (OCD) Trust, Amai Angelica Mukorongo, avo vane dambudziko rechirwere ichi vakurudzira veruzhinji kuti vasadzikisira pasi vane zvirwere zvepfungwa vachiti zvakangofanana nezvimwe zvirwere. Amai Mukorongo vachemachemawo vachiti vazhinji vane zvirwere zvepfungwa havasi kuwana mishonga muzvipatara zvehurumende vakati dai hurumende yawanisa mishonga yezvirwere zvepfungwa pachena. Asi VaMangwiro vati hurumende ine hurongwa hwekuona kuti mishonga yezvirwere zvepfungwa yawanikwa zviri nyore munyika. Amai Babra Machando vanoshanda nesangano rinoona nezvehutano pasi rese reWorld Health Organisation vati dambudziko reCovid-19 rakawedzerawo kuwanda kwezvirwere zvepfungwa vachiti zvakakosha kuti vanhu ava vawane rubatsiro. Muzvare Batsirai Chiedza Muchochomi vanoshandawo nesangano rinobatsira vane zvirwere zvepfungwa rinonzi Insight Wellbeing vati dambudziko rechirwere chepfungwa rinobata munhu chero upi zvake vachitiwo zvakakosha kuti vanhu vazive kuti zvirwere izvi zvinorapika. Zuva reWorld Mental Health Day rinocherechedzwa musi wa 10 Gumiguru pasi rese. Mhemberero dzanhasi dzaitwa panine kurudziro yekuti pasi rese rikoshese hutano hwepfungwa. World Health Organization inoti muAfrica, vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mazana manomwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemaviri kana kuti 792 million vane chirwere chepfungwa. No media source currently available

headline: Zuva reInternational Literacy Day Rinosvika Dzidzo Iri Parumananzombe neCovid-19
text:
Nyika dzepasi rose dzacherechedza zuva reInternational Literacy Day nhasi panguva iyo pasi rese riri kuvhiringirwa dzidzo nedenda reCovid-19. Zuva ranhasi nderekurangarira kukosha kwakaita kugona kunyora nekuverenga. Asi zuva iri racherechedzwa nhasi pasi rose rakatarisana nedenda reCovid-19 iro riri kuvhiringa dzidzo munyika dzakawanda. Mumwe mudzidzisi ari nhengo yeProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaRosten Mutapa, vati denda reCovid-19 riri kutadzisa vana vakawanda kuti vadzidze sezvo zvikoro zviri kuvharwa nguva dzakawanda, uye vabereki vasina mari dzekuti vana vavo vashandise madandemutande.

Mutungamiri weAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vatiwo dambudziko reCovid-19 riri kutadzisa kuti vana vatange chikoro vave nezera rinodiwa uye vamwe vachatorega chikoro sezvakaita vamwe miriyoni imwechete kubva gore rapera.

Mutauriri weZimbabwe Teachers Association, VaGoodwill Taderera, vati kudzidza kuburikidza nepamaredhiyo hazvishande sezvo vana vasina zvikwanisiro zvikuru vana vekumaruwa.

Asi mutauriri webato rinopikisa reMDC T, VaWitness Dube, vati nyaya
yechirwere cheCovid-19 haisi iyo iri kutadzisa kuti vana vasadzidze
sezvo vana vari kudzidza mudzimwe nyika munguva ino yeCovid-19.

Mutauriri webazi rezvedzidzo yepasi, VaTaungana Ndoro, vati hurumende
iri kuedza zvikuru kupa mukana wekudzidza kuvana kuburikidza nekudzidza pamadandemutande pamwe nemaredhiyo.

Zuva reInternational Literacy Day rakatanga kucherechedzwa mugore ra1966 uye mhemberero dzegore rino dziri kuitwa pasi pedingindira
rekuti:“Literacy for a human-centered recovery: Narrowing the digital
divide”. No media source currently available

headline: CZI: Maindasitiri Oramba Akaomerwa
text: Sangano revemabhizimisi reCondeferation of Zimbabwe Industries, CZI, rinoti kuti vemakambani vatange kuita chouviri vanofanira kunge voshandawo pazvikamu zvinopfuura makumi matanhatu kubva muzana. Asi ikozvino sangano iri rinoti maindasitiri emunyika ari kushanda ari pazvikamu makumi matatu nezvipfumbamwe kubva muzana. Panguva imwe cheteyo gore rapera, makambani aishanda ari pasi pezvikamu zvinoti darikei zvikamu makumi matatu nezvinomwe kubva muzana. Mashoko aya ari mugwaro rakaendeswa kugurukota rezvemari, vaPatrick Chinamasa, ne CZI pagadziriro yegwara remafambiro ezvehupfumi repakati pegore richaparurwa nebazi raVaChinamasa. Muna 2009 kushanda kwemaindasitiri kwainge kwadzikira kusvika pazvikamu gumi kubva muzana. Asi munguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa akakwira kusvika pazvikamu makumi mashanu nezvinomwe kubva muzana. Asi zvinhu zvakadzokerazve kumawere mukupera kwehurumende yemubatanidzwa. Kusashanda zvakanaka kwemaindasitiri kwapa kuti vanhu vakawanda vagume votengesa zvinhu mumigwagwa. Ongororo ye World Bank inoti vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni mashanu nezviuru mazana mashanu vari kutengesa mumigwagwa muZimbabwe. Asi CZI inoti divi rezvivakwa rinenge riri kuita zviri nani munyaya dzehupfumi. Zvinhu zvekunze zviri kupinda munyika nemutengo wakaderera, zviri kupawo kuti zvinhu zviite manyama amire nerongo mumaindasitiri. Mutungamiri wesangano reCZI, VaBusisa Moyo, vanoti pane zvinhu zvakawanda zvinoda kuvandudzwa kuitira kuti maindastiri atange kushanda zvakanaka. No media source currently available

headline: Chirongwa cheBVR Chinotanga muBulawayo Vanhu Vashoma Vachipinda Machiri
text: Kunyoreswa kwevanhu kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota kwatanga muguta reBulawayo kuine vanhu vashoma vange vachinyoresa kuvhota, michina yeBiometric Voter Registration, BVR, ichitadza kunyatsoshanda pane zvimwe zvainotarisirwa kuita, ukuwo vamwe vanhu vachiti chirongwa ichi chinofanirwa kushambadzwa zvakasimba sezvo veruzhinji vasina ruzivo rwakakwana pamusoro pacho. Vanhu vange vachiuya vari vashoma, asi kunyoreswa kwavo kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota kwazotanga nguva dzekuma 9 mangwanani pamahofisi eZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, muBulawayo, sezvo vashandi veZEC vambotanga nekuwona kuti muchina wavo unoshanda zvakanaka here. Kunyange hazvo muchina uyu wange uchishanda zvakanaka, wange uchimbotadza kuita zvimwe zvaunotarisirwa kuita zvakadai sekukwanisa kuburitsa mazita enzvimbo dzekuti vanhu vanyoresa vanokwanisa kuzonotarisa kuti mazita avo akanyorwa zvechokwadi here kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota kana kuti polling center. Munhu atanga kunyoreswa pahofisi yeBulawayo District, VaAbel Ncube, vati vafara kuti vakwanisa kunyoresa, asi vange vachinyunyuta kuti izvi kwavatorera nguva, izvo zvatsigirwawo naVaWeston Dumba avo vaita munhu wechipiri kunyoresa. VaDumba vati kunyange hazvo zvingave zvinotora nguva, zvakakosha kuti vanhu vose vanokodzera munyika vave vanonyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota. VaDumba vatiwo maonero avo ndeekuti veruzhinji havasati vave neruzivo rwakakwana pamusoro pechirongwa chekunyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota. Mumwezve mugari wemuBulawayo VaAustin Moyo, avo vanogara mumusha weveruzhinji weCowdray Park, vaudza Studio7 kuti vange vachitevera nyaya yekunyoreswa kwevanhu kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota saka vaona zvakakosha kuti vauyewo vanyorese. Chirongwa chekunyoresa vanhu kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota chakaparurwa zviri pamutemo nemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, svondo rapera muHarare asi nekuda kwekuti pari zvino michina yekunyoresa ichiri mishoma, kunyoreswa uku kuri kungoitwa panzvimbo shoma kunyanya pane mahofisi eZEC mumatunhu akasiyana-siyana munyika. Pari zvino pamahofisi eZEC ari kumahombekombe kweguta kwakadziva kumadokero ndipo pari kunyoreswa vanhu vari pasi peBulawayo District pamwe neveUmguza District. Mukuru anoona nezvesarudzo muBulawayo, Amai Sithembiso Khupe, vabvuma kuti muchina wavo wambovanetsa asi vati vari kufara nemafambiro aita chirongwa pakutanga kunyoreswa kwevanhu. Amai Khupe vati hofisi yavo yeBulawayo yakanzi ichapiwa michina zana negumi rimwe chete uye vachave nenzvimbo dzinopfuura mazana mana dzavachange vachinyoresa vanhu. VeZEC vanoti chirongwa chekunyoresa vanhu chichasimudzirwa zvakasimba kana vawana mimwe michina iyo vakati vanotarisira kuwana pakati pemwedzi unouya. Kuti munhu ukwanise kunyoresa kuvhota unofanirwa kuve uri chizvarwa chemuZimbabwe chine makore gumi nemasere, kana kupfuura, uye unofanirwa kuve nechitupa, cherata kana cheplastic, chine mufananidzo wechiso chako kanawo gwaro rekufambisa richiri kushanda. Rezinesi yemotokari haikwanise kushandiswa pakunyoresa kuvhota. Munhu unozodawo gwaro rinoratidza paunogara ingave tsamba yemvura iri muzita rako kana gwaro raunonyora rosainwa naCommissioner of Oaths, sabhuku kana mumwe munhu akadaro. No media source currently available

headline: Tinoda var muZim
text: nyaya dzenhabvu munyika reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) rinoti riri kutevera gwara reFederation International de Football Association (Fifa) nekuunza muchina weVideo Assistant Referee (VAR) muZimbabwe uyo unobatsira varidzi vepembe mukuita basa ravo.   Kumutambo weFifa World Cup 2018 uri kutambirwa kuRussia pari zvino, kwaona michina yeVAR ichishandiswa kekutanga uye iri kubatsira zvikuru varidzi vepembe kuona zvimwe zvavanenge vapotsa zvinosanganisira kuvabatsira kupa mapena kana kubvisa mamwe magobhora apo mutambi anenge anwisa ari offside.   Mukushi wemashoko weZifa – Xolisani Gwesela — anoti sangano ravo riri pasi peFifa saka richange richitevedzera zvose zvinoitwa neFifa nechinangwa chekuramba vachivandudza nhabvu munyika muno.   “Isu seZifa tiri pasi peFifa tinotevedzera zvese zvainoita, saka tarisirai michina yeVAR muno nekuti muchina uyu wakanakisa uye uchabatsira varidzi vepembe.   “Nhabvu iri kuita ichishanduka, zvakawanda zviri kuuya zvichange zvichibatsira mutambo uyu kuti ukure uye urambe uchienda kure,” anodaro Gwesela.   Anoti nhabvu yemazuva ano yasiyana neyekare nekuda kwekuti iri kusanduka nekukasika nekudaro vatsigiri vemutambo uyu vanofanirwa kutarisira zvakawanda zvinoita kuti urambe uchinakidza.

headline: Mabhishopu Oudza VaMnangagwa Zvinofanirwa Kuitwa neChimbi Chimbi
text: Zvichitevera kushandurwa kwemutungamiriri wenyika svondo rapfuura mushure mekupindira kwemauto, sangano reZimbabwe Catholic Bishops Conference raburitsa gwaro, kana kuti Pastoral Letter, richiti hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa inofanira kugadzirisa nyaya dzehupfumi nemitemo yesarudzo nechimbi chimbi kuitira kuti nyika igadzikane. Mugwaro iri, mabhishopi aya, kubva kumatunhu ese munyika, anotenda kuti shanduko yemutungamiri wenyika yakaitwa murunyararo. Mabhishopi aya anoti nyika yave nemukana wekutanga patsva, asi zvinhu zvinofanira kugadziriswa nekukasika inyaya dzehupfumi. Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Catholic Bishops Conference, Baba Frederick Chiromba, vaudza Studio7 kuti vari kuita chikumbiro chekuti hupfumi hugadziriswe nechimbi chimbi nekuti vari kuona kutambura kuri kuita vanhu zuva nezuva. Vatiwo mabhishopu aya anodawo kuti mitemo yesarudzo igadziriswe nekukasika vachiti kunyange hazvo pakave nekushandura mutungamiriri wenyika murunyararo, nzira yakashandiswa handiyo yakakakodzera mukore uno. Baba Chiromba vati sarudzo dzemuZimbabwe dzagara dzisingagutsi veruzhinji izvo zvakakakonzera kuti nyika itemerwe zvirango zvehupfumi nedzimwe nyika dzekumavirira. Asi Pastor Philip Mugadza veRemnant Church vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo zvakakosha kusimudzira hupfumi nekugadzirisa mitemo yesarudzo, kodzero dzevanhu dzakakosha kudarika zvese. Baba Fidelis Mukonori vesvondo yeRoman Catholic ndivo vaive muyananisi panhaurirano dzakaitwa nemauto naVaMugabe kutiVaMugabe vasiyebasa. Baba Chiromba vati izvi zvinoratidza kuti vedzisvondo vanoita basa guru mukuyananisa pamwe nekubatanidza vanhu munyika. Mumashoko avo ekutanga semutungamiriri wenyika, VaMnangagwa vakati kumutsiridza hupfumi, kuita sarudzo dzakachena pamwe nekurwisa huwori, zvimwe zvezvinhu zvavachaita nekukasika. No media source currently available

headline: Chelsea yadzinga Tuchel
text: CHIKWATA cheChelsea nhasi mangwanani chadzinga basa murairidzi wacho Thomas Tuchel.   Izvi zvinotevera kusatamba zvinogutsa kuri kuita chikwata ichi mumwaka mutsva wegore rino.   Chelsea yakakundwa neDinamo Zagreb nezuro manheru mumutambo wavo wekutanga weUEFA Champions League.   Chinyorwa chabva kuChelsea chinoti: “Nhasi Chelsea yapesana nemurairidzi wedu Thomas Tuchel.   “Takamirira munhu wose wekuChelsea FC, chikwata chinoda kutenda Thomas nebasa raakabata panguva yaaive nechikwata chedu.   “Apo vatungamiri vatsva vasvitsa mazuva 100 kubva vatenga chikwata chino uye vachiramba vachishanda vachienda mberi, ino ndiyo nguva yekushandura zvakawanda.   “Vamwe varairidzi veChelsea ndivo vachashanda nechikwata takatarisana nemitambo inotevera apo tiri pakati pekutsvaga murairidzi mutsva wekutsiva Tuchel.”

headline: Vanorarama neHutachiona hweHIV/AIDS Vogunun'una Nekunonoka Kupihwa Mumwe Mushonga Wakakosha
text: Sangano reZimbabwe National Network of People Living with HIV, kana kuti ZNNP+, rinoti riri kushushikana zvikuru kuti nhengo dzaro dzakawanda hadzisati dzava kushandisa mushonga unonzi unodzikisa hukasha pamwe nekupararira kweHIV/AIDS mumuviri wemunhu anorarama neHIV/AIDS. Mumwe mukuru mukuru musangano reZNNP+, VaClarence Mademutsa, vanoti mushonga mutsva weDolutegravir, kana kuti DTG, uyo wakaparurwa muZimbabwe gore rakapfuura, hausati wava kupihwa vanhu vakawanda vanorarama neHIV/AIDS munyika. VaMademutsa vanoti vanhu vanorarama neHIV/Aids vakawanda vaifanirwa kunge vakatanga kunwa mushonga weDTG gore ra 2019 risati rapera. VaMademutsa vanoti vanhu havafanirwi kuramba vakamirira mushonga weDTG, sezvo wakanakira kuvanhu vanorarama neHIV/AIDS. VaMademutsa vanoti dzimwe nhengo dzesangano ravo dzanga dzichinetseka pakushandisa mushonga we Efavirenz, nokudaro chinhu chinenge chakanaka kuti vanhu vakawanda vashandise DTG sezvo mushonga uyu usina hukasha hunovhiringa hutano hwevanhu vanorarama neHIV/AIDS.. VaMademutsa vanoti havasati vave neruzivo rwekuti vanhu vangani vanofanirwa kunge vachipihwa DTG. Asi mumwe mudzimai asina kuda kudomwa nezita rake anoti vanhu havafanire kumanikidzwa kuti vapinde muchirongwa cheDTG, sezvo vamwe vanhu, vakaita saivo, vasina dambudziko nemishonga yavari kunwa pari zvino. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kugurukota rezvehutano, Dr Obadiah Moyo, kuti zvii zvakanakira mushonga mutsva uyu, uye kuti seyi vanhu vakawanda vasati vava pahurongwa hweDTG sezviri kutaurwa naVaMademutsa. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvirwere mubazi rezvehutano, Dr Clorata Gwanzura, vanoti mushonga weDTG mushonga mutsva unobatsira kudzikisa hukasha hweHIV. Dr Gwanzura vanoti bazi rehutano rinogara richiita ongororo dzekuona kuti ndeupi mushonga ungave nani pakubatsira vanorarama neHIV/AIDS. Dr Gwanzura vanoti ongororo yakaitwa inoratidza kuti DTG inobatsira zvikuru mukudzikisa hukasha hweHIV munguva pfupi mushure mekunge munhu atanga kunwa mushonga uyu. Zimbabwe imwe yenyika shoma dzemuAfrica dzava kushandisa mushonga weDTG uyo wakatambirwa zviri pamutemo muAmerica mugore ra 2013, mushure mokunge nyanzvi dzehutano dzaona kuti mushonga uyu waibatsira zvikuru kudzikisa hukasha hweHIV/Aids. No media source currently available

headline: Bato reCCC Rinokurudzira Veruzhinji Kupfeka Nhumbi dzeYellow seMucherechedzo weKutsigira Nhengo Gumi neNhatu dziri muHusungwa
text: Bato rinopikisa reCitizens Coalition for Change rakurudzira neChishanu vana veZimbabwe kuti vapfeke nhumbi dzeruvara rwe yellow, senzira yekutsigira nhengo dzaro gumi nenhatu dziri muhusungwa mushure mekusungwa dzichipomerwa mhosva yekukonzera mhirizhonga. Nhengo idzi dzinonzi dzakakonzera mhirizhonga kuNyatsime kuChitungwiza zvichitevera kupondwa kwenhengo yeCCC, Muzvare Moreblessing Ali, avo vakazowanikwa mutumbi wavo wakachekwachekwa. Nhengo dzakasungwa dzinosanganisira mutevedzeri wasachigaro vebato uye vari mumiriri weZengeza West muparamende, VaJob Sikhala, pamwe nemumiriri weChitungwiza North, VaGodfrey Sithole. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weCCC, VaGift Ostalos Siziba vanoti vari kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vabatane navo pakumira nenhengo dzavo gumi nenhatu idzi, idzo vanoti dziri kungoshungurudzwa sezvo dzakasungwa dzisina mhaka. VaSikhala naVaSithole vakanyimwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso nedare reHigh Court, mutongi wedare achiti anotyira kuti vakapiwa mukana, zvikuru VaSikhala, vanonopara dzimwe mhosva. VaSikhala ndivo gweta remhuri yaMuzvare Ali.

headline: Napoli yoshuvira Cech
text: kuda kutenga mubati wepagedhi weArsenal, Petr Cech (36), nechikwereti.   Chikwata chekuSerie A ichi chakanyora pasi mazita evabati vepagedhi vachingade kutenga kuti vazotsiva Pepe Reina uyo akabva achienda kunotambira AC Milan.   Cech ari mugore rekupedzisira pakondirakiti yake kuEmirates Stadium uye anogona kubvuma kuenda kuItaly kumbonotambira ikoko zvichitevera mashoko akabuda ekuti murairidzi mutsva weArsenal – Unai Emery – ari kutsvaga mubati wepagedhi mutsva wechidiki.   Sekutaura kwebepanhau rekuItaly, Gazzetta dello Sport, maGunners ane chivimbo chekuti vachakwanisa kutenga mubati wepagedhi weBayer Leverkusen Bernd Leno nemari inosvika 22 miriyoni paunzi, izvo zvichatuma Cech kuti abve achienda kuNapoli.   Maneja mutsva weNapoli, Carlo Ancelotti, anofarira chaizvo Cech zvichitevera kushanda kwavakamboita vese kuchikwata cheChelsea uye zvinozivikanwa kuti ndiye waari kuda kuti auye kuzove mubati wake wepagedhi muchikwata chake. – SportMail Football

headline: Makorokoza Oisa Hupenyu hweVagari veMasvingo paNjodzi neKuchera pedyo neDzimba uye Matangi eMvura
text: Vamwe vagari vekuMasvingo vanoti vari kuronga kuendesa kanzuru yavo kumatare kana isina kubvisa mukati memazuva manomwe makorokoza ari kuchera goridhe pedyo nematangi emvura nedzimba dzavo sezvo vachigona kuzokonzera njodzi huru. Vagari vanoti matangi emvura anogona kutsemuka oyeredza dzimba dzavo zvinogona kukonzera rufu. Sangano revagari reMasvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance(MURRA), richimirirwa nemagweta aro ekwa Mutendi, Mudisi and Shumba, rinoti raendesa tsamba yeyambiro iyi kukanzuru. Gweta revagari Advocate Phillip Shumba vati kanzuru inofanira kutora matanho ekubvisa makorokoza aya nekuti ndiyo ine matangi emvura ari mugomo remumusha we Target Kopje. Matangi aya anotyirwa kuti akadhirika nekucherwa anogona kupa kuti dzimba dziri pedyo nawo dziyeredzwe nemafashamu emvura sezvo achinzi anotakura marita anosvika mamirironi gumi anopa dhorobha rose mvura yekushandisa. Amai Entrance Takaidza, vemumusha wekwaMajange, vanoti kunze kwenyaya yemvura makorokoza aya ari kushandisa zvinoputika achidhuura gomo zvopa kuti dzimba dzavo dzitsemuke uye kukonzera ruzha rwakanyanya. Meya wedhorobha reMasvingo, VaCollen Maboke, vanoti vari mubishi rekugadzirisa nyaya iyi. Mukuru webasa muMURRA, VaAnoziva Muguti, vanoti vanoti vatora danho iri nekuti hupenyu hwe vanhu hunogona kupinda munjodzi.. Asi mamwe makorokoza akataura ne Studio 7 anoti ivo vari kuchera mugo umu nekuti vari kusevenzera vakuru vakuru vezvematongerwo enyika avaramba kudoma nemazita. Mumwe mukorokoza ati anoda kuzivikanwa nekunzi Chinjiri, ati chavanoda imari zvematangi nedzimba dzevanhu havaneyi nazvo. Magweta eMurra ati aendesawo tsamba idzi kubazi rinoona nezve zvicherwa munyika neku hofisi yegurukota reMasvingo, VaEzra Chadzamira. VaShumba vati pakasabuda zviri kudiwa nevagari nyaya iyi inopedzwa nematare edzimhosva sezvo ine chekuita nekodzero dzevanhu dzakaita sehupenyu ne mvura. No media source currently available

headline: Kunetsana muZanu-PF Kotemesa VaMugabe Musoro
text: Zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka mubato reZanu-PF kunyange hazvo bato iri rakadzinga mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joyce Mujuru, nevamwe vanodarika gumi uye kumisa kuva nhengo vanhu vanosvika makumi masere nevapfumbamwe. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vanoti vakaudzwa kuti mubato mapindwazve napongwe sezvo poita kurwisana pakati pevanonzi vari kutsigira vatevedzeri vavo VaEmmerson Mnangagwa naVaPhelekezela Mphoko. Bepanhau reSunday Mail rinoti VaMugabe vakaudza vechidiki mubato ravo kuti nhengo dzebato dzinofanira kumira kutaura nezvekuti ndiyani achavatsiva kana vasiya chigaro. Asi vakuru mubato iri vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunetsana mubato kuri kuenderera mberi. Nyanzvi munyaya dezezvehupfumi dzinoti hakuchina munhu ari kutaura nezvekugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika sezvo makurukota ari kupedza nguva yakawanda achirongerana dhende. Vamwe vakadzingwa mubato vakaita sevaive gurukota rezvedunhu reMasvingo, VaKudakwashe Bhasikiti, vanoti kunetsana kuri kukonzerwa nevanhu vakatora zvigaro asi vasina rutsigiro rwevanhu. No media source currently available VaBhasikiti vanoti vari kutambiswa chamutavanhava naAmai Shuvai Mahofa, avo vakatora chigaro chavo vave kuvatorera chimwe chikamu chepurazi ravo vachishandisa vakarwa hondo. Asi Amai Mahofa vaudza Studio 7 kuti nyaya dzekunetsana mubato dzakapera nekudzingwa kwa Amai Mujuru nevamwe vavo vakaita saVaBhasikiti. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yotora Matanho Kudzivirira Kupinda kweCoronavirus Munyika
text: Hurumende inoti iri kutora matanho ese ainokwanisa kudzivirira kuti vanhu vasabatwe nehutachiwana hweCoronavirus uye vanhu vese vanobva kunyika dzine hutachiwana uhwu, vave kusungugirwa kuuya nemagwaro anoratidza kuti havana hutachiwana uhwu. Vachitaura mushure memusangano wedare remakurukota, gurukota rezvehutano, Dr Obadiah Moyo, vati vanouya vasina magwaro aya vacharambidzwa kupinda munyika. Kusvika musi wa1 Kurume, Zimbabwe yange yaongorora vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvitanhatu vakawonekwa vasina hutachiwana hweCoronavirus uye ongororo iyi iri kuramba ichitwa panhandare dzese dzendenge munyika pamwe nedzimwe nzvimbo dzekupinda nadzo munyika. VaMoyo vazivisawo kuti pane chizvarwa chekuZimbabwe chaibva kuBahrain nechimwe chekuChina vakaongororwa pachipatara cheWilkins vakawanikwa vasina hutachiwana uhwu. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato guru runopikisa munyika, VaLuke Tamborinyoka, vati kunyange hazvo zvakakosha kuti vanhu vane hutachiwana uhwu vasapinde munyika, hurumende inofanira kusimudzira mabasa ehutano munyika kuitira kuti ikwanise kuongorora zvirwere zvese. Mune imwe nyaya, gurukota rinoona nezvemutemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, vati majeri emunyika akazarisa uye hurumende iri kuronga kuburitsa vamwe vasungwa mumajeri. Vati pari zvino vave kurongwa kuti vasungwa voburitswa ndevapi. Majeri emuZimbabwe ane vasungwa zviuru makumu maviri nezviviri asi iwo akagadzirirwa kuchengeta vasungwa zviuru gumi nezvinomwe chete. VaZiyambi vati vanoda kuti majeri asare aine vasungwa zviuru gumi nezvitanhatu. Muneimwewo nyaya vakasanobatachinzvimbo chegurukota remutambo, VaKazembe Kazembe, vatiwo hurumende iri kuedza pese painogona napo kugadzirisa nhandare dzeNational Sports Stadium neBarbourfields kuitira kuti Zimbabwe ikwanise kutamba mutambo wayo CAF neAlgeria munyika. Nhandare idzi dzakanzi neCAF hadzikodzeri kutambira mitambo yeCAF sezvo dzisina zvimwe zvinhu zvinodiwa mazuvano. VaKazembe vati kana vakapedza kugadzirisa National Sports Stadium neBarbourfields, vachakumbira CAF kuti mutambo weZimbabwe neAlgeria musi wa29 Kurume utambirwe munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Bhanga reCBZ Rinofaindiswa $385m neAmerica
text: Gavhuna webhanga guru renyika, Doctor John Mangudya, vanoti vane chivimbo chekuti America ichabvisa mari yezvirango iri kunzi ibhadharwe nebhanga reCBZ iro rinonzi rakatyora mutemo weAmerica une chekuita nezvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru vehurumende muna 2003 vachipomerwa mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Hofisi yeUnited States Treasury’s Office of Foreign Assets Control kana kuti OFAC inoti CBZ yakatyora mutemo sezvo yaibatsira vanhu vebhanga reZB iro rainge rakatemerwa zvirango. OFAC yakatanga yati CBZ ibhadhare mari inosvika mabhiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana masere zvemadhora asi mari iyi ikazodzikiswa kusvika pamamiriyoni mazana matatu nemakumi masere nemashanu emadhora mushure mekuchema chema kwakaita CBZ. Doctor Mangudya vati vane chivimbo chekuti mari iyi ichabviswa yose asi vashora zvikuru nyaya yekutemerwa zvirango kwevamwe muhurumende pamwe nemakambani anodyidza nehurumende yeZimbabwe vachiti zvinokanganisa nyaya yemabhizimisi. Asi gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaDewa Mavhinga, vaudza Studio7 kuti Zimbabwe haingaudze America zvekuita maererano nekudyidzana kwenyika mbiri idzi. Vati zviri kuAmerica kuona kuti zvirango zvobviswa here ichionawo nyaya yekuremekedzwa kwekodzero dzevanhu. No media source currently available

headline: POLAD Yonetsana neHurumende yaVaMnangagwa Pakuvandudza Bumbiro reMitemo
text: Paita ropa rakaipa pakati pehurumende nevamwe vePOLAD padanho rakatorwa nehurumende rekuburitsa mugwaro raro reGovernment Gazette hurongwa kwekuvandudza bumbiro remutemo. Kunyangwe hazvo Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku vakamboudza studio 7 kuti kuburikidza nePolad vaizokumbira mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuti hurumende yavo imbomira kuvandudza chikamu chekuti mutungamiri wenyika abve asarudzwa pamwe chete nevatevedzeri vake vaviri kutanga muna 2023. Hurumende inoti iri kuda zviripo ikozvino zvekuti mutungamiri wenyika asarudze vatevedzeri ava sarudzo dzapera. VaMadhuku vati zvaitwa zvinoodza moyo sezvo vange vachida kuti zvimbozeyiwa kuPOLAD. No media source currently available Asi gurukota rezvemutemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi vanoti Zanu-PF ndiyo yakasarudzwa nevanhu kuti itungamire nekudaro haifanire kupa masimba ose kuPOLAD. Asi vati vePolad vakasungunuka kupa pfungwa dzavo sevamwe vose kana bhiri iri rozeyiwa. No media source currently available

headline: Vanotengesera Mumigwagwa Vanobviswa neMapurisa muHarare
text: Mapurisa pamwe nevashandi vekanzuru yeHarare vadzinga zvechisimba vanhu vanotengesera mumigwagwa pakati peguta reHarare zvichitevera kurudziro yakaitwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, mukupera kwesvondo. Mapurisa anga akapakatira zvombo pamwe nevashandi vekanzuru yeHarare vadzinga mumigwagwa avo vanorarama nekutengesa mumigwagwa zvaita kuti vatengesi ava vaswere vachiita hwekiti negonzo mukati padhorobha. Mumwe wevanotengesera mumigwagwa, Amai Maidei Chimuka, vati pane vanotengesera mumigwagwa varohwa zvakaipisisa vakakuvara uye vamwe vavo vanonzi vasungwa. VaMike Muvadi vati havadi kuenda kunotengesera zvinhu kunzvimbo dziri kunze kwedhorobha kwavari kunzi nekanzura vanoshandira. VaGwinyai Gandanzara, avo vanotegesawo mbatya, vati kurudziro yakaitwa naVaMugabe pakupera kwesvondo yekuti vanotengesera mumigwagwa vabude mudhorobha inoratidza kuti VaMugabe havana hany’a nehupenyu hwevanhu. Zvichakadai, nhengo yeboka reTajamuka, VaDenford Ngadziore, vati vachashanda zvakasimba nevanotengesera mumigwagwa kuti vasarambe vachishungurudzwa nemapurisa pamwe nevashandi vekanzuru. Munyori muboka revechidiki reMDC-T, VaLovemore Chinoputsa, vati bongozozo raitwa nemapurisa iri inzira yehurumende yekukanganisa vanhu kunyoresa kwavari kuita sevavhoti pakati pedhorobha sezvo vachiti bato ravo rine vatsigiri vakawanda mumadhorobha mazhinji. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri wemapurisa, Amai Charity Charamba, kuti tinzwe divi remapurisa panyaya iyi. Kanzuru yeHarare inoti vanotengesera mumigwagwa vanofanira kutengesera munzvimbo dzakatarwa dzavanenge vachibhadhara mitero kwete kuti vanhu vangomera kunge hohwa pakati pedhorobha. No media source currently available

headline: Mushonga weCovid-19 Wakawanikwa Asi Zvichatora Nguva Kuti Usvike kuZimbabwe neDzimwe Nyika
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzavekutarisira kuti kuwanikwa kwemishonga yekurapa chirwere cheCovid-19 kuchabatsira kuti vanhu vasafe vakawanda pasi rose. Nemusi weMugovera vanoona nezvemishonga muAmerica veFood and Drug Administration kana kuti FDA vakapa mvumo kuti mushonga unonzi Regeneron wakapihwa mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaDonald Trump pavakarwa neCovid-19 uchitange kupihwa vanenge vabatwa nechirwere ichi zvikuru vana uye vakwegura. Mamwe makambani maviri akati agadzira nhomba yekurapa chirwere ichi anoti Pfizer ne Moderna akamirira kupihwa mvumo neFDA. Asi zviri kutarisirwa kuti zvichatora nguva kuti munhu wose abaiwe nhomba pasi rose sezvo mushonga wacho wakawandirwa. Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano Dr Henry Madzorera vanoti kuuya kuZimbabwe kuchatora nguva nekuti haisi nyika ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa kana kufa nechirwere ichi. Vati vanoona sekuti America, India, South Africa neBrazil ndidzo dzichatanga kuwana mushonga nekukasika. No media source currently available Bazi rezvehutano rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vari kurwara nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika hwakakwira neMugovera kusvika pazviuru zvipfumbamwe anezana nemakumi manomwe nevaviri kana kuti 9,172 mushure mekunge vamwe vanhu makumi mashanu nevaviri vabatwa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vose vakabatwa nechirwere ichi havana nhoroondo yekubuda munyika uye vakawanda vacho vari muguta reBulawayo. Vanhu vari kurwara mazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe nevaviri kana kuti 672 uye pavanhu ava, mazana maviri negumi nevashanu vari muBulawayo, zana nemakumi matanhatu nevana kana kuti 164 vari kuMatabeleland North, Harare ine makumi masere nevatanhatu 76, Matabeleland South makumi matanhatu nevashanu uye Mashonaland East ndiyo ine vanhu vashoma vari kurwara pamatunhu ose vanove gumi nevaviri. Vanhu vapora kusvika parizvino vave zviuru zvisere nemazana maviri ane makumi matatu nevashanu kana kuti 8, 235 mushure mekunge vanhu gumi nemumwe vapora neMugovera. Vanhu vafa vachiri mazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nevashanu kana kuti 265. Bepanhau reSunday Mail rinotiwo kutanga svondo rino National Institute of Health Research kana kuti (NIHR) ichapinda munharaunda dzakasiyana siyana mumadhorobha nemumaruwa ichiita ongororo yekuona kuti chirwere cheCovid19 charuura munzvimbo dzipi chaidzo. Chirongwa ichi chinonzi National Sero-Prevalence Survey for Covid-19 uye chichapetwa musi wa30 Zvita. Vanhu vari mudzimba zviuru zvimomwe mumatunhu makumi mashanu nemana dzichavhenekwa hutachona uhu. Mapurisa anotiwo achasimbaradza kusunga vasiri kupfeka zvekuzvidzivirira kana kuti maface mask. Vanhu zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi maviri nevana vanonzi vakasungwa kubva muna kurume pakatanga kupararira chirwere ichi munyika. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri kana kuti 2 million vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zviuru makumi mana nemapfumbamwe ane zana nemakumi maviri nerimwe kana kuti 49,121. Vapora vadarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 1, 7 million. South Africa ine vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi matanhatu nemashanu kana kuti 765 000 vabatwa nechirwere ichi ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi mashanu nemasere kana kuti 58 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica chete vanodarika zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu nematanhatu kana kuti 256,000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni gumi nemaviri kana kuti 12 miillion. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 1,3 million. Asi vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi matatu nemasere kana kuti 37 million.

headline: Hurumende Yokundikana Kubatsira Vakaremara kuMasvingo
text: Apo hurumende yakawedzerazve mazuva ekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba kana kuti lockdown, kuitira kurwisa kupararira kwehutachiona hwecoronavirus kana kuti Covid-19, vamwe vakaremara mudunhu reMasvingo vave kuchema chema kuti nzara yapfunya chisero mudzimba dzavo. Vemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevakarema vanoti nhengo dzavo dziri kunonga svosve nemuromo munguva ino yelockdown sezvo dzisisina kana nzira dzekutsvaga raramo dziri mudzimba. Vakawanda vakaremara ava vanorarama nekutengesa mumigwagwa uye nekupemha asi nenyaya yekunzi vagare mudzimba havachakwanisi kuita izvi nekudaro mari yekutenga chikafu yakapera kare. VaHenry Chivhanga, veSangano reDisability Amalgamated Community Trust(DACT) vanoti nenyaya yekushaikwa kwechikafu kune vakaremara, kodzero dzavo dziri kumbunyikidzwa. Vamwe vakaremara ava vanoti vari kusanganawo nemamwe matambudziko akaita sekushaiwa mvura munguva ino, iyo inouya kwenguva pfupi pfupi mudzimba dzavo. Muzvare Nyaradzo Mutande, vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reInstitute of Community Development Trust, vanoti vakaremara nevanovabatsira vari kushaya zvipfeko zvekudzivirira kutapuriranwa kwechirwee checoronavirus. Vamwe vemasangano aya vanoti rubatsiro ruri kupuwa vamwe nehurumende harusati rwasvika mudunhu reMasvingo nekudaro vari panguva yakaoma. Hurumende yakavimbisa kupa vanhu rubatsiro rwemari inosvika mazana matatu emadhora emabond pamwedzi asi haisati yauya. Gurukota rinoona nezvemagariro akanaka evanhu Muzvinafundo, Paul Mavhima, avo vanga vari mumusangano pavabatwa ne Studio 7 vati vari kubatsira vakaremara munguva ino uye hurongwa uhu hwagara huripo. Mutauriri we Covid-19 Taskforce muMasvingo, VaRogers Irimayi, vatsigira Muzvinafundo Mavhima, vachiti komiti yavo iri kushanda nebazi iri kubatsira vakaremara munguva ino. Asi, Pastor Cover Mugwadi, vesangano, reZimbabwe Disability Advocacy, Empowerment, Rehabilitation and Technology, vanoti hurumende haisi kutaura chokwadi nekuti hapana chavarikuwana mudunhu reMasvingo. Vamwe vazhinji vevakaremara vanoti vari kushushikana kuwana matsamba ekuti vakwanise kufamba kuti vaitewo mabasa vawane chekudya sezvo hurumende yave kutendera vanhu kuti vaitewo mamwe mabasa. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende yeBritain Inoburitsa Gwaro Rinonan'anidza Mamiriro eZvinhu muZimbabwe
text: Hurumende yeBritain neMuvhuro yaburitsa gwaro rinoratidza kwainoti kusagadzikana kwezvinhu muZimbabwe munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, kodzero dzevanhu, zveupfumi, mabhizimusi nehuwori. Nyika iyi yayambira kuti nekuda kwezvikonzero izvi, kuita bhizimusi muZimbabwe kune matambudziko nezvimhingamipinyi zvakawanda. Mune zvematongerwo enyika, gwaro reBritain iri rinoti kubva nyika yawana kuzvitonga muna 1980, Zimbabwe ingori pasi pehutongi hweZanu PF uye nyika iri kutarisira kuita dzimwe sarudzo muna 2023. Munyaya yezvehupfumi, Britain inoti Zimbabwe iri kuramba ichisangana nematambudziko anosanganisirawo kushaikwa kwerubatsiro rwunopiwa vanhu vanotambura. Gwaro iri rinotiwo kunyange hazvo goho rakanaka pamwe nekumuka kwehupfumi hwenyika mushure meCovid-19 zvichigona kumborerutsa matambudziko aya, hurongwa hwemuono uri kure weremangwana mune zvemabhizimusi ndihwo hunodiwa. Gwaro reBritain iri rinotiwo Zimbabwe ine nhoroondo yekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu, izvo zvakaita kuti vamwe vakuru vemauto vana vaiswe pazvirango musi wa 01 Kukadzi zvichitevera kuurayiwa nemauto kwevanhu vairatidzira muna 2018. Zvimwe zviri kusimudzwa mugwaro iri inyaya yechioko muhomwe nehuwori uhwo Britain inoti hwatekeshera zvakazoita kuti itemere muzvinabhizimusi VaKudakwashe Tagwirei zvirango. Gwaro iri rinotarisawo kusagadzikana kwezvemabhizimusi munyika nekuda kwezvikonzero zvakasiyanasiyana. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaFrederick Shava, avo vari kumusangano weSADC kuMalawi. Asi vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika pamwe nezvehupfumi vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaCharles Mutasa, vanoti hapana zvitsva zviri mugwaro reBritain iri, sezvo mapoka akawanda anoongorora zvematongerwo enyika agara achisimudza nyaya idzi. Asi VaMutasa vanoti nyaya dzose idzi dzinofanirwa kugadziriswa kuitira kuti zvinhu zvikane muZimbabwe, vachiti hurumende inofanirwa kuteerera zvinyunyuto zvevanhu zvinosanganisira nyaya yekusaitwa kwesarudzo yema by-election, kugadzirisa nyaya yehuwori, uye kusiyana netsika yekushungurudza vanoonekwa sevanopesana nehurumende pamaonero. No media source currently available

headline: RBZ Yoshorwa neVamwe veMabhizimisi Ichinzi Iri Kupa VaTagwirei Mari Yakawandisa
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa neMuvhuro vakaita musangano nevakuru vemabhizimisi zvikabuda pachena kuti zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi hazvina kumira zvakanaka uye hapana kuwirirana pakati pehurumende nevemabhizimisi zvikuru pamabatirwo ari kuitwa mari neReserve Bank of Zimbabwe. Vemabhizimisi munyika vari kuchema chema nekwavanoti kusanyatsojeka kwehukama pakati peReserve Bank of Zimbabwe nekambani yeSakunda Holdings Private Limited neyeTrafigura Zimbabwe. Gore rapera, Sakunda yakati yainge yochinja zita kuti inzi Trafigura Zimbabwe sezvo yainge yatengwa nekambani iyi kuburikidza nekambani yePUMA. Trafigura ikambani ine muzinda kuSingapore. Pamusangano wakaitwa neMuvhuro kuState House muHarare , zvakabuda pachena kuti vemabhizimisi havasi kufara kuti mari yakawanda iri kuenda kunotenga mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari asi mari yacho yakawanda ichienda kukambani yeSakunda Holdings Group yaVaKuda Tagwirei. Asi vachipindura nyaya iyi, gurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu, Dr Joram Gumbo, vati kambani iyi inopihwa mari yakawanda nekuti ine magaraji akawanda. Asi vaive chipangamazano chaVaMnangagwa, VaChris Mutsvangwa, vakaudza bepanhau reThe Standard kuti hurumemende inofanira kubvumidza makambani akawanda kuti atenge mafuta edzimotokari nekuti pakaita kambani imwe chete panozoita kuti zvinhu zvinetse. VaGumbo vatiwo kunze kwekupihwa mari neRBZ, hurumende yakawanawo chimwe chikwereti kubva kumakambani makuru anosanganisa iyo Trafigura neIndependent Petroleum Group kana kuti IPG yekuKuwait, asi vamwe vachiti izvi zvine mutauro sezvo kambani imwecehte ichipihwa mari zvekare neRBZ kuburikidza neSakunda. Mamwe makambani akawanda ataura neStudio 7 zvikuru anochera zviwanikwa anoti haasi kufara nekuti ari kuendesa zvicherwa zvavo kuRBZ asi haana kana kobiri raari kuwana pamari yekunze yaakanzi anopihwa nebhanga iri muna 2016. Kambani yeRio Zim yakaburitsa mashoko ekuti yave kuendesa RBZ kumatare sezvo iri kukundikana kuipa mari yayo. Kambani huru inochera goridhe yeMettallon Gold yaVaMzi Khumalo vekuSouth Africa inoti iri kuronga kuti ichinjane hayo goridhe nemichina yekucheresa goridhe sezvo isina mari yairi kuwana kubva kuRBZ. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachidzidzisa paNelson Mandela Metropolitan University, VaGift Mugano, vanoti izvi zvinoodza moyo vanoda kuuya kuzouchika mari munyika. Vachitaurawo nezvemusangano weMuvhuro, mukuru weUnited Refineries Limited, VaBusisa Moyo, avo vakapindawo mumusangano waVaMnangagwa vati mabatirwo emari neRBZ akakosha mukugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi. Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko raburitsawo mashoko ekuti mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, mune remangwana achatanga anzwa zvinofungwa nevemabhizimisi asati atora matanho panyaya dzezvehupfumi. Vakapinda mumusangano uyu vanoti VaMnagagwa vakati vachatarisa nyaya yemamiriro ezvinhu pakutengwa kwemafuta edzimotokari sezvo kwaita mutauro wakanyanya. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri waVaMnangagwa, VaGeorge Charamba, kana VaTagwirei sezvo nhare nenharembozha dzavo dzange dzisiri kudairwa. No media source currently available

headline: Vakuru veKambani yeFSG Vosungiswa neKuzvidza Dare reParamende neNyaya ye"Command Agriculture"
text: Paramende yeZimbabwe nhasi yanyora magwaro ekusungisa kambani mukuru wekambani yeFert, Seed, Grain (FSG) nemhosva yekuzvidza dare. Sachigaro vekomiti iyi, VaTendai Biti veMDC, vati zviri pachena kuti vakuru vekambani iyi vari kuzvidza komiti yavo saka vaita chisungo chekuti mukuru wekambani iyi, VaSteve Morland, vasungwe nenyaya yekuzvidza dare. Vakuru vekambani iyi vatadza kuuya kuzotsangangura kuti sei yakabhadharwa mamiriyoni mazana mana emadhora ($400 million) nehurumende muna 2017 na2018 zviri kunze kwebhajeti pamwe nekuti mari iyi yakashandiswei. FSG ndeimwe yemakambani ari kuda kubvunzurudzwa nekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekushandiswa kwemari yehurumende, yePublic Accounts Committee, iyo iri kuongororo kunofungidzirwa kuti kusashandiswa zvakanaka kwemari yehurumende inodarika mabhiriyoni mashanu muna 2017 na 2018. Kambani iyi yave nenguva ichitadza kumira pamberi pekomiti iyi isingape zvikonzero uye nhasi chaiye yatadza kuuya zvagumbira nhengo dzeparamende dziri mukomiti yezvekufambiswa kwemari. VaBiti vanoti zvino shamisa kuti kambani yeFSG inoramba kuuya kukomiti yavo asi ichienda kune mamwe makaomiti eparamende. Mwedzi uno VaMorland vakaenda kunomira pamberi pekomiti yezvekurima ina VaJustice Wadyajena vanova nhengo yeZanu-PF sasachigaro. Pamberi pekomiti iyi, VaMorland vatisina kukwanisa kubata nhasi vakaramba kuti vakaita zvehuori nemari iyi. Komiti yaVaBiti yashorawo kuita kwevamwe vakuru vakuru mubazi rezvamari avo vasinawo kuuya kuzopa humbowo kukomiti iyi pamusoro pemashandisirwo aiitwa mari zviri kunze kwemutemo nehurumende muna 2017 na2018. VaBiti vayambira vakuru ava, vano sanganisira mukuru anoona nezvamabhajeti mubazi rezvemari, VaZvinecheimwe Churu, kuti vasara nemukana mumwe chete uye kana vakatadza kuuya musi wa15 Mbudzi vachasungwawo. VaChuru nevamwe vavo vatadza kuenda kuparamende vachiti vange vari kumusangano wekubasa kwavo kuDarwandale. Asi VaBiti vanoti basa reparamende rakakosha kudarika rimwe basa ripi zvaro. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi, vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaNyasha Muchichwa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hapana chakaipa chiri kuitwa neparamende sezvo iri kuita basa rayo rekuongorora kuti mari yevanhu yakashandiswa sei. Vatiwo hazvifaniri kunetsa bazi rezvemari kutsanangura kuti mari yakashandiswa sei vachiti kana poita kuda kunzvenga nzvenga zvinoreva kuti pane zvinenge zvisina kufambiswa zvakanaka. Paramende iri kuita ongororo mushure mekunge hofisi inoona nezvekufambiswa kwemari dzehurumende yaAuditor-General vaburitsa mugwaro rayo kuti mari dzainge dzisina kushandiswa zvakanaka nebazi rezvekurima muna 2017 na2018. Mari yacho zhinji yakashandiswa pazvirongwa zvePresidential Input Scheme neCommand Agriculture. Gurukota rinoona nezvekurima VaPerrance Shiri vakazivisa kuti gore rino vari kuvandudza mapirwo emari iyi vachiti vanhu vanenge voenda kunopihwa mari dzacho sezvikwereti kumabhanga. Nyaya yekusafambisa zvakanaka mari idzi kunziwo nemuzinda weAmerica muZimbabwe mumwe munongedzo wehuori hunoitika munyika huchipa kuti itadze kufambira mberi asi iyo yozoti zvirango zvainoti yakatemerwa. Asi hurumende inoti chirongwa cheCommand Agriculture chakakosha kuvandudza nyaya dzezvehupfumi kuburikidza nekurima. No media source currently available

headline: Ndakatamba chikweshe: Nyangela
text: SHASHA yakambonetsa munhabvu Maronga “Bomber” Ngangela anoti nhabvu yezvikweshe yakakosha chaizvo nekuti ndiko kwakabikwa tarenda rake kusvikira ave nemukurumbira.   Nyangela anoti kubikwa kwevatambi hakufanire kutangira kumaAcademy, asi kuti kuzvikweshe.   “Isu tichikura, nhandare dzaizara vanhu vachiuya kuzotiona tichitamba zvikweshe chaizvo.   “Zvaisimudzira chaizvo kune vechidiki kuti vari kuonekwa vachitamba zvichikweshe uye zvaivatuma kuramba vachishanda nesimba. Saka tinofanirwa kuzvikoshesa uye kutsvaga zvinosimudzira vechidiki kuti varambe vachishanda nesimba,” anodaro Nyangela.   Bomber mumwe wevatambi vaizunza mambure  munhorondo yenhabvu yemuno izvo zvaimuona achinwisa kanodarika ka20 mumwaka yakasiyana achitambira Black Rhinos FC.   Zita rekuti Bomber vanotaura vanoti rakabva pakuti Nyangela ainwisa bhora zvisina mukare akamboona izvo zvakamuona achinwisa ka30 mune mumwe mwaka kozoti pamwe akanwisa ka29 ndokuhinha mubairo weGolden Boot mugore ra1987 ari kuBlack Rhinos.   Makore ano hakuchina vatambi vakaita saBomber vanozunza mambure zvinonwisa mvura.   “Tichitarisa vatambi variko ava zvinosuwisa zvikuru. Mutambi akanwisa nhasi anombogara mitambo mina kana mishanu achitadza kunwisa zvakare uye mumutambo wacho anotoda mikana 10 chaiyo kuti anwise kamwe chete.   “Isu taiti tikapihwa mukana mumwe chete taibva tatoziva kuti igobhora iroro,” anodaro.   Asi anoti kana vatambi vechikwata vakatamba vakabatana zvinobatsira kuti vahwine.   “Ndinoona sekunge zvikwata hazvisi kutamba zvakabatana chete, asi zvikabatana mumwe nemumwe achiita basa rake raapindira munhandare zvinohwina chete.   “Nhabvu haisi yehumbimbindoga, vatambi vanofanirwa kutamba sechikwata chimwe vakabatana,” anodaro.   Bomber anoti zvakakosha kuti vatambi vashande nesimba kuitira kuti vagokwanisa kuenda kune maligi anobhadhara mari yakanaka.   “Nhabvu yave nemari zhinji pasi rese uye vatambi vemuno ndiyo yavave kungofunga chete.   “Mari ngaive muripo unopihwa kumutambi anenge ashanda nesimba kwete kuti vanotungamidza mari.   “Isu panguva yedu pataitamba nhabvu yaisabhadhara sezvayave kuita iye zvino. Asi, taive nerudo nemutambo uyu uye taifara chaizvo kana vatsigiri vakauya kuzotiona kunhandare tichitamba,” anodaro.   Kubva asendeka nhabvu, muchinda uyu ange ari kushanda kubika vatambi vechidiki vari kusimukira uye akamborairidza kuBlack Rhinos ari mutevedzeri waStanford ‘Stix’ Mutizwa.   Anoti iye pamwe nedzimwe shasha dzakambonetsa dzichitamba nhabvu vane basa rekusimudzira vechidiki.   “Kutaura kuno ndine vechidiki vandiri kubatsira vari kukura ndichivapa ruzivo rwenhabvu nemazano kuti vasimukire mumutambo uyu uye muhupenyu hwavo.   “Tinoona vazhinji vachiwira pasi pasina kwavasvika nekuda kwekuzvirova matundundu. Saka tiri kuedza semalegends kubatsira vana vedu, vasimuke mumutambo uyu. Mari nembiri zvinokuvadza, hunge zvikasashandiswa zvakanaka, vechidiki ngavazvizive,” anodaro.   Kunyangwe hake Bomber aizivikanwa ari shasha yekuzunza mambure panguva yake muchikwata cheBlack Rhinos, anoti chinhu chakange chakamukoshera mikombe yavaihwina sechikwata sezvavakaita mugore ra1984 apo vakahwina mikombe miviri.   “Ini chinhu chandaitungamidza pazvese kuhwina sechikwata, ndizvo zvainge zvakandikoshera chete. Kunyangwe tikasatamba zvinogutsa asi kubatana kwataive takaita ndiko kwaindikoshera chete. Hapasi pose pataihwina, dzimwe dzenguva zvairema tichirwa kuti tisaburitswe muligi.   “Ndizvo zvimwe ndinoda kudzidzisa kune vechidiki kuti nhabvu ngaive yechikwata uye ngavatungamidze chikwata pazvese vanenge vachiita,” anodaro Bomber.

headline: VaLumumba Vorohwa neKutorwa neMapurisa
text: VaAcie Lumumba avo vakaparura bato ravo rezvematongerwo enyika nemusi weChina rinonzi Viva Zimbabwe vanonzi vasungwa uye kurohwa nevanhu vasiri kuzivikanwa. VaLumumba vakaparura bato ravo iri kuAmbassador Hotel muHarare Munyori anoona nezvemutemo mubato idzva iri VaAgency Gumbo vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaLumumba varohwa panze pehotera iyi. "VaLumumba pavangobuda muhotera mavanga vari vabva vangorohwa nevanhu vatisiri kuziva kuti ndivananai." VaGumbo vatiwo VaLumumba vabva vadaidzwa nemapurisa kuHarare Central Police Station. "VaLumumba vadaidzwa kumapurisa vachinzi vange vari kuda kubvunzurudzwa nemapurisa. Asi patazoyedza kuvafonera panharembozha yavo vange vasingadaire nharembozha yavo. Ikozvino hatisi kuziva kuti vari kupi." VaLumumba pakuparura bato ravo vanonzi vakatukirira mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Studio 7 yayedza kutaura naVaLumumba panharembozha yavo asi vange vasiri kudaira.

headline: Mapurisa neMauto Orambaidza Vanhu Kupinda Mukati meDhorobha reBulawayo
text:
Mapurisa nemasoja aswera achirambidza vanhu kupinda mukati meguta reBulawayo uye kudzinga vamwe vanhu vanga vave muguta nechekare.

Vamwe vanhu vataura neStudio7 vati vanetseka kusvika kumabasa kwavo
sezvo mapurisa achishanda nevechiuto, ange akaisa maroadblock
mumigwagwa yose inopinda mudhorobha achidzorera vanhu vakwanda
kudzimba.

Mumwe mugari uyo angozvidoma nezita rekuti Sisa, uyo anogara mumusha weCowdray Park achitengesa mune chimwe chitoro chinotengesa zvekudya, ati azokwanisa hake kusvika kubasa kwake asi zvange zvakaoma.

Mumwezve mugari uyo angozvidoma nezita rekuti Amai Dube, ati
ashamisika nekuona mapurisa nemasoja vachidzinga vanhu mudhorobha
zvisinei nekuti mitemo yelockdown yakati zvitoro nemamwe mabhizimisi
zvinogona kuvhura kusvika panguva dza3 masikati.

Mumazuva mashoma apfuura dare repamusoro reHigh Court rakapa mutongo wekuti mapurisa haana mvumo yekubvunza vanhu magwaro ekufambisa kana kuvarambidza kufamba, mushure mekunge rimwe gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaObey Shava, vakwira kudare nechikumbiro chechimbi-chimbi chekuti mapurisa asaite izvi.

VaShava vati vanoshushikana zvikuru nekusatevedzera mutemo kuri kuitwa nemapurisa.

Pave nemazuva akawanda mapurisa nevechiuto vachirambidza veruzhinji
kupinda mumadhorobha munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana munyika uye
vakawanda vanoti izvi zvine chekuita nekuedza kudzivirira kuratidzira
kwakarongwa kuitwa mangwana.

Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kumutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant
Commissioner Paul Nyathi, sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isingabatiki.

Asi mukuru wemapurisa, VaGodwin Matanga, vakaudza Studio7 neChitatu kuti kuratidzira kuri kuda kuitwa nemusi weChishanu hakuzi pamutemo uye vanhu vasina mvumo yekupinda mumadhorobha vanofanirwa kugara
kudzimba dzavo.

Mune imwewo nyaya, mukuru weNational Aids Council mudunhu reBulawayo, Amai Sinatra Nyathi, vaudza Studio7 kuti veruzhinji munyika havasi kutambira zvizere kuti chirwere cheCovid-19 chiriko uye vayambira
kuti vanhu vanofanirwa kutevedzera zvinotaurwa nenyanzvi dzezvehutano
senzira yekuzvidzivirira pakubata chirwere ichi.

Amai Sinatra vataura izvi mushure mekupa rubatsiro rwezvinhu zvinoshandiswa mukudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 zvakaita sema Personal Protective Equipment nema sanitiser kukanzuru yeBulawayo. Vati vaona zvakakosha kupa rubatsiro urwu sezvo vashandi vezvehutano kunyanya vana mukoti vari ivo vari panjodzi yakakura yekubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19.

Pachiitiko chimwe chete sangano reWorld Vision rapawo rubatsiro kukanzuru yeBulawayo rwematangi emvura, mushonga inoshandiswa pakuchenesa nzvimbo uyewo zvipfeko nezvinhu zvinoshandiswa kudzivirira kubata chirwere ichi.

Kune vanhu gumi nevanomwe vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kusvika pari
zvino muguta reBulawayo uye pari zvino guta iri ndiro rine huwandu
hwakakura hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi munyika mose. No media source currently available

headline: VaTsvangirai Vanoti MDC-T Haisi Kuzobatana naAmai Mujuru
text: Mutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vayambira nhengo dzavo kuti dzirambe dzakamira semuzamba vachiti bato ravo harisi kuzotungamirirwa nebato reZimbabwe People First sezviri kufunga vakawanda. Mutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vanoti MDC ibato guru uye harisi kuzomedzwa nemutungamiri weZimbabwe People First, Amai Joice Mujuru. VaTsvangirai vatiwo hapana kutaurirana kuripo pakati pavo naAmai Mujuru, izvo vanogaronzwa veruzhinji vachitaura. Vachitaura kekutanga kubva pakanyoreswa Zimbabwe People First svondo rapera, VaTsvangirai vayambira nhengo dzavo kuti dzirambe dzakamira semuzamba vachiti bato ravo harisi kuzotungamirirwa nebato reZimbabwe People First sezviri kufungwa nevakawanda. Vachitaura neChipiri pamahofisi ebato ravo muChinhoyi, VaTsvangirai vaudza vatsigiri vavo kuti vasaite semhepo inoenda kunoenda mhepo, asi kuti varambe vachitsigira bato ravo kudzamara rave kutonga. VaTsvangirai vatiwo mashoko ekuti vari kuita nhaurirano naAmai Mujuru manyepo uye bato ravo harisi kuzotungamirirwa nemumwe mutungamiri werimwe bato, kunze kwaivo VaTsvangirai vakasarudzwa nekongiresi kuti vatungamire bato. VaTsvangirai vati kuisa Amai Mujuru pamberi kana kuita mubatanidzwa nebato ravo zvakafanana nekudzokera kuZanu PF, sezvo Amai Mujuru vari munhu akadzingwa muZanu PF nepamusana pekunetsana kuri mubato iri, asi ivo mukati memoyo wayo vachiri kuda kuramba vari mubato iri. VaTsvangirai vatorawo mukana uyu kushoropodza zvikuru mashoko emutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaPhelekezela Mphoko, ekuti pane vanhu mubato reZanu PF vari kuti kana mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vabva pachigaro, munhu achatora nzvimbo yavo haafanirwe kunge ari muZezuru sezvo VaMugabe vari muZezuru. VaTsvangirai vati hakuna chizvarwa chakakosha kudarika chimwe chizvarwa munyika. Vati vanhu vane mafungiro akadaro, imharadzi dzevanhu munyika. Vachitaura kunhengo dzehutungamiri hwebato ravo muMashonaland West dzanga dzichidarika mazana mashanu, VaTsvangirai vati vanhu vasateerera mashoko aVaMugabe ekuti nyika dzemuAfrica dzibude mumubatanidzwa wenyika dzepasi rose weUnited Nations vachiti mashoko aVaMugabe ndeemunhu anyanya kukwegura. VaTsvangirai vati vanhu vanofanirwa kudzidza pane zvakaitika apo VaMugabe vakabudisa nyika mumusangano weCommonwealth muna Mbudzi 2003, izvo zvakasiya Zimbabwe isisina madzisahwira ayo akawanda. VaTsvangirai vari kushanyira matunhu ose emunyika vachisangana nehutungamiri hwevatsigiri vavo vachitaura pamusoro pezviri kuitika mubato pamwe nemunyika. Musangano wemuChinhoyi wapindwawo nehutungamiri hweMDC-T hunosanganisira mutevedzeri waVaTsvangirai, Muzvare Thokozani Khupe, munyori mukuru mubato iri, VaDouglas Mwonzora, pamwe nemutauriri webato, VaObert Gutu. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vashanu Vopora Kubva kuCoronavirus muBulawayo
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muZimbabwe hwasvika pamakumi mashanu nevatanhatu kuti 56. Asi vamwe vanhu vashanu kuBulawayo vapora kubva kuhutachiona uhu zvichireva kuti munyika yose vanhu makumi maviri nevatu vapora. Vanhu vafa vachiri vana. Vanhu vari kurwara makumi maviri nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 29. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzeezvehutano dziri kuyambira kuti kushaikwa kwezvikwanisiro zvekuvheneka vanhu vane chirwere ichi kana kuti matest kits kunoreva kuti vanhu vanoona kunge vari kuparadzira chirwere ichi vasingazive nekuti kue vamwe vanhu vanogona kunge vasingakosore kana kupisa muviri asi vachitapurira chirwere. Gurukuta rinoona nezvehutano Doctor Obadiah Moyo vakatenda kuti nyika yave kupererwa nezvekuvheneka vanhu. Vamwe vakabva kunze kwenyika vachimbochengetwa munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana vanoti vave kunzi vabhadhare mari dzinodarika madhora makumi matanhatu nemashanu ekuAmerica kuti vavhenekwe hutachiona uhu. Asi munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana vanyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter kuti hurumende haibhadharose vanhu kunze kwekunga huri hurongwa hwavo vega. Mukuru musangano reCommunity Working Group on Health VaItai Rusike vanoti danho rehurumende rekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba pasina guva yakatarwa harisi kushanda. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika zvuru zana kana kuti 100 000 vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muAfrica uye vashaya vadarika zvuru zvitatu nemazana maviri anemakumi mana nevatanhatu kana kuti 3.246. Vapora vanodarika zvuru zvina nezviviri kana kuti 42, 000 Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni mashanu nezvuru mazana matatu kana kuti 5, 3 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuamerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi vadarika miriyoni imwe chete nezvuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 1,6 million. Vanhu vafa muAmerica vave kuda kusvika pazvuru zana kana kuti 100 000. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika zvuru mazana matatu 300 000 asi vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni maviri kana kuti 2 million. No media source currently available

headline: Vanotengesera Mumigwagwa Vodyira Hurumende Marasha
text: Vanoita basa rekutengesa mumigwagwa nevanoita mabasa emaoko vaenderera mberi nemusangano wavo pachechi yeAnglican muHarare zvisinei nechaunga chemapurisa vamwe vacho vanga vakapakatira pfuti, uye vamboda kurambidza vanhu ava kuita musangano uyu. Vanhu ava vaungana kuti vazeye matanho avangatora mushure mekudzingwa mudhorobha nekanzuru yeHarare ichibatsirwa nemapurisa eZRP izvo zvavanoti zvasiya mhuri zhinji dzichinhonga svosve nemuromo. Vamhu ava vashoropodza zvikuru kurohwa kwavati vari kuitwa nemapurisa pamwe nekutorerwa zvavanenge vachitengesa. Vatengesi vati vakaramba vachishungurudzwa vanoda kuti vese vanobata mabasa emaoko vabatane pamwe chete voenda kubazi rehurumende rine chiga chekubatsira vanotambura. Mumwe mutengesi asina kuda kudomwa nezita ati kana vachitadziswa kuzvichengeta, hurumende inofanirwa kuvachengeta. Vanhu ava varatidza hasha uye vayambirawo mapurisa kuti vakaramba vachivarova vachaitawo chirwirangwe sezvo vaine kodzero dzavo semunhu wese. Amai Chipo Magwizi vati vatengesi vemumigwagwa vanofanirwa kubatana vorwisawo vanenge vachivarwisa. Mumwe mugare wemuHarare, Amai Vaida Nhemachena, vatiwo kunyange hazvo vari kushungurudzwa havasi kuzobuda mudhorobha kusvika kanzuru yeHarare yavapa kwekutengesera kune vanhu. Vatiwo mwedzi uno zvakavaomera zvikuru sezvo vasina bhizimusi ravakaita nekuda kwekudzingwa nemapurisa. Sachigaro weNational Vendors Union of Zimbabwe, VaStendrick Zvorwadza, vatiwo vanodawo kutaura nemutungamiriri wenyika kuti vanzwisise kuti mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, ndivo vari kutuma mapurisa here kuti varove vatengesi vemumigwagwa. Vati vapa VaMugabe masvondo maviri chete kuti vakurukure nevanoita mabasa emaoko. VaZvorwadza vashoropodzawo mapurisa nekumboda kumisa musangano wavo izvo zvaita kuti vanonoke kutanga. VaZvorwadza vati mapurisa haana simba rekupa mvumo kana kurambidza misangano asi vanongofanira kuziviswa chete pasi pemutemo wePublic Order and Security Act. Pave nemasvondo matatu vanotengesa mumigwagwa vachiita hwagonzo nakiti nemapurisa eZRP pamwe neekanzuru, ayo ari kuvabvisa mumigwagwa nechisimba. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Inonyorerana Chibvumirano neKambani yeKunze Kuti Ishambadze Marasha
text: Hurumende yanyorerana chibvumirano neimwe kambani yekunze kwenyika kuitira kuti ibatsirwe mukutengesa marasha kunyika dzakaita seIndia neJapan. Vachitaura pakunyoreranwa kwechibvumirano ichi ne Victoria Consulting, gurukota rinoona nezvezvicherwa, VaWinston Chitando, vati donzvo rehurumende nderekuti nyika iwanirwe kwekutengesera marasha kuIndia uye kuitira kuti iwane mari yekushandisa mukuchera marasha aya. VaChitando vati Zimbabwe inofungidzirwa kuti ine marasha anosvika mabhiriyoni makumi maviri nemashanu ematani asi pagore kuri kucherwa matani ari pakati pemamiriyoni maviri nemamiriyoni matatu. VaChitando vatiwo India ndiyo inotenga marasha akawanda pagore zvichienzaniswa nedzimwe nyika. Vachitaura pamusangano mumweyo, mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vati Zimbabwe inofanirwa kutora mukana wekudyidzana wakanaka uripo pakati payo neIndia. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kuziva kuti kambani yeVictoria Consulting yakamboshanda nenyika dzipi, uye kuti vakuru vayo ndivanani. Asi vaimbove mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvezvicherwa muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, VaGift Chimanikire, vati havaoni kuti zvakanaka kuti Zimbabwe itsvage misika yekutengesera marasha kunze kwenyika, ipo pari zvino kusiri kucherwa marasha anokwana munyika. Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi, VaNyasha Muchichwa, vatiwo havaoni zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe itsvake kambani yekunze inonotsvakira Zimbabwe misika yemarasha. VaMuchichwa vatiwo zviri nani kuti kushandiswe hukama hwagara huripo nedzimwe nyika. Dandemudande rebazi rezvezvicherwa rinoti Zimbabwe ine marasha akanaka, uye ine nzvimbo makumi maviri nepfumbamwe dzine marasha. Makambani maviri chete munyika, Hwange Colliery neMakomo Resources, ndiwo ari kunyanyochera marasha. No media source currently available

headline: Vatsigiri venhabvu vodya magaka mambishi
text: VATSIGIRI venhabvu vari kudya magaka mambishi zvichitevera kukundwa kwaitwa maWarriors neEthiopia mumutambo wechipiri wekurwira tikiti rekuenda kuQatar World Cup 2022.    MaWarriors akundwa 1-0 mumutambo uyo watambirwa kuEthiopia, uye iye zvino asarwa negomo guru rekukwira mukurwira tikiti rekuenda kuQatar gore rinotevera sezvo mitambo yechikwata ichi inotevera chichasangana neGhana.    Munyori mukuru weFriends of the Warriors – Zivanai Muwashu – ati murairidzi wemaWarriors Zdravko Logarusic ave kufanirwa kusiya basa nekuti hapana chaari kubatsira nacho chikwata chedu asi kuchidzorera kumashure.    “Tange tichifanirwa kuhwina mutambo wedu neEthiopia kuti tirambe tiine mukana wekurwira kuenda kuWorld Cup.    “Loga apa atirwadzisa, ngaaende nekuti tamupa nguva refu asi chabuda hapana,” anodaro Muwashu.    Achitaurawo, mutsigiri mukuru wemaWarriors, Adomsi Mukwasi anoti tikiti rekuenda kuWorld Cup rinogona kunge raperera nekukundwa kwataitwa neEthiopia.    “Kukundwa kwataitwa manheru ano, zvinogona zvatidhakirwa ipapa. Tange tichifanira kuhwina mutambo uyu. Iye zvino tisu tabva taenda pasi muboka redu, tave negomo guru rekukwira kuti tikwanise kuenda kuQatar gore rinotevera,” anodaro Mukwasi.    Aimbove mutambi wenhabvu Musset Zengeni anoti maWarriors ange achifanirwa kutora zvibodzwa zvose pamutambo weEthiopia, kukundwa kwataitwa kwavasiya vane gomo guru rekukwira.    “Tange tichifanira kuhwina nhasi, apa tarasa mukana mukuru. Regai tione paGhana tinogona kuwana zvibodzwa zvingani,” anodaro Zengeni.    Vamwe vange vachitenderedza mashoko padandemutande vachiti Loga aremerwa saka zviri nani aende vamwe vachiti #Logaremerwa

headline: Vagari vemuHarare Vanoti Mitemo yeHurumende Yopa Kuti Nzara Ipfunye Chisero Mudzimba Dzavo
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti kunyange hazvo hurumende ichibvuma kuti hupfumi hausi kufamba zvakanaka uye kuti veruzhinji havasisina mabasa gore rino yakatora matanhano akawedzera kutambudzika kweveruzhinji akaita sekuvatandanisa mumigwagwa umo vaitengesa kuti vawane raramo pamwe nekuvaputsira dzimba ichiti dzimba idzi dzainge dzavakwa munzvimbo dzisingabvumidzwe. Gore rino hurumende yakapa mvumo kumakanzuru kuti adzinge vanotengesa mumigwagwa zvikuru sei panzvimbo dzisingabvumidzwe ichiti vaisvibisa maguta nemadhorobha. Asi vanhu ava vanoti makunzuru aya ari kutadza kuvapa nzvimbo dzavano kwana vese sezvo vawanda zvikuru nekuda kwekushaikwa kwemabasa. Izvi zvaita kuti gore ra2015 ripere vashandi vemakanzuru nemapurisa vachiita hwakiti nagonzo nevanotengesa mumigagwa. Mukuru werimwe remasangano anomirira vanotengesa mumigwagwa reZimbabwe Informal Sector Organization zvakare vari mutauriri wemubatanidzwa wemasangano anomiriria vanotengesa mumigwagwa reInformal Economy Coalition, VaPromise Mkwananzi, vanoti kunyange nhengo dzavo dziri kushungurudzwa vacharamba vachitengesa mumigwagwa sezvo pasina zvimwe zvavangaite. VaMkwananzi vanoti nhengo dzemasangano avo dziri kurasikrwa nemari yakawanda chose apo dzinotorerwa zvinhu zvadzo nemakanzuru nemapurisa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaMasimba Manyanya vanoti pane kushungurudza vanhu, makanzuru pamwe nehurumende vanofanira kugadzirisa dambudziko raita kuti vanhu vagume vave mumigwagwa vachitsvaga chouviri. Asi VaPaddington Japajapa avo, vanomirira sangano remabhizimisi reZimbabwe Centre for Business for Opportunities, vanoti kunyange hazvo vanhu vayaura nenhamo havafaniri kurarama nekuita zvinhu zviri kunze kwemutemo. VaJapajapa vanoti sangano ravo rinotsigira vemabhizimisi madiki nevanotengesera mumigwagwa asi rinodawo kuti vatevedze mitemo vachiti zvimwe zvave kutikita mumaguta hazvina kunaka sezvo vanhu vave kutengesera pese pese. V ashorawo danho rakatorwa nehurumende rekurambidza kupinda munyika mbatya neshangu tsaru vachiti izvi ndizvo zvave kuraramisa veruzhinji sezvo makambani anogadzira mbatya akavhara. Imwe nyaya isina kufadza veruzhinji kuputsirwa dzimba dzavo nekanzuru muHarare neChitungwiza nekanzuru vachinzi vainge vadzivaka panzvimbo dzisingabvumidzwe. Asi VaManyanya vanoti zvinoshamisa kuti makanzuru anorega vanhu vachivaka nekushandisa mari dzakawanda achimirira kuzoparadza chete. VaManyanyaya vanotiwo masangano anomiriria vagari a anofanirawo kudzidzisa veruzhinji mutemo nematanho anofanira kutedzwa nemunhu asati avaka. Asi VaJapajapa vanoti vanhu havafanira kuvakapa pese pese vachiti dzimwe dzimba dziri kuputswa dzakavakwa panzvimbo dzisingaite dzakaita sepasi petambo dzemagetsi kana nzvimbo dzinofanira kuvakwa zvikoro kana machechi. Vanotiwo vamwe vanhu vaivaka nechisimba vachishandisa zvematongerwo enyika. Vanongorora nyaya dzehupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakaitika zvese izvi zvakakonzera kutambura kwanyanya sezvo zvakaita kuti vanhu varasikirwe nemari yakawanda. VaKuchera vanoti mhuri zhinji munyika hadzichakwanisa kurarama sedzaiita kare. VaKuchera vanoti hurumende inofanira kuisa mutemo inokwezva vemabhizimisi kuti vatange mabhizimisi munyika kuti veruzhinji vakakwanise kuchengeta mhuri dzavo. Vanoti mhuri zhinji dzaparira nepasi rese dzichitsvaga raramo uye zvinofungidzirwa pane zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinodarika mamiriyoni matatu zvave kugara kunze kwenyika. Vazhinji vevanhu ava vari kunyika dzakaita seSouth Africa neBritain. No media source currently available

headline: Kaputeni weCaps United Zvirekwi Ochekwa Ruoko paChanza Mushure meTsaona
text: Mutambi weCaps United anovazve kaputeni wechikwata ichi, Hardlife Zvirekwi akakuvara zvakaipisisa munjodzi yemotokari muHarare neMuvhuro mangwanani zvakapa kuti vanachiremba kuchipatara cheParirenyatwa Group of Hospitals vamudimbure ruoko rwake nechepachanza. Mukuru wechikwata cheCaps United VaCuthbert Chitima vakaudza Studio 7 kuti vanachiremba vainge vavavimibisa kuti achakwanisa hake kuramba achitamba nhabvu kana ave kunzwa zviri nani. No media source currently available

headline: MDC-T Inoti Haipinde Misangano yePOLAD.
text: Munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, vakazivisa nezuro kuti musangano wevatungamiri vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika vakakwikwidza musarudzo dzemuna 2018 vari mugungano rePolitical Actors’ Dialogue, kana kuti POLAD, vari kusangana nhasi vachishandisa dandemutande. VaMangwana, avo tatadza kubata kuti tinzwe zvizhinji, havana kutaura kuti chii chikuru chichakurukurwa mumusangano uyu. Asi musangano uyu uri kuuya panguva iyo vanhu vakawanda kusanganisira mutungamiri weMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vemakereke pamwe nevanhuwo zvavo, vari kukurudzira kuti munyika muitwe nhaurirano dzinopindwa nemapoka ose senzira yekugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nenyika. Chipangamazano chezvehupfumi mubato reMDC-T uye vari mubato wehomwe, Doctor Tapiwa Mashakada, vanoti bato ravo harineyi nechekuita nePOLAD sezvo riri sangano revatungamiri wemapato vakakwikwidza musarudzo dza 2018. Vakambofanobata chigaro chemutungamiri weMDC-T, Muzvare Thokozani Khupe, vaipinda misangani yePOLAD. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubzwa divi raMuzvare Khupe. Asi VaMashakada vanoti VaMwonzora havana kukwikwidza muna 2018, nekudaro havasi mugungano iri. Ngatinzweyi hurukuro yavaita naJonga Kandemiiri weStudio 7. No media source currently available Asi mutauriri weNational Constitutional Assembly, VaMaddock Chivasa, vanoti mutungamiri webato ravo, Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku, vari kupinda mumusangano uyu. Ngatinzweyi hurukuro yavaita naBlessing Zulu weStudio7. No media source currently available
