headline: Vanachiremba Vanoti Mamasiki Ashandiswa Asabatwabatwa Kunze Kwekuarasa
text: Zvichitevera kutaurwa pachena kwekuti vamwe vanhu vari kunhonga zvinoshandiswa kuvhara mhuno nemiromo, mamasiki, (face masks) anoshandiswa nevanhu mukudzivirira chirwere che coronavirus, bazi rehurumende rinoona nezvehutano rakurudzira vanhu paTwitter paro kuti vanhu vachekecheke mamasiki avashandisa vasati vaarasa kuitira kuti vamwe vanhu vasaanhonga vachiawacha kuti vazoatengesa zvekare. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko ekuti vamwe vanhu varikufamba vachinhonga mamasiki akasviba awa, vachiawacha vachizoatengesera kuvanhu zvekare. PaTweeter pavo, bazi rehurumende rinoona nezvehutano rinokurudzira vanhu kuti vatore mamasiki avo avashandisa vachiachekacheka vasati vamarasa kudzivirira kuti vamwe vanhu vasazoanonga vachiatengesa zvekare. Asi vamwe vanachiremba vanoti bazi rehurumende rezvehutano ririkukurudzira vanhu kuita zvinovapinza munjodzi dzehutano, vachiti mamasiki ashandiswa anenge ave tsvina isingafanirwi kubatwa asi inofanirwa kuraswa isina kubatwa nemaoko kunyange nemuridzi wayo. Dr Simbiso Ranga, vanoshanda mudunhu reNorth Carolina, muAmerica, vanoti kana ‘face mask” yashandiswa, haifanirwi kubwatwa kunze nemuridziwayo asi achiibata zvakanaka uye akachenjera paanoirasa nekuti ndiyo yakabata nekutakura hutachiona hwese hwange huchida kupinda mumuviri wake. Dr Ranga vati kana iri masiki yako unogona kuibata zvakanaka, pakuiwacha nepakuiwomesa kuti ugoishandisa zvekare, iwe muridzi wayo. No media source currently available

headline: Egpyt Yotatsurana neSenegal Mufainari yeAfcon
text: Makwikwi eAfrica Nations Cup 2021 ari kutarisirwa nhasi kusvika kwamvura yacheka makumbo nemutambo wefainari pakati peEgypt neSenegal. Mutambo uye wakamirirwa nevakawanda sezvo paine vatambi vane mukurumbira vanoti Mo Salah anotambira Egypt neLiverpool uye Sadio Mane anotambira Senegal neLiverpool zvekareuye Edouard Mendy mubati wepagedhi weSenegal neChelsea ari kushura mare pasi rose nekuva mangoyi wemhando yepamusoro. Egypt yasimudza mukombe uyu kanomwe, Senegal haisati yambouhwina. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvemitambo VaBrian Musekiwa vemuMaryland America vanoti vanoona sekuti Senegal yavanoti ine vatambi vakawanda vepamusoro ichakunda Ehypt 2-1. Nezuro Cameroon yakakunda Burkina Faso 5-3 mumapenalties mushure mekuita mangange 3-3 pakurwira chidanho chechitatu kumakwikwi aya. No media source currently available

headline: ZCTU Yoendeswa kuMatare neARTUZ Pamusoro peKongiresi
text: Masangano maviri anove nhengo dzesangano guru rinomirira vashandi munyika reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, kana kuti ZCTU, aendesa sangano iri kumatare edzimhosva achiti kongiresi yesangano iri iyo yakatarisirwa kuitwa svondo rinouya haifanire kuenderera mberi mushure mekunge ZCTU yatora danho rekuti masangano aya asavhote pakongiresi iyi. Mumapepa asvitswa kudare repamusoro reHigh Court nesangano rinomirira vadzidzisi vekumaruwa reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe pamwe nereFootwear Tanners and Allied Workers Union, ZCTU iri kupomerwa mhosva yekurambidza masangano aya kuvhota pakongiresi yesangano revashandi iri iyo yakatarisirwa kuitwa svondo rinouya muHarare. Mutungamiri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure, vati havasi kufara nedanho rakatorwa neZCTU vachiti sangano ravo rakaita zvose zvinodiwa pamutemo kuti rikwanise kuvhota pakongiresi iyi. VaMasaraure vati danho rakatorwa pamusangano weGeneral Council yeZCTU rekuvadzivisa kuvhota harisi pamutemo sezvo musangano weGeneral Council uyu wakaitwawo pasingatevedzwe bumbiro reZCTU. VaMasaraure vati musangano weGeneral Council uyu wakaitwa nguva yaifanira kuitwa musangano uyu wadarika saka nokudaro zvose zvakabvumiranwa pamusangano uyu hazvisi pamutemo. Asi mutungamiri weZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, vati pane kusawirirana pazvinoreva bumbiro remitemo yeZCTU, nokudaro nyaya iyi ichagadziriswa nematare. VeARTUZ nesangano reFootwear Tanners and Allied Workers Union vanoti vari kuda mutongo wekuti kongiresi iyi imiswe kusvika vabvimidzwa kuvhota pakongiresi iyi. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kusangano reFootwear Tanners and Allied Workers Union Musangano uyu ukabudirira, vakatarisirwa kukwikdzana pachigaro chemutungamiri weZCTU ndiVaPeter Mutasa naAmai Florence Taruvinga uye vakatarisirwa kukwikwidza pachigaro chemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wekutanga (1stVice President) ndiVaDominic Manyangadze naVaMandla Sibanda. VaMuchapiwa Mazarura naAmai Miriam Katumba ndivo vakatarisirwawo kukwikwidza pachigaro chemutevevedzeri wemutungamiri wesangano iri wechipiri kana kuti Second Vice President. Munyori mukuru weZCTU, kana kuti secretary general, anozodomwa panopera kongiresi. Mune imwewo nyaya, nhumwa yeUnited Nations iri kushanya munyika, Amai Alena Douhan, nhasi vasangana nemutungamiri weMDCT, VaDouglas Mwonzora, gurukota rinoona nezvekutengeserana, Amai Sekai Nzenza, gurukota rezvematunhu, VaJuly Moyo, nevamwe. Mutauriri waVaMwonzora, VaLloyd Damba, vati VaMwonzora vasvitsa nyaya dzakawanda kuna Amai Douhan dzinosanganisira kuti zvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe zvakanganisa zvakadii veruzhinji munyika. Kusangana kwaita Amai Douhan naVaMwonzora kunouyawo apo masangano anoshanda akazvimirira achiti Amai Douhan vanofanira kusangana nevemapato ezvematongerwo enyika akasiyana-siyana, vemabhizimusi, vedzisvondo, vadzidzi, vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu nevamwe kwete kuti vaswere vari mumahofisi ehurumende vachiudzwa zvinhu zvimwechete. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naAmai Douhan kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi asi hurumende yakati Amai Douhan vachazotaura nevatori venhau kamwe chete musi waGumiguru 28 kana vachinge vapedza misangano yavo. No media source currently available

headline: Vanopikisa Voshora Dare reMakurukota raVaMnangagwa Rizere Varume Chete
text: Mapato anopikisa anoti haasi kutambira nemufaro dare remakurukota rakadomwa nemusi weChina nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Makurukota aya ari kutarisirwa kutoreswa mhiko neMuvhuro. VaMnangagwa vakadoma dare remakurukota makumi maviri nevaviri, uye riine vanhukadzi vatatu chete vari mudare iri. VaMnangagwa vakadomawo makurukota ematunhu gumi zvichireva kuti makurukota pasi pehurumende yavo anenge ari makumi matatu nevaviri, kunyange hazvo makurukota anomirira matunhu asingapinde mudare remakurukota. Vakadzi vatatu vari mudare remakurukota ndiAmai Sithembiso Nyoni, gurukota rezvemadzimai nevechidiki; Amai Oppah Muchinguri Kashiri, gurukota rezvemamiririro ekunze uye Amai Priscah Mupfumira, gurukota rezvekushanyirwa kwenyika. Vanhukadzi vatatu vakaitwa makurukota ematunhu vanoti Amai Angeline Masuku (Bulawayo); Amai Rutendo Chikukwa (Harare), uye Amai Monica Mutsvangwa (Manicaland). Mapato anopikisa anoti VaMngangwa vaifanira kunge vakaremekedza zviri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika zvinovasungira kuti vaone kuti zvinzvimbo zvevanhukadzi zvawedzerwa muhurumende. Mutungamiri wechimwe ckwata chePeople's Democratic Party, PDP, Amai Lucia Matibenga, vanoti vakagara vazviona kare kuti VaMnangagwa munhu weZanu PF nokudaro havatarisiri kuona kushanduko inobva kumunhu weZanu PF. Chimwe chikwata che PDP chinotungamirwa naVaTendai Biti. Amai Matibenga vanoti vanhukadzi vacharemekedzwa zvido zvavo kana veruzhinji vakabvisa Zanu PF musarudzo dzegore rinouya. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano ravanaChiremba reZADHR Roshora Mabatirwo eNhengo dzeZanu PF Dziri muHusungwa
text: Sangano ravana chiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, rinoti riri kushushikana zvikuru nemabatirwo ari kuitwa vamwe vevaimbove vakuru-vakuru mubato re Zanu-PF, avo vakasungwa svondo rapera. Munyori mukuru we sangano iri, Dr. Evans Masitara, vanoti sangano ravo rinoshora zvakasimba zvakaitwa nemauto nemapurisa kuvasungwa ava uye vari kuedza zvikuru kuti vapiwe mvumo yekuzvionera voga vasungwa ivavo sezvo vainzi havana kubatwa zvakanaka pavakanga vari muhusungwa, umo vanonzi vakashungurudzwa nokurohwa. Dr Masitara vanoti zviri kuitwa nemapurisa kuvasungwa hazvibumidzwe nebumbiro yemitemo. VaChombo, avo vari kupomerwa mhosva dzehuwori, vakasungwa pamwe nemunyori muboka revechidiki muZanu PF, VaKudzanai Chipanga, pamwe nemurongi wemisangano muboka revechidiki, VaInnocent Hamandishe. VaChombo naVachipanga vari kumirirwa negweta rine mukurumbira, Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku, uye vari kutarisirwa kudzoka mudare nemusi weMuvhuro 27 Mbudzi. No media source currently available

headline: Dare reDzimhosva Rinoramba Kuti VaNguwaya Vabhadhariswe Mari yeChibatiso
text: Dare ramejisitireti muHarare rarasa chikumbiro chamuzvinabhimisisi ane mutauro mukuru munyika, VaDelish Nguwaya, chekuti vatongwe vachibva kumba kwavo panyaya mbiri dzavari kupomerwa. VaNguwaya vari kupomerwa mhosva dzekukorovhera hurumende kuti ipinde muchibvumirano chekutenga mishonga kubva kumbani yekunze yavanomirira muZimbabwe, yeDrax Consult SAGL. Mutongi wedare, Amai Vongai Muchuchuti, vati VaNguwaya vadzoke kudare musi wa 30 Chikumi, asi pose apa vanenge vari mutirongo. Amai Muchuchuti vati vanobvumirana nevachuchusi panyaya iyi kuti kana VaNguwaya vakabhadhara mari yechibatiso vanogona kuvhiringidza kuferefetwa kwenyaya iyi uye vanogona kutiza munyika sezvo mhaka yavakapara yakakura chose. Vatiwo vamwe vavanonzi vakapara navo mhosva iyi vari kunze kwenyika. VaNguwaya vanonzi vakapara mhosva iyi pamwe nemuridzi wekambani yeDrax Consult, LIir Dedja, uyo anonzi ari kuItaly kana kuti kuti Hungary. Rimwe remagweta aVaNguwaya, VaTafadzwa Hungwe, vanoti dare raona VaNguwaya semunhu asingavimbike sezvo vakomboita dzimwe nyaya dzekukorovhera vanhu nguva yapfuura. Vatiwo havana kufara nemutongo wedare uye vanovimba kuti dare repamusoro richave nemuono wakasiyana panyaya. VaNguwaya, avo vanomirira kambani yeDrax Consult SAGL neDrax International, vakusungwa nemusi weChishanu chapfuura vachipomerwa mhosva yekutsotsa kambani yehurumende inoita zvekutenga mishonga yeNatpharm kuita chibvumirano chekutenga mishonga kukambani yavanomirira inokosha mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu emadhora ekuAmerica. Vachuchusi panyaya iyi vanoti VaNguwaya vakanyepa kuti kambani iyi inogadzira mishonga izvo zvakaita kuti mapazi ehutano, nebazi remari ape NatPharm mvumo yekushanda neDrax. Asi VaNguwaya vari kuramba mhosva dzavari kupomerwa. Magweta avo anoti ivo semumiriri weDrax havana chavakatadza uye vachatura kudare humbowo hunoratidza kuti Dejda uyo akatombuuya munyika akaonana nemutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, ndiye ainyora nekusaina matsamba ekutsvaga basa rekutengesa mushonga kubazi rezvehutano. Magweta aya anotiwo ane humbowo hunoratidza kuti Drax yakapihwa basa kuNatpharm mushure mekunge bazi rezvemari raita ongororo rikaona kuti kambani iyi yainge yakachena. VaHungwe vanoti kunyange VaNguwaya vaive ivo vaisaina matsamba ekutsvaga basa kubazi rezvehutano, hapana nhema dzakataurwa mutsamba idzi nekuti kambani yeDrax inoita mabasa akawanda kusanganisira kutengesa mishonga. Vatiwo pachibvumirano cheDrax neNatpharm, Drax yakabuda pachena kuti mishonga yainotengesa yaiiwana kupi uye hapana kana nhema dzakataurwa muchibvumirano ichi. Mutitikitiva ari kuita nyaya iyi akaudza dare kuti vakatanga kuferefeta nyaya iyi mushure mekunge bazi rezvehutano, raratidza kusafara nechibvumirano cheDrax neNatpharm. Asi magweta aVaNguwaya anoti vane humbowo hunoratidza kuti mapurisa emuno akatanga kufererfeta nyaya iyi mushure mekunge sangano remapurisa pasi rese reInterpol ranyorera kuZimbabwe Republic Police richida rubatsiro pakuongorora kuti mamiriyoni maviri emadhora ekuAmerica aiinge aiswa mubhanga reDrax kuHungary yainge iri yei. Interpol yaifungidzira kuti paive nekusafambiswa kwemari zvakanaka kana kuti money laundering sezvo Drax isina basa rayaiita raizikanwa kuti iwane mari yakawanda kudai. Mushure maizvozvo hurumende yakabva yamisa chibvumirano cheDrax neNatpharm. Svondo rapfuura mapurisa akabvunzurudza vakuru vakuru kuNatpharm, bazi rezvehutano pamwe nebazi rezvemari uye vazhinji vavo vanotarisira kupa humbowo kana kusungwa nekuda kwenyaya iyi. VaNguwaya vakabuda mumifananidzo yakawanda vaine mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Auxilia Mnangagwa, pamwe nevana vaVaMnangagwa, Shaun na Collins. Mifananidzo iyi yakakonzera mitauro yakawanda mu social media vamwe vachiti zvose zviri kuitwa naVaNguwaya, vari kutsigirwa nemhuri yemutungamiri wenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Zanu-PF Yopembera Kukunda Vatsigiri vaVaMugabe kwaZvimba
text: Bato reZanu PF rinoti riri kufara nekukunda kwarakaita munzvimbo dzekwaZvimba uko kunobva vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe. Vachitaura pamahofisi ebato ravo muChinhoyi, mutevedzeri wasachigaro wedunhu reMashonaland West, VaDexter Nduna, vati vari kufara kuti vakakunda mapato aitsigirwa naVaMugabe munzvimbo dzeZvimba. VaMugabe vainge vati vanotsigira mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, kuti vave mutungamiri wenyika musarudzo dzakaitwa svondo rapera vachiti vainge vasingavhotere mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. VaNduna vati dunhu reMashonaland West rimwe rematunhu mana akavhotera VaMnangagwa neZanu PF zvine mutsindo. Kunyange bato reZanu PF razvipembedza kuti rakawana zvigaro gumi nezvisere pazvigaro makumi maviri nezviviri zviri mudunhu reMashonaland West, Muzvari Rudo Mpofu, vanoti Zanu PF iri kupemberera kutadza sezvo yaimbenge iine zvigaro makumi maviri nechimwe chete sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. Panyaya yekugadzwa zviri pamutemo kwaVaMnangagwa semutungamiri wenyika, VaNduna vati zvichaitwa panguva yakafanira pachitevedzerwa mutemo. Asi vayambira nhengo dzavo kuti dzisateerere zviri kubuda pamadandemutande zvekuti VaMnangagwa havasi kuzogadzwa nyaya yekukunda kwavo isati yapera kumatare edzimhosva. VaChamisa vari kuendesa nyaya yezvakaburitswa neZimbabwe Electoral Commission zvekuti VaMnangagwa ndivo vakakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. VaChamisa vanoti ivo ndivo vakakunda musarudzo iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vaviri Vofa neCovid-19 Kusanganisira Mumwe Mukuru weChikoro kuMasvingo
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa nechirwere cheCovid-19 huri kuramba huchikwira mushure mekunge vamwe vanhu vaviri vafa nechirwere ichi. Munhu mumwe chete akafa kuManicaland neMasvingo. Bepanhau reThe Masvingo Mirror rinoti akashaya mudunhu iri mukuru wechikoro cheMukaro High Amai Pauline Dzapasi avo vakashaya neChishanu vakavigwa neSvondo. Varairidzi vose vapachikoro ichi vanzi vambondogara pavo voga pasina mhuri pachityirwa kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Vana vechikoro avo vakavhara neChishanu vanziwo vari kuongororwa. Mukuru wezvehutano mudunhu reMasvingo Dr Amadeu Shamu vakatenda kuti Amai Dzapasi vakashaya mushure mekurwara nechirwere cheCovid-19. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave mazana matatu nemakumi maviri kana kuti 320. Vanhu zana nemakumi manomwe nevana vabatwa nechirwere ichi nemusi weSvondo. Vakawanda vacho vari muHarare uye matunhu ose ane vanhu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro kunze kwekuMashonaland West. Izvi zvasiya huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga hwave pazvuru gumi nezviri zvine mazana matatu nemakumi maviri nemashanu kana kuti 12, 325. Vanhu pora kubva kuchirwere ichi vave zvuru gumi zvine nemakumi maviri nevana kana kuti 10, 024 mushure mekunge vamwe vanhu makumi mana vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi. Vanhu vachiri kurwara vave churu chimwe chete chine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi masere nemumwe kana kuti 1,981. Asi kunyangwe hazvo vanhu vari kurwara nekufa nechirwere ichi, mutungamiri wesangano revakoti reZimbawe Nurses Association VaEnock Dongo vanoti hurumende haisi kuvapa zvekuzvidzivirira kubva kuchirwere cheCovid-19 zvopa kuti vakawanda vavo varware. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nezvuru mazana mana kana kuti 2,4 million vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zvuru makumi mashanu nemasere zvine mazana manomwe nemakumi matanhatu nevaviri kana kuti 58,762. Vapora vadarika mamiriyoni maviri kana kuti 2 million. South Africa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Dunhu reSADC ndirowo rine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi muAfrica vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi manomwe nematanmhatu ane zvuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 76,7 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vanodarika zviuru mazana matatu negumi nevanomwe kana kuti 317,000 vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni gumi nemanomwe nezvuru mazana masere kana kuti 17,8 million. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 1,6 million. Asi vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi mana nematatu kana kuti 43 million.

headline: Vatambi VeTeam Zimbabwe 2016 Paralympic Vodzokera Kumusha Vasina Menduru
text: Vatambi vemuZimbabwe vema2016 Paralympic Games vari kudzoka kumusha vari maoko chete. Mutori wedu wenhau dzemitambo. Vatambi vaviri vanga vasara kukwikwidza mumakundano aya ve Mixed Four, Margaret Bangajena, Michelle Garnet, Jesicca Davies na Previous Wiri nezuro vakapedza vari pachinhanho chekugumisira mugungano ravo. Vatambi ava vakatevera Laina Sithole uyo neMugovera akatadza kusvika mufainari ye 100 metres T35 ayo aive makundano ake ega aaikwikwidza. Sezvakaitawo chikwata cheZimbabwe kubva kumaOlympic Games chisina menduru, chikwata ichi chiri kudzokawo chisina kana menduru imwechete. Mumitambo yeCastle Lager Premier Soccer League chikwata cheHighlanders chiri mumafaro makuru mushure mekudzokorora kurova Dynamos 2-1mumutambo wanga wakaoma muBarbiurfields Stadium nezuro. Aka kave kechipiri Highlanders ichi kunda Dynamos mwaka uno wenhabvu mumitambo yeligi, kanove kechipiri zvekare mukati memakore gumi Bosso ichikwanisa kukunda Dembare. Kukunda uku kwasiya Bosso yasara nemapoinzi gumi pasi pechikwata chiri kutungamira cheFC Platinum icho chakarova How Mine 1-0 munhandare yeMandava. Mutsigiri weBosso VaDannboy Hamandishe vanoti vangadai vakakunda nezvibodzwa zvakawanda asi zvakangodaro varatidza kuti vanhu vakuru. Mumwe wavo VaTichaona Jecha vanoti murairidzi wawave naye ibanga chairo vachiti zvinhu zvasanduka. Kugona Kunenge Kudada yave nemapoinzi makumi mana nemasere kubva mumitambo makumi maviri nemitatu. Asi Bosso yave nemapoinzi matanhatu pamusoro peDynamos iyo nemamiriro akaita zvinhu yave kuratidza kuti yabuda mumakwikwi emukombe weligi. Asi Makepekepe aramba arimo muhondo yeligi mushure mekurova Chicken Inn 1-0. Kunyange hazvo chikwata ichi chaibaka moto hachina kukwanisa kunwisa zvibodzwa zvakawanda kunze kwechimwechete chakabva kuna Leonard Tsipa. Chikwata chemaGreen Machine chakatamba zvine mutsindo zvekuti mumwe muteveri wechikwata ichi Charles Muroyiwa anoti vanoisa mari muchikwata ichi vanotsvaga neshungu nematambiro aya. Asi maGreen Machine ari kuramba aiine poindi imwechete pasi peFC Platinum iyo yakarova How Mine. Musi mumwechete iwoyo, Hwange neZPC Kariba dzakaita mangange 1-1. Ngezi yakadambura Bulawayo City 1-0, Tsholotsholo ikakunda Border Strikers 1-0 asi Chapungu yakanwisa zviviri pakukunda Harare City 2-1. No media source currently available

headline: Kushungurudzwa kweVabva Kure Kwoenderera Mberi muSouth Africa
text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveSouth Africa zviri kuenderera mberi zvichityidzira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe nezvekune dzimwe nyika muzvipatara nemumisha inogara vazhinji. Izvi zviri kuitika kunyangwe hazvo mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, neChipiri vakashora zvikuru vamwe vanhu vemuSouth Africa vari kuratidzira pane zvimwe zvipatara, vachidzivirira kuti vabvakure varapiwe. VaRamaphosa vakaudza dare reparamende kuti maitiro aya anokonzera kuvengwa nekurwiswa kwevabvakure uye haasi pamutemo. Vakati South Africa inyika ine hutongo hwejekerere asi ine dambudziko revabvakure vane magwaro ekugara munyika iyi nevasina, vachiti kuvhundutsira nekushungurudza vabvakure vose hakubvumidzwi nemutemo wenyika. . Chikwta chinonzi Operation Dudula chiri kuratidzira pachipatara che Kalafong, muguta reAtteridgerville riri pedyo neguta re Pretoria, chichirambidza kupinda muchipatara kwevarwere vasiri zvizvarwa zvenyika iyi. Asi VaRamaphosa vakati mapurisa ari kurwisa kupedza nekumisa vabvakure vari muSouth Africa zvisiri pamutemo, vachiti zviri kuitwa nevanhu veOperation Dudula hazvienderani nezvinangwa zvehutongo hwe jekerere, vachiti vanhu vemuSouth Africa havavengi vabvakure uye vanovatambira zvakanaka. Vanodzidzisa zvematongerwo enyika paWellesley College kuMassachusetts, Muzvinafundo Chipo Dendere, vanoti VaRamaphosa vakamanikidzwa kutaura izvi zvichitevera mabasa esangano reOperation Dudula. Muzvinafundo Dendere vanoti nyaya iyi inogona kupedzwa nenhaurirano pakati pehurumende yeSouth Africa nehurumende yeZimbabwe, pamwe nemapato anopikisa nevamwe vane chekuita nezve magariro evanhu mu Zimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Makanzura Ose eChitungwza Ombosungwa neMapurisa Pamwe neVatori Venhau
text: Makanzura ese eguta reChitungwiza pamwe nevatori venhau vambosungwa pamahofisi ekazuru iyi apo makanzura ari pakati pekuita musangano. Gweta range richiririra makanzura aya VaJob Sikhala vati makanzura mazhinji azoregerwa asi vamwe vashanu vachiri mumaoko emapurisa. Zvinonzi mapurisa anga akapakatira zvombo asvika pamahofisi ekanzuru iyi ndokusunga makanzuru aya asina kuvapa chikonzero. Mumwe wemakunzura aya, VaTumai Fungai Magadzire avo vanomirira Ward 16 muChitungwiza makare vaudza Studio 7 varchiri kukamba yemapurisa yeSt Mary’s kuti havasi kuziva chikonzero chaita kuti vasungwe. Pasungwa makanzura aya panga paine vatori venhau vashanu vanoti Phillimon Jambaya, Audrey Galawu, Cleopatra Mapfumo, Christine Hlengani, naElma Sekete. Jambaya audza Studio 7 kuti iye nevamwe vake vanga vachiitawo basa ravo pavasungwa. Mukuru musangano rinorwira kodzero dzevatapi venhau reMisa Zimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo, vashora kusungwa kwaitwa vatori venhau ava vari pabasa. Makanzura aya pamwe nevatori venhau ava vazoendeswaa kukamba yeHarare Central kuCommercial Crimes Unit. Mutauriri wemapurisa, VaPaul Nyathi, vati havakwanise kutaura nezvenyaya iyi vachiti vanga vasati vatambira mashoko akakwana nezvenyaya iyi. Zvichakadai, vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reChitungwiza Residents Trust, Muzvare Alice Kuvheya, vashora kusungwa kwemakanzura edhorobha ravo vachiti zvinodzosera nyaya yebudiriro kumashure. Mukuru weSpecial Anti Corruption Unit, VaTabani Moyo, vaudza bepanhau reHerald kuti vasungawo mukuru anoona nezvemari mukanzuru yeHarare, VaTendai Kwenda, vachisungirwa nyaya yehuori. Zvinonzi VaKwenda vakasaina magwaro akaita kuti kanzuru yeHarare irasikirwe nemari inoita mamiriyoni masere emadhora ekuAmerica iyo yakashandiswa munzendo, kutengwa kwemotokari pamwe nekuenda kumazororo kwevamwe vakuru-vakuru mukanzuru kubva muna 2014 kusvika 2015. Vachipawo pfungwa dzavo, mutungamiri wesangano reHarare Residents Trust VaPrecious Shumba vati kunyange hazvo kurwisa huori chiri chinhu chakanaka, kusungwa kuri kuitwa makanzura eMDC mumaguta akawanda vamwe vari kuita huori vari muhurumende vasingasungwe kunoburitsa pachena kuti makanzura aya ave kungosungwa zvine chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika. Vamwe vakasungwa munguva pfupi yadarika vanosanganisira vaimbova meya weHarare, VaHerbert Gomba, meya weHarare parizvino VaJacob Mafume avo vari muchizarira, maabharani wekanzuru yeHarare VaHosia Chisango, mukuru anoona nezvedzimba mukanzuru

headline: Choto otaura nezveFIFA ‘ban’
text: Ndooka    SHASHA yakambonetsa munhabvu — Dickson Choto — anoti nyaya yezvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe neFIFA pamwe neCAF zvekuti isakwikwidze mumitambo mikuru inofanirwa kugadziriswa nekukasika sezvo yadzosera kumashure zvakanyanya budiriro yemutambo uyu, zvikuru remangwana revechidiki.   Zvichitevera kuburitswa kwakaitwa chikwata chenyika chemaWarriors mumakwikwi ekurwira kuenda kumutambo weAfrica Cup of Nations 2023 uyo uchatambirwa kuIvory Coast, Choto anoti izvi zvinokanganisa kusimukira kwenhabvu sezvo shuviro yemutambi wese kutambira nyika yake.   Choto aive muchikwata chekutanga chemaWarriors chakakwikwidza kumutambo weAFCON mugore ra2004.   Anoti danho iri richaita kuti zvikwata zvemuno zvisawane mari iyo zvaisiwana kuburikidza nekutengesa vatambi kunze kwenyika sezvo zvimwe zvezvirango izvi zvichaona Zimbabwe ichitadza kudyidzana nezvikwata zvekunze.   “Remangwana renhabvu yedu, kunyanya vechidiki, rakanganiswa zvikuru nezvirango zvatakatemerwa neFIFA neCAF nekuti mutambi wese wenhabvu shuviro yake kuzotambira nyika yake. Manje apa nyika kana isisachatenderwe kutamba mumitambo mukuru yakadai zvadzosera zvinhu zvose kumashure.   “Zvirango izvi hazvina kutombomira zvakanaka nekuti zvikwata zvemuno hazvichakwanise kutengesa vatambi vazvo kunze kwenyika. Mari yekunze iyo vaifanirwa kuwana vatengesa vatambi haichauye izvo zvave kudzorera vatambi vedu venhabvu kumashure.   “Saka nyaya iyi tokumbira ngaigadziriswe nekuchimbidza, nhabvu yedu isimukire ienderere mberi,” anodaro Choto.   Anoti nerimwe divi, zvirango izvi zvinogona kutuma vatambi vari kunze kwenyika avo vaida kuzotambira maWarriors kuti vawore mwoyo nekuda kwekusarongeka kwenhabvu yemuZimbabwe.   “Danho iri rave kutidzingira vatambi venhabvu vakawanda vepamusoro, vamwe vakakurira kunze kwenyika. Hakuna mutambi angade kuuya kuzotamba paanoona kuti hapana kurongeka,” anodaro.   Zimbabwe yakatemerwa zvirango neFIFA uye neCAF zvekuti isakwikwidze mumitambo mikuru zvichitevera danho rakatorwa nesangano rinoona nezvemitambo reSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) rekumisa basa bhodhi reZifa iro raitungamirirwa naFelton Kamambo vachipomerwa kutadza kuita basa ravo nemazvo.   Choto mumwe wevatambi venhabvu vakatambira kuEurope kwenguva refu izvo zvakamuona achitambira kunyika yePoland kwemakore anodarika 10 apo akatambira zvikwata zvakadai seGornick Zabrze, Pogon Szczecin neLegia Warsaw.   Anoti vatambi vemazuvaano vanofanirwa kuzvipira mubasa ravo voshanda nesimba zvakanyanya kana vachida kusvika padanho seraakasvika iye.   “Basa redu iri rinoda kuti munhu ashande nesimba azvipire uye agone kuzvibata. Ndizvo zvega zvinongodiwa kana uchida kubudirira.   “Ngakagara makore akawanda ndiri kuPoland kuburikidza nekushanda nesimba uye ndaiziva zvandaida muhupenyu.   Kurudziro yangu kune vechidiki ndeyekuti shandai nesimba muzive zvinangwa zvenyu muhupenyu, munosvika kure mumutambo uyu kana makazvipira chete,” anodaro Choto.   Kubva asendeka shangu dzake dzekutamba nhabvu, Choto ave kuita basa rekurairidza vechidiki kuchikwata chake cheDC Academy.

headline: Munhu Mumwe Chete Akafa neChirwere cheCovid-19 kuMatabelaland South neMusi weChipiri
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weChipiri kuti munhu mumwe chete akafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kuMatabeleland South, izvo zvakasiya huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera, hwave pachiuru chimwe chete nemazana mashanu ane makumi mashanu nevana, kana kuti 1,554. Vanhu gumi nevatanhatu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare, izvo zvakasiyawo vanhu vabatwa nacho vave zviuru makumi matatu nezvinomwe ane mazana masere nemakumi manomwe nevashanu, kana kuti 37, 875. Vanhu makumi maviri nevanomwe vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi zvasiya vanhu vapora vave zviuru makumi matatu nemashanu nemakumi mashanu nevasere kana kuti 35, 058. Vanhu vachiri kurwara vave chiuru chimwe chete chine mazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nevatatu kana kuti 1, 263. Huwandu uhu hunogona kukwira neChitatu manheru apo hurumende ichazivisa zvayakawana. Zvichakadaro, vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yecovid-19 kekutanga hwave zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi masere nezvisere nemazana maviri nemakumi maviri nevapfumbamwe, kana kuti 288, 229. Asi vabayiwa. Nhomba yepiri sezviri kukurudzirwa navanachiremba vave zviuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu ane mazana manomwe nemakumi manomwe nevasere, kana kuti 36, 778. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kumukuru munyaya dzekurwisa chirwere checovid-19 muhurumende dr agness mahomva sezvo vange vasati vapindura mibvunzo yedu. Asi hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba vanhu mamiriyoni gumi ichishandisa nhomba dzakabva kuChina dzinoti Sinovac neSinopharm, idzo dzisati dzapihwa chitambi neWorld Health Organization kuti dzishandiswe neveruzhinji. Imwe nhomba yakabva kuIndia uye imwe iri kutarisirwa kubva kuRussia. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano uye vakambove mukuru weChitungwiza Hospital varizve munyori wesangano reZimbabwe Medical Association mudunhu reMashonaland, Dr Enock Mayida, vanoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vabayiwe nhomba uye kuramba vachiteerera kurudziro iri kuitwa nebazi rezvehutano kuti chirwere ichi chisadzoke zvine hukasha. No media source currently available

headline: Vanorarama neKukumbira Rubatsiro Vovhiringwa neCovid-19 muZimbabwe
text: Vamwe vasingaoni vanorarama nekukumbira mari mumabhazi nemumigwagwa kwaRusape vanoti vari panguva yakaoma sezvo hurumende yakambomisa kufamba kwemabhazi aya senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCoronavirus. Mumwe wevanhu ava, VaTymon Rukuni vekwaRusape, vanoti kubva nemusi weSvondo apo vakapedzisira kupemha mubhazi, ndiwo musi wavakapedzisira kudya rinopisa nevana vavo vatanhatu, sezvo vasingawani kwekupemhera nekuti muguta hamuchina vanhu ukuwo kumabhazi havachadiwiko nekuda kwechirwere che-COVID-19. "Tine mhuri nine dzinorarama nekupemha asi nekuda kwechirwere cheCoronavirus hapachina kana chichabuda nekuti mumabhazi hakuchina, chikafu hatichina nekuti kumabhazi hatichadiwi kuti tifambe ikoko. Toita seyiwo nhai," vanodaro VaRukuni. Amai Rejoice Chinembiri vekwaRusape vanoti nekusafamba kwemabhazi panguva ino, hakuna kumwe kwavanotarisira kuwana mari kunze kwekufamba nemabhazi iwaya vachikumbira rubatsiro. 'Tinosipinda mumabhazi tikukumbira, towana tumari totenga tuhupfu tuTsunami nemuriwo todya nevana kumba. Zvino izvezvi mabhazi akamiswa hatina kana pekutangira. Tamboenda kwaMP wedu kuti tibatsirwe tikazoenda kuSocial Welfare asi tangonyorwa mazita hatina kupihwa kana chipunu chehupfu chaicho," Amai Chinembiri vanotsanangura. VaNhamo Makusha vanoti sevanhu vanorara nechavawana musi iwoyo, hapana zvazvichareva kana vachirambidzwa kupemha munzvimbo dzemuguta kana mumadutavanhu sezviri kuitika panguva ino yeLockdown. "PaLockdown apa patidhisiadhivhandeja nekuti sevanhu vanotsvaga mumabhazi, nekuti hatina chatinacho, zvichireva kuti takapedzisira kupemha Sunday apo pakaguma kufamba mabhazi acho uye pari zvino hatichabvumirwi kukwira mabhazi acho, takapedzisira kudya musi iwoyo weSunday," vadaro VaMakusha Mumiriri weMakoni Central mudare reparemende, VaDavid Tekeshe, vanoti vari kuedza nepavanogona napo kuti mhuri dzevasingaoni idzi dziwane rubatsiro asi zviri kutora nguva refu. "Ndatouya nemuriwo izvezvi kwavari ndichiti pamwe vangabatsirikana sezvo vange vakanzi vanokwanisa kubatsirwa kumapurisa asi hapana chabuda ikoko vakanzi vaende kuWelfare asi vangonyorwa mazita chete pasina chabuda. Vanhu ava vanoti vakapedzisira kupemha Sunday apo vakakwanisa kutenga katsaona kekudya musi wacho. Vanhu ava vari pa desperate havana chekudya vanotoda rubatsiro," vanodaro VaTekeshe. Dambudziko rakatarisana nevanhu ava idambudziko rakatarisanawo nevanhu vakawanda munyika yose vanga vachipona nekukumbira rubatsiro mumigwagwa nemumabhazi. Zimbabwe ine vanhu vangangosvika zviuru mazana mashanu vasingaoni, vazhinji vavo vachipona nekukumbira rubatsiro sezvo munyika musina mabasa akawanda nepamusana pekuparara kwaita hupfumi hwenyika. No media source currently available

headline: VaMunyaradzi Kereke Vanokandwa muJeri neMhosva yekuBata Chibharo
text: Nhengo yeZanu PF inomirira Bikita West muparamende, VaMunyaradzi Kereke, vatongerwa kugara mujeri kwemakore gumi mushure mekubatwa nemhosva yekubata chibharo. Mutongi wedare ramejasiteri, VaNoel Mupeyiwa vawana VaKereke vaine mhosva yekubata chibharo mwana wehama yavo ari pasi pemakore gumi nemasere vachimutyisidzira nepfuti makore matanhatu adarika. Asi imwe nyaya yekubata chibharo yanga ichi pomerwa VaKereke yaraswa mushure mekunge dare rati harina kugutsikana nehumbowo hwakaturwa mudare pakutongwa kwenyaya iyi. VaMupeyiwa vati kunyange hazvo VaKereke vaishandisa muchuchisi mukuru wehurumende VaJohannes Tomana, avo vakambomiswa basa vachipomerwa mhosva yekushandisa masimba avo zvisirizvo vari pabasa, kuti vavhariridze nyaya iyi sezvataurwa nemuchuchisi akazvimirira panyaya iyi, VaCharles Warara, vaona zvakakodzera kuti vati iyi haisi nyaya inotsikirira VaKereke sezvo vachiti munhu wese anogona kuita zvinhu zvekuti apukunyuke panyaya yaanenge akatarisana nayo. VaKereke vanga vatongerwa kugara mujeri kwemakore gumi nemana asi mutongi wedare azovabvisira makore mana aka ndekekutanga kupara mhosva. Mutongi atiwo anzwira VaKereke tsitsi sezvo vari munhu ane vakadzi vatatu nevana gumi nevanomwe uye vari zvakare munhu akamboshandira hurumende sachipangamazano wagavhuna webhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe. VaWarara vati vafara nemutongo waturwa nedare. "Dare raita zvandafunga kuti zviri fair and handifungi kuti tinonyanya kuve nedambudziko nazvo, eeh, kunyange zvazvo taifungidzira zvatongwa nedare, eeh, tinozvigamuchira," VaWarara vadaro. Kubatwa kwaitwa VaKereke nemhosva kunoreva kuti kuBikita West kwave kufanirwa kuitwa sarudzo dzechipiri dzekutsvaga anomirira nzvimbo iyi mudare reparamende. Mune imwewo nyaya yanga iri mumatare, mutauriri weboka revechidiki riri kuzvidaidza kuti Tajamuka, VaPromise Mkwananzi, avo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekupwanya zvinhu muchitoro chemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaPhelekezela Mphoko cheChoppies chiri pakati pedhorobha muHarare, vapihwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso. Hurumende inoti VaMkwananzi ndemumwe weavo vakaratidzira pamberi pechitoro chaVaMphoko vachiti chitoro ichi chinofanira kupiswa pamusana pekuti VaMphoko vari kuramba kubuda muhotera mavagara kwemakore anoda kusvika kumaviri vachishandisa mari yehurumende. Gweta raVaMkwananzi, VaTrust Maanda avo vanoshanda nesangano remagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, vatsinhira zvaturwa nemutongi wedare, VaTendai Mahwe. "Zvanzi vabhadhare madhora mazana matatu ekuAmerica, vazvipereke kumapurisa musi weChishanu wega wega kuLaw and Order, uyezve vagare pa address yavakapa, uyezve kuti varege kuzovhiringidza vafakazi panyaya iyoyi," VaMaanda vadaro. Mune imwe nyaya yanga iri mumatare zvakare, sachigaro webato idzva reViva Zimbabwe, VaAcie Lumumba, vapihwawo mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso panyaya yavari kupomerwa yekubika mapepa emotokari yavanonzi vakatengesa. VaLumumba vanzi vabhadhare mazana matatu emadhora semari yechibatiso. No media source currently available

headline: Vanorwira Kodzero dzeVakapondwa muNguva yeGukurahundi Vosungwa paZuva reKubatana kweZanu PF nePF Zapu
text: Sangano remagweta reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights rinoto vanhu vatatu vesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevane hama dzakafa kana kukuvadzwa munguva yeGukurahundi reIbhetshu Likazulu vacharara mujeri nhasi. ZLHR yanyora padandemutande rayo reTwitter kuti vatatu ava vasungwa pedyo nechiumbwa chamushakabvu Joshua Nkomo vakanzi vatyora weCrimina; Code vachinzi vainge vachida kuratidzira zvisiri pamutemo. Vange vakatakura chinyorwa chakanzu, “The power of the memory & seeking justice & healing enf Genocide off Gukurahundi” Mapurisa ange afumobata jongwe muromo achirambidza vanhu kuungana pedyo nechiumbwa ichi. VaMbuso Fuzwayo, munyori mukuru wesangano reIbhetshu Likazulu vatenda kuti vanhu vatatu vasungwa pachirongwa chavo chanhasi ichi. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kumutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isingabatike. Asi mumwe mukuru wemapurisa ange achitungamira chiwakata chemapurisa chamisa chiitiko ichi uyo angozvidoma nezita rekuti Inspector Dube ati ange asingadi kuti vanhu vaungane nekuti hurongwa hwange huchida kuitwa uhu hwange husina kubvumidzwa nemapurisa. Studio 7 yaona gwaro rinoratidza kuti veIbhetshu Likazulu vakanyorera mapurisa sezvinodiwa pamutemo asi vakarambidzwa kuti vasaite gungano iri. Vanhuwo zvavo nevamwe vange vachida kutorwa mifananidzo pachiumbwa chamushakabvu Nkomo pamwe nevatori venhau vange vachiita basa ravo vanosanganisira veStudio 7, vaudzwa nemapurisa aya kuti vabve panzvimbo iyi zvisinei kuti vange vaine magwaro avo ekuita basa, zvinove zvashorwa nemumwe mutori wenhau Lulu Brenda Harris uyo anoshandira bepanhau repadandemutande reCITE. Mutungamiri wesangano reZINASU VaBenoni Ncube avo vati vange vauya kuzopa rutsigiro rwavo pachiitiko ichi vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvaitwa nemapurisa zvinoratidza kuti hurumende haizi kuzadzikisa zvainoreva panyaya yeGukurahundi. Munyori webato reZAPU mudunhu reBulawayo avo vakarwawo hondo yerusununguko vari pasi pemauto eZIPRA VaVivian Siziba vatiwo zvaitwa nemapurisa zvinoratidza kuti hapana kubatana kwechokwadi munyika. Asi vachitaura munguva pfupi yapfuura mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vati ivo nehurumende yavo vaive vazvipira kugadzirisa nyaya yeGukurahundi. Nyaya yekurambidza vanhu murunyararo iri kushorwa neAfrican Commission On Human and People’s Rights negungano reUnited Nations. Masangano aya anoti kuratidzira murunyararo ikodzero iri mubumbiro remutemo wenyika uye Zimbabwe yakanyorerana nenyika dzepasi rino zvibvumirano zvekuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu. No media source currently available

headline: PANE NYAYA: MAFERO . . .uku ndiri kumaWarriors, Chicken Inn
text: MURAIRIDZI weChicken Inn nechikwata chenyika chemaWarriors Joey “Mafero” Antipas anoti mabasa maviri aya ari kumupedza simba, asi acharamba achishingirira kuti agobudirira maari ose.   Mafero anoti anoda kutora mukombe weCastle Premiership kechipiri munhorowondo yeGamecocks – sezita remadunhurirwa reChicken Inn.   Muchinda uyu akambofanogadzwa kuve murairidzi wemaWarriors nesangano reZifa apo kondirakiti yake ichapera musi wa31 Zvita.   “Zvinhu zvakaoma kuita mabasa maviri, kurairidza Chicken Inn muligi kozoti maWarriors chikwata chenyika. Zvakaoma asi unofanirwa kushanduka nekuchimbidza paunenge wave kuenda kune rimwe basa.   “Zviri kundipedza simba rakawanda asi ndinoramba ndichishanda nesimba nekuti ndiri kuda chaizvo kubudirira mumabasa maviri ese aya,” anodaro Mafero.   Parizvino Chicken Inn iri pechipiri palog ichitevera CAPS United.   Nerimwewo divi, Mafero mumasvondo anotevera achange achitungamira maWarriors apo achatanga kurwira tikiti rekuenda kumakwishu e2021 Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) ayo achazoitirwa kuCameroon.   Sezvo kondirakiti yake ichapera musi wa31 Zvita, Mafero anoti haasati aziva kuti acharamba ari panyanga here.   “Parizvino ndichiri kumboshanda, tichagara pasi tozokurukura toona kuti zvichafambiswa sei,” anodaro Mafero

headline: Vakawanda muNyika Voisa Tarisiro paHurumende Ichaumbwa naVaMnangagwa
text: Vanhu vakawanda vanoti vane tarisiro yekuti zvinhu zvichanaka nekukurumidza munyika zvichitevera kugadzwa kwakaitwa VaEmmerson Mnangagwa semutungamiri wenyika mutsva. Vakawanda vevanhu ava vanoti dambudziko guru ranga ratarisana nenyika hutongi hwevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe, hwavanoti veruzhinji kusanganisira dzimwe nyika, vainge vasisina chivimbo nahwo. Kunyange vashandi vemumakanzuru akawanda vainge vasisatambire mari dzemihoro, vanhu vachitadza kuwana mari dzavo kumabhangi ukuwo vashandi vehurumende vainge vasisazive zuva ravanotambira mari yavo zvairatidza kuti hurumende yakangaisina hurongwa hwekupedza matambudziko munyika nechimbichimbi. Mumwe mushandi wekanzuru yeKariba, VaFish Mucheza, avo vanoti vave negore nemwedzi mitatu vasingatambire, vane tarisiro yekuti vave kuzohora nekuda kwehutungamiri hutsva. Mumwe mugari wemuChinhoyi, VaPanashe Tsomondo, avo vane bhizinisi rekutengesa midziyo yekuvakisa, vanoti vari kutarisira kupera kwedambudziko rekushayikwa kwemari kumabhangi. Mumwe mugari wekuAlaska VaEdmore Mazarure vanotiwo vanhu vachanyatsoona kusiyana kwaVaMnangagwa naVaMugabe nekufambiswa kwesarudzo munyika. VaMazarure vanoti nyika ine nhorowondo yekusafambiswa zvakanaka kwesarudzo nekudaro vanhu vakawanda vakatarisira shanduko pamabatirwo esarudzo, kubvira mukutsvaga rutsigiro, kana kuti ku campaigner, kusvika mukuburitswa kwezvinenge zvabuda musarudzo, kana kuti ma results. Vanoona nezvematongerwo enyika muChinhoyi VaJohn Marava vanoti vanhu vave netariro yakakura munaVaMnangagwa nekuti ivo nemauto vakakwanisa kubvisa VaMugabe pachigaro izvo zvaidiwa neveruzhinji munyika zvinova zvakatadza kuitwa nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika akaita seMDC-T inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai. VaMarava vanoti kuperera kwaVaMnangagwa mubasa rekushandura hurumende kuchatanga kuonekwa pavachasarudza makurukota avo svondo rino. Nekuda kwekuparara kwezvinhu zvakawanda munyika zvinosanganisira hupfumi hwenyika, kushayikwa kwemabasa,kuparara kwezvivakwa nemigwagwa pamwe nenzara yanga yatekeshera munyika, vamwe vanoti VaMunangagwa vane mutoro wakakura nyika isati yaenda kusarudzo gore rinouya. Asi vamwe vanoti VaMnangagwa vanofanira kupihwa mukana sezvo vatanga basa ravo zvakanaka nekushamwaridzana nenyika dzaivengwa naVaMugabe dzakaita seBritain neAmerica uye vanozivikanwa kuti vakatungamira chirongwa chemaguta, che Command Agriculture, zvakanaka gore rapera, izvo zvakapa varimi vakawanda goho rakawanda. No media source currently available

headline: Vanamukoti Vanosungwa Mushure Mekuedza Kuungana paChipatara cheHarare Hospital
text: Sangano rinomirira vanamukoti vanoshanda muzvipatara zvehurumende, reZimbabwe Nurses Association, ZINA, rinoti nhengo dzaro dzasungwa neMuvhuro mushure mekunge dzaedza kuungana pachipatara cheHarare Central Hospital apo dzanga dzichitarisira kuita musangano. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnock Dongo vanoti vanamukoti ava vanga vachiedza kusangana kuti vazeye matambudziko ari kusangana navanamukoti anosanganisira mihoro, kuramwa mabasa kwavari kuita pamwe nekudzingwa kuri kuitwa vari kuramwa mabasa vari kugara mudzimba dzepachipatara cheParirenyatwa Group of Hospitals. VaDongo vanoti vanamukoti vasungwa ava vabva kuzvipatara zvinoti Parirenyatwa, Harare Central neChitungwiza, uye panguva yataenda pamhepo vanga vasati vanzwa kuti vari kupomerwa mhosva ipi, asi vanga vakachengetedzwa pakamba yemapurisa yeMbare. Sangano remagweta reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights razivisa mugwaro raraburitsa kuti vanamukoti vasungwa vanosvika gumi nevatatu, uye vacharara muhusungwa vachitarisirwa kumira pamberi pedare neChipiri. Kusungwa kwavanamukoti ava kunouya panguva iyo vanamukoti muzvipatara zvehurumende zvekuBulawayo zvinoti Mpilo, United Bulawayo Hospitals neEngutsheni, varatidzirawo vachinyunyuta kuti hurumende haisati yavapindura zvichemo zvavo. Vanamukoti vari kuda kuti hurumende ivape mihoro yavo nemari yekuAmerica yavaitambira muna Gumiguru 2018. Studio yaedza kubata mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, kuti tinzwe pamusoro penyaya iyi, asi vati vanga vari pane imwe nhare nekudaro vanga vasingakwanise kutaura nesu. No media source currently available

headline: Mapiritsi eAbacavir Oshomekera Vanorarama neHIV/AIDS?
text: No media source currently available Vamwe vevanorarama neHIV/AIDS vari pamapiritsi anonzi e “second line” vanoti vava kutyira hupenyu hwavo sezvo mapiritsi e Abacavir ari kunetsa kuwana. Mapiritsi aya anotengwa kubva kunze kwenyika. Mumwe wevanorarama neHIV, Amai Veronica Sikaka, vanoti vakatanga kumwa mapiritsi eAbacavir muna 2010. Vanoti panguva yese iyi yavanga vachimwa mapiritsi aya, vanga vasati vamboita dambudziko rekushaya mishonga yavo. Asi Amai Sikaka, avo vanotorera mapiritsi avo kuChitungwiza, vanoti vave kushungurudzika zvikuru sezvo vari kupiwa mapiritsi emazuva mashoma ipo nguva yese yapfuura vaipiwa mapiritsi emwedzi mitatu. Amai Sikaka vanotiwo kunyange hazvo mapiritsi aya achiwanikwa muzvitoro zvemapiritsi, havakwanisi kuatenga sezvo achidhura kwavari sezvo vari kutotambura kuwana mari yekuti vararame zuva nezuva. Izvi zvinotsigirwawo naAmai Rosemary Mhashu vanoraramawo neHIV vachishandisawo mapiritsi mamwewo. Amai Mhashu vanoti nekuda kwekuti vave kupihwa mapiritsi aya ari mashoma, kudzokera dzokera kuchipatara vachinotora mapiritsi kuri kukanganisa raramo yavo sezvo vachirarama nemabasa emaoko. Sachigaro weZimbabwe National Network of People Living with HIV, VaSabastian Chinhaire, vanoti nhengo dzavo zhinji kunzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana dziri kuchema nekushaikwa kwemapiritsi e “second line.” VaChinhaire vanoti vava kutyira kuti vanhu vakashaya mapiritsi aya, pavanozoanwa, anozotadza kushanda zvakanaka. Rimwe gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu muZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, Muzvare Agnes Muzondo, vanoti sezvo bumbiro remitemo yenyika richipa kodzero yehutano, hurumende inofanirwa kuwona kuti pawanikwa mari yakakwana yekutenga mishonga inodiwa munyika. Asi munyori mubazi rezvehutano, Doctor Gerald Gwinji, vakati munyika mune mapiritsi anokwanira vanhu kwemwedzi gumi nemitatu inotevera. VaGwinji vanotiwo dzimwe nguva vanhu vanopihwa mapiritsi emavhiki maviri pachinzvimbo chemwedzi mitatu nekuti mapiritsi anenge asati asvika kunzvimbo dzavo kubva kwaanochengeterwa vachiti asi izvi vari kuzvigadzirisa. Bazi rezveutano rinoti pavanhu vanosvika mirioni imwechete varikumwa mapiritsi emaARV munyika, vanhu zviuru makumi matatu nezvina ndovari pamapiritsi e “second line”.

headline: Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kufa neKorera Huri Kuramba Huchikwira
text: Hurumende inoti hwuwandu hwevanhu vafa nevari kubatwa nechirwere chekorera huri kuramba huchikwira. Gurukota rezveutano, VaObadiah Moyo, vakati vanhu makumi maviri nevashanu vanga vafa nechirwere chekorera. VaMoyo vakatiwo huwandu vabatwa nechirwere ichi hwasvika pavanhu zviuru zvitatu nemazana manomwe ane makumi matanhatu nevana. VaMoyo vakataura mashoko aya nezuro apo vakange vachitambira rubatsiro rwekurwisa chirwere chekorera. VaMoyo vakati kunyange hazvo huwandu uhwu huri kukwirira, vane tarisiro yekuti hudzike munguva shoma shoma iri kutevera sezvo hurumende iri kutora matanho akasiyana siyana kupedza chirwere ichi. VaMoyo vakatiwo hurumende iri kumisa kutengeswa kwezvinhu mumigwagwa muguta reHarare rese. Hurumende inoti iri kushanda pamwe chete nemakanzuru kuendesa mvura yakachena kunzvimbo dzine dambudziko rechirwere chekorera. Kambani yenharembozha yeEconet yapa rubatsiro rwemamiriyoni gumi emadhora, ukuwo Lotto pasi pe President’s Fund yapawo rubatsiro rwezana rezviuru zvemadhora. Mari iyi ichashandiswa mukurwisa korera. Kambani yedzimotokari yeQuest yapawo bazi rezveutano rhori yekubatsira mukurwisa chirwere chekorera. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vagari vemuGweru Vochema Chema neMutengo weMagetsi
text: Vamwe vagari vemuGweru vanoti havasi kunzwisisa nezve mutengo mutsva wemagetsi zvisinei netsananguro yeveZimbabwe Electricity Supply Authority, vachitiwo magetsi aya ave kudhura zvakanyanya. Kutsutsumwa kwevamwe vagari ava kwabuda mushure memusangano waitwa nevagari nhasi nevagari nevamwe vakuru vakuru vekambani yeZESA. Mumwe mugari, Amai Patience Musambasi vati havana kugutsikana netsananguro yapihwa neveZESA. Vati magetsi ave kudhura vakatiwo kambani iyi yakaunza matengeserwo emagetsi matsva aya isina kupa vanhu dzidziso yakakwana pamusoro penyaya iyi. Ambuya Winfriedah Chimwango vati vave pamudyandigere vatsinhirawo kuti mutengo mutsva wemagetsi haunzwisisike vachitiwo magetsi ave kudhura zvoomesera varombo. Amai Immaculate Madzimure vati matengesero ave kuita veZesa magetsi ane hukoronyera mukati. Izvi zvatsinhirwavo naVaSimbarashe Chirara avo vati kunyange hazvo munhu akatenga magetsi emari yakawanda aunozowana ekushandisa chaiwo anenge ari mashoma. VaChirara vachema-chemawo nenyaya yekuti magetsi acho anogara asipo nguva zhinji. Mukuru anooona nezvekutengeswa kwemagetsi mudunhu rekuchamhembe kwenyika VaEdward Nyoni ndivo vange vakatungamira chikwata cheveZESA pamusangano uyu. Varamba kutaura neStudio 7 pamhepo sezvo vati havabvumirwe kutaura nevatori venhau. Mutauriri weZESA vaFullard Gqasira vanoti kambani yavo yakakwidza mutengo wemagetsi mwedzi wapera uye yave nematengesero ekuti munhu ukaramba uchitenga magetsi kakawanda mukati memwedzi mumwe chete, mutengo wemagetsi aya unoramba uchikwira. Nemusi weChishanu veruzhinji vakaungana pamahofisi eZesa munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana munyika vachida kunzwisisa nezvemutengo wemagetsi mutsva uyu. Zesa inoti inotarisira kuti mhuri yega yega inoshandisa zvikamu mazana maviri zvemagetsi mukati memwedzi mumwe chete. Magetsi aya anotengeswa nemari inoita mashereni makumi mana pazvikamu makumi mashanu zvekutanga (41 cents for the first 50 units) uye mashereni makumi mapfumbamwe nesendi rimwe chete pazvikamu zana nemakumi mashanu zvinotevera. Kana munhu ukapfuudza zvikamu mazana maviri zvinotarsisirwa kuti ushandise pamwedzi unenge wave kuzotenga chikamu chimwe chete chemagetsi nemadhora matatu mashereni makumi masere nemasendi mapfumbamwe ($3.89 per every unit.) Mune imwewo nyaya vamwe vagari vemuGweru vari kuchema-chema kuti vashandi vekanzuru vari kuvabvisira mametre emvura pamba pavo vachinzi vane zvikwereti. Amai Ruth Dube vati vakabvisirwa mita yavo zvisinei nekuti vaiva vawirirana nekanzuru kuti vaizobhadhara chikwereti chavainacho zvishoma-nezvishoma. Muzvare Tariro Kaseke vati vakabvisirwa mita yemvura yepamba pavo zvisinei nekuti vaive vakabhadhara chiwereti chavainzi vaive nacho kukanzuru. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kukanzuru yeGweru panyaya iyi. Asi vakafanobata chigaro chemunyori wekanzuru VaDouglas Chikwekwe vakabuda pane imwe nhepfenyuro yemuGweru mazuva mashoma apfuura vachikumbira ruregerero pamusoro penyaya iyi vachiti hauzi mutemo wekanzuru kubvisira vagari vane zvikwereti kukanzuru mametre emvura ari padzimba dzavo. No media source currently available

headline: Vogadzirira kudzoka kwenetball
text: SANGANO reRainbow Amateur Netball League (RANL) rinoti ragadzirira kudzoka kwemutambo uyu zvichitevera kuronga kwavakaita mutambo weDry Run svondo radarika uyo wakaona chikwata cheZRP Mambas chichikunda cheGlow Petroleum Queens 27-24 mufainari.   Munyori mukuru weRANL — Moses Gukumure — anoti kugara nguva ndefu vatambi vasingatambe mutambo uyu, zvichikonzereswa nedenda reCovid-19, kwakadzosera kumashure kusimukira kwavo asi vave nemufaro zvichitevera kudzoka kwawakaita.   “Mushure mekunge tapedza nguva ndefu mutambo uyu usiri kutambwa, zvinofadza zvikuru kuti tave kukwanisa kudzokera kuhupenyu hwedu hwekare vasikana vachitamba mutambo uyu unovararamisa. “Mutambo weDry Run wange uri wekuona kuti zvikwata zvave papi mugadziriro yekudzoka kwemutambo uyu. Tazvionera tega kuti zvagadzirira saka isu tagadzirirawo kuti mitambo ichitanga,” anodaro Gukumure.   Zvisinei, anoti vachiri kumbomirira kupihwa mvumo kubva kuZimbabwe Netball Association (ZINA) neSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) kuti vachitanga mutambo uyu.   Anoti kusvika pari zvino vanyorera kuZINA kanokwana katanhatu asi havasati vapihwa mhinduro. “Chiri kungotimisa kuti mitambo yedu ichitange kupihwa mvumo uye tinyoreswe neZINA.   Takavanyorera asi havasati vatipindura kusvika pari zvino. Saka tiri kuramba tichigogodza kwavari, tichivanyorera kuti vatipe mvumo titange mitambo yedu,” anodaro.   Zvichitevera kuvambwa kwakaitwawo ligi rePremier Netball League (PNL) nguva yadarika izvo zvakaona zvimwe zvikwata zvichibuda muRANL zvichienda kuPNL, Gukumure anoti maligi akawanda zvinobatsira kukura kwemutambo uyu uye zvichipa vatambi mikana yakasiyana yekukwikwidza. “Tichiri nezvikwata zvedu zvakawanda zvikuru uye isu tinovimba kuti zvapave nemaligi maviri zvichabatsira kukura kwemutambo uyu,” anodaro.   Zvakadaro, chikwata cheZRP icho chakahwina mutambo uyu chakaenda kumba neUS$1 350 kuchiti zvimwe zvakakwikwidza zvinosanganisira Lusumbami, Tenax, Ruwa, Correctional Queens neKhami Prisons.

headline: Manondo otarira mberi
text: MUTAMBI weCAPS United – William Manondo – uyo mwaka uchangodarika akahwina mubairo weGolden Boot, anoti chiremerera ichi chaisakwanisika pasina rubetsero rwevamwe vaanotamba navo muchikwata chavo pamwe chete nemurairidzi wake, Lloyd ‘Lodza’ Chitembwe.   Manondo akamuka chibhebhenenga mumwaka wake wekutanga ari kuGreen Machine izvo zvakamuona achinwisa ka17 ndokuhwina mubairo uyu apo akapedza ari pamberi pevamwe vatambi vakaita saWalter Musona weFC Platinum uyo akakwanisa kunwisa ka14 kuchiti Delick Murimba weNgezi Platinum akanwisa ka13.   Mubairo weGolden Boot uri kuona Manondo achiwaniswa US$6 375.   Kunyangwe hazvo akakundikana kunwisa kanodarika ka20 mumwaka mumwe chete, izvo zvakapedzisira kuitwa naNorman Maroto mugore ra2010, Manondo mwaka uchangodarika akabatsira chikwata chake zvikuru icho chaitatarika nekuda kwenyaya dzakawanda dzaisanganisira vatambi vaimboramba kutamba vachida mari dzavo dzebhonasi yavainge vasingabhadharwe.   Mwaka uchangopera, Kepekepe yakazopedza yakagara pechi11 palogo.   Aka ndekekutanga CAPS United ichipedza isiri muTop 10 izvo yakapedzisira kuzviita gore ra2012 apo yakapedza iri pechi10 palogo.   Makore adarika, yange ichisimukira ichipedza iri muTop 8.   Kuhwina kwaakaita Golden Boot uku, kwaona Manondo achipinda muboka rimwe chete nevatambi vakaita mukurumbira kuKepe-kepe vakambohwina mubairo vakaita saAlosi Bunjira (1996), Tapfuma Gahadzikwa (2001), Leonard Tsipa (2004 na2016) uye Nyasha Mushekwi (2009).    William Manondo   Manondo anoti anoshuvira kuti matambiro aakaita mwaka wadarika achamuvhurira mikana yekuenda kunze kwenyika.   “Chekutanga, ndinoda kutenda Mwari nekuti ndivo vakandisunda vaive neni kusvika ndahwina mubairo uyu weGolden Boot.   Zvinoreva zvakawanda kwandiri saka ndine mufaro mukuru nekuti hazviitike nyore.   “Panguva imwe chete, ndinoda kuremekedza murairidzi wangu ‘Coach Lodza’ nevamwe vandinotamba navo nekuti takatamba sechikwata. Uri wega pasina vamwe vaunotamba navo hazvikwanisike,” anodaro.   Manondo anoenderera achiti, “Hongu, ndakatamba zvinonwisa mvura mwaka wadarika asi shuviro yemutambi wese wenhabvu kuenda kunotambira kunze kwenyika. Asi Mwari ndiye anoziva remangwana uye nguva yake ndiyo yatinomirira.”   Manondo akazvarirwa muHarare akakurira kuMbare uye anoti aifarira nhabvu kubva achiri chindumurwa.   Murwendo rwake rwenhabvu, akatanga achitambira Kiglon ndokubva akamboenda kuFC Platinum iyo akatambira 2011 kusvika 2013.   Panguva yavaive kuFC Platinum, akambotumirwa kuGunners nechikwereti uko anotamba mwaka mumwe chete ndokuzodzokera kuFC Platinum. Kubva 2013 kusvika 2021, mutambi uyu – uyo vazhinji vanoziva saMr Chibuku – aitambira Harare City.   Paakabva kuHarare City, ndipo paakaenda kuCAPS United kutanga kwa2022 uko akasvika zvine mutsimba ndokuhwina mubairo mukuru uyu weGolden Boot.   Akangokwanisa kutambirawo chikwata chenyika chemaWarriors kaviri apo akaenda kumutambo we2016 African Nations Championship (CHAN) uyo wakaitirwa kunyika yeRwanda.   Mumitambo miviri yaakatamba yechikwata chenyika iyi, akanwisawo kamwe chete. Manondo anoyera Soko Mukanya.

headline: Vanhu Vatatu Vanofa neCOVID-19 paNguva Iyo Huwandu hweVari Kuwanikwa Vaine Denda Hwakwira
text: Bazi rezvehutano razivisa neChipiri mangwanani kuti vanhu vatatu vakafa neMuvhuro neCovid-19, uye huwandu hwevanhu vakawanikwa vaine denda iri Muvhuro wakare hwakakwira zvakanyanya kusvika pazviuru zviviri nemazana mashanu ane makumi mashanu nevashanu, kana kuti 2 555. Izvi zvakasiya vanhu vafa neCovid-19 vave pazviuru zvina nemazana manomwe nemakumi matatu, kana kuti 4 713, kuchitiwo vanhu vabatwa neCovid-19 kubva patanga chirwere ichi munyika vakasvika pazviuru zana nemakumi mana nechimwe namazana matanhatu nemumwe kana kuti 141 601. Vanhu mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana masere nemakumi masere nezvitatu zvine mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu nevashanu, kana kuti 3,882 255 vakanga vabaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira COVID-19 pakupera kwezuva neMuvhuro. Vamwe mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana masere nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezviviri zvine mazana matatu nemakumi matanhatu nevatanhatu, kana kuti 2,892 366, vakanga vabaiwawo nhomba yepiri sezvinokurudzirwa. Huwandu hwevanhu vakabatwa neCovid-19 uhwu huri kukwira kubva pamazana mashanu nemakumi maviri nevatatu, kana kuti 523, vakawanikwa vaine denda iri nemusi weSvondo, kuchitiwo neMugovera vanhu chiuru nemakumi masere nevaviri, kana kuti 1 082, vakawanikwawo vaine Covid-19. Hurumende yakazivisa svondo rapera kuti hutachiwana hweOmicron hwakanga hwawanikwa munyika pavanhu makumi mashanu vakavhenekwa kuMasvingo. Mukuru wesangano rinorwira hutano hwakanaka munharaunda, reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti havasi kushamisika nekukwira kuri kuita huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa neCovid-19 mazuvano sezvo paine kuvarairwa kweveruzhinji kwakanyanya. VaRusike vanoti nekupinda munyika kwehutachiwana hweOmicron, veruzhinji vanofanirwa kuramba vachitevedzera nzira dzekudzivirira nadzo kupararira kweCovid-19, dzakaita sekugeza maoko, kupfeka mamasiki, kugara madaranganwa pamwe nekusaenda munzvimbo dzakawanda vanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Zvicherwa neSarudzo Zvinokurukurwa muWashington paHurukuro dzeGlobal Press Institute
text: Sangano reGlobal Press nemusi weChina muWashington D.C., rakakokera hurukuro dzakanangana neZimbabwe munyaya dzekucherwa zviri kunze kwemutemo kwezviwanikwa nemakorokoza, pamwe nesarudzo, idzo dziri kutarisirwa kuitwa munyika gore rino. Hurukuro idzi, idzo dzaive pasi pechirongwa cheGlobal Press Influencer Series, dzakaitirwa paNewseum, pasi pedingindira rekuti “Zimbabweans Take Action”, kana kuti “Vana veZimbabwe Torai Matanho”, uye dzaitsigirwa nemasangano anosanganisira reNewseum Institute, neMetropolitan Group. Vakataura pamusangano uyu vanosanganisira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinoti mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Diaspora for Democracy Inc., VaCharles Mutama, Muzvare Wadzanayi Mhute veNew York Times, Muzvare Linda Mujuru veGlobal Press Journal, naMuzvare Cristina Maria Villegas, vanove mukuru anoona nezvezvicherwa musangano rakazvimirira rePACT. Muzvare Villegas vakati munyika dzese dzavakafamba pasi rose, Zimbabwe ndiyo ine zvicherwa zvakawanda asi zvisina anochengetedza nenzira dzingaite kuti zvibatsire veruzhinji. Panyaya yesarudzo, vatauri vose ava vakawirirana kuti mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanogona kukunda musarudzo idzi, vachiti dzichabiridzirwa pachishandiswa mauto. Vatauri ava vakatiwo kunyangwe mapato anopikisa akakunda, havaoni achipiwa mukana wekutonga. Muzvare Mujuru vakati vanoona sekunge VaMnangagwa vachakunda musarudzo, sezvo pasina vanopikisa vakasimba, uye pachiratidza sepasina gwara chairo mumapato anopikisa. No media source currently available

headline: VanaMukoti Voramwa Mabasa kuChipatara cheMpilo
text: Vamwe vana mukoti varatidzira paMpilo Hopital nhasi mangwanani vachiti havasi kusafara nemashandiro avo. Vana mukoti vange vachisvika zana vaungana kwenguva inoda kusvika awa imwe chete pamusiwo mukuru wechipatara ichi vachiimba vamwe vavo vakabata zvinyorwa zvakasiyana-siyana zvichiratidza kusafara kwavo. Mukuru weZimbabwe Nurses Association mudunhu reBulawayo VaDonald Chidowore vati vari kutsutsumwa nedanho rekuti vave kunzi vashande kwemazuva mashanu pavhiki pane kuti vashande mazuva maviri sezvavari kuita pari zvino. Vati havawone chikonzero chekuti vashande kwenguva yakareba seizvi sezvo mari yavari kutambira isiri kuvakwanira uye vasina zvikwanisiro zvekushanda. Munyori mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Nurses Association VaEventhough Siziba avo vange varipowo pakuratidzira uku vati zvimwe zvinyunyuto zvavana mukoti zvinosanganisira kuti havakwanise kubatsira varwere zvakakwana sezvavanotarisirwa nekuti zvipatara zvakawanda munyika hazvina mishonga. Vatiwo hutano hwaana mukoti huri panjodzi sezvo vasingapiwe mishonga kana zvipfeko zvinovadzivrira kuzvirwere kunyanya panguva ino hutachiwana hwecoronavirus huri kupararira pasi rose. Vamwe vevana mukoti vange vari pabasa vazozodzokera pabasa papera kuratidzira uku. Vanoziva nezviri kuitika vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanamukoti vanzi vamboenderera mberi vachishanda mazuva maviri pasvondo kusvika nyaya iyi yagadziriswa nevakuru vakuru. Taedza kunzwa kubva kumukuru wemabasa ekurapwa paMpilo Dr Solwayo Ngwenya asi vati hapana zvavange vachikwanisa kutaura panyaya iyi nekuti vari pazororo pari zvino. Mukuru wechipatara VaLeonard Mabande vaudzawo Studio parunhare kuti vari kuHarare uko vari kumusangano webazi rezvehutano. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano Dr John Mangwiro vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti vanganyatsoziva nezvekuti vana mukoti vanofanirwa kushanda mazuva managani munyori webazi iri Dr Agnes Mahomva asi tatadza kuvabata sezvo nherembozha yavo yange isingabatike. Vana mukoti pamwe navana chiremba munyika vave nenguva yakareba vachinyunyuta pamusoro pemashandiro avo uye kuti mari yemihoro yavanowana haivakwanire. No media source currently available

headline: Vanotengesa Mumigwagwa Voratidzira muHarare
text: Vanotengesera mumigwagwa neChipiri vanopfuura mazana matatu vakaratidzira mu Harareku nyangwe hazvo mapurisa akayedza kuvarambidza kusvitsa gwaro renyunyuto kudare reparamende. Vairatidzira ava vaipika kuti havasi kuzobvuma kubviswa mumigwagwa mavanoshandira pakati peguta kana hurumende isati yavapa nzvimbo dzekushandira dzakanaka. Varatidziri ava vakatangira kuratidzira pakatarisana nemahofisi ekanzuru yeHarare pana Rezende ndokupinda muna Nelson Mandela vakananga kuparamende apo pavazomiswa nemapurisa panosangana Nelson Mandela na Julius Nyerere kwenguva inokwana awa imwe chete mapurisa achiramba kuti varatidziri ava vaendese gwaro ravo renyunyuto kuparamende. Asi apo mapurisa ainge ari pakati pekurambidza varatidziri kuenderera mberi, mumwe wevanga vachitungamira varatidziri ava, VaJustice Munayi ,vanove munyori mubhodhi rerimwe remasangano anga achiratidzira aya re National Vendors Union Zimbabwe, kana NAVUZ, vakaudza varatidziri ava kuti sevanhu vanotengesera mumigwagwa havasi kuzofa vakabvuma kubviswa mumigwagwa musi weChishanu uyo wakatarwa nehurumende kuti vange vabva mumigwagwa. Zvakataurwa naVaMunayi zvakatsinhirwawo nemutungamiri weNAVUZ, VaSamuel Wadzai. Mumwe wevanga vachiratidzira ava uye vari nhengo yeMDC-T inomirira Bulawayo East muparamende, Muzvare Thabitha Khumalo, vakaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende inofanira kutanga yagadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika kuitira kuti vanhu vari kutengesera mumigwagwa vawane mabasa. Varatidziri ava vakazobvumirana nemapurisa aya ainge akatakura zvombo kuti gwaro renyunyuto ravanga vainaro riendeswe kuparamende nevanhu vana chete uye kuti vamwe vese vasare vakamira panosangana Nelson Mandela na Julius Nyerere pavasara vachiimba zvakaomarara. Kuratidzira uku kunouyawo apo dare repamusoro ranga rabvumidza vanhu ava kuratidzira mushure mekunge mapurisa ange aramba neMuvhuro kuti vaenderere mberi nekuratidzira nyangwe zvazvo mapurisa akambenge abvuma. Zvichakadaro, sangano re Zimbabwe Informal Sector Organization kana kuti ZISO rasvitsawo gwaro renyunyuto kugurukota rinoona nezvematunhu, VaIgnatious Chombo. Sangano re Ziso riri kuda kuti hurumende isiyane nehurongwa hwayo hwekuda kudzinga vanotengesera mumigwagwa uye kuti igare pasi nevemasangano anomirira vanhu vese ava kuti vawirirane nzira dzokuti nyaya iyi yogadziriswa sei. No media source currently available

headline: Vanachiremba Vakuru Vanozivisa Kuramwa Mabasa Kana Zvichemo Zvavo Zvisina Kugadziriswa
text: Vanachiremba vakuru vari pasi pesangano reZimbabwe Senior Hospital Doctors Association, neChitatu vakapa hurumende mazuva gumi nemana ekuti igadzirise matambudziko ari muzvipatara pamwe nenyaya yemihoro yavo, kukundikana kwayo voramwa mabasa. Izvi zvinouya panguva iyo bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa zuva rimwero kuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere che Covid-19 munyika hwakakwira kusvika pachiuru nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 1 089, zvichitevera kuwanikwa kwevamwe vanhu makumi maviri nevashanu vaine chirwere ichi pavanhu zviuru zviviri nemazana matanhatu negumi nevaviri kana kuti 2 612 vakavhenekwa. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi kusvika nezuro vaive mazana matatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevashanu kana kuti 395, uye vashaya vachiri makumi maviri. Tsamba yakanyorwa nesangano ravanachiremba vakuru iyi, iyo yakanyorerwa kuboka reHealth Services Board, kumunyori mukuru mubazi rezvehutano pamwe nekuvakuru vezvipatara, kana kuti hospital clinical directors, iri kuda kuti hurumende iise mishonga nezvikwanisiro muzvipatara, iwanise vanachiremba zvekuzvidzivirira kubva ku Covid-19, uye kuti mihoro yavo ive iri mumadhora ekuAmerica ichienzaniswa nemari dzavaitambira muna Gumiguru 2018. Vanachiremba ava vari kudawo kuti zvichemo zvevamwe vashandi vemuboka rezvehutano vari pakuramwa mabasa pari zvino zvigadziriswe kuitira kuti vabatsirane mabasa, uyewo kuti nhengo dzavo dzinoshanda kuUniversity of Zimbabwe asi iye zvino dziri kushanda muzvipatara munguva ino, dzinge dzichibhadharwa mari dzekushanda uku. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Pasi rose vanhu vabatwa ne Covid-19 vadarika mamiriyoni gumi nezviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 15.5 million, uye vanhu vafa vadarika zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi masere nezvina kana kuti 584 000. Imwe nyanzvi mune zvehutano vachidzidzisa zvehutano pa Nottingham Trent University, ku Britain, Doctor Mathew Nyashanu, vanoti vari kukurudzira hurumende kuti igare pasi navanachiremba ava vakurukure zvichemo zvavo kuti zvinhu zvisaipa kudarika zvazviri pari nhasi muzvipatara. Doctor Nyashanu vanoti chinonyanyorwadza ndechekuti vanachiremba ava vari kuda kuramwa mabasa munguva iyo nyika iri mudambudziko re Covids-19, izvo zvinozoisa varwere vagara vaine zvimwe zvirwere zvinovanetsa munyodzi huru kana vakazobatwa neCovid-19. Vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kugadzirisa zvinhu muzvipatara nekukasika, umo munonzi hamuna mishonga nezvimwe zvikwanisiro. Doctor Nyashanu vanotiwo kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kubata chirwere cheCovid-19 chinhu chinityisa nekuti kana vanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 vanenge vachida kubatwa zvakanaka, uye kuti vabatwe zvakanaka vanofanirwa kunge vachienda kuzvipatara, uko kunofanirwa kunge kuine vanamukoti navanachiremba. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weNyika, VaMnangagwa, Vanotambira Nyomba yeCovaxin Kubva kuIndia
text: Chikamu chekutanga chenhomba yeCOVAXIN inodzivirira Covid-19 yakapiwa Zimbabwe neIndia serubatsiro chapinda munyika, mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vachigamuchira mushonga uyu panhandare yendege yeRobert Gabriel Mugabe International Airport muHarare. Bepanhau reHerald rinoti vachigamuchira rubatsiro urwu, VaMnangagwa vatenda zvikuru mutungamiri weIndia pamwe nehurumende yeIndia, vachiti rubatsiro urwu rwauya panguva yakakodzera. VaMnangagwa vanonzi vati Zimbabwe iri panyika dzekutanga dzakave nehurongwa hwekubaya vanhu nhomba. Vanonzi vakokawo vemabhizimusi vekuIndia vanoda kuzotanga mabhizimusi munyika kuti vashandise mikana iri kuunzwa nechirongwa cheNational Development Strategy NDS 1. Mumiriri weIndia muZimbabwe VaVijay Khanduja ndivo vasvitsa nhomba iyi kumutungamiri wenyika. VaKhanduja vatiwo rubatsiro urwu mucherechedzo wehukama hwakasimba pakati peZimbabwe nenyika yavo yeIndia. VaMnangagwa vaperekedzwa nemutevedzeri wavo uye vari gurukota rezvehutano VaConstantino Chiwenga pamwe nemamwe makurukota ehurumende. India yakapa Zimbabwe nhomba inosvika zviuru makumi manomwe nezvishanu, 75 000, asi zviuru makumi matatu nezvishanu, kana kuti 35 000 ndizvo chete zvakwanisa kupinda munyika, zvichireva kuti imwe nhomba inosvika zviuru makumi mana ichatevera munguva pfupi inotevera. Zimbabwe yakawana zvakare rubatsiro rweimwe nhomba yeSinopharm kubva kuChina mukutanga kwemwedzi uno uye yakatengawo zvakare imwe nhomba yekuChina yeSinovac. Hurumende yakabvumidzawo kushandiswa kwenhomba yekuRussia, yeSputnik V. Nhomba yeCOVAXIN iyi yakagadzirwa nekambani yeBharat Biotech ichishanda pamwechete nesangano rinoona nezvetsvakurudzo dzemishonga muIndia, reIndian Council of Medical Research. Nhomba iyi inobayiwa kaviri, kepiri kachibaiwa mushure memazuva makumi maviri nemasere, kana kuti 28 ekunge munhu atora nhomba yekutanga. Nhomba yeCOVAXIN inonzi yakaratidza zvikamu makumi masere nechimwe kubva muzana, kana kuti 81 percent, zvekushanda kwayo kudzvirira Covid-19 pavanhu vanenge vasina nhoroondo yehutachiwana hunokonzera chirwere ichi mushure mekunge vabaiwa nhomba yepiri. Nyanzvi mune zvehutano vachidzidzisa pa Nottingham Trent University kuBritain, Doctor Mathew Nyashanu, vanoti chinhu chakanaka chose kuti Zimbabwe yawana imwe nhomba kubva kuIndia, asi vanokurudzira kuti dai hurumende ichifanodzidzisa veruzhinji pamusoro penhomba inenge ichizopinda munyika nhomba iyi isati yapinda. Doctor Nyashanu vanoti izvi zvinozobatsira kuti veruzhinji9 vanenge vave neruzivo nechakare panozopinda mushonga uyu munyika, pane kuti vanhu vatange kudzidziswa nezvawo iwo wazara munyika. Doctor Nyashanu vanotiwo hurumende inofaniorwa kutenga mushonga wakawanda unenge wafarirwa nevanhu wakawanda kuitira kuti vanhu vasazosanganisirwa mishonga kana vachinge vonobaiwa nhomba dzepiri vachizopiwa unenge wakasiyana nenhomba yekutanga. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vana Vanobata Chirwere cheTyphoid muHarare
text: Mukuru webazi rezve hutano mukanzuru yeHarare, Dr Prosper Chonzi, vanoti chirwere chetyphoid chadzoka muHarare zvikuru mumisha yevazhinji yeBudiriro neGlenview. Pari zvino pane vanhu vana vari kunzi vakabatwa nechirwere ichi vamwewo vachinzi vachiri kuongororwa. VaChonzi vari kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vafashaidze mvura yekumwa uye kudziyisa chikafu nekuteedzera kurudziro dzose munyaya dzezvehutano kuti vadzivirire kutapuriranwa kwechirwere ichi. Dr Chonzi vanoti vanenge vachifungidzira kuti vabatwa nechirwere ichi vanofanirwa kuenda kukiriniki iri pedyo navo kuitira kuti vawane rubatsiro nguva ichiripo. Vanoti kanzuru iri kuyedza kudzidzisa veruzhinji nezvenzira dzekuzvidzivirira kuti vasatapurirwe kana kutapuririrana chirwere ichi. No media source currently available Vamwe vanhu vakawanda muguta reHarare vari kubatwawo nemanyoka nekuda kwekushaikwa kwemvura yakachena, kana kuti kushaikwa kwayo zvachose. Meya weguta reHarare, VaBernard Manyenyeni, vanoti vari kuyedza nepavanogona napo pose kugadzirisa dambudziko remvura muguta.

headline: Madzishe Otsigira VaMugabe Musarudzo Gore Rinouya
text: Madzishe emunyika mukupera kwesvondo akabuda nechisungo chekuti achatsigira mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika gore rinouya. Mutungamiri wesangano remadzishe, Ishe Fortune Charumbira, vakazivisa neMugovera kumusangano wemadzishe wepagore weNational Annual Conference, kuti madzishe akawirirana muna 2014 kuti VaMugabe ndiye munhu avachatsigira musarudzo dza 2018. "Madzimabo anenge achiti pahumambo hwedu, kana mutungamiri anenge aripo omunyika, adiwa navanhu, kana munhu adiwa isu madzimambo tinotsigira munhu iyeyo," vanodaro Ishe Charumbira. Vanoti hurumende yaVaMugabe yakaita zvirongwa zvebudiriro zvakawanda , uyewo mutungamiri wenyika ano remekedza pamwe nekukoshesa madzishe. Panyaya yekuti bumbiro remitemo rinoti madzishe haafanirwi kuita zvematongerwo enyika, Ishe Charumbira vanoti vanhu vanodaro ivavo havana ruzivo rwakakwana. No media source currently available Asi mutauriri webato rinopikisa rePeople's Democratic Party, VaJacob Mafume, vanoti madzishe ari kutyora bumbiro remitemo nekutsigira VaMgabe, pachinzvimbo chekuti vatokurudzira kuti munyika muve nemapato akawanda ezvematongerwo enyika. VaMafume vanoti hapana chakashata kuti Ishe Charumbira vatsigire VaMugabe, asi kwete kuti vabude vachiti madzishe ose anotsigira mutungamiri wenyika. "Pakutanga madzishe haana kana kumboti vanoda VaMugabe. Charumbira ndiye ati anoda VaMugabe. Saka iye ega kana ane zvaari kupuwa ngaasati madzishe ose ataura kuti anoda VaMugabe," VaMafume vanodaro. Vanoti bato ravo rinotaura nemadzishe siku nesikati, naivowo madzishe ari kunetseka nekushushikana nekutambura kuri kuita rizhinji rweZimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Makombi neZvitoro Vokwidza Mitengo kuBulawayo
text: Apo zvinhu zviri kuramba zvichiita manyama amire nerongo munyaya dzezvehupfumi munyika, vamwe vagari vemuBulawayo vanoti vanotengesa mari pamusika mutema ndivo vari kukuchidzira kuti zvinhu zviipisise. Sekune dzimwe nzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana munyika zvitoro zvakawanda muguta reBulawayo zvakwidza mitengo yezvinhu zvinowanzoshandiswa nevanhu zuva nezuva kunyanya mafuta ekubikisa pamwe nemukaka. Nekune rimwewo divi zvimwe zvitoro zvinotengesa zvinhu zvakasiyana siyana kusanganisira chikafu, pamwe nezvimwe zvakadai semishonga nechikafu chezvipfuyo zvange zvakavharwa nechikonzero chinofungidzirwa nevakawanda kuti inyaya yekuda kukwidza mitengo. Vemakombi anoenda kumisha inogara veruzhinji vakwidzawo mari yekufambisa Vamwe vanhu vataura neStudio7 vange vachitsutsumwa zvikuru nekukwira kuri kuramba kuchiita mitengo yezvinhu. Mumwe wevanhu ava ndemumwe mudzimai angozvidoma nezita rekuti Amai Ndlovu avo vati vanoshora vanotenga nekutengesa mari pamusika mutema vachivati ndivo vari kukuchidzira kukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu. Izvi zvatsigirwawo nemumwe murume angozvidoma nezita rekuti George uyo ati anoshamisika kuti sei hurumende isiri kuda kugadzirisa nyaya yekutengeswa kwemari pamusika mutema. VaReginald Shoko ndivo mukuru mukuru weAffirmative Action Group mudunhu reMateleland uye muongorori wezvehupfumi akazvimirira ega. VaShoko vati kunyange hazvo vanotengesa mari mumigwagwa vachibatsira kuwedzera kusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi, dambudziko guru inyaya yekuti vanhu vakawanda havana chivimbo nehupfumi hwemunyika. VaShoko vatiwo rimwe dambudziko inyaya yekuti vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kuita humbimbindoga kana kuti mazvake mazvake izvo vati zvinoita kuti matambudziko akatarisana nenyika anetse kugadzirisa. Vamwe vanhu kusanganisira vatsigiri vebato reZanu PF, vanoti vemabhizimisi vari kukwidza mitengo zvenhando senzira yekuda kushoresa mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nehurumende yavo. Asi mutauriri webato reZapu VaIphithule Maphosa vaudza Studio7 chinhu chikuru chiri kukonzera kuti zvinhu zvisamira zvakanaka munyika kusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Dzimwe nyanzvi dzinoti kushaikwa kwemari yekunze ndiko kuri kunyanya kuwedzera matambudziko ari munyika. Mitengo yezvinhu zvakasiyana siyana iri kukwira kubvira svondo rapera apo mukuru webhanga guru renyika, VaJohn Mangudya, vakatura mamiriro ezvinyu munyaya dzekushandiswa kwemari munyika.

headline: Dare reCongress muAmerica Rozeya Hukama hweNyika iyi neZimbabwe
text: Chimwe chikamu chekomiti yemuAmerica inoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika kana kuti Subcommitee on Africa, Global Health, Global Human Rights, and International Organizations chakaita musangano muWashington DC nezuro chichizeya nyaya yeremangwana reZimbabwe mushure mekunge vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vasiya basa. Aikokera musangano uyu imwe nhengo yekomiti iyi VaChristopher Smith. Vakapa humbowo mudare iri vanoti vaimbove mumiriri weAmerica muZimbabwe VaCharles Ray, Murimi VaBen Freeth Doctor Chipo Dendere vanodzidzisa paAmherst Collegemuno muAmerica uye Amai Elizabeth Lewis mutevedzeri wemukuru wesangano reInternational Republic Institute. Dr Dendere vanoti musangano uyu wainge wakakosha zvikuru sezvo wakapa mukana kuZimbabwe ne America kuti dziyedze kugadzirisa hukama. VaSmith vakaudza dare iri kuti musangano uyu wainge wakanangana nekutsvagawo nzira dzekuunza hutongo hwejekerere muZimbabwe. Vachitaurawo pamusangamo uyu, imwe nhengo yedare iri VaEd Royce vakati Zimbabwe inofanira kuve netarisiro yakanaka mune remangwana asi isingakanganwe chazuro nehope sezvo vamwe vari muhurumende iri kutungamirwa naVaEmmerson Mnangagwa vaityora kodzero dzevanhu mazuva aitonga vaive mutungamiri wenyika VaMugabe. VaRoyce vakati sarudzo dziri kuitwa munyika gore rino dzinofanira kuve dzakachena uye vachiti hurumende inofanira kumira nyaya dzehuori. Vati hurumende yeAmerica inoda kutanga yaona kuti mitemo yaremekedzwa isati yabvisa zvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru muhurumende yeZimbabwe. VaRay vakaudza dare iri kuti kubviswa kwakaitwa VaMugabe kunopa America mukana wekuti iyedze kugadzirisa hukama hwayo neZimbabwe. Vakati Zimbabwe ikaita sarudzo dzakachena, zvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vatungamiri vehurumende zvinofanira kubviswa. Asi Amai Lewis vakati zvirango hazvifanire kubviswa sezvo zvichipa America mukana wekuti imanikidze hurumende yaVaMngangagwa kuti irambe ichivandudza zvinhu muZimbabwe Nyaya yekupindira kwemauto munyaya dzesarudzo nezvematongerwo enyika yakazeyiwawo mudare iri zvichinzi mauto haafanire kuve aine chekuita nenyaya dzesarudzo. Kuti izvi zvisaitike, vamwe vakapa kurudziro yekuti munyika mutumirwe vaongorori vekunze, asi VaFreeth vanoti izvi hazvibatsire nekuti dzimwe nguva kunoitwa mapungwe vanhu vachiitwa kafiramberi pasina vaongorori vanosvikako zvikuru kumamisha. Dr Dendere vakatsinhirawo mashoko aya. Vedare iri vakachema chemawo nenyaya yekushaiswa mukana kwevanopikisa kuti vawane mukana wekutaurawo padzinhepfenyuro. Asi vedare ava Vachitungamirwa naVaRay vakarumbidza Studio 7 vachiti inopa mukana mapato ose. Vamwe vakapinda mumusangano uyu ndiDoctor Frank Guni avo vakati vange vachida kuti dare iri rikokewo vamwe muhurumende yeZimbabwe kana kubato reZanu-PF. Vanhu vakawanda zvikuru vakapinda mumusangano uyu kusanganisa zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muAmerica nevamwe vachena vakawanda vakambogara muZimbabwe. America yakatanga kutemera vakuru veZimbabwe zvirango muna 2001 vachiipomera mgosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Ashton odzoka kuEngland
text: akasayina kondirakiti neSale kuti akwanise kudzoka muchikwata cheEngland zvichitevera kubva kwaakaita kuToulon.   Ange ari makwikwi ekurwira kutenga Ashton kubva paakanwisa hat-trick yemaBarbariasn apo yaitamba neEngland kuTwickengam muna Chivabvu ndokubva ataura chishuvo chake chekukwikwidza kumutambo weWorld Cup gore rinotevera.   Mutemo weEngland uripo iye zvino hautenderi kuti vatambi vanotambira kune dzimwe nyika vashavedzwe kuzotambira chikwata ichi.   Mushure mekunge afungisisa zvakadzama, Ashton — uyo ainge ashanyirwa nakaputeni weEngland anove sahwira wake, Dylan Hartley, paaive pazororo zvichitevera mutambo wemaBarbarians – ndipo paakazivisa Toulon kuti vamusiye achienda.   Pekutanga, chikwata chekuFrance ichi chakarwa zvakasimba kuti chichengetedze mutambi uyu asi hazvina kutadzisa Sale nemaHarlequins kurakidza nechido chekuda kumutenga uye svondo rino ndipo pakazobvuma Toulon kuti imusiye achienda.   Ashton haana hake kutaura zvakawanda pamusoro penyaya yekuda kutambira nyika yake, achiti pari zvino ari kufunga nezvemaSharks chete.   “KuToulon ndakadzidza zvakawanda ndichiwedzera zvimwe zvandakabva nazvo kuSaracens. Kune vatambi vakawanda kuSale Sharks avo vandiri kutarisira kutamba navo munguva inotevera. Handisi kuuya kuzororo.   Ndine rugby yakawada yekutamba yasara mumuviri wangu uye ndinoda kushanda nesimba kuti tidzorere chikwata ichi mukuhwina zvachaiita kumashure mugore ra2006.”  anodaro — SportsMail Rugby

headline: MDC Inoshoropodza Gwaro Rakaburitswa neKomisheni yaVaMotlanthe
text: Bato reMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa rinoti gwaro rekomisheni yakadomwa kuongorora nezvemhirizhonga yakaitika musi wa 1 Nyamavhuvhu raburitswa kune veruzhinji nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, harina zvariri kubatsira nazvo nyika pari zvino kunze kwekuda kubata vanhu kumeso. Gwaro iri rakanyorwa nekomisheni yaitungamirirwa nevaive mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaKgalema Motlanthe, mushure mekunzwa humbowo kubva kuvanhu vakasiyanasiyana. Mutauriri webato iri, VaJacob Mafume, vanoti sebato vanoona sekunge gwaro iri ragara richida kuvharidzira kuurayiwa kwakaitwa vanhu nemauto. Vanotiwo chimwe chavashamisa ndechekuti gwaro iri riri kukurudzira kuti vakapfura nekuuraya vanhu vatsvagwe vamiswe pamberi pematare, asi riri iro basa raifanirwa kuitwa nekomisheni iyi rekuburitsa pachena vakauraya vanhu. VaMafume varambawo kuti bato ravo ndiro rakakonzeresa mhirizhonga iyi.
