No media source currently available Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu uye vari mukuru wesangano reHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti vanoona sekunge komisheni yaVaMotlanthe iyi yakaedza kwazvo kuburitsa pachena kuti mauto akapfurikidza mwero pakushandisa chisimba mukupomhodza kuratidzira. Asi VaMavhinga vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kuchiendesawo ongororo yakaitwa iyi mberi kuburikidza nekusunga vose vane chekuita nekupfurwa kwevanhu vorangwa zvakakodzera. No media source currently available

headline: Vakapotsa Vafa neCovid-19 Voyambira Vanhu Kuti Vabayiwe Nhomba Nguva Ichiripo
text: Vamwe vanhu vakarwara nechirwere cheCovid-19 vasina kubayiwa nhomba vari kukurudzira vari kuzengurira kubayiwa kuti vaite izvi nekuti vakapotsa vaenda kwamupfiganebwe. Vaimbova mupurisa muZimbabwe Republic Police VaMalvern Mudyiwa mumwe akapona nepaburI retsono mushure mekubatwa nechirwere ichi vasina kunge vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19. VaMudyiwa vanoti vakatozonoponera kuchipatara cheParktowen uko vakange vopihwa mweya wekufema kwemavhiki matatu sezvo vainge vozarirwa uye vagarawo vaine chirwere cheasthma. VaMudyiwa vaendera mberi vachiti vakashamiswa apo vakapedza kugeza vakatarisa pachiringiro vakaona mufananidzo wavo wairatidza kuti vainge vasara mapfupa chete. Vamwe vakataura neStudio 7 ndiAmai Namatirai Mutemwa vanogara kuZambia vakabatwa neCovid-19 vagara vaine chirwere chemoyo. Vanoti kunyangwe vakaburitswa muchipatara vachiri kunetseka nekufema uye vakanzi nachiremba vavo kana vave nani vabayiwe nhomba yeCovid-19. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare kuTynwald North VaProvidence Moyo vanoti vakabhadhara mari yakawanda zvikuru kuti varapwe chirwere ichi vari kumba kwavo. Vanoti chirwere chavasiya vasinganyatsogone kumira kwenguva yakareba zvekuti kuti vaende kuri kubayiwa nhomba kune vanhu vakawanda zvinovanetsa. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano avo varikuita ongororo yemishonga yeCovid19 Muzvare Miriam Chemhanza vanoti vakabayiwa nhomba vakatapurirwa chirwere ichi havazonyanye kurwara sevasina. Nyanzvi munayay dzezvehutano Dr Tinashe Gede vakurudzira veruzhinji kuti vabaiwe nhomba yeCovid 19 uye kuti vasateerera zvinobuda pamadandemutande zvisingabvi kunyanzvi dzehutano pamusoro penhomba dze Covid-19 sezvo vanhu vakawanda vari kupedzisira vapinda muna taisireva. Vaendera mberi vachiti panguva ino yeCovid-19, chakakosha kubaiwa nhomba yechirwere ichi nekutevedzera kurudziro yeWorld Health Organisation yekuti vanhu vapfeke mamasiki, vageze mawoko uye vagare vakataramukana kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisapararire. Pane gwaro rakaburitswawo nehurumende rinonzi “Covid 19 Admissions and Community Deaths by Vaccination Status,” riri kutsinhirawo kuti vanhu vari kufa zvakanyanya nechirwere cheCovid 19 vanhu vasina kubaiwa nhomba. Gwaro iri rinotiwo vana vadiki vave kunyanya kubatwawo nemhando yeCovid-19 iri kutenderera munyika yeDelta variant. No media source currently available

headline: NHABVU YORWISA COVID-19
text: ZVIKWATA zvenhabvu izvo zvinokwikwidza muCastle Lager Premiership zvakatora matanho ekubatana nemamwe masangano mukurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 kuburikidza nezvirongwa zvinosanganisira kupa chenjedzo yedenda iri.   Kwayedza yakaita hurukuro nezvimwe zvezvikwata izvi kusanganisira Dynamos, Highlanders neFC Platinum izvo zvinotaura pamusoro pezvirongwa zvazviri kuita munharaunda yazvinobva.   Mukushi wemashoko kuDynamos FC, Tinashe Farawo anoti sechikwata, vari kushanda nevanhu vakasiyana mukupa chenjedzo kuvanhu pamusoro peCovid-19 achiti vatambi veDeMbare vari kuvashandisa kugadzira mavhidhiyo ayo vanotumira vanhu vachivayambira kuti vagare vakachengetedzeka.   “Isu sechikwata, tiri kupa chenjedzo kuvatsigiri vedu kuti ngavagare vakachengetedzeka panguva ino, nekuti chirwere ichi chiri kupararira. Mukudaro, tine mavhidhiyo evatambi vedu vachitaura nezvechirwere ichi ayo tiri kugadzira tichitumira kuvanhu tichivapa yambiro.   “Tiri kushanda zvekare nemasangano akasiyana uye vamwe vanhu vakuru kuti tirwise denda iri uye tibatsire vatsigiri vedu panguva ino,” akadaro Farawo.   Mutevedzeri wasachigaro weHighlanders, Modern Ngwenya anoti Bosso yakabatsira chimwe chipatara chekuBulawayo nemari sedanho rekurwisa coronavirus uye vatambi vavo vari kubika mavhidhiyo ayo ane mashoko ari pamusoro pedenda rabata nekuuraya vanhu vakawandisa pasi rose iri.   “Isu takabatsira chimwe chipatara nemari yekushandisa kutenga zvinodiwa mukurwisa coronavirus. Vatambi veduzve vari kubika mavhidhiyo ayo ane shoko rechenjedzo ayo tiri kutumira kune veruzhinji,” anodaro Ngwenya.   Muhurukuro nemutauriri weFC Platinum, Chido Chizondo anoti sechikwata, vari kuita basa guru munharaunda yeZvishavane nedunhu rose reMidlands kusanganisira kupa chenjedzo uye kupa masanitizers kuti veruzhinji vashandise kubvisa kana kuuraya hutachiona.   “Tine rudo nenharaunda yatinobva saka tiri kuita mabasa akasiyana ekubatsira anosanganisira kupa masanitizers uye kupakura chenjedzo pamusoro pechirwere ichi. “Chokwadi chirwere ichi chiriko uye chiri kuuraya vanhu saka isu sechikwata chevanhu chine vanhu pamoyo, tiri kuita zvose zvatinokwanisa kuti tibatsire vatsigiri vedu panguva ino,” akadaro Chizondo.

headline: Vari Kubheja paMitambo yeWorld Cup Vodyiwa Mari Zhinji neKuda kweNyika Dziri Kushura Mare
text: Vanoita zvekubheja mitambo yenhabvu vari kuchema chema nekudyiwa mari kwavari kuitwa nemakwikwi e2022 World Cup ayo arikubura zvishamiso muQatar. Vanoita zvekubheja mitambo ava vari kuchema nekudyiwa kwavari kuitwa mari dzavo nezvishamiso zviri kuitika mumakwikwi arikuitwa e2022 World Cup. Zvikwata zvine mukurumbira izvo vane chivimbo nazvo zviri kurohwa nezvikwata zvavasingafungire muhondo yekurwira mukombe mukuru uyu. Nezuro chaiye Senegal yakapunzira pasi Ecuador 2-1 ndokuita chikwata chekutanga muAfrica kupinda munharaunda yechipiri kumakwikwi aya. Mimwe mitambo iri pedyo ndeiyo inoti Morocco 2 Belgium 0, Argentina 1 Saudi Arabia 2, Japan 1 Germany 2, Costa Rica 1 Japan 0, neTunisia 0 Denmark 0. Vamwewo havasi kukanganwa mutambo wemuvhuto uyo Cameroon yakadzora kubva 3-1 pasi ndokuzoita mangange 3-3 neSerbia. Vanoita zvekubheja mitambo yenhabvu VaOliver Musongoro vanoti vanzwa nekurohwa kwavari kuitwa mari yavo iyo irikutsvedza sesipo. Mutsigiri wenhabvu VaJustice Muzanenhamo vanoti varikunzwira tsitsi avo vaive vakanda mari dzavo paJapan iyo yakarohwa neCosta Rica 1-0. Kubheja mitambo yenhabvu ratove basa rema zuva ese revazhinji kwete muZimbabwe kana muAfrica chete asi pasi rese. Asi kune vamwe vasiri kushamiswa ne zviri kubuda kuWorld Cup izvi vachiti mumutambo wenhabvu hamuna zvakanyorwa kunzi anofanira kukunda ndiani. Aimboridza pembe muPremier Soccer League VaSam Hamandawana vanoti nhabvu yekare neyemazuva ano zvasiyana zvikuru nekuti hapasisina chikwata chinonzi chinokunda mutambo usati watambwa. Aimbove murairidzi weCaps United Darlington Dodo anoti zvakaitwa neSaudi Arabi neJapan uyezve zvaitwa neMorocco zvinoratidza kuti nhabvu yasanduka zvekuti nyika dzaitarisirwa pasi pasi dzasimukawo. Asi Argentina yakakwanisa kukwakukwa kubva mukurohwa neSaudi Arabia ndokurovawo Mexico 2-0. Aimbobatira Zimbabwe neHighlanders Tapuwa Kapini anofunga kuti Argentina iyi ndiyo yezvimwe zvikwata zvinokwanisa kutora mukombe. Zvimwe zvikwata zvirikutarisirwa kurwira zvakasimba kutora mukombe uyu iBrazil, Spain, neFrance iyo yakatora mukombe wacho muna 2018. France yatove munharaunda yechipiri mushure mekukunda mumitambo yayo yese miviri neAustralia neDenmark. No media source currently available

headline: Emery oda vamwe vatambi
text: anovimba kuti Arsenal ichamutsigira muna Ndira uno nekumutengera vamwe vatambi, asi akaramba kutaura kuti Denis Suarez achange ari mumwe wacho here.Mutambi weBarcelona uyu ari kunzi ari kudiwa chaizvo nechikwata chekuEmirates ichi uko achasanganiswa zvakare naEmery uyo waakashanda naye kuSevilla.   Chikwata chake chichangobva kukunda Blackpool 3-0 mumutambo weFA Cup third-round.   Emery anoti,” Ndinofunga kuti chikwata chiri kushanda kutsvaga vatambi vanogona kutibatsira mumwedzi mina inotevera. Ndinofunga kuti nguva ino tinogona kubatsirika tikatsvaga mutambi wekumashure. Asi hazvisi nyore nekuti tina Konstantinos Mavropanos uyo ari kudzoka mushure mekumbokuvara. Tinodazve mutambi wekumberi, mumwe chete anokwanisa kutamba kumberi munzvimbo dzakasiyana.”   Paakabvunzwa kuti anoona Suarez achitamba sewinger, murairidzi wemaGunners uyu akawedzera kuti, “Ndipo paaitamba kwese, ndichimurairidza aitamba kurudyi kana kuruboshwe panzvimbo iyoyi.”

headline: Baba neMwana Vokonzera Mutauro nekuHwina Makwikwi ekwaTM Supermarkets kuChinhoyi
text: Kuhwina makwikwi eTM Bonanza promotion kwababa nemwana ane makore mashanu kokonzeresa mutauro muChinhoyi vamwe vachiti vanoshandisa mushonga kuti vahwine. VaClifton Mandla nemwana wavo Clinton ane makore mashanu ndivo vakahwina mibairo mukuru yeTM Bonanza promotion yakaitwa muChinhoyi neMugovera. Clinton akahwina mubairo mukuru wemari inosvika zviuru gumi, baba vake avo vanogaro vachihwina mibairo pachitoro cheTM muChinhoyi vakahwina zviuru zvishanu zvemadhora. Vamwe vagari vemuChinhoyi vanoti VaMandla vanoshandisa mushonga wekuti vahwine kana kuti vanorotswa. Amai Sobangile Kamudyariwa mumwe wevanofunga kuti VaMandla vanoshandisa mushonga kuti vahwine. Amai Kamudyariwa vanoti chimwe chinoshamisa ndechekuti VaMandla vari kuhwina pamakwikwi echitoro chimwechete izvo vanofunga kuti pane chitsotsi chirikuitwa nevashandi veTM. Asi VaMandla vanoti hapana mushonga wavanoshandisa vachiti vanohwina nekuti vanopinda mumakwiwi ose anoitika muzvitoro. VaMandla vanoramba kuti vanohwina makwiwi anoitwa muchitoro cheTM chete vachiti vanohwina makwiwi emunezvimwe zvitoro. VaMandla vakambohwina mamwe madhora zviuru zvishanu mugore ra2016, gore rakapera vakahwina firiji mumakwiwi ekwaTM Bonanza promotion. Vanoti mari yavahwina vachaishandisa kuvaka imba panzvimbo yavakatenga mushure mukuhwina mari yekutanga uye vanoti vacharamba vachipinda mumakwikwi ekwaTM nemunezvimwe zvitoro. Kunyange hazvo mutemo unoona nezvekupinda mumakwikwi usingabvimire kuti vana vane makore ari pasi pegumi nemasere vapinde mumakwikwi, chitoro cheTM chakaiswa panguva yakaomwa sezvo vainge vasina kunyora kuti makwikwi aya ayipindwa nevanhu vane makore mangani. Mukuru anoona nezvekushambadzirwa muzvitoro zvekwaTM Muzvare Paida Moyo vanoti vakaona kukanganisa uku Clinton atohwina vakatya kusamupa mubairo wake sezvo vaizoendeswa kumatare. Muzvare Moyo vanoti zvekuhwinisa mwana mudiki hazvichaitika zvakare. Zvitoro zvakawanda zvave kuita makwiwi ekuwanisa mibairo kuti vanhu vatenge zvinhu zvakawanda nechinangwa chekuhwina mibairo. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi dzeHutano Dzofara neKusashaya kweVanhu neCovid-19 muMazuva Manomwe Adarika
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weChina kuti huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 hwaramba huri pamazana maviri nemakumi maviri nevana kana kuti 224, sezvo pasina munhu akafa nedenda iri. Izvi zvinoreva kuti kwemazuva manomwe, hapana munhu afa munyika neCovid-19, chiitiko chiri kutambirwa nenyanzvi mune zvehutano dzichiti ichi chiratidzo chekuti matanho ekurwisana nechirwere ichi ari kutorwa nenyika ari kushanda. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika hwakakwira kusvika pazviuru zvinomwe nemazana matanhatu ane makumi matatu nevatatu, kana kuti 7 633 mushure mekunge vanhu makumi matatu nevashanu kana kuti 35, vawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi. Pavanhu ava vanhu makumi matatu nevaviri kana kuti 32 vagara vari munyika, vaviri vakadoka kubva kuSouth Africa kuchiti mumwe chete ari akadzoka munyika kubva kuNamibia. Vanhu vakanga vapona kubva kucovid-19 kusvika nemusi weChina vanonzi vakanga vasvika pazviuru zvishanu nemazana masere ane makumi mana nemumwe, kana kuti 5 841. Huwandu hwevanhu vachiri kurwara neCovid-19 hwakakwira kuenda pachiuru nemazana mashanu nemakumi matanhatu nevasere, kana kuti 1 568.

headline: NCA, EU neAmerica Dzoshora Mhirizhonga Iri Kuitika Munyika
text: Bato rinopikisa reNational Constitutional Assembly, NCA, raburitsa gwaro rinoshoropodza mhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika iri kuitika munyika. Ukuwo muzinda weAmerica muZimbabwe, pamwe nesangano reEuropean Union muZimbabwe, EU, dzashorawo mhirizhonga ingava ichiitika pakati pemapato ezvematongerwo enyika, kanawo mukati mebato rimwe chete. America neEU dzinoti mhirizhonga munyika ine hutongo hwejekerere haitambirike, uye dzinokurudzira kuti vanenge vachikonzera mhirizhonga vatorerwe matanho. Mutauriri weNCA, VaMadock Chivasa, vanoti bato ravo rakanyanya kubatikana nemhirizhonga yakaitika mumusha weSt. Mary’s kuChitungwiza uko nhengo dzeZanu PF dzakarwisana izvo zvakazotora hupenyu hwevanhu vatatu. Bato iri rinoti rinoshamisikawo nekuti munhu anonzi akaponda vamwe vake veZanu PF ava anozonzi akawanikwa akafa ari mumaoko emapurisa muhusungwa. “Isu tinokurudzira kuti vanhu vasashandise mhirizhonga mukugadzirisa makakava avo,” vanodaro VaChivasa. No media source currently available Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, uye vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaChamu Madiridze, vanotiwo dambudziko rekupedzwa kwemhirizhonga munyika richanetsa sezvo iine midzi kubva munguva yehondo yekurwira rusununguko. “Mukatarisa kubva munguva yehondo yeChimurenga, vanhu vaishandisa mhirizhonga kuti vanzwikwe, kwouya nyika yawana kuzvitonga, hurumende yaishandisa mhirizhonga kunyaradza vanenge vachida kuipikisa,” VaMadiridze vanodaro. VaMadiridze vanoti mhirizhonga iri kuitika iyi inogona kuve munongedzo wezvichaitika musarudzo dza2018, kana kurudziro iri kupiwa nemasangano akaita se EU nemuzinda weAmerica muZimbabwe ikasatambirwa. No media source currently available

headline: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe Chiri kuAmerica Chotaura Pamusoro peKugara Kwacho kuZimbabwe Munguva yeCovid-19
text: Vakuru vakati gonzo mhini gara mumhango chemudzimu chikuwaniremo. Izvi ndizvo zvakaitwa nechimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, VaTinashe Tsokodayi, mushure mekunge vashanya kumusha panguva imwechete denda reCovid-19 rakapindawo munyika. VaTsokodayi, avo vanogara muVirginia muAmerica, vanoti pavakaenda kumusha muna Kukadzi wegore rino, havana kumbobvira vafunga kuti vaizogara kwemwedzi minomwe. Asi nekuda kwekuti nyika yakazovharwa muna Kurume wakare nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 mushure mekunge hurumende yakadzika mutemo unorambidza kufambafamba kwevanhu senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19, VaTsokodayi vakazongozvipira kugarako kusvika zvinhu zvanaka. VaTsokodayi vanoti vanoona sekunge hurumende yeZimbabwe yakaita zvose zvaikodzera kuti iite kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi, izvo vanoti zvinogona kunge zvakaita kuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa pamwe nekufa nechirwere ichi huderere. Vanoti vaifanirwa kudzoka kuAmerica musi wa20 Kurume asi vakaona zvakakosha kuti varambe vari muZimbabwe senzira yekuzvidzivirira ivo pamwe nehama dzavo dziri kuAmerica, sezvo vaityira kuti vaizogona kubatira chirwere ichi murwendo rwavo, uyewo kuti vambotanga vanzwisisa nezvechirwere ichi. "Ndakaona kuti izvoni ndakafamba nguva yeCovid kwandaisvika ikoko I was a potential risk yekuti ndi spuredhe as I had a feeling yekuti Covid yakawanda yanga ichibatwa nevanhu in transit mundege imomo, saka ndakangoita decision yekuti ndimbomira ku traveller," VaTsokodayi vanodaro. Vanoti vakazokwanisa kubuda munyika kutanga kwaGumiguru, mushure mekunge hurumende yavhura zvakare nhandare dzendege dzose dzemunyika. Semutemo uri munyika dzose, vakasungirwa kutanga vawana gwaro rinoratidza kuti vakavhenekwa Covid-19 vakawanikwa vasina chirwere mukati memaawa makumi manomwe nemaviri kuti vakwanise kukwira ndege. VaTsokodayi vanoti havana kusangana nedambudziko pakupinda muAmerica, asi vakatara kuti vachange vachigara kwavo vega kwemazuva gumi nemana, kunyange hazvo dunhu ravo risina mutemo iwowo. No media source currently available

headline: Kambani yeECONET Inozivisa Kuti Yavhariswa Zvakare Masaisai neHurumende
text: Mashoko atiri kutambira anoti kambani yenharembozha yeECONET yamanikidzwa zvakare nehurumende kuvhara masaisai eindaneti kusvika yazoziviswa matanho ekutora. Kambani iyi yaburitsa mashoko ayatumira kuvanhu vanoshandisa masaisai ayo ekuti yamanikidzwa zvakare kutora danho iri kunyange hazvo nyaya yekuvhariswa kwayakaitwa masaisai kekutanga iri kumatare edzimhosva. ECONET inoti magweta ayo aiudza kuti itevedzere zviri kudiwa nehurumende izvi kusvika vanzwa zvichabva kumatare edzimhosva kuti zviri pamutemo here kana kuti kwete. Kambani iyi yakumbira ruregerero kuvanhu ichiti izvi zviri kunze kwemasimba ayo.

headline: Sangano reDiaspora Care Forum Rinoparurwa muSouth Africa
text: Zvizvarwa zviviri zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa, zvabatana nemakambani matatu emunyika iyi mukuumba sangano richabatsira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika munyaya dzekufirwa pamwe nekuronga zvirongwa zvinounza mari mumhuri. Sangano reDiaspora Care Forum, Dicafo, raparurwa zviri pamutemo muJohannesburg kuSouth Africa nemunyarikani waro, VaAustin Moyo, pamwe nemukuru waro mutsva, VaSocks Chikowero. Vachitaura pakuparurwa kwesangano iri, VaMoyo vati chinangwa chikuru chesangano ravo ndechekukurudzira vari kunze kwenyika kuti vakwanise kuita mabasa anovapa mari kuitira kuti vasazoshupike mumatambudziko akaita serufu nemamwe. VaMoyo vatiwo masangano achange achishanda neDicafo achabatsira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika mukutanga mishandira pamwe, mabhizinesi, pamwe nekuchengeta mari zvine hungwaru, senzira yekusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika, kana vachinge vazodzokera kumusha. VaChikowero vatiwo Dicafo ichashanda nevanhu vari munyika dziri muSADC, zvikuru South Africa, Botswana, Swaziland, Namibia, Lesotho neMozambique. Imwe nhengo yeDicafo, Amai Venitia Govendor, vatiwo sangano ravo richapawo ruzivo kunhengo dzaro munyaya dzakasiyana siyana, dzinosanganisira zvinhu zvinounza mari mumhuri kuti dzigare zvakanaka. Masangano emuSouth Africa achange achishanda neDicafo anosanganisra GuardRisk, Prosperity Funeral Advisors, neRetail Funerals. No media source currently available

headline: Vashoma Vovhenekwa Chirwere cheGomarara Rinoita paZamu
text: Kunyange hazvo mwedzi waGumiguru uchizivikanwa nekucherechedza gomarara repazamu, sangano reCancer Association of Zimbabwe rinoti kunyange hazvo huwandu hwevanhu vakauya kuzoongororwa gomarara repazamu hwakawanda kudarika Gumiguru wegore rapera, veruzhinji havasati vonyanyotambira zvekuongororwa. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, Muzvare Anna Zvarehwanashe, vanoti kunyange hazvo vakaongororwa vanoti nguva zhinji zvinonetsa kungoti munhu anoongororwa pasina paanonzwa panorwadza izvo zvinozoita kuti vanhu vaongororwe kana paita zviratidzo zvekuti pangangove negomarara remazamu. Muzvare Zvarehwanashe vatiwo kushomeka kwenzvimbo dzinoongorora gomarara munyika kunoitawo kuti veruzhinji vatadze kunoongororwa nguva nenguva zvirwere zvakadai segomarara repazamu. Kunyange hazvo gomarara repazamu richinyanyouraya vanhukadzi, vanhurume vanobatwawo negomarara iri. Mumwe murume, VaJoseph Murwira, vatiwo kunyange hazvo vachiziva kukosha kwekuongororwa gomarara rezamu, vati vanhurume vazhinji vanozvitora sezvinhu zvedambe. VaMurwira vatsigirawo pfungwa dzaMuzvare Zvarehwanashe kuti kushomeka kwenzvimbo dzinoongorora gomarara ndozvezvimwewo zvinoshaisa varume vazhinji shungu. Mumwe mugari wekumusha weMkoba muguta reGweru, Amai Musa Shumba, vanotiwo kunyange hazvo gomarara repazamu riri kuuraya vanhu vakawanda kunyanya vanhukadzi, vatiwo ruzivo rwechirwere ichi rwuchiri rwushoma. Amai Shumba vati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti dai gomarara remazamu rarapwa pachena. Vachitaura neStudio7 parunhare, mukuru weCancer Association of Zimbabwe, Amai Junior Mavu, vabvuma kuti kumamisha hakuna nzvimbo dzakawanda dzekuti vanhu vaongororwe gomarara repazamu asi vakakurudzira kuti vanhu vaende kuzvipatara zvinenge zviri pedyo navo. Vatiwo muzvirongwa zvavo vachange voita dzidziso kumamisha nezvenyaya yegomarara. Amai Mavu vati muHarare vanhu churu nemazana matanhatu vakaongororwa gomarara rezamu mumwedzi waGumiguru zvichienzaniswa nevanhu churu nemazana mashanu vakaongororwa nguva imwechete gore rapera Sangano reCancer Registry rinoti muna 2014 gomarara repazamu ranga riri gomarara rechitatu mumagomarara akanyanyobata vanhu huye zvikamu zvinomwe kubva muzana zvakabatwa negomarara iri mugore rimwero. No media source currently available

headline: Bazi rezveKugara Kwakanaka kweVanhu Rinoti Vakaremara Vari Kubatsirwa muNguva Ino yeCovid-19 Lockdown
text: Gurukota rezvemabasa, vashandi nekugara zvakanaka kwevanhu, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, vanoti bazi ravo riri kubatsira vakaremara vakarasikirwa nemihoro munguva ino yemutemo unorambidza kufambafamba kwevanhu, kana kuti lockdown, kuburikidza nechirongwa chavakaparura chakanangana nekubatsira vanotambura. Vachitaura neStudio 7 vari kuCongo Brazzaville, uko vari kumusangano wechinomwe webudiriro mudunhu reAfrica, kana kuti "Africa Regional Forum on Sustainable Development", uyo wakapetwa nemusi weChina, Professor Mavima vanoti bazi ravo rakakwanisa kunyoresa vanhu vanosvika zviuru mazana matatu negumi, kana kuti 310 000, pasi pechirongwa ichi. Vanotiwo vave nemakore maviri vaumba bazi rinomirira vakaremara, iro riri kutungamirwa naDoctor Christine Peta. Professor Mavima vanoti munguva ino bazi ravo riri kubatsira vakaremara kuburikidza nehomwe yemari yavakaisa parutivi yekubatsira vanoda kutanga zvirongwa zvekuzvibatsira, uye ivo segurukota vari kukurudzira kuti vanhu vanyorese kumahofisi ebazi ravo ari nyika yose kuti vabatsirwe. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi Munyika Vocherechedza Zuva Ravo reVashandi Vakaomerwa
text: Sangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Union, ZCTU, rinoti gore rino vashandi vari kucherechedza zuva ravo revashandi mangwana zvinhu zvakavaomera kudarika mamwe makore ose aya. Munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo vanoti gore rino vashandi vakaomerwa zvakanyanya nekuda kwekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu asi mihoro yavo isina kwairi kuenda. Vanotiwo chimwe chakanyanya kuomesera vashandi kuvharwa kwemakambani pamwe nekushaikwa kwemabasa kune vanga vasiri kushanda. ZCTU inoti ichacherechedza zuva revashandi iri munzvimbo makumi maviri neimwe munyika yose, asi gungano guru richange riri kunhandare yeDizvarasekwa muHarare. Dingindira resangano iri gore rino, iro rinoti “We are at a Crossroads! Unite, Fight Neoliberalism and Austerity,” riri kukurudzira vashandi kuti vabatane, varwise kuraswa kwetsika dzavo pamwe nekudzikwa kwemitemo inovaomesera, zvikuru mune zveupfumi. No media source currently available Asi munyori werimwe sangano revashandi, reZimbabwe Industrial Revolution Worker's Federation, VaPascoe Ekemu Chakanetsa, vanoti nekuda kwekuoma kwezvinhu, sangano ravo raona zvakakodzera kuti vashandi vasaungana zvavo gore rino. VaChakanetsa vanoti sangano ravo rine huron gwa hwekusangana nehurumende mushure mezuva revashandi, kana zvabudirira vozozivisa vashandi zvinenge zvabuda mumusangano uyu. No media source currently available

headline: VaBiden Votura Mashoko kuNyika yeAmerica Vachiti Vazadzikisa Zvavakavimbisa Kuita Mumazuva Zana eKutanga
text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaJoe Biden nhasi vatura mashoko avo kunyika yeAmerica pamberi pematare maviri eHouse of Representatives neSenate mudare reCapital Hill muWashington DC. Izvi zvauya mushure mekunge VaBiden vasvika mazuva zana vari muhofisi kubva zvavatora mhiko yekutungamira nyika. VaBiden sezvange zvakatarisirwa vataura nezvechirwere cheCovid-19 icho chauraya vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matatu pasi rose kusanganisira zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi mana nevanomwe kana kuti 547 000 muAmerica uye kubata vanhu mamiriyoni makumi matatu nemaviri kana kuti 32 million. Asi vati vari kubudirira kurwisa chirwere ichi sezvavakavimbisa musarudzo. Vati vachapa dzimwe nyika nhomba kana vanhu vose vemuAmerica vabayiwa nhomba. Panyaya yezvehupfumi, VaBiden vati hurumende yavo yakwanisa kuti zvinhu zvigadzikane. Vanhu vakawanda zvikuru vakawana mabasa muAmerica uye IMF inoti hupfumi hweAmerica huchakwira nezvikamu zvitanhatu kubva muzana. VaBiden vanoti vanoda kuti vashandi vawedzerwe mari uye madzimai apihwewo mari yakawanda. Vanoti vakazvipira kushanda nemaRepublicans pagwara ravo rekuvandudza zvehupfumi. VaBiden vataurawo nezvekuda kwavo kuwandudza zviwakwa vachiti zvichabatsira kuwanisa vanhu vakawanda mabasa. Vati vanoda kuti shoroma dzibhadharewo mutero wakati kurei kuti vakwanise kugadzira zvivakwa izvi. MuAmerica hamuna kugadzikana mune mamwe matunhu zvichitevera kuurayiwa kwevamwe vatema nemapurisa zvikuru vechichena. VaBiden vati nyaya iyi inoda kugadziriswa. VaBiden vakurudzirawo kuvandudzwa kwemitemo ine chekuita nekutengeswa kwepfuti zvichitevera kuurayiwa kwevanhu vakawanda nevamwe vanhu vanokwanisa kutenga pfuti asi vasina kugadzikana mupfungwa. Kekutanga munhoroondo yeAmerica, mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika Amai Kamala Harris mudzimai wekutanga kuva nechigaro ichi uye Amai Nancy Pelosi mudzimai wekutanga kuva mutauriri wedare reHouse of Representative vange vakagara pazvigaro zvepamusoro pedyo naVaBiden. Papedza VaBiden kutaura, Senator Tim Scott vekuSouth Carolina vabva vataurawo vakamirira bato rinopikisa remaRebuplicans. Senator Scott ndivo chete munhu mutema anova Senator mubato remaRepublicans. VaScott vati maDemocrats haasi kuratidza kuda kushanda nebato ravo panyaya dzakaita sekurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 kuti vana vadzokere kuchikoro kana pakuvandudza hupfumi. Vati kazhinji maDemocrats anoita zano ndega. No media source currently available

headline: VaChiwenga Havasati Vaita Musangano naVanachiremba neVakoti Vari Kuramwa Mabasa
text: Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika varizve gurukota rezvehutano, VaConstantino Chiwenga, pamwe nemunyori mukuru mubazi rezvehutano, VaJasper Chimedza, havasati vaita musangano nevashandi vemuzvipatara kusanganisira vakoti navanachiremba avo vave nemwedzi miviri vachiramwa mabasa. Vari kuramwa mabasa vanoti vari kuda kuwedzerrwa mari uye kuti vawaniswe zvikwanisiro muzvipatara. Asi vachitaura nezvekudomwa kwaVaChiwenga nemusi weChipiri svondo rapera, munyori mukuru mudare remakurukota, Doctor Misheck Sibanda, vakati mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangangwa, vaida kuti VaChiwenga vatange basa nechimbi chimbire kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa mubazi rezvehutano munguva iyo nyika yatarisana nedambudziko reCovid-19. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaChiwenga kuti tinzwe divi ravo sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. Asi tabata munyori mukuru wesangano ravanachiremba reSenior Hospital Doctors Association Doctor, Aaron Musara, avo vanoti hakuna musangano wati waitwa. No media source currently available Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nemutungamiri wesangano revakoti reZimbabwe Nurses Association VaEnoch Dongo vati hakuna chavati vanzwa kuvakuru mubazi rezvehutano nezvekugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. No media source currently available

headline: VaMahlangu Voradzikwa neMugovera
text: Mumiriri weNkulumane mudare reparamende VaThamsanqa Mahlangu avo vakashaya neMuvhuro vave kutarisira kuradzikwa muBulawayo neMugovera. VaMahlangu mumwe wevakabatsira kuumba bato reMDC muna 1999.  VaMahlangu vakashaya nechirwere chegomarara. Pakushaya kwavo vange varizve mutevedzeri wemunyori anoona nezvekurongwa kwemabasa muMDC uye vakambovawo mutevedzeri wegurukota rinoona nezvevechidiki. Mutauriri weMDC VaObert Gutu vanoti vacharadzikwa kumarinda eLady Stanley kuBulawayo. Iyi inzvimbo inoradzikwa magamba emuBulawayo. Mutungamiri webato reMDC VaMorgan Tsvangirai nevamwe vatungamiri mubato ravo vari kutarisirwa kunoradzika VaMahlangu. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yokundikana Kutengera Vashandi vemuZvipatara Zvinodzivirira Covid-19
text: Mutungamiri wesangano revakoti reZimbabwe Nurses Association VaEnoch Dongo vanoti chimwe chave kupa kuti chirwere checoronavirus chipararire zvakanyanya munyika inyaya yekuti vakoti navanachiremba havana zvikwanisiro zvekuzvidzivirira kutapurirwa chirwere ichi kana kuti maPPE. VaDongo vanoti vave nenguva yakareba vachikumbira kuti vawane zvikwanisiro zviri kukona n’anga murapwa achida. No media source currently available Kubva zvakatanga kupararira chirwere ichi munyika muna Kurume, vashandi vemuzvipatara kusanganisira vakoti navanachiremba vabatwa nechirwere ichi vadarika mazana matau nemakumi maviri nevatatu. Vakoti vanoti zvekupfeka vave kutozviona kumarinda eHeroes Acre sepakashaya gamba renyika VaPerrance Shiri avo vakaradzikwa nemusi weChina.

headline: Chess yotambwa padandemutande
text: SANGANO reZimbabwe Chess Federation (ZCF) rinoti riri pakati pekuronga kuti mutambo uyu uitwe kuburikidza nedandemutande munyika muno zvichitevera kunyuka kepiri kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Mutauriri weZCF, Thabo Elisha, anoti vane hurongwa hwekuti chess itambwe kuburikidza nedandemutande kumapurovhinzi akasiyana enyika sezvo pari zvino vanhu vasiri kutenderwa kuungana nechinangwa chekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda reCovid-19.   Elisha anoti vakadzidza kubva kumutambo weInternational Chess Federation Online Olympiad, uyo wakaitwa gore rapera, izvo zvakaona vatambi vemuno vachikwikwidza mumutambo uyu padandemutambe.   Anoti chess haina basa nekuti vanhu vaungane izvo zvagara zvisiri kutodiwa pasi pemitemo yekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   “Chess mutambo wakasiyana nemimwe mitambo nekuti haina basa nekuti vanhu vaungana here kana kuti kwete uye vanhu havambofe vakagumhana, vanenge vachingokwikwidza pabhodhi remutambo uyu. “Saka zvinogona kurongeka kuti mitambo yacho itambwe padandemutande vatambi vari kudzimba dzavo.   “Mwedzi yadarika, tine vatambi vedu vakakwikwidza mumutambo weInternational Chess Federation Online Olympiad saka isu ndiro gwara ratiri kuda kufamba narowo,” anodaro Elisha.   Apo vachiri kuronga kudzosa mutambo uyu, Elisha anoti mumasvondo maviri anotevera ndipo vachange vave negwara chairo ravachafamba naro.   “Iye zvino tiri pakati pekuronga kuti tozvifambisa sei sezvo izvi tiri kutotangawo kuzviunza muno,” anodaro Elisha.

headline: Sangano reZimbabwe Women In Politics Alliance Rinoti Richaenderera Mberi Nekuratidzira Kunyangwe Rikashungurudzwa
text: Nhengo dzemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu anoti re Zimbabwe Activists Alliance, Occupy Africa Unity Square Movement neZimbabwe Women In Politics Alliance dzakabata nevamwe vana veZimbabwe, dzinoti dzirikuenderera mberi nekuratidzida kwavo kusafara nemafambisirwo ari kuitwa zvinhu munyika kunyangwe vachiti vakashungurudzwa mambakwedza eMugovera nevanofungidzirwa kuti mapurisa kana kuti vasori. Nhengo idzi dziri kurara nekuswera mu Africa Unity Square muHarare uye dzinoti dziri kugadzira tsamba yenyunyuto kana kuti petition ichaendeswa kudare reparamende nekune mutungamiri wenyika vaRobert Mugabe. "Kunyangwe vakati shungurudza ticharamba tichienda mberi nekuratidzira kwedu sezvo mararamiro atiri kuita muno munyika asina kumira zvakanaka. Mari mumabhanga hamuna, mabasa hapana, vana vavazi kuenda kuzvikoro apa huwori hwuri kuramba hwuchiwanda munyika asi hapana ari kusungwa. Isu ticharamba tiri muno muAfrica Unity Square kusvika tanzwikwa zvichemo zvedu," Muzvare Lynda Masarira vesangano re Zimbabwe Women In Politics vaudza Studio 7. Muzvare Masarira vanoti vakakwidza nyaya yavo kumagweta avo nemamwe masangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu asi havana kuenda kumapurisa sezvo vakambo shungurudzwa nemapurisa aya musi Chishanu. "Hatina kuenda nenyaya yedu kumapurisa asi maphone evazhinji vari kuratidzira nesu akabiwa, ini ndikakuvadzwa ruwoko nechigunwe vamwe vakarohwa nekukuvadzwa asi izvi hazvisi kuzoita kuti tiregedze kuratidzira," Muzvare Masarira vaenderera mberi. Vanoti nemusi weChipiri vachaita musangano nevatori venhau wekuzeya mafambiro arikuita zvinhu mukuratidzira kwavarikuita. No media source currently available

headline: Nzvimbo yeRujeko Yoshaikwa muBRV kuMasvingo
text: Vagari vazhinji vemumusha weRujeko kuMasvingo vanoti havasi kufara nekushaikwa kwenzvimbo yavanofanirwa kunyoresa mumishina yeBiometric Voter Registration, BVR, izvo zviri kuita kuti vatadze kunyoresa. Vagari ava vanoti vari kuenda kunzvimbo dzakatarwa asi vachikundikana kunyoresa sezvo nzvimbo yavanofanirwa kunyoresa isiri kuwanikiwa mumishina yeBVR. Mumwe mugari wemuRujeko, VaZivanai Muzorodzi, vanoti vakatadza kunyoresa kuti vazovhotera muwadhi yavo sezvo yakanga isiri kuwanikwa mumishina, vakazopedzisira vanyoresa kuti vavhotere kumusha kwavo kumaruwa. Vamwewo vakaita sa VaBrighton Ramusi vanoti vari kushamiswa zvikuru kuti sei mumsha wavo weRujeko usiri muBVR uku Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, iri kuti yakagadzirira zvakakwana. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwebasa kuZEC mudunhu reMasvingo, Amai Getrude Murumbi, avo varamba kurekodhwa mashoko avo,vabvuma kuti kuRujeko kwaita dambudziko uye vatombomisa kunyoresa vanhu veikoko. Vatiwo dambudziko iri riri kugadziriswa nana mazvikokota vavo. Asi vamwe vagari vanoti vave kutyira kuti vangangotadza kuvhota uye ZEC haisi kufambisa mashoko akakwana kuvagari ichivaudza zvinodiwa kuti vanyorese. Nemamiriro akaita zvinhu muRujeko, Muzvare Esther Chimanikire, vanoti vave kutyira kodzero dzevanhu dzekuvhota kuti dzichambunyikidzwa. Zvichakadaro, vamwe vagari vemuMasvingo vanoti vashandi veZEC vari kutora nguva yakareba kunyoresa munhu muwe chete, vachiratidza sekuti havasi kugona basa iri nemazvo kunyange hazvo vakadzidziswa kushandisa michina iyi mitsva. Mumwe mugari wemuMasvingo, VaAnoziva Muguti, vanoti vabudirira kunyoresa nhasiasi havana kufara nenguva yatorwa kuti vapedzerwe. Chirongwa chekunyoresa kuvhota chakaparuwa musi wa 14 Gunyana uye chinopera musi wa 15 Ndira gore rinouya. Asi MDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai yakwidza mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, ZEC, pamwe negurukota rezvemitemo, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, ichiti VaMugabe havana kutevedza zvinodiwa nemutemo pavakatara mazuva aya. MDC-T inotiwo ZEC haina kugadzirira zvakakwana kuitira kuti iite basa iri nemazvo. Nyaya iyi iri kunzwikwa mudare nemusi weChina. Munhu anotairisirwa kunyoresa anofanirwa kunge aine makore gumi nemasere kana kudarika, aine chitupa kana gwaro rekufambisa, gwaro rinoratidza pavanogara muguta, kana kuri kumaruva, tsamba yasabhuku, kanawo affidavit yakasainwa na Commissioner of Oaths, kanawo magweta nevamwe vanhu vanobvumirwa kuita basa iri. No media source currently available

headline: Siyanai nemaboozer: Stix
text: SHASHA yakambonetsa munhabvu, Stanford “Stix” Mtizwa, anoti vatambi vezvikwata zviri muPremier Soccer League vanofanirwa kusiyana nekatsika kekutamba mitambo yekubheja mari yemaboozer panguva ino apo mitambo yose yakambomiswa senzira yekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 sezvo zvigona kukanganisa remangwana ravo.   Stix anoti kana vatambi ava vakakuvara vachitamba mitambo iyi zvisingazivikanwe nezvikwata zvavo zvichavakanganisa nekuti vonogona kushaya anovarapisa.   “Panguva ino zvinhu zvakaoma, tese tiri kuzviziva asi ini ndinoyambira vatambi kuti ngavachengetedze miviri yavo nekuti kana nhabvu ikazonzi yadzoswa vanenge vakagadzirira. Vari kudzimba dzavo vanotoita gadziriro dzavo dzese dzinodiwa nezvikwata zvavo vakatopedza.   “Asi ngavasiye tsika yavari kuita nekuti tiri kunzwa kuti kune vamwe vave kuita zvekutamba mitambo yekubheja mari kana kuti maboozer. Itsika yakashata kutamba mitambo iyi usina kupihwa mvumo nechikwata chako nekuti ukakuvara ikoko chete zvinokuomera, unoshaya anokurapisa,” anodaro Stix.   Stix, uyo ave kushanda kuchikwata cheBlack Rhinos basa rekuongorora vatambi vekune zvimwe zvikwata (chief scout) anoti ino ndiyo nguva yekuti masangano anotungamira nhabvu ashandise mukana uyu kugadzirisa zvose zvinokanganisa kusimukira kwemutambo uyu.   Anoti sangano rinotungamira nhabvu reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) rinofanira kubatsira zvikwata zvose nemari kuti zvifambise mabasa azvo.   “Zvikwata zviri kuremerwa izvo ndiri kuzvionerawo ndega. Saka Zifa inofanira kupindira yobatsira zvikwata zvese nemari nekuti vatambi vanodawo mari yekuzvichengeta nemhuri dzavo.   “Zvasiyana nekare apo taiziva kuti taienda kumabasa uye kana tabva kubasa toenda kubhora, iye zvino vatambi vakutamba bhora chete. Saka kana vasiri kutamba nhabvu yacho hapana mari yavanenge vachiwana. Naizvozvo vanoda kuchengetwa vanoda mari saka Zifa ngaipindire idire mari yakabva kuFifa.   “Fifa yakapa nyika dzose mari kuti dzibatsirikane panhabvu saka mari iyoyo ngaishande kubatsira zvikwata zvemuno zvese,” anodaro.   Stix anozivikanwa achitambira chikwata chenyika chemaWarriors nezvikwata zvinosanganisira CAPS United neBlack Rhinos.    Kubva zvaakasendeka kutamba nhabvu, akazotanga kurairidza izvo zvakamuona achimborairidza Black Rhinos.

headline: Africa kuWorld Cup
text: NEMUSI wesvondo, pasi rose richange rakatarisa apo pachatanga mutambo weFIFA 2022 World Cup uyo uchaona nyika yeQatar, iyo iri kuronga mutambo wegore rino, ichitatsurana neEcuador.   Mutambo weWorld Cup wadzoka gore rino uyo wakapedzisira kuitwa muna2018 kuRussia apo France yakatora mukombe mushure mekukunda Croatia 4-2 mufainari.   France neCroatia zviriko zvekare kumutambo wegore rino kuQatar.   Asi pachatanga mitambo nemusi weSvondo, Africa ichange yakatarisawo nyika dziri kumirira dunhu iri kumutambo uyu dzinoti Senegal, Ghana, Cameroon, Tunisia neMorocco.   Svondo rino, Kwayedza yakaita ongororo yezvikwata zvishanu izvi ichitarisa vatambi vazvo pamwe nemapoka azvakaiswa.   1.Senegal    Chikwata chaAloiu Cisse, icho chinove shasha yemuAfrica pari zvino, ndicho chiri kutarisirwa nevazhinji kuti chinogona kurwisana nezvimwe zvepasi rese zvekutosvika mufainari yegore rino.   Senegal yakakomborerwa nevatambi vane chitsama vane mukurumbira vanotambira nhabvu yavo kuEurope.   MaLions of Teranga ari muboka reGroup A umo achasangana neQatar, Netherlands neEcuador.   Mutambo wekutanga uriko nemusi weMuvhuro apo achasangana neNetherlands, kuchiti wechipiri achasangana neQatar musi wa25 Mbudzi uye wekupedzisira nemusi wa29 Mbudzi neEcuador.   MaLions of Teranga achange achitarira kumutambi wavo ane mukurumbira, Sadio Mane, uyo vari kunamatira kuti ange apora musi weMuvhuro usati wasvika pavachasangana neNertherlands.    Kalidou Koulibaly   Mutambi weBayern Munich uyu akakuvara achitambira chikwata chake chekuGermany asi akadomwa kupinda muchikwata chaCisse icho chine vamwe vatambi vanosanganisira Edouard Mendy weChelsea, Kalidou Koulibaly (Chelsea), Abdou Diallo (RB Leipzig), Idrissa Gueye (Everton) naPape Gueye (Marseille).   2.Tunisia    MaCarthage Eagles ari kunokwikwidza kumutambo weWorld Cup kechitanhatu munhoroondo yawo.   Chimwe chezvikwata zvemuAfrica zvakwanisa kuenda kakawanda kumutambo uyu uye chakasanganiswa vatambi vanotambira kuEurope nevanotambira muAfrica.   Chikwata chaJalel Kadri ichi chiri muboka reGroup D umo chichasangana neDenmark mumutambo wekutanga nemusi wa22 Mbudzi, chozosangana neAustralia nemusi wa26 Mbudzi uye neFrance nemusi wa30 Mbudzi.   Chikwata chaKadri ichi chine vatambi vakaita saWahbi Khazri, Youssef Msanki naHannibal Mejbri weManchester United uyo ari kutambira Birmingham City nechikwereti.   3.Morocco    MaAtlas Lions ari kuenda kuWorld Cup kechitanhatu uye gore rino zvakawanda zviri kutarisirwa kuchikwata ichi icho chizere vatambi vanotambira kuEurope zvakare.   Chikwata chaWalid Regragui ichi chiri muboka rimwe chete neCroatia, Belgium neCanada muGroup F.   Mutambo wacho wekutanga uriko musi wa23 Mbudzi apo chichasangana neCroatia, chozobandana neBelgium musi wa27 Mbudzi uye chichizopedzisira neCanada musi wa1 Zvita.    Hakim Ziyech   Achraf Hakim wePSG, Hakim Ziyech weChelsea nevamwe vatambi vechikwata ichi vane gomo rekukwira kuti vagobuda muboka ravo iri.   4.Cameroon    MaIndomitable Lions ari kuenda kuWorld Cup kechisere gore rino apo achange achirairidzwa naRigobert Song uyo anove shasha kuCameroon sezvo akatomboenda kumutambo uyu achitambira nyika yake.   Muchikwata chake mune vatambi vakaita saVincent Aboubakar (Al Nassr), Christian Bassogog (Shangai Shenhua), Eric-Maxim Choupo Moting (Bayern Munich) naAndre Onana (Inter Milan) vanotambira kuEurope.    Vincent Aboubakar   Cameroon iri muboka rimwe chete neBrazil, Switzerland neSerbia muGroup G. Mutambo weCameroon wekutanga ichasangana neSwitzerland musi wa24 Mbudzi, yozotamba neSerbia musi wa28 Mbudzi.   Mutambo wekupedzisira muboka iri ichasangana neBrazil musi wa2 Zvita apo vachatatsurana neshasha dzakaita saNeymar Junior, Gabriel Jesus, Vinicius Jnr naCasemiro.   5.Ghana    MaBlack Stars ari kuenda kuWorld Cup kechina munhoroondo yawo uye gore rino akaiswa muboka rine zvikwata zvinoti Portugal, Korea Republic neUruguay muGroup H.   Chikwata chemaBlack Stars chizerewo nevatambi vanotambira kuEurope vakaita saThomas Partey weArsenal, Jordan Ayew (Crystal Palace), Tariq Lamptey (Brighton & Hove Albion) naInaki Williams (Athletic Bilbao).    Thomas Partey   Chikwata chaOtto Oddo mutambo wacho wekutanga uriko musi wa24 Mbudzi apo chichabandana nePortugal yaCristiano Ronaldo, chozosangana neKorea Republic musi wa28 Mbudzi uye mutambo wekupedzisira muboka iri chichasangana neUrugual musi wa2 Zvita.   Mutambo wavo neUrugual unotarisirwa kunakidza zvikuru sezvo zvikwata zviviri izvi zvakambosangana muquarter-final yeWorld Cup ya2010 apo Luis Suarez akabata bhora akatadzisa Ghana kunwisa kuti ifambire mberi kupinda musemi-final.   Ghana yakazopihwa pena asi aive kaputeni wechikwata ichi, Asamoah Gyan, akaibhururutsa mutambo uyu ukapera uri mangange 1-1 apo Ghana yakazoburitswa kumapena.

headline: Vagari veMuChinhoyi Vofarira Kugadzirwa kweMigawagwa
text: Vagari vakawanda vemuChinhoyi vanoti vari kufara nekugadzirwa kuri kuitwa migwagwa yeguta ravo iyi yange yaipa nekuda kwekupedza nguva isina kugadziriswa. Vazhinji vataura neStudio 7 vanoti kunyange hazvo zvinhu zvakaoma kanzuru yavo iri kuita zvinhu zvinobatika sekugadzirisa migwagwa iyo yanga yave nemakomba makomba akawanda izvo zvanga zveve kukonzera njodzi uye kuuraya motokari dzavo. Mumwe mutyairi wemotokari inotakura veruzhinji VaMacdonald Chareya vanoti zvinofadza kuti kanzuru iri kugadzira migwagwa izvo vanoti zvave kuchengetedza motokari dzavo uye kusasimuka kwehuruva iyo inokonzera zvirwere. Izvi zvinotsigirwa naVaLazarus Tembo avo vanoti motokari dzavo hadzichafa nekuda kwekufamba mumakomba. VaChareya vanoti dambudziko ravepo nderekuti vamwe vatyairi vave kumhanyisa motokari sevari pamakwikwi nekudaro vanoti paiswe mahambu mumigwagwa. Meya weguta reChinhoyi VaDyke Makombe vebato reMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa vanoti vave kukwanisa kugadzira migwagwa nemari iri kubva kubazi rinoona nezve kugadzira kwemigwagwa munyika reZimbabwe National Road Authority kana kuti ZINARA. VaMakombe vanoti kanzuru yavo yave kushandisa mari yeZINARA pabasa ravanenge vapihwirwa mari kwete kuishandisa zvimwe. Asi mumwe mugari Amai Mercy Tapfumaneyi vanoti vanotenda maruva vadya chakata sezvo kanzuru ichimbotanga zvinhu asi yotadza kupedza nekuti kwavanogara kuWhite City hakusati kwagadzirwa. Mutauriri wekanzuru VaTichaona Mlauzi vanoti nzvimbo dzisiri kugadzirwa gore rino dzichagadzirwa munaNdira gore rinouya sezvo vakapihwa mari inosvika miriyoni nechidimu neZINARA yekushandisa gore rinouya. VaMlauzi vanoti parizvino vari kushandisa mari inosvika miriyoni kugadzira makiromita mapfumbamwe. Zvichakadaro mune imwewo nyaya sachigaro webato reZanu PF mudunhu reMashonaland West VaZiyambi Ziyambi vakazivisa nezuro kuti mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vachatanga kutenda vanhu nekuvavhotera kwavakaita. VaZiyambi vanoti VaMnangagwa vachatanga nekutenda vanhu vekwaZvimba neMugovera sezvo vainge vasingafungidzire kuti vanokunda mudunhu iri sezvo kuri kumusha kwevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe.

headline: Zvikwata zvehandball hutu kuZambia
text: ZVIKWATA zviviri zvemutambo wehandball mumapoka anoti Under18 ne21 svondo rino zvakaenda kuLusaka, kuZambia uko zviri kutarisirwa kukwikwidza mumitambo yeAfrica Zone 6 International Handball Federation Challenge Trophy.   Zvikwata zviviri izvi zviri kurwira matikiti ekuzoenda kunokwikwidza kumitambo mikuru yevechidiki ichaitirwa kuMacedonia kozoti yevakuru iyo ichaitirwa kuSpain gore rino.   Munyori mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Handball Association, Edson Chirowodza, anoti zvikwata zvavo zvicharwa sebvumba kuti zvigokwanisa kuenderera mberi mumutambo uyu.   “Uyu mukana mukuru wezvikwata zvedu kuti zvigoenda kunokwikwidza kuEurope zvakamirira Africa, saka takagadzirira nepatinokwanisa napo kuti tigohwina.   “Tinovimba zvikuru kuti svondo rino ticharwa semvumba tigosimudza mukombe nekuti hakuna zvimwe zvatiri kutsvaga kunze kwekuhwina chete,” anodaro Chirowodza.   Mutambo uyu une zvikwata zvisere izvo zvakaiswa mumapoka maviri anoti Group A neB uye chikwata cheZimbabwe chevechidiki cheU19 chakaiswa muboka rine zvimwe zvinosanganisira Madagascar, Lesotho neSeychelles kozoti chevakuru chiri muGroup A zvakare umo mune Madagascar, South Africa neSwaziland.

headline: Vaimbove Gurukota rezveKutakurwa kweZvinhu, VaJorum Gumbo, Vanosungwa neZACC
text: Vaimbove gurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu, VaJorum Gumbo, avo vave gurukota muhofisi yemutungamiri wenyika, vasungwa neZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission, ZACC, vachipomerwa mhosva yekuita zvehuwori pavaive gurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu. Sachigaro veZACC, Justice Loice Matanda-Moyo, vatenda kuti komisheni yavo yamboshevedza VaGumbo kuti vabvunzurudzwe uye kuti vape divi ravo panyaya dzavari kupomerwa idzi. "Vasungwa zvavo asi vachiri kutorwa ma warned and cautioned statement, vozoendwa navo ku court." Justice Matanda-Moyo vanoti VaGumbo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuita zvehuwori kukambani yendege yeAir Zimbabwe kuburikidza nekutengwa kwendege ina dzerudzi rweBoeing 777 kuMalaysia. Ndege idzi dzakatengwa munguva yehutongo hwevaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Justice Matanda-Moyo vanoti dzimwe mhosva dziri kupomerwa VaGumbo dzinosanganisira yekudzora pabasa mumwe aive mukuru wekambani yeCMED, kunyange hazvo akanga awanikwa aine mhosva nematare edzimhosva. Dzimwe mhosva dzinosanganisira yekushandisa imba yehama yavo kuyiita muzinda wemahofisi eAir Zimbabwe, pamwe nekusashandisa mari yehurumende zvasina kujeka. Justice Matanda-Moyo vanoti VaGumbo vanotarisirwa kumiswa pamberi pedare neChipiri. "Hativaisi mumaoko emapurisa Aiwa. Vanotori mumaoko eZACC, kusvika taenda kudare, tozonovaisa mumaoko ema prosecutor. Kana tichida kuti varare ku police station tinotsvaga police station yatinotaura nayo kuti vararewo vari ku police station iyoyo, asi vanenge vangori mumaoko eZACC," Justice Matanda-Moyo vanodaro. Gweta riri kumirira VaGumbo, VaSelby Hwacha vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti vaGumbo Havana kusungwa kwete, asi kuti vangoenda kuZACC kunopa divi ravo panyaya yavari kupomerwa. VaHwacha, avo varamba kutaura zvakawanda pamusoro penyaya iyi vachiti vanosungwa nemutemo wekudzivirira vavanomirira, vati VaGumbo varegwa vachienda kumba kwavo, uye zvinozotevera Havana ruzivo nazvo. Justice Matanda-Moyo vanoti vanhu vakawanda vave kusununguka kumhan'gara huwori hwavanoona kukomisheni yavo, asi vachakasungwa nenyaya yekuti hapasati pave nemutemo unochengetedza vafakazi pamwe nevanoruma nzeve ZACC, izvo vanoti zvinofanirwa kugadziriswa kuitira kuti vanhu vasununguke kubatsira komisheni inorwisana nehuwori iyi. No media source currently available

headline: ‘NETBALL IRI MUMHURI’
text: MUTAMBI wenetball wechikwata chenyika chemaGems, Ursula Ndlovu (25), anoti amai vake ndivo vakamumanikidza kuti atambe mutambo uyu sezvo iye aive nerudo rwemujaho wekumhanya.   Vazhinji vanoziva Ursula – uyo anotambira chikwata cheHarare City Queens zvakare, ari mumwe weshasha dzemaGems dzakanetsa kumakwikwi eVitality World Cup akaitirwa kuLiverpool, kuEngland nguva yadarika.   Mutambi uyu ange ave nemakore achinetsa mumutambo uyu izvo zvakambomuona achihwina mibairo inosanganisira Moment of the Match mune mumwe mutambo waakanotamba kuSouth Africa.   Ursula anoti achikura akadzidza kuzvikoro zvinosanganisira Nkulumane Primary neMsiteli High School, kuBulawayo uye aikwikwidza mumujaho wekumhanya.   Anoti mugore ra2013 ndipo paakatanga kutamba netball akurudzirwa namai vake – Norah Ndlovu – avo vakambotambawo mutambo uyu.   “Ini mwoyo wangu waive pamujaho wekumhanya, ndizvo ndaida nekuti ndaive ndiri pfuti pakutiza. Asi, amai vangu ndivo vakati ndisiye zvekumhanya nditange kutamba netball.   “Saka mugore ra2013 ndipo ndakatanga kutamba ndikapinda muchikwata chemupurovhinzi tikanokwikwidza kumakwishu emaYouths Games, kubva ipapo handina kuzobvira ndatarira shure.   “Netball ndiyo yave hupenyu hwangu uye yandiendesa kune dzimwe nyika dzandaisafungira kuti ndichazoenda muhupenyu hwangu,” anodaro Ursula.   Anoti amai vake vakatombonetsa vachitambawo netball muchikwata chenyika kare chisati chave kuzivikanwa semaGems uye vairaidzwa naLedwin Dondo uyo anove ave kurairidzawo Ursula zvakare.   Ursula anoti anopa kutenda kuna amai vake vakaita kuti atambe netball sezvo yave kumupa pundutso muhupenyu hwake.   “Amai vangu iGaffa chairo, vaive shasha panetball uye ndivo vakaita kuti ndive nerudo nemutambo uyu. Asi chinondifadza hangu parizvino ndechekuti amai vangu vakarairidzwa naLedwin Dondo vari kuchikwata chenyika uye nhasi Dondo ndiye ave murairidzi wangu.   “Kashoma kuzviona zvichiitika izvozvo kumitambo yakasiyana,” anodaro.   Anoenderera achiti, “Nhasi netball yandipa hupenyu hwandaisambofungira. Iye zvino ndave kukwanisa kuchengeta mhuri yekwandinobva kusanganisira ambuya vangu vakandichengeta Gogo Matshabalala, handidi navo. Amai pavaienda kunotamba netball, gogo ndivo vaisara neni vachindichengeta saka nhasi yave nguva yanguwo yekuvachengeta.   “Izvezvi pandinoenda kunze kwenyika kunotamba netball mwanasikana wanguwo ndinomuendesa kwagogo vangu kumusha vanosara naye vachimuchengeta sekundichengeta kwavaiita ini,” anodaro Ursula.   Mutambi uyu akwanisa kutambira zvikwata zvakasiyana zvinosanganisira Beta Queens, Connemara neHarare Queens uye akatanga kutambira maGems mugore ra2017.   Ursula anoti shuviro yake anoda kuzonotambira zvikwata zvekunze kwenyika dzakaita seAustralia, England neNew Zealand uko kunotambwa netball yepamusoro.

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanovhura Harare Agricultural Show yeGore Rino Zviri paMutemo
text: Mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vavhura zviri pamutemo Harare Agricultural Show vachiti hurumende yavo icharamba ichidzika mitemo nekuita zvirongwa zvinoita kuti munyika muve nechikafu chakakwana. Vachitaura pakuvhurwa zviri pamutemo kweHarare Agricultural Show, mutungamiri wenyika ati vanhu havafaniri kungorima chete asi kuti vanofanira kutora kurima sebhizinesi vachiti kana izvi zvikaitika nyika ichabudirira. Vati hurumende yavo ichadzika mitemo nekuita zvirongwa zvinoita kuti mabasa ekurima abudirire munyika. VaMnangagwa vati zvirongwa zvePfumvudza/ Intwasa, Presidential Input Scheme, Jonh Deree neBelarus ndezvimwe zvezvirongwa zvakanangana nekupedza dambudziko renzara munyika. Vatiwo hurumende iri kugadzira migwagwa kuitira kuti varimi vasanetseke kuwana mbeu pamwe nekuendzesa zvirimwa kumisika. Vatenda Zimbabwe Agricultural Society nekuronga showo kunyange hazvo kuine denda reCovid -19 vachiti izvi zvakakosha nekuti mwaka unotevera unotarisirwa kunge wakanaka. VaTawanda Mangisi vekambani yeSygenta iyo yapa mimwe mibairo nhasi, vati zvakakosha kuti varimi vatambire kana kupinda muzvironga zvehurumende sezvo zviine chinangwa chekuti nyika iwane chikafu chinokwanira munhu wese. Kanzuru yeHarare ndiyo yawana mubairo wekutanga pakurwisa denda reCovid 19. Mutauriri wekanzuru iyi, VaMichael Chideme, vaudza Studio 7 kuti uyu mucherechedzo mukuru webasa guru riri kuitwa nekanzuru yavo. VaEdson Kulungwe vekuGokwe North avo vakawana mbeu yedonje pasi pechirongwa chePresidential Input Scheme vakaburitsa mabhero mazana maviri nemakumi maviri nemana akavawanisa zviuru makumi maviri nezvitatu zvemadhora ekuAmerica ndivo vatora mubairo wekutanga pavairimi vedonje. Vapihwa mubairo wetarakita. Showo yegore rino iri kupinda vanhu vashoma nekuda kwedenda reCovid-19 uye ichapera nemusi weMugovera. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Munhu wese kumaWarriors’
text: AIMBOVE mutambi wemaWarriors – Tendai Ndoro – anoti ari kutsigira chikwata chenyika chakasarudzwa naNorman Mapeza kuti chinomirira Zimbabwe kumutambo weAfrica Cup of Nations (AFCON) kuCameroon achiti zvakakosha kuti veruzhinji vachitsigire kuti chigotamba zvinonwisa mvura. MaWarriors pari zvino ari kuCameroon uko ari kuita gadziriro dzemutambo uyu uchatanga nemusi weSvondo.   Ndoro, uyo akaenda kumutambo uyu mugore ra2017, anoti anoona chikwata chegore rino chichibudirira kubuda muboka racho izvo chaikundikana makore anoti 2004, 2006, 2017 na2019 pachakamboenda kumutambo uyu. Kumutambo wegore rino, maWarriors akaiswa muboka reGroup B rine zvikwata zvinoti Senegal, Guinea neMalawi.   Mutambo wekutanga wechikwata chenyika ichi uriko nemusi weMuvhuro unotevera apo chichasangana neSenegal. Aka kachange kari kechitatu maWarriors achisangana neSenegal kuAFCON.   MaWarriors akatanga kutamba nemaLions of Teranga, sezita remadunhurirwa reSenegal, mugore ra2006 kuAFCON kuEgypt apo akakundwa 2-0 uye zvikwata zviviri izvi ndokuzosangana 2017 kuGabon uko maWarriors akakundwa 2-0 zvekare.   Ndoro anoti kutamba kuAFCON chiremerera chikuru icho chinofanirwa kushandiswa nevatambi vanoenda kumutambo uyu kusimudzira mureza wenyika pamwe nekugadzira mazita avo. “Kekutanga munhoroondo yedu yenhabvu, gore rino ndinoona tichibudirira kubuda muboka redu nekuti zvikwata zvatichasangana nazvo tinopedzerana nazvo. Ingangotityisa chete iSenegal asi zvimwe zvese tinopedzerana nazvo, kunyanya Malawi, tagara tichingoirova uye hatizive kuti muNational Sports Stadium takairova kangani,” anodaro.   Ndoro anoti vatambi vemaWarriors vanotofanirwa kutokunya dzisimbe uye vagorwa semvumba mumitambo yavo.   “Kune vakomana vanotambira nhabvu yavo muno, uyu ndiwo mukana wekuti vagadzire mazita avo nekuti mutambo mukuru wakaita seAFCON vakawanda vanoshuvira kuenda asi zvichiramba. Saka ndipo pavanotofanirwa kugadzira mazita avo kuti vagotengwa nezvikwata zvekunze,” anodaro Ndoro.   Ndoro muchikwata chaaive nacho kuAFCON muna2017, vatambi vaaiva navo vanoti Knowledge Musona, Kudakwashe Mahachi, Teenage Hadebe naTino Kadewere varimo zvekare muchikwata chegore rino chiri kumutambo uyu.   “Tikatarisa vatambi vari muchikwata chedu, tine vatambi vane chitsama vakamboenda kuAFCON makore adarika. Saka kuvepo kwavo muchikwata chedu kuchabatsira zvikuru mumatambiro atichaita,” anodaro Ndoro.   Zvakadaro, Ndoro anoti ari kutarisira kudzoka munhabvu uye mwedzi uno anogona kunge ave nechikwata chitsva.   “Ndine zvirongwa zvandiri kumhanyisana nazvo zvakawanda, asi ndichiri munhabvu manhingi zvekuti tarisirai muone mwedzi uno ndichange ndave nechikwata chitsva,” anodaro Ndoro.

headline: Varimi veFodya Voshaiswa Mufaro neMutengo weFodya
text: Kunyange hazvo hurumende yakabvisa mutero wezvikamu zviviri kubva muzana weElectronic Transaction Tax pakutengwa kwefodya, varimi vari kunyunyuta kuti mutengo wefodya uri kuramba uri pasi. Asi vemisika yefodya vanoti mitengo yave kukwira kana zvichienzaniswa nemitengo yaivepo pakavhurwa misika iyi svondo rapfuura. Pakavhurwa misika yefodya neChitatui chapfuura, varimi vakawanda vakabvisa fodya yavo pamusika nekuda kwekuti mutengo waive pasi zvakanyanya sezvo vanotenga fodya vaigunun’una kuti vazorasikirwa nemari yakawanda nekuda kwemutero weElectronic Transfer Tax pakutenga fodya. Asi zvichitevera kubviswa kwemutero uyu svondo rino, mitengo yefodya haina kukwira zvakanyaya, izvo zvisiri nkufadza varimi. Ongororo yaitwa neStudio 7 pamisika yefodya inoratidza kuti varimi vakawanda vachiri kugunun’una nemitengo iyi. Murimi wekuKazangarare kuKaroi, VaLast Kawani, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanoona sekuti mitengo yakaderedzwa nenyaya yekuti madhora ekuAmerica haasisina kufanana huremu nemaRTGS dollars. Mumwe murimi, VaNomore Sakala, avo vataura neStudio7 mushure mekutengesa fodya yavo pamusika weTobacco Sales Floor, TSF, vati mutengo wange uri pasi pewavange vakatarisira. Nhasi mutengo wepasi pasi paTSF wange uri dhora rimwe chete pakirogramu kana zvichienzaniswa nemasenzi makumi mashanu pakirogiramu pakavhura misika svondo rapfuura. Kumusika weBoka Tobacco Floor, zvinhu zvange zviri kufamba zvakanaka uye vanoona nekufambiswa kwebasa pamusika uyu, VaMoses Bias, vati vese vanotenga fodya vave kuuya kumusika wavo zvichitevera kugadziriswa kwezvichemo zvavo nehurumende. Vatiwo kuwanda kwevanotenga ndiko kwave kuita kuti mutengo wefodya ukwire pamusika wavo. Mumashoko avo atsigirwa nevamwe vanotenga fodya, VaBias vati mutengo wefodya unenge wakadzikira pamazuva ekutange sezvo varimi vachitengesa mhando yepasi vachiti vanotarisira kuti mitengo iyi ichakirwa zvinofadza varimi. Zvichakadai, varimi vatiwo havasi kufara nenyaya yekuti bhanga guru renyika, reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe neTobacco Industiries Markeing Board, vakadzokera kumushure pachibvumirano chavainge vaita chekuti varimi vaizopihwa imwe mari yavo ari madhora ekuAmerica, imwe iri maRTGS. Zvichitevera kuvhurwa kwemisika yefodya, varimi vave kupihwa mari yavo yese ari maRTGS asi vachipihwa mikana wekutenga madhora ekuAmerica kumabhanga avo kana vachida kuita izvi. Gore rapfuura, Zimbabwe yakawanda mari inosvika bhiriyoni remadhora ekuAmerica kubva mukutengesa fodya kunze kwenyika. Asi gore rino mari iyi ichadzikira sezvo imwe fodya yakaparadzwa nezuva uye imwewo iparadzwa neCyclone Idai. No media source currently available

headline: Musangano weInternational AIDS Conference Wotanga muSouth Africa
text: Musangano wemazuva mashanu weInternational Aids Conference wakatanga muDurban South Africane musi weMuvhuro uye uchapera nemusi weChishanu. Musangano uyu uri kuzeya nyaya dzekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheHIV/AIDS uye kuti potsvagwa sei mari yekuita izvi. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika yeSouth Africa VaCyril Ramaphosa ndivo vavhura musangano uyu zviri pamutemo. VaRamaphosa vakurudzira nyika dzepasi rino nemasangano akazvipira kuti vabatane mukurwisa denda iri. Vamwe vanyarikani vari pamusangani uyu vanosanganisa munyori mukuru weUnited Nation VaBan Ki Moon, vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica, muimbi Elton John uye Nevanzi wamambo kana kuti Prince Harry vekuBritain. Musangano uyu wakarongwa nesangano reInternational Aids Society uye unounza pamwe chete nyanzvi dzinosvika zviuru gumi nenomwe kubva kunyika dzose dzepasi rino. Nyanzvi idzi dzinenge dzichiisa misoro pamwe chete kuti dzibatsirane kurwisa denda iri iro rauraya vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi matatu mumakore makumi matatu nemashanu. Vari kutungamira Zimbabwe kumusangano uyu igurukota rinoona nezvehutano Dr David Parirenyatwa avo vanoti Zimbabwe iri kuda kuvhara maburi ose angaite kuti vanhu vatsva vatapurirwe chirwere cheHIV. Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kumusangano uyu zvinosanganisirawo VaDaniel Molokele vanova mukuru wesangano reAIDS Accountability International avo vanoti Zimbabwe ichabatsirikana nekuve pamusangano uyu. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nasachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Network for Positive Women Amai Martha Tolana vati kunze kwekunzwa zviri kuitwa nevamwe, nyika ichagovawo zvairi kuita. Sangano reUnited Nations rinoti rinoda kupedza mukondombera panosvika gore ra2030 uye panguva imwe cheteyo richiwanirawo vanhu mushonga. Asi UN inoti pachine mutambo sezvo paine vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi matatu vari kurarama nehutachiona pasi rose, vakawanda vari muAfrica. Vanhu vakawanda vanonziwo vari kutapurirwa chirwere ichi zvikuru kuNorth Africa, Middle East nekuRussia. KuRussia kunonzi nyaya iri kupa kuti chirwere chipararire kuramba kutambira nyaya dzechingochani. Asi vakawanda vanoita zvechingochani ava vanonzi vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi zvakanyanya. VaMolokele vanoti Zimbabwe inarowo dambudziko rekusada kupinza ngochani muzvirongwa zvayo. Imwe nyaya iri kupa kuti kurwisa chirwere ichi kunetse inyaya yekuti nyika dzemuAfrica nevanobatsira vave kusunga homwe. Muna Kubvumbi 2001 nyika dzemuAfrica dzakatenderana kuAbuja, Nigeria kuti mumabhajeti adzo dziise mari inosvika zvikamu gumi nezvishanu kubva muzana kunyaya dzezvehutano. Asi zvinonzi nyika imwe chete chete ndiyo yakwanisa kuzadzikisa zvido zveAbuja Declaration. VaMolokela vanoti izvi zvapa kuti kurwisa denda iri kunetse. Amai Martha Tolana vanotendawo kuti kushaya mari kuri kupa kupa kuti zvinhu zvikone n’anga murapwa achida. Kutapuriranwa kwechirwere muZimbabwe kwakadzika kubva pazvikamu gumi kubva muzana kusvika pazvikamu gumi nezvishanu kubva muzana. Asi zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka sezvo Zimbabwe isina mari yakakwana yekubatsira vanorarama nehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS. Zimbabwe iri pachidanho chechishanu panyika dziri pamusoro soro muAfrica pachitariswa nyaya dzekupararira kwemukondombera. Vanhu vanosvika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mana vari kurarama nehutachiona muZimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Quantam Global Reseach Inoti Mitemo yeZiimbabwe Yokanganisa Hurongwa hweKukwezva veMabhizimisi veKunze
text: Ongororo yakaitwa nesangano reQuantam Global Research Lab iro rinoongorora mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika dzemuAfrica panyaya yekukwezva vekunze vanoda kuzotanga mabhizimisi munyika iri kuratidza kuti Zimbabwe ichiri kutatarika kuti ikwanise kukwezva vekunze ava. Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube chizvarwa cheZimbabwe ndivo chipangamazano sangano reQuantum Global Research Lab iri. Izvi zvakabuda muongororo inonzi Africa Investment Index 2018. Nyika dzinonzi dziri kuita zvinounza budiro dzinosanganisa Morocco, Egypt, Algeria, Botswana neCote d’ivore, South Africa, Ethiopia, Zambia, Kenya neSenegal. Zimbabwe iri pachidanho chechimakumi mana nemashanu panyika makumi mashanu neina dzemuAfrica dziri kutatarika kukwezva vekunze. Dzimwe nyika dzisiri kuita zviri nani dzakafanana neZimbabwe dzinosanganisa Central African Republic, Liberia, Somalia, Eritrea, Equatorial Guinea, Gambia, Sierra Leone, Guinea uye Sao Tome and Principe. Ongororo iyi yakaburitswa kumucheto wemusangano wevakuru wemabhizimisi wakaendwa masvondo apfuura nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Global Quantum yakambobatsirawo VaMnangagwa kusangana nevamwe vakuru vemabhizimisi kubva kuSwitzerland kumucheto wemusangano wekuDavos muna Ndira. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera vanoti Zimbabwe inofanira kuvandudza mitemo yayo kuti ikwezve vekunze. No media source currently available

headline: ZESN Yokurudzira Kuti Veruzhinji Vawaniswe Dzidziso Yakakwana Pamusoro peSarudzo
text: Sangano rinoongorora sarudzo munyika reZimbabwe Election Support Network, ZESN, rinoti zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, vane chekuita nesarudzo, pamwe nemasangano akazvimirira vape dzidziso yakasimba kuvanhu pamusoro pesarudzo. Sangano iri rinoti ZEC inofanirwawo kubuda nenzira dzekupedza nadzo mhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika, pamwe nekutyisidzirwa kwevavhoti kuitira kuti sarudzo dzigoitwa murunyararo. Izvi zvinotevera sarudzo dzekutsvaga mumiriri weChimanimani West dzakaitwa mukupera kwesvondo, idzo dzakakundwa naAmai Nokuthula Matsikenyere veZanu PF, idzo dzinonzi vanhu vakawanda vakaenda munzvimbo dzekuvhotera dzisidzo, pamwe nekudzorwa vasina zvinodiwa zvakakwana. ZESN pamwe nemamwe mapato akapinda musarudzo idzi anoti NCA neRDZ vanoti vanhu vaityisidzirwa nenhengo dzaZanu PF, mauto, vasori pamwe nemadzishe nemasadunhu munguva yekutsvaga rutsigiro. Vanotiwo Zanu PF yakashandisa chikafu senzira yekukwezva nayo vavhoti, danho rinonnzi nemukuru weZESN Amai Rindai Chipfunde-Vava kutenga mavhoti. "Sarudzo iyi yakafamba zvakanaka, zvikuru pane zvema poling materials zvaifanirwa kunge zviripo. Voters' roll takaona aripo nemamwe ma materials, uyezve yakatanga kuvhotwa nguva dzanga dzakatarwa. Asi chatakazoona chaingonetsa ndeche free election, mavhoti asati aitwa kune vanhu vaingopiwawo wana rice, zviya zvatakaona kuNorton yatinoti vote buying," Amai Chpfunde-Vana vanodaro. Vanoti sezvavanoita musarudzo dzose, vakanyorawo zvavakaona zvakaitika musarudzo idzi vakazvisvitsa kuZEC, uye vanotarisira kuti ichagadzirisa zvinetswa izvi sarudzo dzimwe dzisati dzaitwa. Amai Matsikenyere veZanu PF vakawana mavhoti zviuru gumi nechimwe nemazana mana ane makumi mananematanhatu, VaEdmore Mtetwa vakakwikwidza vakazvimirira vakawana mavhoti zviuru zvitatu negumi nezvisere, VaPeter Gudyanga veRDZ vakawana mavhoti zana nemakumi masere nematatu, kuchitiwo VaPesanai Musakanuka veNCA vachiwana mavhoti zana nemakumi manomwe nerimwe. Sarudzo idzi dzaive dzekutsiva vende rakasiiwa naVaMunacho Mutezo, avo vakadzingwa mubato reZanu PF vachipomerwa mhosva yekutsigira Amai Joice Mujuru. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Makumi Mana neVaviri (42) Vofa muMavhiki Maviri muZimbabwe neCovid-19
text: Vanhu makumi mana nevaviri kana kuti 42 vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika, vamwe churu nemazana masere nemakumi mashanu nevasere kana kuti 1, 858 vachibatwa nechirwere ichi mukati memavhiki maviri adarika. Pamavhiki amaviri aya pane vanhu gumi nevanomwe vakabva kuSouth Africa vakabatwa nechirwere ichi. Izvi zviri kutemesa nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano musoro nekuti chirwere cheCovid-19 kuSouth Africa, Britain, France, Japan, Nigeria, Denmark, Canada, Italy, Lebanon, Netherlands, Singapore, Sweden ne Spain chatanga kuzvivanddza kana kuti mutate. Mhando yeCovid-19 itsva iyi inopararira zvakanyanya ichifungidzirwa kuti inobatawo zvakanyanya vana vadiki. Kamhando katsva aka kakatanga kutaurwa nezvako kuBritain musi wa 14 Zvita. Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weSvondo kuti vanhu vasere vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika muvhiki rapera zvasiya vafa kubva zvakatanga chirwere ichi kupararira munyika vave mazana matatu nemakumi mana nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 349. Vanhu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi neSvondo izana negumi nevana kana kuti 114. Izvi zvinoreva kuti vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kusvika parizvino vave zvuru gumi nezvitatu zvine manomwe nevanomwe kana kuti 13, 077. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi zvuru gumi nemazana mashanu ane makumi mapfumbamwe nematatu kana kuti 10, 593 zvichitevera kupora kwevamwe vanhu makumi manomwe nevana neSvondo. Vanhu vachiri kurwara vanosvika zvuru zviviri nezana nemakumi matatu nevashanu kana kuti 2,135. Vakawanda vari kurwara vari muHarare neBulawayo. Africa Covid-19 Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nezvuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 2,6 million vabatwa nechirwere checovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zvuru makumi matanhatu nemaviri ane mazana matatu nemakumi matanhatu nematanhatu kana kuti 62, 366.  Vapora vadarika mamiriyoni maviri nezvuru mazatuna maviri kana kuti 2,2 million. South Africa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Dunhu reSADC ndirozve rine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi vadarika miriyoni imwe chete. Pasi Rose Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi masere nezvuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 80, 7 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vanodarika zvuru mazana matatu zvine makumi matatu nematatu kana kuti 333, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni gumi nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 19 miillion. Pasi rose, vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 1,7 million. Asi vapora pasi rose vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi mana nemashanu ane zvuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 45, 6 million.

headline: Ticharonga Cosafa patsva: Destombes
text: SANGANO reCouncil of Southern Africa Football Association (Cosafa) – iro rinoronga Cosafa Cup – rinoti mitambo yegore rino ichadzoserwa kumashure nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 icho chakakonzera kuti nhabvu imbomira kutambwa kunyika dzakawanda dzepasi rose.   Mitambo yeCosafa Cup yegore rino yange ichifanirwa kutambwa munaChikumi kuDurban, kuSouth Africa.   Asi muhurukuro neKwayedza svondo rino, munyori mukuru weCosafa, Sue Destombes anoti mazuva achatambwa mutambo uyu gore rino achatariswa patsva sezvo pari zvino vanhu vasati vava kutenderwa  kufamba kuenda kune dzimwe nyika nekuda kwecoronavirus.   “Sekuziva kwemunhu wose, chirwere cheCovid-19 chavhiringidza zvakawanda pasi rose. Saka nekuda kwaizvozvo, mazuva achatambwa Cosafa Cup 2020 achasandurwa.   “Cosafa Cup inotambwa panguva iyo mitambo yePSL inenge yapera, saka nekudaro tichamirira kuti mitambo iyi igopera uye hatizive kuti lockdown iyi ichapera rinhi zvekare kuti miganho yenyika inovhurwa rinhi kuti vanhu vagofamba kuenda kune dzimwe nyika,” anodaro Destombes.   Zimbabwe imwe yenyika dzichange dzichitarisirwa kuenda kunokwikwidza kuCosafa Cup uko iine nhoroondo yekuva nyika yakahwina mukombe uyu kakawanda kudarika dzimwe nyika.   Kutaura kuno chikwata ichi chakwanisa kuhwina mukombe uyu katanhatu uye chakapedzisira kuusimudza mugore ra2018.   Gorerakadarika mukombe uyu wakahwinwa neZambia.

headline: VaCyril Ndebele Vanoshaya
text: Vaimbova mutauriri wedare reparamende VaCyril Ndebele vakashaya nemusi weChishanu kuchipatara cheMatar Dei kuBulawayo. Hama neshamwari dzavaCyril Ndebele avo vange varizve sachigaro weNational Peace and Reconciliation Commission dzinoti mushakabvu aive munhu ane mutsa uye aisatya kutaura pfungwa dzake pamusoro pezvinhu zvakaipa. Dzimwe hama nevamwe vanhu vakashanda naVaNdebele vati havana mamwe mashoko avangave nawo pamusoro pemufi kunze kwekuvarumbidza. Hanzvadzi yemushakabvu amai Tenny Mijoso vati mhuri yavo iri kurwadziwa zvikuru nekushaya kwaVaNdebele vachiti mufi aive chirera nherera achibatsira hama pamwe nevatorwa vemunharaunda mavaigara. Amai Mijoso vati VaNdebele vaive vanzi vaifanirwa kuendeswa kuHarare nendege kunoongororwa naanamazvikokota asi vazoshaya izvi zvisati zvaitika. Vati varwadziwa zvikuru nenyaya yekuti vanhu vanorasikirwa nehupenyu nekuda kwekushaikwa kwaanamazvikokota munyika. Munyori mukuru weZapu VaStrike Mkandla vati vakatanga kuziva mushakabvu pavakasangana kuUnited Kingdom mumakore ekuma70s. VaMkandla vati havabvumirane netsika inoitwa nebato reZanu yekuti ndiro rinopa chiga chekuti munhu anopiwa ruremekedzo rwegamba renyika ndiani. Asi VaMkandla vati VaNdebele munhu anokodzera kupiwa ruremekedzo urwu nekuda kwenhoroondo yavo muhondo yerusununguko rwenyika uyewo nemabasa avakaita nyika yawana kuzvitonga. VaMkandla vati VaNdebele vaive munhu aive asingatye kutaura pfungwa dzake vakatiwo mushakabvu ndemumwe wenhengo dzebato reZapu dzakati bato iri ribude mumubatanidzwa waro nebato reZanu PF. VaNdebele vane ndoroondo yakasimba yekurwira rusununguko. Vainge vari nhengo yeAfrican National Congress yekuSouth Africa kubva muna 1960 apo vaidzidza paUniversity of Natal. Vakazotora degree ravo remutemo paQueens Universoty Belfast muna 1970 ndokuzodzoka kumba nyika ichiri kunzi Rhodesia kuzoita sachigaro weZapu. Muna 1995 vakaitwa mutauriri wedare reparamende chigaro chakazotorwa naVaEmmerson Mnangagwa muna 2000. Muna 2001 VaNdebele vakapihwa honorary doctorate degree neUniversity of Essex yekuBritain Hurongwa hwekuti VaNdebele vachavigwa riinhi uye kupi hausati hwavepo sezvo vamwe vemhuri yavo kusanganisira mudzimai wavo amai Venetta Ndebele, vasati vasvika kubva mhiri kwemakungwa. Vanhu vakaungana pa7B Hope Road kuWoodville muBulawayo. VaNdebele avo vange vave nemakore makumi masere nematatu vasiya mudzimai, vana vashanu, pamwe nevazukuru vane chitsama. No media source currently available

headline: Amai Chikasha Voshora Hurumende Zvichitevera Mhirizhonga muSouth Africa
text: Mutungamiriri webato rinopikisa reAfrican Democractic Party, Amai Merceline Chikasha, vanoti kunyange hazvo vachishora hurumende yeSouth African nekushungurudzwa kuri kuitwa zvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika mukati menyika iyi, vanoshorawo hurumende yeZimbabwe nekutadza kupa vanhu mabasa kuitira kuti vanhu vasaende kunze kwenyika. No media source currently available Vachitaura nevatori venhau muHarare nhasi, Amai Chikasha vati vana veZimbabwe vari kutenderera nenyika dzepasi rese vachitambudzwa nekupondwa sezviri kuitika kuSouth African nekuti hurumende iri kutadza kugadzirisa zvinhu munyika. Vati hurumende inofanira kuita chirongwa chekumutsiridza maindasitiri nekusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika kuitira kuti vanhu vawane mabasa varegedze kuenda kunze kwenyika uko vazhinji vavo vari kugara vachishungurudzwa. Vanhu vemuZimbabwe vari pakati pezvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika zviri kupondwa nekushungurudzwa kuSouth Africa mukurwisana kwakatanga masvondo maviri apfuura. Zvichakadai, mazana nemazana evanhu vakatiza misha yavo kuSouth Africa vanotarisirwa kusvika muZimbabwe nhasi mushure mekubatsirwa nezvifambiso nehurumende. Vamwe vavo vanotarisirwa kusvika panopera svondo rino. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemukuru weCivil Protection Unit, VaMadzudzo Pawadyira, kuti tinzwe zvizhinji pamusuro penyaya iyi sezvo vange vasiri kudaira mbozhanhare yavo. VeCivil Protection Unit ndivo vachatambira pamwe nekubatsira vanhu ava pavanosvika munyika. Vachitaura pazuva rekucherechedza kuzvitonga kwenyika kuNational Sports Stadium, mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakashoropodza zvikuru kurwiswa kuri kuitwa zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe muSouth Africa. VaMugabe vakashorawo mashoko amambo Goodwill Zwelithini, avo vanonzi ndivo vakataura mashoko ekukurudzira kurwiswa kwevekunze. Asi mambo Zwelithini vakazobuda vachiramba kuti vakataura mashoko akadayi, vachiti vemapepanhau vayiisa mashoko mumukanwa mavo. VaMugabe vakatendawo mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaJacob Zuma, nemashoko avo ekushoropodza mhirizhonga iyi, iyo yakatangira muDurban. Vanhu vashanu vekunze kweSouth Africa vanonzi vafa kusvika pari zvino mumhirizhonga yemarudzi iyi. Mune imwewo nyaya, meya veguta reHarare, VaBen Manyenyeni, vanoti kanzuru yavo yakazvipira kupa pekugara kuvanhu vese vari kugara munzvimbo dzisingaite muguta. Vataura mashoko aya apo vange vari kutambira chikwata chabva kusangano reBill and Melinda Gates Foundation icho chiri munyika kuzovhura dzimba dzakavakwa nemamiriyoni mashanu emadhora akabva kusangano iri mumusha weDzivaresekwa. Pari zvino mune nzvimbo makumi manonwe dzinogara vanhu zviri kunzwe kwemutemo uye VaManyenyeni vati vachakumbira rubatsiro rwemari kubva kumasangano akaita seBill and Melinda Gates Foundation nemamwe kuti vavakire vanhu dzimba. Dzimba dzakavakwa nemari yakabva kuBill and Melinda Gates Foundation dzakazovakwa kuDzivaresekwa mushure mekunge nhengo dzeZanu PF dzaramba kuti chirongwa ichi chiitwe mumusha weMbare. VaManyenyeni vati nekuda kwaizvozvo musha weMbare ucharamba uchisiiwa muzvirongwa zvakaita seizvi nezvimwe kudzamara vanhu veko vachinja maitiro uye vadzidza kutambira zvirongwa zvekanzuru nemasangano ainoshanda nawo.

headline: Paramende Yodaidza VaChinamasa Kuti Vajekese Kwakabva Mari yeKubhadhara Chikwereti kuWorld Bank
text: Vanoona nezvehupfumi mubato reMDC, VaTapiwa Mashakada, uye vari nhengo yekomiti yedare reparamende inoona nezvehupfumi, vanoti komiti yavo ine hurongwa hwekudaidza kudare iri gurukota rinoona nezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, kuti vataure nezvekubhadhara chikwereti chenyika. VaMashakada vanoti vanoda kuti VaChinamasa vazotsanangure nyaya yemari inosvika bhiriyoni imwe chete yemadhora yavanoti vakawana kubhadhara mari yakawedzerwa pazvikwereti zveZimbabwe kuWorld Bank neAfrican Development Bank. VaChinamasa havana kutaura kuti mari iyi yainge yabva kupi. Asi bepanhau reZimbabwe Independent rakabva raburitsa nyaya yekuti mari iyi yainge yabva kukambani yekuSingapore inonzi Trafigura. Asi mutauriri wekambani iyi, Amai Zohra McDoolley-Aimone, varamba mashoko ekuti kambani yavo yakapa Zimbabwe mari inodarika bhiriyoni imwe chete yemadhora yekuti ibhadhare chikwereti kuWorld Bank neAfrican Development Bank. Vachipindura mubvunzo kubva kuStudio7, Amai McDoolley-Aimone vati vainge vanzwa mashoko kubva kumapepanhau ekuti Trafigura yainge yapa Zimbabwe mari asi vakati aya manyepo. Vatiwo vane mabhizimisi muZimbabwe uye makambani avo akazvipira kuramba achifambisa basa achishanda nehurumende asi panyaya yekukweretesa Zimbabwe, asi kambani yavo iri kuzorwa mafuta enguruve yavasina kudya.. Kambani yeTrafigura Group yakapinda muZimbabwe muna 2013 kuburikidza nekuisa hupfumi mukambani yePuma Energy iyo yakaisa zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana mukambani yeRedan Petroleum. Redan ine nzvimbo dzinotengeserwa mafuta edzimotokari makumi manomwe nepfumbamwe, uye inopa mafuta endege panhandare ina. VaMashakada vanoti zvinonetsa kuti pawane mabhanga kana makambani angakweretese Zimbabwe mari kana asinawo kusviba. No media source currently available

headline: “Huyai Titaurirane”  - Hurumende Youdza Vashandi Voronga Kuramwa Mabasa
text: Hurumende iri kukurudzira vashandi vayo kuti vambomira zvekuramwa Mabasa zvisinei nemari shoma yavanotambira. Izvi zvinotevera gwaro ranyorwa nemamwe masangano anomiririra vashandi vehurumende vachizivisa kuti kana hurumende ikasagadzirisa nyaya yemihoro yavo mumazuva gumi nemana vachange vachizoramwa mabasa. Masangano anyora tsamba iyi anoti, Public Service Association, the Federation of Educators Unions of Zimbabwe neNurses Federation of Zimbabwe. Asi vachitaura neStudio 7, gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi VaPaul Mavhima vatiwo vashandi nevashandirwi vari kuzoita hurukuro nemusi weMuvhuro . VaMavhima vati hurumende inokoshesa hurukuro Asi mutungamiriri weZimbabwe Nurses Association VaEnoch Dongo vanogara vachiti hurumende haidi zvenhaurirano pachine nguva vati vari kutambiriswa mutero wembwa. Munyori mukuru werimwe sangano revarairidzi Progressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe VaRaymond Majongwe vanotiwo sevashandi vanodawo mari inokwanisa kuti vararame sezvo vakatodzidzira mabasa avo. Mutauriri weZimbabwe Teachers Association VaGoodswill Taderera vatiwo vashandi vehurumende vave kuita mushandirapmwe kuti vawedzerwe mari. Asi VaMavhima vatiwo kuramwa mabasa kunokanganisa mabasa akakosha ehurumende. Pave nenguva hurumende nevashandi vayo vasiri kuwirirana panyaya yemihoro. Vashandi vanotiwo vanoda kupiwa mihoro nemari yekunze vachiti zvinhu zvese zvave kungoda kubhadharwa nemari yekuAmerica panguva iyo vashandi vari kutambiriswa madhora emunyika.

headline: VaMugabe Vokurudzira VaTrump Kusaita Zvemangoromera
text: No media source currently available Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakakatyamadza vanhu vakawanda pasi rose nemusi weChina nekushora kwavakaita mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica, VaDonald Trump, vachiti vanofanira kukurudzira runyararo pasi rose kwete kuda kuita zvemangoromera. VaMugabe vakataura mashoko aya kuNew York muAmerica kumusangano mukuru wepagore weUnited Nations General Assembly, UNGA. Mutungamiri wenyika haana kutaura nezvenyaya dzezvirango zvavanoti zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe nyaya inova yange yave rwiyo rwavo kumusangano uyu. VaMugabe vakati hapana chakaipa kuti VaTrump vazviridzire hwamanda asi vakati inofanira kunge ichitaura nezverunyararo pasi rose. VaTrump vakasiya vamwe vatungamiri venyika dzepasi rose vasina neremuromo mushure mekunge vayambira North Korea kuti vaigona kuiparadza ikaramba ichipinda nemwenje mudziva ichisvokosva America neshamwari dzayo nekupota ichivhundutsira nekukanda zvombo zvemuchadenga. Mutungamiri weAmerica akatsoropodzawo Iran, Venezuela nedzimwe nyika dzavakati hadziremekedze kodzero dzevanhu. VaMugabe vakasetsa vamwe vatungamiri mudare iri apo vakafananidza VaTrump naGoriyati wemubhaibheri anongoziva kushandisa chisimba. Vakatyorazve vanhu mbabvu apo vakati VaTrump vanofanira kuridza havo hwamanda yavo asi vachiita izvi mukuunza runyararo munyika dzepasi rose. VaMugabe vakashorawo America nekubuda muchibvumirano chakanangana nekuchengetedza mamiriro ekunze cheParis Climate Agreement. Asi VaMugabe vakati Zimbabwe haisi kuzongorega nyika dzakabudirira idzi dzichityora zvisungo zvechibvumirano ichi. VaMugabe vakatiwo Zimbabwe ine hukama hwakanaka nesangano reUnited Nations asi vakati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti bazi rakakosha reUnited Nations Security Council rivandudzwe.
