Dare reSecurity Council rine nyika shanu chete dzisingabude mudare iri uye dzine masimba ekuchinja zvinhu dzinoti Russia, America, China, France neBritain, uye nyika gumi dzisina masimba dzinoita majanho kugara mudare iri kwemakore maviri. Panyika gumi idzi pane nyika nhatu chete dzemuAfrica dzinoti Ethiopia, Senegal neEgypt. Asi Africa nedzimwe nyika dzinoda kuti nyika dziri mudare iri dzine masimba ekuchinja zvinhu dziwedzerwe kubva pashanu dziripo. Sachigaro weMDC-T muAmerica, VaDen Moyo, vashora zvikuru VaMugabe vachiti vanoda kupindira nyaya dzisinei neZimbabwe uye vanoshora vatungamiri vavanoti vanotyora kodzero dzevanhu asi ivo kunyika kwavo vasingaremekedze vanovapikisa uye vachitonga nedemo. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa naMuzvare Tsitsi Chiriseri, chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe icho chakaratidzira muNew Yorl chichishora matongero aVaMugabe. Muzvare Chiriseri vanoti muromo hauzarirwe nerwizi nekuti dai VaMugabe vaiita zvavanotaura, dai Zimbabwe isiri mukanwa mamupere. Asi mumwe muzvinafundo paMalone University kuOhio muAmerica, VaMoses Rumano, vanoti vafadzwa zvikuru nemashoko aVaMugabe ekutsiura VaTrump. Kunyange hazvo zvakabuda pachena kuti VaMugabe vakange vachinetsekana nekufamba pavakange vachienda kunotura mashoko avo kudare reGeneral Assembly, vakawanda vanoti vange vachiratidza kuti hutano hwavo huri nani. Musangano weUNGA uyu ndewechimakumi manomwe nembiri.

headline: Vamwe Vagari vekuTynwald South Vopomora Kanzura Wavo Mhosva yeHuwori
text: Harare Residents Trust, rimwe sangano rinomiririra vagari vemuHarare, rinoti vamwe vanhu vekuTynwald South havasi kufara nenyaya yekutengeserwa kwakaitwa vamwe vemabhizimisi nzvimbo yainge yakatarwa kuti ivakwe chikoro. Vagari ava vanoti kanzura wavo, va Girisoti Mandere, nemumiriri wavo kuparamende, amai Betty Kaseke, nevamwe vashandi veguta reHarare ndivo vevamwe vakabatsira kutengesa nzvimbo iyi vachiita zvehuwori. VaPrecious Shumba, avo vanotungamira Harare Residents Trust, vanoti chirikudiwa nevanhu itsananguro yekuti zvinhu zvakafambiswa sei uye chinyi chirikuitwa kuti nzvimbo dzakatengeswa idzi dzidzoserwe kuvanhu. “MaCouncilors vane basa rekumiririra vanhu vakavasarudza. Councilor Mandere ndivo councilor we Ward 45 umo mune Tynwald South isina chikoro chingabatsira vagari vaimomo kuti vana vavo vaende kuchikoro.” VaShumba vakaenda mberi vachiti, “Mutemo wehurumende unoti munzvimbo dzese dzinogara vanhu, munofanira kuwanikwa nzvimbo dzokudzidzira mukati mema kilometer mashanu. Zvino kana tichitarisa danho re City Of Harare kuti inotora nzvimbo yayakange yati ndeyechikoro ichipa kune vamwe vanhu pasina kushambadzwa kwaitwa kuti pavekuchinjwa mashandisiro enzvimbo idzi, izvi zvinopinza councilor mukati nokuti ndiye anomiririra vanhu mudunhu iri.” VaShumba vakati havasikuona kuti kanzura akataura nyaya iyi sei kuma komiti ekanzuru inoona nezverudzidzo nokuti vanhu vakatora nzvimbo iyi havazaikwanisa vasina tsamba inobva kuna kanzura. No media source currently available Asi vaGirisoti Mandere, kanzura weWard 45 kuKuwadzana Phase 3, vanoti zviri kutaurwa navaShumba ndezvemugotsi matsuro. Vanoti ivo sa kanzura wenzvimbo iyi vanoti nyaya iyi haina chokwadi nokuti hapana wavakapa nzvimbo inotaurwa iyi uye zvese zvakaitwa pachena. “Vanhu ve Harare Residents Trust havana kumbotaura neni pamusoro penyaya iyi. Ndirikutotanga kuzvinzwa izvozvi.” VaMandere vakapamidzazve vachiti hapana akambobatsira vanhu kuti vatenge kana kutora nzvimbo inotaurwa iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa Ozara Mudhorobha reChitungwiza Kudzivirira Vanhu Kuratidzira
text: Mapurisa anodzivirira nyonga-nyonga nemusi weChishanu akapinda Chitungwiza uye ange ari panzvimbo zhinji dzemabhizimisi mudhorobha iri zvisinei nekuti mapato anopikisa pasi pesangano reNational Electoral Reform Agenda kana kuti NERA ange amisa kuratidzira kwaange akaronga mudhorbha iri.Mapuerisa Papinda Studio 7 mudhorobha iri panguva dzekuma9 mangwanani, mapurisa anodzvirira nyonga nyonga ange atozara mumusha weChitungwiza uye motokari dzinodira mvura inovava kana kuti maWater Canons dzange dzakamira mumisha mizhinji yakaita sekwaChigovanyika pamwe nekuSt Marys. Mune mimwe misha yakaita seZengeza, kwaSeke pamwe nepaMakoni mapurisa ange aine tsvimbo nezvombo zvehondo ange achitenderera izvi zvavhundutsa vakawanda. Mukuru weChitungwiza Residents Trust, VaMarvelous Khumalo vaudza Studio 7 kuti kupinda kwemapurisa anodzivirira nyonga nyonga mumusha weChitungiwza kwatadzisa vanhu vakawanda kuenda kubasa kuHarare sezvo vanhu vaange vachifunga kuti muHarare mange makazarawo mapurisa. VaKhumalo vanotiwo kana vanozviitira mabasa emaoko vakanganiswawo nhasi. Mutauriri weMDC inotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai muChitungwiza VaBernard Mazhindu vaudza Studio 7 kuti vashamisika kuti mapurisa auuya muChitungwiza akawanda zvinotyisa zvisinei nekuti NERA yange yamisa kuratidzira kwange kwakarongwa nhasi. VaMazhindu vanoti vanhu vemuZimbabwe vari kushushikana zvikuru kuti mapurisa ave kurambidza vanhu kuratidzira kutsutsumwa kwavo. Mumwe mugari wemuChitungwiza, VaCollin Kunaka vanoti vashamisika nekuita kwemapurisa uye vanoti vatadza kuita zvavange vachida kuita vakatya mapurisa. VeNERA vanoti vambomisa kuratidzira vachiti vari kuda kutsvaga nzira dzekuti kuratidzira kwavo kungaite mutsindo sei. Vanotiwo nhengo dzavo dzakawanda dziri kusungwa uye mari yechibatiso iri kudiwa nematare yakawandisisa. Sachigaro wekomiti yeNERA inoona nezvemutemo VaDouglas Mwonzora vaudza Studio 7 kupinda kwemapurisa muChitungwiza kunoratidza kuoma moyo kwemapurisa. Vatiwo vafara chose kuti mapurisa nhasi ashandisa mari yawo kuenda kuChitungiwza kunyange hazvo pasina zvange zvichiitika ikoko. Zvichakadai muHarare mapurisa ange akawanda mumigwagwa semazuva ose kunyange hazvo pasina kuratidzira kwaitika. Kubvira pakatanga veNERA kuratidzira mapurisa ave kugara ari mumumigwagwa zuva nezuva sezvo ari kufungidzira kuti vanhu vanogona kuratidzira nguva ipi zvayo. VeNERA vanoti vacharamba vachiratidzira kudzamara hurumende yavandudza mitemo yesarudzo kuti nyika iite sarudzo dzakachena. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yoparura Hurongwa Hwekupa Vana Nhomba yeMhetamakumbo
text: Zvichitevera kutanga kupararira kwechirwere chemhetamakumbo kune dzimwe nyika dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica, Zimbabwe nhasi yaparura hurongwa hwekupa vana nhomba yePoriyo kana kuti National Polio Vaccination Campaign. Chirongwa ichi chiri kutanga zviri pamutemo mangwana chopera musi wa 30 mwedzi uno. Chinangwa chebazi rezvehutano ndechekupa vana zvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe nemashanu kubva muzana kana kuti 95% pavana mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi mashanu nematanhatu nemazana masere kana kuti 2, 556, 800 vari pasi pemakore mashanu. Vachiparura chirongwa ichi muHarare nhasi, mutevedzeri wegurukota rinoona nezvehutano Dr John Mangwiro vaudza vatori venhau kuti chirongwa ichi chiri kuitwa pachiitwa mushandira pamwe nenyika ddzinoti Zambia, Tanzania, Malawi neMozambique. Chirwere cheporiyo chakatobata vana kuMalawi nekuMozambique. Vachitaura neStudio 7 vanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mubazi rezvehutano VaDonald Mujiri vati vane chivimbo chekuti vachapa vana vakwanda nhomba iyi sezvo vari kufamba mudzimba. VaMujiri vanoti vachapa mushonga kunyange kune vana vakambopihwa sezvo dzokororo iine simba. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano Dr David Parirenyatwa vanoti nyaya yenhomba yekudzivirira mhetamakumbo inofanirwa kushambadzirwa zvakakwana nyika yose kuti pasawanikwe mwana anotadza kupihwa mushonga. Izvi zvatsigirwa nemumwe chiremba uye vari mumiriri weChinhoyi mudare reparamende Dr Peter Matarutse. Sezvo chirongwa chekudzivirira mhetamakumbo chiri kuitwa munyika dzose dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica, mukuru anoona nezvehutano mudunhu reMashonaland West Dr George Kambondo vanoti vari kushanda pamwechete nevehutano munyika yeZambia kuti vana vose vanenge vachidarika nepamuganhu wenyika mbiri idzi vadonhedzerwe mushonga. Zviratidzo zvekutimwana abata chirwere ichi zvinosanganisira kupindwa nechando, kuneta, kurutsa, kuoma kana kurwaziwa mutsipa uye kurwadziwa maoko nemakumbo. Nyika yakapedzisira kuita chirwere chemhetamakumbo mugore ra1998 uye ikanzi haina chirwere ichi zvachose mugore ra2005 nebazi guru reWorld Health Organisation. Chirongwa chechipiri chekudzivirira chirwere chemhetamakumbo chichaitwa kubva musiwa 1 kusvika musiwa 4 Zvita. No media source currently available

headline: Zanu-PF Inoti Iri Kutora Nhamba dzeVanhu Vanenge Vanyoresa kuVhota
text: Nhengo yeZanu-PF Politburo VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana vanoti hapana chakaipa pane zviri kuitwa nenhengo dzebato ravo zvekutora nhamba kana kuti ma serial numbers evavhoti vachiti ichi chisungo chebato ravo chekuona kuti nhengo dzaro chaidzo dzanyoresa kuvhota. :Isu tinoenda kunhengo dzedu dzeZanu PF kuti dzitiratidze kana dzakanyoresa, hatibvunze vanhu vasiri vebato redu," VaMunyaradzi vatsanangura. Asi munyori mukuru weMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vanoti veZanu-PF havafanire kumanikidza vanhu kuti vavape nhamba dzavo dzemapepa aya. "Zvinenge zvisina kushata kana veZanu PF vachibvunzana pachavo. Asi zvatiri kunzwa ndezvekuti nhengo dzedu dzeMDC dziri kumakidzwa kuratidza ma serial numbers aya. Ndizvo tiri kuramba izvozvo," vadaro VaMwonzora. Vatiwo vakatenderana neZanu-PF kuti madzishe, masabhuku nemakanzura havafanire kutora nhamba dzevanhu sezo vachimbogovera vanhu zvekudya zvehurumemende. Zvichakadaro, VaMwonzora naVaMangwana vati ivo nemumwe mumiriri we MDC inotungamirwa naVaWelshman Ncube, ndivo vakapa kuti Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, kana kuti ZEC, iwedzere nguva yekunyoresa vavhoti. Komisheni inoone nezvesarudzo yeZEC inoti iri kuzoenderera mberi nekunyoresa vavhoti zvakasimba ichipinda munharaunda dzavo kana kuti registrationblitz kubva musi wa 10 Ndira kusvika musi wa 8 Kukadzi. Vakafanobata chigaro chasachigaro weZEC, VaEmmanuel Magade, vanoti hurumende yakatopa ZEC mari yekuita chirongwa ichi. Asi vamwe vanhu munyika vari kugunun’una kuti vari kutyisidzirwa zvakanyanya nevanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri veZanu-PF vachivamanikidza kuti vavape nhamba dzemapepa avanenge vavhotesa. No media source currently available

headline: Vakawanda Vanoti Kugadzikana kweHupfumi Hakuna Zvakuri Kubatsira Varombo
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti zvirongwa zvehurumende zvairi kuparura ichiti zviri kusimbisa hupfumi hwenyika, zviri kutopa kuti varombo vanyanye kushupika. Gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, naGavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, Doctor John Mangudya, vakaparura zvirongwa zvavo zvemafambisirwo emari nehupfumi asi vachivimbisa kuti havasi kubuda mugwara ravari sezvo vachiti rinodzikamisa hupfumi. Zvirongwa izvi zvakatambirwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi asi dzichiyambira kuti zvirongwa zvehurumende zvakawanda zvinenge zviri kusiya varombo vachinonga svosve nemuromo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano, vanoti zakaturwa naVaMangudya zvakanaka chose panyaya yekusadhinda mari yakawanda uye kuwanise mari makambani kuburikidza nemusika wemari. Asi vakurudzirawo hurumende kuti iwedzere vashandi mari vachiti izvi ndizvo zvinosimudzira hupfumi hwenyika. Mashoko aya atsinhirawo neimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhanga vari nhengo yeZanu-PF, VaGilbert Muponda, avo vanoti hurumende yakwanisa kudzikamisa mitengo, dhora remunyika nekusimudzira zvigadzirwa kumaindustry asi vachitsinhirawo nyaya yekuti vashandi vabhadharwe mari dzinovakwanira kuti vakwanise kutenga zviri kugadzirwa kumaindasitiri zvacho. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vari mukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vatiwo VaNcube vanofanira kuendesa mari kuzvirongwa zvekubatsira varombo munyaya dzedzidzo uye hutano sezvo vakawanda vari kutatarika nekuda kwekunzi vagare mudzimba vasingashande nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Vachitaura kumarinda eHeroes Acre nezuro, mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakatiwo chinangwa chavo ndechekuti Zimbabwe inge yave nyika ine vashandi vakati wandei vanotambirawo mari dziri nani kana kuti upper middle-class economy mugore ra2030. Zimbabwe inoti iri kutarisira kuti hupfumi huchakwira nekuda kwegoho rakanaka regore rino asi nyaya yekupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 inonzi inogona kukanganisa zvakanyanya hupfumi sezvo vanhu vakawanda vasiri kuenda kumabasa. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inoti Hapana Mwana weChikoro Afa neCovid-19 Kunyangwe Vakawanda Vabatwa neChirwere Ichi
text: Mukuru anoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika Dr Agnes Mahomva vanoti kunyangwe huwandu hwevana vechikoro vari kubatwa neCovid-19 huri kuramba huchikwira, hapana mwana ati afa nechirwere ichi kusvika parizvino. Vana vechikoro mazana masere nemakumi mapfumbamwe kana kuti 839 vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 mumavhikimnaviri adarika chete. Pavanhu zana nemakumi manomwe nevaviri vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nemusi weSvondo, makumi maviri nemumwe vana vechikoro. Izvi zvasiya vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru mazana maviri zvine makumi matatu nemashanu nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi manomwe nemashanu kana kuti 235 975. Nemusi weSvondi bazi rezvehutano rinoti hakuna munhu akafa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vafa nacho vachingori zviuru zvishanu nemazana matatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevana kana kuti 5 394. Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu mamiriyoni mana nezviuru mazana matatu zvine makumi mashanu nezvishanu nemazana mashanu nemakumi masere kana kuti 4 355 580 vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga yeCovid-19. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba kaviri vave mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana matatu zvine makumi masere nezvipfumbamwe nemazana mashanu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevanomwe kana kuti 3 389 597. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba katatu vave zviuru zana nemakumi maviri zvine mazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe nevatatu kana kuti 120 673. Bazi rezvehutani rinoti rine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kuti inyatsoshanda zvakanaka. Hurumende yave kukurudzirawo kuti vana vane makore gumi nemaviri kuti vabayiwe nhomba zvanzi naDr Mahomva zvinogona kubatsira kuti vana vakawanda vasabatwe neechirwere ichi.

headline: ZEC Inoudzwa Kuti Chinowandiswa Ivhoti Kwete Mifananidzo
text: Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemataongerwo enyika Doctor Pedzisayi Ruhanya avo vari kushanda neUniversity of Johannesburg vanoti ZEC inofanira kuburitsa gwaro remazita evavhoti rine mifananidzo yevanhu sezvinodiwa nechirongwa chitsva cheBVR. Doctor Ruhanya vanoti chiso chemunhu hachifanire kuwandiswa asi chinofanira kuwandiswa ivhoti. Mashoko aya anotevera kutsika madziro kuri kuita sachigaro weZEC Amai Priscilla Chigumba vachiti havasi kuzoburitsa gwaro revavhoti rine mifananidzo. Zvichakadaro, sangano rinoona nezvemitemo nemashandiro eparamende reVeritas raramba mashoko ari kubuda mubepanhau reHerald kunyanya kuti riri kuda kukanganisa mashandiro esangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commission kana kuti ZEC nekuriendesa kumatare edzimhosva richipomera mhosva yekutyora mitemo yesarudzo. Bepanhau iri rinotiwo veVeritas vanoda kusvibisa zita remutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Sangano iri ratiwo rakatanga basa rekuti mutemo wesarudzo ugadziriswe muna 2013 pakatambirwa bumbiro remutemo idzva. Asi veVeritas vanoti izvi ndezvemugotsi matsuro sezvo nyaya zhinji vakadzikwidza kumatare VaMnangagwa vasati vatora masimba vachishandisa mauto kubva kune vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Veritas yati haina bato rematongerwo enyika rainotsigira asi yakurudzira kuti bumbir remutemo richengetedzwe uye kuti munyika muitwe sarudzo dzakachena. Sangano iri ratiwo rinoda kuti kana sarudzo dzaitwa mapato asazoenda kumatare achidzipikisa nekuti bumbiro remutemo rinenge risina kuteverwa. Veritas yatiwo pamutemo ZEC inofanira kungotevera mutemo kwete kuda kutara iyo mitemo nekupikisa nyaya dzose dzinenge dzaendeswa kumatare kunyangwe iri risiri basa rayo. No media source currently available

headline: Zim ine tarenda: Songani
text: MUTAMBI wemaWarriors neVestri yekuIceland — Silas Songani — anoti vatambi vemuZimbabwe vane tarenda rinonwisa mvura uye anoshuvira kuona vakawanda vachitambira kuEurope.   Songani pari zvino ari munyika akamirira kudzokera kuIceland uko mwaka mutsva wenhabvu uchazotanga munaChivabvu.   Nhabvu yekuIceland inotanga munaChivabvu, yakasiyana nekune dzimwe nyika dzekuEurope sezvo kunyika iyi panguva ino kunenge kuchitonhora zvikuru.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza svondo rino, Songani anoti munyika muno mune vatambi vakawanda vane tarenda rekutamba nhabvu.   “MuZimbabwe tine vatambi vakawanda vanotamba nhabvu zvinonwisa mvura zvekuti vanotokwana kuzvikwata zvakawanda zviri kuEurope. Asi nekuda kwezvirango zvatakatemerwa neFIFA pamwe neCAF, zviri kutidzorera kumashure, dai nyaya iyi yagadziriswa nekuchimbidza.   “Sevatambi venhabvu, tikanotambirawo kunze kwenyika ndipo patinowanawo mari yekuchengeta nemhuri dzedu.   Muno zvikwata zvishoma zvinobhadhara, ndiko saka mutambi wese wenhabvu achishuvira kuenda kunze kwenyika.   “Manje kana takavharirwa sezvatakaitwa izvi, vatambi vakawanda vanopedzisira vaora mwoyo nekuti vakomana vanenge vane nzara, vamwe vavo vozopedzisira vamedzwa nezvinodhaka.   “Ngatikoshesei hupenyu neremangwana revatambi venhabvu,” anodaro.   Songani ave makore anodarika manomwe achitambira nhabvu yake kuEurope uko akambotambira kuDenmark kwenguva refu ari kuzvikwata zvakaita seSønderjyskE, Sydvest 05 neElverum.   Anoti vamiriri vevatambi vemuno ngavave vanhu vakavimbika vanomirira kodzero dzavo vovatsvagira zvikwata chaizvo zvekutambira kwete kukoshesa mari.   Songani anoti vatambi vazhinji tarenda ravo rakakanganiswa nevamiriri vavo avo vaivavimbisa zvinhu zvakawanda zvisina kuzoitika.   “Vamiriri vevatambi venhabvu ngavasanyepere vapfana nekuvavimbisa zvinhu zvisipo nekuti vanokonzeresa kuti vasvike pakuramwa nhabvu nekuda kwenhema dzavo zhinji.   “Mutambi wenhabvu munhu anoda kuraramisa mhuri yake nekuchengeta vabereki vake, asi manje kana muchivanyepera munenge muchitouraya remangwana rake.   “Ini ndakaita rombo rakanaka rekuti ndakashanda naMore Moyo mumiriri wangu uyo aikoshesa remangwana rangu.   Kune vaimbouya kwandiri vachindivimbisa zvinhu zvakawanda, asi ndakaramba ndakamira panaMoyo nekuti ndinoziva kwandakabva naye,” anodaro.   Songani kunyangwe hake akatambira kuEurope kwemakore akawanda, mutambi uyu haana kunyatsowana mukana wakakura wekutambira chikwata chenyika chemaWarriors sezvo akangokwanisa kutamba ka11 chete.   “Mutambi wenhabvu ishuviro yake kutambira nyika yake mitambo yakawanda, ini ndakakomborerwa kuti ndakatambira nyika yangu ka11 asi ndaidawo chaizvo kuitambira kakawanda.   “Varairidzi vairairidza chikwata chenyika ndivo vanoziva kuti sei vasina kundishevedza kakawanda uyewo ini handina daka nazvo nekuti pakupedzisira sechizvarwa chemuno, ndinoda kuona nyika yangu ichibudirira mumutambo wenhabvu ichisvika kure,” anodaro.   Songani anoenderera achiti: “Kana tave kutenderwa kutamba nhabvu senyika, ndichashanda nesimba kuti ndishevedzwe ndizotambira nyika yangu zvekare.”   Mutambi uyu anorumbidza zvikuru Norman Mapeza uyo waakashanda naye kuFC Platinum panguva yaakambodzoka kuzotambira nhabvu yake muno achibva kuDenmark asati aenda kuIceland.   Anoti Mapeza akamubika patsva zvekuti akashamisika kunzwa kuti atengwa neVestri yekuIceland.   “Mapeza ndinomurumbidza zvikuru nekuti akandibika patsva izvo zvakazozarura mukana wekuti ndiende kuIceland. Iye Mapeza pachake akatoshamisika kuti ndave kudzokera kuEurope akandikurudzira kuti ndishandise mukana uyu nemazvo wandakawana apo ndakatengwa neVestri,” anodaro.   Songani, uyo akambotambira Harare City neFC Platinum, ave nemakore 33 ekuberekwa uye anoti ave kutanga kuita gadziriro dzekusendeka shangu dzake dzekutamba nhabvu.   Anoti kana akasiya kutamba nhabvu, anoda kuzoita zvesports management.   “Nekugara kwandaita kuEurope, ndave kuzivana nevanhu vakawanda ikoko saka ndinoda kuvhurira mikana vatambi vakawanda vagouya kuzotambirawo nhabvu yavo kuEurope.   “Mikana yandakawana, ndinoda kuti vamwe vaiwanewo zvibatsire kuti nhabvu yedu munyika isimukire,” anodaro.

headline: Nhabvu yevechidiki yosimudzirwa
text: SHASHA dzakambonetsa munhabvu – Godfrey ‘Goda’ Moyo naBeavan Chikaka – vobatana mukusimudzira vatambi vechidiki izvo zviri kuvaona vachirairidza chikwata chePrime Rangers Soccer Academy.   Goda, sekuzivikanwa kwaanonyanya kuitwa munhabvu, akatambira zvikwata zvinoti Motor Action, Lengthens neShooting Stars kuchiti Chikaka akatambira CAPS United, Highlanders, Zimbabwe Saints, Black Rhinos neTafic yekuBotswana.   Vatambi vaviri ava vose pavange vave kunosendeka shangu dzavo dzenhabvu vakasangana kuPrime Rangers FC iyo yaikwikwidza muDivision One uko kunove kwavave kurairidza iye zvino vachibika vatambi vemangwana. Kuchikwata ichi, varairidzi vaviri ava vari kushanda nezvikwata zvemapoka anoti Under-11, 12 ne21.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza svondo radarika pamhemberero dzePrime Rangers Academy apo vaipa mibairo kuvatambi vavo vakadadisa mugore ra2021, Goda anoti akabatana naChikaka nechinangwa chekubika vatambi vechidiki kuti vagokwanisa kusimukira mumutambo uyu.   “Nhabvu yedu kuti ibudirire tisvike kure, tinofanira kubika vechidiki zvakasimba nekudaro ndiko saka ini naChikaka takabatana kuchikwata chePrime Rangers Academy. Ruzivo rwatakawana munhabvu tiri kurwupawo kune vechidiki kuti vagokwanisa kudarika padanho ratakasvika isu,” anodaro Goda.   Anoti nerutsigiro rwavari kuwana kubva kumutungamiri wePrime Rangers, Samuel Horonga, vari kuona chiyedza chikuru zvekuti vane vatambi vakawanda avo vanofunga kuti vanogona kuenda kunotambira kunyika dzakaita seSouth Africa nekuEurope mune remangwana.   “Chishuwo chemutambi wese wenhabvu wemazuva ano kunotambira padanho repamusoro kuEurope kana kuSouth Africa chaiko. Tine vatambi avo tinofunga kuti vanogona kusvika padanho iri zvekuti vakaramba vakangozvininipisa chete vanosvika kure mumutambo uyu,” anodaro.   Chikaka anotiwo chikwata chavo gore rino chichakwikwidza muligi reUnder-21 Challenge League izvo vanovimba kuti zvichabatsira vatambi vavo kuti vagoonekwa nezvikwata zvikuru zvemuno nezvekunze.   “Mwaka uno tiri kuzokwikwidza muUnder-21 Challenge League umo tinovimba kuti muchabatsira vatambi vedu vagoonekwa nezvikwata zvizhinji.   “Ligi iri rakakosha nekuti ndipo panovhurirwa mikana yevatambi vazhinji yekusimukira mumutambo uyu. Masvondo adarika, takakwikwidza kumutambo wekupedzisira wegore uyo takasvika mufainari, matambiro atakaita akafadza zvikuru zvekuti tiri kutarisira kutanga kweChallenge League,” anodaro Chikaka.   Mumutambo weUnder-21 Challenge League, Prime Rangers ichakwikwidza nezvikwata zvinosanganisira Friendly Academy neBN Academy kutanga munaKukadzi.

headline: Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kupona kuChirwere cheCOVID-19 Munyika Hwuri Kukwira
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weChina kuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika hwasvika pazviuru zvishanu zvine mazana manomwe nemakumi mana nevashanu, kana kuti 5,745. Bazi iri rakaisawo huwandu hwevanhu vapona kuchirwere ichi pazviuru zvina zvine mazana mashanu nemakumi maviri nevashanu, kana kuti 4,525. Vanhu vafa vasvika pazana nemakumi mashanu nemumwe, kana kuti 151. Izvi zvinoreva kuti vanhu vachiri kurwara neCovid-19 munyika yose vave chiuru nemakumi matanhatu nevapfumbamwe, kana kuti 1,069. Dunhu reMasvingo, iro ranga risati rashaikirwa nemunhu nekuda kwechirwere ichi, nemusi weChina rakazove nemunhu wekutanga kushaya anove munhu mumwe chete akashaya nemusi weChina. Vanhu vari kushaya vanonzi ndevaya vane makore ari pakati pemakumi mana nemakumi masere, vanhurume vachinzi ndivo vari kufa vakawanda nekukwirawo kwemakore. Asi Zvinonziwo pave netarisiro yekuti kudziya kwekunze kuchaderedza kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Mukuru anoona nezvezvirwere zvinotapuriranwa mubazi rezvehutano, Doctor Portia Manangazira vakaudza bepanhau reHerald kuti vanotarisira kuti kupera kwechando kuchabatsira kuti vanhu vasarambe vari munzvimbo dzakamanikidzana vachitsvaga kudziirwa, izvo zvichabatsira kuti vasatapurirane chirwere. Nyanzvi mune zvehutano vari chiremba, Dr. Edgar Munatsi, vanoti kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kupona kubva kuCovid-19 kune chekuita netsanangudzo itsva yeWorld Health Organisation iyo inoti kana munhu akavhenekwa akawanikwa aine chirwere nekuti anga achinzwa kurwadziwa kana kuti anga aine zviratidzo, akazoita mazuva matatu asisina zviratidzo anobva anzi apora. Chimwe chinonzi naDr. Munatsi chakashandurwa neW-H-O ndechekuti munhu akavhenekwa akawanikwa aine chirwere asi akazoramba asina zviratidzo kwemazuva gumi anotevera anenge ave kutonzi apora. Zvichakadaro, vanhu vabatwa ne covid-19 pasi rose vanonzi neJohns Hopkins University Hospital vadarika pamamiriyoni makumi maviri nemaviri nezviuru mazana manomwe, kana kuti 22,700 000. Vanhu vashaya vanonzi vadarikawo zviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezvina kana kuti 794 000. America ndiyo ichiri pamusoro panyika dzose pavanhu vane Covid-19, iine vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mashanu nezviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi manomwe nezvitanhatu, kana kuti 5,576 000, vafa vachidarikawo zviuru zana nemakumi manomwe nezvina kana kuti 174 000. South Africa ndiyo iri pamusoro muAfrica iine vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezvipfumbamwe, kana kuti 599 000, vafa vachidarika zviuru gumi nezviviri nemazana matanhatu kana kuti 12,600. No media source currently available

headline: Vorwisa kutorwa kwezvinodhaka nemitambo
text: MURAIRIDZI wenhabvu yevechidiki arizve sachigaro weMbare Junior League, Stanley Kavayi, obatana nekereke yeRoyal Assembly International Ministries mukusimudzira vechidiki kuburikidza nemitambo nechinangwa chekurwisa kutorwa kwezvinodhaka.   Kavayi ari kushanda naProphet Emmanuel Ngoshi vechechi iyi uye vaviri ava vari kuronga mitambo inosanganisira nhabvu, netball, volleyball nebasketball senzira yekusimudzira matarenda evechidiki pamwe nekuvaendesa kuchikoro.   Kavayi, uyo anotungamira nekurairidza chikwata cheReal Stars Mbare, anoti kutorwa kwezvinodhaka zvisingatenderwe mumuviri zvakadai semutoriro, gukamakafela, crystal merth, mbanje nebronco kuri kukanganisa vechidiki zvakanyanya. Anoti dambudziko iri rapambirawo kuvanasikana sezvo vamwe vavo vave kutora zvinodhaka izvo zviri kukanganisa remangwana ravo apo vanozosvika pakupihwa pamuviri votadza kuenderera mberi nedzidzo.   “Tine vechidiki vakawanda avo ramangwana ravo riri kukanganisika zvikuru nekuda kwekutorwa kwezvinodhaka nezvimwe zvakasiyana. Vechidiki vakangosiiwa vasina zvekuita vari vega vanofuririka vopedzisira vave kutora zvinodhaka. Ipapo hupenyu hwavo hunoenda mudondo saka takabatana naProphet Ngoshi donzvo riri rekuti tiwanire vechidiki ava zvekuita tivabvise mukatsika kekutora zvinodhaka hupenyu hwavo hufambire mberi zvakanaka.   “Tiri kushanda nevasikana zvekare nekuti hatidi kuvasiya, tinoda kuti vawaniswe mikana seinongopihwa vanakomana. Vanasikana vazhinji vari kusiira chikoro panzira vapihwa pamuviri, saka tiri kuvasimudzira mune zvemitambo kuti vambosiye zvekufunga zvebonde izvo zvinoita kuti vapihwe pamuviri nguva isati yakwana,” anodaro.   Kavayi anoti vari kushanda zvekare nevaimbi vane mukurumbira vakaita saBaba Harare, Peter Moyo naMai Titi avo vanoshevedza vachidzidzisa vechidiki ava.   “Vaimbi vane izwi rine simba saka tinovashevedza nguva nenguva vachiuya kuzotaura nevatambi vechidiki vachivakurudzira kuti vagare hupenyu hwakachena, zvinobatsira mukurwisa kutorwa kwezvinodhaka,” anodaro Kavayi.   Prophet Ngoshi vanoti danho iri vari kuritora nechinangwa chekuvaka vechidiki kuti remangwana ravo rive rakajeka.   “Zvinodhaka zviri kukanganisa vechidiki uye zvinorwadza kuona vachikanganiswa matarenda avainavo nekuda kwezvinodhaka. Saka donzvo redu kuvaka matarenda evanakomana nevanasikana kuti vaite zvemitambo tivabvise kune zvinodhaka zvinokanganisa zvakaita semutoriro, guka, crystal merth nezvimwe zvakawanda.   “Vana vakatanga kutamba mitambo, pfungwa dzekutora zvinodhaka hadzimbouye uye hupenyu hwavo hunotodzoredzeka zvakanaka,” vanodaro Prophet Ngoshi.

headline: Huori Muhurumende Hoendesa Nyika kuMawere
text: Nyaya yehuori yanetsa munyika zvikuru mumakambani ehurumende ayo ari kupomerwa mhosva yekuita chikiribidi munyaya yematenda ane mari inosvika mabhiriyoni emadhora. Nyaya yehuori yanetsa munyika zvikuru mumakambani ehurumende ayo ari kupomerwa mhosva yekuita chikiribidi munyaya yematenda ane mari inosvika mabhiriyoni emadhora. Huori hunonzi nevakawanda huri kupawo kuti nyika irambe iri mumadhaka. Mapazi ehurumende akaita seremhando dzemoto anonzi akapa basa kunhengo yeZanu-PF, VaPsychology Mazivisa, rekushambadzira kambani iyi kunyangwe paine vanhu vari kuita basa iri. Kambani yeZesa inonziwo iri kupa VaWicknel Chivhayo mamiriyoni emadhora ekuita zvinonzi nevamwe zviri kuitwa nechikiribidi. Vakuru kumakambani akaita seZimra neAnti-Corruption Commission vari kuferefetwa pari zvino nenyaya dzehuori. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakatendawo kuti mari inosvika mabhiriyoni gumi nemashanu yemangoda yakatsakatira kwachiyadzwa. Sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Coalition on Debt and Development VaJoy Mabenge, vanoti mutungamiri wenyika anofanira kuona kuti nyaya yehuori yapararira. No media source currently available

headline: Kubviswa kweLockdown Kuchanetsa Sezvo Vanhu Vakawanda Vasati Vaongororwa Covid-19
text: Sangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights rinoti danho rekuwedzera kana kusawedzera mazuva ekuti nyika irambe yakavharwa, richanetsa kutora sezvo vanhu vazhinji munyika vasina kuongororwa kuti vane chirwere cheCovid-19 here kana kuti kwete. Izvi zvinoitika apo hurumende ichiti yave kutora matanho matsva ekuti vanhu vakawanda vaongororwe, zvikuru vari munzvimbo dzine vanhu vakabatwa neCovid-19. MuZimbabwe mava nevanhu makumi maviri nevatatu vabatwa nechirwere ichi, uye vanhu vatatu vafa nacho, asi pasi rose riine vanhu vanodarika zviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezvinomwe vafa neCovid-19 kubva zvayakatanga kuChina gore rapera. Munyori musangano iri, Doctor Norman Matara, vaudza Studio7 ruzhinji rwevanhu munyika harwuna kuongororwa kuti rwune chirwere cheCovid-19 here kana kuti kwete panguva iyo nyika yakavharwa kwemazuva makumi maviri nerimwe akatarwa nemutungamiri wenyika zvichaita kuti hurumende itemeseke musoro kuti nyika yoramba yakavharwa here kana kuti kwete pachapera nguva yakatarwa naVaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Pari zvino, bazi rezvehutano rinoti raongorora vanhu mazana matanhatu nemakumi matanhatu nevashanu chetekuti vane chirwere ichi here kana kuti Havana munyika ine vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi nematanhatu. Nekuda kweizvi, VaMatara vati zvinonetsa kuti hurumende itore danho rine hudzamu isina humbowo hwakati tsvikiti hwekuti zvinhu zvakamira sei munyika pamusoro pechirwere ichi. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano uye vari munyori wezvehutano muMDC, Doctor Henry Madzorera, vanoti huwandu hwevanhu vaongororwa kusvika pari zvino hunoratidza kuti kuvharwa kwakaitwa nyika hakuna chakwabatsira. Mutauriri wesangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaMarvelous Khumalo, vakurudzirawo mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, kuti vambomira kufamba-famba kwavari kuita. Asi VaMnangagwa vanoti vari pakati pahurongwa hwekutenderera nenyika yose vachiona mamiriro akaita zvinhu pamusoro pechirwere cheCovid-19 ichi uye kuona kuti veruzhinji vari kutevedzera here kurudziro yavo yekuti veruzhinji vagare kudzimba senzira yekuderedza kuapararira kwechirwere ichi. VaMnangagwa vakazivisa kutivachazoongorora pakupera kwemazuva makumi maviri nerimwe avakatara kuti veruzhinji vange vari kudzimba senzira yekuderedza mikana yekupararira kwechirwere ichi kuti zvinokodzera here kuti veruzhinji varambe vari mudzimba kana kuti kwete. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rezvehutano, VaObediah Moyo, sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Asi munyori mubazi ravo, Doctor Agnes Mahomva, vaburitsa mashoko ekuti komiti yakaumbwa nemutungamiri wenyika kuti itungamire nyaya dzekurwisa chirwere che Coronavirus yeInter-Ministerial Taskforce on Covid-19 inotungamirwa nemumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika, VaKembo Mohadi, yakabvumirana kuti patorwe matanho akasimba ekuti vanhu vazhinji munyika vaongororwe kuti havana chirwere cheCvoid-19 here. Gwaro raburitswa naDoctor Mahomva iri rinoti vanhu vese vanga vachienda kumabasa panguva iyo nyika yanga yakavharwa, kunyanya vashandi vehurumende, vachaongororwa kuti havana kutapukirwa nechirwere ichi here. Doctor Mahomva vati munhu wese anofungidzirwa kuti ane chirwere ichi anosungirwa kuongororwa, uye vose vari kupinda munyika vachibva kunyika dzine chirwere ichi pamwe nevane zvirwere zvedzihwa vanofanira kuongororwa zvakare. Doctor Mahomva vatiwo vanhu vakwegura vane makore makumi matanhatu zvichikwira vari muzvipatara vane zvirwere zvakaita se asthma, shuga, BP, nezvirwere zvemoyo vanofanirawo kuongororwa zvakare. Vati zvose izvi zvichaitwa kuti hurumende inyatsoziva kuti nyika yakamira papi chaizvo pachirwere cheCovid-19. Pari zvino, chirwere cheCovid-19, icho chakatangira kuChina, chinonzi nehurumende chauraya vanhu vatatu munyika, uye kubata vanhu gumi nevasere, ukuwo pasi rose, vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni maviri vabatwa neCovid-19, uye vanhu vanodarika zviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezvonomwe, vafa nechirwere ichi pasi rose. No media source currently available

headline: Varwiri veKodzero Vashanu Vanomiswa Mudare Vachipomerwa Mhosva yeKuronga Kubvisa Hurumende
text: Varwiri vekodzero vashanu vakasungwa mushure mekupinda musangano wezvekodzero dzevanhu kuMaldives vamiswa pamberi pedare vachipomerwa mhosva yekuronga zvekupidigura hurumende. Asi vasungwa ava vasvitsa chikumbiro kudare chekuti nyaya iyi iraswe vachiti havana mhosva yavakapara uye kodzero dzavo dzakatyorwa vari muhusungwa. Hurumende yati vasungwa vashanu ava, avo vanoti VaTatenda Mombeyarara vesangano reCitizens Manifesto, VaGamuchirai Mukura vesangano reCommunity Tolerance Reconciliation and Development, VaNyasha Frank Mpahlo veTransparency International Zimbabwe, VaGeorge Makoni veCentre for Community Development in Zimbabwe, naMuzvare Farirai Gumbonzvanda vesangano reRosaria Memorial Trust, vakaronga zvekupidigura hurumende kumusangano wavakapinda kuMaldives wakarongwa nesangano rinoshanda rakazvimirira rekuSerbia rinodaidzwa kuti Centre for Apllied None Violent Action and Strategies kana kuti CANVAS. Hurumende yatiwo vasungwa ava vakadzidziswa zvekushandisa pfuti diki pamwe nezvekupidigura hurumende vachishanda nevamwe vavo vavati vachiri kutsvagwa nemapurisa. Vachuchisi venyaya iyi vatiwo vasungwa ava vakadzidziswa nzira dzekukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vanopandukira sei hurumende uye nzira dzekutiza nadzo kusungwa mukuratidzira pamwe nekuita zvechitororo. Hurumende yatiwo ine humbowo hwainahwo hwayakakawana munharembozha dzevasungwa ava pamwe nemuma computer avo ayo akapambwa nemapurisa pakasungwa varwiri vekodzero ava pavakasvika panhandare yendege yeRobert Gabriel Mugabe International Airport neMuvhuro manheru. Asi rimwe remagweta evasungwa ava, Muzvare Jessie Majome, vasvitsa chikumbiro kudare chekuti nyaya iyi iraswe vachiti vasungwa ava havana mhosva yavakapara uye vati vasungwa ava vakatyorerwa kodzero dzavo pavakasungwa. Vachipa humbowo hwavo kudare, VaMombeyarara vati vakatyisidzirwa zvakakomba nemapurisa uye havana kuudzwa chikonzero chekusungwa kwavo pavakasungwa sezvinotaurwa nebumbiro remitemo. VaMakoni vatiwo vakamanikidzwawo kuvhura nharembozha dzavo nema computer avo vese mapurisa asina matsamba ekuita izvi sezvakatarwa mumurawu. Vasungwa vese ava vatiwo vakarariswa mumatirongo akasiyana-siyana aive nerima uye ane zvimbuzi zvakange zvakapfachukira tsvina yevanhu neweti uye vakanyimwa chikafu nemvura yekunwa kubva pavakasungwa kusvika pavakazobvumidzwa kuti vaonekwe nemagweta avo nezuro Chipiri masikati. Vasati vapinda mudare, VaMombeyarara vaudza Studio7 kuti vari kushubgurudzwa nehurumende zvisina maturo. Vasungwa vese ava vaudza dare kuti musangano wavakanopinda kuMaldives wakange usinei nezvekupidigura hurumende asi kuti waive wekurwira kodzero dzevanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Maonero Osiyana paMashoko aVaMugabe Anoti Hupfumi Huchasimuka
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakavimbisa kuti hupfumi hwenyika hwagadzirira kusimuka kuburikidza nechirongwa cheZIM-ASSET. Vachitaura muparamende pachirongwa cheState of The Nation nemusi weChipiri, VaMugabe vakati hurumende yavo yakabuda nezviga gumi zvaichatevera mukusimudzira kwayo hupfumi hwenyika, uye kukwezva vekunze pamwe nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika kuti vasime mari dzavo munyika. Vakatiwo hurumende yavo iri kuita hurongwa hwekuti itange kudyidzana zvakare nenyika dzekunze, kusanganisira dzekumawirira. Asi mutauriri weMDC Renewal Team, VaJacob Mafume, vanoti hapana zvitsva pamashoko aVaMugabe aya, sezvo zvinhu zviri kuramba zvichienda kumawere munyaya dzeupfumi. Vanotiwo VaMugabe vanofanirwa kutanga nekuvandudza mitemo iri kutyisidzira vekunze kuti vatadze kusima mari dzavo munyika. Asi nhengo yeZanu PF, uye vachiongororora zvematongerwo enyika, VaGoodson Nguni,vanoti hurumende yeZanu PF yagara itori kuita hurukuro nevekunze kuti Zimbabwe itange kudyidzana zvakare nenyika dzekunze. VaNguni vanoti izvi zvakaonekwa kana munguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa apo pakaumbwa komiti yemakurukota yaiita hurukuro nenyika dzekumawirira. No media source currently available

headline: Bhanga Guru Rinoparura Hurongwa Hutsva hweMari
text: Bank guru renyika, reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe (RBZ), raparura hurongwa hwemari hutsva kwekuti mabhanga munyika atange kutenga mari yekunze izvo rinoti zvichauraya musika mutema. RBZ inoti hurongwa hutswa uhu huchaita kuti mari yekunze iwande munyika, kudzikisa mutengo wemari yekunze, pamwe nekudzikisa mitengo yezvinhu izvo zvange zvave kuvhiringa raramo yevanhu munyika. Vachiparura hurongwa hwawo hweMonetary Policy, gavhuna weRBZ, VaJohn Mangudya, vati kuti izvi zvitange kuitika, mari yese yeReal Time Gross Settlement (RTGS) nemabhondi iri mumabhanga, yave kutorwa semaRTGS dollars uye mari iyi ndiyo ichange yave kuchinjwa nemadhora ekuAmerica kana dzimwe mari dzekunze. Vati mari iyi ndiyo ichange yave kushandiswa kutenga mari yekunze pamusika wemumabhanga kana kuti Inter-Bank Foreign Exchange Market. VaMangudya vati bhanga ravo ratora matanho ekuti mutengo wemari yekunze hausi kuzokwira zvakanyanya uyewo vati vachange vachiongorora kuti mabhanga ari kutenga nekutengesa mari yekunze zviri pamutemo. Vatiwo veruzhinji vachange vave kukwanisa kutengesa mari yavo yekunze mumabhanga. Vatiwo vaya vanotumirwa mari kana kutambira mari kubva kunze kwenyika vacharamba vachipihwa mari dzavo ari madhora ekuAmerica. VaMangudya vati vanoona sekuti matanho avatora achabvisa musika mutema wemari, kudereredza mutengo wemari yekunze, izvo vati zvichaderedza mitengo yezvinhu munyika. Vatiwo izvi ndozvange zviri kudiwa nevemabizimisi. Muzvinabhisimisi, VaOswald Binha, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvaitwa naVaMangudya ndizvo chaizvo zvavange vakatarisirira sezvo zvange zviri pachena kuti huremu hwema bond notes hauenderani nehuremu hwemadhora ekuAmerica. Asi vati pachine mamwe matanho anofanira kutorwa nehurumende kuti zvinhu zvinyatsofamba zvakanaka munyaya dzemabhizisimisi. Vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi, VaPersistence Gwanyanywa, vaudza Studio7 kuti danho ratorwa neRBZ rakanaka chose uye zvinogona kuti nyika iwane mari yekunze yakawanda. Asi vati RBZ inofanira kushanda zvakanyanya kudzivirira zvipingaidzo zvinogona kumuka apo matanho aya anotanga kushanda. VaMangudya vati vemakambani vakawanda vange vave kutenga mari yekunze pamukoto kuitira kuti vatenge zvinhu zvinokosha. Pari zvino dhora rimwe rekuAmerica rinokosha mana mana kana kudarika pamukoto. VaMangudya vati matanho avatora achaderedza mutengo uyu zvakanyanya uye kana izvi zvaitika, mitengo yezvinhu ichadzikirira. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, nyanzvi munyaya dzekufambiswa kwemari, uye vaimbove gurukota rezvemari muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, VaTendai Biti, vanoti zvataurwa nehurumende zvinoratidza kuti dhora remuZimbabwe radzoka pachishandiswa rimwe zita. VaBiti, avo vakayambira nyika kuti hurumende iri kuda kudzosa dhora remunyika nerweseri, vanoti havasi kufara nehurongwa hwagavhuna webhanga guru, sezvo mari dzevanhu dziri mumabhangi dzasiyiwa dzisina kuchengetedzwa nehurongwa hwaturwa nhasi. VaBiti vanotiwo vanhu vanofanirwa kutarisira kukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu uye kushaikwa kwezvinhu zvizhinji munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Vakawanda Votarisira maWarriors Kushura Mare kuAFCON kuGabon
text: Mitambo yeAfrica Cup of Nations iri kutanga musi wa 14 Ndira kusvika musi wa 5 Kukadzi kuGabon. Zimbabwe iri muGroup B neTunisia, Algeria uye Senegal. Aka ndekechitatu Zimbabwe ichienda kumakwikwi aya mushure nekuenda kuTunisia muna 2004 uye kuEgypt muna 2006. Mutambo wekutanga weZimbabwe uri kutambwa musi wa 15 Ndira neAlgeria kuStade deFanceville. Ichazotambazve musi wa 19 Senegal uye neTunisia musi wa 23. Mitambo yeAfrica Cup of Nations iri kutanga musi wa 14 Ndira kusvika musi wa 5 Kukadzi kuGabon. Zimbabwe iri muGroup B neTunisia, Algeria uye Senegal. Zvichakadaro, vatsigiri vemitambo vanotiwo vari kutarisira shanduko mugore ra 2017. Nhengo yeZimbabwe National Soccer Supporters Association VaJaphet Mhombera vanoti vari kutarisra shanduko mumaitiro ehurumende kuti ipewo mari kumitambo. Hurumende yeZimbabwe haina nhoroondo yekupa vatambi mari asi VaMombera vanoti mari yakakosha pakuti inowedzera mwando muvatambi uyezve inokurudzira budiriro mune vechidiki. VaTakawira Mthombeni avo vanove nhengo yevatsigiri venhabvu yeWarriors Fan Club vanoti varikutarisira kuti maWarriors achapa Zimbabwe matangiro egore akanaka nekutamba zvinofadza muma Africa Cup of Nations finals. VaMthombeni vanoti vari kuona maWarriors achitora mukombe uyu nemhaka yagadziriro yanga ichiitwa. MaWarriors arikutarisirwa kusimuka musi weChishanu vakananga kuCameroon munzira yavo yekuenda kuGabon. Vaimbove mutungamiri weTennis Zimbabwe VaPaul Chingoka vanoti gore rino chikwata chenyika cheDavis Cup chinofanira kuratidza kuti mutambo uyu uchirimo munyika nekukunda muEuro-Africa Zone Group Three. VaChingoka vanoti gadziriro yemakundano ayo arikutanga muna Kurume inofanira kutanga ikozvino. Mukuru weOriental Boxing Promotions VaChris Malunga vanoti varikutarisira mutambo mukuru pakati paCharles Manyuchi naDanny Garcia wekuAmerica vachirwira bhande regoridhe reWorld Boxing Council. Manyuchi anoti akatotanga kare gadziriro yemutambo mukuru uyu. VaMalunga vanoti varikutaurirana nevanotungamira Garcia kuti vaone kuti mutambo uyu ungaitwe rinhi. No media source currently available

headline: NDAKARASA MUKANA: CHARLES MANYUCHI
text: SHASHA yetsiva – Charles Manyuchi – anoti akarasa mukana mukuru mugore ra2017 apo akakundwa naQudratillo Abduqaxorov wekuUzbekistan, kuSingapore izvo zvakamuona achitorerwa bhande raaive naro reWorld Boxing Council Silver Tittle asi kudzoka kwaaita ane chishuwo chekurwa nedzimwe shangwiti dzepasi rose dzinosanganisira Floyd Mayweather (Jr).   Kukundwa kwakaitwa Manyuchi mumutambo uyu kwakamudzorera kumashure sezvo akange ave pedyo nekukwanisa kurwira mabhande makuru etsiva akadai seWBC Championship uye nekusangana nevatambi vane mukurumbira vakaita saAmir Khan wekuEngland, Manny Pacquiao wekuPhilippines naShawn Porter wekuAmerica. Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Manyuchi anoti iye zvino ave munzira kugadzirisa zvakakanganisika kumashure uye achiri nemukana wekudzokera zvakare pamusoro mumutambo uyu.   “Ndakarasa mukana paye pandakakundwa kuSingapore naAbduqaxorov nekuti dai ndakahwina mutambo uyu ndakange ndatosvika pedyo nekutosangana nanaPacquiao uye nedzimwe shasha dzetsiva dzepasi rose. Zvakaitika hazvo asi ndiri kuzvigadzirisa nekuti chishuvo changu kuti ndirwe naManny Pacquaiao, Amir Khan kana naFloyd Mayweather (Jr) chaiye nekuti ndinoti dai adzoka mutsiva nekuti ndiri kuda kumbosangana nayewo,” anodaro.   Manyuchi mwedzi yadarika akahwina mutambo wake weRestoration Fight naPablo Ezequiel Acosta wekuArgentina ndokuhwina mabhande maviri eUBC neGBU izvo zvakamusimudza. Parizvino ave kutarisira kusangana naNordine Orik wekuFrance mwedzi unotevera uye mutambo uyu anofanirwa kuuhwina kuti akwanise kudzokera padanho raaive kare.   Manyuchi anoti mutambo wake naAcosta kudai asina kuuhwina ndipo paibva paperera kutamba kwake tsiva sezvo wainge wakamukoshera mukudzoka kwake.   “Mutambo wangu naAcosta ndiwo wandisvitsa nhasi pandave iye zvino, dai ndakakundwa zvingadai zvakabva zvaperera ipapo asi ndakahwina saka mukana uchiripo uye ndiri kutarisira mutambo uri kutevera naOrik. Ndozviziva kuti ndikauhwina aihwa ndenge ndadzokera pandaive chaipo uye iye zvino ndiri kuvimbisa kuti zvakaitika kare hazvichadzokorodzeke.   “Ndave kumberi chaiko uye ndiri kubata basa sebasa nekuti ndiri kuhwina, handidi kukundwa zvakare,” anodaro.   Muchinda uyu anoti akavamba boka rake iro ari kudzidzisa vatambi vetsiva vari kusimukira rinonzi Charles Manyuchi Boxing Academy.   Vamwe vatambi vari muboka iri vacharwa mitambo yakasiyana apo shasha iyi ichatatsurana naOrik musi wa28 Gunyana kuHarare International Conference Centre.

headline: Bhanga reStandard Chartered Romisa Vamwe Vashandi Basa muZimbabwe
text: Bhanga reStandard Chartered rinoti riri kuzogumura vamwe vashandi sezvo rave kuendesa mamwe mapazi aro zvikuru anoda humhizha kuChina, India neMalaysia. Vanhu makumi maviri vakatomiswa basa pavashandi mazana matatu nemakumi masere nemana vari muZimbabwe. Bhanga iri rakatonyorera vashandi varo chiziviso richitaura nezvenyaya iyi. Mumwe mukuru muStandard Chartered Amai Lillian Hapanyengwi vaudza nhepfenyuro yeBloomberg kuti vamwe vashandi vachatatsvagirwa kumwe kwekuenda. Vanotiwo zvavari kuita zvakanangana nekuderedza mari dzavari kushandisa. Mutungamiri wesangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Union VaPeter Mutasa vanoti vashandi vakatotanga kumiswa basa gore rapera. Vanoti vanhu ava havasi kunyatsopihwa mari yavo yemudyandigere sezvo hurumende isiri kuvapawo rutsigiro. Vati zvinhu zvinovashungurudza kuti vashandi vemuZimbabwe vari kusiiwa vachinonga svosve nemuromo nevemakambani. No media source currently available

headline: ZEC Yotenda Kuti Humhizha MUkufambiswa kweMashoko Hunogona Kushandiswa Kudzidzisa Vanhu neZvesarudzo
text: Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Youth Council Vasungano Chisina vanoti sangano reZimbabwe Electoral Coimmission kana kuti ZEC rakabuda pachena kumusangano wakarongwa neNational Association of Youth Organization kana kuti NAYO kuKadoma Ranch Motel. Musangano uyu wakatanga nemusi weChipiri ukapera neChishanu wainge wakanangana nekudzidzisa vechidiki nezvehumhizha mukuburitwa kwemashoko kana kuti digital media. VaChisina vakaudza Studio 7 kuti kubva kune zvakataurwa nevesangano re ZEC vainge vari kumusangano uyu, musarudzo munogona kushandiswawo digital media iyi. “Kubva kune zvakataurwa nevaimirira ZEC pamusangano uyu zvakabuda pachena kuti muZimbabwe vanhu vapfumbamwe pagumi vane nharembozha kana kuti vari pedyo nayo nekudaro pakashandiswa nharembozha pakudzidzisa vanhumashoko anogona kufambiswa nechimbi chimbi mukunyoresa nekudzidzisa vanhu nezvesarudzo.” VaChisina vatenda kuti vechidiki vemuZimbabwe vachine rwendo rwurefu mukukwanisa kushandisa humhizha hwechizvino zvino mukuita mabasa akasiyana siyana. “Tadzidza zvakawanda. Asi chikuru chatadzidza ndechekuti vechidiki vakawanda havana ruzivo nezvekushandisa digital media. Se Zimbabwe Youth Council tave kutoenda kunobuda negwaro rekuti tidzidze vechidiki nezvekushandisa digital media mumabasa akasiyan siyana.” Hatina kukwanisa kubata mukuru weZEC Amai Rita Makarau sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nhraembozha ravo. Musangano uyu wakaparurwa neNAYO nemusi weChipiri nechinangwa chekudzidzisa vechidiki nezvekushandisa humhizha hwechizvino zvino kana kuti digital media kuti vapinde muzvirongwa zvehutongi hwejekerere zvakaita sesarudzo nezvimwe. Humhizha uhu hunosanganisira kushandisa nharembozha nemadandemutande akaita seFacebook, WhatsApp ne Twitter. Musangano uyu uri kuitirwa kuKadoma Ranch Hotel uye uri kutarisirwa wakapera nemusi weChishanu. Sangano reNAYO isangano remuZimbabwe rinoyedza kuunza kuyanana mune vechidiki kuitira kuti vamise nyaya dzemhirizhonga. Musangano uyu wange wakanangana nekukurudzira nhaurirano pakati pevechidiki vemuZimbabwe neve kunze kana kuti Dialogue Exchange Program. Vanoona nezvekuenzaniswa kwemikana pakati pevakomana nevasikana musangano iri, Muzvare Starline Mukumbachore, vanoti chinangwa chavo chikuru ndechekukurudzirawo kushandiswa kwemichina yechizvino zvino munyaya dzesarudzo. Izvi vanoti zvakanangana nesarudzo dzichazoitwa muna 2018. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weBotswana, VaMasisi, Vanovhura Harare Agricultural Show Vachiti Covid-19 Yakaratidza Zinyenyeke Riri munyika dzeSADC neAfrica
text: Mutungamiriri weBotswana, VaMokgweetsi Masisi, vavhura zviri pamutemo Harare Agricultural Show vachiti Covid-19 nehondo yekuUkraine zvakaratidza zinyenyeke riri munyika dzeSADC neAfrica yose panyaya dzekurima. Vati zviviri izvi zvakapinza nzara uye yave nguva yekuti nyika dzemuAfrica dzishandise michina yechizvinozvino kusimbaradza mabasa ekurima kuti pasave nenzara kunyange pakaita matambudziko akaita seCovid-19. VaMasisi vati Zimbabwe neBotswana dzinofanira kusimbaradza kudyidzana kwadzo panyaya dzekurima vachiti Zimbabwe inyanzvi pakurima zvirimwa zvakaita sechibage, ukuwo nyika yavo ine hunyanzvi panyaya dzekugadzira mishonga yezvipfuyo yakaita seyekurapa zvirwere zvakaita se newcastle ne foot and mouth. Vatiwo Zimbabwe ine nyanzvi munyaya dzekurima uye dzimwe dzacho dzave kutoshanda munyika yavo. VaMasisi vati hurumende dzenyika mbiri idzi dziri kushanda pamwe kurwisa dambudziko rekubiwa kwezvipfuyo pamuganhu wenyika mbiri idzi iro rakonzera mutauro. Nyanzvi munyaya dzekurima uye vari nhengo yeZimbabwe Agricultural Society, Va Ivan Craig vaudza Studio kuti vanowirira nemashoko aVaMasisi ekuti Covid-19 nehondo yeUkaraine zvakaburitsa zinyekenyeke panyaya dzekurima muAfrica. Vati izvi zvinofanira kusvinudza nyika dzemuAfrica kuti dzinofanirwa kuzvirimira chikafu chakakwana nekuti dzine zvese zvinodiwa kuita izvi. Zvichakadai Zimbabwe National Army ndiyo yatora mubairo wezviratidzwa zvakakunda vese pashowo yegore rino. VaJonathan Musoki ndivo vawana mubairo wekutanga pavarimi yefodya. Vamwe vawana mibairo vanosanganisira Amai Priscillar Marauka, avo vawana wekuve murimi wepamusorosoro, kana kuti Best Agro Produce Farmer, purazi re Zvikomborero richiwana mubairo wekutanga pavarimi vemombe. VaConcern Mutasa vekuZaka ndivo vawana mubairo wekutanga pavarimi vePfumvudza uye vapiwa mubairo wetirakita. VaMutasa vanoti vafara nekukunda kwavaita vachiti kurima nepfumvudza hakurwadzi sezvinofungidzirwa nevakawanda. Aka ndekutanga mukati memakore maviri veruzhinji vachibvumidzwa kupinda mushowo iyi nehuwandu hwavo zvichitevera kurerutswa kwehurongwa kwekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. Kunze kwevarimi nemakambani emuno, pane makambani kubva kunyika nhanhatu dzinosanganisira Botswana, South Africa, Malawi neIndia ari kuratidzira pashowo iyi iyo inopera neMugovera. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Ndinofara kuti nhabvu yadzoka’
text: MUTAMBI wenhabvu wemaWarriors neNAPSA Stars yekuZambia, Dennis Dauda, anoti kugara asingatambe bhora kwange kuchirwadza asi ave kunzwa mufaro sezvo mitambo yekunyika iyi yave kutanga.   Kubva pakamiswa nhabvu pasi rose, kusanganisira kuZambia, senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19, Dauda ange angogara kunyika iyi.   Muchinda uyu akambobuda pachena kuti kugara pamba kwaimuremera achiti asuwa nhabvu uye mhuri yake iri kuZimbabwe.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza svondo rino ari kuZambia, Dauda anoti kudzoka kwenhabvu kunyika iyi, iyo inotarisirwa kutanga nemusi wa17 Gumiguru, kwaunza mufaro mukuru kwaari sezvo ange asuwa zvikuru mutambo uyu.   “Handidi kunyepa, nhabvu ndange ndaisuwa zvikuru, kuramba ndakangogara kwange kwave kurema. Isu sevatambi venhabvu tinoraramiswa nemutambo uyu saka kana tisingatambe manje hupenyu hwedu hunobva hwatiremera.   “Mitambo yeZambian League iri kutanga musi wa17 Gumiguru saka ndagadzirira kutanga kwayo,” anodaro Dauda.   Pachatanga mitambo yeZambian League yemwaka uno, Dauda anenge ave kutambira chikwata chitsva cheNapsa Stars icho chakamutenga kubva kuLusaka Dynamos.   Anoti ari kutarisira kutanga kutamba nhabvu kuchikwata chake chitsva ichi uye anoshuvira kuhwina mikombe yakawanda nacho.   “Ndave kutanga hupenyu hutsva kuNapsa Stars, shuviro yangu kuhwina mikombe yakawanda,” anodaro.   Dauda, uyo akambohwina mubairo weSoccer of the Year mugore ra2014 apo aitambira ZPC Kariba, anoti shuviro yake ndeye kuzotambira kuEurope mune remangwana.   Anoti acharamba achishanda nesimba kusvikira awana mukana uyu.   Apo paakaita Soccer Star of the Year, akamboenda kumbonozama mhanza yake kuchikwata cheGabala, kuAzerbaijan.   “Mutambi wese wenhabvu shungu dzake kuti rimwe remazuva azotambirawo kuEurope uye iniwo ndini mumwe wacho anozvishuvira. Kana zvikazoitikawo, ndinovimba mukana uchauya kwandiri ndoendawo kuEurope,” anodaro.

headline: Vanotengesa muMigwagwa Vanoti Havasi Kuzovhunduka Masoja
text: Mutungamiri werimwe sangano revanotengesa zvinhu mumigwagwa reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation kana kuti (VISET) VaSamuel Wadzai Mangoma vanoti havasi kuzovhunduka mashoko egurukota rezvematunhu VaJuly Moyo ekuti vakumbira mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika vari gurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika Retired General Constantino Chiwenga kuti mauto abatsirane nemapurisa mekanzuru kubvisa vanotengesa mumigwagwa. VaMoyo vakapa vanotengesa mumigwagwa ava mazuva maviri ekuti vange vabuda mumigwagwa. Asi VaWadzi Mangoma vanoti hurumende haina kana kumboyedza kugara navo pasi kuti vaone kuti dambudziko iri ringagadziriswe sei. Nyaya yekushandisa mauto yakamboitwawo panguva yeOperation Restore Legacy asi zvakakona n'anga murapwa achida. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti nyaya yehupfumi husina kumira zvakanaka iri kupa kuti vanhu vakawamda vagume vaenda kunotengesa zvinhu mumigwagwa. No media source currently available

headline: Vaimbove Varwiri veRusununguko Vokumbira Veruzhinji Ruregerero
text: Vamwe vevaimbove varwiri vehondo yerusununguko vakumbira ruregerero kuruzhinji rwavanhu vavakatyorera kodzero dzavo muzimbabwe, vachiti kubva nhasi zvichienda mberi, havasi kuzobvuma kushandiswa nevezvematongerwo enyika, sezvavakaitwa nebato reZanu PF. Mashoko aya abuda apo vaimbove varwiri vehondo ava vanga vachiparura boka idzva rinokurudzira runyararo munyika rinonzi War Veterans Peace Initiative Vachitaura nevatori venhau muHarare nhasi, vaimbove varwiri vehondo ava, avo vari pasi pesangano reZimbabwe National War Veterans Association, ZNLWVA, vanoti munyika hamuna runyararo izvo zvinotadzisa budiriro mukati menyika. Munyori mukuru muboka idzva reWar Veterans Peace Intiative, VaZvakanyorwa Wilbert Sadomba, vati zvinosuwisa kuti makore makumi matatu nemanomwe nyika yawana kuzvitonga, muZimbabwe machine mweya wehondo nemhirizhonga, uye vamwe vavo vachiri kushandiswa kuita zvemhirizhonga. VaSadomba vati izvi ndozvapa kuti vapinde muhurongwa hwekuvaka hwaro hwerusununguko VaSadomba, avo vari muchikwata chinotsigira VaChris Mutsvangwa, sachigaro weZNLWVA, vati apo nyika yakatarisana nesarudzo dza2018, zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvofanirwa kubatana mukurwisa mhirizhonga kuitira kuti munyika muitwe sarudzo dzakachena uye murunyararo. VaSadomba vatiwo zvinosuwisa kuti munyika machine vanhu vasingadi runyararo, vane zvavanowana nemhirizhonga Vachipa muenzaniso waSaul wemubhaibheri, sachigaro weboka rerunyararo iri, VaWilfred Marimo, vati sevarwi verusununguko vanokumbira kuregererwa neruzhinji pane zvavanopomerwa uye zvakaitwa nevamwe vavo vaimbunyikidza veruzhinji. VaMarimo vati vanotarisira kushanda nemasangano akasiyana siyana mukuparidza shoko rerusununguko. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika, VaTinashe Muzamhindo, vanoti zviri kuirwa nevaimbove varwiri verusununguko zvinoratidza kuti vava kuonawo zvavaitadza uye danho ravatora rekukumbira ruregerero rinoita kuti vabatane nevamwe mukurwira kodzero dzemunhu wese. Sangano reZimbabwe National War Veterans Association rine zvikwata zviri kurwira masimba, chimwe chikwata chichitungamirwa naVaPatrick Nyaruwata, chimwe naVaMutsvangwa. Makatanwa aya panyaya yehutungamiri ari mumatare edzimhosva, kunyange hazvo paine mutongo wekuti chikwata chaVaMutsvangwa ndicho chinocherechedzwa nemutemo. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inoramba Mashoko eKuti iri Kuparura Mari Itsva yeNyika Svondo Rino
text: Hurumende pamwe nagavhuna vebhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Doctor John Mangudya, varamba mashoko ekuti nyika iri kuparura mari yayo svondo rino. Zvichitevera mashoko aburitswa padande mutande reTwitter nevakambove gurukota rezvemari muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, VaTendai Biti, ekuti svondo rino hurumende iri kuparura mari yenyika itsva, Doctor Mangudya vanoti vanhu havafanirwe kuteerera mashoko enhema akadai, ayo vanoti anokanganisa zvinhu mune zveupfumi. Doctor Mangudya vanoti Zimbabwe haina hurongwa hwakadaro munguva pfupi inotevera. Ukuwo, bazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko raburitsawo mashoko ekuramba nezvehurongwa uhwu, richiti hurumende iri kushushikana zvikuru nemanyepo ari kutenderedzwa nemamwe mapoka ezvematongerwo enyika ekuti nyika iri kuparura mari yayo svondo rinouya. Aka hakasi kekutanga kuti hurumende inzi iri kuda kuparura mari itsva. Masvondo mashoma adarika mashoko aya akamboduawo zvakare, zvikuru mumadandemutande. Asi mwedzi wapera gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vakazivisa kuti nyika isunge dzisimbe sezvo paine hurongwa hwekuparura mari itsva yenyika mukupera kwegore rino. No media source currently available

headline: Zvipingaidzo Zvobuda muChirongwa cheNhomba yeCovid-19
text:
Bazi rezvehutano rinoti harikwanise kuongorora vanhu vose vari kuda
kubayiwa nhomba vasati vabayiwa nhomba iyi sezvinokurudzirwa nevakagadzira nhomba yeSinopharm. Vachitaura nevatori venhau nezuro mukuru webazi rezvehutano mudunhu
reMashonaland West, Dr Gift Masoja, vakati hurumende haikwanise kuongorora sezvo vasina zvikwanisiro zvinokwanira munhu wese ari kuda kubayiwa nhomba. Dr Masoja vakati chimwe chikonzero ndechekuti nguva yekubayiwa nhomba inozowandisa zvakanyanya sezvo zvichitora maawa maviri kana kudarika munhu akamirira zvichabuda muongororo inenge yaitwa iyi.

Dr Masoja vakati munhu akamborwara nechirwere cheCovid-19 anogona
kubayiwa nhomba sezvo paine mukana wekuti anogona kurwara nechirwere ichi zvakare.

Nyanzvi yezvehutano uye vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende
yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vanoti hurumende yakatadza kare kuti iwongorore vanhu nekudaro vakada kuzviita chirongwa chekubaya nhomba chinodzokera kumashure.

Dr Madzorera vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kukurudzira vanhu vari kuda
kubayiwa nhomba kuti vataure chokwadi kuti vane hutano hwakasimba
here,kana kuti kwete.

Dunhu reMashonaland West iro rakapihwa majekiseni enhomba anosvika
zviuru gumi rechimwe chete, rabaya vanhu chiuru chimwe chete nezana
nemakumi masere nevasere, kana kuti 1188 mumazuva
mashanu kusvika nezuro. Munyika yose, vanhu zviuru gumi nezviviri nemazana mashanu nemakumi manomwe nevapfumbamwe, 12579, vakange vabayiwa nhomba iyi mukupera kwezuva ranezuro. Chirwere ichi chakauraya vanhu vashanu nezuro, izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa munyika yose pachiuru nemazana mana nemakumi matanhatu nevatatu, 1463. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika vava zviuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu nemakumi mana nevana, 36044, zvichitevera kubatwa kwevanhu makumi mashanu nechirwere ichi nezuro. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa Anorova Nhengo yeMDC Zvakaipisisa kwaRusape
text: Mukuru wemapurisa munharaunda yeRusape ari kupomerwa mhosva yekuzvindikita imwe nhengo yeMDC yanga yaenda kukamba yemapurisa kunobvunza nezvehurongwa hweMDC hwekuratidzira kusafara nehutongi hwemutungamiri wenyika, Va Robert Mugabe, kuri kuda kuitwa nebato iri mangwana ma Rusape makare. Mutauriri we MDCT mudunhu reManicaland, Va Trevor Saruwaka, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanowona nezvekurongwa kwemisangano ku Makoni Central mubato ravo, Va Tazviona Marima, vakarohwa zvakaipisisa nemukuru wemapurisa wemaRusape neChitatu achibatsirana nemamwe mapurisa asina kudomwa mazita awo. No media source currently available Va Saruwaka vanoti Va Marima vakarohwa ndokuchengetedzwa nemapurisa mushure mekunge vaenda kunonzwa mhinduro yemapurisa pamusoro pehurongwa hwebato ravo hwekuratidzira kwavari kuda kuita mangwana. Va Valentine Ziswa, vanove munyori anowona nezvekurima mukomiti yepamusoro ye MDC national executive, vaudza Studio7 parunhare vari kwa Rusape kuti nhengo dzebato ravo dzanga dzaenda kunowona Va Marima pamwe nekuvaunzira chikafu dzarambidzwa kupinda mukamba nemapurisa anga akapakatira zvombo. Va Saruwaka, avo vanove zvakare mumiriri weMutasa Central muparamende, vati Va Marima vave kutarisirwa kumiswa pamberi pedare neChishanu kunyange hazvo zvisati zvanyotsozivikanwa kuti vari kupomerwa mhosva ipi. Vaenderera mberi vachiti bato ravo richaenderera mberi nekuratidzira kwavakaronga uku zvisinei nekuti mapurisa anoti kudii. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemukuru wemapurisa ma Rusape, vanzi vanonzi Dispol Gwangwava kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi sezvo mapurisa ose anga achidaira nhare pakamba yeRusape anga achiti havasi muhofisi mavo. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Amai Charity Charamba, vati havakwanise kutaura nezvenyaya iyi sezvo vasati vanzwa kubva kune vamwe vavo vavanoshanda navo vari mudunhu reManicaland. Zvichakadai, Va Saruwaka vanoti kuratidzira kwavari kuda kuita kwakanangana nekuti VaMugabe vabve pachigaro vachiti hurumende yavo yatadza kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyika. Asi Va Mugabe pachezvavo vakaudza nyika yose pavaitaura mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika muna Nyamavhuvhu, kana kuti State of the Nation Address, kuti vane chivimbo chekuti hupfumi hwenyika huchasimukira zvakakomba munguva pfupi iri kutevera.

headline: Vakawanda Vanoti Mari Iri Kuda Kupihwa Bazi reHutano Ishoma
text: Mari iri kuda kupihwa bazi rezveutano nekurerwa zvakanaka kwevana pabhajeti regore ra2018, yatambirwa zvakasiya-siyana munyika. Asi vanhu vazhinji vari kunyunyuta kuti ishoma. Bazi iri riri kuda kupiwa mamiriyoni mazana mana nemasere emadhora kubva pamabhiriyoni mashanu nemamiriyoni zana emari yebhajeti. Kunyangwe hazvo mari iyi yawedzera kubva pamamiriyoni mazana maviri nemakumi masere akapihwa bazi iri gore rino, sangano reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights rinoti mari iyi ishoma zvikuru kana pakatariswa zvinodiwa mubazi iri. Munyori musangano reZADHR, Doctor Evans Masitara, vati mari yaiswa kubazi rezveutano ishoma zvikuru. "Mari yapihwa bazi iri iri pasi pezvikamu gumi nezvishanu kubva muzana zvebhajeti renyika yose sezvakabvumiranwa kuAbuja," vadaro Dr Masitara. Vanokokera nhengo dzeMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai muparamende, huye vari mumiririri weMutare Central, VaInnocent Gonese, vatiwo vange vaine tarisiro yekuti hurumende izadzise zvibvumirano zvayakasaina. "Isusu tanga takatarisira kuti hurumende icharemekefza chibvumirano chakaitwa kuAbuja mubhajeti regore rinouya iri'" VaGonese vaudza Studio7. Vachitaura bhajeti risati raitwa, gurukota mubazi rezveutano nekurerwa zvakanaka kwevana, Doctor David Parirenyatwa, vakaudza Studio7 kuti vanoda mari inosvika biriyoni imwechete nemamiriyoni zana emadhora kuitira kuti vafambise mabasa ezveutano zvakanaka. Asi sachigaro wedare remadzishe, Mambo Fortune Charumbira, vati vanogutsikana nemari yapiwa kubazi rezvehutano. VaCharumbira vati mamwe mapazi mana apiwa mari yakawanda kudarika yehutano akakosha kuti vanhu vave nehutano hwakanaka. Bazi rehutano rakatarisana nematambudziko akasiyana siyana anosanganisira vashandi vashoma, kuparara kwezvipatara, kushaikwa kwemishonga nemichina yechimanje manje inoongorora zvirwere huye mari zhinji inoshandiswa mubazi iri inobva kumasangano akazvimiririra. No media source currently available

headline: GMAZ Yoronga Kuwedzera Mutengo hweHupfu
text: Sangano reGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe rinoti riri chiri rakangomirira kunzwa kubva kuhurumende kuti mutengo wehupfu hwowedzerwa kusvika papi. Izvi zvinotevera kuwedzerwa kwemutengo wetani rechibage kubva pazviuru zvina zvemadhora kusvika pazviuru makumi matanhatu nezana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemakumi mashanu nemasere. Mwedzi wapera, hupfu hwakawedzerwa kubva pamadhora makumi mashanu kusvika pamadhora manomwe. Gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko Amai Monica Mutsvangwa vakti mutengo wechibage wainge wawedzerwa kubatsira varimi. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube kana gurukota rezvemaIndustry Doctor Sekai Nzenza kuti tinzwe divi ravo. Asi mutauriri weGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe VaGarikai Chaunza. No media source currently available

headline: Vatambi veZim kuEurope
text: MUMASVONDO anotevera, nhabvu yekuEurope – iyo inoteverwa zvikuru muno – ichange yave kutanga uye vatambi vemaWarriors vari kutarisirwa kutambira zvikwata zvavo zvakasiyana.   Iye zvino vatambi vakaita saMarvelous Nakamba weAston Villa, Tino Kadewere weLyon yekuFrance naMarshall Munetsi weStade de Reims yekuFrance vange vachitamba mitambo yegadziriro kuzvikwata zvavo apo vakatarisana nekutanga kwemwaka mutsva wenhabvu.   Mwaka wekuEngland nekuFrance zvose zvichatanga musi wa5 Nyamavhuvhu.   Chikwata chaKadewere ndicho chichavhurira mwaka mutsva wekuLigue 1 apo chichasangana necheAjaccio musi wa5 Nyamavhuvhu.   Kuchiti zuva rinotevera, chikwata chaNakamba chekuEnglish Premier League chichazotamba apo chichasangana nechaJordan Zemura cheAFC Bournemouth.   Svondo rino, Kwayedza yakaita ongororo yevatambi vemaWarriors vanotambira kuEurope pamusoro pekuti gadziriro dzavo dziri kufamba sei panguva ino yepre-season.    Marvelous Nakamba   Nakamba: Mutambi weAston Villa uyu angokwanisa kutamba mutambo mumwe chete wegadziriro dzemwaka mutsva wechikwata chake kubva pamitambo mina yachatamba chiri kuAustralia uko chiri kuita gadziriro dzacho. Akatamba mutambo wechikwata chake neLeeds uyo vakahwina 1-0.   Mumutambo uyu, Nakamba akatanga akagara pabhenji ndokuzopinda muchikamu chechipiri vachibva pahalftime.   Mimwe mitambo yakazotevera, weBrisbane Roar neManchester United, kana pabhenji chaipo aive asipo uye murairidzi wake Steven Gerrard haana kutaura kuti sei asina kumutambisa.   Svondo rino, chikwata chake chichasangana neRennes mumutambo wekupedzisira wegadziriro mwaka wePremier League usati watanga.    Tino Kadewere   Kadewere: Mutambi weLyon uyu mwaka wadarika haana kunyatsotamba sezvaakaita paakatengwa nechikwata ichi paakanwisa ka10 kubva mumitambo 33 yaainge atamba. Mwaka wadarika, akangonwisa kamwe chete kubva mumitambo 15.   Pari zvino chikwata chake chatamba mitambo mishanu yehushamwari uye Kadewere atamba katatu apo vakasangana neBourge en Bresse (France) iyo vakakunda 4-2 uye akazotamba mutambo weAnderlecht (Belgum) apo vakakundwa 3-0.   Akazotamba zvakare mutambo wechikwata chake apo chakazvamburwa 5-0 neWillem II Tilburg (Netherlands).   Lyon iri kutarisirwa kutamba mutambo wekupedzisira wehushamwari apo ichasangana neInter Milan musi weMugovera.   Zvakadaro, Kadewere anonzi ari kudiwa nezvikwata zvakasiyana kusanganisira cheReal Valladolid chekuSpain.    Marshall Munetsi   Marshall Munetsi: Mutambi weStade de Reims uyu mwaka uno watatarisana nawo anonzi ange achidiwa neBrighton & Hove yekuEngland.   Pari zvino atamba mutambo mumwe chete hwehushamwari wechikwata chake asi ndokutadza kutamba yaitevera sezvo ainge akuvara.   Ange achitarisira kudzoka svondo rino kuzosimudzira gadziriro dzake apo chikwata chake chakatarisana nemwaka mutsva wemuLigue 1.    Tendayi Darikwa   Darikwa: Tendayi Darikwa ndiye kaputeni weWigan Athletic uye mugadziriro dzavo ange achitamba zvikuru izvo zvinorakidza kuti ari muhurongwa hwechikwata chake mwaka uno. Chikwata chake chichatambira muligi reEnglish Championship chichirwira kuti chigopinda muEnglish Premier League.   Mitambo yeChampionship iri kutanga svondo rino musi weChishanu apo pachaona Huddersfield ichisangana neBurnely.   Chikwata chaDarikwa mutambo wacho wemwaka mutsva chichisangana nePreston North End musi weMugovera.   Pamitambo yehushamwari mishanu yakatambwa neWigan, Darikwa akatamba yese apo chikwata chake chakasangana necheOldham Athletic chikwahwina 3-1, chichakunda Liverpool XI 6-0, chikaita mangange 0-0 neAccrington Stanley uye ndokuzokunda zvekare Bamber Bridge neSheffield Wednesday 5-1 ne4-1.    Jordan Zemura   Jordan Zemura (AFC Bournemouth): Zvakawanda zviri kutarisirwa kubva kuna Zemura uyo mwaka uno chikwata chake chichange chichitambira muEnglish Premier League.   Mwaka wadarika, Zemura aipisa zvikuru muChampionship izvo zvakamuona achitamba ka33 ndokunwisa katatu apo chikwata chake chakahwina tikiti rekupinda muEnglish Premier League.   Mumitambo mitatu yehushamwari yatambwa nechikwata chake, Zemura akatamba yese izvo zvakaona vachikunda Sheffield Wednesday 2-1, ndokukundwa 2-1 neSporting Braga yekuPortudal uye vakazokundwa zvekare 1-0 neBristol City yekuEngland.   Bournemouth iri kutamba mutambo wayo wekupedzisira hwehushamwari svondo rino musi weMugovera apo ichasangana neReal Sociedad yekuSpain.   Zvakadaro, vamwe vatambi vakaita saAdmiral Muskwe weLuton Town, Macauley Bonne weQueens Park Rangers naBrendon Galloway wePlymouth vose vari pakati pekuita gadziriro nezvikwata zvavo.   Kuchiti David Philani Moyo, uyo aitambira Hamilton Academical yekuScotland, haasati ave kuzivikanwa kuti nhabvu yake achange achiitambira kupi mwaka uno zvichitevera kubva kwaakaita kuchikwata ichi apo kondirakiti yake yakapera.

headline: Dare Rotarisirwa Kutura Mutongo Waro Chero Nguva paChikumbiro chaVaMaengahama neVamwe Vavo
text: Dare reSupreme Court rati richazotura mutongo waro panguva yarisina kutara pachikumbiro chasvitswa kudare iri nenhengo dzeMDC dzakabatwa nemhosva yekuponda mupurisa mumusha weGlen View muna 2011. Vachisvitsa chikumbiro kudare iri chekuti mutongo wakapihwa VaTungamirai Madzokere, VaLast Maengehama, VaPhineas Nhatarikwa pamwe naMuzvare Yvonne Musarurwa, wekuti vapike makore makumi maviri vari mujeri, gweta revasungwa ava, Amai Beatrice Mtetwa, vati dare repamusoro rakakanganisa parakavawana vaine mhosva. Amai Mtetwa vati kunyange hazvo Muzvare Musarurwa vakaburitswa mujeri mushure mekunzwirwa tsitsi nemutungamiri wenyika zvakange zvisingakodzere kuti vabatwe nemhosva kubva pekutanga sezvo vati mapurisa akapa hufakazi pakutongwa kwenyaya iyi mudare repamusoro akapa humbowo hwakasiyana. Amai Mtetwa vati hufakazi hwemapurisa aya hwakasiyana nezviri mumutongo waVaChinembiri Bhunu avo vakatura kuti hufakazi hwese hwakapihwa nemapurisa hwakanga hwakafanana zvairatidza kuti vasungwa ava ndivo vakakonzera kufa kwemupurisa, VaPetros Mutedza, pane rimwe bhawa riri mumusha weGlen View muno muHarare muna 2011. Amai Mtetwa vati dare repamusoro harina humbowo hwarakapihwa nevafakazi hunoratidza kuti chii chaizvo chakaitwa nemumwe nemumwe pavasungwa ava chinoratidza kuti ndivo vakauraya VaMutedza. Vati panzvimbo yemabhizimusi apa pakange paine vanhu vakawanda vaizvifambirawo saka nokudaro zvinoshamisa kuti hapana kana munhuwo zvake akauya kudare kuzopa hufakazi hwekuti akaonawo kana munhu mumwechete zvake pavasungwa ava achiita mhirizhonga ingave yakakonzera kufa kwaVaMutedza kunyange hazvo mapurisa akambenge audza dare kuti vasungwa ava pavaikumbira mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso kuti pane veruzhinji vakawanda vaifanira kuzopa hufakazi hwekuroverera vasungwa. Zvataurwa naAmai Mtetwa mudare zvatsinhirwa naVaCharles Kwaramba vanove rimwe remagweta evasungwa ava. Asi gweta rehurumende panyaya iyi, VaFungai Nyahunzvi, vaudza dare kuti hapana chakakanganiswa nemutongi wedare vachiti mutongi akashandisa mutemo sezvauri uye humbowo hwakasvitswa mudare pakutongwa kwenyaya iyi, hunoratidza kuti vasungwa ava ndivo vakakonzeresa kufa kwaVaMutedza. VaNyahunzvi vati VaNhatarikwa kunyange hazvo vainge vasipo pakarohwa VaMutedza vakafa, kutakura kwavakaita vamwe vevasungwa vakange votiza panzvimbo yakaparirwa mhosva kunoburitsa kuti vaive nerimwe nevasungwa vakabatwa nemhosva ava. VaNyahunzvi varamba kutaura neStudio7 vachiti havabvumirwe nemutemo webasa ravo kutaura nevatori venhau. Vatongi vedare reSupreme Court vatatu vanga vachiti Amai Elizabeth Gwaunza, Amai Susan Mavhangira pamwe naAmai Rita Makarau vati vachazotura mutongo wavo pazuva ravasina kutara. Zvichakadai, Muzvare Musarurwa, avo vauya kuzonzwa nyaya iyi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mwoyo wavo unorwadza pose pavanoenda kunoona vavakange vakasungwa navo kujeri. Munyori mukuru muMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaCharlton Hwende, vaudzawo Studio7 padare apa kuti sebato vari kushushikana zvikuru kuti nhengo dzebato dziri kushungurudzirwa mhosva yavanoti hadzina kutara. VaMaengehama nevamwe vavo vakatongerwa kuti vagare mujeri kwemakore makumi maviri mushure mekubatwa nemhosva yekuponda VaMutedza. Vasungwa ava vakanga vari makumi maviri nevasere asi vamwe vavo vakawanikwa vasina mhosva. Pakutongwa kwenyaya iyi, vasungwa ava vakati vaishungurudzwa zvine chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika vachiti havanei nekufa kwakaita VaMutedza. Padare panga paine hutungamiri hweMDC hwanga huchisanganisira mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri webato iri, Amai Lynette Karenyi Kore, mutevedzeri wemunyori anoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaDouglas Mwonzora, munyori anoona nezvemitemo mubato iri, VaInnocent Gonese, nevamwe. No media source currently available

headline: Nhomba yeKutanga yeCovid-19 Yotarisirwa muNyika neMuvhuro Kubva kuChina
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika uye vari gurukota rezvehutano VaConstantino Chiwenga ndivo vachagashira nhomba yeCovid 19 yakapihwa Zimbabwe neChina panhandare yendege yeR.G. Mugabe International Aiport muHarare nemusi weSvondo. Nhomba iyi, inosvika zviuru mazana maviri, inonzi Sinopharm iri kutarisirwa kusvika muZimbabwe nenguva dza 3 mangwanani. Kunyangwe dzimwe nyanzvi dziri kuti China haisi kunyatsobuda pachena nezvenhomba iyi, nyika dzakaita seTurkey, Indonesia neBrazil dziri kuishandisa dzinoti iri kushanda nezvikamu makumi mashanu kusvika pamakumi mapfumbamwe nerimwe kubva muzana kana kuti 50% to 91%. Hurumende inotiwo veMedicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe vachaongororawo kuti mushonga uyu unoshanda here usati wabayiwa vanhu. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Brighton Chireka vakurudzira vanhu kuti vatambira nhomba iyi kuti chirwere chisarambe chichipararira zvakanyanya. Tichiri panyaya iyi, huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa nekubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 huri kuramba huchiderera uye bazi rezvehutano rinoti nemusi weSvondo kwakafa vanhu vaviri nechirwere ichi. Izvi zvinorevea kuti vanhu vafa kubva chirwere ichi zvachakatanga kupararira vave vave chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mamana kana kuti 1, 400. NeSvondo vanhu makumi matanhatu nevasere kana kuti 68 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru makumi matatu nemashanu anezana nemakumi manomwe nevaviri kana kuti 35, 172. Vanhu mazana mashanu negumi nevaviri kana kuti 512 vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi nezuro zvasiya vanhu vapora vave zviuru makumi matatu nemazana matanhatu nemumwe kana kuti 30, 601. Vanhu vachiri kurwara zviuru zvitatu nezana nemakumi manomwe nemumwe kana kuti 3, 171. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 3,7 million vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zviuru makumi mapfumbamwe nemanomwe nemazana masere nemakumi manomwe kana kuti 97, 870. Vapora muAfrica vadarika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana maviri kana kuti 3,2 million. South Africa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Dunhu reSADC ndirozve rine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi vadarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 1,7 million. North Africa ine vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi vadarika miriyoni imwe chete. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika zana remamiriyoni nemasere kana kuti 108 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vanodarika zviuru mazana mana nemakumi masere nevatatu zvine mazana matanhatu kana kuti 483, 600 vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemanomwe ane zviuru zvishanu kana kuti 27, 5 million. Pasi rose, vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 2,3 million. Asi vapora pasi rose vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu nezviuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 60, 7 million. No media source currently available

headline: VaChari Vanoti Vatumira Vana Chiremba Kunobatsira Vakakuvadzwa neCyclone Idai
text: Mumwe wevanhu vakatanga hurongwa hwekutsvaga mari yekubatsira mudambudziko reCyclone Idai, VaFreeman Chari, vanoti mari yavakwanisa kuunganidza pari zvino yave kudarika zviuru makumi masere nezvina zvemadhora. VaChari vanoti vakatanga hurongwa hwe GoFundMe vaine chinangwa chekuunganidza zviuru zana zvemadhora. VaChari, avo vanogara muAmerica, vanoti vari kushanda nemasangano akazvimirira, pamwe nevanhu vemumatunhu akatarisana nedutumupengo iri. VaChari vanotiwo pane vana chiremba makumi maviri vaendeswa kumatunhu aya kuitira kuti vanobatsira vanhu vanoda rubatsiro zvichitevera kukuvara kwavakaita mutsaona yemvuramupengo. "Tiri kushanda nevanhu vari mumatunhu akabatwa nedambudziko iri. Chishuwo chedu ndechekuti vanhu vawane rubatsiro nechimbi chimbi pasina zvekumbomirira kuwana mvumo kumamwe mahofisi. Pari zvino tinofara nevatiri kushanda navo nekuti zvese zvatiri kuita zviri kuitwa pajekerere," VaChari vaudza Studio7. VaChari vanoti rutsigiro rwavari kuwana kubva kunezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri pasi rose rwunodadisa nekuti dambudziko iri neremunhu wese. Vanoti vakatanga chirongwa ichi mazuva apfuura uye vanoshuwira kuti vanhu varambe vachibatsira nepavanokwanisa sezvo dambudziko iri richiri rakakomba. VaChari vanoti kune dzimwe dzvimbo rubatsiro harusati rwasvika sezvo kusiri kufambika asi varikushanda nemasangano akawanikwa vachiwunza zvikopokoko munzvimbo iyi kuti vatakurewo chikafu nemishonga zvichieswa kune avo vakatarisana nedambudziko iri. No media source currently available

headline: NPRC Yonzwa Humbowo paNyaya yeGukurahundi Kutanga kweMwedzi Uno
text: Komisheni inoona nezverunyararo nekuregererana, yeNational Peace and Renciliation, nhasi yazivisa kuti ichatanga kunzwa humbowo kubva kune veruzhinji pamusoro peGukurahundi pakati pemwedzi uno kana ichinge yapedza kutsanangurira veruzhinji gwara rairi kutora mukuita basa rayo kana kuti maOuthreach Programs ayo iri kuitwa mumatunhu ese munyika. Vachitaura pamusangano waitwa nekomisheni iyi muHarare, imwe nhengo yekomisheni iyi, Amai Netty Musanhu vati kana chirongwa chavari kuita parizvino munyika yese chapera, vachatanga kunzwa humbowo kubva kune veruzhinji munzvimbo dzakaitika Gukurahundi. Vati komisheni yavo iri kutora danho iri nekuti veruzhinji vakaratidza kuti vachivimba nekutenda basa rekomisheni iyi kana ikange yagadzirisa nyaya yeGukurahundi. Asi mumwe apinda mumusangano uyu asina kuda kudomwa nezita, aratidza kusafara nenyaya yekuti pane vamwe vakaurayiwa paGukurahundi vave kutofukunurwa komisheni isina kuzivisa veruzhinji. Asi makomishina eNPRC ati komisheni yavo haisati yatanga kuita zvekufukunura makuva evakafa. Ati svondo rapfuura komisheni yakakokwa neimwe mhuri kuTsholotsho kuti ipe huchapupu apo imwe mhuri yaichera makuva ehama dzavo dzakapondwa panuva yeGukurahundi. Zvinofungidzirwa kuti pane vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi maviri vakaurawa panguva yegukurahundi kumatunhu eMatabeleland neMidlands.
