Amai Emerenzia Chitsaka vaudzawo komisheni iyi kuti mabhizimisi avo anoparadzwa panguva yemhirizhonga uye inyaya yavanoda kuti komisheni yavo igadzirise. Komishina Musanhu vati kunyange hazvo komisheni yavo iri kutanga kunzwa humbowo panyaya yeGukurahundi, pane nyaya dzakawanda dzakabuda mumatunhu akasiyana siyana dzichaongororwa nekomisheni yavo. Vati nyaya yeGukurahundi yakabuda zvakanyanya kumatunhu eMidlands, Bulawayo, Matabeleland North neSouth uye kumatunhu eMashonaland East, Central neWest nyaya dziri kunetsa vanhu inyaya dzemhirizhonga panguva yesarudzo kozoti kuManicaland vanhu veko havasi kufara nemafambisirwe akaitwa nyaya dzemangoda ukuwo kuMasvingo vagari vachiti havasi kufara nenyaya yekuti vakabviswa munzvimbo dzavaigara kuti pavakwe madhamu akaita seTokwe Mukosi kana mamwe mabasa ebudiriro asi vasingapihwe muripo sezviri mubumbiro remutemo. Komisheni iyi yati ichaongorora nyaya idzi dzose nekutora matanho ese anodiwa akaita sekuti vakapara mhosva varipe kana kusungwa uye vati vachashanda neveruzhinji oanguva dzose. Komishina Geoffrey Chada vati vanhu vakasununguka kupa humbowo kutokomisheni yavo uye pasi pemutemo imhosva kurambidzidza kana kutyisidzira munhu anenge apa humbowo komisheni yavo. Vati nekuda kwaizvozvo vese vachapa humbowo kukomisheni iyi vachange vakachengetedzwa nemutemo. No media source currently available

headline: Voruzhinji Vopiwa Mukana weKupa Pfungwa Dzavo paBhiri reRBZ Amendment Act
text: Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, nhasi vamisa hurongwa hwavo hwekuda kupasisa muparamende bhiri reReserve Bank Ammendment Act iro rinogadzirisa kushandiswa kwemari yemaBond Notes nechimbichimbi uye vati vatora danho iri mushure mehurukuro dzavaita nevakuru veparamende pamwe nevebato rinopikisa reMDC. NeChitatu VaChinamasa vainge vakumbira paramende kuti zvinhano zvese zvinodiwa kuti bhiri ripasiswe zviitwe musi mumwechete asi nhasi vati vabvisa chikumbiro ichi pamberi pedare reNational Assembly. VaChinamasa vaita izvi mushure menhaurirano dzavaita nemutauriri weNational Assembly, VaJacob Mudenda, avo vabva vazivisa kuti komiti yeparamende inoona nezvemari nebhajeti ichatenderera nyika yese svondo rinouya ichinzwa pfungwa dzevanhu pamusoro pebhiri iri, iro rakanangana nekushandiswa kwemari yemaBond Notes. Mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiriri weMDC T zvakare vari mumiriri weKuwadzana East mudare reNational Assembly, VaNelson Chamisa, vanoti vano bvumirana nedanho ratorwa naVaChinamasa rekupa veruzhinji mukana wekupa pfungwa dzavo pamusoro pebhiri iri. Vanoti hazvina kunaka kuti hurumende ityore bumbiro remutemo apo ine mutemo wainenge ichida kugadzira vachiti bumbiro rinosungira paramende kuti ipe vanhu mukana apo inenge ichiumba mutemo. Vati kunyange hazvo vachiziva kuti hurumende haiteerere kana kutambirwa pfungwa dzeveruzhinji, zvakakosha kuti vanhu vataure zvavanoda. Kunyange hazvo veRBZ vange vari kushambadza zvemaBond Notes, VaChamisa vati nhengo dzeparamende ndidzo dzine mvumo yekubvunzurudza vanhu vadzinomirira. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaMalvin Mukudu vanoti nyaya yekunzwa pfungwa dzeveruzhinji yakanaka chose kunyage hazvo pfungwa dzacho dzisingazotevedzwi. Mukuru weMedia Centre, VaEnerst Mudzengi vanoti danho ratorwa neparamende rakanaka chose uye ndizvo zvinofanira kuitwa pese panoumbwa mutemo. Kunyange hazvo mutungamiriri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakashandisa simba ravo pasi pemutemo we Presidential Powers (Temporary Measures) Act kuti maBond Notes ashandiswe zviri pamutemo, mutemo weRBZ Act unofanirwa kuvandudzwa kuti uenderane neizvi. Nyanzvi dzemutemo musangano reVeritas dzinoti kana RBZ Amendment Act ikapasiswa inotanga kushanda musi wakagazetwa mutemo wemaBond Notes nemutungamiriri wenyika, musi wa31 Gumiguru gore rino. Mutemo wePresidential Powers uri kupikiswa nevanhu nemasangano anoti unopikisana nebumbiro remutemo wenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Mari Inonzi neCCZ Inodiwa neMhuri paMwedzi Inonzi Inotambirwa neVashandi Vashoma Kwazvo
text: Sangano reConsumer Council of Zimbabwe rinoti kusvika musi wa 09 Chikumi, unove mwedzi uno, mhuri ine vanhu vatanhatu yaida madhora emunyika zviuru makumi mana nemazana matanhatu ane makumi masere nemaviri, kana kuti RTGS$40 682.84, kuti ikwanise kurarama. Asi mutungamiri werimwe sangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti mari iyoyo iri kutaurwa neConsumer Council of Zimbabwe yatove pasi kwazvo pachitariswa kukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu. VaMutasa vanoti iyo mari yacho yaidiwa nemhuri kuti irarame hakuna mushandi ari kuitambira sezvo vashandi vari kupiwa mihoro iri pasi kwazvo isina chaichatenga. Izvi zvatsinhirwawo nemunyori mukuru werimwe sangano revashandi, reZimbabwe Federation of Trade Unions, ZFTU, VaKennias Shamuyarira, avo vanoti mhuri ine vanhu vatanhatu yave kutoda mari inoita madhora zviuru zvishanu pamwedzi kuti ikwanise kurara nekuda kwekukwira kuri kuita mitengo yezviinhu. Mukuru werimwe sangano rinomirira vanorarama nekutengesa, reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation, VaSamuel Wadzayi, vanotiwo dambudziko rekushaya mari inokwanira mhuri ratonyanya munyika nekuda kwekuti vazhinji vave kuzvishandira. Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti mari yakataurwa neConsumer Council of Zimbabwe inoratidza kuti mutengo wekurarama muZimbabwe uri kuramba uchikwira, zvikuru mushure mekudzikwa kwemutemo weStatutory Instrument 127. Doctor Chitambara vanotiwo mihoro iri kutambirwa nevashandi vakawanda mumapoka mazhinji iri kure kwazvo pachitariswa mari inonzi inodiwa nemhuri yevanhu vatanhatu iyi. Vanoti semuenzaniso, vashandi vemuboka rezvekurima vari kutambira madhora zviuru zvitatu nemazana matanhatu ane makumi mapfumbamwe nematanhatu kana kuti RTGS$3 696.00 pamwedzi, kuchitiwo vari muboka remachira vachitambira madhora zviuru gumi nezitatu pamwedzi, (RTGS$13 000.00), vari mukuvaka vachinziwo vari kutambira madhora zviuru zvisere, kana kuti RTGS$8 000.00. Doctor Chitambara vanoti mari iyi ishoma zvikuru pane inonzi neConsumer Council of Zimbabwe inodiwa kuti mhuri ine vanhu vatanhatu vararame iyi. Saka dambudziko iri ringagadziriswa sei? VaShamuyarira vanoti chasara chinofanirwa kuitwa nevana veZimbabwe kubatana kwevashandi pamwe nevarimi voenda kuhurumende, kwete nnechinangwa chekuibvisa pachigaro, asi kuti vagare pasi vataurirane vese voisa misoro pamwechete. Studio7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezvevashandi nemabasa, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, kuti tinzwewo kuti vanoti kudii namararamiro anonzi ari kuita vashandi aya sezvo vanga vasiiri kudaira nharembozha yavo, uye vanga vasati vapindura mubvunzo wedu pataenda pamhepo. Nhaurirano dzemihoro pakati pevashandi nevashandirwi kusanganisirawo vashandi vehurumende, dzinonziwo nevashandi hadzisi kuburitsa chimuko sezvo dzisina kwadziri kuenda. Nekuda kwaizvozvo, nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti vashandi vacharamba vachinoga svosve nemuromo. No media source currently available

headline: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe Choshura Mare neKurima Bindu muSouth Africa
text: Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri muSouth Africa chiri kushura mare nekurima miriwo yendudzi dzakasiyanasiyana, izvo zvave kuchipa raramo yachakanga chisingatarisire muhupenyu hwacho mushure mekumboomerwa nezvinhu munyika iyi. VaLeonie Kuchakanya, avo vane makore makumi matatu ekuberekwa, vanoti vakafunga kutamba nevhu mushure mekunge vaona kuti zviroto zvemafuro manyoro vari muSouth Africa zvakanga zvisiri kubereka michero. VaKuchakanya, avo vanobva kuMasvingo asi vakakurira mumusha weOld Highfield muHarare, vanoti pavakapinda munyika iyi vaive netarisiro yepamusoro sevakawanda vanobva kuZimbabwe, asi izvi handizvo zvakaitika, izvo zvakazoita kuti vashande mabasa akawanda asi hazvina kugadzirisa matambudziko avo. Vaona kuti zvinhu zviri kuramba kubatana, vanoti vakazofunga kuedza mamwe mabhindauko izvo zvakazoita kuti muna 2016 vatsvage nzvimbo yekurima muPretoria, uko vakawana gombo ravakatotanga kugobora voga. Mushure memakore mashanu, VaKuchakanya vanoti vave kudya cheziya ravo sezvo vave mumwe wevarimi vepamusoro vari kuwanisa vanhu muriwo wendudzi dzinosanganisira makabheji, tsunga, hanyanisi, matomati nezvimwe zvakawanda. Vanoti vanhu vanotenga zvirimwa zvavo vanobva muPretoria nenzvimbo dzakapoteredza, kusanganisirawo neguta reJohannesburg, uko vakawanda vanobva vachinohodha zvekuzotengesawo mberi. Asi VaKuchakanya vanoti hausi mutserendende nguva dzose mubasa ravo sezvo vari kusangana nedambudziko guru rembavha dziri kuvashanyira dzichifunga kuti vari kuchengeta mari mumba. Vanotiwo munguva ino yechirimo vanosangana nedambudziko remvura, izvo zvinoita kuti vade kuisa bhohoro kana mukana wacho wawanikwa. Vanokurudzirawo zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika kuti zvishande nesimba kunyange munguva yekuomerwa, pane kuti zvitsvage ruramo kuburikidza nekuita mabasa erima. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Makumi Maviri neVaviri Vanofa Mutsaona kuTsholotsho
text: Tsaona yakaitika neMugovera ku Tsholotsho ku Matabeleland North inonzi yakatora hupenyu hwevanhu makumi maviri nemumwe pakaitika tsaona, mumwezve ndokufira kuchipatara. Tsaona iyi yakaitika apo vanhu makumi matanhatu vakange vari murhori yehurumende vachiendeswa kunzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana kunorwisa chirwere che malaria kwa Sipepa, ku Tsholotsho kwakare. Vari munzira kuenda kubasa, zvinonzi muchairi werhori anonzi akatadza kutyaira zvakanaka rhori iyi kuti irambe iri mumugwagwa payakasvika panomonyoroka mugwagwa, ndokubuda mumugwagwa ichibva yapinda musangano umo yakabheukira. Mukuru anoona nezvehutano mudunhu reMatabeleland North, Doctor Nyasha Masuka, vanoti hurumende iri kubatsira vakashaya mutsaona iyi. Vatiwo munhu akashaya mutsaona iyi ari kuwana mari inoita chiuru chemadhora. Dr Masuka vatiwo pane vanhu vari kurapwa muzvipatara zvinoti Tsholotsho, Mpilo Central Hospital ne United Bulawayo Hospitals zvichitevera tsaona iyi. Studio7 haina kunzwa divi remapurisa panyaya iyi. Muna Chikunguru gore rino, vanhu gumi nevaviri vakafa vazhinji vakakuvara ku Kamativi ku Matebeleland North kwekare. No media source currently available

headline: Vatsigiri vorumbidza Nakamba
text: Villa vari kurumbidza zvikuru chizvarwa chemuZimbabwe Marvelous Nakamba padandemutande reTwitter zvichitevera kutamba kwaakaita zvinodakadza svondo radarika apo chikwata chake chakaita mangange 2-2 neBurnley kuVilla Park.   Rakange risiri zuva rekufara reAston Villa iyo mwaka uno yarasa zvibodzwa zvisere zvayainge ichifanirwa kuwana muPremier League.   Asi Nakamba ari kurakidza kuti mutambi wepamusoro izvo zvakaona murairidzi wechikwata chake ichi, Deam Smith, achimutenga nemari inosvika 11 miriyoni paunzi.   Mumutambo wavo neBurnley, Nakamba  akatamba zvemhando yepamusoro.   Kubva paakatengwa neAston Villa mwaka uno achibva kuClub Brugge yekuBelgium, Nakamba akwanisa kutamba mitambo mina kuchikwata ichi iyo inoti mitatu yemuEnglish Premier League kozoti mumwechete mumakwishu eCarabao Leagu Cup uyo wakave mutambo wake wekutanga.   Chikwata chake parizvino muEPL chatamba mitambo minomwe asi Nakamba haana kukwanisa kutamba yose sezvo akambenge akakuvara apo aitambira chikwata chenyika chemaWarriors mumutambo weAfrica Cup of Nations uyo wakaitirwa kuEgypt nguva yadarika.   Asi kubva apora, Nakamba ari kurakidza kuti arovera hoko muchikwata chaSmith zvichitevera kutamba kwaaita mitambo mitatu yadarika.   Izvi zvamuona zvakare achigarisa pabhenji vamwe vatambi vakaita saDouglas Luiz chizvarwa chekuBrazil uyo aimbotambira Manchester City naHenri Lansbury chizvarwa chemuEngland uyo akambotambira Arsenal.   Ane bhora kunyangwe asina, Nakamba anorakidza kuti mutambi wepamusoro.   Mashoko anotevera ndiwo mamwe ezvakataurwa nevatsigiri veAston Villa padandemutande reTwitter.       Si R   @Sprawlsy   Zviri pachena handina kufara nezvabuda mumutambo uyu, asi regai nditi ndinofarira zvandiri kuona pana Nakamba????#avfc       Gav ??   @gavlarAVFC   Chandakatora kubva pamutambo wedu, Marvellous Nakamba ari kukurumidza kuita mumwe wevatambi vandinofarira #avfc       Tom King   @thomasavfc12   Nakamba ange asiri kubatika nhasi – HITC Sport

headline: Veruzhinji Voyambirwa Kuti Vakoshese Hutsanana Kuitira Kuti Vasa Batwe neTyphoid
text: No media source currently available Veruzhinji vari kuyambirwa kuti vakoshese hutsanana uye kuti vaende kuchipatara kana vakaona vachiita manyoka ane ropa sezvo vangange vane chirwere chetyphoid. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano, Dr Rutendo Bonde, vanoti dambudziko retyphoid rakatekeshera muGweru. Sangano re Gweru Residents Forum nhasi razivisa kuti pane vanhu vapfumbamwe vakashaya nechirwere ichi, vamwe vanhu mazana matatu vakarapwa chirwereichi. Sangano iri rinoti dambudziko iri riri kuwanda kuMkoba township nzvimbo inogara vazhinji. Dr Bonde vanoti vanhu vanofanirwa kukoshesa kugeza michero yavanotenga pamisika uye kuziva pekuchengetedza mvura yakachena kuitira kuti dambudziko iri risavabate. Dr Bonde vanoti panguva iyo dambudziko iri ririkunetsa kunzvimbo dzakadayi seGweru, vanhu vanofanirwa kumbomira kukwazisana uye kuchenjera kutapurirana chirwere chemanyoka ichi pamichato nendufu sezvo vanhu vanenge vasingazive kuti chikafu chavanenge vachudya chinenge chabikwa pakachena uye nehutsanana here. "Dambudziko iri rinokwanisa kuderera kana vanhu vakaita hutsanana uye vakakurumbidza kuenda kuchipatara kana vachinge vawona vava kuita manyoka aneropa nekupisa muviri zvakanyanya," Dr Bonde vaudza Studio7.

headline: Vashandi veForestry Commission Voyaura neNhamo
text: Vashandi veForestry Commission vanoti vanoda rubatsiro nekuti vave nemakore akawanda vasingapiwe mari dzavo dzakakwana. Mumwe wevashandi ava, uyo aramba kudomwa nezita, ati anovimba kuti gurukota idzva rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vachavabata zviri nani pane zvavaiitwa nevaimbove gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa. Mushandi uyu anoti VaChinamasa ndivo vakaita kuti Forestry Commission isave pasi pehurumende muna 2015. Munyori mukuru we National Employment Council for Lumber Milling, Timber Processing and Trading Industry, VaZakia Tagwirei, vanoti chimwe chakakonzera izvi ndechokuti vashandi ava havasi pasi pesangano rinomirira vashandi. “Zvave nenguva chaizvo, kusvika kumakore matanhatu vashandi ivava ava vachipihwa mari dziri pasi pedzakatarwa pamutemo,” VaTagwirei vaudza Studio 7. “Havana kumbosvika kwatiri kuzotsvaka rubatsiro. Ndinoona sekuti chinovatadzisa kusvika kusaziva kuti veNational Employment Council inovabatsira kusvika papi…asi tichavabatsira kana vakatiudza.” Vashandi vakawanda vari mudambudziko iri ndivo vanoita basa recheka matanda vachiatengesa. No media source currently available

headline: VaMugabe Votaura paKutoreswa Mhiko kwaVaLungu vekuZambia
text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeZambia VaEdgar Lungu vakatoreswa mhiko nemusi weChipiri mushure mesarudzo dzakaitwa mwedzi wapera. VaLungu vakatora mhiko kunhandare yeHeroes Stadium muLusaka. Asi vemapato anopikisa vanoti sarudzo idzi dzakabirirwa uye VaLungu vaishandisa mhirizhonga. Valungu vanoti vari kuzorwa mafuta enguruve yavasina kudya. Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe ndevamwe vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica vashoma shoma vakange vari kuZambia. VaMugabe ndivo vakataura vakamirira vamwe vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica. VaMugabe vati nyika dzine hutongo hwejekerere hadzidi vanhu vanoda kushandisa mhirizhonga kutora masimba. Vakatiwo Zambia yainge yabuda pachena kuti sarudzo ndidzo dzinofanira kushandiswa munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika kuMulungushi University of Zambia VaShakespeare Hamauswa vanoti mashoko aVaMugabe akatambirwa zvakasiyana muZambia vamwe vachiti vainge vabaya dede nemukanwa asi vamwe vachishora vachiti makudo ndemamwe zvikuru vachitarisa nyaya yemhirizhonga. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Onai COSAFA muri kumba’
text: VATSIGIRI vechikwata chenhabvu cheZimbabwe Warriors vanokurudzirwa kuti vatevedzere mitemo yenyika neyeWorld Health Organization (WHO) iyo yakananga kuderedza kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 uye kuti vasaungane panguva iyo vachaona chikwata chavo chichikwikwidza mumitambo yeCosafa Cup iri kuitirwa kuSouth Africa.   Mitambo yeCosafa Cup yakatanga svondo rino uye maWarriors ari kurwira kuhwina mukombe uyu kechinomwe zvekare kuudzora kumusha kubva gore ra2018.   Kusvika pari zvino, maWarriors ndiwo akahwina mikombe yakawanda kudarika zvimwe zvikwata achiteverwa neZambia iyo yakwanisa kuhwina mukombe iwoyu kashanu.   Achitaura svondo rino, mutungamiri weFriends of the Warriors – Edward Chimedza – anoti ino haisisi nguva yekuti vatsigiri venhabvu vaungane vachiona pazvivhitivhiti mitambo iri kuitirwa kuSouth Africa sezvo zvichizokonzera kuti Covid-19 itapuriranwe pakati pevanhu.   “Chikumbiro changu kune vatsigiri venhabvu, ndapota ngatisanungane sezvataiita kare nekuti Covid-19 iri kuuraya. Kare taingonzwa kuti chirwere ichi chiriko kune vamwe vanenge vane hama dzavo dzabatwa kana kuuraiwa nacho, asi iye zvino chave kuuraya hama dzedu dzepedyo muno.   “Saka ngationei mitambo tiri kudzimba dzedu tichitsigira chikwata chedu tichienda padandemutande pakaita seTwitter neFacebook tichitumira mashoko esimbaradzo ipapo. Hatidi vanoungana nekuti mhando itsva yeCovid-19 iyo iri kunzi Delta variant iri kuuraya uye haisi kutambisa.   “Hatidi kurasikirwa nehama dzakawanda, ngatigare kudzimba dzedu toona mitambo tiri ikoko,” anodaro Chimedza.   Anoenderera achiti zvakakosha kuti vatsigiri venhabvu vaende kunobaiwa nhomba kana kuti majekiseni ekudzivirira Covid-19 sezvo iyi iri iyo imwe yenzira dzinobatsira.   “Ngatiite mudungwe wekuenda kunobaiwa nhomba nekuti zvinobatsira kudzivirira chirwere ichi. Kana tichida kuzowana mukana wekuona zvikwata zvedu zvichikwikwidza, ngatifarirei kubaiwa, ngatiite mudungwe wekunobaiwa,” anodaro Chimedza.   Achitaurawo, mutsigiri mukuru wenhabvu Adomsi Mukwasi, anoti kana zvichibvira dai mapurisa afamba achiongorora munzvimbo sedzekutandarira kuti vanhu havasi kuungana here izvo zvisingatenderwe achiti kazhinji panowanzotamba chikwata chenyika, vanhu vanofarisa vachida kuona chikwata chavo chichitamba.   “Chikwata chedu tinochidisisa zvikuru zvekuti tinoda kuona mitambo yacho takawanda. Asi iye zvino dai tambogara kudzimba nekuti Covid-19 haina kumira zvakanaka, vanhu vari kufa.   “Kuti tikunde denda iri tinofanira kutevedzera zvinotaurwa neHurumende yedu togara kudzimba tichitsigira chikwata chedu.   “Tine mapoka akawanda eWhatsApp anoita nezvenhabvu, imomo ngatinge tichikurukura tichiongorora matambiro anenge achiita chikwata chedu kwete kuungana.   “Kuungana imhosva huru, ndapota hangu ngatigare kudzimba,” anodaro Mukwasi.   Achitaurawo, munyori mukuru weFriends of the Warriors – Zivanai Muwashu – anoti zvinorwadza kuti chikwata chavo chakaenda kumakwikwi aya chisina vatsigiri, asi vanofanira kutevedzera mitemo iripo ine chekuita nedenda reCovid-19 kuitira kuti zvigobatsira kuponesa upenyu hweveruzhinji.   Anoti naizvozvo vatsigiri vanofanira kubatana mukuisa minamato kuti maWarriors agohwina kuSouth Africa.   “Cosafa yagara ndeyedu makore ose, saka tinoziva kuti maWarriors achadadisa kumutambo uyu. Isu sevatsigiri, ngatinamatire chikwata chedu kuti chigokunda mukombe uuye kumusha,” anodaro Muwashu.   Zvakadaro, maWarriors akavhurira mitambo yawo yeCosafa apo akasangana neMozambique. Mutambo wavo unotevera achasangana neMalawai musi weChishanu.   Mutevedzeri waZdravko “Loga” Logarusic, Tonderayi Ndiraya ndiye ange achifanorairidza maWarriors sezvo Loga ange arambidzwa kupinda munyika yeSouth Africa nekuti ange asina magwaro akakwanana (visa).   Asi Loga akazopihwa zvake visa rekuti atevere chikwata chake kuSouth Africa.

headline: Chenjerai Hove Anorangarirwa Zvine Mutsindo muHarare
text: Vanyori, vana nyanduri, vaimbi pamwe nehama neshamwari dzemushakabvu, VaChenjeral Hove, kubva mativi mana enyika, dzakasangana muHarare nemusi weMugovera manheru dzichipemberera hupenyu hwavo pamwe nemabasa avo munyaya dzekunyora mabhuku nenhetembo. Paive nemufaro mukuru kuQueensade Sports Club uye mhuri yaVaHove inoti yakafara zvikuru kuti shamwari dzavo pamwe nevamwe vavaishanda navo vakaronga mutambo wakadai uyo vakati wakabudirira zvikuru. Mudzimai wamuchakabvu, Amai Tekla Hove, vakatsanangura murume wavo semunhu aive nerudo nemhuri nebasa rake uye vanoti vanotenda chose kuti vakadzisisa vana vavo uye vanokwanisa kurarama pasina dambudziko kunyange baba vavo vasisipo Amai Hove vakati chimwe chinonyanyovafadza rudo rwakaratidzwa neshamwari dzemurume wavo nevamwe vavaishanda navo uye vati izvi zvinoratidza kuti vakasiya vadyara rudo. Mmwe mwana VaHove, Tanatswa, akaudza Studio7 kuti baba vake munhu aive nerudo uye izvi zvakaratidzwa nekuuya nehuwandu kwakaita vanhu, vanyori, shamwari dzavo, vaimbi nevanhuwo zvavo kumutambo wekupemberera hupenyu hwavo nekuvarangarira. Mumwe mwana wavo, Tafadzwa, akatiwo mafariro aita vanhu neMugovera ndozvaigara vachiita nebaba vavo uye zvinorwadzo kuti havasisipo. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Human Rights Association, VaOkay Machisa, avo vakaridzawo mimhanzi pamutambo wekurangarira VaHove, vanoti vakaona zvakakodzero kunge varipowo sezvo VaHove vaive mumwe wevanhu vakavamba sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimRights. VaMichael Mabwe, avo vanoitawo nhetembo dzekukurudziro kodzero dzevanhu, vanoti vanorangarira VaHove nemabasa avo uye mabasa avo ndivo akaitawo kuti vapinde mumabasa ekusimudzira kodzero dzevanhu. Munyori wesangao rinomirira vanyori reZimbabwe Writers Association, Memory Chirere, akati mutambo wekurangarira VaHove wakafamba zvakanaka uye zvinoratidza kufamba kwavaiita nevamwe vavo. Vamwe vanyori, vaimbi nananyanduri vakapinda mumutambo weMugovera vanosanganisira, David Mungoshi, Conte Mhlanga, Shimmer Chinodya, Virginia Phiri, Hope Masike nevamwe. VaHove vaive nemukurumbira uye vakahwina mibairo yakwanda yekunyora mabhuku. Mibayiro iyi inosanganisira we Noma Aaward for Publishing in Africa. Vakashayikira kuNorway munaChinkunguru uko vange vave kugara muhupoteri. Asi vakazochengetwa kumusha kwavo kuGokwe. No media source currently available

headline: MDC T Yoronga Musangano Mukuru weKupeta Gore kuZimbabwe Grounds
text: Mutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa reMDC T, VaMorgan Tsvangirai mangwana vari kutarisirwa kutungamira nhengo dzavo pamusangano mukuru wekuvhara gore uchaitirwa munhandare ine nhoroondo yekurwira rusununguko rwevatema yeZimbabwe Grounds iri mumusha weHighfield. Mutauriri weMDC-T VaObert Gutu vanoti chinangwa chikuru chemusangano uyu ndechekutarisa matambudziko akatarisana nenyika pari zvino, pasvika hurongwa hwemubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa pakatarisanwa nesarudzo dza2018, pamwe nekutendawo vana veZimbabwe nekushinga kunyange vari mukati mematambudziko makukutu. VaGutu vanoti zvimwe zvicha kurukurwawo ndezvakaitwa nebato ravo mukati megore rino, zvinosanganisira kuratidzira mumatunhu akasiyana-siyana enyika. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari veKuMasvingo Voronga Kuratidzira neNyaya yeKushaya Mvura Mudzimba
text: Sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevagari vemuMasvingo, re Masvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance (MURRA) pamwe nesangano rekodzero dzemadzimai, reWomen’s Coalition of Zimbabwe vanyorera kanzuru yeMasvingo gwaro renyunyuto vachiipa mazuva maviri kuti igadzirise dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemvura. Vagari ava vanoti vari kuronga kuratidzira kana kanzuru ikakundikana kugadzirisa dambudziko ravo. Vagari vemunzvimbo dzinogara veruzhinji mudhorobha reMasvingo vave nemavhiki matatu vasina mvura mudzimba dzavo mushure mekufa kwepombi inodhonza mvura kubva mudhamu reMutirikwi. Vachitaura ne Studio 7 nhasi vesangano re Murra pamwe neWomens’Coalition vanoti vakagumbuka zvikuru nekuti kanzuru haisi kuratidza kuita chimbi chimbi nekugadzirisa dambudziko iri. Vati vave kutyira kuti zvirwere zvakaita seCholera neTyphoid zvinogona kubata vagari. Muzvare Eshter Chimanikire vanoona nezve kufambiswa kwemabasa muMurra vanoti vatora danho rekuda kuratidzira nekuti kanzuru iri kutyora kodzero dzevagari dzekuwana mvura nguva dzose. Vagari vazhinji vave kutorarama nekunwa mvura yemumatsime iyo isina kuchena. Kanzuru iri kuyedza kupawo vanhu mvura nemabhauza asi haisikukwana. Vagari vazhinji vanoti vanomukira pakati pehusiku kubata raini pa mabhauza aya ne zvibhorani zvishoma zviri munzvimbo dzavanogara. Muzvare, Joyce Mhungu, sachigaro we Women’s Coalition, mudunhu reMasvingo, vanoti nyaya yekushaikwa kwemvura iri kunyanya kubata madzimai ndosaka vanyorera kanzuru tsamba uye nekubatana nemamwe masangano kuti vazoratidzira kana Kanzuru isina kugadzirisa dambudziko iri muma awa makumi mana nemasere. Asi Meya weMasvingo VaCollen Maboke vanoti yakagadzirisa dambudziko iri vachiti mvura yatotanga kuwanikwa kune dzimwe nzvimbo mudhorobha. Asi vagari vazhinji vanopikisa Meya vachiti munzvimbo dzavo mvura haisati yave kubuda kunyanya vekuRunyararo West, vachiri kungomirira mabhauza nekuenda ku zvibhorani. VaHardlife Tangai nde mumwe mugari ati zviri kutaurwa na Meya hazvisi zvechokwadi. Dhorobha reMasvingo rave kugara richisangana nedambudziko remvura sezvo mishina inopomba mvura ichigara ichingofa. Muna Nyamavhuvhu vagari vakaita mwedzi wose vasina mvura nekusashanda zvakanaka kwemichina iyi.

headline: Vechidiki Votaura Zvimhingamupinyi Zvavanosangana Nazvo Munyaya dzeHIV/AIDS
text: Kunyange hazvo Zimbabwe ichiverengwa pane dzimwe nyika dziri kukwanisa kurwisa HIV/Aids pamwe nekupa dzidziso pamusoro pekudzivirira zvirwere zvepabonde uye kuronga mhuri, vamwe vechidiki vanoti zvakaomera vakawanda vavo kuti vade kuongororwa ropa ravo, kurapwa zvirwere zvepabonde kana kutsvaga zvekudzivirira zvirwere izvi. Izvi zvakabuda pamusangano weAdolescent Sexual and Reproductive Health Dialogue wakaitwa muBulawayo munguva pfupi yapfuura nesangano reCommunity Working Group on Health nevamwe vechidiki, wekuzeya kuongororwa ropa, kutsvaga ruzivo rwekuronga mhuri, pamwe nerwekuzvidzivirira kwevechidiki kubva kuzvirwere zvepabonde kwevechidiki. Mumwe mukomana anoda kungoziikanwa nezita rekuti Everson, ndemumwe wevechidiki vari muBulawayo, vanodzidzisa vamwe vavo nezveHIV/AIDS, kuronga mhuri pamwe nekudzivirira zvirwere zvepabonde. Everson anoti nyaya yekuti muzvipatara nemumakiriniki hamuna vanamukoti vakakwana ndeimwe inoita kuti vechidiki vakawanda vatadze kuongororwa ropa ravo, kutsvaga ruzivo rwekuronga mhuri pamwe nerwekuzvidzivirira kubva kuzvirwere zvepabonde. Everson anotiwo vechidiki vanotya kubuda pachena panyaya dzine chekuita nezvepabonde nekuda kwekuti vanonyara kutaura nevanhu vanenge vari kumakiriniki kana dzimwe nzvimbo dzavanogona kuongororwa ropa ravo kana kuwana ruzivo rwekuronga mhuri pamwe nerwekuzvidzivirira kubva kuzvirwere zvepabonde. Mumwe musikana wechidiki, Muzvare Natasha Shoko, vanobvumirana nemaonero aya vachiti vechidiki vanoona vana mukoti vakawanda sevanhu vanovasarura vasingakwanise kuvanzwisisa kunyanya panyaya dzine chekuita nezvedzidziso yekudzivirira zvirwere zvepabonde kana kuronga mhuri. VaWatson Chiwambo ndemumwezve mukomana wechidiki anoitawo zvekudzidzisa vamwe vezera rake nezveHIV/AIDS. VaChiwambo vanoti mutemo wekuti vechidiki vari pasi pemakore gumi nematanhatu havakwanise kuenda kuzvipatara kana makiriniki vari vega unokanganisa vechidiki munyaya dzekurwisa HIV/AIDS nzvimwe zvirwere zvepabonde uye kusimudzira ruzivo rwekuronga mhuri. Mumwe wechidiki anoita zvekurwira kodzero dzevechidiki, Muzvare Bertha Nyoni, vanobvumawo kuti mutemo uyu unokanganisa vechidiki. VaNhlanhla Moyo vanoshanda nesangano reYoung People’s Network mubazi reSexual and Reproductive Health. VaNhlanhla vanoti kunyange hazvo chingave chokwadi kuti vechidiki vanosangana nematambudziko akawanda mukeudza kuwana ruzivo pamwe nekurapwa HIV/Aids nezvirwere zvepabonde uye kuronga mhuri, vanoti vechidiki vanofanirwa kuzvipira kuenda kunzvimbo dzinoita izvi. Murongi wemabasa nesangano reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaMongi Khumalo, vanoti zvakakosha kuti veruzhinji, kunyanya vechidiki pachavo, vazeye nezvenyaya iyi senzira yekupedza matambudziko avanosngana nawo panyaya dzine chekuita nezvedzidziso yekudzivirira zvirwere zvepabonde kana kuronga mhuri. Munguva pfupi yapfuura, sangano reUNAIDS rakaburitsa gwaro rinoratidza kuti vechidiki vemuZimbabwe, kunyanya vari pakati pemakore gumi nemashanu nemakumi maviri nemashanu havanyanyofarira kunogororwa ropa ravo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzeHIV/Aids dzinoti kurwisa denda iri kungabudirira chete kana veruzhinji vakaziva mamiriro ehutano hwavo. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Yoita Musangano Wayo muGweru neSvondo
text: MDC inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa ichaita musangano neSvondo muGweru wekutenda vatsigiri vayo vakaivhotera musarudzo dzakaitwa gore rakapera. Mutauriri webato iri, VaJacob Mafume, vaudza Studio7 kuti bato ravo riri kutenda zvikuru vanhu vakarivhotera, uye mutungamiri webato ravo, VaNelson Chamisa, vachange vari ku Mkoba Stadium kuchaitirwa musangano uyu. “Kunenge kune musangano muhombe; tinenge tichiungana sezvo tiri bato rezvematongerwo enyika. Tinoudzana zviri kuitika munyika nekushungurudzwa kuri kuitwa vatsigiri vedu vari kurohwa, vari kuurayiwa, vari kuitwa zvakasiyana siyana,” VaMafume vakaudza Studio7. “Tinoda kupa vanhu gwara, tichivaudza kuti kongiresi yavepo. Munoziva kuti pakongiresi tinenge tichichinja hutungamiri hwedu, tichipana gwara, tichigadzirisana pakakanganisika.” MDC yakaita musangano weNational Council iyo yakabvumirana kuti kongiresi iitwe kubva musi wa 24 kusvika 26 Chivabvu. Kune vamwe vaida kuti kongiresi iitwe muna Gumiguru. Kongiresi iyi iri kuitwa zvichitevera kushaya gore rapera kwevaimbove mutungamiri webato iri, VaMorgan Tsvangirai. VaMafume vati VaChamisa vachashandisa mukana wemusangano wekuGweru kuudza veruzhinji muZimbabwe pamusoro pechirongwa chebato ravo chekugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Mertesacker odemberera Wenger
text: anoti Arsene Wenger achiri nesimba rekuramba achirairidza nhabvu kana akabva kuArsenal pachapera mwaka uno.   Wenger achabva kuEmirates Stadium pachapera mwaka uno izvo zvaakataura svondo radarika achiti achabva kuchikwata ichi chaakarairidza kwemakore 22.   Vanhu vari kuda kuona kuti shasha iyi ichasendeka here kurairidza nhabvu kana kuti achatsvaga chimwe chikwata chekutungamirira.   Svondo radarika, Wenger akataura kuti acharamba achiita mabasa akasiyana mumutambo wenhabvu.   Wenger akataura chikwata chake chichangobva kukunda West Ham 4-1 achiti haana kuneta.   Kaputeni wechikwata chake – Per Mertesacker – anoti anofunga kuti chizvarwa chekuFrance ichi chichiri nezvakawanda zvekuita munhabvu abva kuArsenal.   “Takashamisika ndicho chekutanga, tingangobaikana ndicho chokwadi,” Mertesacker akadaro achitaura nezvemashoko akabva kuna Wenger svondo radarika ekuti achasiya kurairidza Arsenal.   “Unotozviona kuti achiri nezvakawanda maari uye simba rekuti anogona kuramba achirairidza chikwata ichi chiende mberi kana kune zvimwe zvikwata.” – SportsMail Football

headline: Mutongo weChikumbiro Chekuti Chin'ono Abvisiswe Mari yeChibatiso Woitwa neChina
text: Mutongi wedare, Amai Marehwanazvo Gofa, vati vachapa mutongo wavo neChina pachikumbiro chemutori wenhau, Hopewell Chin’ono, chekuti apihwe mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso kuitira kuti atongwe achibva kumba kwake. Asi mutongo uyu wanga uchifanirwa kupihwa nhasi sekutaura kwavo Amai Gofa nemusi weChipiri. Amai Gofa vatura mashoko aya mushure mekunzwa zvaturwa naChin’ono nhasi mudare. Achitaura mudare, Chin’ono ati kunyora kwaakaita kuti zvainge zvaitwa nebazi reNational Prosecuting Authority kuti rakanga ratora danho rekusapikisa chikumbiro chaizoitwa mudare nemutungamiri weZimbabwe Miners’ Federation avo vakambomiswa basa, Muzvare Henrietta Rushwaya, hakuna chakwaivhiringidza mafambisirwo enyaya mumatare sezvo nyaya iyi yakanga isati yaunzwa mudare. Chin’ono ati zvaakaita ndizvo zvinotarisirwa kuitwa nevatori venhau kana vachifungidzira kuti zvinhu hazvisi kufambiswa zvakanaka mumapazi ehurumende zvikurusei kana paine humbowo sezvakaitika panyaya yaMuzvare Rushwaya. Chin’ono ati akanyora zvaakanyora paTwitter mushure mekunge awona chatove chijairiro chehurumende kusapikisa zvikumbiro zvekubhadhara mari yechibatiso kuvanhu vanenge vakatarisana nenyaya hombe vakapa nyaya yevaimbova gurukota rezvehutano, VaObadiah Moyo neyaMuzvare Rushwaya achiti izvi zvinoratidza kuti pane huori hunenge huchiitika. Chin’ono audza dare kuti haana chikonzero chekutiza kutongwa panyaya kana akapihwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso achiti mhosva iyi idiki zvikuru kana ichienzaniswa neimwe yaari kupomerwa yekukurudzira veruzhinji kuti varatidzire iyo yakatarisira kutanga kutongwa musi waZvita 7. Chin’ono ataura izvi mushure mekunge muchuchisi panyaya iyi, VaLancelot Mutsokoti, vaudza dare kuti Chin’ono anogona kutizira kune dzimwe nyika uye munhu anogara achipara mhosva achishandisa dandemutande rake reTwitter. Asi Chin’ono ati munhu ane midziyo inokosha zvekuti haangatize kutongwa uye ati haasati ambobatwa nemhosva mungave muZimbabwe kana kunze kwenyika zvekuti anganzi nemuchuchisi ihoromori. Chin’ono ati zvataurwa nemuchuchisi izvi kumutuka kuri pachena. Gweta rake, Amai Beatrice Mtetwa, vaudzawo dare kuti hapana humbowo hwasvitswa nemuchuchisi wenyaya iyi pamwe nemupurisa arikuferefeta nyaya iyi hunoratidza Chin’ono akapara mhosva yaari kupomerwa kunyange hazvo dare rakatura mutongo nezuro wekuti pane fungidziro yekuti Chin’ono akapara mhosva yaari kupomerwa iyi. Asi VaMutsokoti varamba vakatsika madziro vachiti zvakaturwa nemutongi nezuro pachikumbiro chaChin’ono chekuti asaiswe pa remand humbowo hwakakwana hunoita kuti Chin’ono asakodzere kupihwa mari yechibatiso. Rimwe remagweta aChin’ono, VaGift Mtisi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vapedza kusvitsa chikumbiro chaChin’ono. Mune imwewo nyaya yanga iri mumatare, magweta ari kumirira Muzvare Rushwaya nevamwe vavo vana vanosanganisira vasori vaviri avo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekunzi vaida kuburitsa goridhe rairema makirogiramu matanhatu kunze kwenyika zvisiri pamutemo, apedzawo kusvitsa chikumbiro chekuti vasungwa ava vapihwe mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso. Mutongi wedare panyaya iyi, VaNgoni Nduna, vati vachatura mutongo wavo neMuvhuro pachikumbiro ichi vachiti zvakasvitswa kudare nemagweta evasungwa pamwe nevachuchisi zvakawandisa zvekuti zvinoda nguva yakareba kuti vature mutongo wavo. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yotenga Michina yeMuzvipatara Inodarika Miriyoni yeMadhora ekuAmerica Isingashande
text: Komiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano nhasi iri kutarisirwa kushanyira chipatara cheParirenyatwa kuonoona michina yakanzi navanachiremba vakuru nezuro yakatengwa nehurumende asi isiri kushanda. Michina iyi yakanotengwa kuIndia nemutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano VaJohn Mangwiro, avo vatiwo vakatenga michina iyi vachibatsirana nevashandi vemuzinda weZimbabwe kuIndia. Vachitaura kukomiti iyi, vanachiremba vakuru vari pasi pesangano reSenior Hospital Doctors Association kana kuti SHDA vakati zvinhu zvichiri zvakaita manyama amire nerongo muzvipatara uye hakuna michina inodiwa kuzvipatara zvehurumende kuti ibatsire varwere. Mutungamiri weSHDA Amai Shingai Nyaguse vakati pamichina yakatengwa nehurumende iyi zvikamu gumi kubva muzana chete ndiyo iri kushanda. Amai Nyaguse vatiwo kunyangwe hazvo vamiriri vekambani yekuIndia kwakatengwa michina vakazodanwa kuuya munyika kuzoigadzirisa vakakundikana. Amai Nyaguse vakatiwo pamichina iyi, mizhinji yacho yakamboshanda uye yakatengwa kukambani isingazivikanwi. Vakapawo muenzaniso wekuti mimwe mibhedha yakauya inofanirwa kushandiswa pakusununguka kwemadzimai akazvitakura yakanyorwa kuti ishandiswe nemadzimai asingaremi zvinodarika makirogiramu makumi matanhatu nemashanu, vakati madzimai mazhinji munyika anenge akazvitakura anodarika huremu uhwu. Vachitaurawo kukomiti iyi, VaMangwiro vakaramba kuti michina iyi haisi kushanda vachiti mishoma chete ndiyo ine zvimwe zvaive zvisipo asi vakati zvinhu izvi zvakazogadzirwa uye vamiriri vekambani yekuIndia kwavakatenga michina iyi vari kuuya kuzoisa zvaive zvisipo izvi kuti itange kushande. Imwe nhengo yeSHDA, Doctor Bothwell Mbuvayesango vanoti zvipatara zvinofanira kupihwa mvumo yekuzvitengera michina yazvo. Vanachiremba ava vakaudzawo komiti yeparamende iyi kuti vanhu vazhinji vari kufa nekuda kwekushaikwa kwezvikwanisiro muzvipatara zvehurumende zvinodiwa mukurapwa kwavo. Vanachiremba vakuru ava vakapawo chichemo kudare reparamende kuti ribvise bhodhi rinovamiririra reHealth Services Board iro vanoti harimiririre zvido zvavo. Asi gurukota rinoona nezvehutano VaObadiah Moyo vakati kubviswa kweHealth Services Board kunonetsa kana pasina kuvandudzwa mutemo. VaMoyo vakabvumawo kuti zvinhu zvakaparara munyaya dzehutano vachiti kugadzirisa matambudziko aya kunoda mari yekunze iyo hurumende isina. Komiti inoona nezvehutano iyi yatiwo nhasi ichaenda kunozvionera pamhuno sefodya kuzvipatara zveParireyyatwa pamwe neSally Mugabe kuti zvinhu zvakamira sei chaizvo munyaya dzezvehutano, sezvo pasina kuwirirana nezvekuti michina iyi iri kushanda here kana kuti kwete. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vorangarira Magamba Vachiti Hurumende Yavo Haisi Kutyora Kodzero dzeVanhu
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vatungamira nyika mukurangarira zuva remagamba vachiramba kuti hurumende yavo iri kutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Asi vanopikisa vanoti munyika maberekera ingwe zvapa kuti vanhu vanodarika makumi matatu vatize misha yavo. Mhemberero idzi ndedzechimakumi mana kubva nyika zvayawana kuzvitonga kuzere. Vachitaura kuState House pazuva rekurangarira magamba enyika, VaMnangagwa vati pane vanhu vari kuda kusvibisa nyika vachishanda nehurumende dzekunze. Zimbabwe inocherechedza zuva remagamba muvhiki rechipiri raNyamavhuvhu gore roga roga vanhu vachienda kunoungana kumarinda eHeroes Acre kunoradzikwa magamba muHarare uye kunovigwa magamba ematunhu mumativi mana enyika. Asi rwendo rwuno kwangoenda VaMnangagwa nevamwe vatungamiri kunoisa maruva sezvo pari kutyirwa kupararira kwchirwere checoronavirus kana vanhu vakaungana. VaMnangagwa vati vari kucherechedza magamba ose kubva kuChimurenga chekutanga kusvika chechipiri vachivimbisa kuvaka chimwe chiumbwa chaGeneral Mtshane Khumalo vaitungamira mauto aMambo Lobenguka muna 1893. Vanoti ichi chiremekedzo sechakapiwa Mbuya Nehanda vane chiubwa chiri kuvakwa muHarare. Vati Magamba ose aya ainge akazvipira zvikuru. Asi mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato reMDC Alliance inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaClifford Hlatswayo vanoti hapana chekupemberera kana vanhu zvikuru nhengo dzebato ravo dzichisungwa nekutyorerwa kodzero dzavo sezvaiitwa pahutongi hwaIan Smith munguva yeRhosedia. Mukuru wesangano rePlatform for Youth Development VaClaris Madhuku vanoti zuva remagamba rakasiyana nemamwe makore sezvo riri kupembererwa vaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vashaya asi hama dzavo dzichiti vasaradzikwe paHeroes Acre. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vachishanda neZimbabwe Democracy Institute Doctor Pedzisayi Ruhanya vanoti zuva remagamba rakakosha asi rinokanganiswa nevanotyora kodzero dzevanhu. Asi vanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu-PF VaTafadzwa Mugwadi vanoti nzvimbo inovigwa magamba icharamba ichikosheswa zvisinei kuti magamba akaita saVaMugabe akaramba kuvigwa ikoko. Vatiwo kunyange munhu akapihwa ruremekedzo rwegamba anokwanisa kuvigwa kwaanoda kana kunodiwa nemhuri yake sezvakaitwa Oliver Mtukudzi uye Muzvinafundo Phineas Makhurane. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Alliance Yoshushikana neMaitiro aVaMnangagwa
text: MDC Alliance inoti haisi kufara kuti mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakatara zuva resarudzo pasina kugadziriswa zvose zvinodiwa kuti paitwe sarudzo dziri pachena. Vachitaura nevatori venhau pamuzinda weMDCT inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, mumwe wevatungamiri veMDC Alliance, VaTendai Biti, vati mubatanidzwa wavo hausi kufara kuti VaMnangagwa vakatara musi wa30 Chikunguru sezuva resarudzo pasina kugadziriswa zvose zvinodiwa kuti sarudzo dziri pachena dziitwe munyika. VaBiti vatiwo vari kuda kuti veruzhinji vapihwe mukana wekunotarisa gwaro revavhoti zvakare zvichitevera kunyoresa kwakaita vamwe vanhu sevavhoti veruzhinji pavaitarisa kuti mazita avo avo arimo here mugwaro revavhoti. VaBiti vati vanhu vakachinja nzvimbo dzekuvhotera paitariswa gwaro revavhoti mazita avo arimo here mugwaro revavhoti. VaBiti vati kusagadzirira zvakakwana kwekomisheni inoona nezvesarudzo panyaya yegwaro revavhoti iro risati rabuda kwave kuvapa dambudziko rekunyoresa mazita evachakwikwidza musarudzo dzegore rino kudare rinotora mazita evanhu vari kuda kukwikwidza musarudzo dzegore rino. Vaenderera mberi vachiti vacharatidzira nemusi weChipiri muHarare vachinosvika kumahofisi eZEC pamwe nemahofisi emutungamiri vachiratidza kunyunyuta kwavo. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nasachigaro weZEC, Amai Priscilla Chigumba kuti tinzwe pavamire panyaya iyi sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha dzavo. Asi mumwe komishina weZEC, VaQubani Moyo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti komisheni yavo ichagara pasi yotarisa nhuna dzeMDC Allianc idzi vachiti komisheni yavo yakazvipira kuita sarudzo dzinogutsa mapato ose achakwikwidza musarudzo dzegore rino. No media source currently available Mune imwewo nyaya, vaimbova gurukota rezvematunhu, VaSaviour Kasukuwere, vamiswa pamberi pedare ramejasitiri muHarare uko kwavapihwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso madhora mazana matatu pamhosva yavari kupomerwa yekubuda munyika zvisiri pamutemo panguva yakapindira masoja mune zvematongerwo enyika zvakazoita kuti vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vasiye basa. Zvichakadai, VaMakomborero Haruzivishe, avo vaimbova mumwe wevatungamiri wesangano rinomiria vadzidzi reZinasu, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende yaVaMnangagwa iri kushandisa mutemo zvetsvete. VaHaruzivishe vanoti VaMnangwagwa pachavo munhu anofanirawo kumiswa pamberi pedare sezvo vakabuda pachena voga kuti vakabuda munyika zvisiri pamutemo pavakadzingwa basa naVaMugabe. Zvichakadai, VaKasukuwere, avo vari kuramba mhosva yavari kupomerwa, vakatarisirwa kudzoka kudare musi wa11 Chikumi apo pachatanga kutongwa kwemhosva yavari kupomerwa iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inoisa Zvikamu Makumi Manomwe neZvitanhatu Kubva Muzana Patafura
text: Sangano reApex Council, iro rinomirira vashandi vehurumende, rasangana nevamiriri vehurumende pamusangano wekuzeya mihoro yevashandi vehurumende weNational Joint Negotiating Council, NJNC, hurumende ichinzi yaisa patafura zvikamu zvinoita makumi manomwe nezvitanhatu kubva muzana zvekuwedzera nazvo mihoro yevashandi vayo kutanga mwedzi uno. Asi sachigaro veApex Council, Amai Cecilia Alexander, vanoti vakumbira nguva yekuti vambotanga vanzwa kubva kunhengo dzavanomirira vasati vatambira zvauya zvakapfumbatwa nehurumende izvi. Amai Alexander vanoti mushure mekunan’anidza mari yauya nehurumende iyi, vaona kuti mushandi wepasi anenge otambira mari inoita RTGS$1023.00 pamwedzi, achikwira kubva paRTGS$582.00, iyo vanoti iri pasi zvikuru. Vanoti ivo vashandi vari kuda kuti mushandi wepasi atambiriswe mari inoita $4750.00 RTGS pamwedzi kuti akwanise kurara. Zvikwata zviviri izvi zviri kutarisirwa kusangana zvakare nemusi weChipiri kuti zvione kuti zvapeta here nhaurirano idzi. Mwedzi wapera hurumende yakanga yapa vashandi vayo zvikamu gumi kubva muzana, asi vakaramba kutambira mari iyi vachiti chaive chituko chaicho kuwedzera vashandi nezvikamu zvakadaro. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi., sezvo gurukota rezvevashandi, Amai Sekai Nzenza, vanga vasiri kubatika panharembozha yavo. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yoendesa VanaHutsana kuRufu neKune Mamwe Magungano Kuyedza Kurwisa Cholera
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvehutano Dr David Parirenyatwa vakaudza dare reparamende kuti hurumende ichange ichitumira vanahutsana kumachechi, kurufu nepamwe pose panoungana vanhu zvikuru muChegutu nenzvimbo dzakapoteredza kuti vaona kuti chirwere cheCholera hachirambe chichipararira. Vanhu vana vanonzi nehurumende vakafa nechirwere ichi uye vanhu makumi matanhatu nemashanu vanonzi vanifungidzirwa kuti vakatapurirwa chirwere ichi. Doctor Fortune Nyamande vanoti zviri kutaurwa naDr Parirenyatwa panyaya yavana hutsanana ndizvo chaizvo zvinofanira kuitwa kuti cholera isapararire munyika. Vakurudzirawo vanhu kuti kana vakafungidzira kuti munhu abatwa nechirwere ichi vamupe mvura ine munyu netsvigiri kana kuti "salt sugar solution" apo vanenge vachienda naye kuchipatara.

headline: Zanu-PF Yoita Musangano wePagore Mubato Muine Bata Murefu Bata Mupfupi
text: Bato riri kutonga reZanu-PF neChitatu riri kutarisirwa nemusi weChitatu kutanga musangano wavo wepagore kajna kuti annual conference kuBindura, Mashonaland Central mubato iri muine kunetsana nekurwisa kwakasimba. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanova mutungamiri webato iri vakatenda kuti mumusangano mave kuita mhirizhonga vakavimbisa kutora matanho akasimba kune vari kupomerwa mhosva yekukonzera kusagadzikana nekuda kwesarudzo dziri kuitwa mumatunhu. MuHarare, Manicaland, Mashonalad West, Mashonaland East neManicaland muri kuitika mhirizhonga inotyisa zvapa kuti vakawanda vasungwe. Asi vakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri webato iri VaMike Bimha vanoti vana tinhayi dzirwe ndivo vari kuti ubato mune kunetsana kwakasimba. Vati parizvino vari kuita gadziriro yakasimba kuona kuti vakunda zvine mutsindo musarudzo dzinotevera dza2023. No media source currently available

headline: Musona, Ronaldo dhuma-dhuma
text: AIMBOVE kaputeni wemaWarriors — Knowledge Musona — ane mukana wekusangana naCristiano Ronaldo apo chikwata chake cheAl Tai chichatatsurana necheAl Nassr mumutambo weSaudi Pro League.   Zvikwata zviviri izvi zvichasanga neChina svondo rino mumutambo uchatambirwa kunhandare yeAl Nassr yePrince Faisal bin Fahd Stadium kuRiyadh.   Ronaldo akatengwa neAl Nassr svondo rino uye pane fungidziro huru yekuti anogona kutamba mutambo wake wekutanga apo chikwata chake chitsva ichi, icho chinorairidzwa naRudi Garcia, chichange chiri pamusha apo chichasangana neAl Tai.   Pari zvino Al Nassr ndiyo iri kutungamira palog rekuSaudi Arabia iine zvibodzwa 26 kubva mumitambo 11 yayatamba mwaka uno.    Cristiano Ronaldo   Nerimwewo divi, Al Tai yakagara pechinomwe iine zvibodzwa 18 kubva mumitambo 11 yayatambawo mwaka uno.   Musona atamba mitambo yese 11 uye ndokukwanisa kunwisa katatu.   Akanwisa katatu aka (hat-trick) mumutambo mumwe chete apo Al Tai yakakunda Al Khaleej 3-0.   Akapedzisira kunwisa mwedzi wadarika apo Al Tai payakasangana neAL Fateh mumutambo weKing’s Cup uyo wakazopera uri mangange 2-2, ndokuzoenda kumapena uko Al Tai yakakundwa 7-6 zvakaita kuti ibve yazoburitswa mumutambo uyu.   Kuchiti Ronaldo, akaenda kuAl Naasr zvichitevera kudzingwa kwaakaitwa kuManchester United mushure mekunge ashoropodza chikwata ichi pamwe nemurairidzi wacho, Erik ten Hag, uyo waakati haamuremekedze nekuti iye akange asingamuremekedzewo.   United naTen Hag hazvina kutambira mashoko aRonaldo aya zvakanaka ndokubva vamudzingwa kuchikwata ichi apo aigadzirira kuenda kuWorld Cup nenyika yake yePortugal.

headline: Kanzuru yeChinhoyi Yotsamwisa Vatyairi veDzimotokari
text: Vazhinji vataura neStudio7 muChinhoyi vanoti nguva dzakawanda vanosungirwa kusapaka motokari zvakanaka vachiti panenge pasina mitsetse yakajeka pavanopaka motokari dzavo. Mumwe anetsana nemapurisa nhasi ndiMuzvare Agnes Chiwoko avo vanogara nekushanda kuSouth Africa. Muzvare Chiwoko vati pavamisa motokari yavo panga pasina mitsetse yanga yakajeka izvo zvaita kuti vabhadhariswe madhora makumi mashanu nematatu. Muzvare Chiwoko vati vashandi vekanzuru vari kuita huori vachiti vanoda kusunga motokari dzine manhamba ekune dzimwe nyika kuitira kuti vapihwe mari yechioko muhomwe. Mumwe mutyairi wemotokari inotakura veruzhinji, VaTom Mbire, vati kanzuru inofanirwa kugadzirisa pekumisa motokari vasati vaita shave rekutora mari. VaAndrew Chisi vatiwo nzvimbo dzekumisa motokari iduku zvakanyanya uye mutsetse yacho haiwoneke vachiti nguva yavanopihwa kuti vamise motokari dzavo ipfupi padhora rimwechete paawa. Mutauriri wekanzuru yeChinhoyi, VaTichaona Mlauzi, vati mapurisa ari kunzi ndeekanzuru haasi, vakati kanzuru yakapa basa iri kukambani yakazvimirira yeClina Investment. Asi VaMlauzi vati vachaongorora zvichemo zvevanhu sezvo kubata basa kwakaipa kwekambani iyi kuchisvibisa zita rekanzuru. Hatina kunzwa divi rekambani yeClina Investment sezvo mukuru wavo, VaBrian Michels, vanga vasinga davire nharembozha yavo. No media source currently available

headline: Vana Mukoti Vanokanda Mapadza Pasi Vachiti Mari Dzavo Dziwedzerwe
text: Vana mukoti muzvipatara zvikuru zvehurumende zvakasiyana-siyana munyika vatanga kuramwa mabasa neChishanu vachiti vanoda kuti hurumende ihadzirise zvichemo zvavo. Kuramwa mabasa uku kunoitika panguva iyo vana chiremba vadarika masvondo maviri vachiramwawo mabasa. Vana mukoti vanodarika zviuru gumi nezvitanhatu munyika mose vakanda mapadza avo pasi vachiti hurumende iri kuramba ichivabata kumeso pazvichemo zvavo, izvo yakavimbisa kugadzirisa makore akawanda apfuura. Vana mukoti ava vanoti vari kuramwa mabasa kwete senzira yekutsigira vana chiremba avo vava nemazuva gumi nematanhatu vachiramwa mabasa, asi kuti ivo vane zvichemo zvavowo zvisiri kugadziriswa nehurumende, zvavanoda kuti zvigadziriswe nechimbi chimbi. Vana mukoti vari kuda kuti mari dzavanotambira dziwedzerwe, uye mashandiro avo agadziriswe kuitira kuti vashande zvine chiremera, pamwe nekuti muzvipatara muve nemishonga uye zvikwanisiro zvinoita kuti vashande nemazvo. Sachigaro weZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnock Dongo, vati ichokwadi kuti nhengo dzavo zhinji dzaramwa mabasa kuitira kuti zvichemo zvavo zvigadziriswe nehurumende. Vati hurumende iri kutaura navo nechinangwa chekugadzirisa zvichemo izvi. Asi vati zvinenge zvavimbiswa nehurumende zvichazeyiwa nesangano ravo voona matanho ekutora. Pashanyira Studio7 zvipatara zvemuBulawayo, vana mukoti vanga vachidzokera kudzimba dzavo mangwanani, pasina basa ravaita. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Nurses Association muBulawayo, VaSimangaliso Mafa, vaudza Studio 7 vati hapana zvakawanda zvavange vachikwanisa kutaura pamusoro pezvekuramwa mabasa uku sezvo vange vachipinda mumusangano patavabata parunhare. Sangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions raburitsa gwaro rinoshora gurukota rezvehutano, Dr David Parirenyatwa, richiti VaParirenyatwa vanofanirwa kusiya basa nekuti varatidza kukundikana kugadzirisa matambudziko munyaya dzezvehutano. Munyori mukuru weWomen’s Committee muZCTU, Amai Barbara Tanyanyiwa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti sangano ravo rinotsigira kuramwa mabasa kwemadhokotera navana mukoti vachiti zvakakosha kuti vapiwe mugove wavo wakafanira. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuna Dr Parirenyatwa kana kuhurumende panyaya iyi. Asi hurumende inoti haina mari yekugadzirisa zviri kudiwa nebazi rezvehutano. Vanhu vakawanda vanoti kuramwa basa kwemadhokotera navana mukoti mabasa kuri kuisa hupenyu hweveruzhinji munjodzi vachiti hurumende inofanirwa kugadzirisa nyaya iyi nekukasika. Mumwe mugari wemuBulawayo uyo angozvidoma nezita rekuti Takunda ati ange aperekedza sekuru vake kuRichard Morris Hospital chikamu chechipatara cheUnited Bulawayo Hospital panorapwa vanhu maziso, asi ati vatadza kuwana rubatsiro. Nhengo yekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano, VaDingilizwe Tshuma, avo vanomirira Entumban/Emakhandeni mudare reparamende, vati nhengo dzeparamende dzinogara dzichitaura kuti hurumende igadzirise matambudziko akatarisana nebazi rezvehutano. Mumiriri we Bulawayo Central mudare reparamende, Amai Dorcas Sibanda,vatiwo hurumende inofanirwa kukoshesa kugadzirisa matambudziko munyaya dzezvehutano pamwe nedzidzo munyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti vana mukoti vari kuramwa mabasa ava vari kuwedzera matambudziko akatarisana nevarwere munyika yose, sezvo vana chiremba vanodarika chiuru chimwe chete, vari kuramwawo mabasa. No media source currently available

headline: Veruzhinji Vopa Pfungwa Dzavo nezveRwendo RwaVaMugabe Kumusangano weUN
text: Mutungamiriri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vari muNew York kuAmerica uko vari vari kupinda mumusanganano weUnited Nations General Assembly. Asi vanhu vemuZimbabwe vanoti kunyange hazvo vasiri kufara nenzendo dzaVaMugabe dzekunze kwenyika, urwu rwendo rwunodiwa kuti VaMugabe vaveko. Vachitaura neStudio 7 muHarare neChishanu, vanhu vakawanda vati VaMugabe vanofanira kupinda mumusangano weUnited Nations uye vanofanira kushandisa mukana uyu kutaura nedzimwe nyika kuti dziregerere Zimbabwe pazvikwereti zvayo. Vamwewo vakaita saRas Chanakira vati kunyange hazvo vasiri kufara nenzendo dzaVaMugabe dzekunze kwenyika, rwendo rwekuUN rwakakosha uye VaMugabe vanofanira kuchenjerera kuita zvavaikaita masvondo maviri apfuura apo vakeverenga mashoko asiri iwo pakuvhurwa kwedare reparamende. “Aiwa, aah, no, zvakanaka kuti vaende President but hatidi kuti vano mixer speech sezvavakaita pakuvhurwa kweparamende, handitika?” Vanodaro Ras Chanakira. “Totarisirawo kuti this time vanotiitira zvakanaka uye havacollapse.” VaWakefiled Mlilo vatiwo vanotsigira rwendo rwemutungamiriri wenyika kuAmerica uye vatiwo vanofunga kuti VaMugabe vachashandisa mukana uyu kugadzirisa hukama hwavo nedzimwe nyika. Mumwewo mugari wemuHarare VaTendai Hakata vati VaMugabe vanofanira kusiyana nekufamba sezvo vavamunhu mukuru. Vati VaMugabe vave kufanira kutuma vamwe vavo kumisangano yakaita seye UN. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika VaTakura Zhangazha vati kunyange hazvo vanhu vasiri kufara nenzendo dzaVaMugabe rwendo rwe kuUN rwakakosha uye VaMugabe vanofanira kuvepo sezvo Zimbabwe ichi batsirwa nenyika dzepasi rose mumatambudziko akasiyana siyana . Vatungamiriri venyika dzepasi rese vanosangana muAmerica gore rega rega pasi pesangano reUnited Nations, apo vanozeya nyaya dzinonetsa pasi rese. VaMugabe vari kutarisirwa kutaura kuUnited Nations General Assembly nemusi weMuvhuro. Vari kuperekedzwa nemudzimai wavo Amai Grace Mugabe, gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika VaSimbarashe Mumbengegwi uye gurukota rezvehutano Doctor David Parirenyatwa. Vatungamiri ava vari kutarisira kuzeya chirongwa chekutambira gwara idzva reUnited Nations rehurongwa hweSustainable Development Agenda kutsiva maMillenium Development Goals. Izvi zviri kuitwa pamusangano wakakosha kana kuti special summit kutanga neChishanu kusvika Mugovera. No media source currently available

headline: VaKenyatta naVaOdinga Vovimbisa Kugadzirisa Makakatanwa Avo MuKenya
text: Mutungamiri weKenya VaUhuru Kenyatta vaita musangano nemutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa munyika iyi, VaRaila Odinga, mukuedza kwevatungamiri vaviri ava kutsvaga nzira dzekupedza gakava munyika iyi. Mutungamiri weKenya VaUhuru Kenyatta vaita musangano nemutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa munyika iyi, VaRaila Odinga, mukuedza kwevatungamiri vaviri ava kutsvaga nzira dzekupedza nadzo gakava rakakonzerwa nezvakabuda musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika dzakaitwa gore rapera. VaOdinga Vaipikisa zvakabuda musarudzo idzi, mushure mekunge VaKenyatta vanzi ndivo vakanga vakunda sarudzo dzekutanga, idzo dzakazonzi dzaive dzisina kufambiswa zvakanaka. Izvi zvakazoita kuti dzidzokororwe, asi VaOdinga vakaramba kupinda musarudzo dzepiri idzi vachiti pane zvavaida kuti zvitange zvagadziriswa, izvo zvakazoita kuti VaKenyatta vapinde voga vachibva vakunda zvakare. Izvi zvanga zvakonzera kusagadzikana kwenyika iyi, uye kuurayiwa kwevanhu vanodarika chiuru. Kusangano kwetungamiri vaviri ava ndekekutanga kubva pakaitwa sarudzo idzi, uye vaudza vatori venhau kuti vachashanda pamwechete kuti nyika yavo iende mberi murunyararo. “Tave kutanga nhaurirano dzekutsvakurudza chakanyanya kuita kuti tive nemaonero akasiyana azokonzera kuti tive nekusawirirana pakati pedu,” VaKenyatta vadaro. "Yakwana nguva yekuti tigadzirise zviri kuita kuti tisawirirane,” VaOdinga vatsinhirawo mashoko aVaKenyatta aya. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika dzinoti kugadzirisa makakatanwa pakati pevatungamiri vaviri ava kwakaoma sezvo nyika yavo ichinetseka zvikuru nenyaya yemarudzi. Asi mumwe anoongorora zvematongerwo enyika, VaPromise Sande, vatiwo dai vanoita zvematongerwo enyika muZimbabwe vaonawo gwara iri, vadzidzawo kuti zvakakosha kuti vatungamiriri vemapato anopikisana vaise zvido zvevanhu pamberi pekupokana kwavo. No media source currently available

headline: Vechidiki Vanofadzwa neZviratidzwa zveMabasa muHarare
text: Vamiriri vedzimwe nyika, masangano ekunze akaita seEuropean Union neInternational Monetary Fund pamwe nevakuru vakuru muhurumende neChishanu vabatana nevechidiki pazviratidzwa apo nyika dzino darika makumi maviri dzange dzichi ratidza nekutsanangura mikana yedzidzo nemabhizimisi inowanikwa nevechidiki munyika idzi. Pazviratidzwa izvi paitwawo nhaurirano pamusoro pezvingaitwe nehurumende, pamwe nemasangano ekunze pakuvanduza kana kuwedzera mikana yevechidiki munyaya dzemabhizimisi pamwe nekuti vawane mabasa. Vamwe vataura panhaurirano idzi vanosanganisira vamiriri veEuropean Union, International Monetary Fund, Britain neweDemocratic Republic of Congo muZimbabwe nevamwe avo vati zvakakosha kuti hurumende ipe mukana kune vechidiki muzvirongwa zvayo sezvo remangwana riri mavari. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvhupfumi, VaAshok Chakara vati pari zvino remangwana revechidiki harina kumira zvakanaka sezvo vasina mabasa uye hurumende isiri kuvapinza muzvirongwa zvayo. Mumwe wechidiki wemuHarare Denford Ngadziore ati anowirirana nemashoko aVaChakara. Blesssing Makovera uyo anodzidza pane chimwe chikoro chemuHarare anoti adzidza zvakawanda pazviratidzwa izvi. Shamwari yaBlessing, Hilary atiwo ave neruzivo rwekuti anoita sei kana achida kunodzidza kunze kwenyika. Mumwe wevakaronga zviratidzwa izvi, VaMisheck Gondo,vati zviratidzwa izvi, izvo vati zvinonzi space, zvichange zvave kuitwa gore rega rega uye chinangwa chazvo kupa mikana kune vechidiki munyaya dzedzidzo nemabhizimisi. Nyika dzakawanda kubva kumativi mana kusanganisira America, Britain, Japan, France neIndonesia dzange dziri pazviratidzwa izvi. Nekuda kwekusamira zvakanaka kwenyaya dzezvehupfumi, vechidiki vakawanda vari kunonga svosve nemuromo muZimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Inocherechedza Zuva reKubatana kweZanu PF nePF Zapu
text: Zimbabwe neMuvhuro yakacherechedza makore makumi maviri nemanomwe echibvumirano chokubatana chakanyoreanwa pakati peZanu PF nePF Zapu musi wa 22 Zvita mugore ra 1987. Chibvumirano ichi chakakwanisa kupedza kusagadzikana kwakanga kwapinda munyika kubva panguva yekuwana kuzvitonga kuzere. Chibvumirano ichi chakaita kuti pave nehurumende yemushandira pamwe pakati pebato reZanu PF raVaRobert Mugabe nerePF Zapu raitungamirirwa nevakazove mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, mushakabvu VaJoshua Nkomo. Chibvumirano ichi chakasunga kuti vatungamiri vemapato maviri aya ndivo vanenge vachiumba hutungamiri hwenyika, VaMugabe vari mutungamiri vachiteverwa naVaNkomo. Asi vamwe vanoti chibvumirano ichi hachichina hudzamu nechiremera chakaita kuti chivepo, sezvo bato reZanu PF rave kuonekwa serisiri kuchiremekedza zvakanyanya. Vaive murwiri wehondo yerusununguko vari kubato rePF Zapu, VaMax Mkandla, vanoti izvi zvakaonekwa nekusadomwa kwemutevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika anobva kubato re PF Zapu zvichitevera kushaya muna Ndira wegore rapera kwevaive mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutunganiri wenyika vachibva kuPF Zapu, VaJohn Nkomo. VaMkandla vanotiwo kusasimba kwechibvumirano ichi kunoonekwa zvakare nekubuda muchibvumirano ichi kwevamwe vakaita saVaDumiso Dabengwa nevamwe vachinomutsiridza bato reZapu. Asi nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu, vanoti kunyunyuta kwevashoma hakumisi bhazi rerunyararo sezvo vanonzi vakabuda muchibvumirano ichi vakazvibudira pachezvavo sevanhu, kwete sebato. VaChirumhanzu vanotiwo vanoona kudomwa kwaVaPhelekezela Mphoko vaive kuPF Zapu kuti vave mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika chiri chiratidzo chekuti chibvumirano chichakabata. No media source currently available

headline: Zim yateya South Africa
text: CHIKWATA cheZimbabwe Cricket A chiri mushishi kuita gadziriro dzekusangana necheSouth Africa A mumitambo mina yeOne Day International nemiviri yeTest Match iyo ichatambirwa kuHarare Sports Club.   Mitambo iyi ichatambwa nemusi wa29 na31 Chivabvu uye 2 na4 Chikumi kozoti yeTest Match ichatanga musi wa7 Chikumi ichizopera musi wa10 Chikumi.   Mutambo wechipiri weTest Match uchatanga musi wa13 Chikumi uchizopera 16 Chikumi uye uchitambirwa kuTakashinga Sports Club.   Muchinyorwa chakabva kuZimbabwe Cricket, ZC Director of Cricket, Hamilton Masakadza, anoti mitambo yose iyi ichatambwa isina vatsigiri sezvo nyika ichiri pakati pekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Anoti ane mufaro mukuru kuti chikwata ichi chave kudzoka kuzotamba mutambo uyu sezvo zvichibatsira vatambi vazhinji kusimukira.   “Kukosha kweZimbabwe A hakufanirwe kutarisirwa pasi saka tinofara kuti vakomana vadzoka uye vave kutamba mutambo uyu.   “Kutamba cricket padanho iri kuchabatsira vatambi vedu kuwana mikana yakasiyana. “Tinotenda zvikuru kuSouth Africa iyo yakabvuma kutumira chikwata chavo kunosangana nesu, isuwo tiri kutarisira mutambo wezvikwata zviviri izvi,” anodaro.   Chikwata cheZimbabwe A chakapedzisira kutamba cricket mugore ra2017 apo chakaenda kunosangana neUnited Arab Emirates kunyika iyi.

headline: America Inoti VaMnangagwa Ngavaite Zvavari Kutaura Kwete Kuperera Mukutaura Chete
text: Mumwe mukuru muhurumende yeAmerica anoti kunyange hazvo mutungamiri weZimbabwe, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vari kutaura mashoko akanaka nekuvimbisa kuita zvakanaka, zvakakosha kuti vachitanga kuita zvavari kuvimbisa kuitira kuti vakwanise kudyidzana nekugara nenyika dzepasi rese zvakanaka. Mutevedzeri wemunyori anoona nezvenyika dzemuAfrica muhurumende yeAmerica, Ambassador Matthew T Harrington, vataura mashoko aya vachipindura mibvunzo kubva kuvatapi venhau vemuAfrica pachiitiko chekupa mubairo kumakambani akabudirira mumabhizimisi eAwards for Corporate Excellence. VaHarrington vati nyika dzese pasi rose, kusanganisira America, dzakatarisa Zimbabwe nemaziso matsvuku zvichitevera kushanduka kwakaita hurumende muZimbabwe. Vati Zimbabwe ine mukana mukuru wekuchinja gwara rayaifamba naro mumakore makumi matatu apfuura. Vati America inotarisira kudyidzana neZimbabwe zvekare sezvavaita kare. Vati kunyange hazvo VaMnangagwa vari kutaura mashoko akanaka chinokosheswa nenyika yavo kuita zvinhu izvi kwete kungotaura chete. Ambassador Harrington vati panodiwa kushanduka munyaya dzehupfumu nematongerwo enyika kuti America nenyika dzepasi rose dzigutsikane nekutanga kudyidzana neZimbabwe zvakare. Hurumende yaVaMnangagwa inoti inoda kugadzirisa hukama hwayo nenyika dzepasi rese. Nemusi weMumvuro, gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, vakaparura hurongwa hwekugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika pamwe nekuti nyika ichabhadhara zvikwereti zvayo sei kumabhanga epasi rese akaita seWorld Bank, African Development Bank nemamwe. Vakatiwo vachatauririrana nenyika dzese dzakakweretwa neZimbabwe kuti vatange kudzidzana nadzo zvekare. Kusabhadhara zvikwereti ndezvimwe zvange zvave kuita kuti Zimbabwe isemwe nenyika dzepasi rese. No media source currently available

headline: Masangano Akazvimirira Ogunun'una neMitero Yobhadhariswa Mumamwe Matunhu
text: Mamwe masangano anoshanda akazvimiriri kana kuti maNGO’s anoti haasi kufara nemari yavari kubhadhariswa nemakanzuru kuti vashande munzvimbo dziri pasi pemakanzuru. Imwe yemakanzuru mudunhu reMashonaland West, yeMakonde yakazivisa nezuro kuti masangano ose anoda kushanda munzvimbo mavo vanofanirwa kubhadhara madhora zana ekuAmerica uye vagara vachishanda vanofanirwa kubhadhara madhora makumi mashanu pamusoro pekuwana gwaro rinovabvumira kushanda kana kuti Memorandum Of Understanding-MOU. Vanoshanda mukanzuru yeMakonde mubazi rinodyidzana nemasangano akazvimirira Amai Geytta Moyo vanobvuma kuti vose vanoda kushandira munzvimbo iri pasi pekanzuru yavo inosanganisa Chinhoyi, Mhangura neMakonde vanofanirwa kubhadhara mari iyi vasati vatanga kuita mabasa avanenge vakabvumirana navo. Sachigaro weZimRights mudunhu reMashonaland West VaAdrian Zarimba vanoti havasi kufara nedanho ratorwa nekanzuru yeMakonde vachiti hazvisi pamutemo. Makanzuru ekunemamwe mutunhu makuru akaita seMidlands anonzi ari kubhadharisawo mari dzekushanda munzvimbo asi dzinenge dzichingodaidzwa nemazita akasiyana. Nhengo yerimwe sangano rinoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwezviwanikwa zvemunzvimbo asina kuda kuzivikanwa nezita anoti zviri kuita makanzuru hazvisi pamutemo. Izvi zvinotsigirwa nemukuru weZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, VaMusa Kika avo vanoti chekutanga ndechekuti kunyange maMOU ari kudiwa nemakanzuru haasi pamutemo uye mari dziri kutaurwa hazvisi pamutemo zvakare. VaKika vanoti mari dziri kudiwa nemakanzuru inzira yekutsvaka mari zvisiri pamutemo. Izvi zvatsinhirwa nemukuru weCentre for Natural Resource Governance VaFarai Maguwu vanoti mamwe makanzuru ari kubhadharisa masangano akazvimirira nechinangwa chekuda kuti varegere kushanda. Asi mamwe makanzuru akaita seBindura anoti vanongoda wirirano yeMOU chete kuti sangano rishande munzvimbo yavo. Gurukota redunhu reMidlands VaLarry Mavima vakamboudza Studio 7 kuti munyika mune masangano akazvimirira oga akawandisa vachiti ngavaende kuUkraine kune vanhu vanoda ruyamure sezvo kuine hondo. Kunyange mubatanidzwa wemasangano anoshanda akazvimiririra weNational Association of Non Governmental Organisation-NANGO- richiti pane masangano anosvika chiuru chimwechete akanyoresa nesangano ravo, VaMavhima vakati masangano akazvimiririra ega zviuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu kana kuti 36 000 arikushanda munyika yose. No media source currently available

headline: VaTrump Voraswa neMamwe Maseneta eBato Ravo
text: Zvinhu hazvina kumirira zvakanaka kumutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, zvichitevera mashoko nezviri kuitwa nevanhu vebato ravo, reRepublican Party, muparamende yeAmerica. Bepanhau reNew York Times rinoti mutungamiri wenhengo dzedare reSenate, dze Republican Party, VaMitch Mcconnell, vaudza bepanhau iri kuti VaTrump vakapara mhosva dzinofanirwa kutongwa. Svondo rapera, vatsigiri vaVaTrump vakapinda zvechisimba mudare reCongress yeAmerica vakapwanya misuwo, mahwindo, matafura nemacheya vachitsvaka mutevedzeri waVaTrump, VaMike Pence, pamwe chete nenhengo dzeparamende idzo dzakazvivharira mune dzimwe dzimba dzikavanda pasi pamatafura. Vamamwe vatsigiri vaVaTrump vanoti zvinotaurwa nemukuru wavo zvekuti sarudzo dzakabirwa ndezvechokwadi. Imwe nhengo yedare reSenate, Amai Liz Cheney, vakati nhasi Chitatu, vachavhota kuti VaTrump vatongwe neparamende pamusoro pemhosva dzavanonzi vakapara mukukurudzira vatsigiri vavo kuti vakonzere mhirizhonga paCapital Hill nemusi weChitatu pakafa vanhu vashanu. VaTrump vari kuramba vachiti vakabirwa musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika kunyange hazvo matare edzimhosva makumi matanhatu akarasa zvichemo zvaVaTrump achiti hapana humbowo hunoratidza kuti sarudzo yakabirwa. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika vari mugari wemu Washington D.C. Doctor Frenk Guni, vanoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka mubato raVaTrump sezvo makambani mazhinji abuda pachena achiti haachapi mari kunhengo dzebato iri dzakakwikwidza kuti VaJoe Biden vakasarudzwa nevanhu pasina kubirirwa kwakaitwa. Makambani eSocial Media mazhinji, anosanganisa Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, Google nemamwe akavhara kuti VaTrump vasashandisa madandemutande awo. Doctor Guni vanoti mapurisa ari kushanda zvine simba kuitira kuti pakugadzwa nemusi weChitatu kwaVa Biden, pasave nebongozozo serakaonekwa svondo rapera. No media source currently available

headline: Huwandu hweMadzimai Akazvitakura Ari Kuonekwa neNyanzvi Hwokwira
text: Madzimai akazvitakura muZimbabwe anonzi ave kukoshesa kuenda kune vezveutano kunoongororwa nhumbu dzavo inonzi pachirungu Antenatal Care visits zvichienzaniswa nemakore akare. Mumwe chiremba, Doctor Fortune Nyamande, vanoti zvakakosha zvikuru kuti madzimai akazvitakura vave vachinoonekwa nguva nenguva kuitira kuti kana pane zvinonetsa zvigadziriswe. VaNyamande vatiwo madzimai akazvitakura ari kunoongororwa sezvinotarisirwa asiwo vakati pachine mamwe madzimai anononoka kunyoresa pamuviri kana vasinganoongororwi. Izvi zvatsigirwa naDr Nicholas Wazadza avo vatiwo zvakakosha kuti madzimai akazvitakura apote achinoongororwa vachiti izvi zvinodzikisa hupenyu hwemadzidzimai nevana hunorasika. Mumwe mukuru musangano rinoshanda nemadzimai munyaya dzehutano oasi rose, reUnited Nations Population Fund, Amai Abigail Musemberi, vati madzimai mazhinji ava kukwanisa kunoonekwa kana vabata pamuviri. Amai Musemburi vati zvimwe zvezvipingaidzo zviri kutadzisa kuenda kwemadzimai akazvitakura kunoongororwa inyaya yemufambo unenge uripo. Madzimai aitarisirwa kunovhenekwa pamuviri kana kusvika vabatsirwa asi sangano reWorld Health Organisation rakakwidza kuti madzimai achive achishanyira zvipatara kasere pavanenge vakazvitakura. Amai Musemburi vanoti vachiri kuongorora kuti madzimai ari kuzvigona here ikana kuti kwete zvekuonekwa kasere apo anenge aine pamuviri. No media source currently available

headline: VaBiti Votatsurana naVaMangudya neNyaya yeMari ye"Command Agriculture"
text: Gavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Doctor John Mangudya, nhasi vaudza komiti yeparamende kuti hapana chavakatadza apo vakashandisa mari inodarika mabhiriyoni matatu kutenga zvinhu pazvirongwa zvakaita sePresidential Input, Command nezvimwe muna 2017 na2018 vachiti zvese izvi zvakaitwa paine mvumo kubva kuhurumende. Sachigaro wekomiti iyi ndiVaTendai Biti vanova mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weMDC. Komiti iyi yange yakoka VaMangudya kuti vazotsanangura kuti sei RBZ yakashandisa mari inodarika mabhiriyoni matatu emadhora muna 2017 na 2018 zvisina mvumo yeparamende. VaBiti vaudza VaMangudya kuti komiti yavo yaita izvi mushure mekunge hofisi yaAuditor General yaburitsa magwaro anoratidza kuti RBZ yainge yashandisa mari isiri mubhajeti uye pasina mvumo yedare reparamende sezviri mubumbiro remutemo. VaBiti vabvunza VaMangudya kuti chii chakaita kuti vatyore mutemo wenyika. Asi VaMangudya vaudza komiti iyi kuti hapana mutemo wavakatyora vachiti vakatumwa nehurumende kuita zvese zvavakaita. Vati kana paka kanganiswa mutemo, gurukota rezvemari ndiro rinofanira kubvunzwa nekuti ndiro rakavapa mvumo yekubhadhara zvinhu zvakawanda zvakaita sezvinhu zvaishandiswa pazvirongwa zvakaita sePresidential Input Scheme, Command Agriculture pamwe nekubhadhara makambani akaita seZESA, ZISCOSTEEL nemamwe. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube sezvo vari kuRussia kumusangano weRussia Africa Summit. Asi VaBiti nevamwe vavo vati komiti yavo yakabvunzurudza vamwe vakuru vakuru mubazi rezvemari nerekurima avo vakataura kuti vainge vasingazive kuti mari dzainge dzabhadharwa neRBZ dzaive dzei. Asi VaMangudya vati zviri pachena kuti vakuru vakuru ava vanogona kunge vakanyepera komiti iyi kana kuti vainge vasingazive zveshuwa asi vakati bhanga ravo rine matsamba ese akabva kugurukota rezvemari richivaudza kuti vabhadhare makambani kana kutenga zvinhu zvakatenga. Imwe nyaya isina kufadza komiti iyi ndeyekuti maTreasury Bills akaburitswa neRBZ nebazi rezvemari ainge asina zvese zvinodiwa pamaTreasury Bills. VaMangudya vabvuma kuti apa vakati vachagadzirisa izvi mune remangwana. Pamusangano wanhasi pamboita kukandira makobvu nematete pakati paVaMangudya naVaBiti izvo zvisina kufadza dzimwe nhengo dzekomiti iyi. Mumwe asina kufara nekuita kwaVaMangudya naVaBiti ndiAmai Barbara Rwodzi avo vaudza vaviriri ava kuti varekemekedze dzimwe nhengo dzekomiti iyi kuti ikwanise kuita basa ravo zvakanaka. Komiti yaVaBiti iri kushushikana kuti mari dzehurumende dzakashandiswa zviri kunze kwemutemo zvikuru sei pazvirongwa zvakaita sePresidential Input Scheme neCommand Agriculture uye nemusi weMuvhuro unouya ichabvunzurudza zvakare vakuru vakuru mubazi rezvemari pamusoro penyaya iyi. Nhasi komiti iyi yange yakatarisirwa kutura gwaro rayo rekutanga pamusoro pemashandire eRBZ. No media source currently available

headline: Dare reSupreme Court muAmerica Rinorasa Chikumbiro ChaVaTrump Chekuti Zvakabuda Musarudzo Zviraswe
text: Dare repamusorosoro remuAmerica, reSupreme Court, neChishanu rakarasa nyaya yakanga ichitsigirwa nemutungamiri wenyika VaDonald Trump yekuti dare rirase zvakabuda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, izvo zvakaratidza kuti VaJoe Biden ndivo vakakunda. Danho redare reSupreme Court iri rasvitsa kumagumo kurwisa kwaVaTrump kwekuda kuti vatongi vematare ematunhu nevatongi venyika vatambire chikumbiro chavo. Mumutongo waro muchidimbu, dare repamusorosoro iri rakati dunhu reTexas harina masimba ekuendesa kumatare matunhu anoti Michigan, Georgia, Pennsylvania neWisconsin nekuti harina kuratidza zvikonzero zvinotambirika zvingaita kuti ripindire mukuitwa kwesarudzo nerimwe dunhu. Vatongi vanoti Justice Samuel Alito naJustice Clarence Thomas, vakambenge vati dare harina masimba ekurasa nyaya dziri pakati pematunhu, vachiti vaifanirwa kunzwa chinyunyuto chedunhu reTexas. Asi havaikwanisa kuita zvaidiwa neTexas pachimirirwa kugadziriswa kwenyaya nekusendekwa kwemavhoti makumi matanhatu nemaviri kana kuti 62 akawanikwa naVaBiden kubva kumatunhu mana aya. Vatongi vatatu vakadomwa naVaTrump vari kudare repamusorosoro iri. Mukuedza kwavo kuti mutongi wavakadoma, Justice Amy Coney Barrett, vakasike kutoreswa mhiko, VaTrump vakati vaidikanwa kuitira kuzobata nyaya dzaizosvitswa kumatare dzine chekuita nesarudzo. Justice Barrett vanoratidza kunge vakapindawo mukunzwikwa kwenyaya dzose svondo rino. Pavatongi vakadomwa naVaTrump vose, hapana zvinoratidza kuti vakapesana nevamwe vatongi munyaya dzose idzi. Mutongo uyu wakave wepiri svondo rino wekuraswa kwezvikumbiro zvebato reRepublican zvekuda kuti dare iri ripindire mune zvakabuda musarudzo dza 2020. Nemusi weChipiri vatongi vedare vakarasa zvakare chikumbiro chakanga chasvitswa kudare nenhengo dzebato reRepublican dziri mudunhu rePennsylvania. Chikwata chevanhu vanodomwa nematunhu ose emuAmerica chinovhota chichisarudza mutungamiri wenyika, kana kuti Electoral College, chiri kusangana neMuvhuro kuti chisarudze zviri pamutemo VaBiden semunhu achazove mutungamiri wenyika.

headline: Vakambotochwa Voungana kuNyanga Vacherechedzwa Zuva Ravo Pasi Rose
text: Masangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu abatana mukucherechedza zuva revanhu vakatochwa pasi rose, re Intenational Day In Support of Victims of Torture - muhurongwa hwaitirwa kuNyamaropa, kuNyanga, mudunhu reManicaland. Vanhu vanopfuura mazana matatu nemakumi matanhatu vakambotochwa vaungana vachirangarira zuva iri. Izvi zvaitwa muhurongwa hwanga huchikokerwa nemasangano anosanganisira Zimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, Zimbabwe Peace Project, Counselling Services Unit, pamwe neZimbabwe Political Victims Foundation Trust. United Nations yakatara muna 1997 kuti zuva iri richerechedzwe gore rega rega nemusi wa 26 Chikumi. Vanoona nezvekurongwa kwezvinhu muZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, VaTafadzwa Christmas, vanoti dambudziko guru riripo nderekuti Zimbabwe haisati yaisa ruoko rwayo pachiga che United Nations chinorambidza kutochwa kwevanhu pasi rose. “Isusu tinofunga kuti munhu anenge asangana nedambudziko rekutochwa anofanira kupiwa betsero yekuti agone kumira pachezvake zvekare nokuti kazhinji vanhu vanenge vakasangana nedambudziko vanosara vaine kusurukirwa kwakanyanya nokuti vanosara vasisagone kuita zvinhu sevamwe,” VaChristmas vakaudza Studio 7. Vanotizve nyaya yekuti Zimbabwe haina kuisa ruoko rwayo pagwaro rinorambidza kutochwa kwevanhu, zvinonetsa kugadzirisa kodzero dzevakambotochwa nekuti bumbiro remitemo yenyika haritauri zvakajeka pakurambidza kutochwa kwevanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Vatungamiri muZimbabwe neAfrica Voyambirwa Kuti Vatonge Zvakanaka Kuti Mauto Asarambe Achipidigure Hurumende
text: Nemusi weSvondo mauto emuGuinea achitungamirwa naColonel Mamady Doumbouya akapidigura hurumende yaVaAlpha Conde. VaConde avo vakavandudza bumbiro remutemo kuti varambe vachitungamira nyika iyi vakasarudzwa gore rapera musarudzo dzainge dziine mutauro wakanyanya. Izvi zvave kureva kuti muAfrica mauto apindira munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika muAfrica achiyedza kana kutopidigura hurumende kanodarika mazana maviri. Burkina Faso ndiyo ine mauto akapindira zvakanyanya kanosvika gumi ichiteverwa neNigeria kasere. Mauto akapidigurawo hurumende muZimbabwe muna 2017 kanova kekutanga zvichiitika munyika. Panyika dzemuAfrica makumi mashanu nenhatu, nyika makumi mana dzine mauto akapindira mukupidigura hurumende. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti zviri kuitika izvi zviri kudzosera Africa kumashure munyaya dzehutongo hwejekerere kunyangwe yange yambopemberera zvakaitika kuZambia uko kwakatambidzanwa masimba murunyararo. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu VaDewa Mavhinga vanoti vatungamiri venyika yeZimbabwe neAfrica vanofanira kukoshesa zvido zvevanhu kuti mauto asapindire munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Asi nhengo yeZanu-PF uye vaimbotungamira bato rinopikisa reDare vaGilbert Dzikiti vanoti chakakonzera kupindira kwemauto kuGuinea inyaya yekupindira munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika muAfrica kunoita France. No media source currently available

headline: Vakarwa Hondo Voshaikwa kuMusangano weZanu PF wePagore
text: Mutauriri wesangano reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterabs Association, VaDouglas mahiya vanoti sangano ravo harina kukokwa kuti rive pamusangano uyu sezvinosimboitika makore ose apfuura. Nhengo dzesangano revakarwa hondo yerusununguko dziri pasi paVaChristopher Mutsvangwa dzinoti hadzisi kuzoenda kumusangano wepagore weZanu PF, uyo uri kuitirwa kuMasvingo svondo rinouya. Mutauriri wesangano reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association, VaDouglas Mahiya, vanoti sangano ravo harina kukokwa kuti rive pamusangano uyu sezvinosimboitika makore ose apfuura, uye kana rikakokwa, harisi kuzoenda. VaMahiya vanoti chikonzero chikuru chakaita kuti sangano ravo risakokwa kumusangano weZanu PF uyu ndechekuti havawirirane nevari kutungamiri hurongwa hwemusangano uyu, vanove vechikwata cheG40 icho chinonzi chiri kurwisana nechikwa che Team Lacoste. “Eeh, ichokwadi kusvika pari zvino hatisati tatambira tsamba yekukokwa kuti tivewo pamwechete nechatakatambudzikira, pakaperera hupwere hwedu hwakakosha zvakadaro. Eeeh, hatisati tadaidzwa kumusangano iwoyo wakuitwa wevamwe vanhu isu tisipo,” VaMahiya vanodaro. Vanoti izvi zvichapinda munhoroondo yemusangano weZanu PF kuti kekutanga musangano wakadai waitwa pasina nhengo dzevakarwa hondo yerusununguko vakasarudzwa zviri pamutemo. VaMahiya vanoti kana vakazokokwa kuburikidza nehutungamiri hwavo, vachaenda kumusangano uyu kunotaurira vane simba pamusoro pematongerwo enyika nezviri kukanganiswa uye kutambura kuri kuita vanhu munyika pamwe nehuwori hwose. "Kana vakaendesa vachitaura nehutungamiri hwedu isusu tinoenda kumusangano kunovataurira zviri kukanganiswa nekutambudzika kuri kuita vanhu munyika muno umu munyaya dzeupfumi, munyaya dzemari, munyaya dzemabasa, nehuwori hwese hunowanikwa munyika muno umu. Ndopatinohutaura. Kwete tiri kure nevane simba pamusoro pazvo, but takatarisana navo," VaMahiya vanodaro. Panyaya yekuti zvimwe sangano ravo harina kukokwa sezvo hutungamiri hwavo hwakadzingwa mubato reZanu PF, VaMahiya vanoti havana kudzingwa muZanu PF asi kuti vakadzingwa muG40. "Aah, ndandichida kuti iwe ugadzirise kuti eeh, wataura kuti Zanu PF, asi dai wati kudzingwa mumusangano weG40 ndozvakaitika. Wedu musangano hatidzingiki nokuti tisu zvidhinha zvakavaka musangano iwoyo, saka hatidzingiki nemunhu, hapana anogona kutidzinga," VaMahiya vanotsanangura. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kune murongi wemisangano muZanu PF VaSaviour Kasukuwere. Musangano uyu uri kutarisirwa kutanga musi wa13 Zvita uchipera musi wa17. Dingindira remusangano uyu rinoti ZimAsset Murunyararo neKubatata, kana kuti ZimAsset in Peace and Unity. Vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvishanu vari kutarisirwa kupinda mumusangano uyu. No media source currently available

headline: Kusasununguka kweUpfumi Kwodzikisa Chimiro cheZimbabwe
