text: Kusamira zvakanaka kwenyaya dzeupfumi munyika kunonzi kwaita kuti Zimbabwe ive imwe yenyika nhatu dziri pasi dzinonzi hadzina rusununguko munyaya dzezveupfumi. Izvi zvakaburitswa netsvakurudzo yakaitwa nemakambani maviri avana chipangamazano anoti Heritage Foundation ne Wall Street Journal akabatana pamwechete. Tsvakurudzo iyi, iyo inonzi 2015 Index of Economic Freedom, inoratidza kuti Ziri pachinzvimbo chezana nemakumi manomwe neshanu, kubva munyika zana nemakumi manomwe nesere, iine zvibodzwa makumi matatu nezvinomwe. Masangano makuru maviri aya aitarisa zvinhu zvinobata rusununguko rweupfumi zvakaita semitemo yenyika, mitemo yezvemabhizimusi, kuvhurika kwemisika nezvimwe zvakadaro. Nyika nhatu dziri kumashure kweZimbabwe dzinoti Venezuela, Cuba neNorth Korea. Nyika gumi dziri pamusoro dzinoti Hong Kong, Singapore, New Zealand Austria, Canada, Switzerland, Chile, Ireland, Estonia neMauritius. Gore rapera Zimbabwe yaive pachinhambo chezana nemakumi manomwe nenhanhatu, zvichireva kuti gore rino yakakwira nechinzvimbo chimwe chete chete. Kutseketuka kweZimbabwe uku kunonzi kwakakonzerwa nekubatwa zvakanaka kwenyaya dzinosanganisira kushandiswa kwemari nehurumende. Studio7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamsa, kuti tinzwewo divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Asi nyanzvi mune zveupfumi uye vari mukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti Zimbabwe inokwanisa zvikuru kukwira kubva pachinhambo chinonyadzisa chayagara iri ichi kana chete ikabvuma kushandura mitemo yayo inobata zvemabhizimusi. No media source currently available

headline: VaJoram Gumbo Vopomerwa Mhosva yeHuori-ZACC Ichiti Haisati Yasumwa
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvemhando dzemoto, VaJoram Gumbo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuita zvehuori apo vaive gurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu. Bepanhau reHerald rinoti kambani yavo yekusona hembe inonzi JMCD yakapihwa basa nekambani yeZinara uye vachinzi vaitorawo mari kubva kukambani iyi yaive pasi pebazi ravo. Asi vachibvunzwa nebepanhau reHerald, VaGumbo vakaramba kuti vanoita zvehuori vachiti kambani yavo inotengeserawo mbatya kuZanu-PF mauto nemamwe mapazi ehurumende. VaGumbo vanonzi vaipihwawo mari kubva kuZINARA dzekuenda kuMalaysia kunoita basa reAir Zimbabwe risinei nekugadzira migwagwa sezvinoshandiswa homwe iyi. Komishina weZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission VaGoodson Nguni vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanga vasati vasumwa nezvenyaya iyi nekudaro hapana chavangataure parizvino. Nhengo yedare reparamende inomirira MDC kuKambuzuma VaWillas Madzimure vanove nhengo yeAfrican Parliamentarians Network Against Corruption uye vari mukomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemashandiro emapazi ehurumende avo vanoti zvakakosha kuti makurukota nenhengo dzedare reparamende vabude pachena panyaya yehupfumi hwavo vachangotora mhiko. No media source currently available  .

headline: Tino Kadewere ava kutambira kuSpain
text: MUTAMBI wemaWarriors, Tinotenda Philana Kadewere, aendeswa kuchikwata cheReal Club Deportivo Mallorca chekuSpain nechikwereti uko achatambira nhabvu yake mwaka uno achibva kuOlympic Lyon.   Chibvumirano chiri kuona Kadewere achienda kuMallorca chinosanganisira kuti chikwata ichi chinogona kuzomutenga kuita mutambi wavo zvachose kana akatamba zvinogutsa mwaka uno.   Kadewere abva aita mutambi wekutanga kubva muZimbabwe achinotambira nhabvu yake muligi reSpanish LaLiga.   Kuendeswa kwaaita kuMallorca neLyon kunotevera kushaiswa mukana wekutamba kwaange achiita zvichitevera kudzoka kwaAlexandre Lacazette kuchikwata chekuFrance ichi.   Pamusoro pezvo, kuArsenal kune vamwe vatambi vanoti Karl Toko Ekambi anobva kuCameroon, Mathis Cherki wekuFrance naMoussa Dembele wekuFrance zvakare avo vange vachitambiswa pamberi pake.

headline: Masoja Opomerwa Mhosva Yekuda Kuita Kafiramberi Vagari Vari Pamamwe Mapurazi ekuChegutu
text: Vamwe vevanhu vakagariswa patsva vanosanganisira vaimbove varwi vehondo yerusununguko vanoti vari kushungurudzwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti masoja mumapurazi ari pedyo neChegutu. Vakagariswa patsva ava vanoti masoja ainge akapfeka mbatya dzechiuto uye vaine motokari dzainge dzisina manhamba vakavashungurudza vachiti vabve pamapurazi eDorith neStanley pedyo neChegutu kana kuti vanoitwa kafiramberi. VaLivingstone Nyamadzawo avo vakanga vari muchiuto vanoti masoja mashanu akasvika pamba pavo akavataurira kuti vabve pamunda nekuti vakasabva vaizodzoka kuzovauraya. VaNyamadzawo avo vane tsamba kana kuti Offer Letter yepamunda pavari vanoti masoja aya akati havana basa nevezvematongerwo enyika sezvo vakabvisa vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Mumwe mugari VaMathew Paul vanoti masoja akauya kumba kwavo akafanana nevakauraya vanhu vatanhatu muHarare sezvo vainge vasingade kuzivikanwa kuti ndivanaani. VaPaul vanoti mumwe musoja akazvivisa saMuswere Moyo uye vakanomhan’ara kumapurisa emuChegutu. Amai Mairesi Nyirenda vanoti masoja akati pane vanhu vashanu vavari kuda kuuraya nekuda kwenzvimbo yavakagara. Amai Nyirenda vanoti vave kutya kusiya vana vavo vari vega nekuda kwekuita kwemasoja aya. VaNyamadzawo vanoti vave kutyira hupenyu hwavo sezvo vakambobviswa papurazi ravo gore rapera asi vakadzoserwa nematare. Sachigaro wekomiti yezveminda mudunhu reChegutu VaTariro Tom, vanoti havazive nezvehurongwa hwekubvisa vanhu pavagere sezvo pari kuitwa wongororo yekuti ndiani ane munda uye wakakura sei nedonzvo rekudimura mimwe minda ichipihwa vasina. VaTom vanoti parizvino komiti iyi iri mudunhu reHurungwe vachiti masoja aya ari kuita zvisiri pamutemo. Mumiriri weChegutu muparamende VaDexter Nduna avo vanonzi vaishoropodzwa nemasoja aya vanoti vanhu ava havasi masoja chaiwo sezvo vari kupesana nezviri kukurudzirwa nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuti zvinhu zvese zviitwe pamutemo. Mutauriri wemapurisa mudunhu reMashonaland West Inspector Clemence Mabgweazara vati titaure naAmai Charity Charamba avo vanga vasingadavire mbozhanhare yavo sezvo ivo vasingabvumirwe kutaura nyaya dzinechekuita nemasoja kune vatori venhau. Mutauriri wemauto VaEverson Mugwisi vati tivanyorere tsambambozha kuti vaferefete nyaya iyi. Asi pataenda kumhepo vange vange vasati vapindura mibvunzo iyi.

headline: VaChamisa Vanodoma VaNcube naVaKomichi seVatevedzeri Vavo
text: Mutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, vadoma VaWelshman Ncube pamwe naVaMorgen Komichi, sevatevedzeri vavo. VaNcube naVaKomichi vari kubatana naVaElias Mudzuri kuva vatevedzeri vatatu vaVaChamisa. VaChamisa vasimudzirawo Muzvare Thabitha Khumalo kuva sachigaro vebato, uye mutevedzeri wavo vari VaTendai Biti, avo vanga vari mutungamiri wePeople's Democratic Party. VaJacob Mafume ndivo mutauriri mutsva webato. VaMafume vanga vari mutauriri wePeople's Democratic Party. Mutauriri waVaChamisa, VaNkululeko Sibanda, vati vakaedza kuti nhaurirano nechikwata cheMDC-T chinotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe asi zvakakona n’anga murapwa achida. Asi mutevedzeri waMuzvare Khupe, VaObert Gutu, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hapana kumbobvira paita nhaurirano dzakadai pakati pechikwata chavo nechikwata chaVaChamisa. VaSibanda vati MDCT yaMuzvare Khupe yave kushanda neZanu PF ndosaka vari kuramba kushanda nevamwe vemapato anopikisa. Asi VaGutu vati zviri kutaurwa naVaSibanda izvi ndezvemugotsi matsuro. VaGutu vatiwo kugadzwa pazvigaro kwakaitwa VaNcube pamwe naVaBiti naMafume, hakusi pamutemo sezvo vachiti zvinzvimbo zvakadai zvinogadzwa vanhu pakongiresi chete. Asi VaMafume vaudza vatori venhau kuti VaChamisa vane masimba mubumbiro ravo remitemo rekuita izvi uye pamusoro pezvo vanoti vakapihwa masimba ekuita izvi nekomiti yepamusorosoro mubato ravo pakati pemakongiresi reNational Council. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemamwe mapato aive mumubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance akaita seZimbabwe People First neTransform Zimbabwe kuti tinzwe paamire panyaya yekupinda muMDC. Kunyange hazvo tatadza kutaura nemutauriri weTransform Zimbabwe, VaJustin Makota, avo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo, vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika mubato iri vanoti mutungamiri weTransform Zimbabwe, VaJacob Ngarivhume, vakamirira kuita musangano nehutungamiri hwebato ravo vasati vazivisa kuti votora gwara ripi panyaya iyi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti mapato ose anopikisa ari munyika akabatana kuita bato rimwe chete ane mukana wakakura kwazvo wekubvisa Zanu PF mumasimba pachaitwa sarudzo dzinotevera. No media source currently available

headline: VaMangudya Vanoti Dhiziri nePeturu Zvizere Munyika
text: Gavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Dr John Mangudya, vaudza komiti yeparamende inoona nezvemhando dzemoto kuti munyika mune mafuta emotokari akawanda uye vanhu vanofanira kuashandisa zvine mwero. Vatiwo mitsetse iri pamagaraji mazhinji inokonzerwa nekuti vanhu vari kutenga vachityira kuti achashaikwa zvakare. Vachipa humbowo pamusoro pemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika panyaya dzepeturu nedhiziri nezvimwe, VaMangudya vati nyika yakatenga mafuta akawanda zvekuti vanhu havafaniri kutenga mafuta zvematyira sezvari kuitwa pari zvino. Vati bhanga ravo rine zvirongwa zvekutenga mafuta kubva kumakambani akawanda uye pari zvino makambani emafuta ari kuendesa mafuta aya kumagaraji mazuva ose. Semuenzaniso, vati kambani yeTrafigura inounza munyika mamiriyoni gumi nemana emarita emafuta ayo inoendesa kumakambani ePUMA, Redan, CMED, Trek ne Genesis pasvondo rega rega, panguva imwe cheteyo Total ichiunza mamiriyoni gumi, Engen ichiunzawo mamiriyoni manomwe kozotiwo IPG ichiunza mamiriyoni manomwe. Vatiwo kune mamwe makambani akawanda anopinzawo mafuta munyika achiwana rubatsiro kubva kuRBZ. VaMangudya vati kunyange hazvo nyika iine dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari yekunze, bhanga ravo riri kupa makambani anounza mafuta munyika mari inokwana kutenga mafuta anokwanira nyika yese. Zimbabwe inoda zana nemakumi maviri emamiriyoni emadhora semari yekutenga mafuta mwedzi wega. Vati mitsetse iri kuonekwa zuva nezuva pamagaraji inokonzerwa nekuti vanhu vari kutenga mafuta vachinochengeta nekutengesa pamukoto sezvo vachitya kuti anogona kuzoshaikwa. Vatiwo huwandu hwemotokari hwakwirawo zvakanyanya zvekuti munyika mave nemotokari dzinosvika miriyoni nemazana masere. Mukuru weZimbabwe Engery Regulatory Authority, VaEddington Mazambani, vaudzawo komiti iyi kuti pave kudiwa kutora matanho anopedza dambudziko remafuta aya. Vati panodiwa kumutsiridza hurongwa kwekuti pashandiswe mabhazi nematireni kuitira kuderedza huwandu hwevanhu vanoshandisa motokari. No media source currently available

headline: Mbatya Tsaru Dzorambidzwa Kupinda Munyika
text: Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamassa, vaparura hurongwa hwavo hwekuongorora mashandiro ari kuita hupfumi kana kuti mid term fiscal policy review. No media source currently available Mukuparura chirongwa ichi, VaChinamasa vanoti vatora matanho akawanda akanangana nekusimudzira maindasitiri nekuwezdera mari yehurumende. Vchitura muparamende hurongwa hwepakati pegore hwemafambisirwo emari, VaChimanasa vati kunyange hazvo paine mitero yakakura pashangu nembatya tsaru, zvinhu zvange zviri kuramba zvichipinzwa munyika uye zvava kukanganisa maindasitiri emuno. Vati kutanga mwedzi unouya, zvinhu izvi zvinenge zvisisabvumidzwe kupinda munyika, uye zvikabatwa zvichatorwa nekuparadzwa. Vatiwo zvinhu zvakaita semafuta nesipo hazvichabvumidzwe kupinda munyika, sezvo nyika iri kuzvigadzira. Vati mbatya zhinji idzi dzinounza zvirwere munyika. VaChinamasa vawedzera mitero yemotokari tsaru dzinotengwa kunze kwenyika kana kuti surtax charge kubva pazvikamu makumi maviri kubva muzana kusvika pazvikamu makumi matatu nezvishanu kubva muzana. Mari iyi inobhadharwa pamusoro peimwe yeduty inove zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana VaChinamasa vatiwo hurumende iri ichasandura mutemo kuti machechi anoita mabasa ekutsvaga mari kana kuti profit abhadhare mutero kana kuti tax. Asi vati mari yechegumi nezvipo haisi kuzobhadhariswa mutero. VaChinamasa vatiwo hurumende iri kushishakana nenyaya yekuti mari zhinji yairi kuwana iri kuenda mukubhadhara vashandi nekudaro dare remakurukota rakatora danho rekuti mari inoenda kuvashandi inofanira kuderedzwa kubva pazvikamu makumi masere nezvitatu kubva muzana kusvika pazvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana. Vanoti izvi zvinoita kuti kurumende iwane mari yekushandisa mumabasa ebudiriro. Vaenderera mberi vachiti mutongo wakapihwa nedare repamusoro reSupreme Court unopa vashandirwi samba rekudzinga vashandi mushure mekuvapa chiziviso chemwedzi mutatu chete wakauya panguva iyo hurumende yange iri kuronga kuvandudza mitemo yevashandi kuti inakire vashandi nevashandirwi. Vati kuvandudzwa kwemutemo wevashandi kunofanira kuitwa pachitarisirwa kuti unofanira kupa mukana wekuti makambani akawanise kushanda zvakanaka vachiti pari zvino makambani akawanda ane zvikwereti zvemari yevashandi izvo zvinoatadzisa kuita basa nemazvo. Vapa semuenzaniso kambani yeZiscosteel iyo vati kunyange yakavhara makore akati kuti apfuura, mari dzevashandi dziri kuramba dzichiwedzera. Vatiwo hupfumi hwenyika hausi kuita zvakanaka uye izvi zviri kukonzerwa nekuti mabasa ekurima haasi kufamba zvakanaka uyewo maindasitiri haasikuita zvakanaka sezvo zvichidhura kuita bhizimisi munyika nekuda kwekudhura kwemari, nekudhura kwezvinhu zvakaita semagetsi nemvura. VaChinamasa vatiwo nekuda kwekusashanda zvakanaka kwehupfumi, hurumende yave kutarisira kuwana $3.6 billion gore rino kubva pane $3.9 billion yavange vachitarisira. VaChinamasa vati hurumende pamwe nevanhu vanofanira kuchinja maitiro avo kuitira kuti hupfumi hwenyika hubudirire. Mukuru wesangano rinomirira vemabhizimisi reZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, VaDavison Norupiri, vanoti matanho atorwa naVaChinamasa ekuchengetedza maindasitiri emuno akanaka chose uye vanoatsgira. Vatiwo zvakakosha kuti hurumende ideredze mari inoenda kuvashandi vachiti izvi zvinoipa mukana wekuita zvirongwa zvebudiriro. Mukuru weConferderation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaBusisa Moyo, vatiwo vanotsigirawo matanho atorwa naVaChinamasa. Gavhuna webhanga guru renyika, VaJohn Mangudya, pamwe nemutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vanga vari muparamende vachinzwa VaChinamasa vachitaura

headline: Boka reVezvitoro Rinokura muGore Rino Kunyange Paine Zvimhingamipinyi zveCovid-19
text: Vakuru vakati kuipa kwechimwe kunakana kwechimwe. Izvi ndizvo zvinenge zvakaitika muboka rezvekutengeserana revezvitoro, iro rinoti kunyange hazvo rakakanganiswa zvakanyanya nedenda reCovid-19 rakatokura nezvikamu zvishanu nechiga chimwe kubva muzana kana kuti 5.1 precent mugore rino. Izvi zvakaziviswa nemutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vezvitoro, reConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers VaDenford Mutashu svondo rapera vachiti vanofara kuti boka ravo rakakura nezvikamu zvavakanga vakatarisira gore rino kunyange hazvo rakasangana nezvimhingamipinyi zvakakonzerwa nedenda iri. Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vari mutungamiri webato rinopikisa re Nationalists Alliance Party uye vari nhengo ye Polad, VaDivine Hove, vanoti nyaya iyi ine mativi akati kuti kuti munhu anyatsonzwisisa zviri kuitika pasi apa, vachiti zvinenge zvakakosha kuti panzwisiswe kuti kukura kuri kutaurwa uku kuri kubva papi kuchienda papi. Asi imwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanotsanangura zvinotariswa pakukura kuri kutaurwa uku vachiti vanenge vachitarisa zvigadzirwa zvavanenge vatengesa mugore rino, vachienzanisa nezvavakatengesa mugore rapera. Asi VaHove vanoti kunyange hazvo pachida kunzwisiswa kuti zvinhu zviri kufamba sei, vanoti zvinenge zviri zvinhu zvakanaka chose kuti hupfumi hwenyika hwakakura munguva yezvimhingamipinyi zvedenda reCovid-19. Imwe nyanzvi yezvehupfumi uye vakambotungamira sangano reEmployers’ Confederation of Zimbabwe, EMCOZ, VaJohn Mufukare, vanotiwo kukura kweboka revezvitoro uku kwakave minana chaiyo pachitariswa matambudziko akawanda akakonzerwa neCovid-19 anosanganisira kuderedwa kwenguva dzekuvhurwa kwezvitoro, uye kumbovharwa kweboka revanozvishandira rinove ndiro rave guru kudarika vakabairwa zvitupa. Imwe nyanzvi vari munyori wezvehupfumi mubato reMDC-T, Doctor Tapiwa Mashakada vane mamwe maonero panyaya iyi, Asi Doctor Mashakada vanoti chinonetsa muboka iri inyaya yemitengo iri kuita chamurambamhuru. Vamwe vanotevera zvehupfumi vanoti kunyange pakaita matambudziko akadii, veruzhinji vanototi vatenge zvekudya nezvekupfeka, izvo zvinogona kunge zvakaita kuti boka iri rikure. Mune dzimwe nyika vanoongorora zvehupfumi vanoti boka iri rakatokura munguva yeCovid-19 ino sezvo vanhu vakawanda vakanga vasina zvekuita kunze kwekutenga zvinhu muzvitoro kana pamadandemitande. Sezvo nyika yatarisana nemwaka wekurima pamwe nezororo reKisimusi, boka rezvekutengesa iri rinogona kuwedzera zvakare kukura kwaro sezvo vanhu vari kuita besanwa muzvitoro. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Gumi neVashanu Vofa neKudya Hohwa hweMusango Hune Muchetura
text: Vanhu vana kubva kumhuri imwe chete vakafa mushure mekudya hohwa une muchetura kumusha weThandanani kuFilabusi Matabeleland South. Vamwe vanhu vana vanonzi vari kurwara zvakaipisisa vari muchipatara. Izvi zvave kureva kuti vanhu vanosvika gumi nevashanu vafa nekudya hohwa usingafanire kudyiwa nevanhu uhu. Bazi rinoona nezvehutano rinoti vanhu havafanire kungodya chero hohwa hwemusango sezvo humwe huchiuraya. Vamwe vanhu gumi nemumwe vakafawo kuMberengwa, Midlands svondo rapera mushure mekudyawo hohwa hune muchetura.

headline: Zvinhu Zvichakaminama Muzvipatara zveHurumende
text: Apo kudzokera kubasa kwavana chiremba kwange kusati kwaziviswa kune veruzhinji neChina masiakati, vamwe varwere vange vachiburitswa nehama dzavo muchipatara chepaChinhoyi vachinorapirwa kumba sezvo muchipatara ichi manga musina vana chiremba. Zvinhu zvanga zvasvika pakaoma pachipatara ichi izvo zvange zvave kumanikidza vamwe vanhu kuti vatore hama dzavo vachinodzirapisa kunana chiremba vakazvimirira. Muzvare Tariro Chinogwenya, avo vanogara na amai vavo mumusha unogara veruzhinji weChikonohono, vaudza Studio7 neChina masikati kuti amai vavo vakadimurwa gumbo nezuro nachiremba wavakatora kubva kuHarare uyo vakabhadhara madhora ekuAmerica mazana mana. Muzvare Chinogwenya vati amai vavo vakanonokerwa kurapwa sezvo vari murwere weshuga izvo zvakazokonzera kuti vadimurwe gumbo. Muzvare Chinogwenya vati vakaisa amai vavo muwadhi yakatsaurwa iyo vati inodhura sezvo vari kubhadhara madhora makumi matatu ekuAmerica pazuva. Mumwe mugari, Amai Cleopatra Tsomondo, vaudza Studio7 kuti vakaburitsa murume wavo muchipatara cheChinhoyi nekuti ainge asingarapwe zvakakwana. Amai Tsomondo vati mari yavari kubhadhara chiremba akazvimirira nemishonga yakawanda zvikuru. Mumwe murwere adzoserwa kumba nhasi, VaErick Madzimbamuto, vati vadzoserwa kumba vachinzi pachipatara hapana vanachiremba. Mumwe murwere anoda kuzivikanwa nezita rekuti Tawanda ati zvave pachena kuti vana mukoti havachashande sezvavanofanirwa kuita. Mukuru webazi rezvehutano mudunhu reMashonaland West, Dr Wencilus Nyamayaro, vati chipatara chemuChinhoyi chakaremerwa zvakanyanya sezvo varwere vematunhu madiki vachiendeswa pachipatara ichi. Mukuru wechipatara chemuChinhoyi, Dr Collet Mawire, vatiwo madhokotera anga asati ave pabasa panguva yashanyirwa chipatara ichi neStudio7. Vanhu vakawanda vari kutarisira kuti vana chiremba vachadzokera pamabasa avo nechimbi chimbi zvichitevera kumiswa kwaitwa kuramwa mabasa uku nesangano ravo reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, mubati wehomwe muZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Dr Prince Butau, vaudza Studio 7 kuti pachine zvinhu zvakawanda zvichiri kutauriranwa nehurumende sezvo zvichemo zvavo zvizhinji zvisati zvagadziriswa. No media source currently available

headline: GMAZ Inoti VaMnangagwa Vanoziva nezveNyaya yeMari Inofungidzirwa neParamende Kuti Haina Kufambiswa Zvakanaka
text: Sangano reGrain Millers Association kana kuti GMAZ nhasi razivisa paramende kuti rakabatsira Grain Marketing Board nemari yekugadzirisa matura ayo mushure mekunge rakumbirwa kuita izvi nemutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, panguva yavaive mutevevedzeri wemutungamiriri wenyika zvakare vari sachigaro wedare remakurukota ainona nezvekuti nyika yawana chikafu chakakwana kana kuti Food Security pachirungu. Avo ndisachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekurima, VaJustice Mayor Wadyajena, vachikandirana makobvu nematete nasachigaro weGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe, VaTafadzwa Musarara. VaMusarara, nhasi vaudza komiti yeparamende inoona nezvekurima, kuti vakapa kambani yehurumende yeGMB mari yekugadziria matura ayo muna 2016 mushure mekunge vakumbirwa kuita izvi naVaMnangagwa. Vaenderera mberi vakati vakaudzwa naVaMnangagwa kuti chirongwa cheCommand Agriculture chaizoburitswa goho rakanaka nekudaro vaida kuti GMB igadzisirise mataura ayo uye vaida kuti sangano ravo ribatsire panyaya iyi. Vati mushure mekutaura naVaMnangagwa, vakazoita mumwe musangano nevaive gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, apo vakazoita chibvumira chekubatsira GMB nemamiriyoni mapfumbamwe emadhora ekuAmerica. Vati vakabvumirana kuti hurumende yaizobhadhara mari iyi nekutengesera sangano ravo chibage nemutengo uri pasi izvo zvinove zvakazoitika. Kunyange hazvo VaMusarara vaburitsa magwaro avati anoratidza kuti mari iyi yakashandiswa kubva kubhanga ravo reMetbank pamwe nevanoongorora mari dzeGMAZ kana kuti auditors veBaker Tilly, GMB yaramba kuti yakawana mari kubva kuGMAZ. Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muGMB, VaClemence Guta, vati GMB yakagadzirisa matura ayo nemari yaitengwa chibage nenhengo dzeGMAZ. Panyaya yekuti bazi rezvemari raiziva nezvekubatsira kwakaitwa GMB neGMAZ, VaWadyajena vati paramende yakanyorera kugurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube avo vakataura kuti hapana humbowo rweizvi mubazi ravo uye havana zvavanoziva nezvenyaya iyi. VaWadyajena vati nekuda kwaizvozvo VaNcube vakati hapana humbowo hwavaikwanisa kupa komiti yavo. Komiti yaVaWadyajena yati iri kuenderera mberi nekuongorora nyaya iyi uye inoda kuti GMAZ iendese kuparamende magwaro aya kaita chibvumirano chekubatsira GMB nebazi rezvemari nezvimwe zvingabatsire komiti iyi panyaya iyi. Mune imwewo nyaya, komiti yaVaWadyajena yange ichida kuziva kuti GMAZ yakashandisa sei mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemanomwe emadhora ekuAmerica ayakapiwa neReserve Bank of Zimbabwe. VaMusarara vati mari iyi yakashandiswa kutenga gorosi kunze kwenyika. Vati mari iyi haina kupihwa kuGMAZ asi kuti yakapihwa kukambani yeHolbud iyo inove kambani yaiunza gorozi munyika. Asi VaWadyajena vati komiti yavo haina kugutsikana nezvetaurwa naVaMusarara uye vati kuferefetwa kwakaita neparamende kumakmbani akaita seZimbabwe Revenue Authority, kwaratidza kuti GMAZ haina kana kumbotenga gorosi kubva kunze kwenyika asi kuti izvi zvakatoitwa neimwewo kambani inonzi Drostky. VaMusarara vabvuma kuti Drostky ikambani yavo uye VaWadyajena vati komiti yavo iri kuenderera mberi nekuongororo kuti sei Droskty iri iyo yaitenga gorosi kubva kunze kwenyika ichishandisa mari yainge yapihwa GMAZ. Mangwana komiti yaVaWadyajena iri kutarisirwa kushanyira makambani aVaMusarara anoti Drostky neAlpha Grain apo iri kuenderera mberi nekuongororo nyaya iyi. Nyaya iyi yaifanira kunge yakaitwa gore rapfuura asi VaMusarara vakanyorera kumutauriri weparamende VaJacob Mudenda vachiti vaida kuti inzikwe nekomiti inoona nezvekushandisa kwemari yehurumende sezvo vaiona VaWadyajena semunhu aive nedivi raakarerekera. Asi hutungamiriri weparamende hwakagara pasi hukaona zvakakodzera kuti VaMusarara vamire pamberi pekomiti yaVaWadyajena ndokuvatumira masamanisi azovaunza kudare nhasi. VaWadyajena varatidzawo kusafara kuti VaMusarara pamwe nevashandi veGMAZ vaitaura kumapepanhau nezveongororo iyi uye vati kana zvikaitika zvekare vachatongwa nenyaya yekuzvidza dare. VaMusarara avo vauya negweta ravo varambidzwa kushandisa gweta ravo uyewo mutauriri wesangano reGMAZ, VaGarikai Chaunza, avo vange vatora mhiko yekuti vape humbowo vadzingwa mudare vachinzi vange vave kukanganisa komiti iyi. VaChaunza vayambirwawo kuti vacharangwa kana vakaramba vachitaura pamusoro penyaya iyi. Ongororo iyi iri kuenderera mberi uye VaMusarara pamwe nedzimwe nhengo dzeGMAZ vanzi vachakokwa zvakare kudare. No media source currently available

headline: RBZ Yoti Inomira neGwaro reMazita eVanhu Vari Kubira Nyika Mari Vachiburitsa Kunze
text:
Gavhuna webhanga guru renyika Doctor John Mangudya vanoti vanomira negwaro ravakaburitsa revanhu vavanoti vari kubira nyika mari vachiiyendesa kunze kwenyika zvisiri pamutemo. Arthur Chigoriwa anotipa nyaya inotevera. Gwaro rakaburitswa iri riri kushorwa nevakawanda vanoti vaitarisira kuona mazita evakuru-vakuru vezvematongerwo enyika sezvo vakawanda vavo vachinzi vanoendesa mari yehuwori kunze kwenyika. Asi VaMangudya vanoti vanomira negwaro ravo sezvo zviri kuita makabhani aya nevanhu ava zviri kuita kuti vanhu vashaye mari munyika. Panyaya yekuti pane vanhu vari kufungidzirwa nevakawanda kuti vari
kuita zvehuwori vachiburitsa mari, VaMangudya vanoti kana pane anoziva vanhu vacho ngaamhan'are. Mumwe mugari wemuChinhoyi, VaJasper Kawondera, vanoti gwaro rakaburitswa harina mazita evanhu vanofungidzirwa nevakawanda kuti vane mari dzakawandisa kunze kwenyika. VaKawondera vanoti zviri pachena kuti vanhu vakatiza munyika
vakaendesa mari kunze kwenyika zvisiri pamutemo iyo yavave kushandisa
pari zvino. Vanoti kune mazita ari pamiromo pevakawanda asiri mugwaro reRBZ iri, zvikuru vakuru-vakuru muhurumende, nemamwe mapoka ezvemabhizimusi, nematongerwo enyika. Mumwe mushandi weimwe kambani anoda kuzivikanwa nezita rekuti
Tambudzai anoti mazita akaburitswa mashoma sezvo kambani yavo iyo
inotengesa nzvimbo dzekuvaka dzimba kuvagari vari kunze kwenyika, asi
vachibhadharira mari yekutenga kuBritain. Mamwe makambani nevanhu vakaburitswa mazita avo vanoti zvakabuda mugwaro reRBZ manyepo sezvo vakapedzerana nebhanga guru renyika iri kare. Kunyange vakuru vemakambani varamba kudomwa nemazita vanoti vakapedzerana nebhangi guru renyika. Mumwe mushandi wekambani yeUnilever asina kuda kudomwa nezita anoti zita rekambani yake rakadomwa nekuda kwekusagona basa kwebhangi guru
renyika sezvo vakabhadhara mari yakabuda kare kare. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti vanhu vakaburitswa mugwaro iri vashoma zvichienzaniswa nemari yakambotaurwa iyo inosvika kumabhiriyoni ane chitsama. VaChitambara vanoti hurumende ichine mukana wekuzvichenesa kana ikaita
komishoni inoongorora kuburitswa kwemari munyika nemunhu wese. Kuburitsa mari zvisiri pamutemo kana kuwana mari kunze kwenyika munhu
asingataure kuhurumende mari yaanenge awana kuti abhadhare mutero
imhosva. Vamwe vanoona nezvehupfumi vanoti mitemo yakafanana nekurambidza
vemabhizinisi kudzosera mari yavanenge vashanda kumusha kwavo zvimwe
zvezvinhu zvinodzinga vemabhizinisi vekunze. Mamwe magweta anotiwo zvinonetsa kusunga vakaburitsa mari ava sezvo mutemo wacho usina kujeka. No media source currently available

headline: Zhoya apihwa ‘red card’ neFIFA
text: AIMBOVE munyori mukuru wevaridzi vepembe kuZIFA, Obert Zhoya, akatemerwa zvirango zvekuti asave nechekuita nenhabvu kwemakore mashanu zvichitevera kubatwa kwaakaitwa nemhosva yekushungurudza zvine chekuita nebonde varidzi vepembe vechidzimai.   Akabva aripiswa US$20 400.   Zhoya akasiya chigaro chake muna Kubvumbi gore rino apo FIFA yakatanga kuferefeta nyaya yakaendeswa kwavari nevanhu vaimupomera mhosva.   Zhoya akawanikwa aine mhosva nesangano reFIFA Adjudicatory Independent Ethics Committee. Muchinyorwa, FIFA, iyo isingade kunzwa nyaya dzine chekuita nekushungurudzwa, inoti chikwata chaiferefeta nyaya iyi chakagutsikana nehumboo hwachakawana panyaya yaZhoya.   “Mushure mekunyatsoongorora humboo hwakabva kune vakashungurudzwa zvichitevera kuferefetwa kwakaitwa nyaya iyi, chikwata cheInvestigatory neAdjudicatory Chamber chakagutsikana kuti Zhoya akatyora mutemo weArticle 23 (Protection of physical and mental integrity), Art. 25 (Abuse of position) uye Article 13 (General duties) yeCode of Ethics,” chinodaro chinyorwa cheFIFA.   Zhoya akaziviswa nezvemutongo wake uyu nezuro, zuva iro pakabva patanga zvirango zvaakatemerwa. Aimbove shefu waZhoya, Bryton Malandule ari kupomerwawo mhosva yekushungurudza varidzi vepembe vachidzimai uye nyaya yake iri kuferefetwa.   Nyaya dzekushungurudzwa nenzira yepabonde munhabvu, kubva kuhutungamiri kusvika kuvatsigiri, huri kuwanda muZimbabwe zvekuti vanamazvikokota vanoti nyaya yaZhoya inofanirwa kuve mucherechedzo kune vangade kuzopara mhosva dzakadai mune remangwana.

headline: South Africa Inoti Vabvakure Vachabaiwavo Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Hurumende yeSouth Africa yakazivisa kuti vanhu vese vari mu South Africa vachakwanisa kubaiwa mushonga wenhomba, kana kuti vaccine, wekudzivirira chirwere che Covid-19. Izvi zvinotevera gurukota reSouth Africa rinoona nezvehutano, VaZweli Mkhize, vazivisa kuti South Africa ichangobaya mushonga uyu pazvizvarwa zveSouth Africa chete, kwete vabvakure. Mushure mekushorwa zvikuru nenyanzvi dzezvehutano nemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, vakazivisa neMuvhuro kuti vanhu vakuru vose vari munyika iyi vachabaiywa mushonga uyu zvisinei kuti zvizvarwa zvekunyika ipi. Sangano reHuman Rights Watch, iro rakashoravo zvikuru hurumende yeSouth Africa payakange yataura zvekusarura vabvakure mukudzivirira chirwere ichi, rinoti izvi ndizvo zvinotarisirwa kuitwa munyika dzose, kusanganisa muSouth Africa. Mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kwe Africa, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti sezvo South Africa ine mbiri yekusarura vabvakure, sangano ravo richange rakatarisisa kuona kuti South Africa inoita here kana kuti kwete, zvayavimbisa kuita izvi. No media source currently available

headline: Hatikwate: Chegutu Pirates
text: CHIKWATA chenhabvu cheChegutu Pirates chinoti hachina chimwe chachinovhunduka apo chatarisana nekusangana neSimba Bhora FC mumutambo weAxis Solutions Super 8 Tournament svondo rino.   Mitambo iyi ichaona zvikwata zvange zviri muTop 8 zvichibandana apo ligi reNorthen Region Soccer League (NRSL) rakamboenda pazororo. Mumitambo iyi, kunze kweChegutu Pirates ichisangana neSimba Bhora FC, Herentals U20 FC ichatamba neBlack Mambas FC, Golden Eagles ichitatsurana neNgezi U19 FC uye Commando Bullets ichibandana neTrojan Stars FC.   Munyori mukuru weChegutu Pirates, Jeffrey Wachiseka, anoti vagadzirira mutambo uyu uye hapana chikwata chavanotya.   “Zvikwata zvose zvikuru, kusanganisira iyo Simba Bhora, tiri kusangana nayo svondo rino mumutambo weAxis Solutions Super 8 Tournament, takatombosangana nayo tikasvitsana kumiganhu.   “Haina kutikunda uye hatisati tambokundwa nezvikwata zvikuru, taitozvikunda. Saka tiri kuzvitemba kuti tine mukana mukuru wekufambira mberi mumutambo uyu,” anodaro Wachiseka.   Murairidzi weNgezi Under-19 FC, Klifton Kadurira, anoti chikwata chavo chiri kutamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura uye vanoda kubika vatambi vechidiki avo vanozotumira kuchikwata chevakuru.    Klifton Kadurira   “Isu tinofara kuve pakati pezvikwata zvisere zvakabudirira kuti zvigokwikwidza mumutambo weAxis Solutions Super 8 Tournament. Zvinorakidza kuti basa ratiri kuita rekubika vechidiki riri kufamba negwara chairo.   “Kutaura kuno, tine vatambi vatatu avo vave kutotambira muchikwata chevakuru. Saka ticharamba tichisevenza nevechidiki tichivabika.   “Mutambo weAxis Solutions Super 8 Cup tiri kuona kuti uri kusimudzira vatambi vedu vazhinji,” anodaro Kadurira.   Zvakadaro, neMugovera svondo rino apo Simba Bhora FC iri kutamba neChegutu Pirates, nemusi weSvondo kuchasangana Herantals U20 neBlack Mambas.

headline: Zanu PF Inoti Zvirango zveAmerica Ngazvibviswe
text: Mutungamiriri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, vakawedzera neMuvhuro rimwe gore pazvirango zvakatemerwa vakuru vakuru muhurumende yeZanu PF, pamwe nemakambani anodyidzana nehurumende yaVa Emmerson Mangagwa. VaTrump vakati maitiro evanhu vari pazvirango izvi anokanganisa kutonga kwejekerere. Vakatiwo kodzero dzevanhu vemuZimbabwe dziri kuramba dzichityorwa nehurumende yaVa Mnangagwa. VaTrump vakati sarudzo dzakaitwa munyikaa gore rapera dzaifanirwa kunge dzakapa mukana wekuti Zimbabwe ipinde munzira itsva, ichipa America mukana wekuti itange zvekare kudyidzana nayo, asi izvi hazvina kuitika. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri waVa Mnangagwa, Va George Charamba, kuti tinzwe divi ravo. Hatina wo kukwanisa kubata munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangagwa. Asi imwe nhengo yeZanu PF, uye vaimbove mumiriri weMpopoma Pelandaba mudare reNational Assembly, VaJoseph Tshuma, vanoti VaTrump havasi kuziva zvavari kutaura nekuti zvinhu zvinonetsa muZimbabwe hazvigone kugadziriswa nenguva pfupi. America yakatemera zvirango zvehupfumi nekufamba vakuru vakuru muhurumende yavaive yaVaRobert Mugabe muna 2003 zvicitevera kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu muZimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Mutongo weDare Unomanikidza Hurumende Kudzika Mutemo Unotara Mashandiro eMakurukota neVatevedzeri veMutungamiri weNyika Wotambirwa neMufaro
text: Dare repamusoro reHigh Court neChitatu rakapa mutongo wekuti gurukota rezvemitemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi pamwe negweta guru rehurumende, VaPrince Machaya, vange vabuda nemutemo unotara mitemo inofanirwa kuteverwa nevatevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika, makurukota pamwe nevatevedzeri vemakurukota mukuita mabasa avo kana vari muhofisi, kana kuti Code of Conduct. Vachipa mutongo wavo, mutongi weHigh Court Justice David Mangota vakapa vaviri ava mazuva makumi mana nemashanu (45) ekuti vange vabuda nebhiri iri uye ringe raendeswa kudare remakurukota. Mutongo uyu unotevera matanho ekuenda kumatare edzimhosva akatorwa nemumwe mudzidzi wezvemitemo wepachikoro chepamusorosoro cheZimbabwe Ezekiel Guti University, ZEGU, Nyasha Chirima, uyo aida kuti dare rimanikidze VaZiyambi pamwe naVaMachaya kuti vabude nebhiri iri sezvinokurudzirwa nechikamu 106 (3) chebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Vaive mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaKembo Mohadi, vakamanikidzwa kusiya basa mushure mekunge nyaya dzavo dzehupombwe dzaburitswa mumadandemutande. Svondo rapera mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakadzinga basa vaive mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekurima, VaDouglas Karoro, mushure mekunge vapomerwa nyaya dzehuwori. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaZiyambi Ziyambi sezvo vanga vasingadairi nharembozha yavo. Takundikanawo kubata VaMachaya kuti tinzwewo divi ravo panyaya iyi. Asi gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu vachishanda nesangano reAll Hands on Justice, VaKennedy Masiye, vanoti mutongo uyu mutongo wakanaka kwazvo uye wanga watononokesa. VaMasiye vanoti havaoni zvavo pachizotorwa matanho ekuti pange pave nemutemo uyu nekukasika, kunyange hazvo uri mutongo uri kuendesa zvinhu mugwara rakanaka. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Tagadzirira kudzoka kwePSL’
text: VARAIRIDZI vezvikwata zvakasiyana zvinokwikwidza muCastle Premier Soccer League (PSL) vanoti vakagadzirira kudzoka kwemitambo iyo iri kutanga nemusi weMugovera svondo rino zvichitevera makore maviri yakambomiswa senzira yekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Svondo rino, kuchange kusingadanwe anonzwa kunhandare dziri kumativi mana enyika uko zvikwata zvichatatsurana mumitambo yePSL yekutanga iyo yakapedzisira kutambwa mugore ra2019 apo FC Platinum yakahwina mukombe uyu kechitatu.   Varairidzi vakaita hurukuro neKwayedza svondo rino vanoti vane mufaro mukuru nekudzoka kwemitambo iyi.   Murairidzi wevakomana vatsva muPSL veCranborne Bullets – Nesbert ‘Yabo’ Saruchera – anoti chikwata chake chagadzirira zvakasimba kusangana nezvimwe zvavakabva nazvo kuDivision One. Mumutambo wekutanga, Cranborne Bullets ichasangana neChicken Inn kuLuveve Stadium kuBulawayo.   Yabo anoti mitambo yavange vachitamba yeChibuku Super Cup yakabatsira chaizvo kuumba chikwata chake apo chatarisana nemwaka wacho wekutanga muPSL.   “Yazosvika mitambo yatange takamirira kwenguva ndefu. Takatarisira zvikuru svondo rino apo tichatamba mutambo wedu wekutanga wePSL tichisangana neChicken Inn, maGamecocks. “Zvinhu zvatange takatarisira kwenguva ndefu asi tichikundikana kuzviita nekuda kwedenda reCovid iro range richidzorera mutambo wedu uyu kumashure. Iye zvino tave kutarisira mberi, mutambo wave kutsvuka ropa. Tingave tiri vadiki pazita sezvo tichangopinda muPSL asi tinovimbisa kuti tichatamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura,” anodaro Yabo.   Kuchiti murairidzi weTriangle United – Taurai Mangwiro – anoti kudzoka kwemitambo yePSL kunofadza asi zvakakosha kuti vose vane chekuita nenhabvu varangarire kuti denda reCovid-19 richiriko uye votora matanho ose ekuridzivirira.   “Iyi ndiyo nguva yatange takamirira kubva takaenda palockdown, taingoti nhabvu yedu ichanyatsodzoka rinhi. Iye zvino tine mufaro kuti tave kuchisimudzira mitambo yedu. “Asi zvakakosha kuti tirangarire kuti Covid-19 ichiriko haisati yapera. Saka patinenge tichitamba mitambo yedu titevedzere matanho ose anodiwa ekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda iri,” anodaro.   Chikwata chaMangwiro mutambo wacho wekutanga wemwaka uno chiri kunanga kuBulawayo uko chichasangana neBulawayo Chiefs. Murairidzi weChicken – Joey ‘Mafero’ Antipas – anoti mwaka wegore rino uchanakidza zvikuru sezvo vatsigiri vange vasuwa nhabvu.   Mafero, uyo chikwata chake cheGamecocks chakaburitswa muquarter-final yeChibuku Super Cup svondo radarika, anoti vachashanda nesimba kuti vagopedza vari pakati pezvikwata zvepamusoro. “Takatarisana nekudzoka kwemitambo yePSL, mutambo wedu mukuru wenhabvu munyika. Mutambo uyu pawange usingatambwe zvange zvichitirwadza, asi zvakakosha nekuti taive pakaoma senyika nekuda kweCovid-19. Isu tiri kutarisira zvikuru kutanga kwemitambo uye tinovimbisa kuti ticharwa semvumba mumitambo yedu tiyedze kusimudza mukombe watakambohwina 2015. Ndinoziva kuti zvakaoma nekuti tinenge tichikwikwidza nezvikwata zvakasimba,” anodaro Mafero.   Zvakadaro, kune mimwe mitambo iriko svondo rino, Dynamos ‘DeMbare’ inenge iri pamusha apo ichasangana neYadah Stars kuchiti vakaomana veBlack Rhinos vachange vari pamusha zvakare vachitatsurana neHighlanders.   FC Platinum iri kutanga mwaka wayo mutsva iri pamusha apo ichasanganawo nevakomana vachangopinda muPSL veTenax.

headline: Paramende Yozeya Mutemo weSarudzo weElectoral Amendment Bil
text: Dare reNational Assembly riri kuzeya mutemo wesarudzo weElectoral Amendment Bill, uye chibvumirano chemapato ezvematongerwo enyika chekuita sarudzo dzakachena dzisina mhirizhonga, cheElectoral Code of Conduct for Political Parties and Candidates and Other Stakeholders chapinzwawo mubhiri iri kuti chive mumutemo wesarudzo. Bhiri iri rakanangana nekuvanduza mitemo yesarudzo kuti nyika ikwanise kuita sarudzo dzakachena. Zvimwe zviri kudiwa nemapato anopikisa kuti mapato aya avewo nechekuita pamwe nekuongorora kudhindwa kwemagwaro ekuvhotesa kana kuti maballot papers. Mapato aya anodawo kuti mitemo yesarudzo usungire mapato kuti ape mukana wakaenzana kuvanhukadzi nevanhurume pazvinzvimbo zvese zvino kwikwidzwa musarudzo. Chibvumirano chemapato chekuita sarudzo dzakachena icho chapinzwa mumitemo yesarudzo, chinorambidza nyaya dzemhirizhonga uye chinosungira kuti vemapato, vemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira, vanokwikwidza musarudzo vapanane mukana pamwe nekuregawo vamwe vachitaura pfungwa dzavo pamwe nekupinda mumisangano pamadiro. Chibvumirano ichi chinosungurirawo kuti vanhu vapihwe mukana wekuzvishambadza uye chinoti vaye vachazenge vachibvisa kana kubvarurwa zvinyorwa zvevamwe kana kuti maposters, varangwe nemutemo. No media source currently available Chibvumirano ichi chinorambidzawo kutenga vavhoti kana kutyityidzira vanhu kuti vavhotere bato rinenge richida munhu. Chinorambidzawo vemapato kuti vataure zvinenge zvabuda musarudzo zvisati zvaziviswa neZimbabwe Electoral Commission. Mukuru wesangano rePlatform for Youth Development, VaClaris Madhuku, vati danho rekuisa chibvumirano chemapato mumutemo wesarudzo chakanaka chose. VaMadhuku vati sezvo wave mutemo vanenge vautyora vacharangwa. Vati kana mutemo mutsva wesarudzo ukatevedzwa, nyika inogona kuita sarudzo dzakachena. Chibvumirano ichi chinosungirawo vemapato ezvematongerwe enyika kurega vatapi venhau vachipinda mumisangano yawo yekutsvaga rutsigiro pamwe nekuvachengetedza. Mukuru weMedia Institute of Southern Africa – Zimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo, vati vanofara nenyaya yekuti vatapi venhau vachengetedzwe pavenenge vachiita basa ravo. VaMoyo vati vatapi venhau vanogara vachishungurudzwa nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika zvikuru munguva yesarudzo uye mutemo unofanira kubuda nezvirango zvakaomarara kune vanoshungurudza vatapi venhau. Dare richiri kuzeya bhiri iri uye rinotarisirwa kuripasisa chero nguva

headline: Vagari vekuMasvingo Vochema neKukwira kweMitengo yeZvekudya
text: Vagari vemudhorobha reMasvingo vochema-chema kuti mitengo yezvinhu, kunyanya chikafu, yakakwira zvisingaiti muzvitoro apo hurumende iri kuti mamiriro ehupfumi hwenyika hwaka gadzikana. Vamwe vagari vataura neStudio 7 vanoti vakashamisika svondo rino mitengo yezvikafu zvakaita sehupfu, mafuta ekubikisa pamwe nenyama zvamuka zvakakwira mutarara. Amai Rumbidzai Magomo vemumusha we Mucheke F, vanoti hupenyu huri kuramba huchivaomera nekukwira kwaita mitengo svondo rino. Chisaga chehupfu cinorema makirogiramu gumi chave kuita mazana mashanu nemakumi mashanu emadhora e RTGS kubva mumazana mana muchitoro che OK. Apowo kirogiramu imwe chete yenyama, yaiita mazana matatu emadhora eRtgs yave kuita mazana matanhatu emadhora akaraudzira, zvimwe chete nemafuta ekubikisa. Marita maviri aiita zana nemakumi manomwe emadhora ave kuita mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu emadhora e RTGS. Vagari vazhinji vanoti mitengo iri kukwira asi mihoro yavo isiri kukwira nekudaro zvichawedzera kutambura kwavo sezvo kuwana chikafu chakakwana kunenge konetsa. Muzvare Eve Mamombe, vanoti kukwira kuri kuita mitengo yechiakafu munyika kwovashaisa hope. Sangano rinomiriria vashandi munyika, reZimbabwe Congress of Trades Unions(ZCTU), rinoti mihoro yakatarwa nehurumende yevashandi vepasi inokwana zvikamu gumi nezviviri kubva muzana pamari inodiwa kushandiswa nemhuri yevanhu vashanu munyika. Sangano rinomirira vatengi munyika reConsumer Council of Zimbabwe rinotiwo mhuri yevanhu vatanhatu inoda mari inosvika zviuru makumi maviri nechimwe yemaRTGS apo vashandi vazhinji vachiwana mari isingapfuuri zviuru zvishanu zvemadhora emunyika pamwedzi. Mutungamiriri we ZCTU munyika VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti vashandi vari kunonga svosve nemuromo uye vadzorerwa munguva yehutongi hwevapambepfumi. Studio 7 yatadza kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi sezvo gurukota rezve maIndasitiri nekutengeserana munyika, Amai Sekai Nzenza vanga vasingadairi nharembozha yavo. Asi vachitaura mudare reparamende munguva pfupi yapera Amai Nzenza vakati hurumende iri kushushikana nekukwira kwemitengo uye vachashanda nemamwe mapazi ehurumende kuti vagadzirise nyaya iyi. Asi vamwe vagari vanoti zvinoshamisa kuti hurumende inogara ichiti zvinhu zvakanaka munyika iyo mitengo ichikwira kudai. VaLovemore Mashinga vanoti ivo nenyaya yekudhura kuri kuita zvinhu vave kutodya kashoma pazuva. Vanoona nezve hupfumi hwenyika vanoti mitengo iri kukwira mumari yemunyika nekuti iri kukwikwidzana ne mari yekunze yakasimba yeku America iyo yave kubvumidzwa kutenga. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vomanikidzwa Kutenga Hupfu neZvitupa
text: Vamwe vagari vemuChinhoyi vanoti havasi kufara nedanho rakatorwa nevamwe vanotengesa hupfu rekuti munhu aburitse chitupa chake kuti atenge hupfu. Zvitoro zvakaita seN. Richards, Gain Wholesale neOK Zimbabwe zvave kutengesera hupfu kune munhu anenge ayine chitupa chete. Danho iri riri kushorwa nevakawanda avo vari kuti zvinosiya vanhu vakawanda vasina zvitupa vachifa nenzara. Mumwe mugari wemuChinhoyi VaBasildon Kanonge vanoti zvekudya ikodzero yemunhu nekudaro haafanirwe kutadza kudya nekuti haana chitupa. Izvi zvatsigirwa naVaIsrael Nyandoro avo vanoti vanhu vakawanda havasikupihwa zvitupa kwamudzviti zvichinzi havana mapepa anogadzira zvitupa. Asi vamwe vakaita saAmai Cornilia Matekenya vanoti kutenga hupfu munhu aburitsa chitupa zviri kuita kuti hupfu hutengwe nevanhu vakawanda uye zvinoderedza huori. VaDesire Mapfumo vanoti zvose zviri kuitika zvinoreva kuti chikafu chishoma munyika nekudaro hurumende inofanirwa kuunza hupfu hwakawanda kuvanhu. Mukuru wechitoro cheN. Richards VaJohn Matikiti vanoti vari kuti munhu anoda hupfu anofanirwa kuuya nechitupa kuti vazvichenure kana vazobvunzwa kuti vakatengesera ani hupfu. Hupfu hweRoller Meal uhwo hwavekutengwa nemadhora makumi manomwe emabhondi kana RTGS sezvo vanohugaya vachipihwa mari nehurumende huri kunetsa munyika yose. Hurumende iri kufungawo kupa vanhu vanoshaiwa makuponi ekutenga hupfu senzira yekupedza huori munyaya dzezve kugaya nekutengeswa kwehupfu. Vamwe vanhu vari kupomerwa mhosva yekutanga hupfu muzvitoro nemari iri pasi vonoutengesa nemutengo wepamusoro pamukoto. World Food Programme inoti vanhu vanoda kusvika mamiriyoni masere vakatarisana nenzara inotyisa munyika uye vanoda kupihwa chikafu nechimbi chimbi. Izvi zvinonzi nesangano iri zvakakonzerwa nekusanaya zvakanaka kwemvura uye mitemo yehurumende iri kungovandudzwa chero nguva. No media source currently available

headline: Rodriguez odzika midzi kuMunich
text: (27) acharamba ari kuBayern Munich kusvika mwaka wegore rino wapera uye haasi kuzoenda kuArsenal kana, kuNapoli mwedzi uno.   Chizvarwa chekuColombia ichi, chiri kuBayern kwemwaka miviri nechikwereti kubva kuReal Madrid uye haasi kunyatsotamba sezvaangade achirairidzwa naNiko Kovac mwaka uno.   Akatadza kutamba mitambo mitanhatu yeBundesliga nemiviri yeChampions League mushure mekunge akuvara gumbo rake munaMbudzi ndokuzodzoka svondo radarika apo vakakunda Hoffenheim.   Mamiriro ezvinhu aya ndiwo akaita kuti pabude mashoko ekuti anogona kuenda kuArsenal kana kuti kuNapoli mwedzi uno kuti atambe kakawanda.   Asi, sekutaura kweESPN FC, Rodriguez acharamba ari kuBayern kusvika kondirakiti yake yapera panopera mwaka uno uye anogona kuramba ariko mwaka unotevera.   Zvimwe zviri mukondirakiti iyi zvakawiriranwa mugore ra2017, zvinotaura kuti Bayern inofanirwa kutenga mutambi uyu yobhadhara mari inosvika 37 miriyoni paunzi.   Rodriguez akwanisa kunwisa katatu nekubatsira vamwe vatambi kunwisa kaviri mumitambo 12 yaatambira chikwata cheBavaria ichi mwaka uno.   Anoshanda zvakanaka nemurairidzi weNapoli Carlo Ancelotti uyo waakashanda naye kuReal Madrid neBayern, asi hazvizivikanwe kuti vaviri ava vachasanganiswa zvakare here. – SportsMail Football

headline: Nyaya yeKuendeswa kweMasimba kuMatunhu Inotsviriridza paMusangano weStudio 7 kuBulawayo
text: Nyaya yekuendeswa kwemasimba kumatunhu yakatsviriridza pamusangano wakaitwa muBulawayo neChishanu manheru, vamwe vagari vachitsutsumwa zvikuru nekwavanoti kusarangarirwa nehurumende kwematunhu ekuMatabeleland. Pamusangano uyu, uyo wakaitwa nenhepfenyuro yeStudio 7 yakabatana neMedia Centre, pakaita makakatanwa makuru pamusoro pekuti chii chaizvo chinoreva kuendeswa kwemasimba kumatunhu. Asi vanhu vakawanda vaive pamusangano uyu vakaratidza pachena kuti havazi kufara nenyaya yekuparara kwemaindasitiri muguta reBulawayo pamwe nekusarira kumashure munyaya dzebudiriro kwavakati kuri kuita matunhu eMatabeleland. VaNqobizitha Dube, vanove mudzidzisi muzvidzidzo zvehupfumi uye vari mumwe wevatauri pamusangano uyu, vakati hazvishamise kuti nyaya yekuendeswa kwemasimba kumatunhu inokonzera makakatanwa sezvo ichibata raramo yeveruzhinji. VaDube vakati zvakakosha kuti vanhu munyika vabvumirane gwara kana nzira yakajeka yekuti izvi zvichaitwa nenzira ipi. Takunda Madzana mumwe wechidiki vaive pamusangano uyu. Takunda akati haabvumirane nepfungwa yekuti hupfumi hugovanwe kuchishandiswa huwandu hwevanhu vari mumatunhu akasiyana-siyana, achitiwo maonero ake ndeekuti kuendeswa kwemasimba kumatunhu haizi nyaya inofanirwa kunetsa. Vamwe vanhu vaive pamusangano uyu vakati nyaya yekuti kune vanhu vakawanda vanogara munzvimbo dzavasingabvi, humbimbindoga pamwe nehuwori kunyanya hunoitwa nevezvematongerwo enyika ndezvimwe zvinhu zvinokonzera kusarira kumashure kwematunhu ari munyika. Asi mutevedzeri wameya weguta reBulawayo VaTinashe Kambarami, avo vaivewo pamusangano uyu, vakati vanhu vemuZimbabwe havafanirwe kuitirana rusarura kuchishandiswa nyaya yerudzi kana kuti munhu anobva kupi, vachitiwo matambudziko akatarisana neveruzhinji munyika akangofanana. VaKambarami vakabvuma kuti huwori idambudziko guru munyika asi vakati kana kuchitariswa makanzura, pave nemitemo yakajeka inobatsira kudzivirira nyaya yehuwori. Mutauriri webato reZAPU, VaIphithule Maphosa, avo vaivepowo pamusangano uyu, vakaudza Studio 7 kuti kuendeswa kwemasimba kumatunhu kunogona kubatsira kupedza matambudziko everuzhinji munyika, asi vakati havazi kugutsikana nenzira iri kutorwa nehurumende mukuti danho iri rizadzikiswe. Musangano uyu waive wekupedzisira muchikamu chemisangano yakaitwa neStudio 7 ichishanda nesangano reMedia Centre munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana munyika senzira yekunzwa mafungiro everuzhinji panyaya dzebudiriro nezvimwe zvinovabata mumararamiro avo zuva nezuva. Misangano iyi yaiitwa nerutsigiro rwemuzinda wenyika yeAmerica muZimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Vasungwa Vodzidziswa Kurima Fodya kuBanket
text: Vasungwa nevakange vari muhusungwa vanosvika gumi nevatanhatu vepajeri rekuBanket, Mashonaland West vakaita zvidzidzo zvekurima fodya vakapiwa zvitupa. Mumwe wevakapiwa chitupa chekurima fodya pamhemberero yakaitwa svondo rino ndiVaMathias Mushambe vanogara kuMutorashanga. VaMushangwe avo vakagara mujeri kwemakore matanhatu mushure mekuwanikwa vaine mhosva yekutsika munhu nemotokari vanoti zvidzidzo zvekurima fodya zvakavayamura sezvo vave murimi wefodya anemukurumbira. VaMushangwe vanoti vave kutopinza vamwe vanhu basa mumunda wavo wefodya. Mumwe musungwa akapiwa chitupa chekurima fodya ndiVaWebster Tafadzwa Mubayiwa vekuDomboshava avo vakaburitswa mujeri mushure mekuregererwa nemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe mwedzi wapera vanoti varikutarisira kupiwa chidimbu chemunda kuti vagoratidza hunyanzvi hwavo hwekurima fodya. VaMubayiwa vanoti vanofara nekuburitswa mujeri vasati vapedza makore avakakatarirwa pamwe nekudzidziswa kurima fodya izvo vanoti zvichavayamura mukurarama. VaMushambe vanoti parizvino vave kutodzidzisawo vamwe vari munharaunda mavagere kurima fodya. Mutevedzeri wemukuru weZimbabwe Prison and Correctional Services (ZPCS) VaMoses Chihobvu vanoti kuti musungwa akwanise kupinda muchirongwa chekudzidziswa kurima fodya anofanirwa kunge aine chido nekudzidzira kurima fodya. VaChihobvu vanoti vanodzidzisa vasungwa vanenge vasarirwa negore rimwe chete kuti vabude muhusungwa. VaChihobvu vanoti dai hurumende yakwanisa kupa vasungwa ava mabasa kana vabuda sezvo vaveneruzivo. Asi mukuru mubazi rePublic Service Commission Amai Muchada vanoti izvi hazvikwanisike sezvo hurumende yakamira kupinza vanhu mabasa. Vasungwa vakapihwa zvitupa zvekurima fodya kubva zvatanga chirongwa ichi muna 2008 vanosvika zana namakumi manomwe nevapfumbamwe.

headline: Vanotakura Zvinhu Zvinopfuura nePamuganhu weNyika Voshora Mitemo Mitsva yeZimra
text: Vatyairi vemotokari dzinofamba neveruzhinji vachienda kunze kwenyika vanoti mutemo wakaiswa nebazi reZimbabwe Revenue Authority, Zimra, wekuti vazivise hurumende mazita evanhu nezvinhu zvavanenge vakatakura maawa matatu vasati vasvika pamuganhu wenyika wakaitwa zvechimbichimbi veruzhinji vasina kupihwa mukana wekupa pfungwa dzawo. Izvi zvinotevera chiziviso chakaitwa neZimra ichiti iri kutora danho iri senzira yekugadzirisa dambudziko rekunonoka kubatsira vanhu vanenge vachida kupinda munyika pamwe nekuti nyika ikurumidze kuwana mari yemitero yainenge ichitora kuvanhu nemakambani. Zimra inoti munhu anotadza kutevedza mutemo uyu anosungwa achibhadhariswa faindi. Mutungamiriri weZimbabwe Union of Drivers and Conductors, VaFradreck Maguramhinga, vanoti pabepa mutemo uyu unoratidza kuve wakanaka asi nguva zhinji mitemo iyi haitevedzerwi nehurumende. VaMaguramhinga vanotiwo zvakakoshawo kuti dai vedzimotokari dzinotakura veruzhinji vachipihwa mukana wekuisawo pfungwa dzavo panenge pachiiswa mitemo mitsva inovabata. VaMaguramhinga vanoti zvinganetsa pamutemo uyu inyaya yekuti vatyairi vanenge voda kuti vashandise michina inoratidza zvinenge zviri mumabhegi evafambi sezvo vachikwanisa kunyeberwa zvinenge zvakatakurwa nemunhu. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano re Labour Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaNyasha Muchichwa, vanoti kuti mutemo uyu ushande zvakanaka, panoda kunyatsotsanangurwa nzira dzekuti mazita evanhu nezvakatakurwa izvi zvinosvitswa sei kuZimra. Asi imwewo nyanzvi inoongorora zveupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera, vanoti havaoni mutemo uyu uchibudirira nekuti Zimra haisati yavanemishina yechizvino zvino inoita kuti zvairi kuda zvive nyore. Hurongwa hweZimra huri kuitwa zvichitevera mari yayakapihwa nebhanga reAfrican Development Bank kuitira kuti ivandudze mashandiro ayo kuburikidza nekutenga mishina yechizvino zvino inoita kuti Zimra ikurumidze kuwana mari yemitero inobhadharwa nevanhu nemakambani vanenge vachipinda nezvinhu kubva kune dzimwe nyika. Bhanga reAfrican Development Bank rakapa Zimra mamiriyoni masere emadhora ekuAmerica kuitira kuti bazi iri risimbaradze mashandiro aro pakubhadharwa kwemitero. Gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vakati mari iyi ichabatsira kusimbaradza ZIMRA panyaya dzekutambira mitero pamwe nekurerutsira veruzhinji nemakambani kubhadhara mitero. Vachitaurawo pakasainiranwa chibvumirano chekubatsira Zimra nemamwe mapazi ehurumende, Commissioner General we Zimra, Amai Faith Mazani, vakati mari yavakawana iyi ichavabatsira zvikuru pakuvandudza michina yavo nemabasa avo pakubhadharisa mitero yakasiyana siyana. No media source currently available

headline: Mitambo yekuEngland yamiswa
text: MITAMBO yeEngland Premier League yesvondo rino yamiswa nhasi zvichitevera kufa kwaQueen Elizabeth II nezuro manheru.   Great Britain yapinda mumazuva 10 ekuchema mambokadzi avo vakatonga nyika iyi kwemakore anodarika 70. Izvi zvaona England Football Association (FA) ichimisa mitambo yose yenhabvu yemuEngland yange ichazotambwa svondo rino.   Muchinyorwa chaburitswa neEngland FA inoti: “Zvichitevera musangano wataita nhasi mangwanani, zvikwata zvemuPremier League zvacherechedza Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II.   “Senzira yekukudza upenyu hwavo uhwo hwaive hwakatikoshera nenyika yedu uye senzira yekuvaremekedza, mitambo yesvondo rino yePremier League yambomiswa kusanganisira yemusi weMuvhuro.”

headline: Chirwere cheKorera Chonetsa muHarare
text: Hurumende inoti chirwere chekorera chauraya vanhu makumi maviri nemumwe, uye vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvitatu nemakumi matanhatu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kusvika pari zvino. Vachitaura nevatori venhau mushure mekusangana kwemapazi akasiyana-siyana ehurumende, gurukota rezveutano, VaObadiah Moyo, vati zvinosuwisa kuti nyika iri kurasikirwa nehupenyu hwevanhu nekuda kwezvirwere zvinorapika zvakaita sekorera. VaMoyo vati hurumende iri kutora matanho akasiyana siyana senzira yekupedza chirwere ichi, icho chanetsa mumisha inogara veruzhinji muHarare yakaita seGlen View, Budiriro neGlen Norah. VaMoyo vati kunyange hazvo kune dzimwe nzvimbo dzakaitawo seBuhera neMasvingo kwabatwa vanhu nekorera,tsvakiridzo dzavakaita dzinoratidza kuti vanhu ava vakabva muBudiriro neGlenview muHarare. VaMoyo vati hurumende iri kuendesa mvura yakachena kunzvimbo dzine dambudziko, kudzidzisa veruzhinji hutsanana pamwe nekubvisa vatengesi vemumigwagwakuGlenview nekuBudiriro. VaMoyo vati mapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police ndovachange vachibvisa vatengesi mumigwagwa vachiti mapurisa ekanzuru akatadza kuita izvi. VaMoyo vabvumawo kuti hutachiona hwekorera huriko hauchaurayiki nemishonga yekutanga first line antibiotic drugs. Vatiwo mishonga inodiwa kurapa chirwere ichi inodhura. Kunyange hazvo kune dzimwe nzvimbo kuri kurapwa chirwere ichi kuri kunzi hakuna mishonga yakakwana, VaMoyo vati pari zvino vanayo mishonga. Hurumende neChipiri yakatara korera sedambudziko guru rawira nyika. Zvichitevera danho rakatorwa nehurumende, mapurisa abva azivisawo kuti hapana misangano kana ma rally achaitwa muguta reHarare zvichitevera dambudziko rekorera. Zimbabwe inogara ichinetseka kurwisa dambudziko rezvirwere zvekorera neTyphoid nekuda kwemvura isina kuchena inoshandiswa nevagari pamwe nekuputika kwemvura dzetsvina kunyanya kumisha inogara veruzhinji. Pamusangano uyu, kanzuru yatiwo haina zvikwanisiro zvakakwana zvekuti igadzire nechimbichimbi kunenge kwaputika mvura dzetsvina idzi. Sangano reZimbabwe Doctor’s for Human Rights rinoti hurumende inofanirwa kuisa musoro pamwe chete kuitira kuti igadzirisa dambudziko rezvirwere zvemudumbu zvinoputika gore negore. Munyori musangano iri, VaEvans Masitara, vakurudzirawo veruzhinji kuti vakurumidze kuenda kuchipatara kana vakafungidzira kuti vane chirwere ichi huye kuti vanhu vabike zvekudya zvakanaka. Mugore ra2008 vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvina vakafa nechirwere chekorera. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti chirwere chekorera hachifanirwe kunge chichinetsa mukore uno sezvo chichikwanisa kudzivirirwa kuburikidza nekuita hutsanana pamwe nekunwa mvura yakachena. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vanhukadzi Votenda Kuwana Kuzvitonga
text: Vanhukadzi vakawanda vanoti kubva mugore ra1980 apo Zimbabwe yakawana kuzvitonga, hupenyu hwavo huri kuenda huchishanduka nguva nenguva nekuda kwematanho ari kutorwa nehurumende ekuona kuti madzimai nevanhurume vanofanirwa kupihwa mikana yakaenzana. No media source currently available Mugari wemuManicaland, Amai Moreblessing Shinya, murairidzi pachikoro chiri kwaMarange. Amai Shinya vanoti vanonzwa kufara nematanho ari kutorwa nehurumende pari zvinho ekuti madzimai ange anewo zvigaro zvepamusoro mune zvematongerwo enyika. Vanoti mikana yaveko mazuvano yakanaka uye yasiyana neemakore apfuura. Amai Shinya vanoti panguva ino zvinofadza kuona kuti madzimai awandawo muparamende uye nemuzvigaro zvepamusoro muhurumende - kunyange hazvo pachine zvakawanda zvinoda kuitwa. Muzvare Pamela Chitima vanoshanda nerimwe sangano rakazvimirira, rePeace Building and Development Foundation maMutare. Muzvare Chitima vanoti nguva yegochanhembe ndiyo yakarashwa nehurumende apo zvaingonzi nzvimbo yemudzimai mumba yokubikira, pamwe neyemusikarudzi. Muzvare Chitima vanoti vanofara zvikuru nematanho akaiswa ekuti vanasikana vawane dzidzo zvakaenderana nevanakomana izvo zviri kupa kuti pave nevanhukadzi vakawanda vanodzidza muzvikoro zvepamusoro soro. Muzvare Mandy Kanyemba mugari wemaMutare vachidzidza paZimbabwe Open University. Muzvare Kanyemba vanoti pane zvichakasarira zvinofanirwa kuitwa nehurumende sezvo kuwanira vanasikana, uye madzimai mikana muzvikoro nemumabasa zvisiri izvo zvega zvinokwaniswa kuitwa mukusimbaradza mudzimai wanhasi, kana mwanasikana wanhasi. Muzvare Kanyemba vanoti chinodiwa kuti madzimai akwanda ange ari pazvigaro zvepamusoro zvinobuda nesungawirirano, uye zvigaro izvi vanofanirwa kuzviwana nehunyanzvi, kwete zvekuitirwa tsvete. Muzvare Perpetual Guwila vanoshanda nesangano re-Zimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce maMutare. Muzvare Guwila vanoti mikana inonzi iripo yacho yekuti madzimai anowana haisi kunyatsobuda nemazvo. Vanoti madzimai akawanda ari kunyanya kuwanikwa mumabasa anoita basa repasi pasi. Vanoti izvi zvinofanirwa kugadziriswa kuitira kuti mabasa akawanda epamusoro, ange achitorwawo nevanhukadzi. Mumwe mugari wemuChikanga maMutare, Amai Tarisai Machipanda, vanoti kunyange hazvo hurumende iri kuedza kusimudzira madzimai, mamwe maitiro uye matauriro anoitwa nevamwe vakuru vari muhurumende, kusanganisira mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, anozvidza vanhukadzi izvo zvinovagumburisa. Amai Machipanda vanoti hurongwa hwekusumudzira madzimai hunofanirwa kuoneka mukuita zvese nemukutaura kwevakuru vemuhurumende kuitira kuti vanhukadzi, avo vakashanda zvakasimba munguva yehondo, vave neramangwana rakanaka munyaya dzose dzehupenyu. Kudzamara izvi zvaitika, vanhukadzi vakawanda vacharamba vachichema muhondo yavo yekuti varemekedzwewo munyaya dzose dzinobata nyika nehupenyu, sezviri kuitika kuvanhurume.

headline: Mumwe Mushandi wekuMajeri Opinzwa Munyatwa Achinzi Anotsigira VaChamisa
text: Sangano remagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights riri kushora zvikuru vebazi rezvekuchengetedzwa kwevasungwa reZimbabwe Prisons and Correctional Services nekuda kumisa basa mumwe mujeregadhi achipomerwa mhosva yekutsigira bato rinopikisa reMovement for Democratic Change rinotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa. Bazi remajeri reZimbabwe Prisons rakanyorera masamanisi kuna VaJohn Mahlabera vanoshanda kujeri reChiredzi kuMasvingo kuti vauye kuzotongwa musi wa 12 Chikumi vachipomerwa mhosva yekutyora chikamu chechitatu chemutemo yekushanda kwevanochengetedza vasungwa kana kuti Section 3(1) of the Prison (Sfaff) (Discipline) Regulations1984. VaMahlabera vari kupomerwa mhosva yekunyora mashoko patwitter vachiti “Huyai kuChiredzi mutungamiri wenyika” kana kuti “Come to Chiredzi my president”. Vebazi rezvekuchengetedzwa kwevasungwa vanoti mashoko aya akanyorwa mushure mekunge VaChamisa vaita musangano kuJerera Growth Point, kuZaka kuMasvingo. VeZimbabwe Prisons vanoti mashoko aya aizvidza zvikuru mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa uye VaMahlabera havana kodzero zvachose yekunyora sezvavakaita izvi. Vanhu vana vari kutarisirwa kupa huchapupu vachiroverera VaMahlabera mhosva uye dare richagara kuMasvingo kutonga nyaya yavo. VaMahlabera vanenge vachimirirwa naVaCollen Maboka uye VaBlessing Nyamaropa vanova nhengo dzeZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights. VaMaboke vanoti havaone mhosva yakaparwa naVaMahlabera. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nerimwe gweta remuMasvingo VaAmen Mafa vanoti bumbiro remutemo harirambidze vashandi vehurumende kutsigira bato ravanoda. Zimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights inoti kubva muna 2010 vanhu vanodarika mazana maviri vakasungwa nekunenerwa mhosva dzekuzvidza mutungamiri wenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yogunun'una neKurambidzwa Kutengesa Nyanga dzeNzou kuCITES
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwezviwanikwa Amai Oppah Muchinguri kashiri vari kushora zvikuru nyika dziri kuda kurambidza Zimbabwe kutengesa nyanga dzenzou dziri mudura maro. Amai Muchinguru-Kashiri vataura mashoko aya kumusangano weConvention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora kana kuti CITES uri kuitirwa kuJohannesburg, South Africa. Nyika dzakaita seKenya, China neAmerica dzinoti nyanga dzenzou hadzifanire kutengeswa sezvo zvichizokonzera kuti vari kuvhima nzou zvisiri pamutemo varambe vachizviita. Kenya mwedzi yapfuura yakapisa nyanga dzenzou dzayo dzose. Mukuru wesangano reU.S. Fish and Wildlife Service VaDan Ashe vanoti kuti nzou dzisapere dzose nyanga hadzifanire kutombotengeswa zvachose. Asi gurukota rinoona nezvehupfumi VaPatrick Chinamasa vanoti Zimbabwe ine nyanga dzenzou dzinopfuura mabhiriyoni mapfumbamwe mudura mayo uye inoda kuti dzitengeswe.

headline: Muzvare Nyagomo Vokurudzira Vari Kunze Kunonyoresa Kuvhota
text: Mutungamiri werimwe remapato anopikisa, reProgressive Democrats of Zimbabwe, Muzvare Barbara Nyagomo, vanoti bato ravo riri kushanda zvakasimba kukurudzira vana veZimbabwe vari munyika dzakapoteredza nyika vadzokere kumusha kunonyoresa kuti vazokwanisa kuvhota musarudzo dzegore rinouya. Muzvare Nyagomo vanoti vari kuita izvi munyika dzakaita seSouth Africa, Mozambique, Botswana neZambia. "Isusu tiri kunyanya kuisa simba rakawanda muSouth Africa, mune vana veZimbabwe vazhinji vatinoziva kuti vanokwanisa kuenda kumba vachino register kuti vavhote. Saka tiri kuita voters education ne awareness kuti vazive kuti sei vachifanira kuti vano register izvozvi, chero vakanga vaka register kubva muna 1980," Muzvare Nyagomo vanodaro. Muzvare Nyagomo, avo vari kuManchester kuBritain, vanoti hapana imwe nzira yekuti vari kunze kwenyika vakwanise kupinda musarudzo kunze kwekutoenda kumusha kunonyoresa, sezvo Zimbwbwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, yakatozivisa kare kuti haina mari yekuti ikwanise kunyoresa vese vari kunze kwenyika vari munyika dzavari kugara. Bato reProgressive Democrats of Zimbabwe riri mumubatanidzwa wemapato ari kurwira kuti mitemo ine chekuita nesarudzo ivandudzwe, weNational Electoral Reform Agenda, NERA. Mapato ari mumibatanidzwa yeNERA neCODE ari muSouth Africa pari zvino munhaurirano dzinonzi dzakanangana nekuedza kuumba mubatanidzwa pakati pemapoka maviri aya. No media source currently available

headline: Hama dzaVaLavender Chiwaya Dzinoti Mapurisa Adzirambira Mutumbi weMufi
text:
Paita makakatanwa akaipa pakati pemapurisa nemhuri yenhengo yeMDC Alliance, VaLavender Chiwaya, avo vakawanikwa vakafa neChishanu mangwanani. Makakatanwa aya atanga zvichitevera kutadza kuitwa ongororo yekuti chakakonzera kufa kwaVaChiwaya chii, kana kuti post-mortem neMugovera pachipatara chemuKaroi. Mushure mekutadza kuuya kwachiremba anoongorora mitumbi yevanhu vanenge vafa nedonzvo rekuona chinenge chauraya munhu, pazorongwa kuti mutumbi uyende kuHarare asi pashaikwa motokari inotakura chitunha. Hama dzemufi dzabva dzati zviri nani dzivige hama yadzo, asi mapurisa aramba kutambira izvi achiti ari kutevedza mutemo unobata mavigirwo anoitwa munhu anenge achifungidzirwa kuti akapondwa. Mutauriri wemhuri uye vari mukoma wemufi, VaJohannes Chiwaya, vati
havasi kufara nekurambirwa nemutumbi kuri kuitwa nemapurisa vachiti hapana chichashanduka.

VaChiwaya vati varombo zvekuti havana mari yekutenga zvekudya kana
rufu rwukatora nguva yakareba, uye munguva ino yeCovid-19, vanhu havafanirwe kuungana kwenguva yakareba. Asi mutauriri wemapurisa mudunhu reMashonaland West, VaIan Kohwera,
vati mapurisa ane kodzero yekuti ongororo iyitwe zvichienderana
nemafiro anenge aita munhu. Danho ratorwa nemapurisa rasiya vanhu vakapatsanurana vamwe vachiti
vanotsigira danho remapurisa kuitira kuti pabude chokwadi kuitira kuti vanhu vasapumhana uroyi sezviri kuitika, asi vamwe vachiti mufi akaurayiwa nekuda kwenyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, uye hapana chazvinobatsira kumirira ongororo yachiremba. VaChiwaya, avo vanga vari sachigaro weMDC Alliance we Ward 4 muHurungwe, uye vari kanzura, vakawanikwa vakafa neChishanu mangwanani pedyo nepamba pavo muKaroi mudunhu reMashonaland West. Matauriri wemapurisa munyika, VaPaul Nyati, vazivisa kuti mapurisa ari kuferefeta nyaya iyi, uye ane ruzivo rwezvakaitika manheru eChina apo VaChiwaya vanonzi vakatenga chibage chakagochwa pamwe nezvinodhaka vachibva vaoneka shamwari dzavo vachiti vava kuenda kumba. No media source currently available

headline: Dare reDzimhosva Rinobvisisa Muzvare Mahere, Tsitsi Dangarembga neVamwe Mari yeChibatiso
text: Mutauriri weMDC Alliance, Muzvare Fadzai Mahere, munyori wemabhuku ane mukurumbira pasi rose, Tsitsi Dangarembga, nevamwe negumi nemumwe chete vakasungwa neChishanu, vaburitswa muhusungwa zvichitevera kubhadhariswa kwavaitwa mari yechibatiso inoita zviuru zvishanu zvemadhora emaRTGS. Vasungwa ava vamiswa pamberi pedare mushure mekurara vari muchitokisi vachipomerwa mhosva yekutyora mirawu ye Covid-19 Regulations pamwe nekukurudzira zvemhirizhonga. Vasungwa ava vanzi nedare vadzoke kudare musi wa18 Gunyana. Muchichisi wenyaya idzi, VaMichael Reza, vaudza dare kuti vasungwa ava vakaratidzira zviri kunze kwemutemo vachiisa hupenyu hweveruzhinji panjodzi uye vakakurudzira mhirizhonga nekuratidzira kwavakaita. Kunyange hazvo magweta ari kumirira vanhu ava ati ane zvichemo, magweta aya ati achataura zvichemo izvi mudare pachadzoka nyaya iyi kudare. Hurumende haina kupikisa chikumbiro chekuti vasungwa ava vapihwe mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso zvaita kuti mutongi wedare, VaNgoni Nduna, vati vasungwa vese ava vabhadhare madhora zviuru zvishanu pamunhu semari yechibatiso. Zvaturwa nedare zvatsinhirwa nerimwe remagweta evasungwa ava, VaPaidamoyo Saurombe. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaTendai Biti, vashora hurumende nekusunga kwayakaita vanhu ava. VaBiti vakurudzira sangano remubatanidzwa wenyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica, reSADC, pamwe nemutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, kuti vashandise chigaro chavo sasachigaro weAfrican Union kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa muZimbabwe vachiti veruzhinji munyika vave kugara muhutapwa. Mumwe wevanhu vanga vari muhusungwa, VaLoveridge Chinzvende, vabhadhariswa zviuru zvishanu zvemadhora kuitira kuti vatongwe vachibva kumba kwavo. Vamwe vevanhu vamiswa mudare vanosanganisira Simon Drury, Tinashe Murapatsa, Nyasha Musendu, Josse Lots, Jessica Drury naTinotenda Muswe. Sangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights rinoti vanhu vanodarika makumi matanhatu vasungwa kusvika pari zvino, vachisungirwa nyaya yekuratifdzira kwanezuro, uye vanhu gumi nevatanhatu vakakuvara uye vanoda kurapwa. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rinoona nezvinoitika mukati menyika, VaKazembe Kazembe ,kuti tinzwe pamire hurumende pane zvataurwa neMDC Alliance izvi. Asi VaKazembe vakaudza vatori venhau svondo rino kuti hurumende haisi kuzopeta maoko ichisiya vemapato anopikisa vachikonzeresa kusagadzikana munyika kubudikidza nekuratidzira kwavakati hakusi pamutemo uye kwavakati kwaizopinza veruzhinji panjodzi sezvo chirwere cheCovid19 chiri kuuraya vanhu munyika. Zvichakadai, mapurisa nemasoja nhasi vaswera vachirambidza zvakare veruzhinji kupinda mudhorobha sezvakaitika nezuro pakange pashevedzerwa neveboka reJuly 31st Movement kuti veruzhinji varatidzire vachiti havasi kufara nehuori hwavanoti hwatekeshera munyika. Mapurisa nemasoja vawedzerawo kuvhara migwagwa yose inopinda mudhorobha zvaita kuti vanhu vashomanana vakwanisa kupinda mudhorobha, zvivatorere nguva yakareba kupinda mudhorobha. Gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti mauto anofanirwa kunge ari mamakamba awo, asi nepamusana pekuti munyika maita dambudziko reCovid-19, mauto aya ari kubatsira kuona kuti vanhu havasi kutyora mitemo yeCovid-19 Regulations. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa Oyedza Kurambidza Hurongwe hweKuratidzira Huri kunzi "Munhu Wese muRoad"
text: Masangano akawanda munyika anoti achange achiratidzira nemusi weChishanu pasi pechirongwa chinonzi “Munhu wese muRoad”. Masangano ari kuratidzira anosanganisira #Tajamuka/Sesijikile, #This Flower, #This Flag, Occupy Africa Unity Square, Bulawayo Youth Arise, ZINASU nemamwe. Masangano aya anoti haasi kufara nenyaya kuda kuparurwa kwemari yemabond notes nehurumende uye nyaya yehuori hunonzi hwatekeshera nenyika zvikuru muhurumende. Asi mapurisa kuburikidza nemukuru muHarare, Officer Commanding Police Harare Central District Chief Superintendent JT Chizemo vari kuramba kupa mvumo masangano aya kuti aratidzire. Mapurisa anodzivirira mhirizhonga atozara muHarare uye neChishanu anonzi achafumobata jongwe muromo kunodzivirira kuti vanhu vasaratidzire. Mapurisa anonzi ari kuda kusungawo VaStern Zvorwadza ve#This Flower naDr Patson Dzamara veOccupy Africa Unity Square vachi vapomera mhosva yekuronga kuratidzira uku. Asi VaJason Zhuwawu vebato reZanu-PF vanotungamira Team ZANU-PF Live, iyo ino buritsa mashoko ezvinenge zvichiitwa nebato iri, vati vanhu vari kuratidzira havana kana pfungwa dzekuvaka uye vanofanira kutaurirana nehurumende kwete kuratidzira. Asi VaZvorwadza vanoti hurumende inhinhi, haidi kunzwa pfungwa dzevanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Munhu Mumwe Chete Ofa neCovid-19 Hurumende Ichirwisa Kuti muZvikoro Musarambe Muine Dambudziko Iri
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti munhu mumwe chete akafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nemusi weSvondo zvasiya huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira hwave zviuru zvina nemazana matanhatu nemana kana kuti 4, 604. Vanhu zana nemakumi maviri kana kuti 120 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi uye pavanhu ava zvikamu makumi matatu nemasere kubva muzana vana vechikoro kuManicaland kune gumi, Matabeleland North makumi matatu nemumwe uye vashanu kubva kuBulawayo. Mukuru anoona nezvekurwisa denda reCovid-19 munyika Dr Agness Mahova vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kushanda neStudio 7 kuona kuti chirwere ichi hachirambe chichipararira muzvikoro. Vati vakatenga zvekuvhenekesa chirwere ichi zvakakwana uye vari kufara kuti vari kukwanisa kuti chisapararire munharaunda kubva kuzvikoro. No media source currently available Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera vave zviuru zana nemakumi maviri nemapfumbamwe zvine mazana matanhatu nemakumi maviri nemashanu kana kuti 129, 625. Vanhu zana nemakumi maviri nemumwe vakapora zvasiya vapora vave zana rezviuru nemakumi maviri nemaviri zvine mazana maviri nemakumi mana nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 122, 249. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba vave mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru makumi matatu nemanomwe zvine gumi nevatanhatu kana kuti 3 037, 013. Vabayiwa nhomba kechipiri sezvinokurudzirwa vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru zana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemanomwe zvine mazana matatu nemakumi matatu nemumwe kana kuti 2 197 331.

headline: Joyce orongera Fury
text: muboka reheavyweight, Joe Joyce, anoti anoda kurwa naTyson Fury munaKukadzi kana shasha yeWBC ikatadza kuwirirana naDillian White uyo waanofanirwa kusangana naye.   Joyce mumwe wevatambi vetsiva vari kusimukira zvikuru izvo zvamuona asati ambokundwa muboka iri uye akakunda Danile Dubois gore radarika naCarlos Takam gore rino.   Ishamwari yaFury uye vanombotamba mitambo yehushamwari vachigadzirira mitambo yavo yakasiyana.   Asi anoti izvozvo hazvimutadzise kuti vasangane vachirwira mabhande akasiyana. Joyce anoti akazvipira kuti mitambo yavo vari vaviri irongwe.   WBC yakaramba kutaura kuti Whyte ndiye anofanirwa kurwa naFury sezvo vachiri vakamirira kunzwa kudare reBoxing Board of Control. Whyte ndiye ange akamirira kurwira bhande iri kwenguva ndefu, kwemazuva anodarika 1,000 ariye mutambi anotaurwa nebhodhi rinotungamirira tsiva kuti arirwire. Saka akasvika pakukwidza nyaya iyi kumusoro kuti apihwe mukana wake. Asi kana akakundikana, Joyce akagadzirira kuti vasangane.   Anobvuma hake kuti anoremekedza Fury asi ndokumukurudzira kuti amurangarirewo. Akanyora padandemutande paTwitter kuti, ‘Ndine ruremekedzo rukuru kunaTyson Fury seshamwari yangu uye semutambi wetsiva. Asi, ndakasununguka kusvika munaKukadzi. Ngatizviite!”.   ‘The Juggernaut’, sezita rake remadunhurirwa uyo anonzi ndiye ari pamusoro pevamawe vatambi vese neWBO uye ari pechipiri kuWBC, ari kuda chaizvo kuramba achizvirakidza kuti ishasha mumutambo uyu waari kusimukira.   Svondo radarika akanyora paTwitter kuti, “Mukana wangu uchauya! Ingori nyaya yenguva chete, asi ichasvika.” – SportsMail.

headline: Dambudziko reMagwaro eKufambisa Rokanganisa Vari Kunze kweNyika
text: Rimwe gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu rinoti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zviri kutyorerwa kodzero dzazvo nekukundikana kwehurumende kuzviwanisa magwaro ekufambisa kana kuti masipoti nenguva inokodzera uye inotarisirwa nemunhu kuti ange awana gwaro rake. Mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu pasi rose, reHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti bumbiro remitemo yenyika rinopa kodzero kuvana veZimbabwe kuti vawane magwaro ekufambisa kana chero magwaro anokodzera kunge achiwanikwa nechizvarwa chenyika. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko ekuti hurumende yave kukundikana kudhinda magwaro ekufambisa aya nekuda kwekushaya mari yekunze yekutenga bepa pamwe ne ink zvinodiwa mukugadzirwa kwemagwaro aya. Vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika kumahofisi amabharani mukuru wenyika kana kuti Registrar-General vanoti pasipoti itsva yave kutora mwedzi inodarika makumi maviri isati yabuda, kuchitiwo kutora pasipoti yechimbichimbi kuchinzi kwave kutora mwedzi gumi nemisere kana kudarika. VaMavhinga vanoti dambudziko iri rinofanirwa kugadziriswa nechimbichimbi sezvo paine vanhu vakawanda vari kunze kwenyika vanoda kumutsiridza magwaro avo, vakaita sevari muSouth Africa vanoda magwaro ekushanda nekugara munyika iyi. Vanoti vamwe vari munyika vari kukanganiswa vanenge vachida kubuda munyika kuenda kunorapwa kunze kwenyika, kuenda kuzvikoro, kana kushanya chaiko. Muna Kubvumbi gore rino gurukota rezvemukati menyika, VaCain Mathema, vakaudza vatori venhau kuti hofisi yaRegistrar-General yaive iine magwaro anodarika mazana maviri ezviuru akanga akamirira kudhindwa. VaMathema vakati kana hofisi iyi ichishanda ine hudzamu hwekudhinda magwaro zviuru zvisere pazuva. No media source currently available

headline: Vanorarama neKutengesa muBulawayo Vowaniswa Mukana weKubaiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Rimwe sangano rinomiririra vanorarama nekutengesa muBulawayo, reBulawayo Vendors and Traders Association, rinoti rinotambira nemufaro chirongwa chehurumende chekubaya nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 kuvanhu vanorarama nekutengesa icho chaparurwa muguta iri. Mutevedzeri wemunyori anoona nezvezvirongwa musangano iri, uye vachiraramawo nekutengesa, Muzvare Debra Mukasa, vanoti vanofara nekuti hurumende yakanzwa chikumbiro chavo chekuti vanorarama nekutengesa vange vachibaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 kuitira kuti vakwanise kuvhura misika. Chirongwa ichi chaparurwa munzvimbo nhatu muBulawayo dzinoti City Hall, Renkini neSokusile, uye hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu zviuru gumi nezvishanu, kana kuti 15 000, mukati memazuva gumi senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda iri. Muzvare Mukasa vanoti vanotarisira kuti vamwe vasiri kutengesera mumisika yekanzuru vachabaiwawo nhomba iyi, sezvo kwanga kuchinzi vanhu vatange vaburitsa makadhi anoratidza pavanoshandira kuitira kuti vakwanise kubaiwa. Vanotiwo vanhu zviuru gumi nezvishanu vanonzi nehurumende ichabaya nhomba vashoma zvikuru, asi vanoti zvakakosha kuti chirongwa ichi chatomboparurwa sezvo vachitarisira kuti hurumende ichawedzera huwandu uhwu. No media source currently available

headline: Dare Rinonyima Zvakare Muzvare Masarira Mukana weKubvisa Chibatiso
text: Dare ramajisitereti rekuMbare muHarare, nhasi raramba chikumbiro chekuti nyaya iri kupomerwa Muzvare Linda Masarira nevamwe vavo iendeswe kudare repamusorosoro reConstitutional Court kuti zvinoongororwa kuti kodzero dzavo hadzina kutyorwa. Izvi zvinotevera kusungwa kwavakaitwa mumusha weMufakose kutanga kwemwedzi uno, pakuratidzira kwainge kwakarongwa nechikwata cheTajamuka/Sesijikile Campaign pamwe naPastor Evan Mawarire ve#This Flag. Mutongi wedare VaStan Mambanje varamba chikumbiro ichi vachiti dare iri rakatonga kare kuti vanhu vakange vaunzwa kudare paine nguva apo vakamira pamberi pedare iri nguva yapfuura. VaMambanje vati vawona zvichikodzera kuti nyaya iyi isakwidzwe kuConstitutional Court nekuti haina kupikiswa apo vakapa mutongo panyaya iyi. Nekudaro vati Muzvare Masarira nevamwe vavo vadzoke kudare zvakare musi wa11 Nyamavhuvhu. Gweta revasungwa ava, VaKudzai Kadzere vaudza Studio 7 kuti havana kufara nemutongo uyu sezvo zviri pachena kuti vanhu ava vakaunzwa kudare pave nemaawa makumi mashanu nematatu vasungwa, asi mutemo uchiti munhu anosungirwa kuuendeswa kudare mukati memaawa makumi mana nemasere asungwa. Vamwe vaMasarira gumi nevana kusanganisira vana vaviri vechikoro vari kutongwa vachibva kumba asi Masarira ari kutongwa achibva kutirongo sezvo achinzi ane rimwe gwaro rekuti asungwe kana kuti warrant of arrest pane imwe mhosva yaanonzi akapara kwaMutare. VaKadzere vati dare rarambawo kunzwa chikumbiro chavo chekuti Linda aendeswe kwaMutare kuti vandogadzirisa nyaya yewarrant of arrest iri. Vanoti kana nyaya iyi ikagadziriswa zvinovapa mukana wekuti vabhadhare mari yechibatiso kuti Masarira atongwe achibva kumba. Zvichakadai vanhu vakawanda kusanganisira vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu pamwe nevezvematongerwo enyika kubva kumapato akasiyana siyana vaungana pamatare amajisitireti ekuMbare vachitsigira Masarira nevamwe vake. Vamwe vange varipo ndiSenator Lilian Timveous veMDC T vekudunhu reMidlands. VaHardlife Mudzingwa veTajamuka vati kunyange hurumende ikaramba ichi vasunga Chimurenga chichaenderera mberi kudzamara zvinhu zvanaka munyika.
