Vati seTajamuka/Sesijikile, vachapinda mumigwagwa mwedzi unouya vachiratidzira kuti mutungamiriri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vasiye basa kana vasina kugadzirisa zvese zviri kunetsa munyika. Vati kunze kwekupinda mumigwagwa vane zvimwe zvirongwa zvakawanda zvavachaita nechinangwa chekuti VaMugabe vasiye basa. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reProject 263 Rinoenda kuDare reHigh Court Richida Kuwaniswa Gwaro reVavhoti repaDandemutande neZEC
text: Sangano rinoongora sarudzo reProject Vote 263 nemusi weChina rakakwira kudare repamusoro reHigh Court richida kuti dare rimanikidze Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, kuti iri wanise gwaro revavhoti repadandemutande, kana kuti electronic voters roll. Mukuru wesangano iri VaYoungerson Matete, vanoti ZEC haisi kuda kuvapa gwaro repadandemutande iri asi ichida kuti vatenge gwaro revavhoti remapepa, kana kuti hard copy, iro ravanoti riri kudhura zvakanyanya. VaMatete vanoti gwaro revavhoti rebepa riri kutengeswa nedhora rimwechete papeji, uye gwaro iri rine mapeji anodarika zana nemakumi masere ezviuru. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri weZEC, VaJasper Mangwana kuti tinzwe divi ravo, asi vakamboudza zvavo Studio 7 kuti komisheni yavo iri mushishi kugadzirisa gwaro revavhoti kuti riende padandemutande. Mamwe masangano akazvimirira pamwe nemapato anopikisa vari kunetsanawo neZEC pamusoro pegwaro revavhoti repadandemutande iri. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vabatwa neCovid-19 Vapfuura Mazana Mashanu Hurumende Ichiti Ichawedzera Dzidziso muVanhu
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika hwakakwira neMuvhuro kusvika pamazana mashanu negumi nevaviri (512) mushure mekunge vamwe vanhu makumi maviri nevatatu (23) vawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi pavanhu mazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nevashanu (535) vakaongororwa nezuro. Huwandu hwevanhu vapona kubva kudenda iri huchiri pamakumi matanhatu nevana (64), kuchitiwo vashaya vachiri vatanhatu kana kuti 6. Kuwanda kwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 uku kwaita kuti bazi rezvehutano riburitse mashoko padandemutande reTwitter richiti rave kuzosimbisa nyaya yekudzidzisa veruzhinji pamusoro pechirwere ichi pachiteverwa zvisungo zvakatarwa neWorld Health Organisation. Nyanzvi mune zvehutano dzakawanda dzagara dziri kukurudzira hurumende kuti iwedzere vanhu vari kuongororwa chirwere ichi pazuva, uye kuendesa dzidziso kumaruwa kuitira kuti veruzhinji vanzwisise nekukasika zviri kuitika kuitira kuti vasazobatwa vakavarairwa. Johns Hopkins University Hospital yemuAmerica inoti vanhu vabatwa neCovid-19 pasi rose vadarika mamiriyoni mapfumbamwe nezana rezviuru (9.1 million), America iri iyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nemazana matatu ezviuru (2.3 million) ichiteverwa neBrazil, iyo yadarikawo miriyoni nezana rezviuru (1.1 million). Mumatunhu akawanda eAmerica chirwere ichi chinonzi chave kukwira zvakare zvichitevera kunyevenutswa kwemutemo unorambidza kufambafamba kwevanhu. Nyanzvi mune zvehutano, Doctor Simbiso Ranga, avo vari muNorth Carolina muno muAmerica, vanoti huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi huri kukwira, kwete muZimbabwe chete, asi pasi rose, izvo anoti zvinofanirwa kutorerwa matanho nekukasika. Panyaya yekukwira kwehuwandu munyika, Doctor Ranga vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kuendesa hurongwa hwekuongorora vanhu akaita sekukurudzira vanhu kupfeka mamasiki, kugeza maoko, uyewo kuchengetedza vanenge vawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi kwavo voga. No media source currently available

headline: Chabvondoka kuNash Stella Netball
text: zvenetball zvemuzvikoro svondo rinotevera zvichatatsurana mumakwishu eNash Stella Netball 17 and Under Tournament ayo achaitirwa pachikoro chePamushana High School, kuMasvingo.Mutambo uyu uchatanga svondo rinotevera musi weChitatu uchizotarisirwa kuzopera neChishanu.   Mutungamiriri wesangano reNational Association of School Heads (NASH), Johnson Madhuku uyo anove zvakare mukuru wechikoro chePamushana anoti mutambo wegore rino uchanakidza kukunda ngoma kurira sezvo chikwata chavo chine huturu hwekukundwa kwachakaitwa gore radarika apo chakatorerwa mukombe uyo wachainge chine makore akawanda chichirambira nawo. “Gore rino Pamushana tine huturu hukuru nekutorerwa kwatakaitwa mukombe wedu gore radarika. Saka tiri kuvimbisa hondo yega-yega kune zvimwe zvikwata, zvichaonerera gore rino mirai muone.   “Tiri pamusha saka ticharwa semvumba kuti mukombe urambe unesu, usare mupurovhinzi yedu,” anodaro Madhuku.   Zvakadaro, NASH ichashandisa mutambo uyu kusarudza vatambi vachazonomirira nyika kumitambo yeConfederation of School Sports Association of Southern Africa (COSSASA).  “Semakore ese, mutambo uyu ndiwo watinoshandisa kusarudza chikwata chedu chatichazotumira kunokwikwidza kuCOSSASA.   |Saka zvikwata zvese ngazviuye zvitambe netball “Kana uchida kuzotambira nyika mumutambo wenetball unototangira mumitambo iyi ndiko kwatinosarudza vatambi votanga kubikwa kusvika vapinda muchikwata chevakuru. Vamwe vacho vakatotanga kutambira zvikwata zvevakuru vachiri vadiki saka ngavashandise mukana uyu,” anodaro Madhuku.   Farayi Garayi wekambani yeTanganda Tea — iyo iri kukotsvera makwikwi aya — anoti vakazvipira kusimudzira vanasikana vane zvipo mumutambo wenetball.   “Isu neNASH tiri bhande nebhurugwa uye ticharamba tichishanda nesimba tichisimudzira mutambo uyu,” anodaro Garayi.

headline: Zvinhu zvakasunga: Ndiraya
text: MURAIRIDZI weDynamos FC, Tonderai ‘Stanza’ Ndiraya, anoti mwaka wegore rino wakaoma zvikuru sezvo zvikwata zvose zvinokwikwidza muCastle Premiership zviri kutamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura.   DeMbare, iyo yakapedzisira kuhwina mukombe wePSL mugore ra2014 ichirairidzwa naKalisto Pasuwa, mwaka uno yatanga zvakanaka mumitambo yayo apo iri kuda kuhwina mukombe uyu kekutanga mumakore matanhatu.   Pari zvino chikwata ichi chakagara pechitatu nezvibodzwa 16 palog kubva mumitambo misere yachatamba uye chiri kutevera Chicken Inn iyo iri kutungamira neManica Diamond iri pechipiri.   Ndiraya anoti ari kuyemura nhabvu inodakadza iri kutambwa nezvikwata zvakasiyana zviri muPSL kunyangwe hazvo pasati patambwa mitambo yakawanda.   “Kutanga kwakaita mwaka wegore rino, zvikwata zvose zviri kutamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura iyo tiri kuona svondo rega-rega. Ini pachangu ndiri kuyemura nhabvu yandiri kuona ichitambwa kunyangwe hazvo mitambo yatambwa kusvika pari zvino ichiri yekutanga,” anodaro.   Apo mitambo yakambomiswa pazororo reKirisimasi, DeMbare yakatenga vatambi vane chitsama vakadai saEvans Katema, Ralph Kawondera, Keith Murera, Emmanuel Paga naIssa Sadiki. Ndiraya ari kurumbidza vatambi ava achiti vachabatsira kusimbisa chikwata chake apo mwaka uno vari kurwa semvumba kuti vagotora mukombe wePSL.   “Zvamunoziva kuti Dynamos tinotambira kuhwina mikombe yese yenhabvu uye gore rino ndizvo zvimwe chetezve. Tinofanirwa kutamba chaizvo kuti zvikwanisike saka tinenge tichitora mutambo sekuuya kwaunenge uchiita. Nevatambi vatsva vatakaunza muchikwata chedu avo vakatanga zvakanaka, tinovimba kuti vachatibatsira kuti tirambe tichisimukira tichihwina mitambo yedu,” anodaro Ndiraya.   DeMbare iri kusangana nechikwata cheSunshine City Boys cheHarare City nemusi weSvondo kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium mumutambo weHarare Derby. Zvikwata zvizviri izvi pazvakapedzisira kusangana mumutambo wePSL mugore ra2019, Harare City yakahwina 3-1.   Asi, gore radarika zvakambosangana mumutambo weChibuku Super Cup apo Dynamos yakahwina wekutanga 1-0 uye wechipiri ukazopera ari mangange 0-0.

headline: Nyanzvi Dzinoti Zimbabwe Ngaitaurirane neBhanga Guru Repasi Rose
text: Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi inoshanda nesangano re Labour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti Zimbabwe haina chimwe chekuita kunze kwekutaurirana nebhanga guru rinokweretesa mari reWorld Bank mkuitira kuti zvinhu zvifambe zvakanaka munyaya dzehupfumi. No media source currently available Zimbabwe ine chikwereti chemari inopfuura bhiriyoni imwe chete yemadhora. Mashoko aVaKanyenze anotsinhirwawo nevaimbova gurukota rezvehupfumi, VaTendai Biti. Vaviri ava vanoti pasina rubatsiro nyaya yekugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika inoramba iri zviroto. VaKanyenze vanotiwo Zimbabwe inofanirwa kutaurirana zvakare nesangano rinokweretesa pasi rose reInternational Monetary Fund. Zimbabwe ine zvikwereti zvekunze kwenyika zvinodarika mabhiriyoni mapfumbamwe ane zviuru zvipfumbamwe zvemadhora.

headline: ZITF Inotanga muBulawayo Vakawanda Vasina Mufaro
text: Vamwe vagari vemuBulawayo vanoti havachawone kukosha kwegungano remabhizimisi rinoitwa pagore rega rega reZimbabwe Internatiomnal Trade Fair ratanga muguta reBulawayo neChipiri. Vamwe vagari vemuBulawayo vanoti havachawone kukosha kwegungano remabhizimisi rinoitwa pagore rega rega reZimbabwe Internatiomnal Trade Fair kana kuti ZITF, iro ratanga muguta reBulawayo neChipiri. Vamwe vagari vataura neStudio 7 vati gungano reZITF raivapa mukana wekuti vaende nemhuri dzavo kunoona zvakasiyana siyana kuZITF asi vati mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi ave kuita kuti vasaona kukosha kwechiitiko ichi. Mumwe weavo vataura neStudio 7 ndemumwe mugari uyo angozvidoma nezita rekuti Amai Tawonga. Amai Tawonga vati ZITF iri kuuya panguva iyo vari kutotemwa nemusoro kuti vabatanidze mari yekubhadharira vana vavo chikoro sezvo zvikoro zviri kuvhurwa svondo rinouya. Mumwewo mugari, Muzvare Clara Moyo, vati vanosiendawo nevana vavo kuTrade Fair asi vati pari zvino zvinhu zvakavawomera, vakatsinhirawo kuti vari mushishi rekutsvaga mari yechikoro yevana vavo. VaTaipanei Mutadza vaimboshandira imwe yaive kambani hombe yaigadzira mbatya muBulawayo asi yakazovhara. VaMutadza vati vaive mumwe wevashandi vekambani iyi vaigara vachienda kuTrade Fair kunoratidza zvinhu zvaigadzirwa nekambani iyi. VaMutadza vanoti ivo semunhu ave kuedza kutangawo kuzvishandira pachavo vega, vanoona gungano reZITF rakakosha sezvo richivapa mukana wekuwana mazano ebhizimisi kune vamwe. Mumashoko avo kuvatapi venhau muBulawayo, sachigaro weZITF, VaBekhithemba Nkomo, vati kunyange hazvo mamiriro ezvehupfumi munyika asina kumira zvakanaka, vari kufadzwa nezviratidzwa zviri pagungano reZITF regore rino vachiti zviratidzwa izvi ndezvemhando yepamusoro kupfuura mamwe makore mashoma apfuura. Gungano reZITF richavhurwa zviri pamutemo nemusi wechishanu uye mutungamiri wenyika yeTogo ndiye achange ari munyarrikani pachiitiko ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weNyika VaMnangagwa Vanoshanya kuGuinea kweMazuva Maviri
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vasvika kuGuinea, uko vari kushanya kwemazuva maviri. Nhepfenyuro yeZBC inoti VaMnangagwa vatambirwa panhandare yeConakry Gbessia International nemutungamiri weGuinea, VaAlpha Conde. Mutungamiri wenyika vanonzi vakakokwa nemutungamiri weGuniea muna Chivabvu, asi vazowana nguva yekushanya iye zvino. Nyika mbiri idzi inonzi dziri kutarisira kusimbaradza hukama hwadzo munyaya dzekurima, mhando dzemoto, zvekuvaka, pamwe nezvimwe zvakawanda. Asi nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika vachitungamira sangano reProgressive Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, Doctor Takavafira Zhou vanoti nzendo dzaVaMnangagwa dzawandisa dzisina chimuko chadzinoburitsa chinobatsira nyika. Doctor Zhou vanoti VaMnangagwa vanofanirwa kutanga vagadzirisa matambudziko ari munyika vasati vasusukidza nyaya dzekutenderera nenyika dzepasi rino, sezvavanoti zvaiitwa nevaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Vanotiwo Guniea inyika ine hurombo kwazvo zvekuti haina chinotarisirwa kunzi ingawanisa Zimbabwe panguva ino yekushupika. No media source currently available Asi nhengo yeZanu PF VaFrenk Guni, avo vari muno muWashington D.C., vanoti rwendo rwaVaMnangagwa kuGuinea urwu rwakakosha zvikuru sezvo hurumende yavo iri kuedza kumutsiridza pamwe nekugadzirisa hukama nenyika dzose, zvisineyi nemamiriro adzakaita mune zveupfumi. VaGuni vanotiwo Guinea inyika yakawana kuzvitongwa kare zvichireva kuti inenge iine hunyanzvi mune zvimwe zvisati zvawanikwa neZimbabwe. Panyaya yekuti VaMnangagwa havafanirwe kungoenda kwese kwese, asi kuti dai vachitumira makurukota avo, VaGuni vanoti nyika yose inozviziva kuti gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusiso Moyo, avo vangadai vachitumwa nemutungamiri wenyika, havasi kunzwa zvakanaka. No media source currently available

headline: OK Zimbabwe Yopa Homwe yaMeya weHarare Rubatsiro Rwekupa Varombo
text: Vamwe vanoshaya muHarare vave kupinda muna 2020 vachinyemwerera mushure mekunge kambani yeOk Zimbabwe yapa masangano anobatsira vanoshaya chikafu nezvimwe pasi pehomwe yeHarare Mayor’s Cheer Fund. Vachituara pane chimwe chitoro chavo muHarare meshure mekutambidza meya weHarare, VaHebert Gomba chikafu nezvimwe zvinhu zvekushandisa, mukuru wekambani yeOK Zimbabwe, VaAlex Siyavora, vati gore negore kambani yavo inoita izvi senzira yeku rerutsira vanoshaya panguva ino apo veruzhiinji vanenge vachifara nekupembeera nehama neshamwari. Vati kambani yavo inoita izvi mumaguta madhorobha nenzvimbo dzese dzainoshandira senzira yekubatsira vaya vasina chekubata panguva ino. VaGomba vatenda zvikuru makambani akaita seOK Zimbabwe ayo vati anobatsira kanzuru nechikafu nezvimwe zvekupa kune vanoshaya pamazuva eKisimusi negorezva. Vatiwo homwe yavo yeMayor’s Cheer Fund haichamirira kimisimusi chete sezvo vanhu vachitambura gore rese. Vachitaura vakamirira musha weBoka reDonhodzo wekuHighfiled uyo unochengeta vakwegura, Amai Emilia Mkaratigwa, vatenda VaGomba neOK Zimbabwe nekuratidza rudo panguva ino vachiti chikafu chavawana chichabatsira zvikuru pamusha wavo. Nhengo yeZimbabwe Albino Association, Emmaculate Paidamoyo Chitsunza, anoti afara nezvaitwa nehomwe yaMayor’s Cheer Fund. Mamwe masangano awana Rubatsiro nhasi anosanganisira Tose Respite Care Centre, Jairos Jiri Southerton, Wheelchair Bound neHarare Children’s Home. Homwe yeMayor’s Cheer Fund, ihomwe inotambira rubatsiro runosanganisira chikafu, mbatya mari nezvimwe kubva kumakambani nemasangano akasiyana uye zvese izvi zvinozopihwa kumasangano anoriritira vanoshaya nameya weguta. Gore rino rino homwe iyi yakatsigirwa nemari inodarika zviuru mazana maviri zvemadhora. No media source currently available

headline: America Inoti Zimbabwe Haisi Kuzadzikisa Zvivimbiso zveKuvandudza Nyaya dzeMatongerwo eNyika
text: Hurumende yeAmerica inoti Zimbabwe haina zvizhinji zvairi kuvandudza munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika zvingapa kuti zvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vatungamiri vehurumende zvibviswe. Izvi zvabuda pamusangano waitwa neChitatu muWashington DC nesangano reCentre for Strategic and International Studies Strategic kana kuti CSISS razeya nyaya yemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika zvikuru nyaya yezvekudya uye zvingaitwe kugadzirisa matambudziko aya. Vachivhura hurukuro iyi, mutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru mubazi rezvekudyidzana nenyika dzemuAfrica muhurumende yeAmerica kana kuti Deputy Assistant Secretary of State, Bureau of African Affairs Ambassador Mathew Harrington, vati kunyange hazvo America yakabuda pachena kuti zvii zvainoda kuti zviitwe isati yabvisa zvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru vehurumende, zviri pachena kuti kuvakuru vehurumende yeZimbabwe muromo hauzarirwe nerwizi sezvo vari kungotaura kuti vari kuda kugadzirisa zvinhu asi pasina chabuda. Vamwe vakataura pamusangano uyu mukuru mubazi rezverubatsiro muZimbabwe mubazi reUSAID, VaJason Taylor. Vamwe vange varipo ndevakafanobata chigaro chemukuru anoongorora mamiriro ezvekudya musangano reFewsnet, VaPeter Thomas, uye nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vari chipangamazano chehurumende, Muzvinafundo Ashok Chakravarti. Muzvinafundo Chakravarti vati zvirango zviri kukonzera matambudziko uye zvinofanira kubviswa. Asi vachipindurawo VaJason vati handi chokwadi kuti Zimbabwe iri kutadza kubudirira nenyaya yemutemo wezvirango weZimbabwe Democracy and Economic Recovery Act kana kuti (ZIDERA) vachiti chiri kupa kuti Zimbabwe itadze kupihwa mari inyaya yekutadza kubhadhara zvikwereti. Panyaya dzezvekudya, VaThomas vati vanhu vakawanda munyika vakatarisana nenzara inotyisa. VaTaylor vanoti zvinhu zvikasagadziriswa munyika munogona kusagadzikana vanhu vachiratidzira sezvakaitika muna Ndira pakawedzerwa mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari kunyangwe havo vatenda kuti vanhu vemuZimbabwe havadi zvekurwisana zvinopa kuti munyika musadeuke ropa. Mutemo weZIDERA wakadzikwa nedare reCongress remuAmerica iro raipomera vatungamiri venyika yeZimbabwe mhosva yekutonga nedemo. No media source currently available

headline: European Union Inoburitsa Gwaro reSarudzo dzeZimbabwe dza2018 Ichiyambira Kuti Sarudzo dza2023 Dzinogona Kusagadzikana neKujeka
text: Sangano reEuropean Union raburitsa gwaro raro rekupedzisira riri pamusoro peongororo yarakaita yesarudzo dzakaitwa muZimbabwe muna 2018, richiti kana zvimwe zvine chekuita nesarudzo zvakakomekedzwa kuti zvigadziriswe zvisina kubatwa sarudzo dza2023 dzinenge dzisina kujeka uye dzisina runyararo. Sangano iri rinoti pazvikomekedzwa zvayo zvose zvinokwana kuita makumi maviri nezvitatu, zviviri chete ndizvo zvabatwabatwa. EU inoyambira kuti nhandare yekutsvaga rutsigiro haina kuenzana, asi ichiti kana bhiri rekuvandudza mutemo wesarudzo rakatambirwa riri zvariri, rinogona kuunza shanduko dzinooneka kusarudzo Studio 7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezvemitemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi kuti tinzwe pasvika nyika nekuvandidza zviga zvine chekuita nesarudzo izvi. Asi mushandi mukuru anoona nezvezvirongwa musangano reElection Resource Centre, VaSolomon Bobosibunu, vanoti kunyange hazvo sarudzo dzaswedera, pachine nguva yekuti zviga zvakakomekedzwa izvi zvivandudzwe kuti sarudzo dzigoitwa murunyararo. No media source currently available

headline: Varwere Voshaya Vanovabatsira Muzvipatara Zvikuru zveHurumende
text: Zvinhu zvave kuramba zvichiita manyama amire nerongo muzvipatara zvikuru muguta reBulawayo mushure mekunge vana mukoti nevamwe vashandi vemuzvipatara vatangawo kuramwa mabasa senzira yekupa rutsigiro kuna vanachiremba vave nemasvondo maviri vachiramwa mabasa. Studio 7 payasvika pachipatara cheMpilo Central Hospital yawana panzvimbo dzinorapirwa vanhu vanobva kumba kana kuti Outpatient Department pamwe neCasualty Department paine vanhu vashoma zvikuru. Vanhu vazoudzwa kunzi vadzokere kudzimba dzavo mushure mekunge vana mukoti nevamwe vashandi vehurumende vaita musangano apo vatora chisungo chekutanga kuramwawo mabasa senzira yekutsigira vana chiremba avo vakatanga kuramwa mabasa masvondo maviri apfuura. Mumwe murume asina kuda kudomwa nezita ati kubva nemusi weMuvhuro ange achiuya nababa vake kuti vazoongororwa navana chiremba paMpilo asi vasingawane rubatsiro. Murume uyu ati hurumende inofanirwa kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavana chiremba nevamwe vashandi vemuzvipatara. Muzvare Dorcas Mpofu avo vange vaperekedza sekuru vavo kuti vazorapwawo paMpilo vati havachaziva zvekuita vakatsinhirawo kuti dai hurumende yaona zvaingaita. Mukuru waana chiremba paMpilo Hospital, Dr Solwayo Ngwenya, vati chimwe chikamu chishoma chavanachiremba chakauya kubasa asi vabvuma kuti vana chiremba pamwe nevamwe vashandi vemuzvipatara havazi kufara uye vakawanda vavo havana kuuya kubasa nemusi weChitatu zvekuti zvinhu zvikaramba zvakadaro, hupenyu hweveruzhinji hunenge hwave munjodzi. Pamashoko ari kubuda mumapepanhau ehurumende ekuti hurumende iri kuunza vana chiremba vemuchiuto muzvipatara, Dr Ngwenya vati havasati vanzwa nezvavo. Sangano reZimbabwe Nurses Association rakaita musangano nezuro muHarare pamwe nemasangano anomirira vashandi vemuzvipatara, vakatora danho rekutangawo kuramwa mabasa kutanga nhasi. Mamiriro ezvhinhu paUnited Bulawayo Hospitals ange ari mamwe chete vana chiremba vakawanda vasiri pabasa uye vanoziva zviri kuitika vaudza Studio 7 kuti vana mukoti vakawanda vange vasiri pabasa. Mumwe murume wechikuru, VaMabuku Ndlovu, avo vange vauya kuti vazoonekwa nachiremba paUBH vati vaudzwa kuti havakwanise kuonekwa nekuti vana chiremba vange vasiri pabasa. Mukuru wavana chiremba pachipatara ichi, Dr Narcisius Dzvanga, vati havakwanise kutaura nesu sezvo vange vari mumusangano. Vana chiremba vakawedzera kuramwa kwavo mabasa zvichitevera kupambwa kwakaita Dr Peter Magombeyi avo vange vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri wesangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association. No media source currently available

headline: Muzvare Mamombe Vanonzi Havasi Kunzwa Zvakanaka Mujeri Mavari kuChikurubi
text: Mumiriri weHarare West mudare reparamende, Muzvare Joana Mamombe, avo vari mujeri reChikurubui mushure mekunyimwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso kaviri nematare, vanonzi havasi kunzwa zvakanaka. Muzvare Mamombe nemutevedzeri wasachigaro mubato revechidiki reMDC Alliance Youth Assembly, Muzvare Cecilia Chimbiri, vakasungwa vachipomerwa mhosva yekutyora mitemo ine chekuita neCovid-19 vachinzi vainge vataura nevatori venhau panze pedare ramejastiriti muHarare. Asi vamwe vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanoti vari kuishamisika kuti sei vamwe kubato riri kutonga reZanu-PF vari kuita misangano vasiri kusungwa. Masangano akaita seAmnesty International neHuman Rights Watch ari kupomera hurumende mhosva yekushandisa denda reCovid-19 kudzvinyirira vanopikisa. Asi gurukota rezvemutemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, vanot mutemo hautarise kuti wabuda mumba maani. Majeri emuZimbabwe anogara akazarisa zvinonzi nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano zvinoisa vasungwa munjodzi. Svondo rapera vasungwa zviuru zvitatu vakaregererwa nemutungamiri wenyika senzira yekupemberera zuva rekuwana kuzvitonga kuzere. Asi sezvo mumajeri mainge muine vasungwa zviuru makumi maviri nevaviri kana kuti 22 000 kwete zviuru gumi nezvinomwe kana kuti 17 000 zvinotarisirwa, achiri akazarisa. Hatina kukwanisa kubatawo mutauriri wevemajere, Superintendent Meya Khanyezi, sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. Munyori anoona nezvemagariro evanhu muMDC Alliance, Muzvare Maureen Kademaunga, vanoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka kuna Muzvare Mamombe. Ngatinzweyi hurukuro yavaita naBlessing Zulu weStudio7. No media source currently available

headline: Arsenal yopfeka Adidas
text: kupfeka majezi anogadzirwa neAdidas kutanga gore ra2019 ichibva kune ePuma ayo yange ichipfeka bvira makore adarika.   Chibvumirano nePuma change chichiona chikwata ichi chichipihwa mari inosvika 30 miriyoni paunzi pagore kwemakore mashanu.   Chiri kupera gore rinotevera, uye Arsenal ichaona ichiwedzera mari iyi nekutanga kupfeka Adidas. Dhiri itsva iri richaona chikwata ichi chichipihwa 60 miriyoni paunzi pagore kwemakore mashanu anotevera.   Mari iyi ichabatsira murairidzi wechikwata ichi – Unai Emery – gore rinotevera pakuzotenga vatambi vatsva.   Akamanikidzwa kushanda nemari shoma inovsika 70 miriyoni paunzi zvichitevera kutsiva kwaakaita Arsene Wenger.   Arsenal iri kuzama kushanda kuti igadzirise remangwana raAaron Ramsey (27).   Mutambi uyu kondirakiti yake inopera pakupera kwemwaka uno uye anogona kuenda mahara gore rinotevera.   Chelsea iri kuda kutenga Ramsey uye inogona kubhadhara mari inosvika 30 miriyoni yekuunza chizvarwa chekuWales ichi kuchikwata ichi.   Arsenal inogona kutambira mari iyi sezvayakaita mugore ra2012 apo yakatengesa Robin van Persie kuManchester United apo akange aramba kusaina kondirakiti itsva ndokuetengeswa ne22.5 miriyoni paunzi. — SportsMail Football

headline: Vari kuMaruwa Vokurudzirwa Kuzvidzivirira kuCovid-19
text: Kunyange hazvo denda reCovid-19 richiri munyika vanhu vakawanda kumaruwa ekuMashonaland East anosanganisira Murehwa vari kufamba vasina kuzvidzivirira kuchirwere ichi izvo zvinonzi nenyanzvi munyaya dzehutano zvinogona kukonzora kuparararira kwechirwere ichi. Vanhu vakawanda vekumaruwa vanoona sekuti vanhu vemumadhorobha ndivo vanonyanyobatwa neCovid-19. VaIrimai Chakaza, avo vanogara kuMurehwa West, vanoti vanhu vakawanda munzvimbo yavo havakosheshi zvekupfeka mamasiki munguva ino yekurwisa chirwere che Covid-19. VaChakaza vanoti vanozviza kuti chirwere ichi chinouraya asi havasati vaona pachakauraya izvo vati zviri kukonzera veruzhinji kuti vasatora matanho anokurudzirwa kupararira kwacho. Mumwe mugari, VaTakunda Mabaya, vanoti hapana kurudziro yakanyanya iri kuitwa kumaruwa sezvinoitwa kumadhorobha. Vanoti izvi ndizvo zviri kuita kuti vasaite hany’a nekutora matanho ekuzvidzivirira. Asi vachitaura nevatsigiri vebato ravo muzvimbo iyi, murongi wemisangano muMDC Alliance, VaAmos Chibaya, vakayambira vagari ava kuti vakoshese zvavanoudzwa nenyanzvi pamusoro pechirwere ichi vachiti chinouraya. Imwe nhengo yerimwe sangano rinoshandira kumaruwa eChipinge neChimanimani, VaOwen Dhliwayo, vanoti dambudziko rekusapfeka mamasiki ririko kwavanoshandira uye vanorwisana naro zuva nezuva. Vatiwo zvinoburitswa muongororo dziri kuitwa pamusoro pechirwere ichi zuva nezuva zvinoratiddza kuti chirwere ichi chakawandira kumaguta akaita seHarare neBulawayo izvo zvave kuita kuti vanhu varivare kumaruwa. Vaombove gurukota rezvehutano panguya yehurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vaudza Stduio7 kuti zviri kuitika kumaruwa zvine ngozi yakakura. Dr Madzorera vanoti dambudziko iri rinowanikwawo mumisha inogara veruzhinji mumaguta uye chirwere ichi chinogona kuputika zvakare kana vanhu vakarega kutevedza zvakatarwa nebazi rezvehutano pamwe neWorld Health Organisation pakudzivirira Covid-19. No media source currently available

headline: America Yoramba Ichirwisa Kumanikidzwa kweVanhu Kuita Mabasa Avasingade Kuita
text: Sechiratidzo chekuti hurumende yeAmerica yakazvipira kurwisa kumbunyikidzwa kwevanhu vachinoitiswa mabasa avasingade kune dzimwe nyika, bazi rezvekudyidzana kweAmerica nedzimwe nyika, rakaburitswa gwaro rechimakumi maviri rekumbunyikidzwa kwevanhu vanoendeswa kudzimwe nyika vachinoitiswa mabasa avasingade, kana kuti 20th Annual Trafficking in Persons Report, kana kuti TIP Report, musi wa 25 Chikumi. Vachitaura pakuparurwa kwegwaro iri, gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaMike Pompeo, vakati kumbunyikidzwa kwevanhu vachiendeswa kune dzimwe nyika, kunosanganisira kuitiswa mabasa epabonde pamwe nekushanda mamwe mabasa munhu achimanikidzwa, uye izvi zviri kuramba zvichiitika pasi rose. “Pane zvanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemashanu vari kumanikidzwa kuita mabasa avasingade uye kuitiswa mabasa epabonde pasi rose. Kudzikisira hunhu hwevanhu zvakadaro hazvitambirwe, tose takasikwa tiri mufananidzo yaMwari. Mabasa akadai ndeehutsinye.” Gore rapera, mutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, vakamisa rumwe rubatsiro kudzihurumende gumi neshanu idzo dziri mugwaro re 2019 Tip Report. Muna Ndira gore rino, VaTrump vakati America yakanga yadira mari inoita mazana mashanu emamiriyoni emadhora mukurwisa kumanikidzwa kwevanhu kuita mabasa epabonde pamwe nemamwe mabasa avanenge vasingadi kuita. VaPompeo vakataura pamusoro pemabasa akaitwa neAmerica mukurwisa maitiro akaipa aya sezviri mugwaro re 2020 TIP Report. “Nyika makumi maviri nembiri dzakasimudzirwa gore rino, gumi nenhatu dziri nyika dzemu Sub-Saharan Africa.” Gwaro reTIP Report rinoburitswawo pachena nyika dzinotsigira kumbunyikidzwa kwevanhu vachinoitiswa mabasa avasingadi idzo dziri pachinhambo yechitatu. Nyika idzi dzinosanganisira China, uko bato re Chinese Communist Party pamwe nemakambani ehurumende izvo zvinomanikidza zvizvarwa zvenyika iyi kushanda munzvimbo dzakashata muhurongwa hwenyika iyi hweBelt and Road, uko verudzi vechi Uighurs nemamwe marudzi madiki echiMuslim vari kumanikidzwa kuita mabasa avasingadi kuita muXinjiang nedzimwe nzvimbo. Mu Cuba, hupfumi hwehurumende yaVaCastro hunobva muhurongwa hwezvehutano. Pane vanhu vekuCuba vanodarika zviuru makumi mashanu vanoshanda munyaya dzehutano munyika makumi matanhatu pasi rose. Madhokotera mazhinji ekuCuba ari munyika idzi anoti ari kumanikidzwa kushanda muhurongwa uhu. Nyika dzakawanda dzinotambira madhokotera aya kuti ashande munyika idzi, kunyange hazvo zviri pachena kuti vashandi vezvehutano ava vanenge vamanikidzwa kunoshanda kunyika idzi, vachibatirwa magwaro avo ekufambisa, kusajekeswa kwezvibvumirano zvavo zvekushanda kunze kwenyika, uye kubhadharwa kwehurumende yeCuba nenyika idzi, madhokotera aya asingabhadharwe. “Tinotora zvakadzama nyaya dzekumbunyikidzwa kwevanhu nedzihurumende dzavo,” vakadaro VaPompeo. “Ibasa redzihurumende kuchengetedza kodzero dzezvizvarwa zvenyika, kwete kumbunyikidza kodzero idzi. America haife yakabatana nenyika dzinomanikidza zvizvarwa zvadzo kuita zvisingadiwe nezvizvarwa izvi.” No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vatatu Vanourayiwa neMauto Vakawanda Vachikuvara Mukuratidzira muHarare
text: Vanhu vatatu vapfurwa vakafa muHarare apo vatsigiri veMDC Alliance vange vachiratidzira kusafara kwavo nemafambisirwo aeri kuitwa basa rekuzivisa nyika zvakabuda musarudzo dzakaitwa neMuvhuro. Vaona zvaitika vanoti vanhu vapfurwa ava vanhuwo zvavo vabatwa nemhirizhonga yange isineyi nezvavanga vachiita. Mashoko atiri kutambira anoti vamwe vapfurwa vakafa afa madzimai anga achizvifambirawo zvawo. Muguta remuHarare maswera muchiridzwa pfuti nemapurisa achirwisana nevatsigiri veMDC Alliance. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Senior Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba, vatenda kuti pane vanhu vaurayiwa muHarare mukuratidzira uku uye mitumbi yavo iri kuParirenyatwa Hospital. Mauto anofungidzirwa kuti ndiwo auraya vanhu ava. Zviuru nezviuru zvevatsigiri veMDC Alliance zvapinda mudhorobha mangwanani mazvatanga kuratidzira zvichiti sarudzo dzemusi weMuvhuro hadzina kubatwa zvakanaka neZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec. Varatidziri ava vatematema motokari dzeZanu PF nematombo pamwe nekutema mahwindo epamuzinda weZanu PF pamwe neZec. Pasina chinguva mapurisa anga akapakatira zvombo abva atanga kuridza pfuti panze pemahofisi eZanu PF. Panga pachiridzwa pfuti pamahofisi eZanu PF, vamwe varatidziri vaenda kwanga kuchiverengerwa mavhoti asi vazodzingwa nemapurisa avakandira hutsi hunokachidza pamwe nekuridzira pfuti mudenga. Varatidziri ava vabva vaparira nedhorobha rose vachiimba vachiti “tinoda Chamisa”. Chikopokopo chemasoja chazenge chave kutendererawo nepamusoro pevanhu vanga vachiratidzira uye masoja anonziwo anga ave kurova vanhu kune mimwe migwagwa iri pakati pedhorobha. Varatidziri ava vanoti havasi kuzofa vakadzokera kudzimba dzavo kudzamara zvavanoti ndizvo zvechokwadi zvakabuda musarudzo zvaziviswa kwete zviri kuziviswa neZec. Pataenda pamhepo, masoja pamwe nemapurisa anga akapakatira zvombo anga achimhanyisa vanga vachiratidzira ava. No media source currently available

headline: VaCharamba Vokonzera Kugeda Geda KweMeno neMashoko Avo paNyaya yeKuratidzira
text: Mutauriri wemutungamiri wenyika VaGeorge Charamba vakonzera mutauro wakanyanya pasi rose nemashoko avanonzi vakataura kubepanhau reSunday Mail vari ku Azerbaijan uko vari kushanya nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. VaCharamba vanoti zviri kuitika munyika umo muri kupomerwa mauto nemapurisa mhosva yekupfura vanhu gumi nevaviri, kukuvadza mazana nemazana uye kusunga vanhu vanodarika mazana manomwe inzwisa chete. VaCharamba vanoti mhirizhonga iri kukonzera nebato reMDC nemapato akazvimirira. Mapepa nhau emunyika dzakawanda aratidza kukatyamadzwa zvikuru nemashoko aya. Asi masangano akaita seUnited Nations, nyika dzakaita seAmerica, Britain nesangano reEuropean Union ari kushora zvikuru nyaya yekushandisa mauto mukushungurudza vanhu iri kuitwa neZimbabwe. Sangano ravanasorojena rinozivikanwa nekuti The Elder’s rashorawo zviri kuitwa nehurumende yeZimbabwe zvekushungurudza vanhu uye kudzima masaisai einternet. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaCharamba kuti tinzwe zvizere nezvemashoko avo sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. Vakawanda vanoti munyika maberekera ingwe. Asi gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko Amai Monica Mutsvangwa vanoti zvinhu zvave kuita zviri nani avo vakurudzira vanhu kuti vasaite mhirizhonga. No media source currently available

headline: Mutori weNhau, Tawanda Gudhlanga, Ashaya nehirwere cheCovid-19
text: Vatori venhau munyika voita misodzi pamatama zvakare zvichitevera kushaya kwemumwe wavo, uyo anonzi atorwa nedenda reCovid 19. Pasina kana mazuva akawanda vatori venhau vabva kuradzika mumwe wavo, muzvinambiri munyaya dzekutora nhau, Sandra Nyaira, uyo akamboshandira Studio7 kwemakore gumi nemaviri, mumwe mutori wenhau ange ane mukurumbira munyika, Tawanda Gudhlanga, ashaya zvakare nechirwere che Covid 19 nhasi mangwanani. Kushaya kwaGudhlanga kwaziviswa neshamwari yake, Nigel Nyamutumbu, padandemutande rake eTwitter nhasi mangwanani. Mutungamiri werimwe remasangano anomirira vatori venhau munyika, reZimbabwe Union of Journalists, VaMichael Chideme, vati vatori venhau varwadziwa zvikuru nekushaya kwaGudhlanga misodzi yavo yekuchema Nyaira, isati yambowoma. Munyori musangano reYoung Journalists Association of Zimbabwe, VaLeopold Munhende, vakurudzirawo hurumende kuti isawanze misangano inoita kuti vatori venhau vange varipo vachiti hurumende yave kufanira ushandisa humhizha hwechimanjemanje kuitira kuderedza mikana yekuti vatori venhau vasangane nevari muhurumende senzira yekuderedza mikana yekubatwa nechirwere cheCovid 19. Gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, havana kunge vapindura mibvunzo yatavatumira uye mutevedzeri wavo VaKindness Paradza vati titaure nemunyori mubazi ravo VaNick Mangwana avo vanga vasiri kubatika panharembozha yavo. Asi VaMangwana vanyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter vachiti varwadziwa nekufa kwaGudhlanga vakati chiri kunyanyorwadza ndechekuti nyika iri kuramba ichirasikirwa nevatori venhau vane mukurumbira. Zvichakadai, gurukota rezvemari VaMthuli Ncube vaburitsa mashoko ekuti vachatura hurongwa hweMid Term Budget and Economic Review svon do rinouya vachishandisa humhizha hwechimanje-manje nechikonzero chekupararira kwedenda reCovid 19. Mutungamiri weMedia Istitute of Southern Africa muZimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo, avo varatidzawo kushushikana nekufa kwaGudhlanga, vatiwo dai makambani enhau aonawo kuti vatapi venhau vanovashandira vave vashoma munzvimbo dzavanoshandira uye vane zvikwanisiro zvekuzvidzivirira kuchirwere cheCovid 19. Mupepeti webepanhau reThe Observer, VaBarnabas Thondlana vatiwo zvakakosha kuti vatori venhau vabaiwe nhomba dzekudzivirira Covid 19 uye kuti vashandire kudzimba dzavo. Gudhlanga, uyo ange ave nemakore makumi mana nerimwe chete ekuberekwa, ange ave maneja wenhepfenyuro yeYaFM kuZvishavane. Gudhlanga akamboshandira makambani enhau anoti ZBC-TV achitepfenyura chirongwa chinonzi Business Forum, uye akashandirawo nhepfenyuro yeClassic263 pamwe neSport FM. Muna 2017, Gudhlanga akapihwa mubayiro wekuva munhu akakunda vamwe vese munyika pakutepfenyura parhedhiyo mumakundano eNational Arts Merit Awards. Kusvika pari zvino, vatori nenhau vashanu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachakapinda munyika. Vatori venhau ava vanoti Zororo Makamba, uyo akave wekutanga kutorwa nechirwere ichi, aive munyori mukuru weZUJ, Foster Dongozi, mutapi wenhau weZBC, Janet Munyaka, Sandra Nyaira pamwe naGudhlanga. No media source currently available

headline: Kubirira Sarudzo neKusunga Vanopikisa Raisava Donzvo reHondo yeRusungunuko: VaNelson Chamisa
text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reCitizens Coalition for Change VaNelson Chamisa vanoti Zuva reMagamba rakakosha zvikuru munhoroondo yenyika sezvo vakawanda vakafa nekukuvadzwa vachirwira rusungunuko. Asi VaChamisa vaudza Studio 7 kuti vane kutsutsumwa kuti zvimwe zvakarwira zvave kukanganiswa nehurumende. Vati vari kushushikana nenyaya yekuti sarudzo hadzisi kufambiswa zvakanaka uye vanopikisa vachimbunyikidzwa nemapurisa. Vapa muenzaniso nyaya yekusungwa kwenhengo dzebato ravo reparamende VaJob Sikhala naVaGodfrey Sithole nevamwe vakasungwa kuNyatsime munongedzo wekuti mutemo uchiri kutarisa kuti wabuda mumba maani. Varamba zvinotaurwa neZanu-PF zvekuti vakatora nyika vanodzokera chimurenga kumashure, VaChamisa vavimbisa kugadziriasa nyika kuti munhu wose awane chouviri. VaSikhala naVaSithole vakasungwa vachipomerwa mhosva yekuda kukonzera mhirizhonga uye vari kunyimwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechbatiso nematare. Izvi zviri kuitika kunayngwe hazvo vanopikisa vari kuti nhengo dzeZanu-PF dzakabuda pamavhidhiyo dzichitaura nyaya yemhirizhonga dzisina kusungwa. Mutauriuri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi vakaudza Studio 7 kuti hapana ainge amhan’ara. Asi pakamhana’rwa nyaya yemutsigiri weZanu-PF VaAbton Mashayanyika vaiti vaChamisa vapondwe musi wa27 Chikunguru, mutsigiri uyu haasati asungwa. Mapurisa akangoti achazoivisa nekufamba kwenguva. Varamba zvinotaurwa neZanu-PF zvekuti vakatora nyika vanodzokera chimurenga kumashure, VaChamisa vavimbisa kugadziriasa nyika kuti munhu wose awane chouviri. No media source currently available

headline: Votatsurana mumitambo yenaph
text: makuwerere nomusi weChishanu chino paAlfred Beit Primary, muHarare, apo shasha dzakakunda mumitambo yakasiyana yezvikoro zviri mudunhu reHarare dzichange dzichitatsurana.   Kwayedza neMuvhuro uno yakashanyira zvikwata zvakanga zviri kukwikwidza pachidanho chedistrict zviri pasi peMbare-Hatfield District pachikoro cheNettleton Junior ndokuita hurukuro nazvo.   Mai Lilian Chidovori Tadzingwa, avo vanova sports director paNettleton Junior, vanoti vanasikana vazhinji vepachikoro chavo vakasarudzwa kukwikwidza mumitambo yebhora (ball games).   “Tine chivimbo chekunokunda, saka pachidanho ichi sangano reNational Association of Primary School Heads (NAPH) ndiro richasarudza chikwata chichanomiririra Harare Province pakati pematunhu manomwe ari muHarare. Pamakwikwi atakaita, takasangana nezvimwe zvikoro musi wa8 Chikumi paDavid Livingstone School tikatora nhamba yetatu mumitambo yebhora pakati pezvikoro zvinomwe,” vanodaro.   Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, “Mukuru wechikoro cheNettleton, VaLeo Busvumani, vanotsigira zvikuru nyaya dzemitambo uye temu ino vakatenga mabhora matsva, zvekushandisa mumitambo yehockey nemimwe midziyo yakawanda. Pachikoro chedu tine vana vane matarenda akawanda zvikuru nekuti handi vose vanogona muchikoro. Saka sevarairidzi, zvakakosha kuti ticherechedze zvimwe zvipo zviri muvana.”   Vanoti sevarairidzi, vanofundisa vana mitambo yakasiyana. Vanoshuvira kuti kudai zvikoro zvakwanisa kuvawanisa rutsigiro rwekuti vanofundiswa humwe hunyanzvi hutsva maringe nezvemitambo.   VaNobert Mudzikati, vanova district coach kumitambo yenhabvu yevasikana, vanoti vanofara kusimudzira vane matarenda emutambo uyu.   “Pano tine chikwata chakasimba uye tinovimba kuti tichakunda zvisinei nekuti hatina hedu kuwana nguva yakakwana yekufundira,” vanodaro.   Makwikwi emhando iyi anogaroitwa gore negore achitsigirwa neNAPH.

headline: Tsigirai Division 1: Mushonga
text: MUNYORI mukuru weZifa Northern Region Division One, Sweeney Mushonga, anoti makambani akawanda anofanirwa kutsigira nhabvu yeDivision One neTwo sezvo kuriko kunobikwa vatambi. Apo pavasisina mitambo yemikombe inoona zvikwata zvemuPremier League zvichitatsurana nezvemaDivision ari pasi, Mushonga anoti mitambo iyi inofanirwa kudzoswa sezvo ichibatsira kusimudzira nhabvu yemuno. “Mazuva ano zvikwata zviri mumaDivision pazvinowana mukana wekutamba nezvemuCastle Premiership panguva yepre-season chete, hapanazve pamwe pazvinosangana nazvo. “Izvi hazvina kunakira nhabvu yedu nekuti zvikwata zvedu zvinofanirwa kumbomhanyisana nezvemuCastle Premiership sezvatinomboona kune dzimwe nyika. “Zvakatonakira isu nhabvu yedu sezvo zvichibatsira kuti zvikwata zviwane mari uye kusimukira kwevatambi kuti vaonekwe nezvimwe zvikwata zvepamusoro,” anodaro Mushonga. Zvakadai, svondo rino kuchange kusingadanwe anonzwa apo zvikwata zvepamusoro zvemuDivision One zvichange zvichitatsurana. Mushowani Stars – iyo iri kutungamira palog mumujaho wekurwira kupinda muPSL – iri kuenda kuMorris Depot uko ichasangana neZRP iyowo yakagara pechitatu palog. Cranborne Bullets, iyo iri kufemera mugotsi meMushowani Stars, ichasangana neHarare City Cubs musi weSvondo kunhandare yeRufaro.

headline: Vanorarama neKutengesa Vonyunyuta neKusiiwawo muHurongwa Hwemari yeKubatsira veMabhizimusi
text: Sangano Vendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation, kana kuti VISET, rinoti riri kushushikana zvikuru nemashoko egurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube ekuti mari yekubatsira vemabhizimi munguva yekurwisa denda reCovid-19 yakaiswa parutivi nehurumende inosvika mabhiririyo gumi nemasere kana kuti 18 billion RTGS haisi kuzopihwa vanozviitira mabasa emaoko. VaChitaura mudare reparamende svondo rapera, VaNcube vakati mari iyi ichakwereteswa vemabhizimisi makuru kuburikidza nemabhanga uye RBZ iri kuisa mari yechibatiso inosvika zvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana. VISET inoti vemabhizimi madiki nevanozviitira mabasa emaoko vari kudawo rubatsiro sezvo vari kutatarika kumutsiridza mabhizimisi avo akanganiswawo nechirwere cheCovid-19. Mukuru weVISET VaSamuel Wadzayi vanotiwo hurumende inokwanisa kushanda nemakanzuru kugadziridza misika yekuti vakwanise kushanda vakasungunuka. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaNcube sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. No media source currently available

headline: Varimi veDonje neVabatsiri Vavo Vogura Muchato
text: Varimi vedonje gore rino vanonzi vachatarisana nedambudziko hombe zvichitevera kubuda muzvibvumirano zvekushanda nevarimi kunonzi kwaitwa nevanga vachitsigira varimi nezvekurimisa. Makambani anga achitsigira varimi anonzi ari kunyunyuta nekusawana chimuko kubva muhurongwa hwekubatsira varimi uhu achipomera varimi ava mhosva yekutengesa donje neparutivi, vasingatevedzere zvibvumirano zvekuti makambani aya atenge iwo donje. Hurongwa hwanga huripo hunonzi hwaiita kuti varimi vawaniswe zvinodiwa pakurima zvakaita semishonga, mbeu nefotereza, ivo voisawo simba ravo pakurima, kusakura pamwe nekukohwa donje ravo vozotarisirwa kuri tengesera kambani inenge yavabatsira. Asi zvinonzi varimi vaizonotengesa nerweseri donje ravo kune vamwe vanotenga vanenge vaine mitengo inenge iri pamusoro peinenge ichipiwa nemakambani anenge avabatsira. Asi mutungamiri werimwe sangano revarimi, reZimbabwe Commercial Farmers Union, ZCFU, VaWonder Chabikwa, vanoti havawirirane nemashoko ekuti kutengeswa kwedonje parutivi nevarimi ndiko kwakonzera kuti vemakambani vabude muzvibvumirano izvi. VaChabikwa vanoti vemakambani anotenga donje ava vanogona kunge vakanga vaunganidza zvavo donje rakawanda nechekare zvekuti havachina shungu dzekutenga zvakare rimwe donje. Mitengo yedonje wemwaka wapera unonzi wakanga wakadzikawo pasi zvakanyanya, izvo zvinonzi zvakasvibisawo mwoyo yevamwe varimi mumwaka uno. Imwe yemakambani aitenga donje pamwe nekubatsira varimi, yeCargill, inonzi yakatovhara bhizimusi rayo munyika ichiti kuoma kwezvinhu kwakanga kwoita kuti isakwanise kurarama. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vowedzera Dr Mangudya Mamwe Makore Mashanu Vari Gavhuna weRBZ
text: Mukuru wedare remakurukota Doctor Misheck Sibanda vanoti mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vawedzera nemakore mashanu temu yagavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe Doctor John Mangudya. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau VaSibanda vati izvi zvakatanga musi wa 1 Chivabvu mwedzi uno. Izvi zvaitwa pasi pemutemo weReserve Bank Act. VaMangudya vakatora chigaro ichi kubva kuna VaGideon Gono muna 2014. VaMangudya vakamboshanda kuRBZ kwemakore gumi senyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi kusvika muna 1996 vasati vaenda kunoshanda kubhanga reAfrican Export-Import Bank kana kuti Afrexim.

headline: Kongiresi dzeMatunhu eMDC Dzovhiringidzwa neKurwisana kweNhengo dzeBato
text: Bato rinopikisa reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa riri kuita misangano yekongiresi mumatunhu aro maduku ose, kana kuti ma district, risati rapinda mumakongiresi ematunhu makuru, kana kuti ma province. Kana rapeta misangano yematunhu iyi, bato iri rinozoita kongiresi yaro huru yenyika yose mwedzi unouya. Misangano yekongiresi iyi iri kushandiswa kusarudza hutungamiri hwematunhu aya kuburikidza nekuita sarudzo, idzo dzinokwikwidzana nhengo dzebato iri. Asi zvinonzi misangano mizhinji yaitwa kusvika pari zvino haisi kufamba zvakanaka nekuda kwemhirizhonga, iyo iri kuona nhengo dzebato iri dzichirwisana zvinotyisa, zvekusvika pakukuvadzana. Kurwisana uku kunonzi kuri kuitika pakati pezvikwata zvinonzi zviri kutsigira vanotarisirwa kukwikwidzana pakongiresi huru, mutungamiri webato VaNelson Chamisa, nemunyori mukuru webato, VaDouglas Mwonzora. Mukupera kwesvondo, kurwisana uku kwakakanganisa sarudzo dzedunhu reChitungwiza, uko dzimwe nhengo dzinonzi dzakakuwara zvakaipisisa uye mapurisa akatosungawo vanhu vane chitsama vanosanganisira mumiriri weZengeza East muparamende, VaGoodrich Chimbaira. Kudunhu reChegutu kunonzi kwakaitawo kuriwsana, izvo zvakaita kuti vanhu vana vasungwe nemapurisa, kuchitiwo kumatunhu eMasvingo, Sanyati neNorton kunonzi sarudzo dzakatadza kuenderera mberi zvakanaka nekuda kwemhirizhonga. Vamwe vanoti kusagadzikana kuri mubato iri ndiko kwakakonzera kuti rikundwe musarudzo ye by-election kuBulawayo, uko MDC yakakundwa neZanu PF. Vamwe muMDC vanoti kusagadzikana kuri mubato ravo kwakakonzerwa neZanu PF, iyo vanoti yakadira mari yekukanganisa kongiresi yavo, chiitiko chakarambwa neZanu PF. Mutauriri weMDC, VaJacob Mafume, vanoti kunyange hazvo nhengo dzavo dzakarwisana, zvinovafadza ndezvekuti hapana kudeuka kweropa kwakaitika. VaMafume vanoti bato ravo riri kuongorora nyaya dzemhirizhonga mumatunhu matatu, uye vanenge vawanikwa vaine mhosva vachatorerwa matanho anokodzera. asi vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vakarerukira kubato reZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu, vanoti kurwisana kuri kuitika mubato rinopikisa iri mucherechedzo wekuti zvinhu hazvichina kumira zvakanaka. Vanoti kupatsanuka kuri kuita MDC hakuna kutanga nhasi, zvekuti vanhu vemuZimbabwe zvatove kuvasemesa. No media source currently available

headline: DeMbare ndokuti bhora: Jaure
text: MUTAMBI weDynamos FC nechikwata chenyika chemaWarriors – Partson Jaure – anoti kudzoka kwenhabvu kunofadza zvikuru sezvo mutambo uyu uriwo unounza raramo kuvatambi vazhinji. Jaure, uyo anove kaputeni weDeMbare, anoti hupenyu hwevatambi vakawanda hwange hwakatokanganiswa nekumbomiswa kwakaitwa nhabvu kubvira gore rapera nechinangwa chekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Anoti vatambi vaishushikana zvikuru nekungogara sezvo vange vasisina chekubata asi kudzoka kwemutambo uyu kwave kuvabatsira kuti hupenyu hwavo huchiendeka.   “Isu tinoraramiswa nenhabvu, ndicho chingwa chedu chatinodya mangwanani, masikati uye nemanheru. Saka kana nhabvu isipo tinofa nenzara. “Hupenyu hwange huchirwadza kungogara nekuti hapana mari yatange tichiwana, zvange zvichirema. Asi nhabvu zvayadzoka manje, hupenyu hwedu hwave kuchiendeka,” anodaro Jaure. Kudzoka kwenhabvu kuri kuona zvikwata zvemuPremier Soccer League (PSL) zvichikwikwidza mumutambo weChibuku Super Cup.   Jaure anoti mutambo uyu wakaoma zvikuru sezvo zvikwata zvose zviri kurwisana neDeMbare. Anoti DeMbare kubva kare chikwata chihombe zvokuti mitambo yacho inenge isiri nyore sezvo zvikwata zvose zvichitsvaga mbiri pavari.   “Kana uchitambira Dynamos unofanira kunge wakazvipira kuifira nekuti chikwata ichi chihombe uye chikwata chose chinosangana nesu chinenge chichitotsvaga mbiri patiri. Mutambi wese anotoda kunzi akunda Dynamos nekuti kuti DeMbare ndokuti bhora, saka isu totofanira kugara takagadzirira. “Mumitambo yeChibuku yatiri kutamba iye zvino haisi nyore nekuti zvimwe zvikwata zvinenge zvichida kuti tibude kuitira kuti zviwane mukana. Saka isu tiri kutofanira kushanda nesimba tivarakidze kuti tiri shasha panyaya dzenhabvu,” anodaro Jaure.   Jaure abva kure munyaya dzenhabvu izvo zvakambomuona achinotamba kuSouth Africa kuchikwata cheUniversity of Pretoria uye akambonotambira kuZambia zvekare kuchikwata cheBuildcon. MuZimbabwe, akambotambira zvikwata zvinosanganisira Ngezi Platinum Stars neManica Diamond ndokuzodzoka kumusha kuDeMbare uko akarerwa akaita mukurumbira.   Achitaura pamusoro pemafambiro aaita munhabvu anoti, “Zvinofadza kumbonotamba kune dzimwe nyika wodzidza zvinoitwa ikoko. Ndakadzidza zvakwanda mukufamba kwandakamboita, asi iye zvino ndadzoka zvandakadzidza kunze kwenyika ndiri kuzvishandisa kubatsira vechidiki vari kusimukira mumutambo uyu vazive kuti zvofambiswa sei uye zvii zvinodiwa kuti mutambi abudirire mumutambo uyu.”   Zvakadaro, svondo rino DeMbare ichange iri pamusha apo ichasangana neHarare City mumutambo wechishanu weChibuku Super Cup.   DeMbare ndiyo iri kutungamira muboka rayo umo mune zvimwe zvikwata zvinoti CAPS United, ZPC Kariba neHerentals.

headline: Hazard asendeka shangu
text: asendeka shangu dzekutambira nyika yake yeBelgium.   Mutambi uyu (31) akasarudza kusatambira nyika yake apo ichange ichirwira kuenda kumutambo we2024 European Championships uye ne2026 World Cup.   Zvichitevera kuburitswa kwakaita chikwata chake kuWorld Cup kuQatar, Hazard asiya mushure mekutambira nyika yake kwemakore 14 apo ave kutarisira kumutsiridza hupenyu hwake hwenhabvu kuReal Madrid.   “Nhasi ndavhura chimwe chikamu. Ndokutendai nerudo,” Hazard anonyora paInstagram.   “Ndokutendai nerutsigiro rwenyu. Ndinokutendai nenguva yemafaro atakave navo kubva gore ra2008.   “Nhasi ndasarudza kusiya kutambira nyika yangu. Chikwata chitsva chevechidiki chagadzirira. Ndichakusuwai zvikuru.”   Bepanhau rekuBelgium Het Laastest Nieuws rakanyora kuti Hazard akange akurukura nevamwe vaanotamba navo nhabvu kuti anoda kusiya kutambira nyika yake kubva pavakaburitswa kuWorld Cup neCroatia.   Mazuva matanhatu akatevera, Hazard haana kushandura pfungwa dzake sezvo akabva azivisa vanhu 27.2 miriyoni vanomutevera paInstagram.   Matambiro ake muchikwata cheBelgium ange adzikira izvo zvakaona mutambo waakapedzisira kutambira nyika yake kuWorld Cup achipinzwa kwatambwa maminitsi anodarika 87 wave kunopera.   Akatanga kutambira Belgium aine makore 17 okuberekwa mugore ra2008 apo vakatamba neLuxembourg nemusi wa19 Mbudzi, 2008.   Mutambi uyu, uyo aimbove kuChelsea, akakwanisa kutambira nyika yake ka126, ndokunwisa ka33 uye achibatsira vamwe vatambi kunwisa ka36.   Hazard akatungamira Belgium ari kaputeni mumitambo 56. – SportsMail Football

headline: ‘Siyai maWarriors akadaro’
text: SHASHA dzakambonetsa dzichitambira nhabvu chikwata chenyika chemaWarriors dzinoti zvakakosha kuti chikwata chiripo parizvino chirege kusandurwa sezvo chinogona kusvika kure mumutambo weAfrica Cup of Nations (Afocn) apo chiri kurwira kuenda kuCameroon gore rinotevera.   Svondo radarika, maWarriors akaita mangange 1-1 neCongo Brazzaville mumutambo wavo muGroup G.   MaWarriors ndiwo ari panyanga akatarisana nemutambo inotevera apo paachasangana neDemocratic Republic of Congo mumitambo miviri yakatevedzana musvondo rimwe chete.   Akakwanisa kuhwina mitambo yawo neDRC, maWarriors anenge ave nemukana mukuru wekubudirira kuenderera mberi mumutambo uyu izvo akamboita katatu kose asi achikoniwa kutamba zvinogutsa.   Zvakadai, svondo rino Kwayedza yakaita hurukuro nedzimwe shasha dzakambotambira maWarriors dzinosanganisira Leo Kurauzvione naHarlington Shereni avo vanoti chikwata ichi ngachirege kusandurwa zvachose.   Vaviri ava vamwe vevaive muchikwata chemaWarriors chekutanga kuenda kunomirira Zimbabwe kuAfcon mugore ra2004 kuTunisia.   Panguva iyi, Kurauzvione aitambira Dynamos FC kozoti Shereni aitambira Guingamp yekuFrance.   Kurauzvione anoti zvakakosha kuti chikwata ichi – icho chine vatambi vakaita saKnowledge Musona, Khama Billiat, Kuda Mahachi, George Chigova naEvans Rusike  – chirambe chakangobatana sezvachiri.   “Chikwata chedu chine mukana mukuru wekusvika kure asi hachidi kungoshandurwa-shandurwa zvisina tsarukano. Chiripo ichi ngachisiiwe chakadaro chiite basa racho chovakwa chakadaro, kwete kuti padiki mashandura kwauya vamwe vatambi.   “Zvikwata zvenyika hazvina nguva zhinji zviri zvese saka nguva shoma iyoyo vatambi vakambotamba vese kare vanenge vachizivana matambiro avanoita, manje kana muchivashandura-shandura pese pese zvinodzorera basa kumashure,” anodaro.   Gore rakatanga maWarriors kubudirira kuenda kuAfcon, chikwata chacho chaive nevatambi vashoma vaitambira kunze kwenyika.   Kurauzvione anoti mamiriro ezvinhu parizvino akakosha zvikuru nekuti vatambi vari kutambira kunze kana vauya havafanirwe kutanga kuchema-chema nekuda kwenyaya dzemari nekuti kuzvikwata zvavo zvavanenge vabva vanowaniswa zvese zvavanoda.   “Patori nemusiyano mukuru nechikwata chedu nekuti chikwata chavepo iye zvino chizere nevatambi vari kutambira kunze kwenyika uko kwavanowaniswa zvese zvavanoda, vanochengetedzwa zvakanakisa uye chavo kungofunga zvenhabvu chete. Saka kana vave kuuya kuzotambira maWarriors ngavafunge kusimudzira mureza wenyika kwete zvemari nekuti kwavari kubva kwakanuna kare.   “Chatiri kuda kuona basa richifamba, vakomana ava vane mukana mukuru uye ngavaushandise sezvauri,” anodaro Kurauzvione.   Mashoko ake anotsinhirwa naShereni uyo akatambira zvikwata zvizhinji zvekuFrance achiti maWarriors anofanira kuramba akabatana.   “Isu sevatambi vakambotambira kunze kwenyika uye kumutambo weAfcon uyu tinoda kupihwa mukana wekumbotaura nevatambi variko ava tichivarayira nzira dzavanofanirwa kuzvibata nadzo kana vachida kusvika kure.   “Ngavasati vakangoenda kuSouth Africa votozviona kuti vakatopenga, aiwa kwete. Ngavashingirire kusvika vasvika kuEurope vatambire zvikwata zvikuru uye mumaligi makuru akaita seEnglish Premiership, La Liga, Serie A neFrench Ligue 1,” anodaro.

headline: Amai Mugabe Vanoti Vakazvipira Kushanda Vari Pasi paVaMnangagwa
text: Mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, vaenderera mberi nemisangano yavo kuMataga Business Center, Mberengwa kuMidlands. Amai Mugabe vati havana chido chekutora chigaro chemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, sezviri kutaurwa nevamwe mubato. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko ekuti vamwe muZanu-PF, vachitungamirwa nedunhu reMashonland West, vari kuda kuti Amai Mugabe vatore chigaro chekuva mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika. No media source currently available Pari zvino Amai Mugabe ndivo mukuru webazi remadzimai reWomens League. Amai Mugabe vatiwo VaMugabe munhu agara achinetsekera nyika uye achirarama hupenyu hwakaoma kubva munguva yechimurenga. Mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika ashorawo bato reMDC achiti rakaumbwa navanasapurazi vaisafara nekutorerwa minda. Vatiwo mutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai,ndivo vakaunza zvirango zvakatemerwa nyika. Asi mutauriri weMDC-T, VaObert Gutu, vanoti Amai Mugabe havana zvavanoziva pane zvavari kutaura. VaGutu vatiwo bato ravo riri kuenda kumatare kuti amise Amai Mugabe kupa vanhu matarakita ehurumende, sezvo asiri ehurumende. No media source currently available Amai Mugabe vashorawo VaRugare Gumbo vePeople First vachiti mutengesi uye vari kufamba vachipa vanhu mari kuti vavatsigire.Asi VaGumbo vati zviri kutaurwa nemudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika hazvina nemusoro wese. No media source currently available Vatevedzeri vose vemutungamiri wenyika, VaMnangagwa naVaPhelekezela Mphoko vange varipowo pamusangano uyu. VaMpoko varatidza kusafara apo vadaidzwa kunzi VaMboko nevakafanobata chigaro chasachigaro weMidlands, VaKizito Chivamba. Vati uku kushora uye kunyomba.

headline: Aluvah abuda muchipatara kuCameroon
text: MUTSIGIRI mukuru wenhabvu, Alvin “Aluvah” Zhakata, anoti aburitswa muchipatara mushure mekunge avhenekwa nemachiremba ekunyika yeCameroon avo vange vachimurapa chirwere chemoyo icho chakangomubata achiona mutambo weAFCON pakati pechikwata cheMalawi necheMorocco ikoko.   Aluvah ari kuCameroon uko akaenda kumakwikwi eAfrica Cup of Nations (AFCON) uyo ari kutambirwa kunyika iyi. Ange ava nemazuva ari muchipatara.   Zvichitevera kuburitswa kwakaita chikwata chenhabvu chenyika chemaWarriors kumitambo iyi, Aluvah haana kudzoka sezvo akasara achiona mimwe mitambo uye paaiona mutambo weMalawi neMorocco, ndipo akadonha arwara nechirwere chemoyo ndokumhanyiswa kuchipatara.   Aluvah ange agara muchipatara izvo zvakazomuona achibhadharirwa mari dzange dzichidiwako, zvose nedzemachiremba, nemutungamiri weCameroon Football Association, Samuel Eto’o.   Achitaura ari kunyika iyi, Aluvah audza Kwayedza nhasi mangwanani kuti ave kunzwa zviri nani.   “Ndave kunzwa zvakanaka manje, ndakavhenekwa nanachiremba vange vachindirapa ndikaitwa mascan akadzoka achiratidza kuti ndave nani,” anodaro.   Aluvah anoti haasati ave kuziva kuti anodzoka kumusha kuZimbabwe rinhi.   “Ndichakuzivisai zuva rekudzoka,” anodaro.   Aka hakasi kekutanga Aluvah achisangana netsekwende apo anenge achinotsigira mitambo yeAfrica Cup of Nations. Mugore ra2019, achienda kuAFCON kuEgypt – apo akafamba kubva kuSouth Africa – akambovharirwa mujeri nemapurisa munyika yeSudan umo maive nehondo.   Akazokwanisa hake kupfuurira mberi nerwendo rwake kunosvika kuEgypt asi pakudzoka akazobhadharirwa ndege nesangano reConfederation of African Football (CAF).

headline: Madzimai Oyambirwa nezveChirwere CheKusagadzikana Mupfungwa Achongobva Kusunguruka
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dziri kuyambira vanhu kuti vagare vakangwarira nyaya yekurwara nepfungwa kunogona kuita madzimai kana achangobva mukusungunuka zvinogona kuti vamwe vagume vatora hupenyu hwavo. Asi chirwere ichi chinorapika munhu akakwanisa kuwana rubatsiro nekukurumidza. Chirwere ichi chinonzi postpartum chinokonzerwa nekusagadzikana mupfungwa kana mudzimai achangobva mukusungunuka. Dr Vongai Munatsi vanoti pavanhu gumi vanoenda kunotsvaga rubatsiro kuzvipatara nekumakiriniki munyika, panowanikwa vanhu vatatu vanezvirwere zvepfungwa. Vakurudzira kuti kana zvaonekwa kuti mukadzi asununguka aakuita zvinhu zvaaisamboita kare zvinenge kusuwa, kutadza kudya zvakanaka kana kutoramba kuyamwisa mwana , zvinenge zvavekuratidza kuti pfungwa dzake dzinenge dzisisina kugadzikana zvakanaka. Dr Munatsi vanoendera mberi vachiri zvirwere zvepfungwa zvinofamba nedzinza remunhu zvokuti kana zvikasaongororwa nemazvo, panogona kuonekwa kuti kune vamwe vemudzinza vakambobatika nedenda repfungwa. Vatiwo zvirwere zvepfungwa hazvikonzerwi nekuroiwa, madhimoni kana mweya yetsvina asi kuti varapwi ava vanenge vachingoda anoda kukurukura navo kuti vataure misengwa yavakatakura. Mugari wekuChitungwiza Amai Grace Chihuri vanoti nyaya yemadzimai anovhiringika pfungwa kana vabatsirwa inyaya isinganyanye kutambirika mumhuri dzakawanda zvokuti havatozive kuti vakadzi ava vanokwanisa kurapwa nemishonga vakatoita zvakanaka. Nyanzvi yezvehutano hwepfungwa, avo vanoshanda nesangano reZimbabwe National Association for Mental Health kana kuti ZimNamh, Dr Ignatius Murambidzi, vakatsinhirawo mashoko akataurwa naDr Munetsi vachiti vanhu vakawanda havanzwisise nezvenyaya deemadzimai anoshungurudzika mushure mokunge vasununguka izvo zvinozoita kuti varware havo muchinyararire. Dr Murambidzi vanoti zvirwere zvepfungwa zvinorapika nemapiritsi zvokuti varapwi ava vanotogona kutorarama kusvikira vakwegura vachinwa mishonga iyoyi. Chero zvazvo zvisingazivikanwe kuti kuti madzimai mangani ane dambidziko repostpartum depression munyika, Dr Murambidzi vanoti denda repfungwa ratove dambudziko guru nokudaro panofanirwa kutsvagwa dzimwe nzira dzokuti vanhu vanedambudziko iri vakurumidze kuwana rubatsiro vasati vasvika pakuda zvokuzotora hupenyu hwavo. Sangano reWorld Health Organisation rinoti huhwandu hwevanhu varikuzviuraya kwave kuda kuenzana nevanhu vanofira munjodzi dzepamigwagwa. Vanhu mirioni nemazana matanhatu anemakumi mana, 1 640, vakafa nekuzviuraya uye vanhu vanodarika mirioni nemazana masere anemakumi matatu, 1830, vakafira mutsaona dzepamigwagwa mugore 2017 zvinova zvinhu zvave kuratidza kuti firo mbiri idzi dzatove kukwikwidzana. Sangano reWorld Health Organisation rinoti zvakare vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matatu pasi rose vanorwara nechirwere chekufungisisa kana kuti depression pachirungu, uye vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete, vanozviuraya pasi rose.

headline: ZCTU Inoti Ngapaitwe Hurukuro paNyaya yeMitengo Yoita Chamurambamhuru
text: Munyori mukuru wesangano revashandi reZCTU VaJaphet Moyo vanoti panofanira kuitwa musangano wechimbi chimbi weTNF kuzeya nyaya yemitengo yezvinhu yoramba yoita chamurambamhuru. Mitengo yezvinhu zvekudya uye michova yakawedzerwa zvakanyanya mumazuva mashoma adarika. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende sezvo gurukota rezvevashandi Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima vati vange vachangopinda munyika kubva kuAmerica nekudaro vange vachida kumbotura befu. Mutungamiri weEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe Doctor Israel Murefu vati vange vakabatikana vakati tigozovafonera. No media source currently available

headline: MISA-Zimbabwe, Vatori veNhau Vopikisa Mutongo weCriminal Defamation
text: Sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevatori venhau kuchamhembe kweAfrica reMISA-Zimbabwe rakabatana nevamwe vatori venhau, neChitatu rasvitsa kudare repamusorosoro reConstitutional Court, magwaro ekuti mutemo unosvibisa chimiro chemunhu wecriminal defamation uraswe mubumbiro idzva remitemo. Mumagwaro asvitswa kudare negweta riri kumirira sangano iri pamwe nevatori venhau ava, VaChris Mhike, vanoti chikamu 96 chemutemo wecriminal law (Codofication and Reform) Act (Chapter 9:23) uri kunze kwemutemo sezvo usingadyidzane nezvikamu 61 ne 62 zvebumbiro remitemo, nekudaro unofanirwa kuraswa. VaMhike vanoti zvikamu 61 ne 62 zvebumbiro idzva izvo zvinochengetedza kodzero dzevanhu mukufambiswa kwenhau pamwe nekuwaniswa mashoko pamwe nekodzero dzekutaura vakasununguka. Vamwe vakwira dare pamwe neMISA-Zimbabwe vatori venhau vanoti Nqaba Matshazi, Sydney Saize pamwe naGodwin Mangudya, pamwe nevanoita zvekudhinda mapepa vakazvimirira VaRoger Dean Stringer. Matshazi naVaStringer vanonzi vakamboshungurudzwawo nemutemo uyu. Vakwirirwa dare vanoti gurukota rezvemitemo nemabasa eparamende uye vari mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaJonathan Moyo pamwe negweta guru rehurumende VaPrince Machaya. Vatatu ava vane mazuva gumi ekupikisa nyaya iyi. Danho iri rinouya panguva shoma dare rimwechetero ratonga kuti mutemo wecorminal defamation uchiri kushanda sezvo wakangobviswa chete pabumbiro remitemo rekare. No media source currently available

headline: Zanu PF Yomanikidza Vanhu Kubvisa Mari yeBhavhadhe raVaMugabe
text: Vagari vekuMasvingo vanoti vari kumanikidzwa kubhadhara mari neZanu PF kuitira kuti mari iyi izoshandiswa pamabiko ekupemberera bhavhadhe remutungamiri wenyika, Va Robert Mugabe, mwedzi uno. VaMugabe vari kusvitsa makore makumi mapfumbamwe nematatu nemusi wa 21 Kukadzi. Vagari vekumaruwa pamwe nevashandi vehurumende vanoti vari kurwadziwa nekumanikidzwa kwavari kuitwa kuti vatsigire zvirongwa zveZanu PF ivo vasingadi. Vagari ava vanoti vechidiki ve Zanu PF vari kufamba mumaruwa pamwe nekumabasa evashandi vehurumende vachivamanikidza kuti vabvise mari inotangira padhora rimwe chete kusvika pamadhora matatu. Mumwe mugari wekwaMazambara kwaZimuto, VaPaul Kurima, vanoti vechidiki ava vari kumakidza masabhuku kuti vatore mari iyi kuvagari. Mumwe mushandi wehurumende akaramba kudomwa zita rake sezvo asingabvumidzwe kutaura nevatori venahu anoti vashandi vehurumende vari kumanikidzwa kubvisa mari dzezvirongwa zveZanu PF zvavasineyi nazvo asi hurumende isingavawedzeri mari yemihoro. Mushandi uyu anoti vakawanda vari kubhadhara mari iyi vachityira kurasikirwa nemabasa avo, kanawo hupenyu hwavo sezvo Zanu PF iri kuvavimbisa kuzovaranga kana vachinge varamba kubvisa mari idzi. Asi mumwe mudzidzisi weku Zaka, Va Tonderai Hakutangwi, vanoti havasi kuzobvisa mari iyi nekuti zviri kuitwa izvi hazvisi pamutemo. Anotungamirira sangano rekodzero dzevanhu re Masvingo Human Rights Trust, VaMasimba Gonese, vanoti ichokwadi kuti izvi zviri kuitika uye vashoropodza Zanu PF vachiti iri kurwadzisa vanotambura. Mumwe wevatungamiri wevechidiki ku Zanu PF, VA Talent Chivange, vanoti mashoko aya ndekunyepa sezvo bato ravo riri kukumbira mari kuvanoda pasina kumanikidza vanhu. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kumutauriri weZanu PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, kuti tinzwe divi ravo. Zviri kuitika kuMasvingo zviri kuitikawo kumatunhu akawanda munyika. Mutungamiri weZapu, VaDumiso Dabengwa, vakaudza vanhu neMugovera kuMarula mudunhu reMatabeleland South kuti veZanu PF vakamanikidza mwanakomana wavo kuti abvise mombe, asi akaramba kuita izvi. Vari kuronga bhavhadhe raVaMugabe, Va Never Khanye, vanova nhengo yeZanu PF inomirira Matobo North, vakaudza vatori venhau kuti varimi vose vari muma A2 vanofanirwa kubvisa mombe dzichaurayiwa pamabiko aya. Zanu PF inonzi iri kuda mombe zana nemakumi mashanu dzichaurayiwa pabhavhadhe raVaMugabe. Mhemberero idzi dzichaitirwa pa Rhodes Estate Preparatory School kuMatobo. No media source currently available

headline: VaKhaya Moyo Vanobvuma Kuti Chabvondoka muZanu PF
text: Bato re Zanu PF rinoti richasangana svondo rinouya kuti rizeya nyaya yekunetsana kuri mubato iri kana paine vanenge vaine zvichemo zvavanenge vatura kuPolitburo. Mashoko aya ataurwa nemutauriri webato iri, Va Simon Khaya Moyo, zvichiteveraa kunetsana nekurovana uye kukandirana makobvu nematete kuri kuenderera mberi mubato iri pamveri pemusangano waro we National Conference uri kutarisira kuitwa kuVictoria Falls muna Zvita. No media source currently available Vanhu vakawanda mubato iri vave makara asionane zvikuru vanonzi vari kutsigira chikwata chinonzi chinotungamirwa nemumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nechimwe chinonzi Generation 40 chinosanganisira mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe. Asi Amai Mugabe naVaMnangagwa vanoti havana zvikwata zvavanotungamira. Vanoziva zviri kuitika muZanu PF vanoti chirongwa cheGeneration 40, kana kuti G40, chakauya kuburikidza nepfungwa dzevaimbove gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaJonathan Moyo, vachishanda nemamwe makurukota echidiki muZanu PF Mune kunetsana kunotyisa mumatunhu akawanda muZanu PF kusanganisira Masvingo, Harare, Mashonaland West, Mashonaland East neMashonaland Central. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika uye vachiongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaClifford Mashiri, vanoti zvava kuitika muZanu PF zvinoratidza kuti bato iri chava chitima chisina musoro

headline: United Nations Yotumira Nhumwa Kuzoongorora Nyaya yeKupfurwa kweVanhu neMauto Muna Ndira
text: Sangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights rinoti rinotambira nemufaro danho rebazi reUnited Nation’s rinoona nezvekodzero dzevanhu reHigh Commission for Health Rights kutumira nhumwa kuZimbabwe kuzoongorora nezvenyaya yekupfurwa kwevanhu nemauto muHarare muna Ndira. Vanhu ava vairatidzira vachiti havaifara nenyaya yekukwidzwa kwemutengo wemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari. Vamwe vanhu vanonzi vakaurayiwa, mamwe madzimai achipomera mauto mhosva yekuvabata chibharo uye vakawanda vakasungwa. Hurumende iri kuramba kuti izvi zvakaitika ichiti mauto aizorwa mafuta enguruve yaasina kudya. Vachitaura nebepanhau reSunday Mail munyori mukuru mubazi rezvemutemo amai Virginia Mabhiza vakati gurukota rezvemitemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi vainge vatenderana nemukuru weUNHRC Amai Michelle Bachelet nezvekutumirwa kwenhumwa kuZimbabwe. Mutauriri weZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights VaKumbirai Mafunda vati vanotambira rwendo urwu nemaoko maviri. No media source currently available

headline: Paramende Inozeya Bhiri reMitemo yeSarudzo
text: Dare reNational Assembly razeya mutemo wesarudzo weElectoral Amendment Bill uye chibvumirano chemapato ezvematongerwo enyika chekuita sarudzo dzakachena dzisina mhirizhonga, cheElectoral Code of Conduct for Political Parties and Candidates and Other Stakeholders chapinzwawo mubhiri iri kuti chive mumutemo wesarudzo. Bhiri iri rakanangana nekuvanduza mitemo yesarudzo kuti nyika ikwanise kuita sarudzo dzakachena. Zvimwe zviri kudiwa nemapato anopikisa kuti mapato aya avewo nechekuita pamwe nekuongorora kudhindwa kwemagwaro ekuvhotesa kana kuti maballot papers. Mapato aya anodawo kuti mitemo yesarudzo usungire mapato kuti ape mukana wakaenzana kuvanhukadzi nevanhurume pazvinzvimbo zvese zvino kwikwidzwa musarudzo. Chibvumirano chemapato chekuita sarudzo dzakachena icho chapinzwa mumitemo yesarudzo, chinorambidza nyaya dzemhirizhonga uye chinosungira kuti vemapato, vemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira, vanokwikwidza musarudzo vapanane mukana pamwe nekuregawo vamwe vachitaura pfungwa dzavo pamwe nekupinda mumisangano pamadiro. Chibvumirano ichi chinosungurirawo kuti vanhu vapihwe mukana wekuzvishambadza uye chinoti vaye vachazenge vachibvisa kana kubvarurwa zvinyorwa zvevamwe kana kuti maposters, varangwe nemutemo. Chibvumirano ichi chinorambidzawo kutenga vavhoti kana kutyityidzira vanhu kuti vavhotere bato rinenge richida munhu. Chinorambidzawo vemapato kuti vataure zvinenge zvabuda musarudzo zvisati zvaziviswa neZimbabwe Electoral Commission. Mukuru wesangano rePlatform for Youth Development, VaClaris Madhuku, vati danho rekuisa chibvumirano chemapato mumutemo wesarudzo chakanaka chose. VaMadhuku vati sezvo wave mutemo vanenge vautyora vacharangwa. Vati kana mutemo mutsva wesarudzo ukatevedzwa, nyika inogona kuita sarudzo dzakachena. Chibvumirano ichi chinosungirawo vemapato ezvematongerwe enyika kurega vatapi venhau vachipinda mumisangano yawo yekutsvaga rutsigiro pamwe nekuvachengetedza. Mukuru weMedia Institute of Southern Africa – Zimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo, vati vanofara nenyaya yekuti vatapi venhau vachengetedzwe pavenenge vachiita basa ravo. VaMoyo vati vatapi venhau vanogara vachishungurudzwa nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika zvikuru munguva yesarudzo uye mutemo unofanira kubuda nezvirango zvakaomarara kune vanoshungurudza vatapi venhau. Dare richiri kuzeya bhiri iri uye rinotarisirwa kuripasisa chero nguva. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Voparura Musangano weZvekurima kuVictoria Falls
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnagagwa vakasvika muVictoria Falls nezuro sezvo vari munyarikani pamusangano uri kuitwa mudhorobha iri weSouthern African Confederation of Agicultural Unions. Musangano uyu uri kutarisirwa kutanga nhasi. VaMnangagwa vakaendawo negurukota rinoona nezvekurima VaPerrance Shiri. Nyika dzinosvika gumi nenhatu dziri kutarisirwa pamusangano uyu dzichizeya nyaya dzekutengeserana mune zvekurima. Masangano anoti Zimbabwe Farmers Union neCommercial Farmers Union ndiwo akaronga musangano uyu. Panopera musangano uyu pari kutarisirwa kuti panenge pave sachigaro mutsva wesangano iri sezvo aripo ikozvino, Doctor Theo de Jager, vanenge voenda pamudyandigere. Muzvinafundo munyaya dzezvekurima VaMandivamba Rukuni vanoti musangano uyu wakakosha zvikuru kunyika dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica munyaya dzekutengeserana. No media source currently available

headline: “One World Together At Home” Inowana Mamirioni Mazana Maviri Anemakumi Manomwe Emadhora Kubatsira Kurwisana neCovid-19
text: Muimbi ane mukurumbira, anozivikanwa nezita rekuti ‘Lady Gaga’, achibatsirana neWorld Health Organisation, akaronga mutambo wemimhanzi apo vaimbi vane mukurumbira vaishaura kuvanhu pasi pose vari mudzimba dzavo muAmerica, United Kingdom, kuEurope nekunedzimwe nyika zhinji pasi pose. Mutambo uyu, uyo unonzi ‘One World Together at Home’, wakaona vaimbi vanemukurumbira vachiimbira vanhu, pakabuda mamirioni nemamirioni emadhora ekubatsira mukurwisana nechirwere che Coronavirus, pamwechete nekubatsira avo vanorapa vanhu asi vasina mbatya dzakakwana dzekuzvidzivirira kubva kuchirwere ichi. Vanhu vanoita mamirioni makumi maviri ne mazana manomwe (270 million) vakaona mutambo uyu uchiitwa paInternet, patelevhizhini nepama ‘social media’ akasiyanasiyana. Mutambo uyu wakaitirwa kutsigira avo vanoshanda vachirapa vanhu vanechirwere che Covid-19 uye kuedza kubatsira kumisa kupararira kwe chirwere ichi. Sangano rinoona nezvehutano pasi pose, reWorld Health Organization, rakabatana naLady Gaga, rakaronga mutambo uyu, uyo wakatora ma awa matanhatu vaimbi vachiyaura. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinofarira zvemimanzi nemafirimu, Tafadzwa Munjanja, anogara mudunhu reOklahoma, muAmerica, anoti mushure memutambo uyu, pakazoita ma awa maviri apo vaimbi, vamwe vatungamiri venyika neavo vanozivikanwa mukubatsira nemari vakarumbidza vashandi mune zvehutano, vanachiremba neavo vese varikurwisana nechirwere che coronavirus pasi pose. No media source currently available

headline: Ndasuwa bhora: Figgy
text: MUTAMBI weMighty Warriors neBlack Rhinos Queens, Felistas Muzongondi,  anoti asuwa zvikuru mutambo wenhabvu.   Izvi zvinotevera kumiswa kwakamboitwa mitambo pasi rose nechinangwa chekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 kubvira muna Kurume gore rino.   Mitambo yakatanga kuitwa munyika muno nguva yadarika apo maWarriors akasangana neAlgeria mumutambo wekurwira tikiti rekuenda kumakwikwi eAfrica Cup of Nations Cameroon 2021.   Mutambo uyu wakatambwa pasina vatsigiri sezvinodiwa pasi pemitemo yekurwisa Covid-19.   Figgy, sezita remadunhurirwa raMuzongondi, anoti akaita rombo rakanaka rekupinda basa kuZimbabwe National Army (ZNA) pamwe nekuve mutambi wenhabvu.   Muzongondi anoti kuva nerimwe basa kuri kumubatsira zvikuru sezvo ange achikwanisa kuwana raramo panguva yelockdown asi asuwa nhabvu unove mutambo waanodisisa.   “Kubva nyika yakaenda palockdown tange tichienda kumabasa, ndizvo zvange zvichitiraramisa muhupenyu hwedu nemhuri dzedu. Semutambi wenhabvu wemuZimbabwe zvakakosha chaizvo kuita rimwe basa uye mamwe mabhindauko anounza mari nekuti anokubatsira muhupenyu hwako pane dzimwe dzenguva. Kana usina zvimwe zvekuita ndipo paye zvinhu zvinooma,” anodaro.   Muzongondi anoenderera mberi achiti, “Chokwadi ndechekuti nhabvu ndaisuwa zvikuru, ndinonzwa manyukunyuku ndichitamba ndiri munhandare asi iye zvino chakakosha hupenyu hwevanhu uye hwedu tose pamberi.”   Figgy achagara ari munhorowondo yenhabvu yemaMighty Warriors sezvo ndiye ane chiremerera chekuva kaputeni wekutanga wechikwata chenyika kuchitungamirira kuenda kumakwikwi eRio de Janeiro Brazil 2016 Olympics.   Pari zvino zvikwata zvizhinji zvevarume zvakapihwa mvumo yekutanga kuita gadziriro dzavo asi hunge kana vatambi vacho uye hutungamiri hwaongororwa denda reCovid-19.

headline: Sangano reCitizens Forum Rokurudzira Kuomeserwa kweVanotengesa Nyika
text: Rimwe sangano rinozviti Citizens Forum rinoti ranyora tsamba dzenyunyuto kumasangano akazvimiririra avanoti akabatsira mukurongwa kwekuratidzira kwakaitwa mwedzi wapera. Vachitaura nevatori venhau, mukuru musangano iri, VaAlex Gakanje, vati masangano aya akapesvedzera mhirizhonga, uye vachaavharisa. Mamwe emasangano adomwa neCitizens Form anosanganisira Crisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, Law Society of Zimbabwe, Zimbabwe lawyers for Human Rights nemizinda yeAmerica neBritain. Asiwo mukuru wePlatform for Youth Development inove nhengo yeCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaClaris Madhuku, vashora zvikuru Citizens Forum vachiti kutyityidzirana kunodzorera nyika shure. VaMadhuku vatiwo vese vane moyo wekuda kuona kubudirira kwenyika, vari kukurudzira nhaurirano, izvo zviri kuitwa nemasangano avanodyidzana nawo. Studio7 haina kukwamisa kunzwa divi reBritain neAmerica pamusoro pemashoko eCitizens Forum. Nyika mbiri idzi dzakabuda pachena dzichishora mabatirwo akaitwa mhirizhonga nemauto nemapurisa. Vanhu vanodarika gumi nevashanu vakapfurwa vakafa, uye vanhu vanodarika makumi manomwe vakarapwa maronda akakonzerwa nemabara epfuti. Hurumende yeZanu PF iri kupomera MDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa mhosva yekuronga mhirizhonga. Asi MDC inoti haisi iyo yakaronga kuratidzira uku, uye zviri kuitwa nehurumende, zvakafanana nekutsvaga uta mugate. Mune imwewo nyaya, vechidiki mubato reZanu PF vari kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vatsungirire mumatambudziko akatarisana nenyika vachiti vane chivimbo chekuti mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachagadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyika. Vachitaura nevatapi venhau muHarare, vechidiki vebato reZanu PF vati vawirirana kuti mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanofanirwa kupiwa mukana. Mumwe wevechidiki ava, Muzvare Yeukai Simbanegavi, vati vanonzwisisa kutambura kuri kuita veruzhinji nekuda kwekusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu munyaya dzezveupfumi. Muzvare Simbanegavi vati VaMnangagwa vanofanirwa kupiwa mukana wekurwisa huori, kutsvaka mari dzekunze pamwe nekugadzirisa matambudziko ari kusangana neveruzhinji muhupenyu hwavo. Muzvare Simbanegavi vatiwo sevechidiki vari kushora zvikuru nekwavanoti kushandiswa kwevechidiki mukuratidzira kwakaitika muna Ndira.

headline: Celtic musha wangu: Rodgers
text: Brendan Rodgers, anoti anoshuvira kuzoshanda muEnglish Premier League rimwe zuva asi kwete iye zvino.   Rodgers – uyo ari kunzi anodiwa neArsenal kuti azorairidze chikwata ichi uye achitsiva Arsene Wenger zvichitevera kubuda pachena kwaakaita kuti ari kubva kuchikwata ichi pachapera mwaka uno – anoti anoda kubhadhara rutsigiro rwaakapihwa nebhodhi reCeltic nekuramba achitungamira chikwata ichi kuenda kumberi.   Shasha iyi yasarirwa nemutambo mumwe chete kuti chikwata chake chihwine mukombe wechitatu wegore rino zvichitevera kukunda kwachakaita Rangers 5-0 ndokuhwina mukombe weLadbrokes Premiership Title.   Rodgers asarirwa nemakore matatu pakondirakiti yake uye akabuda pachena kuti haadi kushanda kumwe kunze kwekuCeltic.   Aimbove murairidzi weLiverpool uyu anoti, “Ndakamuka nemusi weMuvhuro kuno mangwanani ndiri maneja weCeltic, zvizivei kuti kuGlasgow kuno kunonakidza.   “Ndiri kurairidza chikwata chandinoda chikuru pasi rose. Ndinoda basa randiri kuita kuno.” – SportsMail Football

headline: Hart ave kuBurnley
text: akabva kuManchester City achienda kuBurnley.   Shasha iyi — iyo yaimbove mubati wepagedhi weEngland — akasayina kondirakiti yemakore maviri kuchikwata chaSean Dyche uye ane tarisiro yekuwedzera rimwe gore pamusoro.   Burnley, iyo yagara ina Tom Heaton naNick Pope muchikwata chayo, yakabhadhara mari inosvika £3.5 miriyoni pamwe neimwe ichazotevera yekutenga Hart.   Achitaura pamusoro penguva yake kuEtihad, Hart akaudza CityTV kuti, “Zvange zvichifadza zvikuru, ndakakura zvakanyanya. Ndakauya kuno ndine makore 19 ekuberekwa, ndave kubva ndave ne31 saka inguva ndefu chaiyo uye zvinhu zvakawanda zvakaitika — mhuri, shamwari uye nenhabvu yakawanda!   “Ndinonzwa rudo nekugamuchirwa. Ndaifarira zvikuru rudo rwandaipihwa nevatsigiri veMan City, ndakauya kuno ndiri mutambi weShrewsbury Town, kakomana kaibva kuShrewsbury. Zvainge zvakandikoshera kuve kuchikwata chino chisati chatanga kurwira mikombe uye ndakagamuchirwa kubva pazuva rekutanga. Ndofunga vakaona mandiri mumwe munhu aizoshanda nesimba rake kuti tiende kure.   “Ndaisazokwanisa kuita zvandakaita dai ndange ndisina kugamuchirwa uye ndisina mufaro, saka ndinofara kuti ndakapa vatsigiri nguva yemufaro uye ndinoshuvira kuti ndichagara mundangariro dzavo.”   Sportsmail yakaburitsa svondo radarika kuti mutambi uyu ange ave kusvika pakubva muchikwata ichi icho chaakatambira kwemakore anodarika 12 zvichitevera kuburitswa kwaakaita naPep Guardiola.   Akapedza mwaka wadarika ari kuWest Ham uko akaendeswa nechikwereti, asi haana kutamba zvakagutsa kuti apinde muchikwata chaGareth Southgate chakaenda kunokwikwidza kumutambo weWorld Cup.   Mwaka wa2016-17, akaupedza ari kuTorino inokwikwidza muSerie A uko akaenda nechikwereti, ndokutamba ka37 ndokuzodzoka kuEngland. — SportsMail Football

headline: VanaChiremba Vanoti Kuramwa Mabasa Kuri Kuendera Mberi
text: Mubati wehomwe musangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association Doctor Prince Butau vanoti kuramwa mabasa kwavanachiremba kuchiri kuenderera mberi kunyangwe vari kutarisirwa kuita musangano mangwana kuti votora danho ripi. VaButau vanoti vanachiremba havachina chivimbo nezvinovimbiswa nehurumende zvikuru kana pasina chanyoreranwa pasi. Vati chakachenjedza ndechakatanga sezvo muna 2014 vakambovimbiswa pakashaya chakazobuda. Bepanhau reSunday Mail range raburitsa mashoko ekuti kuramwa mabasa kwapera sezvo hurumende yagadzirisa zvimwe zvichemo zvavanachiremba. Zvichemo izvi zvinosanganisa kushaikwa kwemari muzvipatara uye vanachiremba vanoti vanoda kutambiriswa mari yekuAmerica sezvo mitengo yezvinhu iri kuramba ichiita chamurambamhuru. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvehutano VaObidiah Moyo sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Zifa inonzwisisa basa guru reHurumende’
text: ZIFA inoti inonzwisisa kuti Hurumende ine zvimwe zvinhu zvikuru zvairi kuita, izvo zvinoda kuitwa nechimbi-chimbi nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19, nekudaro haingainamikidze kuti iipe mari yekubatsira kuti mutambo wenhabvu urambe uchiendeka.
