Sangano iri rinoti harikwanisi kumanikidza Hurumende kuti iripe mari nekuda kwekuti hurumende yeBotswana yakapa mari yekutsigira nhabvu kunyika iyi.   Vatambi vane chitsama vemuZimbabwe nevarairidzi vacho vari kuzvikwata zvepamusoro zvekuBotswana uye mutambi mumwe nemumwe achange achiwana US$206, kubva pahomwe yakaiswa padivi nehurumende yenyika iyi yekutsigira nhabvu.   Mutambi mumwe nemumwe anotambira muligi reBotswana First Division achawana US$124,18 pasi pehomwe iyi.   Homwe iyi ndeyekubatsira nemari yemuhoro yevatambi kubva munaKubvumbi kusvika munaChikumi. Gurukota rezvemitambo kuBotswana VaTumiso Rakgare  nemusi weMuvhuro uno vakatsinhira kuti hurumende yavo ine hurongwa hwekubatsira zvikwata zvenhabvu zvepamusoro nemari yemuhoro yevatambi.   “Mari iyi ichaiswa mumaakaundi ebhengi evatambi senzira yekudzivirira nyaya yekuti zvimwe zvikwata zvinogona kupedzisira zvave kuishandisa mumabasa azvo ezuva nezuva,” vanodaro VaRakgare.   Vanoti vanamuzvinhapembe vachabatsirwa kuburikidza nehomwe yesangano rinoona nezvenhabvu pasi rose yeFifa relief fund sechiwirirano chakaitwa neBotswana Football Association.   Nhengo yebhodhi reZifa Philemon Machana anoti zvakakosha kutambira mamiriro akaita zvinhu parizvino sezvo zvichisiyana nyika nenyika.   “Tinonamata kuti rimwe zuva tichasvikawo ipapo, asi parizvino Hurumende yedu iri pakamanikana sezvo iine zvimwe zvikuru zvairi kuita. Tinovimba kuti mamiriro ezvinhu achaita zviri nani nekufamba kwenguva uye nhabvu yozove nerutsigiro rwakawanda,” anodaro.   Zvakadai, kuBotswana zvikwata zviri muligi yepamusoro zvichawana US$3 311 pachimwe nechimwe.   Chikwata chenhabvu chenyika iyi chinozivikanwa nekuti Zebras, chiri muboka rimwechete nemaWarriors eZimbabwe mumakwikwi ekurwira kuenda kuAfcon 2021, chine chibodzwa chimwe chete kubva mumitambo miviri uye chiri pachinzvimbo chechitatu.   MaWarriors ari pachinzvimbo chechipiri muboka iri kubva mumitambo yakawanda uye ari mumashure meAlgeria iyo ine zvibodzwa zvitanhatu.   Zambia ndiyo yakasenga boka iri iyo isina kana chibodzwa kubva mumitambo miviri.

headline: Zanu-PF Yoita Sarudzo neSvondo Vamwe Vachigunun'una
text: Sarudzo dzekutsvaga vachamirira Zanu PF musarudzo dzichaitwa, kana kuti primary elections, dziri kuitwa nemusi weSvondo kunyange hazvo paine kugunun’una kwevamwe kuti vakarambidzwa kutsvaga rutsigiro nezvikonzero zvakasiyana siyana. Vari kukwikwidza musarudzo idzi vari kunzi vafambe vose pamwe chete vachitsvaga rutsigiro uye kuratidza kuti vanotsigirawo zvizere mutungamiri webato iri, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, avo vari kukwikwidza musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. Munyori wezvemutemo mubato reZanu-PF, VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana, vanoti sarudzo idzi dzinoitwa musi mumwe chete.  No media source currently available

headline: VeChidiki veZanu-PF Vopika Kufa Vachirwira VaMugabe
text: Vechidiki vanotsigira bato reZanu PF mudunhu reMashonaland West vanoti vakazvipira kufira kudzivirira mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe kuvanhu vari kuda kuvabvisa pachigaro nekuratidzira. Vachitaura mushure memusangano wavo muChinhoyi, mumwe wevechidiki ava, VaKingstone Bakasa vakati vakasunga zvisungo zvinosanganisira kupira hupenyu hwavo vachirwisa dzavanoti mhandu dziri kuratidzira kuti VaMugabe vasiye basa nguva yavo isati yakwana. VaBakasa vanoti kubva parizvino vachange vachipinda mumigwagwa kudzivirira vanamai nanababa vavanoti vari kushungurudzwa nevanhu vari kuratidzira munyika. VaBakasa vanotiwo vechidiki veZanu PF vachaita kuti nhengo dzavo dziongorore zvose zvinenge zvichiitika pamisika nepose panokwirirwa mota dzekufambisa mumadhorobha. VaBakasa vanoti vachatora nzvimbo idzi sezvo dziri idzo dzinotanga mhirizhonga. Asi mumwe wechidiki webato rezimbabwe People First VaEldon Cherai vanoti havasi kuzobvuma kutyisidzirwa nevechidiki vezanu PF. Zvisungo zvakawanda zvakabuda nevechidiki iri zvakanangana nekusimbaradza bato rezanu-PF.

headline: VaMangudya Votaura Pamusoro peMari Yanetsa Munyika
text: VaMangudya vataura mashoko aya vachitsanangurira nhengo dzekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemari kuti dambudziko remari mumabhangi riri kunyanyokukonzerwa nekuti nyika iri kutenga zvinhu zvakawanda kunze kwenyika asi iyo isina zvakawanda zvainotengesa. Gavhuna webhanga guru munyika, VaJohn Mangudya, vaudza nhengo dzepararamende kuti bhanga ravo nemamwe mabhanga akaunza munyika mari inodarika mamiriyoni mazana maviri emadhora kubva muna Ndira kusvika pakutanga kwemwedzi uno, asi izvi zviri kutadza kupedza dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari munyika. VaMangudya vataura mashoko aya vachitsanangurira nhengo dzekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemari kuti dambudziko remari mumabhangi riri kunyanyokukonzerwa nekuti nyika iri kutenga zvinhu zvakawanda kunze kwenyika asi iyo isina zvakawanda zvainotengesa. Vatiwo nyaya yekuti nyika iri kutenga chibage zvichitevera nzara yakakonzerwa neEl Nino pamwe nekuti vanhu havachina chido chekuchengetera mari dzavo mumabhanga sezvo vari kubhadhariswa mari yakawanda pakushandisa mabhangi. Asi vati zvisinei hazvo bhanga ravo nemamwe vari kuronga kuunza imwe mari munyika kuitira kupedza dambudziko iri. Vatiwo mabhanga matanhatu pamabhanga gumi ari munyika ndiwo chete ari kupinza mari munyika. Vatiwo kutanga kwemwaka wekutengeswa kwefodya kuchaunzawo mari yakawanda munyika. Zimbabwe yakatarisana nedambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari mumabhanga uye VaMangudya vati mabhanga anofanira kubhadharisa vanhu mari shoma pavanoshandisa mabhanga pamwe nekuona kuti veruzhinji vasina mabhuku ekubhanga kumabhanga vapihwa mukana wekuvhura maakaunzi aya. Mabhanga mazhinji ari kupa vanhu mazana maviri emadhora kana mari iri pasi pazuva nekuda kwekushomeka kwemari. Zvinhu zvakanaka, mabhanga anopa vanhu zviuru zviviri zvemadhora kana kudarika pazuva. Pavabvunzwa kuti sei vasiri kushandisa mari yemuno iyo vanokwanisa kudhinda kana yave shoma mumabhanga, VaMangudya vati nyika haisati yakwanisa kuita zvinodiwa kuti itange kushandisa mari yemuno zvekare. Vati chikuru chichapedza dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari munyika kugadzira nekutengesa zvinhu zvemuno kunze pamwe nekuumba mitemo inoita kuti vemabhizimisi vekunze vauye kuzotanga mabhizimisi munyika. Zimbabwe iri kushandisa mabhiriyoni manomwe emadhora kutenga zvinhu zvekunze iyo ichitengesa kunze zvinhu zvinokosha mabhiriyoni matatu chete emadhora. No media source currently available

headline: Kanzuru yeChitungwiza Yozivisa Vane Zvivakwa Zvisiri Pamutemo Kuti Vaputse Zvivakwa Izvi
text: Kanzuru yeChitungwiza nhasi yapa vese vakavaka zvisiri pamutemo panzvimbo yemabhizimisi yeTown Centre kuti vaputse zvivakwa zvavo mukati memaawa makumi mana nemasere ari kutevera ichiti kana vakasaita izvi, kanzuru ichaputsa zvivakwa izvi yega. Muchiviso kuvagari, kanzuru yeChitungwiza yati vakavaka vasina mvumo yekanzuru vanofanira kuputsa zvivakwa izvi zvisinei kuti ndivo varidzi venzvimbo here kana kuti kwete. Kanzuru inoti ichashandisa mutemo weRegional, Town and Country Planning Act, zvikamu 32 ne35 kuputsa zvivakwa izvi. Mutaururi wekanzuru yeChitungwiza, VaLovemore Meya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kanzuru inotarisira kuvandudza nzvimbo yeTown Centre ndosaka vari kubvisa vanhu vakavaka zvisiri pamutemo. VaMeya vatiwo vamwe vevanhu vari kuvakava zvisina mvumo vanhu vakatopihwa masitendi asi vari kungotadza kutevedza mutemo. Vati zvivakwa zvichaputswa zvinosanganisira zvitoro, maDurawall pamwe nezvimwe. Asi mukuru weChitungwiza Residents Trust, Muzvare Diana Kuvheya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kanzuru haina mvumo zvekuti magweta avo eZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights atonyorera kukanzuru pamusoro penyaya iyi. Mutauriri weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaObert Masaraure, vashoropodza hurongwa hwekanzuru yeChitungwiza vachiti kanzuru haifaniri kurega vanhu vachivaka pese pese yozomirira kuputsa chete. Vati kanzuru inofanira kugara pasi nevagari vogadzirisa nyaya iyi kwete kuputsa zvivakwa zvavo. Gore rino kanzuru yeChitungwiza yainge yaronga kuputsa dzimba dzese nemisika zvakavakwa zvisiri pamutemo asi ikamiswa kuita izvi nematare edzimhosva ayo akati inofanira kutanga yapa vanhu ava pekugara pamwe nepekutengesera. Tabvunza VaMeya kuti chirongwa chavo hachisi kuzomiswa sezvakaitwa zvimwe here vakati vanopihwa simba nemutemo weRegional, Town and Country Planning Act. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi regurukota rezvematunhu, VaJuly Moyo, sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kubatika. No media source currently available

headline: Zvinhu Zvogadzikana Munyika paNyaya yeMitengo Uye Kuwanikwa Kwazvo
text: Sangano ravana chipangamazano munyaya dzehupfumi, reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, rinoti zvinhu zvinenge zvadzokera pazvaive zviri masvondo apera zvichitevera kushaikwa kwezvimwe zvinodiwa nevanhu zuva nezuva, uye kukwira mitengo kwezvimwe. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vachishanda nesangano iri, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti ongororo yakaitwa nesangano ravo inoratidza kuti zvinhu zvose zvakaita semafuta ekubikisa nemafuta edzimotokari zvakanga zvave kushaikwa pamisika zvave kuwanikwa, kunyange hazvo vamwe vatengesi vasati vadzikisa mitengo. Mitengo yezvinhu izvi yakanga yakwidzwa zvichitevera kushaikwa kwazvo. Semuenzaniso, mafuta edzimotokari akanga akwira nemasendi matatu parita kubva padhora nemasendi makumi matatu nemana kuenda padhora nemasendi makumi matatu nemanomwe. Mafuta ekubikisa anonzi akanga akwirawo zvakanyanya mune zvitoro zvizhinji. Semuenzaniso, marita maviri emafuta akanga otengeswa nemari iri pakati pemadhora mashanu nemadhora matanhatu, kubva pamadhora matatu nemasendi makumi mashanu. Doctor Chitambara vanoti havaoni mitemo iri kudzikwa nehurumende yekutara mitengo yezvinhu ichibatsira. Asi vanoti dambudziko remari richiri kuenderera mberi kunyange hazvo hurumende iri kuti yakadzika mutemo unosunga vanotengesa mari nevasiri kuisa mari kumabhanga. No media source currently available

headline: ZCTU Yoita Hurukuro naVaMnagagwa Apo Mitengo Yoita Chamurambamhuru
text: Zvinhu munyika zvaramba zvakaita manyama amire nerongo munyaya dzezvehupfumi zvopa kuti vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi nezvematongerwo enyika vati hurumende yave kungopumha vanoipikisa huroyi ichishandisa mapepanhau akaita seHerald kurova bembera. Asi mutugamiri weZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti mushandi ave kudya nhoko dzezvironda. VaMutasa vanoti sesangano revashandi vachasangana neChitatu nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachivaudzawo nhuna dzevashandi. Vanoti gurukota rezvevashandi, Doctor Sekai Nzenza, ndivo vakaronga musangano uyu mushure mekunge ZCTU yakumbira musangano wakadai. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata Doctor Nzenza kana mutauriri waVaMnagagwa, VaGeorge Charamba, sezvo nharembozha dzavo dzange dzisiri kudairwa. Bepanhau reHerald riri kuti vemabhizimisi ndevamwe vanofanira kuongororwa kana vakwidza mitengo sezvo vari kuda kuti vanhu vapandukire hurumende vachitsigina neAmerica nebato rinopikisa reMDC. Izvi zvinotevera kukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu muzvitoro. Zvinhu zvawedzerwa mitengo zvinosanganisira hupfu, chingwa, mupunga, Mazowe nezvimwe. Marita maviri eMazowe awedzerwa kusvika pamadhora emaRTGS makumi maviri nerimwe kana kuti 21 RTGS dollars kubva pamadhora gumi nematatu nemasendi makumi mashanu, 13,50 emaRTGS. Mutauriri weGrain Millers Association, VaGarikai Chaunza, vanoti vakwidza mitengo sezvo zvavanoshandisa kusanganisa mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari zvawedzerwa mutengo. Asi VaChaunza vanoitiwo seGMAZ vanenge votumira vanhu kunoongorora kuti hapana vari kudhurisa zvinhu here. Asi mutauriri weMDC, VaJacob Mafume, vanoti hurumende yeZanu-PF yakundikana kugadzirisa zvinhu. Asi muzvinabhizimisi vari nhengo yeZanu-PF, VaGilbert Muponda, vanoti mitengo ichagadzikana asi zvinogona kutora makore maviri sezvakavimbiswa negurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube. Zvimwe zvitoro zvinoti zvave kutengesa nemadhora ekuAmerica chete zvinonzi nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Doctor Godfrey kanyenze vanotungamira sangano reLabour and Economic Reform Institute of Zimbabwe hazvishamise. Ko chii chingaitwe kuti zvinhu zvigadziriswe? Doctor Kanyenze vanoti munyika munoda kugadziriswa nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika nekutaurirana. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti nyaya yehouri nekutadza kutungamira ndiyo yakanganisa hupfumi hwenyika. Asi hurumende inoti iri kukanganiswa nezvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru muhurumende. No media source currently available

headline: Chibuku Super Cup yadzoka
text: PREMIER Soccer League (PSL) razivisa nezvekudzoka kwemitambo yeChibuku Super Cup iyo ichasimudzira nemusi weChitatu svondo rinouya apo zvikwata zvose zviri mumapoka zvichabandana mumitambo yekurwira mukombe uyu.   Mitambo iyi ichatanga musi weChitatu 29 Gunyana izvo zvichaona Herentals FC neZPC Kariba zvichizarura mutambo wemuboka reGroup 1.   Musi uyu zvekare, kuboka reGroup 3, Cranborne Bullets ichange iri pamba apo ichasangana neManica Diamond kuchiti Triangle United ichitatsurana neNgezi Platinum.   Nenguva dza1 masikati kuchange kusingadanwe anonzwa kuBulawayo muboka reGroup 2 uko Chicken Inn ichabandana neBulawayo City iyo yangokwanisa kuwana chibodzwa chimwe chete mumitambo mitatu yayatamba.   Mumitambo yezuva iri yemasikati zvakare, Dynamos FC – iyo iri kutungamira muGroup 1 – ichisangana neYadah FC kuchiti FC Platinum yemuGroup 4 ichabandana neWhawha.   MuGroup 3, Black Rhinos ichisanganawo neTenax.   Mitambo iyi ichazoenderera mberi musi weChina apo Harare City FC ichatatsurana neCAPS United mumutambo wemuGroup 1 kuzoti Highlanders ichasangana neBulawayo Chiefs muGroup 2.

headline: Hama dzaVaMugabe Dzinoti Hadziwirirane naAmai Grace Mugabe
text: Hama dzevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, dzinoti hadziwirirane nemuroora wadzo, Amai Grace Mugabe, nekuda kwekusakudza vakuru mumhuri, uye kutsvinyira kwavanoita vemumhuri, pamwe nekutaura zvisina maturo izvo vanoti zvakakonzeresawo kusawirirana mubato reZanu PF. Hama dzaVaMugabe dzinosanganisira mhuri yekwaMugabe, kwaJenami pamwe neyekwaMatibiri, dzinoti Amai Mugabe munhu asingatsiurike sezvo vaine pamuromo pasingamharwi nenhunzi. Hama idzi dzinoti nekuda kwekusaremekedza vakuru vemumhuri, vainge vasisa fambidzane nemuroora wavo uyo asisaende kumusha kwaZvimba nekuti hapana anomufarira. VaBen Matibiri vanoti Amai Mugabe munhu anotaura zvisina maturo nguva dzakawanda. VaMatibiri vanoti Amai Grace Mugabe vainge vakasiyana zvikuru nemudzimai waVaMugabe wekutanga mushakabvu, Amai Sally Mugabe, uyo vanoti Ainge akanyarara uye aine rudo nevanhu vose. Imwe hama yaVaMugabe yechidiki, Va Clemence Matibiri, vanoti Amai Mugabe vane nharo uye vanopikisana nevakuru mumhuri izvo zvakaita kuti vasagamuchirike kumusha kwaZvimba. Mumwe muvakidzani waVaMugabe kumusha kwaZvimba, VaFidelis Chinhyanyi, vanoti vanoziva mudzimai waVaMugabe wekutanga Amai Sally zvakanyanya vachiti hunhu hwaAmai Sally hwaiyemurwa zvakanyanya nevemhuri pamwe nemunyika yose. Asi VaMunyanyi vanoti Amai Grace Mugabe vaizivikanwa nekutuka kunyange zvinonyadzisira pavanhu nekudzikisira vanhu vakuru. VaMunyanyi vanoti Amai Grace munhu aida kutonga tonga pese pavanenge vari izvo zvazokonzera kusawirirana mubato ravo reZanu PF. Mumwe mugari wekwaZvimba asina kuda kudomwa nezita anoti Amai Grace Mugabe vanoita senzena nenyaya yekutukirira vanhu vose vavasingawirirane navo. Vamwe vanoti zvakaita Amai Grace Mugabe zvekudyara mhodzi yekusawirirana mubato reZanu PF zvakazonakirawo nyika nekuti ndizvo zvakazoita kuti paite kudzingana mubato reZanu PF izvo zvakazokonzera kuti mauto atore masimba munyika, chiitiko chakafadza ruzhinji rwevanhu. Wongororo yakaitwa neStudio7 inoratidzawo kuti vanhu vakawanda mubato reZanu pamwe nemunyika vakabatanidzwa nechishuwo chekumisa Amai Grace Mugabe kuti vasatore chigaro chemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika icho vanga voda kutora pamusangano mukuru webato reZanu PF mwedzi unouya. Amai Grace Mugabe vanga vopihwa mazita emadunhurirwa akawanda anosanganisira mazita akaita saMarujata rinoreva mudzimai anotaurisa uye anokonzeresa kusawirirana kwevanhu mumusha. No media source currently available

headline: Mumiriri weAmerica muZimbabwe, VaBrian Nichols, Vanosangana naVaChamisa
text: Mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, vasangana nemumiriri weAmerica muZimbabwe, VaBrian Nichols, vakakurukura zvinhu zvakati wandeyi. Vaviri ava vakurukura nezvesarudzo dzichangobva kuitwa, nyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu pamwe nemamiriro akaita zvinhu muZimbabwe. Mutauriri waVaChamisa, VaNkululeko Sibanda, vanoti VaChamisa vafadzwa zvikuru nemukana uyu sezvo vakwanisa kukurukura nezviri kuitika muZimbabwe. Musangano uyu unouya mushure mekunge VaNichols vasangana neChitatu nemutungamiri wenyika uye vakamirira Zanu PFmusarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachizeyawo mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika. VaChamisa vari kupikisa kukunda kwaVaMnangagwa musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, uye dare repamusorosoro riri kutarisirwa kunzwa nyaya yavo musi wa 22 Nyamavhuvhu. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Inoti Kushungurudzwa kweNhengo Dzayo neMauto Kwakapa Kuti Itadze Kutsvaga Rutsigiro kuBulawayo
text: Bato reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa rinoti rakatambira zvinyunyuto zvakawanda zvine chekuita nesarudzo yarakakundwa neZanu PF kuCowdry park muguta reBulawayo mukupera kwesvondo, uye richatora matanho kugadzirisa mhosho dzakakonzera kuti rikundwe. Mutauriri webato iri vaJacob Mafume vanoti chikuru chakasimudzwa muzvinyunyuto izvi kukundwa kwebato ravo mudunhu ragara richihwinhwa sarudzo neMDC, izvo vanoti vatsigiri vavo vakawanda vanoti zvinhu zvisingafanirwe kudzokororwa. Asi VaMafume vanoti pane zvikonzero zvakawanda zvinosanganisira kukundikana kwebato ravo kutsvaga rutsigiro kudunhu iri nekuda kwesungwa pamwe nekushungurudzwa kwaiitwa nhengo dzavo nemapurisa. Vanoti zvimwe zvakaita kuti vasabudirire kutengwa kwemavhoti kuburikidza nekupiwa kwechikafu kuvanhu, pamwewo nenyaya yekuti vakawanda havana han’ya nekunovhota kusarudzo dze by-election nepfungwa yekungoti mapato anopikisa anokundwa neZanu PF. Bato reMDC rakawanikwa riine vanhu vaviri vaikwikwidza, izvo zvakawedzera kukundwa kwaro nevaimirira Zanu PF, VaKidwell Mujuru. No media source currently available

headline: Chivandire ahwina bhandi reWBC kuZambia
text: SHASHA yetsiva yechidzimai, Kudakwashe ‘Take Money’ Chivandire anyoora nhoroondo manheru adarika apo akunda Cathrine Phiri wekuZambia ndokumutorera bhande reWorld Boxing Council Super-bantam weight.   Mukudaro, Chivandire abva aita mutambi wetsiva wekutanga kubva muZimbabwe kuhwina bhandi guru reWBC.   Achitaura ari kuZambia, maneja waTake Money arizve murairidzi wake, Clyde Musonda ati chikwata chavo chizere nemufaro zvichitevera kuhwina kwaita Take Money.   “Handisisina izwi kutaura kwatiri kuita kuno nekuti izvozvi tiri pakupembera. Kuda adadisa zvikuru, asimudza mureza wenyika yedu.   “Tinotenda ruzhinji rweZimbabwe nerutsigiro rwavo neminamato yavo yose,” adaro Musonda.   Vasati vaenda kumutambo uyu, Take Money ange akatsidza kuti ari kunounza bhandi iri ndokuudza Phiri vasati vasangana kuti haasi shasha asi iye ndiye nyanzvi itsva ine bhandi iri izvo zvaazozadzikisa apo azomukundira pazvibodzwa.

headline: RBZ Yotanga Kutengesa Mapeni Madukuku eGoridhe Kune Veruzhinji.
text: Sekuvimbisa kwarakaita svondo rapera kuti raizodira pamusika mapeni egoridhe e Mosi-oa-Tunya ane mutengo wepasi uye huremu hwepasipasi hwe one tenth ye ounce anosvika zviuru zvina nemazana mashanu, kana kuti 4 500, bhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe razivisa kuti mapeni aya ave kuwanikwa pamusika. Bhanga guru iri rati mapeni aya ave kukwanisa kutengwa kubva kumabhanga, kuHomelink, pamwe nezvitoro zveAurex kutanga nChipiri 15 Mbudzi 2022. Izvi zvinotevera kutengeswa kwemapeni egoridhe makuru kutanga muna Chikunguru wegore rino pahurongwa hwehurumende neR-B-Z hwekudzikamisa hupfumi hwenyika. Imwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi inoshanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Developemnt Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti vanoona kuuya kwemapeni madikidiki aya kuchipawo mukana kune veruzhinji wekuti vange vachikwanisawo kuchengetedza mari dzavo kuburikidza nemapeni aya. Ukuwo, mukuru werimwe sangano revanotengesera mumigwagwa, reVendors Intiative for Social and Economic Transformation, VISET, VaSamuel Wadzai Mangoma, vanoti hurongwa uhwu hwakanaka chose kana hwakaitwa zvakajeka. Asi vanoti veruzhinji vanotya kuhutambira kana vakacheuka shure vachitarisa zvakamboitika apo hurumende yakadzika zvirongwa zvakazotsvaira nekurovesa mari dzavo dzaive mumabhanga. Izvi zvinotsinhirwa nemunyori mukuru wemumwe mubatanidzwa wemasangano evashandi, weZimbabwe Federation of Trade Unions, ZFTU, VaKennias Shamuyarira, avo vanoti sevashandi, vanotarisira kuti hupfumi hwenyika hunovakwa pamwe nekudzikamiswa nezvigadzirwa zvinobva kumakambani emunyika, kwete kuburikidza vezvirongwa zvakanangana nekudzimura rimi remoto nguva iyoyo chete. VaShamuyarira vanoti zvizhinji zvezvirongwa zvinodzikwa nehurumende izvi zvinogumisira zvatosiya vashandi vave varombo kudarika pazvinenge zvisati zvadzikwa. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gavhuna veR-B-Z, Doctor John Mangudya kuti tinzwe kuti mapeni aya atambirwa sei neveruzhinji. Asi bhanga guru renyika rakavimbisa kare kuti hurongwa hwemapeni egoridhe uhwu hahuna wahunosiya shure, uye huchasvika nzvimbo dzose dzenyika. R-B-Z inoti kutenga mapeni ndeimwe nzira yekudyara nayo mari yakanangana nemunhu wese. Bhanga iri rinoti kubva muna Chikunguru wegore rino kusvika pari nhasi mapeni anodarika zviuru gumi nechimwe, kana kuti 11 000, anokosha madhora emunyika $11,4 billion atengeswa munyika uye mapeni egoridhe aya akwanisa kutsvaira mari dzanga dzichitenderedzwa pamusika mutema izvo zvadzikamisa hupfumi hwenyika pamwe nekuderedza inflation. No media source currently available

headline: VaMzembi Vopinda Misangano muWashington DC yeKukwezva Vashanyi
text: Gurukota rezve kushanya nekushanyirwa kwenyika, VaWalter Mzembi, vanoti vari pamusangano we US-Africa Business Summit uyo uri kuitirwa muWashington vachiyedza kukwezva vanoita zvemabhizimusi ekushanyira nyika kuti vaende kuZimbabwe. ​VaMzembi vanoti kunyange hazvo huwandu hwevanhu vanoshanyira nyika vachibva kuAmerica hwakawanda kukunda dzimwe nyika, vanoti vanoda kuti hurambe huchikwira. Musangano uyu wakatanga neChipiri uye uchapera neChishanu. VaMzembi vachangobva kukundwa mumakwikwi ekutsvaga munyori mukuru musangano re United Nations World Tourism Organisation akaitwa kuSpain. Asi vanoti izvi hazvisi kuvadzora kumashure sezvo vakadzidza zvikuru kubva kumakwikwi aya. "Tichange tichizeya nedzimwe nyika dzinosanganisira vana muzvina bhisinesi vemu America pamusoro pekuti vangawedzere seyi huwandu hwevanoshanya munyika," VaMzembi vaudza Studio 7. VaMzembi vaenderera mberi vachiti vane zvirongwa zvakawanda zvavari kuda kuti vana muzvinabhisinesi vemuAmerica vaite vakabatana neZimbabwe mukuedza kuvandudza nyaya yekushanya nekushanyirwa. No media source currently available

headline: Tauya muPSL zvachose: Samaita
text: MURAIRIDZI weGreen Fuel FC — Lloyd “Samaita” Mutasa — anoti chikwata chake icho chakapinda muCastle Premiership (PSL) kekutanga mwaka uno, hachina kuuya kuzongozadzikisa chete sezvimwe zvikwata asi vanotoda kurwira mikombe yakawanda.   Green Fuel FC yakapinda muPSL mushure mekunge yahwina mukombe weEastern Region Division One uko yaitamba nhabvu inodakadza.   Samaita anoti kare zvikwata zvaiwanzopinda muPSL zvaitarisirwa kuti zvinopinda zvichingodzokera kuDivision One.   Asi anoti chikwata chake maEthanol Boys, sezita remadunhurirwa reGreen Fuel, chauya zvachose muPSL.   “Tauya zvachose, tasiyana nezvimwe zvikwata zviye zvinoti zvikapinda muPSL zvinodzokera kuDivision One pasina chinguva. Isu tinoda kuramba tiri muPSL togorwira mikombe yakawanda.   “Chikwata chedu chine vatambi vakawanda, vamwe vasati vambotambira muPSL vanoda kugadzira mazita avo saka vatori nehukasha hwekuda kurakidza matarenda avo. Tine chivimbo chekuti vachabata basa sebasa,” anodaro.   Samaita anoti akaumba chikwata chine vatambi vasati vambotambira muPSL pamwe chete nevave nenguva vachitamba muleague iri avo vachabatsira kurakidza gwara kune vechidiki vari kusimukira.   “Ukaenda kana kuEurope chaiko, vatambi madhara anotodiwa anenge arimo muzvikwata zvakasiyana nechinangwa chekusimbisa chikwata pamwechete nekurakidza gwara kune vatambi vechidiki,” anodaro Samaita.   Kupinda kwakaita Green Fuel FC muPSL chakabva chaita chikwata chekutanga kubva kuChisumbanje kutambira nhabvu yacho league iri.   Samaita anoti kuChisumbanje vatsigiri vamirira kutanga kwenhabvu izvo zvichavapawo mukana wekuona zvikwata zvikuru zvenhabvu zvemuno zvakaita seDynamos, Highlanders neCAPS United.   “MuChisumbanje vanhu vari kufara zvikuru, ndekekutanga aka nhabvu yePSL ichiuya uye vamirira kuda kuona chikwata chavo chichitamba nezvikwata zvikuru zvenhabvu munyika.   “Vamwe vacho havasati vamboona Dynamos, Highlanders, CAPS United neFC Platinum dzichitamba saka kwavari chinhu chikuru kuona zvikwata izvi zvichiuya kuzotambira muChisumbanje.   “Kuno kune vanhu vane mabhizimisi vakawanda, ndiri kutoona kuti vari kumhanya-mhanya kugadzirira mabhizimisi avo nekuti vanoziva kuti nhabvu paichatanga vachaita mari apo panenge pachiuya zvikwata zvakawanda kuzotamba nesu,” anodaro Samaita.   Pari zvino, Green Fuel iri musvondo rayo rechipiri yatanga kuita gadziriro dzemwaka wa2023 uyo unotarisirwa kutanga munaKukadzi.   Vazhinji vanoziva Samaita achitamba nhabvu apo akaita mukurumbira achitambira Tanganda FC yekwaMutare ndokuzoenda kuDynamos uko akanohwina mikombe yakawanda zvikuru.   Achiri kuTanganda, Samaita akatamba nhabvu yainwisa mvura izvo zvakaona achishevedzwa kunzi ndiPele wenhabvu wekuTanganda uye kana achifamba muguta reMutare vatsigiri venhabvu vakamuona vanomushevedza kuti Mambo Mutasa wenhabvu.   Samaita anobva muimba yehushe hwekwaMambo Mutasa kuManicaland.   “Tisu taive muchikwata cheTanganda chakatamba muPSL chikahwina mukombe weCastle Cup mugore ra1993. Saka nhasi ndikafamba maMutare ndinenge ndichingoshevedzwa kunzi Mambo Mutasa wenhabvu, rukudzo rwandinopihwa nekuda kwebasa randakabata ndichitambira kuchikwata ichi.   “Kare kwaive nemumwe mutori wenhau akandishevedza kuti ndini Pele weTanganda, saka ndinongotenda kuti ndinoyemurwa nevekwangu kwandakabva,” anodaro.   Vanakomana vaSamaita vaviri, Wisdom naPanashe, vese vakatevera matsimba ake sezvo vanotamba nhabvu.   Wisdom, uyo anotambira Black Rhinos, akambotambira FC Platinum, Dynamos, CAPS United, Motor Action neSenica yekuSlovakia kuchiti Panashe anotambira Manica Diamonds.

headline: Ballance odzoka kuzotambira maChevrons
text: ZIMBABWE Cricket yakazivisa kuti vakaita chibvumirano naGary Ballance chemakore maviri chekuti adzoke kuzotambira cricket yake muno zvichitevera kubva kwaakaita kuchikwata cheYorkshire.   Ballance, uyo akambotambira nyika yeEngland, anoti ane mufaro mukuru kudzoka kuzotambira nyika yake yaakazvarirwa.   “Ndiri kunzwa manyuku-nyuku kumirira Zimbabwe uye ndatarisira kushanda nevarairidzi vemhando yepamusoro nevatambi vane tarenda.   “Mukana wekumirira Zimbabwe wandipa simba rekushanda nesimba uye ndinonzwa kufara kuti ndiri kuenderera mberi nekutamba mutambo uyu.   “Ndange ndichikurukurura nevanhu vakawanda vecricket vemuno kwemakore akawanda uye ndichiona kukura kwange kuchiita mutambo uyu makore adarika,” anodaro Ballance.   Achitaura nezvekudzoka kwaBallance, director of cricket kuZC – Hamilton Masakadza – anoti sangano ravo ratarisira kushanda naBallance uyo vane idi rekuti achaunza shanduko huru mumutambo uyu.   “Zvinofadza kuti tave naGary, mutambi ane tarenda ane ruzivo rwemutambo uyu uye adzoka kuzotamba cricket kwazvakatangira.   “Kuuya kwake kwakakosha nekuti tiri kutarisira kuona achishandura zvakawanda mumutambo uyu achitambira zvikwata zvedu,” anodaro Masakadza.   Balance asati aenda kunotambira kuEngland, akaita mukurumbira mugore ra2006 apo akanetsa kumutambo weWorld Cup achitambira Zimbabwe U19.

headline: Gatland otarisira kurairidza England
text: (55) ari kutarisira kurairidza England pabasa rake rinotevera mushure mekunge World Cup ichangopera, ombomisa hurongwa hwekudzokera kuNew Zealand kunozorora mugore ra2020.   Shasha iyi iri kutungamira Wales mumutambo weSix Nations wekupedzisira kutanga svondo rino apo vachasangana neFrance kuParis uye ndipo paachataura nezvehurongwa hwake hwekutanga hwemimwe mitambo inotevera.   Gatland anonzi akasununguka kutungamira British & Irish Lions kechitatu kuSouth Africa mugore ra2021.   Asi, anonzi ari kudawo kutungamira chikwata chimwe chete ichi muGallagher Premiership.   “Ndanga ndiri kutarisira kutora mwedzi mishoma ndisipo ndozotanga pakati pa2020, zvimwe ndogona kurairidza zvimwe zvikwata zvemuSuper Rugby kuNew Zealand kana kune mukana wacho,” anodaro.   “Asi ndinozviziva kuti hakuna mabasa akawanda kuNew Zealand. Saka handingafunge zvakanyanya nezvazvo.   “Saka zvinoreva kuti pamwe ndichadzokera kuzorairidza makirabhu muPremiership kana kuti kuFrance kana kuJapan.   “Ndakaita hurukuro nevanhu vakasiyana asi hapana zvinobatika zvati zvavepo kutaura kuno.   “Ndofunga panopera World Cup ndinenge ndisisina basa.” – Sportsmail Rugby

headline: Hurumende Yoyambira Vashandi Vayo Vasati Vabayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19 Kuti Havapindi paBasa
text: Hurumende inoti vashandi vayo vasina kubaiwa nhomba dzeCovid 19 kusvika mukupera kwezuva ranhasi havachabvumidzwe kuuya kubasa uye vasina kubaiwa nhomba idzi vacharangwa zvakaomarara. Asi vashandi vehurumende vanoti zviri kutaurwa nehurumende izvi hazvina musoro. Text: Munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana vazivisa padandemutande ravo reTwitter nhasi kuti hurumende haisi kudzokera kumashure nedanho rayo rayakatora rekuti vashandi vayo vose vasina kubaiwa nhomba dzekudzivirira Covid-19 havachazobvumidzwa kuenda kubasa kubva mangwana zvichienda mberi.  VaMangwana vati vashandi vehurumende vose vacharamba kubaiwa nhomba idzi vacharangwa zvakawomarara uye vati panguva yavanenge vasiri kuenda kubasa vashandi ava havasi kuzobhadharwa mihoro yemazuva iwayo.  Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvehutano uye vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaConstantino Chiwenga, avo vari kuDubai pari zvino uye mutevedzeri wavo VaJohn Mangwiro vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo kuti tinzwe kuti matanho api ari kutorwa nebazi ravo kuona kuti vashandi vehurumende vakwanisa kuwana nhomba idzi nekukasika.  Zvichakadai gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, vatenda kuti vashandi vese vehurumende vanofanira kuti vabaiwe nhomba idzi uye vati vazhinji vevashandi vehurumende vakatobaiwa nhomba dzeCovid 19 kare.  ///////act 1-------mavima/////  VaMavima vati vashandi vehurumende vanofanira kuziva kuti kusabayiwa nhomba idzi kune mubayiro wacho kubva pakataurwa nyaya iyi nehurumende.  /////////act 2------mavima/////  Asi mutevedzeri wemuyori mukuru musangano revashandi vehurumende reZimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Trade Unions, VaGibson Mushangu, vati danho rehurumende iri harina zvarinoreva kwavari nekuti havana kutambira tsamba kubva kuhurumende kubva zvakatorwa danho iri nedare remakurukota ehurumende.  ///////act 3------mushangu/////////  Mutungamiri wesangano revadzidzisi vekumaruwa reAmalgamted Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vati hurumende haifaniri kuedza kutsvaga nzira dzekusabhadhara vashandi vayo kubudikidza nekudzinga mabasa vashandi vasina kubaiwa nhomba dzeCovid 19. VaMasaraure vati hurumende inofanira kugadzirisa nyaya dzemihoro yevashandi vayo kwete kuswera ichidzinganisana nezvinhu zvisina musoro.  ///////act 4----masaraure////////  Zvichakadai, imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vakamboshanda sachipangamazano munyaya dzehupfumi mubazi rezvemari, VaMasimba Manyanya, vati hurumende haifanire kumanikidza vashandi vayo kubaiwa nhomba dzeCovid-19 vachiti izvi zvinotyora kodzero dzevashandi. VaManyanya vati kana hurumende ikaenderera mberi nehurongwa hwayo uhwu zvichakanganisawo hupfumi hwenyika sezvo vashandi vehurumende vane basa rakakura kwazvo mukusimudzirwa kwehupfumi hwenyika.  /////////act 5-------manyanya///////  Hurumende iri kukurudzirawo veruzhinji kuti vabaiwe nhomba dzeCovid-19 idzo dziri kubaiwa pachena muzvipatara zvehurumende nemakanzuru senzira yekuedza kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi munyika. Zvipatara zvinoshanda zvakazvimirira zviri kubhadharisawo mari shomanana kubaya nhomba idzi.  Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba vanhu mariyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana pakupera kwegore rino senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid 19.

headline: Hurumende Yovimbisa Kugadzikana Mune zveMafuta Panguva iyo Magetsi ave Kunetsa muNyika
text: Gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto, Doctor Joram Gumbo, vanoti zvinhu zvave kuzogadzikana munyaya dzemafuta edzimotokari zvichitevera kuibva kwemari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi mashanu emadhora ekuAmerica yakapiwa makambani anopinza mafuta munyika kana kuti ma 'letters of credit'. Doctor Gumbo vanoti kubva kupera kwesvondo rapera kusvika pari zvino, motokari dzinotakura mafuta dziri mubishi kumhanya nemafuta dzichidira mumagaraji emunyika. Asi vanoti sezvo munyika manga mave negaha nechekare, zvinoda kanguva kakati kuti kuti vakwanise kudzora zvinhu pazvinofanirwa kunge zviri. Ukuwo, vamwe vedzimotokari vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvinhu hazvisati zvave kuratidza shanduko, sezvo mitsetse ichiri kuwanikwa munyika yose. Zvichakadaro, kambani yemagetsi yeZimbabwe Electricity Transmission and Distribution Company yazivisa nezvehurongwa hwekumbodzimwa kwemagetsi pane dzimwe nguva senzira yekuchengetedza magetsi mashoma ari kuwanikwa munyika. Kumbodzimwa kwemagetsi uku kuchaitwa munyika yose panguva dzatarwa nekambani iyi. Kambani yemagetsi iyi inoti yamanikidzwa kutora danho iri nekuda kwekuderera zvakanyanya kwemvura kudhamu rinogaiwa magetsi reKariba, pamwe nekudzikira kwemagetsi ari kugaiwa kugwenya remarasha reHwange Power Station. Kambani iyi yatiwo rimwe dambudziko riri kukonzera kushaikwa kwemagetsi anokwana nderekushomeka kwemagetsi ari kutengwa kubva kunze kwenyika, zvikuru kuMozambique. Magetsi achadzimwa kubva nenguva dzeshanu mangwanani kusvika nenguva dzegumi mangwanani, kuchizotiwo kubva nenguva dzeshanu manheru kusvika nenguva dzegumi usiku. Doctor Gumbo vanoti hurumende iri kugadzirisa dambudziko remagetsi iri kuburikidza nekupa marezinesi kwayakaita kumakambani makumi matatu nemana anoshandisa simba rezuva kuti awanise nyika magetsi, uye kugadziriswa kuri kuitwa magwenya ekuHwange. No media source currently available Asi mukuru werimwe sangano rinomirira vagari vemuHarare, reHarare Residents Trust, VaPrecious Shumba, vanoti vagari havasi kufara nenyaya yekumbodzimwa kwemagetsi iyi sezvo vanenge vakatobhadhara kare magetsi emwedzi wese. VaShumba vanotiwo nyika haisati yave nezvikwanisiro zvekuti magetsi ezuva ave iwo nhungamiri munyaya dzemhando dzemoto, izvo zvichaita kuti ruzhinji rwuomerwe zvakanyanya. No media source currently available

headline: Vanyori veMabhuku Vochemachema Sezvo Zvinyorwa Zvavo Zviri Kutengeswa Mumikoto
text: Vanyori vemabhuku vakawanda vanoti mabhuku avo anofanirwa kutengeswa munzira zviri pamutemo kwete zviri kuitika pari zvino. Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita muHarare, vanyori vabvumirana kuti dambudziko rekutengeswa kwemabhuku avo zvisiri pamutemo hariperi sezvo kuine vanhu vanoda kutenga mabhuku aya nemari shoma. Mumwe munyori, Muzvare Monica Mpambawashe, vati panofanirwa kuve nemigwagwa inotengeserwa mabhuku zviri pamutemo sezvinoitika kune dzimwe nyika. Muzvare Mpambawashe vati vanotengesa mabhuku mumigwagwa vanofanirwa kutopihwa mabhuku nevanodhinda, uye munyori webhuku achizviziva kuti anotengeswa nemari yakadii. Muzvare Mpambawashe vati vanodhinda mabhuku vanofanirwa kudhinda nekuburitsa mabhuku akasimba zvakasiyana kuitira kuti bhuku ritengwe nemitengo yakasiyana zvichienderana nekuwana kwemunhu. Izvi zvatsigirwa nemunyori ane mukurumbira, VaThompson Tsodzo, avo vanozivikanwa nebhuku ravo rinonzi Pafunge, vati pari zvino hapana mari yavari kuwana pamabhuku avo eShona ari kushandiswa muzvikoro.  Mumwe munyori, Lawrence Hova, atiwo vanhu vakawanda vari kushaya mabhuku kwaanotengeswa zviri pamutemo, asi vachizoawana mumigwagwa. Munyori ane mukurumbira, Shimmer Chinodya, atiwo kuti vechidiki vanyore mabhuku zvine hunyanzvi, vanofanirwa kuti basa ravo riongororwe nevapepeti vemabhuku vane hunyanzvi.  Chinodya ati vapepeti vakakosha mukunyorwa kwemabhuku. Vanyori vemuZimbabwe vari kurasikirwa nemari yakawanda sezvo zvinyorwa zvavo zviri kufotokopwa pamwe nekutengeswa zvisiri pamutemo. Dambudziko iri riri munyika dzakawanda dzichiri kusimukira sezvo pasina mitemo yakasimba inoranga vanotyora kodzero dzevanyori pamwe nevatsikisi vemabhuku. No media source currently available

headline: Chirwere cheCovid-19 Chovhiringa Pfungwa dzeVashandi Vakawanda
text:
Vamwe vana mukoti nanachiremba vakawanda vanonzi vave kubatwa nedambudziko rekusagadzikana kwepfungwa nekuda kwemashandiro avari kuita munguva ino yekurwisa dambudziko rechirwere cheCovid-19. Izvi zvakabuda pamusangano wakaitwa nezuro wakapindwa nevagari vemudunhu reMashonaland West. Vachitaira pamusangano uyu, m ukuru anoona nezvehutano hwepfungwa mudunhu reMashonaland West kana kuti Provincial Mental Health Officer, Dr Tichaona Mahachi, vakati vana mukoti navana chiremba vanosvika mazana matanhatu nemakumi masere nevatatu kana kuti 683 vakarwara nekusagadzikana kwepfungwa uye vamwe vanomwe vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 mudunhu kubva patanga chirwere ichi gore rapera. Dr Mahachi vakatiwo hurumende iri pakati pekuita dzidziso yakanangana
nevashandi vebazi rezvehutano kuvagadzirira kuti vasavhiringwe hutano
hwepfungwa pavanenge vachiita basa ravo nerutsigiro kubva kubazi
reUnicef.

Mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri, vanoti dambudziko
rekusagadzikana kwepfungwa riri kuitikawo mune mwamwe matunhu. Vati hurumende iri kuita dzidziso kunana mukoti navana chiremba mumatunhu aya. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa huwandu hwevana chiremba nevakoti vari kusangana nedambudziko iri munyika yose. Asi mukuru mubazi rezvehutano mudunhu reMashonaland Central, Dr
Cremance Tshuma, vati dambudziko iri harisi mudunhu mavo.

Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu vanomwe
vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu
hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi munyika yose pazviuru zvina nemazana
mashanu ane makumi mashanu, 4,550. Vamwe vanhu mazana mana ane gumi nevasere vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare izvo zvasvitsa vanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19
kubva zvachatanga pavanhu zviuru zana nemakumi maviri nazvitanhatu
nemazana masere ane gumi nevanomwe, 126 817.

Kusvika pakupera kwezuva nezuro, vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga
yekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 vakanga vave mamiriyoni maviri ane
zviuru mazana masere nemakumi manomwe nezvitatu zvine mazana masere nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatatu, 2 873 893. Vabayiwa nhomba dzose dziri mbiri sezvinokurudzirwa vave miriyoni
imwechete ine zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi maviri nezvitanhatu nemazana maviri ane makumi mana nevanomwe, 1 926 247. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 vanhu
mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana
kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisarambe chichipararira munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Kubhadhariswa Maifandi Mumigwagwa neMapurisa Konetsa Munyika
text: Nyaya yekubhadhariswa kwevatyairi mari dzemafayindi pama road blocks nemapurisa iri kuenderera mberi ichinetsa munyika, vakawanda vachitsigira mashoko emutongi wedare, Justice Francis Bere, ekuti nzira inoshandiswa nemapurisa kubhadharisa mari idzi kazhinji haizi pamutemo. Mumashoko avo neChitatu, mutauriri wemapurisi, VaPaul Nyathi, vakati havazi kuzoteerera mashoko aVaBere vachiti mapurisa acharamba achibhadharisa vatyairi mari dzemafayindi kana vatyora mutemo. Mutauriri wehurumende, uye vari gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaJonathan Moyo, vari kutsigirawo mashoko emapurisa aya. Asi gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaArnold Tsunga, vanoti vanotsigira mashoko aVaBere, vachiti vanhu havafanirwi kumanikidzwa kubhadhara faindi, asi kuti vanofanirwa kupihwa mukana wekupikisa tikiti ravanenge vapihwa kudare redzimhosva kana vachida. No media source currently available

headline: Knowledge Musona neZimbabwe Vangasimudze Here Mukombe weCOSAFA
text: Chikwata cheZimbabwe Warriors chiri kutarisirwa kutamba mutambo wacho wekutanga mumakwikwi eCOSAFA Cup nemusi weSvodo uye chiri kusimuka munyika mangwana. Asi zimbabwe haina vatambi vana vari kutarisirwa kubatana nevamwe muharare nhasi vasati vasimuka kuenda kuSouth Africa vanoti Knowledge Musona, Khama Billiat, Tino Kadewere naCosta Nhamoinesu. Zimbabwe yakasimudza mukombe uyu kashanu nekudaro iri kutangira padanho repamusoro re Quarter Final. Ichatamba nenyika inenge yakunda muGroup B mune nyika dzakaita seBotswana, Angola, Malawi ne Mauritius. South Africa inova iri kuitirwa mitambo iyi ichatamba mumaQuarter Finals neanenge akunda mugroup A umo mune Comoros islands, Mozambique, Madagascar ne Seychelles. Mamwe maQuarter Finals anenge ari pakati peZambia yakatora mukombe muna 2015 neNamibia kochizoti Swaziland neLesotho. Gore rapera Zimbabwe ndiyo yakasimudza mukombe uyu.

headline: Chibage Chodhura Kupinda Kutenga Kunze
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zveupfumi dzinoti danho rehurumende rekurambidza kupinzwa kwechibage munyika uye kumanikidza varimi kutenga chibage muGrain Marketing Board, GMB, chete harina kunyatsofungisiswa nezvaro, sezvo chibage chemunyika chichidhura kudarika changa chichitengwa kunze. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti chibage chemunyika chiri kuita madhora mazana matatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe patani, zvichienzaniswa nemadhora zana nemakumi mana ari kutengwa nawo tani rechibage kuSouth Africa nedzimwe nyika dzakapoteredza Zimbabwe. Mukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti rimwe dambudziko nderekuti havaoni chibage chiri kunzi maguta ichi chichisvika mwaka unouya, sezvo nyika yakanga isina goho rakanaka kwemakore maviri adarika. Imwe nyanzvi yezveupfumi vachitungamira Employers Confederation of Zimbabwe, EMCOZ, VaJohn Mufukare, vatsinhirawo maonero aDoctor Kanyenze aya vachitiwo mutengo wekurima chibage munyika uri pamusoro kwazvo, izvo zvinozoitawo kuti mutengo wechibage ukwire. Asi mukuru weimwe kambani inogaya upfu, yeBlue Ribbon Foods, VaYusuf Kamau, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanotambira danho rehurumende iri sezvo nyika iine chibage chakakwana, uye rinowanisawo vanhu mabasa munyika. Gurukota rezvekurima, VaJoseph Made, neChitatu vakazivisa kuti hurumende haichabvumidzi kutengwa kwechibage kunze. VaMade vakazivisawo kuti vanogaya upfu vave kusungirwa kutenga chibage kuGMB, asi vachifanirwa kutanga vabhadhara mari kuhurumende vozopiwa matsamba ekuenda nawo kunotora chibage chacho kuGMB. Hurumende inoti iri kutarisira maguta gore rino kuburikidza nechirongwa chekurima chinotsigirwa nehurumende cheCommand Agriculture. No media source currently available

headline: Dare rePamusoro Rorasa Chikumbiro ChaVaSikhala Chekuti Vabhadhare Mari yeChibatiso, Repasi Richimira Kupa Mutongo
text: Nhasi matare maviri anoti ramejastiriri nedare repamusoro ange achinzwa zvikumbiro zvemumiriri weZengeza West mudare reparamemde VaJob Sikhala zvekuti vapihwe mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso pamhosva dzavari kupomerwa. Dare reHigh Court raramba kutambira chikumbiro chaVaSikhala chekuti vapihwe mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso panyaya yavari kupomerwa yekuti vaida kukanganisa mapurisa kuferefeta nyaya yekupondwa kwaMuzvare Moreblessing Ali nhengo yebato ravo reCitizens Coalition for Change. Rimwe gweta raVaSikhala Amai Beatrice Mtetwa vanove nhengo yesangano remagweta reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights ndivo vange vachimiririra VaSikhala. Rimwe gweta riri muchikwata chinomirira VaSikhala vachishanda nesangano reZLHR zvekare VaJeremiah Bamu vati vamirira VaSikhala kudare ramejastiriti uko mutongo wasendekwa parutivi. Masangano emagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu pasi rose ari kushora kusungwa kwaVaSikhala, mumiriri weChitungwiza West VaGodfrey Sithole nevamwe vasingapihwe mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso. No media source currently available

headline: Pane Chikwata chemuAfrica Chichaenderera Mberi muWorld Cup Here?
text: Kunyangwe hazvo pasina chikwata chemuAfrica chati chatiora mapoinzi matatu kumakwikwi eWorld Cup, vazhinji munyika vachiine tarisiro yekuti zvikwata zvishanu zviri kumiririra Africa zvichaenderera mberi muchikamu chechipiri chemakundano aya. Africa iri kumiririrwa kumakwikwi aya neSenegal, Ghana, Cameroon, Tunisia neMorocco. Mumitambo yekutanga, Senegal yakarohwa 2-0 neNetherlands, Tunisia yakaita mangange 0-0 neDenmark, Morocco yakaita mangange 0-0 neCroatia. Izvi zvasiya vatsigiri venhabvu vekuAfrica vazhinji vachibvunza kuti zvikwata zvishanu zvinobva kuAfrica zvichakwanisa kuenderera mberi here sezvo parizvino pasina zvikwata zvati zvakwanisa kukunda. Asi muongorori wenhau dzemitambo Muziwethu Hadebe anoti ane chivimbo chekuti zvikwata zvekuAfrica zvinokwanisa kuenderera mberi kubva kuma Group stages nekuti zviri kutamba nemoyo wese kunyangwe hazvo zvisati zvakunda pamitambo yatambwa parizvino. "Vatsigiri vezhinji venhabvu vari munyika vazhinji vanoti shuwiro yavo ndeyekuti zvikwata zvemu Africa zvienderere mberi kubva pama group stages mumakwikwi e FIFA World Cup 2022 kuQatar. Kunyangwe hazvo vasati vakunda mumitambo yatambwa kumakwikwi aya ndine tarisiro yekuti vachienderera mberi," Hadebe audza Studio 7. No media source currently available

headline: Ndinotenda vatsigiri: Holloway
text: akatenda Conor McGregor nevatsigiri vemutambo weMMA nemashoko esimbaradzo avaimutumira zvichitevera kubuda kwaakaita mumutambo weUFC 226.   Shasha yeFeatherweight iyi ange achifanirwa kurwira kuchengetedza bhande rake svondo rino apo aitarisirwa kurwa naBrian Ortega mumutambo mukuru.   Asi haacharwe nekuda kwehutano hwake sezvo ange achinzwa dzungu, kunyangwe hazvo mutambi uyu asati anyatsoudzwa kuti chii chaizvo chiri kumukanganisa.   McGregor, uyo akakunda Holloway apo vaviri ava vakasangana mugore ra2013, akatumira shasha iyi inozivikanwa se145-pound king mashoko paTwitter.   Chizvarwa chekuIrish ichi chakanyora kuti, “Pfungwa dzangu uye rukudzo ndinorupa kuna145lb champion Max ‘Blessed’ Holloway”.   Zvakarakidza kuti Holloway akatenda zvikuru nerutsigiro rwaakawana izvo zvakazomutuma kutenda vatsigiri vake paInstagram ndokuvatumira mashoko aya.   “Ndizvo zviripo uye ndizvo zvatave kutoita. Rukudzo rukuru kunaOrtega nechikwata chake. Ndinokutendai mese vatinoshanda navo nekukoshesa hutano hwangu.   “Ndiri kukuonai mese. Kune vatsigiri ndinoziva kuti rwendo urwu runorwadza harwo asi ndinoziva kuti chikwata change chiri kushanda nesimba panyaya yacho.   “Chandinokwanisa kutaura inyaya yekuti ndine hurombo hukuru uye ndinovimba kuti ndichadzoka zvakasimba mumutambo uyu manje-manje, handisati ndapera ndicho chokwadi,” anodaro. — SportsMail UFC

headline: Vanhu Vokurudzirwa Kuvhenekwa Ropa paZuva reKucherechedza HIV/AIDS
text: Zimbabwe yakacherechedza zuva reWorld Aids Day nemusi weMugovera kuGlendale. Mazowe, kuMashonaland Central. Mhemberero idzi dzaiitwa pasi pedingindira rekuti Ziva Paumire rinokurudzira vanhu kuti vachenekwe ropa kuti vaonekwe kuti vane hutachiwana hweHIV here kana kuti kwete. Vanhu vanokurudzirwawo kuti vaongororwe zvimwe zvirwere zvinosanganisira gomarara, zvirwere zvepabonde, rurindi, shuga kana kuti diabetes nezvimwe zvisina zviratidzo zvinooneka. Mhembero dzekucherechedza zuva iri dzakaitirwa kuGlendale, kuMazowe mudunhu reMashonaland Central nemusi weMugovera, zuva rinocherechedzwa World Aids Day pasi rose, uko kwakaungana zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu. Gurukota rezvehutano VaObediah Moyo vakaudza gungano iri kuti Zimbabwe ichiri nerwendo rwukuru maringe nekuti vanhu vange vachiziva pavamire. Vakaenderera mberi vachiti pasina kuongororwa hutachiwana hweHIV, munhu haangakwanise kuti awaniswe mishonga yema anti-retroviral, kana kuti ARVs, kuchecheudzwa uye kuti vanaamai vakazvitakura vakwanisewo kudzivirira hutachiwana uhwu kumwana. VaMoyo vakaenderera mberi vachitsanangura nezvedingidira remhemberero yegore rino, iro rakanangana nekuparadzwa kwechirwere ichi, Zimbabwe paichasvika gore ra2030. Vakati chirwere cheHIV chinopera kana dungamunhu akaziva paamire maererano nezvechirwere ichi izvo zvinozoita kuti vasina chirwere vagozvichengetedzawo. VaMoyo vakayeuchidza vagari vemudunhu reMashonaland Central kuti vaite zvoutsanana hwepamusoro nokuti chirwere cheCholera chakanyukawo kuMount Darwin mudunhu iroro. Studio 7 yakakwanisa kutaura nevamwe vanhu vari kurarama nechirwere cheHIV avo vakataura kuti mishonga yema ARVs, iri kuvabatsira chaizvo. Mumwe wevari kushandisa mishonga iyi ndaAmai Christine Pfidzai. Amai Edna Runeto vakatiwo vakatoroorwa nemunhu asina HIV vakatozvara vana vaviri nokuti vari kunwa mapiritsi aya sekurairwa kwavanoitwa naanachiremba. Amai Joana Kasirori vakati vararama nehutachiwana hweHIV kwemakore anodarika makore makumi maviri zvokuti vatove mukuru wechimwe chikoro muHarare. VaJosephat Chinembiri Tarenyika vati vakambosungwa vakagara mujere vasingawani mishonga, izvo zvakazoita kuti vakwidze nyaya yavo kudare reConstitutional Court kuti vakwanise kupiwa mishonga yeHIV vari mujeri. Mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Auxillia Mnangagwa, avo vakanga vari munyarikani pagungano iri, vakati vari kuyedza nepavanokwanisa kuti pashaike mwana anozvarwa aine hutachiwana hweHIV. Vakayambirawo vanhu vari kutaura kuti vawana mushonga unorapa HIV, vakati hakuna mushonga unodarika maARV ari kupiwa varwere kuzvipatara pari zvino. Amai Mnangangwa vakatiwo hapana mudzimai anofanirwa kuzvara mwana ane hutachiwana hweHIV nokuti hurumende yakaisa matanho ekuti mudzimai wese akazvitakura aongororwe uye agopiwa mishonga yekuti mucheche ari mudumbu asabatira hutachiwana. Mumiriri weAmerica muZimbabwe, VaBrian Nichols vakudza gungano iri kuti vanhu makumi mapfumbamwe nevashanu kubva muzana muZimbabwe vari kunwa mishonga yemaARV zvekuti sangano rekuAmerica re President’s Emergency Plan For Aids Relief, PEPFAR, rakatowedzera mari inodarika bhirioni rimwechete remadhora ekuAmeica kuti ishandiswe pakurapa vanhu vane hutachiwana munyika muno. Sachigaro weNational Aids Council, NAC, VaEvaristo Marowa vakataurawo kuti Zimbabwe ine tarisiro yekuzadzikisa zvinangwa zve 90-90-90 Global Targets zvekupedzisa HiV neAids mugore ra2030. VaMarowa vakaenderera mberi vachiti izvi zvinokwanisika bedzi kana vanhu vakaziva pavamire. Zimbabwe ine vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nemazana mana ezviuru, 1, 4million, vari kurarama nehutachiwana hwe HIV uye vari pachirongwa zvakare chekunwa mapiriritsi emaARV. Vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi manomwe nemanomwe, US$77 million, vari kurarama nechirwere cheHIV pasi rose uye vanhu mamiriyoni makumi matatu nemashanu, US$35 million, vakatofa nekuda kweHIV pasi rose. No media source currently available

headline: Bazi reMedicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe Rinopa Mvumo Yekuti Vana Vabayiwe Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Vanoona nezvekushandiswa kwemishonga munyika, veMedicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe (MCAZ), vanonzi vakapa bazi rezvehutano mvumo yekuti vana vane makore ari pakati pegumi nemana negumi nemanomwe vange vachibaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19. Mutauriri webazi rezvehutano nekurerwa kwevana, VaDonald Mujiri, vanoti bazi ravo rakatarirwa zviga neMCAZ zvarinofanirwa kutanga razadzisa risati raparura chirongwa chekubaya vana nhomba yeCovid-19 iyi. Vanoti MCAZ yakakomekedza kuti bazi rehutano ritange raita ongororo inganzi paChirungu Phase 3 clinical trial, yekuona kuti mushonga uyu unoshanda sei muvana vezera iri risati raparura chirongwa ichi. VaMujiri vanoti pari zvino bazi ravo riri mushishi kuzadzisa zvakatarwa neMCAZ izvi kuitira kuzoparura chirongwa ichi. Hurumende yakazivisa masvondo maviri adarika kuti vana vemazera aya vave kuzobaiwa nhomba yakakosha iyi, yekudzivirira Covid-19. Pari zvino vanhu vari kubaiwa nhomba dzeavo vane makore anotangira pagumi nemasere zvichikwira. Mukuru werimwe sangano rinoshanda nenharaunda munyaya dzezvehutano, reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti vanogamuchira zvikuru danho ratorwa neMedicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe iri, vachiti rinobatsira kuchengetedza vana vadiki ava. VaRusike vanoti vana vane makore ari pasi pegumi nemasere vave kubatwawo zvakare nehutachiwana hunokonzera Covid-19, zvikuru hweseDelta Variant, izvo zvavanoti zvinoisa vana ava munjodzi huru. asi VaRusike vanoti vana ava vasati vabaiwa kana kupinda muchirongwa chekuongorora kana nhomba iyi ichishanda zvakanaka kumazera avo, vana ava vanofanirwa kutanga vapiwa mvumo nevabereki vavo kana vanovachengeta vasati vabaiwa., sezvo vari pasi pemakore ekuzvimirira. No media source currently available No media source currently available

headline: Vanorarama neKutengesera Mumigwagwa Vochema Kuti Hurumende Haina Kuvabvumidzawo Kutanga Kushanda
text: Vanotengesa zvinhu mumigwagwa vari kuchema-chema zvikuru vachiti hurumende inofanirwa kuvabvumidzawo kuti vadzokere pamabasa avo sezvo vachirarama nekutengesa zvinhu mumigwagwa uye vanhu ava vakawanda kudarika vanhu vanoenda kumabasa. Masangano anomirira vanhu ava, anoti reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation, (VISET) neSurvival Vendors Union of Zimbabwe anoti hurumende yaifanirwawo kuona kuti vanozviitira mabasa emaoko ava vabvumidzwawo kudzokera kumabasa avo sezvayakaita kubvumidza vemakambani kuti vavhure. Hurumende yakabvumidza vemakambani kuvhura asi vachiita kuti vashandi vavo vaongororwa kuti havana COVID-19 here kana kuti kwete. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvemakambani madiki neepakati, Amai Sithembiso Nyoni kuti tinzwe kana paine hurongwa hwavari kuitira vanozvibatira mabasa emaoko ava. Makanzuru mazhinji munyika ari mushishi kuparadza nzvimbo dzinosishandirwa nevanozvishandira ava, kunyange hazvo dare repamusoro rakapa mutongo richiti mamwe emakanzuru aya akanga atyora mutemo nekuparadza nzvimbo idzi. Asi mukuru weVISET, VaSamuel Wadzayi, vanoti vane kunyunyuta uye kushamisika kuti sei hurumende yakasvika padanho iri isinawo kutarisa vanorarama nekutengesera mumigwagwa, vavanoti ndivo vakabata hupfumi hwenyika. No media source currently available Vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru wesangano re Survival Vendors Union of Zimbabwe, VaObey Mwariwangu, vanoti kunyange hazvo hurumende iri kuita zvakawanda mukurerutsa zvinhu yakanangana nechirwere che coronavirus, kune vanotengesera mumigwagwa hapana chinhu chati charerutswa, sezvo vasiri kukwanisa kupinda mumigwagwa, munove mavanogara nekushandira. No media source currently available

headline: Madzimai Anoshanyira South Africa Onyunyuta neKurambidzwa Kupinda neMapiritsi eKuronga Mhuri
text: Madzimai ari kushanya kuSouth Africa haasi kufara nekutorerwa mapiritsi ekuronga mhuri kwaari kuitwa nevashandi vanoona nezvekupinda nekubuda kwevashanyi muSouth Africa. Madzimai aya anoti ari kubvumirwa kupinda nepakiti imwechete iyo inenge iyine mapiritsi anokwana mwedzi mumwechete. Madzimai aya anoti izvi zvinoita kuti azopedzesera oshandisa mapiritsi ekuronga mhuri ekuSouth Africa ayo vakawanda vanoti anovarwarisa zvinosanganisira kubuda ropa kwenguva yakareba. Amai Getrude Tarumbwa, avo vanodzidzisa kuPretoria, vanoti kurambidzwa mapiritsi akawanda anovakwanira kunozovamanikidza kunwa mapiritsi ekuSouth Africa ayo anovarwarisa, uye kubuda ropa rakawanda. Amai Tarumbwa vanoti munhu anofanirwa kubvumirwa mapiritsi anoenderana nenguva yaanenge abvumirwa kugara muSouth Africa. Izvi zvinotsigirwa naAmai Patricia Zuze, avo vanoenda kunotengesa zvinhu zvakaita semidziyo yemumba yakagadzirwa nemiti kuSouth Africa. Amai Zuze, avo vanogara mwedzi miviri kana mitatu vachitengesa, vanoti kutorerwa mapiritsi kutyorerwa kodzero dzavo uye vanozomanikidzwa kunwa mapiritsi ekuronga mhuri ekuSouth Africa avanoti anovarwarisa. Nekuda kwekurambidzwa kwemapiritsi akawanda pabhodha, mamwe madzimai ave kuita bhizinisi rekuenda nemapiritsi achinotengesera zvizvarwa zvemunyika zviri kuSouth Africa. Pakiti rimwe chete, iro rinopihwa pachena munyika rinotengeswa nemari iri pakati pemaRands zana nemakumi mashanu nemazana maviri zvichienderana nekuti munhu ari kuatengesera kunzvimbo ipi muSouth Africa. Amai Roselyne Chitani mumwe wemadzimai anotengesa mapiritsi ekuronga mhuri kuSouth Africa. Vatyairi vemabhazi anoenda kuSouth Africa vanoyambirawo vanhu vavanenge vakatakura zvinhu zvisingabvumirwe kupinda munyika iyi kuitira kuti vasazobatwa vachinzi vari kutakura vanhu vanopinda nezvinhu zvisingabvumirwe. Mutyairi webhazi reFirst Class, VaFrank Muguti, vachiyambira vashanyi vechidzimai kuti vasatakure mapiritsi ekuronga mhuri akawanda. Zvinhu zvakaita semufushwa, manhanga, nzimbe muriwo hazvibvumirwe kupinda nazvo pabhodha. Munhu anowanikwa nazvo anotorerwa uye haazobvumirwa kupinda munyika iyi musi waanenge abatwa. Munyori mubazi rezvehutano, Brg Gerald Gwinji, vanoti vachaongorora nyaya iyi vachiti hazvisi pamutemo kuti vanhu varambidzwe kana kuita zvinotadzisa kuti munhu atore mushonga wake sezvinenge zvataura chiremba. Hatina kunzwa divi reSouth Africa panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yombomira Kupa Magwaro Ekurima Mbanje
text: Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehupfumi, VaTerrance Mukupe, vanoti hurumende yambomira kupa vanhu marenzenise ekurima mbanje nokuti vanhu vanyorera kuti vanoda marezenisi aya vawandisa. VaMukupe vativo hurumende inoda nguva yekumbotura mafemo ichiona kuti hurongwa uhu hungafambiswa sei. "Tanga tisingatarisiri kuti kuchaita vanhu vakawanda kudaro vanoda marezenisi nekuti vanhu vauya vapfuura mazana matatu vanoda marezenisi. Saka unoona kuti kana wange uchida kupa vanhu vashanu chete, unozosarudza sei pasingaitwe huori," VaMukupe vakaudza Studio 7. Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, "Saka tirikunyatsotarisa kuti tozviita sei. Tinofanira kunyatso kunzwisisa kuti chinofanirwa kuitwa chii uye tinozviita sei. Uyezve tinofanira kuronga kuti kunorimirwa kwacho ndekupi uye kuti kune masoja here anochengeta." No media source currently available

headline: Vatsigiri vava kutenderwa munhandare
text: VATSIGIRI venhabvu vakabaiwa majekiseni ose ekudzivirira Covid-19 vave kutenderwa kuona mitambo yeChibuku Super Cup. Sangano reSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) rakanyorera kuZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) richazivisa kuti chikumbiro chavo chekuti mitambo yeChibuku Super Cup inge iine vatsigiri 2 000 munhandare chatambirwa.   Mutsamba yakanyorwa neSRC, akafanobata chigaro chadirector general – Sebastain Garikai – anoti vatsigiri 2 000 vachaona mitambo iyi vanofanirwa kunge vakabaiwa nhomba dzeCovid-19 uye pose pavanoenda kumitambo iyi vagare vakapfeka mamasiki nekutevedzera matanho ose ekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi.   “Chikumbiro chenyu chekuti vatsigiri vaone nhabvu vari munhandare chatambirwa. Saka vatsigiri vose vari muZone 3 neZone 4 vanofanirwa kuuya nemakadhi anoratidza kuti vakabaiwa majekiseni ose eCovid-19 pamwe nezvitupa zvavo kunhandare pavanenge vachipinda. “Naizvozvo, tinokurudzira kuti matikiti ekupinda mumitambo iyi atengeswe mitambo isati yatanga kuitira panhandare pasazoita nyonga-nyonga uye tinotarisira kuti pave nemagedhi akasiyana anopinda nekubuda nevanhu.   “Mazita evatsigiri aya anofanirwa kunge akatonyoreswa kare zvekuti pakupinda munhandare pane vanenge vachiongorora. Kana munhu zita rake risipo, haatenderwe kupinda munhandare macho.   “Mitemo iyi nemimwe ikoshesei uye ngaitevedzerwe nekuti mukasaitedzera zvinotituma kuti timise vatsigiri vacho kuuya kuzoona mitambo iyi,” anodaro Garikai.

headline: Mutungamiri weNamibia, VaHage Geingob, Vanovhura ZITF Vachikurudzira Kudyidzana kweZimbabwe neNamibia
text: Mutungamiri weNamibia, VaHage Geingob, vanoti kudyidzana pakati peNamibia neZimbabwe munyaya dzemabhizimisi kwakaderera vachiti kudyidzana uku kunofanirwa kukwira. Vachivhura ZITF yegore rino zviri pamutemo, VaGeingob vati mugore rapfuura Namibia yakatenga kubva kuZimbabwe zvinhu zvemari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemana emadhora. Vati kudyidzana pakati peNamibia neZimbabwe uye pakati penyika dzemuAfrica kunofanirwa kukwira vachiti kuita izvi kunobatsirawo kusimudzira hupfumi henyika idzi. VaGeingob vati Namibia ichiri yakatarisana nedambudziko munyaya yekugovewa kweivhu vakati nyika yavo inogona kudzidza zvakawanda kubva mukugadziriswa kwakaitwa nyaya iyi muZimbabwe vachiti kugadzirisa nyaya iyi kunobatsira kurwisa hurombo hune veruzhinji. Vati hurmende yavo yakatanga chirongwa chavakati "Harambe" senzira yekurwisa hurombo uye kusimudzira hupenyu hweveruzhinji munyika mavo. VaGeingob vati vemakambani vanofanirwa kuita zvemabhizimisi vasina kungonangana nekuwana mari chete, asi kubatsirawo kurwisa hurombo. Vasati vatura mashoko avo, VaGeingob vamboshanyira nzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana muZITF pamwe nemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vachiona zviri kuratidzwa pachirongwa ichi. Nyika gumi neina chete ndidzo dzange dziine makambani adzo achiratidza zvigadzirwa paZITF yegore rino. No media source currently available

headline: Varimi veFodya Voyambira RBZ Kuti Vabhadharwe Zviri paMutemo
text: Vane misika yekutenga fodya vanoti bhanga guru renyika, reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, rinofanira kuona kuti mabhanga ese ari kumisika iyi ane mari inokwana kuti varimi vese vawane mari yavanosungirwa kuwana pazuva. Vachitaura nevakuru vakuru vekambani yehurumende yeTobacco Industries Marketing Board avo vange vari kuona kuti misika iyi yagadzirira zvakadii mwaka wekutengesa fodya, vemisika iyi vati sezvo RBZ yakati varimi vanokwanisa kuwana madhora mazana matatu pazuva, mabhanga ese anofanira kunge aine mari yekuita izvi. Mumwe mukuru pamusika weTobacco Sales Floor, VaPeter Mujaya, vati chisingafadzi ndechekuti kana varimi vachinge vashaya mari dzavo kumabhanga, vanodzoka kuzopopota kumisika uko vanenge vatengesa fodys yavo. Vati semuenzanizo gore rapera RBZ yainge yavimbisa kuti varimi vazokwanisa kuwana churu chemadhora pazuva asi izvi hazvina kuitika uye mamwe mabhanga aipa mazana maviri emadhora izvo zvakazomutsa bongozozo pamusika uyu. Asi sachigaro veTIMB, Amai Monica Chinamasa, vatiwo zvakakosha kuti vemisika yefodya vadzidzise varimi kuti vachange vachibhadharwa sei uye kuti vanofanira kunyoresa fodya vasati vauya nayo kumusika. Amai Chinamasa vati vanozivisa kuti varimi vanenge vachidawo mari yekunobhadhara vanhu vakaivaitira basa asi vati zvakakosha kuti varimi ava vazivewo kuti nyika yakatarisana nedambudziko remari uye vanofanira kutambira mari iripo. Svondo rapfuura RBZ yakazivisa kuti varimi vachange vachikwanisa kupihwa mazana matatu emadhora pazuva mushure mekutengesa fodya uye imwe yacho ichange ichizoiswa mumabhanga avo. Amai Chinamasa vanoti vanofara chose negadziriro yekuvhura misika iyi uye pamisika mina yavashanyira nhasi inoti Boka, TSF, Premium neMashonaland Tobacco Company, yese yave nezvinodiwa zvakaita semakirinika, zvimbuzi, mvura nezvese zvinoita kuti misika iyi ikwanise kushanda zvakanaka. Misika yefodya inovhura nemusi wa 21 Kurume. Amai Chinamasa vati zvinofadza kuti mamwe makambani anotenga fodya achange achitenga fodya munzvimbo dzakaita seRusape, Mvurwi neKaroi. Vati izvi zvichaderedza huwandu hwevanhu vanouya kuzotengesa fodya pamisika iri muHarare. No media source currently available

headline: Bazi rezveHutano Roongorora Vanhu Vakabva Kunyika Dzine Chirwere cheCoronavirus
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti pane vanhu zana nemakumi maviri nemapfumbamwe vakabva kunyika dzakabatwa vanhu chirwere che coronavirus vari kumboongororwa munyika kusvika musi wa7 Kukadzi kuti vaonekwe kuti havana kutapurirwa chirwere ichi here. Vanhu ava vakasvika munyika pakati pa25 na28 Ndira, unove mwedzi uno, vachibva kunyika dzakasiyanasiyana dzabatwa nedambudziko rechirwere ichi, kusanganisira China, uko kwachakatangira. Chirwere ichi chauraya vanhu vanosvika zana nemakumi manomwe kuChina kwakare uye vamwe vanodarika zviuru zvipfumbamwe nemazana matanhatu vabatwa nacho kusvika pari nhasi munyika iyi. Kunze kweChina, chirwere ichi chawanikwawo kunyika dzinosvika gumi nesere dzinosanganisira America, France, Germany, Japan neVietnam. Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano Dr Henry Madzorera vanoti vanoona zviri zvinhu zvakanaka zvekudzivirira vanhu kuti chirwere ichi chisapararira. Doctor Madzorera vanotiwo vanoona zvakakodzera kuti vanhu vari kutarisiswa ava vange vachimbogara vari kudzimba dzavo vachiongororwa sezvo pasati pave nemunhu abatwa nechirwere. Vanoti nekuda kwekuoma kwezvinhu mune zveupfumi, Zimbabwe haizokwanise kuita sedzimwe nyika dzakabudirira dzinonzi dzakatovaka zvipatara zvekuchengetera vanhu vari kuongororwa kana vakabatwa nechirwere ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Kushomeka kweMari kuMabhanga Kotadzisa Varairidzi Kutora Mari Dzavanoda
text: Dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari kumabhanga rinonzi ratadzisa varairidzi kuwana mihoro yavo yemwedzi uno. Dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari kumabhanga rinonzi ratadzisa varairidzi kuwana mihoro yavo yemwedzi uno. Mutungamiri weProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, VaTakavafira Zhou, vanoti varairidzi vakawanda vaenda kumahofisi avo vachi nyunyuta kuti vari kutadza kutora mari dzavanoda kumabhanga. Vanoti varairidzi ava vanga vachiti mabhanga mazhinji anga achingovapa mari inoita madhora makumi mashanu chete pamunhu, inove shoma kune zvavanenge vachida. “Varairidzi vanenge vakatarisira kuti mari idzi ndidzo dzavachashandisa kutenga zvavanoda uyewo kubhadharira vana vavo school fees sezvo zvikoro zvave kuvhurwa. Asi zvose izvi zvapinda musango,” VaZhou vanodaro. Mumwe anoshanda kune rimwe bhanga asina kuda kudomwa nezita sezvo asingabvumidzwi kutaura nevatori venhau audza Studio7 kuti mabhanga haasi kukwanisa kuwana mari yaanoda kubva kubhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, izvo zvave kuita kuti mabhanga amirire kuwana mari kubva kune vanenge vachida kuchengetesa mari dzavo. Mukutanga kwemwedzi uno gavhuna veRBZ, VaJohn Mangudya, vakaudza paramende kuti mabhanga emunyika akapinza mari inodarika mazana maviri emamiriyoni emadhora kubva kutanga kwegore rino kusvika mwedzi uno, asi mari iyi ichiri kutadza kugutsa misika. VaMangudya vakati bhanga ravo riri kutora matanho akawanda anosanganisira kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vashandise makadhi ekumabhanga pakutenga nekubhadhara zvinhu. Vakatendawo kuti vanhu vakawanda havachada kuchengetera mari dzavo kumabhanga nekuda kwemitero yakakwira yekumabhanga pamwe nekuderera kwemari dzinoberekwa. Asi VaZhou vanoti vakuru vehurumende vanofanirwa kumbosendeka kusawirirana kwavo nevemamwe mapato vogara pasi kuti vagadzirise zvinhu munyika. “Inini ndinoona sekuti vakuru venyika, eeh, VaRobert Mugabe nevamwe, nevakuru vema opposition ngavambogara pasi vataurirane vachitaurirana chokwadi kuti nyika ingafamba ichienda mberi sei,” VaZhou vanowedzera. Panya yemabhonasi evarairidzi, vanoti hurumende yakavazivisa varairidzi kuti vachawana mari idzi musi wa 30 Kubvumbi. Asi vanoti kukundikana kwehurumende kubhadhara varairidzi mabhonasi avo, ayo vatarisira kwenguva ndefu, kucharevawo kuti zvikoro zvichangovhurwa zvakavharwa, zvichireva kuti varairidzi havasi kuzoenda kubasa pachavhurwa zvikoro musi wa 3 Chivabvu. No media source currently available

headline: General Electric Yotarisa Nzira dzeKuita Bhizimisi muZimbabwe
text: Vakuru vakuru vekambani yeku America yeGeneral Electric vanonzi vari kushanya muZimbabwe kuzotsvaga kuita mabhizimisi. Mumiriri we America muZimbabwe, VaHarry Thomas, vakataurawo mashoko aya padandemutande ravo reTwitter vachiti vainge vaita musangano nevakuru veGE. Izvi zvinotevera kuridziro yemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, yekuti Zimbabwe yagadzirira kudyidzana nedzimwe nyika. General Electric ikambani inokosha madhora anopfuura mabhirioni zana nemakumi maviri nemaviri uye inogadzira zvinhu zvakawanda kubva kune zvemagetsi, mainjini emota nendege kusvika kumafiriji nezvimwe zvinoshandiswa mudzimba. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Doctor Elliot Masocha, avo vanodzidzisa kuOhio muno mu America, vanoti Zimbabwe yave nemumwe mukana wekugadzirisa nyika munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachiti vanofara nezvinoda kuitwa neGeneral Electric. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vatatu Vofa neCovid-19
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu vatatu vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nezuro kuHarare, Bulawayo neMasvingo. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kusvika parizvino vave mazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe kana kuti 294. Vanhu zana nemakumi maviri nemumwe kana kuti 121 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro. Vanhu vose vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro ava Havana nhoroondo yekubuda munyika. Matababeland North ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro vanove makumi manomwe nemana, Bulawayo ine makumi matatu nevaviri, Midlands gumi uye mumwe chete kuMasvingo. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga vave zvuru gumi nemazana masere nemakumi matatu nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 10, 839. Vanhu vapora kusvika parizvino zvuru zvisere nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi manomwe nevaviri kana kuti 8, 972 mushure mekunge vanhu makumi mapfumbamwe nevaviri vapora nezuro. Vanhu vachiri kurwara churu chimwe chete nemazana mashanu nemakumi manomwe nevatatu kana kuti 1, 573. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa studio 7 neafrican union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nezvuru mazana maviri kana kuti 2, 2 million vabatwa nechirwere checovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zvuru makumi mashanu nezvitatu zvine mazana masere nemakumi mashanu nevatatu kana kuti 53, 853. Vapora vadarika miriyoni imwe chete nezvuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 1,9 million. South Africa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu nemanomwe ane zviuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 67, 7 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muamerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vadarika zvuru mazana maviri nemakumi masere nematatu kana kuti kuti 283, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni gumi nemana nezvuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 14, 9 million. Pasi rose, vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 1, 5 million. Asi vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi mana nematatu kana kuti 43 million.

headline: Musangano weNational Convergence Platform Unombomiswa
text: Vari kuronga musangano weNational Convergence Platform wekuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvigare pasi zvizeye matambudziko akatarisana nenyika, Mufundisi Sebastian Bakare, vanoti musangano uyu wava kumbomira kuitwa sezvo vanhu vazhinji vasiri kutambira musangano uyu. No media source currently available Vachitaura nevatori venhau mu Harare, Bishop Bakare vati vanhu vazhinji havasi kutambira hurongwa uhwu uhwo hwanga huchifanira kuitwa musi wa 24 Gumiguru, 2015. Mutauriri we National Convergence Platform, Va Vince Museve, vatiwo chimwe chiri kunetsa kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvigare pasi zvizeye matambudziko azvakatarisana nawo pamwe nekutsvaga nzira dzekugadzirisa zviri kunetsa inyaya yemari. Ve National Convergence Platform vave nenguva inokwana gore vachiedza kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviungane. Va Bakare varamba mashoko akabuda mune mamwe mapepanhau ekuti musangano uyu uri kutadza kubudirira nepamusana pekuti vanga vane vatungamiri vavanga vachida kuti vatungamire mubatanidzwa wemapato ezvematongerwo pamberi pesarudzo dzemuna 2018 kana kuti grand coalition. Mutungamiri weProgressive Democratic Party, Va Tendai Biti, pamwe nemutungamiri werimwe boka reMDC, Va Welshman Ncube, vakabuda pachena kuti havadi kuti mutungamiri weMDC, Va Morgan Tsvangirai, vatungamirire grand coalition iyi. Asi vamwe vakaita saVa Simba Makoni, vebato reMavambo, Kusile, Dawn vanoti vanhu havafanire kumhanyira kugoverana mhuka yavasati vabata vachiti mapato anofanirwa kuita chirwirangwe kuti abvise hutongo hweZanu PF yavari kupomera mhosva yekuondomora hupfumi hwenyika. Va Museve vati zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvikaungana kuti zvizeye matambudziko akatarisana nenyika, panogona kubuda gwara razvingatevedzera mukugadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyika. Zvichakadai, Va Bakare vati seNational Convergence Platform, vachakoka munhu wese ane chekuita nekugadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyika kusanganisira vari muhurumende, vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika, masangano anoshanda akazvimirira neruzhinji rweZimbabwe. VaBakare vati musangano wavari kuda kuti uitwe uyu hausi kuzotarisa kuti munhu anotsigira bato ripi rezvematongerwo enyika sezvo munhu wese achibatwa nezviri kuitika munyika.

headline: Vodzidziswa nezveMixed Martial Arts
text: VARAIRIDZI veMixed Martial Arts (MMA) vemuno vachawaniswa mukana wekudzidziswa zvizere ruzivo rwemutambo uyu apo vari kurongerwa zvidzidzo nesangano reZimbabwe National Boxing and Wrestling Control (ZNBWC) iro riri kuunza nyanzvi dzemutambo uyu dzekunze kwenyika.   MMA mumwe wemitambo iri kusimukira zvikuru pasi rose uye une mukurumbira kunyika dzakawanda nekudaro ZNBWC yakabatana neMixed Martial Arts South Africa iyo ichatumira nyanzvi muno kuzodzidzisa nezvemutambo uyu.   Mumashoko aakaverengerwa svondo rino muHarare naSharon Dube anove mutauriri weZNBWC apo paiparurwa chirongwa ichi, chamangwiza weZNBWC — Lawrence Zimbudzana — anoti MMA mutambo uri kufarirwa zvikuru pasi rose.   “Makore adarika tikatarisisa zvikuru, MMA mutambo uri kukura chaizvo kunyika dzakawanda uye unoteverwa zvakanyanya.   Saka isu tiri kutora chikamu chekuuunza muno.   “Musi wa29 na30 Gumiguru tichaita zvidzidzo muHarare apo tichaunza shasha dzine hunyanzvi mumutambo uyu kuzopakurira ruzivo rwavo,” anodaro Zimbudzana.   Pari zvino Zimbabwe ine vatambi vaviri vari kukwikwidza mumutambo uyu vanoti Themba Gorimbo anove Sportsman of the Year naSylvester Chipfumbi uyo akanyorawo nhoroondo yekuve shasha ahwina bhande reExtreme Fighting Championship Bantamweight munaChivabvu.   Zimbudzana anoti zvichitevera kubudirira kwaita vatambi vaviri ava, ZNBWC yazviona zvakakodzera kusimudzira mutambo uyu nekuushambadza zvakanyanya munyika kuitira kupawo mukana kune vatambi vangade kuzoutamba.   “Zvinofadza kuti tine shasha mbiri dziri kukwikwidza kune dzimwe nyika, saka izvi zvimwe zvezvikonzero zvakatituma kuti tisumudzire mutambo uyu zvigopawo mikana kune vamwe vatambi vangade kukwikwidza,” anodaro.   Kana varairidzi vemutambo uyu vadzidziswa, ZNBWC iri kuronga kutanga mitambo yeMMA muna2022.

headline: Morocco yatevera Senegal ku’Round of 16′
text: MOROCCO nhasi manheru ano yatevera Senegal panyika dzemuAfrica kupinda mu’Round of 16′ zvichitevera kukunda kwayaita Canada 2-1 mumutambo we2022 FIFA World Cup iyo iri kutambirwa kuQatar.   MaAtlas Lions ange ari muGroup F umo akasangana neCroatian, Belgium neCanada.   Mumutambo wekutanga, Morocco yakaita mangange 0-0 neCroatia, ndokuzokunda Belgium 2-0 uye Canada iyo yayaradzika 2-1 ndokupedza iine zvibodzwa zvipfumbabwe.   Yabva yaita nhoroondo yekupedza iri pamusoro peGroup F ndokubva yanyora nhoroondo yekuita chikwata chega chemuAfrica chekupedza chiri pamusoro muboka rayo uye chisina kumbokundwa mumitambo kana mumwe chete.   Iye zvino MaAtlas Lions amirira kuona kuti achasangana nechikwata chipi kuRound of 16.

headline: MUCHAFARA: NAKAMBA
text: MUTAMBI wenhabvu wemaWarriors neAston Villa yekuEngland, Marvelous Nakamba anoti shuviro yake kuunza mufaro kuvatsigiri vese venhabvu vemuno nekuhwina mibairo mukuru yenhabvu nenyika yake.   Nakamba akaita mutambi wenhabvu wechishanu wemuZimbabwe kutambira muEngland Premier League achitevera matsimba aBruce Grobbelaar, Peter Ndlovu, Benjani Mwaruwari naBrendan Galloway, uye kutengwa kwaakaitwa neAston Villa matambiro ake aari kuita kurakidza kuti sei Dean Smith murairidzi wake akabhadhara mari inosvika 11 miriyoni paunzi kumuunza kuchikwata ichi achibva kuClub Brugge yekuBelgium.   Achitaura neKwayedza nguva pfupi yadarika muHarare apo ainge auya kuzotambira maWarriors mumutambo wekurwira tikiti rekuenda kumakwishu e2021 Africa Cup of Nations ayo achaitirwa kuCameroon, Nakamba akati rutsigiro rwaari kuona kubva kuvatsigiri vemuno zvichitevera kutengwa kwake neVilla kunonwisa mvura uye acharwa semvumba kuti agounza mufaro kwavari.   “Zvinofadza zvikuru uye zviri kundipa simba kuti ndirambe ndichishanda nesimba nguva nenguva kuti tiunze mufaro kwavari vatsigiri vedu,” akadaro.   Muchikwata chemaWarriors, Nakamba ndiye mumwe wevatambi vechikwata ichi vakuru vanotarisirwa nevamwe vatambi uye aive muchikwata chemaWarriors chaive kumakwishu eAfrica Cup of Nations yakaitwa gore rino kuEgypt uye nechakaenda kuGabon mugore ra2017 chichirairidzwa naKalisto Pasuwa. Iyezvino ari kurwira kuenda kuAfcon yake yechitatu uye makwishu eFIFA World Cup 2022 iyo ichaitirwa kuQatar.   Kubva Nakamba atanga kutamba nhabvu, shasha iyi yakakurira mumhuri yeBantu Rovers umo akabikwa zvakasimba tarenda rake uye mugore ra2012 akaabva aenda kuFrance uko akanotambira chikwata cheNancy icho parizvino chiri kutambira muFrench Ligue 2. Achibva kuNancy akabva aenda kuVitesse yekuNetherlands uko kwaakanyatsogadzira zita rake kwaakatamba kubva mugore ra2012 kusvika mugore ra2017 apo akazobva achienda kuClub Brugge uko aitambira mwaka miviri yadarika.   Ari kuClub Brugge mutambi uyu akahwina mukombe weligi weBelgian First Division Trophy mumwaka wa2017-18 izvo zvakazomuona achitamba mumakwikwi eUEFA Champions league wemwaka wegore ra2018-19 apo chikwata chaksangana nezvimwe zvikwata zvinosanganisira Atletico Madrid.   Achibva kuClub Brugge ndipo paazotengwa neAston Villa mwaka uno uye ndiye mutambi wenhabvu ega kubva muZimbabwe ari kutambira muEngland Premier league.   Achitaura pamusoro pehupenyu hwaari kurarama kuEngland, Nakamba anoti ari kufambirwa zvakanaka uye anoda kuramba achidzidza achisimukira mumutambo uyu wenhabvu.   “KuEngland hupenyu huri kufamba zvakanaka uye ndiri kunzwa manyukunyuku nepandiri saka ndinoda kuramba ndichishanda nesimba ndigosvika kure, shuviro yangu kuti ndirambe ndichisimukira mumutambi uyu uye ndigounza mufaro kuchikwata cheAston Villa nevatsigiri vedu.   “Ini pachangu nditori mutsigiri mukuru weAston Villa nekuti yandandizarurira mukana wekuuya kuzotamba muligi renhabvu hombe pasi rese,” akadaro.   Shasha iyi inoti rutsigiro rwaanopihwa nevabereki vake Anthony naCharity Nakamba runokomborera uye zvinomutuma kuramba achishanda nesimba kuti aunze mufaro kwavari.   “Vabereki vangu ndivo vatsigiri vakuru vangu vakuru uye vanogara vachinditsigira uye pese pandinouya kuzotambira maWarriors vanenge varimo munhandare vachinditsigira saka zvinhu zvakandikoshera zvikuru uye ndozvitenda, ndizvo zvimwe zvacho zvinondituma kuti ndirambe ndichizvisunda ndishande nesimba,” akadaro Nakamba.   Kubva aenda kuAston mutambi uyu akwanisa kutamba mumitambo minonwe yemuEngland Premier league kozoti umwechete weCarabao Cup.   Shasha iyi yaive muchikwata cheVilla icho chakasangana neManchester City, Arsenal uye neLiverpool mitambo iyo anoti achiri kuirangarira zvikuru sezvo aisangana nevatambi vakuru venhabvu pasi rese.   “Iyi imwe yemitambo ndichiri kurangarira zvikuru yandakatamba asi yese yandatamba yakandikoshera zvikuru uye ini chishuvo change kuti ndirambe ndichisimukira mumutambo wangu uye nechikwata changu tienderere mberi munhabvu,” anodaro.   KuAston Villa, Nakamba ari kurairidzwa naDean Smith uye naJohn Terry gamba renhabvu remuEngland iro rakaita mukurumbira achitambira Chelsea Football Club, England neAston Villa.

headline: Zvizvarwa Zviri Kunze Zvokwira Matare neNyaya yeKuvhota
text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika svondo rapera zvakakwira kudare zvichida kuti rirase zvikamu zvemutemo une chekuita nesarudzo unorambidza kuti vari kunze kwenyika vavhote vari munyika dzavagere. Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa neUnited Kingdom zvakamirirwa nemagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu zvakaenda kudare repamusorosoro, reConstitutional Court, zvichipikisa mutemo wesarudzo uyu, zvichiti bumbiro remitemo idzva ravepo rinozvipa mukana wekuti zvivhote musarudzo dzinoitwa munyika.
