Vanhu ava vari kumirirwa neZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, Pari zvino vari kunze kwenyika vachiita mabasa ehurumende kana kushandira masangano makuru akazvimirira ndivo chete vanobvumidzwa kuvhota vari munyika dzavagere. Muna Chikunguru wegore rino dare rimwechetero rakarasa imwe nyaya yakadai yakanga yakwidzwa nechimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri kuSouth Africa muna 2013, richiti hurumende haimanikidzwe pamutemo kuisa nzvimbo dzekuvhotera kunze kwenyika. Mutongi wedare repamusoro soro, Chief Justice Luke Malaba, vakati zvizvarwa zvose zvakasarudza kugara kunze kwenyika zvakasununguka kudzoka kumusha kunovhota munguva dzesarudzo. Hurumende yakazvisawo zvakare kuti haina zvikwanisiro zvekuti iise nzvimbo dzekuti vari kunze vavhotere, danho rinoonekwa nevanopikisa senzira yekurambidza vazhinji vevari kunze, avo vanoonekwa nehurumende sevanoipikisa, kuvhota. Asi gweta rinorwira kodzero dzeavnhu vachishanda neHuman Rights Watch, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti danho rakatorwa nezvizvarwa zviri kunze kwenyika iri rakakosha zvikuru sezvo bumbiro remitemo idzva richipa munhu wese kodzero dzekuvhota. VaMavhinga vanoti kunyange hazvo mutongo wakapiwa muna Chikunguru wakarambidza kuti vanhu vavhote vari kunze kwenyika, nyaya iyoyo yakanga yakwidzwa kudare pachipikiswa mutemo waive mubumbiro rakare. No media source currently available

headline: Ndinotamba mitambo yekare: Ndlovu
text: MUTAMBI wenetball weGlow Petroleum Queens nechikwata chenyika chemaGems — Ursula Ndlovu — anoti mukukura kwake aifarira zvikuru mitambo yakasiyana kusanganisira yechinyakare yakaita semaflau nearawuru uye nanhasi achiri kuitamba.   Ndlovu anoti paanenge asiri kubasa kwake kwaanoshanda achiita zvekudira mafuta edzimotokari kana kutamba netball, anotombotamba maflau nearawuru nemwana wake uye neshamwari dzemwana wake. “Ndichikura, pamitambo yechinyakare inozivikanwa ini ndaifarira zvikuru maflau nearawuru, iyo ndaigona nekuti mitambo yandaidisisa.   “Nanhasi chaiye ndikaona mwana wangu, Mitchell, achitamba neshamwari dzake mitambo iyi, ndinototanga kutamba navo uye vanotozvifarira,” anodaro Ndlovu.   Anoti kutamba kwaanenge achiita nevana inzira yekukurudzira mwana wake neshamwari dzake kuti vakoshese mitambo iyi sezvo ichizogona kuvabatsira mune remangwana.   Ndlovu anoti achikura, paaitamba maflau nearawuru ndipo paakatanga kuona kuti ane chipo chekumhanya zvikuru izvo zvakazomuona achikwikwidza mumijaho yekumhanya yakasiyana. Anoti kutamba nemwana wake neshamwari dzake zvaitawo kuti aone kuti Mitchell ane chipo chekumhanya saiye.   “Pandave iye zvino haisisiri nyaya yekuti ndinofarira manhingi kutamba maflau nearawuru asi ndinenge ndichitodzidzisa mwana wangu neshamwari dzake kuti zvemitambo zvine pundutso muhupenyu. “Ini kukura kwangu dai ndisina kutamba mitambo iyi ndisina kusvika pandave nhasi. Ndakwanisa kufamba kuenda kune nyika dzakawanda nekuda kwekutamba netball.   “Asi zvakatangira pakutamba maflau nearawuru,” anodaro Ndlovu.   Veruzhinji vanoziva Ndlovu ari mumwe wevatambi vemaGems vakanyora nhorowondo kuve chikwata chekutanga kuenda kunokwikwidza kumutambo weVitality World Cup kuLiverpool, England mugore ra2018.   Kumutambo uyu, Ndlovu mumwe wevatambi vemaGems vakatamba zvinonwisa mvura.

headline: VeMuzvitoro Voramba Kutambira Makadhi ekuBhanga
text: Veruzhinji muHarare vanoti havasi kufara nezvave kuitwa nevezvimwe zvitoro zvekunzi vatenge nemari chaiyo pakutenga zvimwe zvinhu kwetese kushandisa makadhi ekubhanga. Zvimwe zvitoro zvinonzi zvakumanikidza vatengi kuti vashandise mari kutenga zvimwe zvinhu zvakaita semafuta kwete kushandisa makadhi ekubhanga kana dzimwe nzira dzakaita seEcocash. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, Amai Takudzwa Dzumbunu vati dambudziko iri rafararira nezvitoro zvakawanda zvavanoti zviri kukonzera kuti vashaye zvekuita sezvo vanhu vazhinji vanga vorarama nekushandisa makadhi ekubhanga kana kubhadhara neEcocash sezvo mari dziri kushyaikwa kumabhanga. Asi Amai Winnet Bhasera vanoti ivo semunhu ave pamudyandigere zviri kuvawomera kuti vanzi vasashandise makadhi ekubhanga pakutenga zvimwe zvinhu muzvitoro vachiti havakwanise kuswera vakamira pamitsetse yekumbhanga kuti vakwanise kuwanisa mari yekutenga zvavanenge vachida. Asi Muzvare Kudzai Chaparadza vatiwo kunyangwe hazvo iri riri dambudziko kuvatengi, vezvitoro vanenge vachidawo kubhadhara vashandi nemari yacho saka zvakakoshawo kuti veruzhinji vashandise musvo wemari pakutenga. Vaenderera mberi vachiti makambani anogadzira zvinhu akaita semafuta anodawo mari yekutenga kubva kunze kwenyika zvaanoshandisa mukugadzira zvinhu. Vamwe vakuru munezvimwe zvitoro zvashanyirwa neStudio 7 varamba kutaura nezvenyaya iyi vachiti havabvumidzwe kutaura pamhepo nevakuru vavo. Kunyangwe hazvo varamba kutaura, zvinyorwa zvanga zvakanamatidzwa muzvitoro izvi zvanga zvichiti vanhu vanofanira kutenga nemari chaiyo kwete makadhi sezvo kwavanohodha kuchidiwa musvo wemari. Umwe mushandi pane imwe kambani inogadzira mafuta iri muHarare uyo aramba kudomwa nezita ati imwe yemichina yavanoshandisa pakusvina mafuta inoda kutengerwa zvinhu kana kuti ma parts kubva kunze kwenyika saka zviri kuvatorera nguva yakareba kuti vawane mvumo yekuburitsa mari iyi kubva kubhanga guru renyika reRBZ. Kubva pakatanga kunetsa kushayikwa mari kumabhanga, RBZ yakabva yatora danho rekuti vese vanoda kutenga zvinhu kunze vanofanira kutanga vapihwa mvumo neRBZ. Zvichakadai, tsvangiridzo yaitwa neStudio 7 yaburitsa pachena kuti zvimwe zviteshi zvinotengesa mafuta edzimotokari zvavekuti munhu awedzere imwe mari pamusoro kana achishandisa kadhi rekubhanga pakutenga mafuta emotokari. Vashandi pane chimwe chiteshi chepeturu chiri pakati pedhorobha vati chikonzero chiri kuita kuti vaite izvi ndechekuti vanobatirwa mari kubhanga kana voda kutora mari iyi zvavati zvinoita kuti varuze mari yakawanda kana vasingawedzere mari shomanana pamusoro pemari yakatarwa kuti vatengese nayo mafuta edzimotokari. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nevasangano rinomirira vatengi reConsumer Council of Zimbabwe kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yoshorwa neKukundikana Kuumba Komiti Inoongorora Mauto, Mapurisa neVasori
text: Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvemitemo nemashandiro eparamende veVeritas vanoti kutadza kwehurumende kuzadzikisa bumbiro remutemo nekuumba komiti yakazvimirira yoga inoongorora mapurisa, mauto kana vasori vanenge vachipomerwa mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu ndizvo zviri kupa kuti vanhu vane hama dzinenge dzaurayiwa, kuitwa kafiramberi kana kubatwa chibharo i vatadze kumhan’ara nyaya dzavo. Komiti iyi yaifanira kunge yakaumbwa makore matanhatu apfuura kuzadzikisa chikamu chemazana maviri negumi kana kuti Section 210 yebumbiro remutemo. Veritas iri kushorawo dare reConstitutional Court nekutadza kuudza hurumende kuti itevedzere mutemo nekuumba komiti iyi kunyangwe muna 2015 VaDouglas Mahiya mutauriri wesangano reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association vakakwidza nyaya iyi kudare mushure mekushungurudzwa nemapurisa vachipomerwa mhosva yekuda kupidigura vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Asi gurukota rezvemutemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi varamba kuti hurumende iri kudya manonoko vachiti pane zvimwe zvakakosha zvayange ichiita zvakafanana nesarudzo . No media source currently available Asi gweta vari mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reHuman Rights watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica VaDewa Mavhinga vanoti hurumende inofanira kuumba komiti iyi nechimbi chimbi. No media source currently available VeHuman Rights Watch, Amnesty International neOxfam International vakatonyora tsamba yenyunyuto kumutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nenyaya yekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu iri kupomerwa vanodzivirira nyika iyi. VaMnangagwa vakadzoka kumusangano weAfrican Union nezuro.

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kuti Isabate Mutero paMari Inotambirwa neVashandi iri Pasi pePoverty Datum Line
text: Vashandi pamwe nedzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vari kutambira zvakasiyanasiyana hurongwa hwakaziviswa svondo rapera negurukota rezvehupfumi, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, hwekuti hurumende yakakwidza mari isingabatwe mutero kubva paZWL$75 000.00 pamwedzi kuenda paZWL$91 700.00 pamwedzi, kana kuti kubva paZWL$900 000.00 kuenda paZWL$1.1 million pagore. Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti iri idanho rakanakira vashandi chose, kunyange hazvo sesangano, vakanga vakurudzira Muzvinafundo Ncube kuti vashandi vanotambira mari iri pasi pemihoro yepasi pasi, kana kuti minimum wage, vasabatirwa mitero. Munyori mukuru wemubatanidzwa wemasangano evashandi vehurumende, weZimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Trade Unions (ZCPSTU) VaDavid Dzatsunga, vanoti sevashandi vanotambira chero danho rinotorwa nemushandirwi rekuona kuti mushandi asara aine mari muhomwe dzake. Asi VaDzatsunga vanoti sevashandi vehurumende havasi kufadzwa nekudzikira kwakaita mihoro yavo zvekuti vanototadza kubhadhara mitero sevamwe vashandi. Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti sesangano vanga vachitarisira kuti mari isingabatirwe mushandi mutero inge iri pasi peinodiwa nemhuri yevanhu vashanu pamwedzi kuti irarame, kana kuti pasi pePoverty Datum Line. VaMoyo vanoti pamire sangano ravo ndepekuti mari isingakwanise kuchengeta mhuri haifanirwe kunge ichibatirwa mutero. Ukuwo, Doctor Chitambara vanodzoka vachiti kusara kunoita vashandi vaine mari muhomwe dzavo kunoita kuti vaende kunotenga zvinhu kuzvitoro uko hurumende inozowana zvakare mari yakawanda kubva kune mimwe mitero yakaita seValue Added Tax, kana kuti VAT. Muna Gumiguru munhu mumwechete anonzi aida mari inoita ZWL$$28 144.00 pamwedzi kuti ararame, zvichireva kuti mhuri ine vanhu vashanu yaida mari inoita ZWL$140 720.00 pamwedzi kuti irarame. Asi vamwe vanoongorora zvehupfumi vanoti nekuda kwekukwira kunomboita inflation munyika, mari iyi painozotambirwa nevashandi gore rinouya inogona kunge isisina simba zvekuti inenge yangove yechirango. Muzvinafundo Ncube vakaudza paramende svondo rapera kuti hurumende yave kukwidza mari isingabatirwe mutero iyi mushure mekunge nhengo dzeparamende dzachema chema kwavari kuti vaone zvekuita sezvo vashandi vakanga vasisina chekusara nacho mushure mekubatirwa mitero. No media source currently available

headline: Vanotengesa muMigwagwa Vonetsana neVana Muzvinazvitoro
text: Munyika maita kusawirirana nenyaya yekuti poitwa sei nevanhu vanonzi vanodarika mamiriyoni mashanu nezviuru mazana manomwe avo vari kurarama nekutengesa zvinhu mumigwagwa nenyaya yekushaikwa kwemabasa kunyanya. Dzimwe nhengo dzedare reparamanende dziri kukurudzira hurumende nemakanzuru kuti vabvise vanhu ava mumigwagwa sezvo vave kukonzera nyonga nyonga zviuru muHarare. Rimwe sangano ravana muzvinabhizimisi re Confederation of Zimbabwe Retailers rinotiwo riri kushaiswa hope nevanhu vanotengesa mumigwagwa ava sezvo vezvitoro vari kutadza kubhadhara mari dzemitero nevashandi nekutorerwa bhizimisi nevanotengesa mumigwagwa vasina chavari kubhadhara kuhurumende. Asi gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vakatiwo hurumende ine hurongwa hwekutanga kubhadharisa vanhu ava mari dzemitero. Mukuru wesangano reNational Vendors Union Zimbabwe, VaSamuel Wadzai, vanoti hurumende haifanire kuvadzinga vasina kwekuendeswa. Asi vamwe vakavamba sangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers, VaGift Juawo, vanoti panodiwa kutauriranwa kuti dambudziko iri dzigadziriswe sezvo vemabhizimisi vari kurasikirwa nebhizimisi nekuda kwevari kutebngesa mumigwagwa. No media source currently available

headline: VaBiden Votarisirwa Kutora Mhiko Pasina Ruzhinji neNyaya yeCovid-19
text: Pane hurongwa hwekuti vakasarudzwa kutungamira nyika yeAmerica VaJoe Biden vachatoreswa mhiko musi wa 20 Ndira gore rinouya vanhu vasina kuungana paWashington Mall muguta reWashington DC sezvinoitwa makore ose nekuda kwekupararira zvakanyanya kwechirwere checoronavirus. Hurongwa uhu hunonzi huchaitwa padandemutande kana kuti Virtual Inauguration. VaBiden vanenge vachitora mhiko semutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica wechimakumi mana nematanhatu. VaBiden nevamwe vanyarikani vashoma shoma nevanhu vashoma vachatora mhiko pamberi pemukova wedare reparamende kana kuti Congress sechigariro vozofamba nemugwagwa, Pennsylvania Avenue, kuenda kumuzinda weWhite House. Gadziriro yehurongwa uhu yatotanga muWashington DC pachiiswa zvivakwa zvakasiyana siyana. Mutungamiri wenyika VaDonald Trump havasati vatenda kuti vakakundwa sarudzo uye vamwe vanoti vacharegedza kuenda panenge pachitoreswa mhiko VaBiden inova tsika inoremekedzwa pakutambidzana masimba muAmerica. VaTrump vari kufungidzirwa kuti vachaita musangano neveruzhinji musi uyu muchinangwa chekuda kutotanga gadziriro yekukwikwidzazve musarudzo dzemuna 2024. Zvichakadaro VaBiden vari kutarisirwa kudoma vaive mukuru wemauto vari pamudyandigere Retired U.S. Army General Lloyd Austin kuti vave munhu mutema wekutanga kuve gurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika.

headline: Tine mukana: Antipas
text: Inn — Joey Antipas — anoti mwaka wemutambo weCastle Premiership uchiri wakavhurika zvikuru uye chikwata chake chicharwisa semvumba zvikwata zviri pamusoro zvinoti FC Platinum neNgezi Platinum kusvika kumagumo chichirwira mukombe uyu.   Mutambo uyu uri kusimudzirwa svondo rino mushure mekunge wambomira panguva yemid-season break kwemasvondo maviri adarika.   Zvikwata zvose zvange zvichigadzirira zvakasimba nekuti mitambo 17 yasara ichange yakaomarara sezvo zvimwe zvichange zvichirwira kuti zvisaburistwe muligi iri kozoti zvimwe zvichirwira mukombe.   Pari zvino FC Platinum neNgezi Platinum ndizvo zvikwata zviri pamusoro uye vatsigiri venhabvu vazhinji vari kuona sekuti pakati pezviviri izvi ndipo pane chichatora mukombe mwaka uno.   Asi, Antipas ari kuramba mafungiro akadai aya achiti chikwata chake chicharwa zvekudambuka makumbo segurwe chichirwirawo mukombe uyu.   “Nhabvu inogona kushanduka pamusingafungire muchiti mukombe waenda asi chandinoziva munozopembera pakupedzisira nekuti kutaura kuno hatizive kuti mukombe uri kuenda kupi.   “Isu sechikwata ticharwa kusvika kumagumo, iye zvino hatizive kuti zvichabuda pakupedzisira ndezvipi,” anodaro.   Svondo rino maGamecocks – sezita remadunhurirwa reChicken Inn – ari kusangana neDynamos ‘DeMbare’ musi weSvondo kunhandare yeRufaro Stadium muHarare.   Antipas anoti mutambo uyu mukuru kuchikwata chake uye vari kuugadzirira semagadziriro avanoita mimwe mitambo yese.   “Semazuva ese isu tinogadzirira mitambo nekuuya kwainenge ichiita, saka hatisi kunyanya kufunga zvekumberi asi zvemutambo weDynamos watakatarisana nawo wesvondo rino,” anodaro.   Murairidzi weCAPS UNITED, Lloyd Chitembwe, akatsinhirawo mashoko aAntipas achiti rwendo rwekurwira mukombe weCastle Premiership rwuchiripo uye chikwata chake chiri kushanda zvakasimba kuti chidzore mukombe uyo wachakahwina mugore ra2016.   “Hatimhanye kufunga zvekuhwina mukombe chete, zvinoda zvakawanda uye zvinoda kushanda nesimba muchigadzirisa zviri kudiwa kuti basa rifambe.   “Nyaya hombe kushanda nesimba sechikwata kuti zvatinenge tichida zvigoitika. Tikaramba tichishanda nesimba ndinoziva kuti tinokunda chete hapana zvinomboramba.   “Mujaho uchiripo hausati wapera, hatizive kuti mune ramangwana zvichafamba sei,” anodaro Chitembwe.   Chikwata chaChitembwe svondo rino chiri kusangana neHarare City musi weMugovera kunhandare yeRufaro Stadium.   Mune mimwe mitambo iriko svondo rino muCastle Premiership, FC Platinum ichange iri pamusha kuMandava apo ichasangana neZPC Kariba.

headline: ZIMPARKS Yogura Zvipembere Nyanga Kudzivirira Kuurayiwa Zviri Kunze kweMutemo neVanotsvaga Nyanga
text: Zimbabwe Parks and Wildlife Management Authority, ZIMPARKS, yakaparura zvakare chirongwa chekugura zvipembere nyanga senzira yekudzivirira kuurayiwa kwazvo nevanovhima zvipembere vachida nyanga dzazvo. Mutauriri weZIMPARKS, VaTinashe Farawo, vanoti izvi zvinhu zvavagara vachiita nguva nenguva, uye gore rino vari kuronga kubvisa zvipembere chiuru nyanga, vachitanga nezviri ku Lake Chiwero. VaFarawo vanoti nyanga dziri kubviswa pazvipembere izvi dzichachengetwa kudura ravanochengetera nyanga dzezvipembere kubva mugore ra 1975. Vanonyika yasarirwa nezvipembere zvinosvika chiuru nemazana maviri chete, izvo zviri kuita kuti vakwanise kufambisa chirongwa chekugura nyanga ichi zviri nyore. Asi VaFarawo vanoti izvi hazvisi nyore kuitwa kunzou nekuti nyika ine nzou dzakawandisa zvakanyanya. No media source currently available

headline: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri muAmerica Zvawaniswa Mukana Weku Tenga Dzimba ne Steward Bank
text: No media source currently available Bhanga re Steward Bank rinoti rine hurongwa hwekuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muAmerica zvikwanise kutenga dzimba pasina kusungirwa kubhadhara zvikamu kubva muzana zvemari yemba inenge ichida kutengwa. ​Mumwe weavo vari kuronga chirongwa ichi muAmerica vakamirira Steward Bank, muzvare Revesayi Nyahasha, vanoti vachange vachiparura chirongwa ichi kuzvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kuDallas Texas neMugovera. Izvi zvinotevera chirongwa chekutanga chakaitirwa muWashington DC neChishanu chapfuura. Muzvare Nyahasha vanoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vawane pekusvikira kana vachinge vashanya kumusha pavanoti pavo, uye vanokwanisawo kuchengeta hama dzavo mudzimba idzi dzinenge dziri mumazita avo. "Chirongwa ichi chirikutambirwa zvakanaka chaizvo muAmerica uye tiri kushandisa chizvino zvino chema Apps mukubatsira vanenge vachida kupinda muchirongwa ichi padandemutande. Vanokwanisa kushandisa app yedu mukuvhura bhuku rekubhangi yedu uye mukuzo tenga imba pasi pechirongwa chedu ichi," Muzvare Nyahasha vaudza Studio 7.

headline: Vamwe Votsigira Danho reMDC Rekuratidzira, Vamwe Vachiti Bato iri Ngaribatane neVamwe muNhaurirano
text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMDC, VaNelson Chamisa vakazivisa nezuro kuti bato ravo rave kuzopinda mumigwagwa richiratidzira pamusoro pemabatirwo avakati ari kuitwa nyaya dzehupfumi hwenyika nehurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa.  VaChamisa vakataura mashoko aya pamusangano wavakaita nevatori venhau muHarare neChitatu, vakati misangano yavakaita nenhengo dzavo mumatunhu gumi emunyika yakavaratidza kuti vanhu vaneta nekuparara kwehupfumi.  Mutungamiri weMDC uyu akati vatsigiri vebato rake vave kuda kuti vapinde mumigwagwa, vachiti iyi ndiyo chete nzira yekugadzirisa nayo zvinetswa izvi.  Mushure memusangano uyu, vechidiki veMDC mudunhu reHarare vakabva vapinda mumigwagwa vachiratidzira vachikurudzira kuti VaMnangagwa vasiye basa. Varatidzira ava vakazoparadzwa nemapurisa achishandisa utsi hunokachidza.  Zvichitevera mashoko aya, pave nemaonero akasiyana pamusoro pedanho riri kukurudzirwa navatsigiri veMDC iri, vamwe vachiti pane nzira dzakawanda kwazvo dzekugadzirisa nadzo matambudziko ari munyika dzisiri kupinda mumigwagwa.  Ukuwo, vamwe vari kuti mutauro unonzwisiswa nehurumende chete ndewekuti vanhu vapinde mumigwagwa, uye izvi zvinobvumirwa mubumbiro remitemo yenyika.  Mukuru weCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu ndemumwe wevari kukurudzira kuti vanhu varatidzire murunyararo, vachiti hapana chinobatika chati chaitwa nehurumende mukuratidza kuti ine zvairi kuita mukugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika.  Asi izvi zvinoshoropodzwa nasachigaro vevechidiki vebato reZanu PF mudunhu reHarare, VaAlex Gakanje, avo vanotsoropodza pfungwa yaVaMaguwu yekuti vanhu varatidzire, vachiti VaMaguwu vari kufurira vanhu kuti vapinde mumigwagwa vachityora mutemo.  Asi VaMaguwu vanoti chinhu chinozivikanwa nemunhu wese kuti kubva muna 2000 nyika haina kwairi kuenda, iri kungotenderera panzvimbo imwechete nekuti hurumende iri kungoramba ichipa pfungwa dzisina zvadzinobatsira nyika nazvo. VaGakanje vanoti mhirizhonga iri kukurudzirwa neMDC iyi inotora hupenyu hwevanhu vanenge vaiswa pamhene nemaitiro akadai. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vokurudzirwa Kuvhenekwa Chirwere cheShuga neKudya Zvine Hutano
text: Zimbabwe nhasi yatabatana nenyika dzepasi rese kucherechedza zuva rechirwere cheshuga kana kuti World Diabetes Day veruzhinji vachikurudzirwa kuvhenekwa navanachiremba, kudya chikafu chine hutano uye chinoita kuti vasabatwe nedenda iri. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzashandisa zuva ranhasi kuongorora vanhu pachena pamwe nekuvadzidzisa pamusoro pudenda iri. Mumwe murapi pane chimwe chipatara chakazvimirira muHarare, Amai Fungai Priscillar Gomba vati hirwere cheshuga chiriri kupararira munyika asi munhu anogona kurarama pasina dambudziko kana atavedza dzidziso kubva kunana chiremba. Vanoti zvimwe zvikonzero zvinoita kuti vanhu vabatwe shuga kana kuti diabetes inyaya yekuzvarwa mumhuri ine nhoorondo yechirwere ichi, mararamire anoita munhu nechikafu chaanodya kana kuti kuti Lifestyle pachirungu. Vaenderera mberi vachiti vashandisa zuva ranhasi kungorora vanhu kuti vane denda iri here pamwe nekuti vangararame sei vasingapinde munjodzi. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzekuongorora zvirwere, VaEdmore Mahureva, vanoti vashandisa zuva ranhasi kuita ongororo dzakaita seHBCa1 yekungoora shuga yemunhu mukati memwedzi mitatu yapfuura uye vaita izvi pachena vachiti zvinobatsira kuti munhu azive pamire nedenda iri. Mutungamiriri wesangano remachiremba anoshanda akazvimirira, re Medical and Dental Private Practitioners Association Dr Johannes Marisa kuti nhasi vange vachibatsirawo vanhu pachena kuti vasafe nedenda iri. Amai Maonei Tiki avo vakabatwa shuga muna Chikumi gore rino uye vakatobviswa gumbo nekuda kwedenda iri vanoti vafara chose neruzivo rwavawana nhasi. Ambuya Agnes Zioni ndevamwe vari kurarama nedenda iri uye vanoti zvakakosha kutevedza dzidziso yanachiremba. Gore rapfuura, shuga yakauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvitatu nemazana manomwe kana kuti 3,400 uye zvinofundidzirwa kuti denda iri rinobata munhu mumwe chete pavanhu gumi pasi rese. Zuva reWorld Diabetes Day iro rinocherechedzwa musi 14 Mbudzi, racherechedzwa pasi pendingindira rine chinangwa chekuti vanhu vawane zivo yakakwana kuti vakwanise kurapwa nekuita kurarama nzira dzinoita kuti denda iri risarambe richipararira kana kuti Education to Protect Tomorrow, Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi kana mashoko ehurumende pazuva iri sezvo mutauriri webazi iri VaDonald Mujiri vange vasati vapindura mibvunzo yedu patataenda pamhepo.

headline: Murairidzi mutsva wemaWarriors nhasi: ZIFA
text: MUTUNGAMIRI wesangano reZimbabwe Football Association (ZIFA) – Felton Kamambo – anoti murairidzi mutsva wechikwata chenyika chemaWarriors ari kugadzwa nhasi kuti ambofanobata chigaro chakasiiwa naZdravko ‘Loga’ Logarusic mushure mekunge vapedza kuita hurukuro naye.   Zvichitevera kudzinga kwavakaita basa Loga nemusi weSvondo, Kamambo audza Kwayedza kuti vari mushishi kuita hurukuro nevarairidzi vachitsvaga anombofanobata basa iri kwekanguva kadiki.   “Tiri pakati pekuita hurukuro iye zvino nevarairidzi vakasiyana apo tiri kutsvaga wekufanopa basa iri. Asi nhasi tichazivisa kuti ndiani murairidzi mutsva wemaWarriors.   “Handisati ndave kukwanisa kutaura zita rake iye zvino kuti ndiyani sezvo tichiri pakati pekutaurirana, saka kana tawirirana tozozivisa nyika yose.   “Murairidzi uyu toda kuti zvizivikanwe kuti achange akafanobata chigaro ichi, apo isu tichitsvaga watichazopa basa iri kuti agotsive Loga,” anodaro Kamambo.   Loga akadzingwa basa musi weSvondo wadarika mushure mekunge atadza basa. Akarairidza maWarriors mitambo 14 ndokukundwa misere, akaita mangange mishanu ndokungohwina mumwe chete.

headline: Chevrons, Ireland zvotatsurana
text: CHIKWATA chenyika checricket chemaChevrons, svondo rino chiri kubandana neIreland mumitambo yeOne Day International.   Zvikwata zviviri izvi svondo radarika zvakatamba mitambo yeTwenty20 International Series iyo yakahwinwa nemaChevrons 2-1.   Mumitambo yeT20, maChevrons akahwina wekutanga, Ireland ndokuzohwina wechipiri uye maChevrons akahwina wechitatu uyo wakaaona achisimudza mukombe weT20.   Svondo rino, zvikwata izvi zviri kutatsurana mumitambo yeODI kunhandare yeHarare Sports Club. Mutambo wekutanga uri kutambwa nemusi weChitatu, wechipiri nemusi weMugovera uye wekupedzisira nemusi weMuvhuro (23 Ndira).   MaChevrons anotofanira kukunya dzisimbe kuti akunde mumutambo weODI uyu obva ahwina series yese inoti yeT20 neODI.   Achipedza kubandana neIreland, maChevrons haasi kumbozorora sezvo ari kubva atanga gadziriro dzekusangana neWest Indies mwedzi unotevera mumitambo miviri yetest match kuQueens Sports Club kuBulawayo.   Director wecricket kuZimbabwe Cricket (ZC) — Hamilton Masakadza — anoti nguva yange yareba chikwata chavo chisina kumbotamba mitambo yetest match.   Anoti vakagadzirira kusangana neWest Indies uye chikwata chavo chinoda kuhwina mutambo uyu.   “Tine mufaro kukuzivisai kuti tichashanyirwa neWest Indies iyo yatichatamba nayo mitambo miviri yetest match kuBulawayo.   “Kunyangwe hazvo nguva yange yareba tisina kumbotamba mitambo yetest match, vakomana vedu vachange vaine hukasha vakagadzirira kutamba mitambo iyi. Ndinovimba kuti mumwe mutambo mukuru nechimwe chikwata chikuru uri kurongwa,” anodaro Masakadza.   Zvikwata zviviri izvi zvakapedzisira kusangana mumitambo yetest match series mugore ra2017 iyo yakapera iri mangange.   Asi, mutambo wakazopihwa West Indies kuti yahwina sezvo yainge yakakunda mutambo wekutanga ne117 runs.   MaChevrons akapedzisira kutamba mutambo wetest match mugore ra2021 apo akasangana neBangladesh muHarare.

headline: Chikumbiro chaHopewell Chin'ono Chinoramba Kutambirwa neDare
text: Dare ramajisitireti rarasa nhasi chikumbiro chemutori wenhau ane mukurumbira munyika, Hopewell Chin’ono, chekuti mhosva yaari kupomerwa iraswe. Dare iri rati mhosva yake achatanga kutongwa musi wa12 kusvika musi 14 Chikunguru. Vachipa mutongo wavo nhasi, mutongi wedare, Amai Vongai Muchuchuti Guwuriro, vati kunyange hazvo nyaya iri kupomerwa Chin’ono isina kujeka, ichajekeswa apo paachatongwa. Rimwe remagweta aChin’ono, VaGift Mtisi, vati dare ichokwadi kuti dare harina kutambira chikumbiro chavo richiti huchapupu hwenyaya huchabuda paichatongwa nyaya iyi. VaMtisi vati vabvumirana nevachuchusi kuti nyaya iyi itongwe muna Chikunguru. Chin’ono, uyo achatongwa achibva kumba kwake mushure mekubhadhara mari yechibatiso, ari kuramba nyaya iyi achiti ikodzero yake semutapi wenhau kufambisa mashoko. Chin’ono anonzi akakurudzira veruzhinji kuratidzira zvine mhirizhonga musi wa31 Chikunguru gore raperaachishandisa dandemutande rake reTwitter. Anonzi akaita izvi pamwe naVaJacob Ngarivhume nevamwe vakaita semumiriri weZengeza West, uye vari mutevedzeri wasachigaro weMDC Alliance, VaJob Sikhala, avo vari kumatarewo nemhosva imwe cheteyo. Mapurisa arambidza zvakare magweta aChin’ono kutaura nevatori venhau pasina chikonzero. Mukuru weMedia Institute of Southern Africa-Zimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvinosuwisa kuti Chin’ono ava kutongwa nekuda kwebasa rake. Zvichakadai, mutori wenhau anoshanda akazvimirira, Jeffrey Moyo, asungwa nemapurisa uye pari zvino ari mumaoko emapurisa paHarare Central Police Station. Moyo ari kubatsirwa nemagweta, Amai Beatrice Mtetwa naVaDougie Coltart, uye VaColart vaudza Studio7 kuti hazvisati zvajeka kuti Moyo asungirwei. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, vati tivabate mangwana panyaya iyi. Zvichakadai VaMoyo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende inofanira kusiya vatapi venhau vachishanda vakasununguka. Pataenda pamhepo Jeffrey Moyo ange achiri kukamba yemapurisa paHarare Central. No media source currently available

headline: VaZuma Voendeswa kuMatare
text: Masangano maviri ezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe aendesa kudare repamusoro muSouth Africa mutungamiri wenyika iyi, VaJacob Zuma, achida kuti vadzike mutemo wechimbichimbi nekutonga nemauto kana kuti State of Emmergency munzvimbo dzaberekera ingwe muSouth Africa. Nzvimbo idzi, Durban neJohannesburg dzanga dziine mhirizhonga iri kuitwa kune zvizvarwa zvekunze nezvizvarwa zvemuSouth Africa. Masangano eZimbabwe Exiles Forum neBlack Business Forum Zimbabwe akakwidza nyaya iyi kudare repamusoro muSouth Africa sezvinodiwa nebumbiro remutemo wenyika iyi. Masangano aya anoda kuti hurumende yeSouth Africa isungewo mambo wevanhu verudzi rweZulu, Goodwill Zwelithini, nemwanakomana waVaZuma, Edward, avo vanonzi vakapesvedzera mhirizhonga. Asi muzvinafundo munyaya dzemitemo, uye vari mutungamiri we National Constitutional Assembly, VaLovemore Madhuku, vanoti zvinonetsa zvikuru panyaya yakadai kuti matare ati VaZuma vasungirwe kuita zviri kudiwa nemasangano aya. VaMadhuku vanoti masangano aya anofanira kuva nehumbowo hwakasimba nekuti matare kazhinji haadi kuonekwa achipindira munyaya dzekutongwa kwenyika. Mashoko aVaMadhuku atsinhirwawo nerimwe gweta, VaTerrence Hussein, avo vati matare anowanzoita pfungwa dzekuti kana vanhu vasarudza mutungamiri wenyika, vanenge vaine chivimbo nematanho aanotora munguva dzakaoma nekudaro vanowanzogeza maoko sapirato panyaya dzine chekuita nemutungamiri wenyika. Asi rimwe gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, uye vari chipangamazano musangano re Human Rights Watch, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti masangano aya anogona kubudirira nekuti VaZuma vakaita hwakamba vachinonoka kugadzirisa dambudziko iri. Munyori musangano reBlack Business Forum Zimbabwe, VaWashington Mehlomakulu, vanoti hurumende yeSouth Africa haisi kutevedzera bumbiro remitemo mukupedza mhirizhonga iri munyika iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Vatatu vorwira Golden Boot yeUS$6 375
text: MWAKA wenhabvu wa2022 wave pedyo nekusvika kwamvura yacheka makumbo uye vatsigiri vemutambo uyu vakavhura maziso vachida kuona kuti ndiani achahwina mubairo mukuru weSoccer Star of the Year neweGolden Boot.   Mukombe wePremier Soccer League wakatohwinwa kare neFC Platinum saka kwasara mibairo inosanganisirawo wevarairidzi weCoach of the Year.   Mwaka uno, mutambi achahwina mubairo weGolden Boot achapihwa US$6 375. Izvi zvakaziviswa namarketing manager wePSL, Rodwell Thabe, svondo radarika.   “Mutambi achahwina Golden Boot mwaka uno achaenda kumba kwake neUS$6 375,” anodaro.   Kusvika pari zvino, zvikwata zvese zvemuPSL zvanwisa ka556 mumitambo 32 yatambwa apo FC Platinum ndiyo iri kutungamira pakunwisa izvo zvaiona ichinwisa ka48. Kuchiti murwendo rwekurwira Golden Boot, mutambi weCAPS United – William Manondo – ndiye ari kutungamira pakurwira mubairo uyu izvo zvamuona achinwisa ka15 mumitambo 32 yatambwa.    Walter Musona   Pasara mitambo miviri chete kuti mitambo yePSL ichipera mwaka uno. Manond o anote ve r w a naWalter Musona weFC Platinum uyo akwanisa kunwisa ka12.    Brian Muza   Kuchiti Brian Muza weChicken Inn, uyo akambotungamira pakunwisa, anofungidzirwawo kuti mumwe wevanogona kuhwina mubairo uyu apo akagara pechitatu sezvo akwanisa kunwisa ka10

headline: ZC yamirira Afghanistan
text: SANGANO reZimbabwe Cricket (ZC) rinoti rakanyorera kuHurumende richikumbira mvumo yekuti mutambo wemaChevrons neAfghanistan uenderere mberi mukupera kwemwedzi uno.   Izvi zvinotevera kuziviswa kwakaitwa nesangano reInternational Cricket Council (ICC) nguva pfupi yadarika kuti riri kuronga kudzosa mutambo uyu sezvo mitambo pasi rose yaive yambomiswa senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19.   Nyika zhinji dzakatotanga kuita gadziriro yecricket kusanganisira maChevrons ayo akatanga gadziriro dzawo dzekusangana neAfghanistan nguva yadarika.   Chikwata chemaChevrons chinofanirwa kusangana neAfghanistan uye neIndia asi mutambo weIndia wakambomiswa sezvo nyika iyi ichiti haisati yatora danho rekuti mitambo yakasiyana ichitanga zvakare.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, mutauriri weZC Darlington Majonga anoti sangano ravo riri kumhanya-mhanya kugadzirira kuti panouya chikwata cheAfghanistan pasawanikwe chinokanganisa mutambo wezvikwata zviviri izvi.   “Takanyorera kuHurumende yedu tichizivisa nezvemutambo uyu saka takamirira kunzwa kubva kwavari kuti vanotitendera here kuti uendere mberi. Isuwo kudivi kwedu tiri kumhanya-mhanya kugadzirisa zvose zvinodiwa kuti mutambo ugotambwa zvakanaka pasina chinokanganisa kana chinoita kuti denda recoronavirus ritapukire,” anodaro Majonga.   Kana Hurumende ikatendera kuti mutambo uyu uenderere mberi, chikwata cheAfghanistan chinenge chave kutarisirwa kusvika muno masvondo maviri anotevera.   Panouya chikwata ichi, vatambi vacho vachambogara mazuva 14 kunzvimbo yavo voga vachiongororwa kuti havana here hutachiona hwecoronavirus sezvinodiwa nemutemo wenyika ino.   Majonga anoti gwaro rakabva kuICC rinoti zvikwata zvinoenda kunosangana nedzimwe nyika, vatambi vacho vanosvika vachimbogara mazuva 14 vari kwavo voga vachiongororwa utano hwavo.   “Mutemo wavepo uri kungoitwa kunyika dzese, Afghanistan painosvika kuno vatambi uye nevarairidzi vacho vese vanosvika vombogara mazuva 14 mu’quarantine’. Izvi tiri kuzviita senzira yekubatsira kuti coronavirus isapararire saka tiri kutevedzera mitemo yese yeWHO, yeHurumende uye neyeICC,” anodaro Majonga.   Zvakadai, ZC yakazivisawo kuti sangano iri nereCricket Australia zvakawirirana kuti mutambo wezvikwata zvavo weOne Day International uyo waifanirwa kutambwa munaNyamavhuvhu umbomiswa nekuda kwezvikonzero zvakasiyana.   Akafanobata chigaro chamanaging director weZC, Givemore Makoni anoti, “Tange tichitarisira chaizvo kusangana neAustralia asi tichitarisa mamiriro akazvakaita takazviona zvakakodzera kumbomisa mutambo toronga patsva mamwe mazuva ekuutamba.”   Achitaurawo chamangwiza weCricket Australia, Nick Hockley anoti, “Takanetseka kuti takasvika pakukanzura mutambo uyu, asi CA neZC takawirirana kuti ndiyo nzira yekutora kuti tikwanise kuchengetedza hupenyu hwevatambi vedu, vatsigiri uye vanoshanda vachibatsira pakuronga mitambo.   “Isu takazvipira kuramba tichishanda neZimbabwe Cricket pakuronga mazuva matsva ekutamba mutambo uyu.”

headline: MaPlatinum obandana
text: KUCHANGE kusingadanwe anonzwa nemusi weSvondo kunhandare yeMandava Stadium, kuZvishavane uko FC Platinum neNgezi Platinum Stars zvichabandana mumutambo weChibuku Super Cup final.   Rwendo rwekusvika pafainari iyi rwange ruri rurefu sezvo pakatanga mutambo uyu munaChivabvu, wakambomiswa mitambo iri pakati pekutambwa munaChikumi senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Mutambo uyu mukuru sezvo uchiuya netikiti rekuzokwikwidza mumitambo yemuAfrica yaCAF Confederations Cup.   Zvikwata zviviri izvi zvose zvakambohwina mukombe weChibuku Super Cup final kare saka zvichange zvichirwira kuti zvigousimudza kechipiri.   FC Platinum yakahwina mukombe uyu muna2014 apo yakakunda Harare City mufainari 3-1 kumapena mushure mekunge mutambo uyu wapera uri mangange 1-1.   Kuchiti mugore ra2016, Ngezi yakazvambaradza FC Platinum 3-1 ndokuhwina mukombe uyu mumutambo wakatambirwa kuBaobab Stadium.   Zvikwata zviviri izvi zvaive muboka rimwe chete reGroup 4 umo maive nezvimwe zvinoti Triangle United neWhawha FC. Mubati wepagedhi weFC Platinum arizve kaputeni, Petros Mhari, anoti zvinofadza zvikuru kutamba mumutambo mukuru wefainari.   Mhari, uyo aive muchikwata cheFC Platinum chakahwina mukombe uyu mugore ra2014 necha2016 icho chakazvamburwa neNgezi, anoti mitambo yefainari haisi nyore sezvo zvikwata zvese zvinenge zvichida kuhwina.   “Mitambo yefainari yose yakaoma zvikuru nekuti zvikwata zvinopindamo zvinenge zvabva kure uye zvese zvinoda kuhwina. “Asi isu sechikwata kusvika patave kurakidza kuti takabva kure naizvozvo zvinofadza zvikuru uye tichashanda nesimba kuti tigohwina mutambo uyu uyo tinoziva kuti unenge wakaoma.   “Hatifanire kutarisira pasi Ngezi nekuti chikwata chikuru chatinoziva chinogona uye takambosangana nacho kare mufainari chikambotikunda. Saka mutambo uyu uchange wakaomarara zvikuru. Chikuru isu sechikwata chatiri kutarisira kuhwina mutambo wemusi weSvondo, zvimwe zvese tinozotarisa zvichazotevera,” anodaro Mhari.   Kuchitiwo nekune rimwe divi, murairidzi weMadamburo – sezita remadunhurirwa reNgezi Platinum Stars – Rodwell Dhlakama, ari kunyunyuta zvikuru nekufamba kwakanyanya kwakaita chikwata chake apo chakatarisana nemutambo.   Chikwata ichi chakaenda kuBulawayo chichida kunosangana neHighlanders mumutambo usina kuzoenderera mberi nekuda kwevaridzi vepembe vakamboramwa basa, ndokuzouya kuHarare kuzotamba semi-final yemutambo uyu neHighlanders uyo chakahwina.   Vachipedza, vakabva vadzokera kuBulawayo zvakare kumutambo wePremier Soccer League neHighlanders uyo wakapera uri mangange 0-0. Dhlakama anoti mutambo wavo wekupedzisira wakaona vatambi vazhinji vakaita saWellington Taderera, Keith Murera, Ariel Makopa naNelson Chadya vachikuvara izvo zviri kudzosera gadziriro dzavo kumashure.   “Rwendo rwedu kusvika pamutambo uyu rwange ruri rurefu kunyangwe zvazvo tiri kugadzirira hedu. Asi, gadziriro dzedu dzakadzorerwa kumashure nekuda kwekukuvara kwakaita vatambi vedu vazhinji. Tiri kuvatarisa kusvika musi weSvondo kuti vanenge vave papi sezvo vakatikoshera.   “Asi hatitye hedu kupinda mumutambo uyu nekuti nhandare yacho tave kuiziva sezvo tatambira mitambo yedu mizhinji ikoko saka tichanorwa semvumba.   “Mutambo uyu uchange wakakosha nekuti unenge uine vatsigiri sezvo pataitamba mitambo yemuboka redu vatsigiri vange vasingatenderwi kupinda munhandare nekuda kwemitemo ine chekuita nekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda reCovid-19,” anodaro Dhlakama.   Chikwata chichahwina mukombe uyu gore rino chinopihwa mari inosvika US$75 000 uye chinenge chakundwa chichiwana US$50 000.

headline: Ishe Charumbira Vanoudzwa neDare Kuti Madzishe Haapindiri Munyaya dzeMatongerwo eNyika
text: Mutongi wedare repamusoro, VaClement Phiri, vakatura mutongo neChitatu wekuti Ishe Fortune Charumbira vakatyora mutemo apo vakataura mashoko ekuti madzishe anotsigira bato riri kutonga reZanu-PF. Dare iri rakati Ishe Charumbira vanofanirwa kurangwa nemitemo yezvematunhu. VaPhiri vakapawo Ishe Charumbira mazuva manomwe ekuti vaudze vanhu kuburikidza nemapepanhau, nhepfenyuro nepaterevhizheni kuti hapana ishe anofanira kutora divi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Dare iri rakakomekedza kuti Ishe Charumbira vaburitse pachena kuti vakanganisa nekutaura kwavo kuti madzishe anotsigira bato riri kutonga. Bumbiro remutemo wenyika rinoti madzishe nemasabhuku havafanire kupindira munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika kunyange hazvo vamwe vavo vachiramba vachiita izvi. Nyaya iyi yakakwidzwa kumatare nesangano reElection Resource Center, ERC. Hatina kukwanisa kubata Ishe Charumbira sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembosha yavo. Mukuru weERC, VaTawanda Chimhini, vanoti vafara zvikuru nemutongo uyu vakati madzishe anofanira kutonga asina divi raanorerekera. No media source currently available

headline: Varairidzi Voronga Kuzivisa Hurumende neDanho reKuda Kuramwa Mabasa
text: Varairidzi vari pasi pemubatanidzwa mutsva weFederation of Zimbabwe Educators’ Unions (FOZEU) vanoti vari kuronga kusvitsa kuhurumende neChitatu tsamba yekuzivisa nezvekuronga kuramwa mabasa panovhurwa zvikoro mwedzi unouya. Masangano evaraidzi mashanu anoti Zimbabwe Teachers Association (ZIMTA), Progressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe (PTUZ), Amalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe (ARTUZ), Professional Educators’ Union of Zimbabwe (PEUZ), neZimbabwe National Teachers’ Union (ZINATU), akabatana akaumba mubatanidzwa unonzi Federation of Zimbabwe Educators’ Unions (FOZEU) senzira yekurwira kodzero dzavo. Varairidzi ava vanoti zvichemo zvavo hazvisi kunyanyonzwikwa kana vakaenda kunhaurirano sevashandi vehurumende pasi Apex Council, iyo inomirira vashandi vehurumende vose, izvo zvakaita kuti vade kuzvimirira voga. Mutungamiri wePTUZ, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vanoti vakaita zvose zvinotarisirwa mukuedza kuti vataurirane nehurumende, asi hapana chinoratidza kuti hurumende iri kutirimuka. Vanotiwo hurongwa hwekuti vashandi vehurumende vakwanise kuita hurukuro dzemihoro, kana kuti collective bargaining, hunonzi hwakapasiswa nedare remakurukota inzira yehurumende yekuda kuedza kunyaradza varairidzi pamwe nevamwe vashandi vehurumende vari kurwira kuti vapiwe kodzero yavo iyi, iyo iri mubumbiro remitemo. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Alliance Inodoma VaChamisa Kukwikwidza Musarudzo yeMutungamiri weNyika
text: MDC Alliance yadoma mutungamiri weMDC-T, VaNelson Chamisa, kuti vakwikwidze chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika zvichitevera kushaya kwaVaMorgan Tsvangirai. Pamusangano wavaita nevatori venhau muHarare neChishanu, mutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaWelshman Ncube, vati vanovimba naVaChamisa, kunyange hazvo muMDC T mune makakatanwa munyaya dzehutungamiri hwebato iri. VaChamisa vati vanonzwa kuzvininipisa zvikuru nebasa guru ravapiwa nemapato avari kushanda nawo. VaChamisa vatiwo MDC Alliance ine zvinhu zvitatu zvairi kuvimbisa vavhoti zvinoti shanduko yakakwana yechokwadi, kuwaniswa kwemikana kuvana veZimbabwe vese pamwe nebudiriro. VaChamisa vakumbirawo ruregerero nemabatirwo akaitwa vatori venhau nevechidiki mubato ravo. Vavimbisa kuti vari kuongorora nyaya iyi vakati havawirirani nekushungurudzwa kwevatori venhau. MDC Alliance ine mapato manomwe anoti MDC T, MDC yaVaNcube, People's Democratic Party, Transform Zimbabwe, Zimbabwe People First, Multi-Racial Democratic Party neZanu Ndonga. No media source currently available

headline: VaMownzora naVaMangwana Votatsurana neNyaya yeGwaro reVavhoti
text: Nyaya yekuti gwaro revavhoti riri kugadzirwa riri kuchengeterwa kupi uye kuti mapepa acho ekuvhotesa ari kudhindwa kupi yakonzera mutauro wakanyanya pakati peZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, nemapato anopikisa. MDC Alliance yakatoratidzira nemusi weChipiri ichitsutsumwa nenyaya iyi. Asi bato riri kutonga reZanu-PF rinoti harina dambudziko nemabatirwo ari kuitwa sarudzo neZEC. Masangano akazvimirira ari pasi peCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition anotiwo ZEC inofanira kubuda pachena kuti iri kufambisa sei nyaya yegwaro revavhoti uye Election Resource Centre yakatokwidza nyaya yekuti mapato ose aone gwaro revavhoti kudare repamusoro reHigh Court. Zimbabwe Election Support Network yaburitsawo mashoko kuvatori venhau nhasi ichiti chikamu 52 A chemutemo wesarudzo kana kuti Electoral Act chinosungira ZEC iudze vari kukwikwidza kuti mapepa ekuvhota ari kudhindirwa kupi uye nani. Sachigaro weZEC, Amai Prisciall Chigumba, vari kushorwa zvikuru nevanhu mushure mekunge vati gwaro revavhoti riri padandemutande ravo iro risipo. Munyori wezvemutemo muZanu-PF, VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana, vanoti vane chivimbo neZEC. Asi munyori mukuru muMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vanoti ZEC inofanira kutevera mutemo nekuita zvinhu pachena kuti vanhu vave nechivimbo nesarudzo. No media source currently available

headline: Jordan Zemura anotambira mari shoma
text: MUTAMBI wenhabvu weAFC Bournemouth nemaWarriors eZimbabwe – Jordan Zemura (22) – ndiye ari kutambira mari shoma kuchikwata chake mwaka uno apo chiri kukwikwidza muEnglish Premier League.   Mutsvakurudzo, zvaonekwa kuti Zemura, uyo akasaina chibvumirano chake kuBournemouth achiri kutambira chikwata chevadiki, anotambira mari inosvika £385 pasvondo.   Mari yaanotambira iyi yakaderera zvikuru kana ichienzaniswa nevamwe vatambi vemuchikwata chake vakadai saJefferson Lerma uyo anotambira mari inosvika £55 000 pasvondo.   Tichitarisa mari inotambirwa naZemura, zvinoreva kuti pamwedzi anotambira £1 432 uye mwaka wose achitambira £17 184.   Mari yaanotambira mwaka wose haisvike pane inotambirwa naLerma yepasvondo rimwe chete.   Muchikwata ichi zvekare, vamwe vatambi vakadai saDominic Solanke vanonzi vanotambira mari inosvika £50 000 pasvondo, kuchiti Phillip naLewis Cook vanotambira £40 000 pasvondo pamumwe nemumwe wavo.    Mari dzinotambirwa nevatambi veBournemouth – (spotrac.com)   Asi pane tarisiro yekuti Bournemouth ichatanga kuita hurukuro naZemura munguva inotevera kuti iwedzere kondirakiti yake iyo inotarisirwa kupera gore rinotevera. Mutambi uyu ari kutarisirwa kutamba zvikuru mwaka uno sezvo achidiwa zvakanyanya naScott Parker uyo aimushandisa mwaka wadarika apo vakahwina tikiti rekupinda muEPL.

headline: Doctor Magaisa Voitwa Gamba reVanhu neMasangano Akazvimirira
text: Gweta raive nemukurumbira, Dr Alex Magaisa, avo vakashaya nemusi wesvondo kuBritain nhasi vapihwa ruremekedzo rwegamba revanhu, People’s Hero, nerimwe sangano ravakatanga muZimbabwe, reConstitutional Law Centre, uye sangano iri ratara mazuva mashanu ekuvachema kutanga nhasi. Munyori weCLC zvakare vari mukuru weZimrights, VaDzikamai Bere, vaudza vatori venhau kuti mukati memazuva mashanu aya kutanga nhasi, pachaitwa zvirongwa zvakawanda zvekurangarira mushakabvu nemabasa. Nhasi manheru nenguva dza7 padandemutande reTwitter Spaces reCLC pachataura rimwe gweta rine mukurumbira, VaBrian Kagoro, uye mangwana na5 manheru pachaitwa Public Lecture apo pachataura gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, Amai Beatrice Mtetwa, avo vakashandawo naVaMagaisa. VaBere vanoti nemusi weChishanu pachaitwawo munamato wekurangarira VaMagaisa uyo uchange uchitungamirirwa nemumwe murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu, VaDeprose Muchena. Vatiwo vano kurudzira veruzhinji kuti vabude nehuwandu hwavo kunotambira mutumbi waVaMagaisa kuRobert Mugabe International apo uchauya kuzoradzikwa pazuva risati rataurwa nemhuri yavo. VaLovemore Kadenge avo vanobva kumusha kumwe chete nemufi vanoti zvinofadza chose kuona Alex apihwa ruremekedzo rwakakura kudai nevamwe vake. Vati mufi akaratidza hunyanzvi hwake po akashanda sechipangamazano chemutungamiri wenyika VaMorgan Tsvangirai panguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa uyewo pakunyorwa kwebumbiro remutemo weZimbabwe. VaMagaisa vakashaya nesvondo kuBritain mushure mekurwara nechirwere chemoyo.  No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa, Vanoudza Africa Union Kuti Nhaurirano, Kwete Zvirango, Ndidzo Chete Dzinounza Runyararo
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanonzi vaudza musangano weAfrican Union kuAddis Ababa, kuEthiopia, kuti kutaurirana ndiko chete kunounza runyararo nekushanda pamwe munyika, kwete zvirango zvavanoti zvakatemerwa nyika nevekumadokero. Bepanhau reHerald rinoti mutungamiri wenyika vaudzawo musangano uyu kuti vari kuita nhaurirano neAmerica pamwe neUeropean Union kuti vatange kudyidzana zvakare, uye kuti zvirango zvibviswe. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezveupfumi uye vakambotungamira sangano re Zimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce (ZNCC), VaLuxson Zembe, vanoti zvakakosha kuti paitwe nhaurirano pakati paVaMnangagwa nemutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa kuitira kuti zvinhu zvishanduke munyika. VaMnangagwa vanonzi vaudza gungano reAfrican Union iri kuti vari kuita nhaurirano dzekugadzirisa matambudziko ari munyika kuburikidza nePOLAD, iyo yakaumbwa nevatungamiri vemapato akakwikwidza musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika muna 2018. Asi VaZembe vanoti zvakakosha kuti mutungamiri wenyika vataurirane naVaChamisa, avo vanonzi vari kuramba kupinda muPOLAD. No media source currently available

headline: ZCTU Inoti Vashandi Vari Kutora Nguva Refu Kuti Vasvike Kumba Vapedza Basa
text: Munyori mukuru wesangano revashandi, reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti vashandi vari kunetsekana zvakanyanya nezvekufambisa zvopa kuti vamwe vasungwe vatadza kubata nguva iri kunzi vanhu vange vave mudzimba. Izvi zviri kuitirwa kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau padandemutande reTwitter, mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistance Commissioner Paul Nyathi, vakati mapurisa ari kuzosimbaradza kuona kuti mitemo yakaturwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pakurwisa denda reCovid-19 yatevedzerwa. Vakatiwo vanhu vanofanira kunge vave mudzimba nenguva dza6:30 manheru kusvika na6:30 mangwanani. VaMnangagwa vakati vanofamba zvisina maturo vachasungwa. VaMoyo vanoti zvave kutorera vamwe vashandi maawa mana kuti vasvike kudzimba dzavo mushure mekupedza basa. No media source currently available

headline: Muzongondi iNo. 1 . . . Zvibodzwa 41 mumwaka . . . ‘Ndinoda kuita saChunga’
text: FELISTAS “Figo” Muzongondi (33) – uyo akaita mukurumbira wekunwisa zvibodzwa 41 gore rakapera munhabvu yevasikana achitambira chikwata cheBlack Rhinos Queens – anoti kutamba kwake nhabvu ruremekedzo rukuru rwaanopa kuvabereki vake.   Vabereki vemutambi uyu vakashaika.  Munhoroondo yomuno, Figo akapotsa nezvibodzwa zvishanu bedzi kuti asvike pa46 izvo zvakanwiswa naMoses “Bambo” Chunga mugore ra1986.   Pose paanonwisa, Muzongondi anotambanudza maoko ake akatarira kumakore achitambirira.   Anoti izvi anozviitira kuremekedza vabereki vake avo vaanoti vanenge vachimuona vari kumatenga.   “Pose pandinopinda munhandare ndichinotamba nhabvu, ndinozviita ndiine chisimbiso chokuti ndiri kutambira vabereki vangu avo vakashaika kare kare,” anodaro Figo.   Amai vake vakashaika muna2003, baba vake ndokuzotevera 2007 vachisiya Muzongondi – uyo ava kushandira Zimbabwe Defence Forces – nemadzikoma ake maviri nevanin’ina vaviri zvakare.   Kunyangwe akatora mukombe wekunwisa zvibodzwa zvakawanda munhabvu yevanhukadzi munyika yose, Figo anoti anobatikana mumwoyo nokurangarira vabereki vake.   “Pavakashaika, vakatisiya tichingova vana toga. Vamwe vangu vanouya kuzonditsigira kazhinji pandinotamba, asi ndinongoshuvira kuti kudai nevabereki vangu varipowo,” anodaro Muzongondi.   Mutambi uyu akatanga kutamba nhabvu mugore ra2001 paNdarama High School, kuMasvingo, uko kunova ndiko kwaakapihwa zita remadunhurirwa rokuti Figo – zvichibva pazita reshasha yenhabvu yekunyika yePortugal, Luis Figo uyo akaita mukurumbira achitambira nyika yake nechikwata chekuSpain cheBarcelona.   Anoti zita iri akaripihwa pamusana pekugona nhabvu kuita sekunge mukomana.   Mugore ra2008, akatanga kutambira chikwata cheCyclone Queens, kuMbare, ndokuzobvako oenda kuMwenzana Queens muna2014.   Muna2016, akasiya ndokunotambira Black Rhinos Queens apo akazodaidzwa kuchikwata chenyika chemaMighty Warriors uko kwaakanoita mukurumbira nezvidobi zvake munhabvu.   “Kazhinji pose pandinotamba kumaMighty Warriors, ndinombodonhedza misodzi ndichirangarira kuti dai Mwari akapawo vabereki vangu mazuva panyika ekundiona ndichitambira Zimbabwe.   “Vazhinji vakazotanga kuziva nezvangu pandakatanga kutamba muchikwata chemaMighty Warriors asi nhabvu ndakatanga kuitamba ndichiri kuchikoro,” anodaro Figo.   Muzongondi – uyo ava nemukurumbira wakanyanya pakuzunguza mambure – anokurudzira vatambi venhabvu vechisikana kuti vazvibate kana vachida kubudirira.   “Kunyangwe ukava mutambi ane mukurumbira, ukasangozvibata uye ukashaya hunhu, hauna kure kwaunosvika.   “Ukava nehunhu, zvoreva zvakare kuti unogona kutamba nevamwe zvakanaka, iya yatinoti ‘team work’. Iyi ndiyo yakakosha munhabvu.”   Figo anoti pakubudirira kwake, anotenda chikwata chaanotamba nacho chinova ndicho chinoita kuti kugona kwake kuonekere.   “Mibairo yose yandinowana ndinopa kutenda kuchikwata chandinotamba nacho nokuti ndivo vanoita kuti kugona kwangu kuonekwe. Kunyangwe zvichiratidza kushingaira kwangu, asi mutambo uyu ndewechikwata,” anodaro Figo.   Kugadzirira ramangwana rake, Muzongondi anoti ava kuita zvidzidzo zvekuti awane magwaro ekurairidza vatambi nhabvu.   Anoti kunyangwe achiri kutarisira kutamba kwemakore anotevera, munhabvu munosanganikwa netsaona dzinosanganisira kukuvara naizvozvo anofanira kugara akagadzirira. Nerudo rwaainarwo nemutambo wenhabvu, Figo anoti kana azosvika panguva yokuti haachatambi munhandare, achaita zvokurairidza mutambo uyu.   “Nhabvu ndiyo upenyu hwangu, naizvozvo kana nguva yokutamba yadarika, ndichaita zvokurairidza,” anodaro.   “Ndinorangarira gore ra2010 apo takatamba fainari yeCosafa tichikwikwidzana nechikwata cheSouth Africa munhandare yeRufaro, muHarare, ndakademba kuti dai upenyu hwaitengwa, ndainotenga hwevabereki vangu kuti vaone kudadisa kwandakaita zuva iroro.   “Taisirakashwa neSouth Africa nguva dzose asi musi uyu takaita sungano sechikwata kuti taida kuvaratidza kuti hatikundwi munyika medu.   “Tichipinda munhandare, taiva tizere neuturu hwekuda kugohwesa, naizvozvo vasikana veSouth Africa takavapa nguva yakaoma tikavakwapaidza 3-0.   “Kunyangwe musi uyu ndisina kunwisa, asi ndakatamba nemwoyo wose uye tiine donzvo rimwe chete sechikwata tikabudirira,” anodaro Muzongondi.   Figo anoti gore rino anoda kutamba nekugohwesa kudarika gore rakapera.   Shuviro yake ndeyekudarika zvibodzwa zvaChunga zvemugore ra1986 iro rinova ndiro raakaberekwa.   Kubva 1986 kudzimara zvino, hakuna mutambi wenhabvu muno ati anwisa zvibodzwa sezvakaitwa naBambo mumwaka mumwe chete. Muzongondi ndiye bedzi ari pedyo nezvibodzwa 41 zvegore rapera.   Figo anoona kuberekwa kwake mugore ra1986 sokunge zvine chirevo muupenyu hwake zvinova ndizvo zvaanofunga kuti zvakaita kuti atambe nhabvu.   “Kusangana kwemakore aya – ekubarwa kwake nekunwisa kwaChunga – kwandiri haisi tsaona, zvinoreva kuti gore irori rakakosha zvikuru kwandiri.   “Naizvozvo ndoda kugohwesa kudarika zvakaitwa naBambo mugore irori,” anodaro.

headline: Vanhu Vanodarika Mamiriyoni Matanhatu (6M) Vafa neCovid-19 Pasi Rose
text: Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 pasi rose inoti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matanhatu kana kuti 6 million vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kubva zvachatanga kupararira pasi rose muna 2019. MuAmerica chete vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe zvine makumi matanhatu nechimwe kana kuti 961 000 vafa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vasina kubayiwa nhomba vakawanda ndivo vari kunzi vari kufa zvakanyanya. Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano rinoti nezuro vanhu mazana mashanu nemumwe vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kusanganisira vana vechikoro zana nemakumi matatu nevatanhatu. Vanhu makumi manomwe vanonzi vari kurwara neCovid-19 vari muzvipatara zvakasiyana siyana munyika. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti nezuro hakuna munhu akafa nechirwere cheCcovid-19 zvasiya vafa nacho kubva zvachatanga kupararira munyika muna 2020 vachiri zviuru zvishanu nemazana matatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 5 399.

headline: Mamonya onokwikwidza kuSA
text: SANGANO reZimbabwe Powerlifting Federation (ZPF) riri mushishi yekuumba chikwata chenyanzvi 10 dzinosimudza masimbi ekuvaka muviri avo vachaenda kunomirira Zimbabwe kumakwikwi achaitwa kunyika yeSouth Africa munguva inotevera.   Muna Chikumi, nyanzvi dzekusimudza masimbi dzepasi rose dzichange dzichirakidzana masimba mumakwikwi eWorld Classic Open Powerlifting Championships ayo achaitirwa kuSun City, kuSouth Africa.   Sachigaro weZPF mupurovhinzi yeHarare, Moses Nyamhotsi, anoti vakatotanga kuita gadziriro dzekuenda kumutambo uyu.   Mumasvondo anotevera, anodaro Nyamhotsi, vachaita mitambo yakawanda yekusarudza chikwata chavo chevatambi 10 – varume vashanu nemadzimai mashanu.   “MunaChikumi, tinoda kutumira chikwata chedu kumutambo weWorld Classic Open Powerlifting Championship kuSouth Africa. Mutambo uyu mukuru uye vatambi vose vanoda chaizvo kuenda kunokwikwidza.   “Isu chinangwa chedu kutumira vatambi vedu 10 vanoti varume vashanu nemadzimai mashanu. Saka mumasvondo anotevera tichange tichiita mitambo yakasiyana tichisarudza vatambi vedu vatinoda kuti vapinde muchikwata chatichazotumira kuenda kuSun City kunomirira nyika kumutambo uyu.   “Tarisiro yedu ndeyekuti chikwata chedu tinge tapedza kuchisarudza munaKurume,” anodaro Nyamhotsi.   Aka kachange kari kekutanga Zimbabwe ichitumira vatambi kumutambo uyu.   Nyamhotsi anoti vanotarisira kuti chikwata chavo chiende kunobata basa sebasa kumakwikwi aya.   “Kuenda kwatichaita kuSouth Africa, tinoda kuti chikwata chedu chigonobata basa sebasa kwete kuenda kunozadzikisa chete.   Tiri kuda kutonohwina, kunyangwe tichiziva hedu kuti mutoro wacho unenge wakakura sezvo chikwata chedu chichasangana nedzimwe shasha dzepasi rose,” anodaro Nyamhotsi.

headline: Mafuta eKufambisa Dzimotokari Oshaikwa muNyika
text: Pane mashoko ekuti Zimbabwe yasara nemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari asara munyika anokwana svondo rimwe chete chete sezvo Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe iri kutatarika kuwana mari yekunze yekupa vemagaraji kuti vatenge mafuta aya. Mune dzimwe nzvimbo dzakawanda munyika, motokari dzakawanda dzange dziri mumutsetse dzichitsvaga mafuta peturu nedhiziri. Izvi zviri kuitika kunyangwe hazvo mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakazivisa vanhu kwaZvimba, Mashonaland West neMugovera kuti mafuta aya harisi dambudziko. Hurumende yakambozivisawo kuti yainge yawana chikwereti chekutenga mafuta. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gavhuna weRBZ Doctor John Mangudya kuti tinzwe divi ravo sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. Gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto Doctor Joram Gumbo vanoti zvinhu zvinenge zvisina kumira zvakanaka kuRBZ panyaya yemari. Vati izvi zviri kukonzerwa nenyaya yekuti zvinhu zvinoda mari yekunze zvawandisa. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo negurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube avo vati mari yave kushomeka sezvo RBZ yave kubhadhara mari dzakawanda kune vanochera goridhe neplatinum. Vamwe vemakambani ekunze akaita seRio Zimbabwe vange voendesa RBZ kumatare idzimhosva nekukundikana kuvapa mari dzavo. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vokurudzirwa Kugara Vakazvichengetedza Munguva yeCovid-19
text: Vanhu makumi mashanu nemumwe chete vakafa nechirwere che Covid-19 nezuro, uye vanhu mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mashanu nevatanhatu, vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vava zviuru zvitatu nemazana masere nevashanu, uye vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose, vava zviuru zana negumi nezvishanu, nemazana mana nemakumi mana nevashanu. Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu vabaiwa nhomba yekutanga vakanga vava miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana masere negumi nezvinomwe nemazana mashanu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevasere, 1, 817,598 uye vabayiwa nhomba yepiri vakanga vava zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matanmhatu nezvitanhatu nemazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe nevaviri, 966, 672. Huwandu uhu hunogona kukwira nhasi manheru apo bazi rezvehutano richazivisa zvarawana muongororo dzaitwa nhasi. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 kuvanhu mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana, senzira yekumisa kupararira kwedenda iri. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano, Dr Simbiso Ranga, vanoti dambudziko reCovid-19 rava kuda mushandira pamwe kuitira kuti denda iri risarambe richienderera mberi. Dr Ranga, avo vanova chiremba anoshandira mudunhu reNorth Carolina muAmerica, vanoti vanhu vanofanirwa kuchengetedza mitemo kuitira kuti vasabatwe nechirwere Covid-19. Kunyange hazvo hurumende iri kuti iri kufara nechirongwa chekubaya vanhu nhomba, Dr Ranga vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kuita zvakawanda zvakaita sekubaya vanhu nhomba vakawanda pamwe nekuti nhomba idzi dziwanikwe nyore. No media source currently available

headline: NDAROVERA HOKO: CHIPEZEZE
text: MUBATI wepagedhi weWarriors Elvis Chipezeze anoti atoroverera hoko pagedhi uye acharwa semvumba kuti arambe achibatira chikwata chenyika ichi.   Chipezeze nguva yadarika akapomerwa mhosva nevatsigiri venhabvu vachiti ndiye akadyisa maWarriors apo akazvamburwa 4 – 0 neDemocratic Republic of Congo kumakwishu eAfrcia Cup of Nations (Afcon) ayo akaitirwa kuEgypt.   Asi murairidzi wemaWarriors mutsva, Joey Antipas, akamupa mumwe mukana ndokumushevedza kuzotambira chikwata chenyika murwendo rwekurwira kuenda kuQatar 2022 World Cup.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium nemusi weChipiri chino apo maWarriors ange achangobva kukunda Somalia 3-1, Chipezeze anoti akambobatikana zvikuru nezvakataurwa nevanhu nekuda kwemutambo weAfcon asi akaramba achishanda nesimba.   “Zvakawanda zvakataurwa asi ndakawana rutsigiro kubva kuvanhu vakawanda nemurairidzi wangu uye mhuri yangu. Zvinowanikwa munhabvu asi chikuru kuramba ndichingoshanda nesimba chete,” anodaro.   Mutambi uyu – uyo anotambira Baroka FC yekuSouth Africa – anoti chivimbo china Antipas maari anochikoshesa zvikuru.   “Rutsigiro rwandapihwa nemurairidzi runondikoshera zvikuru saka ini ndinofanirwa kuramba ndichishanda nesimba chete.   “Kundigadza kwaaita kuve mubati wemaWarriors kunorakidza kuti anovimba neni saka iniwo ndicharwa semvumba uye ndichishanda nesimba kuti ndirambe ndiri mubati wemaWarriors,” anodaro Chipezeze.   MaWarriors akabudirira kupinda mumapoka (group stages) ekurwira kuenda kuQatar 2022 World zvichitevera kuhwina kwaakaita 3 -1 nemusi weChipiri chino.    Vatambi vanoti Marshall Munetsi, Knowx Mutizwa naKhama Billiat ndivo vakanwisa.   Mumutambo wekutanga wakatambirwa kuDjibouti svondo radarika, maWarriors akakundwa neSomalia 1 – 0.

headline: Kuteresa Makambani Ane Minda Munyika Kotambirwa neNyanzvi
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvekurima dzinoti dzinotambira danho rakatorwa nedare remakurukota rekuti makambani makuru ane minda munyika abhadhare mitero. Bepanhau reHerald rinoti makambani aya akanzi anofanirwa kubhadhara madhora gumi pahekita pagore kubvira muna Ndira wegore rino. Danho iri rinozi richabatsira hurumende kuti iunganidze mari yekushandisa mubudiriro pamwe nekubhadhara varimi vechichena vakatorerwa minda. Danho iri rinotevera rimwe rakadai rakaziviswa zvakare nehurumende mwedzi mishoma yadarika rekuti varimi vakagariswa patsva pamwe nevekumaruwa, vanonzi ma A1 ne A2, vabhadharewo mitero. Vekumaruwa vanofanirwa kubhadhara madhora mashanu kuchitiwo vemapurazi madiki vachibhadhara madhora gumi nemashanu pagore. Asi imwe nyanzvimune zvekurima, VaBernard Manyadza, avo vanoshanda vakazvimirira, vanoti zvakakoshawo zvikuru kuti patariswe kuti munhu ari kushandisa ivhu iri ari kuwanawo cheuviri here kubva mariri. VaManyadza vanotiwo havatambiri pfungwa yekuti varimi vatsva kana vekumaruwa vahwandirwe nehurumende mukubvisiswa mari yekubhadhara vachena, avo vakatobuda munyika, vazhinji vacho vachinzi vave kurima vari kuZambia, kunove kwave kutengwa chibage neZimbabwe. Asi mumwe murimi mukuru, uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu, vanotiwo havaoni varimi vachiita dambudziko rekukundikana kubhadhara mitero iyi, sezvo iri pasi zvikuru, uye vagara vachiibhadhara. VaChirumhanzu vanoti havaoni hurumende iri iyo ine dambudziko kana hurongwa uhwu hwakasabudirira, sezvo paine zvipangamazano zvinoipa mazano nekunyora zvekuti itevere. Mamwe makambani makuru ari kurima munyika, anosanganisira yeTongaat Hulett, anonzi ane minda mikuru kwazvo, izvo zvinogona kuti azoguma obhadhara mari dzinodarika miriyoni yemadhora pagore. No media source currently available

headline: Umwe Mukuru Wesangano Rinomirira Vashandi VeMenisiparati YeChitungwiza Anombomiswa Basa
text: Menisiparati yeChitungwiza yambomisa basa mukuru we St Marys Clinic, Sister Shingirai Tsvangirai, zvichitevera kushanda zvishomazvishoma kwakatangwa kuitwa nevashandi svondo rapera. Vashandi vemenisiparati varikuratidzira vachiti vanoda kupiwa mbatya dzekuzvidzivirira kana vari pabasa, uye vanoda mari yekuenda kumabasa sezvo vamwe vavo vachifamba mamaira matanhatu netsoka kuenda kumabasa avo. Vanotizve havasi kupiwa mihoro yavo. Pamusoro pekuva Sister-In-Charge veSt Mary's Clinic, Sister Tsvangirai mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vashandi, reChitungwiza Municipal Workers Union. Mutungamiri wesangano iri, VaEphraim Katsina, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakuru mumenisiparati vagara vachishora Sister Tsvangirai vachiti vanotaurisa mumisangano yevashandi. VaKatsina vanoti vashandi vashatirwa zvikuru pavanzwa nezvekumbomiswa basa kwaSister Tsvangirai vakabvumirana kuti vave kuregera zvekuratidzira vachiti vave kutangidza kuramwa mabasa. Taedza kutaura ne vakafanobata chigaro chemunyori weguta reChitungwiza, Dr Tonderai Kasu, vakatitumira gwaro vachiti ichokwadi kuti Sister Tsvangirai vambomiswa basa, vachiti havagoni kutaura zvakawanda sezvo nyaya iyi ichiri kukurukurwa kuona zvakakanganiswa naSister Tsvangirai uye kuona kuti vanorangwa sei kana vaine mhosva. No media source currently available

headline: Seke South Clinic Yomboshandiswa Senzvimbo Yekuongorora neKurapa Vane Coronavirus
text: Menisiparati yeChitungwiza inozivisa vagari veguta iri kuti kanzuru yavo yakabvumirana kuti Seke South Clinic imboshandiswa senzvimbo yekuongorora nekurapa vanhu vane chirwere che Coronavirus. Mutauriri wemenisiparari yeChitungwiza, VaLovemore Meya, vati parizvino vagari veChitungwiza vanofanirwa kushandisa mamwe makiriniki eChitungwiza, akaita se St Marys, Zengeza 3 ne Seke North sezvo kiriniki ye Seke South yambomira kutora varwere vesevese, kunze kweavo vari kurapwa kana kuongororwa chirwere che coronavirus. Coronavirus. Izvi zvinotevera kunyunyuta kwesangano rinomirira vagari veChitungwiza, reChitungwiza Residents Trust, iro rinoti madzimai anepamuviri arikudzorerwa kudzimba kana vaenda kunotsvaka rubatsiro paSeke South Clinic. Mukuru weChitungwiza Residents Trust, Muzvare Alice Kuvheya, vanoti madzimai arikuda kubatsirwa haagone kuenda kuma kiriniki ari kure nekwavanogara sezvo makombi asiri kufamba zvakanaka pamusoro pehurongwa rwekurwisana neCoronavirus. Muzvare Kuvheya vanoti kanzuru yeChitungwiza inofanirwa kubatsira madzimai aya kuti akwanise kuenda kwavanobatsirwa panguva iyo vave kuita vana. No media source currently available

headline: PTUZ Yoramwa Mabasa Kutanga neChishanu
text: Rimwe remasangano anomirira vadzidzisi reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, rinoti nhengo dzaro dzichatanga kuramwa mabasa mangwana richiti mari iri kutambiriswa vadzidzisi ishoma zvikuru. Izvi zvouyawo panguva iyo sangano rinomirira vashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions richiti riri kuenderera mberi nekuronga kuratidzira munyika yose. Mutungamiri wePTUZ, VaTakavafira Zhou, vaudza Studio7 kuti nhengo dzesangano ravo dzichatanga kuregedza kuenda kubasa neChishanu vachiti hurumende yaramba yakaisa zvimiti munzeve pachikumbiro chavo chekuti iwedzere vadzidzisi mari dzemihoro dzine musoro. VaZhou vati sangano ravo rinoda kuti hurumende ivape mari inoita madhora mazana maviri ekuAmerica kana yakaringana nemari iyi ari maRTGS, kubhadharirwa mari dzechikoro dzevana vatatu pamudzidzisi wega-wega uye kupihwa masitendi ekuti vadzidzisi vakwanise kuvaka dzimba dzekugara. Danho ratorwa nePTUZ rekutanga kusaenda kubasa mangwana rinouyawo apo mutungamiri wesangano revadzidzisi vekumaruwa reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vachiti nhengo dzesangano ravo dzichatangawo kurega kuenda kubasa neMuvhuro uye havasi kutambira zvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana zvekurerutsa raramo yavo zvavapihwa nehurumende. Munyori musangano rinomirira vashandi vari mune zvehutano reHealth Apex, VaEdwick Nhema, vanotiwo sezvo hurumende ichiti ine imwe mari yakasara pabhajeti renyika, inofanira kuvapa mari iyi kuitira kuti vakwanise kurarama. ZCTU inotiwo iri kuenderera mberi nekuronga kuratidzira kwakasimba munyika yose. Munyori mukuru muZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vati sangano ravo riri pakati pekunzwa pfungwa dzemasangano akawanda nezvenyaya yekuratidzira iyi vachiti kuratidzira uku kunogona kuitwa kubva svondo rinouya zvichienda mberi. Danho riri kutorwa neZCTU iri rinouyawo panguva iyo hutungamiri hweZCTU huchiti huri kutyisidzirwa nepamusana pehurongwa hwekuratidzira uhwu. Gurukota rezvevashandi, Amai Sekai Nzenza, vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti hurumende iri kunzwa zvichemo zvevashandi vayo uye vati vari kutsvaga nzira dzekuti nhuna dzevashandi dzingagadziriswa sei kubudikidza nekutaurirana pakati pavo sehurumende nevashandi pasi peTripartite Negotiating Forum.

headline: Makwikwi ePSL adzoka
text: MURAIRIDZI weFC Platinum – Norman ‘Muchina wemajuzi’ Mapeza – anoti mujaho wekurwira mukombe wePremier Soccer League watanga apo zvikwata zvose zvave kudzoka kuzokwikwidza muchikamu chechipiri chePSL.   Mitambo yePSL yange yakamiswa kwemasvondo maviri adarika senzira yekupa zvikwata mukana wetura befu pamwe nekuti nhandare dzimbovandudzwe.   FC Platium ndiyo yakatora mukombe wePSL gore radarika, Pakamiswa mitambo yePSL, Chicken Inn ndiyo yaitungamira palog iine zvibodzwa 35 kubva pamitambo 17 yayange yatamba. MaGamecocks, sezita remadunhurirwa reChicken Inn, aiteverwa neFC Platinum iyo ine zvibodzwa 34 kubva mumitambo 17 kuchiti Dynamos FC ndiyo iri pechitatu ine zvibodzwa 34 zvekare kubva pamitambo 16.   Achitaura ari kuZvishavane uko ari kuita gadziriro nechikwata chake, Mapeza anoti chikamu chechipiri chePSL icho vatarisana nacho chakaomarara zvikuru.   “Kurwira mukombe wePSL mujaho mukuru wakaoma saka tave kutokunya dzisimbe nekuti kwatave kuenda makata chaiwo. “Zvikwata zvose zviri kurwa semvumba kuti zvisaburitswe muPSL,” anodaro Mapeza.   Apo pari kudzoka mitambo yePSL svondo rino, Pure Platinum Play (FC Platinum) iri kunanga kuBulawayo uko ichanosangana neBulawayo City musi weMugovera kuBabourfields.   Bulawayo City chimwe chezvikwata zviri kutatarika mwaka uno izvo zvaona chichikwanisa kuwana zvibodzwa 12 chete kubva mumitambo 17.   Pari zvino, Bulawayo City yakagara pechi17 palog iri pamusoro peWhawha iyo yakasenga iine zvibodzwa 12. Mapeza anoti zvikwata zvakaita seBulawayo City zvinotyisa kusangana nazvo sezvo zvinenge zvichirwira kuti zvisaburitswe muPSL.   “Zvikwata zvakaita seBulawayo City hazvina kumira zvakanaka nekuti zvinenge zvichitorwira kuti zvisaburitswe muPSL. Saka iyi ndiyo mitambo yekutongwarira nekuti inogona kuenda kwese kwese,” anodaro Mapeza.   Achitaurawo nekudzoka kwePSL svondo rino, murairidzi weCranborne Bullets – Nesbert ‘Yabo’ Saruchera – anoti haasi kugutsikana nematambiro ange achiita chikwata chake muchikamu chekutanga chePSL.    Nesbert Saruchera   Asi anoti ari kutarisira kuti vachashanda nesimba kuti vagopinda muTop 8. Pari zvino Cranborne Bullets yakagara pechi15 palog uye yakwanisa kuwana zvibodzwa 15 kubva mumitambo 17.   “Patakapinda muPSL, taitarisira kuvhundutsa vanhu asi handizvo zvakazoitika. Saka tave kutokunya dzisimbe mumitambo yatatarisana nayo muchikamu chepiri kuitira kuti tigosimukira.   “Tichawedzera vatambi vaviri kana vatatu kuti tigadzirise pano neapo panoda kugadziriswa kuitira kuti tinyatsosimba chaizvo. Zvamunongoziva, vakomana vedu ava vazhinji takabva navo kuDivision One saka pari kudiwa vanouya vosimbisa chikwata chedu chonyatsomira zvakasimba,” anodaro Yabo.   Chikwata chaYabo svondo rino chichange chiri pamusha apo chichasangana neChicken Inn musi weMugovera kuSakubva Stadium.   Zvakadaro, kune mimwe mitambo iriko, Yadah Stars ichasangana neDynamos musi weMugovera kuNational Sports Stadium kuchiti CAPS United ichatsurana neZPC Kariba musi weSvondo panhandare imwe cheteyo.   Highlanders ichasangana neBlack Rhinos musi weSvondo kuBabourfields mumutambo uchange uri wekutanga waBaltemar Jose de Oliveira Brito, chizvarwa chekuPortugal uyo aimbove mutevedzeri waJose Mourinho.

headline: Kanzuru yeHarare Yobhadharisa Mitero Ichishandisa Madhora ekuAmerica
text: Kanzuru yeHarare yatanga kubhadharisa vagari mari yemvura nemimwe mitero nemadhora ekuAmerica zvichitevera kupihwa kwayakaitwa mvumo yekuita izvi nehurumende. Sangano rinomirira maguta nemadhorobha munyka reUrban Councils Association of Zimbabwe, kana kuti UCAZ, ranyorerawo kuhurumende richtsvaga mvumo yekuti maguta nemadhorobha ese munyika abhadharise vagari mari nemadhora ekuAmerica. Hurumende yakapa kanzuru yeHarare mvumo yekubhadharisa vagari nemakambani vachishandia madhora ekuAmerica kutanga mwedzi uno. Mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichaeil Chideme, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vasingakwanise mari yekunze vacharamba vachishandisa mari yemuno, asi inenge yakatarwa ichienzaniswa nedhora rekuAmerica. Mamwe maguta akaita seMasvingo, Kwekwe neRedcliff akaitawo zvisungo zvekuti vanokwanisa vabhadhare mitero vachishandisa madhora ekuAmerica. Mutungamiriri weUrban Councils Association of Zimbabwe, zvakare mari meya weGweru, VaJosiah Makombe, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakatonyorera kugurukota rinoona nezvemadhorobha nematunhu, VaJuly Moyo, vachikumbira mvumo yekuti maguta nemadhorabha ese munyika makumi matatu nemaviri abvimidzwe kubhadharisa mitero nemvura nemadhorobha ekuAmerica. VaMakombe vati maguta nemadhorobha ange ave kutatarika kuita basa ravo sezvo vese vanovatengesera zvinhu zvekushandisa zvakaita semishonga yekuchenesa mvura vave kutengesa nemari yekunze. Vati kubhadharisa mari yekunze kunoita kuti makanzuru akwanise kuita basa ravo zvakanaka asingapedzi nguva ari mumitsetse yekutsvaga mari yekunze kubva kuReserve Bank of Zimbabwe. Mukuru werimwe remasangano anomirira vagari vemuHarare, reHarare Residents Association, VaPrecious Shumba, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanotambira danho rekubhadharisa mitero nemari yekunze vachiti zvinoita kuti makunzuru aya asagare achishandura mitero nekuda kwekushaya simba kunogara kuchiita mari yemuno. VaShumba vaenderera mberi vachiti danho iri rinoita kuti maguta nemadhorobha asagare achikumbira mari kuReserve Banj nehurumende. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwebasa musangano rreCommunity Water Alliance, VaHardlife Mudzingwa, vaudza Studio 7 kunyange hazvo iri riri danho rakanaka uye richikwanisa kuvandudza mabasa emakanzuru, dambudziko guru nderekuti vagari nevashandi vakawanda munyika vari kutambira mari yemuno, izvo zvichanetsa kuti vawane mari yekunze iyi. Mukuru wesangano reMasvingo United Residents and Ratepayers Association, VaAnoziva Muguti, vaudza Studio 7 kuti danho rekushandisa mari yekunze rakanaka chose uye chinofadza ndechekuti vasingawane marii iyi havasi kumanikidzwa kubhadhara nemari yekunze, sezvo vachibhadhariswa mari yemunyika asi yakatarwa nemutengo wedhora rekuAmerica. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaJuly Moyo kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Mumwe mushandi mukuru mubazi ravo uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita, audza Studio 7 kuti VaMoyo vachapindurachikumbiro cheUCAZ, nguva ipi zvayo kubva pari zvino. Hurumende yadzika mutemo unobvumidza vemabhizimisi bhadharisa vatengi nemari yekunze neyemuno, kana kuti Dual Pricing System, asi haina kunge yapa makanzuru mvumo yekuita izvi. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Zifa ngaibude pachena’
text: MURAIRIDZI weFC Platinum — Norman ‘Muchina wemajuzi’ Mapeza — anoti hutungamiriri hwenhabvu yemuno hweZIFA hunofanira kutaura chokwadi maringe nemamiriro emutambo uyu sezvo hupenyu hwevatambi vazhinji hwakanganisika.   Izvi zvinotevera kumiswa kwakaitwa nhabvu nemimwe mitambo munyika muno muna Kurume gore rapera senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Mapeza anoti ZIFA ngaitaure chokwadi kuti iri kuronga zvipi pamusoro pekudzoka kwemutambo uyu. “Vakomana vazhinji venhabvu vange vachiraramisa mhuri dzavo kuburikidza nemari dzavange vachiwana kubva kunhabvu asi iye zvino havana chekubata sezvo mutambo uyu usiri kutambwa. Kana vakomana vakasatamba nhabvu havawane mari yekuti vakwanise kutengera mhuri dzavo chikafu chekudya kumba. Saka nhabvu ikasadzoka nekuchimbidza zvinoramba zvichivaomera vakomana ava.   “Tiri kushaya kuti chii chaizvo chiri kukonesa kuti mutambo uyu udzoswe muno munyika medu, kune dzimwe nyika uri kutambwa asi muno chete ndimo mauchiri wakamiswa. Izvi zviri kukanganisa zvakawanda.   “Saka ZIFA ngaitaure chokwadi kuti zvinhu zviri kufamba sei chaizvo vanhu vazive pane kungotsika-tsika zvavari kuita izvi,” anodaro Mapeza. Svondo rapera, mutauriri weZIFA Xolisani Gwesela akaudza Kwayedza kuti sangano ravo rakanyorera kuHurumende richikumbira bvumo yekuti mutambo wenhabvu uchidzoka uye vachakamirira mhinduro yacho. Chikwata cheFC Platinum chiri kukwikwidza mumitambo yeCAF Confederations Cup umo chiri kurwira kuenda kumagroup stages kunyangwe hazvo chisiri kunyatsowana nguva yekugadzirira. Mapeza anoti mutambi wenhabvu anofanirwa kugara achitamba svondo rega-rega.   “Igaroziva kuti mutambi hunyanzvi hwake hunonyatsobuda kana akaita nguva achitamba nhabvu, anenge asina ngura yekugara nguva yakareba asingatambe.   “Manje isu tiri kupedza nguva tisingatambe nhabvu nekuti ligi remuno rakamiswa, tiri kuzongonokwikwidza mumitambo yemuAfrica. Vatambi vedu vanenge vasina kusvika padanho chairo rinotarisirwa rekukwikwidza sezvo vanenge vagara nguva refu vasina kukwikwidza. Saka dai nhabvu yemuno yange ichitambwa, zvaibatsira zvikuru mumitambo yedu nekuti vatambi vedu vanenge vasina ngura,” anodaro. Mapeza anoti anotyirawo vatambi vechidiki avo vave nemakore maviri vasingatambe nhabvu kuti remangwana ravo rinogona kukanganisika.   “Moziva, vechidiki iye zvino vave kukanganiswa nezvinodhaka nekuti vari kuswera vachingomberereka kumaraini vasina zvekuita, ndipo vanopedzisira vave kutora zvinodhaka,” anodaro.   Chikwata chaMapeza chakasimuka nemusi weChipiri chakananga kuSenegal uko chiri kunosangana necheAssociation Sportive et Culturelle Diaraf (ASC Diaraf) mumutambo wechipiri wekurwira kufambira mberi muCAF Confederation Cup.   Mumutambo wekutanga wakatambirwa muno kuNational Sports Stadium, FC Platinum yakakundwa 1-0 saka iri kufanirwa kunohwina 2-0 kana nezvimwe zvibodzwa zvepamusoro, ASC Diaraf isinganwise, kuti chigogona kufambira mberi mumutambo uyu.   Mapeza anoti kunyangwe hake chikwata chake chakakundwa muno, havasi kurasa tariro uye vari kuenda kuSenegal vane chivimbo chekuti vachanohwina.   “Isu hatirase tariro, tinotamba mitambo yese kuti tihwine uye ndizvo zvatiri kuenda kunoita kuSenegal. Kana ivo vakahwina muno, hapana chinotitadzisa kuti tinohwinawo ikoko,” anodaro Mapeza.

headline: Eboue odzoka munhabvu
text: weArsenal, Emaanuel Eboue (35), anogona kudzoka munhabvu achitambira LA Galaxy, makore maviri apedzisira kutamba nhabvu.   Chizvarwa chekuIvory Coast ichi anoshuvira zvikuru kudzoka munhabvu zvichitevera kutemerwa zvirango kwaakaitwa neFIFA kuti asatambire Sunderland mugore ra2019 apo akanzi asatambe kwegore atadza kubhadhara mumiriri wake.   Nyaya dzehutano hwake dzakamutadzisa kuti atengwe nechikwata chekuCyprus, Ocagi Limasol gore radarika.   Mutambi uyu akasiiwa asina kana kobiri zvichitevera kurambana kwaakaita nemudzimai wake izvo zvakamudya chaizvo mupfungwa zvekusvika pakuda kuzviuraya.   Asi chikwata chekuMLS – LA Galaxy – chiri kuedza kuda kumudzora munhabvu, sekutaura kwenhau dziri kubva kuThe Sun.   Chikwata ichi chinoziva kuti ruzivo rwaanarwo rwenhabvu rwakakosha zvikuru.   Eboue ange asiri munhabvu kwemakore maviri, asi nguva yadarika akambotambira chikwata chemaArsenal Legends munaChikumi.   Achitaura neCanal gore rino, akati, “Chandinongoda chete kudzoka munhabvu nekuti ndichiri kukwanisa kutamba.   “Ndinogona kuenda kunzvimbo dzakaita seBaghdad kana Pakistan kuti ndingotamba chete. Handina basa nazvo kuti ndekupi.   “Ndinogara nemabhegi angu akarongedzwa nekuti pane mukana wekuti ndinogona kudzingwa mumba mangu.   “Handina munhu parutivi rwangu ari kundimirira mazuva ano. Ndingori ndega. Ndaimbofara chaizvo nevana vangu nemhuri yangu asi iye zvino ndave ndega.” – SportsMail Football

headline: Hurumende Yokundikana Kugara Dare Kutonga Vakoti Vayakamisa Basa
text: Hurumende, iyo yange yadaidza neChina chikwata chekutanga chevakoti pachipatara cheUBH kuBulawayo kuti chimire pamberi pedare, kana kuti tribunal, vachipomerwa mhosva yekutyora mutemo wevashandi, yati nyaya iyi yave kuzonzwikwa svondo rinouya sezvo pane zvimwe zvanzi zvichiri kuda kuitwa. Dare remakurukota rakati rine hurongwa hwekuranga vakoti churu nezana nemakumi maviri nevasere vari kuti havana kwanise kushanda kwemazuva mashanu nekuti havana mari. Mukuru wechipatara cheUBH, Dr Narcisius Dzvanga, mutsamba yavakatumira vakoti vakamiswa basa musi wa 30 Gumiguru, vakati vakatyora mutemo we Labour (National Employment Code of Conduct) Regulations, Statutory Instrument 15 of 2006 nekuti vakange vaudzwa kuti vashande mazuva mashanu vakatsika madziro. Vakoti ava vakanzi vasauye kubasa sezvo vachigona kuvhiringidza zvapupu zvisina kudomwa. Magweta eZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaJabulani Mhlanga naMuzvare Prisca Dube, ndivo vari kumirira vakoti ava. Hatina kukwanisa kubata munyori mubazi rezvehutano, Air Commodore Jasper Chimedza, vanzi vange vari mumusangano asi vakaudza dare reparamende svondo rino kuti bazi ravo riri kupihwa mari yebhajeti shoma zvave kuri kanganisa kuita mabasa. Asi mutungamiri weZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnoch Dongo, vanoti hurumende iri kumbunyikidza kodzero dzevashandi. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yotenga Gorosi Kubva kuGermany neCanada
text: Sangano reGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe rakazivisa kuti riri kuunza gorosi kubva kuCanada neGermany kuitira kuti munyika musashaikwe chingwa sezvo gorosi rave shoma munyika. Izvi zvinoitika panguva iyo mutemo wechingwa uri kunzi wave kukwira kubva padhora rimwe chete kuenda padhora nemasendi gumi nekuda kwekushaikwa kwegorosi munyika nekukwirawo kwezvimwe zvinodiwa pakugadzirwa kwechingwa.
