Sachigaro veGrain Millers Association Zimbabwe, VaTadzwa Musarara, vaudza vatapi venhau nhasi kuti gorosi rave shoma chaizvo munyika uye mamwe makambani anoita zvekugaya gorosi akatomira basa izvo zvakazoita kuti vatenge gorozi kubva kuCananda neGermany. VaMusarara vatenda banga reReserve Bank nekuvapa chimwe chikamu chemari yekunze kuti vabhadhare gorosi iri uye vati bhanga iri rinotarisirwa kubhadhara mamiriyoni manomwe nezviuru mazana mashanu zvemadhora zvasara kumakambani akavatengesera gorosi aya kuitira kuti richitange kupinda munyika. Vanoti pane chikepe chine zviuru makumi matatu zvegorosi chakatomira kuBeira uye vachatanga kutakura gorosi iri kana RBZ yabhadhara mari mangwana. VaMusarara vati kunyange hazvo nyika ichida matani anodarika zviuru makumi matatu egorosi, vari kuunza gorosi shoma rinokwanisa kutakurwa nezvikepe zvinosvika paBeira. Vatiwo huwandu hwevanhu munyika huri kuramba huchikwira izvi zvinoita kuti chikafu chavanoda kudya chiwande. VaMusarara vatiwo kunyange nyika ikarima gorosi rakawanda sei, icharamba ichitenga gorosi rekunze sezvo pakubika chingwa pachishandiswa zvikamu makumi matatau kubva muzana zvegorosi remuno chete. Vati zvimwe zvikamu zvegorosi remuno zvinoshandiswa kugadzira furawa inogadzira mabhisikitis nezvimwe. Vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvinokatyamadza kuti nyika inoramba ichiita dambudziko rezvinhu zvakaita segorosi kana chingwa asi iyo hurumende ichagara ichipa vanhu mbeu, zvekurimisa, matarakita nguva nenguva. Gurukota rezvekurima, VaPerence Shiri, vakaudzawo bepanhau reHerald kutanga kwesvondo rino kuti hurumende ichaedza napose painogona kuona kuti gorosi rekubika chingwa rawanikwa munyika. No media source currently available

headline: VaMugabe Vodaidzira Misangano yeKuyedza Kugadzirisa Zvinhu Zvaita Manyama Amire neRongo
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe avo vatarisana nematambudziko makukutu zvichikonzerwa nekurwisana mubato ravo uye hupfumi hwenyika hwaenda kumawere vari kutarisirwa kuita misangano mitatu yakakosha svondo rino kutanga neChitatu kuyedza kugadzirisa zvinhu. VaMugabe vari kuita misangano yePolitburo, Central Committee uye mumwe neveZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association. Nyaya yekuti VaMugabe vave nemakore makumi mapfumbamwe nemaviri pasina kujeka kuti ndiyani achatora chigaro chavo yakonzera kuti mubato ravo nemunyika muiite kunetsana kwakanyanya. Pane vamwe vari kutsigira mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vamwe vachitsigira Amai Grace Mugabe vari kuchikwata chinonzi Generation 40. Vaviri ava vanoramba kuti vane zvikwata zvavanotungamira. Vakarwa hondo vari kutsika madziro vachiti VaMugabe vanofanira kudzinga mubato vamwe vechikwata cheG40 vanosanganisa makurukota matatu anoti VaJonathan Moyo, muzukuru wavo VaPatrick Zhuwao uye VaSaviour Kasukuwere. Asi vachitaura mushure mekudzoka kuJapan mushure mekupfuura nekuSingapore nemusi weSvondo, VaMugabe vakati vakarwa hondo havafanire kuudza bato zvekuita asi kuti vanofanira kungotevera gwara rebato. Mutauriri wesangano reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association VaDouglas Mahiya vanoti vari kuda kuti zvichemo zvavo zvigadziriswe. Izvi zvinosanganisa nyaya dzehutano, kuendeserwa vana kuzvikoro nezvimwe. No media source currently available

headline: Tinorarama: Dynamos
text: MANEJA weDynamos FC, Richard Chihoro, anoti hazvimbofe zvakaitika kunzwa kuti DeMbare yaburitswa muligi reCastle Premiership kunyangwe ikatamba zvakashata sei.   Chikwata ichi mwaka uno hachisi kutamba zvinogutsa izvo zvinove zvimwe zvezvikonzero zvakazotuma aimbove mutungamiri wacho Kenias Mubaiwa kuti asiye chigaro chake.   Parizvino chikwata ichi chakagara pechi13 palog chiine zvibodzwa 22 kubva mumitambo 20 yachatamba uye chakasiiwa nezvibodzwa 27 neFC Platinum iyo iri kutungamira palog.   Mwaka uno, Dynamos yasarirwa nemitambo 14 nekudaro iri kufanirwa kuhwinha mitambo yayo yose kuti irambe iri muPremier Soccer League.

headline: Vamwe Vanoti Vakapembedza N'anga Neinobata Mai Pakapidigurwa Hurumende yaVaMugabe neMauto
text: Mwedzi waMbudzi unoyeuchidza vazhinji kubviswa kwehurumende yamushakabvu Robert Mugabe nemauto muna 2017 mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vainge vaenda muhupoteri kuSouth Africa vachidzoka kuzotungamira nyika. Asi mubvunzo uri pamuromo wevakawanda ndewekuti pane chachinja here pamararamiro evana veZimbabwe sezvaitarisirwa nevakawanda vachipemberera kuti VaMugabe vainge vamanikidzwa kusiya basa. Musi wa 14 Mbudzi 2017, motokari dzehondo dzakaonekwa kumucheto kweguta reHarare mushure mekunge vaive mutungamiri wemauto VaConstantino Chiwenga vashoropodza kudzingwa basa kwevaive mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Manheru acho pfuti dzakanzwikwa dzichirira muguta reHarare asi vakawanda vasingazive kuti chii chiri kuitika. Mauto ayo akatora nhepfenyuro yeZBC akaramba kuti aipidugura hurumende achiti VaMugabe vainge vakachengegtedzwa asi vaida kubvisa makororo ainge akavakomberedza. Asi musi wa 15 Mbudzi mauto akabva atora zvivakwa zvakawanda mudhorobha vachimanikidza VaMugabe kuti vasiye basa. Kunyangwe vanopikisa vanoti vakapemberera n’anga neinobata mai, veZanu-PF vanoti zvinhu zvachinja sezvo yave hurumende itsva yechipiri uye Zimbabwe yainge yakasungunuka kutambira vemabhizimisi ekunze. Mutungamiriri werimwe sangano revanotengesa mumigwagwa re National Vendors Union of Zimbabawe VaStan Zvorwadza vanoti muna 2017 vakapemberera asi tarisiro yavo haina kubuda. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nevanoona nezvemabasa musangano reZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum VaVaWilbert Mandinde vati mitemo haisi kutevedzwa uye kumbunyikidzwa kwemasangano akazvimirira oga kuri kuenderera mberi. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi VaMasimba Kuchera vanoti pane zvishoma zvavandudzwa munyaya dzezvehupfumi asi izvi hazvina kubatsira vakawnada vari kunonga svosve nemuromo. Mutauriri wevechidiki mubato rinopikisa reMDC Alliance, VaStephen Chuma vatiwo vainge vaine chivimbo chekuti kubviswa kwaVaMugabe kuchaunza matongero matsva asi zvinhu zvatoenda kumawere. Asi vakafasanobata chigaro chemutauriri webato reZanu PF VaMike Bimha vanoti VaMnangagwa vaunza shanduko munyika uye varatidza hutungamiri pakurwisa denda reCovid-19. VaBimba vanoti matambudziko evana veZimbabwe achapera nekuda kwezvirongwa zvebudiriro zviri kuitwa nehurumende itsva kusanganisira kusimudzira zvekurima, maindasitiri nezvimwe. Panyaya yehuori hunonzi nevakawanda hwapfunya chisero munyika, VaBimha vati VaMnangagwa vari mugwara kurwisa dambudziko iri. Izvi zvatsinhirwa neimwe nhengo yeZanu-PF vari mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Citizens Forum VaTaurai Kundishaya vati VaMnangagwa vari kuzadzikisa zvavakavimbisa. Vachigadzwa kuve mutungamiriri wenyika muna 2017, VaMnangagwa vakavimbisa kuunza shanduko kuvana veZimbabwe, kurwisa huori, kuteerera zvinenge zvichidiwa nevanhu munyika, kugadzirisa dambudziko rehurombo, kushaikwa kwemabasa, kugadzirisa zvinhu munyaya dzezvehutano nezvimwewo. Asi vanopikisa vanoti muromo hauzarirwe nerwizi vachiti VaMnangagwa vave kutoita kuti VaMugabe vaite sekunge vaive mutsvena.

headline: Dynamos Yotatsurana neFC Platinum Mumutambo Wakakosha weCastle Premier Soccer League
text: Dyanamos iyo ine gakava mumba mayo iri kutarisirwa kutamba nechikwata chiri kutungamira gungano reCastle Premier Soccer Leagur cheFC Platinum mumutambo wakatarisirwa neveruzhinji munyika neMugovera. Nhengo yeDynamos Supporters Association Muzvare Judith Nyatsanza vanoti vateveri vechikwata ichi vanofanira kubatana vakananga kuZvishavane kuti vanokunda FC Platinum. Chikwata ichi chirikubaka moto nekudzima zvekuti vateveri vavo havasisina chivimbo nechikwata chavo mumitambo mitanhatu yasara. Muongorori wezvemitambo VaDannyboy Muneri vanoti vachitarisa matambiro anga achiita zvikwata izvi Kugona Kunenge Kudada iri kukunda. VaMuneri vanofembera zvibodzwa zvavanofunga kuti FC Platinum inokunda nazvo. Chikwata chiri pachidanho chechitatu Highlanders chiri pamusha neMutare City Rovers apo Caps United iri pamusha zvekare neTsholotsho Pirates. Mutare City Rovers irikusangana ne Ngezi Platinum Stars panguva iyo Triangle ine Chapungu. ZPC Kariba ichatamba neHarare City Chicken Inn ichivhara musangano neNgezi Platinum Stars

headline: America Inobatsira Dzimwe Nyika neMushonga weNhomba yeCovid-19
text: Pamusangano wakaitwa nenyika dzakabudirira dzeG7, nyika idzi dzakazvipira kubatsira dzimwe nyika nenhomba yeCovid-19. Nhomba idzi, pamwe chete nezvakavimbiswa kubva muna Kukadzi 2021, zvichasvitsa rubatsiro rwemushonga rwese urwu pabhirioni remadhora mugore riri kuuya, America ichibatsira nehafu yemushonga iyi. Mugwaro ravakabudisa, vatungamiri venyika dzeG7 vakati chinhu chekutanga chavanoda kuitira dzimwe nyika dzepasi rose kuona kuti mushonga wakanaka uye unoshanda uwanikwe nenyika dziri kubudirira sezvo kubaiwa nhomba kwavanhu vose pasi pano chiri chinhu chakanakira vagari vose pasi pano. Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaJoe Biden, vakafara nekuzvipira kwakabvumiranwa uku, zvikurusei sezvo kwakauya mushure mekutaura kwavo kuti America ichatenga mishonga yePfizer/BioNTech inoita zviuru mazana mashanu kuti ipiwe kunyika dzinoita zana. Sekutaura kwakaita VaBiden, America iri kutenga mushonga wekupa dzimwe nyika unopfuura wakambotengwa nenyika ipi zvayo. VaBiden vakati, “Zviuru mazana mashanu zvemushonga wenhomba uyu zvichatanga kuendeswa kunyika dzakasiyana siyana mumwedzi waNyamavhuvhu gore rino. Zviuru mazana maviri zvemushonga uyu zvichaendeswa kuned zimwe nyika gore rino, uye zviuru mazana matatu zvichaendeswa mumwedzi mitanhatu yekutanga mugore ra2022.” Kuzvipira kweAmerica kubatsira dzimwe nyika nemishonga yenhomba yePfizer inoita zviuru mamirioni mazana mashanu kuri kuwedzerwa pamusoro pe mishonga inoita mamirioni makumi masere akavimbiswa dzimwe nyika naVaJoe Biden, avo vakazvipiravo kubatsira nemari inoita mabhirioni maviri emadhora eku America ekubatsira sangano rinobatsira dzimwe nyika mukuwana mushonga wenhomba. Chivimbiso chakaitwa nenyika dzeG7 chinoratidza kuti kubva muna 2020, nyika dzeG7 dzakazvipira kubatsira dzimwe nyika nemabhirioni maviri emushonga wenhomba. Nyika dzeG7 dzakazvipiravo kubatsira dzimwe nyika mukugadzira mushonga wenhomba munyika dzayo dzichishanda neQuad Vaccine Partnership yeAmerica, Australia, India neJapan. VaBiden vanoti zviri pachena kuti nyika dzeG7 dzinobvumirana kuti zvadzakavimbisa izvi hazvisi izvo zvese zvadzichaita, vachiti kubatsira uku kuchaenderera mberi kwenguva yakareba. No media source currently available

headline: Vaive Vashandi vepaRan Mine kuBindura Voputsirwa Dzimba
text: Vaive vashandi vepaRan Mine pedyo neBindura vanonzi vari kuputsirwa dzimba nekudzingwa pamugodhi wegoridhe uyu zvasiya vakawanda vasina pekugara. Mugodhi uyu waimbocherwa kare nekambani yeGNP Industries yekuGermany kusvika muna 1999 ndokuzombocherwa neExdrill Mining pasati pauyazve kambani yeAurora Gold. Hatina kukwanisa kubata vakuru vepakambani yeAurora nezvekudzingwa kwevanhu ava asi mumwe ataura asingabvumidzwe kutaura nevatori venhau ati vakapihwa mvumo nedare repamusoro rekudzinga vanhu ava. Kanzura Ian Makone veWard 2 kuBindura vati vari kuyedza kubatsira vammwe vashandi vakadzingwa basa ava uye havana kupihwa mari yemudyandigere kunyangwe vakashanda makore akawanda. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Tsiva haina chibhanzi’
text: MUTAMBI wetsiva wechidzimai Kudakwashe ‘Kudah’ Chivandire anoti mutambo uyu hausi kumubhadhara zvachose zvekuti ari kufunga kumbousiya ozama zvimwe zvekuti araramise mhuri yake.   Kudah – uyo anove shasha yeWomen’s International Boxing Association (WIBA) Inter-Continental Champion – achangobva kukunda Iriya Matoga wekuMalawi mumutambo wehushamwari wakaitirwa kuHarare International Centre (HICC) svondo rapera.   Makwishu aya aive ekutsigira mutambo waCharles Manyuchi uyo akakunda Diego Diaz Gallardo wekuArgentina.   “Chokwadi mutambo uyu hapana zvatiri kuwana, tikapinda mukembi chaimo tichigadzirira kuzorwa hapana chatinopihwa uye tinogaramo kwenguva ndefu chaiyo patinobuda tinopihwa tumari tusingatenge. Ipapo unenge une nguva ndefu wasiya mwana wako uyo anenge achida kuchengetwa.   “Ndinombofunga zvekusiya mutambo uyu uye parizvino nditori pakati pekugadzirisa kuti ndiite zvimwe zvinondipa pundutso muhupenyu hwangu.   “Ndinogona kugadzira musoro wangu, saka ndinogona kutanga bhizimisi rekugadzira musoro ndichiwana mari yekuraramisa ini nemhuri yangu. Pandinenge ndisingarwe ndoziva kuti ndine zvandinenge ndichiita zvinenge zvichindipa mari,” anodaro Kudah.   Kubva achitanga kuita zvetsiva, Kudah akwanisa kurwa mitambo mitanhatu ndokuhwina mina uye akakundwa miviri chete.   “Chishuvo changu kuti ndiraramise mwanasikana wangu uyo ane makore maviri ekuberekwa. Pandinoenda kunotamba tsiva ndotarisira kuti ndigodzoka ndine mari chaiyo inotenga yekuti ndigomutengera zvose zvaanoda.   “Asi manje ndanzwa nekuvimbiswa zvinhu zvakawanda asi hapana kana chiri kumbozadzikiswa pazvose,” anodaro Kudah.   Anoti murume wake – uyo anomutsigira zvikuru mumutambo uyu – ndiye anombosara achichengeta mwana wavo apo paanoenda kunotamba tsiva.   “Ndinotenda murume wangu nerutsigiro rwaanondipa, anoziva kuti ndine chido netsiva uye anonditsigira zvikuru,” anodaro.   Zvakadai, nhengo yeZimbabwe Boxing Board of Control, Thomas Kambuyi, anoti nyaya dzekubhadharana mari pakati pevatambi vetsiva nemamaneja avo dzinonetsa kupindira nekuti ivo sesangano havazive zvinenge zvakavimbisana mativi maviri aya.   “Chandingataure ini ndakazvimirira hangu ndechekuti mutambi uyu anofanirwa kugara pasi nemamaneja ake votaurirana kuti vagodzirisana sei zvavainge vakavimbisana. Isu ipapo hatikwanise kupindira sezvo takange tisipo vachiwirirana uye hatizive kuti vakavimbisana zvipi.   “Kutaura chokwadi hupenyu iye zvino hwaoma, mabhizimisi haasi kufamba zvakanaka uye isu vari mune zvemitambo zvakatikakatawo zvakare, mitambo yese iri kuchema kwete tsiva yoga,” anodaro.

headline: Varimi Vachena Vopihwa Imwe Mari yeKubatsirikana neHurumende
text: Hurumende yatanga kupa vamwe varimi vachena vakatorerwa mapurazi mari yekubatsirikana vakamirira kupihwa mari yemuripo wezvivakwa nezvekurimisa zvainge zviri pamapurazi avakatorerwa kutanga muna 2000. Asi varimi ava vari kuchema nerekuti mari yavari kutambiriswa haisisina simba sezvo RTGS riri kushaya simba zuva nezuva zvichienzaniswa nedhora rekuAmerica. Varimi makumi maviri nevasere ndivo vapihwa mari kusvika parizvino pavarimi mazana manomwe nemakumi matatu nevanomwe vari kutarisira kupihwa mari iyi. Murimi mumwe chete ari kupihwa mari inosvika zviuru makumi mashanu nemamashanu kana kuti 55 000 RTGS. Mukuru weCFU VaBen Gilpin vanoti varimi vari kutambira mari asi vari kunetseka nekushaya simba kwayo. No media source currently available

headline: Platform for Youth Development Yorwisa Kuti Mhuri Dzisabviswa kuMunyokowere, kuChipinge
text: Sangano revechidiki rePlatform for Youth Development rinoti rave kushanda nemagweta eZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights mukuedza kumisa kubviswa kwemhuri dzinodarika mazana mashanu dzigere Munyokowere kuChipangayi, mudunhu reChipinge kuManicaland. Mhuri idzi dzinonzi dzakatopiwa tsamba dzekudzizivisa kuti dzinge dzabva panzvimbo iyi mukati memazuva manomwe, kukundikana kwadzo dzinozobviswa nechisimba. Mutungamiri wePlatform for Youth Development, VaClaris Madhuku, vanoti mhuri idzi dzakatambira matsamba aya, ayo anonzi akanyorwa musi wa 27 mwedzi wapera, dzichiziviswa kuti dzinge dzabva munzvimbo iyi panopera zuva nemusi wa 05 mwedzi uno. VaMadhuku vanoti matsamba aya akabva kuhofisi yebazi rezveminda nekugariswa patsva kwevanhu, kunyange hazvo mhuri idzi dzagara panzvimbo iyi kubva muna 1992 padzakagariswa zviri pamutemo nevaive mudzviti wedunhu iri. Vanoti chakaita kuti mhuri idzi dzigariswe panzvimbo iyi chaive chikumbiro chevarimi vachena vaiveko vaida kuti vabatsirwe nemasvikiro kuchenesa nzvimbo yavo., Asi vanoti chiri kunyanya kurwadza mhuri idzi ndechekuti hurumende haina kutanga yagara navo pasi isati yavapa matsamba ekuti vabviswe aya. Vanoti hapana kana hurongwa huripo hwekuti vana vechikoro vachaita sei, uye hapana nzvimbo yavati varatidzwa yekunzi ndiko kwavachaendeswa. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kubazi rezvekurima nekugariswa patsva kwevanhu pamusoro penyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Murwiri weKodzero dzeVanasikana Muzvare Betty Makoni Vobatwa neCovid-19 keChipiri
text: Murwiri wekodzero dzevanasikana uye vakavamba sangano reGirl Child Network muZimbabwe, Muzvare Betty Makoni vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kechipiri gore rino. Vachitaura neStudio 7 vari kuBritain, Muzvare Makoni vati vave kunzwa zviri nani uye vanachiremba vatovapa tsamba yekuratidza kuti vapora. Muzvare Makoni vanoti nyaya yekuti vanomboshanda vachipinda muzvipatara nedzimwe nzvimbo dzine vanhu vakawanda inopa kuti vapindewo munjodzi yekutapurirwa chirwere ichi. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti munhu paanobatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kekutanga anokwanisa kungopedza mwedzi mitatu chete masoja emuviri wake akamudzivirira. Ana chiremba vachiri kuzeya nyaya nyaya dzevanhu vanobatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kaviri sezvo vachiri vashoma. Nyika dzine vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kechipiri dzinosanganirsira America, Britain, Hong Kong, Belgium, the Netherlands ne Ecuador. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Mark Pandori vanova mukuru paNevada State Public Health Laboratory muAmerica vanoti kubatwa nechirwere ichi kechipiri kwevanhu ava munongedzo wekuti kunyangwe ukapora kubva kuCovid-19 unofanira kugara wakazvichengetedza kunyangwe wambopora kubva kuchirwere ichi. Vanokurudzira vanhu kuti vapfeke mamamask, kugeza maoko uye kusangoita magungano. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Inotungamirwa naVaNcube Yozvipira Kuita Mushandira Pamwe Musarudzo dza2018
text: Bato reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaWelshman Ncube rinoti richashanda nemamwe mapato kuitira kuti mubatanidzwa wemapato ukunde Zanu PF musarudzo dza 2018. Bato reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaWelshman Ncube rinoti richashanda nemamwe mapato kuitira kuti mubatanidzwa wemapato ukunde Zanu PF musarudzo dza 2018. Izvi zvabuda pamusangano weNational Council wekupedzesera gore rino waitirwa muHarare. Vachitaura papera musangano uyu, VaNcube vati bato ravo rapa hutungamiriri hwebato iri basa rekutaurirana nemapato ese anopikisa kuitira kuti vaumbe mubatanidzwa sezvo iri iyi nzira yega ingaite kuti vakunde bato riri kutonga reZanu PF. VaNcube vatiwo zviri pachena kuti vanhu vese munyika vari kuda kuti mapato anopikisa abatane musarudzo vakatiwo musangano wavo watambira chisungo cheMDC inotungamiririrwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai pamusangano wayo weNational Council chekuti bato iri rakazvipira kushanda nemamwe mapato mukuumba mubatanidzwa uchakwikwidza Zanu PF. Vati kana izvi zvikabudirira mapato ese anopikisa achamiririrwa nemunhu mumwe chete musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika uye musarudzo dzeparamende mapato aya anenge achimiririrwa nenhengo imwe chete muconstituency yega yega. Vati pane nhaurirano dzavave kutoita nemamwe mapato uye zvinofadza kutipane chido chekubatana kubva kumapato akawanda munyika. Mutevedzeri waVaWelshman Ncube, VaEdwin Mushoriwa, vanotiwo zvimwe zvisungo zvabuda mumusangano wavo ndezvekuti bato iri richaita kongiresi yaro mukutanga kwegore rinoouya. Vatiwo musangano uyu waita chisungo chekuti vanofanira kuramba vachirwira kuti mitemo yesarudzo isandurwe kuti paitwe sarudzo dzakachena. Vatiwo mutemo unofanira kusandurwa kuti kana anenge akunda ogadzwa ipapo vachiti izvi ndizvo zvingadziviririre zviri kutika kuGambia uko mutungamiriri wenyika iyi akakundwa musarudz,o VaYahya Jamme, vari kuramba kubva pachigaro. Vatiwo izvi zvakaitika muZimbabwe muna 2008 apo VaMugabe vakakundwa musarudzo naVaTsvangirai asi vakaramba kubva pachigaro nekuti mapato anopikisa ange asina zano rekuti iota sei kutora masimba. VaNcube vati vanofara chose nezviri kuitwa neAfrican Union, ECOWAS neUnited Nations ku Gambia uye SADC inofanira kuitawo zvimwezvo kana pakaita anoramba kubva pachigaro akundwa muna 2018. Zvichakadai, sachigaro wemadzimai mubato iri AmaiMonica Ngwenya vaudza Studio 7 kuti madzimai akatoita chisungo pamusangano wavo svondo rapera chekuti vanofanira kupinda musarudzo vakawanda muna 2018. Nyanzvi munyaya dzematonmgerwo enyika dzinoti VaMugabe nebato ravo reZanu PF vane hunyanzvi hwekubira sarudzo zvekuti mapato anopikisa haakwanise kuvakunda kana akasabatana. Mapato anopikisa munyika ave kutoshanda akabatana muzvirongwa zvakasiyana siyana zvakaita seCoalition of Democtracts kana kuti Code neNational Electorla Reform Agenda kana kuti NERA. No media source currently available

headline: ‘TAGADZIRIRA LIVERPOOL’. . . tichigara hedu kuStodart: Chipandu
text: MUMAZUVA makumi matanhatu nemana ari kutevera, chikwata chenyika chemutambo wenetball – icho chinozivikanwa nezita rekuti maGems – chichange chotatsurana nedzimwe shasha dzemutambo uyu kuLiverpool, kuEngland.   Nyika gumi nenhanhatu dzichakwikwidza munhandare yeEcho Arena kubva musi wa12 kusvika 21 Chikunguru uye gadziriro dzemutambo mukuru uyu dzasvika kwamvura yacheka makumbo.   Mutungamiriri wesangano reZimbabwe Netball Association, Leticia Chipandu, anoti ari kushushikana nekugunun’una kuri kuita vamwe vatsigiri vemutambo uyu.   Izvi zvinobva pakuti mazuva mashoma adarika, vamwe vatsigiri vakanyunyuta vachiti sei maGems ari kugara kuMbare munguva yegadziriro dzavo?   Gurukota revechidiki, mitambo nezvekutandara, Dr Kirsty Coventry, vakanyorawo padandemutande reTwitter vachiti, “. . . kubva zvandakagara pasi nevatungamiri venetball gore rakapera muna Mbudzi, gadziriro dziri kufamba negwara chairo.   “Takavavimbisa rutsigiro rwuzere maringe neWorld Cup uye nazvino tiri kuvatsigira uye hatisi kuzosanduka.”   Chipandu anoti Hurumende iri kuvatsigira zvizere pagadziriro dzechikwata ichi.   “Hurumende iri kutsigira zvizere chikwata chemaGems mugadziriro dzeWorld Cup yatatarisana nayo munaChikunguru.   “Pari zvino, (Hurumende) yakatobhadhara imwe yemari inodiwa kuti tikwanise kukwikwidza mumitambo iyi.   “Imwe yemari yasara, Hurumende yakavimbisa kuti ichabhadhara zvizere nenguva inodiwa,” anodaro Chipandu.   Pari zvino chikwata ichi chiri kuUganda uko kwachiri kukwikwidzana necheko cheShe Cranes segadziriro dzeWorld Cup.   Chipandu anoti kuburirira kwerwendo urwu kunoratidza kuti Hurumende iri kutsigira zvizere chikwata ichi.   Panyaya yekugara kwemaGems kuMbare, Chipandu anoti Mbare Stodart Netball Complex ine nhoroondo yakakosha kuvatambi.   “Munhandare yeStodart Netball Complex mune hudzamu hurimo kuvatambi venetball, nhoroondo yatinovimba kuti yakatikoshera patiri kugadzirira World Cup.   “Takakokwa kunzi tiuye kuzogara kuBelvedere Technical Teachers’ College nekuZESA Training Grounds asi nzvimbo idzi takati tichazodzishandisa pane dzimwe gadziriro.   “Stodart zvakare ndiyo nzvimbo inozivikanwa nevatsigiri vedu, naizvozvo takaona zvakakosha kuti tigare ikoko kuitira vatsigiri,” anodaro.   MaGems anotarisirwa kusimuka musi wa7 Chikunguru akananga kuEngland.   Mukuenda mhiri kwemwakungwa, Chipandu anoti shuviro yavo ndeyekuti vasikana vose vari makumi maviri vari kuita gadziriro vaende.   Pagadziriro idzi, ndipo pachabviswa gumi nevana vachanotamba kuWorld Cup.   “Tinoda kutakura chikwata chose pakuenda kuEngland.   “Aka ndekekutanga kuti Zimbabwe isvike kuWorld Cup naizvozvo tinoda kuti vatambi vedu vaende vaine zvakakwana zvokunotambisa zvichireva kuti isu tinofanira kutsigirana neHurumende mukutsvaga rubatsiro,” anodaro Chipandu.   Patience Kabanda wekuSports and Recreation Commission anotsinhira kuti gadziriro dzechikwata ichi dziri kufamba negwara kwaro.   Anoti ZINA yakatoendesa magwaro ehurongwa hwayo naizvozvo Hurumende iri mubishi kuti igadzirise zvose zvinodiwa.   “Zvinosuwisa chaizvo kuti vamwe vari kutaura zvakasunama maringe negadziriro idzi, asi zvinova zvisiri izvo zviri kuitika.   “Gadziriro dziri mugwara uye seSRC, tiri kuvatsigira zvizere nekuvapa zvose zvinodiwa.   “Tinovimbisa kuti vasikana vachafamba zvakanaka kunomiririra nyika,” anodaro Kabanda.   Kumutambo weWorld Cup uyu, Zimbabwe yakaiswa muchikwata cheGroup A pamwe chete nenyika dzinoti Australia, Northern Ireland neSri Lanka.   Zimbabwe yakabudirira kupinda mumakwishu aya mushure mekunge yakunda mumitambo yemaAfrican Championships akatambirwa kuZambia muna Gunyana gore rakapera.   Uganda, South Africa neMalawi dzichanokwikwidzawo kuWorld Cup.

headline: MaSpringboks ovimba naEtzebeth
text: wekuSouth Africa, Eben Etzebeth, ari kutarisirwa kutamba mutambo wake wekutanga achitambira nyika yake kubva zvaakapedzisira mwedzi 10 yadarika apo maSpringboks achatamba mumakwikwi eRugby Championship neArgentina kuKing’s Park musi weMugovera.   Murairidzi wemaSpringboks, Rassie Erasmus, akazivisa kuti kaputeni wegore radarika uyu akatenderwa nanachiremba kuti atambe uye anogona kutamba awa rekutanga apo vari kusangana nemaPuma.   Etzebeth akange ambomira kutamba zvichitevera  kukuvara kwaakange aita ruoko rwake uye nemusana.   “Utano hwake ndihwo hune nyaya nekudaro ndosaka tisiri kuzomuona achitamba maminitsi anodarika 60 svondo rino,” Erasmus anodaro.   “Tichangotambira matsamba kubva kunanachiremba vanamazvikokota. Ange achiita gadziriro dzakakwana nesu kubva pakapera mwaka wemaStormers weSuper Rugby, asi tange tichimirira tsamba yeutano hwake chete.   “Ndinoda kutangisa mutambi akaita saye mumutambo uyu pane kumutangisa akagara pabhenji. Kana tikatangisa mumwe mutambi obva akuvara mumaminitsi okutanga, tinochiona chimoto.”   Kudzoka kwaEtzebeth pamwe chete nevamwe vatambi vanosanganisira Wareen Whiteley anotamba paloose-forward nahooker Malcolm Marx kwabatsira kusimbisa chikwata ichi nekuwedzera huwandu hwevatambi vekusarudza.   Chikwata chaErasmus chakakunda England 2-1 pamusha munaChikumi.   “Takakomborerwa kuvatambi vekumberi, nguva yanga yareba tisina vatambi ava pamwe nemahooker chaiyo vakakwana muchikwata. Taive tizere nevepasi chete saka tave kusanganisa vatinavo nevanokwanisa kutisimudzira uye kuhwinisa chikwata chedu,” anodaro Erasmus. — Sportsmail Rugby

headline: Hurumende Yotenda Kuti Vanhu Vave Kufa neKuratidzira kwaVanaChiremba
text: Sangano rinomirira ana chiremba vehurumende avo vari kuramwa mabasa parizvino rinoti munyika mungangosara musina anachiremba zvichitevera kudiwa kuri kuitwa madhokotera nezvipatara zviri kunze kwenyika. Mashoko aya anouya apo hurumnde yave kutenda kuti varwere vari kufa muzvipatara zvehurumende nekuda kwekutaridzira kwavanachiremba vave nemavhiki matatu vachiratidzira. Vachitaura nevatori venhau mu Harare neChina, mutauriri Zimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, VaFrancis Rwodzi, vati kuramwa kwemabasa nana chiremba kucharamba kuchienderera mberi zvichitevera kutadza kuwirirana kuri kuita ana chiremba nehurumende panyaya yekuwedzerwa kwemari dzemihoro. Madhokotera ari kuramwa mabasa anoti anoda kuwedzerwa mari yaari kutambiriswa kubva pamadhora mazana maviri nemakumi masere nemaviri ($282) kusvika pamadhora chiuru nemazana maviri ($1200) asi hurumende inoti homwe yayo yakabooka zvekuti haikwanise kupa ana chiremba ava mari dzavari kuda idzi. Zvichakadai, VaRwodzi vati zvipatara zvekunze kwenyika zvizhinji zvirikukoka ana chiremba vemuZimbabwe kuti vanoshandira kuzvipatara izvi zvavati zvichaita kuti hupenyu huomere veruzhinji. VaRwodzi vati hurumende haina hany’a neraramo yavana chiremba uye vanoti hurumende inokoshesa kupa mari yakawanda kumadzishe asina basa guru raanoita muhupenyu hwevanhu ichisiya kubhadhara madhokotera zvine mwero. Zvichakadaro, munyori mukuru mubazi rezvehutano Dr Gerald Gwinji vanoti vanachiremba vari kuramwa mabasa vanofanira kuti vadzokere kumabasa. Vachitaura nebepanhau reHerald Dr Gwinji vanoti varwere vave kufa muzvipatara zvehurumende nenyaya yekuramwa mabasa kwavanachiremba. Dr Gwinji vanoti zvipatara zvehurumende zvinokwanisawo kudaidza vanachiremba kubva kumauto. Asi vanoti zvakakosha kuti vanachiremba vadzokere kumabasa nhaurirano dzichiitwa. Mashoko aDr Gwinji anoteverawo kurudziro yakapihwa negurukota rezvehutano Dr david Parirenyatwa yekuti vanachiremba vadzokere kumabasa asi hurukuro dzichienderera mberi. Asi mashoko aya anenge akatowedzera peturu mumoto nekuti vanachiremba muzvipatara zvekumatunhu makuru nemadiki vakabva vatangawo kuramwa mabasa. Sangano rakazvimirira reZimbabwe Peace Project raburitsawo mashoko richiti riri kushushikana nekuramwa mabasa kwavanavanachiremba richiti vanhu vave kurasikirwa nehupenyu. Sangano iri riri kuti riri kushushikana nemashoko akabuda mubepanhau reThe Southern Eye Newspaper nezuro ekuti pane varwere vana vakashaya kuMpilo nenyaya yekuramwa mabasa kwavanachiremba. Mune imwewo nyaya, sangano revanotengesa mumigwagwa re National Vendors Union of Zimbabwe, kana kuti Navuz, rinoti harisi kutambira hurongwa hwekanzuru yeHarare hwekuda kubvisa vanotengesa mumigwagwa pakati pedhorobha. Munyori musangano re Navuz, VaSamuel Wadzayi, vati sangano ravo, iro ravati rine nhengo dzinodarika zviuru gumi nezvitatu, riri kushushikana zvikuru nehuruongwa hwekanzuru iyo iri kuda kubvisa vese vanotengesera mumigwagwa mudhorobha. VaWadzayi vati sangano ravo rine nzira dzakawanda dzarichashandisa kurwisana nezviri kurongwa nekanzuru iyo yavati yakaronga kluvadzinga ichishanda pamwechete nemauto. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naMeya we Harare, VaBernard Manyenyeni kana mutauriri wekanzuru VaLeslie Gwindi, kuti tinzwe divi rekanzuru panyaya iyi asi kanzuru inogara ichimhanyisana nevanotengesera mumigwagwa nguva nenguva. Mune imwewo nyaya zvakare, bhodhi resangano rinoshanda rakazvimirira re Crisis in Zimbabwe Coalition rinoti harisi kuzosuduruka pachisungo charo chekuti mutungamiri wesangano iri, VaMcDonald Lewanika, vasiye basa pakupera kwegore panopera nguva yavakasainira kuti vange vari mutungamiri wesangano iri. Sachigaro webhodhi re Crisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaDewa Mavhinga, vakaudza vatori venhau muHarare neChina kuti nyangwe zvazvo panga paine mukana wekunyorerana patsva kuti VaLewanika vapinde muchibvumirano chitsva, bhodhi ravo rakawona zvakakodzera kuti VaLewanika vasiye basa sezvo pane humbowo hwekuti havana kufambisa zvakanaka mari yesangano iri. Zvichakadaro, VaLewanika vanoti vari kuronga musangano mukuru wemasangano ese anove nhengo dze Crisis in Zimbabwe Coalition uchaitwa mwedzi uno uine chinangwa chekuchinja zvakabvumiranwa nebhodhi resangano iri asi VaMavhinga vati musangano uyu hauna zvaunoreva uye vati uri kunze kwemutemo. Mune imwe nyaya nemusi weChina wakare, mapositori gumi neumwechete vakabatwa vaine mhosva yekurova mapurisa nevatori venhau kuBudiriro uye vamwe vavo makumi maviri nevatanhatu vawanikwa vasina mhosva nedare. Vabatwa nemhosva ava vatongerwa kugara mujeri kwemakore mana. Mapurisa nevatori venhau vakarohwa nemapositori aya kuBudiriro mushure mekunge mapositori aya apomerwa mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevana zvinosanganisira kurambidza vana kuenda kuchikoro.

headline: Amai Makarau Vobvuma Kuti Chirongwa cheBVR Chine Zvinetswa
text: Sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, Amai Rita Makarau, vanoti matambudziko ari kusangana nevanhu vari kuvhota vange vakaatarisira sezvo chirongwa chavo chekunyoresa vavhoti chichiri kutanga. ZEC yakatanga kunyoresa vanhu kuvhota nemusi weMuvhuro kunyange hazvo vamwe vari kuchema chema kuti havana ruzivo rwakakwana nezvechirongwa ichi. Mimwe michina inonzi yange ichimboramba kushanda zvakanaka kumatunhu makumi matanhatu nematatu munyika yose. Amai Makarau vasimbisawo kuti vanhu vanokwanisa kunyoresa nezvitupa zvesimbi uye vanofanira kuuya netsamba dzinoratidza kwavanogara kuti vakwanise kukurumidza kunyoreswa. ZEC inoti inotarisira kuti muchina mumwe chete unge uchinyoresa vanhu makumi masere pazuva. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vabatwa neCoronavirus muHarare Voda Kusvika paZana
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muHarare chete hwasvika pamakumi mapfumbamwe nemasere kana kuti 98 apo bazi rezvehutano rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus munyika yose hwasvika pamazana maviri nemakumi manomwe nemapfumamwe kana kuti 279. Vanhu vafa vachiri vana uye vapora vave makumi matatu nevatatu kana kuti 33. Vanhu gumi nevana vakabatwa nechirwere ichi neMugovera vose vakadzoka kubva kuSouth Africa. Harare ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi, ichiteverwa neMatabeleland South ne Masvingo. Nyazvi munyaya dzezvehutano dziri kuyambirawo kuti munzvimbo dzinochengeterwa vanenge vadzoka kubva kunze kwenyika zvikuru vanouya nemabhazi hadzina kushambidzika uye kune huori hunotyisa vamwe vachinzi vabhadhare mari yechiokomuhomwe vasati vabuditswa kana kuti kuvhenekwa. Munyori mubazi rezvehutano VaNick Mangwana vachinyora padandemutande ravo vakatenda kune munhu akadzingwa basa paBelvedere Teachers College nenyaya yehuori uye inyaya yavanoda kuferefeta. Mutungamiri wesangano reCommunity Working Group on Health VaItai Rusike vanoti hurumende inofanira kuona kuti munzvimbo dziri kugara vanhu vanenge vadzoka kubva kune dzimwe nyika kana kuti maqurantine centres dzive dzine hutsanana kuti chirwere ichi chisapararire. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika zviuru zana nemakumi masere nemana nematanhatu kana kuti 184, 000 vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muAfrica. Vashaya vadarika zviuru zvishanu nemakumi manomwe nemumwe kuti 5,071. Vapora vanodarika zviuru makumi manomwe nemasere kana kuti 81,000. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni matanhatu nezviuru zvipfumbamwe kana kuti kuti 6,9 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika zviuru mazana mana kana kuti 400,000. Vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni matatu kana kuti 3 million. No media source currently available

headline: Chikwata chakasimba: Mapeza
text: MURAIRIDZI wemaWarriors — Norman Mapeza — anoti chikwata chake chiri kufanirwa kurwa semvumba musi weMugovera apo chiri kusangana neGhana mumutambo wemuGroup G wekurwira kuenda kumakwikwi eQatar 2022 World Cup gore rinotevera.   MaWarriors anotofanirwa kuhwina mutambo uyu kuti arambe ane mukana wekubudirira kuenda kuQatar sezvo kusvika pari zvino angokwanisa kuwana chibodzwa chimwechete kubva mumitambo miviri yaatamba.   Mumutambo wavo wekutanga, Warriors akaita mangange 0-0 neSouth Africa ndokuzokundwa wechipiri neEthopia unove mutambo uyo wakazoona sangano rinotungamira nhabvu reZifa richidzinga basa Zdravko “Loga” Logarusic aive murairidzi wechikwata ichi.   Zvichitevera kugadzwa kwakaitwa Mapeza kuti atsive Loga, Mapeza anoti chiremerera chikuru chaakapihwa kurairidza nyika yake nekudaro zvakakosha kuti varwe vamire. Achitaura nemusi weChipiri vasati vasimuka vakananga kuGhana, Mapeza akati zvakakosha kuti vagowana zvibodzwa zvizere kuAccra.   “Munhabvu, nguva dzose tinotambira kuhwina saka tiri kufanira kubata basa sebasa kuGhana nekuti nyika iri kutarisira zvikuru kubva kwatiri.   “Mutambo uyu wakatikoshera saka tichazama nepatinokwanisa kuunza zvibodzwa zvose nekuti tinoziva kuti hapana asingade kuhwina. Isu tinototamba mitambo yedu tichida kuhwina,” anodaro Mapeza.   Apo maWarriors ari kusangana neGhana kuAccra, achange ane vatambi vanotambira kuEngland vanoti Marvelous Nakamba weAston Villa, Jordan Zemura weAFC Bournemouth naTendayi Darikwa weWigan Athletic avo vakambokundikana kuuya kuzotamba mitambo yeSouth Africa neEthopia nekuda kwekuti Zimbabwe yakaiswa muboka rered list renyika dzinonzi dzine vanhu vakawanda vane chirwere cheCovid-19.   Vatambi ava vachangokwanisa kutamba mutambo wekuGhana chete asi havazokwanise kuzouya kuzotamba wemuno uyo uchasangana maWarriors neThe Black Stars svondo rinotevera musi weChipiri.   “Zvinofadza kuti kuGhana tichange tine chikwata chakasimba, tiine vatambi vedu vose saka tinofanira kubata basa sebasa. Mitambo yadarika, tange tichitamba takashota tisina vamwe vatambi vedu, apa tichange tinavo kuGhana uko tinofanirwa kubva nezvibodzwa.   “Mumutambo wekunoku ndiwo vatambi vekuEngland vasiri kutenderwa kuuya, asi zvakangonakawo nekuti iyo Ghana ine vayo vatambi vanotambira kuEngland vachatadzawo kuuya kuno,” anodaro Mapeza.   Apo maWarriors achatatsurana nemaBlack Stars, achange achishuvira kuti mutambo weSouth Africa neEthopia ugopera ari mangange kuitira kuti mukana wavo wekuenda kuQatar urambe uripo.

headline: Vashandi veHurumende Voramba Kufanotambira Zana reMadhora, Voronga Kuramwa Mabasa
text: Mamwe masangano evashandi vehurumende atobuda pachena kare kuti nhengo dzawo hadzisi kuzotambira zana remadhora rinonzi nehurumende ichapa kuvashandi vayo nemusi weChishanu svondo rino kuti vawane chekufanoshandisa pavanenge vakamirira mihoro yavo yaChikumi, iyo ichauya mwedzi. Mutungamiri wesangano reProfessional Educators Union of Zimbabwe, VaWilson Makanyaire vanoti sangano ravo rimwe remasangano ane nhengo dzaramba kutambira mari iyi, vachiti ichi chituko chaicho kuvarairidzi. “Nhasi musangano wataita kuMarondera wekunzwa pfungwa dzevarairidzi unoratidza kuti havasi kuzotambira mari iyi. Varairidzi vari kuti kana hurumende ichida kutipa mari ngaitipe mihoro yedu yese yakakwana mwedzi uno,” VaMakanyaire vanodaro. Vanoti sangano ravo rasunga kuti varairidzi vapinde mukuramwa mabasa kana vasina kutambira mihoro yavo panosvika musi wa 1 Chikunguru. “Zvatiri kukumbira kuvarairidzi ndezvekuti zvisineyi kuti uri wesangano ripi, ngatibataneyi maoko tipinde mukuratidzira, tipinde mukuramwa mabasa nekuti ndiwo mutauro unoteererwa nemushandirwi,” vanodaro VaMakanyaire. No media source currently available Iri danho ratsigirwa nerimwe sangano revarairidzi, reProgressive Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, iro rinoti nhengo dzaro dzarambawo kutambira hurongwa hwehurumende uhwu. Mutungamiri wesangano iri VaTakavafira Zhou vanoti zana remadhora iri imari isina zvainovabatsira sezvo ichiperera kumabhanga. “Varairidzi vane zvikwereti kumabhanga saka mari iyi inobva yangobatwa ikoko isati yasvika kwavari. Kana vakaitambira mari yacho vachienda kumabasa, ko mhuri dzavo dzinosara dzichidyeyi?” VaZhou vanobvunza. VaZhou vanoti nhengo dzavo hadzisi kuzoenda kumabasa kubva musi wa 1 mwedzi unouya kusvika dzapiwa mihoro yadzo yakakwana. Vanoti vari kukurudzira vashandi vose vehurumende kuti vaende kumusangano wevashandi uchaitwa muHarare neMugovera, apo pachapiwa mukana vose vanoda kutaura zvavanofunga. No media source currently available Sangano reRural Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe rakaudzawo Studio 7 kare kuti harisi kuzotambira zana remadhora iri, sezvo zvichiratidza pachena kuti hurumende haina hany’a nevashandi vayo. Munyori mukuru weRural Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, VasRobson Chere vakati nhengo dzavo dzichatora matanho ekuramwa mabasa kana dzisina kupiwa mihoro yadzo yaChikumi muna Chikumi, kwete muna Chikunguru sezviri kurongwa nehurumende. Ukuwo sangano reZimbabwe Teachers Association, Zimta rakaudzawo bepanhau reHerald kuti kunyange richiri kunzwa pfungwa dzenhengo dzaro pamusoro penyaya iyi, varairidzi vari kudya magaka mambishi sezvo vari kuramba kutambira mari isina kwainovasvitsa.

headline: America Yobatsira Zimbabwe Kuti VanaChiremba naVanaMukoti Vasatapurirwe Zvirwere
text: Hurumende dzeAmerica neZimbabwe nemusi wenhasi dzakaparura chirongwa chemakore mashanu icho chakanangana nekudzivirira vanachiremba navanamukoti kuti vasatapurirwe chirwere cherurindi kana kuti TB. Chirongwa ichi chiri kuitwa nebazi rezvehutano nekuchegetedzwa zvakanaka kweavana nemamwe masangano akaita seveThe Union, Biomedical Research and Training Institute chiri kutsigirwa neveCenters for Disease Control vekuAmerica zvichiburikitsa nemari inopihwa nemutungamiriri wenyika yeAmerica pachirongwa chake chekurwisana neHIV chePresident’s Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief kana kuti PEPFAR. Vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru weCDC muZimbabwe Amai Laurie Fuller vati vari kutsigira chirongwa ichi nekuti vashandi vezvehutano vakakosha uye zvakawonekwa kuti hapana change chiri kuitwa kuvadzviriri kubva kuchirwere cherurindi kana kuti TB. Amai Fuller vanoti vachashandisa miriyoni yemadhora nechidimbu pachirongwa ichi mugore rekutanga. Vange vakamirira munyori mubazi rezvehutano pachiitiko chanhasi, Dr Angela Mushavi vanoti chirongwa ichi chakakosha chose kuvashandi vezvehutano munyika. Vanoti vashandi vehutano vari padambudziko rekutapurirwa zvirwere vari pababsa uye chirongwa ichi chichaita kuti vagare vachiongororwa nguva nenguva. Mukuru wesangano reThe Union iro rine hunyanzvi mukurwisana nechirwere cherurindi, Dr Christopher Zishiri vaudza Studio 7 kuti sangano ravo richabatsira nehunyanzi hwaro mukuronga chirongwa chekudzidzisa vanachiremba navanamukoti kuti vakangazvidzivirire sei kubva kuTB. Vanoti chirongwa ichi chakakosha chose nekuti hapana ange ari kutarisa vanachiremba navanamukoti pamwe nekuona kuti vazvidzivirira here kubva kuTB. Chirongwa ichi chinotarisirwa kuitwa muzvipatara nemumakirinika munyika yose. Zimbabwe ndeimwe yenyika gumi neina dzinevanhu vakawanda vanotapurirwa chirwere cherurindi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti zvikamu makumi manomwe kubva muzana zvevanhu vane chirwere cherurindi vanenge vaine hutachiwana hweHIV/AIDS kozotiwo vanhu vazhinji vane HIV/AIDS vanofa neTB. No media source currently available

headline: Vakarwa Hondo Vanoti Vari kuBatwa neSeri kweRuoko neHurumende
text: Vamwe vevakarwa hondo yerusunguko vanoti vari kusiiwa muzvirongwa zvakawanda zviri kuitwa nehurumende nepamusana pekuti vanotsigira mapato ezvematongerwo enyika anopikisana ne Zanu PF. Makore makumi matatu nemashanu Zimbabwe yawana kuzvitonga kuzere kubva kuhutongi hwevachena, vamwe vevakarwa muhondo yerusunguko iyi vanoti havasi kufara kuti havana chinobatika chavari kupihwa nehurumende. Mumwe wevanhu ava ndiVaJim Mbewe avo vanoti vari kufara zvikuru kuti hurumende yakazowumba bazi rakazvimiririra rinowona nezvevakarwa muhondo yeChimurenga. Asi VaMbewe kunyange hazvo vachifara nekuwumbwa kwebazi iri kwakaitwa nehurumende yaVa Robert Mugabe, varikurwadziwa nenyaya yekuti vakarwa hondo vazhinji vachiri kunonga svosve nemuromo. Mumwe wevakarwa hondo, VaJohannes Mbeko, vakatsigira zvakataurwa naVa Mbewe. VaMbeko vanoti vanotenda kuti hurumende yakazadzisa zvakatarwa nebumbiro idzva remitemo pakuremekedzwa kwevakarwa muhondo yeChimurenga kubudukidza nekuwumba kwayakaita bazi iri asi vanoti vari kutyira kuti vazhinji vavo vasiri muZanu PF hapana chavachawana sezvo bazi iri rakabuda pachena kuti ririkususukidza zvido zveZanu PF pamberi. Mutauriri weMDCT, VaObert Gutu, vanoti kunyange hazvo bumbiro idzva remitemo yenyika richicherechedza vakarwa muhondo, kubatwa kuri kuitwa vanhu ava nehurumende kunotopisa tsitsi. VaGutu, avo vanoti vakange vari mujibha munguva yehondo, ndeumwe weavo vakanyimwa minda pasi pechirongwa chekugovera ivhu kuvatema icho chakatangwa nehurumende yeZanu PF muna 2000 nepamusana pekuti inhengo yebato rinopikisa. Zvichakadaro, sachigaro wesangano ranaMujibha nana Chimbwido re Zimbabwe National Liberation War Collaborators Association, Amai Josephine Gandiya, vanoti parizvino sangano ravo riri kufara nemabatirwo arikuitwa nyaya dzevakarwa hondo yerusunguko nehurumende. Asi Amai Gandiya vanoti zvose zvichaitwa nebazi rinowona nezvevakarwa hondo zvinofanira kuitwa pasingatariswe kuti munhu anotsigira bato ripi rezvematongerwo enyika. Nekune rumwe rutivi, sangano revana vevarwi vehondo yerusununguko re Children of Zimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans’ Association rinoti kutatsurana kuri kuitwa muZanu PF panyaya dzekuti achatora matomhu kana VaMugabe vachinge vabva pachigaro ndiyani kwanhanhirawo kuvarwi vehondo yeChimurenga. Mutungamiri wesangano iri, VaInnocent Mhlanga vari kupomera chikwata cheZanu PF chiri kudaidzwa kuti Generation 40 kana kuti G40 mhosva yekusabata varwi vehondo zvakanaka. Chikwata che Generation 40 kana kuti G40 chinonzi chine vezvematongerwo enyika vechidiki vakawanda muZanu PF avo vanonzi vari kutsigira mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, kuti vagotora matomhu kana murume wavo abva pachigaro. Amai Mugabe vakambotaura pavaiatsvaga rutsigiro pamberi pekongiresi yeZanu PF yakaitwa muna Zvita wegore rapera kuti vaidawo chigaro chiri pamusoro pechehunyori muboka remadzimai re Women’s League chavainacho pari zvino asi vakazoti havanei nechigaro chemutungamiri wenyika avo vavanoti vanogona kutonga vagere pa wheelchair nepamusanana pekukura kwavaita. VaMhlanga vanoti vakarwa muhondo yerusununguko vanofanira kuremekedzwa zvisinei nenyaya dzekurwirana masimba kuri kuitwa mu Zanu PF. Zvisinei, munyori mubazi rinowona nezvevarwi vehondo, Retired Brigadier General Asher Walter Tapfumanei vanoti bazi ravo rakawumbwa pachitevedzwa mutemo nokudaro zvose zvinoitwa nebazi iri zviri pamutemo. VaTapfumanei vanoti hapana kusarura kunoitwa nebazi racho kuti anobatsirwa ndiyani vachiti vakarwa muhondo yerusunguko vane kodzero dzekusarudza kutsigira kana kusatsigira chero ripi bato zvaro munyika. Kunyange hazvo nguva yareba nyika yawana kuzvotonga kuzere, varwi vehondo yeChimurenga vazhinji varikungoramba vachingunun’una nemabatatirwo avari kuitwa nehurumende. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti vakarwa hondo yerusunguko havafanire kungochema vachiti vakambopihwa mari yakawanda yemudyandigere uye vakawanawo mapurazi. No media source currently available

headline: Shaya, ini naPeter tisu toga: Chunga
text: SHASHA yakambonetsa munhabvu – Moses “Bambo” Chunga – anoti mushakabvu George “Mastermind” Shaya aive shasha uye aiyevedza kuona achitamba mutambo uyu zvekuti hakuna mumwezve ati asvika padanho rake.   Bambo anoti Shaya akasiya amutambidza “chimuti” chekutamba nhabvu iyewo ndokuzotambidza Peter Ndlovu. “Ukaona munhu wasvika pakupihwa zita rekuti Mastermind unenge uri padanho rekumberi kudarika vamwe vose. Mudhara ange ari kuseri kudarika vamwe vose.   “Tarasikirwa zvikuru,” anodaro Chunga.   Anoti pavatambi vose vakatamba nhabvu muZimbabwe, hakuna anosvika panaShaya.                               Peter Ndlovu   Anoti Shaya paakasendeka shangu dzake dzenhabvu, akabva atambidza “chimuti” chehunyanzvi kwaari icho akazopawo kunaPeter Ndlovu.   “Munyika muno pakutamba nhabvu, Shaya ndiye ari pamusoro kotevera ini waakapa chimuti, kuchizoti Peter Ndlovu. Hakuna mumwe ati asvika padanho redu tiri vatatu,” anodaro Bambo.   Anoti mukukura kwake, akadzidza zvakawanda kubva kunaShaya uyo waanoti aive nerudo rukuru.   “Mudhara aive nerudo rukuru. Ndakadzidza zvakawanda kubva kwaari, asi chikuru rudo rwaairatidza kwandiri nevamwe vatambi.      Moses Chunga    “Aida chaizvo kutiona tichisvika kure nemutambo uyu saka aitikurudzira kuti tishande nesimba. Ndakaterera mashoko ake ndikasvika kure nenhabvu,” anodaro Chunga.   Shaya ari kutarisirwa kuvigwa mangwana Muguvoera kumarinda eWarren Hills, muHarare uye Hurumende ndiyo iri kubatsira pakurufu nekuvigwa kwake.

headline: Crisis in Zimbabwe Coalition Inoti SADC neAU Ngadzizeye Nyaya yeKusagadzikana muZimbabwe neMozambique
text: Sangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition rinoti richayedza kuita hurukuro nevamiriri vedzimwe nyika vemuSADC kuti vakurudzire vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica kuti vazeye matambudziko akatarisana neZimbabwe neMozambique arinoti anogona kukonzera matambudziko kunyika dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica. Izvi zvakabuda pamisangano yakaitwa nesangano iri kuMozambique yakapetwa nemusi weMugovera. Crisis in Zimbabwe yakaita misangano nebato riri kutonga reFrelimo, vemakereke nevemasangano akazvimirira oga. Kunyangwe hazvo sangano iri riri kuti muZimbabwe hamuna kugadzikana munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, bato riri kutonga reZanu-PF rinoti munyika hamuna matambudziko uye rakatoramba kutambira vanamutongi gava kubva kuSouth Africa. Asi vebato guru rinopikisa reMDC Alliance vanoti munyika mapindwa naPongwe. Mutauriri weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition VaMarvelous Khumalo vanoti hondo iri kuMozambique pakati pehumende nevanopfurikidza mwero vanotsigira chikwata cheIslamic State uye kusagadzikana munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika muZimbabwe kunofanira kuzeyiwa kumisangano yeSADC neAfrican Union. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi dzeHutano Dzoshushikana neKushomeka kweVanhu Vari Kubaiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Nyanzvi dzezvehutano dzinoti dziri kushushikana zvikuru nekushomeka kwevanhu vari kuzvipira kubaiwa nhomba yekudzvirira Covid-19 kunyange hazvo pave nezvirongwa zviviri zviri kufambiswa nguva imwe chete zvinoti Phase 1 ne Phase 2. Nemusi weChina vanhu vanokwana mazana matatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevashanu, kana kuti 395, ndivo chete vakazvipira kubaiwa nhomba iyi, kuchitiwo nemusi weChitatu vanhu makumi mashanu nevanomwe, 57, ndivo bedzi vakabaiwa nyika yose. Huwandu hwevanhu vabaiwa nhomba kubva patanga chirongwa ichi hwakasvika pazviuru makumi mana nevaviri, kana kuti 40 002. Phase 1 yakanangana nekubayiwa kwevashandi vari mune zvehutano, mapurisa nemauto pamwe nevanoshanda kumiganhu yenyika, kuchitiwo Phase 2 ichinanganawo nekubayiwa kwevarairidzi, vashandi vemumahotera, vemakereke, pamwe nevakwegura. Vashandi vezvehutano ndevamwe vanonzi havasi kuzvipira kubaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 yeSinoPharm yakabva kuChina iyi. Hurumende yakazivisa kuti ine tarisiro yekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi senzira yekudzivirira kutapuriranwa kwehutachiwana. Asi mukuru weCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti kana pakasave nedzidziso yakasimba chikamu chepiri chePhase chinogona zvakare kuita sechikamu chekutanga kushaya vanhu vanozvipira kunobayiwa. VaRusike vanoti havaone hurumende ichisvika pamamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana zvevana veZimbabwe, zvainotarisira kuti zvichabaiwa nhomba iyi nyika yose kunze kwekunge yashanda zvakasimba nemasangano evashandi mukushambadza nhomba iyi kuti itambirike muvanhu. Asi mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvirongwa zvekubaya vanhu nhomba zviri kufamba hazvo zvakanaka, uye vakaparurawo zvirongwa zvekukwezva veruzhinji kuti vabaiwe nhomba iyi, izvo zvave kuitawo kuti vashandi vari muboka rezvehutano vakawanda vatambire nhomba iyi. No media source currently available

headline: PTUZ Inoti Varairidzi Vachenge Vachishanda Zuva Rimwe Chete paSvondo
text: Sangano rinomiririra varairidzi, reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe (PTUZ), rinoti mari yakapiwa vashandi vehurumende senzira yekuvabatsira, yakatopera isati yatambirwa mushure mekunge hurumende yakwidza mutengo wemafuta ekufambisa dzimotikari. Mutungamiri wesangano iri, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vaudza Studio7 kuti varairidzi vari musangano ravo vachange vachingoshanda zuva rimwe chete, reMuvhuro, pasvondo kusvika nyaya yemihoro yevarairidzi yagadziriswa. Doctor Zhou vashora gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavhima, pamwe chete negurukota rinoona nezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, vachiti havasi kumboteerera zviri kutaurwa nevashandi. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata makurukota aya kuti tinzwe divi ravo. No media source currently available

headline: Mutemo Unorambidza Vanhu Kufambafamba Wotadzisa Vanorarama neHIV/Aids Kuwana Mishonga Yavo
text: Rimwe sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, rinoti vamwe vanorarama nehutachiwana hweHIV vagere kumaruwa ari kure vari kukundikana kuenda kunzvimbo dzehutano dzavanositorera mishonga yavo yemaARVs. Mukuru wesangano reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu, vanoti vanhu vanodarika mazana mashanu ezviuru vanorarama nehutachiwana hweHIV/Aids vari vari kumaruwa vari kukundikana kuwana chekufambisa kuti vanotora mishonga yavo panguva ino yekurambidzwa kufamba kwevanhu senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweCoronavirus. VaMaguwu vanoti izvi zviri kukonzerwa nemutemo wakadzikwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, unorambidza vanhu kufambafamba kwemazuva makumi maviri nerimwe, senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiwana hwe coronavirus. Vanoti matunhu avawana nyunyuto iyi anosanganisira reMutasa kuManicaland pamwe neHwange kuMatabeleland North. VaMaguwu vanoti mabhazi ari kubvumidzwa kufamba chete munguva yemushanda kwemutemo wekurambidza vanhu kufambafamba ndeehurumende eZUPCO, ayo vanoti haasvike kunzvimbo dzakawanda dzine vanhu vane matambudziko ava. Sangano reNational Aids Council rakazivisa svondo rapera kuti riri kukurudzira vanorarama nehutachiwana vose kuti vange vaine mishonga yemwedzi mitatu munguva ino yekusafamba kwevanhu kuitira kuti vange vakazvidzivirira zvakakwana. VaMaguwu vanoti sesangano, vanoona sekuti hurumende yaifanirwa kushanda nemasangano akazvimirira oga, uyewo kuti iendese mishonga iyi munzvimbo dziri kumaruwa idzi dzakaita sezvikoro nemakiriniki kuitira kuti vanhu ava vakwanise kuwana mishonga yavo pedyo. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzokurudzira Hurumende Kuti Igadzirise Dambudziko reMari Munyika
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kuyambira hurumende kuti ikasarovanisa misoro nevashandi nevashandirwi, Zimbabwe ichadzokera kumakore ekuma 2007 uko mitengo yezvinhu yaikwira katatu pazuva. Nemusi weMuvhuro, Zimbabwe National Statistics Agency kana kuti Zimstats yakazivisa kuti inflation yemunyika yakwira kusvika pazvikamu makumi matatu nechiga chimwe kubva muzana kana kuti 31.01% kubva pazvikamu makumi maviri nezviga makumi masere nemashanu kubva muzana kana kuti 20,85%. Aka ndekekutanga mitengo yezvinhu ichikwira zvakadai mukati memakore gumi. Zimstats inoti mitengo yezvinhu zvakaita sechingwa, zvinwiwa nehembe ndizvo zvapa kuti mitengo yezvinhu ikwire. Kukwira kwemitengo uku kuri kupesana zvikuru nemashoko egurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, avo vainge vati inflation mukupera kwegore yaizopera iri pazvikamu makumi maviri nemashanu kubva muzana kana kuti 25%. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi muAmerica ichidzidzisa paJohns Hopkins University, Muzvinafundo Steve Hanke, vanoti inflation yemuZimbabwe yakatodarika zana kare kare uye yananga kumakore ekuma2008 apo vanhu vakaomerwa nehupenyu zvisina mukare akamboona. Vaimbova gurukota rezvemari, Doctorr Simba Makoni, vanoti zvainge zviri pachena kuti inflation ichakwira zvakanyanya nenyaya yemashandisirwo ari kuitwa mari munyika zvikuru kuda kuenzanisa dhora rekuAmerica nemari yemaRTGS nemabond. Mashoko aya anotsinhirwao nenyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Dr Godfrey Kanyenze. Munyori mukuru musangano reZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti vashandi vakaomerwa zvakanyanya sezvo zvinhu zvaramba zvichiita chamurambamhuru. Ko zviri kunzi naVaNcube vakwanisa kuisa mari parutivi inosvika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemapfumbamwe emadhora mukushanda kwavo? Vachipindura, Dr Makoni vati chiri kunetsera hurumende inyaya yekungoita gudziramukanwa. Kugadzirisa dambudziko iri, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kukurudzira mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, kuti vasiyane nemari dzebond notes nemaRTGs uye kumutsiridza nyaya dzekurima kuti nyika isarasikirwe nemari yekunze. Vamwe vari kukurudzirawo kuti hurumende igadzirise hukama hwayo nedzimwe nyika kunyanya America nenyika dziri muEU kuti isabatwe seyakageza negoka munyama. No media source currently available

headline: America Inoti VaMnangagwa Vakaita Sarudzo Dzakachena Vachabvisirwa Zvirango
text: Senator Chris Coons vebato remaDemocrats vachimiririra Delaware muAmerica vanoti kana mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakazadzikisa chivimbiso chavo chekuita sarudzo dzakachena ivo nevamwe vebato riri kutonga remaRepublicans vachashanda zvakasimba kuona kuti zvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru vehurumende zvabviswa. VaCoons vakashanya kuZimbabwe mavhiki apera asi vanoti kunyangwe hurumende yakavimbisa kuvandudza zvinhu kuti paitwe sarudzo dzakachena, zviri pachena kuti hurumende yave kudya manonoko uye sarudzo dzave kuswedera. Mapato anopikisa uye masangano akazvimirira anoti pane zvakawanda zvinoda kuvandudzwa. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu muZimbabwe Vopa Pfungwa Dzavo neKukunda kwaVaTrump muSarudzo dzekuAmerica
text: Kukunda kwaVaDonald Trump musarudzo dzekuAmerica kwatambirwa zvakasiyana siyana muZimbabwe. Vamwe vanoti vange vachida kuti Amai Hillary Clinton vakunde asi vamwe vanoti kukunda kwaVaTrump kuchaunzwa pfungwa dzitsva dzehutongo munyika iyi. VaTrump vebato remaRepublicans vakakwanisa kuzvika mavhoti mazana maviri nemakumi masere nemapfumbamwe ukowo Amai Hillary Clinto vebato remaRepublicans vaine mavhoti mazana maviri ane gumi nemasere. MuAmerica dunhu roga roga rinenge riine mavhoti anonzi Electoral College zvichienderana nehuwandu hwevanhu vanenge vari mudunhu racho. Munhu anotanga kusvika mavhoti mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe ndiye anenge akunda musarudzo. VaTawanda Karombo ndeumwe wevange vachitsigira vaTrump uye vange vaine mufaro mukuru. VaKarombo vati Amai Clinton vange vabata mabasa akawanda ehutungamiriri saka havana chitsva chavaizounza mukutungamirira America. VaOstallos Siziba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu uye vachiita zvidzidzo zveInternational Relations kuUniversity of Zimbabwe vati kukunda kwaVaTrump chinofanirwa kuve chidzidzo kuvatungamiriri vemuAfrica kuti sarudzo dzinofanirwa kuve dzejekerere. VaElijah Mutemeri vekuZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyangwe zvazvo vange vachida kuti Amai Clinton vakunde, vati semunhu anoda hutongo rwejekerere vanogutsikana nezvadiwa nevagari vekuAmerica. Vatiwo vane chivimbo chekuti VaTrump havazosiyi Africa ichitambura. Amai Charity Mandishona vaudza Studio 7 kuti vabatikana zvikuru nekukunda kwaVaTrump vakati vange vasingadi VaTrump nekuti vanofunga kuti vane rusaruraganda. Amai Lorraine Sibanda vanotungamirira sangano reZimbabwe Chamber of Informal Economy Associations vati kukundwa kwaAmai Clinton kunoratidza kuti handinyore kuti vanhukadzi vawane zvigaro zvepamusororo. VaWisborn Malaya vataurawo neStudio 7 vati vakabatira hura mumaoko kuti VaTrump vachaenderera mberi nekuzadzikisa zvavaitaura zvinosanganisira kusada vanhu vanobva kune dzimwe nyika uye kutaririra vanhukadzi pasi Asi VaAlois Mutizira imwe nyanzvi munezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika vati havaoni kudyidzana kweAmerica nedzimwe nyika kuchichinja nekukunda kwaVaTrump. VaTapiwa Mashakada munyori mukuru munyaya dzehupfumi mubato reMDC vashorawo VaTrump vakati vakatyityidzira vavhoti nekuti vacharamba zvinenge zvabuda musarudzo kana vachinge vakundwa. No media source currently available

headline: Mitengo yeZvinhu Inokwira Izvo Zvoomesera Vakawanda
text: Mitengo yezvinhu munyika inonzi iri kuramba ichikwira izvo zviri kusiya vanhu vakawanda vari parumana nzombe. Gwaro rakaburitswa neZimbabwe National Statistics Agency, Zimstat, rinoratidza kuti mitengo yezvinhu yakakwira nezvikamu zviri pakati, zvinosvika 0,21 kubva muzana kubva mumwedzi waKurume wegore rapera kusvika Kurume wegore rino. Imwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vachishanda nesangno reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti zvinhu zvinogona kunge zvakaita kuti mitengo ikwire zvinosanganisira mafuta ekufambisa. Doctor Chitambara vanotiwo imwe nyaya inogona kunge iri yekuparurwa kwakaitwa mari yerudzi rwema bond note nehurumende, izvo zvakaita kuti mari iwande mumisika. Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zveupfumi dzinotiwo kudzikwa kwemutengo weStatutory Instrument 64, uyo unorambidza kupinzwa munyika kwezvigadzirwa zvekunze kunogona kunge kuine chekuita nekukwira kwemitengo uku. Zvekudya zvakaita semafuta ekubikisa zvinonzi ndizvo zvazara muzvitoro zvemunyika, asi mafuta anobva kunze achiri kuwanikwa mumisika mitema sezvo achiri kupinzwa munyika zviri kunze kwemutemo. Mitengo yezvinhu inonzi yakakwira kekutanga mukati memwedzi makumi maviri nemipfumbamwe mushure mekunge yadzikira zvakanyanya kutanga muna Kukadzi wegore ra2014. Izvi zvakaita kuti zvinhu zvigare muzvitoro zvisina anotenga sezvo mari yaitenderera munyika yaive shoma, kana kuti deflation. No media source currently available

headline: Zvizvarwa zve Zimbabwe Zvoratidzira Kutsigira Mauto eZimbabwe
text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muWashington DC nematunhu akapoteredza zvakaungana neMugovera pamuzinda weZimbabwe uri mu Washington DC zvichitsigira zviitiko zviri kuitika kumusha, zvichitevera kupindira kwemauto mune zvematongerwo enyika, uye kumanikidzwa kwaVaMugabe nebato ravo re Zanu PF, kuti vasiye chigaro, izvo zviri kutsigirwawo neveruzhinji. Mumwe wevakaronga kufora uku, Muzvare Shingi Mangwiro, vanoti vashamiswa nekubuda kwakaita zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe, kunyange hazvo kwaitonhora zvekukwidza hamba mumuti. No media source currently available Ukuwo zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinonzi zvakabva kumatunhu ari kure akaita se Pennsylvania, New Jersey, New York, Virginia ne Maryland Zvizvarwa zve Zimbabwe nevamwe vanofarira Zimbabwe vanogara ku Texas, vaunganawo paCity Hall muDallas vachiratidzira kutsigira kwavo zviri kuitika kuZimbabwe. Mumwe wevakaratidzira Dr. Prisca Ngondo, vanoti vanotarisira kuti Zimbabwe itange patsva uye vanotarisira kuti dzimwe nyika hadzipindire munyaya yekupindira kwemauto mukutongwa kwenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Masangano Akazvimirira Okurudzira Vanhu Kuti Varambe maBond Notes
text: Vemasangano akazvimirira vakabvumirana nhemusi weMuvhuro kuti vataure neve ruzhinji kuti varambe mabond notes ari kuda kuparurwa ne hurumende mwedzi uno. Vemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira vakabvumirana kuti vapinde muvanhu vachiva kurudzira kuti vatore matanho nehurongwa hwekuda kuunza mabond notes aya. Sachigaro wesangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition rinove raronga musangano uyu, Muzvare Sally Dura, vati zvakakosha kuti veruzhinji vasarambe vakapeta mawoko avo ivo vachitsutsumwa. Muzvare Dura vati vabvumiranawo zvakare kuti veruzhinji vazeye nyaya yehuwori hwatekeshera munyika zvikuru sei muhurumende. Doctor Patson Dzamara, avo vanoshanda nesangano reOccupy Africa Unity Square vaudza musangano uyu kuti chave kudikanwa ndechekuti munhu wese apinde mumigwagwa achiratidzira kudzamara zvido zveveruzhinji zvazadziswa. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vachishanda nesangano re Labor and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze vati chanyanyonetsa ndechekuti vari muhurumende vari kuswerotambisa nguva vachitarisa kuti achatora matomhu kubva kumutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe ndiyani vasingaite zvinoda kuitwa kuti hupfumi hwenyika huvandudzwe. Vatiwo misangano iri kuitwa nagavhuna webhanga guru renyika VaJohn Mangudya ne veruzhinji inoratidza pachena kuti hurumende iri kuda kudzosa mari yemuZimbabwe nerweseri sezvagara zvichitaurwa nevari kupikisa hurongwa hwemabond notes uyu. VaMangudya neMuvhuro vakaita musangano nevagari vekuBanket vachiti vari kutsanangurira veruzhinji masevenzeserwo achaitwa mabond notes. RBZ inoti mabond notes achashandiswa semubairo kune vanenge vachitengesa zvinhu kunze kwenyika kana kuti export incentive. VaMangudya vanotiwo mabond notes achaparurwa mukupera kwemwedzi uno. No media source currently available

headline: VaMthuli Ncube Voronga Kupa Bazi reHutano Mari Shoma Pane Yariri Kuda
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakumbira paramende neChipiri kuti ione kuti rapihwa mari yakawanda pabhajeti regore rinouya mushure mekunge bazi rezvemari razivisa bazi rehutano kuti richawana mazana matanhatu ane makumi masere nepfumbamwe emamiriyoni emadhora, $689 million chete. Asi bazi iri rakanga rakumbira bhiriyoni nemazana matatu emamiriyoni emadhora, $1.3 billion, inodiwa kuti bazi iri rikawanise kuita basa raro nemazvo. Munyori mubazi rezvehutano nekuchengetedzwa kwevana, Dr Gerald Gwinjni, vaudza komiti inoona nezvehutano kuti huwandu hwemari yavari kuda mubhajeti regore rinouya, hwakaderedzwa nebazi remari riri pasi paVaMthuli Ncube nezvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana sezvo hurumende iri kufunga kuti bazi ravo richawana mari kubva kune dzimwe nyika pamwe nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira. Dr Gwinji vati handi pese pavanobatsirwa nemari yakawanda nemasanangano anoshanda akazvimirira. Vatiwo zvakakosha kuti paramende ione kuti hurumende yaisa mari yakawana kumabasa ehutano. Vatiwo munyika munogona kuita dambudziko guru kana masangano anoshanda akazvimirira akamira kubatsira bazi ravo nemari. Vati zvakakosha kuti hurumende izadzisewo chiga cheAbuja Declaration chekuti dzihurumende dzinofanira kuisa zvikamu gumi nezvishamu kubva muzana zvemabhajeti adzo kuti hutano husimukire munyika. Hurumende yave nemakore akawanda ichitadza kuita izvi vati. Dr Gwinji vakumbirawo nhengo dzeparamende kuti dzibatsire bazi ravo kuitira kuti ripihwe mari yese yemutero weHealth Levy iyo inobatwa pese panotengwa Airtime yembozhanhare sezvo pari zvino riri kupihwa zvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana zvemari iyi. Vati vanotarisira kuwana mamiriyoni makumi mana nemasere emadhora gore rinouya kubva pamari iyi uye vanotarisira kushandisa zhinji yacho kumaruwa. Dr Gwinji vati zvikamu makumi manomwe nezvisere kubva muzana zvemari yese yavachapihwa gore rinouya ichaenda kumihoro yevashandi uye haitokwani sezvo vachida kupinza vamwe vashandi vakawanda basa. Vati makirinika nezvipatara zviri kuvakwa hazvina varapi uye vanoda kupinza vashandi zviuru zvitatu nemazana maviri nemakumi matatu, kubva pazvinzvimbo zviuru zvitanhatu nemazana masere ane makumi manomwe nezvishanu. Vatiwo vanoda kuti hurumende itange kubhadharira vakweguri utsanana sezvo pari zvino vari kubhadharirwa nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira ayo, asingashande mumatunhu ese munyika. Nhengo yekomiti iyi, Amai Nomathemba Ndlovhu, vaudza Dr Gwinji kuti yavo haisi kufara nezviri kuitika muzvipatara zvakaita seKaranda kuMashonaland Central iyo inobatsira vanhu asi isina rubatsiro kubva kuhurumende. Vamwewo vati havasi kufara kuti pane zvipatara zvizhinji zvakavakwa zvisati zvavhurwa pamwe nekuti vanhu vave kunzi vatenge mishonga nemadhora ekuAmerica ayo asiri kuwanikwa nyore munyika. Dr Gwinji vati matambudziko esearipo nekuti hurumende iri kutadza kupa bazi ravo mari inorikwanira kuitira kuti ripe vanhu hutano hwakanaka. Pari zvino hurumende inoisa zvikamu makumi mana nezvipfumbamwe kubva muzana mubhajeti rehutano, Global Fund inoisa zvikamu gumi nezvisere kubva muzana, kozotiwo mamwe masangano ndiwo anotora zvimwe zvikamu zvasara. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Ngatichitarisai AFCON’
text: SHASHA yakambonetsa munhabvu iri mubati wepagedhi weRio Tinto nemaWarriors — Raphael Phiri — inoti yave nguva yekutanga kuvaka chikwata chakasimba chichanomirira nyika kumutambo weAfrica Cup of Nations (AFCON) kuCameroon gore rinotevera.   Zvichitevera kukundwa kwakaitwa maWarriors neGhana mumitambo miviri yadarika, inoti 3-1 kuGhana ne1-0 muno nemusi weChipiri, mukana wemaWarriors wekuramba vachirwira kuenda kuQatar World Cup wakabva wapera.   Chikwata chenyika ichi pari zvino changokwanisa kuwana chibodzwa chimwechete kubva mumitambo mina zvekuti kunyangwe chikahwina mitambo miviri yasara, hapana zvazvichashandura.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Phiri anoti murairidzi wemaWarriors — Norman Mapeza — anofanirwa kushandisa mitambo miviri yasara yechikwata chake muboka reGroup G, iyo ichatambwa munaMbudzi, neSouth Africa uye neEthiopia kugadzirira kuenda kuCameroon.   “Isu senyika zvekufunga kuenda kuWorld Cup zvichiri kure nesu nekuti hatisati tambotora mikombe mikuru yakaita seAFCON asi tinofunga zvekuenda kuWorld Cup.   “Ngatitange tambotsviriridza muno muAfrica nekunetsa kuAFCON pamwe nekukunda zvikwata zvikuru zvakaita seGhana, ndiko kuti tigotange kufunga zveWorld Cup nekuti uko kunoenda shasha. Taenda kuAFCON kakawanda chaizvo asi hapana zvatamboita zvinobatika taenda ikoko.   “Kazhinji tinogara tichingochema-chema tichiti hatiwane mitambo yehushamwari yekugadzirira, miviri yasara ngatiishandise kuita gadziriro dzedu nekuvaka chikwata chedu,” anodaro Phiri. Jimmy Cliff, sezita raPhiri remadunhurirwa iro aizivikanwa naro munhabvu, anoti zvakakosha kuti chikwata chemaWarrioirs chivakwe patsva chiine vatambi vechidiki.   Anoti vatambi vakaita saBrendan Galloway naJordan Zemura vachiri vadiki uye remangwana ravo rakajeka.   “Tine vatambi vakawanda vechidiki, ngavashevedzwe chikwata chemaWarriors chovakwa kubva pavatambi ava. Ngatisangorambe tichingoshevedza madhara chete nekuti vapera, pave kudiwa vechidiki kuti vatakure chikwata ichi kuenda mberi,” anodaro Phiri.   Kubva asendeka shangu dzenhabvu, Phiri ave kuita basa rekurairidza mutambo uyu izvo zvakamuona achirairidza zvikwata zvinosanganisira Golden Valley iyo yaikwikwidza muDivision One.   Pari zvino akavamba chikwata chake cheEiffel Flats United icho chiri kukwikwidza muDivision Two. Zvakadaro, sachigaro wesangano reFriends of the Warriors – Edward Chimedza – anotsinhira mashoko aPhiri achiti maWarriors anofanirwa kushandisa mitambo miviri yasara kuvaka chikwata chichaenda kuAFCON.   “Yave nguva yekutanga gadziriro dzekuenda kuAFCON, mitambo miviri yasara ngaishandiswe kuvaka chikwata chedu chakasimba.   “Zifa ngaipe Norman Mapeza rutsigiro rwose kuti avake chikwata chake chakasimba. Iye zvino haisi nguva yekungoshandura-shandura varairidzi pose pose, tinoda kuti pave nemurairidzi wavanopa kana kondirakiti yemakore mashanu anyatsoshanda kuvaka chikwata chakasimba chaicho,” anodaro Chimedza.

headline: Zimbabwe neBotswana Dzoita Mushandira Pamwe paCovid-19
text: Zimbabwe neBotswana dzakaita chibvumirano chekubairana nhomba yeCovid-19 zvizvarwa zvadzo zvinogara munyika mbiri idzi. Izvi zvakaziviswa negurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaFrederick Shava, avo vakati danho iri rakatorwa nokuti chara chimwe hachitswanyi inda. VaShava, avo vari murwendo rwemazuva matatu ekubvakachira nyika nhatu dzinoti South Africa, Botswana neNamibia, vakati hurongwa uhu hwakabvumiranwa mumusangano wavakaita negurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muBotswana, VaLemogang Kwape. Kuburikidza nehurongwa uhu, VaShava vakati nyika mbiri idzi dziri kutarisira kusvika pachinhanho chekuti kupararira kwedenda iri kuve kushoma nekukurumidza. Vakatiwo kana nyika mbiri idzi dzikakwanisa kuderedza kupararira kweCOVID-19, musangano wechitatu weZimbabwe/Botswana Bi-National Commission uri kutarisirwa kuitirwa mudhorobha reVictoria Falls mumwedzi mishomanini iri kutevera. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende yeBotswana panyaya iyi nokuti VaKwape vanga vasingabatike panharembozha yavo sezvo vari murwendo rwekubvakachira Lesotho. Nyanzwi munyaya dzehutano uye vari chiremba pachipatara chikuru cheNyangabgwe Referral Hospital mudhorobha reFrancistown, VaTarisai Garanevako vaudza Studio7 kuti Zimbabwe ndiyo ichakohwa pahombe kuburikidza nechibvumirano ichi. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinorarama nekutenga nekutengesa mudhorobha reGaborone, Muzvare Florence Manzungu, vagamuchira hurongwa uhu vachiti COVID-19 inotoda kuisa misoro pamwe chete. Pari zvino, Botswana yabaya nhomba vanhu vanosvika zviuru makumi matanhatu ruzhinji rwavo vari vashandi vezvehutano, mapurisa, masoja nevebazi rinoona nekupinda nekubuda kwevanhu munyika. Nyika iyi ine vanhu vanodarikazviurumakumimashanu nemazabna masere vabatwa neCovid-19,uye vafa nechirwere ichi vari mazana manomwe nemakumi manomwe nevana. No media source currently available

headline: Kushaikwa kweMari yeKunze Kwokonzeresa Kushomeka kweDoro neZvinwiwa
text: Kambani yeDelta inoti yasarirwa nedoro nezvinwiwa zvakaita sekokokora (Coca Cola) zvevhiki rimwechete chete nekuda kwekushaikwa kwemari kubva kubhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe. Nekuda kwekushomeka kwemari, makambani makuru munyika anopihwa mari kubva kuRBZ kuti atenge zvinhu kubva kunze kwenyika. Kambani yeDelta inonziwo ine zvikwereti zvakakura. Asi zvinhu zvinenge zvisina kumira zvakanaka kubhanga iri nenyaya yekuti mari yekunze iri kunetsa kuwana. Mukuru we‎Management Solutions (Pvt) Ltd, VaLuxon Zembe, vanoti zvinhu zvinotambudza zvikuru kune vemabhizimusi, zvichiratidza zvakare kuti nyaya yemari yekune dzimwe nyika ichiri kunetsa muZimbabwe pari zvino. "Kana makambani makuru anogadzira zvekudya akaita seDelta aakupa yambiro yakadaro zvinoratidza kuti zviro zvedu hazvina kumira zvakanaka," VaZembe vanodaro. No media source currently available

headline: Doctor Manyika veBuild Zimbabwe Vokurudzira Kuti Vanhu Vasakanganwa Kwavakabva
text: Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, Doctor Noah Manyika vanogara kuCharlotte, kuNorth Carolina muAmerica vari kuita zvakawanda kukurudzira vana veZimbabwe, vangave kumusha kana kunze kwenyika, kuti vavake nyika yechipikirwa. Doctor Manyika vanoshanda nesangano reBuild Zimbabwe, iro vakavamba vaine chinangwa chekuti vabatsire vana nezvipfeko, mabhuku pamwe nevirongwa zvinorodza pfungwa. Asi vanoti vakazorivhurirawo kune vamwe vana veZimbabwe kuti vaite mubata pamwe semajuru mukuumba nyika. "Build Zimbabwe chirongwa chandaiita makore gumi nemashanu adarika nechinangwa chekuti Zimbabwe ibudirire kana munhu wese akawana chaanoita mukuvaka nyika. Asi ndakazoti, kwete, kwete, regai ndidaidzed vamwe vana veZimbabwe tivake tiri pamwechete," vanodaro Doctor Manyika. Vanoti sangano ravo iri rine zvirongwa zvakawanda zvariri kuita mumatunhu akasiyanasiyana enyika, zvinosanganisira kuvaka dzimba dzine mitengo yepasi mumaguta ari munyika senzira yekubatsira vanhu vakawanda kuti vawane pekugara pakakodzera. No media source currently available

headline: Masangano Akazvimirira Okwezva Vanhu Kunonyoresa kuVhota Kuburikidza neMimhanzi
text: Vanhu vane chitsama vaungana mumusha weCowdray Park muBulawayo neSvondo vachiona vaimbi vakasiyana-siyana pamwe nekunyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota pasi pechirongwa chaitwa nemamwe masangano anoshanda akazvimirira ega. Masangano aya anga achishanda nesangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commission mukuedza kukurudzira vanhu kuti vanyorese kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota musarudzo dzichaitwa gore rino. Vamwe vevanhu ava, vanosanganisira vechidiki, vange vachinyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota kekutanga muhupenyu hwavo. Mumwe wevanhu vakadaro ndiKindness Mukume uyo ati ange asati awana mukana wekunyoresa achitiwo azokwezvwa kuuya kuzonyoresa nenyaya yekuti anga auya kuzoona vamwe vevaimbi vange varipo sezvo achifarira zvemumhanzi. Mumwezve wechidiki Muzvare Shamiso Ncube, avo vane makore makumi maviri nemana ekuberekwa, ndemumwe wevanyoresawo kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota pachiitiko ichi, vachiti vange vasati vanyoresa nekuti vange vave nekanguva vari kuSouth Africa. VaTawanda Chimhini vanove mukuru wesangano reElection Resource Centre, rinove rimwe remasangano ange ari muchirongwa ichi, vati vakatanga kushandisa chirongwa chekushandisa vaimbi kuedza kukwezva vanhu kuti vanyorese kuvhota kubvira gore rapera. Vati chirongwa ichi vari kuchiita senzira yekuedza kukurudzira vanhu kuti vanyorese kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota, kunyanya munzvimbo dzine vanhu vashoma vari kuita izvi. VaChimhini vatiwo kunyange hazvo chirongwa cheMop-Up chave kupera, chirongwa chekuedza kukwezva vanhu ichi chinobatsira sezvo kunyoreswa kwevanhu kucharamba kuchienderera mberi kusvika kumazuva gumi nemaviri mushure mekunge zuva rekuvhota ratarwa zviri pamutemo. Mukuru wezvesarudzo mudunhu reBulawayo Amai Sithembiso Khupe vati chirongwa chanhasi chavabatsira zvikuru pakusimudzira huwandu hwevanhu vauya kuzonyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota. Chirongwa cheBVR Mop-Up, icho chakatanga musi wa10 Ndira, chinotarisirwa kupera nemusi weChina 8 Kukadzi. Dunhu reBulawayo ndiro rine vanhu vashoma vanyoresa pamatunhu ose ari munyika. Vanhu zvikamu makumi mashanu nezvinomwe kubva muzana ndivo vanyoresa kusvika pari zvino mudunhu iri. Vanhu vanopfuura mamiriyoni mashanu nezviuru mazana maviri ndivo vanyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota munyika mose kusvika pari zvino. ZEC inoti yakanga yakatarisira kunyoresa vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni mashanu. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reVarairidzi, reARTUZ, Rokurudzira Varairidzi Kutora Zororo reKugadzirisa Matambudziko Avo
text: Rimwe sangano revarairidzi, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, rinoti riri kukurudzira varairidzi vane matambudziko anoda kugadziriswa nechimbichimbi kuti vatore zororo remazuva mashanu ekugadzirisa matambudziko avo kutanga neMuvhuro 16 kusvika Chishanu 20 mwedzi uno, inove svondo inouya. Mutungamiri wesangano iri, VaObert Masaraure vanoti mutemo unobvumidza varairidzi kutora zororo iri, iro rinonzi Compassionate Leave, pasi pechikamu 41 (g) chemutemo yePublic Service kana kuti Public Service Regulations. VaMasaraure vanoti varairidzi vakatarisana nematambudziko akawanda ari kukonzerwa nemari dziri pasi dzavari kutambiriswa anoda kugadziriswa, uye vanoti havaoni vakuru vezvikoro vachinyima varairidzi mukana uyu. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuPublic Service Commission panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Basketball yogeda-geda
text: MURAIRIDZI wechikwata chebasketball cheJBC Basketball Club — Addison Chiware — anoti vatambi vakawanda vemutambo uyu vanoda kuziva remangwana ravo zvichitevera kumiswa kwakaitwa mitambo yose gore rapera senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Chiware, uyo akamborairidza chikwata chenyika chebasketball, anoti Covid-19 yakavhiringidza zvakawanda mumutambo uyu zvekuti havachazive kuti vodii kuti udzoswe.   “Vatambi vedu vazhinji vave nemibvunzo yakawanda zvikuru, vanoda kuziva kuti remangwana ravo rakamira sei uye zvichafambiswa sei kuti mutambo uyu udzoswe.   “Vatambi vaitoraramiswa nemutambo uyu uye vamwe vaitoushandisa kuti vagokwanisa kuwana mikana yekuenda kunze kwenyika saka kana usingatambwe mukana wekutengwa nezvikwata zvekunze hapatorina.   “Covid-19 iyi yavhiringa zvakawanda. Saka isu tave kungomirira kuti zvinhu zvinake chete.   “Ndiyo nzira yega inoita kuti zvitifambire uye mutambo uyu udzoke pasina chinokanganisa,” anodaro Chiware.   Gore radarika rave kunopera, zvikwata zvebasketball zvakasiyana zvakange zvave kutanga kuita gadziriro paine tarisiro yekuti mutambo uyu waigona kuzodzoswa asi zvose zvakaenda mudondo nekuda kwekunyuka zvakare kweCovid-19.   “Pane patakambotanga kugadzirira tikafunga kuti zvave kuendeka manje asi takabva tadzoserwa shure neCovid-19 yakatanga kunyuka zvekare.   “Izvezvi kana mutambo uyu ukanzi wadzoka zvichatitorera nguva sezvo vatambi vave nenguva huru vasingatambe,” anodaro Chiware.

headline: Vogadzirira kupanana zvematsenganzungu
text: VATAMBI vetsiva vane chitsama votarisirwa kubandana mumutambo wePound for pound Knockout Covid Boxing Series uchatambwa nemusi wa5 Chikumi kuHarare Showgrounds.   Mutambo uyu uri kurongwa neDeltaforce Boxing iyo inotungamirirwa naClyde Musonda uye uchaona vatambi 16 vachirwa mumitambo misere.   Mutambo mukuru pazuva iri uchange uri waFreeman Mabvongwe uyo acharwira bhande reZimbabwe Welteright naPeterson Machinjike.   Clyde Musonda, anove zvakare murairidzi wevatambi vetsiva vazhinji, anoti mutambo uyu uchabatsira zvakanyanya sezvo vatambi vange vave nenguva ndefu vasingakwikwidze zvichitevera kumiswa kwakaitwa mitambo yose munaKurume gora rapera senzira yekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Anoti chishuvo chavo kuona vatambi vari kusimukira vachiwaniswa mikana yekukwikwidza nekugadzira mazita avo kuitira kuti vagonorwira mabhande akasiyana kunze kwenyika.   “Isu chishuwo chedu kuona vatambi vetsiva vachisimukira nekuwana mikana yekugadzira mazita avo. Nekuda kweCovid-19, mitambo yange yakamiswa uye vatambi hupenyu hwavo hwakakanganiswa zvikuru. Saka isu taronga mutambo weKnockout Covid, tinoda kuirwisa kuti ngaiende Covid-19 itisiye tiite mabasa edu atange tajaira hupenyu hwedu hudzokere pahwainge huri kare,” anodaro.   Mutambo wePound for pound knockout Covid boxing series ndewechipiri wetsiva kurongwa muno kubva mitambo payakapihwa mvumo yekunzi ichiitwa munyika.   “Tiri palockdown, taienda nevamwe vatambi kunze kunyika dzakaita seTanzania vachinokwikwidza ikoko, asi vange vari vashoma. Saka iye zvino vatambi vakawanda vave nemukana wekuzoenda kunorwira kunze kwenyika asi hunge vakatamba zvinonwisa mvura mitambo yatinovarongera muno,” anodaro Musonda.

headline: Kusagadzirisa Zvipatara Ndiko Kunonzi Kwakapa Kuti VaMugabe neVamwe Vatungamiri veAfrica Vafire Kunze
