text: Vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika muchakabvu Robert Mugabe vakashaya kuSingapore vachirapwa chirwere chegomarara muna 2018 vari kurangarirwa zvakasiyana nevana veZimbabwe nevekunze. VaMugabe vakaita sevamwe vatungamiri vemuAfrica vanoenda kunorapwa nekufira kunze kwenyika dzavo vanosanganisira vaive mutungamiri wenyika yeZambia, VaMichael Sata vakafira kuLondon, vaive mutungamiri wenyika iyi zvekare VaLevy Mwanawasa vakashaikira kuFrance, mutungamiri wehurumende yeEthiopia VaMeles Zenawi vakashaikira kuBelgium, VaOmar Bongo vekuGabon vakashaikira kuSpain nevamwe. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vachidzidzisa paFriends University kuKansas Dr Moses Rumano vaudza Studio 7 kuti veruzhinji vanorangarira VaMugabe zvakasiyana siyana sezvo kune rimwe divi vane mabasa avakabata akasimudzira nyika senyaya yedzidzo nenyaya yekupa ivhu kuvatema kunyengwe hazvo chirongwa ichi chisina kunyatso itwa zvakanaka. Kune rimwe divi vanorangarirwa semutongi aitonga nedemo uye asina kugadzirisa zvinhu zvakadayi sezvipatara nehupfumi hwenyika zvakazokonzera kuti vasarapwe munyika nevana vavakapa dzidziso yepamusoro, "Zvinosiririsa kuti VaMugabe vakazoshaikira kuSingapore, dai vakange vakagadzirisa zvipatara panguva yehutongi hwavo vakarapirwa munyika vachipepwa nevana vevhu avo vakapa dzidzo yakanaka asi ikazoparadzwa nehuwori nehutongi husiri wejeketrere," Dr Rumano vaudza Studio 7. No media source currently available Vamwe vemhuri yavo vaudza Studio 7 kuti Amai Grace Mugabe nevana vavo vari kuSingapore kwakashaikira VaMugabe parizvino vachivarangarira.

headline: Bato reNCA Rokwirira VaMugabe Dare
text: Bato rinopikisa reNational Constitutional Assembly, NCA, rinoti ratuma magweta aro kuti akwire kudare repamusoro soro reConstitutional Court, achimisa mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, kugadza vatevedzeri vavo vaviri richiti zviri kunze kwebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Mutauriri webato iri, VaMadock Chivasa, vanoti bumbiro remitemo idzva rinoti VaMugabe vaifanirwa kunge vakadoma vatevedzeri vavo vaviri sarudzo dzichangopera, kwete kuzozviita kwapera gore sarudzo dzaitwa. VaChivasa vanoti bato ravo riri kutevera Sixth Schedule paragraph 14 sub-paragraph iyo vanoti inoti VaMugabe vaifanirwa kudoma vatevedzeri vavo vaviri pasina kunonoka. Imwe nyaya inonzi naVaChivasa iri mugwaro ravo riri kuenda kudare ndeyekuti hutungamiri hwenyika hwaVaMugabe nevatevedzeri vavo vaviri hahunawo munhukadzi sezvinotarisirwa munyika ine vanhukadzi vakawanda kudarika vanhurume. VaChivasa vanoti magweta avo eMbidzo, Muchadehama and Makoni achaendesa mapepa aya chekutanga neChishanu mangwanani. VaMugabe vari kutarisirwa kutoresa mhiko VaEmmerson Mnangagwa pamwe naVaPelekezela Mphoko sevatevedzeri vavo vaviri. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo inodzidzisa paKent University kuBritain, Doctor Alex Magaisa, vanoti nyaya yeNCA inonakidza kutevera. Vanoti chikamu chemutemo chiri kushandiswa nebato iri nechinonzi chakashandiswawo naVaMugabe zvinonetsa kunyatsonzwisisa asi vanoti dare repamusorosoro iri rinogonawo kuramba kutambira nyaya iyi. Zvichakadaro, bato reMDC T rinotiwo riri kuronga kuroverera VaMugabe nemhosva yekutyora bumbiro remitemo nekudzinga kwavakaita mutevedzeri wavo, Amai Joice Mujuru, kubva pachigaro richishandisa nhengo dzaro mudare reparamende. Mutauriri webato iri, VaObert Gutu, vaudza bepanhau reNewsDay kuti VaMugabe vakazvidza bumbiro renyika nekudzinga kwavakaita Amai Mujuru, vachiti mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika anofanirwa kudzingwa chete pachiteverwa bumbiro renyika. No media source currently available

headline: Zimpapers Yoshorwa neKudzinga Vashandi Mabasa Zvisina Tsarukano
text: Masangano anomirira vatapi venhau munyika anoti haasi kufara nekudzingwa mabasa zvisina tsarukano kweshandi nekambani yeZimbabwe Newspapers uye masangano aya anoti achagara pasi nehurumende nechinangwa chekuti kambani iyi isiye katsika aka. Masangano aya, ayo ari pasi peMedia Alliance of Zimbabwe anoti anoshushikana zvikuru nekuti vashandi vekambani iyi vatatu vanoti, VaMunyaradzi Huni vanga vari mutevedzeri wemupepeti webepanhau rekambani iyi reThe Sunday Mail, nevamwe vakuru weimwe nhepfenyuro yekambani iyi yeCapiTalk VaNapoleon Nyanhi naMuzvare Ruvheneko Parirenyatwa vakadzingwa mabasa mazuva mashonana apfuura pasina zvikonzero zvakajeka. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuZimpapers panyaya iyi asi vanoziva zviri kuitika vanoti kudzingwa kwevatatu ava kune chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika. Zvinonzi mashandiro evatatu ava haana kufadza vamwe vakuru vakuru muhurumende. Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwezvirongwa muMedia Alliance of Zimbabwe, VaNigel Nyamutumbu, vaudza Studio 7 kuti havasi kufara nemabatirwo akaikaitwa nyaya yevatatu ava. Vanoti vaitarisira kuti zvinhu zvichashanduka muhurumende itsva yaVaMnangagwa asi hapana chasanduka sezvo vatapi venhau vari kuramba vachidzvinyirirwa. VaNyamutumbu vakurudzirawo vatapi venhau kuti vaite basa ravo pachena vasina divi ravakarekera uyewo vati makambani ese ezvekutapwa kwenhau anofanira kuvhara kana asingade kuremekedza kodzero dzevatapi venhau dzavanopihwa nebumbiro remutemo wenyika. Imwe nhengo yebhodhi rinomirira vapepeti venhau munyika reZimbabwe National Editors Forum, VaBarnabas Tondhlana vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakaitwa nekambani yeZimpapers hazvina kunaka. Vanoti kunyange mutapi wenhau akakanganisa anofanirawo kubatwa zvine hunhu kwete kubatwa sembwa. Media Alliance of Zimbabwe inoti zvaitwa neZimpapers zvinoratidza pachena kuti hurumende itsva iyi haina hurongwa hwekuti vatapi venhau vashande vakasununguka uye inoti zvakaoma kuti munhu aite mutapi wenhau muZimbabwe. Pakapinda VaMnangagwa panyanga muna Mbudzi gore rapfuura Zimpapers yakadzinga vamwe vatori venhau vaifungidzirwa kuti vainge vakarerekera kuvanhu vanonzi ndivo vaifurira vaimbove mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakaita sevaive gurukota rezvedzidzo yepamusoro VaJonathan Moyo. Nhengo dzesangano reMedia Alliance of Zimbabwe dzinosanganisira masangano anoti Media Monitoring Project Zimbabwe, Media Institute of Southern Africa (Zimbabwe chapter), Zimbabwe Union of Journalists (ZUJ), Zimbabwe National Editors’ Forum (ZINEF), Gender and Media Connect (GMC), the Media Centre, the Zimbabwe Association of Community Radio Stations (ZACRAS), the Voluntary Media Council of Zimbabwe (VMCZ) and the African Community Publishing Development Trust (ACPDT). No media source currently available

headline: Magweta eVeritas Anoti ZEC Inofanira Kuudza Mapato Anopikisa Ari Kudhinda Magwaro ekuVhotesa
text: Magweta anoshanda nesangano reVeritas iro rinoongorora mitemo inenge iri mudare reparamende anoti bumbiro remutemo rinosungira sangano rinoona nezvesarudzo reZimbabwe electoral commission kuti risume mapato anopikisa kuti magwaro ekuvhotesa kana kuti maballot papers ari kudhindwa kupi kuti nyaya dzesarudzo munyika dzisaite mutauro. ZEC inoti sezvo nguva yekuita sarudzo yave pedyo, yave kutsvaga vanodhinda mapepa aya nechimbi chimbi. Asi vanopikisa vange vachiti vanoda kuti zviitwe pajekerere pachikokwa makambani akawanda kuti sarudzo dzisabirirwe. Mutemo unosungirawo ZEC kuti isume mapato ari kukwikwidza huwandu hwemapepa anenge adhindwa uye anenge aendeswa kunzvimbo yose yekuvhotera. Veritas inoti hapana chinokanganisa ZEC kuti izivise vanopikisa kuti kambani yavakasarudza kudhidha mapepa ndeipi uye kukoka a nhumwa kunoona kunenge kudindwa mapepa acho. Mutungamiri wenyika vaemmerson mnangagwa vave kutarisirwa chero nguva kudoma zuva resarudzo sezvo senate iri kutarisirwa svondo rino kutambira bhiri rekuvandudza mitemo yesarudzo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehumhizha mumichina yekuvhotesa kana kuti BVR Doctor Samuel Chindaro vanoti kubirira sarudzo dzeBVR kunogona kuti netsei asi mitemo inodzikwa nemapato inogona kukanganisa jekerere musarudzo. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reARTUZ Ronyunyuta Kuti Nhengo Dzaro Dziri Kuramwa Mabasa Dzave Kutyisidzirwa
text: Kuramwa mabasa kwenhengo dzesangano revarairidzi vekumaruwa, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, kwapinda muzuva rechina nhasi, sangano iri richiti dzimwe nhengo dzaro dzinosanganisira munyori mukuru, VaRobson Chere, dzave kutyisidzirwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori pamwe nenhengo dzebato reZanu PF. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reZanu PF kanawo divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Asi mutungamiri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure vanoti kune vakaita musangano ku Acturus mudunhu reMashonaland East kunove kunodzidzisa VaChere, vachida kuti mudzidzisi uyu abviswe pachikoro ichi. VaMasaraure vanotiwo hakusi kuActurs chete kwavari kusangana nekutyisidzirwa kwenhengo dzavo, sezvo varairidzi vari kusangano nedambudziko iri mune mamwe matunhu. Asi vanoti huwandu hwevarairidzi vari kuramwa mabasa huri kuramba huchiwedzera zuva nezuva vachiti ongororo yavo inoratidza kuti varairidzi vangangoda kusvika pazvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana ndivo chete vaenda kumabasa mune zvimwe zvikoro. Varairidzi vanoti vari kuda kuti mihoro yavo idzoserwe pamari dzavaitambira muna Gumiguru 2018, uye kuti vanyorerane zvibvumirano nehurumende zvekuti vabhadharwe kunyoresa vana bvunzo. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata mutauriri webazi redzidzo yepasi, VaTaungana Ndoro, kuti tinzwe kuti kuramwa mabasa uku kwakanganisa zvakadii dzidzo muzvikoro? No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Voenda kuChina Mukuyedza Kugadzirisa Hupfumi hweNyika
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vainge vachitarisirwa kusimuka manheru eChishanu vachienda kuChina kumusangano weForum on China-Africa Cooperation. Musangano uyu wakanangana nezvekutengeserana kweChina nenyika dzemuAfrica. VaMnangagwa vakatarisana nedambudziko guru rekugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi munyika. Zviri kubuda kubva kubazi reZimbabwe National Statistics Agency kana kuti Zimstats zviri kuratidza kuti zviri kutengwa neZimbabwe kunze kwenyika zvakawedzera nezvikamu makumi matatu nezvitanhatu kubva muzana. Mari yezviri kutengwa kunze kusanganisa mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari nemagetsi nezvimwe zvirimwa yasvika pabhiriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mashanu emadhora zvichienzaniswa negore rapera mukati memwedzi minomwe pasingaverengwe Ndira nemwedzi wapera sezvo michina yeZimra inonzi yaisashanda zvakanaka. Asi mukuru weConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaSifelani Jabangwe, vanoti Zimbabwe yakakwanisawo kuti wedzerei zvayakatengesa kunze uye ine zvakawanda zvainokwanisa kudzidza kubva kuChina. Vati China yaimbotatarika seZimbabwe isati yatanga kugadzirisa zvinhu kuburikidza nekuvandudza makambani ayo ichitora mienzaniso kubva kune dzimwe nyika. No media source currently available

headline: Dare Rinoudza Muzvare Mamombe, Muzvare Chimbiri naMuzvare Marova Kuti Vaise Mapasipoti Avo Mumaoko eDare
text: Dare ramejasitiriti ratura mutongo wekuti mumiriri weHarare West muparamende, Muzvare Joanna Mamombe, nevamwe vavo vaviri, vasvitse magwaro avo ekufambisa kudare. Vatatu ava, avo vanoti vakatochwa vari muhusungwa, vari kupomerwa mhosva yekutyora mitemo yakadzikwa nemutungamiri wenyika yeCovid-19 Regulations. Vachitura mutongo wavo pachikumbiro chakasvitswa nehurumende chekuti zvakaturwa nedare pachikumbiro chevatatu ava zvivandudzwe, mutongi wedare, Amai Vongai Muchuchuti Guriro, vati Muzvare Mamombe nevamwe vavo vanoti Muzvare Cecilia Chimbiri naMuzvare Netsai Murova, vasvitse mapasipoti avo panokwana nguva dza 4 neChitatu masikati. Vanziwo vadzoke kudare musi wa13 Nyamavhuvhu apo pakatarisirwa kuenderera mberi kwenyaya yavari kupomerwa. Vatatu ava vakange vabhadhariswa mari yechibatiso uye kuti vazvipire kumapurisa kamwe chete mukati memasvondo maviri, asi vachuchisi vehurumende vakadzoka kudare kuti izvi zvivandudzwe vachiti vakawana runyerekupe rwekuti vatatu ava vanga vachida kutiza munyika. Amai Guriro vati zvakakosha kuti vatatu ava vamirire kutongwa kwavo nokudaro vati vaona zvakakodzera kuti vabvume chikumbiro chehurumende. Gweta revatatu ava, VaJeremiah Bhamu, vati vachakwidza nyaya iyi kudare repamusoro kuitira kuti vadzoserwe mapasipoti avo vachiti hapana mhosva yavanganzi vangatize kutongwa kwayo. Zvichakadai, baba vaMuzvare Marova, VaRunesu George Marova, vati vari kushungurudzika zvikuru nekushungurudzwa kuri kuitwa mwana wavo pamwe chete nevamwe vaakasungwa ainavo. Baba vaMuzvare Chimbiri, VaHenry Chimbiri, vati vari kushushikana zvikuru nemapurisa ari kuramba achishanyira mwana wavo nevamwe vari kuchipatara kwavari kunyange hazvo vatatu ava vakapihwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso nematare pamhosva yavari kupomerwa. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri wemapurisa, VaPaul Nyathi, kuti tinzwe divi remapurisa sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Muzvare Mamombe nevamwe vavo vanoti vakasungwa mwedzi wapera pa roadblock mushure mekuratidzira kunonzi kwakaitwa nevechidiki veMDC Alliance mumusha weWarren Park. Kunyange hazvo bepanhau reHerald nemamwe masangano enhau akaburitsa kuti vatatu ava vaive mumaoko emapurisa, mapurisa akazobuda achiramba mashoko aya mushure mekunge vatatu ava vazowanikwa kuBindura vachiti vakatochwa vari mumaoko ehurumende. Parizvino, vatatu ava vari kugara muchipatara vachirapwa zvichitevera kutochwa kwavanoti vakaitwa uku. Asi hurumende kuburikidza negurukota rinoona nezvinoitika mukati menyika, VaKazembe Kazembe, inoti ichiri kuferefeta nyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Sikandar odzoka kuzc
text: MUTAMBI wecricket, Sikandar Raza, akasarudzwa kuti agove muchikwata cheZimbabwe Cricket icho chichaenda kunokwikwidza neBangladesh mumitambo mitatu yeone day international uye nemiviri yetest match.   Asi achange asiri muchikwata chemaChevrons icho chiri kuSouth Africa kunokwikwidza mumitambo yakasiyana iri kutanga svondo rino musi weSvondo.   Shasha iyi yange isina kusarudzwa kuti iende kunomirira maChevrons zvichitevera nyaya dzake dzekondirakiti dzainetsa, asi zvakazogadziriswa apo pakaitwa hurukuro pakati pake neZimbabwe Cricket contracts committee svondo rino.   Raza akatsanangura mamiriro aive akaita nyaya yake uye akakumbira ruregerero ndokuzvipira kumirira Zimbabwe mumitambo inotevera.   Apo maChevrons akasimuka kuenda kuSouth Africa kare kunokwikwidza mumitambo mitatu yeODI iyo ichange ichitambirwa kuKimberley uye neyeTwenty20, vanosarudza chikwata ichi vakaronga kuti vamusiye asi vachizomusarudza pakuenda kuBangladesh.    “Ndine mufaro mukuru nezvakaitika izvi uye ndinopa kutenda kuZC iyo yakwanisa kugadzirisa nyaya dzangu.   “Ndinoda kusiyana nenyaya iyi ndotanga kuita zvekuti nditambe cricket yangu kwete kufunga zvakawanda,” anodaro Raza.   Akafanobata chigaro chamanaging director weZC –  Givemore Makoni – anoti anotambira nemaoko maviri kudzoka kwaRaza muchikwata ichi.   “Tine mufaro mukuru kuti takakwanisa kuwirirana naSikandar uyo anove mumwe wevatambi vedu vepamusoro. Tinomutambira nemaoko maviri kudzoka muchikwata chedu uye tinovimba kuti patichaenda naye kuBangladesh nemimwe mitambo achatibatsira zvikuru,” anodaro.   Masvondo adarika, Raza akabuda pachena kuti akange asiri kuzotambira maChevrons kumitambo yeSouth Africa neBangladesh zvichitevera kusapihwa kondirakiti itsva neZC izvo akatumira pandemutande rake retwitter.

headline: Citizens Coalition for Change Inoti Haichineyi neZita reMDC
text:
Bato reCitizens Coalition for Change, kana kuti CCC, rinoti rava bato idzva rakazvimirira risineyi nechose chine chekuita nebato re MDC rakavambwa namuchakabvu VaMorgan Tsvangirai muna 1999.

Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weCCC, VaOstalss Siziba, vati mashoko
ekuti vabude mubato reMDC zviri pamutemo mashoko asina musoro sezvo
mutemo uri pachena kuti munhu anenge ave nhengo yerimwe bato anobva
atorega kuva nhengo yeMDC.

Izvi zvatsigirwawo nasachigaro weCCC mudunhu reMashonaland West,
VaRalph Magunje, avo vati nhengo dzavo dzakabuda mubato reMDC
nekusapinda mumisangano yebato iri kubva mugore ra2018, kusabhadhara mari yekuva nhengo kwemakore matatu uye kuve nhengo yerimwe bato sezvavakaita.

Asi mutauriri weMDC T, VaWitness Dube, vati vari kuyambira nhengo dzeCCC kuti dzibude mubato ravo zviri pamutemo kwete kuti vazoyeuka bako vanaiwa vave kuvadzinga zvakare muparamende nemumakanzura kana vakakunda.

VaDube vati bato ravo rine ruzivo rwakadzama pamusoro pezvinotaura
mutemo webato nokudaro nhengo dziri kuzviti ndedze CCC
dzisazochema mune ramangwana nekuda kwenharo dzadzo.

Nyaya yekuvhomorana pazvigaro yakatanga apo bato reMDC T rakadzinga
nhengo dzeMDC Alliance muparamende nemakanzura richiti inhengo dzaro dzakanga dzasiya gwara remusangano. No media source currently available

headline: Covid-19 yavhiringa mitambo muzvikoro
text: SANGANO reNational Association of Schools Heads (NASH) riri kuchema kuti gore rino vana vanotamba mitambo yakasiyana vakarasikirwa zvikuru zvichitevera kumbomiswa kwakaitwa mitambo yose nechinangwa chekurwisa kupararira kweCovid-19 izvo zvakavatadzisawo kunokwikwidza kunze kwenyika.   NASH ndiyo inotungamira mitambo yose inoitwa muzvikoro uye gore roga-roga inogaroita mitambo inosanganisira Copa Coca Cola neStella Netball Under-17.   Mutungamiri weNASH, VaArthur Maphosa, vanoti gore rino vana vakarasikirwa zvikuru nekuda kweCovid-19.   “Ndinonzwira tsitsi vana vedu vegore rino nekuti ishuviro yemutambi wose wenhabvu, netball kana mimwe mitambo kuti vagofamba nemuchadenga vachienda kunomirira Zimbabwe kumitambo yakasiyana kunze kwenyika.   “Gore rino Covid-19 yakanganisa vana vazhinji, hapana aimbozvifungira kuti zvichasvika pakadai. Makore adarika, kuburikidza neCopa Coca-Cola, vana vange vachienda kunokwikwidza kuKenya.   Mitambo iyi yaiona shasha dzakaita mukurumbira dzichiuya kuzoona pamwe nekurairidza vatambi pamakwikwi aya izvo zvaibatsira mukusimudzira vana,” vanodaro.   Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, “Gore negore taisienda nevana kumitambo yeCOSSASA yaiitwa kunyika dzakasiyana dzemuSouthern Africa uko kwaikwikwidzwa mijaho yekumhanya, volleyball, nhabvu, netball nemimwe. Izvi zvaibika vana murwendo rwavo mukusimukira mune zvemitambo.”   VaMaphosa vanoti mitambo iyi ndiyo yakabika vatambi vazhinji vave nemukurumbira kusanganisira vemaGems avo vakanokwikwidza kumutambo weVitality Netball World Cup kuLiverpool, kuEngland gore radarika.   “Vasikana vazhinji vakaenda kuLiverpool, kuEngland gore radarika vakapfuura nemumitambo yeNASH Stella under-17 Netball Tournament izvo zvinoratidza kuti yakakosha zvikuru uye inobika vatambi vemangwana,” anodaro.   Zvisinei, VaMaphosa vanoti chikuru panguva ino kuti vanhu vagare vakachengetedzeka kubva kuchirwere cheCovid-19.   “Tongoshuvira kuti kana denda iri rapera tirambe tichishanda pamwe chete nevatsigiri vedu sezvataisiita kare vachidira mari uye vachitibatsira kuronga mutambo yevana yakasiyana,” vanodaro VaMaphosa. Zvakadaro, operations manager weTanganda Tea Company iyo inoronga mitambo yeNASH Stella Tea Under-17 netball tournament, VaFarai Garai vanoti kambani yavo yakazvipira kuti panopera denda reCovid-19 hukama hwavo neNASH hurambe huchienderera mberi.   “Isu takazvipira mubasa redu uye hukama hwedu haumbopera neNASH, ticharamba tichishanda navo mukusimudzira mutambo wenetball nemimwe yatinositsigira inosanganisira mujaho weTanganda Tea half marathon,” anodaro Garai.

headline: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zvobatsira Mushure Mekufa kweZvimwe Mazana Maviri muBotswana Gore Rapera
text: Mushure mekufa kwezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinodarika mazana maviri nezvirwere zvakasiyana siyana kubva kuBotswana, zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri munyika iyi zviri musangano reAll Zimbos in Botswana zvakaumba komiti yekukurudzirana kuti kana munhu arwara atsvage rubatsiro nekukasika kubva kune vamwe kana kukurumidza kuenda kuchipatara pane kuzoenda kuchipatara chirwere chakomba. Gore rapera, muzinda weZimbabwe muBotswana unoti wakagadzira mapepa ekudzosera kumusha mitumbi zana nemakumi manomwe nemitatu kana kuti 173 yezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvainge zvafa uye mimwe makumi matanhatu nemitanhatu yezvainge zvafa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Ndufu idzi dzakapa kuti nhengo dzesangano reAll Zimbos in Botswana dziise musoro pamwe chete kuti dzibatsirane kuti vanhu vabude pachena nehurwere hwavo kuti vatsvagirwe rubatsiro. Vakavamba uye vanotungamira sangano reAll Zimbos in Botswana amai Portia Muzondo vanotivakarasikirwa nenhengo dzesangano ravo makumi matnhatu gore rapera. Mukuru wekomiti itsva yekubatsirana pahurwere vachishanda sechipangamazano mune rimwe sangano rakazvimirira muBotswana, Muzvare Bithea Mthetwa vanoti ruzhinji rwezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe rwuri kunonoka kuenda kuzvipatara. Muzvare Mthetwa vanoti vachashandisa madandemutande kukurudzirana kunorapwa. Muzvare Hazvinei Makwanise vanova nhengo yesangano iri vanoti mwana asingacheme anofira mumbereko Vaenderera mberi vachiti vanhu vakafanira kugara vachizvivhenekesa zvirwere zvakafanana nechemukondombera, chegomarara, blood pressure necheshuga sezvo zvichikwanisa kurapwa zvisati zvakomba. Chipangamazano munezvematongerwo enyika nehupfumi pamuzinda weZimbabwe muBotswana, VaFrancis Chimina vatiwo vakagadzirira kubatsirawo zvizvarwa zvenyika zvinenge zvawirwa nematambudziko. Nekuda kwekuoma kwehupenyu munyika uye kudawo mafuro manyoro, zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakaendawo kunogara kuBotswana nedzimwe nyika dzakapoteredza asi dzimwe nguva zvinhu zvinoomera vamwe vanozoguma vofa nekushaya anobatsira zviri kupa kuti vamwe vaumbe masangano ekubatsirana sezvo kutsva kwendebvu varume vanodzimurana.

headline: Kudomwa kweMagamba eNyika Kokonzera Mutauro
text: Munyika mune makakatanwa akasimba panyaya yekuti muimbi ane mukurumbira, Comrade Chinx, igamba here kana kuti kwete. Bato reZanu-PF rakati igamba rehondo kana kuti liberation war hero nekudaro haakwanise kuvigwa pamarinda eHeroes Acre nuHarare. Asi vemhuri uye vesangano revakarwa hondo reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association vanoti Chinx aive gamba. Kunyange hazvo mhuri yaChinx yainge yakumbira kuti Politburo yeZanu PF izeye nyaya iyi zvakare, mutauriri webato reZanu-PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, vati hapana kudududza pachisungo chakaitwa. Izvi zvasiya vanhu vakawanda vaine mibvunzo pamusoro pezvinoreva gamba renyika chairo, uye kuti ndiyani anofanira kunge achisarudza magamba aya sezvo kuvigwa kwemagamba aya kuchishandiswa mari yehurumende inobhadharwa mitero nevanhu kwete mari yeZanu-PF. Nhengo yeZanu-PF ichimirira Chikanga-Dangamvura mudare reparamende VaEsau Mupfumi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti havaone chakaipa pakusarudzwa, kwemagamba nebato ravo. Asi mutauriri webato reMDC-T, VaObert Gutu, vanoti masarudzirwo ari kuitwa magamba haana kunaka. No media source currently available

headline: Vemitambo rongekai: Coventry
text: GURUKOTA revechidiki, mitambo nekutandara, Kirsty Coventry, vanoti hutungamiri hwemitambo yese hunofanirwa kurongeka uye kugadzira magwaro anoratidza hurongwa hwavo hwemakore gumi anotevera.   Gurukota iri rakataura mashoko aya pamusangano warakaita nevatori venhau dzezvemitambo vanoshanda vari pasi peZimpapers nemusi weChishanu chadarika muguta reHarare.   Musangano uyu wakapindwa zvakare nasachigaro webhodhi reZimpapers, Dr Tommy Sithole, nachamangwiza wekambani iyi VaPikirayi Deketeke.   “Basa randiri kuita kugadzira nzira yemakore 10 anotevera iyo ichabatsira kuti mitambo yedu muno igosimukira zvekuti rimwe gurukota richazonditsiva mune ramangwana rinosvika basa rakagadzirwa kare, ropfuurira mberi.   “Tiri ipapo zvekare, kumitambo yese muno tiri kuvakurudzira kuti ngavagadzire magwaro avo ayo anoratidza kuti mumakore 10 anotevera vachange vachifambisa sei basa ravo,” vanodaro.   Dr Coventry vanoenderera mberi vachiti, “Isu tinoda kuona kuti muchafambisa sei basa renyu uye vechidiki muri kuvasimudzira sei nekuti ndivo vatinofanirwa kugadzirira remangwana ravo.”   Vanoti munyika muno mune hutungamiri hwemitambo yakasiyana inosvika 60 uye 12 chete kusvika pari zvino ndiyo isati yave kutevedzera bumbiro remitemo rezvemitambo.   “Kutanga gore rinotevera, vemitambo ipi neipi vachauya vachitsvaga mari kwandiri vasarirwa nemazuva mashoma kuti vaende kumakwikwi akasiyana, havana kana sendi randinovapa, kuratidza kusarongeka ikoko.   Vamwe vanozotanga kumhanya-mhanya kumapepanhau kunotaura kuti ndiri kuvanyima mari.   “Muno munyika mune mitambo inosvika 60 uye 12 chete kutaura kuno ndiyo isiri kutevedza gwaro ratakavapa nekudaro ivavo hatina mari yatinovapa kusvika vagadzirisa zvatinoda.   Sangano reSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) riripo kuvabatsira kuti magwaro avo arongeke,” vanodaro.

headline: Vashandi Voramba Kunyengedzwa neMasitendi eHurumende
text: Sangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende reApex Council raramba mashoko ari kunzi akataurwa negurukota rezvemabasa nevashandi, ekuti vashandi vakawanda vari kuda kupiwa masitendi semuripo wemari dzavo dzemabhonasi egore rapera, pane kuti vapiwe iri mari. Sachigaro weApex Council, Amai Cecilia Alexander, vanoti semaziviro avo vashandi vari kuda kupiwa mabhonasi avo iri mari nekuti sangano ravo rine humwe hurongwa hwekutsvagira nhengo dzaro masitendi ekuvakira dzimba richishanda nebazi rezvekutongwa kwematunhu. Amai Alexander vanorambawo mashoko ekuti vatungamiri vemasangano evashandi vehurumende ndivo vari kurasisa vashandi panyaya iyi. Amai Mupfumira svondo rino vakaudza vatori venhau kuti hofisi yavo iri kutambira vashandi vakawanda chose vari kuda kunzwisisa nezvehurongwa hwemasitendi uhwu. Vanonzi vakatiwo ongororo yekunzwa pamire vashandi panyaya iyi iri kuitwa nebazi ravo inoratidza kuti ruzhinji rwuri kuda nzvimbo dzekuvakira dzimba pane mari. Amai Alexander vanoti vamiriri vemasangano ose evashandi vehurumende vachasangana neMuvhuro svondo rinouya kuti varovane masoro padanho rekutora vachienda mberi. Musangano wanga wakatarisirwa kuitwa neMuvhuro svondo rinouya pakati pevashandi nevamiriri vehurumende unonzi wambosendekwa zvakare parutivi, danho rinonzi riri kutowedzera hukasha wkevashandi. Studio7 yakundikana kubata Amai Mupfumira kuti tinzwe pavamire pari nhasi. Asi Amai Alexander vanoti havaone vashandi vachitadza kutora matanho kana pasina chagadziriswa. No media source currently available

headline: South AfricaYoronga Kubuda muGungano reInternational Criminal Court
text: Hurumende yeSouth Africa nemusi weChishanu yakazivisa kuti iri kutarisira kubuda mugungano re International Criminal Court (ICC). Asi danho riri kushoropodzwa nevazhinji sezvo risingazo kurudzire kuremekedzwa kwekodzero dzevanhu munyika iyi. Gurukota rinoona nezvemitemo muSouth Africa VaMichael Masutha vanoti vari kuunza bhiri kudare reparamende vachikurudzira kuti South Africa isave nhengo yeICC. Vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica vanoti dare iri rinongosunga vanhu vemuAfrica kwete venyika dzakabudirira. VaDewa Mavhinga vesangano re Human Rights Watch vanoti zvakakosha kuti nyika dzemuAfrica dzirambe dziri mugungano iri sezvo richibatsira kuti avo vanenge vatyorerwa kodzero dzavo vawane kwekuturira mhosva. "Zviri kufunga kuitwa neSouth Africa izvi hazviyemurike, zvinoratidza kuti nyika iyi haisisiri payange iri munguva yapfuura pakange pane hutongi hwaVaNelson Mandela avo vairemekedza kodzero dzevanhu. Zviri kuitwa neSouth Africa zvinhu zvinoshoreka uye zvichaita kuti chimiro che South Africa chishoreke." Va Mavhinga vaudza Studio 7. No media source currently available

headline: VaMugabe Voita Musangano weChimbichimbi neMutungamiri weMalaysia
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe nemusi weChishanu vakasangana nemutungamiri wehurumende yeMalaysia VaNajib Razak kumusangano wavakangoenda zvechimbi chimbi. Izvi zviri kunzi nevamwe vakuru vehurumende zvakonzerwa nekusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi zvapa kuti vaende kunosunza. VaMugabe vakasimuka munyika neChina vachiperekedzwa nemudzimai wavo Amai Grace Mugabe, gurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu VaJoram Gumbo nevamwe vakuru muhurumende yavo. VaMugabe vakapedzisira kuenda kuMalaysia pachine mutungamiri wehurumende wenyika iyi wavaidyidzana naye VaMahathir Mohamad. Mazuva ano VaMugabe vanowanzoenda kuMalaysia vachienda kunorapwa. Vatungamiri vekuMalaysia vatenda kuti VaMugabe vari munyika iyi asi havana zvizhinji zvavataura mezverwendo urwu. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika VaJoy Mabenge vanoti zviri pachena kuti VaMugabe vave kutsvaga uta nemugate sezvo hupfumi hwaenda kumawere. Zimbabwe yaimbenge iine hushamwari hwebhande nebhurugwa neChina asi mazuva ano panenge paita zinyeke nyeke. No media source currently available

headline: Vanorwira Kodzero dzeVanhu Voratidzira neKurara neKuswera muAfrica Unity Square
text: Nhengo dzemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu anoti reZimbabwe Activists Alliance, Occupy Africa Unity Square Movement neZimbabwe Women in Politics Alliance, dzakabatana nevamwe vana veZimbabwe, dziri kurara pamwe nekuswera muAfrica Unity Square dzichiratidzira kwemazuva gumi nematanhatu. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reZimbabwe Activists Alliance, Muzvare Tendayi Lynnette Mudehwe vanoti vari kurara pamwe nekuswera munzvimbo iyi senzira yekuratidzira kusafara kwevana veZimbabwe nezvavanoti zviri kuitwa nehurumende zvekusateerera vanhu. “Tiri kuda kutaura nyaya dzatinoti hurumende yeZimbabwe igadzirise nekukurumidza, zvakaita senyaya dzeupfumi, matongerwo enyika pamwe nekurarama kwevanhu,” Muzvare Mudehwe vanodaro. Vanoti vakaona kuti nyaya yekuratidzira zvezuva rimwe chete hainyatsoburitsi zvinyunyuto zvavo, saka vakafunga zvekuti vangogarira panzvimbo kwemazuva aya. “Takasarudza mazuva gumi nematanhatu kuitira kuti zvinangane nezuva rakakosha munhoroondo yeSouth Africa neAfrica yose, reDay of the African Child, apo tinocherechedza mwana weAfrica,” vanowedzera Muzvare Mudehwe. Vanoti vakatanga kurara munzvimbo iyi usiku hwemusi weChipiri uye havasati vasangana nematambudziko kubva kumapurisa, asi vanoti vanotarisira kuti vanogona kuzokanganiswa. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe neDzimwe Nyika Dzozvipira Kuderedza Zvinosvibisa Mweya weKufema
text: Musangano wezvekushanduka kwemamiriro ekunze wechimakumi maviri nenhanhatu kana kuti Cope26 wakapinda muzuva retatu nemusi weChitatu vatungamiri venyika dzakanyanya kutarisana nekuchinja kwemamiriro ekunze dzinoti Nigeria, Madagascar neBarbados vachitaura. Musangano unokokerwa neUnited Nations uyu uri kuitirwa kuGlasgow, Scotland. Asi neChipiri vatungamiri venyika zana vari kumusangano uyu kusanganisira VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, VaJoe Biden vekuAmerica, VaBoris Johnson, Britain vakatsidza kuzvipira kuti nyika dzavo dzidzikisa zvakanyanya zvinosvibisa mweya wekufema zvakaita semethane inobuda pakudhonza mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari, kutema miti nezvimwe. VaBiden vakavimbisa kudzikisa methane iyi nezvikamu makumi matatu kubva muzana panosvika gore ra2030. Asi vakashora vatungamiri veChina neRussia nekusaenda kumusangano uyu. Nyanzvi mubazi rezvekushanduka kwemamiriro ekunze kana kuti Climate Mitigation Department VaLawrence Mashungu vaudza Studio 7 kuti musangano uyu wakakosha zvikuru sezvo zvinhu zvisina kumiara zvakanaka nekuda kwekushanduka kwemamiriro ekunze. No media source currently available

headline: Vana Chiremba Vanoti Zimbabwe Inokwanisa Kubatsira Vana Vane Otizimu
text: Sedzimwe nyika zhinji, Zimbabwe iri kutarisana nechirwere cheotizimu icho chinonyanya kubata vana, zvikuru vanakomana. Bazi rinoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwezvirwere, reCenters For Disease Control, rinoti munhu mumwe chete pavanhu makumi masere nevasere munyika dzese ane otizimu. Vabereki vazhinji vanotadza kuwana zvikwanisiro kuvana vavo vane chirwere ichi izvo zvinozoita kuti vana ava vasainda kuchikoro. Mutauriri wesangano reZimbabwe Association of Doctors For Human Rights, Dr Fortune Nyamande, vanoti Zimbabwe ine vana chiremba vazhinji uye vanhu vakadzidziswa kubatsira vana vane otizimu kunyange hazvo paine zvimwe zvapingaidzo zvavanosangana nazvo munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Upenyu mberi, mitambo kumashure — Musekiwa
text: CHRIS “Romario” Musekiwa — mumwe wevatsigiri vakuru vemutambo wenhabvu muno — ari kukurudzira vatsigiri vemitambo yose zvayo kuti vatevedzere zvose zvinodiwa pakudzivirira nekurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 achiti pachazotanga mitambo, vanotarisira kuzoonana vose pasina varasikirwa neupenyu.   Musekiwa (45) anonyanya kuzivikanwa nekutsigira chikwata cheDynamos nechenyika cheZimbabwe Warriors.   Anoti sevatsigiri venhabvu, vari kusimbisana panhare nepadandemutande pakutevedzera zvinodiwa kudzivirira Covid-19.   Musekiwa — uyo anova munyori nemurongi musangano reZimbabwe National Soccer Supporters Association — anoti kunyangwe vatsigiri vemitambo vagere kudzimba, vari kutevedza zviri kukurudzirwa kuti veruzhinji vaite nemutungamiri wenyika President Mnangagwa neHurumende senzira yekuchengetedza upenyu. Musekiwa, uyo anogara uChitungwiza, anotizve vari kupota vachikurukura sevatsigiri venhabvu apo vanosimbisana pamusoro petarisiro yekuti mitambo ichadzoka kana chirwere ichi chadzikama.   “Sevatsigiri venhabvu nemimwe mitambo, tinoti ngatitsungirirei tichitevedzera zvose zvatinonzi tiite kuti tikunde Covid-19.  Vanhu ngatigarei kudzimba tichigeza maoko edu nesipo nemvura yakachena uye inochururuka. Kana takwanisa, tozorawo maoko edu iwaya masanitiser.   “Isu sevatsigiri, tasuwa mutambo wedu wenhabvu asi tinoti chisingapere chinoshura, chirwere ichi chichadarika. Chakakosha pari zvino upenyu kuti tigotanga mitambo tichikuza vatambi vedu tose tiri vatano.   “Panhabvu ndipo pane upenyu hwedu — tinogara nayo mundangariro dzedu nemudzimba, saka ngatinamatei kuti chirwere ichi chipere, mitambo yemuno neyekunze igotanga.   “Asi zvekuvhakachirana bodo, vanhu garai kudzimba dzenyu tozoonana hondo iyi yapera,” anodaro Romario.   Anoti chirwere cheCovid-19 – icho chinokonzerwa nehutachiona hunodaidzwa kuti coronavirus – chiri chatekeshera pasi rose izvo anoyambira vatsigiri vemitambo yakasiyana kuti vashingirire kusvika zvinhu zvaita nani nechinangwa chekuchengetedza upenyu hwevanhu.   “Zvinorwadza kuguma torwarirwa kana kufirwa nevatsigiri vangava venhabvu kana mimwe mitambo nekuda kweCovid-19. Saka ngatigare mudzimba.   “Izvozvi vasikana vedu venetball vanoda kuzoenda kuEurope, saka nekudaro ngatitevedzei zvinodiwa tigokwanisa kuzotsigira chikwata chedu kana mitambo iyi                                                          yoitwa.”   Romario anoti anoshamiswa zvikuru nevamwe vanhu vari kuita mitambo yekuti vawane mari mumarukisheni achiti uku kuzvipinza mumatambudziko sezvo vanhu ivava vachikwanisa kuzodzokera kudzimba dzavo vava nechirwere.   “Zvose zviri kunzi titevedzere ndizvo zvinokurudzirwa nesangano reWorld Health Organisation (WHO), saka ngatitsungirirei. Tinoziva vamwe vari kutorota nhabvu nemimwe mitambo asi vari mudzimba dzavo,” anodaro Romario.

headline: MaLady Chevrons opinda muhondo
text: MURAIRIDZI wechikwata chenyika checricket chevanhukadzi chemaLady Chevrons – Adam Chifo – anoti vatambi vake vakagadzirira kurwa semvumba apo vacharwira tikiti rekuenda kumitambo yeWorld Cup.   Svondo rino, maLady Chevrons ari kutanga kubandana neThailand munyika muno mumitambo mina yeOne Day International Series uye kana yapera zvikwata zviviri izvi zvichabva zvatanga kutatsurana mumitambo mitatu yeTwenty20 Series.   Achipedza kusangana neThailand, maLady Chevrons achazosimuka akananga kuBotswana munaGunyana uko achanokwikwidza mumutambo weInternational Cricket Council (ICC) Women’s T20 World Cup Africa Qualifier.   Abva kuBotswana, munaMbudzi chikwata chenyika ichi chichange chiri pamusha apo chicharwira tikiti rekuenda kumutambo weICC Women World Cup uyo uriko gore rinotevera kuNew Zealand. Chifo anoti chikwata chake chine basa guru rekubata mumitambo yavakatarisana nayo uye vari kushanda nesimba kuti vagokunda mumitambo iyi yose.   “Tange tichishanda nesimba nguva pfupi yadarika tichigadzirira mitambo yatakatarisana nayo. Tinoda kuenda kumitambo miviri yeWorld Cup.   Asi iye zvino tinombotanga tambopedzerana neThailand iyo tiri kusangana nayo kutanga svondo rino,” anodaro.   Chikwata chake change chiri mukembi masvondo adarika kubva chakapihwa mvumo nesangano reSports and Recreation Commission kuti chitange gadziriro dzacho dzemitambo iyi uye chiri kugara mubio-secure bubble izvo zviri kutenderwa panguva ino kuti zvikwata zvemitambo yakasiyana zvitevedzere apo nyika iri kurwisa denda reCovid-19.   Bio-secure bubble zvinoreva kuti vatambi, varairidzi nevamwe vose vanenge vachiona nezvemutambo vanogara kwavo voga vasingasangane neveruzhinji nedonzvo rekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. “Tave nevhiki tiri mukembi mubio-secure bubble. Bio-secure bubble inobatsira zvikuru nekuti tinenge tichigara pamwe tichishanda zvakasimba pasina zvimwe zvinotidzorera kumashure basa redu ratinenge tichiita,” anodaro Chifo.   Mutambo wemaLady Chevrons neThailand uchatambirwa kuTakashinga Cricket Club uye uchange usina vatsigiri vanotenderwa kupinda kuzoona zvikwata izvi zvichitatsurana sezvinodiwa pasi pemitemo yekurwisa kupararira kwedenda reCovid-19.

headline: ZESN Inoti Dzimwe Nzvimbo dzeKuvhotera Dzanga Dzisina Zvikwanisiro zveVanorarama neHurema
text: ZESN, iyo iri kuongorora mafambiro ari kuita sarudzo dzema by-election dzaitwa neMugovera yakabatana neElection Resource Centre, inoti vaongorori vavo vesarudzo vari mune mamwe matunhu ari kuitirwa sarudzo akaita seEpworth, Murehwa South, neChivi South manga musina zvikwanisiro zvinoita kuti vanorarama nehurema vavhote zvakanaka kana kutokwanisa kuvhota. Mugwaro raraburitsa, sangano iri rinotiwo raona huwandu hwakanyanya hwevanhu vanga vachibatsirwa kuvhota paMangani Business Centre Tent A kuBinga North. Vaongorori vesarudzo ava vanonziwo vaona kuti masabhuku nemadzishe vaendawo nezvikwata zvevanhu kunovhota vachivakomekedza kuti vati vanoda kubatsirwa kuvhota vachivhotera nhengo yeZanu PF. Sangano iri ratiwo ratambira nyunyuto pamusoro pe ink iri kushandiswa mukuratidza kuti munhu avhota, iyo inonzi yakasiyana-siyana ruvara, uye isiri yemhando yepamusoro, izvo zvinogona kuita kuti munhu abiridzire achivhota kakawanda. ZESN yati yaisa vaongorori vayo vesarudzo vanodarika mazana amana mumatunhu makumi maviri nemasere aitirwa sarudzo dzekutsvaga vamiriri vedare reparamende pamwe nezana nemakumi maviri nemaviri ane sarudzo dzevamiriri vemakanzuru.

headline: ZEC Inoti Sarudzo dzeMakanzuru kuBulilima Dzatanga neNguva Uye Dziri Kufamba Zvakanaka, ZESN Ichiti Yagutsikanawo neGadziriro yeZEC
text: Komisheni inotungamira sarudzo munyika, yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, inoti sarudzo dzemakanzuru mumawadhi anoti 1, 14 ne 16, kuBulilima dzatanga zvakanaka uye nzvimbo dzose dzekuvhotera dzavhurwa nenguva yakatarwa ya 7 dzemangwanani. Ongororo yaburitswa nguva dzemasikati nesangano reZESN, iro riri kuongorora mafambiro ari kuita sarudzo idzi, inoti sangano iri riri kugutsikana negadziriro yeZEC pamwe nekuvhura nenguva kwaitwa nzvimbo dzekuvhotera. ZESN inotiwo yaona kuti zvikwanisiro zvose zvinodiwa pakuvhota zvanga zvave panzvimbo dzekuvhotera dzose nenguva. ZESN inoti kusvika panguva dzemasikati vanhu makumi mana vanga vabatsirwa kuvhota munzvimbo nhatu dziri kuvhoterwa, makumi matatu nemumwe wavo vari vanhu vasingaoni. Sangano iri rinotiwo vanhu vashoma ndivo vabuda kunovhota musarudzo idzi. Mapato anoti ZANU-PF, Citizens’ Coalition for Change neZAPU ndiwo ane nhengo dziri kukwikwidzana musarudzo idzi.

headline: Batsirai chikwata chemaWarriors
text: KOMITI iri kuunganidza mari yekutsigira chikwata chenhabvu chenyika cheZimbabwe Warriors — icho chatove kunyika yeEgypt chichigadzirira kukwikiwdza mumitambo yeAfrica Cup of Nations (Afcon) – yeWarriors 2019 Fund Raising Committee, iri kukumbira makambani, mapoka akasiyana neveruzhinji kuti vabatsire mukuunganidzwa kwemari inosvika US$500 000.   Mutungamiri wenyika President Mnangagwa vakadoma komiti iyi yechinangwa chekuti iunganidze mari ichashandiswa nechikwata chenyika ichi mumakwikwi ari kutanga nemusi weChishanu svondo rinouya, 21 Chikumi.   Musi uyu, nenguva dza10 manheru, Zimbabwe ichatatsurana neEgypt mumutambo wekuzarura makwikwi aya.   Sachigaro wekomiti yeWarriors Communications Sub-Committee, Dr Eve Gadzikwa, vanoti mari iri kudiwa ichabatsira pakutsigira maWarriors mukunomiririra Zimbabwe kwavari kuita.   “Sekomiti, tiri kumhanya-mhanya kutsvaga mari nekudaro tinokumbira makambani neveruzhinji kuti vatsigire maWarriors. Ndinoda kuzivisa nyika kuti mari yose yatichaunganidza ichashanda basa rayo chairo uye nenzira dzakajeka. Tinozviziva kuti tinofanirwa kuita zvinhu zvine chiremerera kuitira kuti tigoramba tichitsigirwa.   “Tiri kuedza kuunganidza mari inosvika US$500 000 yekutsigira maWarriors. Rutsigiro rwedu rwunovapa simba rekutamba bhora nesimba, saka chikumbiro chedu kumunhu wose ndechekuti ngatibatane tibatsire nemari kana zvimwe zvatinokwanisa,” vanodaro Dr Gadzikwa.   Nemusi weChitatu chino, kwakaitwa mabiko muguta reHarare ekuparura kuunganidzwa kwemari yekutsigira maWarriors.

headline: Varwere Votambura Zvichitevera Kuramwa Mabasa Kuri Kuitwa Muzvipatara
text: Varwere vari kuchema chema zvikuru kuhurumende kuti igadzirise zviri kudiwa nanachiremba kuitira kuti vasarasikirwe nehupenyu hwavo. Varwere vanotiwo kuramwa basa kwavana chiremba kuri kuisa hutano hwavo parumananzombe. Pashanyirwa chipatara cheHarare Hospital nhasi neStudio7 varwere vanorwarisa chete ndivo vange vachibatsirwa vamwe vachinzi vadzokere kumba vozorapwa kana vana chiremba vadzoka kubasa. Amai Sekai Ganyani Mushandu, avo vane mwana ane dambudziko remoyo, vanoti havachaziva zvekuita nemwana wavo uyo anonyorerwa mishonga mwedzi wega wega. Amai Mushandu vati chikumbiro chavo ndechekuti hurumende igadzirise zviri kunetsa kuitira vanaChiremba vadzokere pamabasa. Amai Previous Sachinda, avo vaenda kunorapwa kuHarare Hospital vakadzokera kumba vasina kuwana rubatsiro, vaudza Studio7 kuti varwadziwa zvikuru kudzorerwa kumba vachidzimbikana nemuviri. Vamwe amai varamba kudomwa nezita vane mwana ane mazuva matanhatu azvarwa, pachishandiswa oparesheni sezvo matumbu ake aive akazvimba, vati vana chiremba havasi kuuya nguva dzese kuzowona vana vari muwadhi mavo izvo zvoitawo kuti vatyire hutano hwemwana wavo Mukuru weHarare Central Hospital, Amai Peggy Zvavamwe, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti vanachiremba havasati vadzoka kumabasa. Amai Zvavamwe vati vanga vari kupinda mumusangano wekuongorora kuti kuramwa mabasa uku kuri kuvhiringa varwere zvakadii. Munyori mubazi rezveutano, Dr Gerald Gwinji, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kuramwa basa kwanachiremba uku kuri kukanganisa mabasa ezveutano. VaGwinji vati bazi ravo richiri kukukurukura nehurumende kuti vangagadzirisa sei dambudziko asi vakatiwo chikumbiro chavo kunana Chiremba ndechekuti dai vakwanisa kudzokera kumabasa hurumende ichigadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. Zimbabwe Hospital Doctor’s Association inoti nhengo dzayo dzinodarika chiuru dziri kuramwa mabasa. Zvichemo zvanachiremba ava zvinosanganisira mari shoma pamwe nekusapiwa mukana wekuti vatenge mota pasina kubhadhariswa mutero kubva kunze kwenyika kuitira kuti vafambe nyore vachienda kubasa. No media source currently available

headline: VaBiden Voshanyira Dunhu reOklahoma
text: Mutungamiri we America, VaJoe Biden, nhasi vachashanyira guta re Tulsa, mudunhu re Oklahoma, uko vanoti vanoda kunopemberera kushinga kwevanhu vechitema vakararama mukupondwa kwakaitwa vatema nemhomho yevachena mugore ra 1921. VaBiden vanoti vanhu vatema vakararama havana kuora moyo asi vakashanda nesimba vakaumba hupenyu hwavo patsva. Kupondwa kwevatema uku kwakaitika kwemazuva maviri, anoti 31 Chivabvu ne 1 Chikumi mugore ra 1921, dzimba nemabhizimisi evatema zvichitungidzwa nemoto vanhu vachipfurwa kana kusungirirwa. Izvi zvinonzi zvakaitika mushure mekunge umwe musikana wechichena aiva nemakore gumi nemanomwe akapomera mhosva mukomana wechitema aive nemakore gumi nemapfumbamwe achiti akange achida kumubhinya. Zvinonzi pakaurawa vanhu vechitema vanopfuura mazana matatu. VaBiden varikuita rwendo urwu panguva iyo vachieza kudzika mitemo inopedza rusaruraganda mu America. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, Muzvinafundo Stan Mukasa, vanodzidzisa paIndiana University of Pennsylvania, vanoti kupondwa kwakaitwa vanhu ava muna 1921 kwaka zivikanwa muna 1995, mushure memurume ainzi Timothy McVeigh akabhomba mahofisi ehurumende muguta reOklahoma City, mudunhu re Oklahoma. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi dzeHutano Dzotyira Kuti Hutachiwana Hwakatanga kuIndia Hungandai Hwave Munyika
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weChina kuti vanhu vatatu vakafa neCovid-19, uye vamwe makumi maviri nevashanu, vaviri vavo vari vakabva kuIndia, vakawanikwa vaine denda iri. Vamwe vanomwe pavanhu ava vanhu vanonzi vakasangana nevakabva kuIndia ava. Izvi zvakasiya huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika kubva zvachatanga hwasvika pazviuru makumi matatu nezvisere nemazana mana ane makumi mapfumbamwe nemumwe, kana kuti 38 491 uye vanhu vafa vasvikawo pachiuru chimwe chete nemazana mashanu ane makumi masere nevaviri, kana kuti 1 582. Kuwanikwa kwevanhu vakabva kuIndia vaine chirwere ichi kunonzi nenyanzvi yezvehutano uye vari chiremba, Dr. Edgar Munatsi, chinhu chinotyisa zvikuru pachitariswa kuti nyika iyi iri kutambudzwa nehutachiwana hweB.1.617, uhwo hunonzi hwakatanga kuonekwa ikoko uye huri kuuraya vanhu vakawanda. Sangano reWorld Health Organisation, W-H-O, rinoti hutachiwana hwekuIndia uhwu hunotapuriranwa nyore kudarika humwe hwose. Pari zvino nyika dzemuAfrica nomwe dzinoti Algeria, D-R-C, Kenya, Uganda, Morocco, Nigeria neSouth Africa dzinonzi neW-H-O dzakatove nehutachiwana hwekuIndia uhwu. Vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemana, kana kuti 24 million, vabatwa nedenda reCovid-19 muIndia kubva zvatanga chirwere ichi, uye vamwe vanodarika zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nezviviri, kana kuti 262 000, vafa nacho munyika iyi. Asi Dr. Munatsi vanoti hazvishamisi kuti hutachiwana uhwu hunogona kunge hwave munyika pachionekwa kuti pane vanhu vakatobva kunyika iyi vakabatwa vaine Covid-19. Vanokurudzira kusimbiswa kwenyaya dzekuvhenekwa kwehutachiwana uyewo kuti pateverwe vose vangadai vakasangana nevanhu ava senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiwana uhwu. No media source currently available Mukuru anoona nezvekurwiswa kweCovid-19 munyika, Dr. Agnes Mahomva vanoti pari zvino vari mubishi kumhanyamhanya kuvheneka zvavainazvo kuti vaone kuti hutachiwana hwekuIndia uhwu hwapinda here muZimbabwe kana kuti kwete. Dr. Mahomva vanoti zvisineyi nekuti hutachiwana hwabva kuIndia here kana kupi, vanhu vanofanirwa kungoramba vachitora matanho ekugeza maoko nemvura nesipo, kusaungana, vachiti zvese izvozvo zvinobatsira kuvharidzira chirwere cheCovid-19. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi maviri nechimwe kana kuti 21 000 vakabaiwa nhomba nezuro wakare. Vanhu zviuru gumi nemakumi manomwe nevasere, kana kuti 10 078 vakabaiwa nhomba yekutanga, kuchiti vamwe zviuru gumi nechimwe nemazana mashanu ane makumi manomwe nevanomwe, kana kuti 11 577 vachibaiwa nhomba yepiri. Huwandu hwevanhu vabaiwa nhomba yekutanga kubva zvatanga chirongwa ichi hwakasvika pazviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi mashanu nezvipfumbamwe zvine mazana masere nemakumi manomwe nevashanu, kana kuti 559 875. Vanhu zviuru zana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nechimwe nezana nemakumi mana nevashanu, kana kuti 192 145, vakanga vabaiwawo nhomba yepiri kusvika nemusi weChina.

headline: Chikwata chaZemura charakashwa
text: CHIKWATA chaJordan Zemura, mutambi wemaWarriors, cheAFC Bournemouth, nhasi charakashwa 9-0 necheLiverpool mumutambo weEnglish Premier League.   Zemura atamba mutambo uyu apo chikwata chake chakwapaidzwa 9-0 izvo zvaona Bournemouth ichiita chikwata chekutanga mwaka uno kunwisa kanodarika kashanu mumutambo mumwe chete.   Mumitambo yatambwa neBournemouth mwaka uno wekutanga yakakunda Aston Villa 2-0, ndokuzokundwa 4-0 neManchester City, 3-0 neArsenal uye 9-0 newanhasi apo Liverpool yakanda kanokwana ka9 kwa”nya”.

headline: Huwandu hweVana Vanotapurirwa HIV paKuzvarwa Hwoderera
text: Hurumende inoti madzimai zviuru makumi manomwe ndivo chete vakabatwa vaine hutachiwana hweHIV/AIDS gore rino. Mutevedzeri wemukuru anoona nezvekutapuriranwa kweHIV kubva kuna amai kuenda kuvana, kana kuti Prevention of Mother To Child Transmission, PMTCT, Dr Nyikadzino Mahachi, vanoti pamadzimai aya, vana vanosvika zvikamu zvipfumbamwe kubva muzana ndivo vakatapurirwa chirwere cheHIV naamai vavo. Hurumende inoti uyu munongedzo wekuti zvirongwa zvawo zvekudzivirira kutapurirwa kwechirwere ichi kuvana huri kushanda. Chirongwa ichi chakaparurwa muna 2001 nehurumende ichishanda nemasangano akazvimirira. Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera veMDC-T, vanoti zviri kuitwa nehurumende zvinofadza uye chinangwa ndechekuti pasave kana nemwana mumwe anotapurirwa hutachiona naamai vake. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Mutambo waChiwandire uchiri kurongwa’
text: CHIKWATA chaKudakwashe Memory ‘Take Money’ Chiwandire chinoti chakakumbira mwedzi mumwe chete kuti chipedzise kuita gadziriro dzekuronga mutambo wake naZulina Munoz wekurwira bhande rake reWBC Female Interim Super-bantamweight.   Take Money ange achifanirwa kurwa naMunoz wekuMexico nemusi weMugovera svondo rino kuHarare International Conference Centre (HICC).   Asi chikwata chake chinoti chakakumbira kuti mutambo uyu upfuudzwe kumberi kuti vawane nguva yekupedzisa kuita gadziriro dzekuuronga.   Maneja waTake Money arizve murairidzi wake, Clyde Musonda, anoti kudivi ravo, gadziriro dzekuti mutambo uyu uitwe hadzisati dzanyatsopera.   Anoti Chiwandire, uyo ange ari kuSouth Africa masvondo adarika achiita gadziriro dzake, akagadzirira kusangana naMunoz asi chakamisa kuti vaviri ava vabandane svondo rino inyaya yekuti pane zviri kuda kugadziriswa mukurongwa kwemutambo uyu.   “Kudivi redu, tange tisati tapedza kuita gadziriro dzekuronga mutambo waTake Money naMunoz. Munoziva kuronga mutambo mukuru wakaita seuyu, panoda zvakawanda saka tichiri kuita gadziriro dzacho.   “Takakumbira mwedzi mumwe chete kuchikwata chaMunoz kuti tipedzise kuita gadziriro dzekuronga mutambo uyu nekuti pane zvakawanda zvange zvichida kugadziriswa.   “Asi tinoda kuti muzive kuti Kuda akagadzirira kurwa, iye zvake kudivi rake ange achiita gadziriro dzake dzichifamba zvakanaka,” anodaro Musonda.   Mutambo wevaviri ava, uyo wakatarisirwa zvikuru nevazhinji, ndiwo uchange uri waChiwandire wekutanga kurwira kuchengetedza bhande rake iri.   Kana akabudirira kuri chengetedza, anenge awaniswa mukana wekurwira bhande reWBC Gold iro rina Yamileth Mercado wekuMexico zvakare.   Chiwandire akahwina bhande rake reWBC Female Interim Super-bantamweight mushure mekukunda Cathrine Phiri wekuZambia mwedzi yadarika.

headline: Vana Chiremba Vakaramwa Mabasa Vobatirwa Mari neHurumende
text: Sangano rinomirira vana chiremba vemuzvipatara zvehurumende, reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, rinoti ranyorera tsamba kudare remakurukota richinyunyuta nekubatirwa mari kwaitwa nhengo dzesangano iri. No media source currently available Sangano iri rinoti ranyorerawo vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pamwe nehutungamiri mubazi rezvehutano richida kuti patorwe matanho echimbichimbi zvichitevera kubatwa kwemari dzavana chiremba vanonzi vakapinda mukuramwa mabasa. Mutungamiri wesangano iri, Dr Fortune Nyamande, vanoti vanyorerawo zvakare kudare redzimhosva repamusoro vachida kuti rinzwe nyaya yavo yekubatwa kwemari dzemihoro iyi nechimbichimbi. VaNyamande vanoti danho iri richatoita kuti vanachiremba vatadze kuenda kumabasa sezvo vazotambiriswa mari shoma shoma kwazvo. Hurumende yakazivisa svondo rino kuti yaizobata mari inoita $264.48 kwemwedzi miviri kuna vanachiremba vakapinda mukuramwa mabasa kwemasvondo matatu. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, Dr Paul Chimedza, vakaudza Studio7 kuti zviri pamutemo kuti munhu anenge aramwa basa haafanirwe kutambiriswa mari yemazuva aanga asiri pabasa. Kuratidzira kwakaitwa navana chiremba kwakavhiringidza kufamba kwemabasa muzvipatara zvehurumende. Dr Nyamande vanoti vaziva nezvekubatirwa mari idzi pavaenda kumabhanga kwavo.

headline: Pastor Evan Mawarire Vanoti Kuratidzira kwaBudirira Zvakanyanya
text: Pastor Evan Mawarire avo vakakurudzira vanhu kuti varatidzire nhasi vanoti kuratidzira uku kwabudirira zvakanyanya. Vachitaura neStudio 7 Pastor Mawarire vati pane varume vana vakauya kumahofisi avo vachivatsvaga asi vakaramba kuudza vavanoshanda navo kuti sei vaivatsvaga. Asi vati havasi kuzodzokera shure kurwira kodzero dzevana veZimbabwe. Pastor Mawarire vati vachazozivisa munguva inotevra kuti votora danho ripi. No media source currently available

headline: Pasuwa Onyorerana Chibvumirano neZIFA
text: Zimbabwe Footballers Association kana kuti Zifa inonzi yapa murairidzi wemaWarriors Callisto Pasuwa chibvumirano chekuti ashande kwemakore matatu achirairidza chikwata ichi. Pasuwa audza Studio 7 kuti achiri kuongorora chibvumirano ichi. Zvichakadaro, chikwata cheZimbabwe chiri kuenderera mberi negadziriro yacho yemakwikwi e Caf African Nations Championship (Chan) ari kutambirwa kurwanda mwedzi unouya kutanga musi wa16 kusvika musi wa 17 Kukadzi. Zimbabwe iri muGroup D pamwe neZambia, Rwanda neUganda.

headline: Seneta Rejoice Timire, Avo Vakashaya neChirwere cheCovid-19, Varadzikwa Nhasi muHarare
text: Mumwe wevanga vachimirira vakaremara mudare reSenate, Amai Rejoice Timire. avo vakashaya nezuro nedenda reCovid-19, varadzikwa nhasi kumarinda eGlen Forest muHarare. Vachitaura pakuradzikwa kwaAmai Timire, sachigaro veNational Disability Board, Amai Mercy Maunganidze, vati vachaedza nepose pavanogona napo kuti mabasa akanaka aiitwa naAmai Timire, aenderere mberi. Vasara vakamirira vakaremara mudare reSeneti, VaWatson Khupe, vati vakaremara vasiyirwa chisveru chekuti vagare vachishanda zvakasimba sezvaiita Amai Timire. Mukuru weDeaf Zimbabwe Trust,Amai Babra Nyangairi, vatiwo vakaremara vanofanira kufambisa mberi mabasa aibatwa naAmai Timire. Hanzvadzi yaAmai Timire, Bishop Sevenzile Msiza, vati semhuri varasikirwa zvikuru. Muzvare Pamela Timire, avo vaishanda pamwe chete naamai vavo, vatiwo ruzhinji rweZimbabwe rwarasikirwa nekushaya kwaita Seneta Timire. Amai Timire, avo vakadomwa kuva nhengo yeSenate muna 2018, vashaya vava nemakore makumi matanhatu nemaviri ekuberekwa, uye vasiya vana vashanu nevazukuru. No media source currently available

headline: Dare reSeneti Rinotambira Kudomwa kwaAmai Amanda Bennett seMukuru Kana Kuti CEO weBoka reNhau reUSAGM
text: Dare reseneti muAmerica nemusi weChina rakatambira kudomwa kwaAmai Amanda Bennett semukuru, kana kuti Chief Executive Officer mutsva weboka rehurumende yeAmerica rakazvimirira rinotepfenyura nhau nekuburitsa mashoko, reUnited States Agency for Global Media, kana kuti USAGM. Vachizivisa nezvekudomwa kwaAmai Bennett uku, vakafanobata chigaro chaChief Executive Officer veUSAGM, Amai Kelu Chao, vakati Amai Bennett mutori wenhau ane hunyanzvi hunoratidzwa kuburikidza nekuwana kwavo mubairo wePulitzer Prize kaviri. Vakaenderera mberi vachiti munhu ari kuunza pachigaro ichi ruzivo rwunodarika makore makumi mana rwekuferefetwa kwenhau muAmerica pamwe nekunze kweAmerica, ruzivo rwekutungamira boka remabhizimusi, uye kutungamira muhurumende. Amai Chao vakati chakanyanya kukosha ndechekuti Amai Bennett vanogoverana nevamwe kuzvipira kwakadzama kwekutorwa kwenhau kwepamusoro, chidokwadokwa chekutorwa kwenhau dzechokwadi uye kwakasununguka, kuzvipira kuchengetedzeka kwevatori venhau nevateereri vavo, nekusarerekera mativi pakuzadzisa zvisungo zvemashandiro eboka reUSAGM. Amai Chao vakati kutambirwa kwaAmai Bennett nedare reseneti mucherechedzo wekukosha kweboka reUSAGM mukuwanisa vanhu nhau dzechokwadi uye kutsigira rusununguko nehutongo hwejekerere pasi rose.

headline: Kakomana kanetsa ne’motor-cross’
text: SHASHA yechidiki yemujaho wemotor-cross Emmanuel Bako (13) inoti inoshuvira zvikuru kuti rimwe remazuva izopihwa chiremerera chekuve shangwiti munyika muno mune zvemitambo.   Emmanuel, uyo anove nyanzvi inozivikanwa mumutambo uyu achihwina mibairo yakasiyana muZimbabwe nekunyika dzekunze dzinosanganisira South Africa, anoti akamirira kudzoka kwemutambo uyu zvichitevera kumiswa kwawakaitwa nechinangwa chekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Anoti gore rino range richirakidza kuve rake sezvo aitarisira kuhwina mijaho yakawanda asi zvose zvakaenda mudondo nekuda kwechirwere ichi.   “Gore rino zvange zvakaoma kugara tisingakwikwidze, ini ndihwo hupenyu hwangu asi ndave nemufaro mukuru kuti mutambo uyu wave kudzoka sezvo tine tarisiro yekuti tichatanga kukwikwidza zvekare munguva iri                                            kutevera.   “Ndinotenda Hurumende yedu nekuti yakatipa mvumo yekuita gadziriro saka ndiri kuita gadziriro pakupera kwevhiki rega-rega musi weMugovera neSvondo kuDonnybrook Raceway.   “Zvatakanzwa kuti mutambo uyu wave kudzoka iye zvino tave kutosimbaradza gadziriro dzacho nekuti ndinoda kuramba ndichisimukira,” anodaro Emmanuel.   Emmanuel akatanga kukwikwidza mumujaho wemotor cross aine makore mana ekuberekwa  achirairidzwa naStanley Mugiyo uyo nanhasi anove murairidzi wake.   Anoti motor-cross ndiwo hupenyu hwake uye acharamba achishanda nesimba sezvo anoda kunokwikwidza kuEurope, Asia nekuAmerica.   “Shuviro yangu kuti rimwe remazuva ndizopihwawo chiremerera munyika yangu chekuve gamba mune zvemitambo saka ndinoramba ndichishanda nesimba,” anodaro.   Baba vake, Brighton Bako avo vanove mutsigiri wake mukuru, vanoti zvakakosha kuti vabereki vatsigire zvipo zvevana vavo.   “Sevabereki, ibasa redu kuti titsigire vana vedu pane zvose zvavanoda kuita muhupenyu hwavo.   Mitambo yakasiyana yava nemari zhinji saka ukaona kuti mwana wako ane chipo chemitambo yakasiyana mutsigire nekuti hauzive kuti mangwana zvinofamba sei,” anodaro Brighton.   Gore rino, Emmanuel akakwikwidza kuSouth Africa akahwina mujaho we85CC (big wheel) Inland Championship.

headline: Vakawanda Vane Varwere paParirenyatwa Voswerapo Nekuda kweKuoma kweZvinhu
text: Kuwondomoka kwehupfumi munyika kowedzera kutambudzika kwehama dzine varwere muzvipatara zvakadai seParirenyatwa, uko vanachiremba vasiri kuenda kumabasa. Ongororo yakaitwa neStudio 7 pachipatara cheParirenyatwa inoratidza kuti veruzhinji vanorwarirwa vari kuswera vari pachipatara ichi vakamirira kuona varwere panguva dzakeona varwere, vachiti zvinhu zvakavaomera kuti vange vachimbodzokera kudzimba vozodzokazve sezvo mari dzekufambisa mumichovha dzakakwidzwa zvakanyanya. Mumwe wevanhu vanoswera pachipatara ichi ndemumwe mudzimai uyo angoda kuzivikanwa nezita rekuti Mai Miranzi. Amai Miranzi, avo vane mukoma wavo ari muchipatara, vanoti kana vangouya panguva dzekushanyira murwere dza 6 dzemangwanani, vanozobva pachipatara apa mushure mekuona murwere nenguva dza 6 dzemanheru. Amai Miranzi vanoti vanoswera nenzara. Amai Miranzi vanotiwo kunyangwe hazvo vari vanhu vabva zera, vanotofamba netsoka kubva mudhorobha mavanenge vaburukira kuenda kuchipatara cheParirenyatwa. Amai Rumbidzai Shumba vane murwerewo zvakare muParirenyatwa. Amai Shumba vanotsigirawo zvataurwa naAmai Miranzi vachiti kudhura kwemari dzekufambisa ndiko kunovapa kuti vangoswera havo pachipatara apa. Kunyangwe hazvo vane varwere ava vachiswera pachipatara apa, vanotiwo kusavapo kwanachiremba kunowedzera matambudziko avo sezvo hama dzavo dzisiri kurapwa uye vachingowana pasina shanduko. Vanachiremba havasi kuenda kumabasa vachiti havasisina zvikwanisiro zvinoita kuti vaende kumabasa avo. Vamwewo amai vada kuzivikanwa nezita rekuti Kukuwe vati zvinosuwisa kuti zvavanenge vangosiya varwere vavo vari ndizvo zvavanowana vari. Vemachechi pasi pemubatanidzwa weZimbabwe Christian Heads of Denominations vanotiwo vakanyora gwaro kumutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vachitaridza kushushikana zvikuru nekurambodzikira kwezvinhu munyaya dzehupfumi. Vachitaura neStudio 7, Reverend Kenneth Mtata veZimbabwe Council of Churches vanoti vemakereke vanoona sekuti kuramboderera kwehupfumi kunokonzera kusagadzikana kwezvinhu munyika. Ukuwo, dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi dzinoti kushaya simba kwemari yemunyika ichienzaniswa nedhora rekuAmerica pamwe nekudhura kwemitengo yezvinodiwa nemunhu zuva rega rega zvave kusiya mhuri zhinji dzichinyura kupinda muhurombo. No media source currently available

headline: MDC-T yaVaChamisa Yorwisa Kuti Vari kuChikwata chaMuzvare Khupe Vadzingwe muParamende
text: MDCT inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa inonzi yanyorera kuparamende ichikumbira kuti vaimbova mutevedzeri webato iri Muzvare Thokozani Khupe nevamwe vabviswe kuve nhengo dzeparamende zvichitevera makatanwa ari mubato iri. Vakafanobata chigaro chasachigaro webato reMDCT rinotungamirwa naVaChamisa, VaMorgen Komichi, vanoti bato ravo rakaendesa tsamba kumutauriri wedare reparamende, VaJacob Mudenda, nechinangwa chekuti Muzvare Thokozani Khupe nevamwe vavo vari kuvatsigira vadzingwe muparamende. Izvi zvinotevera kudzingwa kwakaitwa Muzvare Khupe, avo vaiva mutevedzeri wemutungamiri muMDCT, pamwe naVaAbednigo Bhebhe, avo vaiva murongi wemisangano mubato iri. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaMudenda kuti tinzwe divi reparamende panyaya iyi. Asi mutauriri weboka reMDC-T inotungamirwa naMuzvare Khupe, VaObert Gutu, vanoti zviri kutaurwa naVaKomichi izvi ndezvemugotsi matsuro. Zvichakadai, imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaVivid Gwede, vanoti kunyorwa kwetsamba yekubvisa Muzvare Khupe nevamwe vavo muparamende hachisi chinhu chinoshamisa. Aka hakasi kekutanga kuti MDC-T idzinge nhengo dzayo muparamende. Vaimbova munyori mukuru weMDCT, VaTendai Biti nevamwe, vakambodzingiswa kuparamende mushure mekunge vanetsana nevaimbova mutungamiri webato iri, mushakabvu VaMorgan Tsvangirai. Kunetsana pakati paVaChamisa naMuzvare kwakatanga pakafa VaTsvangirai apo komiti yepamusorosoro yeMDCT, yeNational Council, yakabuda nechisungo chekuti VaChamisa vatsive VaTsvangirai, nekune rumwe rutivi, Muzvare Khupe vachiti panofanirwa kuitwa kongiresi yechimbichimbi kutsvaga anotsiva VaTsvangirai. Zvichakadai, Muzvare Khupe vanoti hurongwa hwekuita kongiresi hwave pachinhanho chepamusoro vachiti kongiresi iyi ichaitwa musi wa 21 mwedzi uno. Nekune rumwe rutivi, VaChamisa vanoti hapasisina nguva yekuita kongiresi gore rino sezvo patarisanwa nesarudzo. Zvikwata zviviri izvi zviri kurwirawo zita rekuti MDC-T, uye nyaya iyi yakatosvitswa kudare redzimhosva. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa Anosunga Hutungamiri hweZCTU muHarare neDzimwe Nzvimbo
text: Mapurisa asunga nhengo dzesangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions muHarare pamberi pekuratidzira kwangu kwarongwa nesangano iri richinyunyuta nekuoma kuri kuramba kuchiita hupenyu kunonzi neZCTU kwakonzerwa nekukwidzwa kwakaitwa mitero nehurumende. Kuratidzira kwanga kwakarongwa neZCTU kwatadza kuenderera mberi muHarare sezvo mapurisa akomberedza muzinda wesangano revashandi iri akasunga hutungamiri hwesangano iri. Mutauriri weZCTU, VaLast Tarabuku, vaudza Studio7 kuti vasungwa ava vanomwe avo vanosanganisira mutungamiri weZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, munyori mukuru musangano iri VaJaphet Moyo nevamwe. Rimwe remagweta ari kumirira vasungwa uye vari vesangano remagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaLizwe Jamela, vati vasungwa ava vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuita zvinhu zvisina maturo. VaJamela vatiwo pane vashandi veZCTU pamwe nedzimwe nhengo dzesangano iri vari kutadza kubuda mumahofisi esangano iri sezvo mapurisa akapakatira zvombo akakomberedza muzinda weZCTU kubva mangwanani. Zvichitevera kusungwa kwaitwa hutungamiri hweZCTU uku, hapana kuratidzira kwazoitwa muHarare. Zvichakadai, mutongi wedare ramejasitiriti, Amai Lanzini Ncube, vatura mutongo wekurambidza ZCTU kuratidzira vachiti muHarare muchine chirwere chekorera chichakadzika midzi vachiti kuratidzira kwanga kuchida kuitwa uku kwaizokonzera kupararira kwechirwere ichi. ZCTU yanga yakwidza nyaya iyi kumatare mushure mekunge mapurisa arambidza sangano iri kuratidzira nhasi nepamusana pechirwere chekorera icho chauraya vanhu makumi mana nevapfumbamwe kusvika parizvino. Kunyange hazvo dare nemapurisa ari kurambidza ZCTU kuratidzira, mitambo yenhabvu iri kuitwa muHarare, uye Zanu PF yakaita musangano wayo nguva pfupi yapfuura pasina kurambidzwa nemapurisa. MDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa yakarambidzwawo kuita musangano wayo zvichinzi munyika mune chirwere chekorera. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weNyika VaMnangagwa, Vanosaina Mutemo Mutsva weSarudzo
text: Mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vasaini bhiri reElectoral Amendment Act of 2018 kuti uve mutemo wenyika, izvo zvave kupa mukana wekuti nyika iite sarudzo pachishandiswa mutemo mutsva uyu. Izvi zvaziviswa mugwaro rehurumende reGovernment Gazette, iro raburitswa neChipiri, uye chiziviso ichi chinoti mutemo uyu wakatanga kushanda neMuvhuro. Vachiutaura mushure mekuburitswa kwechiziviso ichi, vanokokera nhengo dzebato guru rinopikisa munyika reMDC-T inotungamiririrwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaInnocent Gonese, vati havana kufara nekuti VaMnangagwa vasaina mutemo uyu usina zvizhinji zvaidiwa nevemapato anopikisa kuti zvigadziriswe kana kuwedzerwa. Vati semaonero avo nyika haigona kuve nesarudzo dzisina mutauro kana pasina kuwirirana pazvinhu zvakawanda zvakaita sekudhindwa kwemagwaro ekuvhotesa kana kuti maballot paper. MDC-T yaida kuti kudhindwa nekwema ballot paper kuitwe pachena vese vari kupinda musarudzo varipo. Vaenderera mberi vachiti kunyange hazvo mutemo mutsva uyu uchirambidza zvemhirizhonga, haupi matare mazino ekuranga vanenge vakonzera mhirizhonga panguva yesarudzo. Munyori anoona nezvemutemo mubato riri kutonga reZanu PF, VaPaul Mangwana, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vafara chose nedanho ratorwa nemutungamiriri wenyika, vachiti vave kugadzirira sarudzo pasi pemutemo mutsva uyu. Panyaya yekunyunyuta kuri kuita vemapato anopikisa, VaMangwana vati mapato aya aifanira kugadzirisa zvichemo zvawo kuparamende uye mutungamiriri wenyika anoshanda nezveanenge apihwa neparamende. VaMnangagwa vanotarisirwa kudoma zuva richaitwa sarudzo nguva ipi zvayo, uye izvi zvinoteverawo kupera kwechirongwa chekuongororwa kwegwaro revavhoti neveruzhinji. No media source currently available

headline: Vatambi vetsiva votambira kunze
text: VATAMBI vetsiva vanonzi vave kuenda kune dzimwe nyika uko mutambo uyu wave kutenderwa kutambwa vachinotsvaga raramo.   Izvi zvinotevera kumiswa kwakamboitwa mitambo pasi rose kubvira muna Kurume gore rino nechinangwa chekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Mamiriro ezvinhu aya akaona vatambi vemitambo yakasiyana vachikwangwaya sezvo vange vajaira kurarama kuburikidza nemitambo iyi.   Asi, pari zvino mitambo yakasiyana yakatanga kuitwa kune dzimwe nyika zvichitevera kunyevenutswa kwematanho ekurwisa kupararira kwedenda iri. MuZimbabwe, mitambo yakawanda haisati yave kutenderwa kutambwa izvo zvinonzi zviri kuona vamwe vatambi vetsiva vachienda kunyika dzinosanganisira South Africa, Tanzania neMalawi.   Miganhu yakasiyana yenyika ichakavharwa kune veruzhinji uye nhandare dzinosvikira ndege kubva kunze kwenyika dzakavhurwa nguva pfupi yadarika zvichitevera kuvharwa kwadzange dzakaita zvakare nechinangwa chekumisa kupararira kweCovid-19.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Clyde Musonda anove puromota wetsiva anoti chirwere cheCovid-19 chakanganisa zvakawanda sezvo vave kurasikirwa nevatambi vachienda kune dzimwe nyika.   “Hatisi kuziva kuti tiri kuenda kupi nekuti hatisati tapihwa mvumo yekuti tichironga mitambo yetsiva, kune dzimwe nyika vave kutoronga uye mitambo iri kutambwa. Vatambi vazhinji muno vanotoraramiswa nemari inobva kutsiva saka vave kutiza vachienda kune dzimwe nyika kuzozama raki ravo                                                                     ikoko.   “Isu hatina zvatinokwanisa kuita kana kuvaudza kuti musaende, zvinotiremera nekuti hatina chekuvapa pari zvino. Zvinhu zvose zvakamira nekuda kweCovid-19 saka vave kutoenda kune dzimwe nyika kunotsvaga kurarama nekutamba mutambo uyu,” anodaro Musonda.   Musonda anoti vatambi vetsiva vari kutambudzika zvikuru nekuda kwekushaiwa zvokuita munguva ino yeCovid-19.   “Havasi vatambi vese vakabatsirika nemari yeRelief Fund yakauya uye vakaiwana vacho imwe yakatopera.   Saka kuti varambe vakagara kuine mimwe mikana kunze kwenyika zvinonetsa, ndizvo zvave kuvatuma kuti vaende. Tiri kuita zvekuzonzwa kuti vatoenda hameno kuti vanenge vaenda sei,” anodaro Musonda.   Pane mimwe mitambo yakamiswa nguva yadarika nechinangwa chekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19 munyika muno.   Mitambo iyi inosanganisira waCharles Manyuchi uyo aifanira kusangana naMuhamad Sebyala wekuUganda vachirwira bhande reWorld Boxing Federation Association Supreme Middleweight newaTinashe Mwadziwana aitarisirwa kusangana naPaulus “The Rock” Ambunda wekuNamibia.

headline: Hurumende Yoronga Kuvandudza Mamwe Makambani Ayo
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vazivisa kuti hurumende yave kuvandudza mashandiro emakambani ehurumende kana kuti parastatals uye kutengesa mamwe. Makambani akaita seCold Storage Commission Company, Grain Marketing Board neNational Railways of Zimbabwe achapihwa mari, asi mabhodhi e Zimbabwe Electricity Transmission and Distribution Company, Zimbabwe Power Company neZESA achibatanidzwa. Makambani akaita sePetrotrade, ZUPCO, POSB nemamwe achabvumnidzwa kuti ashande nevamwe vanokwanisa kutenga zvikamu zvehupfumi mumakambani aya. Potraz neBroadcasting Authority of Zimbabwe makambani anoona nezvekutepfenyura achabatanidzwa zvimwe chetezvo neZimtrade, Zimbabwe Investment Authority neSpecial Economic Zones Authority achabatanidzwa. VaChinamasa vakaudza vatori venhau muHarare nemusi weChishanu kuti dare remakurukota rakatowirirana kare nedanho iri uye makurukota achapihwa mazuva zana ekuuya nemazano ekuti makambani ari pasi pavo achavandudzwa sei kana kutengeswa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzave nemakore dzichiti makambani aya anofanira kutengeswa nekuti ari kupa kuti chikwereti chehurumende chikure nekuti haana kana kobiri raari kuunza kuhurumende. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvemari, VaTerrence Mukupe, vanoti hurumende yave kuda kuvandudza nyaya dzezvehupfumi nekudaro hapana chekuchengetera makambani asiri kushanda zvakanaka. No media source currently available

headline: Varwere Voshaya Anorapa muZvipata zveHurumende Vakoti naVanaChiremba Vachiramwa Mabasa
text: Vashandi vemuzvipatara kusanganisira vakoti navanachiremba vasvika mazuva makumi matatu nematatu vakanda mapadza pasi vachiti mari yavari kutambiriswa haichakwani kuti vaende kumabasa pasina kana tarisiro yekuti dambudziko iri richagadziriswa. Zvinhu muzvipatara zvehurumende zvabva zvaita manyama amire nerongo zvopa kuti vamwe varwere vadzoserwe kumba vasina kurapwa. Zvinhu muzvipatara zviri kutarisirwa kutonyanyoipa sezvo sangano ravanachiremba vakuru reSenior Health Doctors Association vakatozivisa kuti kana nyaya dzemari nekuramwa mabasa kwavanachiremba vadiki nevakati dzikasagadziriswa naivo vachapindawo mukuramwa mabasa. Mutauriri wesangano ravanachiremba vakuru iri Dr Aaron Musara vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muzvipatara. Dr Musara vanoti kunyangwe hazvo vakazivisa hurumende nezvedanho ravo rekuda kukanda mapadza pasi kuburikidza nemagwaro avakanyorera mapazi akasiyana siyana hapana mhinduro yavati vawana. Vanamukoti muzvipatara zvehurumende havasi kuenda kumabasa uye vari kuda kuti hurumende ivape mihoro yavo nemari yekuAmerica yavaitambira muna Gumiguru 2018 pamwe nekuvapa zvekushandisa kuzvidzivirira kubva kuzvirwere kana vari pamabasa. Mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vanamukoti reZimbabwe Nurses Association, ZINA VaEnock Dongo vanoti hurukuro nehurumende kutungana kwembudzi. Mutauriri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association kana kuti ZHDA Dr Tapiwa Mungofa vatiwo kusagadziriswa kwenyaya dzevashandi vezvehutano nehurumende kwave kusiya varwere vasina anovarapa. VaMungofa vatiwo panguva iyo vana mukoti vakaramwa mabasa dzimwe nhengo dzavo dzakawanda dzave kumba senzira yekudzivirira kutapurirwa chirwere cheCOVID-19 inonzi pachirungu Self quarantine. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya yekugadzirisa zvichemo zvevashandi vezvehutano sezvo vakafanobata chigaro chagurukota rezvehutano Muzvinafundo Amon Murwira vanga vasingadaviri nharembozha yavo. Asi vhiki rapera, VaMurwira vakazivisa kuti vanga vatanga hurukuro nana mukoti. Mutevedzeri wavo VaJohn Mangwiro vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti vanga vakabatikana nekudaro vange vasingakwanise kutaura. Sachigaro weHealth Services Board, Dr. Paulinus Sikosana, vatiwo vange vari mumusangano unechekuita nedenda reCOVID-19 nekudaro vanga vasingakwanisi kutaura nesu. Nyanzvi dzezvehutano dzinotiwo kana hurumende ikasagadzirisa nyaya yevakoti kuti vadzokere kumabasa uyewo kudzivirira vana chiremba kuti vasaenderera mberi kuzvigokera moto muziso kunyanya panguva ino nyika yakatarisana nedenda reCOVID-19 iro rauraya vanhu makumi maviri nevashanu kusvika parizvino. No media source currently available

headline: VaBiti Voshanyira Dr Patson Dzamara neVamwe Vari muHusungwa
text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa rePeople’s Democratic Party VaTendai Biti nhasi vaenda kuHarare Central Prison nekuChikurubi uko kune nhengo gumi neimwe dzakasungwa dzichiratidzira muAfrica Unity Square. Vakasungwa ava vanosanganisa Muzvare Linda Masarira, Tatenda Mombeyarara, Dr Patson Dzamara, Pride Mukono, Muzvare Pamela Mawire, Makomborero Haruzivishe, Muzvare Irene Takavada, Shadreck Dhliwayo naBrian Kansunzuma. Vechidiki ava vaida kuratidzira kwemazuva gumi nematanhatu vachiti havasi kufara nenyaya yekuti mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vari kutonga nedemo. Kudare ramajastiriti vakanzi vabhadhare mari yechibatiso inosvika chiuru chemadhora inonzi nemagweta yakawandisa. No media source currently available VaBiti vati vanhu vari muhusungwa ava vari kunetseka zvikuru nekuti hapana vari kukwanisa kuunganidza mari inosvika zviuru zvisere zvemadhora zvemari yechibatiso. Madzimai ari kuChikurubi anonzi ari kunetsekawo nekushaya zvokudya uye mvura yakachena. Mumwe mudzimai ane mwana ane mwedzi mitatu anonzi akatomurumura nekuda kwekusungwa uku.

headline: Amai Mujuru Vanoti Hurumende yaVaMnangagwa Haina Kusiyana neyaVaMugabe
text: Vaimbove mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, zvakare vari mukuru webato rinopikisa reNational People’s Party, Doctor Runaida Joice Mujuru, vanoti kunyange hazvo vari kufara nekusiya basa kwevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, havana mufaro nekuti vese vaishanda naVaMugabe pamwe nenzira dzavaishandisa kutonga zvichiripo. Amai Mujuru vanoti ivo nebato ravo pamwe nemubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa, wePeoples Rainbow Coalition, vacharamaba vachirwisa bato reZanu PF kuitira kuti munyika muve neshanduko chaiyo kwete shanduko yekubata vanhu kumeso. Vanoti vanopikisa pavaiita slogan yekuti "ngaende ngaende" vainge vasingareve kuti VaMugabe ngavaende vega chete asi kuti vaireva kuti vayende zvese nebato ravo navose vaishandiswa mukumbunyikidza zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe. Amai Mujuru vanoti haugadzire chakaipa nechakaipa asi nechakanaka. Asi vanoti zvisinei nezvakaitika, vakafara chose kuti mutungamiri wenyika avepo, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakazivisa nyika kuti sarudzo dzichaitwa nenguva yange yakatarisirwa uye vave kutoita gadziriro yesarudzo idzi. Asi vanoti mitemo yesarudzo inforanira kusandurwa kuti pave nesarudzo dzakachena. Amai Mujuru vanotiwo mauto haafanirwe kupindira munyaya dzesarudzo. Vanoti zvinokatyamadza chose kuti mauto nemapurisa emuZimbabwe ane mbiri yekugona basa kunze kwenyika uko anogaro sheedzwa kuno chengetedza runyararo kunyika dzakasiyana siyana asi achiita mukumbira wekushungurudza vanhu muno. Mukuru weZimbabwe Democracy Institute, Doctor Pedzisai Ruhanya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kupindira kwemauto munyaya dzematongerwo enyika hakuvashamise nekuti mauto emuZimbabwe haaite basa ravo zvine hunyanzvi. Vakawanda munyika vanochema nerekuti mauto ari kupindira munyaya dzematongerwo enyika. Asi vamwe vakaita semukuru wevakarwa hondo yerusununguko zvakare vari chipangamazano kumutungamiri wenyika, VaChris Mutsvangwa, vanoti hapana chakaipa pane kuti vechiuto vapinde munyaya dzematongerwo enyika. Doctor Mujuru vanoti kana vakakunda musarudzo dza2018, vachaunza shanduko nechimbi chimbi sezvo paine zvizhinji zvinokwanisa kusandurwa chete pasina kuchinja mutemo. Mubatanidzwa wePeople’s Rainbow Coalition ndemumwe wemibatanidzwa yakawanda yemapato anopikisa inosanganisira MDC Alliance iyo ine zvikwata zveMDC zvinotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai and Professor Welshman Ncube, pamwe nemumwe unonzi Coaliton of Democrats.

headline: Munhu Mumwe Chete Ofa neCovid-19 kuBulawayo Asi kuMash.East neCental Hakuchina Ane Chirwere Ichi
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti munhu mumwe chete akafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muBulawayo nMugovera. Izvi zvinoreva kuti vanhu vafa nyika yose vave mazana maviri nemakumi mana nevatatu kana kuti 243. Vanhu vashanu vakabatwawo nechirwere ichi uye vose vari muBulawayo makare munova mavakachitapurirwawo munharaunda zvekare. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika vave zviuru zvisere nemazana matatu ane makumi matanhatu nemanomwe kana kuti 8, 367. Vanhu gumi vakaporawo kubva kuchirwere ichi, uye vanomwe vacho vari muBulawayo vamwe vatatu kuMasvingo. Vapora nyika yose vave zviuru zvinomwe nemazana masere nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevana kana kuti 7, 894. Vanhu vachiri kurwara mazana maviri nemakumi matatu kana kuti 230. Pavanhu vari kurwara ava, zana nevaviri kana kuti 102 vari muBulawayo uye makumi matanhatu nevatatu vari muHarare. Asi kuMashonaland East neMasvingo hakuchina kana munhu mumwe chete ari kurwara neCovid-19 parizvino. kuMashonaland Central kune munhu mumwe chete chete. Nezuro kwakavhenekwa vanhu mazana matanhatu nemakumi masere nemumwe kana kuti 681. Pavanhu ava, mazana mashanu nevatanhatu kana kuti 530 vari muHarare muBulawayo makumi mana nevapfumbamwe uye Manicaland makumi mapfumbamwe nevana. Ko chii chiri kupa kuti zvinhu zviite kunge zvisina kumira zvakanaka muBulawayo? Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano uye vakambotungamira Chitungwiza Hospital, Dr Enoch Mayida vanoti vamwe vanhu vanonzi vanenge vabatwa nechirere ichi muBulawayo vanenge vari vemumamwe maguta asi vavhenekerwa mudhorobha iri. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inoti Ichiri Kuferefeta Kutsakatika kwaVaItai Dzamara
text: Hurumende inoti ichiri kuferefeta kuti VaItai Dzamara, avo vakapambwa nevanhu vasinga zivikanwe makore mana apfuura, vari kupi uye inoti pari zvino hapana zvayati yawana. Izvi zvinoitika apo mhuri yaVaDzamara iri kuparura Manheru eChitatu, Itai Dzamara Trust, unova mucherechedzo wezvinhu zvese zvairwirwa naVaDzamara. Izvi zvataurwa negurukota rezvemukati menyika, VaCain Matema, muNational Assembly vachipindura mubvunzo kubva kunhengo dzebato rinopikisa reMDC. Mumiriri weKambuzuma muNational Assembly, VaWillas Madzimure, vange vakumbira VaMathema kuti vazivise dare iri kuti vasvika papi nekutsvaga VaDzamara avo vakapambwa mumusha weGlen View 7 muna 2015. VaDzamara, avo vaive mutori wenhau, vakasiya basa rekutora nhau vachiti vava kurwira kodzero dzevanhu kudzamara vaive mutungamiri wenyika panguva iyi, VaRobert Mugabe, vasiya basa. Vakaita mukuru wesangano reOccupy Africa Unity Sqaure iro raive nevanhu vaiswera vakaungana muAfrica Unity Square vachiti VaMugabe vabve pachigaro sezvo vaityora kodzero dzevanhu. Musi wa9 Kurume muna 2015, VaDzamara vakapambwa nevanhu vasingazivikanwe uye kusvika nhasi havazikanwe kuti vari kupi. Dare repamusoro soro rakapa mutongo wekuti hurumende, kuburikidza nemapurisa, itsvage kuna VaDzamara pamwe nekuzivisa mhuri yavo kuti vari kupi. Munin’ina waVaDzamara, VaPatson Dzamara, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mapurisa akataura navo kwemwedzi mitatu chete zvichitevera mutongo uyu, uye kubvira ipapo, mapurisa haasi kutaura navo. VaDzamara vati vakatomboedza kutaura nemapurisa, gurukota rezvemukati menyika pamwe nemutungamiriri wenyika kuti vagadzirise nyaya iyi asi hapana chakabuda. Mhuri yaVaDzamara iri kuparura Itai Dzamara Trust rinova sangano richange richimirira zvese zvairwira naVaDzamara. VaPatson Dzamara vati mukoma wavo aida kuti vanhu vagare vakasununguka murunyararo uye izvi ndizvo zvichange zvichimirwa neItai Dzamara Trust.
