Zvichakadai, sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekudyidzana nekutengeserana nedzimwe nyika, VaKindness Paradza, vazivisa kuti mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakatambira chisungo chekuti nhengo dzeparamende dzipihwe maDiplomatic Passports. Vati nekudaro nhengo dzese dzeparamende dzichatanga kupihwa magwaro aya zvisinei nekuti ndedze bato ripi. VaParadza vayambira kuti vachashandisa magwaro aya zvisina mwero vachaatorerwa. Mune imwewo nyaya, nhengo dzeparamende kuMDC dzaramba kuzeya bhiri reMaintenance of Peace and Order dzichiti dzinoda kutanga dzawona zvakashandurwa pabhiri iri mushure mekunge imwe komiti yeparamende yeParliamentary Legal Committee yati bhiri iri rinotyora bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Vange vakabata chinzvimbo chemumutauriri weNational Assembly, VaWilliam Mutomba, vabvuma kutambira chikumbiro chenhengo dzeMDC uye gurukota rezvemukati menyika, VaCain Mathema, vachiti vachauya nebhiri rine zvakashandurwa mudare neChina. No media source currently available

headline: World Cup: Chabvondoka
text: anonzwa svondo rino kutanga musi weChina apo pasi rose richange rakatarira kunyika yeRussia uko kuri kutambirwa mutambo weFifa Wold Cup 2018.   Mutambo uyu ndiwo mukuru pasi rose wenhabvu nekudaro Kwayedza yakaita ongororo yemitambo yekutanga yezvikwata zvakasiyana izvo zviri kutamba gore rino.   Mutambo wekutanga uchaona Russia – iyo inenge iri pamusha payo – ichisangana neSaudi Arabia kunhandare yeStadion Luzhniki.   Zvikwata zviri izvi zviri muboka rine zvimwe zvinoti Egypt neUruguay asi zvose vashoma vanoona zvichisvika kure mumutambo uyu.   Musi weChishanu ndipo pachange pakabaka apo shasha dzemuEurope – Portugal – ichasangana neSpain iyo yakambohwina mukombe weWorld Cup mugore ra2010 kuSouth Africa.   Uyu mutambo uchange wakatarisirwa nevazhinji sezvo zvikwata zviviri izvi zvinogona kubuda zvose muGroup B zvofambira mberi mumakwishu aya.   Portugal ichange yakaisa tariro yayo pavatambi vanoti Cristiano Ronaldo, Bernardo Silva, Adrien Silva nevamwe. Kozoti Spain, izere nemukaka wevatambi vanosanganisira  Isco, Marco Asensio, Koke, Diego Costa naThiago Alcantara.   Musi weMugovera, Nigeria ichisangana neCroatia, maSuper Eagles chimwe chezvikwata zvakamirira Africa kumutambo uyu uye vatsigiri vazhinji vari kushuvira zvikuru kuti aiite zvinorova kuWorld Cup.   France ichisangana neAustralia neMugovera zvakare, kozoti Argentina ichitatsurana neIceland.   Kuzvikwata zviri kukwikwidza kuRussia gore rino, France neArgentina zvimwe zvine vatambi vakawanda vanotamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura.   France ine vatambi vanosanganisira Kylian Mbappe, Antoine Griezmann, Paul Pogba, Ousmane Dembele naNabil Fekir.   Nerumwe rutivi, Argentina ine vatambi vanoti Lionel Messi, Angel di Maria, Gergio Aguero, Gonzalo Higuain, Paulo Dybala nevamwe vakawanda.   Musi weSvondo shasha dzine mukombe weWorld Cup – Germany – ichatamba mutambo wayo wekutanga apo ichasangana neMexico kuMoscow kuStadion Luzhiniki.   Germany chimwe chezvikwata zviri kutarisirwa kuhwina mukombe uyu asi inofanirwa kutanga yabuda muboka rayo rine zvikwata zvinoti Mexico, Sweden neKorea Republic. Die Mannschaft ine vatambi vakaita saMesut Ozil, Thomas Muller naTimo Werner. Musi uyu zvakare ndiwo uchaona Brazil – iyo yakahwinha mukombe weWorld Cup yakawanda – ichitamba mutambo wayo wekutanga apo ichasangana neSwitzerland kuRostov Arena.   Makore mana adarika, Brazil yakabatiswa pasi pamusha payo apo yakakundirwa musemi-fainari neGermany nekudaro gore rino ichange ine huturu hukuru sezvo iri kuda kuhwina mukombe uyu nepainogona. Samba Boys ichange yakaisa tariro yayo pana Neymar, Gabriel Jesus naRoberto Firmino.

headline: Shaya ari muchipatara
text: naMilcah Nhakura SHASHA yakambonetsa ichitamba nhabvu, George ‘Mastermind’ Shaya, anoti anogamuchira zvakaitika kwaari zvekudamburwa gumbo rake rekurudyi zvichitevera kunetseka kwaakange aita nechirwere chepasi petsoka chinozivikanwa nekuti ganrene.   Achitaura neKwayedza svondo rino ari muchipatara cheParirenyatwa Group of Hospitals, muHarare, Shaya anoti anoisa zvose mumawoko aMwari.   “Muhupenyu hwedu chinenge chaitika tinofanirwa kuzvitambira. Mwari variko uye hatizvirambe.   “Munhu unofanirwa kugara wakagadzirira zvese zvese muhupenyu zvinogona kuitika,” anodaro.   Paakashanyirwa neKwayedza, Shaya aive ane mudzimai wake – Agnes Shaya – uyo anoti murume wake akange atambudzwa zvikuru nechirwere chaive pagumbo rake apo raingopera nekudyika kubva nekutsoka.   “Baba vange varwadziwa hama, gumbo rakavashungurudza iri saka tiri kutozviona kuti zvakange zviri nani kuti vari bviswe pane kurwadziwa kwavakange vachiita vainaro gumbo racho.   “Iye zvino tinoona kuti vasununguka manje, havacharwadziwe vave kunzwa zvakanaka pane zvavakange vari kunzwa. Isu semhuri tave kungotambira zvakaitika.   “Asi hatidi kunyepa zvakatirwadza nekuti gumbo racho ndiro ravaitamba naro nhabvu, vachiita zvidavado zvavo,” anodaro Agnes.   Anoti murume wake haasi kuzomusiya ari ega uye achamira naye achimubatsira pane zvese zvaanenge achida.   “Mumwe wangu uyu ini ndini ndinomubikira uye kumuwachira, ndicharamba ndakamira naye ndichiona kuti akagara zvakanaka here nekuti panguva ino tinofanirwa kuramba takamira tese.   “Zvakaitika izvi tinongozviisa mumawoko aMwari. Asi vachibuda muno vanofanirwa kuenda kuRehab centre kuti vambonogara vachitariswa nekuti vakangonanga kumba vanogona kunozvikuvadza rimwe gumbo racho,” anodaro Agnes.   Shaya mumwe wevatambi venhabvu vakaita mukurumbira uye munhorondo yemutambo uyu ndiye ega akakwanisa kuhwina mubairo weSoccer Star of the Year kashanu.   Zvakadai, imwe shasha yakambonetsa ichitamba nhabvu kuzvikwata zvinoti Dynamos FC nemaWarriors, David ‘Yogi’ Mandigora – uyo akadamburwawo gumbo rake muna 2017 nekuda kwedenda regomarara – anoti munhu anofanirwa kugamuchira zvose zvinoitika muhupenyu hwake.   “Muhupenyu munhu anofanirwa kugara akagadzirira zvese nekuti hatizive kuti mangwana unomuka uripi. Zvese zvese zvinogona kuitika uye usingafungire.   “Kana zvaitika sezvandakasangana nazvo zvekugurwa gumbo izvi wotongozvitambira nekuti ndizvo zvinenge zvavepo panguva yacho,” anodaro Yogi.   Anoti achazoshanyira Shaya kumba kwake kana achinge abuda muchipatara.   PIX: George Shaya   Caption: George Shaya aine mudzimai wake Agnes Shaya kuchipatara cheParirenyatwa Group of Hospitals nemusi weChipiri svondo rino.

headline: MDC Inochengetedza Chigaro cheMudzimai muPresidium
text: MDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa yakaita musangano wayo weNational Council neMugovera ikabuda nezvisungo zvakati kuti. Chimwe chezvisungo izvi ndechekuti muhutungamiri hwebato, kana kuti presidium, munofanirwa kuva nemunhukadzi. Madzimai akadomwa kuti akwikwidze chigaro chemutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato ndiAmai Lillian Timveos, Amai Lynette Karenyi Kore, naAmai Tracy Mutinhiri. Pari zvino Amai Timveos ndivo vakadomwa nematunhu akawanda. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika, uye dziri nhengo dzeMDC dzinoti kunyange hazvo Amai Timveos vachizivikanwa nehutungamiri muMDC, Amai Karenyi Kore mudzimai anozivikanwa zvikuru muMDC yose sezvo vakashanda zvakasimba sasachigaro wemadzimai mumatunhu akawanda munyika yose, izvo zvinogona kuti vakunde pakongiresi yemuna Chivabvu.  Nyanzvi idzi, idzo dziri kuziva zviri kuitika mubato iri, dzinotiwo hadzioni Amai Mutinhiri vachiwana mavhoti akawanda, nokudaro mutambo mukuru uri pakati paAmai Timveos naAmai Karenyi Kore. Mutauriri weMDC, VaJacob Mafume, vanoti kanzuru yepamusoro soro yebato ravo yakaona zvakakodzera kuti chimwe chigaro chehutungamiri hwepamusorosoro hwebato, chive chemudzimai. Kunyange hazvo bato rakabuda nechisungo ichi, hwuwandu hwemadzimai mu presidium hwushoma zvikuru kana zvichienzaniswa nedonzvo rebato rekuti vanhukadzi vaenzane nevanhurume muzvigaro zvepamusoro soro. VaMafume, avo vakadomwa kuti vakwikwidze chigaro chemutauriri webato pakongiresi mwedzi unouya, vanoti bato ravo rakatambira zvakabva kumakongiresi ematunhu, uye wakazivisa vose vari kuda kukwikwidza kukongiresi mwedzi unouya vakadomwa kukwikwidza zvigaro zvinodarika chimwe chete, kuti vasarudze chigaro chimwe chete chavachakwikwidza. Vati izvi zvinofanirwa kuitwa nemusi weChitatu. Matunhu gumi nematatu eMDC, kusanganisirawo matunhu ari kunze kwenyika anoti North America, South Africa neUnited Kingdom, akapedza kuita makongiresi awo senzira yekugadzirira kongiresi huru ichasarudza hutungamiri hutsva. Kongiresi iyi iri kuitirwa muGweru, uye ndeyechishanu kubva bato iri raumbwa muna 1999. VaChamisa vakadomwa nematunhu ose kuti vakwikwidze chigaro chemutungamiri webato pasina anovakwikwidza. Vakadomwa kukwikwidza chigaro chemutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato vanosanganisira VaMorgen Komichi, VaWelshman Ncube, VaTendai Biti, naVaElias Mudzuri. Muzvare Thabitha Khumalo vakadomwa nematunhu akawanda kuti vave sachigaro webato, ukuwo VaChalton Hwende vakadomwawo kuti vakwikwidze chigaro chemunyori mukuru webato. Vamwe vakadomwa pachigaro ichi ndiVaWelshman Ncube naVaDouglas Mwonzora. VaAmos Chibanda ndivo vakadomwa nematunhu akawanda kuti vave murongi wemisangano. Kongiresi yebato iri kuitika mushure memwedzi inodarika gumi nemina zvichitevera kushaya kwemutungamiri wekutanga webato, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, avo vakashaya gore rapera muna Kurume. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vatatu Vofa neChirwere cheCovid-19 neMugovera
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu vatatu vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nemusi weMugovera zvasiya vafa kubva zvatanga chirwere ichi kupararira vave zviuru zvina nemazana manomwe nemakumi maviri kana kuti 4, 782. Vanhu zviuru zviviri nezana nevatanhatu kana kuti 2, 106 vakabatwawo nechirwere ichi zvasiya vanhu zana rezviuru nemakumi mapfumbamwe nechimwe zvine mazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe nematatu kana kuti 191 673 vabatwawo nechirwere ichi kusvika parizvino. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba kaviri vave mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru zvitanhatu nezvitatu zvine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matatu nemana kana kuti 3 063 934. Vanhu vabayiwa kekutanga vave mamiriyoni mana nezviuru makumi mana nemanomwe zvine mazana manomwe nemakumi mana nematatu kana kuti 4 047 743. Hurumende inoti ine chinangwa chekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana mukupera kwemwedzi uno kuti inyatsoshanda. Kuuya kwemhando itsva yeCovid-19 kwapa kuti huwandu hwevari kurwara neCovid-19 huwedzere zvakanyanya. Pakazivisa hurumende kuti mhando itsva yechirwere ichi yainge yawanikwa munyika musi wa 5 Zvita painge paine vanhu zviuru zviviri nemazana masere nemakumi mana nematatu kana kuti 2 843 vairwara. Asi neMugovera vari kurwara vainge vave zviuru kamumi mashanu nechimwe nezana nemakumi matatu nematanhatu kana kuti 51 136. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Enoch Mayida vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vabayiwe nhomba sezvo iri iyo chete nzira inopa kuti vasarware zvakanyanya kana kufa neCovid-19.

headline: VaMugabe Voshorwa Zvichitevera Komekedzo Kuna VaChinamasa Kuti Vadzose Vechidiki paBasa
text: Hukama hweZimbabwe nemasangano anokweretesa mari anoti reInternational Monetary Fund neWorld Bank hunenge hucharamba hwakaita manyama amire nerongo mushure nekunge mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vabuda pachena kuti havana hurongwa hwekudzikisa huwandu hwevashandi vehurumende senzira yekugadzirisa nyaya yezvehupfumi. VaMugabe vakaudza gurukota rinoona nezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, kuti vadzore pabasa vechidiki kana kuti mayouth officers zviuru mazana maviri kunyangwe VaChinamasa vari kubuda pachena kuti hurumende haina mari yekuvabhadhara sezvo hupfumi hwenyika husina kumira zvakanaka. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye dzezvehupfumi dzagara dzichiyambira kuti kupinza vechidiki ava mabasa kuri kudzorera kumashure nyaya dzezvehupfumi. VeIMF neWorld Bank vanoti mari iri kubhadharwa kuvashandi nehurumende yakawandisa zvinoita kuti pashaikwe mari yekugadzira zvivakwa zvakaita semigagwa, makirinika nezvimwe zvinodiwa nevanhu. Asi sachigaro weZanu-PF Youth League kudunhu reManicaland, VaMubuso Chinguno, vanoti vanhu vakaburitsa basa vechidiki ava vari kuda kushoresa VaMugabe. Asi ko vechidiki ava vanoita basa rei chaizvo? VaChinguno vanoti ndivo vanobatsira vechidiki vari kumaruwa muk zvikwereti zvekutanga mabhizimisi madiki. Vaimbova gurukota rinoona nezvemari, VaTendai Biti, avo vanotungamira bato rinopikisa rePeople’s Democratic Party, vanoti vashandi vehurumende vakawandisa zvekuti kuvabhadhara zvinosiya hurumende isina kana kobiri rekuita zvimwe zvinhu. VaBiti vatiwo zvakataurwa neIMF neWorld Bank zvinhu zvakaoma kutevedzera muZanu-PF sezvo bato iri richikudza nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, uye vachishanda nesangano ravana chipangamazano re Labor and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaGodfrey Kanyenze, vati sezvo nyika yatarisana nesarudzo kuda kuti hurumende igumure basa vashandi ava kupedzera hoko padehwe retsindi. Asi gurukota rezvevechidiki, VaPatrick Zhuwao, avo vange vachirwisa kuti vechidiki ava vadzorwe pamabasa, vanoti mabasa evechidiki ava haanei nezvematongerwo enyika. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu vachitungamira Human Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti vechidiki ava vanoshandiswa neZanu-PF mukutyora kodzero dzevanhu zvikuru munguva yesarudzo Kunyange hazvo VaMugabe vachigara vachitaura kuti vashandi vehurumende vapihwe mari dzemabonasi nezvimwe, VaChinamasa vane makore akawanda vachitatarika kubhadhara mari idzi. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanoti Kuratidzira kweVanopikisa Hakuvavhundutsi
text: Mutungamiri weZanu PF, uye vari mutungamiri wenyika, Va Emmerson Mnangagwa, vanga vari kuMatebeleland North uko vapa vagari vemudunhu iri matsiru anodarika chiuru chimwe chete muchirongwa che Command Livestock. VaMnangagwa vaita izvi vasati vaita musangano ku Lupane uko kwapindwa nevatsigiri vebato ravo. VaMnangagwa vaudza vatsigiri vavo kuti hurumende yavo itsva haifi yakakanganwa vakuru vakaunza rusununguko munyika kusanganisira vaimbove mutungamiriri wenyija, Va Robert Mugabe nevamwe vakashaya. VaMnangagwa vati pavakapinda panyanga gore rakapera vakaziva kukosha kwemadzishe nehutungamiri hwemakereke. Vati vakaita misangano nemadzishe ose uye hutungamiriri hwemakereke ose munyika kuti vanzwe kubva kwavari maererano nekufambiswa kwenyika kuenda kumberi. VaMnangagwa vati chikuru chavakaona kuti chinobatsira nyika kubva mumadhaka ayanga yakanyura, kumutsiridza mabhizinesi, izvo zvakaita kuti vaite misangano nevemabhizinesi munyika yese vachisunga zvibvumirano zvekushanda pamwe chete mukusimudzira nyika munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Vati hurumende yavo yakazvipira kushanda nevanhu vese, mukugadzirisa zvose zvinoda kugadziriswa. VaMnangagwa vapeta musangano wavo nekushoropodza kuratidzira kuri kuitwa nevemapato anopikisa vachiti izvi hazvitadzisi bato ravo kukunda musarudzo nekuti kuratidzira hakusi kuchavhota. Va Mnangagwa vatenda rutsigiro rwevagari vemudunhu reLupane vakavakumbira kuti vagoziva pekuvhotera muzuva resarudzo. No media source currently available

headline: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zvoronga Kuratidzira Pamberi peMusangano weUNGA
text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zviri kuronga kunoratidzira kuNew York, panguva ichaitwa musangano weUnited Nations General Assembly, UNGA, wechimakumi manomwe nembiri, uyo mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vari kutarisirwa kupinda svondo rinouya. Mumwe wevari kutungamira hurongwa uhwu, Muzvare Savanna Madamombe vanoti vane zvakawanda zvavari kunyunyuta nazvo zvinosanganisira kurambidzwa kuvhota kwevari kunze kwenyika uye kuti hurumende haisi kuzvipa mukana wekutaura nhuna dzavo. Muzvare Madamombe vanoti zvimwe zviri kuvashungurudza kushandiswa kwemari kwavanoti kusina kutsarukana munzendo dzaVaMugabe, avo vanonzi vari kutarisirwa kusimuka nechikwata chevanhu vanodarika makumi manomwe. Zvinonzi mumwe nemumwe wevanhu ava, avo vanonzi vanosanganisira mhuri yavo, anonzi achange achipiwa mari inoita chiuru nemazana mashanu emadhora semari yekushandisa pazuva. Gore roga roga zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinoungana muNew York zvichiratidzira panoitwa musangano uyu. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kugadzirisa Zvichemo zveVarairidzi Panguva Iyo Vashandi Vayo Vari Kuti Vave Kushanda Mazuva Maviri Chete
text: Vabereki nevadzidzisi vokurudzira hurumende kuti igadzirise nyaya yemihoro yevashandi vehurumende kusanganisira varairidzi vachiti izvi zvikasaitwa zvinokanganisa zvakanyanya dzidzo yevana. Izvi zvinouya panguva iyo rimwe sangano remubatanidzwa wemamwe masangano evashandi vehurumende, reZimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Trade Unions (ZCPSTU), iro raimbozivikanwa se Apex Council, rakazivisa neChishanu kuti vashandi vehurumende vese vachange vachizoshanda mazuva maviri chete pasvondo kutanga neMuvhuro unouya. Mutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru wesangano iri, VaGibson Mushangu vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakatora danho iri mushure mekuona kuti mari dzavari kupiwa dzekufambisa dzinongokwana mazuva maviri chete. Nhaurirano pakati pesangano iri nehurumende nemusi weChina hadzina zvadzakabudisa. Mutevedzeri wemunyori wesangano iri, VaGibson Mushangu, vanoti nhengo dzavo dzakabvumirana kuti nemari irikupiwa nehurumende vashandi vachange vachienda kubasa mazuva maviri chete, Muvhuro neChipiri kutanga nemusi wemuvhuro. Amai Sandra Gavi, avo vane vana vaviri vari kudzidza pane chimwe chikoro chehurumende muHarare vati kana varairidzi vakabatana nevamwe vashandi kuenda kumabasa mazuva mashoma zvinosiya vana vavo vari munataisireva. Amai Gavi vati nekuda kwekuvharwa kwakamboitwa zvikoro gore rapera, vana vavo vakasarira shure zvakanyanya sezvo vakange vasiri kuita zvidzidzo zvepadandemutande. Mumwe mubereki, VaBanny Manokore, vanotungamirira National Association of School Development Associations and Committes, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanoshungurudzika zvakanyanya nekuti panorwa nzou huswa ndihwo hunokuvara. VaManokere vati varairidzi vakaenda kuzvikoro mazuva mashoma pavhiki rega rega vana vechikoro havakwanisi kupedza zvidzidzo zvinotarisirwa zvepagore. VaManokore vakurudzira hurumende kuti igadzirise zvinhu dambudziko remari yemihoro yevarairidzi risati radzika midzi. Mutungamiriri wesangano rinomirira varairidzi vekumaruwa reAlmagamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure vakurudzira hurumende kuti ingopa varairidzi mari yavaiwana muna 2018. VaMasaraure vati nekuda kwedenda ririko reCovid-19 zvakakosha kuti nguva shoma vadzidzi yavari kuzvikoro vadzidze zvakakwana. Mutungamiri werimwe sangano revarairidzi, reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vayambirawo vakatiwo injodzi kuendesa varairidzi vasina rufaro kunodzidzisa vachitiwo kunyangwe pamazuva anenge achiendwa kubasa, varairidzi havanodzidzisi nemoyo yese sezvo vanenge vachinetsekana nekuti vorarama sei nemari shoma yemihoro. Mutauriri webazi redzidzo yepasi, VaTaungana Ndoro, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti havana zvavangataure pamusoro penyaya iyi vakati titaure nebazi rinoona nezvevashandi vehurumende. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rebazi iri, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanorumbidza Muchakabvu Mandela kuMusangano weNelson Mandela Peace Summit
text: Mutungamiriri wenyika, Va Emerson Mnangagwa, vapinda neMuvhuro mumusangano we Nelson Mandela Peace Summit uyo waitirwa mu New York kumucheto kwemisangano yeUnited Nations Annual General Assembly, UNGA, iri kuitwa muguta iri svondo rino. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu, Va Mnangagwa varumbidza mabasa akaitwa naVaMandela mumazuva avo vachiti pasi rose harikanganwi zvakasiya zvaitwa naVaMandela panyika vachiri vapenyu. Va Mnangagwa vati vanhu havafaniri kungotaura mabasa aVaMandela vasingazadzisi nekuita zvido zvavo. VaMnangagwa vati VaMandela, avo vakava mutungamiri weSouth Africa wechitema wekutanga, munhu akagara mujeri kwemakore akawanda achirwira rusununguko rwemunhu wese wemuSouth Africa. Vamwe vanga vari pamusangano uyu vanosanganisira mutungamiri weSouth Africa, Va Cyrl Rhamaphosa, shirikadzi yaVaMandela, Amai Graca Machel. VaMnangagwa vakasanaganawo nemusi weSvondo nezvizvarwa zve Zimbabwe zvinogara mu America ne kuCanada umo vakataura nezvehurongwa hwehurumende yavo uye kukumbira vana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika kuti vadzoke kumusha kuzobatsira mukusimudzira nyika vazoisawo ruoko mubudiriro nematongerwo enyika ye Zimbabwe. VaMnangagwa vari kutarisirwawo kutaura pamberi pemusangano mukuru uchaitwa nemusi weChitatu. Uyu musangano wekutanga waVaMnangagwa vachitaura semutungamiri wenyika. Kwemakore anodarika makumi matatu nemanomwe, vaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, ndivo vaitaura pamusangano wepagore weUNGA. Nguva zhinji VaMugabe vaitora mukana uyu kunyomba America neBritain nemadzisahwira adzo vachiti nyika idzi dzaipindira mumatongerwo enyika muZimbabwe dziine chinangwa chekuvabvisa pachigaro. Asi VaMugabe vakazobviswa pachigaro nemauto avo, achitungamirwa nemunhu wavakagadza pachigaro chemukuro wemauto ose, VaConstantino Chiwenga, avo vakazoitwa mumwe wevatevedzeri vaVaMnangagwa. No media source currently available

headline: Vanorarama neHIV Vogunun'una Kunzi Vari Kuonekwa seVakatopara Mhaka
text: Nyanzvi dzemitemo dzinoti dziri kushushikana nekuwanda kwenyaya dzinonzi dzine chekuita nekupomerwa dzimhosva kwevanhu vanorarama ne HIV munyika dzakawanda, kusanganisira united states. Izvi zvinonzi zvabuda kumusangano weInternational Aids Conference uri kuitirwa kuDurban, kuSouth Africa. Zvinonzi kunyange hazvo kusina mutemo unozivikanwa unoti imhosva kuti munhu ave neHIV, magweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu akawanda anonzi ati vanorarama nemukondombera vakawanda vanoonekwa sevanhu vakatopara mhosva. Bazi reU.S Centers for Disease Control and Prevention gore rapera rakazivisa kuti matunhu makumi maviri nemana emuAmerica anoda kuti vanhu vanoziva pavamire panyaya dzeHIV kuti vaudze vavanodana navo. Apo hupfumi hwepasi rose huri kudzikira, hurombo hunonzi hwabatawo vanhu munyika dzakawanda, izvo zvomanikidza madzimai akawanda kupinda mune zvechipfambi kuti vararame. Asi madzimai aya ari kugunin’una kuti vanoonekwa sevanhu vane mhosva, izvo zvinovasiya pamhene mune zvinhu zvakawanda zvinosanganisira kubata zvirwere zvepabonde neHIV/Aids.

headline: Vanhu Gumi Vofa neCovid-19 neMugovera
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti nemusi weMugovera vanhu gumi vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvasiya vafa nechirwere ichi vave chiuru chimwe chete nemazana matanhatu nematanhatu kana kuti 1, 666. Vanhu mazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatatu kana kti 293 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vabatatwa nacho vave zviuru makumi mana nechimwe zvine mazana matanhatu nemakumi maviri nevasere kana kuti 41, 628. Vanhu makumi maviri nevana vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi zvasiya vapora vave zviuru makumi matatu nemanomwe zvine zana nemakumi matanhatu nemanomwe kana kuti 37, 167. Vanhu vachiri kurwara nechirwere ichi vave zviuru zviviri zvine mazana manomwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevashanu kana kuti 2, 795. Hurumende inoti nzvimbo dzave kunyanya kupararira chirwere ichi zvekuti dzinogona kuiswa mitemo yakati omei kuti vanhu vasafambe fambe dzinoti Karoi, Chirundu, Magunje, Mhangura, Chinhoyi, Chidamoyo kuMashonaland West, uyeChiredzi mudunhu reMasvingo. Dzimwe nzvimbo dzinoti Nkulumane, Emakhandeni nekunzvimbo dziri kumaodzanyemba kana kuti Northern Surbubs muguta reBulawayo, uye kuMt Darwin kuMashonaland West. Nzvimbo dzakaiswa mitemo yakaomarara kare kuyedza kumisa kupararira kwechirwere ichi dzinoti Kariba, Karoi, Makonde neKwekwe. Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu zviuru mazana manomwe nechimwe zvine mazana matatu nemakumi mana nevasere kana kuti 701 348 vabayiwa nhomba yekudzvirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Vanhu zviuru mazana mana nemakumi matatu nevaviri zvine mazana mashanu nemakumi manomwe nevaviri kana kuti 432, 572 ndivo vabayiwa nhomba kechipiri sezviri kukurudzirwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana nhomba senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Enoch Mayida avo vaimbotungamira chipatara cheChitungwiza vanoti vanhu vanofanira kungwaria kubatwa nechirwere ichi vachikurudzira vanhu kuti vabayiwe nhomba. No media source currently available

headline: Tinoda kushaina: Mapeza
text: MURAIRIDZI weFC Platinum Norman Mapeza anoti ane chishuviro chekuti chikwata chake chive chimwe chezvikuru muAfrica nekudaro vacharwa semvumba apo vari kusangana nedzimwe shasha mumutambo weChampions League.Pure Platinum Play, sezita remadunhurirwa reFC Platinum, yakabudirira kupinda mumini-league reChampions League uye yakaiswa muboka rine zvikwata zvinoti Orlando Pirates yekuSouth Africa, Esperance of Tunisia (shasha dzeChampions League) neHoroya yekuGuinea.   Aka kachange kari kekutanga FC Platinum ichikwikwidza mumini-league iyi sezvo kare yaingoburitswa kumaprelimaninary round rekurwira kuenda kumini-league.   Achitaura neKwayedza svondo rino, Mapeza anoti chikwata chake chiri pachiri nekuti chakashanda nesimba uye chinoda kuve chikuru muAfrica.   “Kunzi unzi uri chikwata chihombe unofanirwa kusangana nezvimwe zvihombe, saka ndizvo zvatiri kutarisira kuona zvichiitika.   “Zvinhu zvatange tichishandira kwemakore akawanda tichimbokundikana, asi tavemo, tinofanirwa kungotenda.   “Zvose tichangozvisiya mumaoko aMwari, ndiye anoziva ramangwana redu kuti rakamira sei uye ndiye achatitungamira mumitambo yedu yose,” anodaro Mapeza.   Mumutambo wekutanga weFC Platinum, chikwata ichi chichasangana neOrland Pirates musi wa11 Ndira kuZvishavane mumutambo uyo inofanirwa kuhwina kuitira kuti itange zvine mutsindo kana ichida kubudirira kufambira mberi mumakwishu aya.   Zvakadai, Mapeza anoti mwaka wegore ra2019 shuviro yechikwata chake kuti chipinde muboka rezvimwe zvinoti Dynamos FC neHighlanders kuburikidza nekuhwinha mukombe weCastle Premiership katatu kakatevedzana.   Munhorowondo yenhabvu yemuZimbabwe, zvikwata zviviri chete zvinoti Dynamos FC neHighlanders ndizvo zvakakwanisa kuhwina mukombe weligi makore matatu akatevedzana.   Dynamos yakazviita kaviri kekutanga kubva mugore ra1980 kusvika 1983 uye ikazozviita zvakare kubva 2011 kusvika 2014 apo yairairidzwa naKallisto Pasuwa kozoti Highlanders yakazvikwanisa kubva 1999 kusvika 2002.   “Isu tinotambira nhabvu kuhwina uye ndizvo tichangoita mwaka mutsva unotevera.   “Asi zvose tinongozvisiira mumaoko aMwari ndivo vanoziva uye ndivo vanotungamira. Hatikwanise kuronga zvepano pasi, Mwari ndivo vanotirongera.   “Asi isu chikuru kuti tirwe kuchengetedza mukombe wedu chete,” anodaro Mapeza.

headline: Chivandire onorwa kuZambia
text: SHASHA yetsiva yechidzimai, Kudakwashe “Take Money” Chivandire, osimbaradza gadziriro dzake dzemutambo uyo uchamuona achizosangana naCathrine Phiri wekuZambia apo vacharwira bhande reWorld Boxing Council (WBC) super-bantam weight iro risina munhu pari zvino.   Vatambi vaviri ava vachasangana nemusi wa29 Ndira uye Chivandire ari kuita gadziriro dzake akatarisana nemutambo uyu.   Maneja waChivandire, Clyde Musonda, uyo anovazve murairidzi wake, anoti vave kusimbaradza gadziriro dzaChivandire kutanga musi wa3 Ndira.   “Take Money haana kumbobvira awana zororo, zvekuti paKirisimasi chaipo tange tichishanda naye tichigadzirira mutambo wake watakatarisana nawo. Mazuva anoita kunge achiri kure asi chokwadi ndechekuti hapasisina nguva.   “Mutambo uyu mukuru kuna Chivandire uye tiri kuda kuti ahwine bhande iri aite mutambi wetsiva wekutanga kubata bhande guru seiri kubva muZimbabwe,” anodaro.   Musonda anoti Chivandire ange achiita gadziriro dzake achibva kumba asi kutanga nemusi wa3 Ndira, achange ave kugara ega achisimbaradza gadziriro idzi asingasangane neveruzhinji kusvika azoenda kuZambia kumutambo uyu.   Anoti vari kutora danho iri nechinangwa chekudzivirira kuti mutambi uyu asatapurirwe chirwere cheCovid-19 uyezve nekuti pfungwa dzake dzinge dzichingofunga nezvemutambo wake chete.   “Kutanga svondo rinotevera, Kuda achabva kumba kwake achinogara paachange achiita gadziriro dzake. Hatidi kuti asangane neveruzhinji achifamba paanenge achiuya kuzoita gadziriro dzake. Achazongobva chete musi waanoenda kuZambia, iye zvino tiri kumbomuvharira toshanda naye tichinyatsomubika zvakasimba,” anodaro Musonda.

headline: VaChamisa Vanosvitsa Mapepa Avo kuConstitutional Court
text: Mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, vasvitsa mapepa avo kudare redzimhosva vachida kuti zvakabuda musarudzo dzakaitwa musi wa30 Chikunguru zvisendekwe parutivi. Magweta aVaChamisa vaita chipatapata kuti vabate nguva yekusvitsa mapepa kudare repamusoro-soro reConstitional Court sezvo Chishanu ranga riri zuva rekupedzisira kuti vapikise zvakabuda musarudzo pasi pemitemo inobata sarudzo.. Rimwe remagweta aVaChamisa, VaThabani Mpofu, vati chasara yave nyaya yekuti vatongi vachinzwa nyaya iyi. VaMpofu vati vasvitsa humbowo hwakati tsvikiti kudare hunoratidza kuti sarudzo idzi dzakabirirwa. Vati chikuru pahumbowo hwavanahwo ndechekuti zvakaziviswa nekomisheni inoona nezvesarudzo zvakasiyana nezviri pamapepa akasainwa nevaimirira mapato panzvimbo dzaivhoterwa kana kuti ma V11 forms. Vatiwo vari kutyisidzirwa zvikuru nekumirira kwavari kuita VaChamisa panyaya iyi asi vati havasi kuzodzokera kumashure. Mapepa asvitswa kudare aya asvitswawo kune vese vakakwikwidza musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, sachigaro weZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec, Amai Priscilla Chigumba, pamwe nemukuru anoona nezvesarudzo muZec, VaUtoile Silaigwana, kuti vapindure kudare. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaMnangagwa kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi . Asi neChina VaMnangagwa vakati havazoenderera mberi nehurongwa hwekugadzwa kwavo kudzamara nyaya yapera kunzwikwa nematare sezvataurwawo naVaMpofu kuti kugadzwa kwanga kuchida kuitwa naVaMnangagwa kwave kufanira kutomiswa. Mumiriri waVaMnangagwa, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, uye vari gurukota rezvemitemo, vazivisa kuti hurongwa hwekugadza VaMnangagwa semutungamiri wenyika hwanga huchida kuitwa neSvondo, hwambomiswa zvichitevera danho ratorwa naVaChamisa. Dare rine mazuva gumi nemana ekuti ringe rabuda nemutongo waro panyaya iyi. Dare iri rinogona kuti zvikaburitswa neZec ndizvo zviri pamutemo, kanawo kubuda nemutongo wekuti VaChamisa ndivo vakakunda musarudzo kana richinge ragutsikana nehumbowo, kanawo kuti sarudzo iyi idzokororwe. Zvarinotura hazvipikiswe, uye warinenge rati ndiye akakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika ndiye anobva agadzwa mukati memaawa makumi mana nemasere. VaChamisa vanoti ndivo vakakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika kunyange hazvo Zec yakazivisa kuti VaMnangagwa ndivo vakakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vashanu Vanofa Zvichitevera Mhirizhonga Iri Kuitika muSouth Africa
text: Mapurisa emu South Africa ashandisa zvombo zvemabara asingauraye senzira yekuti vanhu vanga vachiratidzira mumigwagwa yeAlexandria, vaparare. Vanhu ava vanga vachiratidzira vachiti havadi kuti zvizvarwa zvedzimwe nyika zvinge zvichigara nekushanda munyika iyi. Zvinonzi vanhu vashanu vafa mumhirizhonga iyi, uye vanhu vanodarika zana vasungwa munyika yose vachipomerwa mhosva yekukonzera mhirizhonga. Mutungamiri we South Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, vashora zvikuru mhizhonga iri kuitika munyika mavo, vakati vachaita musangano negurukota rezvemapurisa, Va Bheki Cele, kuti patsvagwe nzira dzekugadzirisa dambudziko iri. Va Cele vabvuma kuti kune vanhu vashanu vafa mumhirizhonga iyi. Mumiriri we Zimbabwe mu South Africa, Va David Hamadziripi, vati havana ruzivo kana pavanhu vafa ava, pane zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe here kana kuti kwete. Asi vavimbisa kuti vachaunganidza zvavanenge vawana vozivisa veruzhinji. VaRamaphosa vati zviri kuitwa nezvizvarwa zve South Africa zvekurwisa nekushungurudza vabvakure, hazvisi zvinhu zvinokurudzurwa kuitwa. Vati izvi zvinofanirwa kumiswa izvozvi, vachiti vanhu vemuSouth Africa vanogara kugara murunyararo. Zvitoro zvevanhu vanobva kunze kwe South Africa zvakapwanywa kana kupiswa mudunhu reGauteng. Ukuwu mutungamiri wedunhu re Gauteng, Va David Makhura, vashanyira musha weAlexandria neChipiri masikati vachiona kuparadzwa kwakaitwa zvitoro. VaMakhura vakurudzira kuti mudunhu ravo muve nekugadzikana. Zvichakadaro, gurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kweSouth Africa, Amai Nosiviwe Mapisa Nqakula, vati kuparadzwa kwezvitoro kwakanangana nekuzvibisa chimiro cheSouth Africa. Mhirizhonga iyi inonzi yakatanga ku Tshwane svondo rapera, isati yapararira mu Johannesburg nenzvimbo dzakapoteredza guta iri. Sachigaro weZimbabwe Exiles Forum, VaGabriel Shumba, vanoti vanhu vana varasikirwa nehupenyu pamusoro pevatatu vakashaya nemusi weMuvhuro, asi havazivi kuti vanhu vangani vanobva kuZimbabwe vangave vakabatwa nemhirizhonga iri. VaShumba varatidzawo kushungurudzika nemaitiro emhuri yeZimbabwe iri muSouth Africa, iyo vati haina kubatana izvo zviri kupa kuti masangano anomirira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe atadze kuve neruzivo pane zvirizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinogona kunge zviri kuvhiringwa nemhirizhonga iyi. VaShumba vakurudzira mhuri yeZimbabwe iri muSouth Africa kuti itumidzire padandemutare reZEF, kana vachinge vasangana netsaona munguva yemhirizhonga iyi. Mukuru wesangano rinomiririra mabhizimisi emhuri yeZimbabwe mu South Africa, reProudly 263, VaStan Makwara, vanoti vanoshungurudzika nezviri zvikuru bezviri kuitika muSouth Africa sezvo zvichivhiringidza mabhizinesi pakati peZimbabwe neSouth Africa. VaMakwara vaenderera mberi vachiti vari mubishi kuzivisa nhengo dzavo nzvimbo dziri kuitika mhirizhonga iyi kuitira kuti vagare vari kure. Vatiwo sangano ravo riri kushanda nemuzinda weZimbabwe muSouth Africa pachitsvagwa nzira dzekupedza dambudziko iri. Zvichakadaro, kune gwaro raburitswa riri kukurudzira zvizvarwa zvekunze, kuti zviratidzire mangwana, pamusangano we World Economic Forum on Africa, uyo uri kutanga nemusi weChitatu muguta reCape Town. Ratidziro iyi, ichange iri yekukurudzira vatungamiriri venyika dzemuAfrica vachange vari pamusangano uyu, kuti vatore matanho akaomara kunyika yeSouth Africa nekutadza kwayo kwairi kuita kuremeredza kodzero dzevanobva kunze kwenyika iyi. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vatove muCape Town kuti vazopinda mumusangano uyu. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reMadutazvinhu Rochema Kushaya kwaVaJoel Biggie Matiza
text: Sangano rinomirira vatyairi nemakondakita, reZimbabwe Union Of Drivers And Conductors (ZUDAC) rinoti kushaya kwevaimbove gurukota rinoona nezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu, VaJoel Biggie Matiza, kwarwadza vanhu vazhinji vanoshanda mune zvekutakurwa kwezvinhu. Mutungamiri weZUDAC, VaFredrick Maguramhinga, vanoti VaMatiza vakange vachishanda zvakanaka nevanhu nemasangano ane chekuita nezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu. Vanoti VaMatiza vaigara vachiita misangano nemasangano avo vachiratidza kuda kunzwisisa mashandiro avo uye vachivabvunzavo nezvemirairo yavaifunga kuti ingabatsira mukufamba zvakanaka kwebazi iri, vachiti VaMatiza vakabatsira sangano ravo zvikuru. VaMaguramhinga varumbidzavo vaimbove gurukota reZimbabwe raiona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusiso Moyo, avo vakashaya nemusi weChitatu svondo rapera, mazuva maviri VaMatiza vasati vashayawo nechirwere cheCovid-19. VaMaguranhanga vati VaMoyo vakabatsira vatyairi nemakondakita panguva iyo vanhu muSouth Africa vakange vachirwisa vatyairi vekune dzimwe nyika vaishanda muSouth Africa. VaMoyo naVaMatiza vakapihwa ruremekedzo rwehugamba hwenyika uye vose vacharadzikwa mangwana, Chitatu, paHeroes Acre muHarare, pamwe chete nerimwezve gamba, vaParadzai Zimondi. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi dzeHupfumi Dzozeya Kurudziro yeRBZ Yekuti Mari yeMunyika Ishandiswe Zvakanyanya
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi dzinoti kurudziro yagavhuna vebhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Doctor John Mangudya, yekuti vanhu vashandise mari yemunyika zvakanyanya ipfungwa yakanaka chose, asi izvi zvinoshanda chete kana mari yemunyika iyi iine huremu hunounza chivimbo muvanhu. Vachitaura kumusangano wavakaita nevemabhizimusi svondo rapera, VaMangudya vakati kushandiswa kwemari yekunze munyika kwakaonekwa muna 2008 kuti hakukudze hupfumi hwenyika kunze kwekungodzikamisa chete mitengo yezvinhu. Vanoshanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti vanhu vemunyika vanofanirwa kuve nechivimbo nemari yemunyika kuitira kuti itambirike. Izvi zvinotsigirwa neimwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, avo vanoti chivimbo nemari yemunyika chinofanirwa kutangira kuhurumende, iyo vanoti iri kutara mitengo yezvinhu kusanganisira mari dzinoripirwa pama Toll gate nemari yekunze. Vaimbotungamira sangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaPeter Mutasa vanotiwo mari yemunyika inofanirwa kuzvishambadza yoga, kwete kuti iite zvekushambadzwa naVaNgudya sevanoshambadza mbatya dzekupfeka kana zvekudya. VaMutasa vanotiwo nyaya hombe yaita kuti mari yemunyika ipere simba inyaya yehuwori, zvikuru kumusika wemari yekunze, uko vanoti vamwe vari kutenga mari yekunze nemutengo wepasi vozoitengesa pamusika mutema nemari iri pamusoro. Asi pane chakaipa here kuti nyika ishandise mari yekunze? Doctor Chitambara vanoti kushandiswa kwemari yekunze hakuna kuipa sezvo kuchibatsira kuti hurumende isarambi ichidhinda mari sezvo isingazokwanisi kudhinda mari yekunze iyi. Asi vanoti mari yemunyika inokwanisa kutambirika chete kana nyaya yekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu kana kuti inflation, yadzikamiswa. Imwe nyanzvi mune zvemabhizimusi, vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGilbert Muponda, vanotsinhira pfungwa yekuti vanhu vaite chivimbo nemari yemunyika. VaMuponda vanoti izvi zvinogadziriswa chete kuburikidza nekuti nyika itengese zvigadzirwa zvayo kunze uyewo ichideredza zvainotengawo kunze. VaMangudya vakati nyaya ye inflation vachaigadzirisa kuburikidza nesimbisa kushandiswa kwemari yemunyika, pamwechete nekukasika kuwanisa vanenge vahwinha pamusika wemari yekunze mari dzavo mukati memasvondo maviri senzira yekuti mari yekunze iwande mumabhizimusi. Asi nyanzvi dzezvehupfumi idzi dzinoti kunze kwekunge hurumende yatora matanho amasimba kurwisana nehuwori, hupfumi hwenyika hunogadzirisika chete kuburikidza nekudzorwa kwemari yekunze kuti ishande munyika, kana kuti dollarization. No media source currently available

headline: Baiwai mudzoke kunhandare: Coventry
text: GURUKOTA rezvemitambo, nevechidiki, Kirsty Coventry, ari kukurudzira vatsigiri kuti vabaiwe majekiseni ekudzivirira Covid-19 kuitira kuti vagobvumidzwa kudzoka kunhandare kunotsigira zvikwata zvavo zvenhabvu.   Achitaura apo kambani yeSakunda Holdings yanga ichiparura rutsigiro rwayo kuzvikwata zvikuru zviviri zvenhabvu muno, cheDynamos necheHighlanders, Coventry anoti, vatsigiri ngavabaiwe nhomba idzi kuitira kuti vagodzoka kunhandare kunoona zvikwata zvavo zvichitamba.   “Tinotsigira pfungwa dzekuti vatsigiri vadzoke kuzoona zvikwata zvavo zvichitamba, asi kuti izvi zviitike, ngatingei takabaiwa nhomba dzeCovid-19.   “Tasuwa kuona nhabvu ichitambwa, saka ngatinobaiwai kuti zviite nyore tigopihwa mvumo yekudzoka munhandare,” anodaro Coventry.   Achitaurawo pachiitiko ichi, sachigaro weDynamos FC, Isaiah Mupfurutsa, anoti sechikwata, vari kushanda kubatsira vatsigiri vavo kuti vabaiwe majekiseni eCovid-19 kuitira kuti zvigovabatsira kuzoona mitambo yechikwata chavo nekukasika. Mupfurutsa anoti sechikwata, vakatanga chirongwa icho vari kukurudzira vatsigiri vavo kuti vanobaiwa majekiseni eCovid-19.   “Dynamos chikwata chikuru uye chine vatsigiri vakawanda muno nepasi rose. Naizvozvo takatanga chirongwa chekuvakurudzira kuti vanobaiwa majekiseni aya.   “Nhabvu inoda pane vatsigiri nesuwo tasuwa vatsigiri vedu. Saka tiri kuvaudza kuti ngavabaiwe nekuchimbidza kuitira kuti vagouya kuzoona mitambo yedu.   “Kana vakabaiwa zvinoita nyore kuti vagouya kuzoona mitambo yedu, isu tiri kukurudzira kuti vanobaiwa uye vari kuenda nehuwandu hwavo,” anodaro Mupfurutsa.   Anoenderera mberi achiti kutsigirwa kwechikwata chavo pamwe necheBosso kuchaona zvikwata zviviri izvi zvichisimukira uye anoti mumakore mashoma chikwata chavo vanoda kuti chidzokere mukukwikwidza mitambo yeCAF Champions League. “Zvikwata zviviri izvi zvikuru uye zvinozivikanwa. Zvichasimukira chaizvo mumatambiro azvo. Mumwaka inotevera tinofanirwa kukwikwidza mumitambo yeCAF Champions League,” anodaro.   Sakunda Holdings yadira mari inosvika US$5,4 miriyoni yemakore matatu. Mwaka woga woga zvikwata izvi zvichawaniswa mari inosvika US$890 000 kwemakore matatu anotevera.

headline: Imwe Zvakare Kambani yekuChina iri muNyika, yeDinson Iron and Steel Company, Yopomerwa Mhosva yeKudzvinyirira Vashandi
text: Pasina masvondo maviri sangano rinomirira vashandi pasi rese reInternational Trade Unions Confederation, (ITUC), radoma kambani yekuChina yeAfrochine sekambani inotyora kodzero dzevanhu zvakanyanya, imwe kambani yekuChina, yeDinson Iron and Steel Company, inonzi iri kudzvinyirira vashandi kuManhize kuMvuma uko iri kuvaka muzinda mukuru wekugadzira simbi munyika. Sangano rinomiriri vashandi vari mukuvaka, reZimbabwe Construction and Allied Trades Workers Union, rinoti rave nenguva richirambidzwa nevakuru-vakuru vekambani iyi vekuChina kuti nhengo dzaro dzishanyire vashandi vekambani iyi, avo vanoti vari kupiwa mihoro iri pasi peyakatarwa pamwe nekurambidzwa kuti vaumbe makomiti anovamirira pazvichemo zvavo. Munyori mukuru musangano iri, VaNicholas Muchapuwa Mazarura, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vave nenguva vachiedza kundoona vashandi vanodarika zviuru mazana maviri kuManhize asi vachirambidzwa kupinda panzvimbo iyi. VaMazarura vaudza Studio 7 kuti vashandi ava vari kuchemachema nenyaya yekupihwa mihoro iri pasi peino bvumirwa nemutemo, nyaya yekushanda nguva ndefu, pamwe nekurambidzwa kuumba makomiti anovamirira nezvimwe. Vati vashandi ava vari kubhadharwa mari inoita masendi ekuAmerica gumi nerimwe paawa yoga yoga asi ivo vachifanira kupiwa mari isiri pasi pedhora rekuAmerica rine masendi makumi mana paawa. VaMazarura vaenderera mberi vachiti chinosuwisa inyaya yekuti pese pane makambani eku China masangano anomirira vashandi vakaita seravo anorambidzwa kuona vashandi kana kuita misangano nemakambani aya kuti atevedze mitemo yevashandi vemuno. Asi achitaura pamusoro penyaya yekuManhize, mumwe mukuru mubazi rezvevashandi kuGweru uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita sezvo asingabvumidzwe kutaura nevatori venhau, audza Studio 7 kuti kusanzwisisana pakati pevakuru vekambani yeDinson Iron and Steel Company nesangano reZimbabwe Construction and Allied Workers Union kwakagadziriswa uye vanotasira kuti mapoka maviri aya asangane nguva ipi zvayo kubva pari zvino. Pataenda pamhepo kambani iyi yange isati yapindura mibvunzo yatavatumira. Kana kambani iyi ichinge yave kushanda zvizere, inotasirirwa kupinza basa vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvitanhatu. Dison Iron and Steel Company imwe yemakambani ari pasi pekambani huru yekuChina inonzi Tsingshan Holding Group. Imwe kambani iri pasi peTsingshan Holding Group yeAfrochine iyo ine chigayo chekoromu kuChegutu, yakanzi neITUC ndiyo kambani iri pamusoro pakudzvinyirira vashandi muZimbabwe. Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Congress of Trade Union, VaJaphet Moyo vanoti kunyange hazvo ITUC yakadoma Afrochine, vashandi vese vemakambani ezvizvarwa zvekuChina vane zvichemo zvakafanana. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rinoona nezvavashandi nemabasa, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavhima. Asi Muzvnafundo Mavhima vakamboudza Studio 7 nguva pfupi yapfuura kuti hurumende inotaririsira kuti makambani ese anouya kuzoshanda muZimbabwe anoshanda achitevedza mitemo yevashandi nemimwe. Asi vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanoona sekuti hurumende haidi kutora matanho nemakambani ekuChina anotyora kodzero dzevashandi nekuti China iri kupa Zimbabwe zvikwereti zvekuita mabasa ebudiriro munyika. Kunze kwemakambani anochera zvicherwa nekugadzira zvinhu zvakaita sesamende, makambani ekuChina ndiwo akapiwa mabasa ekuvandudza nhandare dzendege munyika dzakaita seHarare, Bulawayo neVictoria Falls, kuvaka paramende itsva, kuvandudza magwenya emagetsi kuKariba neHwange nemamwe mabasa akasiya siyana. No media source currently available

headline: Zvikwata zveNhabvu Zvotsvaga Vatambi Vatsva
text: Zvikwata zvenhavu yepamusoro yeCastle Lager Premier Soccer League zvapinda mubishi rekutsvaga vatambi vatsva vakatarisana nekusimbisa zvikwata zvavo zvemwaka unotevera. Chiri kunyanyonakidza ndechekuti vatambi vane zvikwata zvakabuda muPremier Soccer League nemhaka yekukundikana ndivo vaita mukurumbira wekurwirwa nezvikwata izvi mushure mekuita zvidavado apo zvikwata zvavo zvaive muPSL. Vatambi vakaita saKing Nadolo weTelOne, Denver Mukamba weChapungu,Nomore Chinyerere weHwange naClive Dzingai weMushowani Stars, ndivo vari pamuromo pezvikwata zvizhinji, Nadolo achinzi arikudiwa neDynamos, FC Platinum, pamwe neNgezi Platinum Stars. Asi Ngezi haiisi kugumira panaNadolo chete zvichinzi izvo irikuedza zvekare kuraura Denver Mukamba kubva kuChapungu. Murairidzi weMadamburo, Rodwell Dhlakama haana kuvanza kuti anofarira matambiro aMukamba asi achiwedzera iye kuti mutambi uyu anofanira kushandura maitiro ake kana achida kutambira chikwata ichi. Mukamba ane mbiri yekudhakwa uyezve yekurovha basa kuzvikwata zvese zvaatambira zvinosanganisirawo Caps United ne Dynamos. Dynamos yacho yapindawo mumusha weTriangle umo varikuita hurukuro nechikwata ichi kuti vatenge Donald Dzingayi pamusoro paRalph Matema uyo varikuda kutora kuYadah. Mubati wehomwe weDembare VaWebster Marechera vanoti vapa murairidzi wavo Tonderai Ndiraya cheki yakavhurika kuti atenge vatambi vaanoda kuti chikwata chake chisimbe. Ndiraya pachake arikubvuma kuti chikwata ichi chinoda kugadziriswa zvakasimba achiti iye arikuda vatambi vanokodzera kutambira chikwata chinonzi Dembare. Kunyange hazvo FC Platinum yakatora mukombe weligi, chikwata ichi hachisi kumira mukutsvaga vamwe vatambi. Arikurairidza FC Platinum parizvino Lizwe Sweswe anoti hapana zvakawanda zvirikuda kugadziriswa paKugona Kunenge Kudada kunze kwevatambi vashoma shoma. Mashoko arikufamba achiti iwo Kugona Kunenge Kudada yatobvumirana naRalph Kawondera kuti asiye basa kuTriangle anange kuZvishavane. Muchato pakati paKawondera neTriangle wekutambire maSugar Sugar Boys uikupera musi wa 31 Zvita. Pamusoro pezvo, Kugona Kunenge Kudada irikunakidzwa nevatambi vekuHwange uko varikuita hurukuro yekuda kutenga Nomore Chinyere mushure mekuraurako Gift Bweti mukupewa kwemwaka wa 2018. Asi Platinum haisati yabudirira pana Chinyere uyo arikudiwawo zvekare neChicken Inn, iyo irikuda mukombe weligi uyu mushure mekupedza iri pachinhanho chechipiri mwaka uno. MaGame Cocks arikuedza zvekare kuti vatore Clive Dzingayi uyo airura mumusha weMushowani Stars. Asi mumusha weCaps United mune runyararo zvichinzi izvo Makepekepe arikufarira vatambi vari munhabvu yepasi yeDivision One pane vatambi vemuPremier Soccer League, vakawanda vacho vanotsvaga zvikwata zvitswa pese panopera mwaka. Asi Highlanders ndiyo yarasikirwa zvakanyanya panguva ino mushure mekunge murairidzi wavo Henrik Piete De Jong asiya basa akananga kuFC Platinum. Izvi zvauya pamusoro pemutambi Prince Dube uyo arikuChina uko arikutsvaga chikwata chitsva chekutambira mwaka unotevera. Makwikwi eCastle Lager Premier Soccer League arikutanga muna Kurume nemutambo weChampion of Champions pakati peFC Platinum neHighlanders. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa Anonetsana Zvakare neVanotengesera muMigwagwa muGuta reHarare
text: Sechave chigariro musoro wetsuro kushaya nyanga, vanotengesera mumigwagwa yemuguta reHarare nemapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police vaswera zvakare vachitandanisana, izvo zvinonzi zvaita kuti mapurisa aridze pfuti pamwe nekushandisa hutsi hunokachidza mukuedza kudzikamisa zvinhu. Mumwe wevanorarama nekutengesera mumigwagwa aona zvichiitika, uyo ati anoda kunzi VaTodzidambura Mhandu, vanoti vashamisika panguva dzemasikati kuona mapurisa achienda pavanoshandira panosangana migwagwa Kwame Nkrumah Avenue naAngwa Street, pedyo nechitoro chinotengesa mishonga cheQV Pharmacy. VaMhandu vanoti mapurisa aya, ayo anga achitungamirwa nemukuru wemapurisa muHarare, azoedza kusunga mumwe mukomana anotengesa mbatya vasina kana kumbotanga vamuudza mhosva yaapara, izvo zvazoita kuti mukomana uyu arambe kusungwa. Vanoti izvi ndizvo zvazoita kuti paite mhirizhonga yaunganidza vanhu, zvazoitawo kuti mapurisa aridze pfuti pamwe nekukanda utsi hunokachidza. Vanotiwo mapurisa aya aenda nembatya dzanga dzichitengeswa nemukomana uyu, dzinosanganisira midhebhe neshangu. No media source currently available Asi mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, vanoti manyepo kuti mapurisa aridzira vanhu pfuti, vachiti mapurisa anga achitokanganiswa kuita basa ravo mushure mekunge aedza kuferefeta nyaya yekupambwa kwemumwe murume anogadzira pamwe nekutengesa nharembozha nevanhu vana. Assistant Commissioner Nyathi vanoti mushure mekunge vanotengesera mumigwagwa ava vaungana, mumwe wevanhu ava abva apwanya fafitera rechitoro cheQV uye kuita ruzha nekutuka mapurisa izvo zvazoita kuti mumwe mupurisa azoburidza pfuti yake yebasa achiedza kuvatyisidzira achimirirawo kusvika kwemamwe mapurisa, ayo azodira utsi hunokachidza. Mutauriri wemapurisa uyu ati mapurisa anga achiri kuferefeta nezvenyaya iyi, sezvo vanhu vapamba murume wemafoni uyu vamumanikidza kuti avabhadhare mari, iyo vanoti yatobva kumba nemudzimai wake. Assistant Commissioner Nyathi vakurudzirawo veruzhinji kuti vasiyane netsika yekuvhiringidza mapurisa paanenge achiita basa rawo. No media source currently available

headline: Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kufa neKubatwa neCovid-19 Hwowedzera Zvakare muZimbabwe
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa nekubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika hwatanga kukwira zvekare mushure mekumbodzika kwemavhiki apera. NeMugovera bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa kuti vanhu vatatu vakafa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera vave chiuru chimwe chete chine mazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nevasere kana kuti 1,538. Asi mukati memazuva manomwe adarika kusvika Mugovera, vanhu gumi nevatatu kana kuti 13 vashaya nechirwere ichi zvichienzaniswa nevanhu vashanu vakafa vhiki rapera. Vanhu zana nemakumi maviri nevatanhatu kana kuti 126 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi neMugovera zvasiya vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru makumi matatu nemanomwe nemazana maviri nemakumi manomwe nevatatu kana kuti 37, 273. Mumazuva manomqwe kusvika Mugovera chete vanhu mazana matatu nemakumi mashanu kana kuti 350 vabatwa nechirwere ichi zvachienzaniswa nevanhu zana nemumwe kana kuti 101 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi mumazuva manomwe svondo rapera. izvi zviri kuwedzerwao nekusamira zvakanaka kwaita zvinhu muzvikoro. Zvikoro gumi nezvishanu zvine vana nevarairidzi vakabatwa nechirwere ichi. Bazi rezvedzidzo rinoti vana vechikoro zana nemakumi matatu nevaviri kana kuti 132 vainge vabatwa nechirwere ichi pachikoro cheSacred Heart Primary neSacred Heart Girls Gigh kuEsigodini, Matabeleland South. Zvikoro zve Girls College ne Mzilikazi Primary zvine vana vabatwawo nechirwere ichi. Mutauriri webazi rezvedzidzo VaTaungana Ndoro vanoti vabereki havafanire kutya hazo nekuti hurumende iri kuita zvose zvakakodzera kuti chirwere chisapararire zvakanyanya vakati hapana munhu ari kubvumidzwa kupinda pachoikoro cheSacred Heart kusvika dambudziko riripo ragadziriswa. Zvichakadaro, vanhu makumi matatu nemumwe kana kuti 31 vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi zvasiya vanhu zviuru makumi matatu nemana nemazana masere nemakumi matanhatu nevaviri kana kuti 34, 862 vapora kusvika parizvino. Vanhu vachiri kurwara mazana masere nemakumi manomwe nevatatu kana kuti 873. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga yeCovid-19 vave zana rezviuru nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatatu nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matatu nevatanhatu kana kuti 193, 936. Vabayiwa nhomba kaviri zviuru makumi maviri nemasere nemazana manomwe nemakumi manomwe nevanomwe kana kuti 28, 797.

headline: ZRP Inoti Mari Yayakapihwa muBhajeti naVaNcube Haikwane Kutenga Pfuti, Hutsi Hunokatyidza neZvimwe
text: Mubhajeti risati ratambirwa nedare reparamende kana kuti budget proposal ravakatura vhiki rapera, gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vakapa mapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police kana kuti ZRP mari inosvika mabhiriyoni makumi matanhatu emunyika kana kuti 60 billion dollars ekuita mabasa. Asi vakuru vemapurisa vanoti kuti vakwanise kuita zvavanotarisirwa kuita, vanoda mari inosvika mabhiriyoni mazana mashanu nemakumi masere kana kuti 580 billion yemunyika.  Mumwe mutevedzeri wemukuru wemapurisa achiona nezvevashandi, Deputy Commissioner General (Human Resources) VaElliot Ngirandi, vaudza nhengo dzeparamende kuti ZRP mari yavari kunzi vapihwe kana bhajeti rikatambirwa nedare iri ishoma zvikuru pane zvavange vachitarisira.  Semuenzaniso, vatiwo vaida mari inosvika mabhiriyoni mazana mana nemakumi maviri emadhora kana kuti 420 billion pamabasa akasiyana siyana akafanana nekutenga zvombo, motokari nezvimwe zvikwanisiro asi vakapihwa mabhiriyoni gumi nemaviri emadhora emunyika chete kaba kuti 12, 6 billion. VaNgirandi vati vaida mari inosvika makumi mashanu emabhiriyoni kana kuti 50 billion doallrs kuti vakwanise kuendesa mapurisa kunzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana siyana. Vati mapurisa anoenda kubasa asina mari yekubatsirikana kana kuti maallowances vakatiwo mapurisa ari kushandisa mbozhanhare dzavo pachinhambo chekushandisa zviovha zvepabasa. VaNgirandi vatiwo zvinosuwisa kuti vane vanenge vari muhusungwa kuzvitokisi havawani chekafu. Vatiwo kana zvipatara nemakirinika zveeZRP hazvina mishonga uyewo vaida mabhiriyoni matanhatu ekutenga mishonga asi vakapihwa mabhiriyoni maviri chete pabhajeti regore rinouuya. VaNgirandi vakumbira nhengo dzeparamende kubva kukomiti inoona nezvemukati menyika nekomoti yeSeneti inoona nezverunyararo munyika kuti vataure negurukota rezvemari kuti riwedzere mapurisa mari . Asi munyori mubazi rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika, VaAaron Nhepera, vavimbisa nhengo dzeparamende kuti munyika hamusi kuzoita nyonga nyonga nekuda kwekuti ZRP yakapihwa mari shoma vachiti vakatoudza mutungamiriri wenyika nezvenyaya iyi. Vakumbirawo nhengo dzeparamende kuti dzitaure nebazi rezvemari kuti ripeZRP mvumo yekushandisa mari yefaindi nedzimwe dzainowa vachiti izvi zvinoita kuti mmapurisa awane mari yekushandisa yakakwana.  Zvichakadai mukuru mubazi reCivil Registry, Registrar General, VaHenry Machiri, vaudzawo nhengo dzeparamende kuti bazi ravo harina kuwana mari yaraida mubhajeti vachiti vakapihwa mabhiriyoni gumi reimwe kana kuti 1, 1 billion chete asi ivo vaida zana remabhiriyoni emadhora kana kuti 100 billion dollars.  VaMachiri vati vashandi vebazi ravo vakatoresa vanhu zvitupa mumatunhu ese munyika pasi pechirongwa cheNational Mobile Registration gore rino havasti vabhadhra. Varatidzawo kusafara nenyaya yekuti havana kupihwa mari yekunyoresa vanhu kuvhota zvakare kana Zimbabwe Electoral Commission ichinge yapedzeda kutara miganhu yenzvimbo dzekuvhotera gore rinouya kana kuti Delimitation. VaNhepera vatiwo kunyoreswa kwevanhu kwakashosha uye vakumbira nhengo dzeparamende dzione zvadzingaiite kuti mari yekuita izvi iwanike. Sachigaro wekomiti inoona nezvekudzvirirwa kwenyika, VaAlbert Nguluvhe pamwe nasachigaro wekomiti inoona nezverunyararo, VaDavid Parirenyatwa vaudza VaNhepera nevamwe kuti vataure zvinhu zvakakosha zvavanoda kuti zviwedzera mari vachiti zviri pachena kuti hapana mari yakawanda yekupa kuzvirongwa zvese zvabazi ravo.  Pari zvino mapazi ese ehurumende ari kusangana nemakomiti eparamende achitaura kuti anoda kuwedzerwa mari yakawanda zvakadii paramende isati yapasa bhajeti re4.5 trilllion rakaturwa svondo rapfuura. Mapazi ehurumende ainge achida mari inosvika matrillion masere nemabhiriyoni manomwe kana kuti 8,7 trillion.

headline: Vanhu Makumi Masere neVavaviri Vourayiwa neDutumupengo Idai
text: Vanhu makumi masere nevaviri vashaya parizvino nenyaya yedutumupengo reTropical Cyclone Idai kuManicaland. Asi huwandu uhu huri kutarisirwa kukwira sezvo vanhu vakawanda vasiri kuzivikanwa kuti varipi. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa avo vange vamboenda kuUnited Arab Emirates vari kutarisirwa kudzoka kumusha kuti vazoita mubatira pamwe nenyika yawirwa nedutumupengo remvura nemhepo kana kuti Tropical Cyclone Idai. Asi vamwe vanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika nevanhuwo zvavo vari kushora VaMnangagwa kuti vakasimuka munyika kunyangwe hazvo zvange zviri pachena kuti nyika yainge yotarisana nedambudziko redutumupengo. Vanhu ava vari kutumira mashoko kuStudio 7 uye kunyora pamadadendemutande akaita seTwitter neFacebook. Asi vamwe vari kuvatsigira vari kuti vaita zvakanaka kudzoka kumusha uye vari kuUnited Arab Emirates ikoko vakatangawo kutsvaga rubatsiro kuRed Crescent yekunyika iyi. Munyori mukuru bazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana vanoti VaMnangagwa vakaenda vasingazive kuti dambudziko iri raizokura uye havasi kudzika vari maoko chete sezvo vakabva vatanga kutsvaga rubatsiro vari kunze. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro mamwe makurukota mana ehurumende anosanganisira VaJuly Moyo, VaPerence Shiri, Doctor Sekesai Nzenza naVaJoel Biggie Matiza vakamboyedza kushanyira nzvimbo dzakaparadzwa nedutumupengo iri. Asi vanonzi vasangana nematambudziko makukutu sezvo kusiri kufambika. Mukuru weCivil Protection Unit VaNathan Nkomo vanoti mauto ari kuyedza napose paanogona kugadzira migwagwa isiri kufambika. No media source currently available Dutumupengo iri rakatanga kuparadza zvinhu kuMozambique musi wa 14 Kurume risati rapinda muZimbabwe richinorova kuChipinge neChimanimani kunyanya richiuraya vanhu nekuparadza zvivakwa. Dzimwe nzvimbo dziri kutarisirwa kusangana nedambudziko iri dzinoti Mashonaland East, Mashonaland Central, Mashonaland West, Masvingo neMidlands. Asi vebazi rezvemamiriro ekunze kana kuti Metrological Services Department vanoti vari kutarisira muguta reHarare nemamwe matunhu eMatabeleland achasanganawo zvishoma nedambudziko remhepo nemvura.

headline: Vana Chiremba Vanoti Havasi Kuzoita Basa Kusvika Zvinonetsa Zvagadziriswa
text: Vana chiremba vanoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muzvipatara huye havasi kuzodzokera kumabasa kusvika hurumende yagadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. Vana chiremba vaudza vatori venhau kuti zvinovasuwisa zvakanyanya kuti vasvitsa mazuva gumi nemaviri vasiri kuenda kubasa uku hurumende isiri kumboedza kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. Mutungamiriri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctor’s Association, Dr Elias Muzoremba, vati vanoshungurudzika zvikuru vachishanda muzvipatara zvisina zvikwanisiro zvakakwana. Vatiwo muzvipatara zvehurumende hamuna mishonga izvo zvinoita kuti kunyange vakaona varwere, havana zvavanokwanisa kuvabetsera nazvo. VaMuzoremba vatiwo vanachiremba vazhinji havasi pamabasa kunyange hazvo gurukota rezveutano, VaObadiah Moyo, vakaudza makurukota ehurumede neChipiri kuti vana chiremba vashoma ndovari kuramwa mabasa. Munyori musangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctor’s Asssociation, VaMthabisi Anele Bhebhe, vati zvinosuwisa kuti matambudziko avari kuchema nawo vanogarotaura nezvawo gore negore asi hurumende haisi kuagadzirisa. VaBhebhe vati vana chiremba vekumatunhu vabatanawo nana chiremba vanga vari pakuramwa mabasa. VaBhebhe vatiwo hurumende inofanirwa kugadzirisa dambudziko rekushaikwa kwezvekushandisa muzvipatara pamwe nekuona kuti vanachiremba vararamawo hupenyu hwakanaka. Vana chirembawo vari kuti mari dzemihoro dzavari kuwana hadzikwani uye vanoda kuti hurumende ivabhadharewo nemari yekuAmerica. Gurukota rezveutano, VaObadiah Moyo, vakaudza vatori venhau nezuro mushure medare remakurukota ehurumende kuti havasi kuzobhadhara vana chiremba nemari yekunze. VaMoyo vakatiwo vakaita hurukuro nana chiremba uye vakati vazhinji vari kumabasa izvo zvarambwa nanachiremba. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vatatu Vofa neKuda kweMafashamu eMvura kuManicaland
text: Mafashamu emvura nedutumupengo remhepo zvinonzi zvakauraya vanhu vatatu nekuparadza misha yakawanda kuManicaland asi zvave kuenda zvichiita nani. Dutumupengo rakabva nekuMozambique iri rinonzi Eloise. Ku Chipinge neChimanimani zvikoro zvakawanda zvapwanywa nemafashamu emvura aya uye vamwe vanhu vari pedyo nerwizi Save vave kutamiswa kuenda kwakakwirira. Kunaya zvakanyanya kwemvura kwapawo kuti mamwe madhamu maviri anoti Manyuchi neTugwi Mukosi azarise zvopa kuti mvura ivhurwe kuti irasike. Mukuru wesangano rePlatform for Youth Development VaClaris Madhuku avo vanoti dzimwe nzvimbo hadzisi kusvikika nekuda kwemiti yakadonhera mumigwagwa. No media source currently available

headline: Zvidzidzo zvesoftball zvoitwa
text: SANGANO reZimbabwe Softball Association rakapihwa chiremerera chekuitisa zvidzidzo zvekuvandudza ruzivo rwevarairidzi, varidzi vepembe pamwe nevanochetedza zvibodzwa zvemutambo uyu neWorld Baseball Softball Confederation (WBSC).Zvidzidzo izvi zvichange zviri zveLevel One International izvo zvichavabatsira kuti vagokwanisa kuenda kunorairidza nekunoridza pembe kune dzimwe nyika uye zvichaitwa muna Kukadzi.   Varairidzi vanosvika 50 vemutambo uyu, varidzi vepembe 20 uye vanotora zvibodzwa 20 vari kutarisirwa kuzobatsirikana nezvidzidzo izvi.   Mutungamiriri weZimbabwe Softball Association, Stonard Mapfumo, anoti sangano reWBSC richatumira nhengo ina idzo dzichauya kuzoitisa zvidzidzo izvi.   “Takatambira nemufaro mukuru danho iri, takarongerwa neWorld Baseball Softball Confederation kuti tiwedzere magwaro ebasa epamusoro kune varairidzi vesoftball, varidzi vepembe nevanonyora zvibodzwa vemuno.   “Izvi zvichatibatsira mune ramangwana apo tiri kurwisa chaizvo kuti mutambo uyu ukure uye usvike kure. Kuchauya nhengo ina muno dziri kutumirwa neWBSC kuzoitisa zvidzidzo izvi mwedzi unotevera,” anodaro Mapfumo.   Zvidzidzo izvi zvaifanirwa kunge zvichiitwa kutanga musi wa7 Kukadzi zvichizopera musi wa9 asi zvave kuitwa  musi wa23 Kukadzi zvichizopera musi wa26 sezvo nhengo idzi dzichatanga dzambotenderera kune dzimwe nyika dzichidzidzisako.   Mapfumo anoti zvidzidzo izvi zvauya panguva yakanaka apo sangano ravo riri kuita gadziriro dzechikwata chemadzimai chichanokwikwidza kumutambo weAfrica/Europe Olympic Qualifier uyo uchaitirwa kuPretoria, kuSouth Africa muna Chivabvu.   “Zvabva zvatinakira nekuti tange tiri kugadzirira chikwata chedu icho tinoda kuzotumira kuPretoria muna Chivabvu kunokwikwidza kumutambo wekurwira tikiti rekuenda kuTokyo, kuJapan kumutambo we2020 Olympic Games.   “Saka varairidzi vedu vakadzidziswa vopihwa ruzivo rwepamusoro rwesoftball ndinoona tichisvika kure,” anodaro Mapfumo.

headline: ‘Zvimbokoma zvaJoshua naWilder zvombomiswa’
text: anofanirwa kumira kwegore rese asati arwa naDeontay Wilder mumutambo weWorld Heavyweight Title Unification, sekutaura kwaBarry Hearn.   Asi, Hearn – uyo ane makore akawanda ari munyaya dzekuronga mitambo anoti achange asipo pachaitwa hurukuro dzekuronga nezvemutambo uyu pachasangana shasha iyi iyo ine mabhande eWBO, IBF neWBA naJoshua svondo rinotevera apo vacharonga remangwnaa rake mumutambo uyu.   Sachigaro weMatchroom – Hearn – akagadza mwana wake, Eddie, kuti agotungamira Joshua mumutambo uyu nenyaya dzake dzese asi anenge achiraira hake pano neapo zvese zvinenge zvichidiwa kuti basa riende kumberi.   Wilder, uyo ane bhande reWBC, mwedzi wadarika akanyorera Joshua padandemutande achitaura kuti vamiriri vake vane mari inosvika 35.9 miriyoni paunzi yekuronga kuti mutambo uyu uitwe pakati pavo gore rino.   Eddie akatsanangura kuti vane zvakawanda zvavanoda kuti vatange vavimbiswa vasati vasaina kuti mutambo uyu uenderere mberi.   Asi baba vake vakataura kuti nhandare yeManchester United yeOld Trafford ndiyo inogona kurongerwa kuitwa mutambo uyu vachiti, “Zvinogoneka”.   “Ndine musangano naAnthony Joshua svondo rinotevera naEddie, Eddie asati aenda kuNew York kunoronga mutambo uyu.” – SportsMail Boxing

headline: Mapurisa Anoudzwa Kuti Asiye Mhuri yekwaDzamara Ichiita Hurongwa Hwayo neChitatu
text: Gweta remhuri yekwaDzamara, VaKennedy Masiye, vati mutongi wedare, Justice Clement Phiri, vatambira chikumbiro chavo vachiti kuratidzira kana zvirongwa zvakaita seizvi zvinobvumidzwa pasi pemitemo yenyika. Dare repamusoro rapa mhuri yekwaDzamara mvumo yekuita zvirongwa zvekucherechedza kusvita gore VaItai Dzamara vapambwa ndokutsakatika musi was 9 Kurume gore rapfuura. Gweta remhuri yekwaDzamara, VaKennedy Masiye, vati mutongi wedare, Justice Clement Phiri, vatambira chikumbiro chavo vachiti kuratidzira kana zvirongwa zvakaita seizvi zvinobvumidzwa pasi pemitemo yenyika. Dare ratiwo mapurisa haafanirwe kuvhiringidza hurongwa uhu kana huchiitwa murunyararo. Asi mutauriri wemhuri yekwaDzamara, VaPatson Dzamara, vange vataura kuti mhemberero idzi dzange dzichaenderera mberi zvisineni nezvange zvichabuda mudare. VaDzamara vanoti gore rapfuura range rakaona sezvo vange vari kuedza kuona kuti mukoma wavo angawanikwe sei uye vati zvinosuwisa kuti mapurisa ari kuti haana zvaati awana pakutsvaga kwaari kuita. Mudzimai waVaItai Dzamara, Amai Shefra Dzamara, vanoti vachapindawo pazvirongwa zvekucherechedza gore murume wavo atsakatika uye chavanoda chete kuti murume wavo adzoke kumba. Vanoti kana vana vavo chaivo vari kuda zvikuru kuti baba vavo vadzoke kumba. Sachigaro weItai Dzamara Trust,Bhishop AncelimoMagaya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti gore rakwana murwiri wekodzero uyu atsakatika uye hurumende iri kutadza kumutsvaga. VaMagaya vatiwo vanhu vemuZimbabwe ndivo vane simba rekudzivirira zvakaipa uye vanofanira kutsigira chirongwa chemangwana. Vanhu vanotarisirwa kuungana muAfrica Unity Square vobva vazomacha nemugwagwa Jason Moyo vakananga kuRotten Row, vodzoka naSamora Machel vozonoungana paAfrica Unity Square apo pachaitwa munamato. Manheru pachaparurwa firimu rinotaridza mararamiro aita VaItai Dzamara pamwe nerumbo rwavakaimbirwa nemuninina wavo, Va Patson Dzamara. VaItai Dzamara vakapambwa pedyo nekumba kwavo kuGlen View musi wa 9 Kurume gore rapera, uye kubvira musi uyu mhuri yavo inoti haisati yanzwa kuti vari kupi uye mapurisa anotiwo haasati aziva kuti vari kupi. VaItai Dzamara nevamwe vavo veOccupy Africa Unity Square vairatidzira vachida kuti mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vasiye basa vachiti vatadza kutonga nyika. No media source currently available

headline: Vakawanda muAfrica Votarisira kuMorocco paMutambo neFrance Nhasi
text: Vatsigiri vemutambo wenhabvu muZimbabwe vane chivimbo kuti Morocco inorova France manheru ano nekupinda mufainari ye2022 World Cup. Nhasi kune makuwerere pakati pechikwata cheMorocco icho chiri kushura mare kuWorld Cup nechikwata chakapedzisira kutora mukombe uyu cheFrance. Veruzhinji munyika kusanganisira muongorori wemutambo wenhabvu VaLawrence Hwekwete vane chivimbo kuti Morocco inokunda France mumutambo uyu. Chikwata chinokuda apa chiri kusangana neArgentina iyo yakarova Croatia 3-0 nezvibodzwa zvakanwiswa naLionel Messi nezviviri naJulian Alvarez. Mukunwisa nezuro, Messi ave nezvibodzwa zvakaenzana mumakwikwi aya naKylian Mbappe wekuFrance. Vaviri ava vanwisa zvibodzwa zvishanu. Argentina yakapedzisira kusimudza mukombe uyu muna 1986 ichitingamirwa namushakavu Diego Maradona kuMexico. Mbappe ari kupinda munhandare manheru ano mumutambo wakatarisirwa zvikuru nevakawanda neMorocco. Mutambo uyu uri kutambirwa munhandare yeAl Bayt Stadium. Kunze kwaMbappe, maAtlas Lions anofanira kungwarirawo Olivier Giroud uyo ari kurovawo mambure. Asi Morocco iri kurumbidzwa nenyanzvi nekuti yakasunga kumashure neutare zviri kupa kuti nyika dzakawanda dzikundikane kuinwisa. Murairidzi weMoroccco, Walid Regragui ari kurumbidzwa nevakawanda nemarongero ake etsoro yemutambo zvapa kuti ave murairidzi wekutanga kutungamira nyika yemuAfrica kusvika kumazemi-finals eWorld Cup. Morocco iri kutarisira kuna Hakim Ziyech, Achraf Hakimi nevamwe. Muongorori wemutambo wenhabvu VaFarai Kambamura vanoti varikuonawo Morocco ichibudirira mumutambo uyu. Vanoita zvematongerwo enyika VaNixon Nyikadzino avo vanozivikanwa nezita rekuti Cde Mao vanoti Morocco ndizvo. Chikwata chinokundwa nhasi pakati peFrance neMorocco hachisi kubva chadzokera kumusha asi chichatamba neCroatia nemusi weMugovera kuona kuti ndeipi nyika inopedza makundano aya iri pachidanho chechitatu. Fainari yeWorld Cup 2022 iriko musi wesvondo, 18 Zvita. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kubatsira Munguva yeCovid-19 neMari Yakasara Mubhajeti yeRTG's 9,8 Billion
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kukurudzira hurumende kuti ibatsire vanhu vave kuda kunonga svosve nemuromo nekuda kwekurudziro yekuti vagare mudzimba nekuda kwekupararira zvinotyisa kwoita chirwere cheCovid-19. Gurukota rinoona nezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, vanoti hurumende ine mari inodarika mabhiriyoni mapfumbamwe nezviuru mazana masere kana kuti 9,8 billion parutivi kana kuti budget surplus zvakonzerwa nekugona kwayo kushandisa mari zvine mwero. Munyori mukuru wesangano revanotengesa mumigwagwa reZimbabwe Chamber of Informal Economy Associations, VaWisborn Malaya, vanoti vanozviitira mabasa emaoko vari kunetseka uye vanoda rubatsiro. Vati sesangano vari kuyedzawo kubatsira vanhu asi zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka. VaMalaya vati hapana hurongwa huripo kubva kuhurumende. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvemagariro evanhu, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, sesvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kukurudzira hurumende kuti ishandise mari iyi kubatsira vanhu vemuZimbabwe vasiri kukwanisa kuenda kumabasa panguva iyo vamwe vemabhizimisi vave kukwidza mitengo yezvinhu muzvitoro uye kuwedzera mari dzemba nedzekufambisa. Mukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Dr Godfrey Kanyenze, vati vanhu vanoda rubatsiro. Vati izvi zvinokwanisa kuitwa muhurukuro dzeTrripartite Negotiating Forum dzinounza pamwe chete hurumende, vashandi nevashandirwi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhanga vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGilbert Muponda, vanoti zvakakosha kuti hurumende iite muonero wetwiza vachiti chikuru chinoda kuitwa kuti patengwe nhomba dzakawanda dzekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 kuti vanhu vazokwanise kudzokera kumabasa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti mhando yechirwere cheCovid-19 yopararira munyika iko zvino yeDelta variant inotapuriranwa zviri nyore uye iri kuuraya vanhu vakawandidsa kudarika dzimwe mhando dzose. Mabhanga anokweretesa mari nyika dzepasi rino akaita seWorld Bank neInternational Monetary Fund anoti hupfumi hwenyika dzepasi rino huri kukanganiswa zvakanyanya nechirwere cheCovid-19. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kukurudzira hurumende kuti ibatsire vanhu vave kuda kunonga svosve nemuromo nekuda kwekurudziro yekuti vagare mudzimba nekuda kwekupararira zvinotyisa kwoita chirwere cheCovid-19.  No media source currently available

headline: Sangano rePlatform for Youth Development Robatsira Mhuri Dziri Kuda Kubviswa kuChipinge
text:
Sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevechidiki pamwe nebudiriro yematunhu, rePlatform for Youth and Community Development, riri mushishi kubatsira vagari vemudunhu reChipinge rose vanonzi vakatarisana nekubviswa munzvimbo dzavagere.

Mukuru wesangano iri, Claris Madhuku, vanoti vagari vanodarika zviuru zvishanu mumatunhu eChipinge anosanganisira Munyokowere, Ndiyadzo, Beacon, Chibuwe, neKondo vakapiwa matsamba akabva kubazi rezveminda vachipiwa mazuva manomwe chete ekuti vange vabva munzvimbo dzavagere.

VaMadhuku vanoti mhuri idzi dzakatanga kugara mumatunhu aya mumakore ekuma 1950, zvekuti vanotove nemasabhuku nemadzishe avo, zvekuti vari kutokatyamadzwa kuti vave kubviswa munzvimbo dzavo nehurumende yevatema.

Vanotiwo sangano ravo riri kubatsira vagari nekuvadzidzisa kodzero dzavo dziri mubumbiro remitemo. Vanoti vakasvitsa nyaya iyi kumakomisheni anomirira kodzero dzevanhu eZimbabwe Human Rights Commission neNational Peace and Reconciliation Commission kuti apindirewo mugakava iri.

Asi VaMadhuku vanoti vamiriri vehurumende vakavazivisa kuti hurumende iri kutarisa nyaya iyi sezvo panga paine hurongwa hwekuona kuti vanhu vakapiwa sei minda senzira yekugadzirisa nyaya yeminda. Vanoti vari kushandawo nekanzuru yeChipinge pakutsvaga nzira dzekupedza gakava iri.

VaMadhuku vanoti bumbiro remitemo rinoti kana munhu achibviswa paagere, anofanirwa kutanga aratidzwa paari kunogariswa, kwete kuti munhu anongonzi ibva asiri kuziva kwaari kuenda.

Vanoti tsakurudzo yavo inoratidza kuti pane makambani ari kuda kupiwa minda iyi kuti arime rudzi rwenzungu rwe macadamia pamwe nemabhanana. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa Oparura Chirongwa Chekudzinga Vanotengesa Mumigwagwa, 'veMishikashika' neVana Vasina kweKugara muGuta reHarare
text: Mapurisa aparura chirongwa chekubvisa muguta reHarare mishikashika, vana vanogara mumigwagwa uye vanotengesa zvinhu. Mamwe masangano akaita sePassengers Association of Zimbabwe anoti zvinogona kupinza hupenyu hwevanhu munjodzi panenge poitwa hwakiti nagonzo mapurisa achimhanyisa vanhu ava. Mapurisa aabatana neve ZINARA, VID, kanzuru dzeRuwa, Chitungwiza,ye Epworth, neye Harare nevebazi rezvemagariro evanhu muchirongwa ichi. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri we Mapurisa mudunhu re Harare, Assistant Inspector Webster Dzvova, vakazivisa mutsamba yavo nezuro kuruzhinji rwenyika kuti Harare yese ichange ichi mhanyidzana nechirongwa ichi kubva nhasi kusvika mukupera kwesvondo rino. Asi vanotengesa mumigwagwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti havazi kuzotyityidzirwa ne mapurisa kuti varege kushanda. Mukuru wesangano re vanotengesa, reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation (VISET), VaSamuel Wadzayi vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanotengesa mumigwagwa havabve nekuti nyika haina mabasa. No media source currently available

headline: Zviri kuramba: Dynamos…l Tinoda kuhwinha: Lodza , Zviri kutivhara: Mubaiwa ,Bhadharai vapfanha: Romario
text: MUTUNGAMIRIRI weDynamos FC, Kenias “Kenny” Mubaiwa, anoti vari kuzama nepavanogona kuti chikwata chavo chihwinhe mitambo yacho yemuPremier Soccer League asi zviri kukona n’anga murapwa achida.   Kubva mumitambo minomwe yatambwa neDeMbare, haisati yahwina kana mumwe zvawo sezvo yakwanisa kuita mangange mitatu ndokukundwa mina izvo zviri kuona iri imwe yezvikwata zvakasenga zviri pasi pelog. Mubaiwa anoti chikwata chavo chinotambira kuhwina asi zviri kurambawo mwaka uno uye havazive kuti chii chiri kumbonetsa.   “Isu chedu chatinoziva ndechekuti tiri kuedza nepatinogona kuti tirwe, tihwine asi zviri kuramba. Tinogadzirira mitambo yese uye topinda tichida kuhwina asi zviri kuramba, hatipinde mumutambo kuzokundwa, asi kuhwina,” anodaro.

headline: Simudzirai nhabvu yevechidiki’
text: ZVIKWATA zvenhabvu zvinokwikwidza muDivision One kana muPremier League zvokurudzirwa kuti zvikoshese vatambi vechidiki nechinangwa chekusimudzira matarenda avo kuti vagozove vatambi vemangwana.   Kurudziro iyi yakapihwa nasachigaro weNorthern Region Division One, Martin Kweza, achiti kuti nhabvu yemuno ibudirire zvakakosha kuti zvikwata zvipe mikana kune vechidiki.   Anoti kuNorthern Region, zvikwata zvose zvinokwikwidza vakazvitaurira kuti zvinofanirwa kuve zvine vatambi vashanu kana kudarika vane makore ari pasi pe18 ekuberekwa avo vavanoda kuona vachitamba masvondo ese.   Izvi, anodaro Kweza, zvinobatsira kuti nhabvu irambe ichikura pamwe nekuti vatambi ava vagofambira mberi mumutambo uyu.   Anoti kuwanza vatambi vechikuru muzvikwata hakubatsire sezvo zvichidzosera nhabvu kumashure uye nekushaisa vechidiki mikana yekusimukira mumutambo uyu.   “Donzvo redu isu kuvaka vatambi vechidiki kuti vasimukire vagotimirira vachienda kunotambira kunze kwenyika kune zvikwata zvakasiyana. Ndiko kusaka isu tichikurudzira zvikwata zvose zvinokwikwidza muNorthern Region kuti ngazvive nevatambi vashanu kana kudarika vane makore ari pasi pe18 ekuberekwa nekuti chatinoda kuona vechidiki vachivakwa tarenda ravo.   “Kungowanza madhara ega hakubatsire uye hakuna kwamunosvika nechikwata nekuti madhara anenge achembera. Ndiko kusaka muchiona kuti zvikwata zvinobva muNorthern Region pazvinopinda muPSL zvinosvika zvichitamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura nekuti chikwata chinenge chakaumbwa chine vechidiki vakawanda.   “Tinoona kuti madhara mazhinji kana apera anouya kuzopedzera nguva yavo muDivision One voshaisa vechidiki mukana. Asi tinoti ipai mukana kune vechidiki uye madhara musamarase zvachose nekuti vanodiwa kudzikamisa vechidiki nekubatsira kuvaumba,” anodaro Kweza.   Pari zvino pazvikwata zvinokwikwidza muPremier League, zvitatu zvinoti Ngezi Platinum Stars, Harare City neHerentals ndizvo zvine vechidiki vanokwikwidza muNorthern Region Division One.   Zvikwata zvevechidiki izvi zvnoti Ngezi Platinum Under-19, Harare City Curbs neHerentals U-20.   Kuchitiwo Highlanders ndiyo yega ine chikwata chinokwikwidza muSouthern Region Division One.   Kweza anoti kana zvikwata zvakawanda zvemuPSL zvikave nevatambi vanokwikwidza muDivision One zvinobatsirikana kuburikidza nekubika vatambi uye hazvizombonetsekane nekutenga vatambi.   “Zvikwata zvose zvemuPSL zvikaita vechidiki vanokwikwidza muDivision One, zvinobatsira kubika vatambi vakawanda uye hakuna chikwata chinozombonetsekana nekutenga vatambi nekuti vanenge varipo vakawanda.   “Saka kurudziro iri kuzvikwata zvose kuti itaiwo zvikwata zvenyu zvevechidiki zviri muDivision One uye koshesai kubika vatambi vechidiki,” anodaro Kweza.

headline: Kanzuru yeMasvingo Yogadzira Nzvimbo yeKubatsira Vanenge Vabatwa neCoronavirus
text: Kanzuru yeMasvingo inoti iri kutsvaga nzira dzekubatsira vagari vanenge vawirwa nedambudziko rechirwere checoronavirus kunyangwe vamwe vagari vari kuti zviri kuitwa hazvina kukwana. Kanzuru yakaisa chipatara chitsva mumusha wevazhinji weRujeko. Muzvare Rumbidzayi Magurupira, wemumusha weRujeko, anoti chipatara ichi chinogona kusakwana kubatsira vanhu kana coronavirus ikapararira zvakanyanya. Vamwewo vagari vakaita saAmai Tinotenda Mazuru, vanoti danho rekuisa chipatara ichi munzvimbo inogara veruzhinji rinogona kuita kuti chirwere ichi chitekeshere mudzimba dzevanhu vamwe varwere vapoya. Asi Meya weguta reMasvingo, VaCollen Maboke, vanoti vakaita danho iri vaita tsvakurudzo uye vapuwa dzidziso nana Chiremba pamwe nenyanzvi dzebazi rezve hutano. Mukuru webasa, musangano rinomirira vagari, reMasvingo Residents and Rate Payers Alliance(MURRA) VaAnoziva Muguti, vati kanzuru inofanira kuvandudza chipatara ichi kuti chitakure vanhu vakawanda uye kuti paiswe matanho eku chengetedza vanenge vauya nechirwere kuti vasazotapurire vanhu mudzimba. Meya Maboke vari kururdzira vagari kuti vasatye nekuti vakaisa matanho pamwe chete nenyanzvi dzehutano eku chengetedza vanenge vabatwa nechirwere ichi kuti chisatapurirwe mudzimba dzevagari veRujeko. Dhorobha reMasvingo harisati rave nemunhu akabatwa ne chirwere ichi asi vagari vanotyira kuti sezvo riri munzira yemugwagwa inoenda kuSouth Africa chinogona kupararira nevanofamba. VeMurra vanoti kanzuru inofanira kufambisa mashoko neku shambadza kuti vagari vawane ruzivo rwakakwana kuti chirwere ichi chinotapuriranwa sei. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yozeya Mutemo Unobharisa Mazana Mashanu Kune Vanoputira Fodya Paruzhinji
text: Hurongwa hwehurumende hwekuda kudzika mutemo uchakonzera kuti vaputi vefodya vasabvumirwe kuputira paruzhinji hwakonzera mutauro kubva kune veruzhinji munyika. Hurumende ine hurongwa hwekuwunza bhiri kuparamende richange richisungira vaputi vefodya kuti vasaputire fodya pane veruzhinji. Pasi pebhiri iri, munhu anenge abatwa achiputa fodya paruzhinji achange achisungirwa kubhadhara mazana mashanu emadhora semari yefaindi kana kugara mujeri kwemwedzi mitanhatu. Vaputi vefodya vakaita saVaFibion Munhuwa vanogara mumusha weEpworth vanoti havasi kuzofa vakaregedza kuputa fodya kunyangwe mutemo uyu ukadzikwa vachiti vanonzwa parere moyo kana vachinge vaputa fodya. Asi VaNigel Gwekwerere vanoti kuputira fodya paruzhinji kunokanganisa hutano hwevasingapute zvikurusei kuvana nemadzimai akazvitakura nokudaro vanoti vanotambira nemawoko maviri hurongwa hwehurumende uhwu.
