Izvi zvatsinhirwa naVaMalvern Samhembere vanogara mumusha we Kuwadzana muno muHarare. VaSamhembere vanoti hapana chinovaka muviri chinowanikwa mufodya. Amai Gladys Runyowa vanogara mumusha we Greendale vanoti vanhu vasingapute fodya vazhinji vanobata zvirwere zvakanyanya kudarika vanhu vacho vanenge vachiputa fodya. Asi mugari wekubudiriro, VaClayton Ndlela vati zviri kutaurwa nehurumende hazvina musoro sezvo Zimbabwe iri imwe yedzimwe nyika dzinorima fodya yakawanda pasi rose. VaNdlela vanoti Zimbabwe haifanire kutomborima fodya zvachose kana vasingade kuti fodya iputwe. Zvichakadai, VaAlbert Chidhakwa vanoti faindi iri kutaurwa nehurumende yakawandisa kana pakatariswa mari dzemihoro dziri kutambirwa nevanhu vazhinji munyika. Zvataurwa nava chidhakwa zvatsinhirwa naVaTichaona Murandu avo vanogara mumusha weHatcliffe muHarare. VaMurandu vanoti zviri kurongwa nehurumende izvi kuita kwehurumende yapererwa irikuedza kutorera veruzhinji twumari twushoma twunenge twuri muhomwe dzavo. Vanoti kunyangwe hazvo vari munhu asingapute fodya, mari iri kutaurwa nehurumende yakawandisa zvikuru. Zvichakadai, muzvare Faith Musarurwa avo vakakwikwidza musarudzo dzeparamende ku muzarabani vakamirira MDC-T vanoti vari kutambira hurongwa hwehurumende uhwu asi hurumende inofanira kutanga yatara nzvimbo dzinobvumidzwa kuti vanoputa vaputire kwete kungodzika mutemo isati yaongorora zvinhu zvakadai. Makambani anogadzira fodya akatonyorawo pazvipepa zvinenge zvine fodya kuti fodya inogona kukanganisa hutano. Dzimwe nyika dzakawanda pasi rose kusanganisa america hadichabvumidze kuti fodya iputirwe pose-pose. Mukuru anowona nezvezvinodhaka mubazi rezvehutano, amai Dorcas Sithole vakaudza bepanhau reSunday Mail kuti hurumende iri kuedza kudzivirira veruzhinji kuti vasabatwe nezvirwere zvinokonzereswa nefodya vachiti vanhu vakawanda vari kubatwa nezvirwere zvegomarara remumapapu. Amai Sithole vanotiwo bazi ravo rakamirira kupasiswa kwebhiri re national alcohol control policy kuti hurongwa uhwu hutange kushanda. Vanotiwo kudhakwa nekuputa zvakanyanyisa ichange iri mhosva pasi pemutemo uyu kana uchinge wapasiswa. Mutemo uyu uchange uchipawo huwandu hwedoro richabvumidzwa kutengeserwa munhu mumabhawa. Amai Sithole vanotiwo Zimbabwe inofanirwa kuita zvinhu zvakaringana nezvakatarwa nesangano re World Health Organization maererano nekuputwa kwefodya zvichitevera kusaina kwakaitwa ne Zimbabwe muna kurume wegore rino kuve nhengo yebazi re who rinowona nezvekuputwa kwefodya zvine mwero. WHO inoti vanhu mamiriyoni matanhatu vanofa pagore nenyaya yezvirwere zvakanangana nekuputa fodya. No media source currently available

headline: Mari Yotadzisa Vakawanda Kuenda Kuzororo reEaster
text: Vanhu vakawanda vange vachikwira mabhazi vachienda kunotambira zororo reEaster kunzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana, kunyange hazvo vanga vachichema nerekushaya mari. Kunyange hazvo munyika vanhu vari kunetsekana kutora mari dzavo kumabhanga, change chiri chipata pata paMbare Musika vanhu vachikwira mabhazi vachienda kunzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana vachinoshanyira hama neshamwari. VaSteven Masocha vaudza Studio7 kuti vange vakatarisira kuti zororo reEaster richanakidza zvikuru. Asi izvi zvichakundikana sezvo vasina mari yakawanda. Mumwe mudzimai akwanisa kuenda kumusha kwake kuHurungwe, Amai Dorothy Jack, vati mushure mekutadza kuwana mari kubhanga kwavo, vakatozokwereta mari kuti vakwanise kuenda kuzororo. Muzvare Nomatter Chiwenga vatiwo zvange zvakaoma kuti vakwanise kuwana mari nokuti vaimukira husiki kuti vanomira mumitsetse kubhengi kwemazuva akawanda kusvikira mari yavaida yakwana. VaMambo Mandungu Mandedza varatidza kufara kuenda kumusha kwavo kwavakapedzesira kuenda makore masere apfuura. Vati kana vasvika kumusha kwavo vachauraya mombe kuti vafare nemhuri yavo pazororo reEaster iri. Baba Trymore Muvhunza vanoti vana vavo vatadza kuuya kubva kuBuhera nepamusana pekushaya mari. Asi Baba Gibson Chanakira vati vachazoenda kumusha kana zororo rapera sezvo vari mubishi rekutengesa zvinhu zvavo paMbare Musika. Kunyange hazvo vamwe vanhu vakwanisa kuenda kuzororo reEaster, ongororo yaitwa neStudio7 yaratidza kuti vanhu vakawanda vatadza kufamba nepamusana pekushaya mari iyo iri kunetsa kutora kumabhanga. No media source currently available

headline: Dare Rinoti VaMliswa Havana Mhosva
text: Vaimbove sachigaro veZanu Pf mudunhu reMashonaand West, VaTemba Mliswa, vawanikwa vasina mhosva panyaya yavaipomerwa yekuba nekuwanikwa vaine zvombo zvisiri pamutemo. Vachitura mutongo mutongi wedare muChinhoyi neChina, VaFelix Mawadza, vati VaMliswa havana mhosva yekuba pamwe nekuwanikwa vaine zvombo zvitanhatu papurazi ravo reSpring pedyo neguta reKaroi. No media source currently available VaMawadze vati hurumende haifanirwe kuvimba nehufakazi hwevaimbove mushandi waVaMliswa, VaSteadfine Mashiri, sezvo ivo vaipomerwa pamwe naVa Mliswa panyaya iyi. Vati dare rarasa hufakazi hwaVa Mashiri zviri pamutemo sezvo mutemo uri pachena kuti hufakazi hwemunhu achipomera munhu waanofungidzirwa kuti akapara mhosva naye haufanirwe kutambirwa nematare. Izvi vanoti zvabva zvasiya hurumende isina humboo hunosungirira VaMliswa panyaya iyi. Vachitaura mushure mekuwanikwa vasina mhosva VaMliswa vati mutongo uyu unoratidza kuti matare edzimhosva vachiri kuita basa ravo nemazvo. Izvi zvatsigirwa negweta raVaMliswa VaMusindo Hungwe, avo vati hurumende yanga ichingoumbiridza nyaya pasina. VaMliswa vashoropodza mapurisa kuti vasashandiswe nevanoita zvematongerwo enyika sezvo zvichisvibasa zita renyika. VaMliswa vanga vachipomerwa mhosva yekuba zvombo zvitanhatu kuMhangura papurazi reSomerhill muna 2007 vakaenda nazvo kupurazi ravo uko vaizvichengeta. Asi VaMliswa vanga vachiramba mhosva idzi vachiti vanhu vezvematongerwo vakabuda nenyaya dzekunyepa. VaMliswa vari kukwikwidza musarudzo ye by election iri kuitwa kuHurungwe West, uko kuri kuitika mhirizhonga, vose vanofungidzirwa kuti vanotsigira VaMliswa, vari kuoneswa chitsvuku nenhengo dzeZanu PF. Izvi zvinotevera kurudziro yakaitwa negurukota rezvematunhu, VaIgnatius Chombo, yekuti vose vanotsigira VaMliswa vadzingwe mudunhu iri. Mashoko aVaChombo ari kushorwa zvikuru nemasangano anoona nezvekodzero dzevanhu.

headline: VaMangoma, VaNcube, VaMakoni neVamwe Voita Mushandirapamwe
text: Mapato mashanu anopikisana nehurumende yeZanu PF nemusi weChipiri akanyorerana chibvumirano chemushandirapamwe pamberi pesarudzo dzichaitwa muna 2018 achiti kubatana kunowoedzera mukana wekubvisa hutungamiri hwaVaRobert Mugabe nebato ravo avo vave nemakore makumi matatu nematanhatu vari muhutongi. Mapato mashanu anopikisa anoti MDC yaVa Welshman Ncube, Mavambo Kusile Dawn kana kuti MKD, Zunde, Dare pamwe ne Renewal Democrats of Zimbabwe kana kuti RDZ anyorerana chibvumirano chekuumba mubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa achiti kupinda musarudzo akapatsanurana hakuna zvakunobatsira pakukwikwidzana neZanu PF. Mutungamiri weRDZ, VaElton Mangoma, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vafara zvikuru nekunyorerana kwavaita chibvumirano ichi nemamamwe mapato. Kunyangwe hazvo mapato mashanu aya anyorerana chibvumirano ichi, MDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai pamwe neZimbabwe People First inotungamirwa naAmai Joice Mujuru vanga vasina kumiririrwa asi VaMangoma vati mapato aya angangopinda mumubatanidzwa uyu. Izvi zvatsinhirirwa nemutungamiri weMKD, VaSimba Makoni avo vaimbove gurukota rezvehupfumi. VaTendai Biti, avo vanotungamira bato reProgressive Democratic Party kana kuti PDP, vanga varipowo pakusainwa kwechibvumirano ichi. VaBiti vaudza Studio 7 kuti vachiri kuda kumbonokumbira mvumo yekusaina gwaro iri kukomiti huru yebato ravo. Mutauriri weZapu, VaMjobiza Noko, vatiwo vakamirira kuenda kukongiresi yebato ravo kuti vazive gwara richatorwa nebato ravo panyaya iyi. Mutauriri weMDCT, VaObert Gutu, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti havana kunge vakokwa pakusainwa kwechibvumirano asi sebato vanotsigira nyaya yekuti mapato aite mushandirapamwe. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri wePeople First, VaRugare Gumbo vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti havanawo kukokwa kumushandirapamwe uyu uye havana kana kumbotaurwa navo nezvenyaya iyi. Zvichakadai, VaMangoma vati mapato anenge asaina chibvumirano chemushandirapamwe ichi achazogara pasi owirirana kuti ndiyani achakwikwidza pachigaro chemutungamiri wenyika akamirira mubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa aya paine nguva yekutsvaga rutsigiro pamberi pesarudzo dzemuna 2018. Asi vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika munyaya dzenhaurirano idzi vanoti mapato aya amhanyira kuumba mubatanidzwa kuti agokwanisa kuve nemasimba ekuti achatora chigaro chipi ndiyani sezvo variwo vatanga kunyorerana chibvumirano ichi. Zvinonzi nyaya yekuti achataungamira mubatanidzwa uyu ndiyani ndiyo iri kunyanyonetsa kunyangwe zvazvo paine kuwirirana mumapto anopikisa ose kuti panofanira kuve nemubatanidzwa wemapato ose anopikisa uchakwikwidza musarudzo dzemuna 2018. No media source currently available

headline: Nhengo dzeMDC-T Dzobatwa neMhosva yeKuponda Mupurisa
text: Nhengo nhatu dzeMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai nemusi weChipiri dzakabatwa nemhosva yekuponda mupurisa mumusha weGlenView muHarare muna 2011. Vachitura mutongo wavo panyaya iyi, mutongi wedare repamusoro, VaChinembiri Bhunu, vawana vanhu vatatu vaine mhosva yekuponda VaMutedza. VaBhunu vati kunyangwe hazvo zvisina kubuda pachena kuti ngana ndiye akapotsera dombo rakatema VaMutedza zvakazokonzera kuti VaMutedza vafe zviri pachena kuti vatsigiri veMDCT ava vaiva nechinangwa nechekuponda sezvo mumwe mufakazi akapa humbowo pakutongwa kwenyaya iyi akati akanzwa mumwe munhu achidaidzira kuti mapurisa arohwe sezvo achidyidzana nebato riri kutonga reZanu PF. Vabatwa nemhosva yekuponda ava ndiVaLast Maengehama avo vaimbova nhengo yekomiti yepamusoro muMDCT, VaTungamirai Madzokere vanove kanzura mukanzuru yeHarare pamwe naMuzvare Yvonne Musarurwa vanove nhengo yeboka revechidiki muMDC-T. VaPhineas Nhatarikwa, avo vanoshanda semutyairi muMDC-T, vabatwa nemhosva yekubatsira Muzvare Musarurwa naVaMadzokere kubva panzvimbo yakaparirwa mhosva iyi mushure mekuvatakura nemotokari pakaitika kurwisana pakati pemapurisa nevechidiki ve MDCT. Vamwe vatatu vanoti VaEdwin Muingiri, VaLazarus Maengehama naVaPaul Rukanda vasunungurwa sezvo zvanzi nedare hapana humbowo hunoratidza kuti vaivepo pakapondwa VaMutedza. VaRukanda vaudza Studio 7 kuti havasi kufara nemutongo waturwa nedare sezvo zviri pachena kuti pari kuitwa zvematongerwo enyika. Pakatanga nyaya iyi, paive nevasungwa makumi maviri nevapfumbamwe asi vamwe makumi maviri nevaviri vakawanikwa vasinawo mhosva pakanzwikwa nyaya iyi. Vanhu ava vaisanganisira VaPaul Madzore avo vaimbove sachigaro kuboka revechidiki muMDCT vasati vabuda mubato iri. Pakutongwa kwenyaya iyi, nhengo dzeMDC-T idzo dzairamba mhosva iyi dzichiti dzaishungurudzwa zvine chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika. Gweta revasungwa ava Amai Beatrice Mtetwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanhu ava vachadzoka kudare nemusi weChina kuti patange kuzeyiwa chirango chavo. Vati kusvika izvi zvaitwa havana zvakawanda zvavakataura nevatori venhau.  No media source currently available

headline: FC Platinum neTraingle Dzosimudza Mureza weZimbabwe muAfrica
text: Chikwata cheTriangle chakashura mare nezuro mumakwikwi eCAF Confederation Cup mushure mekudambura chikwata cheRukinzo chekuBurundi. Asi chikwata cheFC Platinum chakaita mangange mumakwikwi eCaf Champions league neChikwata cheNyasa Big Bullets. Chikwata cheTriangle nezuro chakarova Rukinzo yekuBurundi 5 kwa 0 izvo zvapa chikwata ichi mukana wekuenderera mberi mumakwikwi aya. Mutambo wechipiri uri kutambirwa kuBurundi svondo rino. Mune mumwe mutambo neMugovera, chikwata cheFC Platinum chakaita manganga 0-0 nechikwata chinorairidzwa naCallisto Pasuwa uyu aimborairidza chikwa cheDynamos. Mutambo wechipiri uchatambirwa kuBarbourfields mavhiki maviri anotevera. Castle Premier Soccer League Iko zvino tombotarisa mitambo yeCastle Premier League yakatambwa mukupera kwesvondo. Chikwata cheChicken Inn neBlack Rhinos zvatambisa mukana mukuru wavanga vawana wekuenda panhongonya yeCastle Premier Soccer League mushure mekurohwa mumitambo yazvo, ndokuramba zviine mapoinzi maviri pasi peFC Platinum iyo irikutungamira. Black Rhinos yakarohwa 1-0 neHighlanders musi mumwechete Chicken Inn yakadamburwa 2-1 neZPC Kariba. FC Platinum iyo yaive isina mutambo muZimbabwe irikutamba mutambo wayo wePSL neChitatu apo irikusangana neHarare City. Nechitatu zvekare, Triangle ichatamba ne Ngezi Platinum Stars. Murwendo rwavo rwekuMalawi, mumutambo weCAF Champions League Pure Platinum Boys yakanoita mangange 0-0 ne Nyasa Bullets. Asi Makepekepe eCaps United ari murufaro mushure mekushanya kwaRusape ndokunorova Manica Diamonds 1-0. Izvi zvasiya maGreen Machine afamba nzendo refu ndokuenda pachinhanho chechipiri nemaponzi makumi maviri nerimwechete, poindi imwechete pasi peFC Platinum. Mumwe mutsigiri weCaps United Muzvare Leslie Marufu varikufara zvikuru nezvakaitwa nechikwata chavo vachiti ivo Kepekepe ndizvo. Mumusha weDembare mune rufaro mushure mekunge chikwata ichi charova Mushowani Stars 2-0 nezuro ndokuenda pamapoinzi makumi maviri nemanomwe. Murairidzi wavo Tonderai Ndiraya arikuti chiwata chake chakabatana zvekuti arikutarisira mashiripiti mumitambo inotevera.  Mimwe mitambo yaiveko yakapera seizvi…  Yadah 0 v Hwange 0 TelOne 1 v Herentals. 1  Kwatambwa mitambo gumi nemisre, zvikwata zvina zviri pamusoro soro ndeizvi..  FC Platinum 32 points Caps United 31 points Chicken Inn 30 points Black Rhinos 30 points. No media source currently available

headline: Masangano eVarairidzi Onyunyuta neHurongwa hweHurumende Hwekuchengeta paZvikoro vana Vakanyora Bvunzo dzeGrade 7
text: Mamwe masangano anomirira varairidzi munyika ari kunyunyuta nedanho rebazi redzidzo yepasi rekuti vana vakapedza kunyora bvunzo dzeGrade 7 svondo rino varambe vachienda kuchikoro kuitira kuti vadzidziswe nezvavachanosangana nazvo mberi, kana kuti “Life Orientation”. Sangano renhau repadandemutande, reZIMLIVE inoti sangano reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, rakati hurumende haina kunzwawo kubva kwariri payakatora danho iri. Ukuwo, sangano reZimbabwe Teachers Association, ZIMTA, ratiwo kunyange hurongwa hwehurumende hwakanaka, rinoona sekunge hurumende yakaona kuti vana ava vari kukasika kunyora bvunzo zvoita kuti hurumende ide kuramba iinawo vachiwana zvekuita. Mutauriri wesangano iri VaGoodwell Taderera vanoti havaoni vana vachizoramba vachienda kuzvikoro sezviri kutarisirwa nehurumende kana vachinge vatonyora bvunzo dzavo. Mutungamiri weAmalagamated Rural teachers Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure vanotiwo sangano ravo harina kubatwa naro nebazi redzidzo yepasi pahurongwa uhwu, vachiti danho iri rekudzidzisa vana remangwana ravo rangorohwa zvechibhubhubhu nehurumende sezvo varairidzi vacho vasina kumbudzwa kuti chii chavachange vachiita. No media source currently available VaMasaraure vanoti sesangano vanokurudzira kuti pane vekurongwa kwakakwana. Ukuwo mutungamiri weProfessional Educators Union of Zimbabwe, PEUZ, VaWilson Makanyaire vari kungoimbawo rwiyo rwumwechete rwekuti hurumende yakaita zano ndega isina kugara pasi nevashandi vayo, vanove varairidzi. No media source currently available Asi mutauriri webazi redzidzo yepasi VaTaungana Ndoro, vaudza Studio 7 kuti chirongwa chekuti vana veGrade 7 varambe vari pachikoro kunyange vakapedza kunyora bvunzo dzavo chakanangana nekuti vawane mukana wekudzidziswa nezvavachanosangana nazvo mberi, kana kuti “Life Orientation”. VaNdoro vanoti varairidzi vanofanirwa kunzwisisa kuti hazvirevi kuti kana vana vanyora bvunzo zvikoro zvave kubva zvavharwa.

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanokumikidza Mabhazi Matsva eZupco muBulawayo
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakumikidza mabhazi matsva ekambani yeZupco muguta reBulawayo vachiti hurumende yavo yakazvipira kuti veruzhinji vawane zvifambiso zvinowanikwa nguva nenguva zvichifamba zvakanaka uye zvisingadhure. Vachitaura pachiitiko chekukumikidza mabhazi makumi manomwe nematanhatu paCity Hall muBulawayo nhasi mangwanani, VaMnangagwa vati vange vaine mufaro mukuru kuve pachiitiko ichi vachiti mabhazi aya achabatsira kurerutsira veruzhinji panyaya dzekufamba. "Kuvepo kwemabhazi aya kunotarisirwa kubatsira zvikuru mukumutsurudza basa rekufambiswa kweveruzhinji uye kubatsirawo kuderedza mari dzakakwrira dzekufambisa idzo dzange dzave kubhadharwa neveruzhinji kumaruwa nemumadhorobha," vadaro mutungamiri wenyika. Pamabhazi akumukidzwa akawanda acho achaendeswa kumaruwa ekumatunhu eMatabeleland North neMatabeleland South asi VaMnangagwa vati pane mamwe ari munzira achashanda muguta reBulawayo. Vati hurumende yakazvipira kudonzvo rayo rekuti mugore ra2030 Zimbabwe ive yave inoverengwa panyika dzakabudirira vakati zvakakosha kuti nyika ive nezvekyfambisa zveveruzhinji zvakakwana. Vati hurumende yavo yakaona zvakakosha kumutsurudza kambani yeZimbabwe United Passenger Company, Zupco. Vati hurumende iri kutenga mabhazi anopfuura chiuru chimwe nemazana matatu achapiwa kukambani iyi. "Mushure mekuona kuti panguva dzakawanda veruzhinji vange vave kuwomeserwa nevamwe vari mubhizimisi rekutakura vanhu, vachivabhadharisa mari dziri pamusoro-soro, takaona zvakakosha kumutsurudza kambani yehurumende yeZupco. Mabhazi achauya achibva kunyika dzeChina, Belarus neSouth Africa," VaMnangagwa vaudza vanhu. VaMnangagwa vati makanzuru nehurumende zvinofanirwa kushanda pamwe chete kuitira kuti veruzhinji vagokwanisa kuitirwa zvizere mabasa avanotarisira kuitirwa vakashorawo zvikuru nyaya yehuwori. Mutungamiri wenyika vati hurumende yavo yakazvipira kuendesa masimba kumatunhu. "Gurukota rezvemari VaMthuli Ncube muhurongwa hwekushandiswa kwemari yehurumende vachawedzera mari ichashandiswa pakuendesa masimba kumatunhu zvichireva kuti pachave nemari yakawedzerwa ichapiwa kumatunhu, kumakanzuru ekumaruwa uye emumadhorobha kuitira kubatsira kuti mukwanise kuita mabasa amunotarisirwa kuita neveruzhinji," vadaro VaMnangagwa Zupco yava nemabhazi matsva anosvika mazana mashanu. Vakafanobata chigaro chameya weBulawayo, VaMalandu Ncube, avo vange varipowo pachiitiko ichi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti ibasa remakanzuru emaguta kuti veruzhinji vawane zvifambiso. Vati vanotambira kuvepo kwemabhazi asi vakati zvakakosha kuti mabasa achamuka muhurongwa uhu apiwe vagari vemunzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana kuchaendeswa mabhazi aya kwete vekunze. Mumwe mugari, VaFriday Thomas Phiri, vati vanotambira chirongwa chemabhazi ichi asi vakati zvakakoshawo kuti hurumende iwone kuti migwagwa yemunyika yagadzirwa vachiti kana izvi zvikasaitwa, mabhazi aya achapera kufa nekukasika. Vatiwo zvakakosha kuti hurumende isangotarisa kunyaya yezvifambiso chete asi kuti iwonewo kuti mitengo yezvinhu zvinoshandiswa neveruzhinji zuva nezuva yadzikiswa. Semamwe makambani ehurumende, kambani yeZupco yakagwadama nekuda kwekusaita basa nemazvo kwevaiyitungamira kambani iyi, pamwe chete nehuwori. Mukutanga kwegore rino, Zupco yanga yasarirwa nemabhazi mazana matatu nemakumi masere, mazana maviri nemakumi maviri nerimwe ari mabhazi emakambani akazvimirira akaendesa mabhazi kuZupco pasi pechibvumirano. Guta reHarare ranga riine mabazi zana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemana, Bulawayo iine makumi manomwe nematanhatu, Mutare iine mabhazi makumi matatu nemana, Masvingo gumi nematatu, Gweru iine masere, ukuwo Chinhoyi iine mabhazi maviri chete eZupco. Muna chikumi, mabhazi matsva makumi mana nemanomwe akapihwa Zupco achibva ku China nekuSouth Africa. Hurumende yakanyoreranawo chibvumirano chemabhazi matsva mazana mashanu neBelarus zvichitevera kushanya kwaVaMnangagwa kunyika iyi muna Ndira. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti kana hururmende yaVaMnangagwa ikasasunga dzisimbe pakugadzirisa nyaya yehuwori, kumutsurudza kambani iyi nedzimwe dzehurumende, kuchashaya basa. Zupco yakaumbwa muna 1980 pakawana nyika kuzvitonga, asi kambani iyi yaizivikanwa nerekuti Rhodesia Bus Company nyika ichiri pasi pehutongi hwevachena. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa neVasori Vogara Vakadzipakatira Sezvo Kugunun'una neHurumende yaVaMugabe Kwowedzera
text: Hurumende inonzi yati vanochengetedza mukati menyika vagare vakadzipakatira kana kuti "high alert" sezvo zvinhu munyika zvaita manyama amire nerongo. Vamwe vakuru mumapurisa vataura neStudio 7 vati zvinhu hazvina kugadzikana munyika nenyaya yekusamira zvakanka munyaya dzezvehupfumi asi vati vakagadzirira kuona kuti hakuna kuratidzira kuchaitika. Vanhu vakawanda kusanganisa vechidiki, mapato ezvematongerwo enyika, vana muzvinabhizimisi uye vemachechi vave kubuda pachena kuti havasi kufara nezviri kuitwa nehurumende yemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Mapurisa anodzivirira mvongamupopoto akawanda ave kuendeswa kumadhorobha akawanda sezvo kuratidzira kwakatangira muHarare Nemusi weChishanu vesangano revechidiki richangoumbwa rinonzi veTajamuka iro rine vechidiki kubva kumasagano ezvematongerwo enyika akasiyana siyana, vadzidzi nevemamwe masangano rakendesa tsamba yenyunyuto kumahofisi eInternational Monetary Fund muHarare uko vanonzi vakasvika kwakazara vesangano revasori avo vakatanga kuvatevera. Tsamba yakasiiwa iyi yaikurudzira IMF kuti isadyidzane nehurumende yaVaMugabe yyavanotio iri kutyora kodzero dzevanhu nekuita zvehuwori. KuMasvingo mapurisa anonzi akaramba kupa mvumo kuvemachechi nevamwe, vemasangano akazvimirira nevezvematongerwo enyika vange vachida kuratidzira vachiti havasi kufara nehutongi hwaVaMugabe. Officer commanding Masvingo Superitendent Philip Ncube vaKAudza vanhu ava kuti havasi kuzotenderwa kuratiudzira pasi pemutemo wePublic Order and Security Act kana kuti POSA. Nemusi weChina vamwe vechidiki veTajamuka vakarohwa zvakaipisisa nemapurisa mushure mekuratidzira muHarare. Vamwe vairatidzira muAfrica Unity Square mavhjiki apera vakambosungwa ndokuendeswa kuChikurubi neHarare Remand asi vakazobuda nemusi weChishanu muhure mekunge vabhadhara mari yechibatiso. Vana muzvinabhizimisi vane chitsama vari kunzi vari kubvunzurudzwa nemapurisa kana vachinge vangotaura kuti nyika yaenda kumawere. Bato guru rinopikisa reMDC-T riri kuratidzirawo mumadhorobha akasiyana siyana. Mubato riri kutonga reZanu-PF maberekerawo pongwe sezvo paine kunetsana kwakanyanya kuti ndiyani achatora chigaro chaVaMugabe avo vave nemakore makumi mapfumbamwe nemaviri asi pasina kujeka kuti achatora chigaro chavo ndiyani kana vasiya basa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika Vajoy mabenge vanoshanda nesangano recrisis in zimbabwe coalition vajoy mabenge. No media source currently available

headline: VeZCTU neZFTU Vanoti Vakuru Vakawanda kuNSSA Ngavamiswe Basa neNyaya yeHuori
text: Masangano evashandi anoti reZimbawe Congress of Trade Union ne Zimbabwe Federation of Trade Unions anoti haasi kufara nedanho rasachigaro weNational Social Security Authority Doctor Percy Toriro rekumisa basa mukuru wekambani iyi VaArthur Manase voga basa. Munyori mukuru weZCTU VaJaphet Moyo vanoti huori huri kupomerwa vakuru vekambani iyi hwakakura zvekuti hapadi kuti munhu mumwe chete akandwe pasi pebazi. VaMoyo vati bhodhi rose rinofanira kumbomiswa basa. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemunyori mukuru weZFTU VaKennias Shamuyarira vanoti masangano evashandi anofanira kumbofanobata matomu pachiitwa ongororo. Gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima vanoti vashandi vanofanira kunzwisa kuti vanhu vanonzi vabatwa nemhosva chete kana papedza kuitwa ongororo. Vati vashandi vanofanira kumirira kuti hurumende ipete ongororo yayo. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakanyora mubepanhau reSunday Mail mavhiki adarika vachiti havasi kufara nemabatirwo ebasa kuNSSA zvakapa kuti paparurwe ongororo iyi. Asi vashandi vanoti vange vave nemakore vachiti NSSA iri kuvabata neseri kweruoko kana vave pamudyandigere ichivapa mari shoma asi vakuru vekambani iyi vachidya noriva nekupura nyemba nemusana.

headline: Ndinofarira Man U: Hadebe
text: MUTAMBI wemaWarriors neYeni Malatyaspor yekuTurkey, Teenage Hadebe, anoti shuviro yake kuti agotamba mumakwikwi eUEFA Champions League uye nekuzotambira Manchester United mune remangwana.   Hadebe mumwe wevatambi vemaWarriors vanotambira nhabvu yavo kuEurope uko akatanga kutambira mwaka uno achibva kuKaizer Chiefs yekuSouth Africa.   Kuenda kwaakaita achinotambira kuTurkey, mutambi uyu akabva aita chizvarwa chemuZimbabwe chechipiri kutamba nhabvu kuTurkey Super Lig, achitevera matsimba aNorman Mapeza uyo akambotambira Galatasaray inove chimwe chezvikwata zvikuru kunyika iyi.   Achitaura neKwayedza nemusi weChishanu chadarika apo maWarriors akaita mangange 0-0 neBotswana kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium, Hadebe anoti agadzikana kuYeni Malatyaspor.   “Ndiri kufara chaizvo nemafambiro ari kuita hupenyu kuTurkey. Ndakatambirwa zvakanaka zvikuru kuchikwata changu uye ndoda kuramba ndichisimukira ndiriko kusvika ndave kutamba mumakwikwi eUEFA Champions League. Uyu mutambo unotambwa nezvikwata zvikuru nevatambi vakuru ndimo mavanotamba, saka iniwo ndoda kumutambawo neYeni Malatyaspor,” anodaro.   Anoti achazvipa makore matatu achitamba kuTurkey uye kana adarika shuviro yake kuenda kunotambira kuEngland.   “Ndichazvipa makore matatu ndiri kuYeni Malatyaspor ndichinyatsobikwa ndichijairirawo muEurope ndochimbonotambira kune imwe nyika. Kana zvikafamba zvakanaka ndoda kuzotambira Manchester United nekuti ndicho chikwata changu chandinotsigira pasi rose. Izvezvi Manchester United zvinhu hazvisi kuifambira zvakanaka asi ndoshuvira kuzoitambira mune ramangwana,” anodaro Hadebe.   Makwikwi eUEFA Champions League ndeemitambo mikuru inoteverwa pasi rose nezvikwata zvikuru zvekuEurope zvinosanganisira Liverpool, Barcelona, Real Madrid, Bayern Munich, Paris Saint-Germain, Juventus uye nevatambi vanoti Cristiano Ronaldo, Lionel Messi, Robert Lewandoswki, Kylian Mbappe, Mohamed Salah, Sadio Mane naRiyad Mahrez.   Mutambi wenhabvu wekupedzisira kubva muZimbabwe kutambawo muUEFA Champions League ndiMarvelous Nakamba uyo akambotambamo gore radarika achiri kuClub Brugge yekuBelgium.   Hadebe anoti Nakamba muenzaniso wakanaka kwaari nevamwe vatambi venhabvu vakawanda vemuno uye vazhinji vanoshuvira kusvika paave.   “Kwatiri sevatambi venhabvu, Nakamba muenzaniso wakanaka uye tese tinodawo kusvika paave. Tinoshuvirawo kuzotambirawo muEngland nerimwe zuva tichitevera matsimba ake,” anodaro Hadebe.   Kusvika parizvino muSuper Lig, Yeni Malatyaspor yatamba mitambo 11 uye Hadebe akwanisa kutamba mitambo misere uye akavhoterwa kuve muchikwata chemwedzi waGumiguru.   Anoti chiremera ichi chinorakidza kuti ari kufamba mugwara chairo kuTurkey nekudaro acharamba achishanda nesimba.   “Kubva ndaenda kuTurkey, ndakambopinda muchikwata chakatamba nhabvu chaive chiri muTeam of the week uye ndikazopinda muTeam of the month yaGumiguru. Zvinorakidza kuti ndiri kutamba zvinonwisa mvura uye ndiri kufamba mugwara chairo,” anodaro.   Muchinda uyu ari muchikwata chemaWarriors icho chiri kurwira kuenda kumutambo we2021 Africa Cup of Nations.   Akatanga kusarudzwa kuti atambire mumakwikwi aya mugore ra2017 asi haana kutamba kana mutambo mumwechete.   Hadebe akazodzokera kuAfcon gore rino kuEgpyt uko akatamba mumutambo wekutanga achimaka Mohamed Salah.

headline: Madhokotera Anodarika Mazana Mana Anodzingwa Basa, Mitumbi Ichiorera Mumamochari
text: Hurumende inonzi yadzinga basa vana chiremba mazana mana nemakumi matatu nevashanu basa vari kuramwa mabasa pakusvika mukuvira kwezuva remusi weChitatu. Madhokotera aya ari kudzingwa basa zvichitevera kuwanikwa vaine mhosva yekutyora mitemo yebasa nekomiti inoranga vanokanganisa pamabasa. Sangano reHealth Service Board rinoti madhokotera aya arikudzingwa basa pachitevedzwa mitemo inobata vashandirwi nevashandi vavo. Sangano reCommunity Working Group on Health rinoti zvitunha zvave kuworera mumamochari emuzvipatara zvehurumende nekushaya vanachiremba vanovhiya kuti pabude chirwere chinenge chapa kuti murwere afe. Sachigharo wesangano reHealth Service Board, Dr. Paulinus Sikosana, vaudza Studio 7 kuti matare ekunzwa mhosva dziri kupomerwa vanachiremba ava kuzvipatara zvavo ari kuenderera mberi uye vakawanda vari kutarisirwa kudzingwa basa pamusoro pevadzingwa basa ava. Panyaya yekuti ndiyani achatora mabasa evari kudzingwa ava, Dr. Sikosana vati vainge vanyora tsamba kumunyori mubazi rezvehutano, Dr. Agnes Mahomva, kuti vaone kuti zvipatara zvingashande sei. Asi Dr. Mahomva vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo,apo taedza kunzwa divi ravo. Vanachiremba vakatanga kuramwa mabasa musi wa 3 Gunyana vachiti mari dzavari kutambiriswa hadzisi kuvakwanira. Mukuru weCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti vamwe vanhu vave kungorwara nekufira kumba vamwe vachienda kuzvipatara zvinenge zvichiri kushanda zvakaita seKaranda Hospital kuMt Darwin. No media source currently available

headline: VaChamisa Vanoti Havasi Kuzopa Huchapupu Kukomisheni yaVaMothlante Kana VaMnagagwa Vasinawo Kukokwa
text: Komisheni yakadomwa nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuti iongorore mhirizhonga yakaitika muHarare muna Nyamavhuvhu yakoka mutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, kuti vazopindura nyaya yavari kupomerwa yekuti ndivo vakakonzeresa mhirizhonga iyi. Asi VaChamisa vanoti havasi kuzomira pamberi pekomisheni iyi kana VaMnangagwa vasina kushevedzwa. Vachitaura nevatori venhau pamuzinda webato ravo paMorgan Tsvangirai House muHarare neChina, VaChamisa vati vatambira tsamba yakanyorwa nasachigaro wekomisheni iyi avo vaimbova mutungamiri weSouth Africa kwechinguvana yekuvakoka kuti vazopa humbowo kukomisheni. Mutsamba iyi, iyo iri mumaoko eStudio 7, VaMotlanthe vati VaChamisa vanofanira kupindura kumhosva yavakapomerwa nevamwe vakapa hufakazi kukomisheni yavo hwekuti ndivo vakakonzeresa mhirizhonga yemusi wa1 Nyamavhuvhu yakazoita kuti vanhu vatanhatu vafe uye vazhinji vakuvare mushure mekupfurwa nevari kufungidzirwa kuti masoja. Vamwe vakumbirwa nekomisheni iyi kuti vazopa hufakazi mutevedzeri wasachigaro weMDC, VaTendai Biti, vakakwikwidza vakamirira MDC Alliance kuHarare South avo vaimbova nhengo yeZanu PF vaShadreck Mashayamombe pamwe naVaJim Kunaka vebato reNational Patriotic Front. Asi VaChamisa vati havasi kuzonomira pamberi pekomisheni iyi kana VaMnangagwa nemutevedzeri wavo VaConstantino Chiwenga vasina kushevedzwa kuzopa humbowo kukomisheni iyi. Mukuru-mukuru wemapurisa VaGodwin Matanga vakaudza komisheni iyi kuti VaMnangagwa ndivo vakapa masoja mvumo yekupinda mumigwagwa zvavakati zvaizivikanwawo naVaChiwenga avo vaivawo zvakare gurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika. Mutauriri wekomisheni yaVaMotlanthe, VaJohn Masuku, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakanakira VaChamisa kuti vamire pamberi pekomisheni yavo kuti vataurewo pavamire panyaya iyi. VaMasuku vati komisheni yavo ichiri kuongorora kuti VaMnangagwa naVaChiwenga vomiswa here pamberi pekomisheni yavo. Gweta uye vachishanda nesangano reHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaChamisa havasungirwe nemutemo kuenda kunomirira pamberi pekomisheni yaVaMotlanthe iyi kana vasingade zvichitevera kukokwa kwavaitwa vachiti tsamba yatumirwa VaChamisa iyi harisi gwaro riri pamutemo rinovasungira kuti vamire pamberi pekomisheni iyi kana kuti subpoena. VaChamisa vati ivo nebato ravo havasirivo vakaudza vanhu vakaratidzira musi uyu kuti vapinde mumugwagwa vachiratidzira. Vachitaurawo pamusangano uyu, munyori mukuru muMDC, VaDouglas Mwonzora vati ivo pamwechete nemunyori anoona nezvemutemo muZanu PF, VaPaul Mangwana, vakamboyambira komisheni inoona nezvesarudzo sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, kuti ichimbidze kuburitsa zvaizobuda musarudzo kudzivirira mhirizhonga munyika sezvo vachiti veruzhinji havavimbe neZEC. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaMnagwana kuti tinzwewo divi ravo panyaya iyi. VaMwonzora vatiwo mavhidhiyo anoratidza masoja akazvivhara kumeso achiridza pfuti musi uyu humbowo hwakakwana hunoratidza kuti masoja ndiwo akauraya vanhu vachiti masoja anenge achichengetedza runyararo haafanire kunge akavhara zviso zvawo. Varambawo zvakare kuti mubato ravo mune boka rinodaidzwa kuti Vanguard iro rakapomerwawo mhosva yekukonzeresa mhirizhonga yemusi wa1 Nyamavhuvhu vachiti boka reVanguard rakaparadzwa kare muna Kurume wegore rino sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. VaChamisa vatiwo hurumende ine hurongwa hwekuparadza MDC ndosaka ichipomera mhosva iyi kubato ravo. Vati zviri pachena kuti vanhu vakafa musi uyu vakapfurwa nemasoja pakatariswa humbowo hwemavhidhiyo akabuditswa nemasangano enhau paiitika mhirizhonga iyi. Vaenderera mberi komisheni yaifanira kuumbwa ikomisheni yaifanira kutarisa kushayikwa kwakaita VaItai Dzamara mushure mekupambwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori kwete kutambisa mari yehurumende nezvinhu zvinozivikanwa nemunhu wese kuti vanhu vakapfurwa ava vakapfurwa nemauto. yezvesarudzo iyi. VaMatanga vakaudza komisheni yaVaMotlanthe kuti pangadai pakafa vanhu vakawanda musi uyu dai masoja akashandisa pfuti dzawo zvisina mwero uye vanoti havazivi kuti aiudza masoja zvekuita musi uyu ndiyani sezvinodiwa pamutemo kana masoja apinda mumigwagwa kunobatsira mapurisa mukuchengetedza runyararo uyo unoti masoja anofanira kunge ari pasi pemapurisa. Nekune rumwe rutivi, mukuru wemauto VaPhillip Valerio Sibanda vakati havazivi kuti akapfura vanhu vakafa ndiyani sezvo vakaudza komisheni iyi kuti masoja akazopinda mumigwagwa vanhu vapfurwa kare. Mumwe mukuru muchiuto VaAncelem Nhamo Sanyatwe vakatiwo masoja aridzira pfuti asingapfuri varatidziri. Kunyange hazvo hurumende ichiti kwakafa vanhu vatanhatu musi uyu, masangano akazvimira anoti vanhu vakafa musi uyu vanogona kudarika gumi sezvo vamwe vevakapfurwa ava vachinzi vakafa vachiendeswa kuzvipatara.

headline: Vamwe Voyaura Zvichitevera Kupera kweMabasa nePamusana peCovid-19
text: Vanhu vakawanda vakarasikirwa nemabasa avo munguva ino yeCovid-19 vanoti vari kutambura zvikuru sezvo vasina chekubata. Mumwe wevanhu vakarasikirwa nemabasa, Va Luck Moyo, vanoti ivo nemhuri yavo vave kudya kamwe chete pazuva kubva pavakasiya basa kukambani yavaishandira. VaMoyo vanoti basa ravo rinokwanisa kuraramisa mhuri yavo asi ikozvino havakwanisi kuenda kunoita basa iri sezvo vasina tsamba inovapa mvumo yokuenda kunzvimbo yavanenge vadaidzwa. Mumwe akatarisana nedambudziko iri, Muzvare Melissa Jairosi, avo vane dhigiri reEngineering, vanoti vakapererwa nebasa muna Nyamavhuvhu gore rapera pakambani inoita zvokuvaka. Vanoti nekushaya chekuita, vakafunga kuita basa rekutengesa hembe dzemumabhero nemuriwo wavanotenga kuMbare, sezvo vari kushaya basa ravakadzidzira kuEngland. Mumwe mudzimai, Amai Mary Makuyana, vanoti vakamiswa basa vachangotanga kupfuya huku kumba kwavo zvokuti ndizvo zvave kuvararamisa. Asi vanoti bhizimisi radzikira nokuti vanhu vavaitengesera huku idzi kum hofisi emuguta vakamiswawo mabasa uye mahofisi makuru akavharwa kubva gore rakapera. Muzvare Dadiso Mudziwepasi vanoti vakadzingwa basa muchitoro chinotengesa zvokudya nembatya zvokuti vave kushanda mumba memumwe mudzimai ane tuckshop pamba pake, asi vanoti mari yavanotambira haisi kuvakwanira nemhuri yavo. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaPeter Gift Mutasa, vanoti panofanirwa kuitwa hurukuro nehurumende kuti pawanikwe nzira dzokubatsira vanhu vane mabhizimisi akaparara uye nekubatsira vanhu vakadzingwa mabasa nenyaya yeCovid 19 iyo yakavharisa nyika. VaMutasa vanoti huwori ndihwo hwasvitsa nyika pairi nhasi nokuti zviri pachena kuti mabhizimisi ari kubudirira ane chekuita nevanhu vari kutonga nyika ino. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kuziva huwandu hwevanhu vakarasikirwa nemabasa avo nekuda kweCovid-19. Gurukota revashandi nemagariro evanhu akanaka, Professor Paul Mavhima, vakaudza Studio7 nguva pfupi yapfuura kuti hurumende ine hurongwa hwekubatsira vanhu vakarasikirwa nemabasa avo munguva ino yeCovid-19. Asi masangano anomirira vagari pamwe neevashandi munyika anoti hapana ruyamuro rwuri kupihwa vanhu nehurumende kuti vabatsirikane munguva ino. No media source currently available

headline: Senegal yapinda muRound of 16
text: CHIKWATA cheSenegal ndicho chaita chekutanga chemuAfrica kuenda kuRound of 16 yemakwikwi eWorld Cup zvichitevera kukunda kwachaita Ecuador 2-1 manheru ano.   Kuhwina uku kwaona Senegal ichipedza iri pechipiri muGroup A iine zvibodzwa zvitanhatu kubva mumitambo mitatu yayatamba pari zvino kuQatar.   Mumutambo wawo wekutanga, yakakundwa 2-0 neNetherlands, ndokuzokunda Qatar 3-1 uye 2-1 nhasi apo yakunda Ecuador.   Chikwata chaAliou Cisse chichasangana neEngland muround of 16.

headline: VaMangudya Vanoti Dhora reZimbabwe Harisi Kudzoka
text: Gavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Doctor John Mangudya, vanoti havana hurongwa hwekudzora dhora remuZimbabwe kunyange hazvo vati vari kuparura mari yemabond notes anotangira pamadhora maviri kusvika pamadhora makumi maviri munguva pfupi inotevera. Gavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Doctor John Mangudya, vanoti havana hurongwa hwekudzora dhora remuZimbabwe kunyange hazvo vati vari kuparura mari yemabond notes anotangira pamadhora maviri kusvika pamadhora makumi maviri munguva pfupi inotevera. VaMangudya vanoti zvavari kuita chete kuyedza kupedza dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari munyika uye kukurudzira kuti vanhu vagadzire zvinhu zvekutengesa kunze kwenyika kuti Zimbabwe iwane mari yekunze. Asi vanoona nezvehupfumi mubato guru rinopikisa reMDC-T, VaTapiwa Mashakada, vati VaMangudya vari kubata vanhu kumeso uye zvavari kuita kudzora dhora remunyika sezvo hupfumi hwenyika hwaenda kumawere. VaMashakada vati zvoitwa munongedzo wenyika isiri kutongwa zvakanaka, huori uye kutadza kugadzirisa hupfumi. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nemutungamiri webato rePeople’s Democratic Party uye vaimbova gurukota rezvehupfumi, VaTendai Biti. VaBiti vati zviri kuitwa naVaMangudya zvichaendesa nyika kuna taisireva. Asi VaMangudya vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kuyedza kugadzirisa nyaya yehupfumi uho husina kumira zvakanaka. No media source currently available

headline: ZIMSTAT Inoti Kuverengwa kweVanhu Kwakaburitsa Pachena Kuti Madzimai Mashoma Ari Kushanda Mabasa Anovapa Mari Yakawanda
text: Sangano reZimstat rinoti ongororo yarakaita pakuverengwa kwakaitwa vanhu gore rino inoratidza kuti varume vakawanda ndivo vanoshanda zvichienzaniswa nevanhukadzi uyewo vanhu vakawanda munyika vabvazera vari kunzi varipamabasa. Vachitura ongororo yavo, mukuru weZimstats VaTaguma Mahonde vati ongororo yavo yakaratidza kuti munyika varume vakawanda ndivo vari pamabasa zvichienzaniswa nevanhukadzi. VaMahonde vati pavanhu vasina mabasa vaitarisa kune avo var ikutotsvaka mabasa vachiti vainge vasina kuisawo avo vainge vaneta nekutsvaka mabasa zvekuti vanga vambomira. VaAdolphus Chinomwe vanoshanda nesangano reInternational Labour Organization kana kuti ILO vati zvabudiswa neZimstats izvi zvinoratidza kuti madzimai akawanda ari mumabasa avasingapihwi mihoro akadai sekuchengeta pamba, kubika nekuchengeta varwere vachiti izvi zvine njodzi huru sezvo zvichizoita kuti madzimai arambe achitambura. VaChinomwe vatiwo kunyangwe hazvo huwandu hwevanhu vasiri pamabasa huchichi hushoma, chakakosha kuongorora ndechekuti vari pamabasa vacho vangani uye vari kuita mabasa anovapa mari yekuti vakwanise kuzviriritira. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaMasimba Manyanya vatiwo zvabuditswa neZimStats zvinoratidza kuti muono wehurumende weVision 2030 hwekuti hapana anofanirwa kusarira kumashure hausi mugwara. VaManyanya vati huwandu hwapiwa neZimstats hunoratidza kuti madzimai nevechiki vari kusarira kumashure. VaMahonde vatiwo ruzivo rwezvemabasa munyika hunobatsirawo hurumende muzvirongwa zvayo kunyanya kuziva kuti hurongwa hwebudiriro hwehurumende huri mugwara here. Gawaro rabuditswa neZimStats iri nderechisere uye riri rekupedzisira pamagwaro aitarisirwa kubuditswa nesangano iri pachitariswa zvakabuda mukuverengwa kwevanhu kunoitwa kamwechete pamakore gumi. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Voratidzira muHarare Vachirwisana neMapurisa
text: Zvinhu zvinonzi zvafuma zvakaita manyama amire nerongo muHarare nenzvimbo dzakapoteredza sezvo vemakombi nevanhuwo zvavo vari kurwisana nemapurisa. Zvinonzi pane bata murefu bata mupfupi munzvimbo dzakaita seHatfield, Epworth, Ruwa, Zimre Park, Mabvuku neTafara. Vanhu vakawanda vanonzi vatotadza kuenda kumabasa nekuda kwekurwisana uku. Mapurisa ari kukandira vanhu hutsi hunokatyidza uku vanhu vachikanda matombo. Vemakombi vakamboratidzirawo kwaMutare vachigunun'una nenyaya yehuori yavanoti iri kuitwa nemapurisa uye maroad blocks avanoti akawandisa mumigwagwa. Kurwisana uku kuri kuuya kunyangwe vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muZanu-PF vari gurukota rezvematunhu VaSaviour Kasukuwere vakayedza kutyisidzira vanhu vanoratidzira nemhirizhonga. Izvi zvakatevera kuratidzira kwakaitika kuBeitbridge nemusi weChishanu vanhu vachiramba kutambira chirongwa chehurumende chekurambidza kupinda munyika zvimwe zvinhu zvinotengwa nevanhu kuSouth Africa nemutengo wakaderera zvozotengeswa muZimbabwe. Vanhu makumi manomwe nevaviri vakasungwa vamwe gumi nevanomwe vakamiswa pamberi pedare nemusi weSvondo. Tichakupai zvizere munguva pfupi inotevera.

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kuwanisa Mishonga Inodzivirira Kudzoka kweGomarara repaZamu Kune Vanenge Vambobatwa neChirwere Ichi
text: Nyanzvi mune zvegomarara remazamu dzinoti zvakakosha kuti pawaniswe mishonga inodzivirira kuti vanenge vambobatwa nechirwere ichi vasazodzokororwe nacho, ukuwo hurumende ichi kurudzirwawo kuti itore matanho anoitwa kuti kurapwa kwemagomarara kuve nyore munyika. Izvi zvabuda neChishanu apo nyanzvi mune zvegomarara dzasangana pachipatara cheParirenyatwa icho change chichitambidzwa mapiritsi eTamoxifen akatsvagwa nesangano reCancerserve ayo anobatsira kuti vanenge vamboita gomarara remazamu vasazobatwe naro zvekare. Vachitaura mushure mechiitiko ichi, nyanzvi mune zvekurapwa kwechirwere chegomarara, uye vari ivo vakatanga sangano reCancerserve, Doctor Anna Mary Nyakabau, vati mushonga weTamoxifen wakakosha mukudzivirira kudzoka kwechirwere chegomarara rezamu. Asi vati pane vamwe vasingakwanisi kutenga mushonga uyu, uyo unonwiwa kwemakore ari pakati pemashanu negumi, nekudaro zvakakosha kuti vanoshaya cheuviri vabatsirwe mukuwana mishonga iyi. Vachitambira mushonga uyu pachiitiko ichi, mukuru weRadiotherapy pachipatara cheParirenyatwa Group of Hospitals, Doctor Nothando Mutizira, vati mushonga weTamoxifen unopiwa mushure mekunge munhu arapwa akapora. Dr Mutizira vati mishonga iyi yakakosha mukurwisa denda regomarara remazamu kuti risadzoke zvakare. Vachitaurawo pachiitiko chanhasi ichi, VaItai Mabasa Bopoto, avo vakatobviswawo rimwe zamu nekuda kwegomarara iri uye vatove pamishonga yeTamoxifen, vati zvakakosha kuti hurumende itore matanho anoita kuti chirwere chegomarara ichi chirapwewo pachena munyika pamwe nekuona kuti michina yekushandisa iripo. VaBopoto vati vakatozopona kubva kuchirwere ichi nekuda kwerubatsiro rwavakawana kumhuri neshamwari dzavo, vakati kurapwa kwechirwere ichi kunoda makunun’unu emadhora. Vati nguva zhinji michina mishoma iri kuzvipatara zvehurumende zvakadai seParirenyatwa inenge yakafa. Izvi zvinogarochemwa chemwa nazvo nevanhu vakawanda vanobatwa chirwere chegomarara. Vataura pachiitiko ichi vakamiririra munyori mukuru mubazi rezvehutano, Doctor Aspect Jacob Maunganidze vati hurumende inokoshesa zvakanyanya kudzivirirwa kwechirwere chegomarara remazamu uyewo vakati vari kushandawo nevamwe vanobatsira kuti mishonga yakaita seTamoxifen iwanikwe pachena munyika. VaMaunganidze vatiwo hurumende iri kugadzirisa dambudziko remichina. Mishonga yapiwa chipatara cheParirenyatwa inonzi ichabatsira vanhu mazana matatu nemakumi masere (380), avo vasingakwanisi kutenga mishonga iyi kwegore rese. Gomarara rezamu rinobata zvese vanhukadzi nevanhurume asi kumadzimai rinonzi ndiyo mhando yegomarara inotevera gomarara rechibereko mukuuraya madzimai zvakanyanya munyika. Mwedzi uno waGumiguru mwedzi wekuyeuchidzana pamusoro pechirwere chegomarara repamazamu, kana kuti breast Cancer Awareness Month. Vanhurume munyika vanonzi vari kukurudzirwawo zvakanyanya kuti vaende kunoongororwa kana vaine gomarara repamazamu sezvinota vanhukadzi senzira yekuti dzivirira kana kukasika kurapwa kwechirwere ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Crisis in Zimbabwe Yonetseka neKutyorwa kweKodzero dzeVanhu muNyika
text: Sangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition nemusi weMuvhuro rakaita musangano kuJohannesburg, South Africa vachizeya mamiriro akaita zvinhu muZimbabwe zvikuru nyaya yekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu. Masangano akapinda mumusangano uyu anosanganisa Tajamuka, National Vendors Union Zimbabwe, ZCTU, Platform for Youth Development nemamwe. Mukuru weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition Amai Pamela Kadau vakaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kunetsekana zvikuru nenyaya yekurohwa kwevanhu munyika nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori uye mapurisa. Amai Kadau vati zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kuSouth Africa zvinotiwo zviri kuda kupihwa mukana wekuvhota. Asi mukuru weZimbabwe Electotal Commission Amai Rita Makarau vakaudza vatori venhau mazuva mashoka apfura kuti mutemo uripo parizvino haupe vanhu vari kunze kwenyika mukana wekuvhota. Vakati izvi zvinokwanisika chete kana bumbiro remutemo ravandudzwa. No media source currently available

headline: Torres hutu kuJapan
text: weAtletico Madrid neLiverpool — Fernando Torres — obuda pachena kuti ari kuenda kuJapan kunotambira Sagan Tosu mwaka unotevera.   Chizvarwa chekuSpain ichi change chichidiwa nezvikwata zvekuUnited States neAustralia, asi akataura nevatori venhau kuti ari kuenda kuAsia.   Torres akazivisa kuti ange achishevedzwa nezvikwata zvakawanda asi akafunga kutevera shamwari yake, Andres Iniesta, kuJapan.   “Ndange ndichidiwa nezvikwata zvekuFrance, Germany nezvimwe zviri muSpain,” anodaro.   “Asi ndange ndisingade kutambira chimwe chikwata chemuEurope ini nekuti ndakawana zvose zvandaida nechikwata changu Atletico.   “Ndichange ndine shamwari yangu futi kuno Andres. Saka tiri kufara tose nemukana uyu wauya kwatiri.”   Iniesta naLukas Podolski vese vanotambira muVissel Kobe uye Sagan Tosu ichange ichisangana navo mumutambo weJ1 League mwaka unotevera.   Torres akabva kuchikwata chake chaakakurira cheAtletico Madrid uko akatamba mitambo 45 ndokuhwina mukombe weEuropa League.   Mutambi uyu akambotambira Liverpool uye ari kuenda kuchikwata icho chakapedza mwaka wadarika chakagara pechisere palog.   “Ndiri kutotanga svondo rinotevera, ndinovimba kuti ndichatanga zvakanaka nechikwata changu chitsva uye ndigotamba mitambo yakawanda nekunwisa,” anodaro Torres.   “Ndinovimba kutanga kutamba musi wa21. Ndinovimba ndichave kuno kwemakore akawanda uye zvichange zvichienderana nekuti ndiri kutamba sei.” — SportsMail Football

headline: Muzinda weZimbabwe kuBotswana Woshanda Nguva Pfupi neNyaya yeCovid-19
text: Muzinda weZimbabwe uri muBotswana wave kuvandudza mashandiro nekuda kwekupararira zvakanyanya kwechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika iyi paine kurudziro yekuti vanhu vashandisewo madandemutande nembozhanhare. Vanoona nezve kuburitswa kwemashoko pamuzinda weZimbabwe muBotswana, VaFrancis Chimina vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti iri nderimwe danho rekuderedza mazuva ekushanda kubva pamashanu kusvika pamana pavhiki nechinangwa chekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Pataenda pamhepo, VaChimhina vange vasati vakwanisa kupa Studio 7 huwandu hwezvizvazvarwa zveZimbabwe zvafa nechirwere ichi muBotswana . Asi muchiziviso chakaburitswa nemuzinda uyu, vanoda rubatsiro rwekuti vakwanise kutakura mufi kubva kuBotswana kuenda kuZimbabwe vanofanira kuita zvekutumira mapepa anodikwana panharembozha vachishandisa WhatsApp panhamba dzinoti 2677 196 7240 ndinodzokorora zvakare nhamba idzi 267 7 196 72470. Kana munhu achida kuendesa mutumbi kuZimbabwe panodiwa magwaro kana kuti copy anoti rerufu, death certificate, gwaro rekufambisa, passport, tsamba yekuratidza kuti mugtumbi hauna chirwere chinogona kutapurirwa vapenyu, tsamba yekuti mutumbi wachengetedzwa kuti usaore uye kune vanenge vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19, vanofanira kuiswa mubhokisi risingavhurike kana kuti zinc-hermatically filled coffin. Izvi zvinodiwa nenyika yeBotswana zvekare. Asi pane vanoda kuradzika hurumende muBotswana panodiwa gwaro rerufu, gwaro rekufambisa kana chitupa uye gwaro rekufambisa rehama yepedyo. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinorarama nechamuka inyama muguta reGaborone, VaEken Tendai Chidarikire vaudza Studio7 kuti hurongwa uhu huri kuomesera zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinogara munyika iyi. Vanotiwo dai muzinda weZimbabwe watsvaga dzimwe nzira dzekubatsira nadzo vanhu nokuti vakasadaro ruzhinji rwuchatsvaga nzira dzekuendesa Asi chimwewo chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinogara muguta reGaborone VaHoward Munemo vanoti danho ratorwa nemuzinda weZimbabwe muBotswana idanho rakanaka kwazvo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano hweruzhinji uye vari mukoti pachipatara chikuru cheNyangabgwe Referral Hospital muguta reFrancistown, Muzvare Jestina Mayambutse vanoti vanhu vanofanira kuziva kuti hutachiona hunokonzera COVID-19 hunogona kutapuriranwa nekugamuchidzana mapepa chaiwo. Botswana ine vanhu zviuru zana nematanhatu zvine mazana matanhatu ne makumi mapfumbabwe (106, 690) vakabatwa nechirwere icho chauraya vanhu chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mashanu nemakumi matanhatu nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 1, 569. Mizinda yenyika dzakawanda pasi rose iri kuderdza huwandu hwevashandi mukuyedza kumisa kupararira kwechirwere ichi. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Ndinoda kutambira maGems’
text: MUTAMBI wenetball ari kusimukira wepachikoro cheMpopoma High School, kuBulawayo anoti shuviro yake kuzotambira chikwata chenyika chemaGems mune neramangwana.   Zvichitevera kudadisa kwakaita chikwata chemaGems kumakwishu eVitality World Cup ayo akaitirwa kuLiverpool, kuEngland nguva pfupi yadarika, mutambo uyu wave kuteverwa nevanhu vakawanda avo vanosanganisira Nicole Ayanda Muzanenhamo (17).   Nguva pfupi yadarika, Muzanenhamo akavhoterwa kuve Player of the Tournament kumakwikwi eStella Netball Tournament ayo akaitirwa kuGweru.     Mutambo uyu wakazohwinwa nePamushana High School iyo yakakunda Chibi mufainari.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Muzanenhamo anoti maGems akapa shungu kuvatambi venetball vari kusimukira.   “MaGems akatifadza nyika yose uye isu sevasikana vechidiki vari kusimukira mumutambo uyu zvinotituma kuti tishande nesimba sezvo tichiona kuti mberi uko kune chiedza chakanaka.   “Ini remangwana rangu ndinoda kuzotambira maGems uye ndizvo ndiri kutoshanda ndakatarisa nekuti zvinouya nemikana yakawanda yakasiyana,” anodaro Muzanenhamo.   Kasikana aka kanoti kanoyemura zvikuru mutambi wemaGems – Felistus Kwanga – uyo akakurira kuBulawayo uye aive muchikwata chemaGems chakaenda kuLiverpool.   “Ndinotevera chaizvo Felistus Kwanga, ndinomutora sasisi vangu saka ndinoda kusvika paasvika mumutambo uyu.   “Kwanga akapfuura nemumitambo yakasiyana kusanganisira Stella Tea U17 Tournament, iniwo ndikaitambawo saka ndiri kuona kuti ndiri kufamba mugwara chairo,” anodaro Muzanenhamo.   Parizvino Muzanenhamo ari kutambira zvikwata zvakasiyana zvenetball kuBulawayo.

headline: Zvekumhanya zvakabva kuna tezvara: Muzhingi
text: SHASHA yemujaho wemarathon, Stephen Muzhingi, anoti akatanga zvekumhanya mushure mekunge aona tezvara vake, baba vakabereka mudzimai wake, vachimhanya uye nehupenyu hwavairarama uho hwainge hwakanaka zvikuru.   Muzhingi — uyo akazvarwa mugore ra1980 kwaGutu — anoti tezvara vake, Esau Magwaza, vaive shasha yemumujaho wemarathon vachikwikwidza nekuhwinha mijaho yakasiyana uye vachirarama hupenyu hunoyemurika izvo zvakamukwezva mwoyo.   Tezvara vake ndivo vakave murairidzi wake wekutanga avo vaida chaizvo kumuona achibudirira mumutambo uyu.   Asi, vakazoshaika Muzhingi achangotanga zvekukwikwidza mumarathon.   “Ndaigaroona tezvara vangu yaive shasha panyaya dzemarathon uye vaive nemukurumbira zvekuti ini ndivo vandaitarisira kwavari nevamwe vanosanganisira anaAbel Chimukoko.   “Ndaingonzwa kuti ukaita zvekumhanya unogona kurarama hupenyu hwakanaka uye ndakazvionera ndega nekuti ndichitarisa Magwaza uye nanaChimukoko vairarama hupenyu hwakanaka,  vachifamba nemota kuburikidza nemarathon. Saka ini ndikati ndizvo ndinoda kuitawo.   “Handina kuzotarira shure, asi tezvara vangu vakazoshaika havo vasina kuzonyatsoona kubudirira kwangu kwandakazoita,” anodaro Muzhingi.   Muzhingi akakwikwidza mijaho yakasiyana muno nekunze kwenyika, asi zita rake rakazonyatsoita mukurumbira apo akahwina mujaho weComrades Marathon katatu kakatevedzana kuSouth Africa.   Haana kugumira ipapo sezvo akaenderera mberi ndokunohwina mimwe mijaho inosanganisira Two Oceans Marathon iyo yaakahwina kaviri kuSouth Africa zvekare.   Panguva yaaipisa chaizvo, shasha iyi yakabuda yega pachena rimwe gore kuti kune zvizvarwa zvekuSouth Africa zvakauya kwaari zvikamuti arambe nyika yake azviti chizvarwa cheSouth African kuitira kuti nyika iyi ipembedzwe izvo akaramba sezvo aida kusimudza mureza weZimbabwe.   Pakumhanya kwese kwaakaita muno nekunze kwenyika, Muzhingi anoti mijaho yeComrades Marathon uye neTwo Oceans Marathon icharamba iri mundangariro dzake pamwechete newekutanga waakaenda kunokwikwidza kuNew York, kuAmerica.   “Mijaho mitatu iyi ichagara iri mundangariro dzangu kusvika muguva nekuti ndakadadisa ndikasimudza mureza wenyika yangu, zvinhu zvinofadza chose,” anodaro.   Kuhwina kwaakaita mijaho yakasiyana muno uye nekunze, Muzhingi anoti akashandisa mari yake yaaihwina zvine musoro izvo zvakamuona achitenga dzimba nhatu – mbiri dziri muHarare uye neimwechete iri kuChitungwiza.   Anoti vanhu vanofanirwa kurongera remangwana ravo vachishandisa mari yavanenge vawana vachiita zvisvinu pane kunakidzwa nekudya mari vasingagadzire remangwana revana vavo.   “Gadzirai remangwana renyu uye nerevana, ini mari yese yandaihwina ndaitenga dzimba iye zvino ndine dzimba nhatu. Ndakange ndisingade kuti mune remangwana rangu vana vozobvunza kuti baba zvamaive nemukurumbira chii chamakaita, tisisina pekugara, izvo ndakaramba,” anodaro.   Muzhingi anoti gore ra2019 harina kumufambira zvakanaka sezvo akatadza kukwikwidza kumijaho yakasiyana apo ainge akakuvara.   Asi iye zvino anoti ari kushanda nesimba kuti gore rino agokwikwidza kumijaho mikuru inosanganisira yeOld Mutual munaKukadzi kozoti Comrades Marathon neTwo Oceans Marathon.   Shasha iyi yakakomborerwa nevanakomana vatatu uye mukuru wacho — Methane (10) — ari kutevera matsimba ababa vake achiita zvemujaho wekumhanya kozoti mumwe wacho ari kuita zvemutambo wekarate.

headline: Highlanders Yopemberera Kusvitsa Makore Makumi Mapfumbamwe
text: Pamusoro pezvo kuchave nemabiko ekupembera kusvitsa makore makumi mapfumbamwe kwechikwata cheHighlanders uko mukuru wacho, VaNadumiso Gumede, vakavimbisa mumimhanzi pamwe nenhabvu zvepamusoro soro muBarbourfields Stadium neMugovera. Vatsigiri venhabvu vatarisana nemabiko anofadza mukupera kwesvondo. Kubva kumitambo yemuAfrica kusvika kumakwikwi eZimbabwe National Army Charity Challenge, kuchave nemachikichori enhabvu ayo anga achingotaurwa nezvawo svondo rese. Pamusoro pezvo kuchave nemabiko ekupembera kusvitsa makore makumi mapfumbamwe kwechikwata cheHighlanders uko mukuru wacho, VaNadumiso Gumede, vakavimbisa mumimhanzi pamwe nenhabvu zvepamusoro soro muBarbourfields Stadium neMugovera. No media source currently available Asi mutambo uri pamuromo pevazhinji ndeuyo uri kuSouth Africa apo chikwata cheChicken Inn chiri kutarisira kudimbura muswe chikwata chemaBrazilains icho chiri kuparadza zvimwe zvikwata. Mutambi ane mukurmbira muZimbabwe, asi achitambira Memelodi Sundowns, Khama Billiart, achenge ari mumutambo uyu kunyange hazvo asina kupinda mune wekutanga nekukuvara. Chicken Inn yakakuanda 1-0 mumutambo iwoyu asi muteveri wenhabvu, VaLesvison Ndudzi, vanoti ikozvino maGamecocks anofanira kungwarira Billiart Vachitarisa matambiro akaita maGamecocks mumutambo wekutanga, muongorori wezvemitambo ane mukurumbira, VaAndrew Rwodzi, vanoti havasi kunyanyotyira Chicken Inn. Vatsigiri vechikwata cheHighlanders vanogara muSouth Africa vanosvika zviuru zviviri vavimbisa kuti vachange vari munhandare vachikuzirira Chicken Inn. Chimwe chikwata chemuZimbabwe cheHarare City chiri kuMadagascar uko chiri kusangana neAS Adema kwete muCaf Champions League, asi muCaf Confederation Cup. Harare City iri kutingamira 3-2 kubva mumutambo wekutanga zvekuti murairidzi wechikwata ichi, Taurai Mangwiro, anoti haasi kuona vachinetseka kukunda mumutambo wechipiri uyu. Mutambo wekugumisira uchange uri muRufaro Stadium umo Dynamos iri kusangana neZPC Kariba mumutambo wekota fainari yeZimbabwe National Army Charity Challenge. Kunyange hazvo mune manyukunyuku muchikwata ichi, chikwata ichi change chichingotamba mumutambo wehushamwari zvekuti uyu ndiwo mutambo ucharatudza kusimba kwacho. Mutambo uyu wauya mumusha macho musina kumira zvakanaka mushure mekunge murairdzi wacho, Jorge Silva wekuBrazil, nezuro akarova mutori wemifananidzo yepaterevhizheni yeZimbabwe Braodcasting Corporation. Svondo rapera, Silva zvekare akakandirana makobvu nematete nemurairdzi wevabati vepagedhe wechikwata ichi, Gif Muzadzi, izvo zvave kuitisa mibvunzo mumabatiro ebasa rake. Asi vatsigiri venhabvu vari kutarisira kuti chikwata cheChicken Inn pamwe necheHarare City zvichavasiya vachipemberera pachapera mitambo yavo.

headline: VaMangudya Votarisirwa Kuburitsa Hurongwa hweMari
text: Gavhuna veReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, VaJohn Panonetsa Mangudya, vachaburitsa gwaro remashandiro avanotarisira kuita nyaya dzemari munyika, kana kuti Monetary Policy Statement. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti gwaro raVaMangudya rinofanirwa kuratidza gwara rekutevera mari yeZimbabwe isati yadzoswa kuti itsive yekunze kwenyika. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti nguva yekudzora dhora reZimbabwe haisati yasvika. Imwe yenyanzvi mune zvehupfumi nezvemari uye vachishanda nePercycon Global Fund Managers, VaPersistance Gwanyanya, vanoti nguva yekuita dhora remuZimbabwe haisati yasvika. VaGwanyanya vanoti Zimbabwe inofanira kushandisa mari yekunze pari zvino uye hurumende inofanirwa kusapindira mubasa re Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe sezvo zvematongerwo enyika zvisingagone kutungamira mashandiro anoita mabhanga. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi, VaRejoice Ngwenya, vanoti havasi kufara nemashandiro ari kuitwa nemabhanga emunyika, vachiti mabhanga haasi kupihwa mukana wekuita mabasa awo akasununguka. No media source currently available

headline: IMF Yoshushikana neDambudziko reZimbabwe
text: Chikwata chesangano reInternational Monetary Fund, IMF, icho chiri munyika kuzoongorora mashandiro echirongwa chekugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika chinoti chinobvumirana nehurumende kuti hupfumi hweZimbabwe haugoni kusimukira pasina rubatsiro rwemari kubva kumasangana akaita neIMF, World Bank nemamwe. No media source currently available Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita nenhengo dzedare reparemende dziri mukomiti inoona zvemari, mukuru wechikwata ichi, VaDomenico Fanizza, vati Zimbabwe inofanira kugadzirisa hukama hwayo nemasangano aya nedzimwe nyika kuitira kuti hupfumi hwayo hufambire mberi. Vati zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyika vachiti makore akawanda nyika isina rubatsiro kubva kunze anoita kuti zvinhu zviome munyika. Vati nekuda kwaizvozvo, zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe iite zvese zvakabvumiranwa pachirongwa cheStaff Monitored Program sezvo chiri icho chinhanho chekutanga mukugadzirisa hukama hwayo nemabhanga ekunze pamwe nenyika dzinopa rubatsiro. Chirongwa ichi chinosungira kuti Zimbabwe ibate mari zvakajeka, ishandure mashandiro emabhanga pamwe nebanga guru renyika. Zimbabwe inosungirwawo kujekesa mutemo wekupa masimba ehupfumi kuvatema. Vati kunyange hazvo izvi zvakaoma kuita, zvinofanirwa kuitwa kana nyika ichida kugadzirisa hukama hwayo nedzimwe nyika nemasangano akaita seIMF. Asi VaFanizza vati zvinofadza kuti Zimbabwe inenge iri kutora gwara rakanaka pachirongwa ichi sezvo pane zveshanduka pamafambisirwo ari kuitwa hupfumi munyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti kunyange hazvo pane zvashanduka hurumende ichiri kusangana nematambudziko akawanda ayo anogona kuvhiringa hurumende nekuitadzisa kuzadzikisa chirongwa cheStaff Monitored Program. Imwe yenyanzvi idzi, VaNyasha Muchichwa, vanoti Zimbabwe inofanirwa kugadzirisa dambudziko rehomwe yehurumende sezvo iine vashandi vehurumende vakawandisa, kusashandiswa zvakanaka kwemari yehurumende pamwe nekusajeka kwemutemo wekupa masimba ehupfumi kuvatema. VaMuchiwa vanoti izvi ndezvimwe zvezvinhu zvinogona kuvhiringa chirongwa ichi. Pabvunzwa VaFanizza kuti sei IMF isiri kubatsira Zimbabwe sezvairi kuita Greece iyo iri kutatarikawo munyaya dzehupfumi, VaFanizza vati vanobatsira nyika dzine zvikwereti, uye vanokwanisa kubatsira Zimbabwe chete kana pachinge pave newirirano pakuti ichabhadhara chikwereti chayo sei. IMF iri kubatsira Zimbabwe kugadzirisa hupfumi hwayo pamwe nezvikwereti zvayo kuitira kuti ikwanise kudyidzana nedzimwe nyika. VaFanizza vati izvi zvichaitika chete kana chirongwa cheStaff Monitored Program chabudirira muZimbabwe. Chikwereti cheZimbabwe chemukati menyika nekunze chave kudarika mabhiriyoni gumi emadhora.

headline: VaChamisa Vovimbisa Huchi neMukaka Kana Vakasarudzwa seMutungamiri weNyika
text: Mutungamiri we MDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, vavimbisa vanhu veku Hwedza kuMashonaland East kuti kana vakasarudzwa semutungamiri wenyika, vachasimudzira dunhu reHwedza kuitira kuti vagari vemudunhu iri vasatambudzike sezvavari kuita pari zvino. Vachitaura kuvanhu vakawanda vaungana kumaruwa ekuHwedza, VaChamisa vatora mukana uyu kutenda mutungamiri wenyika, Va Emmerson Mnangagwa, pamwe nemutevedzeri wavo, Va Constantino Chiwenga, nebasa guru ravakaita mukurwira rusununguko rwenyika. Asi VaChamisa vaudza vaviri ava kuti vachisiira matomu kune vechidiki vanokwanisa kugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika. VaChamisa vaudzawo vagari vekuHwedza kuti hurumende yavo ichagadzirisa nyaya dzemari kuitira kuti munyika musashandiswe ma bond notes. VaChamisa, avo vanogara vakataura nyaya yemigwagwa vachiti ichagadzirwa kuita kunge spaghetti, vatiwo vachasimbaradza nyaya dzekurima kumaruwa kuitira kuti vanhu vave nehupenyu hwakanaka. Vati hurumende yavo ichawanisa varimi vese matarakita kuitira kuti vasashandise mombe pakurima. VaChamisa, avo vari pamakakatanwa nemutungamiri9 weimwe MDC-T, Muzvare Thokozani Khupe, panyaya yekuti ndiyani chaiye mutungamiri weMDC-T zvichitevera kushaya kwevaimbove mutungamiri weMDC, Va Morgan Tsvangirai muna Kukadzi gore rino, vatora mukana wemusangano wekuHwedza uyu kuudza madzimai kuti hurumende yavo ichasimudzira hupenyu hwevanhukadzi sezvo vari musimboti wenyika. VaChamisa vapedza kutaura vachivimbisa vanhu vekuHwedza kuti hurumende yavo ichagadzirisa zvipatara nemakiriniki kuitira kuti vanhu varapwe nyore. Dunhu reMashonaland East rinoziivakanwa zvikuru nekuvhotera Zanu PF munguva dzesarudzo. Musarudzo yemutungamiri yakaitwa muna 2013, VaRobert Mugabe veZanu PF vakawana mavhoti 320,719, ukuwo VaMorgan Tsvangirai veMDC vakawana mavhoti 90,165. Nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika dzinoti MDC Alliance inofanirwa kushanda zvakasimba kuti ikunde VaMnangagwa veZanu PF musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vana Vofa neChirwere cheCovid-19
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weChishanu kuti vanhu vana vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvasiya vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera vave chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mana ane makumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu kana kuti 1,496. Vanhu makumi mana nevatanhatu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi vave zviuru makumi matatu nematanhatu zvine mazana mana nemakumi maviri nevatatu kana kuti 36,424. Vanhu makumi maviri nevana kana kuti 24 vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi zvichireva kuti vapora kubva zvatanga chirwere ichi kupararira vave zviuru makumi matatu nematatu zvine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu kana kuti 33, 996. Vanhu vachiri kurwara mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matatu nemumwe kana kuti 931. Zvichakadaro, huwandu hwevashandi vemuzvipatara nevamwe vanoita mabasa anopa kuti vasangane neveruzhinji vabayiwa nhomba yeSinopharm yakapihwa Zimbabwe neChina vasvika zviuru makumi matatatu nezvitanhatu zvine mazana maviri nemakumi masere nevatatu kana kuti 36, 283. Kunyangwe hazvo huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa nekubatwa nechirwere ichi huri kuramba huchidzikira munyika nepasi rose, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Edgar Munatsi vanoti vanhu havafanire kurivara. African Union Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mana kana kuti 4 million vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vadarika zana nemanomwe rezvuiru kana kuti 107, 000. Vapora muAfrica vadarika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 3, 5 million. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika zana remamiriyoni rine gumi nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 119 million. Pasi Rose Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vanodarika zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nevaviri kana kuti kuti 532, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 29 million. Pasi rose, vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 2,6 million. Asi vapora pasi rose vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu nemanomwe zvine zviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 67,5 million. No media source currently available

headline: Muzvikoro mitambo yaondongwa
text: SANGANO reNational Association of School Heads (NASH) rinoti vana vanotamba mitambo yakasiyana muzvikoro vakanganiswa zvikuru kusimukira kwezvipo zvavo kubvira pakanyuka chirwere cheCovid-19 kekutanga munyika muno gore rapera sezvo mitambo iyi isiri kuitwa.   Mutungamiri weNASH – Arthur Maphosa – anoti mitambo yemuzvikoro inorongwa nesangano ravo kwemakore akawanda inobatsira kusimudzira vana munyaya dzemitambo izvo zviri kuona vamwe vachinokwikwidza kunze kwenyika kumitambo yakaita seConfederation of Schools Sports Association of Sourthen Africa (COSSASA).   Maphosa anoti kuvepo kweCovid-19 kwaita kuti vechidiki varasikirwe nemitambo iyi. “Zvinorwadza kuti remangwana revana vedu muzvikoro riri kutokanganiswa, makore maviri aya hatina mitambo yatambwa muzvikoro, vana vazhinji vatorasikirwa ipapo.   “Tiri kuchema nguva dzose kuti dai denda iri rachipera uye dai tapihwa mikana yekuti tironge mitambo yevana nekuti tinofanira kuvarongera remangwana ravo nekuti vakaregererwa rinoenda mudondo,” anodaro Maphosa.   Makore ose, NASH inoronga mitambo mikuru inosanganisira Copa Coca Cola yenhabvu kuchiti Stella Netball under 17.   Mitambo miviri iyi inozivikanwa ichibika shasha dzakawanda dzakaita mukurumbira pasi rose mumutambo wenhabvu nenetball.   Vatambi venhabvu vane mukurumbira vakaita saPeter Ndlovu, Knowledge Musona naKhama Billiat vakadarika nemumutambo weCopa Coca Cola.   Kozoti kunetball, vatambi vechikwata chenyika cheGems vanosanganisira Sharon Bwanali naFelistas Kwangwa vakapfuura nemuchirongwa cheStella Under 17 netball tournament.   “Chikwata chenyika chemaGems chiye chakaenda kuLiverpool kuWorld Cup mugore ra2019, vasikana vazhinji vaive muchikwata ichi vakapfura nemumaoko edu. Zvakare tinofara tichiona kuti vave kutorarama nemutambo uyu uye vachitambira zvikwata zvikuru zvenetball, zvimwe chetezvo kunhabvu. Saka mitambo iyi yakakosha, tikagarisa isingatambwe vana vakawanda vanorasikirwa nemikana mizhinji,” anodaro Maphosa.

headline: Vakawanda Vanoti Hapana Chekupemberea Kuzvitonga Ivo Vasina Chikafu
text: Apo nyika iri kucherechedza neMugovera kusvitsa makore makumi matatu nemashanu yawana kuzvitonga, nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi pamwe neveruzhinji vanoti hapana chekupemberera sezvo vanhu vazhinj vari kutambura uye hupfumi hwenyika hwadzikira zvakanyanya kudarika zvahwaive huri muna 1980. No media source currently available Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Instititute of Zimbabwe, VaProsper Chitambara, vanoti Zimbabwe yakawana zvayo kuzvitonga munyaya dzematongerwo enyika asi pane kutambura kukuru munyika sezvo hupfumi hwenyika hwadzikira uye kutambura kwanyanya zvikuru munyika. Vanoti semuenzaniso hupfumi hwenyika hwange hwakasimba muna 1980 pane zvahwave nhasi. VaChitambara vanoti kudzikira kwehupfumi kwakakonzerwa nemitemo yehurumende pamwe nemamwe matanho ayakatora akaita sekubhadhara vaimbove varwiri verusununguko izvo zvange zvisina kurongwa mubhajeti remuna 1997, kupindira muhondo yemuDemocratic Republic of Congo, pamwe nezvirongwa zvehupfumi zvakaita seEconomic Structural Adjustment Program icho chakaitwa muna1991 kusvika muna 1995. VaChitambara vanoti zvese izvi nezvimwe zvirongwa zvehurumende zvakaita sekutorwa kweminda zvakasiya hupfumi hwenyika huchidonha izvo zvakakonzera kuvhara kwemakambani, nekurasikirwa kwebasa kwevanhu vakawanda. Vanoti kunyange vashandi vashomanana vasara vari kuwana mihoro iri pasi peyaiwanikwa muna1979 Zimbabwe isati yawana kuzvitonga. Mumwe mutapi wenhau anonyora nhau dzemabhizimisi akazvimirira, Tawanda Karombo, anoti hapana chekupemberera nekuti vanhu vave kutotambura kudarika zvavaive pasati pave nkuzvitonga kwevanhu vatema. Imwewo nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi, VaJames Johwa, vanotiwo hapana chekupemberera sezvo zvinhu zviri kuramba zvichishata munyika. Vanotiwo zviri pachena kuti kubvira muna 1980, kusvika pari zvino, hurumende iri kukoshesa zvematongerwo enyika isingasimudzire mabasa ehupfumi munyika. Vechidiki vakawanda vanoti vari kushishikana chose kuti havasi kuona rubatsiro rwerusununguko sezvo vari kushaya mabasa kunyange hazvo vakaenda kuchikoro. Mumwe wevechidiki ava ndiVaDenford Ngadziore, munyori wevechidiki mudunhu reHarare mubato reMDC inotungamiririrwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai. Vanoti vanoda chose kushanda vachisimudzira nyika asi vari kushaya mukana nekuti hakuna mabasa. Muzvare Natalie Nyakanyanga, avo vanogara mumusha Braeside muHarare, vanotiwo havana chikonzero chekupemembera sezvo vasina mabasa uye vari kutonetseka nehupenyu. Nyanzvi dzinoti kunyange hazvo hurumende yakaedza napose painoga napo kugadzirisa zvinhu munyaya dzedzidzo nehutano mumakore gumi ekutanga nyika yawana kuzvitonga, haina zvayakaita kugadzirisa nyaya dzehupfumi. Maindasitiri, mabhanga, nemakambani ari kuvhara zvekutoti vanhu vazhinji munyika vave kuzvishandira. Sangano revashandi, reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, rinoti vanhu vasina mabasa vasvika pazvikamu zvinodarika makumi masere kubva muzana. Mamwe makambani mahombe aive nezviuru nezviuru zvevashandi anosanganisira Shabanie and Mashaba Mines, Ziscosteel, Mhangura Mines nemamwe akawanda. Zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyika zvekuti nyika yakatomira kushandisa dhora remuno muna 2009 mushure mekunge rarambwa neveruzhinji nekuda kwekushaya simba zvakanyanyisa. VaJohwa vanoti chinodiwa kugadzirisa hupfumi kuita sarudzo dzakajeka, posarudzwa hurumende inoisa zvirongwa zvekukwezva vemabhizimisi vekunze kuti vazodyara mari dzavo munyika. Zimbabwe inocherechedza neMugovera makore makumi matatu nemashanu yawana kuzvitonga. Asi veruzhinji vanoti zvinhu zviri kunetsa munyika zvekuti kana hurumende chaiyo iri kunetseka kubhadhara vashandi vayo uye yakatozivisa kuti haichakwanisa kubhadhara mari dzemabhonasi kutanga gore rino.

headline: Madzimai ekuHwande Oratidzira muHarare Achinyunyuta kuHurumende
text: Madzimai evashandi vekuHwange Colliery vari kuronga kuratidzira neChina muHarare vachinyunyuta nekusapindira kwehurumende mukugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nevashandi vepakambani inoshandira varume vavo. Madzimai ekuHwange ave nemazuva anodarika zana achiratidzira senzira yekutsutsuma kusabhadharwa kwevarume vavo kwemakore mashanu apfuura. Kuratidzira uku kuchange kuchitsigirwa nesangano reZimbabwe Coalition on Debt and Development. Muzvare Janet Zhou, avo vanoshanda nesangano reZimbabwe Coalition on Debt and Development, vati vacharatidzira serutsigiro kumadzimai ekuHwange, uye kuti hurumende ione kuti pane dambudziko rinoda kugadzirwa. Imwe nhengo yekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvezvicherwa, Amai Fanny Chirisa, vatiwo zvinosuwisa kuti hurumende haisi kubuda pachena panyaya yekusabhadharwa kwevashandi vepakambani iyi, kunyange hazvo hurumende ine zvikamu zvakawanda zvehupfumi mukambani iyi. Sachigaro wekomiti inoona nezvemadzimai, Amai Priscilla Misihairambwi Mushonga, vanotiwo semadzimai ari mudare reparamende vanofanirwa kunyara nekuregerera madzimai aya achiratidzira kwenguva ndefu vasina kupindira munyaya iyi. Kambani yeHwange Colliery inonzi ine mari dzeveshandi dzinopfuura mamiriyoni makumi manomwe emadhora. Vachibvunzwa mudare reparamende nezvemadzimai ari kuratidzira aya kuHwange Colliery, gurukota rezvevashandi, Amai Petronella Kagonye, vati madzimai aya ari kushandiswa nevanhu vari mune zvematongerwo enyika. Amai Kagonye vati sehurumende vakagadzirisa nyaya dzezvevashandi. No media source currently available

headline: VanaMukoti muZvipatara zveKanzuru Vobatana naVanaChiremba Kuramwa Mabasa
text: Zvinhu munyika munyaya dzezvehutano zvaramba zvakaita manyama amire nerongo sezvo vanamukoti muzvipatara zvekanzuru vatanga kuramwa mabasa ukuwo hurumende iri kutatarika kugadzirisa dambudziko ravanachiremba muzvipatara zvehurumende vapedza mwedzi miviri vachiratidzira. Studio 7 yashanyira chipatara cheParirenyatwa nhasi ikaona kuine varwere vashoma shoma. Vakuru pachipatara ichi vange vachienderera mberi nekutonga vanachiremba vari kuramwa mabasa. Matare aya akatanga nemusi weChishanu uye vamwe vanachiremba vachatongwa nemusi weChitatu. Sachigaro weHealth Service Board Dr Paulinus Sikosana vaudza Studio 7 kuti nemusi weChishanu vanachiremba havana kuuya kumatare avainge vadanwa kuti vapindure kuti sei vari kuramba kudzoka kubasa sezvakaturwa nedare reLabour Court. Pavabvunzwa neStudio 7 kuti pane vati vadzingwa here, VaSikosana vati kupindura mubvunzo uyu kungava kufukura hapwa. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutevedzeri wemutungamiriri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Doctor Masimba Dean Ndoro vaudza Studio 7 mushure memusangano wavaita nenhengo dzavo nhasi kuti dai hurumende yatsvaga nzira dzekuita hurukuro navo kwete kuramba vachitora nzira dzisingagadzirisi dambudziko riripo. Asi Doctor Sikosana vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakagadzirira kuita hurukuro navanachiremba ava chero nguva. Vati svondo rapera vakatomboita hurukuro asi zvakakona n’anga murapwa achida. Zvichakadaro, vanamukoti muzvipatara zvekanzuru vatangawo kuramwa mabasa. Mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare VaMichael Chideme vatenda kuti vanamukoti vatanga kuramwa mabasa uye vati vari kuyedza kutaurirana navo. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutungamiri wesangano revashandi vekanzuru reHarare Municipality Workers Union VaCosmas Bungu sezvo vanzi vange vabuda muhofisi vachisiya nharembozha yavo. Makirinika akawanda muguta reHarare ndeekanzuru uye kuramwa mabasa kwavanamukoti kuchapa kuti zvinhu zvitonyanye kuipa muguta rinomboita zvirwere zvakaita setyphoid necholera uye ikozvino mwaka wekunaya. Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano uye vari nhengo yeMDC Doctor Henry Madzorera vashora hurumende nekupedza mwedzi miviri isina kugadzirisa dambudziko ravanachiremba vari kuramwa mabasa. VaMadzorera vatiwo idambudziko rehurumende kuda kunenedzera nekusvora vamwe kunyange vari ivo varikukanganisa. Studio 7 haina kukwanisawo kunzwa kubva kugurukota rezveutano VaObadiah Moyo asi mutungamiriri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa svondo rapera vakaudza vechidiki vebato reZanuPF kuti pane vari kunyengedza vana chiremba kuti vasadzokera kumabasa kuti hurumende yavo igoshorwa izvo vanachiremba vari kuramba. No media source currently available

headline: Masangano eSADC neAfrican Union Anoyambirwa Pamusoro Pezvirikuitika muSouth Africa
text: Sangano remakanzuru emakereke echi Kristu munyika dziri kuchamhembe kwe Africa, reFellowship of Christian Councils in Southern Africa, kana kuti FOCCISA, rayambira masangano eSADC neAfrican Union kuti asaita zvekutamba nezvirikuitika muSouth Africa asi kuti ashande nesimba kudzivirira zviri kuitika izvi kuti zvisaramba zvichiitika. FOCCISA yati panofanirwa kuve negwara rekuti zvisarambe zvichiitika sezvo kasiri kekutanga vanhu vemu South Africa vachiita mhirizhonga vachiuraya vekunedzimwe nyika. FOCCISA isangano remakanzuru emakereke echiKristu emunyika dzese dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica. Sangano iri ririkuti vanhu vemunyika dzakasiyana siyana vanoenda kwese kwavanoona kuti vangawana chekuita kuti variritire mhuri dzavo. Sachigaro weFOCCISA, Reverend Doctor Kenneth Mtata, vaudza Studio 7 kuti sangano ravo raudza SADC neAfrican Union kuti dzibatsire nyika dzinevanhu vazhinji vanobuda madziri vachienda kunotsvaka mararamiro kunedzimwe nyika, vachitizve nyika idzi dzinogona kuve nedambudziko rekusagadzikana mune zvematongerwo enyika kana munyaya dzezvehupfumi hwenyika naizvozvo dzinofanirwa kubatsirwa kuti zvinhu zviite zvakanaka mukati madzo. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Voenderera Mberi Vachiita Misangano kuChina.
text: Mutungamiriri we nyika, VaEmerson Mnangagwa, vari kuenderera mberi nemisangano yavo ku China vachitsvaga nzira dzekusimbaradza kudyidzana kwe China neZimbabwe munyaya ndzehupfumi. VaMnangagwa vasangana nemutungamiri wehurumende yeChina, VaLi Keqiang. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu Va Li vati vafara kuona VaMnangagwa vachishanyira China. VaMnangagwa vaitawo musangano nasachigaro we National People’s Congress, VaLi Zhanshu. Vaendawo kumarinda anovigwa magamba emu China. VaMnngagwa vapedza zuva ravo nekunoona muzinda we Huawei Communications uko vapihwa mari inoita zviuru mazana matatu zvemadhora yekutsigira chirongwa che Presidential Scholarship Fund Muongorori wezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano re Percycon Global Fund Managers, VaPersistence Gwanyanya, vanoti hazvina kuipa kuenda kunze nekupindawo misangano yakawanda yezvehupfumi asi, VaMnangagwa vanofanira kuziva kuti havangadzoki vasina chavakabata kunyika kuti zviratidze kuti mari yose inoshandiswa pakufamba kwavo ine zvairi kuunza munyika. Vatiwo hazvingagoni kusiyanisa zvematongerwo enyika nezvehupfumi sezvinhu zvinofambidzana saka VaMnangagwa vanotobatanidza zvese kana vachifamba nenzendo dzavo kunyika dzekunze semutungamiriri wenyika. VaGwanyanya vatiwo mari yapihwa VaMnangagwa sechipo kuhomwe ye Presidential Scholarship Fund chiratidzo chekuti Huawei iri kusimbisa hukama nekutsveterawo kuti irambe ichiwanawo mikana yebhizinesi munyika . No media source currently available

headline: Botswana Yotsigira Makambani Ayo Anoda Kutanga Mabhizinesi muZimbabwe
text: Zimbabwe neBotswana dzanyorerana chibvumirano chemari inosvika bhiriyoni rimwe chete rema Pula ekuBotswana. Chibvumiranbo ichi chaona Botswana ichiisa mazana mashanu emamiriyoni ema Pula pamusoro pemazana mashanu emamiriyoni ema Pula agara aripo. Mutungamiri weBotswana, VaMokwgweetsi Masisi, vaudza vatori venhau kuti Zimbabwe neBotswana dzawirirana hurongwa hwechikwereti uhu. Mutungamiri wenyika, Va Emmerson Mnangagwa, vabvumawo kuti ichokwadi kuti nyika dzavo dzanyorerana chibvumirano. Vachitsanangura zviri muchibvumirano ichi, gurukota rinoona nezvekutengeserana muBotswana, Va Bogonelo Kenewendo, vati mari yabvumiranwa iyi ichashandiswa nemakambani emu Botswana anoda kutanga mabhizinesi muZimbabwe. Mashoko aVaKenewendo anopesana nemashoko ari kuburitswa nemapepanhau muZimbabwe ekuti Zimbabwe yapihwa chikwereti neBotswana senzira yekuti ivandudze makambani anoshanda akazvimirira. Ukuwo gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vatiwo Zimbabwe yapihwa neBotswana mari inoita mamiriyoni makumi mapfumbamwe nemashanu emadhora. Asi havana kujekesa kuti mari iyi ndeyekubatsira here makambani emuBotswana kuti atange mabhizinesi muZimbabwe kana kuti kwete. Apo VaMasisi nechikwata chavo vange vari muHarare, bazi renyika yavo rinoona nezvekutengeserana nedzimwe nyika, razivisa kuti mari iyi ndeyekubatsira makambani ekuBotswana anoda kuita mabhizimisi muZimbabwe uye Zimbabwe inofanirawo kuisa hwaro hwekuti mabhizimisi aya haasi kuzorasikirwa nemari dzawo muZimbabwe.
