Bazi iri ratiwo kuti chibvumirano ichi chitange kushanda chinofanira kutsigirwa neBilateral Investment Protection and Promotion Agreement pakati penyika mbiri idzi. Vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, vaudza Studio7 kuti izvi zvinoreva kuti hapana chashanduka sezvange zviri kutaurwa nemapepanhau ehurumende. VaKuchera vati zviri kutaurwa nebazi rezvekutengeserana rekuBotswana zvinoreva kuti hurumende yeZimbabwe inofanira kushanda zvakasimba kuona kuti chibvumirano ichi chashanda. Nyanzvi munyaya dzemabhizimisi, VaRoy Magosvongwe, varatidza kusafara nemanyepo aiburitswa mumapenhau ehurumende pamusoro pechibvumirano chemari ichi dzisati dzapera. Vati zvakakosha kuti hurumende imbomira zvekurova bembera pamusoro pezvibvurano zvainenge ichironga asi kuti iite basa rinoonekwa kuitira kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimukire. Bato guru rinopikisa munyika reMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, rashora manyepo ehurumende ekuti yainge ichazowana chikwereti chemamiriyoni mazana matanhatu emadhora kubva Botswana. Mumashoko araburitsa, mutauriri webato iri, VaJacob Mafume, vati manyepo aya haana kusiyana nemamwe anogaroutarwa zuva nezuva kuti hurumende iri kusaina zvibvumirano zvichaunza mari kunyika asi pasina chinobuda kana kuti ari manyepo chete. Vanoti hurumende inosungirwa kutaurira vanhu chokwadi kwete manyepo. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kutaura nemunyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, kuti tinzwe divi rehurumende. Zimbabwe neBotswana dzasainirana zvibvurano zvitanhatu munyaya dzedzidzo pamwe nezvicherwa uye musangano unotevera uchaitirwa kuBotswana gore rinouya. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yovimbisa IMF Kudzikisa Bhajeti reVashandi veHurumende
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vavimbisa sangano rinokweretesa mari pasi rose, re International Monetary Fund, IMF, kuti Zimbabwe ichange yadzikisa mari yebhajeti inobhadharwa vashandi kubva pazvikamu makumi masere nemaviri kubva muzana, kusvika pazvikamu makumi mashanu nezviviri kubva muzana panosvika gore ra 2019. Gurukota rinoona nezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vavimbisa sangano rinokweretesa mari pasi rose, re International Monetary Fund, IMF, kuti Zimbabwe ichange yadzikisa mari yebhajeti inobhadharwa vashandi kubva pazvikamu makumi masere nezviviri kubva muzana, kusvika pazvikamu makumi mashanu nezviviri kubva muzana panosvika gore ra 2019. VaChinamasa vange vachitaura muHarare nemusi weChitatu vaine vakuru vechikwata cheIMF chiri munyika kubva musi wa 24 Kukadzi kusvika musi wa 11 Kurume. Vari kutungamira chikwata ichi, VaDomenico Fanizza, vaudzawo vatori venhau kuti Zimbabwe yakwanisa kuzadzikisa zvimwe zvayakazvitarira kuti inoda kuita mukugadzirisa hupfumi. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, kana iyo IMF yacho, vanotenderana kuti zvimwe zvakavimbiswa neZimbabwe zvekuti ichabhadhara mitero yakaiswa pazvikwereti zvinosvika bhiriyoni imwe chete nemazana masere emamiriyoni emadhora muna Kubvumbi kunyika nemabhanga ekunze, zvichanetsa kuzadzisa. Kutadza kubhadhara zvikwereti ndiko kwapa kuti Zimbabwe isakwereteswa mari neIMF ne World Bank. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachidzidzisa paUniversity of Zimbabwe uye vari chipangamazano chehuruemnde, Doctor Gift Mugano, vanoti zvekudzikisa mari inobhadharwa vashandi vehurumende chete hazvina zvazvinobatsira kana hupfumi hwenyika husiri kufamba zvakanaka.

headline: Zimbabwe Inovharwa kweMasvondo Matatu Kutanga neMuvhuro
text: Zimbabwe inoti ichange isingachabvumidze vanhu kubuda mudzimba dzavo kutanga nemusi weMuvhuro senzira yekuyedza kumisa kupararira kwaita chirwere cheCoronavirus pasi rose. Vachitaura neChishanu manheru pamusoro pematanho atorwa nehurumende yavo, mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vati vanhu vachange vachigara kudzimba dzavo kwemasvondo matatu kutanga neMuvhuro senzira yekudzivirira chirwere chiri kuita chamurambamhuru chichibata vanhu pasi rose. Chirwere ichi chabata vanhu vanodarika mazana mashanu nemakumi matatu ezviuru kubva zvachaputika kuChina gore rapera, uye vanhu vanodarika makumi mana ezviuru, vafa pasi rose, kusanganisira Zororo Makamba, uyo akashaya neMuvhuro muZimbabwe. VaMnangagwa vati vashandi vemuzvipatara pamwe nevashandi vehurumende ndivo chete vachange vachibvumidzwa kuenda kumabasa avo. VaMnangagwa vati vose vanotengesa zvinhu mumigwagwa vachange vasingabvumirwe kuita izvi kwemazuva makumi maviri nerimwe, zvitoro zvichange zvichivhurwa kwemaawa mana pazuva; madutavanhu ose achange asingabvumidzwe kutakura vanhu kunze kweZupco chete. Zvitoro zvinobvumidzwa kuvhura ndezviya zvinotengesa chikafu, mishonga nemamwe mabhizinisi akakosha kuvanhu muhupenyu hwavo nguva dzose. VaMnangagwa vati mauto nemapurisa achange achifamba achiona kuti vanhu vagara kudzimba dzavo. Zimbabwe yakavhara miganhu yayo nemusi weMuvhuro, uye ikabhana kuungana kwevanhu vanodarika makumi mashanu. Vanhu vashanu vabatwa nechirwere cheCoronavirus, kusanganisira Zororo Makamba, uyo akavigwa nemusi weChipiri.

headline: Vamwe Vanoti Mitemo yeCovid-19 Haisi Kushanda Kudzivirira kweMhando Itsva yeOmicron.
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu chiuru chimwe chete nemakumi masere nemaviri kana kuti 1082 vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 chikauraya munhu mumwe chete. Izvi zvinoreva kuti vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera vave zviuru zvina nemazana manomwe nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 4, 709. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi vave zviuru zana nemakumi matatu nemasere zvine mazana mashanu nemakumi maviri nematatu kana kuti 138, 523. Mumazuva matatu adarika, vanhu vanodarika chiuru chimwe chete vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi pazuva. Vanhu mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana masere nemakumi matanhatu nemashanu zvine mazana maviri nemakumi masere nemanomwe kana kuti 3 867 287 vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 kekutanga. Vanhu vabayiwa kaviri sezviri kukurudzirwa vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana masere nemakumi manomwe nematanhatu zvine makumi mashanu nematanhatu kana kuti 2 876 056. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba mukupera kwemwedzi uno kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana. Zvichakadaro, apo huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi hwave kukwira zvakanyanya, vaimbova gurukora rezvehutano Doctor Henry Madzorera vanoti mimwe mitemo yakadzikwa nehurumende kwemavhiki maviri kuyedza kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi haina zvakawanda zvainobatsira. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakadzika mitemo inosungira vashanyi munyika kumbogara pavo vega kwemazuva gumi uye kuvhenekwa Covid-19 panhandare yendege.

headline: Kanzuru yeGweru neVagari Vopesana Pamusoro peMamita eMvura
text:
Pari kuita kusawirirana pakati pekanzuru yeguta reGweru nevamwe vagari pamusoro pehurongwa hwekanzuru iyi hwekuda kuti vagari vashandise ma-prepaid metre emvura.

Vamwe vagari vakaudza Studio 7 kuti havawirirane nehurongwa uhu nekuti kuwana mvura yakachena ikodzero yevagari isingafanirwe kutyorwa zvisinei kuti vagari vanombotadza kubhadhara mitero yemvura. Mumwe mugari uyo akangozvidoma nezita rekuti Ambuya Kurebwaseka vakati kuve nema-prepaid metre emvura kunogona kuunza zvirwere sezvo vamwe vanhu vachigona kutadza kuwana mari inenge ichidiwa kuti vakwanise kutenga mvura nguva nenguva. Mumwewo mugari, Amai Nonhlanhla Chijiya vanotiwo havatsigire nyaya yema-prepaid metre vachiti mvura yakasiyana nemagetsi ekuti vanhu vakaashaya vanokwanisa kushandisa dzimwe mhando dzemoto. Amai Chijiya vanotiwo kanzuru inofanirwa kuziva kuti veruzhinji vari kuomerwa nehupenyu vachitiwo vagari vakawanda vanoda kubhadhara zvikwereti zvavainazvo kukanzuru kunyanya zvemvura, asi vanoti kanzuru inovawomesera nekusada kutambira mari inobhadharwa muzvidimbu-zvidimbu. Kunze kwekusawirirana nenyaya yema-prepaid metre emvura mumwewo mugari VaTicharwa Ngambura vanoti vanoti vagari vanochema-chema nehwavanoti huwori hunoitwa nevamwe vashandi vekanzuru vavanoti vanovharira vagari mvura zvisiri pamutemo vachida mari yechiokomuhomwe. VaCharles Mazorodze vanove mukuru werimwe remasangano anomirira vagari reGweru Residents Forum vanoti zvakanakira vagari kuti vashandise ma-prepaid metres vachitiwo zvimwe zvikwereti zvemvura zvinonzi vagari vanazvo kukanzuru hazvizi zvechokwadi nekuti vashandi vekanzuru havatarise nemazvo mashandisirwo anoitwa mvura nevagari. Asi meya weGweru VaCharles Chikozho vakaudza Studio 7 kuti hurongwa hwekuti vagari vashandise ma-prepaid metres huri kuenderera mberi vachitiwo vagari vakatambira hurongwa uhu, kunyange hazvo vakati havakwanise kupa nguva chaiyo yekuti izvi zvichaitwa riinhi. Panyaya yehuwori hunopomerwa vamwe vashandi vekanzuru vachinzi vanovharira vamwe vagari mvura vachida mari yechiokomuhomwe, VaChikozho vakakururudzira vagari kuti vasaite zvekuda kubhadhara mari yakadaro sezvo izvi zvisiri pamutemo uyewo zvisingabatsire vagari pakuderedza zvikwereti zvavanenge vainazvo kukanzuru. VaChikozho vakati vagari vane chikwereti chakakura kukanzuru vachitiwo kanzuru yavo yakazvipira kutaurirana nevagari vanenge vane zvikwereti kuti vabhadhara sei zvikwereti izvi. Vakatiwo kunyange hazvo vachitambira pfungwa yekuti kuwana mvura yakachena ikozdero yevagari, vanhu vanofanirwa kuyeuka kuti kanzuru inoshandisa mari yakawanda kuti vanhu vawane mvura iyi. VeZimbabwe National Water Authority vari kukurudzira kushandiswa kwema-prepaid water metre vachiti munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana munyika vachiti izvi zvinobatsira kuti vanhu vakwanise kubhadhara mvura yavanenge vashandisa chaiyo kwete kubhadharira inenge yaita zvekufungidzirwa. Harare nderimwe remaguta ari munyika akatanga kukurudzira vagari kuti vashandise ma-prepaid metre emvura mune dzimwe nzvimbo muguta iri.
Asi vamwe vanoti kushandiswa kwema-prepaid metre kunogona kuwomesera vanoshaya. No media source currently available

headline: Mumwe weVechidiki Anorwira Kodzero dzeVanhu Otyorwa Gumbo Mushure Mekupambwa neVasori
text: Mumwe wevari kutungamira nyaya yekuratidzira kusatambira kuparurwa kwemari yemabond notes, VaIshmael Kauzani, vakapambwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori vakarorwa zvakaipisisa uye kutsikwa gumbo nemotokari richibva ratyoka. VaKauzani vari muchipatara chemuHarare mu “intensive care unit” munorapwa vanenge vachirwarisa. Mukoma wavo, VaGodfrey Kauzani, vakaurayiwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori muna 2008 apo panonzi pakaurayiwa vechidiki vakawanda veMDC-T munguva yesarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika dzechipiri kana kuti run off. Vamwe vechidiki vatanhatu vakasungwawo nemusi weChitatu vachinzi vaikurudzira vanhu kuti vasatambire mabond notes vakapihwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso inosvika zana remadhora. Pane vakapihwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso, pane mukomana ane makore gumi nemashanu anonzi Costa Zvokusekwa. NeChina vamwe vechikwata cheTajamuka vatatu vanosanganisira VaPromise Mkwananzi vakasungwa neMuvhuro vakapihwawo mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso inosvika madhora mazana maviri. Vose vari kusungwa vari kupomerwa mhosva yekutyora chikamu chechimakumi matatu nenomwe chemutemo weCriminal Law (Codification and Reform) Act vachinzi vari kukurudzira mhirizhonga uye kuita musarinya. Magweta ari kumirira vanhu ava inhengo dzeZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaObey Shava naVaJeremiah Bamu. VaShava vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyangwe vanhu vakapihwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso vari kushaya mari kumabhanga zvopa kuti vasungwe vagare mujeri kwenguva yakareba. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yokwereta Mari Kuti Ibhadhare Vashandi Mabhonasi eGore Rapera
text: Hurumende yave kuyedza kukwereta mari kuburikidza nekutengesa maTreasury Bills kuti ikwanise kubhadhara vashandi vayo mabhonasi. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kuyambira kuti hurumende zvikwereti zvakadai munongedzo wekukundikana munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Gurukota rinoona nezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vanoti hurumende iri kuda mari inosvika mamiriyoni zana nemakumi masere kubhadhara mabhonasi egore rapera. Uku kuwedzera zvikwereti pabhajeti yegore rapera inosvika mabhiriyoni mana emadhora. VaChinamasa vanoti nyika ine mari inosvika mabhiriyoni maviri kuburikidza nematreasury bills aya. Asi chii chaizvo chinonzi treasury bill? Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa rePeople's Democratic Party, uye vaimbova gurukota rezvemari, VaTendai Biti, vanoti ma treasury bills aya anotengeserwa kumabhanga kunyanya uye anenge ari zvibatiso zvekuti hurumende inenge yatenda kuti ine chikwereti. Asi vamwe vanoti VaChinamasa, avo vakagara vati havana mari, havangazorwe mafuta enguruve yavasina kudya. Vanoti mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, avo vakati vashandi vapihwe mabhonasi kunyangwe pasina mari, ndivo vakaresva. Gurukota rezvevashandi, Amai Prisca Mupfumira, vanoti zvinhu zvakaoma asi vachazadzikisa zvavakavimbisa vashandi. Asi VaBiti vanoti kutadza kuronga kwaVaChinamasa segurukota rezvemari vachiti shiri yakangwara inovaka dendere rayo mvura isati yaturuka. Hurumende dzakawanda pasi rose dzinoshandisawo matreasury bills aya kana dzichida kukwereta mari. Asi VaBiti vanoti matreasury bills aya anokanganisa zvikuru hurongwa hwekugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika kana hurumende ichiita zvekupaza dura nguva dzose. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachidzidzisa paUniversity of the Free State, VaCalvin Mdzingiri, vanoti vana veZimbabwe vachasara vasina kana nhaka nenyaya yezvikwereti. Mashoko aya anotsinhirwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vaimbotungamira sangano reZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, VaLuxon Zembe. VaZembe vanotenda kuti hurumende dzinoshandisa matreasury bills asi vachiti hazvidi kubva zvaita mugariro musoro wetsuro kushaya nyanga. Ko chii chingatitwe neZimbabwe kuti isarambe ichikwereta mari? VaMdzingiri vanoti Zimbabwe inotoda kuzvipira kumisa nyaya dzekungoshandisa mari isipo uye kuona kuti yakwezva vekunzwe kuti vatange makambani munyika anozobhadhara mitero inoshandiswa nehurumende. VaBiti vanotenderana nemaonero aya vachiti hurumende inouraya mbeva yodya seyabaya nzou. Zimbabwe ine chimwe chikwereti kunze kwenyika chinodarika mabhiriyoni gumi nerimwe emadhora kumasangano akaita seWorld Bank, IMF, European Investment Bank, African Development Bank nedzimwe nyika. Kutadza kubhadhara chikweri ichi kuri kupa kuti hurumende dzakawanda dzitadze kukweretesa Zimbabwe mari. No media source currently available

headline: Vakawanda Vopesana Maonero Pane Zviri Kuitika Kuna VaMugabe
text: Kunyange hazvo mutauriri waVaMugabe, VaGeorge Charamba, pamwe nemutauriri webato ravo reZanu PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, vakaramba mashoko aya vachiti ndeemanyepo, pane vamwe munyika vanooona sekuti pane chokwadi mumashoko aya. Apo bato reZanu PF pamwe nehurumende vari kuramba runyerekupe rwekuti mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vari kurwara zvakaipisisa vari kune imwe nyika yekumabvazuva, veruzhinji munyika vane maonera akasiyana vamwe vachiti mashoko aya ndeemanyepo sezvo achigaro taurwa nguva ino gore rega rega apo VaMugabe vanenge vari pazororo. Asi vamwe vanoti anogona kunge ari echokwadi sezvo VaMugabe vave mukweguri. No media source currently available Kunyange hazvo mutauriri waVaMugabe, VaGeorge Charamba, pamwe nemutauriri webato ravo reZanu PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, vakaramba mashoko aya vachiti ndeemanyepo, pane vamwe munyika vanooona sekuti pane chokwadi mumashoko aya. VaMilton Phiri, avo vanogara kuRugare muHarare, vanoti kunyange hazvo mashoko aya achigaro taurwa panguva ino gore rega mukati memakore mana apfuura, vanoona sekuti izvi zviri kuitika nekuti ndizvo zviri kutarisira veruzhinji. Vamwewo vakaitasaAmai Betty Machana vanotiwo kunyange hazvo vasingashuvire kuti munhu arware, vanhu vemuZimbabwe vatambura zvekuti vamwe vave kufariria runyerekupe urwu. Amai Melody Garaipasi vekuChitungwiza vanoti kunyanage hazvo iyi iri nyaya inogarotaurwa nezvayo nguva nenguva, inyaya inokonzerwa nekuti hurumende neZanu PF haibudi pachena panyaya yezororo raVaMugabe. Vanotiwo hapana chikonzero chekuti mutungamiriri wenyika aende kuzororo muchihwande vachiti izvi ndizvo zvinokonzera kuti vanhu vataure zvese zvese kunyange zvisiri zvechokwadi. Asi murairidzi wezvekutapwa kwenhau pachikoro cheHarare Polytechnic, VaWellington Gadzikwa, vanoti zvese izvi ndezvemanyepo uye zviri kukonzerwa nevanyori venhau vanoita basa ravo zvisina mwero. Vanoti vatori venhau vanofanira kutanga vabvunzurudza pamwe nekutsvaga chokwadi vasati vanyora nyaya dzavo vachiti zvakaitika izvi zvinoratidza kuti basa harina kuitwa nemazvo. Vanoti izvi zvinoita kuti veruzhinji vasavimbe nezvinobuda mumapenhau anonyora manyepo. VaTyson Mwale vanoti vanobvumirana neVaGadzikwa asi vanoti kuramba nyaya iyi ichingobuda kune zvakunoreva. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika, VaFortune Gwaze, vanoti pari zvino vanotora mashoko aya semanyepo uye vanoti vachatanga kuabvuma kana VaMugabe vakatadza kudzoka kubasa kupera kwemwedzi uno sezvakatarisirwa. VaMugabe vakaenda kuzororo musi wa15 Zvita uye vatevedzeri vavo, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa naVaPhelekhezela Mphoko, vari kuchinjana kubata chinzvimbo chavo. VaGwaze vanot havawoni pane chakaipa pane izvi sezvo mahofisi aVaMugabe akazivisa kuti izvi ndizvo zvichaitika uye pasina zvakawanda zvinoitika kana VaMugabe vasipo. Misangano mikuru yebato reZanu PF pamwe newemakurukota ehurumende weCabinet, haiitwe kana VaMugabe vasipo uye vamwe vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika, VaOwen Dhliwayo, vanoti izvi zvinoratidza kuti vatevedzeri vaVaMugabe havana simba. Vatiwo izvi zvinoratidzwo kuti VaMugabe ndivo vanoita zvese mubato nemuhurumende, zvokuti kana vasipo hapana chinofamba.

headline: WARRIOR AFCON 2019: DeMbare 0, Bosso 0
text: ZVIKWATA zvinoti Dynamos FC neHighlanders hazvina kana mutambi mumwechete akasarudzwa kuti anotambira maWarriors kumakwishu eAfrica Cup of Nations (Afcon) pamwechete neCosafa Cup izvo zvasiyana nakare apo zvaibura vatambi vakawanda vaive shasha vaitambira chikwata chenyika ichi.   Kubva kare, DeMbare neBosso ndizvo zvaive zvikwata zvikuru muZimbabwe asi parizvino zvinotaridza kuti masamba asiyana sezvo matambiro ezvikwata izvi muPremier Soccer League adzikira zvikuru.   Kune zvimwe zvikwata izvo zvainonekwa sezvidiki zviri kutamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura.   Semuenzaniso, Herentals FC ine mutambi wayo Richard Hachiro ari muchikwata chemaWarriors,  Yadah Stars ina Leeroy Mavhunga kozoti Chapungu ina Talbert Shumba neFC Platinum ina Lawrence Mhlanga.   Svondo rino, Kwayedza yakaita hurukuro nevakuru veBosso neDeMbare pamusoro pekudzikira kwaita zvikwata izvi munyaya dzenhabvu.   Sachigaro weHighlanders – Kenneth Mhlophe – anoti ivo sechikwata vari panguva yekuvaka izvo vakatanga gore radarika.   Anoti chikwata chavo ndicho chimwe chine vatambi vechidiki muPSL saka makore anotevera vanogona kubura vatambi vakawanda vachazotambira maWarriors.   “Isu tiri panguva yekuvaka zvakatanga gore radarika, izvi zvinozivikanwa nemunhu wese, vatambi vedu vachiri vechidiki.   “Kutaura kuno tine vatambi vaviri vakashevedzwa kuchikwata chemaUnder-23 saka zvinorakidza kuti tiri kufamba negwara chairo,” anodaro.   Anoenderera mberi achiti Prince Dube – uyo akashavedzwa kumaU-23 – ane ramangwana rakanaka.   “Tina Prince Dube, mutambi ane tarenda rinonwisa mvura. Akaenda kuSouth Africa akanokanganiswa ikoko sezvo aisatambiswa asi akadzoka tiri kumubika patsva, gore rinotevera muchamuona ari kumaWarriors.   “Iye zvino ari kumaU-23, kutoshevedzwa ikoko kunorakidza kuti varairidzi vemaYoung Warriors vanozviziva kuti ane tarenda rinodadisa,” anodaro Mhlophe.   Maneja weDeMbare – Richard Chihoro – anoti chikwata chavo gore rino chakavakwa patsva saka vatambi vavo vachiri kumbodzidzana.   “Zvamunongoziva isu gore rino takatenga vatambi vatsva saka vange vachiri kumbodzidzana, mukatarisa matambiro atiri kuita vave kuita vachibatana, vachigona uye vachisimuka.   “Zvinonetsa kuti vangotanga nekupinda musquad asi tinoziva kuti munguva inotevera kuDeMbare kuchabva vatambi vakawanda vachienda kumaWarriors. Hazviite kuti kushaye vatambi vanobva kuDeMbare vachienda kumaWarriors, kana chikwata chedu changobatana vakawanda vachaenda,” anodaro Chihoro.   Paakabvunzwa neKwayedza kuti pavatambi vari muchikwata chavo parizvino ndevapi vaanofungira kuti vanogona kukwana kumaWarriors, Chihoro anoti, “Parizvino kutaura chokwadi hapana mutambi watinaye anokwana kumaWarriors.”   Zvakadai, nemusi weMugovera uno maWarriors achatanga kurwira kuchengetedza mukombe wavo weCosafa Cup apo achasangana nechikwata chichapedza chiri pamusoro muboka reGroup A kuDurban, kuSouth Africa.   Chikwata chaSunday ‘Mhofu’ Chidzambwa chiri kushandisa makwishu aya segadziro dzemutambo weAfcon uyo uchatanga nemusi wa21 Chikumi apo maWarriors achasangana neEgypt.   Mumakwishu ekupedzisira eAfcon ayo akaitirwa kuGabon mugore ra2017, DeMbare yaive nevatambi vaviri vaive muchikwata chemaWarriors vaiti Tatenda Mkuruva uyo aive mubati wepagedhi naElisha Muroiwa uyo aivhara bhora pamwechete naCosta Nhamoinesu.   Bosso yakapedzisira kuita vatambi vakapinda muchikwata chemaWarriors mugore ra2017 apo paiva naPrince Dube naHonest Moyo avo vakatakurwa naMhofu kuenda kuCosafa Cup. Muchikwata ichi maive zvakare naOcean Mushure weDynamos uyo akatamba zvainwisa mvura.

headline: ZEC Yotarisira Kupeta Gwaro Idzva reVavhoti Mukupera kweGore
text: Sachigaro weZimbabwe Electoral Commission kana kuti ZEC Amai Rita Makarau vanoti vanotarisira kuti panopera gore rino vanenge vave negwaro idzva revavhoti. Izvi zviri kuitwa sezvo nyika iri kutarisira kuita sarudzo gore rinouya. Vanotiwo mukupera kwemwedzi uno vanenge vave nemichina yose inodiwa mukunyoresa vavhoti. Nemusi weChishanu, ZEC inoti yakakwanisa kupihwa michina mazana mana pamichina zviuru zvitatu zvakatengwa nehurumende kubva kukambani yeLaxton Group yekuChina. Amai Makarau vanotiwo vanhu vanokwanisa kuvhota nezvetupa zverata musarudzo dzegore rinouya. Mashoko aya anotevera zvainge zvambotaurwa namabharani mukuru wehurumende vaTobaiwa Mudede avo vainge vati vanhu havakwanise kuvhota kana vasina zvitupa zvebepa. Amai Makarau vanoti kana vachinge vapedza kugadzira gwaro revavhoti vanofunga kuti sarudzo dzinenge dzokwanisa kuitwa. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vana Vofa Asi Bazi rezveHutano Rinoti Zvinhu Zvave Kuita Zviri Nani
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu vana vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nemusi weMugovera zvasiya vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru zvishanu nemazana makumi mapfumbamwe nevaviri kana kuti 5 292. Vanhu mazana maviri negumi nevasere vakabatwa nechirwere ichi neMugovera zvasiya vabatwa nacho vave mazana maviri ezviuru nemakumi maviri nemasere ane zana nemakumi manomwe nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 228 179. Mukuru anoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika Dr Agness Mahomva vanoti vari kufara kuti huwandu hwevari kubatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi munyika huri kuramba huchidzikira. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu mamiriyoni mana nezviuru mazana maviri nemakumi matatu nevapfumbamwe nemazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nemumwe kana kuti 4 239 261 vabayiwa nhomba kekutanga. Vabayiwa nhomba kaviri vave mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nemanomwe ane mazanamaviri nemakumi mashanu nevatatu kana kuti 3 267 253. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba katatu sezvave kukurudzirwa vave zviuru zvina nechimwe zvine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi masere nevatanhatu kana kuti 41 986.

headline: Tinotambira kuhwinha: Ngezi
text: KUBVA gore ra2016 apo Ngezi Platinum Stars yakatanga kukwikwidza muCastle Premiership, chikwata ichi change chichingotamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura uye mwaka uno chiri kurakidza kuti chinogona kuhwina mukombe wePremier Soccer League.   Mumitambo mipfumbamwe yatambwa nechikwata ichi – icho chiri kurairidzwa naTonderai Ndiraya –  kusvika parizvino chakwanisa kuhwina minomwe nekuita mangange miviri chete.   Asi mubvunzo mukuru uri pamiromo yevatsigiri venhabvu vazhinji ndewekuti Ngezi – iyo isati yakundwa mumitambo yayo yayatamba kusvika parizvino – ingakwanisa here kupedza mwaka wese isina kumbokundwa izvo zvisati zvamboitika munhorowondo yenhabvu yemuno.   Zvimwe zvikwata zvinoti Zimbabwe Saints mugore ra1988 yakakwanisa kutamba mitambo 22 isina kumbokundwa kozoti ZPC Kariba muna 2014 apo yakapinda muPSL ichirairidzwa naSaul Chaminuka yakakwanisa kutamba mitambo 19 yekutanga isina kumbokundwa.   Chikwata ichi chaive nevatambi vanosanganisira 2014 Soccer Star of the year, Dennis Dauda.   Mukushi wemashoko weNgezi Platinum Stars – Calvin Mavunga – uyo anovezve performance analyst wechikwata ichi, anoti zvinonetsa kuti vapedze mwaka vasina kumbokundwa kunyangwe zvazvo pavanotamba vasingatarisire kukundwa.   “Nhabvu inotambwa nezvikwata zviviri zvese zvichida kuhwina saka zvinonetsa nekuti nhabvu inotenderera pamwe mangwana rinogona kunge risiri zuva renyu.   “Asi chandinoziva ndechekuti hapana chikwata chinotamba nhabvu chichiti chinoda kukundwa, zvese zvikwata zvinenge zvichitoda kuhwina uye isu tinenge tichida kuhwina mitambo yedu yese. Tinotambira kuhwina,” anodaro Mavunga.   Zvakadai, Kwayedza yakazoita hurukuro nevamwe vatsigiri venhabvu avo vanopa pfungwa dzavo pamusoro pematambiro ari kuita Ngezi kusvika parizvino.   Muongorori wenhabvu Goodwill Zunidza anoti Ngezi inotofanira kukunya dzisimbe sezvo ichasangana nezvikwata zvikuru zvinoti Highlanders, CAPS UNITED, Dynamos neFC Platinum uye nguva yadarika yange ichingotamba nezvikwata zvidiki chete.   “Zvinonetsa nekuti rwendo rurefu urwu saka kana ichida kufunga nezvazvo ngaitokwidziridze masokisi ayo nekuti pane basa. Mutambo wayo wechipiri neBosso uchange wakabaka sezvakaita wekutanga uyo yakahwina 1-0 kuBaobab saka ndinoziva kuti Bosso ichada kutsividza kumusha kwayo.   “Uye tichaona iyo Ngezi paichasangana nezvimwe zvikwata zvikuru zvinosanganisira CAPS UNITED neFC Platinum kuti inobuda here. Kana ikapabuda ndipo tinoziva kuti inogona kuzviita zveshuwa,” anodaro Zunidza.   Mumwe mutsigiri wenhabvu, Tendayi Murambiza, anoti nematengero akaita Ngezi vatambi vatsva vepamusoro anoda kuona chikwata ichi chichinyora nhorowondo yekupedza mwaka chisina kumbokundwa.   “Chikwata ichi chiri kutamba nhabvu yepamusoro saka ini hangu ndiri kuchitsigira kuti chinyore nhorowondo. Ikaramba ichifamba negiya yairi kufamba naro hapana chinovatadzisa kupedza mwaka vasina kumbokundwa,” anodaro Murambiza.   Zvakadai, zvimwe zvikwata zvekuEurope zvinosanganisira Arsenal FC yakambopedza mwaka wese wa2003-2004 isina kumbokundwa payakatamba mitambo 49 ndokuhwina mukombe weEngland Premier League apo yakazodanwa zita rekuti “The Invincibles”.

headline: VaTsvangirai Vanoti Hurumende Ikasachinja Maitiro Nyika Icharamba Iri kuMawere
text: Vaimbova mutungamiri wehurumende uye vari mutungamiri weMDCT, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vanoti hurumende inofanira kuvandudza nyaya dzekurima pamwe nekuvhura maindasitiri kuitira kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimukire. Mashoko aya anouyawo apo varimi vazhinji varikuchema nerokuti havasi kuwana zvekushandisa mukurima pasi pechirongwa chehurumende cheCommand Agriculture. Vachitaura neStudio 7 muHarare, VaTsvangirai vati hurumende inofanira kukoshesa nyaya dzekurima sezvo kurima kuriko kwakanyanyobata hupfumi hwenyika. VaTsvangirai vati varimi vanofanira kuwaniswa zvokushandisa mukuita basa ravo paine nguva kuitira kuti vawane goho rakanaka. Vakurudzirawo kuti varimi vakagariswa patsva vapihwe matsamba emapurazi avagere kuitira kuti vakwanise kukwereta mari kumabhanga.. Mashoko aVaTsvangirai aya anouyawo apo varimi vazhinji munyika vari kugunun'una kuti mbeu nefetereza zvavari kupihwa nehurumende pasi pechirongwa cheCommand Agriculture zviri kunonoka kusvika kwavari iyo mvura ichingonaya. Mumwe murimi akatarisana nedambudziko iri ndiAmai Getrude Moyo vanorima vari munharaunda yeBeatrtice avo vanoti dambudziko ravakatarisana naro nderekushaya mukana wekuwana mari yekurimisa. VaTsvangirai vanoti hapana chirikubuda mukurima nekuti vanhu vazhinji vanokwanisa kurima havana kupihwa minda asi vakuru-vakuru muhurumende vachingokumba mapurazi avasingagone kushandisa. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rinoona nezvekurima VaJoseph Made kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga isiri kudairwa. VaTsvangirai vakurudzirawo kuti makambani akavharwa avhurwe kuitira kuti veruzhinji vawane mabasa. Kurudziro yaVaTsvangirai iyi inouyawo apo sangano rinomirira vashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions richiti pane mazana-nemazana emakambani akavharwa muna 2016 zvichitevera kuoma kwaita zvinhu munyika. Izvi zvinouyawo panguva iyo hurumende iri kutadza kugadzira mabasa mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana maviyi akavimbiswa nemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe pavaitsvaga rutsigiro pamberi pesarudzo dzemuna 2013. No media source currently available

headline: EU Yoshushikana neHurutungamiri hweNyika yeZimbabwe
text: Mumiriri wenyika dzemuEurope muZimbabwe,VaPhillipe Van Damme vanoti nyaya dzehuwori dziri kubuda mumapenhau munyika pamwe nekutadza kuita shanduko munyaya dzehupfumi sezvakabvumiranwa kumusangano wakaitwa kuLima, Peru gore rapera zviri kupa chimiro chakaipa kunyika pamwe nekutadzisa vekunze kuzotanga mabhizimizi muZimbabwe. Vachitaura pachirongwa chekucherechedza makore maviri vatanga basa muZimbabwe change chakarongwa neve263 Chat muHarare nemusi weChishanu, VaVan Damme vanoti mwedzi mishomanana yapfuura yaona mapepanhau achiburitsa nyaya dzehuwori mumapazi akawanda ehurumende asi pasina vanhu vari kusungwa kana kutora matanho ekuongorora nyaya idzi. Makukurukota ehurumende anoti VaJonathan Moyo vedzidzo yepamusoro nemutevedzeri wavo VaGodfrey Gandawa vanonzi vakashandisa mari inodarika mazana mana ezviuru zvemadhora zvisina mwero uye kunyange hazvo komisheni inoona nezvehuwori yakada kuvasunga yakarambidzwa kuita izvi nemutevedzeri wemutungamiriri wenyika,VaPhelekezela Mphoko. VaMphoko vakaburitsawo muhusungwa kuAvondale muHarare vakuru vakuru vekambani yeZimbabwe National Road Authority vanosanganisira VaDavison Norupiri avo vaipomrewa mhosva yekuba mazana matanhutu ezvuru zvemadhora. Gurukota rezvemando dzemoto, VaSamuel Undenge varikupomerwawo nyaya dzehuwori vachinzi vakamanikidza kambani yeZESA kupa basa kuna muzvinabhizimisi Wicknell Chivhayo zvechikiribidi. VaVan Damme vatiwo pasi pechibvumirano cheLima hurumende yainge yavimbisa kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo kuInternational Monetary Fund nekuWorld Bank mwedzi wapfuura usati waperi asi izvi hazvisati zvaitika. Vatiwo hurumende yakavimbisa kugadzirisa nyaya dzehuwori asi huwori huri kutowedzera. Vati zvese izvi zvinoita kuti vekunze vasauye munyika kuzotanga mabhizimisi pamwe nekusimudzira hupfumi. Vati nyika dzeEU dzicharamba dzichibatsira Zimbabwe munyaya dzenzara, hutano nemabasa ebudiriro asi vakati rutsigiro rwakawanda ruchauya chete kana hurumende yagadzirisa zvayakatidza, kutevedza mutemo pamwe nekuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu. Svondo rino vemabhizimisi vemuno vaichemachemawo pamusangano weNational Economic Consultative Forum kuti hurumende inongotaura chete nezvekuti iri kutora matanho ekugadzirisa hupfumi asi pasina zvairi kuita. VaMisheck Gondo vesangano reNational Assocition of Youth Organisations vati maonero aVaVan Damme akafanana nemaonero avo uye zviri pachena kuti hurumende yeZimbabwe iri kutadza kuita zvayakavimbisa. Mumwewo wechidiki, Thembinkosi Rushwaya uyo akasungwa nguva pfupi yapfuura mushure mekuratizira paUniversity of Zimbabwe pamberi pemutungamiriri wenyika,VaRobert Mugabe audza Studio 7 kuti pachinzvimbo chekugadzirisa zvinhu hurumende iri kuwedzera kuparadza hupfumi pamwe nekushungurudza veruzhinji. Kunyange hazvo EU yakabvisa zvirango zvehupfumi kuZimbabwe, vakawanda vapinda mumusangano uyu vanoti kutyorwa kwekodzerp dzevanhu kuri kotowezedzera zvichitevera danho rakatorwe neEU. VaVan Damme vati mukati megore rapfuura sangano iri pamwe nenyiak dzeEU vashandisa mari inodarika zana remamiriyoni emadhora munyaya dzechikafu nehutano. Vanotiwo mukati menguva imwe cheteyo, nyika idzi dzashandisa mari inodarika mamiriyoni makumi mashanu emadhora mumabasa ekuwanisa vanhu mvura yakachena pamwe nemamwe mabasa ebudiriro. VaVan Damme vanoti pane mukana mukuru wekuwedzera rubatsiro munyaya dzehupfumi, budiriro nezvimwe kana hurumende yeZimbabwe ikatevedza chitsidzo chayo cheLima pamwe nekutevedza mutemo, kuvandudza mitemo yavo yemabhizimisi pamwe nekurmekedza kodzero dzenhu. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaChris Mushowe kuti tinzwe divi rehurumende. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi veHurumende Vonyunyuta neKusabuda Pachena kweHurumende Panyaya yeBhonasi
text: Rimwe sangano revarairidzi, reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, rinoti ranyorera kugurukota idzva rezvevashandi nemabasa, Amai Priscah Mupfumira richikumbira kuitaa musangano wechimbichimbi pakati pevashandi vehurumende nehurumende kuti vajekeserwe nezvenyaya yemari dzebhonasi. Danho resangano iri rinotevera kupesana kwemashoko kwarinoti kuri kubva kuhurumende, zvichitevera kusiyana kwemazuva ari kunzi ndiwo achabhadharwa vashandi mari dzavo dzemabhonasi. Svondo rapera vaive mutevedzeri vegurukota rezvevashandi, VaTongai Muzenda vakabuda vachizivisa kuti hurumende yaizobhadhara vashandi vayo vasati vapiwa mabhonasi mwedzi unouya. VaMuzenda vakabva vadzingwa basa neSvondo nemutungamiri wenyika VaRpbert Mugabe. Asi bepanhau reChronicle rinoti Amai Mupfumira vakavimbisa kuti vamwe vashandi vachapiwa mari dzavo mwedzi uno, vanenge vasara vopiwa mwedzi unouya. Asi munyori mukuru wePTUZ VaRaymond Majongwe vanoti hurumende haina zvairi kuita kuti ifambise mashoko aya nenzira kwayo, kunze kwekuzviona mumapepanhau. Hurumende yakazivisa kuti nekuda kwekushaiwa mari yaizopa vashandi vayo mari dzemabhonasi nezvikamu zvikamu. Mauto nemapurisa vanonzi vakatopiwa kare mari dzavo muna Mbudzi. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata Amai Mupfumira kanawo gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa kuti tinzwe divi rehurumende. Asi VaMajongwe vanoti nhengo dzavo dzicharamwa mabasa temu inouya muna 2015 kana nyaya iyi isina kugadziriswa nekukasika. Hurumende yakazivisa kuti iri kutatarika kuwana mari inoikwanira sezvo iri kuwana mari shoma iri kupinda muhomwe yayo, iyo iri kubva yangoperera kumari dzemihoro yevashandi vayo. No media source currently available VaChinamasa vakatozivisa kuti hurumende ichagumura vamwe vashandi basa nekuti haina mari yekuvabhadhara.

headline: Nyaya yeMureza weNyika Yokonzera Mutauro muDare reParamende
text: Mureza weZimbabwe wakaunza kunetsana mudare reNational Assembly nemusi weChitatu mushure mekunge vange vakabata chinzvimbo chemutauriri wedare iri Amai MArble Chinomona vakaedza kudzinga mudare nhengo mbiri dzeMDC T idzo dzakapinda mudare dzakasungira mureza. Nhengo idzi VaTrevor Saruwaka, naVaGodfrey Sithole dzakaramba kubuda uye dzakabva dzatanga kutambidza vamwe vadzo mureza uyu izvo zvakaita kuti basa rimbomiswa mudare iri. Mureza wenyika wave kufarirwa pamwe nekupfekwa nevakawanda munyika zvichitevera chirongwa chamufundisi Evan Mawarire cheHash Tag This Flag icho chinokurudzira mutungamiriri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe kuti vaite zvavakavimbisa musarudzo nyika musarudzo dza2013 zvekupa vanhu mabasa, kumisa huori uye kugadzirisa hupfumi. Muchokoto watangwa nenhengo yedare iri yeZanu PF, VaOliver Mandipaka avo vakabvunza kuti sei VaSaruwaka NaVaSithole vainge vakasungira mireza muhuro asi dare iri rakapa mutongo neChipiri wekuti mureza uyu haufaniri kusungirwa mudare. Amai Chinomona vakabva vati nhengo dzeMDC T idzi dzibvise mureza asi vaviri avo vakaramba. Amai Chinomona vakabva vaudza mupurisa wedare iri kana kuti Segeant at Arms kuti vaburitse vaviri ava asi varamba kubva vatanga kutambidza mureza kune vamwe vavo. Mukuru wenhengo dzeMDC T mudare iri VaInnocent Gonese vati kusungira mureza kunoratidza kuti vanhu vari kufarira nyika yavo uye kuburitsa nhengo idzi mudare kunenge kuri kutyora kodzero dzavo. Asi Amai Chinomona vakaramba vakaomesa musoro. Mireza yakazobviswa mushure mekunge Amai Chinomona vati vaizomisa basa nhengo dzeparamende dzange dzichiramba kutevedza mutongo wavo. Zvichakadaro, makurukota ese ehurumende akatadza kuuya kuzopindura mibvunzo muparamende izvo zvakaita kuti nhengo dzeMDC dzipopote nekukumbira dare kuti rirange makurukota aya. VaGonese vakati yatova tsika yemakurukota aya yekusauuya kuparamende vakakurudzira kuti varangwe. Asi Amai Chinomona vati vange vaudzwa kuti makurukota aya ainge ari mumusangano wedare remakurukota nekudaro vatevedzeri vavo ndivo vange vakavamiririra. Mune imwewo nyaya, mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvevashandi, VaTapiwa Matangaidze, vasveveredzwa nenhengo dzeparamende kubva kumapato anopikisa mushure mekunge vataura kuti hurumende ichiri kukwanisa kubhadhara vashandi vayo. Vange vachipindura mubvunzo kubva kuna muzvare Jessie Majome veMDC T wekuti sei hurumende iri kutadza kubhadhara vashandi vayo paine nguva. VaMatangaidze vanoti vanoshamiswa nekuti mapato anopikisa ari kushushikana nemari dzevashandi vehurumende kudarika vashandi vacho pachavo. Asi Muzvare Majome nevamwe vavo vati zvinokonzera kuti vashushikane nekuti vanomirira vashandi ava munzvimbo dzavo. Mwedzi wapfuura hurumende yakatadza kubhadhara vashandi vayo uye vakatozotambira mihoro yemwedzi wapera mwedzi uno. Mwedzi uno, hurumende haisati yabhadhara vashandi uye haisati yataura kuti vachatambira rini. No media source currently available

headline: VaTsvangirai Vanoti MDC Ndiyo Chete Inogona Kugadzirisa Hupfumi, Kwete Zanu PF
text: Mutungamiri webato reMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vanoti mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, pamwe nebato ravo reZanu PF mucherechedzo wekutadza kutungamiri nyika vachiti bato reMDC-T rine hurongwa hwakajeka hwekuburitsa nyika mumatambudziko ayiri kana vakapiwa mukana wekutonga. No media source currently available Vachitaura pagungano revatsigiri vavo paMkoba 5 Golf Course muGweru neChina masikati, VaTsvangirai vati hazvichabatsire kuti vanhu vaswere vachishora kana kutukirira VaMugabe sezvo zvave pachena kuti havana zano rekukwanisa kuburitsa nyika mumatambudziko ayakatarisana nawo. VaTsvangirai vati bato ravo rine hurongwa hwakajeka kuburikidza nechirongwa chebato iri chekuwanira vanhu mabasa, kusimudzirwa kwehupfumi pamwe nekugadzirisa chimiro chenyika. Vati hurongwa uhu hune hwaro hwakanaka hwekuunza mabasa munyika. Vati kana vakapinda muhurumende bato ravo richaita kuti munyika muwanikwe mabasa kuburikidza nehurongwa hwekugadzuruddza mitemo inovhiringidza hupfumi hwenyika uye kuita kuti vanhu vane mapurazi vawane ma title deeds. VaTsvangirai vafananidza nyika nemurwere kana kuti munhu anenge akakuvara zvakaipisisa achibuda ropa vakati panguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa, vakakwanisa kumisa kubuda kweropa uku asi pari zvino hurwere hwadzoka zvekare. VaTsvangirai vati chinhu chinorwadza kuti vechidiki vakawanda vane zera rekuti vangadai vachishanda mumaindasitiri havana kumboziva kuti chinonzi kushanda chii muhupenyu hwavo nekuda kwekuti makambani ari kuramba achivhara uye vanhu vakwanda vave kurarama nekutengesa mumigwagwa. Vatiwo hazvivashamise kuti pane nhaurwa yekuti hurumende iri kuda kudzora mari yemuZimbabwe sezvo isisina nzira yekuramba ichiwana mari yekunze nekuda kwemamiriro akaipa ezvehupfumi, asi vati kudzora mari yemuZimbabwe uku hakuna zvakunonyanyobatsira. VaTsvangirai vati dambudziko guru rakatarisana nenyika ndere kuti kunyange hazvo bato ravo riri iro rine hutsigiri hwakawanda harizi kukwanisa kupinda muhurumende nekuda kwehumbimbindoga hwebato reZanu PF, vakatsinhira danho rebato ravo rekuti harizi kuzopinda musarudzo dzose dzichaitwa munyika kusvikira mitemo inosanganisira yekufambiswa kwesarudzo yagadziridzwa. Pamubvunzo wekuti saka bato ravo richapinda sei muhurumende, VaTsvangirai havana kunyatsobuda pachena vachipa muenzaniso wevatammbi vebhora avo vati havarambe vachiudzwa zvekuita kana vave munhandare. Asi sachigaro weboka revechidiki reMDC-T, VaHappymore Chidziva, avo vataurawo pagungano iri vabuda pachena vakati munguva pfupi iri kutevera, vechidiki vebato iri vachatumira gwaro rekunyunyuta kwavo pamusoro pekushaya mabasa, vakaenderera mberi vachiti vechidiki ava vacharatidzira kana VaMugabe vakasavapa mhinduro inogutsa. VaChidziva vati vechidiki vemuZimbabwe vari parumananzombe sezvo vari kuona nhamo munyika uye vamwe vavo vakanotsvaga raramo kuSouth Africa vave kufa mumhirizhonga iri kuitwa nevanhu vekuSouth Africa kuvanhu vanobva kunze kwenyika iyi. Musangano wanhasi wange wakananga nekuudza vechidiki vasiri kushanda kuti MDC-T ine hurongwa hupi hwekuunza mabasa uye kugadzirisa mamwe matambudziko akatarisana nenyika kana yapinda muhurumende. Bato iri rashandisawo mukana uyu kuti riburitse pachena danho raro rekuti harichapinda musarudzo dzipi zvadzo munyika kusvika mitemo yavandudzwa. VeMDC-T vatorawo mukana wekuzivisa nezvekudzoka kubato iri kwevamwe vatsigiri vaive vambosiya bato iri kusanganisira vaimbove meya weguta reGweru, VaTedious Chimombe, pamwe nevaive mutevedzeri wavo, VaTaurai Demo. Vanoziva zviri kuitika mu MDC-T vanoti bato iri rinofanirwa kuisa misoro pamwe chete, kwete kuita mweya yekufungirana zvakaipa sezviri kuitika mubato iri pari zvino, kana richida kubudirira musarudzo dzichaitwa munyika. Vanhu ava vanoti hapana chinobudirira kana vanhu vasina kubatana uye vachiita muonera pamwe pazvinhu zvavanoita sebato.

headline: Hurumende Inokurudzirwa Kuendesa Muzvare Joanna Mamombe kuChipatara
text: Sangano reWomen's Academy for Leadership and Political Excellence, kana kuti WALPE, uye rimwe rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu pasi rose, reInternational Commission of Jurists (ICJ), ari kukurudzira hurumende yeZimbabwe kuti iendese kuchipatara mumiriri weHarare West mudare reparamende, Muzvare Joana Mamombe, vebato reMDC Alliance, avo vasiri kunzwa zvakanaka kujeri reChikurubi kwavari. Muzvare Mamombe vari kupomerwa mhosva yekutyora mitemo yeCovid-19. Kunyangwe vange vamboendeswa kuchipatara cheParktown nemusi weChina, Muzvare Mamombe vakamanikidzwa kubuditswa muchipatara ichi nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori kunyangwe vanachiremba vaiti vaifanira kugara muchipatara vachivhenekwa. Sangano reICJ rinoti zvave pachena kuti mutemo wave kushandiswa sechombo chekutsikirira vanopikisa muZimbabwe. Sangano iri rinoti mukusaburitsa Muzvare Mamombe mujeri, hurumende iri kutyora bumbiro remutemo, pachikamu chechimakumi mashanu, kana kuti Article 50(d), chinoti musungwa ane kodzero yekurapwa. Rinotiwo Zimbabwe iri kutyora zvibvumirano neUnited Nations pakubata vasungwa. Tatumira mibvunzo kugurukota rezvemitemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, nezvemashoko aya asi vange vasati vapindura pataenda pamhepo. Tatumirawo mimwe mibvunzo yedu kumutauriri weZimbabwe Prisons and Correctional Services (ZPCS), Superintendent Meya Khanyezi, asi vange vasatiwo vapindura. Mukuru wesangano reWALPE, Muzvare Stabile Dewa, vanoti havasi kufara nemabatirwo ari kuitwa Muzvare Mamombe. No media source currently available

headline: Munzwembiri otungamirira Zim kuWorld Beach Games
text: ZIMBABWE Olympic Committee (ZOC) inoti iri kufara zvikuru nekugadzwa kwakaitwa Merit Munzwembiri – uyo akafanobata chigaro chadirector tv production and digital platforms kuZimbabwe Broadcating Corporation (ZBC) – saChef De Mission (CDM) weZimbabwe Bali 2023 Beach Games.   Mitambo yeWorld Beach Games yakaitirwa kuchitsuwa cheBali kuIndonesia kubva nemusi wa5 Nyamavhuvhu kusvika 12 Nyamavhuvhu.   Mushure mekubudirira kwake musarudzo dzakaitwa, bhodhi reZOC nemusi wa15 Gunyana rakazadzikisa kugadzwa kwaMunzwembiri saChef De Mission weZimbabwe Bali Beach Games 2023.   Izvi zvakaitwa zvichifambirana nemitemo uye zvinangwa zveZOC Athletes Development and Support senzira yekuona kuti zvikwata zvemuZimbabwe zvawaniswa rutsigiro rwakakwana kuti zvizokwanisa kupinda mumakwikwi enyika dzepasi rose mugore ra2025.   Munzwembiri ndiye zvekare sachigaro anoona nezvenyaya dzekuenzaniswa kwemikana pakati pevanhukadzi nevanhurume kuZOC.   “Ndiri kufara zvikuru nekusarudzwa kwandakaitwa muchirongwa ichi chemaWorld Beach Games 2023 uye ndiri kuvimbisa kushanda nesimba kuti tisimudzire mureza weZimbabwe munyaya dzezvemitambo,” anodaro Munzwembiri.   “Kuburikidza nemitambo iyi, tine donzvo rekusimudzira chimiro chedu seZOC.”

headline: Zvirwere zveManyoka Zvotarisirwa Kuwedzera Kunzvimbo Dzakaparadzwa neDutumupengo
text: Mukuru mubazi rezvehutano Dr Robert Madyiradima vanoti huwandu wezvirwere zvemanyoka huchawedzera munzvimbo dzakaparadzwa nedambudziko renemafashamu emvura nemhepo kana kuti Tropical Cyclone Idai sezvo kusina mvura yekunwa yakachena kune dzimwe nzvimbo uko kusiri kusvikika parizvino. Dr Madyiradima vanoti chikuru parizvino ndechekuti vanhu vazvichengetedze vakamirira kuwana rubatsiro. Chiremba ava vanoti bazi ravo riri kushanda nebazi reCivil Protection Unit nemamwe mapazi ehurumende mukuyedza kuendesa rubatsiro kune vakakuvara nevarwere. Vanhu vanodarika makumi mapfumbamwe nevasere vanonzi vafa kuChipinge, Chimanimani neMasvingo nekuda kwedutumupengo iri. No media source currently available

headline: ZESN Inoti Gwaro reVavhoti Ngarigadziriswe
text: Sangano rinoongorora sarudzo rakazvimirira reZimbabwe Election Support Network rinoti richange richiongorora sarudzo dzemaby-elections dziri kuitwa neMugovera kuMbire, Marondera neEpworth. Asi ZESN inoti pachine zvakawanda zvinoda kugadziriswa zvikuru pakatariswa gwaro revavhoti iro risina kumira zvakanaka parizvino. Gwaro revavhoti ragara richikonzera mutauro wakanyanya munyika panguva yesarudzo. ZESN inotiwo vavhoti vanoda kudzidziswa zvakasimba nenyaya dzezvinodiwa mukuvhota. Mapato makuru anopikisa akaita seMovement for Democratic Change inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, People’s Democratic Party uye MDC inotungamirwa naVaWelshman Ncube haasi kupinda musarudzo idzi achiti anoda kuti mitemo yesarudzo itange yavandudzwa kusanganisawo nyaya yegwaro revavhoti. Asi veZanu-PF vanoti vanopikisa vasiri kupinda musarudzo vari kutya kukundwa. Sarudzo idzi dziri kuitwa mushure mekushaya kwaVaAmos Midzi vekuEpworth uye kudzingwa mubato kwaVaRay Kaukonde vekuMarondera Central naVaDavid Butau vekuMbire. No media source currently available

headline: Bhuku reNhoroondo yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa Rokonzera Mutauro Mukuru Munyika
text: Bato reMDC Alliance rinoti bhuku renhoroondo yemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, iro rakaparurwa nezuro, harina kuburitsa mabasa akaipa akaitwa naVaMnangagwa munguva yeGukurahundi apo vaive gurukota rezvekuchengetedzwa kwenyika. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatywayo, vanoti pane zvinhu zvakawanda zvisiri mubhuku raVaMnangagwa izvo vati zvinosanganisira zvinonzi zvakaita naVaMnangagwa munguva yeGukurahundi nezvimwe. Mashoko aVaHlatywayo anotevera kuparurwa kwbhuku iri nezuro, iro riri kudaidzwa kuti “A Life of Sacrifice - A Biography of Emerson Mnangagwa,” rakanyorwa nevaimbova nhengo yeMDC yaimirira Bulawayo South muparamende, VaEddie Cross. Vanhu vakawanda vaenda pamadandemutande avo eFacebook neTwitter vachitaura pamwe nekutsoropodza bhuku iri vachiti VaMnangagwa vaifanira kunge vakashandisa nguva yavakatora bhuku iri richinyorwa kugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika uyewo vamwe vachiti bhuku iri rakanakira kuti veruzhinji vazive nzira dzakafambwa nemutungamiri wenyika. Asi gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vati pane zvakawanda zvekudzidza mubhuku iri. Bhuku iri rinotsanangura hupenyu hwaVaMnangagwa kubva pavakapinda mune zvematongerwo enyika nyika isati yawana kuzvitonga, kusungwa kwavaiitwa munguva yehondo yerusununguko, basa ravakabata muhurumende pasi pehutongi hwemushakabvu VaRobert Mugabe kusvika pari zvino vave mutungamiri wenyika. Mubhuku iri, VaMnangagwa vanotsanangura kusungwa kwavakaitwa nyika isati yawana kuzvitonga kuzere vachiti vakatengeswa nemumwe aive mutungamiri wavo munguva yehondo uye vanotsanangurawo kuti vamwe vavaishanda navo vakavatengesa kuna VaMugabe vachiti vanhu ava vaida kuti vauraiwe zvakazoita kuti vazotiza munyika muna 2017 pakazopindira mauto mune zvematongerwo enyika zvakazokonzeresa kuti VaMugabe vasiye basa. Mutungamiri weDemocratic Party, VaUrayai Zembe, vatiwo chinhu chakanaka kuti mabhuku anyorwe kuitira kuti veruzhinji vagoziva nhoroondo dzevatungamiriri vavo. Kubva parakaparurwa nezuro, bhuku iri rinonzi riri kutengwa zvinoshura mare zvekuti nezuro chete zvinonzi kwakatengwa mabhuku anodarika zviuru makumi makumi mashanu uye riri kutengeswa nemari inoita madhora gumi nemashanu ekuAmerica. No media source currently available

headline: Mari Yoshomeka Munyika Zvokatyamadza Nyanzvi Dzakawanda
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kuyambira kuti nyika yananga kumawere uye zvinogona kukonzera kusagadzikana kwenyika sezvo mari mumabhanga iri kuramba ichishaikwa kunyange hazvo hurumende iri kuti iri kugadzirisa dambudziko iri. Gavhuna webhanga guru renyika, VaJohn Mangudya, vakati Zimbabwe yainge yawana mari inosvika mamiriyoni mazana matanhatu emadhora senzira yekugadzirisa dambudziko remari asi vakawanda vanoti zvinhu zvatonyanya kuita manyama amire nerongo. Kunyange hazvo huremu hwemabond notes hwaderera, vemabhizimisi makuru vanoti vari kumanikidzwa kutengesa zvinhu nemutemo wakafanana pamabond notes nemadhora ekuAmerica. Mamwe mabhangi akaita seSteward Bank neStandard Bank ange achibvumidza kuti vanhu vatore mari pamaATM cards kana vari kunze kwenyika mumazuva mashoma apfuura, amira kuita izvi achiti mumabhanga hamuchina mari kunyange hazvo vanhu ava vakaisa mari dzavo mumabhanga acho. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti vemabhizimisi makuru ndivo vave kunyanya kuomerwa nezvinhu sezvo vachisungwa vakasatevera mitemo yeReserve Bank of Zimbabwe. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wesangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaCallisto Jokonya, avo vati havana zvavangaite kunze kwekutevedzera mutemo. Vaimbova gurukota rinoona nezvemari, VaTendai Biti, vanoti mari mumabhanga hamuchina sezvo hurumende ichiramba ichikwereta mari kumabhanga isingadzosere. Nyaya yekushomeka kwemari iyi yakambopawo kuti mafuta ekubikisa ashaikwe munyika. Asi ikozvino mukuru wesangano reOil Expressers Association, VaBusisa Moyo, vanoti zvave nani. Ko dambudziko iri ringagadziriswe sei chaizvo? VaJokonya vanoti panoda kuti Zimbabwe ikwezve vemabhizimisi vekunze. VaChitambara vanotiwo aya ndiwo maonero avo. Nekuona kuti zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi zvainge zvaenda kumawere, mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakadoma gurukota idzva rezvemari, VaIgnatius Chombo, vachibvisa VaPatrick Chinamasa. Asi VaChitambara vanoti havaone VaChombo vachikwanisa kugadzirisa dambudziko iri. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti kunetsana mubato reZanu-PF, uye sarudzo dziriko gore rinouya, zviri kupawo kuti zvinhu zvinetse kugadzirisa sezvo pasina ari kunyatsotarisa zvingabatsira nyika. Kudzamara vakuru muZanu PF nemuhurumende vaisa zvido zvenyika pamberi pezvido zvavo, matambudziko akadai acharamba achiwanda munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Makambani eZvicherwa Anoti Haakwanise Kuwedzera Vashandi Mari yeMihoro
text: Makambani aya anoti akatarisana nematambudziko munyaya dzemutengo wemagetsi, kuwanikwa kwemari yekuwedzera mabasa pamwe nezvimwe zvaanoshandisa zvisiri kuwanikwa. Ongororo yakabuda nemusi weMuvhuro inotarisa mamiriro ezvinhu munyaya dzezvicherwa inonzi “State of the Mining Industry Survey” inoti makambani ose anochera zvicherwa, kusanganisira Anglo Platinum, Caledonia Mining Corporation nemamwe, haakwanise kuwedzera vashandi mari gore rinouya. Makambani aya anoti akatarisana nematambudziko munyaya dzemutengo wemagetsi, kuwanikwa kwemari yekuwedzera mabasa pamwe nezvimwe zvaanoshandisa zvisiri kuwanikwa. Asi vashandi vari kuchema chema vachitiwo zvinhu zvavaomera sezvo mitengo yezvinhu iri kuramba ichiita chamurambamhuru. Gore rapera mari inotambiriswa mushandi yepasi pasi yakawedzerwa kusvika pamadhora mazana maviri ane makumi mana nematanhatu emadhora. Kunyange hazvo vemakambani vari kuti zvinhu zvavaomera, mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvezvicherwa, VaFred Moyo, vakaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kuyedza napose pavanogona kudzikisa mitero kumakambani aya kuti awane chouviri. Asi zvinhu zvinenge zvaramba zvakaitawo manyama amire nerongo sezvo kambani yeZesa yave kuda mari pamberi kubva kumakambani aya kuti ikwanise kubhadhara magetsi ayiri kutenga kuEskom yekuSouth Africa. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutungamiri weChamber of Mines, VaToendepi Muganyi, sezvo vanzi vange vari mumusangano. Mutungamiri wesangano revashandi reNational Mine Workers' Union of Zimbabwe, VaNdodana Sithole, vanoti vari kushungurudzwa nemashoko ekusawedzerwa mari kwevashandi. No media source currently available

headline: Kushungurudzwa kweZvizvarwa zveKunze Zvichirambidzwa Kupinda muZvipatara neChikwata cheOperation Dudula muSouth Africa kwoenderera Mberi
text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa zvinoti zvinhu hazvichina kumira zvakanaka sezvo nyaya dzekushungurudzwa nezvizvarwa zvenyika iyi dziri kuenderera mberi, kunyange hazvo hurumende dzenyika mbiri idzi dziri kuti dziri kutaurirana. Nhengo dzechikwata cheOperation Dudula, icho chiri kurwisa kuti zvizvarwa zvekunze kweSouth Africa zvibude munyika iyi, dzaenderera mberi nekurambidza vekunze kupinda muzvipatara nemakiriniki zvehurumende zviri muJohannesburg nemuPretoria. Chikwata ichi changa chakamira pamikova yemakiriniki ari muJohannesburg anosanganisira Hillbrow Community Health Centre, uye chinonzi chakatanga kurambidza vekunze kupinda muzvipatara neMuvhuro apo chakavhara mukova wechipatara chikuru cheKalafong Provincial Tertiary Hospital chiri mudunhu re Gauteng. Nhengo dzebato rinopikisa reEconomic FreedomFighters (EFF) dzinonzi dzanga dziri pachipatara ichi neChitatu dzakagarira veOperation Dudula ava kuti vasarambidza varwere kupinda muchipatara ichi. Izvi zviri kuuya mushure mekunge mumwe mukuru wezvehutano mudunhu reLimpopo, Dr. Phophi Ramathuba svondo rapera vanyadzisa chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chairwara chiri mune chimwe chipatara mudunhu iri vachiti vekunze vari kupedzera vemuSouth Africa mishonga nezvikwanisiro. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende kanawo mapurisa panyaya iyi. Asi chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri muPretoria muSouth Africa, Mufundisi Richard Moyo, avo vari kutevera zviri kuitika, vanoti nhau iyi inhau inosiririsa uye kurwadza kuona zviri kuitwa vekunze nezvizvarwa zvaSouth Africa, uchiona kuti vari kushungurudzwa ava vanenge vari varwere kana vari kuperekedza varwere. Mufundisi Moyo vanoti kunyange hazvo mapurisa ari kuzama kubatsira, havaoni ari kuita zvinoita kuti kushungurudzwa uku kumiswe, vachiti vanopa mhosva yose iyi kuhurumende yeSouth Africa, iyo vanoti haisi kumisa chikwata cheOperation Dudula. No media source currently available

headline: Tabhadhara zvikwereti zvose: Zifa
text: SANGANO rinotungamira nhabvu munyika muno reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) rinoti rakapedza kubhadhara zvikwereti zvaro zvese zvaisvika $7 miriyoni kumakambani, mapoka akasiyana pamwe nekuvanhu vakazvimirira.   Achitaura neKwayedza svondo rino, mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weZifa, Omega Sibanda, anoti sangano ravo harisisina chikwereti nemunhu kana kambani zvayo sezvo rakapedza kubhadhara zvose.   Zifa yaive nezvikwereti izvo zvakange zvasvika $7 miriyoni asi gore rino muna Kubvumbi mutungamiri wesangano iri Phillip Chiyangwa akabuda achitaura kuti vakange vasarirwa nechikwereti che$2 miriyoni chete.   “Takapedza kubhadhara zvikwereti zvose zvatainge tinazvo izvo zvaidzorera basa redu kumashure. Iye zvino zvinhu zvave kuchiendeka nekuti takapedza kubhadhara.   “Asi, kana achiripo anoti hatina kumupa mari yake akasununguka kuuya kwatiri otirakidza mapepa ake anotaura kuti tine chikwereti naye toona kuti neatinawo zviri kuenderana here.   “Kana tatarisa tikaona kuti zviri kuenderana tonyorerana pasi toona kuti tobhadharana sei kusvika munhu iyeye tamupa mari yake yechikwereti chake,” anodaro Sibanda.   Nyaya yezvikwereti izvi yakambodzorera nhabvu yemuno kumashure zvikuru izvo zvakaona maWarriors achirambidzwa kuwana mukana wekurwira kuenda kumutambo we2018 World Cup nekuda kwechikwereti chaive neZifa kuna Valinhos uyo akamborairidza maWarriors.   Sibanda anoti parizvino hapana chichavatadzisa kuti basa ravo rifambire mberi nekuti havasisina zvimhingamipinyi zvinosanganisira zvikwereti izvo zvakange zvakavamomotera.   “Iye zvino tave kuchifambisa basa, hapasisina chinotidzorera shure nekuti zvikwereti takapedza kubhadhara. Basa tave kuita takasununguka uye mari yatichange tichiwana tichaishandisa mubasa redu,” anodaro.   Sibanda – uyo achangobva kudzoserwa pachigaro chake kuZifa pamwe chete naChiyangwa – anoti sangano ravo rine hurongwa hwekusimudzira nhabvu yekumaruwa.   “Chinhu chikuru chatiri kuda kushanda kuti chibudirire kuendesa nhabvu kumamisha uko nekumapurazi kune vanhu vakawanda uye vane rudo nenhabvu asi havawaniswe mukana wekuona mutambo uyu saka tinoda kuendesa mutambo kwavari.   “Tinogara tichitaura nenyaya dzegrassroots nguva dzese, kumamisha uko ndiko kwadzinotangira nekuti kune vana vane matarenda uye tarenda ravo rinoda kuonekwa robikwa zvakasimba.   “Saka nhabvu tiri kuenda nayo ikoko uye varairidzi venhabvu vakuru vane mukurumbira vanofanirwa kuendako vachinoshanda nevana,” anodaro Sibanda.

headline: Bulawayo Inokwidza Mitero Zvakanyanyisa Mubhajeti ra2021
text: Kanzuru yeguta reBulawayo ichakwidza mitero nezvikamu zvinodarika mazana matatu nemakumi manomwe kubva muzana izvo zvisiri kutambirwa nemufaro nevagari vakawanda. Kanzuru yeguta reBulawayo yazivisa kuti ichakwidza mitero yayo nezvikamu zvinopfuura mazana matatu nemakumi manomwe nezviviri kuna kumaza,kana kuti 372 per cent kubva muna Ndira gore rinouya. Mutauriri wekanzuru, Amai Nesisa Mpofu, vabvuma izvi kuStudio 7 vachiti izvi zvinotevera kutambirwa nehurumende kwesupplementary budget yegore rino yakaitwa nekanzuru muna Gunyana. Kanzuru yakaita bhajeti remadhora 2.7 billion mugore rino ra2020 uye yakaita bhajeti remadhora 17, 1 billion yegore rinouya asi bhajeti iyi haisati yapasiswa nebazi rezvekutongwa kwematunhu. Mukuru wesangano reBulawayo United Residents Association, VaRodrick Fayayo, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti sangano ravo richaita musangano wechimbi-chimbi nenhengo dzaro kuti vaone kuti votora danho ripi, vachiti kukwidzwa kwemitero uku kuchawomesera veruzhinji. Mumwe mugari, VaBrian Maphosa, vati vagari vakawanda vagara vakatoomerwa nehupenyu zvekuti kukwidzwa kwemitero uku kuchaita kuti vakawanda vatadze kubhadhara mitero yavo. Mumwe mudzidzisi wezvidzidzo zvebudiriro, VaFelix Chari, vati kutambirwa kwesupplementary bhajeti yekanzuru nehurumende kunoratidza pachena kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzezvehupfumi. \n\nVati makanzuru ari parumananzombe nekuti anofanirwa kuwana mari yekuita mabasa aanotarisirwa kuita nemazvo asi nekune rimwe divi anofanirwa kubhadharisa mitero inokwanisa kubhadharwa neveruzhinji. Makanzuru emaguta nemadhorobha akawanda munyika anogara achichemachema nerekuti haawane mari yakakwana yekuita mabasa aanotarisirwa kuita nevagari. No media source currently available

headline: CCC Yopemberera Kukunda kuBulilima, Zanu-PF Ichiti Bato Iri Haridi Kukundwa Chete
text: Bato rinopikisa reCitizens Coalition for Change ndiro rakunda musarudzo mbiri panhatu dzemakanzura ekumaruwa dzakaitwa kuBulilima nemusi weMugovera. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato reCitizens Coalition for Change VaOstallos Siziba vati kunyangwe painge paine kutyisidzirwa kwakanyanya pamberi pesarudzo idzi, vanhu vakavhotera bato ravo. Mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mubato reZanu-PF VaTafadzwa Mugwadi vati vanokorokotedza vakakunda asi vakati veCCC vakakundwa mune remangwana havafanire kuramba kutambira zvinenge zvabuda musarudzo. Izvi zvakaburitswa nekomisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yeZimbawe Electoral Commission kana kuti ZEC. Sarudzo idzi dzakaitwa mushure mumwe kanzura weZanu-PF afa uye vamwe vaviri vasiya basa. MuWard 16, VaMakhadi Moyo veCCC ndivo vakakunda vakapinda musarudzo vanoti Muzvare Jane Moyo veZanu-PF naVaHitman Ncube veZapu. Muward 1 vakakunda ndiVaEphraim Moyo veCCC, vakakunda VaDalton Moyo, vePPP, VaKossam Ndlovu veZanu-PF uye Amai Lindiwe Nyoni veCGC. VaExperience Dube veZanu-PF vakakunda muWard 14 vachikunda veCCC neZapu. Sangano reZimbabwe Election Support Network kana kuti ZESN raingorora sarudzo idzi rakati vanhu vashoma ndivo vakaenda kunovhota asi richiti izvi zvinowanzoitika musarudzo dzemaby elections. ZEC inoti vanhu vakavhota vanoti darikei zvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana.

headline: ‘Tagadzirira’ . . . bhora ngaritambwe.
text: KUCHANGE kusingadanwe anonzwa svondo rino kunhandare dzinosanganisira National Sports Stadium muHarare, Mandava Stadium (Zvishavane) neBabourfields (Bulawayo) uko zvikwata zvemuPremier Soccer League zvichatatsurana mumutambo weChibuku Super Cup.   Iyi ichave mitambo yekutanga yezvikwata izvi kubva pakamiswa mitambo yose munaKurume gore rapera nechinangwa chekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Svondo rino, Kwayedza yakaita hurukuro nevarairidzi vezvikwata zvakasiyana avo vakarakidza mufaro mukuru nekudzoka kwenhabvu.   Murairidzi weFC Platimun, shasha dzePSL, Norman Mapeza anoti nguva yanga yareba vatambi vakangogara.    Mapeza   “Isu semakore ese tinotambira kuti tihwine uye iye zvino tiri kushanda nesimba kuti tigohwina. Asi tiri kutanga patsva nekuti takashandura zvakawanda kuchikwata chedu, vamwe vatambi vakaenda kukauya vamwe. Saka tichafamba nebhora nekuti tinoziva kuti zvimwe zvikwata zvinoda kusvika patiri,” anodaro Mapedza. FC Platinum kana kuti Pure Platinum Play iri muboka reGroup 4 rine zvikwata zvinoti Ngezi Platinum, Triangle neWhahwa. Murairidzi weDynamos FC – Tonderai “Stanza” Ndiraya – anoti nhabvu yadzoka panguva yakanaka chose. Anoti DeMbare yagara inozivikanwa sechikwata chikuru saka mwaka uno vanoda kurakidza nyika yose kuburikidza nekuhwina mikombe yakawanda.   “Zita rekungoti Dynamos chete ihombe uye zvakawanda zvinotarisirwa kubva kwatiri. Saka isu sechikwata tinovimbisa kuti tichashanda nesimba kuti mwaka uno vatsigiri vedu vagofara tahwina mikombe yakasiyana.   “Asi sezvo tange tave nenguva ndefu takangogara, tinokumbira kuvatsigiri vedu kuti ngavatipe nguva kana tikakundikana tinenge takundikana sezvo vakomana vachiri nengura. Asi ndinofara hangu nekuti tiri kutangirana zvikwata zvose sezvo tose tange takagara nguva ndefu,” anodaro Ndiraya.   DeMbare yakaiswa muboka rine zvikwata zvinoti CAPS United, Henrentals, Harare City neZPC Kariba. Iri ndiro rega boka rine zvikwata zvitanhatu sezvo mamwe ese ane zvikwata zvina.   Kuchiti kuBulawayo, murairidzi weChicken Inn — Joey “Mafero” Antipas — anoti chikwata chake hachisati chambohwina Chibuku Super Cup saka vacharwa semvumba gore rino kuti vatore mukombe uyu. Mafero akatungamira maGamecocks mugore ra2015 kuhwina mukombe wePSL.   “Kudzoka kwenhabvu kunofadza uye tiri kutanga nemukombe weChibuku uyo tisati tambohwina sechikwata saka mwaka uno ticharwa semvumba kuti tiuhwine,” anodaro MaGamecocks ari muboka reGroup 2 rine zvikwata zvinoti Bulawayo City, Bulawayo Chiefs neHighlanders.   KuManicaland, murairidzi wechikwata chichangopinda muPSL cheCranborne Bullets — Nesbert “Yabo” Saruchera — anoti ino ndiyo nguva chikwata chavo yange yakamirira.   “Nguva yatange takamirira yazosvika manje, tange takamirira kwenguva ndefu saka tiri kufara uye takagadzirira kusangana nezvimwe zvikwata tigovarakidza kuti isu tauya tichipisa.   “Mumutambo weChibuku Super Cup, vamwe vari muboka redu ngavazive kuti isu tatobudirira kufambira mberi mumutambo uyu. Hatina kupinda kuzozadzikisa mazita kwete asi tinoda kutaridza nyika kuti nhabvu iyi tinotoiziva,” anodaro Saruchera.   MATCH DAY 1 GROUP 1 Caps United FC v Yadah FC Harare City FC v ZPC Kariba FC Herentals FC v Dynamos FC GROUP 2 Bulawayo City FC v Chicken Inn FC; Bulawayo Chiefs FC v Highlanders FC GROUP 3 Tenax FC v Black Rhinos FC Manica Diamonds FC v Cranborne Bullets FC GROUP 4 Ngezi Platinum Stars FC v Triangle United FC

headline: ZCTU Inoudza Dare Kuti Mushandi Haafanirwe Kumakidzwa Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Sangano revashandi, reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZTCU, raenda kumatare nechikumbiro chechimbichimbi chekuti vashandi vasamanikidzwe kubayiwa nhomba dzekudzivirira Covid-19 richiti zviri kuitwa pari zvino zviri kutyora kodzero dzevashandi. ZCTU yaendesa kudare gurukota revashandi, VaPaul Mavima, gweta guru rehurumende, VaPrince Machaya, pamwe nemamwe makambani ari kurambidza vashandi vasina kubayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 kuenda kubasa. Makambani aya anosanganisira makambani ehurumende anoti NetOne neZimbabwe National Road Administration kozitiwo makambani akaita seWindmill, Zimnat Insurance, SeedCo Zimbabwe pamwe neManicaland State University of Applied Science. Munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vaenda kudare mushure mekuwana zvichemo zvakawanda kubva kuvashandi vari kurambidzwa kushanda nekuti havana kubayiwa nhomba dzekudzivirira Covid-19. VaMoyo vati vanhu vane zvikonzero zvakasiyana siyana zvekuti vasabayiwe zvinosanganisira kutoshaya nhomba dzacho. Vatiwo hazvina zvazvinobatsira kuti makambani aya anorambidza vashandi vasina kubayiwa kushanda asi vatengi vemakambani aya vachibvumidzwa kupinda mukambani aya vasina kubayiwa izvo vati rusarura rwunifanuira kumiswa. Vatiwo zvinosuwisa kuti hurumende iri kuramba yakapeta maoko kodzero dzevanhu dzichitsikwa tsikwa. Mutungamiriri wesangano revashandirwi reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, Dr Israel Murefu, vaudza Studio 7 kuti pana nhengo dzavo dziri kutora matanho ekuchetedza hutano hwevashandi. Dr Murefu vati sekuziva kwavo hapana vashandi vari kudzingwa basa nekuti havana kubayiwa nhomba vachiti vari kungonzi vagare kumba kuitira kuti vasaparadzire chirwere ichi kune vaya vakabayiwa. VaMavima vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kupikisa chikumbiro cheZCTU kudare. Vati kuenda kumatare handiko kungagadzirisa nyaya iyi vachiti hurumende, vashandi nevashandirwi vanofanira kuita nhaurirano dzekugadzirisa nyaya iyi pasi peTripatite Negotiating Forum. Vatiwo zvakakosha kuti vashandirwi nevashandi vataurirane mumakambani avo. Vatiwo denda reCovid-19 riri kupedza vanhu pasi rese uye hurumende haingaregi vanhu vachipera nekuda kwekuti pane vamwe vasingade kubayiwa nhomba dzekudzivirira Covid-19. Dare repamusoro rinotarisirwa kutara zuva rekuti nyaya yeZCTU ichanzikwa rini svondo rinouya. Zimbabwe inoti iri kuronga kubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzanakuitirakuti Covid-19 isarambe ichipararira munyika.

headline: Mumwe Mudzimai Oparura Bato Idzva reZveMatongerwo eNyika
text: Mumwe muzvinabhizimusi wekuHwange, Amai Elisabeth Valerio, nhasi vaparura bato ravo rezvematongerwo enyika muHarare vachikurudzira nyika dzekunze kuti dzione kuti sarudzo dzegore rinouya dzaitwa zviri pachena. Vachitaura pavaparura bato ravo nhasi ravari kudaidza kuti United Zimbabwe Alliance, Amai Valerio, avo vane kambani inoita nezvemhuka kuHwange, vati hwaro hwesarudzo hunofanira kuvandudzwa sarudzo dzegore rinouya dzisati dzaitwa kuitira kuti sarudzo idzi dzigoitwa mune zvakanaka. Vatiwo nyika dzekunze dzinofanira kupindira munyaya dzesarudzo idzi kuitira kuti sarudzo dzigoitwa zviri pachena vachiti vane tarisiro yekukunda musarudzo dzegore rinouya. Vaendererera mberi vachitiwo bato ravo riri kushanda zvakasimba munzvimbo ina dzariri kukwikwidza musarudzo dzema by-election kutsvaga nhengo dzeparamende vachiti vari kutarisira kukunda munzvimbo idzi. Bato iri riri kukwikwidza munzvimbo dzinoti Kuwadzana East, Harare East, Mbizo pamwe neKwekwe Central. VaValerio, avo vanoti aka ndekekutanga kupinda munezvematongerwo enyika, vavimbisa kuti vana vese vedzidzo yepasi kana kuti parimary vachange vachidzidza mahara kana bato ravo rikakunda musarudzo degore rinouya. Vati donzvo rebato ravo nderekuvaka nyika yavanoti yawondongwa nehurumende yeZanu PF vakati havasi kuzomirira kutanga vapinda muhutongi kuti vaite izvi. Vati panopera gore rino vachange vavhura makambani makumi matatu zvichaita kuti veruzhinji, zvikurusei vechidiki nemadzimai, vawane mabasa. Amai Valerio vati kana bato ravo rikapinda panyanga richaita kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kutizira kune dzimwe nyika kunotsvaga mafuro manyoro zvidzoke sezvo vachiti munyika muchange mave nehuchi nemukaka vagadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika. Amai Zvanyadza Mutsigwa vanogara mumusha weDzivarasekwa muno muHarare vati vafara nemashoko aturwa naAmai Valerio pakuparura kwavaita bato ravo reUnited Zimbabwe Alliance kana kuti UZA. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemtongerwo, VaRashweat Mukundu, vati hapana chakaipa kuti mapato ezvematongerwo enyika awande munyika vachiti ndizvo zvinoratidza kuti nyika yakasununguka. Asi VaMukundu vati kunyukanyuka kunoita mapato ezvematongerwo enyika kana patarisanwa nesarudzo zvinopa mukana wekuti mapato anopikisa apatsanure mavhoti. Zimbabwe yakatarisana nesarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika, paramende pamwe nemakanzuru gore rinouya uye Amai Valerio, avo vati vachatora vanhu vese vachishanda navo zvisinei nekuti vanga vari kumapato api, vati pachaitwa sarudzo idzi vachange vaita gadziriro dzakakwana vachiti bato ravo richakwikwidza zvigaro zvose.

headline: Ongororo yeHurumende Inoti Goho reMwaka Uno Rishoma
text: Gwaro remamiriro ezvinhu munyika panyaya dzechikafu reCrop Assessment Report rinoratidza kuti nyika inofanira kutenga chibage chinosvika zviuru mazana manomwe zvematani gore rino kuti vanhu vasaziye nenzara. Gwaro iri rinoratidza kuti goho rakadzika nezvikamu makumi mana nezvipfumbamwe kubva muzana zvichikonzerwa nekusanaya zvakanaka kwemvura pamwe nemafashamu emvura. Gwaro iri rinoti Masvingo ndiro dunhu rine nzara yakanyanya asi zvinhu zviri nani zvikuru kuMashonaland West ne Mashonaland Central. Gurukota rezvekurima, VaJoseph Made, vati varimi vemapurazi makuru kana kuti ma A2, ndivo vakarima chibage chakawanda chinosvika zvikamu makumi matatu kubva muzana zvichienzaniswa nezvikamu makumi maviri kubva muzana gore rapera. Varimi veminda midiki kana kuti  A1 ndivo havo vane goho rakakura rinosvika zvikamu makumi matanhatu nezvipfumbabwe kubva muzana. Asi kwekuwana chibage kuchagona kunetsa nekuti South Africa inoti inogona kusatengesa chibage nekuti naiyo haina goho rakakwana. Zimbabwe ichange ichikwikwidazanawo kutsvaga chibage nenyika dzakaita seMozambique neMalawi. Zimbabwe inogona hayo kuwana chibage kubva kuZambia ndokunge yawana mari yacho yekutenga. Gurukota rezvekurima muZambia, VaGiven Lubinda, vanoti Zambia yakashura mare mwaka uno pakurima chibage uye inokwanisa kutengesa miriyoni imwe chete yematani echibage. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa ndivo vanzi nedare remakurukota vave sachigaro wekomiti inoona nezvechikafu. Mukuru wesangano rinobatsira nechikafu reChristian Care, Reverend Stanlus Chatikobo, vanoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzechikafu munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa Orova Madzibaba VeShanduko, Uko Zanu-PF Ichinzi Yoshungurudza veCCC
text: Bato rinopikisa reCitizens Coalition for Change rinoti munyika maberekera ingwe zvichitevera kushungurudzwa kuri kuita nhengo dzaro kwasara vhiki rimwe chete kuti nyika iende kusarudzo. Sangano remagweta reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights raburitsa padandemutande raro reTwitter kuti VaGodfrey Chidhawu Karembera nhengo yebato reCitizens Coalition for Change (CCC) vanozivikanwa nekuti Madzibaba veShanduko varohwa vari mumaoko emapurisa kukamba yeHarare Central. ZLHR inotiwo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekusazvibata zvakanaka paruzhinji vachinzi vanga vachikurudzira vanhu kuti vavhotere VaNelson Chamisa veCCC. Bazi rezvekubuditswa kwemashoko ratiwo padandemutande retwitwer pari kuitwa tsvakurudzo nezvenyaya yekusabatwa zvakanaka kwaVakarembera vari mumaoko emapurisa. Mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi vaudza Studio 7 kuti mapurisa ari kuongorora nyaya yekuti VaKarembera varohwa vari mumaoko emapurisa uye imwe nyaya yavari kupomerwa yekuti vange vachitsvaga rutsigiro zvisina mvumo yemapurisa nekunzwiwo vatuka mapurisa pavange vachida kusungwa. Mutauriri weCCC, Muzvare Fadzayi Mahere vatiwoimwe nhengo yavo Amai Thokozile Dube varikuda kutsvaka chigaro chehukanzura kuUmzingwane ward 20 avkarara vachishungurudzwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri veZanu-PF. Mune imwewo nyaya, Bato reZanu PF rinoti rinoda kukunda sarudzo zvakachena uye ishuviro yavo kuti mapato ese ezvematongerwo enyika akwanise kutsvaka rutsigiro murunyararo. Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita nevatori venhau nhasi muHarare, vanoona nezvematongerwo enyika mubato reZanu PF, VaMike Bimha vati bato reZanu PF rinoda kuti mapato ese avachakwikwidzana nawo musarudzo vatsvake rutsigiro vakasununguka huye kusina mhirizhonga. VaBimha vakakurudzira mapurisa kuti aite basa nemazvo mukuferefeta nyaya dzine chekuita nemhirizhonga. Vatiwo bato reZanu PF ririkushandisa sarudzo dziri kutarisirwa munaKurume sechiyero kuona kuti zvirongwa zvehurumende zviri kutsigirwa here. Vaenderera mberi vachiti bato ravo ratotangawo kupa ruzivo kune avo vachange vari panzvimbo dzekuvhoterwa kana kuti mapolling agents. Asi Muzvare Mahere vati muromo hauzarirwe nerwizi sezvo Zanu-PF ichingotaura chete kuti haidi mhirizhonga asi nekune rimwe divi ichiipesvedzera. Nyanzvi munezvematongerwo enyika VaSydicks Muradzikwa vatiwo mamwe mapato munyika haasi kupiwa mukana wekutsvaka rutsigiro. Sarudzo dzemaby-elections dzirikutarisirwa kuitwa musi wa26 Kurume.

headline: Mizinda yeZimbabwe Yoendeswa kuMatare eDzimhosva Nekuda kweKukundikana Kubhadhara Mitero
text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zvinoti zviri kushushikana zvikuru nekukundikana kwehurumende kubhadhara mitero yezvivakwa zvairi kushandisa semizinda yenyika munyika dzakawanda. Izvi zvinonzi zvave kukanganisa mafambisirwo emabasa kumizinda iyi, sezvo mina yemizinda iyi yave kuendeswa kumatare edzimhosva munyika dzairi. Mizinda yave kuendeswa kumatare inoti uri kuLondon, uri kuHong Kong, uri kuNew York pamwe nemumwe usina kutaurwa nezita. Zvinhu zvinonziwo hazvina kumira zvakanaka kumizinda yakaita seuri kuBotswana nekuEthiopia, pakati pemimwe iri kutaraika. Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekudzidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaJoey Bimha neChipiri vakapa mufananidzo unonzi unosiririsa apo vaipupura mamiriro akaita zvinhu kumizinda yenyika kukomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika. VaBimha vanonzi vakaudza komiti iyi kuti zvinhu hazvina kumirawo zvakanaka kuvashandi vekumizinda iyi, sezvo vari kutatarikawo kuwana mihoro yavo. Vanonzi vakati vamwe vevashandi ava vakatobuda mudzimba dzehurumende dzavanga vachigara nekuda kwekutadza kubhadhara mitero. Mihoro yevashandi vehurumende vari kunze kwenyika inonzi yave kubva kuboka reSalary Service Bureau, iro rinonzi riri kutatarikawo kuisa mihoro paine nguva. Vamwe vevashandi ava vanonzi vari kuita dambudziko rekuti vazotora mihoro iyi munyika dzavagere. VaBimha vanonzi vakaudzawo komiti iyi kuti panzvimbo yekugadzirisa matambudziko, danho rekuti vashandi vekumizinda vawane mihoro yavo ichibva kubazi rezveupfumi rakatowedzera matambudziko. Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kukurudzira kuti hurumende ivhare mimwe mizinda, asi sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende iyi vachimirira Makonde VaKindness Paradza veZanu PF, vanoti danho iroro rinogonekwa chete kupasiswa nemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. VaParadza vanoti rimwe dambudziko riri pakuti bazi rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika harina zvivakwa zvaro sezvo zvivakwa izvi zviri pasi pebazi rezvekutongwa kwematunhu. Vanoti komiti yavo ichaedza kusangana negurukota rezveupfumi VaPatrick Chinamasa kuti vaone kuti vangabatsira sei kuti mizinda iyi iwane mari. Vanoti vachasanganawo zvakare naVaKasukuwere kuti vaone kuti bazi ravo ragadzirisa here zvimwe zvezvivakwa zvinonzi hazvichatarisika, zvakaita semuzinda wenyika uri kuEthiopia uyo unonzi unoda kuvandudzwa. No media source currently available

headline: Veruzhinji Voshora Makurukota Akadomwa naVaMnangagwa
text: Veruzhinji munyika vashora mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nekudoma vari muchiuto pamwe nevanhu vagara vari muhurumende yevaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe, kuti vapinde mudare remakurukota ehurumende, vachiti hapasisina tarisiro yekuti zvinhu zvichanaka munyika. Vataura neStudio 7 muHarare vanoti havasi kufara nekudomwa kwakaitwa makurukota ehurumende naVaMnangagwa nemusi weChina, vachiti vazhinji vevanhu ava vanhu vaiva muhurumende yaVaMugabe iyo yavari kupomera mhosva yekuondomora hupfumi hwenyika. Mumwe wevanhu ava ndiVaJeffrey Chaitezvi avo vanoti zvave pachena kuti VaMnangagwa vari pasi pemauto. Izvi zvatsinhirwa naVaFrancis Machimbidzofa avo vanoti vanoona sekuti VaMugabe vaitova nani pamatongero avo pana VaMnangagwa. VaCrispen Garatsa vanoti kudomwa kwaitwa Major General Sibusiso Moyo segurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika kunoburitsa pachena kuti zvakaitwa nemasoja pakubviswa kwaVaMugabe kwaitova kutora masimba nechisimba kana kuti coup de tat. VaMoyo, avo vaibuda pachivhiti vachizivisa zvaiitwa nemasoja pakutorerwa masimba kwakaitwa VaMugabe mazuva apfuura, ndivo vakambotungamira mauto eUnited Nations kuSomalia uye vari zvakare murume wemutongi wedare repamusoro Amai Loice Matanda Moyo. Muzvare Rutendo Kandengwa vanotiwo havasi kufara nekushomeka kwemadzimai mudare remakurukota iri. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika VaSydney Chisi avo vaimboshanda nesangano reYouth Initiative for Democracy in Zimbabwe, avo vave kushanda vakazvimirira, vanoti chave kutodikanwa ndechekuti veruzhinji vashandise sarudzo dzegore rinouya kudzosera masimba kuvanhu vachiti nyika yave muhutongi hwevari muchiuto. Zvichakadai, mashoko atiri kutambira anoti VaMnangagwa vachazivisa munguva pfupi iri kutevera kuti vachange vari vatevedzeri vavo ndivanaani. Vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika mukuumbwa kwehurumende vanoti mukuru wemauto VaConstantino Chiwenga naVaTshinga Dube ndivo vakatarisirwa kudomwa naVaMnangagwa sevatevedzeri vavo. No media source currently available Tiripanyaya imwe chete iyi, vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vachidzidzisa pa Tswane University of Technology mu South Africa, Doctor Ricky Mukonza, vanoti makurukota akasarudzwa nava Mnangagwa haapi vanhu tarisiro yekuti zvinhu zvichashanduka. Vanotizve mapato anopikisa anofanira kutsvaka mutungamiri wechidiki kuti vachishanda nesimba kuti Zimbabwe iponeswe. No media source currently available

headline: Tanganda Half Marathon yoitwa
text: KUCHANGE kusingadanwe anonzwa svondo rino kwaMutare uko shangwaiti dzekumhanya, kusanganisira dzinotarisirwa kubva kunyika dzekunze dzakadai seSpain, dzichakwikwidza mumujaho weAnnual Tanganda Half Marathon.   Shasha dzemarathon dzinodarika 700 dziri kutarisirwa kukwikwidza mumujaho wegore rino uye dzinosanganisira Misheck Sithole – uyo akahwina mujaho wevarume naRudo Mhonderwa akahwina kuvanhukdzi gore radarika.   Operations manager wekambani yeTanganda Tea, iyo iri kukotsvera mujaho uyu – Farai Garayi – anoti vari kutarisira dzimwe shasha dzekumhanya dzichabva kunze kwenyika.   “Gore rega rega tiri kugara tichitambira nhare kubva kunze kwenyika dzeshasha dzinomhanya marathon dzinoda kuuya kuzokwikwidza mumujaho uyu. Izvi zviri kurakidza kuti mujaho uyu uri kukura uye unofarirwa zvikuru.   “Saka isu sekambani tinovimbisa kuti makore anotevera ticharamba tichingoronga mujaho uyu,” anodaro Garayi.   Anoti gore rino kuri kuuya shangwiti dzemarathon dziri kubva kuSpain kuzokwikwidza mumujaho uyu.   “Kutaura kwandiri kuita kuno uku pane vanomhanya vekuSpain vakatonyoresa kuti vari kuuya kuzokwikwidza mumujaho uyu, zvinorakidza kuti wave mukuru uye unoteverwa pasi rose,” anodaro.   Shasha yemujaho wewiricheya Edmund Makutya – uyo anove kaputeni weTeam Zimbabwe – anoti mujaho weTanganda Half Marathon wakakosha chaizvo sezvo uchivabatsira mukuita gadziriro dzavo apo vanozoenda kunokwikwidza kunze kwenyika.   “Mujaho uyu wakatinakira isu nekuti tinogara tichienda kunokwikwidza kunze kwenyika saka tinoushandisa kuita gadziriro dzedu ndosaka tichiukoshesa uye tichienda gore negore kunokwikwidza,” anodaro Makutya.   Mujaho uyu wakareba makiromita 21 uye unomhanywa muMvuma road uchizoperera paMutare Sports Club.

headline: VaMzembi Votsvaga Rutsigiro rweKutungamira UNWTO muAmerica
