text: Gurukota rinoona nezvekushanyirwa kwenyika VaWalter Mzembi vari muNew York kumuzinda weUnited Nations nemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vachiyedza kutsvaga rutsigiro rwekuti vaite munyori mukuru wesangano reUnited Nations World Tourism Organization kana kuti UNWTO. VaMzembi vanoti vakatotambirwa neAfrican Union, SADC pamwe chete nehurumende yeZimbabwe. African Union yakatambira VaMzembi pamusangano wakaitirwa kuKigali, Rwanda. VaMzembi vakadomwa kuita gurukota rezvekushanyirwa kwenyika muna 2009 vachibva vasarudzwa kupinda muexecutive council yeUNWTO. Kubvira zvakaumbwa sangano iri muna 1975 hapana munhu wemuAfrica ati amboritungamira. VaMzembi vakashora zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kuratidzira panze pemuzinda weUnited Nations vachiti zviri kusvibisa zita renyika. Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe izvi zvinoti hazvisi kufara nematongero emutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. No media source currently available

headline: Varairidzi, VanaChiremba, naVanaMukoti Voramwa Mabasa
text: Sangano rinomirira vadzidzisi vekumaruwa reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe kana kuti ARTUZ rinoti nhengo dzaro zhinji hadzina kuenda kumabasa nhasi zvichitevera kurudziro yesangano iri yekuti varairidzi vasaende kumabasa vachitsutsumwa kuhurumende nemari dzemihoro. ARTUZ inoti nhengo dzayo dzakawanda nhasi dzaswera dzichidziya mushana kudzimba dzisiri pabasa zvichitevera kurudziro yesangano iri yekuti nhengo dzaro dziramwe mabasa kubva nhasi kusvika neChishanu nepamusana pekushomeka kwemari dzemihoro dzavari kutambiriswa nehurumende. Sachigaro weARTUZ mudunhu reHarare, VaMunyaradzi Masiyiwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti vadzidzisi vasina kuenda kumabasa nhasi vanodarika zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana. Mutungamiri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure vatiwo vachatora matanho akasimbarara kana hurumende ikaramba yakaisa zvimiti munzeve isiri kuda kuvabhadhara nemadhora ekuAmerica. Zvichakadai, mumwe mubereki ane mwana anodzidza pane chimwe chikoro chiri kuGoromonzi mudunhu reMashonaland East, Amai Tinotenda Kahari, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende inofanira kugadzirisa nhuna dzevarairidzi nekukasika kuitira kuti vana vasarasikirwe nedzidzo. Zvichakadai, mutungamiri werimwe sangano revadzidzisi reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaTakavafira Zhou, vati nhengo dzesangano ravo dzichatangawo kuramwa mabasa svondo rinouya. VaZhou vati sePTUZ vachataurawo nevemamwe masangano anomirira vashandi vose vehurumende kuti vaite muonerapamwe sechuma chemuzukuru. Mutungamiri weZIMTA VaRichard Gundani vanotiwo havasi kufara nemari dzavari kutambiriswa. Zvichakadai, gurukota rezvedzidzo, VaPaul Mavhima vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti homwe yehurumende yakabooka zvekuti hurumende haikwanise kubhadhara varairidzi nemari yekunze kana kuvawedzera maRTGS parizvino. Vati zvakawanda zvine chekuita nekuwedzerwa kwemari dzemihoro yevashandi vehurumende tibvunze kugurukota rezvemari VaMthuli Ncube avo vatisina kukwanisa kubata panharembozha yavo. Mutauriri weHealth Apex Council VaPanganai Chivese vanoti vanachiremba, vanamukoti nevamwe vashandi vehurumende vatotanga kuramwa mabasa nezuro. Vati vashandi vakawirirana kuenda kumabasa kaviri pazuva asi vachiita zvekuchinjana. Vayambira kuti hurumende ikasagadzirisa zvichemo zvavo havasi kuenda kubasa vose svondo rinouya. Vati health Services Board iyo tisina kubata yati hurumende yakanzwa chichemo chavo uye iri kuyedza kuchigadzirisa. Sangano rinomirira vashandi munyika reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions kana kuti ZCTU rinoti mushandi anotambira mari iri pasipasi anofanira kutambiriswa mazana matanhatu emadhora ekuAmerica sezvo zvinhu zviri kuramba zvichiwedzerwa mutengo muyika. No media source currently available

headline: Murairidzi weMorocco Walid Regragui Opinda Munhoroondo yeWorld Cup
text: Murairidzi wechikwata cheMorocco, Walid Regragui nezuro akapinda munhoroondo yekuva murairidzi wekutanga kubva muAfrica akakwanisa kusvika kumakotafainari emutambo weWorld Cup. Izvi zvakatevera kurova kwakaita Morocco nyika yeSpain 3-0 mumapenereti mushure mekunge nyika idzi dzaita mangange 0-0 kumakwikwi eFIFA World Cup kuQatar. Murairidzi kubva muAfrica akatanga kusvika muchikamu chechipiri kana kuti Round of 16 ndiStephen Keshi wekuNigeria muna 2014. Asi varairidzi vekunze vakapinda mumakotafainari vanoti Valeri Nepomniach wekuRussia airairidza Cameroon muna 1990. Chikwata cheCameroon ichi chainge chine vatambi vakaita saFrancois Oman-Biyik Roger Miller naCyrille Makanaky. Muna 2002, Bruno Metsu wekuFrance akaita zvimwe chete nechikwata cheSenegal chainge chine vatambi vakaita seEl hadji Diouf. Ainge apedzisira kusvika mumakotafainari nenyika yemuAfrica ndi Milovan Rajevac akatungamira Ghana muna 2010. Ghana ndiyo yaive nemukana mukuru wekupinda mumasemifainari asi yakaburitswa mushure mekunge Luis Suareze weUruguay abata bhora rainge rave kugohwa mutambo wave kusvika kwamvura yacheka makumbo nemaoko. Ghana yakabva yatadza kunwisa penereti ichibva yazodyiwa mumapenereti akatevera. Mumakwikwi aya, nyika dzose dzemuAfrica dzakakwikwidza dzainge dziine varairidzi kubva kunyika dzemuAfrica.

headline: Vanhu Vafa neCovid-19 muZimbabwe Vadarika Zana
text: Vanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika vave zana nevaviri kana kuti 104. MuHarare muri imo mune vanhu vakawandisa vafa nechirwere ichi vanosvika makumi mashanu nevashanu kana kuti 55. Bulawayo ndiyo iri kutevera pavanhu vafa vanosvika makumi maviri nevatatu. Dunhu reMasvingo chete ndiro risina kana munhu mumwe chete ati afa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika vadarika zviuru zvina nemazana mashanu ane makumi manomwe nemashanu kana kuti 4, 575. Vapora vachidarika chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mana ane gumi nevatanhatu kana kuti 1,416. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Brighton Chireka vanoti havo vanhu vazhinji vanopora kunyangwe vamwe vashoma vachida kuzoendeswa kuchipatara. No media source currently available Dr Chireka vatiwo kudziya muviri, kurutsa, kutonhorwa zvakanyanyisa, kubvunda nezvimwe munongedzo wekuti munhu anogona kunge abatwa nechirwere ichi. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete vabatwa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Vafa vadarika zviuru makumi maviri nemaviri ane mazana mapfumbamwe nevatatu kana kuti 22, 903. Vanhu vapora vadarika zviuru mazana masere nemakumi maviri kana kuti 720, 000. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni gumi memapfumbamwe ane zviuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 19, 6 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi muAmerica vadarika zviuru zana ne makumi matanhatu nemaviri kana kuti 162, 000. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vadarika zviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi maviri nemanomwe ane mazana mashanu kana kuti 727,000. Vapora pasi rose vachidarika mamiriyoni gumi nerimwe nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 11,9 million.

headline: Masvingo Yotarisana neNzara Inotyisa Sezvo Mvura Yarambira Mudenga
text:
Vamwe varimi mudunhu reMasvingo nemamwe matunhu vanoti vatarisana nenzara yakaoma sezvo pasina chichabuda muminda mavo sezvo zvirimwa zvakapera kutsva apo mvura yarambira mudenga, Varimi vataura neStudio 7 mumaruwa ekwaGutu, Mwenezi, Zaka, Chivi pamwe neNemanwa vanoti kunyange mvura ikauya hapana chavachawana
nekuti zvirimwa zvakatotsva sezvo mwedzi wese waKukadzi wakapera kusina kumbonaya kusvika parizvino. Mumwe murimi wemudunhu reNemamwa , VaHenry Makusha, vanoti vakatarisana nenzara yakaoma gore rino sezvo vasina kana chekunhonga mumunda mavo.

Izvi zvatsinhirwa naAmbuya, Rosina Gonese, vemuraini rekwaMakonese, kwaGutu, avo vati gore rino chero Mhunga neRukweza izvo zvisingadi mvura yakawanda zvakatsvawo.

Mumwe murimi wekuMwenezi, VaCuthebert Mashoko, vati kunze kwezvirimwa zvipfuwo zvakaita semombe zvirikufawo nekushaikwa kwemvura yakakwana
pamwe nezvimwe zvirwere zvakaita seJanuary Disease.

Hurumende inoti chirwere cheJanaurary disease chauraya mombe dzinopfuura mazana mana munyika kubva gore richitanga.
Vamwe varimi vanoti nemamiriro akaita mamiriro ekunze hapana chavachatarisisa uye vanotarisira kuti hurumende ichadeedzera kuti gore rino igore renzara pachinenguva vanhu vazowane rubatsiro. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvekurima munyika, Dr Anxious Masuka, kuti tinzwe divi divi ravoo pamamiriro akaita zvirimwa munyika sezvo nhare yavo yange isiri kudairwa. Asi munyori mukuru mubazi rinoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko munyika, VaNick Mangwana, vanyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter kuti hurumende yavekutanga chirongwa chekushandisa ndege dzinopfapfaidza mushonga mumakore kana kuti cloud seeding kuti mvura inaye ibatsire zvimwe zvirimwa zvisati zvanyanya kutsva. Mukuru webasa musangano rinomirira varimi munyika reZimbabwe Farmers Union(ZFU), VaPaul Zakariya, vanoti zvirimwa zvave kutsva munyika kunyanya munzvimbo dziri kumatunhu eMasvingo, Matebleland South neManicaland.

Sangano reFamine Early Warning Systems Network (FEWSNET) rinoti zvirimwa zvizhinji munyika zviri kutsva nezuva uye vanhu vanoda chikafu vachawedzera munyika gore rino.
FEWSNET inoti hurumende pamwe nemasangano akazvimirira vanotarisira kubatsira vanhu vanosvika mirioni imwe chete nezviurru mazana mashanu kubva muna Ndira kusvika kupera kwaKurume. Sangano iri rinoti gore rino goho rechibage richatengeserwa bazi reGrain Makerting Board(GMB) richadzika kubva pamatani zviruru mazvana mapfumbamwe nepfumbamwe 990 000 metric tonnes.

headline: Malawi yapinda mu’Round of 16′
text: APO maWarriors ari kudzoka kumusha mushure mekuburitswa mumutambo weAFCON, zvimwe zvikwata zvainge zviri muboka rimwe chete nechikwata chenyika ichi reGroup B zvinoti Malawi, Guinea neSenegal zvose zvabudirira kuenda muRound of 16 yemakwikwi aya.   Malawi yabudirira kuenda muRound of 16 zvichitevera kukunda kwayakaita Zimbabwe apo yakahwina 2-1 nemusi weChishanu svondo radarika uye nekuita mangange 0-0 neSenegal mumutambo uyo yakapotsa nepadiki yahwina apo yakazonyimwa pena mushure mekupindira kweVideo Assistant Referee (VAR).   CAF yazivisa nezvekubudirira kweMalawi kuenda kuRound of 16 apo yanyora padandemutande rayo reTwitter ichiti, “Nhoroondo. Chikwata cheMalawi chabudirira kuenda ku#TotalEnergiesAFCON knockout stages kekutanga munhoroondo yacho. Izuva rakakosha zvikuru kunyika yose.”   MaWarriors – ayo akapedza ari pasi muboka rawo – ane zvibodzwa zvitatu uye ari kutarisirwa kusvika munyika achibva kuCameroon.

headline: MaWarriors 9 vane Covid-19
text: SANGANO reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) razivisa kuti rambomisa gadziriro dzechikwata chenhabvu chenyika chemaWarriors dzekuenda kumakwikwi eAfrican Nations Championship (CHAN) zvichitevera kubatwa kwakaita vatambi vacho vapfumbamwe nechirwere cheCovid-19.   Muchinyorwa chakatumirwa neZifa, competitions manager ari zvekare mukushi wemashoko wesangano iri – Xolisani Gwesela – anoti vatambi vose vemaWarriors vainge vakasarudzwa kupinda muchikwata chaZdravko Logarusic nemusi weMuvhuro vakaongororwa pavakadzoka kubva kuzororo reKirisimasi zvikaonekwa kuti vapfumbamwe vavo vane chirwere ichi.   “Tichitevedzera mitemo, vatambi vose nevaraidzi vacho vakavhenekwa nemusi weMuvhuro (28 Zvita) vachibva kuzororo reKirisimasi ndokuonekwa kuti vapfumbamwe vavo vane Covid-19,” anodaro. Gwesela anoenderera mberi achiti vose vaonekwa kuti vane denda iri vaziviswa uye vave kutevedzera mitemo yeWorld Health Organisation (WHO) vachimbogara kwavo voga.   Kunyangwe zvazvo vatambi vane chirwere ichi vasina kudomwa nemazita, Gwesela anoti chikwata chemaWarriors chicharamba chiri mukembi asi chisingaite gadziriro.   Mitambo yeCHAN, iyo iri kutambirwa kuCameroon, ichatanga musi wa16 Ndira 2021 uye maWarriors ari muboka reGroup A rine zvikwata zvinoti Burkina Faso, Cameroon neMalawi.   Zvichakadai, kuMalawi, chikwata cheNyasa Bullets icho chinorairidzwa naKalisto Pasuwa kusvika pari zvino vatambi vacho 11 vabatwa vaine Covid-19.

headline: MaChevrons orongera Sri Lanka
text: CHIKWATA chenyika checricket chemaChevrons chiri kuSri Lanka uko chichasangana nechemaLions mumitambo mitatu yeICC Men’s Cricket World Cup Super League.   Mitambo iyi yeOne Day International ichatanga nemusi weSvondo uye mimwe ichizotambwa musi wa18 na21 Ndira kunhandare yePallekele International Cricket Stadium kuKandy.   MaChevrons ari kufanirwa kuhwina mitambo iyi yeSuper League sezvo ichizovabatsira kuti vagobudirira kuenda kumutambo we2023 ICC World Cup uyo uchaitirwa kuIndia.   Murairidzi wemaChevrons, Lalchand Rajput, anoti ane chivimbo chekuti chikwata chake chinogona kukunda Sri Lanka uye mitambo iyi yakavakoshera.   “Mitambo yose iyi yakatikoshera nekuti Super League ndiyo ichazivisa vachabudirira kamwe chete vasingazonotambe mimwe mitambo, saka zvakakosha kuti tigadzirire totanga zvakanaka.   “Ndiri munhu anozvitemba uye ndinoziva kuti Sri Lanka togona kuikunda tichitarisa kuti takave nemutambo wakanaka tichitamba mutambo wePro50,” anodaro.   Kusvika pari zvino, maChevrons akwanisa kutamba mitambo mipfumbamwe asi akangohwina miviri chete, akakundwa mitanhatu uye ndiwo akasenga ari pasi muboka reSuper League.   Rajput, uyo anove chirwara chenyika yeIndia, anoti matambiro ange achiita chikwata chake haasi kufadza nekudaro vanofanirwa kutokunya masokisi avo.   “Hatina kutanga zvakanaka mumutambo uyu, asi ndinoziva kuti nevatambi vatinavo – avo vange vachitamba zvinonwisa mvura muPro50 – tichatamba zvakanaka patiri kusangana neSri Lanka,” anodaro.   Zvakadaro, Rajput anonzi paakasvika kuSri Lanka achibva kuIndia akabatwa nedenda reCovid-19 ndokumboiswa kunzvimbo yake oga kwemazuva matatu senzira yebio-secure bubble iyo iri kushandiswa panotambwa mitambo yecricket kunyika dzose.

headline: Sangano reMagweta reZLHR Rinobatsira kuNunura Vanhu Vaive muMatare eDzimhosva
text: Sangano remagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Lawyers for Huan Rights, rakazivisa nezuro kuti rakakwanisa kuburitsa muhusungwa murume wekuChipinge, VaTawanda Muzanya, avo vakanga vapedza mazuva maviri vari muhusungwa vachipomerwa mhosva yekutuka mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. VaMuzanya vanonzi vakati mutungamiri wenyika vanoita zvehuwori uye vauraya nyika. VaMuzanya, avo vari kumirirwa naMuzvare Peggy Tavagadza, vakanzi vabvise mari yechibatiso inoita madhora emunyika zviuru zvishanu uye vange vachizvitaridza kumapurisa epa Chisumbanje Police Station kamwechete mushure memasvondo maviri oga oga. Sangano iri rinoti magweta aro ari kumirirawo madzimai matatu anoti Benevolence Taguta naTracy Mutiwekuziva vesangano re TIZim pamwe naLisa Mataka wesangano reShamwari yeMwanasikana, avo varinoti vakasungwa kuChitungwiza neChina vachipomerwa mhosva yekuita musangano vasina mvumo yemapurisa. Vatatu ava vainzi vakaendeswa kukamba yemapurisa yeHarare Central Police Station kudivi reLaw and Order, uye hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kuti vachamiswa mudare riinhi. KuChinhoyi, Zimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights inoti yakakwanisa neChina chakare kununura mutori wenhau anoshanda akazvimirira, Nunurai Jena, uyo anga ave nemakore maviri achitongwa nemhosva yekutuka mapurisa achinzi akavati vanoita zvehuwori. Jena, uyo akasungwa muna Kubvumbi 2020 akachenurwa nemutongi wedare ramejasitiriti Amai Chido Garwe, avo vakawana asina mhosva. Jena aimirirwa negweta VaKudzai Choga.

headline: Covid yakanganisa karate
text: SANGANO reZimbabwe Karate Union rinoti kumiswa kwakaitwa mitambo yakasiyana nekuda kweCovid-19 kwave kukonzeresa kuti vamwe vechidiki varase hunhu sezvo vachiswera vachingodzengerera mumigwagwa.   Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weZKU, Shihan Tawanda Mufundisi anoti hupenyu hwevatambi vekarate vazhinji hwakakanganiswa zvikuru sezvo vachirarama kuburikidza nemutambo uyu.     Anoti mitambo yakaita sekarate inobatsira vechidiki kuti vagone kuzvibata muhupenyu hwavo uye kuvafundisa kuti vasiyane nezvinodhaka.   “Tine vechidiki vakawanda vatange tichishanda navo tichifundisa karate asi iye zvino tave kuvatyira nekuti kumiswa kwakaitwa mitambo uye kuvharwa kwemagym vave kuswera vachingodzungaira mumigwagwa.   “Mitambo iyi yaishandiswa senzira yekubatsira vechidiki kuti vabve mumigwagwa vasaswere vachingomberereka nekuti ndipo vanopedzisira vave kufurirana kuita zvenhando, mongoziva vechidiki kana vakaswera vasina zvekuita panoitwa mabasa makuru ipapo,” anodaro Shihan Mufundisi.   Anoenderera mberi achiti sesangano, vakanyorera kuHurumende vachikumbira mvumo yekuti vavhure madojo vatange kuita gadziriro dzavo dzekarate asi vasingaronge mitambo.   Anoti mutambi wekarate anofanirwa kugara achiita gadziriro dzake nguva nenguva sezvo mutambo uyu uchidzidzisa kuzvibata uye kuzvininipisa.   “Mutambi wekarate anofanirwa kugara ari mudojo achiita gadziriro dzake, mutambo uyu unobatsira zvakawanda zvinosanganisira kuzvibata chaiko.   “Isu vamwe tairarama kuburikidza nekukwikwidza uye kumbopihwa mabasa ekushanda ekuchengetedza vanhu asi zvese zvakaenda mudondo nekuti coronavirus yakauya, shuwa yakatiurayira basa,” anodaro.
